metadata.title: Complete Taittiriya Corpus
metadata.description: Complete digitized texts of Taittiriya Samhita, Brahmana, and Aranyaka

samhita.description: Mantra texts with padam (word-by-word) and samhita (continuous) versions

aranyaka.description: Forest texts with philosophical and mystical content

verses.padam: iṣE|tvA|UrjE|tvA|vAyavaḥ|stha|upAyava̍ ityupa̍ - Ayavaḥ|stha|dEvaḥ|vaḥ|savitA|prEti̍|arpayatu|śrEṣṭha̍tamAyEti̍ śrEṣṭha# - tamAya|karmaṇE|Eti̍|pyAyadhvam|aGniyAḥ|dEvaBAgamiti̍# dEva- BAgam|UrjasvatIḥ|paya̍svatIḥ|prajAva̍tIriti̍# prajA-vatIḥ|anamIvAḥ|ayakṣmAḥ|mA|vaḥ|stEnaḥ|Iśata|mA|aGaśaṃsa̍ ityaGa - śaṃqsaḥ|rudrasya|hEtiḥ|parIti̍|vaḥ|vRuṇaktu|dhruvAḥ|asminn|gOpa̍tAviti̍ gO -patau|syAta|bahvIḥ|yajamAnasya|paśUn|pAhi||1̍ (iṣE - tricatvAriṃśat̍ )
verses.samhita: iṣE tvOrjE tvA# vAyavaḥ̍ sthOpAyavaḥ̍ stha dEvO vaḥ̍ savitA prArpayatu̍ śrEṣṭhatamAya̍ karmaṇa̍ A pyAyaddhvamaGniyA̍ dEvaBAgamUrjasvatIḥ̍ payasvatIḥ̍ prajAvatIranamIvA̍ ayakṣmA̍ mA vaḥ̍ stEna Iśata̍ mA&GaśaṃsO̍ rudrasya# hEtiḥ pari# vO vRuṇaktu dhruvA asmin gOpatau̍ syAta bahvIr yajamAnasya̍ paśUn pAhi||1̍

verses.padam: yajñasya|GOṣat|asi|pratyu̍ṣṭamiti̍ prati# - uṣṭam|rakṣaḥ|pratyu̍ṣṭA̍ iti prati# - uṣṭAḥ|arAtayaḥ|prEti̍|iyam|agAt|dhiṣaṇA̱|baṛqhiḥ|acCa̍|manu̍nA|kRutA|svadhayEti̍# sva-dhayA̱|vitaṣṭEti vi - taṣṭA|tE|Eti|vahanti|kavaya̍ḥ|purastA̱t|dEvEBya̍ḥ|juṣṭa̱m|iha|baṛqḥiḥ|Asada̍ ityA̱ - sadE̱|dEvAnA̱m|pariṣUtamiti# pari -sUtam|asi|vaṛqṣavRuddhamiti̍# vaṛqṣa -vRuddham|asi|dEvabaṛhiriti̍ dEva# - baṛqhiḥ|mA|tvA|anvak|mA|tiryak|parva|tE|rAdhyAsam|AcCEttEtyA̱̍ - CEttA|tE|mA|riṣam|dEvabaṛhiriti̍ dEva# -baṛqhiḥ|śatavaḷśamiti̍# śata - vaḷśam|vIti|rOha|sahasra̍valśA̍ iti# sahasra# -valśAḥ|2 (50)
verses.samhita: yajñasya# GOṣadasi̍ pratyuṣṭaṃq̍ rakṣaḥ pratyuṣṭA̍ arAtayaḥ̍ prEyamagAddhiṣaṇA̍# barqḥiracCa manunA̍ kRutA svadhayA vitaṣṭA̍ ta A vahanti̍ kavayaḥ̍ purastA̱d- dEvEByO juṣṭamiha̍ barqḥirAsadE# dEvAnA̱M pariṣUtamasi̍ varq.ṣavRuddhamasi̍ dEvabaṛhirmA̍ tvA&qnva~g mA tiryak parva# tE rAddhyAsamAcCEttA tE mA riṣaM̍ dEvabaṛhiḥ̍ śatavaḷśaM̍ ~Mvi rOha̍ sahasravaḷśA̍ - [ ] 2

verses.padam: vIti|vayam|ruhEma|pRuthivyAḥ|saMpRuca̍ iti# saM - pRucaḥ|pAhi|susaMBRutEti̍# su - saMBRutA̱|tvA|samiti|BarAmi|adi̍tyai|rAsnA̱|asi|indrAṇyai|saMnaha̍namiti̍# saM - nahanam|pUṣA|tE|granthim|grathnAtu|saḥ|tE|mA|Eti̍|sthAt|indra̍sya|tvA|bAhuByAmiti̍# bAhu-ByAm|uditi|yacCE|bRuhaspatE̱ḥ|mUrdhnA|harAmi|uru|antari̍kṣam|anviti̍|ihi|dEva~ggamamiti̍# dEvam - gamam|asi||3 (38) (sahasravalśA̍ - aṣṭAtriṃśacca)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: vi vayaṃ ruhEma̍ pRuthivyAḥ saMpRucaḥ̍ pAhi susaMBRutA̱ tvA saMBarAmyadi̍tyai̍ rAsnA&sIndrAṇyai̍ sannahanaM̍ pUṣA tE̱ granthiM grathnAtu̍ sa tE mA&& sthAdindrasya̍ tvA bAhuByAmudyacCE̍ bRuhaspatE̱r mUrddhnA harAmyurva̍ntari̍kṣamanvi̍hi̍ dEvaMgamamasi||3̍ (sahasravaḷśA̍ - aṣṭAtriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: śundhaddhvam|daivyA̍ya|karma̍ṇE|dEvayajyAyA̍ iti# dEva -yajyAyai̱|mAtariśvanaḥ|Garmaḥ|asi|dyauḥ|asi|pRuthivI|asi|viśvadhA̍yA̍ iti# viśva -dhAyAḥ|asi|paramEṇa|dhAmnA̱|dRuṃha̍sva|mA|hvAḥ|vasU̍nAm|pavitra̱m|asi|śatadhA̍ramiti̍# śata -dhAram|vasUnAm|pavitra̱m|asi|sahasra̍dhAramiti̍# sahasra# - dhAram|hutaḥ|stOkaḥ|hutaḥ|draPsaḥ|agnayE̱|bRuhatE|nAkAya|svAhA̱|dyAvA̍# pRuthivIByAmiti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivIByA̱m|sA|viśvAyuriti# viśva- Ayuḥ|sA|viśvavyacA̍ iti# viśva -vyacAḥ|sA|viśvakarmEti# viśva -karmA|samiti|pRucyaddhvam|RutAvarIrityRu̍ta̍ - varIḥ|UrmiṇI̱ḥ|madhumattamA̍ iti madhumat-tamAḥ|mandrAḥ|dhana̍sya|sAtayE̱|sOmE̍na̍ ( )|tvA|Eti|tanacmi|indrA̍ya|dadhi̍|viṣṇO̍ iti|havyam|rakṣasva||4̍ (58)
verses.samhita: śundhaddhvaM̍ daivyAya̍ karmaṇE̍ dEvayajyAyai# mAtariśvanO̍ GarmO&si̍ dyaurasi̍ pRuthivyasi̍ viśvadhAyA̍ asi paramEṇa dhAmnA dRuṃhasva̍ mA hvAr vasUnAM̍ pavitramasi̍ śatadhAraM̍ ~MvasUnAM̍ pavitramasi̍ sahasradhAraṃ̍ hutaḥ stOkOhutO draPsO̱ &gnayE# bRuhatE nAkAya̍ svAhA dyAvApRuthivIByAṃq̍ sA viśvAyuḥ sA viśvavyacAḥ̍ sA viśvakarmA̍ saM pRucyaddhva-mRutAvarI-rUrmiṇIrmadhu̍mattamA̍ mandrA dhanasya̍ sAtayE sOmEna̍ ( ) tvA&&tanacmIndrA̍ya̍ dadhi viṣṇO# havyaṃ rakṣasva||4̍

verses.padam: karmaṇE|vAm|dEvEBya̍ḥ|śakEyam|vEṣA̍ya|tvA|pratyu̍ṣṭamiti̍ prati# -uṣṭam|rakṣaḥ|pratyu̍ṣṭA̍ iti prati# -uṣṭAḥ|arAtayaḥ|dhUḥ|asi|dhUrva̍|dhUrva̍ntam|dhUrva̍|tam|yaḥ|asmAn|dhUrva̍ti|tam|dhUrva|yam|vayam|dhUrvA̍maḥ|tvam|dEvAnA̱m|asi|sasni̍tamamiti̍ sasni# - tamam|papritamamiti̍ papri# -tamam|juṣṭatamamiti̍ juṣṭa# - tamam|vahnitamamiti̍ vahni# - tamam|dEvahUtamamiti̍# dEva-hUtamam|ahru̍tam|asi|havirdhAnamiti̍# haviḥ - dhAna̱m|dRuṃhasva|mA|hvAḥ|mitrasya̍|tvA|cakṣu̍ṣA|prEti̍|IkṣE|mA|BEḥ|mA|samiti̍|vikthA|mA|tvA|5̍ (50)
verses.samhita: karmaṇE̍ vAM dEvEByaḥ̍ śakEyaM ~MvEṣAya̍ tvA pratyuṣṭaṃq̍ rakṣaḥ pratyuṣṭA̍ arAtayO̍ dhUrasi̍ dhUrva dhUrvantaM̍ dhUrva taM ~MyO̱&smAn dhUrvati̍ taM dhU̱rvayaM ~MvayaM dhUrvAmastvaM̍ dEvAnAmasi̍ sasnitamaM̍ papritamaM̍ juṣṭatamaM̍ ~MvahnitamaM̍ dEvahUtama-mahru̍tamasi̍ havirdhAnaM dRuṃhasva̍ mA hvA̱r mitrasya# tvA cakṣuṣA̍ prEkṣE mA BErmA saM ~MvikthA̍ mA tvA# - [ ] 5

verses.padam: hiṃqsiṣam|uru|vAtAya|dEvasya̍|tvA|savituḥ|prasava̍ iti# pra -savE|aśvinO̱ḥ|bAhuByAmiti# bAhu -ByAm|pUṣṇaḥ|hastA̱ByAm|agnayE̱|juṣṭa̱m|niriti|vapAmi|agnIṣOmA̱ByAmityagnI̍ - sOmA̱ByAm|idam|dEvAnA̱m|idam|u|naḥ|saha|sPAtyai|tvA|na|arA̱tyai|suvaḥ|aBi|vIti̍|KyEṣam|vaiśvAnaram|jyOti̍ḥ|dRuṃha̍ntAm|duryA̱ḥ|dyAvA̍pRuthivyOriti̍ dyAvA̱ - pRuthivyOḥ|uru|antarikṣam|anviti̍|ihi|adi̍tyAḥ|tvA|upastha̍ ityupa-sthE|sAdayAmi|agnE̱|havyam|rakṣasva||6 (46) ( mA tvA - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśacca̍ ) (A4)
verses.samhita: hiṃsiṣamuru vAtAya̍ dEvasya# tvA savituḥ prasavE̱&śvinO̱r̍ bAhuByA̱M pUṣṇO hastA̱ByA-magnayE juṣṭaM nirvapAmyagnIṣOmA̱ByA-midaM̍ dEvAnAmidamu̍# naḥ saha sPAtyai tvA nArA̱tyai suvaraBi̍ vi KyEṣaM̍ ~MvaiśvAnaraM jyOtir dRuṃhantAM̍ duryA dyAvApRuthivyO-̍ rurvantari̍kṣa̍ manvi-hyadityA̍ stvOpasthE# sAdayAmyagnE# havyaṃ rakṣasva||6̍

verses.padam: dEvaḥ|vaḥ|savitA|uditi|punAtu|acCi̍drEṇa|pavitrE̍ṇa|vasO̱ḥ|sUrya̍sya|raśmiBiriti̍# raśmi - Biḥ|Apaḥ|dEvIḥ|agrEpuva̍ ityagrE̍ - puvaḥ|agrEguva ityagrE̍ - guvaḥ|agrE̱|imam|yajñam|nayata|agrE̱|yajñapatimiti̍# yajña - patim|dhatta|yuṣmAn|indraḥ|avRuṇIta|vRutratUrya̍ iti# vRutra -tUryE̱|yUyam|indra̱m|avRuṇIdhvam|vRutratUrya iti# vRutra -tUryE̱|prOkṣitA̍ iti pra -ukṣitAḥ|stha|agnayE̱|vaḥ|juṣṭa̱m|prEti|ukṣAmi|agnIṣOmA̱ByAmityagnI̍ - sOmA̱ByAm|śundhadhvam|daivyA̍ya|karma̍ṇE|dEvayajyAyA̍ iti# dEva-yajyAyai̱|avadhUtamityava̍# - dhUtam|rakṣaḥ|ava̍dhUtA̍ ityava# - dhUtAḥ|arAtayaḥ|adi̍tyAḥ|tvak|asi|pratIti̍|tvA|7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvO vaḥ̍ savitOt punAtvacCi̍drEṇa̍ pavitrEṇa̍ vasOḥ sUryasya̍ raśmiBirApO# dEvIragrEpuvO agrEguvO&gra# imaM ~MyajñaM nayatAgrE̍# yajñapatiM̍ dhatta yuṣmAnindrO# &vRuṇIta vRutratUryE# yUyamindra-mavRuṇIddhvaM̍ ~MvRutratUryE prOkṣitAḥ̍ sthAgnayE# vO juṣṭaM prOkṣA̱myagnIṣOmA̱ByAṃq śundhaddhvaM̍ daivyAya̍ karmaṇE̍ dEvayajyAyA avadhUtaṃq̍ rakṣO&vadhUtA̍ arAtayO&di̍tyAstvaga̍si̍ prati# tvA - [ ] 7

verses.padam: pRuthivI|vEttu|adhiṣavaṇamitya̍dhi̍ - savanam|asi|vAnaspatyam|pratIti̍|tvA|adi̍tyAḥ|tvak|vEttu|agnEḥ|tanUḥ|asi|vAcaḥ|visarja̍namiti̍# vi-sarjanam|dEvavI̍taya̍ iti# dEva- vItayE|tvA|gRuhṇAmi|adriḥ|asi|vAnaspatyaḥ|saḥ|idam|dEvEBya̍ḥ|havyam|suśamIti̍# su- śami|śamiṣva|iṣa̱m|Eti̍|vada|Urja̱m|Eti̍|vada|dyumaditi̍# dyu-mat|vadata|vayam|sa~gGAtamiti# saM - GAtam|jEṣma|vaṛqṣavRuddhamiti̍# vaṛqṣa -vRuddham|asi|pratIti|tvA|vaṛqṣavRu̍ddhamiti̍# vaṛqṣa -vRuddham|vEttu|parApUtamiti̍ parA̱ - pUtam|rakṣaḥ|parA̍pUtA̍ iti parA̱ - pUtAḥ|arAtayaḥ|rakṣa̍sAm|BAgaḥ̍ ( )|asi|vAyuḥ|vaḥ|vIti|vinaktu|dEvaḥ|vaḥ|savitA|hira̍ṇyapAṇiriti̍ hiraṇya̍ - pAṇiḥ|pratIti|gRuhṇAtu||8̍ (61)
verses.samhita: pRuthivI vE̱ttvadhiṣavaṇamasi̍ vAnaspatyaM prati tvA&dityAstvagvE̱ttvagnEstanUra̍si̍ vAcO visarjanaM̍ dEvavItayE̍ tvA gRuhṇAmyadrirasi̍ vAnaspatyaḥ sa idaM dEvEByO# havyaṃ suśami# śamiṣvEṣamA vadOrjamA vada̍ dyumadvadata̍ vayaṃ saMGAtaM̍ jE̱ṣma varq.ṣavRuddhamasi̍ prati# tvA varq.ṣavRuddhaM̍ ~MvEttu parApUtaṃq̍ rakṣaḥ parApUtA̍ arAtayO̍ rakṣasAM̍ BAgO# ( ) &si vAyurvO vi vinaktu̍ dEvO vaḥ̍ savitA hiraṇyapAṇiḥ̍ prati# gRuhṇAtu||8

verses.padam: avadhUtamityava̍# - dhUtam|rakṣaḥ|ava̍dhUtA̍ ityava# - dhUtAḥ|arAtayaḥ|adi̍tyAḥ|tvak|asi|pratIti̍|tvA|pRuthivI|vEttu|divaḥ|skamBaniḥ|asi|pratIti̍|tvA|adi̍tyAḥ|tvak|vEttu|dhiṣaṇA̱|asi|parvatyA|pratIti̍|tvA|divaḥ|skamBaniḥ|vEttu|dhiṣaṇA̱|asi|pArvatEyI|pratIti̍|tvA|parvatiḥ|vEttu|dEvasya̍|tvA|savituḥ|prasava̍ iti# pra -savE|aśvinO̱ḥ|bAhuByAmiti# bAhu-ByAm|pUṣṇaḥ|hastA̱ByAm|adhIti|vapAmi|dhAnya̱m|asi|dhinuhi|dEvAn|prAṇAyEti̍# pra-anAya|tvA̍ ( )|apAnAtyEpa̍ -anAya|tvA|vyAnAyEti̍# vi- anAya|tvA|dIrGAm|anviti̍|prasi̍timiti̍ pra - sitim|AyuṣE|dhAm|dEvaḥ|vaḥ|savitA|hira̍ṇyapAṇiriti̍ hiraṇya̍ - pAṇiḥ|pratIti|gRuhṇAtu||9̍ (65)
verses.samhita: avadhUtaṃq̍ rakṣO&vadhUtA̍ arAtayO&di̍tyAstvaga̍si̍ prati# tvA pRuthivIvE̱ttu divaḥ skaMBanira̍si̍ prati tvA&dityAstvagvE̱ttu̍ dhiṣaṇA&si̍ parvatyA prati# tvA divaḥ skaMBanirvE̱ttu̍ dhiṣaṇA&si̍ pArvatEyI prati# tvA parvatirvE̱ttu dEvasya# tvA savituḥ prasavE̱-&śvinO̱r̍ bAhuByA̱M pUṣṇOhastA̱ByAmadhi# vapAmidhAnyamasi̍ dhinuhi dEvAn prAṇAya# tvA ( ) &pAnAya# tvA vyAnAya# tvA dIrGAmanu prasitimAyu̍ṣEdhAM̍ dEvO vaḥ̍ savitA hiraṇyapAṇiḥ̍ prati# gRuhṇAtu||9

verses.padam: dhRuṣṭiḥ|asi|brahma̍|yacCa|apEti̍|agnE|agnim|AmAdamityA̍ma̍ -ada̱m|jahi|niriti|kravyAdamiti̍# kravya- ada̱m|sEdha|Eti|dEvayajamiti̍# dEva-yaja̱m|vaha|nirdagdhamiti̍ niḥ - dagdham|rakṣaḥ|nirda̍gdhA̍ iti niḥ - dagdhAḥ|arAtayaḥ|dhruvam|asi|pRuthivIm|dRuṃqha|Ayu̍ḥ|dRuṃqha|prajAmiti̍# pra -jAm|dRuṃqha|sajAtAniti# sa-jAtAn|asmai|yajamAnAya|parIti̍|Uha|dhartram|asi|antari̍kṣam|dRuṃqha|prAṇamiti̍# pra- anam|dRuṃqha|ApAnamityapa̍ - anam|dRuṃqha|sajAtAniti# sa-jAtAn|asmai|yajamAnAya|parIti̍|Uha|dharuṇa̱m|asi|diva̱m|dRuṃqha|cakṣu̍ḥ|10̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dhRuṣṭirasi̍ brahma# yacCApA̱gnE &gnimAmAdaM̍ jahi niṣkravyAdaṃ# sEdhA&&dEvayaja̍M̍ ~Mvaha nirdagdhaṃq̍ rakṣO nirdagdhA̍ arAtayO̍ dhruvamasi̍ pRuthivIM dRuṃqhA&&*yur̍ dRuṃha prajAM dRuṃha̍ sajAtAnasmai yajamAnAya̍ paryUha̍ dhartramasyantari̍kṣaM̍ dRuṃha prAṇaM dRuṃhApAnaM̍ dRuṃha̍ sajAtAnasmai yajamAnAya̍ paryUha̍ dharuṇamasi̍ divaM̍ dRuṃha cakṣur-̍ [ ] 10

verses.padam: dRuṃqha|śrOtra̱m|dRuṃqha|sajAtAniti# sa-jAtAn|asmai|yajamAnAya|parIti̍|Uha|dharma̍|asi|diśa̍ḥ|dRuṃqha|yOni̱m|dRuṃqha|prajAmiti̍# pra -jAm|dRuṃqha|sajAtAniti# sa-jAtAn|asmai|yajamAnAya|parIti̍|Uha|cita̍ḥ|stha|prajAmiti̍# pra -jAm|asmai|rayim|asmai|sajAtAniti# sa-jAtAn|asmai|yajamAnAya|parIti̍|Uha|BRugU̍ṇAm|a~ggi̍rasAm|tapa̍sA|tapyadhvam|yAni̍|GarmE|kapAlA̍ni|upacinvantItyu̍pa̍ - cinvanti|vEdhasa̍ḥ||pUṣṇaḥ|tAni̍|apIti̍|vratE|indravAyU̍ itI̱ndra-vAyU|vIti|mu~jcatAm||11̍ (48) (cakṣu# - raṣṭAcatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: dRuṃha śrOtraM̍ dRuṃha sajAtAnasmai yajamAnAya̍ paryUha̍ dharmAsi̍ diśO# dRuṃha yOniM̍ dRuṃha prajAM dRuṃha̍ sajAtAnasmai yajamAnAya̍ paryUha̍ citaḥ̍ stha prajAmasmai rayimasmai sajAtAnasmai̍ yajamAnAya̍ paryUha̍ BRugUṇAma~ggi̍rasAM̍ tapasA̍ tapyaddhvaM ~MyAni# GarmE kapAlA̱nyupacinvanti# vEdhasaḥ|pUṣṇastAnyapi̍# vrata indravAyU̍ vi mu~jcatAM||11̍ (cakṣu# - raṣṭAcatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: samiti|vapAmi|samiti̍|Apa̍ḥ|adBiritya̍t̍ - Biḥ|agmata|samiti|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|rasE̍na|samiti̍|rEvatI̱ḥ|jaga̍tIBiḥ|madhu̍matIriti̍ madhu# - matIḥ|madhumatIBiriti̍ madhu# - matIBiḥ|sRujyadhvam|adBya ityat̍ - Byaḥ|parIti|prajA̍tA̍ iti pra -jAtAḥ|stha|samiti|adBiritya̍t̍ - Biḥ|pRucyadhvam|janayatyai|tvA|samiti̍|yaumi|agnayE̱|tvA|agnIṣOmA̱ByAmityagnI̍ - sOmA̱ByAm|maKasya|śira̍ḥ|asi|Garmaḥ|asi|viśvAyururiti̍# viśva- Ayuḥ|uru|prathasva|uru|tE|yajñapatiriti̍# yajña -patiḥ|prathatAm|tvaca̱m|gRuhṇIṣva|antaritamityantaḥ̍ - itam|rakṣaḥ|antari̍tA̍ ityantaḥ - itAḥ|arAtayaḥ|dEvaḥ|tvA|savitA̍ ( )|śrapayatu|vaṛṣiṣṭhE|adhIti̍|nAkE̱|agniḥ|tE|tanuva̱m|mA|atIti̍|dhAk|agnE̱|havyam|rakṣasva|samiti̍|brahma̍ṇA|pRucyasva|EkatAya̍|svAhA̱|dvitAya̍|svAhA̱|tritAya̍|svAhA̱||12̍ (72) (savitA - dvAviṃśatiśca)̍ (A8)
verses.samhita: saM ~MvapAmi̍ samApO# adBiragmata̍ samOṣadhayO̍ rasEna̍ saṃ rEvatIr jagatIBir̍ madhumatIr̍ madhumatIBiḥ̍ sRujyaddhvamadByaḥ pari prajAtAḥ̍ stha samadBiḥ pRucyaddhvaM̍ janayatyai̍ tvA saM ~Myau̱myagnayE̱ tvA&gnIṣOmA̱ByAM maKasya śirO&si̍ GarmO&si̍ viśvAyururu̍ prathasvOru̍ tE# yajñapatiḥ̍ prathatAM tvacaM̍ gRuhṇIṣvAntaritaṃq̍ rakṣO&ntaritA̍ arAtayOdEvastvA̍# savitA ( ) śrapayatu̍ vaṛṣiṣṭhE̍ adhi nAkE&gnistE# tanuvaM mA&ti# dhAgagnE# havyaṃ rakṣasva̍ saM brahmaṇA̍ pRucyasvaikatAya svAhA̱ dvitAya svAhA̱ tritAya svAhA̱||12 (savitA - dvAviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: Eti|dadE|indra̍sya|bAhuḥ|asi|dakṣi̍ṇaḥ|sahasra̍BRuṣṭiriti̍# sahasra# -BRuṣṭiḥ|śatatEjA̍ iti# śata -tEjAḥ|vAyuḥ|asi|tigmatEjA̍ iti# tigma - tEjAḥ|pRuthivi|dEvayajanIti̍# dEva -yajani|OṣadhyAḥ|tE|mUla̱m|mA|hiṃqsiṣam|apa̍hata̍ ityapa# -hataḥ|araruḥ|pRuthivyai|vrajam|gacCa|gOsthAnamiti̍# gO-sthAna̱m|vaṛṣatu|tE|dyauḥ|badhAna|dEva|savitaḥ|paramasyA̱m|parAvatIti̍# parA - vati|śatEna̍|pAśai̱ḥ|yaḥ|asmAn|dvEṣṭi̍|yam|ca|vayam|dviṣmaḥ|tam|ata̍ḥ|mA|mauk|apa̍hata̍ ityapa# -hataḥ|araruḥ|pRuthivyai|dEvayaja̍nyA̍ iti# dEva -yajanyai|vrajam|13̍ (50)
verses.samhita: A dada̍ indrasya̍ bAhurasi̍ dakṣiṇaḥ̍ sahasraBRuṣṭiḥ̍ śatatEjA̍ vAyurasi̍ tigmatEjAḥ̍ pRuthivi̍ dEvayaja - nyOṣaddhyAstE̍ mUlaM mA hiṃsiṣa-mapa̍hatO&raru̍ḥ̍ pRuthivyai vrajaM gacCa̍ gOsthAnaM ~Mvaṛṣatu̍ tE dyaurbadhAna̍ dEva̍ savitaḥ paramasyA̱M parAvati# śatEna pAśairyO̱&smAn dvEṣṭi yaM ca# vayaM dviṣmastamatO mA maugapahatO&raru̍ḥ̍ pRuthivyai dEvayaja̍nyai̍ vrajaM -[ ] 13

verses.padam: gacCa|gOsthAnamiti# gO-sthAna̱m|vaṛṣatu|tE|dyauḥ|badhAna|dEva|savitaḥ|paramasyA̱m|parAvatIti̍# parA - vati|śatEna̍|pAśai̱ḥ|yaḥ|asmAn|dvEṣṭi̍|yam|ca|vayam|dviṣmaḥ|tam|ata̍ḥ|mA|mauk|apa̍hata̍ ityapa# -hataḥ|araruḥ|pRuthivyAḥ|adE̍vayajana̍ ityadEva̍ - yajanaḥ|vrajam|gacCa|gOsthAnamiti# gO-sthAna̱m|vaṛṣatu|tE|dyauḥ|badhAna|dEva|savitaḥ|paramasyA̱m|parAvatIti̍# parA - vati|śatEna̍|pAśai̱ḥ|yaḥ|asmAn|dvEṣṭi̍|yam|ca|vayam|dviṣmaḥ|tam|ata̍ḥ|mA|14̍ (50)
verses.samhita: gacCa̍ gOsthAnaM ~Mvaṛṣatu̍ tE dyaurbadhAna̍ dEva̍ savitaḥ paramasyA̱M parAvati# śatEna pAśairyO̱&smAn dvEṣṭi yaM ca# vayaM dviṣmastamatO mA maugapahatO&raru̍ḥ̍ pRuthivyA adEvayajanO̍ vrajaM gacCa̍ gOsthAnaM ~Mvaṛṣatu̍ tE dyaurbadhAna̍ dEva̍ savitaḥ paramasyA̱M parAvati# śatEna pAśairyO̱&smAn dvEṣṭi yaM ca# vayaM dviṣmastamatO mA -[ ] 14

verses.padam: mauk|araruḥ|tE|diva̱m|mA|skAn|vasa̍vaḥ|tvA|parIti̍|gRuhṇantu|gAyatrEṇa̍|Canda̍sA|rudrAḥ|tvA|parIti̍|gRuhṇantu|traiṣṭu̍BEna|Canda̍sA|AdityAḥ|tvA|parIti̍|gRuhṇantu|jAga̍tEna|Canda̍sA|dEvasya̍|savituḥ|savE|karma̍|kRuṇvanti|vEdhasa̍ḥ|Rutam|asi|Rutasada̍namityRu̍ta̍ -sadanam|asi|RutaśrIrityRu̍ta̍ - śrIḥ|asi|dhAḥ|asi|svadhEti# sva- dhA|asi|urvI|ca|asi|vasvI̱|ca|asi|purA|krUrasya̍|visRupa̍ iti# vi- sRupaḥ|viraphśinniti̍# vi- raphśinn ( )|udAdAyEtyut̍ - AdAya|pRuthivIm|jIradA̍nuriti̍# jIra - dAnuḥ|yAm|airayann|candrama̍si|svadhABiriti̍# sva-dhABiḥ|tAm|dhIrA̍saḥ|anudRuśyEtya̍nu̍ anu - dRuśya|yajantE||15̍ (61)
verses.samhita: maugararu̍stE̍ divaM mA skAnq. vasavastvA̍ pari# gRuhṇantu gAyatrEṇa CandasArudrAstvA̍ pari# gRuhṇantu traiṣṭuBEna̍ CandasA&&dityAstvA̍ pari# gRuhṇantu jAgatEna̍ CandasA̍ dEvasya# savituḥ savE karma# kRuṇvanti vEdhasa# RutamasyRutasada̍na-masyRutaśrIra̍si̍ dhA asi̍ svadhA asyurvI̍ cAsi vasvI# cAsi purA krUrasya# visRupO# viraPśin ( ) nudAdAya# pRuthivIM jIradAnuryAmaira̍yan̍ candramasi̍ svadhABistAM dhIrAsO̍ anudRuśya# yajantE||15

verses.padam: pratyuṣṭamiti̍ prati# - uṣṭam|rakṣaḥ|pratyu̍ṣṭA̍ iti prati# -uṣṭAḥ|arAtayaḥ|agnEḥ|vaḥ|tEji̍ṣṭhEna|tEja̍sA|niriti̍|tapAmi|gOṣṭhamiti̍# gO -stham|mA|niriti|mRukṣam|vAjina̱m|tvA|sapatnasAhamiti̍# sapatna - sAham|samiti|mArjmi|vAca̱m|prAṇamiti̍# prA- anam|cakṣuḥ|śrOtra̱m|prajAmiti̍# pra -jAm|yOni̱m|mA|niriti|mRukṣam|vAjinI̱m|tvA|sapatnasAhImiti̍# sapatna - sAhIm|samiti|mArjmi|AśAsAnEtyA̱̍ -śAsAnA|saumanasam|prajAmiti̍# pra -jAm|sauBA̱gyam|tanUm||agnEḥ|anuvratEtyanu̍# -vratA|BUtvA|samiti|nahyE|sukRutAyEti̍# su -kRutAya|kam||suprajasa̍ iti# su-prajasaḥ|tvA|vayam|supatnIriti̍# su-patnI̱ḥ|upEti|16̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pratyuṣṭaṃq̍ rakṣaḥ pratyuṣṭA̍ arAtayO̍ &gnErvastEjiṣṭhEna̍ tEjasA̍ niṣṭapAmi̍ gOṣṭhaM mA nirmRukṣaM̍ ~MvAjinaM̍ tvA sapatnasAhaṃ saM mA̱rjmi vAcaM̍ prAṇaM cakṣuḥ śrOtraM̍ prajAM ~MyOniM mA nirmRukṣaM̍ ~MvAjinI̱M tvA sapatnasAhIṃ saM mA̱rjmyAśAsAnA̍ saumanasaM prajAṃ sauBA̱gyaM tanUM|agnEranuvratA̍ BUtvA saM nahyE̍ sukRutAya kaM||suprajasastvA̍ vayaṃ supatnIrupa-̍ [ ] 16

verses.padam: sEdima||agnE̱|sapatnadamBanamiti̍# sapatna-damBanam|ada̍bdhAsaḥ|adA̱Byam||imam|vIti̍|syAmi|varu̍ṇasya|pAśa̱m|yam|aba̍dhnIta|savitA|sukEta̍ iti# su-kEtaḥ||dhAtuḥ|ca|yOnau̱|sukRutasyEti̍# su -kRutasya|lOkE|syOnam|mE|saha|patyA̱|karOmi||samiti̍|Ayu̍ṣA|samiti̍|prajayEti̍# pra-jayA̱|samiti|agnE|varca̍sA|puna̍ḥ||samiti̍|patnI̱|patyA̱|aham|gacCE|samiti̍|AtmA|tanuvA̱|mama̍||mahInAm|paya̍ḥ|asi|Oṣa̍dhInAm|rasa̍ḥ|tasya̍|tE|akṣI̍yamAṇasya|niriti̍|17̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sEdima|agnE# sapatnadaMBanamada̍bdhAsO̍ adA̱ByaM||imaM ~MviṣyAmi̍ varuṇasya̍ pAśaMq ~MyamabaddhnIta̍ savitA sukEtaḥ|dhAtuśca̍ yOnau# sukRutasya# lOkE syOnaM mE# saha patyA# karOmi||samAyuṣA̍ saMprajayA samagnE̍ varcasA̍ punaḥ|saM̍ patnI patyA&haM gacCE̍ samAtmA tanuvA mama||mahInAM̍ payO&syOṣadhInAṃq̍ rasastasya tE&kṣIyamAṇasya̍ nir-[ ] 17

verses.padam: vapAmi|mahInAm|payaḥ|asi|Oṣa̍dhInAm|rasa̍ḥ|ada̍bdhEna|tvA|cakṣu̍ṣA|avEti̍|IkṣE|suprajAstvAyEti̍# suprajAḥ - tvAya|tEja̍ḥ|asi|tEja̍ḥ|anu̍|prEti̍|ihi|agniḥ|tE|tEja̍ḥ|mA|vIti̍|nait|agnEḥ|jihvA|asi|suBUriti̍# su - BUḥ|dEvAnA̱m|dhAmnE# dhAmna iti dhAmnE̱ - dhAmnE|dEvEByaḥ|yaju̍ṣEyajuṣa̍ iti yajuṣE̍ -yajuṣE|Bava|śukram|asi|jyOtiḥ|asi|tEja̍ḥ|asi|dEvaḥ|vaḥ|savitA|uditi̍|punAtu|acCi̍drEṇa|pavitrE̍ṇa|vasO̱ḥ|sUrya̍sya|raśmiBiriti̍# raśmi-Biḥ|śukram ( )|tvA|śukrAyA̱m|dhAmnE# dhAmna iti dhAmnE̱ - dhAmnE|dEvEByaḥ|yaju̍ṣEyajuṣa̍ iti yajuṣE̍ - yajuṣE|gRuhṇAmi|jyOtiḥ|tvA|jyOti̍ṣi|arciḥ|tvA|arciṣi̍|dhAmnE̍# dhAmna iti dhAmnE̱ - dhAmnE|dEvEByaḥ|yaju̍ṣEyajuṣa̍ iti yajuṣE̍ -yajuṣE|gRuhṇAmi||18 (66) (upa - ni - raśmibhiḥ̍ śukraṃ - ṣOḍaśa̍ ca) (A10)
verses.samhita: vapAmi̍ mahInAM payO&syOṣadhInAṃq̍ rasO&dabdhEna̍ tvA cakṣuṣA&vE̱kṣE suprajAstvAya tEjO&si̍ tEjO&nu prEhyagnistE tEjO mA vi naidagnEr̍ jihvA&si# suBUrdEvAnAM dhAmnEdhAmnE̍ dEvEByO yajuṣEyajuṣE̍ Bava śukramasi̍ jyOtirasi̍ tEjO&si̍ dEvO vaḥ̍ savitOt punAtvacCi̍drEṇa̍ pavitrEṇa̍ vasOḥ sUryasya̍ raśmiBiḥ̍ śukraM ( ) tvA# śukrAyAM dhAmnEdhAmnE̍ dEvEByO yajuṣEyajuṣE̍ gRuhṇAmi jyOtistvA̍ jyOtiṣyarcistvA&rciṣi̍ dhAmnEdhAmnE̍ dEvEByO yajuṣEyajuṣE̍ gRuhṇAmi||18

verses.padam: kRuṣṇaḥ|asi|AKarEṣṭha̍ ityAKarE̍ - sthaḥ|agnayE̱|tvA|svAhA̱|vEdiḥ|asi|baṛqhiṣE̱|tvA|svAhA̱|baṛqhiḥ|asi|srugBya̍ iti# sruk -Byaḥ|tvA|svAhA̱|divE|tvA|antarikṣAya|tvA|pRuthivyai|tvA|svadhEti̍# sva-dhA|pitRuBya iti# pitRu -Byaḥ|Urk|Bava|baṛqhiṣadBya iti# baṛhiṣat - Byaḥ|UrjA|pRuthivIm|gacCata|viṣṇO̱ḥ|stUpaḥ|asi|UrṇA̱mradasamityUrṇA̱̍ - mradasam|tvA|stRuṇAmi|svAsasthamiti# su -Asastham|dEvEByaḥ|gandharva̍ḥ|asi|viśvAva̍suriti̍# viśva - vasuḥ|viśvasmAt|Iṣa̍taḥ|yaja̍mAnasya|paridhiriti̍# pari - dhiḥ|iḍaḥ|Iḍitaḥ|indrasya|bAhuḥ|asi|19̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kRuṣṇO̱&syAKarEṣṭhO̱&gnayE̱ tvA svAhA vEdirasi̍ barqḥiṣE̱ tvA svAhA barqḥira̍si̍ srugByastvA svAhA# divE tvA&ntarikṣAya̍ tvA pRuthivyai tvA̱ svadhA pitRuBya UrgBava̍ baṛhiṣadBya# UrjA pRuthivIM̍ gacCata̍ viṣṇOḥ stUpO&syUrṇA̱mradasaM tvA stRuṇAmi svAsasthaM dEvEByO# gandharvO&si̍ viśvAvasur̍ viśvasmAdIṣa̍tO̍ yajamAnasya̍ paridhiriḍa Iḍita̍ indrasya̍ bAhurasi̍ -[ ] 19

verses.padam: dakṣiṇaḥ|yaja̍mAnasya|paridhiriti̍# pari - dhiḥ|iḍaḥ|Iḍitaḥ|mitrAvaruṇAviti̍# mitrA - varuṇau|tvA|uttarata̍ ityut̍ - tarataḥ|parIti|dhattAm|dhruvEṇa̍|dharma̍ṇA|yaja̍mAnasya|paridhiriti̍# pari - dhiḥ|iḍaḥ|Iḍitaḥ|sUryaḥ|tvA|purastA̱t|pAtu|kasyA̱ḥ|cit|aBiśa̍styA̍ ityaBi -śastyAḥ|vItihO̱tramiti# -vIti - hOtram|tvA|kavE|dyumantamiti# dyu - manta̱m|samiti|idhImahi|agnE̱|bRuhanta̱m|adhvarE|viśaḥ|yantrE̍ iti|sthaḥ|vasU̍nAm|rudrAṇA̱m|AdityAnA̱m|sada̍si|sIda|juhUḥ|upaBRudityu̍pa̍ - BRut|dhruvA|asi|GRutAcI̱|nAmnA̱|priyEṇa|nAmnA̱|priyE|sada̍si̍ ( )|sIda|EtAḥ|asadann|sukRutasyEti# su-kRutasya|lOkE|tAḥ|viṣṇO̍ iti|pAhi|pAhi|yajñam|pAhi|yajñapa̍timiti̍# yajña-patim|pAhi|mAm|yajñaniyamiti# yajña - niya̱m||20 (65)
verses.samhita: dakṣiṇO̍ yajamAnasya̍ paridhiriḍa IḍitO̍ mitrAvaruṇau̍ tvOttarataḥ pari# dhattAM dhruvEṇa dharmaṇA̍ yajamAnasya̍ paridhiriḍa Iḍitaḥ̍ sUryastvA̍ purastA̱t pAtu kasyA̱ścidaBiśastyA̍ vItihO̱traM tvA kavE dyumantaṃq samidhImahyagnE̍# bRuhantamaddhvarE̍ viśO yantrE sthO vasUnAṃ̍ rudrAṇA-mAdityAnAṃq̍ sadasi̍ sIda juhUrupaBRud̍ dhruvA&si# GRutAcI nAmnA̱ priyEṇa nAmnA̱ priyE sadasi̍ ( ) sIdaitA asadanth̍ sukRutasya# lOkE tA viṣṇO̍ pAhi pAhi yajñaM pAhi yajñapatiM̍ pAhi mAM ~Myajñaniya̱M||20̍

verses.padam: Buvanam|asi̍|vIti̍|prathasva|agnE̱|yaṣṭa̍ḥ|idam|nama̍ḥ||juhu̍|Eti̍|ihi|agniḥ|tvA|hvayati|dEvayajyAyA̍ iti# dEva -yajyAyai̱|upaBRudityupa̍# -BRut|Eti|ihi|dEvaḥ|tvA|savitA|hvayati|dEvayajyAyA̍ iti# dEva -yajyAyai̱|agnAviṣṇU̍ ityagnA̱ -viṣṇU|mA|vAm|avEti|kramiṣam|vIti̍|jihAthAm|mA|mA|samiti̍|tAptam|lOkam|mE|lOkakRutAviti̍# lOka-kRutau|kRuṇutam|viṣṇO̱ḥ|sthAna̱m|asi|itaḥ|indraḥ|akRuṇOt|vIryA̍ṇi|samAraByEti̍# saM-AraBya|Urddhvaḥ|addhvaraḥ|divispRuśamiti̍# divi -spRuśa̱m|ahrutaḥ̍ ( )|yajñaḥ|yajñapatEriti̍# yajña - patEḥ|indrAvAnitIndra̍# - vAn|svAhA̱|bRuhat|BAḥ|pAhi|mA|agnE|duścaritAditi̍ duḥ - caritAt|Eti|mA|suca̍rita̍ iti su - caritE|Baja|maKasya|śira̍ḥ|asi|samiti̍|jyOti̍ṣA|jyOti̍ḥ|a~gktAm||21̍ (71) (ahruta̍ - Ekaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A12)
verses.samhita: Buvanamasi̍ vi prathasvAgnE̍ yaṣṭaridaM̍ namaḥ|juhvEhyagnistvA̱̍ hvayati dEvayajyAyA upaBRudEhi̍# dEvastvA# savitA hvayati̍ dEvayajyAyA agnAviṣṇU̍ mA vAmava# kramiṣaM ~Mvi jihAthAM̍ mA mA saM tA̱ptaM ~MlOkaM mE# lOkakRutau kRuṇutaM ~MviṣṇOḥ sthAnamasIta̍ indrO# akRuṇOd vIryAṇi̍ samAraByOrddhvO addhvarO̍ divispRuśamahru̍tO̍ ( ) yajñO yajñapatE-rindrA̍vAnth̍ svAhA# bRuhadBAḥ pAhi mA̱&gnE duścaritAdA̍ mA sucaritE̍ Baja maKasya śirO&si̍ saMjyOtiṣA̍ jyOtira~gktAM||21̍ (ahruta̍ - Ekaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: vAjasya|mA|prasavEnEti̍# pra-savEna|udgrABEṇEtyu̍t̍ -grABEṇa|uditi̍|agraBIt||atha̍|sapatnAn̍|indra̍ḥ|mE|nigrABEṇEti̍# ni-grABEṇa|adha̍rAn|akaḥ||udgrABamityu̍t̍ -grABam|ca|nigrABamiti# ni -grABam|ca|brahma|dEvAḥ|avIvRudhann||atha̍|sapatnAn̍|indrAgnI̍ itI̱ndra-agnI|mE|viṣUcInAn|vIti̍|asyatAm||vasu̍Bya̍ iti vasu-Byaḥ|tvA|rudrEBya̍ḥ|tvA|AdityEBya̍ḥ|tvA|aktam|rihA̍ṇAḥ|viyantu̍|vaya̍ḥ||prajAmiti̍# pra-jAm|yOni̱m|mA|niriti|mRukṣam|Eti̍|pyAyantAm|Apa̍ḥ|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|marutA̱m|pRuṣa̍tayaḥ|stha|diva̱M|22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vAjasya̍ mA prasavEnO̱dgrABEṇOdagraBIt|athA̍# sapatnAṃq indrO# mE nigrABEṇAdharAṃ̍ akaḥ||udgrABaM ca# nigrABaM ca brahma# dEvA avIvRudhann|athA̍# sapatnAnindrAgnI̍ mE# viṣUcInAn vyasyatAM||vasu̍ByastvA̍ rudrEByastvA&&dityEBya̍stvA&ktaṃ̍ rihAṇA̍ viyantu vayaḥ||prajAM̍ ~MyOniM mA nirmRukṣamA̍ pyAyantAmApa̍ OṣadhayO̍ marutAM pRuṣatayaḥ̍ stha divaM-̍ [ ] 22

verses.padam: gacCa|tataḥ|naḥ|vRuṣṭi̱m|Eti̍|Iraya||AyuṣpA̍ ityAyuḥ-̍ pAḥ|agnE|asi|Ayuḥ|mE|pAhi|cakṣuṣpA̍ iti# - cakṣuḥ - pAḥ|agnE|asi|cakṣuḥ|mE|pAhi|dhruvA|asi|yam|paridhimiti̍# pari -dhim|paryadhatthA̍ iti# pari -adhatthAḥ|agnE̱|dEva|paṇiBiriti̍# paṇi -Biḥ|vIyamAṇaḥ||tam|tE|Etam|anviti̍|jOṣa̱m|BarAmi|na|it|Eṣaḥ|tvat|apacEtayA̍tA̍ ityapa̍ - cEtayAtai|yajñasya̍|pAtha̍ḥ|upa̍|samiti̍|itam|saṅqsrAvaBA̍gA̍ iti# saṅsrAva -BAgAḥ|stha|iṣAḥ|bRuhantaḥ|prastarEṣṭhA̍ iti# prastarE- sthAḥ|baṛqhiṣada iti baṛhi-sadaḥ|ca|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: gacCa tatO# nO vRuṣṭimEraya|AyuṣpA̍ agnE&syAyu̍rmE̍ pAhi cakṣuṣpA agnE&si̍ cakṣurmE̍ pAhi dhruvA&si yaM paridhiM̍ paryadhatthA̍ agnE# dEva paṇiBir̍ vIyamAṇaḥ|taM̍ ta# Etamanu jOṣaM̍ BarAmi nEdEṣa tvadapacEtayA̍tai̍ yajñasya pAtha upa samitaṃ̍ saṅsrAvaBAgAḥ̍ sthEṣA bRuhantaḥ̍ prastarEṣṭhA baṛhiṣada̍śca-̍ [ ] 23

verses.padam: dEvAḥ|imAm|vAca̱m|aBIti|viśvE̱|gRuṇanta̍ḥ|AsadyEtyA̱̍ - sadya|asminn|baṛqhiṣi̍|mAdayadhvam|agnEḥ|vAm|apa̍nnagRuhasyEtyapa̍nna̍ - gRuhasya|sadasi|sAdayAmi|sumnAya̍|sumninI̍ iti|sumnE|mA|dhattam|dhuri|dhuryau̱|pAtam|agnE̱|adabdhAyO̍ ityadabdha-AyO|aśItatanO̍ ityaśita̍ -tanO|pAhi|mA|adya|divaḥ|pAhi|prasityA̍ iti pra-sityai|pAhi|duriṣṭyA̍ iti duḥ -iṣṭyai|pAhi|duradmanyA iti# duḥ -admanyai|pAhi|duścaritAditi̍ duḥ - caritAt|aviṣam|naḥ|pitum|kRuṇu|suṣadEti̍# su -sadA̱|yOni̱m|svAhA̱|dEvA̱ḥ|gAtuvida iti# gAtu-vidaḥ|gAtum|vittvA|gAtum ( )|ita|manasaḥ|patE|imam|naḥ|dEva|dEvEṣu̍|yajñam|svAhA̱|vAci|svAhA̱|vAtE̱|dhAḥ||24̍ (63)
verses.samhita: dEvA imAM ~MvAcamaBi̍ viśvE# gRuṇanta# AsadyAsmin barqḥiṣi# mAdayaddhvamagnEr vAmapannagRuhasya̍ sadasi̍ sAdayAmi suMnAya# suMninI suMnE mA# dhattaM dhuri dharyau# pAtamagnE# &dabdhAyO &śItatanO pAhi mA&dya divaḥ pAhi prasityai̍ pAhi duriṣṭyai̍ pAhi duradmanyai̍ pAhi duścaritAdavi̍ṣaM̍ naḥ pituM kRuṇu̍ suṣadA yOniṅq svAhA dEvA# gAtuvidO gAtuM ~MvittvA gAtu ( ) mita̍ manasaspata̍ imaM nO# dEva dEvEṣu# yajñaṅ svAhA# vAci svAhA vAtE# dhAḥ||24

verses.padam: uBA|vAm|indrAgnI itI̱ndra - agnI|Ahuvadhyai̱|uBA|rAdhasaḥ|saha|mAdayadhyai̱||uBA|dAtArau̱|iṣAm|rayIṇAm|uBA|vAja̍sya|sAtayE̱|huvE|vAm|aśra̍vam|hi|BUridAva̍ttarEti̍# BUridAvat̍ -tarA|vAm||vijAmAturiti̍ vi - jAmAtuḥ|uta|vA|Ga|syAlAt||atha|sOma̍sya|prayatIti̍ pra-yatI|yuvaByAmiti# yuva - ByAm|indrA̱gnI itIndra# - agnI|stOma̱m|janayAmi|navya̱m||indrA̱gnI itIndra# - agnI|navatim|puraḥ|dAsapa̍tnIriti̍# dAsa - patnIḥ|adhUnutam||sAkam|EkEna|karma̍ṇA||śuci̱m|nu|stOma̱m|nava̍jAtamiti̍ nava-̍ jAtam|adya|indrA̱gnI itIndra# - agnI|vRutrahaṇEti# vRutra -hanA|juṣEthA̱m||25 (50)
verses.samhita: uBA vAmindrAgnI̍ AhuvaddhyA# uBA rAdhasaḥ̍ saha mAdayaddhyai̱|uBA̍ dAtArAviṣAṃ̍ rayIṇAmuBA̍ vAjasya̍ sAtayE# huvE vAM||aśravaṃq̍ hi BUridAva̍ttarA̍ vAM ~MvijAmAturuta̍ vA# GA syAlAt|athA sOmasya̍ prayatI̍ yuvaByAmindrA̱gnI stOmaM̍ janayAmi navya̱M||indrA̱gnI navatiM purO# dAsapatnIradhUnutaM|sAkamEkE̍na̍ karmaṇA||śuciM̍ nu stOmaM navajAta-madyEndrA̱gnI̍ vRutrahaṇA juṣEthA̱M|25

verses.padam: uBA|hi|vAm|suhavEti# su-havA̱|jOhavImi|tA|vAja̱m|sadyaḥ|uśatE|dhEṣṭhA̱||vayam|u|tvA|pathaḥ|patE|ratha̱m|na|vAja̍sAtaya̍ iti vAja-sAtayE||dhiyE|pUṣann|ayujmahi||pathaspa̍tha̍ iti# pathaḥ - pathaḥ|paripatimiti̍ pari-patim|vacasyA|kAmE̍na|kRutaḥ|aBIti̍|Anaṭ|arkam||saḥ|naḥ|rAsat|śurudha̍ḥ|candrAgrA̍ iti# candra - agrAḥ|dhiyandhiyamiti̍ dhiya̱M - dhiyam|sIṣadhAti|prEti|pUṣA||kṣEtra̍sya|pati̍nA|vayam|hitEna̍|iva|jayAmasi||gAm|aśva̱m|pOṣayitnu|Eti̍|saḥ|naḥ|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: uBA hi vAṃ# suhavA jOhavImi̍ tA vAjaṃ# sadya uśatE̍ dhEṣṭhA̱||vayamu# tvA pathaspatE rathaM na vAjasAtayE|dhiyE̍ pUṣannayujmahi||pathaspa̍thaḥ̍ paripatiM̍ ~MvacasyA kAmEna̍ kRutO aByAnaḍarkaM|sanO̍# rAsacCurudhaścandrAgrA̍ dhiyaMdhiyaṃ̍ sIṣadhAti pra pUṣA||kṣEtrasya̍ patinA̍ vayaṃ hitEnEva̍ jayAmasi|gAmaśvaM̍ pOṣayitnvA sa nO# - [ ] 26

verses.padam: mRuḍAti|IdRuśE̱||kṣEtrasya|patE|madhu̍mantamiti̍ madhu-mantam|Urmim|dhEnuḥ|iva|paya̍ḥ|asmAsu̍|dhukṣva||madhuścutamiti̍# madhu-ścuta̱m|GRutam|iva|supUtamiti̍ su-pUtam|Rutasya|naḥ|pata̍yaḥ|mRuḍayantu||agnE̱|naya̍|supathEti̍# su-pathA̱|rAyE|asmAn|viśvAni|dEva|vayunA̍ni|vidvAn||yuyOdhi|asmat|juhurAṇam|Ena̍ḥ|BUyi̍ṣṭhAm|tE|nama̍uktimiti̍ namaḥ-uktim|vidhEma||Eti̍|dEvAnA̱m|apIti̍|panthA̱m|aganma|yat|śaknavA̍ma|tat|anviti̍|pravO̍ḍhumiti̍ pra- vOḍhum||agniḥ|vidvAn|saḥ|yajAt|27 (50)
verses.samhita: mRuḍAtIdRuśE̱||kṣEtrasya̍ patE madhumantamUrmiM̍ dhEnuriva̍ payO# asmAsu# dhukṣva|madhuścutaM̍ GRutamiva̍ supUtamRutasya̍# naḥ patayO̍ mRuḍayantu||agnE naya# supathA# rAyE asmAn. viśvAni̍ dEva vayunAni̍ vidvAn|yuyOddhyasmajju̍hurAṇamEnO̍ BUyiṣṭhAM̍ tE namauktiM̍ ~MvidhEma||A dEvAnAmapi panthAmaganma̍ yacCaknavAma̍ tadanu pravOḍhuM|agnir̍ vidvAnth sa yajAth̍ - [ ] 27

verses.padam: saḥ|it|u|hOtA̱|saḥ|adhvarAn|saḥ|RutUn|kalpayAti||yat|vAhiṣṭham|tat|agnayE̱|bRuhat|arca|viBAvasO̍ iti# viBA-vasO||mahiṣI|iva|tvat|rayiḥ|tvat|vAjA̱ḥ|uditi̍|IratE||agnE̱|tvam|pAraya|navya̍ḥ|asmAn|svastiBiriti̍# svasti -Biḥ|atIti|durgAṇIti̍# duḥ -gAni|viśvA̱||pUḥ|ca|pRuthvI|bahulA|naḥ|urvI|Bava̍|tOkAya̍|tana̍yAya|śam|yOḥ||tvam|agnE|vratapA̍ iti# vrata- pAḥ|asi|dEvaḥ|Eti# ( )|martyEṣu|A||tvam|yajñEṣu̍|Iḍya̍ḥ||yat|vaḥ|vayam|praminAmEti̍# pra-minAma|vratAni̍|viduṣA̱m|dEvAḥ|avi̍duṣṭarAsa̍ ityaviduḥ̍ - tarAsaḥ||agniḥ|tat|viśva̱m|Eti|pRuṇAti|vidvAn|yEBi̍ḥ|dEvAn|RutuBirityRutu̍ -Biḥ|kalpayAti||28̍ (73) (juṣEthAmA - sA nO# - yajA - dA - trayOviṃśatiśca)̍ (A14) Beginning padas of all 1 to 14 AnuvAkams :- (iṣE tvA# - yajñasya - śunddhadhvam̍ - karmaṇE̍ vAm - dEvO - &vadhUtam̍ - dhuṣṭiḥ - saM vapA-̍ myA dadE̍ - pratyuṣṭam̍ - kRuṣṇO&si̍ - Buvanamasi̍ - vAjasyO̍ - bhA vAM - caturdaśa̍ ) Begninning padas of every 1st, 11th and 21st pancAti's :- (iṣE - druṃha̍ - Buvana̍ - maṣṭAviṃśatiḥ̍ ) First and Last padam of prathama prasanam :- (iṣE tvA# - kalpayAti)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM prathamakAṇḍE prathamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||----------------------------------------------------------------
verses.samhita: sEdu hOtA sO addhvarAnth̍ sa RutUn kalpayAti||yadvAhi̍ṣṭhaM̍ tadagnayE# bRuhadarca̍ viBAvasO|mahiṣIva̍ tvadrayistvadvAjA udIratE||agnE̍ tvaM pArayA̍ navyO# asmAnth svastiBirati# durgAṇi viśvA̱|pUśca# pRuthvI bahulA̍ na# urvI BavA# tOkAya tanayAya̍ śaM ~MyOḥ||tvamagnE̍ vratapA asi̍ dEva A ( ) martyEṣvA|tvaM ~MyajñEṣvIḍyaḥ||yadvO̍# vayaM praminAma̍# vratAni# viduṣA̱M dEvA aviduṣṭarAsaḥ|agniṣṭad̍ viśvamA pRuṇAti̍ vidvAn. yEBir̍ dEvAṃ RutuBiḥ̍ kalpayAti||28̍ (juṣEthAmA - sa nO# - yajA - dA - trayOviṃśatiśca)̍ (A14) praśna korvai with starting padams of 1 to 14 anuvAkams :- (iṣE tvA# - yajñasya - śundhadhvaM̍ - karmaṇE̍ vAM - dEvO-&vadhUtaM̍ - dhuṣṭiḥ - saM ~MvapA-̍ myA dadE̍ - pratyuṣṭaM̍ - kRuṣṇO&si̍ - Buvanamasi̍ - vAjasyOBA̍ vAM - caturdaśa̍ ) korvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (iṣE - dRuṃha̍ - Buvana̍ - maṣṭAviṃśatiḥ̍ ) first and last padam of First praśnam :- (iṣE tvA# - kalpayAti)||hariḥ̍# OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM prathamakAṇḍE prathamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||========================================== OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ|hariḥ OM||1.2 prathamakAṇḍE dvitIyaḥ praśnaḥ -

verses.padam: Apaḥ|undantu|jIvasE̱|dIrGAyutvAyEti̍# dIrGAyu - tvAya|varca̍sE|Oṣa̍dhE|trAya̍sva|Enam|svadhi̍ta̍ iti sva-dhitE|mA|Enam|hiṃqsIḥ|dEvaśrUriti# dEva - śrUḥ|EtAni|prEti̍|vapE|svasti|utta̍rAṇItyut̍ - tarAṇi|aśIya|Apaḥ|asmAn|mAtara̍ḥ|śundhantu|GRutEna̍|naḥ|GRutapuva̍ iti# GRuta-puvaḥ|punantu|viśva̱m|asmat|prEti̍|vahantu|ripram|uditi̍|AByaḥ|śuci̍ḥ|Eti̍|pUtaḥ|Emi|sOma̍sya|tanUḥ|asi|tanuva̱m|mE|pAhi|mahInAm|paya̍ḥ|asi|varcOdhA̍ iti varcaḥ - dhAḥ|asi|varcaḥ|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Apa# undantu jIvasE# dIrGAyutvAya varcasa̍ OṣadhE̍ trAyasvainaṅq̍ svadhitE̍ mainaṃ# hiṃsIr dEvaśrUrEtAni pra vapE̍ svastyuttarAṇyaśIyApO̍# asmAn mAtaraḥ̍ śundhantu GRutEna# nO GRutapuvaḥ̍ punantu viśvamasmat̍ pra vahantu̍ ripramudA̱Byaḥ śucirA pUta Emi̍ sOmasya̍ tanUrasi̍ tanuvaM̍ mE pAhi mahInAM payO&si̍ varcOdhA asi̍ varcO - [ ] 1

verses.padam: mayi|dhEhi|vRutrasya̍|kanIni̍kA|asi|cakṣuṣpA̍ iti# cakṣuḥ - pAḥ|asi|cakṣuḥ|mE|pAhi|citpatiriti̍# cit - patiḥ|tvA|punAtu|vAkpatiriti̍# vAk - patiḥ|tvA|punAtu|dEvaḥ|tvA|savitA|punAtu|acCi̍drEṇa|pavitrE̍ṇa|vasO̱ḥ|sUrya̍sya|raśmiBiriti̍# raśmi - Biḥ|tasya|tE|pavitrapata̍ iti# pavitra -patE|pavitrEṇa|yasmai̱|kam|punE|tat|śakEyam|Eti̍|vaḥ|dEvAsaḥ|ImahE|satya̍dharmAṇa̍ iti satya# - dharmAṇaḥ|addhvarE|yat|vaḥ|dEvAsaḥ|Agura ityA̱ - gurE|yajñiyAsaḥ|havA̍mahE|indrA̱gnI̍ itIndra# - agnI|dyAvA# pRuthivI iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|Apaḥ|OṣadhIḥ̍ ( )|tvam|dIkṣAṇA̱m|adhipatirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|asi|iha|mA|santa̱m|pAhi||2 (58)
verses.samhita: mayi# dhEhi vRutrasya# kanInikA&si̍ cakṣuṣpA asi̍ cakṣurmE̍ pAhi citpatistvA̍ punAtu vAkpatistvA̍ punAtu dEvastvA# savitA punAtvacCi̍drEṇa̍ pavitrEṇa̍ vasOḥ sUryasya̍ raśmiBistasya# tE pavitrapatE pavitrEṇa̍ yasmai kaM punE tacCakEyamA̍ vO# dEvAsa ImahE satyadharmAṇO̍ addhvarE yadvO# dEvAsa AgurE yajñiyAsO̍ havAmaha̍ indrA̱gnI dyAvApRuthivI̍ Apa# OṣadhI ( ) stvaM dIkṣAṇA-madhipatirasIha̍ mA santaM̍ pAhi||2

verses.padam: AkU̱tyA ityA - kUtyai|prayuja iti# pra - yujE̱|agnayE̱|svAhA̱|mEdhAyai̱|manasE|agnayE̱|svAhA̱|dIkṣAyai̱|tapa̍sE|agnayE̱|svAhA̱|sara̍svatyai|pUṣṇE|agnayE̱|svAhA̱|Apa̍ḥ|dEvIḥ|bRuhatIḥ|viśvaśaMBuva̍ iti# viśva - śaMBuvaḥ|dyAvApRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|uru|antarikṣam|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|naḥ|haviṣA̱|vRudhAtu|svAhA̱|viśvE̱|dEvasya̍|nEtuḥ|marta̍ḥ|vRuṇIta|saKyam|viśvE̱|rAyaḥ|iṣuddhyasi|dyumnam|vRuṇIta|puṣyasE̱|svAhA̱|RuKsAmayOrityRu̍k̍ -sAmayO̱ḥ|śilpE iti|sthaḥ|tE̍ iti|vAm|Eti̍|raBE|tE̍ iti|mA|3̍ (50)
verses.samhita: AkU̱tyai prayujE&gnayE svAhA# mEdhAyai manasE̍ &gnayE svAhA# dIkṣAyai tapasE&gnayE̍ svAhA sarasvatyai̍ pUṣṇE̱&gnayE svAhA&&pO# dEvIr bRuhatIr viśvaśaMBuvO dyAvApRuthivI̍ urvantari̍kṣaM̍ bRuhaspatirnO̍ haviṣA# vRudhAtu svAhA viśvE# dEvasya# nEturmartO# vRuṇIta saKyaM ~MviśvE# rAya iṣuddhyasi̍ dyumnaM ~MvRuṇIta̍ puṣyasE svAhaṛKsAmayOḥ̍ śilpE̱ sthastE vAmA raBE̍ tE mA-[̍ ] 3

verses.padam: pAtam|Eti|asya|yajñasya̍|udRuca̍ ityut̍ - Rucaḥ|imAm|dhiya̱m|śikṣa̍mAṇasya|dEva|kratu̱m|dakṣa̱m|varuṇa|samiti̍|śiśAdhi|yayA̱|atIti̍|viśvA̱|duritEti̍# duḥ - itA|tarEma|sutarmA̍ṇamiti̍# su -tarmAṇam|adhIti̍|nAva̱m|ruhEma|Urk|asi|A~ggirasI|Urṇa̍mradA̍ ityUrṇa# - mradAḥ|Urja̱m|mE|yacCa|pAhi|mA|mA|mA|hiṃqsIḥ|viṣṇO̱ḥ|śarma|asi|śarma̍|yaja̍mAnasya|śarma̍|mE|yacCa|nakṣa̍trAṇAm|mA|atIkAśAt|pAhi|indra̍sya|yOni̍ḥ|asi|4̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pAtamAsya yajñasyOdRuca# imAM dhiyaṃq śikṣamAṇasya̍ dEva kratuM dakṣaM̍ ~Mvaruṇa saṃ śiśAdhi̍ yayA&ti viśvA# duritA tarEma̍ sutarmAṇamadhi̍ nAvaṃ# ruhEmOrgasyA~ggirasyUrṇa̍mradA̍ UrjaM̍ mE yacCa pAhi mA mA mA# hiṃsIr viṣṇOḥ śarmAsi̍ śarma yajamAnasya̍ śarma# mE yacCa nakṣatrAṇAM̍ mA&tIkAśAt pAhIndrasya̍ yOnirasi̍ - [ ] 4

verses.padam: mA|mA|hiṃqsIḥ|kRuṣyai|tvA|susasyAyA iti# su - sasyAyai̱|supippalABya iti# su - pippalAByaḥ|tvA|Oṣa̍dhIBya̍ ityOṣadhi̍ - Byaḥ|sUpasthA iti# su - upasthAḥ|dEvaḥ|vanaspatiḥ|Urddhvaḥ|mA|pAhi|Eti̍|udRuca̍ ityut̍ - Rucaḥ|svAhA̱|yajñam|mana̍sA|svAhA̱|dyAvA̍pRuthivIByAmiti̍ dyAvA̱ - pRuthivIByA̱m|svAhA̱|urOḥ|antarikṣAt|svAhA̱|yajñam|vAtA̱t|Eti̍|raBE||5̍ (30) ( mA - yOnirasi̍ - triṃqśacca# ) (A2)
verses.samhita: mA mA# hiṃsIḥ kRuṣyai tvA# susasyAyai# supippalABya-stvauṣadhIByaḥ̍ sUpasthA dEvO vanaspatirUrddhvO̍ mA# pAhyOdRucaḥ svAhA# yajñaM manasA̍ svAhA dyAvApRuthivIByAṅq̍ svAhOrO- rantarikṣAth̍ svAhA# yajñaM ~MvAtAdA raBE||5̍

verses.padam: daivI̱m|dhiya̱m|manAmahE|sumRuḍIkAmiti# su - mRuḍIkAm|aBiṣṭayE|varcOdhAmiti̍# varcaḥ - dhAm|yajñavAhasamiti̍# yajña - vAhasam|supArEti# su - pArA|naḥ|asat|vaśE̱||yE|dEvAḥ|manOjAtA̍ iti manaḥ̍ - jAtAḥ|manOyuja iti# manaḥ - yujaḥ|sudakṣA̍ iti# su - dakṣA̱ḥ|dakṣapitAra̍ iti dakṣa-̍ pitAraḥ|tE|naḥ|pAntu|tE|naḥ|avantu|tEbhyaḥ|nama̍ḥ|tEbhya̍ḥ|svAhA̱|agnE̱|tvam|sviti̍|jAgRuhi|vayam|sviti̍|mandiṣImahi|gOpAya|naḥ|svastayE̱|prabudha̍ iti# pra - budhE̱|naḥ|punaḥ|dadaḥ||tvam|agnE|vratapA̍ iti# vrata - pAḥ|asi|dEvaḥ|Eti|martyE̍ṣu|A||tvam|6̍ (50)
verses.samhita: daivIM dhiyaM̍ manAmahE sumRuḍIkA-maBiṣṭayE̍ varcOdhAM ~MyajñavAhasaṃ̍ supArA nO# asad vaśE̱|yE dEvA manOjAtA̍ manOyujaḥ̍ sudakṣA dakṣapitArastE̍ naḥ̍ pAntu tE nO&vantu̍ tEByO namastEByaḥ svAhA&gnE tvaṃ su jAgRuhi̍ vayaṃ su mandiṣImahi̍ gOpAya naḥ̍ svastayE̱ prabudhE# naḥ punardadaḥ|tvama̍gnE̍ vratapA asi̍ dEva A martyEṣvA|tvaM - [ ] 6

verses.padam: yajñEṣu|Iḍ^ya̍ḥ||viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|aBIti̍|mAm|Eti̍|avavRutrann|pUṣA|sanyA|sOma̍ḥ|rAdha̍sA|dEvaḥ|savitA|vasO̱ḥ|vasudAvEti̍# vasu - dAvA̱|rAsva|iya̍t|sOma|Eti̍|BUya̍ḥ|Bara|mA|pRuṇann|pUrtyA|vIti̍|rAdhi|mA|aham|Ayu̍ṣA|candram|asi|mama̍|BOgA̍ya|Bava|vastra̱m|asi|mama̍|BOgA̍ya|Bava|usrA|asi|mama̍|BOgA̍ya|Bava|haya̍ḥ|asi|mama̍|BOgA̍ya|Bava|7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ~MyajñEṣvIḍyaḥ||viśvE̍# dEvA aBi mAmA&vavRutran̍ pUṣA sanyA sOmO rAdhasA̍ dEvaḥ savitA̍ vasO̱rvasudAvA rAsvEyath̍ sOmA &&*BUyO# Bara mA pRuṇan pUrtyA vi rAdhi̍ mA&hamAyuṣA̍ candramasi̍ mama BOgAya̍ Bava vastramasi̍ mama BOgAya̍ BavOsrA&si mama BOgAya̍ Bava hayO&si̍ mama BOgAya̍ Bava - [ ] 7

verses.padam: CAgaḥ|asi|mama̍|BOgA̍ya|Bava|mEṣaḥ|asi|mama̍|BOgA̍ya|Bava|vAyavE̱|tvA|varu̍ṇAya|tvA|niṛRu̍tyA̍ iti niḥ - Rutyai|tvA|rudrAya|tvA|dEvI̱ḥ|Apaḥ|apAm|napAt|yaḥ|Urmiḥ|haviṣya̍ḥ|indriyAvAnitI̱ndriya̍ - vAn|madintamaḥ|tam|vaḥ|mA|avEti̍|kramiṣam|acCi̍nnam|tantu̱m|pRuthivyAḥ|anviti̍|gEṣam|BadrAt|aBIti̍|śrEya̍ḥ|prEti̍|ihi|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|pura̍ EtEti# puraḥ - EtA|tE|astu|atha|Im|avEti̍|sya̍ ( )|varE̱|Eti|pRuthivyAḥ|ArE|śatrUn̍|kRuṇuhi|sarva̍vIra̍ iti sarva# - vIraḥ|Eti|idam|aganma|dEvayaja̍namiti̍# dEva - yajanam|pRuthivyAḥ|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|yat|aju̍ṣanta|pUrvE̱|RuKsAmAByAmityRu̍KsAma̍ -ByAm|yajuṣA|saMtara̍nta̍ iti# saM - tarantaḥ|rAyaḥ|pOṣE̍ṇa|samiti̍|iṣA|madEma||8̍ (75) (A tvam - hayOsi̍ mama BOgAya̍ Bava sya pa~jcaviṃ̍ śatiśca ) (A3)
verses.samhita: CAgO&si̍ mama BOgAya̍ Bava mEṣO&si̍ mama BOgAya̍ Bava vAyavE̱ tvA varuṇAya̍ tvA niṛRutyai̍ tvA rudrAya# tvA dEvIrApO̍ apAM napAdya Urmiṛ haviṣya̍# indriyAvA̱n madintamastaM̍ ~MvO mA&va# kramiṣamacCinnaM̍ tantuM̍ pRuthivyA anu# gEṣaM BadrAdaBi śrEyaḥ prEhi bRuhaspatiḥ̍ puraEtA tE# astvathEmava# sya ( ) vara A pRuthivyA̍ ArE śatrU̱n kRuṇuhi sarvavIra̍ Edamaganma̍ dEvayajanaM̍ pRuthivyA viśvE# dEvA yadajuṣanta̍ pUrva# RuKsAmAByAM ~MyajuṣA̍ santarantO̍ rAyaspOṣEṇa̍ samiṣA madEma||8̍

verses.padam: iyam|tE|śukra|tanUḥ|idam|varcaḥ|tayA̱|samiti̍|Bava|BrAja̱m|gacCa|jUḥ|asi|dhRutA|mana̍sA|juṣṭA̱|viṣṇa̍vE|tasyA̱ḥ|tE|satyasa̍vasa̍ iti# satya - savasaḥ|prasavE iti# pra -savE|vAcaḥ|yantram|aśIya|svAhA̱|śukram|asi|amRuta̱m|asi|vaiśvadEvamiti# vaiśva -dEvam|haviḥ|sUryasya|cakṣu̍ḥ|Eti̍|aruham|agnEḥ|akṣṇaḥ|kanIni̍kAm|yat|Eta̍śEBiḥ|Iya̍sE|BrAja̍mAnaḥ|vipaścitA̱|cit|asi|manA|asi|dhIḥ|asi|dakṣi̍ṇA|9̍ (50)
verses.samhita: iyaM tE# śukra tanUridaM ~MvarcastayA saM Bava̍ BrAjaM̍ gacCa jUrasi̍ dhRutA manasA̍ juṣṭA viṣṇavE̍ tasyA̱stE satyasavasaḥ̍ prasavE vAcO yantramaśIya̍ svAhA# śukramasyamRuta̍masi̍ vaiśvadEvaṃ haviḥ sUryasya̍ cakṣurA -&ruhamagnE̍ rakṣṇaḥ kanInikAM̍ ~MyadEtaśEBirIya̍sE̍ BrAjamAnO̍ vipaścitA cidasi̍ manA&si dhIrasi̍ dakṣiṇA-[̍ ] 9

verses.padam: asi|yajñiyA̱|asi|kṣatriyA̱|asi|aditiḥ|asi|uBayata̍ḥ̍ śIrṣṇItyuBayata̍ḥ̍ - śIrṣṇI|sA|naḥ|suprAcIti su -prAcI|supratIcIti̍ su - pratIcI|samiti|Bava|mitraḥ|tvA|padi|baddhnAtu|pUṣA|addhva̍naḥ|pAtu|indrA̍ya|addhya̍kṣAyEtyadhi̍# - akṣAya|anviti|tvA|mAtA|manyatAm|anviti̍|pitA|anviti̍|BrAtA̱|saga̍rBya̍ iti sa - garByaḥ|anviti|saKA̱|sayU̍thya̍ iti sa - yUthyaḥ|sA|dEvi|dEvam|acCa|ihi|indrA̍ya|sOma̱m|rudraḥ|tvA|Eti̍|vartayatu|mitrasya̍|pathA|svasti|sOma̍saKEti̍ sOma# -saKA ( )|punaḥ|Eti̍|ihi|saha|rayyA||10̍ (55)
verses.samhita: &si yajñiyA&si̍ kṣatriyA &syaditi-rasyuBayata̍#śśIrṣṇI̍ sA naḥ suprAcI̍ supratIcI̍ saM Bava̍ mitrastvA# padi baddhnAtu̍ pUṣA&ddhvanaḥ̍ pAtvindrAyA-ddhyakṣAyAnu̍# tvA mAtA manyatAmanu̍# pitA&nu BrAtA sagarByO&nu saKA sayU̱thyaḥ sA dEvi̍ dEvamacCEhIndrAya̍ sOmaṃ# rudrastvA &&*vartayatu̍ mitrasya# pathA svasti sOmasaKA̍ ( ) punarEhi# saha rayyA||10

verses.padam: vasvI̱|asi|rudrA|asi|aditiḥ|asi|AdityA|asi|śukrA|asi|candrA|asi|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|tvA|sumnE|raṇvatu|rudraḥ|vasu̍Biriti̍ vasu# -Biḥ|Eti|cikEtu|pRuthivyAḥ|tvA|mUrddhann|Eti̍|jiGarmi|dEvayaja̍na̍ iti# dEva - yajanE|iḍA̍yAḥ|padE|GRutavatIti̍# GRuta - vati|svAhA̱|pariliKitamiti̍ pari# - liKitam|rakṣaḥ|pari̍liKitA̍ iti pari# - liKitAḥ|arAtayaḥ|idam|aham|rakṣa̍saḥ|grIvAḥ|apIti̍|kRuntAmi|yaḥ|asmAn|dvEṣṭi̍|yam|ca|vayam|dviṣmaḥ|idam|asya|grIvAḥ|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vasvyasi̍ rudrA&syaditi-rasyAdityA&si̍# śukrA&si# candrA&si bRuhaspatistvA̍ sumnE raṇvatu̍ rudrO vasuBirA̍ cikEtu̍ pRuthivyAstvA# mUrddhannA jiGarmi̍ dEvayajana̍ iḍAyAḥ̍ padE GRutavati̍ svAhA pariliKitaṃq̍ rakṣaḥ pariliKitA̍ arAtaya̍ idamahaṃ rakṣasO̍ grIvA api# kRuntAmi yO̱&smAn dvEṣṭi yaM ca# vayaM dviṣma idamasya̍ grIvA - [ ] 11

verses.padam: apIti|kRuntAmi|asmE̍ iti|rAya̍ḥ|tvE̍ iti|rAya̍ḥ|tOtE̱|rAya̍ḥ|samiti̍|dEvi|dEvyA|urvaśyA̱|paśyasva|tvaṣṭI̍matI|tE|sapEya|surEtA̍ iti# su - rEtA̱ḥ|rEtaḥ|dadhA̍nA|vIram|vidEya|tava̍|saMdRuśIti̍# saM - dRuśi|mA|aham|rAyaḥ|pOṣE̍ṇa|vIti̍|yOṣam||12̍ (29) (asya grIvA-EkAnna tri(gmq) śacca# ) (A5)
verses.samhita: api# kRuntAmyasmE rAyastvE rAyastOtE rAyaḥ saM dEvi̍ dEvyOrvaśyA# paśyasva tvaṣṭImatI̍ tE sapEya surEtA rEtO dadhAnA̍ vIraM ~MvidEya̍ tava# sandRuśi mA&haṃrAyaspOṣEṇa̍ vi yOṣaM||12̍

verses.padam: aṃqśunA̱|tE|aṃqśuḥ|pRucyatAm|paruṣA|paru̍ḥ|gandhaḥ|tE|kAma̱m|avatu|madA̍ya|rasa̍ḥ|acyu̍taḥ|amAtya̍ḥ|asi|śukraḥ|tE|graha̍ḥ|aBIti̍|tyam|dEvam|savitAra̱m|UṇyO̱ḥ|kavikra̍tumiti̍# kavi - kratum|arcAmi|satyasa̍vasamiti̍# satya -savasam|ratnadhAmiti# ratna - dhAm|aBIti|priyam|matim|UrddhvA|yasya̍|amati̍ḥ|BAḥ|adi̍dyutat|savI̍mani|hira̍ṇyapAṇiriti̍ hiraṇya̍ - pAṇiḥ|amimIta|sukraturiti# su - kratuḥ|kRupA|suva̍ḥ||prajABya̍ iti# pra - jAByaḥ|tvA|prAṇAyEti̍# pra - anAya|tvA|vyAnAyEti̍# vi -anAya|tvA|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|tvam|anu# ( )|prEti|anihi|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|tvAm|anu|prEti̍|anantu||13̍ (57)
verses.samhita: aṃqśunA# tE aṃqśuḥ pRucyatAM̍ paruṣA̍ parur̍ gandhastE kAmamavatu̍ madAya̍ rasO acyutO̍ &mAtyO&si̍ śukrastE grahO&Bi tyaM dEvaṃ savitAra̍mUṇyO̱ḥ̍ kavikratumarcA̍mi̍ satyasavasaṃ̍ ratnadhAmaBi priyama matimUrddhvA yasyAmatirBA adidyutath̍ savImani̍ hiraṇyapAṇiramimIta̍ sukratuḥ̍ kRupA suvaḥ|prajABya̍stvA̍ prAṇAya# tvA vyAnAya# tvA prajAstvamanu ( ) prAṇihi̍ prajAstvAmanu prAṇantu||13̍

verses.padam: sOma̱m|tE|krIṇAmi|Urjasvantam|paya̍svantam|vIryA̍vantamiti̍# vIrya# - vantam|aBimAtiṣAhamityaBimAti̍ - sAha̱m|śukram|tE|śukrEṇa|krIṇAmi|candram|candrEṇa̍|amRuta̱m|amRutE̍na|samyat|tE|gOḥ|asmE̍ iti|candrAṇi̍|tapa̍saḥ|tanUḥ|asi|prajApa̍tEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|varṇaḥ|tasyA̱ḥ|tE|sahasrapOṣamiti̍# sahasra -pOṣam|puṣyantyAḥ|caramEṇa̍|paśunA̱|krIṇAmi|asmE̍ iti|tE|bandhu̍ḥ|mayi̍|tE|rAya̍ḥ|śrayantAm|asmE̍ iti|jyOti̍ḥ|sOmavikrayiṇIti̍# sOma - vikrayiṇi|tama̍ḥ|mitraḥ|naḥ|Eti̍|ihi|sumi̍tradhA̍ iti sumitra̍ - dhAḥ|indrasya|Urum̍ ( )|Eti|viśa|dakṣi̍ṇam|uśann|uśanta̱m|syOnaḥ|syOnam|svAna̍|BrAja̍|a~gGA̍rE|baMBA̍rE|hasta̍|suhastEti̍ su - hasta|kRuśAnaviti̍ kRuśa# - anO|EtE|vaḥ|sOmakrayaṇA̍ iti# sOma - krayaṇAḥ|tAn|rakṣaddhvam|mA|vaḥ|daBann||14̍ (72) (UruM-dvAviṃśatiśca)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: sOmaM̍ tE krIṇAmyUrjasvantaM̍ payasvantaM̍ ~MvIryAvantamaBi-mAtiṣAhaṃ̍# śukraM tE# śukrEṇa# krIṇAmi candraM candrEṇAmRutamamRutE̍na̍ samyattE gOrasmE candrAṇi tapasastanUra̍si̍ prajApatEr̍ varṇastasyA̱stE sahasrapOṣaM puṣyantyAścaramEṇa̍# paśunA̱ krIṇAmyasmE tE bandhurmayi# tE rAyaḥ̍ śrayantAmasmE jyOtiḥ̍ sOmavikrayiṇi tamO# mitrO na Ehi sumitradhA̍ indrasyOru̍ ( ) mA viśa̍ dakṣiṇa-̍ muśannuśantaṅ# syOnaḥ syOnaṅ svAna BrAjA~gGArE̍ baMBArE̍ hasta suhasta̍ kRuśAnavEtE̍ vaḥ̍ sOma krayaṇAstAn̍ rakṣaddhvaM̍ mA vO# daBan||14 (uruM-dvAviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: uditi|Ayu̍ṣA|svAyuṣEti̍# su - AyuṣA̱|uditi|Oṣa̍dhInAm|rasE̍na|uditi̍|parjanya̍sya|śuṣmE̍ṇa|uditi̍|asthAm|amRutAn̍|anu̍||uru|antari̍kṣam|anviti̍|ihi|adi̍tyAḥ|sada̍ḥ|asi|adi̍tyAḥ|sada̍ḥ|Eti̍|sIda|asta̍BnAt|dyAm|RuṣaBaḥ|antari̍kṣam|ami̍mIta|varimAṇa̱m|pRuthivyAḥ|Eti̍|asIdat|viśvA̱|Buva̍nAni|saMrAḍiti̍ saM - rAṭ|viśvA̱|it|tAni|varu̍ṇasya|vratAni̍|vanE̍ṣu|vIti̍|antari̍kṣam|tatAna|vAja̱m|arvathsvityarva̍t̍ - su|payaḥ|aGniyAsu̍|hRuthsviti̍# hRut - su|15 (50)
verses.samhita: udAyuṣA̍ svAyuṣOdOṣadhInAṃq̍ rasEnOt parjanyasya̍ śuṣmEṇOdasthAmamRutAṃq̍ anu|urva̍ntari̍kṣamanvihyadi̍tyAḥ̍ sadO&syadityAḥ̍ sada A sIdAstaBnAd-dyAmRu̍ṣaBO̍ antarikṣamami̍mIta̍ varimAṇaM̍ pRuthivyA A&sIdad̍ viśvA BuvanAni̍ samrAḍ viśvEttAni varuṇasya̍ vratAni vanEṣu̍ vyantari̍kṣaM̍ tatAna vAjamarvathsu̍ payO# aGniyAsu# hRuthsu-[ ] 15

verses.padam: kratu̱m|varuṇaḥ|vikṣu|agnim|divi|sUrya̱m|adadhAt|sOma̱m|adrau̱|uditi̍|u|tyam|jAtavE̍dasamiti̍# jAta - vEdasam|dEvam|vahanti|kEtavaḥ||dRuśE|viśvA̍ya|sUrya̱m||usrau̱|Eti̍|itam|dhUṛqṣAhAviti̍# dhUḥ - sAhau|anaśrU iti|avI̍rahaṇAvityavI̍ra̍ - hanau|brahmacOdanAviti̍# brahma - cOdanau|varu̍ṇasya|skaMBa̍nam|asi|varu̍ṇasya|skaMBasarja̍namiti̍# skaMBa -sarjanam|asi|pratya̍sta̍ iti prati# - astaḥ|varuṇasya|pAśa̍ḥ||16̍ (35) ( hRuthsu-pa~jcatriṃśacca̍ ) (A8)
verses.samhita: kratuM ~MvaruṇO̍ vikṣvagniM̍ divi sUryamadadhAth̍ sOmamadrAvudutyaM jAtavEdasaM̍ dEvaM ~Mvahanti̍ kEtavaḥ|dRuśE̍ viśvAya̍ sUrya̱M||usrAvEtaM̍ dhUṛṣAhAvanaśrU avIrahaṇau̍ brahmacOdanau̍ varuṇasya̍ skaMBanamasi̍ varuṇasya̍ skaMBasarjanamasi̍ pratyastO̍ varuṇasya̍ pAśaḥ||16̍

verses.padam: prEti|cyavasva|Buvaḥ|patE|viśvA̍ni|aBIti̍|dhAmA̍ni|mA|tvA|pariparIti̍# pari - parI|vidat|mA|tvA|paripanthina iti# pari - panthinaḥ|vidann|mA|tvA|vRukA̱ḥ|aGAyava̍ ityaGa̍ - yavaḥ|mA|gandharvaḥ|viśvAva̍suriti̍# viśva - vasuḥ|Eti|daGat|śyEnaḥ|BUtvA|parEti̍|pata|yaja̍mAnasya|naḥ|gRuhE|dEvaiḥ|saṅqskRutam|yaja̍mAnasya|svastyayanIti̍# svasti - ayanI|asi|apIti̍|panthA̱m|agasmahi|svastigAmiti̍# svasti - gAm|anEhasa̱m|yEna|viśvA̱ḥ|parIti̍|dviṣa̍ḥ|vRuṇakti̍|vindatE̱|vasu̍|nama̍ḥ|mitrasya̍# ( )|varuṇasya|cakṣa̍sE|mahaḥ|dEvAya̍|tat|Rutam|saparyata|dUrEdRuśa̍ iti# dUrE - dRuśE̱|dEvajAtAyEti̍# dEva - jAtAya|kEtavE̱|divaḥ|putrAya|sUryA̍ya|śaṃqsata|varu̍ṇasya|skaMBa̍nam|asi|varu̍ṇasya|skaMBasarja̍namiti̍# skaMBa - sarjanam|asi|unmu̍kta̍ ityut - muktaḥ|varuṇasya|pAśa̍ḥ||17̍ (73) ( mitrasya-trayOviṃśatiśca̍ ) (A9)
verses.samhita: pra cyavasva̍ BuvaspatE viśvA̱nyaBi dhAmAni̍ mA tvA# pariparI vidanmA̍ tvA# paripanthinO# vidanmA tvA vRukA# aGAyavO mA gandharvO̍ viśvAvasurA̍ daGacCyEnO̍ BUtvA parA# pata yajamAnasya̍ nO gRuhE dEvaiḥ saṅskRutaM̍ ~MyajamAnasya̍ svastyayanyasyapi̍ panthAmagasmahi̍ svastigA-manEhasaM̍ ~MyEna viśvAḥ pari dviṣO# vRuṇakti# vindatE vasu namO# mitrasya ( ) varuṇasya̍ cakṣasE̍ mahO dEvAya tadRutaṃ saparyata̍ dUrEdRuśE# dEvajAtAya̍ kEtavE# divasputrAya sUryAya̍ śaṃsata varuṇasya̍ skaMBanamasi̍ varuṇasya̍ skaMBasarjana-masyunmu̍ktO̍ varuṇasya̍ pAśaḥ||17̍

verses.padam: agnEḥ|Atithyam|asi|viṣṇavE|tvA|sOma̍sya|Atithyam|asi|viṣṇa̍vE|tvA|ati̍thEḥ|Atithyam|asi|viṣṇa̍vE|tvA|agnayE̱|tvA|rAyaspOṣadAv^^nna̍ iti# rAyaspOṣa - dAv^^nnE̱|viṣṇavE|tvA|śyEnAya̍|tvA|sOmaBRuta̍ iti# sOma - BRutE̱|viṣṇavE|tvA|yA|tE|dhAmA̍ni|haviṣA̱|yaja̍nti|tA|tE|viśvA̱|pariBUriti̍# pari - BUḥ|astu|yajñam|gayasPAna iti# gaya - sPAnaḥ|pratara̍ṇa̍ iti# pra - taraṇaḥ|suvIra̍ iti# su - vIraḥ|avI̍rahEtyavI̍ra̍ - hA|prEti|cara̍ q|sOma|duryAn|adi̍tyAḥ|sada̍ḥ|asi|adi̍tyAḥ|sada̍ḥ|Eti̍|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agnE-rAtithyama̍si̍ viṣṇavE̍ tvA sOmasyA&&*tithyama̍si̍ viṣṇavE̍ tvA-&tithErAtithyama̍si̍ viṣṇavE̍ tvA&gnayE̱ tvA rAyaspOṣadAv.nnE viṣṇavE̍ tvA śyEnAya# tvA sOmaBRutE viṣṇavE̍ tvA yA tE dhAmAni̍ haviṣA yajanti̍ tA tE viśvA# pariBUrastu̍ yajñaM gayasPAna̍ḥ̍ prataraṇaḥ̍ suvIrO&vIrahA̍ pracarA̍ sOma duryAnadityAḥ̍ sadO&syadityAḥ̍ sada A-[ ] 18

verses.padam: sIda|varuṇaḥ|asi|dhRutavra̍ta̍ iti# dhRuta - vrataḥ|vAruṇam|asi|śaMyOriti# śaM - yOḥ|dEvAnA̱m|saKyAt|mA|dEvAnA̱m|apasaḥ|Cithsmahi|Apa̍taya̍ ityA - patayE|tvA|gRuhṇAmi|paripataya̍ iti pari# - patayE|tvA|gRuhṇAmi|tanUnaptra iti tanU̱ - naptrE̱|tvA|gRuhṇAmi|śAkvarAya|tvA|gRuhṇAmi|śakmann̍|Oji̍ṣṭhAya|tvA|gRuhṇAmi|anA̍dhRuṣṭamityanA̱̍ - dhRuṣṭam|asi|anAdhRuṣyamityanA̍ - dhRuṣyam|dEvAnA̱m|Ojaḥ|aBiśastipA̍ ityaBiśasti̍ - pAḥ|anaBiśastEnyamityanaBi̍ - śastEnyam|anviti|mE|dIkṣAm|dIkṣApa̍tiriti̍# dIkṣA - patiḥ|manyatAm|anviti|tapa̍ḥ|tapa̍spatiriti̍ tapaḥ̍ - patiḥ|a~jjasA|satyam|upEti̍|gEṣam|suvitE|mA̍ ( )|dhAḥ||19 (51)
verses.samhita: sIda̍ varuṇO&si̍ dhRutavratO̍ vAruṇamasi̍ śaM~MyOr dEvAnAṃ# saKyAnmA dEvAnA-mapasa̍-śCithsmahyApa̍tayE̍ tvA gRuhṇAmi paripatayE̍ tvA gRuhṇAmi tanUnaptrE̱ tvA gRuhṇAmi śAkvarAya# tvA gRuhṇAmi śakmannOjiṣṭhAya̍ tvA gRuhṇAmya-nAdhRuṣṭamasya-nAdhRuṣyaM̍ dEvAnAmOjO-̍ &BiṣastipA anaBiśastE&nyamanu̍# mE dIkṣAM dIkṣApatir̍ manyatAmanu tapastapaspatira~jja̍sA̍ satyamupa# gEṣaṃ suvitE mA# ( ) dhAḥ||19

verses.padam: aṃqśuraṃśurityaṃqśuḥ̍ - aṃqśuḥ|tE|dEva|sOma|Eti|pyAyatAm|indrA̍ya|Ekadhanavida̍ ityEkadhana̍ - vidE̱|Eti|tuBya̱m|indra̍ḥ|pyAyatAm|Eti̍|tvam|indrA̍ya|pyAyasva|Eti̍|pyAyaya|saKIn̍|sanyA|mEdhayA̱|svasti|tE|dEva|sOma|sutyAm|aśIya|Eṣṭa̍ḥ|rAya̍ḥ|prEti̍|iṣE|BagA̍ya|Rutam|RutavAdiBya̍ ityRutavAdi̍ - Byaḥ|namaḥ|divE|nama̍ḥ|pRuthivyai|agnE̱|vratapata̍ iti# vrata - patE|tvam|vratAnA̱m|vratapatiriti̍# vrata - patiḥ|asi|yA|mama|tanUḥ|EṣA|sA|tvayi̍|20̍ (50)
verses.samhita: aṃqśuraṃśustE̍ dEva sOmA&&*pyAyatA-mindrA̍yaikadhanavida̍ A tuByamindraḥ̍ pyAyatAmA tvamindrAya̍ pyAyasvA&&*pyAyaya̍ saKI̱nth sanyA mEdhayA̱ svasti tE# dEva sOma sutyAmaśIyEṣṭA̍ rAyaḥ prEṣE BagAyartamRu̍tavAdiByO̍ namO# divE namaḥ̍ pRuthivyA agnE̱ vratapatE tvaM ~MvratAnA̱M ~Mvratapatirasi̍ yA mama# tanUrEṣA sA tvayi -[ ] 20

verses.padam: yA|tava|tanUḥ|iyam|sA|mayi̍|saha|nau|vratapata̍ iti# vrata -patE|vratinO̱ḥ|vratAni|yA|tE|agnE|rudri̍yA|tanUḥ|tayA̱|naḥ|pAhi|tasyA̱ḥ|tE|svAhA̱|yA|tE|agnE|ayAśayEtya̍yA̍ - śayA|rajAśayEti# rajA - śayA|harAśayEti# harA - śayA|tanUḥ|vaṛṣiṣṭhA|gahvarEṣṭhEti̍# gahvarE - sthA|ugram|vacaḥ|apEti̍|avadhIm|tvEṣam|vaca̍ḥ|apEti̍|avadhIm|svAhA̱||21̍ (40) ( tvayi-catvAriṃqśacca̍# ) (A11)
verses.samhita: yA tava# tanUriyaṃ sA mayi# saha nau̱ vratapatE vratinO̱r vratAni yA tE# agnE rudriyA̍ tanUstayA# naḥ pAhi tasyA̱stE svAhA yA tE# agnE&yAśayA rajAśayA̍ harAśayA̍ tanUrvaṛṣiṣṭhA̍ gahvarEṣṭhO&graM ~MvacO apAvadhIM̍ tvEṣaM ~MvacO apAvadhIṅq̍ svAhA̱||21

verses.padam: vittAyanIti# vitta - ayanI|mE|asi|tiktAyanIti̍# tikta - ayanI|mE|asi|ava̍tAt|mA|nAthitam|ava̍tAt|mA|vyathitam|vidEḥ|agniḥ|naBa̍ḥ|nAma̍|agnE̱|a~ggiraḥ|yaḥ|asyAm|pRuthivyAm|asi̍|Ayu̍ṣA|nAmnA̱|Eti̍|ihi|yat|tE|anA̍dhRuṣṭamityanA̱̍ - dhRuṣṭam|nAma|yajñiya̱m|tEna̍|tvA|Eti̍|dadhE|agnE̱|a~ggiraḥ|yaḥ|dvitIya̍syAm|tRutIya̍syAm|pRuthivyAm|asi̍|Ayu̍ṣA|nAmnA̱|Eti̍|ihi|yat|tE|anA̍dhRuṣṭamityanA̱̍ - dhRuṣṭam|nAma|22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vittAyanI̍ mE&si tiktAyanI̍ mE&syavatAnmA̍ nAthitamavatAnmA̍ vyathitaM ~MvidEragnirnaBO nAmAgnE# a~ggirO yO̱&syAM pRuthivyAmasyAyu̍ṣA̍ nAmnEhi yattE&nAdhRuṣṭaM̍ nAma# yajñiyaM tEna tvA&&*dadhE&gnE# a~ggirO yO dvitIyasyAM̍ tRutIyasyAM̍ pRuthivyA-masyAyuṣA̍ nAmnEhi yattE&nAdhRuṣṭaM̍ nAma-[̍ ] 22

verses.padam: yajñiya̱m|tEna|tvA|Eti̍|dadhE|siṃqhIḥ|asi|mahiṣIḥ|asi|uru|prathasva|uru|tE|yajñapa̍tiriti̍# yajña - patiḥ|prathatAm|dhruvA|asi|dEvEByaḥ|śundhasva|dEvEBya̍ḥ|śuMBasva|indraGOṣa̍ itI̱ndra - GOṣaḥ|tvA|vasuBiriti̍ vasu# - Biḥ|purastA̱t|pAtu|manOjavA̍ iti manaḥ̍ - javAḥ|tvA|pitRuBiriti# pitRu - Biḥ|dakṣiṇataḥ|pAtu|pracEtA̍ iti pra - cEtAḥ|tvA|rudraiḥ|paścAt|pAtu|viśvakarmEti# viśva - karmA|tvA|Adityaiḥ|uttarata ityut̍ - tarataḥ|pAtu|siṃqhIḥ|asi|sapatnasAhIti# sapatna - sAhI|svAhA̱|siṃqhIḥ|asi|suprajAvaniriti# suprajA - vaniḥ|svAhA̱|siṃqhIḥ|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yajñiyaM tEna tvA&&*dadhE̍ siṃqhIrasi̍ mahiṣIrasyuru̍ prathasvOru̍ tE# yajñapatiḥ̍ prathatAM dhruvA&si# dEvEByaḥ̍ śundhasva dEvEByaḥ̍ śuMBasvEndraGOṣastvA vasuBiḥ̍ purastA̱t pAtu manOjavAstvA̍ pitRuBir̍ dakṣiṇataḥ pAtu̍ pracEtAstvA̍ rudraiḥ paścAt pAtu̍ viśvakarmA̍ tvA&&dityairuttarataḥ̍ pAtu̍ siṃqhIrasi̍ sapatnasAhI svAhA# siṃqhIrasi̍ suprajAvaniḥ svAhA# siṃqhI-[ ] 23

verses.padam: asi|rAyaspOṣavaniriti# rAyaspOṣa - vaniḥ|svAhA̱|siṃqhIḥ|asi|AdityavanirityA̍ditya̍ - vaniḥ|svAhA̱|siṃqhIḥ|asi|Eti̍|vaha|dEvAn|dEvayata̍ iti# dEva - yatE|yajamAnAya|svAhA̱|BUtEBya̍ḥ|tvA|viśvAyuriti̍# viśva - Ayuḥ|asi|pRuthivIm|dRuṃqha|dhruvakṣiditi# dhruva - kṣit|asi|antarikṣam|dRuṃqha|acyutakṣiditya̍cyuta̍ -kṣit|asi|diva̱m|dRuṃqha|agnEḥ|Basma|asi|agnEḥ|purI̍ṣam|asi||24̍ (35) (nAma-suprajAvaniḥ̍ svAhA# simṃqhiḥ-pa~jcatriṃ̍ śacca ) (A12)
verses.samhita: rasi̍ rAyaspOṣavaniḥ svAhA# siṃqhIrasyAdityavaniḥ̍ svAhA# siṃqhIrasyA vaha̍ dEvAndEvayatE̍ yajamAnAya̍ svAhA# BUtEByastvA̍ viśvAyurasi̍ pRuthivIM dRuṃha̍ dhruvakṣidasyantari̍kṣaM̍ dRuṃhAcyutakṣidasi̍ divaM̍ dRuṃhAgnEr BasmA̱syagnEḥ purIṣamasi||24̍

verses.padam: yu~jjatE̱|manaḥ|uta|yu~jjatE|dhiya̍ḥ|viprA̱ḥ|vipra̍sya|bRuhataḥ|vipaścita̍ḥ||vIti̍|hOtrA̱ḥ|dadhE|vayunAviditi̍# vayuna - vit|Ekaḥ|it|mahI|dEvasya̍|savituḥ|pari̍ṣṭutiriti̍ pari# - stutiḥ||suvAgiti# su- vAk|dEva|duryAn|Eti̍|vada|dEvaśrutAviti̍# dEva - śrutau̱|dEvEṣu|Eti̍|GOṣEthAm|Eti̍|naḥ|vIraḥ|jAyatAm|karmaṇya̍ḥ|yam|sarvE̱|anujIvAmEtya̍nu̍ - jIvAma|yaḥ|bahUnAm|asa̍t|vaśI||idam|viṣṇu̍ḥ|vIti̍|cakramE|trEdhA|nIti̍|dadhE|padam||samU̍ḍhamiti̍ sam - Uḍham|asya|25 (50)
verses.samhita: yu~jjatE mana# uta yu~jjatE̍ dhiyO viprA viprasya̍ bRuhatO vipaścita̍ḥ|vi̍ hOtrA# dadhE vayunAvidEka inmahI dEvasya# savituḥ pariṣṭutiḥ||suvAgdE̍va̍ duryAṃq A vada̍ dEvaśrutau# dEvEṣvA GOṣEthAmA̍ nO# vIrO jAyatAM̍ karmaṇyO# yaṃ sarvE&nu̍ jIvAma̍ yO bahUnAmasa̍dvaśI||idaM̍ ~Mviṣṇur vicakramE̍ trEdhA ni dadhE̍ padaM||samUḍhamasya̍ - [ ] 25

verses.padam: pAṃqsurE|irAvatI̍ itIrA̱ - vatI|dhEnumatI iti# dhEnu - matI̱|hi|BUtam|sUyavasinI iti# su - yavasinI̱|manavE|yaśasyE̍# iti||vIti̍|askaBnAt|rOda̍sI̍ iti|viṣṇu̍ḥ|EtE̍ iti|dAdhAra̍|pRuthivIm|aBita̍ḥ|mayUKai̱ḥ||prAcI̍ iti|prEti̍|itam|addhvaram|kalpaya̍ntI̍ iti|Urddhvam|yajñam|nayatam|mA|jIhvaratam|atra̍|ramEthAm|vaṛṣmann̍|pRuthivyAḥ|divaḥ|vA|viṣṇO|uta|vA|pRuthivyAḥ|mahaḥ|vA|viṣṇO|uta|vA|antari̍kṣAt|hastau̱|pRuṇasva|bahuBiriti̍# bahu - Biḥ|vasavyai̱ḥ|A*|prEti|yacCa|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pAṃsuqra irAvatI̍ dhEnumatI hi BUtaṃ sUyavasinI̍ manavE̍ yaśasyE̱|vyaskaBnAd-rOda̍sI̍ viṣṇurEtE̍ dAdhAra# pRuthivImaBitO# mayUKai̱ḥ||prAcI prEtamaddhvaraM̍ kalpayantI̍ UrddhvaM ~MyajñaM nayataM̍ mA jI̱hvaratamatra# ramEthAM ~Mvarṣman̍ pRuthivyA divO vA# viṣṇavuta vA# pRuthivyA mahO vA# viṣṇavuta vA&ntarikṣAddhastau̍# pRuṇasva bahuBir̍ vasavyairA̍ pra yacCa̍ - [ ] 26

verses.padam: dakṣiṇAt|Eti̍|uta|savyAt||viṣṇO̱ḥ|nuka̱m|vIryA̍ṇi|prEti̍|vOcam|yaḥ|pArthi̍vAni|vimama̍ iti# vi - mamE|rajAṃsi|yaḥ|aska̍BAyat|utta̍ramityut̍ - taram|sadhasthamiti# sadha - stham|vicakramAṇa iti# vi - cakramAṇaḥ|trEdhA|urugAya ityuru̍ - gAyaḥ|viṣṇO̱ḥ|rarAṭa̱m|asi|viṣṇO̱ḥ|pRuṣṭham|asi|viṣṇO̱ḥ|śnaptrE iti|sthaḥ|viṣṇO̱ḥ|syUḥ|asi|viṣṇO̱ḥ|dhruvam|asi|vaiṣṇavam|asi|viṣṇa̍vE|tvA||27̍ (39) ( asya-yacCai - kAnna catvAriṃq̍ śacca# ) (A13)
verses.samhita: dakṣiṇAdOta̍ savyAt|viṣṇOrnukaM̍ ~MvIryAṇi̍ pra vOcaM̍ ~Myaḥ pArtthivAni̍ vimamE rajAṃsi̍ yO askaBAyadutta̍raṃ̍ sadhasthaM̍ ~MvicakramAṇa strEdhOrugAyO̍ viṣṇO# rarAṭamasi̍ viṣṇO̱ḥ pRuṣṭhamasi̍ viṣṇOḥ ś~japtrE̱ sthO viṣṇOḥ syUrasi̍ viṣṇO̱r dhruvamasi̍ vaiṣṇavamasi̍ viṣṇavE̍ tvA||27

verses.padam: kRuṇuṣva|pAjaḥ|prasi̍timiti̍ pra - sitim|na|pRuthvIm|yAhi|rAjA̱|iva|amavAnityama̍# - vAn|iBEna||tRuṣvIm|anviti̍|prasi̍timiti̍ pra - sitim|drUṇAnaḥ|astA̱|asi|viddhya|rakṣasa̍ḥ|tapi̍ṣṭhaiḥ||tava̍|BramAsa̍ḥ|AśuyA|patanti|anviti̍|spRuśa|dhRuṣatA|śOśu̍cAnaḥ||tapUṃ̍ṣi|agnE|juhvA̱|pata~ggAn|asa̍ndita̍ ityasa̱M - ditaḥ|vIti|sRuja|viṣva̍k|ulkAḥ||pratIti̍|spaśa̍ḥ|vIti̍|sRuja|tUrṇi̍tama̍ iti tUrṇi# - tamaḥ|Bava|pAyuḥ|viśaḥ|asyAḥ|ada̍bdaḥ||yaḥ|naḥ|dUrE|aGaśaṃ̍sa̍ ityaGa - śaṃqsaḥ|28 (50)
verses.samhita: kRuṇuṣva pAjaḥ prasitinna̍ pRuthvIM ~MyAhi rAjEvAmavAṃq̍ iBEna|tRuṣvImanu̍ prasitiM-drUṇAnO-&stA̍&si̍ viddhya# rakṣasa stapiṣṭhaiḥ||tava̍# BramAsa# AśuyA pantatyanu̍# spRuśa-dhRuṣatA śOśucAnaḥ|tapUṅ̍ṣyagnE̍ juhvA# pata~ggAnasanditO̍ visRuja̍ viṣvagulkAḥ||pratispaśO̍ visRuja-tUrṇi̍tamO̍ BavA# pAyurviśO asyA adabdhaḥ|yO̍ nO# dUrE aGaśaṃsO̍ - [ ] 28

verses.padam: yaḥ|anti|agnE̱|mAki̍ḥ|tE|vyathi̍ḥ|Eti̍|dadhaṛṣIt||uditi̍|agnE|tiṣṭha|praIti̍|Eti̍|tanuṣva|nIti̍|amitrAn̍|OṣatAt|tigmahEta̍ iti# tigma - hEtE||yaḥ|naḥ|arAtim|samidhAnEti̍# sam - idhAna|cakrE|nIcA|tam|dhakṣi|atasam|na|śuṣka̱m||Urddhvaḥ|Bava|pratIti|viddhya|adhIti̍|asmat|Aviḥ|kRuṇuṣva|daivyA̍nI|agnE||avEti̍|sthirA|tanuhi|yAtujUnA̱m|jAmim|ajA̍mim|prEti̍|mRuṇIhi|śatrUn̍||saḥ|tE|29̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yO antyagnE mAkiṣṭE̍ vyathirA dadhaṛṣIt||uda̍gnE̍ tiṣṭha pratyA *&&tanuṣva̍ nyamitrAṃ̍# OṣatAt tigmahEtE|yO nO arAtiṃ̍ samidhAna cakrE nIcA taM dhakṣyatasaM̍ na śuṣka̱M||UrddhvO Bava̍ pratividdhyA-&ddhyasmadAviṣkRu̍ṇuṣva̍ daivyA̱nyagnE|avasthirA̍ tanuhi̍ yAtujUnA̱M jAmimajAmiMq̍ pramRuṇIhi̍ śatrUn||sa̍ tE# - [ ] 29

verses.padam: jAnAti|sumatimiti# su - matim|yaviṣṭha|yaḥ|IvatE|brahma̍ṇE|gAtum|aira̍t||viśvA̍ni|asmai|sudinAnIti̍# su - dinAni|rAyaḥ|dyumnAni̍|aryaḥ|vIti̍|duraḥ̍|aBIti̍|dyaut||saḥ|it|agnE|astu|suBaga̍ iti# su - Bagaḥ|sudAnuriti̍# su - dAnuḥ|yaḥ|tvA|nityE̍na|haviṣA̱|yaḥ|ukthaiḥ||piprI̍ṣati|svE|Ayu̍ṣi|durOṇa̍ iti# duḥ - OnE|viśvA̱|it|asmai|sudinEti# su- dinA̱|sA|asat|iṣṭiḥ||arcA̍mi|tE|sumatimiti̍# su - matim|GOṣi|arvAk|samiti̍|tE|vAvAtA̱|jaratAM|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: jAnAti sumatiM ~Myaviṣṭhaya̍ IvatE̍ brahmaṇE̍ gAtumairat|viśvA̱nyasmai̍ sudinAni̍ rAyO dyumnAnyaryO vidurO# aBi dyau̱t||sEdagnE̍ astu suBagaḥ̍ sudAnu-ryastvA nityEna̍ haviṣAya ukthaiḥ|piprIṣati̍ sva Ayuṣi̍ durOṇE viśvEdasmai̍ sudinA sA&sadiṣṭiḥ||arcA̍mi̍ tE sumatiM GOṣyarvAK-santE# vA vA tA# jaratA - [ ] 30

verses.padam: iyam|gIḥ||svaśvA iti# su - aśvA̱ḥ|tvA|surathA iti# su - rathA̱ḥ|marjayEma|asmE iti|kṣatrAṇi̍|dhArayEḥ|anviti̍|dyUn||iha|tvA|BUri̍|Eti̍|carEt|upEti̍|t^mann|dOṣA̍vastariti̍ dOṣA̱ - vastaḥ|dIdivAṃsa̱m|anviti|dyUn||krIḍa̍ntaḥ|tvA|sumana̍sa̍ iti# su - manasaḥ|sapEma|aBIti̍|dyumnA|tasthivAṃsa̍ḥ|janA̍nAm||yaḥ|tvA|svaśva̍ iti# su - aśvaḥ|suhiraṇya̍ iti# su - hiraṇyaḥ|agnE|upayAtItyupa̍ - yAti|vasu̍matEti̍ vasu# - matA|rathEna||tasya̍|trAtA|Bavasi|tasya̍|saKA̱|yaḥ|tE|Atithyam|Anuṣak|jujO̍ṣat||mahaḥ|rujAmi|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: miyaMgIḥ|svaśvA̱stvA surathA# marjayEmAsmE kṣatrAṇi# dhArayEranu dyUn||iha tvA BUryA carE̍ dupatman dOṣAvastar̍ dIdivAṃsamanu dyUn|krIḍantastvA̍ sumanasaḥ̍ sapEmABi dyumnA tasthivAṃsO̍ janAnAM||yastvA-svaśva̍ḥ̍ suhiraṇyO agna̍ upayAti vasumatA̍ rathEna|tasya̍# trAtA-Bavasi̍ tasya saKA yasta# AtithyamAnuṣag̍ jujOṣat||mahO̍ rujAmi̍ - [ ] 31

verses.padam: bandhutA̱|vacOBiriti̍ vacaḥ̍ - Biḥ|tat|mA|pituḥ|gOtamAt|anviti̍|iyAya||tvam|naḥ|asya|vaca̍saḥ|cikiddhi|hOta̍ḥ|yaviṣṭha|sukratO̍ iti# su - kratO|damUnAḥ||asva̍pnaja̍ ityasvapna̍ - jaḥ|taraṇayaḥ|suśEvA̍ iti# su-śEvA̱ḥ|atandrAsaḥ|avRukAḥ|aśra̍miṣṭhAḥ||tE|pAyava̍ḥ|saddhriya̍~jcaḥ|niṣadyEti̍# ni - sadya|agnE̱|tava̍|naḥ|pAntu|amUra||yE|pAyava̍ḥ|mAmatEyam|tE|agnE|paśya̍ntaḥ|andham|duritAditi̍# duḥ - itAt|arakṣann||rarakṣa̍|tAn|sukRuta̍ iti# su - kRutaḥ|viśvavE̍dA̍ iti# viśva - vEdAḥ|diPsantaḥ|it|ripava̍ḥ|na|ha|32̍ (50)
verses.samhita: bandhutA vacOBistanmA̍# piturgOtamAda-nvi̍yAya|tvannO̍# asya vacasa-ścikiddhi̍ hOtaryaviṣṭha̍ sukratO damUnAḥ||asva̍pnaja̍ staraṇayaḥ̍ suśEvA atandrAsO&vRukA̍ aśramiṣṭhAḥ|tE̍ pAyavaḥ̍ saddhriya~jcO̍ niṣadyA&gnE tavanaḥ̍ pAntvamUra||yE pAyavO# mAmatEyaM tE# agnE paśyantO̍ andhaM duritAdara̍kṣan|rarakṣatAnth̍ sukRutO# viśvavEdA̍ diPsanta̍ idripavO nA ha# - [ ] 32

verses.padam: dEBuḥ||tvayA̱|vayam|sadhanya# iti# sadha - nyaḥ|tvOtA̱ḥ|tava̍|praṇItIti̍ pra - nItI|aśyAma|vAjAn||uBA|śaṃsA̱|sUdaya|satyatAta̍ iti# satya - tAtE|anuṣṭhuyA|kRuṇuhi|ahrayAṇa||ayA|tE|agnE|samidhEti# saM - idhA̱|vidhEma|pratIti|stOma̱m|śasyamA̍nam|gRuBAya||daha̍|aśasa̍ḥ|rakṣasa̍ḥ|pAhi|asmAn|druhaḥ|nidaḥ|mitramaha̍ iti# mitra - mahaḥ|avadyAt||rakṣOhaṇamiti# rakṣaḥ - hana̱m|vAjina̱m|Eti|jiGarmi|mitram|prathi̍ṣṭham|upEti̍|yAmi|śarma̍||śiśA̍naḥ|agniḥ|kratu̍Biriti̍ kratu# - Biḥ|samiddha̍ iti saM - iddhaḥ|saḥ|naḥ|divA̱|33 (50)
verses.samhita: dEBuḥ||tvayA# vayaṃ sadhanya̍-stvOtA-stava̍ praṇI̱tyaśyAma vAjAn|uBA̍ śaṃsA# sUdaya satyatAtE-&nuṣṭhuyA kRuṇuhyahrayAṇa||ayA̍ tE# agnE samidhA# vidhEma pratistOmaṃ# śasyamAnaM̍ gRuBAya|dahAśasO# rakṣasaḥ̍ pAhyasmAn̍ druhO nidO mitramahO̍ avadyAt||rakṣOhaṇaM# ~MvAjinamAjiGarmi̍ mitraM prathiṣṭha-mupa̍yAmi̍ śarma|śiśA̍nO̍ agniḥ kratuBiḥ̍ samiddhaḥsanO̍ divA - [ ] 33

verses.padam: saḥ|riṣaḥ|pAtu|nakta̱m||vIti|jyOti̍ṣA|bRuhatA|BAti|agniḥ|Aviḥ|viśvA̍ni|kRuṇutE|mahitvEti̍# mahi - tvA||prEti|adE̍vIḥ|mAyAḥ|sahatE|durEvA̍ iti# duḥ - EvA̱ḥ|śiśItE|śRu~ggE̍ iti|rakṣa̍sE|vinikṣa̍ iti# vi - nikṣE̱||uta|svAnAsaḥ|divi|santu|agnEḥ|tigmAyu̍dhA̍ iti# tigma - AyudhAḥ|rakṣasE|hantavai|u||madE̱|cit|asya|prEti̍|rujanti|BAmA̱ḥ|na|varantE|paribAdha̍ iti# pari - bAdhaḥ|adE̍vIḥ||34̍ (41) (aGaśa(gm)saḥ-sa̍ tE-jaratAṃ̍ rujAmi-ha divai-kacatvAriṃśacca)|(A14)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAm pada pAṭhE prathamakAṇḍE dvitIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||----------------------------------------------------------------
verses.samhita: sariṣaḥ pAtunakta̱M||vijyOti̍ṣA̍ bRuhatA BA̱tyagni-rAvir viśvAni̍ kRuṇutE mahitvA|prAdEvIr̍ mAyAḥ sahatE-durEvAḥ̍ śiśItE̍ śRu~ggE rakṣasE̍ vinikṣE̱||uta svAnAsO# diviṣantvagnE̍ stigmAyudhA̍ rakṣasE̍ hantavA u|madE̍# cidasya prarujanti̍ BAmA na varantE̍ paribAdhO adEvIḥ||34̍ (aGaśaṃsaḥ-sa̍ tE-jaratAṃ-rujAmi-ha̍ -divai - kacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A14) praśna korvai with starting padams of 1 to 14 anuvAkams :- (Apa# undantvA-kU̱tyai-daivI-miyantE-vasvya̍sya-ṃqśunA̍tE-sOma̍nta-udAyu̍ṣA̍ pra cyavasvA-̍ gnErAtithya̍ -maṃqśuraṃ# śur-vittAyanI̍ mE&si -yu~jcatE-kRuṇuṣva̍ pAja-ścaturdaśa|)̍ korvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (ApO-vasvyasi̍ yA tavE-ya~ggI-ścatustriṃśat|)̍ first and last padam of second praśnam :- (Apa# undan-tvadEvIḥ|)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM prathamakAṇḍE dvitIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ|hariḥ OM||1.3 prathamakAṇḍE tRutIyaḥ praśnaḥ -

verses.padam: - Padam dEvasya|tvA|savituḥ|prasava̍ iti# pra - savE|aśvinO̱ḥ|bAhuByAmiti# bAhu - ByAm|pUṣṇaḥ|hastA̱ByAm|Eti|dadE|aBri̍ḥ|asi|nAri̍ḥ|asi|pari̍liKitamiti̍ pari# - liKitam|rakṣaḥ|pari̍liKitA̍ iti pari# - liKitAḥ|arAtayaḥ|idam|aham|rakṣa̍saḥ|grIvAḥ|apIti̍|kRuntAmi|yaḥ|asmAn|dvEṣṭi̍|yam|ca|vayam|dviṣmaḥ|idam|asya|grIvAḥ|apIti̍|kRuntAmi|divE|tvA|antari̍kṣAya|tvA|pRuthivyai|tvA|śundha̍tAm|lOkaḥ|pitRuṣada̍na̍ iti# pitRu - sadanaḥ|yava̍ḥ|asi|yavaya̍|asmat|dvEṣa̍ḥ|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvasya# tvA savituḥ prasavE̱&śvinO̱r̍ bAhuByA̱M pUṣṇO hastA̱ByAmA dadE&Brirasi̍ nArirasi̍ pariliKitaṃq̍ rakṣaḥ pariliKitA̍ arAtaya̍ idamahaṃ rakṣasO̍ grIvA api# kRuntAmi yO̱&smAn dvEṣṭi yaM ca# vayaM dviṣma idamasya̍ grIvA api# kRuntAmi divE tvA&ntarikṣAya̍ tvA pRuthivyai tvA śundhatAM̍ ~MlOkaḥ pitRuṣada̍nO̍ yavO&si̍ yavayAsmad dvEṣO# - [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam yavaya|arA̍tIḥ|pitRuṇAm|sada̍nam|asi|uditi̍|diva̱m|staBAna|Eti̍|antari̍kṣam|pRuṇa|pRuthivIm|dRuṃqha|dyutAnaḥ|tvA|mArutaḥ|minOtu|miqtrAvaru̍ṇayOriti̍# mitrA - varuṇayOḥ|dhruvEṇa̍|dharma̍ṇA|brahmavanimiti̍# brahma - vani̱m|tvA|kṣatravanimiti# kṣatra - vani̱m|suprajAvanimiti# suprajA - vani̱m|rAyaspOṣavanimiti# rAyasyOṣa - vani̱m|parIti|UhAmi|brahma̍|dRuṃqha|kṣatram|dRuṃqha|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|dRuṃqha|rAyaḥ|pOṣa̱m|dRuṃqha|GRutEna|dyAvA̍ pRuthivI iti# dyAvA - pRuthivI|Eti|pRuṇEthAm|indra̍sya|sada̍ḥ|asi|viśvajanasyEti̍# viśva - janasya|CAyA|parIti̍|tvA|girvaṇaḥ|gira̍ḥ|imAḥ̍ ()|Bavantu|viśvataḥ|vRuddhAyumiti̍# vRuddha - Ayum|anviti|vRuddha̍yaḥ|juṣṭA̱ḥ|Bavantu|juṣṭa̍yaḥ|indra̍sya|syUḥ|asi|indra̍sya|dhruvam|asi|aindram|asi|indrA̍ya|tvA||2̍ (68)
verses.samhita: yavayArAtIḥ̍ pitRuṇAṃ sadanamasyuddivaṅ̍# staBAnA&ntarikṣaM̍ pRuṇa pRuthivIM dRuṃha̍ dyutAnastvA# mArutO minOtu̍ mitrAvaruṇayOr̍ dhruvEṇa dharmaṇA̍ brahmavaniM̍ tvA kṣatravaniṃ# suprajAvaniṃ# rAyaspOṣavaniM paryUhAmi̍ brahma# dRuṃha kṣatraM dRuṃha̍ prajAM dRuṃha̍ rAyaspOṣaM̍ dRuṃha GRutEna# dyAvApRuthivI A pRuṇEthAmindra̍sya̍ sadO&si̍ viśvajanasya# CAyA pari# tvA girvaṇO gira# imA ( ) Bavantu̍ viśvatO# vRuddhAyumanu vRuddhayO̍ juṣṭA# Bavantu juṣṭaya̍ indrasya̍ syUrasIndrasya̍ dhruvamasyaindramasIndrA̍ya̍ tvA||2

verses.padam: - Padam rakṣOhaṇa iti# rakṣaḥ - hanaḥ|valagahana̍ iti# valaga - hanaḥ|vaiṣṇavAn|KanAmi|idam|aham|tam|valagamiti̍# vala - gam|uditi|vapAmi|yam|naḥ|samAnaḥ|yam|asa̍mAnaḥ|nicaKAnEti̍# ni - caKAna|idam|Enam|addha̍ram|karOmi|yaḥ|naḥ|samAnaḥ|yaḥ|asa̍mAnaḥ|arAtIyati̍|gAyatrEṇa̍|Canda̍sA|ava̍bAḍha̍ ityava# - bAḍhaḥ|valaga iti# vala - gaḥ|kim|atra|Badram|tat|nau|saha|virAḍiti̍# vi - rAṭ|asi|sapatnahEti# sapatna - hA|samrAḍiti# sam - rAṭ|asi|BrAtRuvyahEti# BrAtRuvya - hA|svarAḍiti# sva - rAṭ|asi|aBimAtihEtyaBimAti̍ - hA|viśvArAḍiti# viśva - rAṭ|asi|viśvAsAm|nAṣṭrAṇA̱m|hantA|3̍ (50)
verses.samhita: rakṣOhaṇO# valagahanO# vaiṣṇavAn KanAmIdamahaM̍ taM ~Mvalagamudva̍pAmi̍ yaM naḥ̍ samAnO yamasamAnO̍ nicaKAnEdamEnamadha̍raM̍ karOmi yO naḥ̍ samAnO yO&samAnO&rAtIyati̍# gAyatrEṇa CandasA&vabAḍhO̍ valagaḥ kimatra# BadraM tannau# saha virAḍasi̍ sapatnahA samrAḍasi̍ BrAtRuvyahA svarAḍasyaBimAtihA̍ viśvArAḍa̍si̍ viśvAsAM̍ nAṣṭrAṇAṃ# hantA - [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam rakṣOhaṇa iti# rakṣaḥ - hanaḥ|valagahana̍ iti# valaga - hanaḥ|prEti̍|ukṣAmi|vaiṣṇavAn|rakṣOhaṇa̍ iti# rakṣaḥ - hanaḥ|valagahana̍ iti# valaga - hanaḥ|avEti̍|nayAmi|vaiṣṇavAn|yava̍ḥ|asi|yavaya̍|asmat|dvEṣa̍ḥ|yavaya̍|arA̍tIḥ|rakṣOhaṇa̍ iti# rakṣaḥ - hanaḥ|valagahana̍ iti# valaga - hanaḥ|avEti̍|stRuṇAmi|vaiṣṇavAn|rakṣOhaṇa̍ iti# rakṣaḥ - hanaḥ|valagahana̍ iti# valaga - hanaḥ|aBIti̍|juhOmi|vaiṣṇavAn|rakṣOhaṇAviti̍# rakṣaḥ - hanau̱|valagahanAviti# valaga - hanau̱|upEti|dadhAmi|vaiṣṇavI̍ iti|rakṣOhaṇAviti̍# rakṣaḥ - hanau̱|valagahanAviti# valaga - hanau̱|parIti|UhAmi|vaiṣṇavI̍ iti|rakṣOhaṇAviti̍# rakṣaḥ - hanau̱|valagahanAviti# valaga - hanau̱|parIti|stRuṇAmi|vaiṣṇavI̍ iti|rakṣOhaṇAviti̍# rakṣaḥ - hanau̱|valagahanAviti# valaga - hanau̱|vaiṣṇavI iti|bRuhann|asi|bRuhadgrAvEti̍# bRuhat - grAvA|bRuhatIm|indrAya̍ ( )|vAca̱m|vada||4 (52)
verses.samhita: rakṣOhaṇO̍# valagahanaḥ prOkṣAmi̍ vaiṣṇavAn rakṣOhaṇO̍# valagahanO&va# nayAmi vaiṣṇavAn yavO&si̍ yavayAsmad dvEṣO# yavayArAtI̍ rakṣOhaṇO# valagahanO&va# stRuṇAmi vaiṣṇavAn rakṣOhaṇO̍# valagahanO&Bi juhOmi̍ vaiṣṇavAn rakṣOhaṇau̍# valagahanAvupa# dadhAmi vaiṣṇavI rakṣOhaṇau̍# valagahanau paryUhAmi̍ vaiṣṇavI rakṣOhaṇau̍# valagahanau pari# stRuṇAmi vaiṣṇavI rakṣOhaṇau̍# valagahanau# vaiṣṇavI bRuhannasi̍ bRuhadgrAvA̍ bRuhatImindrAya̍ ( ) vAcaM̍ ~Mvada||4

verses.padam: - Padam viBUriti# vi - BUḥ|asi|pravAhaṇa̍ iti# pra - vAhanaḥ|vahni̍ḥ|asi|havyavAha̍na̍ iti# havya - vAhanaḥ|śvAtraḥ|asi|pracE̍tA̍ iti pra - cEtAḥ|tuthaḥ|asi|viśvavEdA̍ iti# viśva - vEdAḥ|uśik|asi|kaviḥ|a~gGAriḥ|asi|baMBA̍riḥ|avasyuḥ|asi|duva̍svAn|śundhyUḥ|asi|mArjAlIya̍ḥ|samrAḍiti̍# saM - rAṭ|asi|kRuśAnuriti# kRuśa - anuḥ|pariṣadya iti# pari - sadyaḥ|asi|pava̍mAnaḥ|pratakvEti̍# pra - takvA̱|asi|naBasvAn|asa̍mRuMṣṭa̍ ityasa̱M - mRuṣṭaḥ|asi|havyasUda iti# havya - sUdaḥ|RutadhAmEtyRuta̍ - dhAmA|asi|suvarjyOtiriti̍ suvaḥ̍ - jyOtiḥq|brahmajyOtiriti̍ brahma# - jyOtiḥ|asi|suvardhAmEti̍ suvaḥ̍ - dhAmA|ajaḥ|asi|EkapAdityEka̍# - pAt|ahiḥ|asi|buddhniya̍ḥ|raudrE̍ṇa|anI̍kEna̍ ( )|pAhi|mA|agnE|pipRuhi|mA|mA|mA|hiṃqsIḥ||5 (58)
verses.samhita: viBUrasi̍ pravAhaṇO̍ vahnirasi̍ havyavAhanaḥ̍ śvAtrO&si̍ pracEtAstuthO̍&si̍ viśvavEdA̍ uśigasi̍ kavira~gGArirasi̍ baMBAriravasyura̍si̍ duvasvA~jCundhyUra̍si̍ mArjAlIyaḥ̍ samrAḍasi̍ kRuśAnuḥ̍ pariṣadyO&si̍ pavamAnaḥ̍ pratakvA&si̍ naBasvAnasa̍MmRuṣṭO&si̍ havyasUda# RutadhAmA&si̍ suvarjyOtir brahmajyOtirasi̍ suvarddhAmA&jO̱̍ &syEkapAdahi̍rasi̍ buddhniyO raudrEṇAnIkEna̍ ( ) pAhi mA̱&gnE pipRuhi mA mA mA# hiṃsIḥ||5

verses.padam: - Padam tvam|sOma|tanUkRudBya iti# tanUkRut - Byaḥ|dvEṣO̱Bya iti dvEṣaḥ̍ - Byaḥ|anyakRutEBya̍ ityanya - kRutEByaḥ|uru|yantA|asi|varUtham|svAhA̱|juṣAṇaḥ|aptuḥ|Ajya̍sya|vEtu|svAhA̱|ayaM|naḥ|agniḥ|vari̍vaḥ|kRuṇOtu|ayam|mRudha̍ḥ|puraḥ|Etu|praBindanniti̍# pra - Bindann||ayam|śatrUn|jayatu|jaṛhRu̍ṣAṇaḥ|ayam|vAja̱m|jayatu|vAja̍sAtAviti̍ vAja# - sAtau||uru|viṣṇO iti|vIti̍|kramasva|uru|kṣayA̍ya|naḥ|kRudhi||GRutam|GRutayOna̍ iti# GRuta - yOnE|piba|praprEti pra - pra|yajñapatimiti̍# yajña - patim|tira||sOmaḥ|jigAti|gAtuviditi̍# gAtu - vit|6 (50)
verses.samhita: tvaṃ sOma̍ tanUkRudByO dvEṣO̱ByO&nyakRutEBya̍ uru yantA&si varUthaṅq̍ svAhA# juṣAṇO apturAjyasya̍ vEtu svAhA&yannO# agnirvarivaḥ̍ kRuṇOtvayaM mRudhaḥ̍ pura Etu̍ praBindann|ayaṃ śatrU̱~jjayatu jaṛhRuṣAṇO&yaM̍ ~MvAjaM̍ jayatu vAjasAtau|uru̍ viṣṇO̍ vi kramasvOru̍ kṣayAya̍ naḥ kRudhi|GRutaM GRutayOnE̍ piba prapra# yajñapatiM̍ tira|sOmO# jigAti gAtuvid - [ ] 6

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAnA̱m|Eti|niṣkRutamiti# niḥ - kRutam|Rutasya|yOni̱m|AsadamityA̱̍ - sada̱m|adityAḥ|sada̍ḥ|asi|adi̍tyAḥ|sada̍ḥ|Eti̍|sIda|Eṣaḥ|vaḥ|dEva|savitaḥ|sOma̍ḥ|tam|rakṣaddhvam|mA|vaḥ|daBaqt|Etat|tvam|sOma|dEvaḥ|dEvAn|upEti̍|agAḥ|idam|aham|manuṣya̍ḥ|manuṣyAn̍|saha|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|saha|rAyaḥ|pOṣEṇa|nama̍ḥ|dEvEBya̍ḥ|svadhEti̍# sva - dhA|pitRuBya iti# pitRu - Byaḥ|idam|aham|niriti|varu̍ṇasya|pAśA̱t|suva̍ḥ|aBi|7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvAnAmEti̍ niṣkRutamRutasya yOnimAsadamadi̍tyAḥ̍ sadO&syadityAḥ̍ sada A sIdaiṣa̍ vO# dEva savitaḥ sOmastaṃ rakṣaddhvaM̍ mA vO# daBadEtattvaṃ sOma̍ dEvO dEvAnupAgA̍ idamahaM manuṣyO̍# manuṣyA̱nth saha prajayA# saha rAyaspOṣEṇa̍ namO# dEvEByaḥ̍ svadhA pitRuBya# idamahaM nirvaruṇasya̍ pAśAth suvaraBi̍ - [ ] 7

verses.padam: - Padam vIti|KyEṣam|vaiśvAnaram|jyOti̍ḥ|agnE̱|vratapata̍ iti# vrata - patE|tvam|vratAnA̱m|vratapatiriti̍# vrata - patiḥ|asi|yA|mama|tanUḥ|tvayi̍|aBU̱t|iyam|sA|mayi̍|yA|tava̍|tanUḥ|mayi̍|aBU̱t|EṣA|sA|tvayi̍|yathAyathamiti̍# yathA - yatham|nau|vratapata iti# vrata - patE|vratinO̱ḥ|vratAni||8̍ (31) (gAtuvida - ByE - katriṃśacca)̍ (A4)
verses.samhita: vi KyEṣaM̍ ~MvaiśvAnaraM jyOtiragnE̱ vratapatE tvaM ~MvratAnA̱M ~Mvratapatirasi̍ yA mama# tanUstvayyaBUdiyaṃ̍ sA mayi yA tava# tanUr mayyaBUdEṣA̍ sA tvayi# yathAyathaM nau̱ vratapatE vratinO̱r vratAni||8̍ (gAtuvida-ByE-katriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam atIti|anyAn|agA̱m|na|anyAn|upEti̍|agAm|arvAk|tvA|parai̱ḥ|avidam|paraḥ|ava̍raiḥ|tam|tvA|juṣE|vaiṣṇavam|dEvayajyAyA̍ iti# dEva - yajyAyai̱|dEvaḥ|tvA|savitA|maddhvA̱|anaktu|OṣadhE|trAya̍sva|Enam|svadhi̍ta̍ iti sva - dhitE|mA|Enam|hiṃqsIḥ|diva̱m|agrEṇa|mA|laKIḥ|antari̍kṣam|maddhyE̍na|mA|hiṃqsIḥ|pRuthivyA|samiti̍|Bava|vana̍spatE|śatava̍ḷśa̍ iti# śata - valq.śaḥ|vIti|rOha|sahasra̍vaḷśA̍ iti# sahasra# - valq.śAḥ|vIti|vayam|ruhEma|yam̍ ( )|tvA|ayam|svadhitiriti̍ sva - dhitiḥ|tEtijAnaḥ|praṇinAyEti̍# pra - ninAya|mahatE|sauBa̍gAya|acCi̍nnaḥ|rAya̍ḥ|suvIra̍ iti# su - vIraḥ||9̍ (60)
verses.samhita: atyanyAnagAM nAnyAnupAgAmarvAktvA̍ parairavidaM̍ parO&varaistaM̍ tvA# juṣE vaiṣṇavaM dEvayajyAyai̍# dEvastvA# savitA maddhvA&naktvOṣa̍dhE̍ trAyasvainaṅq̍ svadhitE̍ mainaṃ# hiṃsIr divamagrEṇa̍ mA lEKIrantari̍kṣaM̍ maddhyEna̍ mA hiṃsIḥ̍ pRuthivyA saM Bava̍ vanaspatE̍ śatavaḷśO̍ vi rOha̍ sahasravaḷśA̍ vi vayaṃ ruhEma̍ yaM ( ) tvA&yaṅ svadhitistEti̍jAnaḥ̍ praṇinAya# mahatE sauBagAyAcCi̍nnO̍ rAyaḥ̍ suvIraḥ||9̍

verses.padam: - Padam pRuthivyai|tvA|antarikṣAya|tvA|divE|tvA|śundha̍tAm|lOkaḥ|pitRuṣada̍na̍ iti# pitRu - sadanaḥ|yava̍ḥ|asi|yavaya̍|asmat|dvEṣa̍ḥ|yavaya̍|arA̍tIḥ|pitRuṇAm|sada̍nam|asi|svAvEśa̍ iti# su - AvEśaḥ|asi|agrEgA ityagrE̍ - gAḥ|nEtRuṇAm|vanaspatiḥ|adhIti̍|tvA|sthAsyati|tasya̍|vittAt|dEvaḥ|tvA|savitA|maddhvA̱|anaktu|supippalABya̍ iti# su - pippalAByaḥ|tvA|Oṣa̍dhIBya̍ ityOṣadha̍ - Byaḥ|uditi|diva̱m|staBAna|Eti̍|antari̍kṣam|pRuṇa|pRuthivIm|upa̍rEṇa|dRuṃqha|tE|tE|dhAmA̍ni|uśmasi|10̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pRuthivyai tvAntarikṣAya̍ tvA divE tvA śundhatAM̍ ~MlOkaḥ pitRuṣada̍nO̍ yavO&si̍ yavayAsmad dvEṣO# yavayArAtIḥ̍ pitRuṇAṃ sadanamasi̍ svAvEśO̱-&syagrEgA nEtRuṇAM̍ ~Mvanaspatiradhi# tvA sthAsyati tasya# vittAd dEvastvA# savitA maddhvA&naktu̍ supippalABya-stvauṣadhIBya̍ uddivaṅ# staBAnA&ntarikṣaM̍ pRuṇa pRuthivImuparEṇa̍ dRuṃha tE tE dhAmA̱nyuśmasI - [ ] 10

verses.padam: - Padam gamaddhyE̱|gAvaḥ|yatra̍|BUri̍śRu~ggA̍ iti BUri# - śRu~ggAḥ|ayAsaḥ||atra̍|aha̍|tat|urugAyasyEtyu̍ru̍ - gAyasya|viṣṇO̱ḥ|paramam|padam|avEti̍|BAti|BUrE̱ḥ||viṣṇO̱ḥ|karmA̍ṇi|paśyata|yata̍ḥ|vratAni̍|paspaśE||indra̍sya|yujya̍ḥ|saKA̱||tat|viṣṇO̱ḥ|paramam|padam|sadA̱|paśyanti|sUraya̍ḥ||divi|iva|cakṣu̍ḥ|Ata̍tamityA̍ - tatam||brahmavanimiti# brahma - vani̱m|tvA|kṣatravanimiti# kṣatra - vani̱m|suprajAvanimiti# suprajA - vani̱m|rAyaspOṣavanimiti# rAyaspOṣa - vani̱m|parIti|UhAmi|brahma̍|dRuṃqha|kṣatram|dRuṃqha|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|dRuṃqha|rAyaḥ|pOṣa̱m ( )|dRuṃqha|parivIriti# pari - vIḥ|asi|parIti|tvA|daivI̱ḥ|viśa̍ḥ|vyayantAm|parIti̍|imam|rAyaḥ|pOṣa̍ḥ|yaja̍mAnam|manuṣyA̱ḥ|antari̍kṣasya|tvA|sAnau̱|avEti̍|gUhAmi||11̍ (69) (uśmasI - pOṣamE - kAnna viṃśatiśca̍)̍ (A6)
verses.samhita: gamaddhyE gAvO yatra BUriśRu~ggA̍ ayAsaḥ|atrAha̍ tadurugAyasya̍ viṣṇO̱ḥ paramaM padamava# BAti BUrE̱ḥ||viṣṇOḥ karmAṇi̍ paśyata yatO̱ vratAni# paspaśE|indrasya̍ yujyaḥ saKA̱||tad-viṣṇO̱ḥ paramaM padaṃ sadA# paśyanti sUrayaḥ|divIva̍ cakṣurAtataM||brahmavani̍M̍ tvA kṣatravaniṃ# suprajAvaniṃ# rAyaspOṣavaniM paryUhAmi̍ brahma# dRuṃha kṣatraM dRuṃha̍ prajAM dRuṃha̍ rAyaspOṣaM̍ ( ) dRuṃha parivIrasi̍ pari# tvA daivIrviśO̱ vyayantAM parImaṃ rAyaspOṣO yajamAnaM̍ manuṣyA# antarikṣasya̍ tvA sAnAvava# gUhAmi||11 (uśmasI-pOṣamE-kAnnaviṃśatiśca̍)̍

verses.padam: - Padam iṣE|tvA|upavIrityupa̍ - vIḥ|asi|upO iti|dEvAn|daivI̱ḥ|viśa̍ḥ|prEti̍|aguḥ|vahnI̱ḥ|uśija̍ḥ|bRuha̍spatE|dhAraya̍|vasU̍ni|havyA|tE|svadantAm|dEva̍|tvaṣṭaḥ|vasu̍|raṇva|rEva̍tIḥ|rama̍ddhvam|agnEḥ|janitra̱m|asi|vRuṣa̍ṇau|sthaḥ|urvaśI̱|asi|Ayuḥ|asi|purUravA̱ḥ|GRutEna̍|aktE̍ iti|vRuṣa̍ṇam|dadhAthAm|gAyatram|Canda̍ḥ|anu̍|prEti̍|jAyasva|traiṣṭu̍Bam|jAga̍tam|Canda̍ḥ|anu̍|prEti̍|jAyasva|Bava̍tam|12̍ (50)
verses.samhita: iṣE tvOpavIrasyupO̍# dEvAn daivIr viśaḥ prAgur vahnIruśijO̍ bRuhaspatE̍ dhArayA vasUni̍ havyA tE̱ svadantAM dEva# tvaṣṭarvasu# raṇva rEvatI̍ ramaddhva-magnEr̍ janitramasi̍ vRuṣaṇau̍ stha urvaśyasyAyura̍si̍ purUravA# GRutEnAktE vRuṣaṇaM̍ dadhAthAM gAyatraM CandO&nu pra jAyasva̍ traiṣṭuBaM̍ jAgataM̍ CandO&nu pra jAyasva̍ BavataM̍ - [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam naḥ|samanasAviti̍ sa - manasau|samOkasAviti̍ saM - Okasau|arEpasau̱||mA|yajñam|hiṃqsiṣṭam|mA|yajñapatimiti̍# yajña - patim|jAtavEdasAviti# jAta - vEdasau|śivau|Bavatam|adya|naḥ||agnau|agniḥ|carati|praviṣṭa̍ iti pra - viṣṭaḥ|RuṣIṇAm|putraḥ|adhirAja̍ ityadhi̍ - rAjaḥ|Eṣaḥ||svAhAkRutyEti# svAhA - kRutya|brahma̍ṇA|tE|juhOmi|mA|dEvAnA̱m|mithuyA|kaḥ|BAgadhEyamiti̍# BAga - dhEya̱m||13 (31) (Bavata̍ - mEkatriṃśacca)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: naḥ samanasau̍ samOkasAvarEpasau̱|mA̍ yajñaṃ hiṃsiṣṭaM̍ mA yajñapatiM̍ jAtavEdasau śivau Bavatamadya̍ naḥ||agnAvagniśca̍rati̍ praviṣṭa̍ RuṣIṇAM̍ putrO adhirAja̍ Eṣaḥ|svAhAkRutya brahmaṇA̍ tE juhOmi mA dEvAnA̱M mithuyA karBAgadhEya̱M||13̍ (Bavata-mEka̍triṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam Eti|dadE|Rutasya̍|tvA|dEvahaviriti̍# dEva - haviḥ|pAśEna|Eti̍|raBE|dhaṛṣa̍|mAnu̍ṣAn|adBya̍ ityat̍ - Byaḥ|tvA|OṣadhIBya̍ ityOṣadhi̍ - Byaḥ|prEti|ukṣAmi|apAm|pEruḥ|asi|svAttam|cit|sadE̍vamiti̍ sa - dEvam|havyam|Apaḥ|dEvIḥ|svada̍ta|Enam|samiti̍|tE|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|vAyunA̱|gacCatAm|samiti|yaja̍traiḥ|a~ggA̍ni|samiti̍|yajñapa̍tiriti̍# yajña - patiḥ|AśiṣEtyA̱ - śiṣA̱|GRutEna|aktau|paśum|trAyEthAm|rEva̍tIḥ|yajñapa̍timiti̍# yajña - patim|priyadhEti# priya - dhA|Eti|viśata|urO̍ iti|antarikṣa|sajUriti̍# sa - jUḥ|dEvEna|14̍ (50)
verses.samhita: A dada̍ Rutasya# tvA dEvahaviḥ pAśEnA&&raBE̍ dhaṛṣA mAnuṣAnadByastvauṣa̍dhIByaḥ̍ prOkṣA̱myapAM pErurasi̍ svAttaM cith sadEvaṃ̍ havyamApO# dEvIḥ svadatainaṃq̍ saM tE̱ prAṇO vAyunA# gacCatAṃq saM ~Myajatraira~ggA̍ni̍ saM ~MyajñapatirAśiṣA̍# GRutEnAktau paśuM trAyEthAṃq̍ rEvatIr̍ yajñapatiM̍ priyadhA&&* viśatOrO̍# antarikṣa sajUr dEvEna - [ ] 14

verses.padam: - Padam vAtEna|asya|haviṣa̍ḥ|tmanA̱|yaja|samiti̍|asya|tanuvA̱|Bava|vaṛṣI̍yaḥ|vaṛṣI̍yasi|yajñE|yajñapa̍timiti̍# yajña - patim|dhAḥ|pRuthivyAḥ|sampRuca iti# sam - pRucaḥ|pAhi|nama̍ḥ|tE|AtAnEtyA̱̍ - tAna|anarvA|prEti|ihi|GRutasya̍|kuqlyAm|anviti̍|saha|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|saha|rAyaḥ|pOṣEṇa|Apa̍ḥ|dEvIḥ|śuddhAyuva̍ iti# śuddha - yuvaḥ|śuddhAḥ|yUyam|dEvAn|Uḍhvam|śuddhAḥ|vayam|pariviṣṭA̍ iti pari# - viṣṭAḥ|parivEṣṭAra iti# pari - vEṣṭAraḥ|vaḥ|BUyAsma||15̍ (44) (dEvana - catuścatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A8)
verses.samhita: vAtEnAsya̍ haviṣastmanA# yaja samasya̍ tanuvA# Bava vaṛṣIyO̍ vaṛṣIyasi̍ yajñE yajñapatiM̍ dhAḥ pRuthivyAḥ̍ saMpRucaḥ̍ pAhi namasta̍ AtAnA&narvA prEhi# GRutasya# kuqlyAmanu# saha prajayA# saha rAyaspOṣEṇA &&pO# dEvIḥ śuddhAyuvaḥ śuddhA yUyaM dEvAṃ U̱ḍhvaṃ śuddhA vayaM pariviṣṭAḥ̍ parivEṣṭArO# vO BUyAsma||15 (dEvana-catuścatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam vAk|tE|Eti|pyAyatAm|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|tE|Eti|pyAyatAm|cakṣu̍ḥ|tE|Eti̍|pyAyatAm|śrOtra̱m|tE|Eti̍|pyAyatAm|yA|tE|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|śuk|jagAma|yA|cakṣu̍ḥ|yA|śrOtra̱m|yat|tE|krUram|yat|Asthi̍tamityA̍ - sthitam|tat|tE|Eti|pyAyatAm|tat|tE|EtEna̍|śundhatAm|nABi̍ḥ|tE|Eti̍|pyAyatAm|pAyuḥ|tE|Eti̍|pyAyatAm|śuddhAḥ|caritrA̱ḥ|śam|adBya̍ ityat̍ - Byaḥ|16 (50)
verses.samhita: vAkta A pyAyatAM̍ prAṇasta A pyAyatAM̍ cakṣusta̍ A pyAyatAṅq̍ śrOtraM̍ ta A pyAyatAM̍ ~MyA tE̱ prAṇA~jCugjagAma yA cakṣuryA śrOtraM ~MyattE̱ krUraM ~MyadAsthitaM̍ tatta A pyAyatAM̍ tatta# EtEna# śundhatAM nABista̍ A pyAyatAM̍ pAyusta A pyAyatAṃ̍ śuddhAścaritrAḥ śamadByaḥ - [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam śam|OṣadhIBya̍ ityOṣAdha̍ - Byaḥ|śam|pRuthivyai|śam|ahO̱ByAmityahaḥ̍ - ByAm|OṣadhE|trAya̍sva|Enam|svadhi̍ta̍ iti sva - dhitE|mA|Enam|hiṃqsIḥ|rakṣasAm|BAgaḥ|asi|idam|aham|rakṣa̍ḥ|adhamam|tama̍ḥ|nayAmi|yaḥ|asmAn|dvEṣṭi̍|yam|ca|vayam|dviṣmaḥ|idam|Enam|adhamam|tama̍ḥ|nayAmi|iṣE|tvA|GRutEna̍|dyAvApRuthivI̍ iti# dyAvA - pRuthivI|prEti|UrṇvAthAm|acCi̍nnaḥ|rAya̍ḥ|suvIra̍ iti# su - vIraḥ|uru|antari̍kṣam|anviti̍|ihi|vAyO̍ iti|vIti̍|ihi̍ ( )|stOkAnA̱m|svAhA̱|UrddhvanaBasamityUrddhva̍ - naBasam|mArutam|gacCatam||17 (55)
verses.samhita: śamOṣadhIByaḥ̍ śaM pRuthivyai̍ śamahO̱ByA-mOṣadhE̍ trAyasvainaṅq̍ svadhitE̍ mainaṃ# hiṃsI rakṣasAM̍ BAgO&sIdamahaṃ̍ rakṣO&dhamaM̍ tamO# nayAmi yO̱&smAn dvEṣṭi yaM ca# vayaM dviṣma idamEnamadhamaM̍ tamO# nayAmIṣE tvA# GRutEna# dyAvApRuthivI prOrṇvAthA-macCi̍nnO̍ rAyaḥ̍ suvIra# urvantari̍kṣamanvi̍hi̍ vAyO vIhi# ( ) stOkAnAṅq svAhOrddhvanaBasaM̍ mArutaM gacCataM||17̍

verses.padam: - Padam samiti|tE|mana̍sA|mana̍ḥ|samiti̍|prAṇEnEti̍# pra - anEna|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|juṣṭa̱m|dEvEByaḥ|havyam|GRutavaditi̍# GRuta - vat|svAhA̱|aindraḥ|prAṇa iti# pra - anaḥ|a~ggEa~gga̍ itya~ggE̱ - a~ggE|nIti|dEddhyat|aindraḥ|apAna̍ ityapa̍ - anaḥ|a~ggEa~gga̍ itya~ggE̱ - a~ggE|vIti|bOBuvat|dEva̍|tvaṣṭaḥ|BUri̍|tE|saṃsamiti̍ saM - sam|Etu|viṣurUpA̍ iti viṣu# - rUpAḥ|yat|salakṣmAṇa̍ iti sa - lakṣmAṇaḥ|Bavatha|dEvatrEti̍# dEva - trA|yanta̱m|avasE|saKA̍yaḥ|anviti̍|tvA|mAtA|pitaraḥ̍|madantu|śrIḥ|asI|agniḥ|tvA|śrIṇAtu|Apa̍ḥ|samiti̍|ariṇann|vAta̍sya|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: saM tE manasA̍ manaḥq saM prAṇEna# prAṇO juṣṭaM̍ dEvEByO# havyaM GRutavath svAhaindraḥ prAṇO a~ggEa~ggE̍ ni dE̱ddhyadaindrO# &pAnO a~ggEa~ggE̍ vi bOBuvaddEva̍# tvaṣṭarBUri# tE saṃsamEtu̍ viṣurUpA̍ yath salakṣmAṇO̍ Bavatha̍ dEvatrA yantamavasE̍ saKAyO&nu# tvA mAtA pitarO# madantu śrIrasyagnistvA̱̍ śrIṇAtvApaḥ samariṇan̍ vAtasya-[̍ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam tvA|dhrajyai̱|pUṣṇaḥ|raṅhyai̱|apAm|OṣadhInAm|rOhi̍ṣyai|GRutam|GRutapAvAna̍ iti# GRuta - pAvAnaḥ|pibata|vasA̱m|vasApAvAna iti# vasA - pAvAnaḥ|pibata|antarikṣasya|haviḥ|asi|svAhA̱|tvA|antari̍kṣAya|diśa̍ḥ|pradiśa̍ iti# pra - diśaḥ|Adiśa̍ ityA̱ - diśaḥ|vidiśa̍ iti# vi - diśaḥ|uddiśa̍ ityut̍ - diśaḥ|svAhA̱|digBya̍ iti# dik - Byaḥ|namaḥ|digBya̍ iti# dik - Byaḥ||19 (28) (vAtasyA̍ - ṣṭAviṃśatiśca)̍ (A10)
verses.samhita: tvA dhrajyai# pUṣṇO raṅhyA# apAmOṣadhInAṃq̍ rOhiṣyai̍ GRutaM GRutapAvAnaḥ̍ pibata vasA̱M ~MvasApAvAnaḥ pibatA&ntarikṣasya̍ havirasi̍ svAhA̱ tvA&ntarikṣAya̍ diśaḥ̍ pradiśa# AdiśO# vidiśa# uddiśaḥ svAhA# digByO namO# digByaḥ||19 (vAtasyA-ṣṭAviṃ̍śatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam samudram|gacCa|svAhA̱|antarikṣam|gacCa|svAhA̱|dEvam|savitAra̱m|gacCa|svAhA̱|ahOrAtrE̍ ityahaḥ̍ - rAtrE|gacCa|svAhA̱|mitrAvaruṇAviti̍# mitrA - varuṇau|gacCa|svAhA̱|sOma̱m|gacCa|svAhA̱|yajñam|gacCa|svAhA̱|CandAṃ̍si|gacCa|svAhA̱|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|gacCa|svAhA̱|naBaḥ|divyam|gacCa|svAhA̱|agnim|vaiśvAnaram|gacCa|svAhA̱|adBya̍ ityat̍ - Byaḥ|tvA|OṣadhIBya̍ ityOṣadhi̍ - Byaḥ|manaḥ|mE|hArdi̍|yacCa|tanUm|tvaca̱m|putram|naptA̍ram|aśIya|śuk|asi̍ ( )|tam|aBIti|śOca|yaḥ|asmAn|dvEṣṭi̍|yam|ca|vayam|dviṣmaḥ|dhAmnO̍# dhAmna iti dhAmnaḥ̍ - dhAmnaḥ|rAjann|itaḥ|varuṇa|naḥ|mu~jca|yat|Apaḥ|aGni̍yAḥ|varu̍ṇa|iti̍|śapA̍mahE|tataḥ̍|varuṇa|naḥ|mu~jca||20̍ (76) (asi - ṣaḍviṃśatiśca̍ )(A11)
verses.samhita: samudraM gacCa̍ svAhA&ntarikṣaM̍ gacCa svAhA# dEvaṃ savitAra̍M̍ gacCa svAhA&hOrAtrE̍ gacCa̍ svAhA# mitrAvaruṇau̍ gacCa svAhA sOmaM̍ gacCa svAhA# yajñaM gacCa̍ svAhA CandAṃsi̍ gacCa svAhA dyAvApRuthivI̍ gacCa̍ svAhA naBO# divyaM gacCa̍ svAhA&gniM ~Mvai̱śvAnaraM gacCa̍ svAhA&dByastvauṣadhIByO̍ manO# mE hArdi# yacCa tanUM tvacaM̍ putraM naptAramaśIya̍ śugasi̍ ( ) tamaBi śOca̍ yO̱&smAn dvEṣṭi yaM ca# vayaM dviṣmO dhAmnOdhAmnO̍ rAjannitO varuṇa̍ nO mu~jca yadApO aGniyA̍ varuṇEti śapAmahE̍ tatO# varuṇa nO mu~jca||20

verses.padam: - Padam haviṣmatIḥ|imAḥ|Apa̍ḥ|haviṣmAn̍|dEvaḥ|addhvaraḥ|haviṣmAn̍|Eti̍|vivAsati|haviṣmAn̍|astu|sUrya̍ḥ||agnEḥ|vaḥ|apa̍nnagRuhasyEtyapa̍nna̍ - gRuhasya|sadasi|sAdayAmi|sumnAya̍|sumninIḥ|sumnE|mA|dhatta|indrAgniyOritI̱ndra̍ - agniyOḥ|BAgadhEyIriti# BAga - dhEyI̱ḥ|stha|mitrAvaruṇayOriti̍# mitrA - varuṇayOḥ|BAgadhEyIriti̍# BAga - dhEyI̱ḥ|stha|viśvEṣAm|dEvAnA̱m|BAgadhEyIriti̍# BAga - dhEyI̱ḥ|stha|yajñE|jAgRuta||21 (34) (haviṣmatI̍ - ścatustriṃśat)̍ (A12)
verses.samhita: haviṣmatIrimA̍ ApO# haviṣmA̱n dEvO addhvarO̍ haviṣmAṃq A vivAsati̍ haviṣmAṃ# astu sUryaḥ||agnErvO̍ &pannagRuhasya̍ sadasi̍ sAdayAmi sumnAya# sumninIḥ sumnE mA# dhattEndrAgniyOr BAgadhEyI̱ḥ̍ stha mitrAvaruṇayOr̍ BAgadhEyI̱ḥ stha viśvEṣAM̍ dEvAnA̱M BAgadhEyI̱ḥ stha yajñE jAgRuta||21̍ (haviṣmatI-ścatu̍striṃśat)̍

verses.padam: - Padam hRudE|tvA|manasE|tvA|divE|tvA|sUryA̍ya|tvA|Urddhvam|imam|addhvaram|kRudhi|divi|dEvEṣu̍|hOtrA̱ḥ|yacCa|sOma̍|rAjann|Eti̍|ihi|avEti̍|rOha|mA|BEḥ|mA|samiti̍|vikthAḥ|mA|tvA|hiṃqsiṣam|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|tvam|upAvarOhEtyu̍pa̍ - avarOha|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|tvAm|upAvarOhantvityu̍pa̍ - avarOhantu|śRuṇOtu̍|agniḥ|samidhEti̍# sam - idhA̱|hava̱m|mE|śRuṇvantu|Apa̍ḥ|dhiṣaṇA̱ḥ|ca|dEvIḥ||śRuṇOta̍|grAvAṇaḥ|viduṣa̍ḥ|nu|22̍ (50)
