verses.samhita: hRudE tvA manasE̍ tvA divE tvA sUryAya̍ tvOrddhvamimamaddhvaraM̍ kRudhi̍ divi dEvEṣu hOtrA# yacCa sOma# rAjannEhyava# rOha mA BErmA saM ~MvikthA̍ mA tvA# hiṃsiṣaM prajAstvamupAvarOha̍ prajAstvAmupAvarOhantu̍ śRuṇOtvagniḥ samidhA havaM̍ mE śRuṇvantvApO# dhiṣaṇA̱śca dEvIḥ|śRuṇOta# grAvAṇO viduṣO nu - [ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam yajñam|śRuṇOtu|dEvaḥ|savitA|hava̱m|mE||dEvI̱ḥ|Apaḥ|apAm|napAt|yaḥ|Urmiḥ|haviṣya̍ḥ|indriyAvAnitI̱ndriya̍ - vAn|madintamaḥ|tam|dEvEBya̍ḥ|dEvatrEti̍# dEva - trA|dhatta|śukram|śukrapEBya iti# śukra - pEByaḥ|yEṣA̱m|BAgaḥ|stha|svAhA̱|kAṛṣi̍ḥ|asi|apEti̍|apAm|mRuddhram|samudrasya̍|vaḥ|akṣi̍tyai|uditi̍|nayE||yam|agnE|pRuthsviti̍# pRut - su|martya̱m|Avaḥ|vAjE̍ṣu|yam|junAḥ||saḥ|yantA̱|śaśva̍tIḥ|iṣa̍ḥ||23̍ (47) (nu - saptacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A13)
verses.samhita: yajñaṃ śRuṇOtu# dEvaḥ savitA̍ havaM̍ mE|dEvIrApO̍ apAM napAdya Urmirhaviṣya̍# indriyAvA̱n madintamastaM̍ dEvEByO# dEvatrA dhatta̍ śukraṃ śukrapEByO̍ yEṣA̱M BAgaḥ stha svAhA kAṛṣirasyapA&pAM̍ mRuddhraṃ samudrasya̍ vO&kṣityA̍ unnayE|yama̍gnE̍ pRuthsu martyamAvO vAjEṣu̍ yaM junAḥ|sa yantA śaśvatIriṣa̍ḥ||23̍ ( nu-saptacatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam tvam|agnE|rudraḥ|asuraḥ|mahaḥ|divaḥ|tvam|śardha̍ḥ|mAru̍tam|pRukṣaḥ|IśiṣE||tvam|vAtai̱ḥ|aruṇaiḥ|yAsi|śa~ggaya̍ iti# śaM - gayaḥ|tvam|pUṣA|vidhata iti# vi - dhataḥ|pAsi|nu|tmanA̱||Eti|vaḥ|rAjA̍nam|addhvarasya̍|rudram|hOtA̍ram|satyayajamiti̍# satya - yaja̱m|rOdasyOḥ||agnim|purA|tanayitnOḥ|acittA̱t|hira̍ṇyarUpamiti̍ hiraṇya̍ - rUpam|avasE|kRuṇuddhvam||agniḥ|hOtA̱|nIti̍|sasAda|yajI̍yAn|upastha̍ ityupa - sthE|mAtuḥ|suraBau|u|lOkE||yuvA̱|kaviḥ|puruniṣṭha iti# puru - niṣṭhaḥ|24 (50)
verses.samhita: tvamagnE̍ rudrO asurO̍ mahO divastvaṃ śarddhO mArutaM̍ pRukṣa IśiṣE|tvaM̍ ~MvAtairaruṇairyA̍si̍ śaMgayastvaM pUṣA vidhataḥ̍ pAsi̍ nutmanA̱||A vO rAjAnamaddhvarasya̍# rudraṃ hOtAraṃ̍ satyayajaṃq rOdasyOḥ|agniM̍ purA tanayitnO̍ racittAddhiraṇyarUpamava̍sE̍ kRuṇuddhvaM||agniṛhOtA ni ṣasAdA̍ yajIyAnupasthE̍# mAtuḥ suraBAvu̍# lOkE|yuvA# kaviḥ puruniṣṭha̍ - [ ] 24

verses.padam: - Padam RutAvEtyRutA - vA|dhartA|kRuṣṭInAm|uta|maddhyE̱|iddhaḥ||sAddhvIm|akaḥ|dEvavItimiti̍# dEva - vItim|naḥ|adya|yajñasya|jihvAm|avidAma|guhyA̱m||saḥ|Ayu̍ḥ|Eti̍|agAt|suraBiḥ|vasA̍naḥ|BadrAm|akaḥ|dEvahU̍timiti̍# dEva - hUtim|naḥ|adya||akrandat|agniḥ|stanayann̍|iva|dyauḥ|kṣAma̍|rEri̍hat|vIrudha̍ḥ|sama~jjanniti̍# saM - a~jjann||sadyaḥ|jajñAnaḥ|vIti|hi|Im|iddhaḥ|aKya̍t|Eti̍|rOda̍sI̍ iti|BAnunA̱|BAti|antaḥ||tvE̍ iti|vasU̍ni|purvaṇIkEti̍# puru - anIka|25 (50)
verses.samhita: RutAvA# dhartA kRuṣṭInAmuta̍ maddhya# iddhaḥ||sAddhvImakar̍ dEvavItiM̍ nO adya yajñasya# jihvAmavidAma̍ guhyA̱M|sa AyurA&gA̱th suraBirvasAnO̍ BadrAmakar̍ dEvahUtiM̍ nO adya||akrandadagniḥ̍ stanayanniva̍ dyauḥ kṣAmA rErihadvIrudha̍ḥ̍ sama~jjann|sadyO jajñAnO̍ vi hImiddhO aKyadA rOdasI̍ BAnunA# BAtyantaḥ||tvE vasUni̍ purvaṇIka-[ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam hOtaḥ|dOṣA|vastO̱ḥ|Eti|IrirE|yajñiyA̍saḥ||kṣAma̍|iva|viśvA̱|Buva̍nAni|yasminn̍|samiti̍|sauBa̍gAni|dadhirE|pAvakE||tuBya̱m|tAḥ|a~ggirastamEtya̍~ggiraḥ̍ - tama|viśvA̱ḥ|sukṣitaya iti# su - kṣitayaḥ|pRutha̍k||agnE̱|kAmA̍ya|yEmirE||aśyAma̍|tam|kAma̱m|agnE|tava̍|UtI|aśyAma̍|rayim|rayiva̍ iti# rayi - vaḥ|suvIramiti# su - vIra̱m||aśyAma|vAja̱m|aBIti̍|vAjaya̍ntaḥ|aśyAma̍|dyumnam|ajara|ajara̱m|tE||śrEṣṭha̱m|yaviṣṭha|BArata|agnE̱|dyumantamiti̍# dyu - manta̱m|Eti|Bara||26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: hOtardOṣA vastOrErirE̍ yajñiyAsaḥ|kṣAmE̍va̍ viśvA BuvanAni̍ yasminth saṃ sauBagAni̍ dadhirE pAvakE||tuByaM̍ tA a~ggirastama̍ viśvA̱ḥ sukṣitayaḥ pRuthak|agnE̍ kAmAya̍ yEmirE||aśyAma taM kAmamagnE̍ tavOtyaśyAma̍# rayiṃ rayivaḥ̍ suvIra̱M|aśyAma vAjamaBi̍ vAjayantO̍ &śyAma# dyumnamajarAjara̍M̍ tE||śrEṣṭhaM̍ ~Myaviṣṭha BAratAgnE̱ dyumantamA Bara|26̍

verses.padam: - Padam vasO iti|puruspRuhamiti̍# puru - spRuha̱m|rayim||saḥ|śvitAnaḥ|tanyatuḥ|rOcanasthA iti# rOcana - sthAḥ|ajarEBiḥ|nAna̍dadBiriti̍ nAnadat̍ - Biḥ|yaviṣṭhaḥ||yaḥ|pAvakaḥ|purutama̍ iti# puru - tamaḥ|purUṇi̍|pRuthUni̍|agniḥ|anuyAtItya̍nu̍ - yAti|Barvann̍||Ayu̍ḥ|tE|viśvata̍ḥ|dadhat|ayam|agniḥ|vara̱ṇyaḥ||puna̍ḥ|tE|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|Eti|ayati|parEti̍|yakṣma̱m|suvAmi|tE||AyurdA̍ ityAyuḥ̍ - dAḥ|agnE|haviṣaḥ|juṣAṇaḥ|GRutapra̍tIka̍ iti# GRuta - pratIkaḥ|GRutayOniriti̍# GRuta - yOniḥ|Edhi||GRutam|pItvA|madhu|cAru̍|gavya̱m|pitA|iva|putram|aBIti̍|27̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vasO# puruspRuhaṃ# rayiM||sa śvitAnasta̍nyatU̍ rOcanasthA̍ ajarEBir̍ nAnadadBiryavi̍ṣṭhaḥ|yaḥ̍ pAvakaḥ̍ purutama̍ḥ̍ purUṇi# pRuthUnyagniranuyAti̍ Barvann||Ayu̍ṣṭE̍ viśvatO# dadhadayamagnir varE̱ṇyaḥ|punastE̍ prAṇa A&yati̍ parA yakṣmaṃ# suvAmi tE||AyurdA agnE̍ haviṣO# juṣAṇO GRutapratIkO̍ GRutayOnirEdhi|GRutaM̍ pItvA madhu cAru gavyaM̍ pitEva# putramaBi - [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam rakṣatAt|imam||tasmai̱|tE|pratiharyata̍ iti# prati - haryatE|jAta̍vEda̍ iti jAta# - vEdaḥ|vicaṛṣaṇa̍ iti vi - carq.ṣaṇE||agnE̱|janAmi|suṣṭutimiti̍# su - stutim||divaḥ|parIti|prathamam|jajñE|agniḥ|asmat|dvitIya̱m|parIti̍#|jAtavE̍dA̍ iti# jAta - vEdAḥ||tRutIya̱m|aPsvityap̍ - su|nRumaṇA iti# nRu - manA̱ḥ|ajasram|indhA̍naḥ|Enam|jaratE|svAdhIriti̍# sva - dhIḥ||śuciḥ|pAvaka|vandya̍ḥ|agnE̱|bRuhat|vIti̍|rOcasE||tvam|GRutEBi̍ḥ|Ahu̍ta̍ ityA - hutaḥ||dRuśAnaḥ|rukmaḥ|urvyA|vIti|adyaut|durmaṛṣamiti̍# duḥ - maṛṣa̱m|Ayuḥ|śriyE|rucAnaḥ||agniḥ|amRuta̍ḥ|aBavat|vayO̍Biriti̍ vayaḥ̍ - Biḥ|28 (50)
verses.samhita: rakṣatAdimaM|tasmai̍# tE pratiharyatE̍ jAtavEdO̍ vicaṛṣaṇE|agnE̍ janAmi̍ suṣṭutiM||divaspari# prathamaM jajñE̍ agnirasmad dvitIyaM pari# jAtavEdAḥ|tRutIya̍maPsu̍ nRumaṇA ajasramindhA̍na̍ EnaM jaratE svAdhIḥ||śuciḥ̍ pAvaka vandyO&gnE# bRuhadvi rOcasE|tvaM̍ GRutEBirAhutaḥ||dRuśAnO̍ rukma urvyA vyadyaud-durmaṛṣamAyu̍ḥ̍ śriyE rucAnaḥ|agniramRutO̍# aBavadvayOBir̍ - [ ] 28

verses.padam: - Padam yat|Enam|dyauḥ|ajanayat|surEtA̍ iti# su - rEtA̱ḥ||Eti|yat|iṣE|nRupatimiti̍# nRu - pati̱m|tEjaḥ|Ana̍ṭ|śuci̍|rEta̍ḥ|niṣi̍ktamiti̍ ni - siktam|dyauḥ|aBIkE̱||agniḥ|śardha̱m|anavadyam|yuvAnam|svAdhiyamiti̍# sva - dhiya̱m|janayat|sUdayat|ca||saḥ|tEjI̍yasA|mana̍sA|tvOta̍ḥ|uta|śikṣa|svapatyasyEti̍# su - apatyasya|śikṣOḥ||agnE̱|rAyaḥ|nRuta̍masyEti̍ nRu - tamasya|praBUtAviti̍ pra - BUtau|BUyAma|tE|suṣṭutaya̍ iti# su - stutayaḥ|ca|vasva̍ḥ||agnE̱|saha̍ntam|Eti̍|Bara|dyumnasya̍|prAsahEti̍# pra - sahA̱|rayim||viśvA̱ḥ|yaḥ|29 (50)
verses.samhita: yadEnaM̍ dyaurajanayath̍ surEtA̱ḥ||A yadiṣE nRupatiM tEja AnaṭCuci rEtO niṣiktaM̍ dyauraBIkE̱|agniḥ śarddhamanavadyaM̍ ~MyuvAnaṅ̍ svAdhiyaM̍ janayath sUdayacca||sa̍ tEjIyasA̍ manasA̍ tvOta# uta śikṣa̍ svapatyasya# śikṣOḥ|agnE# rAyO nRutamasya̍ praBUtau̍ BUyAma# tE suṣṭutayaśca̍ vasvaḥ||agnE̍ sahantamA̍ Bara̍ dyumnasya# prAsahA# rayiM|viśvA ya - [ ] 29

verses.padam: - Padam carq.ṣaṇIḥ|aBIti|AsA|vAjE̍ṣu|sAsaha̍t||tam|agnE|pRutanAsahamiti̍# pRutanA - saha̱m|rayim|sahasvaḥ|Eti|Bara||tvam|hi|satyaḥ|adBu̍taḥ|dAtA|vAja̍sya|gOma̍ta̍ iti gO - mataḥ||ukṣAnnAyEtyukṣa - annAya|vaśAnnAyEti# vaśA - annAya|sOmapRuṣṭhAyEti̍ sOma# - pRuṣṭhAya|vEdhasE̱||stOmai̱ḥ|vidhEma|agnayE̱||vadmA|hi|sUnO iti|asi̍|admasadvEtya̍dma̍ - sadvA̱|cakrE|agniḥ|januṣA̱|ajma|anna̱m||saḥ|tvam|naḥ|Urjasana̍ ityu̱rja - sanE|Urja̱m|dhAḥ|rAjA̱|iva|jEḥ|avRukE|kṣEṣi|antaḥ||agnE̱|AyUṃṣi|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ścarq.ṣaṇIraByA̍sA̍ vAjEṣu̍ sAsahat||tama̍gnE̍ pRutanAsahaṃ# rayiṃ sahasva̍ A Bara|tvaṃ̍ hi satyO adButO̍ dAtA vAjasya̍ gOmataḥ||ukṣAnnA̍ya̍ vaśAnnAya̍ sOmapRuṣṭhAya̍ vEdhasE̱|stOmai̱r vidhEmA&gnayE̱||vadmA hi sUnO̍ asyadmasadvA̍# cakrE agnir januṣA &jmA&nna̱M|sa tvaM na# Urjasana UrjaM̍ dhA rAjEva̍ jEravRukE kṣE̱ṣyantaḥ||agna AyUṃṣi̍ - [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam pavasE|Eti|suva|Urja̱m|iṣa̱m|ca|naḥ||ArE|bAdhasva|ducCunA̱m||agnE̱|pava̍sva|svapA̍ iti# su - apA̱ḥ|asmE iti|varca̍ḥ|suvIryamiti̍# su - vIrya̱m||dadhat|pOṣa̱m|rayim|mayi̍||agnE̱|pAvaka|rOciṣA̱|mandrayA̱|dEva|jihvayA̱||Eti̍|dEvAn|vakṣi|yakṣi̍|ca||saḥ|naḥ|pAvaka|dIdivaḥ|agnE̱|dEvAn|iha|Eti̍|vaha||upEti̍|yajñam|haviḥ|ca|naḥ||agniḥ|śuci̍vratatama̍ iti śucivrata̍ - tamaḥ|śuciḥ|vipra̍ḥ|śuci̍ḥ̍ ( )|kaviḥ||śuciḥ|rOcatE|Ahu̍ta̍ ityA - hutaḥ||uditi|agnE|śuca̍yaḥ|tava̍|śukrAḥ|BrAja̍ntaḥ|IratE||tava̍|jyOtIṃ̍ṣi|arcaya̍ḥ||31̍ (64) (puruniṣṭhaḥ - purvaṇIka̍ - BarA - &Bi - vayOBi̍ - rya - Ayuṃṣi̍ - vipraḥ śuci - ścaturdaśa̍ ca) (A14) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 14 Anuvaakams : - (dEvasya# - rakṣOhaṇO# - viBU - stvaṃ sOmA - &tyanyAnagA̱M - pRuthivyA - iṣE tvA - &&dadE̍ vAkta - saMtE# - samudraṃ - haviṣmatI̍ - rhRudE - tvamagnErudra̍ - ścaturdaśa|)̍ Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries Of Panchaatis : - (dEvasya# - gamadhyE# - haviṣmatIḥ̍ - pavasa - Ekatriṃśat|)̍ First and Last Padam of ṭhird Prasnam: - (dEvasyA - &rcayaḥ)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE prathamakAṇḍE tRutIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||
verses.samhita: pavasa A suvOrjamiṣaM̍ ca naḥ|ArE bAdhasva̍ ducCunA̱M||agnE pavasva̍ svapA# asmE varcaḥ̍ suvIrya̱M|dadhatpOṣaṃ# rayiM mayi||agnE̍# pAvaka rOciṣA# mandrayA# dEva jihvayA̱|A dEvAn. vakṣi̍ yakṣi# ca||sa naḥ̍ pAvaka dIdivO&gnE# dEvAṃ ihA vaha|upa̍# yajñaṃ haviśca# naḥ||agniḥ śucivratatamaḥ̍ śucir vipraḥ śuciḥ̍ ( ) kaviḥ|śucI# rOcata Ahutaḥ||uda̍gnE̍ śucayastava̍# śukrA BrAjanta̍ IratE|tava jyOtIṅṣyarcaya̍ḥ||31̍ (puruniṣṭhaḥ-purvaṇIka-BarA-&Bi-vayO̍Bir-ya-AyUṃ̍ṣi̍ - vipraḥ śuci-ścaturdaśa̍ ca) (A14) praśna korvai with starting padams of 1 to 14 anuvAkams :- (dEvasya-rakṣOhaṇO̍# -viBU-stvaṃ sOmA- &tyanyAnagA̱M - pRuthivyA -iṣE tvA - &&dadE̍ - vAkta-santE-̍ samudraṃ- haviṣmatIṛ-hRudE-̍ tvamagnE̍ rudra-ścaturdaśa̍ ) korvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (dEvasya-gamadhyE̍-haviṣma̍tIḥ-pavasa-Eka̍triṃśat)̍ first and last padam of third praśnam:- (dEvasyA-rcayaḥ̍ )||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM prathamakAṇḍE tRutIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ|hariḥ OM||1.4 prathamakAṇḍE caturtthaḥ praśnaḥ-

verses.padam: (Padam) Eti|dadE|grAvA̱|asi|addhvarakRuditya̍ddhvara̍ - kRut|dEvEByaḥ|gaBIMqram|imam|addhvaram|kRudhi|uttamEnEtyu̍t̍ - tamEna|pavinA̱|indrA̍ya|sOma̱m|suṣu̍tamiti̍ su - sutam|madhumantamiti̍ madhu# - mantam|payasvantam|vRuṣṭivanimiti̍# vRuṣṭi - vani̱m|indrAya|tvA|vRutraGna̍ iti# vRutra - GnE|indrAya|tvA|vRutratura̍ iti# vRutra - turE̱|indrAya|tvA|aBimAtiGna̍ ityaBimAti̍ - GnE|indrAya|tvA|Adityava̍ta̍ ityAditya̍ - vatE|indrAya|tvA|viśvadE̱vyAvata̍ iti# viśvadE̱vya - vatE|śvAtrAḥ|stha|vRutratura iti# vRutra - turaḥ|rAdhO̍gUrtA̍ iti rAdhaḥ̍ - gUrtAḥ|amRutasya|patnI̱ḥ|tAḥ|dEvIḥ|dEvatrEti̍# dEva - trA|imam|yajñam|dhatta|upahUtA̍ ityupa# - hUtAḥ|sOmasya|pibata|upa̍hUta̍ ityupa-hUtaḥ|yuṣmAka̱m|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: A dadE̍ grAvA̱&*syaddhvarakRud dEvEByO# gaMBIramima- maddhvaraM̍ kRuddhyuttamEna̍# pavinEndrAya̍ sOmaṃq suṣutaM̍ madhumantaM̍ payasvantaM̍ ~MvRuṣṭivanimindrAya̍ tvA vRutraGna indrAya̍ tvA vRutratura indrAya̍ tvA&BimAtiGna indrAya̍ tvA&&dityavata̍ indrAya̍ tvA viśvadE̱vyAvatE śvAtrAḥ stha# vRutraturO rAdhOgUrtA̍ amRutasya̍ patnIstA dEvIr̍ dEvatrEmaM ~MyajñaM dhattOpahUtAḥ̍ sOmasya̍ pibatOpahUtO̍ yuṣmAkaṃq - [ ] 1

verses.padam: (Padam) sOmaḥ|pibatu|yat|tE|sOma|divi|jyOti̍ḥ|yat|pRuthivyAm|yat|urau|antari̍kṣE|tEna̍|asmai|yaja̍mAnAya|uru|rAyA|kRudhi|adhIti̍|dAtrE|vOcaḥ|dhiṣa̍ṇE̍ iti|vIḍU̍ iti|satI̍ iti|vIḍayEthAm|Urja̱m|dadhAthAm|Urja̱m|mE|dhattam|mA|vAm|hiṃqqsiṣam|mA|mA|hiṃqsiṣṭam|prAk|apA̱k|uda̍k|adharAk|tAḥ|tvA|diśa̍ḥ|Eti̍|dhAvantu|abaM̍|nIti̍|svara||yat|tE̍ ( )|sOma|adA̱Byam|nAma|jAgRu̍vi|tasmai̱|tE|sOma|sOmA̍ya|svAhA̱||2̍ (59) (yuṣmAkaṅ# - svara yattE - nava# ca ) (A1)
verses.samhita: sOmaḥ̍ pibatu yattE# sOma divi jyOtiryat pRuthivyAM̍ ~MyadurAvantarikṣE̍ tEnAsmai yajamAnAyOru̍ rAyA kRuddhyadhi# dAtrE vOcO̍ dhiṣaṇE̍ vIḍU satI vIḍayEthA-mUrja̍M̍ dadhAthAmUrjaM̍ mE dhattaM mA vAṃ# hiṃsiṣaM mA mA# hiṃsiṣṭaM prAgapAgudagadharAktAstvA̍ diśa A dhAvantvaMba̍ ni ṣvara|yattE̍# ( ) sOmA&dA̱ByaM nAma jAgRuvi̍ tasmai# tE sOma sOmAya̍ svAhA̱||2

verses.padam: (Padam) vAcaḥ|patayE|pavasva|vAjinn|vRuṣA̱|vRuṣṇa̍ḥ|aṃqśuByAmityaṃqśu̍ - ByAm|gaBastipUta̍ iti gaBasti̍ - pUtaḥ|dEvaḥ|dEvAnA̱m|pavitra̱m|asi|yEṣA̱m|BAgaḥ|asi|tEBya̍ḥ|tvA|svA~gkRu̍taḥ|asi|madhu̍matIriti̍ madhu# - matIḥ|naḥ|iṣaḥ|kRudhi|viśvE̱Byaḥ|tvA|indriyEBya̍ḥ|divyEBya̍ḥ|pArtthi̍vEByaḥ|mana̍ḥ|tvA|aṣṭu|uru|antari̍kṣam|anviti̍|ihi|svAhA̱|tvA|suBava̍ iti# su - Bavaḥ|sUryAya|dEvEBya̍ḥ|tvA|marIcipEBya̍ iti# marIci - pEByaḥ|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|prAṇAyEti̍# pra - anAya|tvA||3̍ (47) (vAcaḥ - saptacatvAriṃśat)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: vAcaspatayE̍ pavasva vAjin vRuṣA vRuṣṇO# aṃqśuByAM gaBastipUtO̍ dEvO dEvAnA̱M pavitramasi̍ yEṣA̱M BAgO&si tEByastvA̍ svAMkRutO&si̍ madhumatIr̍ na iṣaskRudhi̍ viśvE̱ByastvEndriyEByO# divyEByaḥ pArtthivEByO̍ manastvA̍ &ṣṭUrvantari̍kṣa-manvi̍hi̍ svAhA̱ tvA suBavaḥ sUryAya̍ dEvEByastvA̍ marIcipEBya# Eṣa tE yOniḥ̍ prAṇAya# tvA||3 (vAcaḥ-saptacatvAriṃśat)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) upayAmagRuhIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|antaḥ|yacCa|maGavanniti# maGa - vann|pAhi|sOma̱m|uruṣya|rAyaḥ|samiti̍|iṣa̍ḥ|yajasva|antaḥ|tE|dadhAmi|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|antaḥ|uru|antarikṣam|sajOṣA̍ iti# sa - jOṣA̱ḥ|dEvaiḥ|avaraiḥ|parai̱ḥ|ca|antaryAma̍ ityantaḥ-yAmE|maGavanniti̍# maGa - vann|mAdayasva|svA~gkRutaḥ|asi|madhu̍matIriti̍ madhu# - matIḥ|naḥ|iṣaḥ|kRudhi|viśvE̱Byaḥ|tvA|indriyEBya̍ḥ|divyEBya̍ḥ|pArtthi̍vEByaḥ|mana̍ḥ|tvA|aṣṭu|uru|antari̍kṣam|anviti̍|ihi|svAhA̱|tvA|suBava̍ iti# su - Bavaḥ|sUryAya|dEvEBya̍ḥ(̍ )|tvA|marIcipEBya iti# marIci - pEByaḥ|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|apAnAyEtya̍pa̍ - anAya|tvA||4̍ (57)
verses.samhita: upayAmagRuhItO̍ &syantaryacCa̍ maGavan pAhi sOmamuruṣya̍ rAyaḥ samiṣO# yajasvA&ntastE# dadhAmi dyAvApRuthivI̍ antarurvantari̍kṣaṃ̍ sajOṣA# dEvairavaraiḥ̍ parai̱ścA&ntaryAmE maGavan̍ mAdayasva svAMkRutO&si̍ madhumatIrna̍ iṣaskRudhi̍ viśvE̱ByastvEndriyEByO# divyEByaḥ pArtthivEByO̍ manastvA&ṣṭUrva̍ntari̍kṣamanvi̍hi̍ svAhA̱ tvA suBavaḥ sUryAya̍ dEvEBya# ( ) stvA marIcipEBya# Eṣa tE yOnirapAnAya̍# tvA||4

verses.padam: (Padam) Eti|vAyO̍ iti|BUṣa|śucipA̍ iti# śuci - pAḥ|upEti|naḥ|sahasra̱m|tE|niyuta̍ iti# ni - yutaḥ|viśvavArEti̍# viśva - vAra||upO iti|tE|andha̍ḥ|madya̱m|ayAmi|yasya̍|dEva|dadhiṣE|pUrvapEyamiti̍# pUrva - pEya̱m||upayAmagRuhIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|vAyavE̱|tvA|indravAyU̍ itIndra# - vAyU|imE|sutAḥ||upEti|prayO̍Biriti̍ prayaḥ̍ - Biḥ|Eti|gatam|inda̍vaḥ|vAm|uśanti̍|hi||upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|indravAyuByAmitI̱ndravAyu - ByAm|tvA|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOniḥ|sajOṣA̱ByAmiti̍# sa - jOṣA̱ByAm|tvA||5 (43) (A vAyO̍ - tricatvAriṃśat)̍ (A4)
verses.samhita: A vAyO̍ BUṣa śucipA upa# naḥ sahasraM̍ tE niyutO# viśvavAra|upO# tE andhO madyamayAmi̍ yasya# dEva dadhiṣE pU̱rvapEya̱M||upayAmagRuhItO&si̍ vAyavE tvEndravAyU̍ imE sutAḥ|upa prayOBirA̍ gataminda̍vO̍ vAmuśanti hi||upayAmagRuhItO-&sIndravAyuByA̱M̍ tvaiṣa tE yOniḥ̍ sajOṣA̱ByAM tvA||5 (A vAyO-̍ tricatvAriṃśat)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) ayam|vAm|mitrAvaruṇEti# mitrA - varuṇA|sutaḥ|sOmaḥ|RutAvRudhEtyRu̍ta̍ - vRudhA||mama|it|iha|śrutam|hava̱m||upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|mitrAvaruṇAByAmiti̍# mitrA - varuṇAByAm|tvA|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|RutAyuByAmityRu̍tAyu̍ - ByAm|tvA||6 (20) (ayaM ~MvA̱M - ~Mviṃśatiḥ) (A5)
verses.samhita: ayaM ~MvA̱M mitrAvaruṇA sutaḥ sOma# RutAvRudhA|mamEdiha śrutaṃq̍ hava̱M|upayAmagRuhItO&si̍ mitrAvaruṇAByAM̍ tvaiṣa tE yOniṛ̍ RutAyuByA̱M tvA||6

verses.padam: (Padam) yA|vAm|kaśA̱|madhumatIti̍ madhu# - matI|aśvinA|sUnRutA̍vatIti̍# sUnRutA̱ - vatI||tayA̱|yajñam|mimikṣatam||upayAmagRuhIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|aśviByAmityaśvi - ByAm|tvA|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOniḥ|mAddhvI̱ByAm|tvA||7̍ (18)
verses.samhita: yA vAM kaśA madhumatyaśvi̍nA̍ sUnRutAvatI|tayA̍# yajñaM mimikṣataM|upayAmagRu̍hItO-&syaśviByA̱M̍ tvaiṣa tE yOnirmAddhvI̱ByAM tvA||7

verses.padam: (Padam) prAtaryujAviti# prAtaḥ - yujau̱|vIti|mucyEthAm|aśvi̍nau|Eti̍|iha|gacCatam||asya|sOma̍sya|pItayE̱||upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhataḥ|asi|aśviByAmityaśvi - ByAm|tvA|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOniḥ|aśviByAmityaśvi̍ - ByAm|tvA||8 (19) (prAtaryujAvE - kAnna viṃśatiḥ)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: prAtaryujau vi mucyEthA-maśvi̍nAvEha̍ gacCataM|asya̍ sOmasya̍ pItayE̱||upayAmagRuhItO-&syaśviByA̱M̍ tvaiṣa tE yOniraśviByA̱M̍ tvA||8 (prAtaryujAvE-kAnnaviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A7) xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

verses.padam: (Padam) ayam|vEnaḥ|cOdayatq|pRuśnigarBA̍ iti pRuśni# - garBAḥ|jyOtirjarAyuriti̍ jyOtiḥ̍ - jarAyuḥ|rajasaḥ|vimAna̍ iti# vi - mAnE̱||imam|apAm|sagaMqma iti# saM - gamE|sUryasya|śiśu̱m|na|viprA̱ḥ|matiBiriti̍# mati - Biḥ|rihanti||upayAmagRuhIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|śaṇḍAya|tvA|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|vIratA̱m|pAhi||9̍ (25) (ayaM ~MvEnaḥ - pa~jcaviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A8)
verses.samhita: ayaM ~MvEnaścOdayat̍ pRuś~jigarBA̍ jyOtirjarAyU̍ rajasO̍ vimAnE̱|imamapAṃ saMgamE̍ sUryasya̍ śiśuM na viprA# matiBI# rihanti||upayAmagRuhItO-&si̍ śaṇḍAya̍ tvaiṣa tE yOnir̍ vIratA̱M pAhi||9 (ayaM ~MvEnaḥ- pa~jcaviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) tam|pratnathA̱|pUrvathA̱|viśvathA̱|imathA̱|jyEṣṭhatAtimiti̍# jyEṣṭha - tAtim|barqḥiṣadamiti# baṛhi - sada̱m|suvarvidamiti# suvaḥ - vida̱m|pratIcInam|vRujana̱m|dOhasE|girA|Aśum|jayantam|anviti̍|yAsu̍|vardha̍sE||upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|markAya|tvA|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|pAhi||10 (26) (taM pratnathA - ṣaṭviṃśatiḥ̍ ) (A9)
verses.samhita: taM pratnathA# pUrvathA# viśvathEmathA̱ jyEṣṭhatAtiM̍ baṛhiṣadaṃ# suvarvidaM̍ pratIcInaM ~MvRujanaM̍ dOhasE girA&&śuM jayantamanu̍ yAsu varddhasE|upayAmagRu̍hItO-&si̍ markAya̍ tvaiṣa tE yOniḥ̍ prajAḥ pAhi||10̍

verses.padam: (Padam) yE|dEvAḥ|divi|EkAdaśa|stha|pRuthivyAm|adhIti̍|EkA̍daśa|stha|aPsuṣada̍ ityaPsu̍ - sadaḥ|mahinA|EkA̍daśa|stha|tE|dEvAḥ|yajñam|imam|juṣaddhvam|upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|Agrayaṇaḥ|asi|svA̱grayaṇa iti su - Agrayaṇaḥ|jinva|yajñam|jinva̍|yajñapa̍timiti̍# yajña - patim|aBIti|sava̍nA|pAhi|viṣṇu̍ḥ|tvAm|pAtu|viśa̱m|tvam|pAhi|indriyEṇa̍|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|viśvE̱Byaḥ|tvA|dEvEBya̍ḥ||11̍ (43) (yE dEvA̍ - stricatvAriṃśat)̍ (A10)
verses.samhita: yE dEvA̍ divyEkAdaśa̍ stha pRuthivyAmaddhyEkA̍daśa̍ sthA&PsuṣadO# mahinaikAdaśa̍ stha tE dEvA̍ yajñamimaM juṣaddhva-mupayAmagRu̍hItO-&syAgrayaṇO̍&si̍ svA̱grayaṇO jinva# yajñaM jinva# yajñapatimaBi̍ savanA̍ pAhi viṣṇustvAM pAtu̍ viśaM tvaM pAhIndriyEṇaiṣa̍ tE yOnir viśvE̱ByastvA dEvEByaḥ||11̍ yE dEvA-strica̍tvAriṃśat)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) triṃqśat|trayaḥ|ca|gaṇina̍ḥ|rujanta̍ḥ|diva̱m|rudrAḥ|pRuthivIm|ca|sacantE||EkAdaśAsa̍ḥ|aPsuṣada̍ ityaPsu-sada̍ḥ|sutam|sOma̱m|juṣantAm|sava̍nAya|viśvE̱||upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|Agrayaṇaḥ|asi|svA̱grayaṇa iti su - Agrayaṇaḥ|jinva|yajñam|jinva̍|yajñapa̍timiti̍# yajña - patim|aBIti|sava̍nA|pAhi|viṣṇu̍ḥ|tvAm|pAtu|viśa̱m|tvam|pAhi|indriyEṇa̍|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|viśvE̱Byaḥ|tvA|dEvEBya̍ḥ||12̍ (42) (triṃqśattrayO - dvicatvAriṃśat)̍ (A11)
verses.samhita: triṃqśattrayaśca̍ gaṇinO# rujantO divaṃ# rudrAḥ pRuthivIM̍ ca# sacantE|EkAdaśAsO# aPsuṣadaḥ̍ sutaṃ sOmaM̍ juṣantAṃq savanAya̍ viśvE̱||upayAmagRuhItO̍ -&syAgrayaṇO&si̍ svA̱grayaṇO jinva# yajñaM jinva# yajñapatimaBi̍ savanA̍ pAhi viṣṇustvAM pAtu̍ viśaM tvaM pAhIndriyEṇaiṣa̍ tE yOnir viśvE̱ByastvA dEvEByaḥ||12̍ (triṃqśattrayO-dvicatvAriṃśat)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) upayAmagRuhIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|indrAya|tvA|bRuhadva̍ta̍ iti# bRuhat - vatE|vayasvatE|ukthAyuva̍ ityuktha̍ - yuvE̱|yat|tE|indra|bRuhat|vayaḥ|tasmai̱|tvA|viṣṇa̍vE|tvA|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|indrA̍ya|tvA|ukthAyuva̍ ityuktha̍ - yuvE̱||13 (22) (upayAmagRuhItO&sIndrA̍ya̍ - dvAviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A12)
verses.samhita: upayAmagRuhItO-&sIndrA̍ya̍ tvA bRuhadvatE̍ vayasvata̍ ukthAyuvE yatta# indra bRuhadvayastasmai̱ tvA viṣṇavE̍ tvaiṣa tE yOnirindrAya̍ tvOkthAyuvE̱||13 (upayAmagRuhItO&sIndrA̍ya-dvAviṃ̍śatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) mUrdhAna̱m|divaḥ|aratim|pRuthivyAḥ|vaiśvAnaram|RutAya|jAtam|agnim||kavim|samrAjamiti̍# saM - rAja̱m|atithim|janA̍nAm|Asann|Eti̍|pAtra̱m|janayanta|dEvAḥ||upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|agnayE̱|tvA|vaiśvAnarAya|dhruvaḥ|asi|dhruvakṣi̍tiriti̍# dhruva-kṣitiḥ|dhruvAṇA̱m|dhruvatama̍ iti# dhruva - tamaḥ|acyutAnAm|acyutakṣitta̍ma̍ ityacyutakṣit̍ - tamaḥ|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOniḥ|agnayE̱|tvA|vaiśvAnarAya̍||14̍ (35) (mUrddhAnaM - pa~jcatriṃśat)̍ (A13)
verses.samhita: mUrddhAnaM̍ divO aratiM̍ pRuthivyA̍ vai̱śvAnaramRutAya# jAtamagniM|kaviṃ samrAja-matithiM̍ janAnAmAsannA̍ pAtraM̍ janayanta dEvAḥ||upayAmagRuhItO-&syagnayE̱̍ tvA vaiśvAnarAya# dhruvO&si̍ dhruvakṣitir̍ dhruvAṇA̱M dhruvatamO&cyutAnA-macyutakṣitta̍ma̍ Eṣa tE yOniragnayE̱̍ tvA vaiśvAnarAya||14̍ (mUrddhAnaM-pa~jcatriṃśat)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) madhuḥ|ca|mAdha̍vaḥ|ca|śukraḥ|ca|śuci̍ḥ|ca|naBa̍ḥ|ca|naBasya̍ḥ|ca|iṣaḥ|ca|Urjaḥ|ca|saha̍ḥ|ca|sahasya̍ḥ|ca|tapa̍ḥ|ca|tapasya̍ḥ|ca|upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma-gRuhItaḥ|asi|saṃqsarpa̍ iti# saM - sarpaḥ|asi|aṃqhaspatyAyEtyaṃ̍haḥ̍ - patyAya|tvA||15̍ (30) (madhuśca̍ - triṃqśat) (A14)
verses.samhita: madhuśca̍ mAdhavaśca̍ śukraśca śuciśca̍ naBaśca̍ naBasyaścEṣaścOrjaśca̍ sahaśca̍ sahasyaśca̍ tapaśca̍ tapasyaścO-payAmagRu̍hItO&si̍ saṃqsarpO̱- &syaṃhaspatyAya# tvA||15 (madhuśca-triṃqśat)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) indrA̱gnI itIndra# - agnI|Eti|gatam|sutam|gIrBiḥ|naBa̍ḥ|varE̱ṇyam||asya|pAtam|dhiyA|iṣitA||upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|indrAgniByAmitI̱ndrAgni - ByAm|tvA|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOniḥ|indrAgniByAmitI̱ndrAgni̍ - ByAm|tvA||16 (20) (indrA̱gnI viṃśatiḥ) (A15)
verses.samhita: indrA̱gnI A gataṃ̍ sutaM gIrBir naBO varE̱ṇyaM|asya pAtaM̍ dhiyEṣitA||upayAmagRuhItO-&sIndrAgniByA̱M̍ tvaiṣa tE yOnirindrAgniByA̱M̍ tvA||16 indrA̱gnI viṃśatiḥ)

verses.padam: (Padam) OmAsaḥ|carq.ṣaṇIdhRuta̍ iti# caṛṣaṇi - dhRutaḥ|viśvE̱|dEvAsaḥ|Eti|gata||dAśvAṃsa̍ḥ|dAśuṣa̍ḥ|sutam||upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|viśvE̱Byaḥ|tvA|dEvEByaḥ|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|viśvE̱Byaḥ|tvA|dEvEBya̍ḥ||17̍ (20) (OmAsO̍ viṃśatiḥ) (A16)
verses.samhita: OmAsaścaṛṣaṇIdhRutO̍ viśvE# dEvAsa A gata|dAśvAṃsO̍# dAśuṣaḥ̍ sutaM||upayAmagRuhItO-&si̍ viśvE̱ByastvA dEvEBya# Eṣa tE yOnir viśvE̱ByastvA dEvEByaḥ||17̍

verses.padam: (Padam) marutvantam|vRuṣaBam|vAvRudhAnam|aka̍vArimityaka̍vA̍ - arim|divyam|śAsam|indra̱m||viśvAsAhamiti# viśva-sAha̱m|avasE|nUta̍nAya|ugram|sahOdAmiti̍# sahaḥ - dAm|iha|tam|huvEma||upayAmagRuhIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|indrAya|tvA|marutva̍tE|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|indrA̍ya|tvA|marutva̍tE||18̍ (26) (marutvantaṃq̍ - ṣaṭviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A17)
verses.samhita: marutvantaM̍ ~MvRuṣaBaM ~MvAvRudhAnamaka̍vAriM̍ divyaṃ śAsamindra̱M|viśvAsAhamavasE̍ nUtanAyOgraṃ̍ sahOdAmiha̍ taṃ huvEma||upayAmagRu̍hItO-&sIndrA̍ya̍ tvA marutvata̍ Eṣa tE yOnirindrAya̍ tvA marutvatE||18̍ (marutvantaṃq-ṣaṭviṃ̍śatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) indra|marutvaḥ|iha|pAhi|sOma̱m|yathA̱|śAryAtE|api̍baḥ|sutasya̍||tava̍|praṇItIti̍ pra - nItI|tava|śUra|śarmann̍|Eti̍|vivAsanti|kavaya̍ḥ|suyajñA̍ iti# su - yajñAḥ||upayAmagRuhIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|indrAya|tvA|marutva̍tE|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|indrA̍ya|tvA|marutva̍tE||19̍ (29) (indraikAnna triṃqśat) (A18)
verses.samhita: indra# marutva iha pAhi̍ sOmaM ~MyathA# śAryAtE apibaḥ̍ sutasya|tava̍ praṇItI̍ tava# śUra śarmannA-vivAsanti̍ kavayaḥ̍ suyajñAḥ||upayAmagRuhItO-&sIndrA̍ya̍ tvA marutvata̍ Eṣa tE yOnirindrAya̍ tvA marutvatE||19̍

verses.padam: (Padam) marutvAn|indra|vRuṣaBaḥ|raṇA̍ya|piba̍|sOma̱m|anuṣvadhamitya̍nu̍ - svadham|madAya||Eti̍|si~jcasva|jaṭharE̱|maddhva̍ḥ|Urmim|tvam|rAjA̱|asi|pradiva̍ iti# pra - divaḥ|sutAnA̱m||upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|indrAya|tvA|marutva̍tE|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|indrA̍ya|tvA|marutva̍tE||20̍ (29) (marutvAnEkAnna triṃqśat) (A19)
verses.samhita: marutvAṃ# indra vRuṣaBO raṇAya̍ pibA sOmamanuṣvadhaM̍ madAya|A̍ si~jcasva̍ jaṭharE maddhva# UrmiM tvaṃ rAjA&si̍ pradivaḥ̍ sutAnA̱M||upayAmagRuhItO-&sIndrA̍ya̍ tvA marutvata̍ Eṣa tE yOnirindrAya̍ tvA marutvatE||20̍

verses.padam: (Padam) mahAn|indraḥ|yaḥ|Oja̍sA|parjanya̍ḥ|vRuṣṭimAniti̍# vRuṣṭi-mAn|iva||stOmai̱ḥ|vathsasya|vAvRudhE||upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|mahEndrAyEti# mahA - indrAya|tvA|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|mahEndrAyEti̍# mahA - indrAya|tvA||21(19)̍ (mahAnEkAnna - viṃśatiḥ)̍ (A20)
verses.samhita: mahAṃ indrO ya OjasA̍ parjanyO# vRuṣṭimAṃ iva|stOmai̱rvathsasya̍# vAvRudhE||upayAmagRuhItO-&si̍ mahEndrAya# tvaiṣa tE yOnir̍ mahEndrAya# tvA||21 (mahAnEkAnnaviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) mahAn|indraḥ|nRuvaditi̍# nRu - vat|Eti|carq.ṣaṇiprA̍ iti# caṛṣaṇi - prAḥ|uta|dvibaṛhA iti# dvi - baṛhA̱ḥ|aminaḥ|sahOBiriti̍ sahaḥ̍ - Biḥ||asmadriyagityasma̍ - driyak|vAvRudhE|vIryA̍ya|uruḥ|pRuthuḥ|sukRu̍ta̍ iti su - kRutaḥ|kartRuBiriti# kartRu - Biḥ|BUt||upayAmagRuhIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|mahEndrAyEti# mahA - indrAya|tvA|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|mahEndrAyEti̍# mahA - indrAya|tvA||22̍ (26) (mahAn nRuvath - ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A21)
verses.samhita: mahAṃ indrO# nRuvadA caṛṣaṇiprA̍ uta dvibaṛhA# aminaḥ sahOBiḥ|asmadriya̍gvAvRudhE̍ vIryAyOruḥ̍ pRuthuḥ sukRutaḥ̍ kartRuBirBUt||upayAmagRu̍hItO&si̍ mahEndrAya# tvaiṣa tE yOnir̍ mahEndrAya# tvA||22 (mahAn nRuvath - ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) kadA|cana|starIḥ|asi|na|indra|saścasi|dAśuṣE̱||upOpEtyupa# - upa|it|nu|maGavanniti# maGa - vannq|BUyaḥ|it|nu|tE|dAna̱m|dEvasya̍|pRucyatE||upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|AdityEByaḥ|tvA||kadA|cana|prEti̍|yucCasi|uBE̍ iti|nIti̍|pAsi|janma̍nI̍ iti||turI̍ya|Aditya|sava̍nam|tE|indriyam|Eti̍|tasthau|amRuta̱m|divi||yajñaḥ|dEvAnA̱m|pratIti̍|Eti|sumnam|Adi̍tyAsaḥ|Bava̍ta|mRuḍayanta̍ḥ||Eti̍|vaḥ̍ ( )|arvAcI̱|sumatiriti# su - matiḥ|vavRutyAt|aṃqhOḥ|cit|yA|varivOvittarEti# varivOvit - tarA|asat||viva̍svaḥ|Aditya|Eṣaḥ|tE|sOmapItha̍ iti# sOma - pIthaḥ|tEna|mandasva|tEna̍|tRupya|tRupyAsma̍|tE|vayam|tarpayitAra̍ḥ|yA|divyA|vRuṣṭi̍ḥ|tayA̱|tvA|śrIṇAmi||23̍ (77) (vaḥ - saptaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A22)
verses.samhita: kadA cana starIrasi̍ nEndra# saścasi dAśuṣE̱|upOpEnnu maGavan̍ BUya innu tE dAnaM̍ dEvasya# pRucyatE||upayAmagRuhItO&syA-dityEBya̍stvA||kadA̍ cana pra yucCasyuBE̍ ni pAsi̍ janmanI|turI̍yAditya̍ savanaM̍ ta indriyamA tasthAvamRuta̍M̍ divi||yajñO dEvAnAM pratyEti̍ sumnamAdityAsO̍ BavatA̍ mRuḍayantaḥ|A̍ vO ( ) &rvAcI# sumatir vavRutyAdaṃqhO-ścidyA̍ varivOvittarA&sa̍t||viva̍sva̍ Adityaiṣa tE# sOmapIthastEna# mandasva tEna# tRupya tRupyAsma# tE vayaM tarpayitArO̍ yA divyA vRuṣṭistayA̱ tvA śrIṇAmi||23 (vaḥ- saptaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) vAmam|adya|savitaḥ|vAmam|u|śvaḥ|divEdiva̍ iti# divE - divE|vAmam|asmaByamityasma - Byam|sAvIḥ||vAmasya|hi|kṣaya̍sya|dEva|BUrE̱ḥ|ayA|dhiyA|vAmaBAja̍ iti# vAma - BAjaḥ|syAma||upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|dEvAya|tvA|savitrE||24̍ (24) (vAmaM - caturviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A23)
verses.samhita: vAmamadya savitarvAmamu̍ śvO divEdivE̍ vAmamasmaByaṃ# sAvIḥ||vAmasya hi kṣayasya̍ dEva BUrErayA̍ dhiyA vAmaBAja̍ḥ̍ syAma||upayAmagRuhItO-&si̍ dEvAya# tvA savitrE||24 (vAmaM-caturviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) adabdhEBiḥ|savitaḥ|pAyuBiriti̍# pAyu - Biḥ|tvam|śivEBiḥ|adya|parIti̍|pAhi|naḥ|gaya̱m||hira̍ṇyajihva̍ iti hiraṇya̍ - jihvaḥ|suvitAya|navya̍sE|rakṣa̍|mAki̍ḥ|naḥ|aGaśaṃ̍sa̍ ityaGa - śaṃqsaḥ|Iśata||upayAmagRuhIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|dEvAya|tvA|savitrE||25̍ (23) (adabdhEBi̍ - striyOviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A24)
verses.samhita: adabdhEBiḥ̍ savitaḥ pAyuBiṣṭvaṃ śivEBiradya̍ paripAhi̍ nO gaya̱M|hiraṇyajihvaḥ̍ suvitAya navyasE̍ rakṣA mAkirnO̍ aGaśaṃsa̍ Iśata||upayAmagRuhItO&si̍ dEvAya# tvA savitrE||25 (adabdhEBi-striyO̍viṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) hiraṇyapAṇimiti̍ hiraṇya̍ - pAṇim|UtayE̱|savitAra̱m|upEti|hvayE||saḥ|cEttA̱|dEvatA̱|padam||upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|dEvAya|tvA|savitrE||26̍ (14)
verses.samhita: hiraṇyapAṇimUtayE̍# savitAramupa# hvayE|sa cEttA# dEvatA# padaM||upayAmagRuhItO-&si̍ dEvAya# tvA savitrE||26

verses.padam: (Padam) suśarmEti# su - śarmA̱|asi|supratiṣṭhAna iti# su - pratiṣṭhAnaḥ|bRuhat|ukṣE|namaḥ|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|viśvE̱Byaḥ|tvA|dEvEBya̍ḥ||27̍ (12)
verses.samhita: suśarmA&si̍ supratiṣṭhAnO bRuhadukṣE nama# Eṣa tE yOnir viśvE̱ByastvA dEvEByaḥ||27̍

verses.padam: (Padam) bRuhaspatisutasyEti̍ bRuhaspati# - sutasya|tE|indO iti|indriyAva̍ta̍ itI̱ndriya - vataḥ|patnIvantamiti̍ patnI̱ - vantam|graha̱m|gRuhṇAmi|agnA(3) i|patnIvA(3) iti patnI̱ - vA(3)ḥ|sajUriti# sa - jUḥ|dEvEna|tvaṣṭrA̱|sOma̱m|piba|svAhA̱||28̍ (15)
verses.samhita: bRuhaspatisutasya̍ ta indO indriyAvataḥ̍ patnIvantaM̍ grahaM̍ gRuhṇAmyagnA(3)i patnIvA(3) ssajUrdEvEna tvaṣṭrA sOmaM̍ piba svAhA̱||28

verses.padam: (Padam) hariḥ|asi|hAriyOjana̍ iti# hAri - yOjanaḥ|haryO̱ḥ|sthAtA|vajrasya|BartA|pRuśnE̱ḥ|prEtA|tasya̍|tE|dEva|sOma|iṣṭaya̍juṣa̍ itIṣṭa - yajuṣaḥ|stutastOmasyEti̍# stuta - stOmasya|śastOkthasyEti# śasta - ukthasya|harivantamiti̍ hari# - vantam|graha̱m|gRuhṇAmi|harIḥ|stha|haryO̱ḥ|dhAnAḥ|sahasOmA̍ iti# saha - sOmAḥ|indrAya|svAhA̱||29̍ (26) (harirasi̍ - ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A28)
verses.samhita: harirasi̍ hAriyOjanO haryO̱ḥ sthAtA vajrasya̍ BartA pRuś~jE̱ḥ prEtA tasya# tE dEva sOmEṣṭayajuṣaḥ̍ stutastOmasya̍ śastOkthasya̍ harivantaM̍ grahaM̍ gRuhṇAmi harIḥ stha haryO̱rddhAnAḥ sahasOmA̍ indrAya̍ svAhA̱||29 (harirasi-ṣaḍviṃ̍śatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) agnE̱|AyUṃṣi|pavasE|Eti̍|suva|Urja̱m|iṣa̱m|ca|naḥ||ArE|bAdhasva|ducCunA̱m||upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|agnayE̱|tvA|tEjasvatE|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|agnayE̱|tvA|tEja̍svatE||30̍ (23) (agna AyUṃṣi̍ - trayOviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A29)
verses.samhita: agna AyUṃṣi̍ pavasa A suvOrjamiṣaM̍ ca naḥ|ArE bAdhasva̍ ducCunA̱M||upayAmagRuhItO-&syagnayE̱̍ tvA tEjasvata̍ Eṣa tE yOniragnayE̱̍ tvA tEjasvatE||30̍ (agna AyUṃṣi-trayO̍viṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) uttiṣṭhannityut̍ - tiṣṭhann|Oja̍sA|saha|pItvA|śiprE̍ iti|avEpayaḥ||sOma̱m|indra|camU̍ iti|sutam||upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|indrAya|tvA|Oja̍svatE|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|indrA̍ya|tvA|Oja̍svatE||31(21)̍ (uttiṣṭhannEkaviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A30)
verses.samhita: uttiṣṭhannOjasA̍ saha pItvA śiprE# avEpayaḥ|sOmamindra̍ camU sutaM||upayAmagRuhItO-&sIndrA̍ya̍ tvaujasvata̍ Eṣa tE yOnirindrAya̍ tvaujasvatE||31̍ (uttiṣṭhannEkaviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) taraṇiḥ|viśvada̍ṛśata̍ iti# viśva - daṛqśataḥ|jyOtiṣkRuditi# jyOtiḥ - kRut|asi|sUrya||viśva̱m|Eti|BAsi|rOcanam||upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|sUryAya|tvA|BrAja̍svatE|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|sUryA̍ya|tvA|BrAja̍svatE||32̍ (20) (taraṇi# - rviṃśatiḥ) (A31)
verses.samhita: taraṇir̍ viśvadaṛśatO̍ jyOtiṣkRudasi̍ sUrya|viśvamA BAsi̍ rOcanaM||upayAmagRuhItO-&si̍ sUryAya̍ tvA BrAjasvata̍ Eṣa tE yOniḥ sUryAya̍ tvA BrAjasvatE||32̍

verses.padam: (Padam) Eti|pyAyasva|madintama|sOma̍|viśvA̍Biḥ|UtiBirityUti̍ - Biḥ||Bava|naḥ|sapratha̍stama̍ iti# saprathaḥ̍ - tamaḥ||33 (9)
verses.samhita: A pyAyasva̍ madintama sOma viśvABi-rUtiBi̍ḥ|BavA̍# naḥ saprathastamaḥ||33̍

verses.padam: (Padam) Iyuḥ|tE|yE|pUrvatarAmiti̍ pUrva# - tarAm|apaśyann|vyucCantImiti̍# vi - ucCantI̱m|uṣasa̱m|martyAsaḥ||asmABi̍ḥ|u|nu|praticakṣyEti̍# prati - cakṣyA̱|aBUt|O iti|tE|yanti|yE|aparIṣu̍|paśyAn̍||34̍ (19) (Iyu - rEkAnna viṃśatiḥ)̍ (A33)
verses.samhita: IyuṣṭE yE pUrvatarAmapa̍śyan̍ vyucCantImuṣasaM̍ martyAsaḥ|asmABi̍rU̍ nu praticakṣyA̍&BUdO̍ tE yanti̍ yE aparIṣu̍ paśyAn||34̍ (Iyu-rEkAnnaviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) jyOtiṣmatIm|tvA|sAdayAmi|jyOtiṣkRutamiti̍# jyOtiḥ-kRuta̱m|tvA|sAdayAmi|jyOtirvidamiti# jyOtiḥ - vida̱m|tvA|sAdayAmi|BAsvatIm|tvA|sAdayAmi|jvala̍ntIm|tvA|sAdayAmi|malmalABava̍ntImiti̍# malmalA - BavantIm|tvA|sAdayAmi|dIpya̍mAnAm|tvA|sAdayAmi|rOca̍mAnAm|tvA|sAdayAmi|aja̍srAm|tvA|sAdayAmi|bRuhajjyO̍tiṣamiti̍# bRuhat - jyOtiṣam|tvA|sAdayAmi|bOdhayantIm|tvA|sAdayAmi|jAgra̍tIm|tvA|sAdayAmi||35̍ (36) (jyOtiṣmatIṃq̍ - ṣaṭtriṃśat)̍ (A34)
verses.samhita: jyOtiṣmatIM̍ tvA sAdayAmi jyOtiṣkRutaM̍ tvA sAdayAmi jyOtirvidaM̍ tvA sAdayAmi BAsvatIM̍ tvA sAdayAmi jvalantIM̍ tvA sAdayAmi malmalABavantIM̍ tvA sAdayAmi dIpyamAnAM̍ tvA sAdayAmi rOcamAnAM̍ tvA sAdayAmyajasrAM̍ tvA sAdayAmi bRuhajjyOtiṣaM̍ tvA sAdayAmi bOdhayantIM̍ tvA sAdayAmi jAgratIM̍ tvA sAdayAmi||35 (jyOtiṣmatIṃq-ṣaṭtriṃ̍śat)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) prayAsAyEti# pra - yAsAya|svAhA̱|AyAsAyEtyA̱̍ - yAsAya|svAhA̱|viyAsAyEti̍# vi - yAsAya|svAhA̱|sam~MyAsAyEti̍# saM - yAsAya|svAhA̱|udyAsAyEtyu̍t̍ - yAsAya|svAhA̱|avayAsAyEtya̍va̍ - yAsAya|svAhA̱|śucE|svAhA̱|śOkA̍ya|svAhA̱|tapyatvai|svAhA̱|tapa̍tE|svAhA̱|brahmahatyAyA̍ iti# brahma - hatyAyai̱|svAhA̱|sarvasmai|svAhA̱||36̍ (24) (prayAsAya - caturviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A35)
verses.samhita: prayAsAya svAhA# &&yAsAya svAhA# viyAsAya svAhA# saM~MyAsAya svAhO̱dyAsAya svAhA&vayAsAya̍ svAhA# śucE svAhA śOkAya̍ svAhA# tapyatvai svAhA tapatE̍ svAhA̱ brahmahatyAyai svAhA sarvasmai̍ svAhA̱||36

verses.padam: (Padam) cittam|satAMqnEnEti# saM - tAnEna|Bavam|yaknA|rudram|tani̍mnA|paśupatimiti̍# paśu - pati̱m|sthUlahRudayEnEti# sthUla - hRudayEna|agnim|hRuda̍yEna|rudram|lOhi̍tEna|śarvam|mata̍snAByAm|mahAdEvamiti̍# mahA - dEvam|antaḥ pA̱rśvEnEtyantaḥ - pArśvEna|OṣiṣṭhahanamityOṣiṣṭha̍ - hana̱m|śi~ggInikOśyA̱ByAmiti# śi~ggI - nikOśyA̱ByAm||37 (18)
verses.samhita: cittaṃ santAnEna̍# BavaM ~MyaknA rudraM tanimnA̍ paśupatiṅ# sthUlahRudayEnAgniṃ hRudayEna̍ rudraM ~MlOhitEna̍ śarvaM matasnAByAM̍ mahAdEva-mantaḥpA̱rśvEnauṣiṣṭhahanaṃ# śi~ggInikOśyA̱ByAM||37

verses.padam: (Padam) Eti|tiṣṭha|vRutrahanniti̍# vRutra - hann|ratha̱m|yuktA|tE|brahmaṇA|harI̍ iti||arvAcIna̱m|sviti̍|tE|mana̍ḥ|grAvA̱|kRuṇOtu|vagnunA̱||upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|indrAya|tvA|ṣOḍaśinE̱|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|indrA̍ya|tvA|ṣOḍaśinE̱||38̍ (26) (A tiṣṭa̍ - ṣaṭviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A37)
verses.samhita: A tiṣṭha̍ vRutrahan rathaM̍ ~MyuktA tE brahmaṇA̍ harI̱|arvAcInaṃq su tE manO grAvA# kRuṇOtu vagnunA̱||upayAmagRuhItO&sIndrA̍ya̍ tvA ṣOḍaśina# Eṣa tE yOnirindrAya̍ tvA ṣOḍaśinE̱||38 (A tiṣṭa-ṣaṭviṃ̍śatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) indra̱m|it|harI iti|vahataḥ|apra̍tidhRuṣṭaśavasamityapra̍tidhRuṣṭa̍ - śavasam|RuṣIṇAm|ca|stutIḥ|upEti̍|yajñam|ca|mAnu̍ṣAṇAm||upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|indrAya|tvA|ṣOḍaśinE̱|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|indrA̍ya|tvA|ṣOḍaśinE̱||39̍ (23) (indramit - trayOviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A38)
verses.samhita: indramiddharI# vahatO-&pratidhRuṣṭaśavasa-mRuṣI̍ṇAM̍ ca stutIrupa# yajñaM ca mAnuṣAṇAM||upayAmagRu̍hItO-&sIndrA̍ya̍ tvA ṣOḍaśina# Eṣa tE yOnirindrAya̍ tvA ṣOḍaśinE̱||39 (indramit-trayOviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) asAvi|sOma̍ḥ|indra|tE|śavi̍ṣṭha|dhRuṣṇO|Eti̍|gahi||Eti̍|tvA|pRuṇak^^tu|indriyam|raja̍ḥ|sUrya̱m|na|raśmiBiriti̍# raśmi - Biḥ||upayAmagRuhIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|indrAya|tvA|ṣOḍaśinE̱|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|indrA̍ya|tvA|ṣOḍaśinE̱||40̍ (27) (asAvi̍ - saptaviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A39)
verses.samhita: asAvi̍ sOma# indra tE śaviṣṭha̍ dhRuṣṇavA gahi|A̍ tvA# pRuṇaktvindriyaṃ rajaḥ sUryaM na raśmiBiḥ||upayAmagRu̍hItO&sIndrA̍ya̍ tvA ṣOḍaśina# Eṣa tE yOnirindrAya̍ tvA ṣOḍaśinE̱||40 (asAvi-saptaviṃ̍śatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) sarvasya|pratiśIvarIti̍# prati - śIvarI|BUmi̍ḥ|tvA|upastha̍ ityupa - sthE|Eti|adhita||syOnA|asmai|suṣadEti̍# su - sadA̱|Bava|yacCa|asmai|śarma̍|saprathA̍ iti# sa-prathA̱ḥ||upayAmagRuhIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|indrAya|tvA|ṣOḍaśinE̱|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|indrA̍ya|tvA|ṣOḍaśinE̱||41̍ (26) (sarvasya̍ ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A40)
verses.samhita: sarvasya̍ pratiśIvarI̍ BUmistvOpastha̍ A&dhita|syOnA&smai̍# suṣadA# Bava yacCA̱&smai śarma# saprathA̱ḥ||upayAmagRuhItO&sIndrA̍ya̍ tvA ṣOḍaśina# Eṣa tE yOnirindrAya̍ tvA ṣOḍaśinE̱||41 (sarvasya̍ ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) mahAn|indraḥ|vajra̍bAhuriti̍ vajra# - bAhuḥ|ṣOḍaśI|śarma|yacCatu||svasti|naḥ|maGavEti̍# maGa - vA|karOtu|hantu|pApmAna̱m|yaḥ|asmAn|dvEṣṭi̍||upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|indrAya|tvA|ṣOḍaśinE̱|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|indrA̍ya|tvA|ṣOḍaśinE̱||42̍ (26) (mahAn - ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A41)
verses.samhita: mahAṃ indrO vajrabAhuḥ̍ ṣOḍaśI śarma# yacCatu|svasti nO# maGavA# karOtu hantu# pApmAnaM ~MyO̱&smAn dvEṣṭi||upayAmagRu̍hItO&sIndrA̍ya̍ tvA ṣOḍaśina# Eṣa tE yOnirindrAya̍ tvA ṣOḍaśinE̱||42 (mahAn-ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) sajOṣA iti# sa - jOṣA̱ḥ|indra|sagaṇa̍ iti sa - gaṇaḥ|marudBiriti# marut - Biḥ|sOma̱m|piba|vRutrahanniti# vRutra - hann|śUra|vidvAn||jahi|śatrUn|apEti̍|mRudha̍ḥ|nudasva|atha̍|aBa̍yam|kRuṇuhi|viśvata̍ḥ|naḥ||upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|indrAya|tvA|ṣOḍaśinE̱|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|indrA̍ya|tvA|ṣOḍaśinE̱||43̍ (30) (sajOṣA̱ - triṃqśat) (A42)
verses.samhita: sajOṣA# indra sagaṇO̍ marudBiḥ sOmaM̍ piba vRutraha~jCUra vidvAn|jahi śatrUṃq rapa mRudhO# nudasvA&thABayaM̍ kRuṇuhi viśvatO# naḥ||upayAmagRuhItO&sIndrA̍ya̍ tvA ṣOḍaśina# Eṣa tE yOnirindrAya̍ tvA ṣOḍaśinE̱||43

verses.padam: (Padam) uditi|u|tyam|jAtavE̍dasamiti̍# jAta - vEdasam|dEvam|vahanti|kEtavaḥ||dRuśE|viśvA̍ya|sUrya̱m||citram|dEvAnA̱m|uditi̍|agAt|anI̍kam|cakṣu̍ḥ|mitrasya̍|varu̍ṇasya|agnEḥ||aiti̍|aprAḥ|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|antarikṣam|sUrya̍ḥ|AtmA|jaga̍taḥ|tasthuṣa̍ḥ|ca||agnE̱|naya̍|supathEti̍# su - pathA̱|rAyE|asmAn|viśvAni|dEva|vayunA̍ni|vidvAn||yuyOdhi|asmat|juhurAṇam|Ena̍ḥ|BUyi̍ṣṭhAm|tE|nama̍uktimiti̍ namaḥ̍ - uktim|vidhEma||diva̱m|gacCa|suvaḥ|pata|rUpEṇa̍|44̍ (50)
verses.samhita: udu tyaM jAtavEdasaM̍ dEvaM ~Mvahanti̍ kEtavaḥ|dRuśE̍ viśvAya̍ sUrya̱M||citraM dEvAnA-mudagAdanI̍kaM̍ cakṣur̍ mitrasya varuṇasyA&gnEḥ|A&prA̍ dyAvApRuthivI̍ antarikṣaṃq̍ sUrya# AtmA jagatastasthuṣa̍śca||agnE̍ naya# supathA# rAyE asmAn. viśvAni̍ dEva vayunAni̍ vidvAn|yuyOddhyasma-jju̍hurAṇa̍ mEnO BUyiṣṭhAM̍ tE namauktiM̍ vidhEma||divaM̍ gacCa suvaḥ̍ pata rUpEṇa# - [ ] 44

verses.padam: (Padam) vaḥ|rUpam|aBi|Eti|Emi|vaya̍sA|vaya̍ḥ||tuthaḥ|vaḥ|viśvavE̍dA̍ iti# viśva - vEdAḥ|vIti|Bajatu|vaṛṣi̍ṣṭhE|adhIti̍|nAkE̱||Etat|tE|agnE|rAdha̍ḥ|Eti̍|Eti|sOma̍cyutamiti̍ sOma# - cyutam|tat|mitrasya|pathA|naya|Rutasya̍|pathA|prEti̍|ita|candrada̍kṣiṇA̍ iti# candra - dakṣiṇAḥ|yajñasya|pathA|suvitA|naya̍ntIḥ|brAhmaṇam|adya|rAddhyAsam|Ruṣi̱m|AṛqṣEyam|pitRumantamiti̍# pitRu - manta̱m|paitRumatyamiti# paitRu - matyam|sudhAtudakṣiṇamiti̍# sudhAtu# - dakṣiṇam|vIti|suva̍ḥ|paśya̍|vIti̍|antari̍kṣam|yata̍sva|sadasyai̱ḥ̍ ( )|asmaddA̱trA ityasmat - dAtrAḥ|dEvatrEti# dEva - trA|gacCata|madhumatIriti̍ madhu# - matIḥ|pradAtAramiti# pra - dAtAra̱m|Eti|viśata|ana̍vahAyEtyana̍va̍ - hAya|asmAn|dEvayAnEnEti# dEva - yAnEna|pathA|ita|sukRutAmiti̍# su - kRutA̱m|lOkE|sIdata|tat|naḥ|saṅqskRutam||45 (68)
verses.samhita: vO rUpamaByaimi vayasA̍ vayaḥ|tuthO̍ vO# viśvavEdA̍ vi Bajatu̍ vaṛṣiṣṭhE̍ adhi nAkE̱||EtattE# agnE rAdha aiti sOmacyutaM̍ tanmitrasya# pathA nayartasya̍# pathA prEta# candradakṣiṇA̍ yajñasya# pathA suvitA̍ nayantIr̍ brAhmaṇamadya rA̱ddhyAsamRuṣimAṛṣEyaM̍ pitRumanta̍M̍ paitRumatyaṃ sudhAtudakṣiṇaM̍ ~Mvi suvaḥ paśya vyantari̍kṣaM̍ ~Myatasva̍ sadasyai# ( ) rasmaddA̱trA dEvatrA gacCata̍ madhumatIḥ̍ pradAtAramA viśatA&na̍vahAyA&smAn̍ dEvayAnE̍na̍ pathEta# sukRutA̱M ~MlOkE sIdata̍ tannaḥ̍ saṅskRutaM||45

verses.padam: (Padam) dhatA|rAtiḥ|savitA|idam|juṣantAm|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|nidhipatiriti# nidhi - patiḥ|naḥ|agniḥ||tvaṣṭA̱|viṣṇu̍ḥ|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|saṃqrarAṇa iti# saM-rarAṇaḥ|yajamAnAya|dravi̍ṇam|dadhAtu||samiti̍|indra|naḥ|mana̍sA|nEṣi|gOBi̍ḥ|samiti̍|sUriBiriti̍# sUri - Biḥ|maGavanniti# maGa - vann|samiti|svastyA||samiti̍|brahma̍ṇA|dEvakRu̍tamiti̍# dEva - kRutam|yat|asti|samiti̍|dEvAnA̱m|sumatyEti̍# su - matyA|yajñiyAnAm||samiti̍|varca̍sA|paya̍sA|samiti̍|tanUBi̍ḥ|aga̍nmahi|mana̍sA|samiti̍|śivEna̍||tvaṣṭA̱|naḥ|atra̍|vari̍vaḥ|kRuṇOtu|46̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dhAtA rAtiḥ savitEdaM̍ juṣantAM̍ prajApatir̍ nidhipatirnO̍ agniḥ|tvaṣṭA viṣṇuḥ̍ prajayA# saṃrarAṇO yajamAnAya̍ draviṇaM̍ dadhAtu||samindra̍ ṇO manasA̍ nEṣi gOBiḥ saṃ sUriBirmaGavanth̍ saṅ svastyA|saM brahmaṇA̍ dEvakRutaM̍ ~Myadasti saM dEvAnAṃ# sumatyA yajñiyAnAM||saM̍ ~MvarcasA̍ payasA̍ saM tanUBi-raganmahi̍ manasA̍ saṃ śivEna||tvaṣṭA̍# nO atra varivaḥ̍ kRuṇO - [ ] 46

verses.padam: (Padam) anviti|mArṣṭu|tanuva̍ḥ|yat|vili̍ṣṭamiti̍ vi - liṣṭam||yat|adya|tvA|prayatIti# pra - yati|yajñE|asminn|agnE̱|hOtAram|avRu̍ṇImahi|iha||Rudha̍k|ayAṭ|Rudha̍k|uta|aśa̍miṣṭhAḥ|prajAnanniti̍# pra - jAnann|yajñam|upEti|yAhi|vidvAn||svagEti̍# sva - gA|vaḥ|dEvAḥ|sadanam|akarma|yE|AjagmEtyA̱̍ - jagma|savanA|idam|juṣAṇAḥ||jakṣivAṃsa̍ḥ|papivAṃsa̍ḥ|ca|viśvE̱|asmE̍ iti|dhatta|vasavaḥ|vasU̍ni||yAn|Eti̍|ava̍haḥ|uśataḥ|dEva|dEvAn|tAn|47̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tvanu# mArṣṭu tanuvO yadviliṣṭaM||yadadya̍ tvA̱ prayati yajñE asminnagnE hOtAramavRu̍ṇImahIha|Rudha̍gayAḍRudha̍gutA&śa̍miṣṭhAḥ̍ prajAnan. yajñamupa# yAhi vidvAn||svagA vO# dEvAḥ sadanamakarma̍ ya Ajagma̍ savanEdaM̍ juṣAṇAḥ|jakṣivAṃsa̍ḥ̍ papivAṃsaśca̍ viśvE&smE dhatta̍ vasavO vasUni||yAnA&va̍ha̍ uśatO dEva̍ dEvAn tAn-[ ] 47

verses.padam: (Padam) prEti|Iraya|svE|agnE|sadhastha̍ iti# sadha - sthE||vahamAnAḥ|Bara̍mAṇAḥ|havIṃṣi̍|vasu̱m|Garmam|diva̱m|Eti̍|tiṣṭhata|anu̍||yajña̍|yajñam|gacCa|yajñapa̍timiti̍# yajña - patim|gacCa|svAm|yOni̱m|gacCa|svAhA̱|Eṣaḥ|tE|yajñaḥ|yajñapata iti# yajña - patE|sahasU̱ktavAka iti# sahasa̱kta - vAkaḥ|suvIra iti# su - vIraḥ|svAhA̱|dEvA̱ḥ|gAtuvida̍ iti# gAtu - vidaḥ|gAtum|vittvA|gAtum|ita|manasaḥ|patE|imam|naḥ|dEva|dEvEṣu̍|yajñam|svAhA̱|vAci|svAhA̱|vAtE̱|dhAḥ||48̍ (48) (kRuṇOtu - tAna - ṣṭAcatvAriṃśacca̍ )(A44 )
verses.samhita: prEraya̍ svE agnE̍ sadhasthE̱|vahamAnA̍ BaramAṇA̍ havIṃṣi vasuM̍ GarmaM divamA tiṣṭhatAnu̍|yajña̍# yajñaM gacCa̍ yajñapatiM̍ gacCa svAM ~MyOniM̍ gacCa svAhaiṣa tE# yajñO yajñapatE̍ sahasU̱ktavAkaḥ suvIraḥ svAhA dEvA# gAtuvidO gAtuM ~MvittvA gAtumita̍ manasaspata̍ imaM nO# dEva dEvEṣu# yajñaṅ svAhA# vAci svAhA vAtE# dhAḥ||48

verses.padam: (Padam) urum|hi|rAjA̱|varuṇaḥ|cakAra̍|sUryA̍ya|panthA̱m|anvE̍tavA̍ ityanu# - Etavai|u||apadE̱|pAdA̱|pratidhAtava̍ iti prati-dhAtavE|akaḥ|uta|apavaktEtya̍pa̍ - vaktA|hRudayAvidha iti# hRudaya - vidhaḥ|cit||śatam|tE|rAjann|Biṣaja̍ḥ|sahasra̱m|urvI|gaBIMqrA|sumatiriti̍# su - matiḥ|tE|astu||bAdhasva|dvEṣa̍ḥ|niṛRu̍timiti̍ niḥ - Rutim|parAcaiḥ|kRutam|cit|Enaḥ|prEti̍|mumugdhi|asmat||aBiṣṭhi̍ta̍ ityaBi - sthitaḥ|varuṇasya|pAśa̍ḥ|agnEḥ|anI̍kam|apaḥ|Eti̍|vivEśa||apA̱m|napAt|pratirakṣanniti̍# prati - rakṣann|asurya̱m|damE̍dama̍ iti damE̱ - damE|49 (50)
verses.samhita: uruṃ hi rAjA varuṇaścakAra̍ sUryAya̍ panthA-manvEtavA̍ u|apadE̍ pAdA pratidhAtavE-&karutA-&pa̍vaktA̍ hRudayAvidha̍ścit||śataM̍ tE# rAjan Biṣajaḥ̍ sahasramurvI̍ gaMBIrA̍ sumatiṣṭE̍# astu|bAdhasva̍ dvEṣO niṛRutiM̍ parAcaiḥ kRutaM cidEnaḥ pra mumugddhyasmat||aBiṣṭhi̍tO̍ varuṇasya̍ pAśO&gnEranIkamapa̍ A vivEśa|apA̱nnapAt̍ pratirakṣannasurya̍M̍ damEdamE̍ - [ ] 49

verses.padam: (Padam) samidhamiti# saM - idha̱m|yakṣi|agnE||pratIti|tE|jihvA|GRutam|uditi̍|caraṇyEt|samudrE|tE|hRuda̍yam|aPsvitya̍p̍ - su|antaḥ||samiti|tvA|viśantu|Oṣa̍dhIḥ|uta|Apa̍ḥ|yajñasya̍|tvA|yajñapata̍ iti# yajña - patE|havirBiriti# haviḥ - Biḥ||sUktavAka iti# sUkta - vAkE|namOvAka iti# namaḥ - vAkE|vidhEma|avaBRuthEtyava̍# - BRutha|nica~gkuṇEti# ni - ca~gkuṇa|nicEruriti# ni - cEruḥ|asi|nica~gkuṇEti# ni - ca~gkuṇa|avEti|dEvaiḥ|dEvakRu̍tamiti̍# dEva - kRutam|Enaḥ|ayAṭ|avEti̍|martyai̱ḥ|martya̍kRutamiti̍ martya# - kRutam|urOḥ|Eti|naḥ|dEva|riṣaḥ|pAhi|sumitrA̍ iti# su - mitrAḥ|naḥ|Apaḥ|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|50̍ (50)
verses.samhita: samidhaM̍ ~MyakṣyagnE||prati# tE jihvA GRutamuccaraṇyEth̍ samudrE tE hRudayamaPsva̍ntaḥ|saM̍ tvA# viśantvOṣadhI-rutA&&pO̍# yajñasya# tvA yajñapatE havirBiḥ||sUktavAkE̍ namOvAkE̍ vidhEmA&va̍BRutha̍ nica~gkuṇa nicErurasi̍ nica~gkuṇA&va# dEvair dEvakRutamEnO̍&yAḍava̍ martyair martyakRutamurOrA̍ nO# dEva riṣaspAhi̍ sumitrA na Apa Oṣadhayaḥ̍ - [ ] 50

verses.padam: (Padam) santu|durmitrA iti# duḥ-mitrAḥ|tasmai̱|BUyAsuḥ|yaḥ|asmAn|dvEṣṭi|yam|ca|vayam|dviṣmaḥ|dEvI̱ḥ|Apaḥ|Eṣaḥ|vaḥ|garBa̍ḥ|tam|vaḥ|suprI̍tamiti̍ su - prItam|suBRutamiti̍ su - BRutam|akarma|dEvEṣu|naḥ|sukRuta̍ iti# su-kRutaḥ|brUtAt|prati̍yuta̍ iti prati# - yutaḥ|varuṇasya|pAśa̍ḥ|pratya̍sta̍ iti prati# - astaḥ|varuṇasya|pAśa̍ḥ|Edha̍ḥ|asi|EdhiṣImahi̍|samiditi̍# sam - it|asi|tEjaḥ|asi|tEja̍ḥ|mayi̍|dhEha|apaḥ|anviti̍|acAriṣam|rasE̍na|samiti̍|asRukṣmahi|paya̍svAn|agnE|Eti̍# ( )|agamam|tam|mA|samiti|sRuja|varca̍sA||51̍ (56)
verses.samhita: santu durmitrAstasmai# BUyAsur yO̱&smAn dvEṣṭi yaM ca# vayaM dviṣmO dEvIrApa̍ Eṣa vO garBastaM ~Mvaḥ suprItaṃq̍ suBRuta-makarma̍ dEvEṣu# naḥ sukRutO̱ brUtAt pratiyutO̍ varuṇasya̍ pAśaḥ pratyastO̍ varuṇasya̍ pAśa EdhO̱&syEdhiṣImahi# samidasi̍ tEjO&si̍ tEjO mayi# dhEhyapO anvacAriṣaṃq̍ rasEna̍ samasRukṣmahi|paya̍svAṃ̍ agna A ( ) &gamaM̍ taM mA saṃ sRuja̍ varcasA||51̍

verses.padam: (Padam) yaḥ|tvA|hRudA|kIriṇA̱|manyamAnaḥ|ama̍rtyam|martya̍ḥ|jOha̍vImi||jAta̍vEda̍ iti jAta# - vEdaḥ|yaśaḥ|asmAsu̍|dhEhi|prajABiriti̍# pra - jABiḥ|agnE|amRutatvamitya̍mRuta̍ - tvam|aśyAm||yasmai̱|tvam|sukRuta iti# su - kRutE̱|jAtavEda iti# jAta-vEdaḥ|u|lOkam|agnE|kRuṇavaḥ|syOnam||aśvina̱m|saḥ|putriṇa̱m|vIrava̍ntamiti̍# vIra - vantam|gOmantamiti̍ gO - mantam|rayim|naśatE|svasti||tvE iti|sviti̍|putra|śavasaḥ|avRu̍trann|kAma̍kAtaya̍ iti kAma# - kAtayaḥ||na|tvAm|indra|atIti|ricyatE||uktha^^u̍ktha̍ ityukthE - ukthE|sOmaḥ|indra̱m|mamAda|nIthEnI̍tha̍ iti# nIthE - nIthE|maGavAnamiti̍# maGa - vAnam|52 (50)
verses.samhita: yastvA# hRudA kIriṇA manyamAnO̍ &martyaM̍ martyO jOhavImi|jAta̍vEdO̍ yaśO# asmAsu# dhEhi prajABiragnE̍ amRutatvamaśyAM||yasmai̍ tvaṃ sukRutE# jAtavEda u lOkamagnE̍ kRuṇavaḥ̍ syOnaM|aśvinaṃq sa putriṇaM̍ vIravantaM̍ gOmantaṃ̍ rayiM naśatE̍ svasti||tvE su putra̍ śavasO&vRutran̍ kAmakAtayaḥ|na̍ tvAmindrAti# ricyatE||ukthaukthE̍ sOma indraM̍ mamAda nIthEnIthE̍ maGavAnaṃ̍ - [ ] 52

verses.padam: (Padam) sutAsaḥ||yat|Im|sabAdha̍ iti# sa - bAdhaḥ|pitara̱m|na|putrAḥ|samAnada̍kṣA̍ iti# samAna-dakṣAḥ|avasE|hava̍ntE||agnE̱|rasE̍na|tEja̍sA|jAta̍vEda̍ iti jAta# - vEdaḥ|vIti|rOcasE||rakṣOhEti̍# rakṣaḥ - hA|amIvacAtana̍ ityamIva̍ - cAtanaḥ||apaḥ|anviti̍|acAriṣam|rasE̍na|samiti̍|asRukṣmahi||paya̍svAn|agnE|Eti̍|agamam|tam|mA|samiti̍|sRuja|varca̍sA||vasu̍ḥ|vasu̍patiriti̍ vasu# - patiḥ|hika̱m|asi|agnE|viBAva̍suriti̍# viBA - vasuḥ||syAma|tE|sumatAviti̍# su-matau|api||tvAm|agnE|vasu̍patimiti̍ vasu# - patim|vasUnAm|aBi|prEti̍|mandE|53̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sutAsaḥ|yadIṃ̍# sabAdhaḥ̍ pitaraM na putrAḥ samAnada̍kṣA̍ avasE̍ havantE||agnE̍ rasEna̍ tEjasA̍ jAtavEdO̍ vi rOcasE|rakṣOhA&mI̍vacAta̍naḥ||apO̍ anvacAriṣaṃq̍ rasEna̍ samasRukṣmahi|paya̍svAṃ̍ agna A&gamaM̍ taM mA saṃ sRuja̍ varcasA||vasur̍ vasupatirq.̍ hikamasyagnE̍ viBAvasuḥ|syAma̍# tE sumatAvapi||tvAma̍gnE̍ vasupatiM̍ ~MvasUnAmaBi̍ pra mandE-[̍ ] 53

verses.padam: (Padam) addhvarEṣu|rAjann||tvayA̱|vAja̱m|vAjayanta̍ iti# vAja - yantaḥ|jayEma|aBIti̍|syAma|pRuthsutIḥ|martyA̍nAm||tvAm|agnE|vAjasAta̍mamiti̍# vAja - sAtamam|viprA̱ḥ|vardhanti|suṣṭu̍tamiti̍ su - stutam||saḥ|naḥ|rAsva|suvIryamiti# su - vIrya̱m||ayam|naḥ|agniḥ|varivaḥ|kRuṇOtU|ayam|mRudha̍ḥ|puraḥ|Etu|praBindanniti̍# pra - Bindann||ayam|śatrUn|jayatu|jaṛhRu̍ṣAṇaḥ|ayam|vAja̱m|jayatu|vAja̍sAtaviti̍ vAja-sAtau||agninA̱|agniḥ|samiti̍|iddhyatE|kaviḥ|gRuhapa̍tiriti̍# gRuha - patiḥ|yuvA̱||havyavAḍiti# havya - vAṭ|juhvA̱sya iti# juhu - Asyaḥ||tvam|hi|agnE ( )|agninA̱|vipraḥ|viprE̍ṇa|sann|satA||saKA̱|saKyA̱|samiddhyasa̍ iti# sam - iddhyasE̱||uditi|agnE|śuca̍yaḥ|tava̍|vIti̍|jyOti̍ṣA||54̍ (64) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 46 Anuvaakams : - (A dadE̍ - vAcaspatayE̍ - upayAmagRuhItO&syA-̍ vAyO̍ - ayaM ~MvAM - ~MyAva̱M - prAtaryujA# - vayaM - taM - ~MyE dEvA̍ - striṃqśa ṭṭa dupayAmagRu̍hItO&sI̍ - mUrddhAnaM - madhuścE - ndrA̱gni - OmAsO̍ - marutvanta̍ - mindra# - marutvO - marutvA̱n - mahAn - mahAnnuvat - kadA - vAma - madabdhEBi̍ rhiraṇyapAṇiṃ̍ - suśarmA - bRuhaspati# sutasya - harirasya̍ - gna# - uttiṣṭhan̍ - taraṇi - rApyAyasvE̍ - yuṣṭE yE - jyOtiṣmatIM̍ - prayAsAya# - citta - mAtiṣṭhE - ndra - masAvi̍ - sarvasya̍ - mahAnth - sajOṣA - udutyaM - dhAtO - ruṃ hi - yastvA ṣaṭcatvAriṃśat̍ ) KOrvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis : - (A dadE̍ - yE dEvA̍ - mahA - nuttiṣṭhanth - sarvasya̍ - santu durmitrA - ścatuṣpa~jcAśat|)̍ First and Last Padam of Fourth Prasnam : - (A dadE̍ - vi jyOtiṣA|)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE prathamakAṇḍE caturthaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||
verses.samhita: - vi jyOtiṣA̍ >2 vijyOtiṣA̍ bRuhatA BA̱tyagnirAvir viśvAni̍ kRuṇutE mahitvA|prAdEvIrmAyAḥ̍ sahatE-durEvAḥ̍ śiśItE̍ śRu~ggE rakṣasE̍ vinikṣE̱|(ṭś1-2-14-7) ========================= OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ|hariḥ OM||1.5 prathamakAṇḍE pa~jcamaḥ praśnaḥ -

verses.padam: (Padam) dEvAsurA iti# dEva - asurAḥ|saM~MyattA̍ iti# saM - yattAḥ|Asann|tE|dEvAḥ|vijayamiti# vi - jayam|upayanta ityupa̍ - yantaḥ|agnau|vAmam|vasu̍|sam|nIti̍|adadhata|idam|u|naḥ|Baviṣyati|yadi̍|naḥ|jEṣyanti̍|iti̍|tat|agniḥ|nIti̍|akAmayata|tEna̍|apEti̍|akrAmat|tat|dEvAḥ|vijityEti̍# vi - jitya|avaruru̍thsamAnA̍ ityava̍ - ruruthsamAnAḥ|anviti̍|Ayann|tat|asya|saha̍sA|Eti̍|adithsanta|saḥ|arOdIt|yat|arO̍dIt|tat|rudrasya̍|rudratvamiti̍# rudra - tvam|yat|aśru|aśI̍yata|tat|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvAsurAḥ saM~MyattA̍ AsantE dEvA vijayamu̍payantO̍ &gnau vAmaM ~Mvasu saM nyadadhatEdamu̍# nO Baviṣyati yadi# nO jEṣyantIti tadagnirnyakAmayata̍ tEnApA̱*krAmat taddEvA vijityA*varuru̍thsamAnA̍ anvAyan̍ tadasya̍ sahasA&&*dithsanta̍ sO# &rOdIdyadarOdIt̍ tad rudrasya# rudratvaM ~MyadaśvraśIyata̍ tad- [ ] 1

verses.padam: (Padam) rajatam|hiraṇyam|aBavat|tasmA̱t|rajatam|hira̍ṇyam|adakṣiṇyam|aśrujamitya̍śru̍ - jam|hi|yaḥ|barqḥiṣi|dadA̍ti|purA|asya|saM~MvathsarAditi̍# saM - vathsarAt|gRuhE|rudanti|tasmA̱t|barqḥiṣi|na|dEya̱m|saḥ|agniḥ|abravIt|BAgI|asAni|atha̍|vaḥ|idam|iti̍|punarAdhEyamiti̍# punaḥ - AdhEya̱m|tE|kEvalam|iti̍|abruvann|Ruddhnava̍t|Kalu̍|saḥ|iti̍|abravIt|yaḥ|maddEvatya̍miti̍# mat - dEvatya̱m|agnim|AdadhAtA̍ ityA̱ - dadhAtai|iti̍|tam|pUṣA|Eti̍|adhatta|tEna̍|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: rajataṃ̍ hiraṇyamaBavat̍ tasmA̱d rajataṃ hiraṇya-madakṣiṇya-ma̍śrujaṃ̍ hi yO barqḥiṣi dadAti̍ purA&sya# saM~MvathsarAd gRuhE rudanti̍ tasmA̱d baṛqhiṣi na dEyaṃq sO̱&gnirabravId̍ BAgyasAnyatha̍# va idamiti# punarAdhEyaM̍ tE kEvalamitya̍bruvan̍ nRuddhnavat Kalu sa ityabravIdyO̍ maddEvatya̍-magni-mAdadhA̍tA̍ iti taM pUṣA&&dhatta̍ tEna# - [ ] 2

verses.padam: (Padam) pUṣA|ArddhnOt|tasmA̱t|pauṣṇAḥ|paśavaḥ|ucyantE|tam|tvaṣṭA̱|Eti̍|adhatta|tEna̍|tvaṣṭA̱|ArddhnOt|tasmA̱t|tvAṣṭrAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|ucyantE|tam|manu̍ḥ|Eti̍|adhatta|tEna̍|manu̍ḥ|ArddhnOt|tasmA̱t|mAnavya̍ḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|ucyantE|tam|dhAtA|Eti|adhatta|tEna̍|dhAtA|ArddhnOt|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|vai|dhAtA|tasmA̱t|saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM-vathsaram|prajA iti# pra-jAḥ|paśavaḥ|anu̍|prEti̍|jAyantE|yaḥ|Evam|punarAdhEyasyEti̍# punaḥ - AdhEyasya|Ruddhi̱m|vEda̍|3̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pUṣA&&rddhnOt tasmA̱t pauṣṇAḥ paśava# ucyantE taM tvaṣṭA&&dhatta̍ tEna tvaṣṭA̱&&rddhnOt tasmA̱t tvAṣṭrAḥ paśava# ucyantE taM manurA&dhatta̍ tEna manurArddhnOt̍ tasmA̱nmAnavyaḥ̍ prajA ucyantE̍ taM dhAtA&&*dhatta̍ tEna# dhAtA&&*rddhnO̱th saM~MvathsarO vai dhAtA tasmA̱th saM~MvathsaraM prajAḥ paśavO&nu pra jAyantE̍ ya EvaM punarAdhEyasyarddhiM̍ ~MvEda- [ ] 3

verses.padam: (Padam) RuddhnOti|Eva|yaḥ|asya|Evam|bandhutA̱m|vEda̍|bandhu̍mAniti̍ bandhu# - mAn|Bavati|BAgadhEyamiti# BAga -dhEya̱m|vai|agniḥ|Ahita̍ ityA - hitaḥ|icCamAnaḥ|prajAmiti̍# pra-jAm|paśUn|yajamAnasya|upEti̍|dOdrAva|udvAsyEtyu̍t̍ - vAsya|puna̍ḥ|Eti̍|dadhIta|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|Eva|Enam|samiti̍|ardhayati|athO̍ iti|śAnti̍ḥ|Eva|asya|EṣA|puna̍rvasvOriti̍ punaḥ̍ - vasvOḥ|Eti|dadhIta|Etat|vai|punarAdhEyasyEti̍# punaḥ - AdhEyasya|nakṣa̍tram|yat|puna̍rvasU̍ iti punaḥ̍ - vasU|svAyA̱m|Eva|Enam|dEvatAyAm|AdhAyEtyA̱̍ - dhAya|brahmavarcasIti̍# brahma - varcasI|Bavati|darBaiḥ ( )|Eti|dadhAti|ayA̍tayAmatvAyEtyayA̍tayAma̍ - tvAya|darBaiḥ|Eti|dadhAti|adBya̍ ityat̍ - Byaḥ|Eva|Enam|OṣadhIBya̍ ityOṣadhi-Byaḥ|avaruddhyEtya̍va̍ - ruddhya|Eti̍|dhattE|pa~jca̍kapAla̍ iti pa~jca# - kapAlaḥ|purOḍAśaḥ|Bavati|pa~jca̍|vai|Rutava̍ḥ|RutuBya̍ ityRutu - Byaḥ|Eva|Enam|avaruddhyEtyava̍ - ruddhya|Eti̍|dhattE||4̍ (75) (aśIyata̍ tat- tEna-vEda-̍ darBaiḥ pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A1)
verses.samhita: rddhnOtyEva yO̱&syaivaM bandhutAM ~MvEda bandhumAn̍ Bavati BAgadhEyaM ~MvA agnirAhita̍ icCamAnaḥ̍ prajAM paśUn yajamAnasyOpa̍# dOdrAvOdvAsya punarA dadhIta̍ BAgadhEyEnaivainaṃq̍ samarddhayatyathO̍ śAntirEvAsyaiṣA̍ punarvasvOrA̍ dadhItaitadvai̍ punarAdhEya̍sya̍ nakṣatraM̍ ~Myat punarvasU̍ svAyAmEvaina̍M̍ dEvatAyAmAdhAya̍# brahmavarcasI Bavati̍ darBai ( ) rA dadhAtyayA̍tayAmatvAya̍ darBairA dadhAtyadBya̍ EvainamOṣadhIByO̍ &varuddhyA &&*dhattE̍ pa~jcakapAlaḥ̍ purOḍAśO# Bavati pa~jca vA Rutava# RutuBya# EvainamavaruddhyA̍ &&*dhattE||4̍ (aśIyata̍ tat- tEna-vEda-̍ darBaiḥ pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) parEti|vai|Eṣaḥ|yajñam|paśUn|vapati|yaḥ|agnim|udvAsaya̍ta̍ ityut̍ - vAsayatE|pa~jca̍kapAla̍ iti pa~jca# - kapAlaḥ|purOḍAśaḥ|Bavati|pA~gkta̍ḥ|yajñaḥ|pA~gktA̱ḥ|paśava̍ḥ|yajñam|Eva|paśUn|avEti̍|rundhE|vIrahEti̍# vIra - hA|vai|Eṣaḥ|dEvAnA̱m|yaḥ|agnim|udvAsayata̍ ityut̍ - vAsayatE|na|vai|Etasya̍|brAhmaṇAḥ|RutAyava̍ ityRuta-yava̍ḥ|purA|anna̱m|akṣann|pa~gktya̍ḥ|yAjyAnuvAkyA̍# iti# yAjyA - anuvAkyA̱ḥ|Bavanti|pA~gktaḥ|yajñaḥ|pA~gkta̍ḥ|puru̍ṣaḥ|dEvAn|Eva|vIram|niravadAyEti̍# niḥ - avadAya|agnim|puna̍ḥ|Eti̍|5̍ (50)
verses.samhita: parA vA Eṣa yajñaM paśUn vapati̍ yO̱&gnimudvAsaya̍tE̍ pa~jcakapAlaḥ̍ purOḍAśO# Bavati pA~gktO# yajñaḥ pA~gktA̱ḥ paśavO# yajñamEva paśUnava# rundhE vIrahA vA Eṣa dEvAnAM ~MyO̱&gnimudvAsaya̍tE̍ na vA Etasya# brAhmaṇA RutAyava̍ḥ̍ purA&nnamakṣan̍ pa~gktyO# yAjyAnuvAkyA# Bavanti pA~gktO# yajñaḥ pA~gktaḥ puruṣO̍ dEvAnEva vIraM niravadAyAgniM̍ punarA - [ ] 5

verses.padam: (Padam) dhattE|śatAkṣarA̍ iti# śata - akṣarAḥ|Bavanti|śatAyuriti# śata - Ayuḥ|puruṣaḥ|śatEndri̍ya̍ iti# śata - indriyaḥ|Ayuṣi|Eva|indriyE|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|yat|vai|agniḥ|Ahi̍ta̍ ityA - hitaḥ|na|RuddhyatE̱|jyAyaḥ|BAgadhEyamiti̍# BAga - dhEya̱m|nikAmayamAna̍ iti# ni - kAmayamAnaḥ|yat|AgnEyam|sarva̱m|Bava̍ti|sA|Eva|asya|Ruddhi̍ḥ|samiti̍|vai|Etasya̍|gRuhE|vAk|sRujyatE|yaḥ|agnim|udvAsaya̍ta̍ ityut̍ - vAsayatE|saḥ|vAca̱m|saṃsRu̍ṣṭAmiti̍ saM - sRuṣṭAm|yajamAnaḥ|Iśvaraḥ|anviti̍|parA̍BavitOriti̍ parA̱ - BavitOḥ|viBaktaya̍ iti vi - Baktayaḥ|Bavanti|vAcaḥ|vidhRutyA̍ iti vi - dhRutyai|yajamAnasya|apa̍rABAvAyEtyapa̍rA̍ - BAvAya|6 (50)
verses.samhita: dhattE̍ śatAkṣarA̍ Bavanti śatAyuḥ puruṣaḥ̍ śatEndriya̍ AyuṣyEvEndriyE̍ prati# tiṣṭhati yadvA agnirAhitO̍ narddhyatE jyAyO# BAgadhEyaM̍ nikAmayamAnO̍ yadA̱gnEyaṃ sarvaM Bavati̍ saivAsyarddhiḥ saM ~MvA Etasya# gRuhE vAk sRujyatE̍ yO̱&gnimudvAsaya̍tE̍ sa vAcaṃq saṃsRuṣṭAM̍ ~MyajamAna̍ IśvarO&nu parABavitOr̍ viBaktayO̍ Bavanti vAcO vidhRutyai̍ yajamAnasyApa̍rABAvAya̍ - [ ] 6

verses.padam: (Padam) viBaktimiti̍ vi - Baktim|karOti|brahma|Eva|tat|akaḥ|upAṅqśvityu̍pa-aṃqśu|yajati|yathA̱|vAmam|vasu̍|vividAnaḥ|gUha̍ti|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|agnim|pratIti̍|sviṣṭakRutamiti̍# sviṣṭa- kRuta̱m|niriti|Aha|yathA̱|vAmam|vasu̍|vividAnaḥ|prakAśamiti̍# pra - kAśam|jigamiṣati|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|viBa̍ktimiti̍ vi - Baktim|uktvA|prayAjEnEti# pra - yAjEna|vaṣa̍ṭ|karOti|Ayata̍nAdityA̱̍ - yatanAt|Eva|na|Eti|yaja̍mAnaḥ|vai|purOḍAśa̍ḥ|paśava̍ḥ|EtE̍ iti|Ahu̍tI̍ ityA - hutI|yat|aBitaḥ|purOḍAśa̱m|EtE̍ iti|Ahu̍tI̍ ityA - hutI|7 (50)
verses.samhita: viBaktiM̍ karOti brahmaiva tadakarupAṃqśu̍ yajati̍ yathA# vAmaM ~Mvasu# vividAnO gUhati̍ tAdRugEva tadagniM prati# sviṣṭakRutaM nirAha̍ yathA# vAmaM ~Mvasu# vividAnaḥ prakAśaM̍ jigamiṣati̍ tAdRugEva tadviBaktimuktvA̍ prayAjEna̍ vaṣaṭkarOtyAyata̍nAdEva̍ naiti yajamAnO̍ vai purOḍAśa̍ḥ̍ paśava# EtE AhutI̍ yadaBitaḥ̍ purOḍAśamEtE̍ AhutI̍ - [ ] 7

verses.padam: (Padam) juhOti|yaja̍mAnam|Eva|uBayata̍ḥ|paśuBiriti̍# paśu - Biḥ|parIti|gRuhṇAti|kRutaya̍juriti̍# kRuta - yajuḥ|saMBRutasaMBAra̍ iti saMBRuta̍ - saBAMqraḥ|iti|Ahuḥ|na|saBRuMtyA̍ iti# saM - BRutyA̱ḥ|saMBArA iti# saM-BArAḥ|na|yajuḥ|kartavya̱m|iti̍|athA̍ iti|Kalu̍|saBRuMtyA̍ iti# saM - BRutyA̱ḥ|Eva|saBAMqrA iti# saM-BArAḥ|kartavya̱m|yajuḥ|yajñasya̍|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|punarniṣkRuta iti punaḥ̍ - niṣkRutaḥ|rathaḥ|dakṣi̍ṇA|punaruthsyUtamiti̍# punaḥ - uthsyUtam|vAsaḥ|punaruthsRuṣṭa̍ iti# punaḥ - uthsRuṣṭaḥ|anaḍvAn|punarAdhEyasyEti# punaḥ - AdhEyasya|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|sapta|tE|agnE|samidha iti# saM - idhaḥ|sapta|jihvAḥ|iti̍|agnihOtramitya̍gni̍ - hOtram|juhOti|yatrayatrEti̍ yatra-yatra|Eva|asya|nya̍ktamiti̍ ni - aktam|tataḥ|8̍ (50)
verses.samhita: juhOti yajamAnamEvOBayata̍ḥ̍ paśuBiḥ pari# gRuhṇAti kRutayajuḥ̍ saMBRutasaMBAra̍ ityAhurna̍ saMBRutyA̱ḥ saMBArA na yajuḥ̍ kartavyamityathO̍ Kalu# saMBRutyA# Eva saMBArAḥ̍ kartavya̍M̍ ~Myajur̍ yajñasya samRuddhyai̍ punarniṣkRutO rathO dakṣiṇA̍ punaruthsyUtaM ~MvAsaḥ̍ punaruthsRuṣṭO&naḍvAn̍ punarAdhEya̍sya̍ samRuddhyai̍ sapta tE# agnE samidhaḥ̍ sapta jihvA ityagnihOtraM̍ juhOti̍ yatrayatraivAsya̍ nyaktaM̍ tata# - [ ] 8

verses.padam: (Padam) Eva|Enam|avEti|rundhE|vIrahEti̍# vIra - hA|vai|Eṣaḥ|dEvAnA̱m|yaḥ|agnim|udvAsayata̍ ityut̍ - vAsayatE|tasya̍|varu̍ṇaḥ|Eva|RuṇayAdityRu̍ṇa̍ - yAt|AgnivAruṇamityA̱gni - vAruṇam|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|anu|niriti̍|vapEt|yam|ca|Eva|hanti̍|yaḥ|ca|asya|RuṇayAdityRu̍ṇa̍ - yAt|tau|BAgadhEyEnEti# BAga - dhEyEna|prIṇAti|na|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCati|yaja̍mAnaḥ||9̍ (36) (A-&parABAvAya-purOḍAśa̍mEtE-Ahu̍tI-tataḥ-ṣaṭtriṃ̍śacca)(A2)̍
verses.samhita: Evainamava# rundhE vIrahA vA Eṣa dEvAnAM ~MyO̱&gnimudvAsaya̍tE̍ tasya varuṇa̍ EvarṇayAdA̱gnivAruṇa-mEkAdaśakapAlamanu̍ nirvapEdyaM̍ caiva hanti yaścA̱syarṇayAttau BAgadhEyE̍na̍ prIṇAti nA&&rtimArcCati̍ yajamAnaḥ||9̍ (A-&parABAvAya-purOḍAśa̍mEtE-Ahu̍tI-tataḥ̍ -ṣaṭatriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) BUmiḥ|BUmnA|dyauḥ|variṇA|antari̍kṣam|mahitvEti̍# mahi-tvA||upastha ityupa - sthE|tE|dEvi|aditE|agnim|annAdamityanna̍ - adam|annAdyAyEtyanna̍ - adyAya|Eti̍|dadhE||Eti̍|ayam|gauḥ|pRuśni̍ḥ|akramIt|asa̍nat|mAtara̱m|puna̍ḥ||pitara̱m|ca|prayanniti̍# pra - yann|suvaḥ||triṃqśat|dhAma̍|vIti̍|rAjati|vAk|pata~ggAya̍|śiśriyE||pratIti̍|asya|vaha|dyuBiriti̍ dyu - Biḥ|asya|prAṇAditi# pra - anAt|apAnatItyapa̍ - anatI|antaḥ|carati|rOcanA||vIti|aKyat|mahiṣaḥ|suva̍ḥ||yat|tvA|10̍ (50)
verses.samhita: BUmir̍ BUmnA dyaur variṇA&ntari̍kṣaM̍ mahitvA|upasthE# tE dEvyaditE &gnimannAdamannAdyAyA̍ &&dadhE||A&yaM̍ gauḥ pRuś~jirakramIdasa̍nan̍ mAtaraM punaḥ|pitara̍M̍ ca prayanth suvaḥ||triṃqśaddhAma̍ vi rAjati̍ vAk pata~ggAya̍# śiśriyE|pratyasya̍ vaha dyuBiḥ||asya̍ prAṇAdapAnatya̍ntaśca̍rati̍ rOcanA|vyaKyan̍ mahiṣaḥ suvaḥ||yattvA̱-[̍ ] 10

verses.padam: (Padam) kruddhaḥ|parOvapEti# parA - upava|manyunA̱|yat|ava̍rtyA||sukalpamiti̍# su - kalpa̱m|agnE|tat|tava|puna̍ḥ|tvA|uditi̍|dIpayAmasi||yat|tE|manyupa̍rOptasyEti̍# manyu-parOptasya|pRuthivIm|anviti|daddhvasE||AdityAḥ|viśvE̱|tat|dEvAḥ|vasa̍vaḥ|ca|samABa̍ranniti̍# saM - ABarann||mana̍ḥ|jyOti̍ḥ|juṣatAm|Ajya̱m|vicCi̍nnamiti̍ vi - Cinnam|yajñam|samiti|imam|dadhAtu||bRuhaspati̍ḥ|tanutAm|imam|naḥ|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|iha|mAdayantAm||sapta|tE|agnE|samidha̍ iti# saM - idhaḥ|sapta|jihvAḥ|sapta|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kruddhaḥ parOvapa̍# manyunA yadavartyA|sukalpa̍magnE̍ tattava punastvOddIpayAmasi||yattE̍# manyuparOptasya̍ pRuthivImanu# daddhvasE|AdityA viśvE taddEvA vasavaśca̍ samABarann||manO̍ jyOtir̍ juṣatAmAjyaM ~MvicCinnaM̍ ~Myajñaṃ samimaM dadhAtu|bRuhaspati̍stanutAmimaM̍ nO viśvE# dEvA iha mAdayantAM||sapta̍ tE# agnE samidhaḥ̍ sapta jihvAḥ sapta - [ ] 11

verses.padam: (Padam) Ruṣayaḥ|sapta|dhAma̍|priyAṇi̍||sapta|hOtrA̱ḥ|saptadhEti̍# sapta - dhA|tvA|yajanti|sapta|yOnI̱ḥ|Eti|pRuṇasva|GRutEna̍||puna̍ḥ|UrjA|nIti̍|vartasva|puna̍ḥ|agnE|iṣA|Ayu̍ṣA||puna̍ḥ|naḥ|pAhi|viśvata̍ḥ||saha|rayyA|nIti̍|vartasva|agnE̱|pinva̍sva|dhAra̍yA||viśvaP^^sniyEti̍# viśva - P^^sniyA|viśvataḥ|pari̍||lEka̍ḥ|salE̍ka̍ iti sa - lEkaḥ|sulEka iti# su - lEkaḥ|tE|naḥ|AdityAḥ|Ajya̱m|juṣAṇAḥ|viyantu|kEta̍ḥ|sakE̍ta̍ iti sa - kEtaḥ|sukEta iti# su - kEtaḥ|tE|naḥ̍ ( )|AdityAḥ|Ajya̱m|juṣAṇAḥ|viyantu|vivasvAn|adi̍tiḥ|dEva̍jUtiriti̍ dEva# - jUtiḥ|tE|naḥ|AdityAḥ|Ajya̱m|juṣAṇAḥ|viyantu||12 (63)
verses.samhita: ṛṣayaḥ̍ sapta dhAma# priyAṇi|sapta̍ hOtrA̱ḥ saptadhA tvA# yajanti sapta yOnIrA pRuṇasvA̍ GRutEna||puna̍rUrjA̍ ni vartasva̍ punaragna̍ iṣA&&*yuṣA|puna̍rnaḥ̍ pAhi viśvataḥ||saha̍ rayyA ni vartasvAgnE̍ pinvasva̍ dhArayA|viśvaPsni̍yA̍ viśvataspari||lEkaḥ̍ salEkaḥ̍ sulEkastE na# AdityA AjyaM̍ juṣAṇA viyantu̍ kEtaḥ sakEtaḥ̍ sukEtastE na# ( ) AdityA AjyaM̍ juṣAṇA viyantu̍ vivasvAṃq̍ aditir̍ dEvajUtistE̍ na# AdityA AjyaM̍ juṣAṇA viyantu||12̍

verses.padam: (Padam) BUmiḥ|BUmnA|dyauḥ|variṇA|iti̍|Aha|AśiṣEtyA̱̍ - śiṣA̱|Eva|Enam|Eti|dhattE|sarpAḥ|vai|jIrya̍ntaḥ|amanyanta|saḥ|Etam|kasarṇIra̍ḥ|kAdravEyaḥ|mantra̱m|apaśyat|tata̍ḥ|vai|tE|jIrṇAḥ|tanUḥ|apEti̍|aGnata|sarparAjñiyA̍ iti# sarpa -rAjñiyA̱ḥ|RugBirityRuk̍ - Biḥ|gAṛhapatyamiti̍ gAṛha# - patyam|Eti|dadhAti|punarnavamiti̍# punaḥ- navam|Eva|Enam|ajara̱m|kRutvA|Eti|dhattE|athO̍ iti|pUtam|Eva|pRuthivIm|annAdyamitya̍nna̍ - adya̱m|na|upEti|anamat|sA|Etam|13̍ (50)
verses.samhita: BUmir̍ BUmnA dyaur variṇEtyA̍hA&&śiṣaivainamA̍ dhattE̍ sarpA vai jIryantO̍ &manyanta sa EtaM kasarṇIra̍ḥ̍ kAdravEyO mantramapaśyat̍ tatO vai tE jIrṇAstanUrapA̱Gnata sarparAjñiyA# RugBir gAṛhapatyamA̍ dadhAti̍ punarnavamEvainamajara̍M̍ kRutvA &&*dhattE&thO# pUtamEva pRuthivImannAdyaM̍ nOpAnamathsaitaM̍ - [ ] 13

verses.padam: (Padam) mantra̱m|apaśyat|tataḥ|vai|tAm|annAdyamitya̍nna̍ - adya̱m|upEti|anamat|yat|sarparAjñiyA̍ iti# sarpa -rAjñiyA̱ḥ|RugBirityRuk̍ - Biḥ|gAṛhapatyamiti̍ gAṛha# - patyam|AdadhAtItyA̱ - dadhAti|annAdyasyEtya̍nna̍ - adyasya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|athO iti|asyAm|Eva|Enam|prati̍ṣṭhitamiti̍ prati# - sthitam|Eti|dhattE|yat|tvA|kruddhaḥ|parOvapEti̍# parA - uvapa|iti̍|Aha|apEti̍|hnutE|Eva|asmai|tat|puna̍ḥ|tvA|uditi̍|dIpayAmasi|iti̍|Aha|samiti̍|indhE|Eva|Enam|yat|tE|manyupa̍rOptasyEti̍# manyu - parOptasya|iti|Aha|dEvatA̍Biḥ|Eva|14̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mantramapaśyat̍ tatO vai tAmannAdya-mupAnamadyath̍ -sarparAjñiyA̍# RugBir gAṛhapatya-̍ mAdadhA̱tyannAdyasyAvaruddhyA̍ athO# asyAmEvainaM pratiṣṭhitamA̍ dhattE̍ yattvA̱ kruddhaḥ parOvapEtyAhApa̍hnuta̍ EvAsmai tat punastvOddIpayAmasItyA̍ha̍ samindha̍ EvainaM ~MyattE# manyuparOptasyEtyA̍ha̍ dEvatABirEvai̍ - [ ] 14

verses.padam: (Padam) Enam|samiti|Barati|vIti̍|vai|Etasya̍|yajñaḥ|CidyatE|yaḥ|agnim|udvAsaya̍ta̍ ityut̍ - vAsayatE|bRuhaspati̍vatyEtiq̍ bRuhaspati# - vatya|RucA|upEti|tiṣṭhatE|brahma̍|vai|dEvAnA̱m|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|brahma̍ṇA|Eva|yajñam|samiti̍|dadhAti|vacCi̍nnamiti̍ vi-Cinnam|yajñam|samiti|imam|dadhAtu|iti̍|Aha|saMta̍tyA̍ iti saM - tatyai|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|iha|mAdayantAm|iti|Aha|santatyEti̍# saM - tatya|Eva|yajñam|dEvEBya̍ḥ|anviti̍|diśati|sapta|tE|agnE|samidha̍ iti# saM - idhaḥ|sapta|jihvAḥ|15̍ (50)
verses.samhita: naṃq saM Barati̍ vi vA Etasya# yajñaśCidyatE̍ yO̱&gnimudvAsaya̍tE̍ bRuhaspativatyarcOpa̍# tiṣṭhatE brahma vai dEvAnAM bRuhaspatir brahmaṇaiva̍ yajñaṃ saM dadhAti̍ vicCinnaM̍ ~Myajñaṃ samimaM dadhAtvityA̍ha̍ santatyai̍ viśvE# dEvA iha mAdayantAmityA̍ha̍ santatyaiva yajñaM dEvEByO&nu# diśati sapta tE# agnE samidhaḥ̍ sapta jihvA - [ ] 15

verses.padam: (Padam) iti|Aha|saptasaptEti̍# sapta - sapta|vai|saptadhEti# sapta - dhA|agnEḥ|priyAḥ|tanuvaḥ|tAḥ|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|puna̍ḥ|UrjA|saha|rayyA|iti̍|aBita̍ḥ|purOḍAśa̱m|Ahu̍tI̍ ityA - hutI|juhOti|yajamAnam|Eva|UrjA|ca|rayyA|ca|uBayata̍ḥ|parIti̍|gRuhṇAti|AdityAḥ|vai|asmAt|lOkAt|amum|lOkam|Ayann|tE|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|vIti̍|atRuṣyann|tE|imam|lOkam|puna̍ḥ|aByavEtyEtya̍Bi̍ - avEtya|agnim|AdhAyEtyA̱̍ - dhAya|EtAn̍ ()|hOmAn|ajuhavuḥ|tE|Arddhnuvann|tE|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Ayann|yaḥ|parAcIna̱m|punarAdhEyAditi# punaḥ - AdhEyA̱t|agnim|AdadhItEtyA̱- dadhIta|saḥ|EtAn|hOmAn̍|juhuyAt|yAm|Eva|AdityAḥ|Ruddhi̱m|Arddhnu̍vann|tAm|Eva|RuddhnOti||16̍ (75) (saitaM-dEvatABirEva-jihvA-EtAn-pa~jca̍viṃśatiśca̍ )(A4)
verses.samhita: ityAha̍ saptasapta̍ vai saptadhA&gnEḥ̍ priyAstanuvastA EvAva# rundhE punarUrjA̍ saha rayyEtyaBitaḥ̍ purOḍAśamAhutI̍ juhOti yajamAnamEvOrjA̍ ca# rayyA cOBayataḥ̍ pari# gRuhṇAtyAdityA vA asmAllOkAdamuM ~MlOkamAyaqn̍ tE&muṣmi̍n̍ ~MlOkE vyatRuṣyan̍ ta imaM ~MlOkaM punaraByavEtyA̍ &gnimAdhAyai-tAn. ( ) hOmAnajuhavusta̍ A̱rddhnuvaqn tE suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyanq.̍ yaḥ parAcIna̍M̍ punarAdhEyAdagnimAdadhI̍ta̍ sa EtAn. hOmA̱n juhuyAdyAmEvA&&*dityA RuddhimArddhnuvan̍ tAmEvarddhnOti||16̍

verses.padam: (Padam) upaprayanta ityupa̍ - prayantaḥ|addhvaram|mantra̱m|vOcEma|agnayE̱||ArE|asmE̍ iti|ca|śRuṇvatE||asya|pratnAm|anviti̍|dyuta̱m|śukram|duduhrE|ahra̍yaḥ||paya̍ḥ|sahasrasAmiti̍# sahasra - sAm|Ruṣi̱m||agniḥ|mUrdhA|divaḥ|kakut|patiḥ|pRuthivyAḥ|ayam||apAm|rEtAṃ̍si|jinvati||ayam|iha|prathamaḥ|dhAyi|dhAtRuBiriti̍# dhAtRu - Biḥ|hOtA̱|yajiṣṭhaḥ|addhvarEṣu̍|Iḍya̍ḥ||yam|apna̍vAnaḥ|BRuga̍vaḥ|virurucuriti̍# vi - rurucuḥ|vanEṣu|citram|viBuvamiti̍# vi - Buva̱m|viśEviśa̍ iti# viśE - viśE||uBA|vAm|indrAgnI itI̱ndra - agnI|Ahuvaddhyai̱|17 (50)
verses.samhita: upaprayantO# addhvaraM mantraM̍ ~MvOcEmAgnayE̱|ArE asmE ca# śRuṇvatE||asya pratnAmanu dyutaṃ# śukraM duduhrE̍ ahrayaḥ|paya̍ḥ̍ sahasrasAmRuṣi̱M||agnir mUrddhA divaḥ kakutpatiḥ̍ pRuthivyA ayaM|apAṃ rEtAṃsi̍ jinvati||ayamiha prathamO̍ dhAyi̍ dhAtRuBirq. hOtA yajiṣṭhO̍ adhvarEṣvIḍyaḥ||yamapna̍vAnO̍ BRugavO̍ virurucurvanEṣu̍ citraM ~MviBuvaM̍ ~MviśEviśE||uBA̍ vAmindrAgnI̍ AhuvaddhyA# - [ ] 17

verses.padam: (Padam) uBA|rAdhasaḥ|saha|mAdayaddhyai̱||uBA|dAtArau̱|iṣAm|rayIṇAm|uBA|vAja̍sya|sAtayE̱|huvE|vAm||ayam|tE|yOni̍ḥ|Rutviya̍ḥ|yata̍ḥ|jAtaḥ|arO̍cathAḥ||tam|jAnann|agnE|Eti̍|rOha|atha̍|naḥ|varddhaya|rayim||agnE̱|AyUṃ̍ṣi|pavasE|Eti̍|suva|Urja̱m|iṣa̱m|ca|naḥ||ArE|bAdhasva|ducCunA̱m||agnE̱|pava̍sva|svapA̍ iti# su - apA̱ḥ|asmE iti|varca̍ḥ|suvIryamiti̍# su - vIrya̱m||dadhat|pOṣa̱m|rayim|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: uBA rAdhasaḥ̍ saha mAdayaddhyai̱|uBA̍ dAtArAviṣAṃ̍ rayIṇAmuBA̍ vAjasya̍ sAtayE# huvE vAM||ayaM tE yOniṛ̍ RutviyO yatO# jAtO arOcathAḥ|taM̍ jAnannagna̍ A rOhAthA# nO varddhayA rayiM||agna AyUṃṣi̍ pavasa A suvOrjamiṣaM̍ ca naḥ|ArE bAdhasva̍ ducCunA̱M||agnE pavasva̍ svapA# asmE varcaḥ̍ suvIrya̱M|dadhatpOṣaṃ# rayiM - [ ] 18

verses.padam: (Padam) mayi||agnE̱|pAvaka|rOciṣA̱|mandrayA̱|dEva|jihvayA̱||Eti̍|dEvAn|vakṣi|yakṣi̍|ca||saḥ|naḥ|pAvaka|dIdivaḥ|agnE̱|dEvAn|iha|Eti̍|vaha||upEti̍|yajñam|haviḥ|ca|naḥ||agniḥ|śuci̍vratatama̍ iti śucivrata̍ - tamaḥ|śuciḥ|vipra̍ḥ|śuci̍ḥ|kaviḥ||śuci̍ḥ|rOcatE|Ahu̍ta̍ ityA - hutaḥ||uditi|agnE|śuca̍yaḥ|tava̍|śukrAḥ|BrAja̍ntaḥ|IratE||tava̍|jyOtIṃ̍ṣi|arcaya̍ḥ||AyurdA̍ ityAyuḥ̍ - dAḥ|agnE|asi|Ayuḥ|ma|19̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mayi||agnE̍# pAvaka rOciṣA# mandrayA# dEva jihvayA̱|A dEvAn. vakṣi̍ yakṣi# ca||sa naḥ̍ pAvaka dIdivO&gnE# dEvAṃ ihA &&*vaha|upa̍# yajñaṃ haviśca# naḥ||agniḥ śucivratatamaḥ̍ śucir vipraḥ śuciḥ̍ kaviḥ|śucI# rOcata Ahutaḥ||uda̍gnE̍ śucayastava̍# śukrA BrAjanta̍ IratE|tava jyOtIṅṣyarcaya̍ḥ||AyurdA̍ agnE&syAyu̍rmE̍ - [ ] 19

verses.padam: (Padam) dEhi|varcOdA iti# varcaḥ- dAḥ|agnE|asi|varcaḥ|mE|dEhi|tanUpA̍ iti# tanU - pAḥ|agnE|asi|tanuva̱m|mE|pAhi|agnE̱|yat|mE|tanuvA̱ḥ|Unam|tat|mE|Eti|pRuṇa|citrA̍vasO̍ iti citra# - vasO|svasti|tE|pAram|aśIya|indhAnAḥ|tvA|śatam|himA̱ḥ|dyumanta̍ iti# dyu- mantaḥ|samiti̍|idhImahi|vaya̍svantaḥ|vayaskRutamiti̍# vayaḥ-kRuta̱m|yaśasvantaḥ|yaśaskRutamiti̍# yaśaḥ - kRuta̱m|suvIrAsa̍ iti su - vIrAsaḥ|adA̱Byam||agnE̱|sapatnadaMBa̍namiti̍# sapatna - daMBanam|vaṛṣi̍ṣṭhE|adhIti̍|nAkE̱||samiti̍|tvam|agnE|sUrya̍sya|varca̍sA̍ ( )|agathAḥ|samiti|RuṣI̍ṇAm|stutEna̍|samiti̍|priyEṇa̍|dhAmnA̱||tvam|agnE|sUrya̍varcA̍ iti sUrya# - varcAḥ|asi|samiti|mAm|Ayu̍ṣA|varca̍sA|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|sRuja||20 (67) (Ahuvaddhyai-pOṣaṃ# rayiM-mE-varcasA-sapta̍ daśa̍ ca )(A5)
verses.samhita: dEhi varcOdA agnE&si̍ varcO# mE dEhi tanUpA agnE&si̍ tanuvaM̍ mE pAhyagnE yanmE# tanuvA# UnaM tanma A pRuṇa̍ citrAvasO̍ svasti tE# pAramaśIyEndhA̍nAstvA̍ śataṃ himA̱ dyumantaḥ samidhImahi̍ vayasvantO̍ vayaskRutaM ~MyaśasvantO̍ yaśaskRutaṃ# suvIrAsO̍ adA̱ByaM|agnE# sapatnadaMBanaM̍ ~MvaṛṣiṣṭhE̍ adhi nAkE̱||saM tvamagnE̍ sUryasya̍ varcasA̍ ( ) &gathAḥ samRuṣIṇAṅ̍ stutEna saM priyEṇa dhAmnA̱|tvamagnE̍ sUryavarcA̍ asi saM mAmAyuṣA̍ varcasA̍ prajayA# sRuja||20

verses.padam: (Padam) samiti|paśyAmi|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|aham|iḍaprajasa̍ itIḍa# - prajasaḥ|mAnavIḥ||sarvA̱ḥ|Bavantu|naḥ|gRuhE||aBaMḥ|stha|amBa̍ḥ|vaḥ|BakṣIya|maha̍ḥ|stha|maha̍ḥ|vaḥ|BakṣIya|saha̍ḥ|stha|saha̍ḥ|vaḥ|BakṣIya|Urja̍ḥ|stha|Urja̱m|vaḥ|BakṣIya|rEva̍tIḥ|rama̍ddhvam|asminn|lOkE|asminn|gOṣṭha̍ iti# gO-sthE|asminn|kṣayE̱|asminn|yOnau̱|iha|Eva|sta|itaḥ|mA|apEti|gAta|bahvIḥ|mE|BUyAsta|21̍ (50)
verses.samhita: saM paśyAmi̍ prajA aha-miḍaprajasO̍ mAnavIḥ|sarvA# Bavantu nO gRuhE|aMBaḥ sthAMBO# vO BakṣIya mahaḥ̍ stha mahO# vO BakṣIya sahaḥ̍ stha sahO# vO BakṣIyOrjaḥ sthOrjaM̍ ~MvO BakṣIya rEvatI̍ ramaddhva-masmin̍ ~MlOkE̱&smin gOṣṭhE̱&smin kṣayE&smin yOnAvihaiva̍ stEtO mA&pa# gAta bahvIrmE# BUyAsta - [ ] 21

verses.padam: (Padam) saṃqhitEti# saM - hitA|asi|viśvarUpIriti# viśva - rUpIḥ|Eti|mA|UrjA|viśa|Eti̍|gaupatyEna̍|Eti̍|rAyaḥ|pOṣE̍ṇa|sahasrapOṣamiti̍# sahasra - pOṣam|vaḥ|puṣyAsam|mayi|vaḥ|rAya̍ḥ|śrayantAm||upEti̍|tvA|agnE|divEdi̍va̍ iti# divE-divE|dOṣAvastariti̍ dOṣA̱-vastaḥ|dhiyA|vayam||namaḥ|Bara̍ntaḥ|Eti̍|imasi||rAja̍ntam|addhvarAṇA̱m|gOpAmiti̍# gO - pAm|Rutasya|dIdi̍vim||vardha̍mAnam|svE|damE̱||saḥ|naḥ|pitA|iva|sUnavE̱|agnE̱|sUpAyana̍ iti# su - upAyanaḥ|Bava||sacasva|naḥ|svastayE̱||agnE̱|22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: saṃhitA&si# viśvarUpIrA mOrjA viśA &&*gaupatyEnA̍ &&*rAyaspOṣEṇa̍ sahasrapOṣaM ~Mvaḥ̍ puṣyAsaM mayi# vO rAyaḥ̍ śrayantAM||upa# tvA&gnE divEdivE̍ dOṣAvastarddhiyA̍ vayaM|namO Baranta̍ Emasi||rAja̍ntamaddhvarAṇA̱M̍ gOpAmRutasya dIdiviM|varddha̍mAnaṅq̍ svE damE̱||sa naḥ̍ pitEva# sUnavE&gnE# sUpAyanO Bava|saca̍svA̍ naḥ svastayE̱||agnE- [ ] 22

verses.padam: (Padam) tvam|naḥ|antamaḥ||uta|trAtA|śivaḥ|Bava|varUthya̍ḥ||tam|tvA|śOciṣṭha|dIdivaḥ||sumnAya̍|nUnam|ImahE|saKi̍Bya̍ iti saKi# - Byaḥ||vasuḥ|agniḥ|vasu̍śravA̍ iti vasu# - śravAḥ||acCa|nakṣi|dyumatta̍ma̍ iti# dyumat - tamaḥ|rayim|dAḥ||UrjA|vaḥ|paśyAmi|UrjA|mA|paśyata|rAyaḥ|pOṣEṇa|vaḥ|paśyAmi|rAyaḥ|pOṣE̍ṇa|mA|paśyata|iḍA̱ḥ|stha|madhukRuta̍ iti# madhu - kRutaḥ|syOnAḥ|mA|Eti̍|viśata|irA̱ḥ|mada̍ḥ||sahasrapOṣamiti̍# sahasra - pOṣam|vaḥ|puṣyAsam|23 (50)
verses.samhita: tvaM nO antamaḥ|uta̍ trAtA śivO Bava̍ varUtthyaḥ||taM̍ tvA# śOciṣṭha dIdivaḥ|sumnAya# nUnamImahE̍ saKiByaḥ||vasu̍ragnir̍ vasuśravAḥ|acCA̍# nakṣi dyumattamO̍ rayiM dA̱ḥ||UrjA vaḥ̍ paśyAmyUrjA mA# paśyata rAyaspOṣEṇa̍ vaḥ paśyAmi rAyaspOṣEṇa̍ mA paśyatEḍA̱ḥ stha madhukRutaḥ̍ syOnA mA &&viśatErA̍ madaḥ|sahasrapOṣaM̍ ~Mvaḥ̍ puṣyAsaM - [ ] 23

verses.padam: (Padam) mayi|vaḥ|rAya̍ḥ|śrayantAm||tat|savituḥ|varE̱ṇyam|Barga̍ḥ|dEvasya̍|dhImahi||dhiya̍ḥ|yaḥ|naḥ|pracOdayAditi̍# pra-cOdayA̱t||sOmAna̱m|svaraṇam|kRuṇuhi|brahmaṇaḥ|patE||kakṣIva̍ntamiti̍# kakṣI - vantam|yaḥ|auśijam|kadA|cana|starIḥ|asi|na|indra|saścasi|dAśuṣE̱||upOpEtyupa# - upa|it|nu|maGavanniti# maGa - vann|BUyaḥ|it|nu|tE|dAna̱m|dEvasya̍|pRucyatE||parIti̍|tvA|agnE|pura̱m|vayam|vipra̱m|sahasya|dhImahi||dhRuṣadva̍rṇamiti̍# dhRuṣat - varṇam ( )|divEdiva̍ iti# divE - divE|BEttAra̱m|Ba~ggurAvata̍ iti# Ba~ggura-vataḥ||agnE̱|gRuhapata iti# gRuha - patE|sugRuhapatiriti# su - gRuhapatiḥ|aham|tvayA̱|gRuhapatinEti̍# gRuha - patinA|BUyAsam|sugRuhapatiriti# su - gRuhapatiḥ|mayA̱|tvam|gRuhapatinEti̍# gRuha - patinA|BUyAḥ|śatam|himA̱ḥ|tAm|AśiṣamityA̱ - śiṣa̱m|Eti|śAsE|tanta̍vE|jyOti̍ṣmatIm|tAm|AśiṣamityA̱̍ - śiṣa̱m|Eti|śAsE|amuṣmai̱|jyOti̍ṣmatIm||24̍ (79) (BUyAsta-svastayE&gnE-puṣyAsaM-dhRuṣadva̍rṇa-mEkAnna̍ triṃqśacca# ) (A6)
verses.samhita: mayi# vO rAyaḥ̍ śrayantAM||tathsavitur̍ varE̱ṇyaM BargO# dEvasya# dhImahi|dhiyO yOnaḥ̍ pracOdayA̱t||sOmAnaṅq svaraṇaM̍ kRuṇuhi brahmaṇaspatE|kakṣIva̍ntaM̍ ~Mya auśijaM||kadA̍ cana starIrasi̍ nEndra# saścasi dAśuṣE̱||upOpEnnu maGavan̍ Buya innu tE dAnaM̍ dEvasya# pRucyatE||pari# tvA&gnE puraM̍ ~MvayaM ~Mvipraṃ# sahasya dhImahi||dhRuṣadvarṇaM̍ ( ) divEdivE̍ BEttAraM̍ Ba~ggurAvataḥ||agnE̍# gRuhapatE sugRuhapatirahaM tvayA# gRuhapatinA̍ BUyAsaṃ sugRuhapatirmayA tvaM gRuhapatinA̍ BUyAḥ śataṃ himAstAmAśiṣamA śAsE̍ tantavE̍ jyOtiṣmatIM̍ tAmAśiṣamA śAsE&muṣmai̍ jyOtiṣmatIM||24̍

verses.padam: (Padam) ayajñaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yaḥ|asAmA|upaprayanta̍ ityupa̍ - prayantaḥ|addhvaram|iti̍|Aha|stOma̱m|Eva|asmai|yunakti|upEti̍|iti̍|Aha|prajEti̍# pra - jA|vai|paśavaḥ|upEti̍|imam|lOkam|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|Eva|paśUn|imam|lOkam|upEti|Eti|asya|pratnAm|anviti̍|dyuta̱m|iti̍|Aha|suvarga̍ iti# suvaḥ - gaḥ|vai|lOkaḥ|pratnaḥ|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|Eva|lOkam|samArOhatIti̍# saM - ArOhati|agniḥ|mUrdhA|divaḥ|kakut|iti̍|Aha|mUrdhAna̱m|25̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ayajñO̍ vA Eṣa yO&sAmOpa̍prayantO̍# addhvaramityAha̍ stOmamEvAsmai̍# yunaktyupEtyAha̍ prajA vai paśava upEmaM ~MlOkaM prajAmEva paśUnimaM ~MlOkamupai̱tyasya pratnAmanu dyutamityAha̍ suvargO vai lOkaḥ pratnaḥ suvargamEva̍ lOkaṃ samArOhatyagnir̍ mUrddhA divaḥ kakudityAha̍ mUrddhAna# - [ ] 25

verses.padam: (Padam) Eva|Enam|samAnAnA̱m|karOti|athO iti|dEvalOkAditi̍# dEva - lOkAt|Eva|manuṣyalOka iti# manuṣya - lOkE|pratIti|tiṣṭhati|ayam|iha|prathamaḥ|dhAyi|dhAtRuBiriti̍# dhAtRu - Biḥ|iti|Aha|muKya̱m|Eva|Enam|karOti|uBA|vAm|indrAgnI̍ itI̱ndra - agnI|Ahuvaddhyai̱|iti|Aha|Oja̍ḥ|bala̱m|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|ayam|tE|yOni̍ḥ|Rutviya̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|paśava̍ḥ|vai|rayiḥ|paśUn|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|ṣaḍBiriti̍# ṣaṭ - Biḥ|upEti|tiṣṭhatE|ṣaṭ|vai|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mEvainaṃ# samAnAnA̱M karOtyathO# dEvalOkAdEva manuṣyalOkE̍ prati# tiṣṭhatyayamiha prathamO̍ dhAyi̍ dhAtRuBirityAha̍ muKyamEvaina̍M̍ karOtyuBA vAmindrAgnI̍ AhuvaddhyA ityAhaujO balamEvAva̍# rundhE &yaM tE yOniṛ̍ Rutviya ityAha̍ paśavO vai rayiḥ paśUnEvAva# rundhE ṣaḍBirupa# tiṣṭhatE ṣaḍvA - [ ] 26

verses.padam: (Padam) Rutavaḥ|Rutuṣu̍|aiva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|ṣaḍBiriti̍# ṣaṭ - Biḥ|uttarABirityut̍ - tarABiḥ|upEti|tiṣṭhatE|dvAda̍śa|samiti̍|padyantE|dvAda̍śa|mAsA̱ḥ|sam~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|sam~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsarE|Eva|pratIti|tiṣṭhati|yathA̱|vai|puru̍ṣaḥ|aśva̍ḥ|gauḥ|jIrya̍ti|Evam|agniḥ|Ahi̍ta̍ ityA - hitaḥ|jIryati|saqm~MvathsarasyEti# saM - vathsarasya|parastA̱t|AgnipAvamAnIBirityA̱gni̍ - pAvamAnIBiḥ|upEti̍|tiṣṭhatE|punarnavamiti̍# punaḥ-navam|Eva|Enam|ajara̱m|karOti|athO iti|punAti̍|Eva|upEti̍|tiṣṭhatE|yOga̍ḥ|Eva|asya|Eṣaḥ|upEti̍|tiṣṭhatE|27̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Rutava# RutuṣvEva prati# tiṣṭhati ṣaḍBiruttarABirupa̍# tiṣṭhatE dvAdaśa̍ saM padyantE̍ dvAdaśa̍ mAsA̱ḥ saM~Mvathsaraḥ saM~Mvathsara̍ Eva prati# tiṣṭhati yathA vai puruṣO&śvO gaur-jIryatyEva-magnirAhi̍tO̍ jIryati saM~Mvathsarasya# parastAdAgnipAvamAnIBi-rupa̍# tiṣṭhatE punarnava-mEvaina-majara̍M̍ karOtyathO# punAtyEvOpa# tiṣṭhatE yOga# EvAsyaiṣa upa# tiṣṭhatE - [ ] 27

verses.padam: (Padam) damaḥ|Eva|asya|Eṣaḥ|upEti̍|tiṣṭhatE|yAc~jai|Eva|asya|EṣA|upEti̍|tiṣṭhatE|yathA̱|pApI̍yAn|śrEya̍sE|AhRutyEtyA̱̍ - hRutya|namasyati̍|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|AyurdA̍ ityAyuḥ̍ - dAḥ|agnE|asi|Ayuḥ|mE|dEhi|iti̍|Aha|AyurdA̍ ityAyuḥ̍ - dAḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|varcOdA iti# varcaḥ - dAḥ|agnE|asi|varcaḥ|mE|dEhi|iti̍|Aha|varcOdA̍ iti# varcaḥ - dAḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|tanUpA iti# tanU - pAḥ|agnE|asi|tanuva̱m|mE|pAhi|iti|Aha|28̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dama# EvAsyaiṣa upa# tiṣṭhatE yAc~jaivAsyaiṣOpa# tiṣṭhatE yathA pApIyA~jCrEya̍sa̍ AhRutya# namasyati# tAdRugEva tadAyurdA̍ agnE&syAyu̍rmE̍ dEhItyAhA*&&yurdA̍ hyEṣa̍ varcOdA̍ agnE&si̍ varcO# mE dEhItyAha̍ varcOdA hyEṣa̍ tanUpA̍ agnE&si̍ tanuvaM̍ mE pAhItyAha̍ - [ ] 28

verses.padam: (Padam) tanUpA iti# tanU - pAḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|agnE̱|yat|mE|tanuvA̱ḥ|Unam|tat|mE|Eti|pRuṇa|iti̍|Aha|yat|mE|prajAyA̍ iti# pra - jAyai̱|paśUnAm|Unam|tat|mE|Eti|pUraya|iti̍|vAva|Etat|Aha|citrA̍vasO̍ iti citra# - vasO|svasti|tE|pAram|aśIya|iti|Aha|rAtri̍ḥ|vai|citrAva̍suriti̍# citra - vasuḥ|avyuṣṭyA̍ ityavi# - uṣṭyai|vai|Etasyai̱|purA|brAhmaṇAḥ|aBaiṣuḥ|vyuṣṭimiti̍ vi - uṣṭim|Eva|avEti|rundhE|indhA̍nAḥ|tvA|śatam|29̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tanUpA hyEṣO&gnE̍ yanmE# tanuvA# UnaM tanma A pRuṇEtyAha̍ yanmE̱ prajAyai# paśUnAmUnaM tanma A pUrayEti̍ vAvaitadAha̍ citrAvasO̍ svasti tE# pAramaśIyEtyA̍ha̍ rAtrir vai citrAvasuravyu̍ṣṭyai̍ vA Etasyai# purA brA̱hmaṇA aBaiṣur̍ vyuṣṭimEvAva̍# rundha indhAnAstvA̍ śataṃ - [ ] 29

verses.padam: (Padam) himA̱ḥ|iti|Aha|śatAyuriti̍# śata - Ayuḥ|puruṣaḥ|śatEndri̍ya̍ iti# śata - indriyaḥ|Ayuṣi|Eva|indriyE|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|EṣA|vai|sUrmI|karṇa̍kAvatIti̍ karṇaka-vatI|EtayA̱|ha|sma|vai|dEvAḥ|asu̍rAṇAm|śatatarqḥAniti̍# śata - tarqḥAn|tRuṃqhanti|yat|EtayA̱|samidhamiti# saM-idha̱m|AdadhAtItyA̱ - dadhAti|vajra̱m|Eva|Etat|śataGnImiti̍# śata - GnIm|yajamAnaḥ|BrAtRu̍vyAya|prEti̍|harati|stRutyai̱|acCa̍baMṭkAramityacCa̍baMṭ̍ - kAram|samiti|tvam|agnE|sUrya̍sya|varca̍sA|agathAḥ|iti̍|Aha|Etat|tvam|asi̍|idam|aham̍ ( )|BUyAsam|iti|vAva|Etat|Aha|tvam|agnE|sUrya̍varcA̍ iti sUrya# - varcAḥ|asi|iti|Aha|AśiṣamityA̱̍ - śiṣa̱m|Eva|EtAm|Eti|śAstE||30̍ (66) (mUrddhAnaṃq-ṣaḍvA-Eṣa upa# tiṣṭhatE-pAhItyAha-śata-mahaṃ̍ ṣOḍaśa̍ ca) (A7)
verses.samhita: himA ityAha̍ śatAyuḥ puruṣaḥ̍ śatEndriya̍ AyuṣyEvEndriyE̍ prati# tiṣṭhatyEṣA vai sUrmI karṇakAvatyEtayA̍# ha sma vai dEvA asurAṇAṃ̍ śatatarqḥAṅ stRuṃhanti̍ yadEtayA# samidhamAdadhA̍ti̍ vajramEvaitacCa̍taGnIM̍ ~MyajamAnO̍ BrAtRuvyAya̍ pra harati̍ stRutyA aCaMbaṭkAraṃq̍ saM tvamagnE̍ sUryasya̍ varcasA&gathA̍ ityAhaitattvamasIdamahaM̍ ( ) BUyAsamiti̍ vAvaitadAha̍ tvamagnE̍ sUryavarcA̍ asItyAhA&&śiṣa̍mEvaitAmA̍ śA̱stE||30

verses.padam: (Padam) samiti|paśyAmi|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|aham|iti|Aha|yAva̍ntaḥ|Eva|grAmyAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|tAn|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|aBaM̍ḥ|stha|aBaM̍ḥ|vaḥ|BakṣIya|iti̍|Aha|aBaM̍ḥ|hi|EtAḥ|maha̍ḥ|stha|maha̍ḥ|vaḥ|BakṣIya|iti̍|Aha|maha̍ḥ|hi|EtAḥ|saha̍ḥ|stha|saha̍ḥ|vaḥ|BakṣIya|iti̍|Aha|saha̍ḥ|hi|EtAḥ|Urja̍ḥ|stha|Urja̱m|vaḥ|BakṣIya|iti̍|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: saM paśyAmi̍ prajA ahamityAha̍ yAvanta̍ Eva grAmyAḥ paśavastAnEvAva# rundhE&MBaḥ sthAMBO# vO BakṣIyEtyAhAMBO hyEtA̍ mahaḥ̍ stha mahO# vO BakṣIyEtyAha̍ mahO hyEtAḥ̍ sahaḥ̍ stha sahO# vO BakṣIyEtyAha̍ sahO hyEtA̍ Urjaḥ sthOrjaM̍ ~MvO BakṣIyEtyA - [ ] 31

verses.padam: (Padam) Aha|Urjaḥ|hi|EtAḥ|rEva̍tIḥ|rama̍ddhvam|iti̍|Aha|paśava̍ḥ|vai|rEvatI̱ḥ|paśUn|Eva|Atmann|ramayatE|iha|Eva|sta|itaḥ|mA|apEti̍|gAta|iti̍|Aha|dhruvAḥ|Eva|EnAḥ|ana̍pagA̍ ityanapa-gAḥ|kurutE|iṣṭakaciditI̱ṣṭaka-cit|vai|anyaḥ|agniḥ|paśuciditi̍# paśu - cit|anyaḥ|saṃqhitEti# saM - hitA|asi|viśvarUpIriti# viśva - rUpIḥ|iti|vathsam|aBIti̍|mRuśati|upEti̍|Eva|Enam|dhattE|paśucitamiti̍# paśu - cita̱m|Enam|kurutE|prEti|32̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -hOrjO hyEtA̍ rEvatI̍ ramaddhvamityA̍ha̍ paśavO vai rEvatI̱ḥ paśUnEvAtman ramayata̍ ihaiva stEtO mA&pa# gAtEtyAha̍ dhruvA EvainA anapagAḥ̍ kuruta iṣṭakacidvA anyO̱&gniḥ paśucidanyaḥ̍ saṃhitAsi̍# viśvarUpIriti# vathsamaBi mRuśatyupaivaina̍M̍ dhattE paśucitamEnaM̍ kurutE pra - [ ] 32

verses.padam: (Padam) vai|Eṣaḥ|asmAt|lOkAt|cyavatE|yaḥ|AhavanIyamityA̱ - havanIya̱m|upatiṣṭhata̍ ityupa̍ - tiṣṭhatE|gAṛha̍patyamiti̍ gAṛha# - patyam|upEti|tiṣṭhatE|asminn|Eva|lOkE|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|athO̍ iti|gAṛha̍patyAyEti̍ gAṛha# - patyAya|Eva|nIti|hnutE|gAyatrIBi̍ḥ|upEti̍|tiṣṭhatE|tEja̍ḥ|vai|gAyatrI|tEja̍ḥ|Eva|Atmann|dhattE|athO̍ iti|yat|Etam|tRucam|anvAhEtya̍nu̍ - Aha|saMta̍tyA̍ iti saM - tatyai|gAṛhapatyamiti̍ gAṛha# - patyam|vai|anviti|dvipAda̍ iti# dvi - pAdaḥ|vIrAḥ|prEti̍|jAyantE|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|dvipadA̍Biriti̍# dvi - padABiḥ|gAṛha̍patyamiti̍ gAṛha# - patyam|upatiṣṭhata̍ ityupa̍ - tiṣṭhatE|33̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vA EṣO̱&smAllOkAccyavatE̍ ya AhavanIya̍-mupatiṣṭha̍tE̍ gAṛhapatyamupa̍# tiṣṭhatE &sminnEva lOkE prati# tiṣṭhatyathO gAṛhapatyAyaiva̍ ni hnutE̍ gAyatrIBirupa# tiṣṭhatE tEjO vai gAyatrI̍ tEja# EvAtman dhattE&thO yadEtaM tRucamanvAha santatyai̍ gAṛhapatyaM̍ ~MvA anu# dvipAdO# vIrAḥ pra jAyantE̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAn dvipadABir̍ gAṛhapatya-̍ mupatiṣṭhata̍ - [ ] 33

verses.padam: (Padam) Eti|asya|vIraḥ|jAyatE|UrjA|vaḥ|paśyAmi|UrjA|mA|paśyata|iti̍|Aha|AśiṣamityA̱̍ - śiṣa̱m|Eva|EtAm|Eti|śAstE|tat|savituḥ|varE̱ṇyam|iti̍|Aha|prasU̱tyA̍ iti pra - sUtyai|sOmAna̱m|svaraṇam|iti̍|Aha|sOmapIthamiti̍# sOma - pItham|Eva|avEti|rundhE|kRuṇuhi|brahmaṇaḥ|patE|iti̍|Aha|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma-varcasam|Eva|avEti|rundhE|kadA|cana|starIḥ|asi|iti̍|Aha|na|starIm|rAtri̱m|vasati|34̍ (50)
verses.samhita: A&sya# vIrO jAyata̍ UrjA vaḥ̍ paśyAmyUrjA mA# paśyatEtyAhA̍ &&śiṣamEvaitAmA̍ śA̱stE tathsavitur̍ varE̱ṇyamityAha̍ prasU̱tyai sOmAnaṅq svaraṇamityA̍ha̍ sOmapIthamEvAva# rundhE kRuṇuhi brahmaṇaspata̍ ityAha̍ brahmavarcasamEvAva# rundhE kadA cana starIrasItyAha̍ na starIṃ rAtriM̍ ~Mvasati - [ ] 34

verses.padam: (Padam) yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|agnim|upatiṣṭhata̍ ityupa̍ - tiṣṭhatE|parIti̍|tvA|agnE|pura̱m|vayam|iti̍|Aha|paridhimiti̍# pari-dhim|Eva|Etam|parIti|dadhAti|aska̍ndAya|agnE̱|gRuhapata̍ iti# gRuha - patE|iti|Aha|yathAyajuriti̍# yathA - yajuḥ|Eva|Etat|śatam|himA̱ḥ|iti|Aha|śatam|tvA|hEmantAn|indhiṣIya|iti̍|vAva|Etat|Aha|putrasya̍|nAma̍|gRuhṇAti|annAdamitya̍nna̍ - adam|Eva|Enam|karOti|tAm|AśiṣamityA̱-śiṣa̱m|Eti|śAsE|tanta̍vE|jyOti̍ṣmatIm̍ ( )|iti|brayAt|yasya̍|putraḥ|ajA̍taḥ|syAt|tEjasvI|Eva|asya|brahmavarcasIti̍# brahma - varcasI|putraḥ|jAyatE|tAm|AśiṣamityA̱ - śiṣa̱m|Eti|śAsE|amuṣmai̱|jyOti̍ṣmatIm|iti̍|brUyAt|yasya̍|putraḥ|jAtaḥ|syAt|tEja̍ḥ|Eva|asminn|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|dadhAti||35 (79) (UrjaM̍ ~MvO BakṣIyEti-pra-gAṛhapatyamupatiṣṭha̍tE-vasati-jyOti̍ṣmatI-mEkAnna̍ triṃqśacca)̍ (A8)
verses.samhita: ya EvaM ~MvidvAnagni-mupatiṣṭha̍tE̍ pari# tvA&gnE puraM̍ ~MvayamityAha̍ paridhimEvaitaM pari# dadhAtyaskandAyAgnE̍# gRuhapata ityAha̍ yathAyajurEvaitacCataṃ himA ityAha̍ śataM tvA# hEmantAnindhiṣIyEti̍ vAvaitadAha̍ putrasya nAma# gRuhṇAtyannAdamEvainaM̍ karOti tAmAśiṣamA śAsE̍ tantavE̍ jyOtiṣmatImiti̍# brUyAdyasya# putrO&jAtaḥ̍ syAt tEjasvyE̍vAsya̍# brahmavarcasI putrO jAyatE̍ tAmAśiṣamA śAsE̍ &muṣmai jyOtiṣmatI̍ ( ) miti# brUyAdyasya# putrO jAtaḥ syAt tEja# EvAsmin̍ brahmavarcasaM dadhAti||35̍ (UrjaM̍ ~MvO BakṣIyEti - pra -gAṛhapatyamupatiṣṭha̍tE̍ -vasati-jyOtiṣmatI̍ - mEkAnnatriṃqśacca)̍
