verses.padam: - Padam vai|Eṣaḥ|sisIṛqṣati|yaḥ|sagrAMqmamiti# saM - grAmam|jigIṣati|agniḥ|Kalu̍|vai|dEvAnA̱m|vAjasRuditi̍# vAja - sRut|agnim|Eva|vAjasRutamiti# vAja-sRuta̱m|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|dhAva̍ti|vAja̱m|hanti̍|vRutram|jaya̍ti|tam|sagrAMqmamiti̍# saM - grAmam|athO iti|agniḥ|iva|na|pratidhRuṣa̍ iti# prati - dhRuṣE̱|Bavati|agnayE̱|agnivata ityagni̍ - vatE̱|purOḍAśa̱m|aṣṭAkapAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|yasya̍|agnau|agnim|aByuddharE̍yuritya̍Bi̍ - uddharEyuḥ|nirdi̍ṣṭaBAga̍ iti nirdiṣṭa̍ - BAgaḥ|vai|EtayO̱ḥ|anyaḥ|anirdiṣṭaBAga̍ ityanirdiṣṭa̍ - BAgaḥ|anyaḥ|tau|saBaMvantAviti̍# saM - Bavantau|yaja̍mAnam|20̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ~MvA Eṣa sisIṛṣati̍ yaḥ sagrAMqmaM̍ jigIṣatyagniḥ̍ Kalu vai dEvAnA̱M ~MvAjasRudagnimEva vAjasRutaṅq̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati dhAvati̍ vAjaṃq hanti# vRutraM jayati̍ taṃ sagrAMqmamathO̍# agniriva̍ na pratidhRuṣE̍# BavatyagnayE̱&gnivatE# purOḍAśamaṣṭAka̍pAlaM̍ nirvapEd-yasyAgnA-̍ vagni- maByuddharE̍yu-rnirdi̍ṣṭaBAgO̍ vA EtayOranyO&ni̍rdiṣṭaBAgO&nyastau̍ saBaMvantau̍ yajamAna̍ - [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam aBi|samiti|Bavataḥ|saḥ|Iśvaraḥ|Arti̱m|ArtOrityA̍ - artOḥ|yat|agnayE̱|agnivata ityagni̍ - vatE̱|nirvapatIti# niḥ-vapati|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|Eva|Enau|śamayati|na|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCati|yaja̍mAnaḥ|agnayE̱|jyOti̍ṣmatE|purOḍAśa̱m|aṣṭAka̍pAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|yasya̍|agniḥ|uddhRu̍ta̍ ityut - hRutaḥ|ahutE|agnihOtra̍ ityagni̍ - hOtrE|udvAyEdityut̍ - vAyE̱t|aparaḥ|AdIpyEtyA̱̍ - dIpya|anUddhRutya̍ ityanu̍ - uddhRutyaḥ|iti̍|Ahuḥ|tat|tathA̱|na|kArya̱m|yat|BAgadhEyamiti̍# BAga - dhEya̱m|aBIti|pUrva̍ḥ|uddhriyata̍ ityut̍ - hriyatE̱|kim|aparaḥ|aBi|uditi̍|21̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -maBi saM Bavataḥ̍ sa I̱śvara ArtimArtO-ryadagnayE̱&gnivatE# nirvapati̍ BAgadhEyEnaivainau̍# śamayati nA&&*rtimArcCati̍ yajamAnO&gnayE̍ jyOtiṣmatE̍ purOḍAśamaṣṭAka̍pAlaM̍ nirvapEd-yasyA-gniruddhRutO&hu̍tE-&gnihOtra̍ udvAyEdapara̍ AdIpyAnUddhRutya̍ ityAhustat̍ tathA na kAryaM̍ ~Myad-BAgadhEya̍maBi̍ pUrva# uddhriyatE kimaparO&Byu̍ - [ ] 21

verses.padam: - Padam hriyEta|iti|tAni̍|Eva|avakṣAṇAnItya̍va̍ - kṣAṇAni|sannidhAyEti̍# saM - nidhAya|manthEt|itaḥ|prathamam|jajñE|agniḥ|svAt|yOnE̱ḥ|adhIti̍|jAtavE̍dA̍ iti# jAta - vEdAḥ||saḥ|gAyatriyA|triṣṭuBA̱|jagatyA|dEvEBya̍ḥ|havyam|vahatu|prajAnanniti̍# pra - jAnann|iti|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|Eva|Enam|svAt|yOnE̱ḥ|prEti|janayati|Eṣaḥ|vAva|saḥ|agniḥ|iti̍|Ahuḥ|jyOti̍ḥ|tu|vai|asya|parA̍patitamiti̍ parA̱ - patitam|iti|yat|agnayE̱|jyOti̍ṣmatE|nirvapatIti̍# niḥ - vapati|yat|Eva|asya̍ ( )|jyOtiḥ|parA̍patitamiti̍ parA̱ - patitam|tat|Eva|avEti|rundhE||22̍ (56)
verses.samhita: -ddhriyEtEti̍ tAnyEvA vakṣAṇAni̍ sannidhAya# manthEditaḥ prathamaM̍ jajñE̍ agniḥ svAdyOnEradhi# jAtavEdAḥ|sa̍ gAyatriyA̍ triṣṭuBA jagatyA̍ dEvEByO# havyaM ~Mvahatu̍ prajAnanniti CandOBirEvainaṅq̍ svAdyOnEḥ prajanayatyEṣa̍ vA va sO̱&gnirityAhu̍ rjyOtistvA asya̍ parApatitamiti̍ yadagnayE jyOtiṣmatE̍ nirvapati̍ yadEvAsya ( ) jyOtiḥ parApatitaM̍ tadEvAva# rundhE||22

verses.padam: - Padam vaiśvAnaram|dvAdaśakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|vAruṇam|carum|dadhikrAv^^ṇṇa̍ iti# dadhi - krAv^^ṇṇE̱|carum|aBiśasyamAna̍ ityaBi̍ - śasyamAnaḥ|yat|vaiśvAnaraḥ|dvAda̍śakapAla̍ iti dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlaḥ|Bavati|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|vai|agniḥ|vaiśvAnaraḥ|saM~MvathsarEṇEti# saM - vathsarEṇa|Eva|Enam|svadayati|apEti̍|pApam|varṇa̱m|hatE|vAruṇEna̍|Eva|Enam|varuṇapAśAditi̍# varuṇa - pAśAt|mu~jcati|dadhikrAv^^ṇṇEti# dadhi -krAv^^ṇṇA̱|punAti|hiraṇyam|dakṣi̍ṇA|pavitra̱m|vai|hira̍ṇyam|punAti̍|Eva|Enam|Adya̱m|asya|anna̱m|Bavati|EtAm|Eva|niriti̍|vapEt|prajAkA̍ma̍ iti# prajA - kAmaḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|23 (50)
verses.samhita: vaiśvAnaraM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEd-vAruṇaM̍ caruM dadhikrAv^^ṇṇE̍# carumaBiśasyamA̍nO̍ yad-vai̱śvAnarO dvAdaśakapAlO̍ Bavati̍ saM~MvathsarO vA agni rvai̱śvAnaraḥ saM~MvathsarEṇaivainaṅ̍# svadayatyapa# pApaM ~Mvarṇaṃ# hatE vAruṇEnaivainaM̍ ~MvaruṇapAśAn mu~jcati̍ dadhikrAv^^ṇṇA# punAti hiraṇyaM̍ dakṣiṇA̍ pavitraM ~Mvai hiraṇyaM̍ punAtyEvainamAdya̍-masyAnna̍M̍ BavatyEtAmEva nirvapEt̍ prajAkAmaḥ̍ saM~MvathsarO - [ ] 23

verses.padam: - Padam vai|Etasya|aśA̱ntaḥ|yOni̱m|prajAyA̍ iti# pra - jAyai̱|paśUnAm|niriti|dahati|yaḥ|ala̱m|prajAyA̍ iti# pra-jAyai̱|sann|prajAmiti# pra - jAm|na|vindatE̱|yat|vaiśvAnaraḥ|dvAdaśakapAla̍ iti dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlaḥ|Bavati|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|vai|agniḥ|vaiśvAnaraḥ|saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM - vathsaram|Eva|BAgadhEyEnEti# BAga - dhEyEna|śamayati|saḥ|asmai|śAntaḥ|svAt|yOnE̱ḥ|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|prEti|janayati|vAruṇEna̍|Eva|Enam|varuṇapAśAditi̍# varuṇa - pAśAt|mu~jcati|dadhikrAv^^ṇṇEti# dadhi - krAv^^ṇṇA̱|punAti|hiraṇyam|dakṣi̍ṇA|pavitra̱m|vai|hira̍ṇyam|punAti̍|Eva|Enam|24̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vA EtasyA śA̱ntO yOniM̍ prajAyai# paśUnAM nirdahati̍ yO&laM̍ prajAyai san prajAM na vindatE yad-vai̱śvAnarO dvAdaśakapAlO̍ Bavati̍ saM~MvathsarO vA agni rvai̱śvAnaraḥ saM~MvathsaramEva̍ BAgadhEyE̍na̍ śamayati sO̱&smai śAntaḥ svAdyOnE̱ḥ prajAM prajanayati̍ vAruṇEnaivainaM̍ ~MvaruṇapAśAn mu~jcati̍ dadhikrAv^^ṇṇA# punAti hiraṇyaM̍ dakṣiṇA̍ pavitraM ~Mvai hiraṇyaM̍ punAtyEvainaM-̍ [ ] 24

verses.padam: - Padam vindatE̱|prajAmiti# pra - jAm|vaiśvAnaram|dvAdaśakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|putrE|jAtE|yat|aṣṭAka̍pAla̍ ityaṣṭA - kapAlaḥ|Bavati|gAyatriyA|Eva|Enam|brahmavarcasEnEti̍# brahma - varcasEna|punAti|yat|nava̍kapAla̍ iti nava# - kapAlaḥ|trivRutEti# tri - vRutA̱|Eva|asminn|tEjaḥ|dadhAti|yat|daśa̍kapAla̍ iti daśa# - kapAlaḥ|virAjEti# vi - rAjA̱|Eva|asminn|annAdyamityanna̍ - adya̱m|dadhAti|yat|EkAdaśakapAla̍ ityEkAdaśa̍ - kapAlaḥ|triṣṭuBA̱|Eva|asminn|indriyam|dadhAti|yat|dvAdaśakapAla̍ iti dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlaḥ|jagatyA|Eva|asminn|paśUn|dadhAti|yasminn̍|jAtE|EtAm|iṣṭi̱m|nirvapatIti̍# niḥ - vapati|pUtaḥ|25̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ~MvindatE̱ prajAM ~Mvai̱śvAnaraM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEt̍ putrE jAtEyadaṣṭAkapAlO̍ Bavati̍ gAyatriyaivainaM̍ brahmavarcasEna# punAti yannavakapAla-strivRutaivAsmin̍ tEjO# dadhAti yad-daśakapAlO̍ virAjaivAsminnannAdya̍M̍ dadhAti yadEkAdaśakapAla-̍ striṣṭuBaivAsminnindriyaM̍ dadhAti̍ yad-dvAdaśakapAlO̍ jagatyaivAsmi̍n̍ paśUn dadhAti̍ yasmin̍ jAta EtAmiṣṭiM̍ nirvapati̍ pUta- [ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|tEjasvI|annAda ityanna̍ - adaḥ|indriyAvI|paśumAniti# paśu - mAn|Bavati|avEti|vai|Eṣaḥ|suvargAditi̍# suvaḥ - gAt|lOkAt|CidyatE|yaḥ|darq.śapUrṇamAsayAjIti# daṛśapUrṇamAsa - yAjI|sann|amAvAsyAmitya̍mA̍ - vAsyA̱m|vA|paurṇamAsImiti# paurṇa - mAsIm|vA|atipAdayatItyati̍ - pAdayati|suvargAyEti̍# suvaḥ - gAya|hi|lOkAya̍|darq.śapUrṇamAsAviti̍# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsau|ijyEtE iti|vaiśvAnaram|dvAda̍śakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|amAvAsyA̍mitya̍mA̍ - vAsyA̱m|vA|paurṇamAsImiti# paurṇa - mAsIm|vA|atipAdyEtyati̍ - pAdya|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|vai|agniḥ|vaiśvAnaraḥ|saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM - vathsaram|Eva|prIṇAti|athO iti|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM - vathsaram|Eva|asmai|upEti|dadhAti|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|sama̍ṣṭyA̍ iti saM - aṣṭyai|26 (50)
verses.samhita: Eva tEjasvya̍nnAda̍ indriyAvI̍ paśumAn̍ Bavatyava̍ vA Eṣa suvargAllOkAcCi̍dyatE̍ yO daṛśapUrṇamAsayAjI̍ sannamAvAsyA̱M̍ ~MvA paurṇamAsIM ~MvAtipAdaya̍ti̍ suvargAya hi lOkAya# daṛśapUrṇamAsA vijyEtE# vaiśvAnaraM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEdamAvAsyA̱M̍ ~MvA paurṇamAsIM ~MvA&tipAdya̍# saM~MvathsarO vA agni rvai̱śvAnaraḥ saM~MvathsaramEva̍ prIṇAtyathO̍# saM~MvathsaramEvAsmA upa# dadhAti suvargasya# lOkasya samaṣṭyA-̍ [ ] 26

verses.padam: - Padam athO iti|dEvatA̱ḥ|Eva|anvAraByEtya̍nu̍ - AraBya|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Eti|vIrahEti# vIra-hA|vai|Eṣaḥ|dEvAnA̱m|yaḥ|agnim|udvAsayata̍ ityut̍ - vAsayatE|na|vai|Etasya̍|brAhmaṇAḥ|RutAyava̍ ityRuta̍ - yavaḥ|purA|anna̱m|akṣann|AgnEyam|aṣṭAka̍pAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|vaiśvAnaram|dvAda̍śakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa-kapAlam|agnim|udvAsayiṣyannityu̍t̍ - vAsayiṣyann|yat|aṣṭAkapAla̍ ityaṣṭA - kapAlaḥ|Bavati|aṣṭAkṣarEtyaṣṭA̍ - akṣarA|gAyatrI|gAyatraḥ|agniḥ|yAvAn|Eva|agniḥ|tasmai̱|Atithyam|karOti|athO̍ iti|yathA̱|jana̱m|yatE|avasam|karOti̍|tAdRuk|27̍ (50)
verses.samhita: athO# dEvatA# EvAnvAraBya# suvargaM ~MlOkamEti̍ vIrahA vA Eṣa dEvAnAM ~MyO̱&gni-mudvAsaya̍tE̍ na vA Etasya# brAhmaṇA RutAyava̍ḥ̍ purA&nnamakṣannA-gnEyamaṣṭAka̍pAlaM̍ nirvapEd-vaiśvAnaraM̍ dvAdaśakapAla-magnimu̍dvAsayiṣyan.̍ yadaṣṭAkapAlO̍ BavatyaṣṭAkṣa̍rA̍ gAyatrIgAyatrO̱̍ &gniryAvAnEvAgnistasmA̍# AtithyaM karOtyathO̍ yathA janaM̍ ~MyatE&vasaM̍ karOti# tAdRu - [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|tat|dvAdaśakapAla̍ iti dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlaḥ|vaiśvAnaraḥ|Bavati|dvAdaśa|mAsA̱ḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|Kalu|vai|agnEḥ|yOni̍ḥ|svAm|Eva|Enam|yOni̱m|gamayati|Adya̱m|asya|anna̱m|Bavati|vaiśvAnaram|dvAda̍śakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|mArutam|saptaka̍pAlamiti̍# sapta - kapAlam|grAmakAma̍ iti grAma# - kAmaḥ|AhavanIya ityA̱ -havanIyE̱|vaiśvAnaram|adhIti|śrayati|gAṛha̍patya̍ iti gAṛha# - patyE|mArutam|pApavasyasasyEti# pApa - vasyasasya|vidhRu̍tyA̍ iti vi - dhRutyai|dvAdaśakapAla̍ iti dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlaḥ|vaiśvAnaraḥ|Bavati|dvAdaśa|mAsA̱ḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM-vathsaraḥ|saM~MvathsarEṇEti# saM - vathsarEṇa|Eva|asmai|sajAtAniti̍# sa - jAtAn|cyAvayati|mArutaḥ|Bavati|28 (50)
verses.samhita: -gEva tad-dvAdaśakapAlO̍ vaiśvAnarO Bavati̍ dvAdaśa̍ mAsA̱ḥ saM~Mvathsaraḥ saM~Mvathsaraḥ̍ Kalu vA agnEryOniḥ svAmEvainaM ~MyOniM̍ gamaya-tyAdyamasyAnna̍M̍ Bavati vaiśvAnaraM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEnmArutaṃ̍ saptakapAlaM̍ grAmakAma̍ AhavanIyE# vaiśvAnaramadhi# śrayati gAṛhapatyE̍ mArutaM pApavasyasasya̍ vidhRutyai̍ dvAdaśakapAlO̍ vaiśvAnarO Bavati̍ dvAdaśa̍ mAsA̱ḥ saM~Mvathsaraḥ saM~MvathsarEṇaivAsmai̍# sajAtAṅścyAvayati̍ mArutO Bavati̍ - [ ] 28

verses.padam: - Padam marutaḥ|vai|dEvAnA̱m|viśa̍ḥ|dEvaviśEnEti̍# dEva - viśEna|Eva|asmai|manuṣyaviśamiti̍# manuṣya - viśam|avEti|rundhE|saptaka̍pAla̍ iti# sapta - kapAlaḥ|Bavati|saptagaṇA̍ iti# sapta - gaṇAḥ|vai|marutaḥ|gaṇaśa̍ iti# gaṇa-śaḥ|Eva|asmai|sajAtAniti# sa - jAtAn|avEti|rundhE|anUcyamA̍na̍ ityanu̍ - ucyamAnE|Eti̍|sAdayati|viśa̱m|Eva|asmai|anu̍vartmAnamityanu̍# - vartmAnam|karOti||29 (29) (prajAkAmaḥ̍ saM~Mvathsaraḥ - punAtyEvainaM̍ - pUtaḥ - samaṣṭyai̍ - tAdRu~g - mArutO̍ Bava̍ - tyEkAnna triṃqśacca# ) (A5)
verses.samhita: marutO vai dEvAnAM ~MviśO# dEvaviśEnaivAsmai# manuṣya viśamava# rundhE saptakapAlO̍ Bavati sapta gaṇA̍ vai marutO# gaṇaśa EvAsmai# sajAtAnava# rundhE &nUcyamAna̍ A sAdayati̍ viśamEvAsmA̍ anuvartmAnaM̍ karOti||29

verses.padam: - Padam Adityam|carum|niriti|vapEt|sagrAMqmamiti̍# saM - grAmam|upaprayAsyannityupa̍ - prayAsyann|iyam|vai|aditiḥ|asyAm|Eva|pUrvE̱|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|vaiśvAnaram|dvAda̍śakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|Ayata̍namityA̱̍ - yatanam|gatvA|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|vai|agniḥ|vaiśvAnaraḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM-vathsaraḥ|Kalu|vai|dEvAnA̱m|Ayata̍namityA̱̍ - yatanam|EtasmA̱t|vai|Ayata̍nAdityA̱-yata̍nAt|dEvAḥ|asu̍rAn|ajayann|yat|vaiśvAnaram|dvAda̍śakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|nirvapatIti# niḥ - vapati|dEvAnA̱m|Eva|Ayata̍na̍ ityA̱ - yatanE|yatatE|jaya̍ti|tam|sagrAMqmamiti̍# saM - grAmam|Etasminn|vai|Etau|mRujAtE̍ iti|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: AdityaM caruM nirvapEth̍ saMgrAma-mupaprayAsyanniyaM̍ ~MvA aditirasyAmEva̍ pUrvE pratitiṣṭhanti̍ vaiśvAnaraM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEdAyata̍naM̍ gatvAsaM~MvathsarO̍ vA agni rvai̱śvAnaraḥ saM~Mvathsaraḥ̍ Kalu vai dEvAnA-mAyata̍namEtasmAdvA̍ AyatanAd-dEvA̍ asurAnajayana.̍ yad-vai̱śvAnaraM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapati̍ dEvAnAmEvAyata̍nE̍ yatatE jayati̍ taṃ sagrAMqmamEtasmin̍ vA Etau mRujAtE̍ - [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam yaḥ|vidviṣAṇayOriti# vi-dviṣAṇayO̱ḥ|anna̱m|atti|vaiśvAnaram|dvAda̍śakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|vidviṣAṇayOriti̍# vi - dviṣAṇayO̱ḥ|anna̱m|jagdhvA|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|vai|agniḥ|vaiśvAnaraḥ|saM~Mvathsarasvaditamiti̍# saM~Mvathsara - svaditam|Eva|atti|na|asminn|mRujAtE iti|saM~MvathsarAyEti̍# saM - vathsarAya|vai|Etau|samiti̍|amAtE̍ iti|yau|samamAtE̍ iti# saM-amAtE̱|tayO̱ḥ|yaḥ|pUrvaḥ|aBidruhyatItya̍Bi̍ - druhyati|tam|varu̍ṇaḥ|gRuhṇAti|vaiśvAnaram|dvAda̍śakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|samamAnayOriti̍# saM - amAnayO̱ḥ|pUrvaḥ|aBidruhyEtya̍Bi̍ - druhya|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|vai|agniḥ|vaiśvAnaraḥ|saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM - vathsaram|Eva|AptvA|nirvaruṇamiti# niḥ - varuṇam|31 (50)
verses.samhita: yO vidviṣAṇayOrannamatti̍# vaiśvAnaraM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEd-vidviṣAṇayOranna̍M̍ jagdhvA saM~MvathsarO̍ vA agni-rvai̱śvAnaraḥ saM~Mvathsara̍ svaditamEvAtti̍ nAsmin̍ mRujAtE saM~MvathsarAya vA Etau samamAtE̍ yau samamAtE̍ tayOryaḥ pUrvO&Bidruhya̍ti̍ taM ~MvaruṇO̍ gRuhṇAti vaiśvAnaraM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEth̍ samamAnayOḥ pUrvO&Bidruhya̍# saM~MvathsarO vA agnirvai̱śvAnaraḥ saM~MvathsaramEvA&&*ptvA̍ nirvaruṇaM̍ - [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam parastA̱t|aBIti|druhyati|na|Enam|varu̍ṇaḥ|gRuhṇAti|Avya̱m|vai|Eṣaḥ|pratIti̍|gRuhṇAti|yaḥ|avi̱m|pratigRuhṇAtIti̍# prati - gRuhṇAti|vaiśvAnaram|dvAda̍śakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|avi̱m|pratigRuhyEti̍# prati - gRuhya|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|vai|agniḥ|vaiśvAnaraḥ|saM~MvathsarasvaditAmiti̍# saM~Mvathsara - svaditAm|Eva|pratIti|gRuhṇAti|na|Avya̱m|pratIti̍|gRuhṇAti|Atmana̍ḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|mAtrA̱m|ApnOti|yaḥ|uBayAda̍t|pratigRuhṇAtIti̍# prati - gRuhṇAti|aśva̱m|vA|puru̍ṣam|vA|vaiśvAnaram|dvAda̍śakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|uBayAda̍t|32̍ (50)
verses.samhita: parastAdaBi̍ druhyati̍ nainaM ~MvaruṇO̍ gRuhṇAtyAvyaM̍ ~MvA Eṣa prati# gRuhṇAti yO&viM̍ pratigRuhṇAti# vaiśvAnaraM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEdavi̍M̍ pratigRuhya# saM~MvathsarO vA agnirvai̱śvAnaraḥ saM~Mvathsara-sva̍ditAmEva̍ pratigRuhṇAti̍ nA&&*vyaM̍ pratigRuhṇAtyAtmanO̍ vA Eṣa mAtrAmApnOti̍ ya uBayAda̍t̍ pratigRuhṇAtyaśvaM̍ ~MvA puruṣaM̍ ~MvA vaiśvAnaraM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEduBayAda̍t̍ - [ ] 32

verses.padam: - Padam pratigRuhyEti# prati - gRuhya|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|vai|agniḥ|vaiśvAnaraḥ|saM~Mvathsarasvaditamiti̍# saM~Mvathsara - svaditam|Eva|pratIti|gRuhṇAti|na|Atmana̍ḥ|mAtrA̱m|ApnOti|vaiśvAnaram|dvAda̍śakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|sanim|Eṣyann|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|vai|agniḥ|vaiśvAnaraḥ|yadA|Kalu|vai|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM - vathsaram|janatAyAm|cara̍ti|atha̍|saḥ|dhanArGa̍ iti# dhana - arGaḥ|Bavatiq|yat|vaiśvAnaram|dvAdaśakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|nirvapatIti# niḥ - vapati|saM~MvathsarasA̍tAmiti̍# saM~Mvathsara-sAtAm|Eva|sanim|aBi|prEti|cyavatE|dAna̍kAmA̍ iti dAna# - kAmAḥ|asmai|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|Bavanti|yaḥ|vai|saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM - vathsaram|33 (50)
verses.samhita: pratigRuhya# saMvathsarO vA agnirvai̱śvAnaraḥ saM~Mvathsara-sva̍ditamEva̍ prati# gRuhṇAti nAtmanO mAtrAmApnOti̍ vaiśvAnaraM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEth-sanimEṣyanth-sa̍M~MvathsarO̍ vA agnirvai̱śvAnarO yadA Kalu vai saM~MvathsaraM̍ janatAyAM̍ caratyatha sa dhanArGO̍ Bavatiyad-vai̱śvAnaraM̍ dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapati̍ saM~Mvathsara-sAtAmEva̍ sanimaBi pracyavatE̍ dAnakAmA̍ asmai prajA Bavanti̍ yO vai saM~MvathsaraM̍ - [ ] 33

verses.padam: - Padam prayujyEti# pra - yujya|na|vimu~jcatIti̍# vi - mu~jcati|apratiṣṭhAna̍ ityaprati̍ - sthAnaḥ|vai|saḥ|Bavati|Etam|Eva|vaiśvAnaram|punaḥ|AgatyEtyA̱̍ - gatya|niriti̍|vapEt|yam|Eva|prayu~gkta̍ iti# pra - yu~gktE|tam|BAgadhEyEnEti# BAga - dhEyEna|vIti̍|mu~jcati|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|yayA̱|rajvA̱|uttamAmityut̍ - tamAm|gAm|AjEdityA̱ - ajEt|tAm|BrAtRuvyAya|prEti̍|hiṇuyAt|niṛRu̍timiti̍ niḥ - Rutim|Eva|asmai|prEti|hiṇOti||34̍ (36) (mRujAtE - nirvaruṇaM - ~MvapEduBayAdad̍ - yO vai saM~Mvathsaraṃ̍ - ṣaṭtriṃśacca̍ ) (A6)
verses.samhita: prayujya na vimu~jcatya̍pratiṣṭhAnO̍ vai sa BavatyEtamEva̍ vai̱śvAnaraM punarAgatya̍ nirvapEdyamEva̍ prayu~gktE̍ taM BAgadhEyE̍na̍ vi mu~jcati̍ pratiṣṭhityai̍ yayA rajvO̱ttamAM gAmAjEt tAM BrAtRuvyAya̍ pra hiṇuyAnniṛRu̍timEvAsmai̍ pra hiṇOti||34̍ (mRujAtE - nirvaruṇaM - ~MvapEduBayAdad̍ - yO vai saM~Mvathsaraṃ̍ - ṣaṭtriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam aindram|carum|niriti|vapEt|paśukA̍ma̍ iti# paśu - kAmaḥ|aindrAḥ|vai|paśavaḥ|indra̱m|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmai|paśUn|prEti̍|yacCati|paśumAniti̍# paśu - mAn|Eva|Bavati|caruḥ|Bavati|svAt|Eva|asmai|yOnE̱ḥ|paśUn|prEti|janayati|indrA̍ya|indriyAva̍ta̍ itI̱ndriya - vatE|purOḍAśa̱m|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|paśukA̍ma̍ iti# paśu - kAmaḥ|indriyam|vai|paśavaḥ|indra̱m|Eva|indriyAva̍ntamitI̱ndriya̍ - vantam|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|35̍ (50)
verses.samhita: aindraM caru niMrvapEt̍ paśukAma̍ aindrA vai paśava indramEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmai# paśUn prayacCati̍ paśumAnEva Bavati̍ carurBavati̍ svAdEvAsmai yOnE̱ḥ paśUn prajanayatIndrA̍yEndriyAva̍tE̍ purOḍAśamEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEt̍ paśukAma̍ indriyaM ~Mvai paśava indramEvEndriyAva̍ntaṅq̍ svEna BAgadhEyEnOpa̍# dhAvati sa - [ ] 35

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|asmai|indriyam|paśUn|prEti|yacCati|paśumAniti̍# paśu - mAn|Eva|Bavati|indrAya|Garmava̍ta̍ iti# Garma - vatE|purOḍAśa̱m|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|brahmavarcasakA̍ma̍ iti# brahmavarcasa - kAmaḥ|brahmavarcasamiti# brahma - varcasam|vai|Garmaḥ|indra̱m|Eva|Garmavantamiti̍# Garma - vantam|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asminn|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|dadhAti|brahmavarcasIti# brahma - varcasI|Eva|Bavati|indrAya|arkava̍ta̍ ityarka - vatE|purOḍAśa̱m|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|anna̍kAma̍ ityanna# - kAmaḥ|arkaḥ|vai|dEvAnA̱m|anna̱m|indra̱m|Eva|arkavantamityarka̍ - vantam|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|36̍ (50)
verses.samhita: EvAsmA# indriyaM paśUn prayacCati̍ paśumAnEva BavatIndrA̍ya-Garmava̍tE̍ purOḍAśamEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEd-brahmavarcasakA̍mO̍ brahmavarcasaM ~Mvai Garma indramEva̍ Garmavantaṅq̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmin̍ brahmavarcasaM dadhAti̍ brahmavarcasyEva̍ BavatIndrA̍yArkava̍tE̍ purOḍAśamEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEdanna̍kAmO&rkO̍ vai dEvAnAmannamindramEvArkava̍ntaṅq̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnO - [ ] 36

verses.padam: - Padam upEti|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmai|anna̱m|prEti̍|yacCati|annAda̍ ityanna̍ - adaḥ|Eva|Bavati|indrAya|Garmava̍ta̍ iti# Garma - vatE|purOḍAśa̱m|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|indrA̍ya|indriyAva̍ta̍ itI̱ndriya - vatE|indrAya|arkava̍ta̍ ityarka - vatE|BUtikAma̍ iti BUti# - kAmaḥ|yat|indrAya|Garmava̍ta̍ iti# Garma - vatE|nirvapatIti# niḥ-vapati|śira̍ḥ|Eva|asya|tEna̍|karOti|yat|indrA̍ya|indriyAva̍ta̍ itI̱ndriya - vatE|AtmAna̱m|Eva|asya|tEna|karOti|yat|indrA̍ya|arkava̍ta̍ ityarka - vatE|BUtaḥ|Eva|annAdya ityanna̍ - adyE̱|pratIti|tiṣṭhati|Bava̍ti|Eva|indrA̍ya|37̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -pa# dhAvati sa EvAsmA annaM prayacCatyannAda̍ Eva BavatIndrA̍ya̍ GarmavatE̍ purOḍAśamEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEdindrA̍yE-ndriyAva̍ta̍ indrAyA&rkava̍tE̍ BUtikAmO̍ yadindrAya̍ GarmavatE̍ nirvapati̍ śira# EvAsya tEna# karOti yadindrAyEndriyAva̍ta̍ AtmAnamEvAsya̍ tEna# karOtiyadindrAyA&rkava̍tE̍ BUta EvAnnAdyE pratitiṣṭhati̍ BavatyEvEndrA̍yA̍ - [ ] 37

verses.padam: - Padam aṃqhOmuca ityaṃhaḥ̍ - mucE̱|purOḍAśa̱m|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|yaḥ|pApmanA̱|gRuhItaḥ|syAt|pApmA|vai|aṃha̍ḥ|indra̱m|Eva|aṃqhOmucamityaṃ̍haḥ̍ - muca̱m|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga-dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|Enam|pApmana̍ḥ|aṃha̍saḥ|mu~jcati|indrA̍ya|vaimRudhAya̍|purOḍAśa̱m|EkA̍daśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|yam|mRudha̍ḥ|aBIti̍|pravEpE̍ranniti̍# pra - vEpErann|rAṣṭrAṇi̍|vA|aBIti̍|samiyuriti̍# saM - iyuḥ|indra̱m|Eva|vaimRudham|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmAt|mRudha̍ḥ|38̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -&ṃ hOmucE# purOḍAśamEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEdyaḥ̍ pApmanA# gRuhItaḥ syAt pApmA vA aṃha indramEvA&ṃ̍ hOmucaṅq svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvainaM̍ pApmanO&ṃhasO̍ mu~jcatIndrAya̍ vaimRudhAya# purOḍAśamEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEdyaM̍ mRudhO&Bi pravEpEran-rAṣṭrAṇi̍# vA&Bi samiyurindra̍mEva̍ vaimRudhaṅ̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmAnmRudhO - [ ] 38

verses.padam: - Padam apEti|hanti|indrA̍ya|trAtrE|purOḍAśa̱m|EkA̍daśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|baddhaḥ|vA|pari̍yatta̍ iti pari# - yattaḥ|vA|indra̱m|Eva|trAtAra̱m|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|Enam|trAyatE|indrA̍ya|arkAśvamEdhava̍ta̍ ityarkAśvamEdha-vatE|purOḍAśa̱m|EkA̍daśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|yam|mahAyajña̍ iti# mahA - yajñaḥ|na|upanamEdityupa̍ - namE̱t|EtE iti|vai|mahAyajñasyEti̍# mahA - yajñasya|antyE̍ iti|tanU̍ iti|yat|arkAśvamEdhAvitya̍rka̍ - aśvamEdhau|indra̱m|Eva|arkAśvamEdhavantamitya̍rkAśvamEdha̍ - vantam|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmai̍ ( )|antataḥ|mahAyajñamiti# mahA - yajñam|cyAvayati|upEti|Enam|mahAyajña̍ iti# mahA - yajñaḥ|namati||39 (57) (indriyAvantaṅq̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sO̱ - &rkavantaṅq̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnai̍ - vEndrAyA̍ - smAn mRudhO̱ - &smai - sapta ca# ) (A7)
verses.samhita: &pa# hantIndrAya̍ trAtrE purOḍAśamEkA̍daśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEd-baddhO̍ vA pariyattO̍ vEndramEva̍ trAtAraṅq svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvainaM̍ trAyata indrAyArkAśvamEdhava̍tE̍ purOḍAśamEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEdyaM̍ mahAyajñO̍ nOpanamEdEtE̍ vai mahAyajñasyAntyE̍# tanU yadarkAśvamEdhAvindra̍mEvArkA̱śvamEdha-̍ vantaṅq̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmA# ( ) antatO mahAyajñaM̍ cyAvayatyupai̍naM̍ mahAyajñO namati||39̍

verses.padam: - Padam indrAya|anvRu̍java̍ ityanu# - RujavE|purOḍAśa̱m|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|grAma̍kAma̍ iti grAma# - kAmaḥ|indra̱m|Eva|anvRujumityanu̍-Rujum|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga-dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmai|sajAtAniti̍# sa - jAtAn|anukAnityanu̍# - kAn|karOti|grAmI|Eva|Bavati|indrAṇyai|carum|niriti|vapEt|yasya̍|sEnA̱|asaṃ̍śitEtyasa̱M̍ - śitA|iva|syAt|indrAṇI|vai|sEnAyai|dEvatA̱|indrAṇIm|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|sA|Eva|asya|sEnA̱m|samiti̍|śyati|balba̍jAn|apIti̍|40̍ (50)
verses.samhita: indrAyAnvRujavE̍ purOḍAśamEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEd̍ grAmakAma̍ indramEvAnvRu̍juṅq̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmai# sajAtAnanukAn̍ karOti grAmyEva̍ BavatIndrAṇyai̍ caruM nirvapEdyasya̍ sEnA&saṃśitEva̍ syAdindrAṇI̍ vai sEnAyai̍ dEvatE̱ndrAṇImEva svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati saivAsya sEnAṃq saṅ śyati̍ balbajAnapI-̍ [ ] 40

verses.padam: - Padam iddhmE|samiti|nahyEt|gauḥ|yatra̍|adhi̍ṣkannEtyadhi̍# - skannA|nyamEhaditi̍# ni - amEhat|tata̍ḥ|balba̍jAḥ|uditi̍|atiṣṭhann|gavA̱m|Eva|Enam|nyAyamiti̍# ni - Ayam|apinIyEtyapi̍ -nIya|gAḥ|vEdayati|indrA̍ya|manyumata̍ iti# manyu - matE̱|manasvatE|purOḍAśa̱m|EkA̍daśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|sagrAMqma̍ iti# saM - grAmE|saM~Myatta̍ iti saM - yattE|indriyEṇa|vai|manyunA̱|mana̍sA|sagrAMqmamiti̍# saM - grAmam|jayati|indra̱m|Eva|manyumantamiti# manyu - manta̱m|manasvantam|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga-dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asminn|indriyam|manyum|mana̍ḥ|dadhAti|jaya̍ti|tam|41̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -ddhmE saM nahyEd-gau-ryatrAdhi̍ṣkannAnyamE̍hat̍ tatO balbajA̍ udatiṣṭhan̍ gavAmEvaina̍M̍ nyAyamapinIya̍ gA vEdayatIndrA̍ya̍ manyumatE manasvatE̍ purOḍAśamEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEth̍ saMgrAmE saM~Myatta̍ indriyEṇa vai manyunA manasA̍ saMgrAmaM jayatIndra̍mEva̍ manyumantaM̍ manasvantaṅq̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsminnindriyaM̍ manyuM manO# dadhAti jayati̍ taṃ - [ ] 41

verses.padam: - Padam sagrAMqmamiti# saM -grAmam|EtAm|Eva|niriti|vapEt|yaḥ|hatama̍nA̍ iti# hata - manAḥ|svayaMpApa̍ iti# svayaM - pApaḥ|iva|syAt|EtAni|hi|vai|EtasmA̱t|apa̍krAntAnItyapa̍# - krAntAni|atha|Eṣaḥ|hatama̍nA̍ iti# hata - manAḥ|svayaMpApa̍ iti# svayaM - pApaḥ|indra̱m|Eva|manyumantamiti# manyu - manta̱m|manasvantam|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga-dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asminn|indriyam|manyum|mana̍ḥ|dadhAti|na|hatama̍nA̍ iti# hata-manAḥ|svayaMpApa̍ iti# svayaM-pApaḥ|Bavati|indrAya|dAtrE|purOḍAśa̱m|EkA̍daśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|yaḥ|kAmayE̍ta|dAna̍kAmA̍ iti dAna# - kAmAḥ|mE|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|syuḥ|42 (50)
verses.samhita: sagrAMqmamEtAmEva̍ nirvapEdyO̍ hatamanAḥ̍ svayaM pApa̍ iva syAdEtAni hi vA EtasmA dapakrAntAnyathaiṣa̍ hatamanAḥ̍ svayaM pApa̍ indramEva̍ manyumantaM̍ manasvantaṅq̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsminnindriyaM̍ manyuM manO# dadhAti na hatamanAḥ̍ svayaM pApO̍ BavatIndrAya̍ dAtrE purOḍAśamEkA̍daśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEdyaḥ̍ kAmayEta̍ dAnakAmA̍ mE prajAḥ syu - [ ] 42

verses.padam: - Padam iti|indra̱m|Eva|dAtAra̱m|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmai|dAna̍kAmA̍ iti dAna-kAmAḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|karOti|dAnakAmA̍ iti dAna# - kAmAḥ|asmai|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|Bavanti|indrAya|pradAtra̍ iti# pra - dAtrE|purOḍAśa̱m|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|yasmai̱|pratta̱m|iva|sat|na|pradIyEtEti̍# pra - dIyEta|indra̱m|Eva|pradAtAramiti̍# pra - dAtAra̱m|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmai|prEti̍|dApayati|indrA̍ya|sutrAMṇa̍ iti# su - trAMṇE̱|purOḍAśa̱m|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|apa̍ruddha̍ ityapa# - ruddhaḥ|vA|43 (50)
verses.samhita: -ritIndramEva̍ dAtAraṅq svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmai dAnakAmAḥ̍ prajAḥ karOti̍ dAnakAmA̍ asmai prajA BavantIndrA̍ya̍ pradAtrE purOḍAśamEkA̍daśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEdyasmai̍ prattamiva̍ sanna pradIyEtEndra̍mEva̍ pradAtAraṅq̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpadhAvati̍ sa EvAsmai pradApayatIndrA̍ya̍ sutrAmṇE# purOḍAśamEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEdapa̍ruddhO̍ vA - [ ] 43

verses.padam: - Padam aparuddhyamAna̍ ityapa̍ - ruddhyamAnaḥ|vA|indra̱m|Eva|sutrAmA̍ṇamiti̍# su - trAmAṇam|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga-dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|Enam|trAyatE|anaparuddhya̍ ityanapa̍ - ruddhyaḥ|Bavati|indraḥ|vai|sadRu~g~giti̍# sa - dRu~g|dEvatABiḥ|AsIt|saḥ|na|vyAvRutamiti̍# vi - AvRuta̱m|agacCat|saḥ|prajApatimiti̍# prajA - patim|upEti|adhAvat|tasmai̱|Etam|aindram|EkA̍daśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|avapat|tEna̍|Eva|asminn|indriyam|adadhAt|śakva̍rI̍ iti|yAjyAnuvAkyE̍# iti# yAjyA - anuvAkyE̱|akarOt|vajraḥ|vai|śakva̍rI|saḥ|Enam|vajra̍ḥ|BUtyai̱|aindha|44̍ (50)
verses.samhita: &paruddhayamAnO̍ vEndramEva̍ sutrAmAṇaṅq̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvainaM̍ trAyatE &naparuddhyO BavatIndrO̍ vai sadRu~g dEvatABirAsIth̍ sa na vyAvRutamagacCath̍ sa prajApatimupA̍dhAvat̍ tasmA# EtamaindramEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ niravapat̍ tEnai-vAsminnindriyama̍dadhA-cCakva̍rI̍ yAjyAnuvAkyE# akarOd-vajrO vai śakvarI̍ sa EnaM̍ ~MvajrO BUtyA# aindha - [ ] 44

verses.padam: - Padam saḥ|aBavat|saḥ|abiBEt|BUtaḥ|prEti|mA|dhakṣyati|iti̍|saḥ|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA-patim|punaḥ|upEti̍|adhAvat|saḥ|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|śakvaryAḥ|adhIti̍|rEvatI̱m|niriti̍|amimIta|śAntyai̱|apra̍dAhAyEtyapra̍# - dAhAya|yaḥ|ala̱m|śriyai|sann|sadRu~g~giti# sa - dRu~g~g|samAnaiḥ|syAt|tasmai̱|Etam|aindram|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|indra̱m|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga-dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asminn|indriyam|dadhAti|rEvatI̱|purOnuvAkyEti̍# puraḥ - anuvAkyA̱|Bavati ( )|śAntyai̱|apradAhAyEtyapra̍# - dAhAya|śakvarI|yAjyA̱|vajra̍ḥ|vai|śakva̍rI|saḥ|Enam|vajra̍ḥ|BUtyai̱|indhE|Bava̍ti|Eva||45̍ (64) (api - taṅ - syu# - rvai - ndha - Bavati - caturdaśa̍ ca ) (A8)
verses.samhita: sO&Bavath̍ sO&biBEd-BUtaḥ̍ pra mA# dhakṣyatIti sa prajApatiM̍ punarupAdhAvath̍ sa prajApatiḥ̍ śakvaryA̍ adhi# rEvatIM niramimIta̍ śAntyA apradAhAya̍ yO&laṅ# śriyai santh-sadRu~gKsamAnaiḥ̍ syAt tasmA# EtamaindramEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEdindra̍mEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsminnindriyaM̍ dadhAti̍ rEvatI# purO&nuvAkyA# Bavati ( ) śAntyA apradAhAya̍ śakvarI̍ yAjyA# vajrO vai śakvarIsa̍ EnaM̍ ~MvajrO BUtyA# indhE BavatyEva||45̍

verses.padam: - Padam AgnAvaiṣṇavamityA̱gnA - vaiṣṇavam|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|aBicarannitya̍Bi̍ - carann|sara̍svatI|Ajya̍BAgEtyAjya̍# - BAgA|syAt|bAṛqhaspatyaḥ|caruḥ|yat|AgnAvaiṣṇava ityA̱gnA - vaiṣṇavaḥ|EkAdaśakapAla̍ ityEkAdaśa-kapAlaḥ|Bava̍ti|agniḥ|sarvA̱ḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|viṣṇu̍ḥ|yajñaḥ|dEvatA̍Biḥ|ca|Eva|Enam|yajñEna̍|ca|aBIti̍|carati|sara̍svatI|Ajya̍BAgEtyAjya̍-BAgA|Bavati|vAk|vai|sara̍svatI|vAcA|Eva|Enam|aBIti̍|carati|bAṛqhaspatyaḥ|caruḥ|Bavati|brahma̍|vai|dEvAnA̱m|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|brahma̍ṇA|Eva|Enam|aBIti̍|carati|46̍ (50)
verses.samhita: AgnA-vaiṣṇava-mEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEdaBicaranth-sara̍svatyAjya̍# BAgA syAd-bAṛhaspat̍ yaścaruryadA̱gnA-vaiṣṇava EkAdaśakapAlO̍ Bavatyagniḥ̍ sarvA# dEvatA viṣṇuryajñO̍ dEvatABiścaivaina̍M̍ ~MyajñEna# cABi caratisara̍svatyAjya̍BAgA̍ Bavati vAgvai sarasvatI̍ vAcaivainamaBi̍ carati̍ bAṛhaspatyaścaru rBavati̍ brahma vai dEvAnAM bRuhaspati rbrahmaṇaivaina̍maBi̍ carati̍ - [ ] 46

verses.padam: - Padam pratIti|vai|parastA̱t|aBicara̍ntamitya̍Bi̍ - carantam|aBIti̍|caranti|dvEdvE̍ iti dvE - dvE|purOnuvAkya# iti# puraḥ - anuvAkyE̱|kuryAt|atIti|prayu̍ktyA̍ iti pra - yuktyai|EtayA̱|Eva|yajEta|aBicaryamAṇa̍ ityaBi̍ - caryamAṇaḥ|dEvatA̍Biḥ|Eva|dEvatA̱ḥ|praticaratIti̍# prati - carati|yajñEna̍|yajñam|vAcA|vAca̱m|brahma̍ṇA|brahma̍|saḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|ca|Eva|yajñam|ca|maddhyataḥ|vyava̍sarpatIti̍# vi - avasarpati|tasya̍|na|kuta̍ḥ|cana|upAvyAdha̍ ityupa̍ - AvyAdhaḥ|Bavati|na|Enam|aBicarannityaBi̍ - carann|stRuṇutE|AgnAvaiṣṇavamityA̱gnA̍ - vaiṣṇavam|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|yam|yajñaḥ|na|47̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prati vai parastAdaBicara̍ntamaBi̍ caranti̍ dvEdvE# purO&nuvAkyE# kuryAdati prayuktyA̍ Etayaiva yajEtABi̍ caryamAṇO̍ dEvatABirEva̍ dEvatA̱ḥ praticarati̍ yajñEna# yajñaM ~MvAcA vAcaM brahmaṇA̍ brahma sa dEvatA̱ścaiva yajñaM ca# maddhyatO vyavasarpati̍ tasya na kutaścanOpA̱vyAdhO̍ Bavati̍ nainamaBicaraṉ-thstRuṇuta̍ AgnAvaiṣṇava-mEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEdyaM̍ ~MyajñO nO - [ ] 47

verses.padam: - Padam upanamEdityupa̍ - namE̱t|agniḥ|sarvA̱ḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|viṣṇuḥ|yajñaḥ|agnim|ca|Eva|viṣṇu̱m|ca|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga-dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tau|Eva|asmai|yajñam|prEti̍|yacCataḥ|upEti̍|Enam|yajñaḥ|namati|AgnAvaiṣṇavamityA̱gnA̍ - vaiṣṇavam|GRutE|carum|niriti|vapEt|cakṣu̍ṣkAma̍ iti cakṣuḥ̍ - kAmaḥ|agnEḥ|vai|cakṣuṣA|manuṣyA̱ḥ|vIti̍|paśyanti|yajñasya̍|dEvAḥ|agnim|ca|Eva|viṣṇu̱m|ca|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tau|Eva|48̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -panamEdagniḥ̍ sarvA# dEvatA viṣṇuryajñO̱&gniM̍ caiva viṣṇuM̍ ca svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati tAvEvAsmai# yajñaM prayacCata̍ upainaM̍ ~MyajñO namatyAgnA-̍ vaiṣṇavaM GRutE caruM nirvapEccakṣu̍ṣkAmO&gnErvai̍ cakṣuṣA̍ manuṣyA# vi paśyanti̍ yajñasya# dEvA agniM caiva viṣṇuM̍ ca svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati tAvEvA - [ ] 48

verses.padam: - Padam asminn|cakṣuḥ|dhattaḥ|cakṣu̍ṣmAn|Eva|Bavati|dhEnvai|vai|Etat|rEta̍ḥ|yat|Ajya̱m|anaḍuha̍ḥ|taṇḍulAḥ|mithunAt|Eva|asmai|cakṣu̍ḥ|prEti̍|janayati|GRutE|Bavati|tEja̍ḥ|vai|GRutam|tEja̍ḥ|cakṣu̍ḥ|tEja̍sA|Eva|asmai|tEja̍ḥ|cakṣu̍ḥ|avEti̍|rundhE|indriyam|vai|vIrya̱m|vRu~gktE|BrAtRu̍vyaḥ|yaja̍mAnaḥ|aya̍jamAnasya|addhvaraka̍lpAmitya̍ddhvara-kalpAm|prati̍|niriti̍|vapEt|BrAtRu̍vyE|yaja̍mAnE|na|asya|indriyam|49̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -&smin cakṣurddhattaścakṣu̍ṣmAnEva̍ Bavati̍ dhEnvai vA Etad-rEtO yadAjya-manaḍuha̍-staṇḍulA̍ mithunAdEvAsmai̍ cakṣuḥ prajanayati̍ GRutE Bavati̍ tEjO vai GRutaM tEjaścakṣu-stEjasaivAsmai̍ tEjaścakṣurava# rundha indriyaM ~Mvai vIryaM̍ ~MvRu~gktE BrAtRuvyO̍ yajamAnO&ya̍jamAnasyA-dhvaraka̍lpAM̍ prati nirvapEd-BrAtRu̍vyE̍ yajamAnE̍ nAsyE̱ndriyaM - [ ] 49

verses.padam: - Padam vIrya̱m|vRu~gktE|purA|vAcaḥ|pravaditOriti̍ pra - vaditOḥ|niriti|vapEt|yAva̍tI|Eva|vAk|tAm|aprO̍ditAmityapra̍# - uditAm|BrAtRuvyasya|vRu~gktE|tAm|asya|vAca̱m|pravada̍ntImiti̍# pra - vadantIm|anyAḥ|vAca̍ḥ|anu̍|prEti̍|vadanti|tAḥ|indriyam|vIrya̱m|yaja̍mAnE|dadhati|AgnAvaiṣṇavamityA̱gnA̍ - vaiṣṇavam|aṣṭAkapAlamityaṣṭA-kapAlam|niriti̍|vapEt|prAtaḥ̍ savanasyEti# prAtaḥ - savanasya|AkAla̍ ityA̱ - kAlE|sarasvatI|Ajya̍BAgEtyAjya̍# - BAgA|syAt|bAṛqhaspatyaḥ|caruḥ|yat|aṣṭAkapAla̍ ityaṣṭA - kapAlaḥ|Bavati|aṣṭAkṣarEtyaṣṭA-̍ akṣarA|gAyatrI|gAyatram|prAtaḥ savanamiti# prAtaḥ - savanam|prAtaḥ savanamiti# prAtaḥ - savanam|Eva|tEna|ApnOti|50̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ~MvIryaM# ~MvRu~gktE purAvAcaḥ pravaditO-rnirva̍pEdyAva̍tyEva̍ vAk tAmaprOditAM̍ BrAtRuvyasya̍ vRu~gktE tAmasya̍ vAcaM̍ pravadantImanyA̍ vAcO&nu pravadanti̍ tA indriyaM̍ ~MvIryaM̍ ~MyajamAnE̍ dadhatyAgnA vaiṣṇava-maṣṭAkapAlaM̍ nirvapEt̍ prAtaḥ savanasyA&&*̍ kAlE sarasvatyAjya̍BAgA̍ syAd bAṛhaspatyaścaru-̍ ryadaṣṭAkapAlO̍ BavatyaṣṭAkṣa̍rA̍ gAyatrI gAyatraM̍ prAtaḥ̍ savanaM prAtaḥ̍ savanamEva tEnA̱pnO - [ ] 50

verses.padam: - Padam AgnAvaiṣṇavamityA̱gnA - vaiṣṇavam|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|mAddhya̍ndinasya|sava̍nasya|AkAla̍ ityA̱ - kAlE|sarasvatI|Ajya̍BAgEtyAjya̍# - BAgA|syAt|bAṛqhaspatyaḥ|caruḥ|yat|EkAdaśakapAla̍ ityEkAdaśa̍ - kapAlaḥ|Bavati|EkA̍daśAkṣarEtyEkA̍daśa̍ - akṣarA|triṣṭup|traiṣṭuBam|mAddhya̍ndinam|sava̍nam|mAddhya̍ndinam|Eva|sava̍nam|tEna̍|ApnOti|AgnAvaiṣṇavamityA̱gnA̍ - vaiṣṇavam|dvAdaśakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|tRutIyasavanasyEti̍# tRutIya- savanasya|AkAla̍ ityA̱ - kAlE|sarasvatI|Ajya̍BAgEtyAjya̍# - BAgA|syAt|bAṛqhaspatyaḥ|caruḥ|yat|dvAdaśakapAla̍ iti dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlaḥ|Bavati|dvAda̍śAkṣarEti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - akṣarA|jagatI|jAga̍tam|tRutIyasavanamiti̍# tRutIya - savanam|tRutIyasavanamiti# tRutIya -savanam|Eva|tEna|ApnOti|dEvatA̍Biḥ|Eva|dEqvatA̱ḥ|51̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -tyAgnAvaiṣṇava-mEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEnmAddhya̍ndinasya̍ savanasyA&&̍ *kAlE sarasvatyAjya̍BAgA̍ syAd bAṛhaspatya-ścaru̍ ryadEkAdaśakapAlO̍ BavatyEkAdaśAkṣarA̍ triṣṭup traiṣṭuBaM̍ mAddhyandinaṃq̍ savanaM̍ mAddhyadiMnamEva̍ savanaM̍ tEnA̱&&*pnOtyAgnAvaiṣṇavaM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEt̍ tRutIyasavanasyA&&*kAlE̍ sarasvatyAjya̍BAgA̍ syAd bAṛhaspatyaścaruryad̍ dvAdaśakapAlO̍ Bavati̍ dvAdaśAkṣarA̍ jagatI̍ jAgataM̍ tRutIyasavanaM tRutIya̍ savanamEva tEnA̱&&pnOti dEvatABirEva̍ dEvatA̱ḥ - [ ] 51

verses.padam: - Padam praticaratIti# prati - carati|yajñEna̍|yajñam|vAcA|vAca̱m|brahma̍ṇA|brahma̍|kapAlai̱ḥ|Eva|CandAṃ̍si|ApnOti̍|purOḍAśai̱ḥ|sava̍nAni|maitrAvaruṇamiti̍# maitrA - varuṇam|EkakapAlamityEka̍# - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|vaśAyai̱|kAlE|yA|Eva|asau|BrAtRu̍vyasya|vaśA|anUbandhyEtya̍nu̍ - bandhyA̱|sO iti|Eva|EṣA|Etasya̍|Eka̍kapAla̍ ityEka-kapAlaḥ|Bavati|na|hi|kapAlai̱ḥ|paśum|aṛha̍ti|Aptu̱m||52̍ (37) (brahmaṇaivaina̍maBi̍ carati̍ - yajñO na - tAvEvA - &syE̱ndriya - mA̱pnOti -dEvatA̱ḥ - saptatriṃśacca̍ ) (A9)
verses.samhita: praticarati̍ yajñEna# yajñaM ~MvAcA vAcaM brahmaṇA̍ brahma# kapAlairEva̍ CandAṅsyApnOti̍# purOḍAśaiḥ savanAni̍ maitrAvaruṇamEkakapAlaM̍ nirvapEd-vaśAyai̍# kAlE yaivAsau BrAtRuvyasya̍ vaśA&nUbandhyA̍# sO EvaiṣaitasyaikakapAlO̍ Bavati na hi kapAlai̱ḥ paśumaṛhatyAptu̱M||52

verses.padam: - Padam asau|Adityaḥ|na|vIti|arOcata|tasmai̱|dEvAḥ|prAya̍ścittim|aicCann|tasmai̱|Etam|sOmAraudramiti̍# sOmA-raudram|carum|niriti|avapann|tEna̍|Eva|asminn|ruca̱m|adadhuḥ|yaḥ|brahmavarcasakA̍ma̍ iti# brahmavarcasa - kAmaḥ|syAt|tasmai̱|Etam|sOmAraudramiti# sOmA - raudram|carum|niriti|vapEt|sOma̱m|ca|Eva|rudram|ca|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga-dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tau|Eva|asminn|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|dhattaḥ|brahmavarcasIti# brahma - varcasI|Eva|Bavati|tiṣyApUrṇamAsa iti# tiṣyA - pUrṇamAsE|niriti|vapEt|rudraḥ|53̍ (50)
verses.samhita: asAvAdityO̍ na vyarOcata̍ tasmai# dEvAḥ prAyaścittimaicCan̍ tasmA# Etaṃ sOmAraudraM̍ caruM niravapan̍ tEnaivAsmin rucamadadhuryO̍ brahmavarcasakA̍maḥ̍ syAt tasmA# Etaṃ sOmAraudraM̍ caruM nirvapEth̍ sOmaM̍ caiva rudraM ca svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati tAvEvAsmin̍ brahmavarcasaM dhattO̍ brahmavarcasyEva̍ Bavati̍ tiṣyApUrṇamAsE nirvapEd-rudrO̍ - [ ] 53

verses.padam: - Padam vai|tiṣyaḥ|sOma̍ḥ|pUrṇamA̍sa̍ iti# pUrṇa - mAsaḥ|sAkṣAditi# sa - akṣAt|Eva|brahmavarcasamiti# brahma - varcasam|avEti|rundhE|pari̍śrita̍ iti pari# - śritE|yAjayati|brahmavarcasasyEti# brahma - varcasasya|pari̍gRuhItyA̍ iti pari# - gRuhItyai|śvEtAyai̱|śvEtavathsAyA̍ iti# śvEta - vathsAyai|dugdham|mathitam|Ajya̱m|Bavati|Ajya̱m|prOkṣaṇamiti̍# pra - ukṣaṇam|AjyE̍na|mArjayantE|yAva̍t|Eva|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|tat|sarva̱m|karOti|atIti|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|kriyatE|iti|Ahuḥ|Iśvaraḥ|duścarmEti̍# duḥ - carmA̱|BavitOḥ|iti̍|mAnavI̍ iti|Rucau̱|dhAyyE̍# iti|kuryAt|yat|vai|kim|ca|manu̍ḥ|ava̍dat|tat|BEṣajam|54̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vai tiṣyaḥ̍ sOmaḥ̍ pUrṇamAsaḥ̍ sAkṣAdEva brahmavarcasamava̍# rundhE pariśritE̍ yAjayati brahmavarcasasya parigRuhItyai̍ śvEtAyai̱ śvEtavathsAyai̍ dugdhaM mathitamAjya̍M̍ BavatyAjyaM prOkṣaṇamAjyE̍na̍ mArjayantE yAvadEva̍ brahmavarcasaM̍ tath sarvaM̍ karOtyati# brahmavarcasaM kriyata̍ ityAhurIśvarO̍ duścarmA BavitOriti̍# mAnavI Rucau# dhAyyE# kuryAd-yadvai ki~jca manuravadat-tad-Ba̍ṣajaM̍ - [ ] 54

verses.padam: - Padam BEṣajam|Eva|asmai|karOti|yadi|biBIyAt|duścarmEti̍# duḥ - carmA̱|BaviṣyAmi|iti|sOmApauṣṇamiti̍# sOmA - pauṣṇam|carum|niriti|vapEt|saumyaḥ|vai|dEvata̍yA|puru̍ṣaḥ|pauṣṇAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|svayA̱|Eva|asmai|dEvata̍yA|paśuBiriti̍# paśu - Biḥ|tvaca̱m|karOti|na|duścarmEti# duḥ - carmA̱|Bavati|sOmAraudramiti# sOmA - raudram|carum|niriti|vapEt|prajAkA̍ma̍ iti# prajA - kAmaḥ|sOmaḥ|vai|rEtOdhA̍ iti# rEtaḥ - dhAḥ|agniḥ|prajAnAmiti# pra - jAnA̱m|prajanayitEti# pra - janayitA|sOmaḥ|Eva|asmai|rEta̍ḥ|dadhA̍ti|agniḥ|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|prEti|janayati|vindatE̱|55̍ (50)
verses.samhita: BEṣajamEvAsmai̍# karOti yadi# biBIyAd-duścarmA# BaviṣyAmIti# sOmApauṣṇaM caruM nirvapEth̍ saumyO vai dEvatayA̍ puruṣaḥ̍ pauṣṇAḥ paśavaḥ svayai vAsmai# dEvatayA̍ paśuBistvacaM̍ karOti na duścarmA# Bavati sOmAraudraM caruM nirvapEt̍ prajAkAmaḥ̍ sOmO vai rEtOdhA̍ agniḥ prajAnA̱M prajanayitA sOma# EvAsmai rEtO dadhA̱tyagniḥ prajAM prajanayati̍ vindatE̱ - [ ] 55

verses.padam: - Padam prajAmiti# pra -jAm|sOmAraudramiti# sOmA- raudram|carum|niriti|vapEt|aBicarannitya̍Bi-carann̍|saumyaḥ|vai|dEvata̍yA|puru̍ṣaḥ|Eṣaḥ|rudraḥ|yat|agniḥ|svAyA̱ḥ|Eva|Enam|dEvatA̍yai|niṣkrIyEti̍# niḥ - krIya|rudrAya̍|apIti̍|dadhAti|tAjak|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCati|sOmAraudramiti̍# sOmA-raudram|carum|niriti|vapEt|jyOgA̍mayAvIti̍ jyOk - AmayAvI|sOma̱m|vai|Etasya|rasa̍ḥ|gacCati|agnim|śarI̍ram|yasya̍|jyOk|Amaya̍ti|sOmA̱t|Eva|asya|rasa̱m|niṣkrIṇAtIti̍# niḥ - krIṇAti|agnEḥ|śarI̍ram|uta|yadi̍|56̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prajAṃ sOmAraudraM̍ caruM nirvapEdaBicaraṉ-thsaumyO̍ vai dEvatayA̍ puruṣa̍ Eṣa rudrO yadagniḥ svAyA# EvainaM̍ dEvatAyai̍ niṣkrIya# rudrAyApi# dadhAti tAjagArtimArcCati̍ sOmAraudraM caruM nirvapE-jjyOgA̍mayAvI̍ sOmaM ~MvA Etasya rasO# gacCatyagniṃ śarIraM̍ ~Myasya jyOgAmayati̍ sOmAdEvAsya̍ rasaM̍ niṣkrIṇAtyagnEḥ śarIramuta̍ yadI - [ ] 56

verses.padam: - Padam itAsuritIta - asuḥ|Bavati|jIva̍ti|Eva|sOmArudrayOriti̍# sOmA - rudrayO̱ḥ|vai|Etam|grasitam|hOtA̱|niriti|Kidati|saḥ|Iśvaraḥ|Arti̱m|AtArriyA̍ - artOḥ|anaḍvAn|hOtrA̱|dEyaḥ|vahni̍ḥ|vai|anaḍvAn|vahni̍ḥ|hOtA̱|vahni̍nA|Eva|vahni̱m|AtmAna̱m|spRuṇOti|sOmAraudramiti̍# sOmA - raudram|carum|niriti|vapEt|yaḥ|kAmayE̍ta|svE|asmai|Ayata̍na̍ ityA̱ - yatanE|BrAtRu̍vyam|janayEyam|iti̍|vEdi̱m|parigRuhyEti̍# pari - gRuhya|arddham|uddhanyAdityu̍t-hanyAt|arddham|na|arddham|barqḥiṣa̍ḥ|stRuṇIyAt|arddham̍ ( )|na|arddham|iqddhmasya|aByAdaddhyAditya̍Bi̍ - AdaddhyAt|arddham|na|svE|Eva|asmai|Ayatana̍ ityA̱ - yatanE|BrAtRu̍vyam|janayati||57̍ (62)
verses.samhita: -tAsu rBavati̍ jIvatyEva̍ sOmArudrayOrvA̍ EtaM grasitaṃ̍ hOtA niṣKidati̍ sa I̱śvara ArtimArtO-ranaḍvAn.̍ hOtrA dEyO vahnirvA anaḍvAn.̍ vahnirqḥOtA vahninaiva̍ vahnimAtmAnaṅ̍# spRuṇOti sOmAraudraM caruM nirvapEdyaḥ̍ kAmayEta̍ svE̱&smA AyatanE̍ BrAtRuvyaM̍ janayEyamiti vEdiM̍ parigRuhyArddhamuddhanyAdarddhaM̍ nArddhaM barqḥiṣaḥ̍ stRuṇIyAdarddhaM ( ) nArddha-middhmasyA̱ByA-daddhyA-dadqrddhaM na sva EvAsmA# AyatanE̍ BrAtRuvyaM̍ janayati||57

verses.padam: - Padam aindram|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|mArutam|saptaka̍pAlamiti̍# sapta - kapAlam|grAmakAma̍ iti grAma# - kAmaḥ|indra̱m|ca|Eva|marutaḥ|ca|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tE|Eva|asmai|sajAtAniti̍# sa-jAtAn|prEti|yacCanti|grAmI|Eva|Bavati|AhavanIya̍ ityA̱ - havanIyE̱|aindram|adhIti|śrayati|gAṛha̍patya̍ iti gAṛha# - patyE|mArutam|pApavasyasasyEti# pApa - vasyasasya|vidhRu̍tyA̍ iti vi - dhRutyai|saptakapAla̍ iti# sapta - kapAlaḥ|mArutaḥ|Bavati|saptagaṇA̍ iti# sapta - gaṇAḥ|vai|marutaḥ|gaṇaśa̍ iti# gaṇa-śaḥ|Eva|asmai|sajAtAniti# sa - jAtAn|avEti|rundhE|anUcyamA̍na̍ ityanu̍ - ucyamAnE|Eti̍|sAdayati|viśa̱m|Eva|58̍ (50)
verses.samhita: aindramEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEnmArutaṃ̍ saptakapAlaM̍ grAmakAma̍ indraM̍ caiva marutaśca̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati ta EvAsmai# sajAtAn prayacCanti̍ grAmyEva̍ BavatyAhavanIya̍# aindramadhi# śrayati gAṛhapatyE̍ mArutaM pApavasyasasya̍ vidhRutyai̍ saptakapAlO̍ mArutO Bavati̍ saptagaṇA̍ vai marutOgaṇaśa̍ EvAsmai# sajAtAnava# rundhE&nUcyamAna̍ A sAdayati̍ viśamEvA̍ - [ ] 58

verses.padam: - Padam asmai|anuvartmAnamityanu̍# - vartmAnam|karOti|EtAm|Eva|niriti|vapEt|yaḥ|kAmayE̍ta|kṣatrAya̍|ca|viśE|ca|samadamiti̍# sa - mada̱m|daddhyAm|iti|aindrasya̍|avadyannitya̍va̍ - dyann|brUyAt|indrAya|anviti̍#|brUhi|iti̍|AśrAvyEtyA̱̍ - śrAvya|brUyAt|maruta̍ḥ|yaja|iti̍|mArutasya̍|avadyannitya̍va̍ - dyann|brUyAt|marudBya iti# marut - Byaḥ|anviti|brUhi|iti̍|AśrAvyEtyA̱̍ - śrAvya|brUyAt|indra̱m|yaja|iti̍|svE|Eva|EByaḥ|BAgadhEya̍ iti# BAga - dhEyE̱|samadamiti# sa - mada̱m|dadhAti|vitRuṃqhAṇA iti# vi-tRuṃqhAṇAḥ|tiṣṭhanti|EtAm|Eva|59 (50)
verses.samhita: -smA anuvartmAnaM̍ karOtyEtAmEva nirvapEdyaḥ̍ kAmayEta̍ kṣatrAya# ca viśE ca# samadaM̍ daddhyAmityaindrasyA-vadyan̍ brUyAdindrAyAnu̍# brUhItyAśrAvya# brUyAn-marutO# yajEti# mArutasyAvadyan̍ brUyAnmarudByO&nu̍# brUhItyAśrAvya# brUyAdindraM̍ ~MyajEti sva EvaiByO# BAgadhEyE# samadaM̍ dadhAti vitRuṃ hAṇAstiṣṭhantyE̍ tAmEva - [ ] 59

verses.padam: - Padam niriti|vapEt|yaḥ|kAmayE̍ta|kalpE̍rann|iti̍|yathAdavatamiti̍# yathA - dEvatam|avadAyEtyava̍ - dAya|yathAdEvatamiti̍# yathA - dEvatam|yajEt|BAgadhEyEnEti# BAga-dhEyEna|Eva|EnAn|yathAyathamiti̍# yathA - yatham|kalpayati|kalpantE|Eva|aindram|EkA̍daśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|vaiśvadEvamiti̍# vaiśva - dEvam|dvAdaśakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|grAmakAma̍ iti grAma# - kAmaḥ|indra̱m|ca|Eva|viśvAn|ca|dEvAn|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tE|Eva|asmai|sajAtAniti̍# sa - jAtAn|prEti|yacCanti|grAmI|Eva|Bavati|aindrasya̍|avadAyEtya̍va̍ - dAya|vaiśvadEvasyEti̍# vaiśva-dEvasya|avEti̍|dyEt|atha̍|aindrasya̍ḥ|60̍ (50)
verses.samhita: nirvapEdyaḥ̍ kAmayEta̍ kalpEranniti̍# yathAdEvatamavadAya̍# yathA dEvataM ~MyajEd-BAgadhEyE̍naivainAn̍# yathAyathaM kalpayati̍ kalpanta̍ Evaindra-mEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEd-vaiśvadEvaM̍ dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ grAmakAma̍ indraM̍ caiva viśvAṅśca̍ dEvAnth-svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati ta EvAsmai# sajAtAn prayacCanti̍ grAmyEva̍ BavatyaindrasyA̍vadAya̍# vaiśvadEvasyAva# dyEdathaindrasyO- [ ] 60

verses.padam: - Padam upariṣṭAt|indriyEṇa̍|Eva|asmai|uBayata̍ḥ|sajAtAniti̍# sa - jAtAn|parIti|gRuhṇAti|upAdhAyya̍# pUrvayamityupAdhAyya̍# - pUrvayam|vAsaḥ|dakṣi̍ṇA|sajAtAnAmiti̍# sa - jAtAnA̱m|upahityA̍ ityupa# - hityai|pRuśniyai|dugdhE|praiya̍~ggavam|carum|niriti̍|vapEt|marudBya̍ iti# marut - Byaḥ|grAmakAma̍ iti grAma# - kAmaḥ|pRuśniyai|vai|paya̍saḥ|maruta̍ḥ|jAtAḥ|pRuśni̍yai|priya~gga̍vaḥ|mArutAḥ|Kalu̍|vai|dEvata̍yA|sajAtA̍ iti# sa - jAtAḥ|marutaḥ|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tE|Eva|asmai|sajAtAniti̍# sa - jAtAn|prEti|yacCanti|grAmI|Eva|Bavati|priyava̍tI̍ iti# priya - vatI|yAjyAnuvAkyE# iti# yAjyA - anuvAkyE̱|61 (50)
verses.samhita: -pariṣṭAdindriyEṇaivAsmA̍# uBayataḥ̍ sajAtAn pari# gRuhṇAtyupAdhAyya# pUrvayaM ~MvAsO dakṣiṇA̍ sajAtAnAmupahityai̍ pRuśniyai̍ dugdhE praiya~ggavaM̍ caruM nirvapEnmarudByO̍ grAmakAmaḥ̍ pRuśniyai̍ vai payasO̍ marutO# jAtAḥ pRuśniyai̍ priya~ggavO̍ mArutAḥ Kalu vai dEvatayA̍ sajAtA maruta# Eva svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati ta EvAsmai# sajAtAn prayacCanti̍ grAmyEva̍ Bavati̍ priyavatI̍ yAjyAnuvAkyE# - [ ] 61

verses.padam: - Padam Bavataḥ|priyam|Eva|Enam|samAnAnA̱m|karOti|dvipadEti# dvi - padA̱|purOnuvAkyEti# puraḥ - anuvAkyA̱|Bavati|dvipada iti# dvi - padaḥ|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|catu̍ṣpadEti̍ catuḥ̍ - padA|yAjyA̱|catuṣpada̍ iti catuḥ̍ - padaḥ|Eva|paśUn|avEti|rundhE|dEvAsurA̍ iti# dEva - asurAḥ|saM~MyattA̍ iti saM - yattAḥ|Asann|tE|dEvAḥ|mithaḥ|vipriyA̍ iti vi - priyAḥ|Asann|tE|anyaḥ|anyasmai̱|jyaiṣṭhyAya|ati̍ṣṭhamAnAḥ|caturddhEti̍# catuḥ - dhA|vIti|akrAmann|agniḥ|vasu̍Biriti̍ vasu# - Biḥ|sOmaḥ|rudraiḥ|indra̍ḥ|marudBiriti̍# marut - Biḥ|varuṇaḥ|Adityaiḥ|saḥ|indra̍ḥ|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA - patim|upEti|adhAvat|tam|62̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Bavataḥ priyamEvainaṃ# samAnAnA̱M karOti dvipadA# purO&nuvAkyA# Bavati dvipada# EvAva# rundhE catuṣpadA̍ yAjyA# catuṣpada̍ Eva paśUnava# rundhE dEvAsurAḥ saM~MyattA̍ Asan tE dEvA mithO vipriyA̍ Asan tE̱ (1q) &nyO̱&nyasmai jyaiṣ^^ṭhyAyA-tiṣṭhamAnAścaturddhA̍ vyakrAmannagnirvasu̍Biḥ̍ sOmO# rudrairindrO# marudBirvaruṇa̍ Adityaiḥ sa indraḥ̍ prajApatimupA̍dhAvat̍ ta - [ ] 62

verses.padam: - Padam EtayA̱|sajñAMnyEti# saM - jñAnyA̱|ayAjayat|agnayE̱|vasumata̍ iti vasu# - matE|purOḍAśa̱m|aṣṭAkapAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|niriti|avapat|sOmA̍ya|rudrava̍ta̍ iti# rudra - vatE|carum|indrAya|marutva̍tE|purOḍAśa̱m|EkA̍daśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|varuṇAya|Adityava̍ta̍ ityAditya̍ - vatE|carum|tataḥ|vai|indra̱m|dEvAḥ|jyaiṣṭhyA̍ya|aBi|samiti̍|ajAnata|yaḥ|samAnaiḥ|mithaḥ|vipri̍ya̍ iti vi - priyaḥ|syAt|tam|EtayA̱|sajñAMnyEti# saM - jñAnyA̱|yAjayEt|agnayE̱|vasumata̍ iti vasu# - matE|purOḍAśa̱m|aṣṭAkapAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|sOmA̍ya|rudrava̍ta̍ iti# rudra - vatE|carum|indrAya|marutva̍tE|purOḍAśa̱m|EkA̍daśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|varuṇAya̍ ( )|Adityavata̍ ityAditya̍ - vatE|carum|indra̱m|Eva|Enam|BUtam|jyaiṣṭhyAya|samAnAḥ|aBi|samiti̍|jAnatE|vasi̍ṣṭhaḥ|samAnAnA̱m|Bavati||63̍ (64)
verses.samhita: -mEtayA# sajñAMnyA&yAjayadagnayE̍ vasumatE̍ purOḍAśamaṣṭAka̍pAlaM̍ niravapath̍ sOmAya̍ rudravatE̍ carumindrAya̍ marutvatE̍ purOḍAśa -mEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ ~MvaruṇAyA&&*dityava̍tE̍ caruM tatO vA indraM̍ dEvA jyaiṣṭhyAyABi̍ samajAnata̍ yaḥ samAnairmithO̍ vipriyaḥ̍ syAt tamEtayA# sajñAMnyA# yAjayEdagnayE vasumatE̍ purOḍAśamaṣṭAka̍pAlaM̍ nirvapEth̍ sOmAya̍ rudravatE̍ carumindrAya̍ marutvatE̍ purOḍAśamEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ ~MvaruṇAyA̍ ( ) &&*dityavatE̍ carumindramEvaina̍M̍ BUtaM jyaiṣṭhyAya̍ samAnA aBi saM jAnatE̍ vasiṣṭhaḥ̍ samAnAnA̱M Bavati||63

verses.padam: - Padam hiraṇyagarBa iti# hiraṇya - garBaḥ|Apaḥ|ha|yat|prajA̍pata̍ iti prajA̱ - patE||saḥ|vEda|putraḥ|pitara̱m|saḥ|mAtara̱m|saḥ|sUnuḥ|Buvat|saḥ|Buvat|punarmaGa̍ iti punaḥ̍ - maGaḥ||saḥ|dyAm|aurṇO̱t|antarikṣam|saḥ|suva̍ḥ|saḥ|viśvA̱ḥ|Buva̍ḥ|aBavat|saḥ|Eti̍|aBavat||uditi̍|u|tyam|citram||saḥ|pratnavaditi̍# pratna-vat|navIyasA|agnE̱|dyumnEna̍|saM~MyatEti̍# saM - yatA̱||bRuhat|tatantha|BAnunA̱||nIti|kAvyA̱|vEdhasa̍ḥ|śaśva̍taḥ|kaḥ|hastE̱|dadhA̍naḥ|64̍ (50)
verses.samhita: - citraM>5 citraM dEvAnA-mudagAdanI̍kaM̍ cakṣu# rmitrasya varuṇasyA&gnEḥ|A&̍ prA dyAvApRuthivI̍ antarikṣaṃq̍ sUrya# AtmA jagatastasthuṣa̍śca||

verses.padam: - Padam naryA̱|purUṇi||agniḥ|Buvat|rayipatiriti̍# rayi - patiḥ|rayIṇAm|satrA|cakrAṇaḥ|amRutA̍ni|viśvA̱||hira̍ṇyapAṇimiti̍ hiraṇya̍ - pAṇim|UtayE̱|savitAra̱m|upEti|hvayE||saḥ|cEttA̱|dEvatA̱|padam||vAmam|adya|savitaḥ|vAmam|u|śvaḥ|divEdi̍va̍ iti# divE - divE|vAmam|asmaByamityasma - Byam|sAvIḥ||vAmasya|hi|kṣaya̍sya|dEva|BUrE̱ḥ|ayA|dhiyA|vAmaBAja̍ iti# vAma - BAjaḥ|syAma||baṭ|itthA|parva̍tAnAm|Kidram|biBarq.ṣi|pRuthivi||prEti̍|yA|BUmi|pravatvati|mahnA|jinOṣi̍|65̍ (50)
verses.samhita: naryA# purUṇi|agnirBu̍vadrayipatI̍# rayIṇAṃ satrA cakrAṇO̍ amRutAni̍ viśvA̱||hiraṇyapAṇimUtayE̍# savitAramupa# hvayE|sa cEttA# dEvatA# padaM||vAmamadya savitarvAmamu̍ śvO divEdivE̍ vAmamasmaByaṃ# sAvIḥ|vAmasya hi kṣayasya̍ dEva BUrErayA̍ dhiyA vAmaBAja̍ḥ̍ syAma||baḍitthA parvatAnAM̍ KidraM biBaṛṣi̍ pRuthivi|pra yA BUmi̍ pravatvati mahnA jinOṣi# - [ ] 65

verses.padam: - Padam mahini||stOmAsaḥ|tvA|vicAriṇIti̍# vi - cAriṇi|pratIti|stOBanti|aktuBirityaktu̍ - Biḥ||prEti|yA|vAja̱m|na|hEṣa̍ntam|pErum|asya̍si|arjuni||RudUdarE̍ṇa|saKyA̱|sacEya|yaḥ|mA|na|riṣyE̱t|haryaśvEti̍# hari-aśva|pItaḥ||ayam|yaḥ|sOmaḥ|nyadhAyIti̍# ni - adhAyi|asmE̍ iti|tasmai̱|indra̱m|pratiramiti̍# pra - tira̱m|Emi|acCa||ApA̱ntamanyurityApA̱nta̍ - manyuḥ|tRupalapraBarmEti̍# tRupala# - praBarmA|dhuniḥ|śimI̍vAn|śaru̍mAniti̍ śaru# - mAn|RujIṣI||sOmaḥ|viśvA̍ni|atasA|vanA̍ni|na|arvAk|indra̱m|pratimAnAnIti̍# prati - mAnAni|dEBuḥ||prEti̍|66̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mahini||stOmAsastvA̍ vicAriṇi pratiṣṭOBantyaktuBi̍ḥ|prayA̍ vAjaM na hEṣantaM̍ pErumasyasyarjuni||RudUdarE̍ṇa̍ saKyA# sacEya yO mA na riṣyE̱ddharyaśva pItaḥ|ayaM ~Myaḥ sOmO nyadhA̱yyasmE tasmA indraM̍ pratiramEmyacCa̍||ApA̱ntamanyustRupala̍-praBarmA̍ dhuniḥ śimI# vA~jCarumAṃ̍ RujIṣI|sOmO viśvA̱nyatasA vanAni̍ nArvAgindraM̍ pratimAnAni̍ dEBuḥ||pra - [ ] 66

verses.padam: - Padam suvAnaḥ|sOmaḥ|RutayurityRu̍ta̍ - yuḥ|cikEta|indrAya|brahma̍|jamada̍gniḥ|arcann̍||vRuṣA̱|yantA|asi|śava̍saḥ|turasya̍|antaḥ|yacCa|gRuṇatE|dhartram|dRuṃqha||sabAdha̍ iti# sa - bAdhaḥ|tE|mada̱m|ca|śuṣmayam|ca|brahma̍|nara̍ḥ|brahmakRuta̍ iti# brahma - kRutaḥ|saparyann||arkaḥ|vA|yat|turatE̱|sOma̍cakṣA̍ iti sOma# - cakṣAḥ|tatra|it|indraḥ̍|dadhatE|pRuthsviti̍# pRut - su|turyAm||vaṣaṭ|tE|viṣṇO|Asaḥ|Eti̍|kRuṇOmi|tat|mE|juṣasva|śipiviṣṭEti̍# śipi - viṣṭa|havyam||67 (50)
verses.samhita: suvAnaḥ̍ sOma# RutayuścikEtEndrA̍ya̍ brahma# jamadagnirarcann̍|vRuṣA̍# yantA&si śavasasturasyAntarya̍cCa̍ gRuṇatE dhartraM dRuṃha||sabAdha̍stE̍ madaM̍ ca śuṣmayaM ca brahma narO̱ brahmakRutaḥ̍ saparyann|arkO vA yat turatE sOmacakṣAstatrEdindrO̍# dadhatE pRuthsu turyAM||vaṣaṭ̍ tE viṣṇavAsa A kRuṇOmi̍ tanmE# juṣasva śipiviṣṭa havyaM|67

verses.padam: - Padam varddhantu|tvA|suṣṭutaya̍ iti# su - stutayaḥ|gira̍ḥ|mE|yUyam|pAta|svastiBiriti̍# svasti - Biḥ|sadA̱|naḥ||prEti|tat|tE|adya|śipiviṣṭEti̍# śipi - viṣṭa|nAma|aryaḥ|śaṃqsAmi|vayunA̍ni|vidvAn||tam|tvA|gRuṇAmi|tavasa̱m|ata̍vIyAn|kṣaya̍ntam|asya|raja̍saḥ|parAkE||kim|it|tE|viṣṇO̍ iti|paricakṣyamiti̍# pari - cakṣya̱m|BUt|prEti|yat|vavakṣE|śipiviṣṭa̍ iti# śipi - viṣṭaḥ|asmi||mA|varpaḥ|asmat|apEti̍|gUhaḥ|Etat|yat|anyarU̍pa̍ ityanya - rUpaḥ|samitha iti# saM - ithE|baBUtha||68̍ (50)
verses.samhita: varddhantu̍ tvA suṣṭutayO girO# mE yUyaM pAta̍ svastiBiḥ sadA# naḥ||pra tat tE# adya śipiviṣṭa̍ nAmA&ryaḥ śaṃ# sAmi vayunAni̍ vidvAn|tantvA# gRuṇAmi tavasamatavIyAn̍ kṣayantamasya̍ rajasaḥ̍ parAkE||kimit tE# viṣṇO paricakṣyaM̍ BUt pra yadvavakṣE̍ śipiviṣṭO̍ asmi|mA̍ varpO# asmadapa# gUha EtadyadanyarUpaḥ̍ samithE baBUtha||68̍

verses.padam: - Padam agnE̱|dAḥ|dAśuṣE̱|rayim|vIravantamiti̍# vIra - vantam|parIṇasamiti̍ pari# - nasam|śiśIhi|naḥ|sUnumata iti# sUnu-mataḥ||dAḥ|naḥ|agnE|śatina̍ḥ|dAḥ|sahasriṇa̍ḥ|duraḥ|na|vAja̱m|śrutyai̱|apEti̍|vRudhi||prAcI̍ iti|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|brahmaṇA|kRudhi|suva̍ḥ|na|śukram|uṣasa̍ḥ|vIti̍|didyutuḥ||agniḥ|dAḥ|dravi̍ṇam|vIrapE̍śA̍ iti# vIra - pEśAḥ|agniḥ|Ruṣi̱m|yaḥ|sahasrA̱|sanOti||agniḥ|divi|havyam|Eti̍|tatAna|agnEḥ|dhAmA̍ni|viBRutEti̍ vi - BRutA|purutrEti# puru - trA||mA|69 (50)
verses.samhita: agnE dA dAśuṣE# rayiM ~MvIravantaM̍ parIṇasaM|śiśIhi̍ naḥ̍ sUnumataḥ||dA̍ nO# agnE śatinO dAḥ sahasriṇO̍# durO na vAjaṅq śrutyA apA# vRudhi|prAcI dyAvApRuthivI̍ brahmaṇA̍ kRudhi suvarṇa śukramuṣasO vi didyutuḥ||agnirdA̍ draviṇaM̍ ~MvIrapEśA̍ agnir RuṣiM ~Myaḥ sahasrA# sanOti|agnirdivi̍ havyamA tatAnAgnErddhAmA̍ni̍ viBRutA̍ purutrA||mA - [ ] 69

verses.padam: - Padam naḥ|marddhIḥ|Eti|tu|Bara||GRutam|na|pUtam|tanUḥ|arEpAḥ|śuci̍|hira̍ṇyam||tat|tE|rukmaḥ|na|rOcata|svadhAva̍ iti# svadhA - vaḥ||uBE iti|suścandrEti̍# su - candra|sarpiṣaḥ|darvI̍ iti|śrIṇIṣE|Asani̍||utO̍ iti|naḥq|uditi̍|pupUryAḥ|ukthEṣu̍|śavasaḥ|patE|iṣa̱m|stOtRuBya̍ iti# stOtRu-Byaḥ|Eti|Bara||vAyO̍ iti|śatam|harI̍ṇAm|yuvasva̍|pOṣyA̍ṇAm||uta|vA|tE|sahasriṇa̍ḥ|ratha̍ḥ|Eti̍|yAtu|pAja̍sA||prEti̍|yABi̍ḥ|70̍ (50)
verses.samhita: - rA tU Bara>7̍ A tU Bara̍ mAkirEtat̍ pariṣṭhAdvidmA̍ hi tvA vasupatiM̍ ~MvasUnAM|indra̍ yat tE mAhinaM̍ datramastyasmaByaM taddharyaśva̍ prayandhi||(Appearing̍ in ṭś 1-7-13-3) OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ, hariḥ OM 2.3 dvitIyakAṇḍE tRutIyaḥ praśnaḥ - iṣṭividhAnaM

verses.padam: - Padam yAsi|dAśvAṃsa̱m|acCa̍|niyudBiriti̍# niyut - Biḥ|vAyO|iṣṭayE̱|durOṇa iti# duḥ - OnE||nIti|naḥ|rayim|suBOja̍samiti̍# su - BOjasam|yuva|iha|nIti̍|vIravaditi̍# vIra - vat|gavya̱m|aśviyam|ca|rAdha̍ḥ||rEvatI̱ḥ|naḥ|sadhamAda̍ iti# sadha - mAdaḥ|indrE̱|santu|tuvivA̍jA̍ iti# tuvi - vAjAḥ||kṣumantaḥ|yABi̍ḥ|madE̍ma||rEvAn|it|rEvata̍ḥ|stOtA|syAt|tvAva̍ta̍ iti tva - vataḥ|maGOnaḥ||prEti̍|it|u|hariva̍ iti# hari - vaḥ|śrutasya||71̍ (40) (dadhAnO̍ - jinOṣi# - dEBuḥ pra - havyaM - baBUtha - mA - yABi# - ścatvAriṃqśacca# ) (A12) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 12 Anuvaakams :- (prajApatistAḥ̍ sRuṣṭA - agnayE# pathikRutE - gnayE kAmAyA̍ - gnayEnnavatE̍ -vaiśvAnara -mAdityaM̍ caru - maindraM caru - mindrAyAnvRujava̍ - AgnAvaiṣṇava -masau sOmAraudra̍ - maindramakAdaśakapAlaṃ-̍ hiraṇyagarBO - dvAdaśa̍ ) Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (prajApati̍ - ragnayE kAmAyA̍ - &Bi saM BavatO̍ - yO vidviṣAṇayO̍# -ridhmE sanna# hyE - dAgnAvaiṣṇavamu - pariṣṭA̍ - dyAsi# dAśvAṃsa - mEkasaptatiḥ̍ ) First and Last Padam of śecond Prasnam of Kandam 2 :- (prajApatiḥ̍ - prEdu# harivaḥ śrutasya)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE dvitIyakAṇḍE dvitIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||
verses.samhita: -ryAsi# dAśvAṃ samacCA# niyudBi-rvAyaviṣṭayE̍# durOṇE|ni nO# rayiṃ suBOjasaM̍ ~MyuvEha ni vIravad-gavyamaśviyaM̍ ca rAdhaḥ||rEvatI̱rnaḥ̍ sadhamAda indrE# santu tuvivAjAḥ|kṣumantO̍ yABirmadEma||rEvAṃ̍ idrEvataḥ̍ stOtA syAt tvAvatO̍ maGOnaḥ|prEdu̍# harivaḥ śrutasya||71̍ (dadhAnO̍ - jinOṣi# - dEBuḥ pra - havyaM - baBUtha - mA - yABi# - ścatvAriṃqśacca# ) (A12) praśna kOrvai with starting padams of 1 to 12 Anuvaakams :- (prajApatistAḥ̍ sRuṣṭA - agnayE# pathikRutE - gnayE kAmAyA̍ - gnayEnnavatE̍ -vaiśvAnara -mAdityaM̍ caru - maindraM caru - mindrAyAnvRujava̍ - AgnAvaiṣṇava -masau sOmAraudra̍ - maindramakAdaśakapAlaṃ-̍ hiraṇyagarBO - dvAdaśa̍ ) kOrvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (prajApati̍ - ragnayE kAmAyA̍ - &Bi saM BavatO̍ - yO vidviṣAṇayO̍# -ridhmE sanna# hyE - dAgnAvaiṣṇavamu - pariṣṭA̍ - dyAsi# dAśvAṃsa - mEkasaptatiḥ̍ ) first and last padam of second praśnam of kAṇḍam 2 :- (prajApatiḥ̍ - prEdu# harivaḥ śrutasya)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM dvitIyakAṇḍE dvitIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||2.2.1 AppEndix

verses.padam: - Padam AdityEByaḥ|Buva̍dvadBya̍ iti Buvadvat̍ - Byaḥ|carum|niriti|vapEt|BUti̍kAma̍ iti BUti# - kAmaḥ|AdityAḥ|vai|Etam|BUtyai̱|pratIti|nudantE|yaḥ|ala̱m|BUtyai̱|sann|BUti̱m|na|prApnOtIti̍# pra - ApnOti|AdityAn|Eva|Buva̍dvata̍ iti Buvat̍ - vataḥ|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tE|Eva|Enam|BUti̱m|gamayanti|Bava̍ti|Eva|AdityEBya̍ḥ|dhAraya̍dvadBya̍ iti# dhArayadvat̍ - Byaḥ|carum|niriti|vapEt|apa̍ruddha̍ ityapa# - ruddhaḥ|vA|aparuddhyamAna̍ ityapa̍ - rudhyamAnaḥ|vA|AdityAḥ|vai|aparOddhAra̍ ityapa̍ - rOddhAraḥ|AdityAḥ|avagamayitAra̍ ityava̍ - gamayitAraḥ|AdityAn|Eva|dhAraya̍dvata̍ iti# dhArayat̍ - vataḥ|1 (50)
verses.samhita: AdityEByO BuvadvadByaścaruM̍ nirvapEdBUti̍kAma̍ AdityA vA EtaM BUtyai prati# nudantE yO&laM BUtyai san BUtiM na prApnOtyAdityAnEva̍ Buvadvataḥ̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati ta EvainaM BUtiM̍ gamayanti BavatyEvA̍ &&dityEByO# dhArayadvad-ByaścaruM̍ nirvapEdapa̍ruddhO̍ vA&paruddhyamAnO̍ vA&&dityA vA aparOddhAra̍# AdityA avagamayitAra̍# AdityAnEva dhArayadvataḥ̍ - [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tE|Eva|Enam|viśi|dAddhrati|anaparuddhya̍ ityanapa̍ - ruddhyaḥ|Bavati|aditE|anviti̍|manyasva|iti̍|aparuddhyamA̍na̍ ityapa̍ - ruddhyamAnaḥ|asya|padam|Eti̍|dadIta|iyam|vai|adi̍tiḥ|iyam|Eva|asmai|rAjyam|anviti̍|manyatE|satyA|AśIrityA̱̍ - śIḥ|iti|Aha|satyAm|Eva|AśiṣamityA̱̍ - śiṣa̱m|kurutE|iha|manaḥ|iti̍|Aha|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|Eva|asmai|samanasa̍ iti sa - manasaḥ|karOti|upa|prEti̍|ita|marutaḥ|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati ta EvainaM̍ ~Mviśi dA̱ddhratyanaparuddhyO BavatyaditE&nu̍# manyasvE-tyaparuddhyamA̍nO&sya̍ padamA dadItEyaM̍ ~MvA aditiriyamEvAsmai̍# rAjyamanu# manyatE satyA&&śIrityAha̍ satyAmEvA&&śiṣaM̍ kuruta iha mana ityAha̍ prajA EvAsmai samanasaḥ̍ karOtyupa prEta# marutaḥ - [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam sudAnava iti# su - dAnavaḥ|EnA|viśpatinA|aBIti̍|amum|rAjA̍nam|iti̍|Aha|mArutI|vai|viṭ|jyEṣṭhaḥ|viśpati̍ḥ|viśA|Eva|Enam|rAṣṭrEṇa̍|samiti̍|arddhayati|yaḥ|parastA̱t|grAmyavAdIti̍# grAmya - vAdI|syAt|tasya|gRuhAt|vrIhIn|Eti̍|harEt|śuklAn|ca|kRuṣṇAn|ca|vIti̍|cinuyAt|yE|śuklAḥ|syuḥ|tam|Adityam|carum|nirIti̍|vapEt|AdityA|vai|dEvata̍yA|viṭ|viśa̱m|Eva|avEti̍|gacCati|3̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sudAnava EnA viśpatinA&Bya̍muṃ̍ rAjAnamityA̍ha̍ mArutI vai viḍ jyEṣṭhO viśpatirviśaivainaṃ̍# rAṣṭrEṇa samarddhayati̍ yaḥ parastA̱d grAmyavAdI syAt tasya# gRuhAd-vrIhInA harEcCuklAṅśca̍# kRuṣṇAṅśca vi cinuyAdyE̍ śuklAḥ syustamAdityaM̍ caruM nirvapEdAdityA̍ vai dEvatayA̍ viḍviśamEvAva̍# gacCa - [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam avagatEtyava̍# - gatA|asya|viṭ|anavagatamityana̍va̍ - gatam|rAṣṭram|iti|Ahuḥ|yE|kRuṣṇAḥ|syuḥ|tam|vAruṇam|carum|niriti̍|vapEt|vAruṇam|vai|rAṣṭram|uBE̍ iti|Eva|viśa̱m|ca|rAṣṭram|ca|avEti̍|gacCati|yadi̍|na|avagacCEditya̍va-gacCE̱t|imam|aham|AdityEBya̍ḥ|BAgam|niriti̍|vapAmi|Eti̍|amuṣmA̱t|amuṣyai̱|viśaḥ|ava̍gantOrityava̍-gantOḥ|iti̍|niriti̍|vapEt|AdityAḥ|Eva|Enam|BAgadhEyamiti̍# BAga - dhEya̱m|prEPsanta iti# pra-IPsantaḥ|viśa̱m|avEti̍|4̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -tyavagatA&sya̍ viḍanavagataṃ̍ rAṣṭramityAhuryE̍ kRuṣṇAḥ syustaM ~MvAruṇaM̍ caruM nirvapEdvAruṇaM̍ ~Mvai rAṣṭramuBE Eva viśaM̍ ca rAṣṭraM cAva# gacCati yadi nAvagacCEdima-mahamA̍dityEByO̍# BAgaM nirvapAmyA̍ &muṣmAdamuṣyai̍# viśO&vagantOriti̍ nirvapEdAdityA̍ EvainaM̍ BAgadhEyaM̍ prEPsantO viśamava# - [ ] 4

verses.padam: - Padam gamayanti|yadi|na|avagacCEditya̍va̍ - gacCE̱t|AśvatthAn|mayUKAn̍|sapta|maddhyamEṣAyAmiti̍# maddhyama - IṣAyA̱m|upEti|hanyAt|idam|aham|AdityAn|badhnAmi|Eti̍|amuṣmA̱t|amuṣyai̱|viśaḥ|ava̍gantOrityava̍-gantOḥ|iti̍|AdityAḥ|Eva|Enam|baddhavI̍rA̍ iti# baddha -vIrAḥ|viśa̱m|avEti|gamayanti|yadi̍|na|avagacCEditya̍va̍ - gacCE̱t|Etam|Eva|Adityam|carum|niriti|vapEt|iddhmE|apIti̍|mayUKAn̍|samiti̍|nahyEt|anaparuddhyamitya̍napa̍ - ruddhyam|Eva|avEti|gacCati|Aśva̍tthAḥ|Bavanti|marutA̱m|vai|Etat̍ ( )|Ojaḥ|yat|aśvatthaḥ|Oja̍sA|Eva|viśa̱m|avEti̍|gacCati|sapta|Bavanti|saptaga̍ṇA̍ iti# sapta - gaṇAḥ|vai|marutaḥ|gaṇaśa̍ - iti# gaṇa - śaḥ|Eva|viśa̱m|avEti|gacCati||5̍ (68)
verses.samhita: gamayanti yadi nAvagacCEdAśvatthAn̍ mayUKA̱nth sapta maddhyamEṣAyAmupa̍-̍ hanyAdidamaha-mAdityAn̍ badhnAmyA̍ &muṣmAdamuṣyai̍# viśO&vagantOrityA̍dityA̍ EvainaM̍ baddhavIrA̍ viśamava# gamayanti yadi nAvagacCEdEtamEvA&&dityaM̍ caruM nirvapEdiddhmE&pi̍# mayUKAnth saM nahyEdanaparuddhyamEvAva̍# gacCatyAśvatthA̍ BavantimarutAM ~MvA Eta ( ) -dOjO yadaśvattha̍ Ojasaiva̍ viśamava# gacCati sapta Bavanti̍ sapta gaṇA̍ vai marutO# gaṇaśa Eva viśamava# gacCati|5

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAḥ|vai|mRutyOḥ|abiBayuḥ|tE|prajApatimiti̍# prajA-patim|upEti|adhAvann|tEBya̍ḥ|EtAm|prAjApatyAmiti̍# prAjA - patyAm|śatakRuṣṇalAmiti̍# śata-kRuṣṇalAm|niriti|avapat|tayA̱|Eva|Eṣu|amRuta̱m|adadhAt|yaḥ|mRutyOḥ|biBIyAt|tasmai̱|EtAm|prAjApatyAmiti̍# prAjA - patyAm|śatakRuṣṇalAmiti̍# śata - kRuṣṇalAm|niriti|vapEt|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA-patim|Eva|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asminn|Ayu̍ḥ|dadhAti|sarva̱m|Ayu̍ḥ|Eti|śatakRu̍ṣṇalEti̍# śata - kRuṣṇalA|Bavati|śatAyuriti# śata-Ayuḥ|puruṣaḥ|śatEndri̍ya̍ iti# śata - indriyaḥ|Ayuṣi|Eva|indriyE|6̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvA vai mRutyOrabiBayustE̍ prajApatimupA̍dhAvan̍ tEBya# EtAM prAjApatyAṃ̍ śatakRuṣṇalAM̍ niravapat̍ tayaivaiṣvamRutamadadhAdyO̍ mRutyOrbiBIyAt̍ tasmA# EtAM prAjApatyAṃ̍ śatakRuṣṇalAM̍ nirvapEt̍ prajApatimEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsminnAyurdadhAti̍ sarvamAyurEti̍ śatakRuṣṇalA̍ Bavati śatAyuḥ puruṣaḥ̍ śatEndriya̍ AyuṣyEvEndriyE̍ - [ ] 6

verses.padam: - Padam pratIti|tiṣṭhati|GRutE|Bavati|Ayu̍ḥ|vai|GRutam|amRuta̱m|hira̍ṇyam|Ayu̍ḥ|ca|Eva|asmai|amRuta̱m|ca|samIcI̍ iti|dadhAti|catvAri̍catvArIti̍# catvAri# - catvAri|kRuṣṇalAni|avEti̍|dyati|caturavattasyEti̍# catuḥ - avattasya|Aptyai̱|EkadhEtyE̍ka̍ - dhA|brahmaṇE̱|upEti|harati|EkadhEtyE̍ka̍ - dhA|Eva|yajamAnE|Ayu̍ḥ|dadhAti|asau|Adityaḥ|na|vIti̍|arOcata|tasmai̱|dEvAḥ|prAya̍ścittim|aicCann|tasmai̱|Etam|sauryam|carum|niriti̍|avapann|tEna̍|Eva|asminn|7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prati# tiṣṭhati GRutE BavatyAyurvai̍ GRutamamRutaṃq hiraṇyamAyu̍ścaivAsmA̍# amRutaM̍ ca samIcI# dadhAti catvAri# catvAri kRuṣṇalAnyava# dyati caturavat tasyA&&ptyA# EkadhA brahmaṇa upa# haratyEkadhaiva yajamAna̍ AyurdadhAtya-̍ sAvAdityO̍ na vyarOcata̍ tasmai# dEvAḥ prAyaścittimaicCan̍ tasmA# Etaṃ sauryaM caruM niravapan̍ tEnaivAsmin - [ ] 7

verses.padam: - Padam ruca̱m|adadhuḥ|yaḥ|brahmavarcasakAma̍ iti# brahmavarcasa - kAmaḥ|syAt|tasmai̱|Etam|sauryam|carum|niriti|vapEt|amum|Eva|Adityam|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asminn|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|dadhAti|brahmavarcasIti# brahma - varcasI|Eva|Bavati|uBayataḥ|rukmau|Bavataḥ|uBayata̍ḥ|Eva|asminn|ruca̱m|dadhAti|prayAjEpra̍yAja̍ iti# prayAjE - prayAjE|kRuṣṇala̱m|juhOti|dig^^Bya iti# dik - Byaḥ|Eva|asmai|brahmavarcasamiti# brahma - varcasam|avEti|rundhE|AgnEyam|aṣṭAka̍pAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|sAvitram|dvAda̍śakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|BUmyai̱|8 (50)
verses.samhita: rucamadadhuryO̍ brahmavarcasakA̍maḥ̍ syAt tasmA# Etaṃ sauryaM caruM nirvapEdamumEvA&&dityaṅ̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmin̍ brahmavarcasaM dadhAti̍ brahmavarcasyEva̍ BavatyuBayatO̍# rukmau Bavata̍ uBayata# EvAsmin rucaM̍ dadhAti prayAjE prayAjE̍ kRuṣṇalaM̍ juhOti digBya EvAsmai̱ brahmavarcasamava# rundha AgnEyamaṣṭAkapAlaM̍ nirvapEth̍ sAvitraM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ BUmyai# - [ ] 8

verses.padam: - Padam carum|yaḥ|kAmayEta|hira̍ṇyam|vindEya|hira̍ṇyam|mA|upEti̍|namEt|iti̍|yat|AgnEyaḥ|Bava̍ti|AgnEyam|vai|hira̍ṇyam|yasya̍|Eva|hira̍ṇyam|tEna̍|Eva|Enat|vindatE|sAvitraḥ|Bavati|savitRupra̍sUta̍ iti# savitRu-prasUtaḥ|Eva|Enat|vindatE|BUmyai̱|caruḥ|Bavati|asyAm|Eva|Enat|vindatE|upEti|Enam|hira̍ṇyam|namati|vIti̍|vai|Eṣaḥ|indriyEṇa̍|vIryE̍ṇa|RuddhyatE|yaḥ|hira̍ṇyam|vindatE̱|EtAm|9̍ (50)
verses.samhita: caruM ~Myaḥ kAmayEta̍ hiraṇyaM̍ ~MvindEya hiraṇyaM̍ mOpa# namEditi yadA̱gnEyO BavatyAgnEyaM̍ ~Mvai hiraṇyaM̍ ~Myasyaiva hiraṇyaM̍ tEnaivainad̍ vindatE sAvitrO Bavati̍ savitRuprasUta̍ Evainad-vindatE̍ BUmyai# carurBavatyasyAmEvaina̍d-vindata̍ upainaṃq̍ hiraṇyaM̍ namati vi vA Eṣa indriyEṇa̍# vIryEṇarddhyatE̍ yO hiraṇyaM̍ ~Mvindata# EtA - [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|niriti|vapEt|hira̍ṇyam|vittvA|na|indriyEṇa̍|vIryE̍ṇa|vIti̍|RuddhyatE|EtAm|Eva|niriti̍|vapEt|yasya̍|hira̍ṇyam|naśyE̱t|yat|AgnEyaḥ|Bava̍ti|AgnEyam|vai|hira̍ṇyam|yasya̍|Eva|hira̍ṇyam|tEna̍|Eva|Enat|vindati|sAvitraḥ|Bavati|savitRupra̍sUta̍ iti# savitRu - prasUtaḥ|Eva|Enat|vindati|BUmyai̱|caruḥ|Bavati|asyAm|vai|Etat|naśyati|yat|naśyati|asyAm|Eva|Enat|vindati|indra̍ḥ|10̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -mEva nirvapEddhira̍ṇyaM̍ ~MvittvA nEndriyEṇa# vIryEṇa̍ vyRuddhyata̍ EtAmEva nirvapEdyasya̍ hiraṇyaM̍ naśyEdyadA̱gnEyO BavatyAgnEyaM̍ ~Mvai hiraṇyaM̍ ~Myasyai va hiraṇyaM̍ tEnaivainad-vindati̍ sAvitrO Bavati̍ savitRu-prasUta̍ Evainad-vindati̍ BUmyai# carurBavatyasyAM̍ ~MvA Etannaśyati̍ yannaśyatyasyAmEvaina̍d-vindatIndra̍ - [ ] 10

verses.padam: - Padam tvaṣṭuḥ|sOma̱m|aBIṣahEtya̍Bi̍ - sahA̱|apibat|saḥ|viṣva~g|vIti̍|ArcCat|saḥ|indriyEṇa̍|sOmapIthEnEti̍# sOma - pIthEna|vIti̍|Arddhyata|saḥ|yat|Urddhvam|udava̍mIdityu̍t̍ - avamIt|tE|śyAmAkA̱ḥ|aBavann|saḥ|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA - patim|upEti|adhAvat|tasmai̱|Etam|sOmEndram|śyAmAkam|carum|niriti̍|avapat|tEna̍|Eva|asminn|indriyam|sOmapIthamiti̍# sOma - pItham|adadhAt|vIti|vai|Eṣaḥ|indriyEṇa̍|sOmapIthEnEti̍# sOma - pIthEna|RuddhyatE|yaḥ|sOma̱m|vami̍ti|yaḥ|sOmavAmIti̍# sOma - vAmI|syAt|tasmai̱|11 (50)
verses.samhita: -stvaṣṭuḥ sOmamaBIṣahA̍&̍ pibath sa viṣva~g vyA̱rcCath sa indriyEṇa̍# sOmapIthEna vyA̱rddhyata sa yadUrddhvamudavamIt̍ tE śyAmAkA# aBavanthsa prajApatimupA̍dhAvat̍ tasmA# Etaṃ sOmEndraṅ̍ śyAmAkaM̍ caruM niravapat̍ tEnaivAsminnindriyaṃ̍ sOmapIthama̍dadhAdvi̍ vA Eṣa indriyEṇa̍# sOmapIthEnarddhyatE̍ yaḥ sOmaM ~Mvamiti̍ yaḥ sOmavAmI̍ syAt tasmA-̍ [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam Etam|sOmEndram|śyAmAkam|carum|niriti|vapEt|sOma̱m|ca|Eva|indra̱m|ca|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga-dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tau|Eva|asminn|indriyam|sOmapIthamiti̍# sOma - pItham|dhattaḥ|na|indriyEṇa|sOmapIthEnEti̍# sOma - pIthEna|vIti̍|RuddhyatE|yat|saumyaḥ|Bava̍ti|sOmapIthamiti̍# sOma - pItham|Eva|avEti|rundhE|yat|aindraḥ|Bava̍ti|indriyam|vai|sOmapItha̍ iti# sOma - pIthaḥ|indriyam|Eva|sOmapIthamiti# sOma - pItham|avEti|rundhE|śyAmAkaḥ|Bavati|Eṣaḥ|vAva|saḥ|sOma̍ḥ|12̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Etaṃ sOmEndraṅ̍ śyAmAkaM̍ caruM nirvapEth̍ sOmaM̍ caivEndraM̍ ca svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati tAvEvAsminnindriyaṃ̍ sOmapIthaM̍ dhattO̍ nEndriyEṇa# sOmapIthEna vyRuddhyatE̍ yath saumyO Bavati̍ sOmapIthamEvAva# rundhE yadaindrO BavatIndriyaM̍ ~Mvai sOmapItha̍ indriyamEva̍ sOmapIthamava̍# rundhE śyAmAkO BavatyEṣa̍ vAva sa sOmaḥ̍ - [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam sAkṣAditi# sa - akṣAt|Eva|sOmapIthamiti# sOma - pItham|avEti|rundhE|agnayE̱|dAtrE|purOḍAśa̱m|aṣṭAka̍pAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|indrA̍ya|pradAtra̍ iti# pra - dAtrE|purOḍAśa̱m|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|paśukAma̍ iti# paśu - kAmaḥ|agniḥ|Eva|asmai|paśUn|prajanayatIti# pra - janayati|vRuddhAn|indra̍ḥ|prEti̍|yacCati|dadhi̍|madhu̍|GRutam|Apa̍ḥ|dhAnAḥ|Bavanti|Etat|vai|paśUnAm|rUpam|rUpEṇa̍|Eva|paśUn|avEti̍|rundhE|pa~jcagRuhItamiti̍# pa~jca-gRuhItam|Bavati|pA~gktA̱ḥ|hi|paśavaḥ|bahurUpamiti̍# bahu - rUpam|Bavati|bahurUpA iti# bahu - rUpAḥ|hi|paśavaḥ|13̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sAkṣAdEva sOmapIthamava̍# rundhE &gnayE# dAtrE purOḍAśa̍maṣṭAka̍pAlaM̍ nirvapEdindrA̍ya̍ pradAtrE purOḍAśamEkA̍daśakapAlaM̍ paśukAmO&gnirEvAsmai̍# paśUn prajanaya̍ti̍ vRuddhAnindraḥ pra yacCati̍ dadhi madhu# GRutamApO# dhAnA BavantyEtadvai̍ paśUnAṃ̍ rUpaṃ rUpEṇaiva paśUnava# rundhE pa~jca-gRuhItaM Bavati̍ pA~gktA hi paśavO# bahu rUpaM Bavati̍ bahu rUpA hi paśavaḥ- [ ] 13

verses.padam: - Padam samRuddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|prAjApatyamiti# prAjA - patyam|Bavati|prAjApatyA iti# prAjA - patyAḥ|vai|paśavaḥ|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|Eva|asmai|paśUn|prEti|janayati|AtmA|vai|puru̍ṣasya|madhu̍|yat|madhu̍|agnau|juhOti̍|AtmAna̱m|Eva|tat|yaja̍mAnaḥ|agnau|prEti̍|dadhAti|pa~gktyau̱|yAjyAnuvAkyE̍# iti# yAjyA - anuvAkyE̱|Bavataḥ|pA~gktaḥ|puru̍ṣaḥ|pA~gktA̱ḥ|paśava̍ḥ|AtmAna̱m|Eva|mRutyOḥ|niṣkrIyEti̍# niḥ-krIya|paśUn|avEti̍|rundhE||14̍ (41) (indriyE̱ - &smin - BUmyA# - EtA - mindraḥ - syAt tasmai - sOmO# - bahu rUpA hi paśava - EkacatvAriṃśacca̍ ) (A2)
verses.samhita: samRuddhyai̍ prAjApatyaM Bavati̍ prAjApatyA vai paśavaḥ̍ prajApatirEvAsmai̍# paśUn prajanayatyAtmA̍ vai puruṣasya̍ madhu yanmaddhvagnau juhOtyAtmAnamEva̍ tad-yajamAnO&gnau̍ pradadhAti̍ pa~gktyau# yAjyAnuvAkyE# Bavataḥ pA~gktaḥ puruṣaḥ̍ pA~gktA̱ḥ paśava# AtmAnamEva̍ mRutyOrniṣkrIyapaśUnava̍# rundhE||14

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAḥ|vai|satram|Asata|RuddhiparimitamityRuddhi̍# - parimitam|yaśaskAmA̍ iti yaśaḥ̍ - kAmAḥ|tEṣA̱m|sOma̱m|rAjAnam|yaśa̍ḥ|ArcCat|saḥ|girim|uditi̍|ait|tam|agniḥ|anu̍|uditi̍|ait|tau|agnIṣOmAvityagnI-̍ sOmau̱|samiti|aBavatAm|tau|indra̍ḥ|yajñavi̍Braṣṭa̍ iti# yajña - viBraṣṭaḥ|anu|parEti̍|ait|tau|abravIt|yAjaya̍tam|mA|iti̍|tasmai̱|EtAm|iṣṭi̱m|niriti̍|avapatAm|AgnEyam|aṣṭAka̍pAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|aindram|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|saumyam|carum|tayA̱|Eva|asminn|tEjaḥ|15̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvA vai satramAsata-rddhi̍parimitaM̍ ~MyaśaskAmAstEṣAṃq̍ sOmaṃq rAjAnaM̍ ~Myaśa# ArcCath sa girimudait tamagniranUdait tAvagnIṣOmau samaBavatAM̍ tAvindrO# yajñaviBraṣṭO&nu̍ parait tAvabravIdyAjaya̍taM̍ mEti tasmA# EtAmiṣṭiM niravapatAmAgnEya-maṣṭAka̍pAlamaindra-mEkA̍daśakapAlaṃ̍ saumyaM caruM tayaivAsmin tEja# - [ ] 15

verses.padam: - Padam indriyam|brahmavarcasamiti# brahma - varcasam|adhattAm|yaḥ|yajñaviBraṣṭa̍ iti# yajña - viBraṣṭaḥ|syAt|tasmai̱|EtAm|iṣṭi̱m|niriti|vapEt|AgnEyam|aṣṭAka̍pAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|aindram|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|saumyam|carum|yat|AgnEyaḥ|Bavati|tEja̍ḥ|Eva|asminn|tEna̍|dadhAti|yat|aindraḥ|Bava̍ti|indriyam|Eva|asminn|tEna̍|dadhAti|yat|saumyaḥ|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma-varcasam|tEna|AgnEyasya̍|ca|saumyasya̍|ca|aindrE|samAślE̍ṣayEditi̍# saM - AślEṣayEt|tEja̍ḥ|ca|Eva|asminn|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|ca|samIcI iti|16̍ (50)
verses.samhita: indriyaM brahmavarcasama̍dhattAM̍ ~MyO yajñaviBraṣṭaḥ̍ syAt tasmA# EtAmiṣṭiM nirvapEdAgnEya-maṣṭAka̍pAlamaindra-mEkA̍daśakapAlaṃ̍ saumyaM caruM ~MyadA̱gnEyO Bavati̍ tEja# EvAsmin tEna# dadhAti yadaindrO BavatIndriyamEvAsmin̍ tEna# dadhAti yath saumyO brahmavarcasaM̍ tEnA̱ &&gnEyasya# ca saumyasya# caindrE samAślEṣayEt̍ tEjaścaivAsmi̍n̍ brahmavarcasaM ca# samIcI# - [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam dadhAti|agnIṣOmIyamityagnI̍ - sOmIya̱m|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|yam|kAma̍ḥ|na|upanamEdityu̍pa̍ - namE̱t|AgnEyaḥ|vai|brAhmaṇaḥ|saḥ|sOma̱m|pibati|svAm|Eva|dEvatA̱m|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|sA|Eva|Enam|kAmE̍na|samiti̍|arddhayati|upEti̍|Enam|kAma̍ḥ|namati|agnIṣOmIyamitya̍gnI̍ - sOmIya̱m|aṣṭAkapAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|brahmavarcasakA̍ma̍ iti# brahmavarcasa - kAmaḥ|agnIṣOmAvityagnI - sOmau̱|Eva|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga-dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tau|Eva|asminn|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|dhattaḥ|brahmavarcasIti# brahma - varcasI|Eva|17
verses.samhita: dadhAtyagnIṣOmIya-mEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEdyaM̍ kAmO nOpanamEdAgnEyO̍ vai brA̱hmaṇaḥ sa sOmaM̍ pibati svAmEva dEvatAṅq svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati saivainaM kAmEna̍ samarddhayatyupai̍naM̍ kAmO# namatyagnIṣOmIya-maṣṭAka̍pAlaM̍ nirvapEd-brahmavarcasakA̍mO-&gnIṣOmA̍# vEva svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati tAvEvAsmin̍ brahmavarcasaM dhattO̍ brahmavarcasyEva-̍ [ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam Bavati|yat|aṣṭAkapAla̍ ityaṣṭA - kapAlaḥ|tEna|AgnEyaḥ|yat|śyAmAkaḥ|tEna̍|saumyaḥ|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|sOmAya|vAjinE̱|śyAmAkam|carum|niriti̍|vapEt|yaḥ|klaibyA̱t|biBIyAt|rEta̍ḥ|hi|vai|EtasmA̱t|vAji̍nam|apakrAmatItya̍pa̍ - krAmati|atha̍|Eṣaḥ|klaibyA̱t|biBAya|sOma̱m|Eva|vAjina̱m|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asminn|rEta̍ḥ|vAji̍nam|dadhAti|na|klIbaḥ|Bavati|brAhmaṇaspatyamiti̍# brAhmaṇaḥ - patyam|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa-kapAlam|niriti̍|vapEt|grAma̍kAma̍ iti grAma# - kAmaḥ|18 (50)
verses.samhita: Bavati̍ yadaṣṭAkapAla-stEnA̱&&gnEyO̍ yacCyAmAkastEna̍# saumyaḥ samRuddhyai̍ sOmAya̍ vAjinE̱ śyAmAkaM caruM nirvapEdyaḥ̍ klaibyA̱dbiBIyAd rEtO hi vA EtasmAd-vAjinamapakrAmatyathaiṣa̍ klaibyA̱dbiBAya sOmamEva̍ vAjinaṅq svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmin rEtO vAjinaM̍ dadhAti na klIbO BavatibrAhmaṇaspatya-mEkA̍daśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEd̍ grAmakAmO̍ - [ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam brahmaṇaḥ|pati̱m|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga-dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmai|sajAtAniti̍# sa - jAtAn|prEti|yacCati|grAmI|Eva|Bavati|gaṇava̍tI̍ iti# gaṇa - vatI|yAjyAnuvAkyE# iti# yAjyA - anuvAkyE̱|Bavataḥ|sajAtairiti# sa - jAtaiḥ|Eva|Enam|gaṇavantamiti̍# gaṇa - vantam|karOti|EtAm|Eva|niriti|vapEt|yaḥ|kAmayE̍ta|brahmann̍|viśa̱m|vIti̍|nAśayEyam|iti̍|mArutI̍ iti|yAjyAnuvAkyE̍# iti# yAjyA - anuvAkyE̱|kuryAt|brahmann|Eva|viśa̱m|vIti̍|nAśayati||19̍ (43) (tEjaḥ̍ - samIcI̱ - brahmavarcasyEva̍ - grAmakAma̍ - stricatvAriṃśacca̍ ) (A3)
verses.samhita: brahmaṇaspati̍mEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmai# sajAtAn pra yacCati̍ grAmyEva̍ Bavati̍ gaṇavatI̍ yAjyAnuvAkyE# Bavataḥ sajAtairEvainaM̍ gaṇavantaM̍ karOtyEtAmEva nirvapEdyaḥ̍ kAmayEta̍ brahman viśaM ~Mvi nAśayEyamiti̍# mArutI yA̱jyAnuvAkyE# kuryAd brahmannEva̍ viśaM ~Mvi nAśayati||19̍

verses.padam: - Padam aryamṇE|carum|niriti|vapEt|suvargakA̍ma̍ iti# suvarga-kAmaḥ|asau|vai|Adityaḥ|aryamA|aryamaṇa̱m|Eva|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|Enam|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|gamayati|aryamṇE|carum|niriti|vapEt|yaḥ|kAmayE̍ta|dAna̍kAmA̍ iti dAna-kAmAḥ|mE|prajA̍ iti# pra-jAḥ|syuḥ|iti|asau|vai|Adityaḥ|aryamA|yaḥ|Kalu̍|vai|dadA̍ti|saḥ|aryamA|aryamaṇa̱m|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|20̍ (50)
verses.samhita: aryamṇE caruM nirvapath̍ suvargakAmO&sau̍ vA AdityO̱&ryamA&ryamaṇa̍mEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa Evainaṃ# suvargaM ~MlOkaM gamayatyaryamṇE̍ caruM nirvapEdyaḥ̍ kAmayEta̍ dAnakAmA̍ mE prajAḥ syurityasau vA AdityO̱&ryamA̍ yaḥ Kalu vai dadAti̍ sO̱&ryamA&ryamaṇamEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvA - [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam asmai|dAnakAmA̍ iti dAna# - kAmAḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|karOti|dAnakAmA̍ iti dAna# - kAmAḥ|asmai|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|Bavanti|aryamṇE|carum|niriti|vapEt|yaḥ|kAmayE̍ta|svasti|janatA̱m|iyAm|iti̍|asau|vai|Adityaḥ|aryamA|aryamaṇa̱m|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga-dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|Enam|tat|gamayati|yatra̍|jiga̍miṣati|indra̍ḥ|vai|dEvAnA̱m|AnujAvara̍ ityAnu̍ - jAvaraḥ|AsIt|saḥ|prajApatimiti̍# prajA - patim|upEti|adhAvat|tasmai̱|Etam|aindram|AnuṣUkamityA̍nu̍ - sUkam|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa-kapAlam|niriti̍|21̍ (50
verses.samhita: -smai dAnakAmAḥ̍ prajAḥ karOti̍ dAnakAmA̍ asmai prajA BavantyaryamṇE̍ caruM nirvapEdyaḥ̍ kAmayEta̍ svasti janatAmiyAmityasau̍ vA AdityO̱-&ryamA-̍ &ryamaṇamEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvainaM tad-gamayati̍ yatra jigamiṣatIndrO̍ vai dEvAnAmAnujAvara̍ AsIth̍ sa prajApati̍ -mupAdhAvat̍ tasmA# EtamaindramAnuṣUkamEkA̍daśakapAlaM̍ ni- [ ] 21

verses.padam: - Padam avapat|tEna|Eva|Enam|agra̱m|dEvatA̍nAm|parIti̍|anayat|buddhnava̍tI̍ iti# buddhna - vatI|agravatI̍ ityagra# - vatI|yAjyAnuvAkyE# iti# yAjyA-anuvAkyE̱|akarOt|buddhnAt|Eva|Enam|agra̱m|parIti|anayat|yaḥ|rAjanya̍ḥ|AnujAvara̍ ityAnu̍ - jAvaraḥ|syAt|tasmai̱|Etam|aindram|AnuṣUkamityAnu̍ - sUkam|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa-kapAlam|niriti̍|vapEt|indra̱m|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga-dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|Enam|agra̱m|samAnAnA̱m|parIti̍|nayati|buddhnava̍tI̍ iti# buddhna - vatI|agravatI̍ ityagra# - vatI|yAjyAnuvAkyE# iti# yAjyA - anuvAkyE̱|Bavataḥ|buddhnAt|Eva|Enam|agra̱m|22 (50)
verses.samhita: -ravapat̍ tEnaivainamagraM̍ dEvatAnAM̍ paryaṇayad̍ buddhnavatI̍ agravatI̍ yAjyAnuvAkyE# akarOd buddhnA-dEvainamagraM paryaṇayadyO̍ rAjanya̍# AnujAvaraḥ syAt tasmA# EtamaindramAnuṣUka-mEkA̍daśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEdindra̍mEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa Evainamagraṃ# samAnAnAM pariṇayati̍ buddhnavatI̍ agravatI̍ yAjyAnuvAkyE# BavatO buddhnAdEvainamagraM [ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam parIti|nayati|AnuṣUka̍ ityAnu̍ - sUkaḥ|Bavati|EṣA|hi|Etasya|dEvatA̱|yaḥ|AnujAvara̍ ityAnu̍ - jAvaraḥ|samRuddhyA̍ iti saM- Ruddhyai|yaḥ|brAhmaṇaḥ|AnujAvara ityAnu̍ - jAvaraḥ|syAt|tasmai̱|Etam|bAṛqhaspatyam|AnuṣUkamityAnu-sUkam|carum|niriti̍|vapEt|bRuhaspati̱m|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|Enam|agra̱m|samAnAnA̱m|parIti̍|nayati|buddhnava̍tI̍ iti# buddhna-vatI|agravatI̍ ityagra# - vatI|yAjyAnuvAkyE# iti# yAjyA - anuvAkyE̱|Bavataḥ|buddhnAt|Eva|Enam|agra̱m|parIti|nayati|AnuṣUka̍ ityAnu̍ - sUkaḥ|Bavati|EṣA|hi|Etasya# ( )|dEvatA̱|yaḥ|AnujAvara ityAnu̍ - jAvaraḥ|samRuddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai||23 (54)
verses.samhita: pari# ṇayatyAnuṣUkO BavatyEṣA̍ hyEtasya̍# dEvatA ya AnujAvaraḥ̍ samRuddhyai̍ yO brA̱hmaṇa AnujAvaraḥ̍ syAt tasmA# EtaM bAṛhaspatyamA̍nuṣUkaM̍ caruM nirvapEd̍ bRuhaspatimEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa Evainamagraṃ# samAnAnAM pariṇayati̍ buddhnavatI̍ agravatI̍ yAjyAnuvAkyE# BavatO buddhnAdEvainamagraM pari# ṇayatyAnuṣUkO BavatyEṣA̍ hyEtasya̍# ( ) dEvatA ya AnujAvaraḥ̍ samRuddhyai||23̍

verses.padam: - Padam prajApatEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|trayastriṃśaditi̍ trayaḥ̍ - triṃqśat|duhitaraḥ|Asann|tAḥ|sOmA̍ya|rAjñE̱|adadAt|tAsA̱m|rOhiṇIm|upEti̍|ait|tAḥ|Irṣya̍ntIḥ|puna̍ḥ|agacCann|tAḥ|anviti̍|ait|tAḥ|puna̍ḥ|ayAcata|tAḥ|asmai|na|puna̍ḥ|adadAt|saḥ|abravIt|Rutam|amIṣva|yathA̱|samAvacCa̍ iti# samAvat - śaḥ|upaiṣyAmItyupa̍ - EṣyAmi|atha̍|tE|puna̍ḥ|dAsyAmi|iti̍|saḥ|Rutam|AmIt|tAḥ|asmai|puna̍ḥ|adadAt|tAsA̱m|rOhiṇIm|Eva|upEti̍|24̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prajApatEstraya̍striṃśad̍ duhitara# Asan tAḥ sOmAya̍ rAjñE&dadAt̍ tAsAṃ# rOhiṇImupait tA IrṣyantIḥ̍ punaragacCan̍ tA anvait tAḥ punarayAcata̍ tA asmai̍ na punaradadAth̍ sO̱&bravIdRutamamIṣva̍ yathA# samAvacCa upaiṣyAmyatha̍# tE punardAsyAmIti̍ sa RutamAmIt̍ tA asmai̍ punaradadAt̍ tAsAṃ# rOhiṇImEvOpat - [ ] 24

verses.padam: - Padam ait|tam|yakṣmaḥ|ArcCat|rAjA̍nam|yakṣma̍ḥ|Arat|iti̍|tat|rAjayakṣmasyEti̍# rAja -yakṣmasya|janma̍|yat|pApI̍yAn|aBa̍vat|tat|pApayakṣmasyEti̍# pApa - yakṣmasya|yat|jAyABya̍ḥ|avi̍ndat|tat|jAyEnya̍sya|yaḥ|Evam|EtEṣA̱m|yakṣmA̍ṇAm|janma̍|vEda̍|na|Enam|EtE|yakṣmA̱ḥ|vindanti|saḥ|EtAḥ|Eva|namasyann|upEti̍|adhAvat|tAḥ|abruvann|vara̱m|vRuṇAmahai|samAvacCa̍ iti# samAvat - śaḥ|Eva|naḥ|upEti|ayaḥ|iti̍|tasmai̱|Etam|25̍ (50)
verses.samhita: taM ~Myakṣma# ArcCad-rAjAnaM̍ ~Myakṣma# Araditi tad-rAjayakṣmasya̍ janma yat pApIyAnaBa̍vat̍ tat pApayakṣmasya̍ yajjAyAByO&vindat̍ tajjAyEnyasyaya̍ EvamEtEṣAM ~MyakṣmAṇAM̍ janma vEda nainamEtE̍ yakṣmA# vindantisa EtA Eva namasyannupA̍dhAvat̍ tA abruvan.̍ varaM̍ ~MvRuṇAmahai samAvacCa Eva na upAya̍ iti tasmA# Eta - [ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam Adityam|carum|niriti|avapann|tEna̍|Eva|Enam|pApAt|srAmA̱t|amu~jcann|yaḥ|pApayakṣmagRu̍hIta̍ iti# pApayakṣma - gRuhItaḥ|syAt|tasmai̱|Etam|Adityam|carum|niriti|vapEt|AdityAn|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhavati|tE|Eva|Enam|pApAt|srAmA̱t|mu~jcanti|amAvAsyA̍yAmitya̍mA̍ - vAsyAyAm|niriti̍|vapEt|amum|Eva|Enam|ApyAya̍mAnamityA̱̍ - pyAyamAnam|anu̍|Eti̍|pyAyayati|navO̍nava̍ iti navaḥ̍ - navaḥ|Bavati|jAyamAnaḥ|iti̍|purOnuvAkyEti̍# puraḥ - anuvAkyA̱|Bavati|Ayuḥ|Eva|asminn̍ ( )|tayA̱|dadhAti|yam|AdityAḥ|aṃqśum|ApyAyayantItyA̱ - pyAyayanti|iti̍|yAjyA̱|Eti̍|Eva|Enam|EtayA̱|pyAyayati||26̍ (63)
verses.samhita: -mAdityaM̍ caruM niravapan̍ tEnaivainaM̍ pApAth srAmAdamu~jcan.̍ yaḥ pApayakṣmagRu̍hItaḥ̍ syAt tasmA# EtamAdityaM̍ caruM nirvapEdAdityAnEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati ta EvainaM̍ pApAth srAmA̱nmu~jcantya- mAvAsyAyAM̍ nirvapEdamumEvaina-̍mApyAya̍mAna-manvA̍ pyAyayati̍ navOnavO̍ Bavati jAyamAna̍ iti# purO&nuvAkyA# BavatyAyurEvAsmin̍ ( ) tayA# dadhAti yamAdityA̍ aṃqśumA̱pyAyayantIti# yAjyaivainamEtayA̱̍ pyAyayati||26

verses.padam: - Padam prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|dEvEByaḥ|annAdyamitya̍nna̍ - adya̱m|vyAdiśaditi̍# vi - Adiśat|saḥ|abravIt|yat|imAn|lOkAn|aBIti̍|atiricyA̍tA̍ ityati̍ - ricyAtai|tat|mama̍|asat|iti̍|tat|imAn|lOkAn|aBi|atIti̍|aricyata|indra̱m|rAjA̍nam|indra̱m|adhirAjamitya̍dhi-rAjam|indra̱m|svarAjA̍namiti̍# sva - rAjAnam|tata̍ḥ|vai|saḥ|imAn|lOkAn|trEdhA|aduhat|tat|tridhAtOriti̍# tri - dhAtO̱ḥ|tridhAtutvamiti# tridhAtu - tvam|yam|kAmayEta|annAda̍ ityanna̍ - adaḥ|syAt|iti|tasmai̱|Etam|tridhAtumiti̍# tri - dhAtu̱m|niriti|vapEt|indrA̍ya|rAjñE̱|purOḍAśa̱m|27̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prajApati̍ rdEvEByO&nnAdyaM ~MvyAdiśath̍ sO̱&bravIdyadimAn ~MlOkAnaByatiricyA̍tai̍ tanmamAsaditi̍ tadimAn ~MlOkAnaByatyaricyatEndraṃq̍ rAjAnamindra̍madhirAjamindraṅ̍# svarAjAnaM̍ tatO vai sa imAn ~MlOkAṅ strEdhA&duhat̍ tat tridhAtO̱stridhAtutvaM ~MyaM kAmayEtAnnAdaḥ̍ syAditi tasmA# EtaM tridhAtuM nirvapEdindrA̍ya̍ rAjñE# purOḍAśa - [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|indrAya|adhirAjAyEtya̍dhi̍ - rAjAya|indrA̍ya|svarAjña̍ iti# sva - rAjñE̱|ayam|vai|indraḥ|rAjA̱|ayam|indra̍ḥ|adhirAja̍ ityadhi̍ - rAjaḥ|asau|indraḥ|svarAḍiti̍# sva - rAṭ|imAn|Eva|lOkAn|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tE|Eva|asmai|anna̱m|prEti̍|yacCanti|annAda̍ ityanna̍ - adaḥ|Eva|Bavati|yathA̱|vathsEna|prattA̱m|gAm|duhE|Evam|Eva|imAn|lOkAn|prattAn̍|kAma̱m|annAdyamitya̍nna̍ - adya̱m|duhE|uttAnEṣvityut-tAnEṣu̍|kapAlE̍ṣu|adhIti̍|śrayati|ayA̍tayAmatvAyEtyayA̍tayAma̍ - tvAya|trayaḥ̍ ( )|purOḍAśA̱ḥ|Bavanti|trayaḥ|imE|lOkAḥ|EṣAm|lOkAnA̱m|Aptyai̱|utta̍ra̍ uttara ityuttaraḥ̍ - uttaraḥ|jyAyAn|Bavati|Evam|iva|hi|imE|lOkAḥ|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM-Ruddhyai|sarvEṣAm|aBigamayannitya̍Bi̍ - gamayann|avEti̍|dyati|aCa̍baMṭkAramityaCa̍baMṭ̍ - kAram|vyatyAsamiti# vi - atyAsa̱m|anviti|Aha|ani̍rdAhAyEtyani̍ḥ̍ - dAhAya||28 (76) (purOḍAśaM - trayaḥ - ṣaḍviṃśatiśca)̍ (A6)
verses.samhita: -mEkAdaśakapAla-mindrA̍yA-dhirAjAyEndrA̍ya̍ svarAjñE&yaM ~MvA indrO rAjA&yamindrO-&dhirAjO̍-&sAvindra̍ḥ̍ svarAḍimAnEva lOkAnth-svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati ta EvAsmA annaM prayacCantyannAda̍ Eva Bavati̍ yathA# vathsEna prattAM gAM duha EvamEvEmAn ~MlOkAn prattAn kAmamannAdya̍M̍ duha uttAnEṣu# kapAlEṣvadhi# śrayatyayAtayAmatvAya̍ trayaḥ̍ ( ) purOḍAśA# Bavanti traya# imE lOkA EṣAM ~MlOkAnAmAptyA uttara^^uttarO̍ jyAyA̱n BavatyEvamiva̍ hImE lOkAḥ samRuddhyai̍ sarvEṣAmaBi-gamayannava̍# dyatyaCambaṭkAraM̍ ~MvyatyAsamanvAhAnirdAhAya||28̍ (purOḍAśaM - trayaḥ - ṣaḍviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAsurA iti# dEva - asurAḥ|saM~MyattA̍ iti saM-yattAḥ|Asann|tAn|dEvAn|asurAḥ|ajayann|tE|dEvAḥ|parAjigyAnA̍ iti# parA - jigyAnAḥ|asurAṇAm|vaiśya̱m|upEti̍|Ayann|tEBya̍ḥ|indriyam|vIrya̱m|apEti̍|akrAmat|tat|indra̍ḥ|acAyat|tat|anu̍|apEti̍|akrAmat|tat|avarudhamitya̍va̍ - rudha̱m|na|aśaknOt|tat|asmAt|aByarddha ityaBi̍ - arddhaḥ|acarat|saḥ|prajApatimiti̍# prajA - patim|upEti|adhAvat|tam|EtayA̱|sarva̍pRuṣṭhayEti̍ sarva# - pRuṣṭhayA|ayAjayat|tayA̱|Eva|asminn|indriyam|vIrya̱m|adadhAt|yaḥ|indriyakAma̍ itI̱ndriya - kAmaḥ|29 (50)
