verses.samhita: dEvAsurAḥ saM~MyattA̍ Asan tAn dEvAnasurA̍ ajayan tE dEvAḥ parAjigyAnA̍ asurAṇAM̍ ~MvaiśyamupA&&yan̍ tEBya# indriyaM ~MvIryamapA̱krAmat̍ tadindrO&cAyat̍ tadanvapA̱krAmat tadavarudhaM̍ nAśaknOt̍ tadasmAdaByarddhO̍# &carath sa prajApatimupA̍dhAvat̍ tamEtayA sarvapRuṣṭhayA&yAjayat̍ tayaivAsminnindriyaM̍ ~MvIryamadadhAdya̍ indriyakA̍mO̍ - [ ] 29

verses.padam: - Padam vIryakAma̍ iti# vIrya# - kAmaḥ|syAt|tam|EtayA̱|sarvapRuṣṭhayEti̍ sarva-pRuṣṭhayA|yAjayEt|EtAḥ|Eva|dEvatA̱ḥ|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga-dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tAḥ|Eva|asminn|indriyam|vIrya̱m|dadhati|yat|indrA̍ya|rAtha̍ntarAyEti̍ rAtha̱m - tarAya|nirvapatIti# niḥ - vapati|yat|Eva|agnEḥ|tEja̍ḥ|tat|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|yat|indrA̍ya|bAṛha̍tAya|yat|Eva|indra̍sya|tEja̍ḥ|tat|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|yat|indrA̍ya|vairUpAya̍|yat|Eva|savituḥ|tEja̍ḥ|tat|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vIryakAmaḥ̍ syAt tamEtayA sarvapRuṣṭhayA̍ yAjayEdEtA Eva dEvatAḥ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati tA EvAsminnindriyaM̍ ~MvIryaM̍ dadhatiyadindrAya̍ rAthantarAya̍ nirvapati̍ yadEvAgnE-stEjastadEvAva# rundhEyadindrAya̍ bAṛhatAya̍ yadEvEndrasya̍ tEjastadEvAva# rundhEyadindrAya̍ vairUpAya yadEva savitustEjasta̍ - [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|avEti|rundhE|yat|indrA̍ya|vairAjAya̍|yat|Eva|dhAtuḥ|tEja̍ḥ|tat|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|yat|indrA̍ya|śAkvarAya̍|yat|Eva|marutA̱m|tEja̍ḥ|tat|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|yat|indrA̍ya|raivatAya̍|yat|Eva|bRuhaspatE̱ḥ|tEja̍ḥ|tat|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|EtAva̍nti|vai|tEjAṃ̍si|tAni̍|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|uttAnEṣvityu̍t̍ - tAnEṣu|kapAlE̍ṣu|adhIti̍|śrayati|ayA̍tayAmatvAyEtyayA̍tayAma̍ - tvAya|dvAdaśakapAla̍ iti dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlaḥ|purOḍAśaḥ|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvAva# rundhE yadindrAya̍ vairAjAya yadEva dhAtustEjastadEvAva# rundhE yadindrAya̍ śAkvarAya yadEva marutAM tEjastadEvAva# rundhEyadindrAya̍ raivatAya yadEva bRuhaspatEstEjastadEvAva# rundha EtAvanti̍ vai tEjAṃsi̍ tAnyEvAva# rundha uttAnEṣu# kapAlEṣvadhi# śrayatyayAtayAmatvAya̍ dvAdaśakapAlaḥ̍ purOḍAśO# - [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam Bavati|vaiśvadEvatvAyEti# vaiśvadEva - tvAya|samantamiti̍# saM - antam|paryavadyatIti̍# pari - avadyati|samantamiti̍# saM - antam|Eva|indriyam|vIrya̱m|yajamAnE|dadhAti|vyatyAsamiti̍# vi - atyAsa̱m|anviti|Aha|ani̍rdAhAyEtyani̍ḥ̍ - dAhAya|aśvaḥ|RuṣaBaḥ|vRuṣṇiḥ|bastaḥ|sA|dakṣi̍ṇA|vRuṣatvAyEti̍# vRuṣa - tvAya|EtayA̱|Eva|yajEta|aBiśasyamA̍na̍ ityaBi̍ - śasyamAnaḥ|EtAḥ|ca|it|vai|asya|dEvatA̱ḥ|anna̱m|adanti̍|adanti̍|u|Eva|asya|manuṣyA̱ḥ||32̍ (38) (indriyakAmaḥ̍ - savitustEjastat - purOḍAśO̍ -&ṣṭAtriṃśacca)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: Bavati vaiśvadEvatvAya# samantaM paryavadyati̍ samantamEvEndriyaM ~MvIryaM̍ ~MyajamAnE̍ dadhAti vyatyAsa-manvAhAnirdAhAyAśva̍# RuṣaBO vRuṣṇirbastaḥ sAdakṣiṇAvRuṣatvAyaitayaivaya̍jEtABiśasyamA̍na̍ EtAścEdvA asyadEvatA̍ annamadantyadantyu̍vEvAsya̍# manuṣyA̱ḥ||32 (indriyakAmaḥ-savitustEjastat̍ - purOḍAśO̍ -&ṣṭAtriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam rajanaḥ|vai|kauṇEyaḥ|kratujitamiti̍# kratu - jita̱m|jAnakim|cakṣurvanyamiti̍# cakṣuḥ - vanya̱m|ayAt|tasmai̱|EtAm|iṣṭi̱m|niriti|avapat|agnayE̱|BrAja̍svatE|purOḍAśa̱m|aṣṭAka̍pAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|sauryam|carum|agnayE̱|BrAjasvatE|purOḍAśa̱m|aṣṭAka̍pAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|tayA̱|Eva|asminn|cakṣuḥ|adadhAt|yaḥ|cakṣu̍ṣkAma̍ iti cakṣuḥ̍ - kAmaḥ|syAt|tasmai̱|EtAm|iṣṭi̱m|niriti|vapEt|agnayE̱|BrAja̍svatE|purOḍAśa̱m|aṣṭAka̍pAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|sauryam|carum|agnayE̱|BrAjasvatE|purOḍAśa̱m|aṣṭAka̍pAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|agnEḥ|vai|cakṣuṣA|manuṣyA̱ḥ|vIti̍|33̍ (50)
verses.samhita: rajanO̍ vai kauṇEyaḥ̍ kratujitaM̍ jAnakiM̍ cakṣurvanyamayAt̍ tasmA# EtAmiṣṭiM niravapadagnayE̍ BrAjasvatE̍ purOḍAśamaṣṭAka̍pAlaṃ̍ sauryaM carumagnayE BrAjasvatE̍ purOḍAśamaṣṭAka̍pAlaM̍ tayaivAsmin cakṣuradadhAd-ya-ścakṣu̍kAmaḥ̍ syAt tasmA# EtAmiṣṭiM nirvapEdagnayE̍ BrAjasvatE̍ purOḍAśamaṣṭAka̍pAlaṃ̍ sauryaM carumagnayE BrAjasvatE̍ purOḍAśamaṣṭAka̍pAlamagnE̍ rvai cakṣuṣA̍ manuṣyA# vi - [ ] 33

verses.padam: - Padam paśyanti|sUryasya|dEvAḥ|agnim|ca|Eva|sUrya̱m|ca|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tau|Eva|asminn|cakṣu̍ḥ|dhattaḥ|cakṣu̍ṣmAn|Eva|Bavati|yat|AgnEyau|Bava̍taḥ|cakṣu̍ṣI̍ iti|Eva|asminn|tat|pratIti̍|dadhAti|yat|sauryaḥ|nAsi̍kAm|tEna̍|aBita̍ḥ|sauryam|AgnEyau|Bavataḥ|tasmA̱t|aBita̍ḥ|nAsi̍kAm|cakṣu̍ṣI̍ iti|tasmA̱t|nAsi̍kayA|cakṣu̍ṣI̍ iti|vidhRu̍tE̍ iti vi - dhRutE|samAnI iti|yAjyAnuvAkyE̍# iti# yAjyA - anuvAkyE̱|Bavataḥ|samAnam|hi ( )|cakṣuḥ|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM-Ruddhyai|uditi|u|tyam|jAtavE̍dasamiti̍# jAta - vEdasam|sapta|tvA|haritaḥ|rathE̱|citram|dEvAnA̱m|uditi̍|agAt|anI̍kam|iti̍|piṇḍAn̍|prEti̍|yacCati|cakṣu̍ḥ|Eva|asmai|prEti̍|yacCati|yat|Eva|tasya̍|tat||34̍ (78) (vi - hya# - ṣṭAviṃśatiśca)̍ (A8)
verses.samhita: paśyanti̍ sUryasya̍ dEvA agniM caiva sUryaM̍ ca svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati tAvEvAsmin cakṣurddhattaścakṣu̍ṣmAnEva̍ Bavati̍ yadA̱gnEyau Bavataścakṣu̍ṣI̍ EvAsmin tat prati# dadhAti yath sauryO nAsikAM̍ tEnABitaḥ̍ sauryamA̱gnEyau BavatastasmA̍daBitO̍ nAsikAM̍ cakṣuṣI̍ tasmAnnAsikayA̍ cakṣuṣI̍ vidhRutE̍ samAnI yA̱jyAnuvAkyE# Bavataḥ samAnaṃ hi ( ) cakṣuḥ samRuddhyA̍ udutyaM jAtavEdasaṃ̍ sapta tvA# haritO rathE# citraM dEvAnAmudagAdanI̍kamiti̍ piṇḍAn prayacCati̍ cakṣurEvAsmai̍ prayacCati̍ yadEva tasya tat||34 (vi - hya# - ṣṭAviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam dhruvaḥ|asi|dhruvaḥ|aham|sajAtEṣviti# sa - jAtEṣu|BUyAsam|dhIra̍ḥ|cEttA̱|vasuviditi̍# vasu - vit|dhruvaḥ|asi|dhruvaḥ|aham|sajAtEṣviti# sa - jAtEṣu|BUyAsam|ugraḥ|cEttA̱|vasuviditi̍# vasu - vit|dhruvaḥ|asi|dhruvaḥ|aham|sajAtEṣviti# sa - jAtEṣu|BUyAsam|aBiBUritya̍Bi̍ - BUḥ|cEttA̱|vasuviditi# vasu - vit|AmanamityA̍ - manam|asi|AmanasyEtyA̍ - manasya|dEvAḥ|yE|sajAtA iti# sa - jAtAḥ|kumArAḥ|samanasa̍ iti sa - manasaḥ|tAn|aham|kAmayE|hRudA|tE|mAm|kAmayantAm|hRudA|tAn|mE|Amanasa̍ ityA - manasaḥ|kRudhi|svAhA̱|AmanamityA̍ - manam|asi|35 (50)
verses.samhita: dhruvO&si̍ dhruvO&haṃ̍ sajAtEṣu̍# BUyAsaM dhIraścEttA# vasuvid dhruvO&si̍ dhruvO&haṃ̍ sajAtEṣu̍# BUyAsamugraścEttA# vasuvid dhruvO&si̍ dhruvO&haṃ̍ sajAtEṣu̍# BUyAsamaBiBUścEttA# vasuvidA manamasyAma̍nasya̍ dEvA yE sajAtAḥ̍ kumArAḥ̍ samanasastAnahaM̍ kAmayE̍ hRudA tE mAM kAmayantAṃ̍ hRudA tAn ma Amanasaḥ̍ kRudhi svAhA &&manamasyA̍ - [ ] 35

verses.padam: - Padam AmanasyEtyA̍ - manasya|dEvAḥ|yAḥ|striyaḥ|sama̍nasa̍ iti sa - manasaḥ|tAḥ|aham|kAmayE|hRudA|tAḥ|mAm|kAmayantAm|hRudA|tAḥ|mE|Amanasa̍ ityA - manasaḥ|kRudhi|svAhA̱|vaiśvadEvImiti# vaiśva - dEvIm|sAgraMqhaṇImiti# sAM - grahaṇIm|niriti|vapEt|grAma̍kAma̍ iti grAma# - kAmaḥ|vaiśvadEvA iti# vaiśva - dEvAḥ|vai|sajAtA iti# sa - jAtAḥ|viśvAn|Eva|dEvAn|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tE|Eva|asmai|sajAtAniti̍# sa-jAtAn|prEti|yacCanti|grAmI|Eva|Bavati|sAgraMqhaṇIti̍# sAM - grahaṇI|Bavati|manOgrahaṇamiti̍# manaḥ - grahaṇam|vai|sagraMha̍ṇamiti̍# saM - grahaṇam|mana̍ḥ|Eva|sajAtAnAmiti̍# sa - jAtAnA̱m|36 (50)
verses.samhita: -manasya̍ dEvA yAḥ striyaḥ samanasastA̍ ahaM kAmayE̍ hRudA tA mAM kAmayantAṃ̍ hRudA tA ma Amanasaḥ̍ kRudhi svAhA# vaiśvadEvIṃsA̱~ggrahaṇIM nirvapEdgrAma̍kAmO̍ vaiśvadEvA vai sajAtA̍ viśvAnEva̍ dEvAnthsvEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati ta EvAsmai# sajAtAn pra yacCanti̍ grAmyEva̍ Bavati̍ sAMgrahaṇI Bavati̍ manOgrahaṇaM̍ ~MvaisagraMhaṇaM̍ mana# Eva sajAtAnA̱M̍ - [ ] 36

verses.padam: - Padam gRuhṇAti|dhruvaḥ|asi|dhruvaḥ|aham|sajAtEṣviti# sa-jAtEṣu|BUyAsam|iti̍|paridhIniti̍# pari - dhIn|parIti|dadhAti|AśiṣamityA̱̍ - śiṣa̱m|Eva|EtAm|Eti|śAstE|athO̍ iti|Etat|Eva|sarva̱m|sajAtEṣviti̍# sa-jAtEṣu|adhIti̍|Bavati|yasya̍|Evam|viduṣa̍ḥ|EtE|paridhaya̍ iti# pari - dhayaḥ|paridhIyanta̍ iti# pari - dhIyantE̱|AmanamityA̍ - manam|asi|AmanasyEtyA̍ - manasya|dEvAḥ|iti|tisraḥ|Ahu̍tIrityA̍ - hutIḥ|juhOti|EtAvantaḥ|vai|sajAtA̍ iti# sa-jAtAḥ|yE|mahAntaḥ|yE|kṣullakAḥ|yAḥ|striya̍ḥ|tAn|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE̍ ( )|tE|Enam|avaruddhA̍ ityava# - ruddhAḥ|upEti|tiṣṭhantE||37̍ (55) (svAhA &&manamasi̍ - sajAtAnAṃ# - rundhE - pa~jca# ca ) (A9)
verses.samhita: gRuhṇAti dhruvO&si̍ dhruvO&haṃ̍ sajAtEṣu̍# BUyAsamiti# paridhIn pari# dadhAtyAśiṣamEvaitAmA̍ śAstE&thO# EtadEva sarvaṃ# sajAtEṣvadhi# Bavati yasyaivaM ~Mviduṣa# EtE paridhaya̍ḥ̍ paridhIyanta Ama# namasyAmanasya̍ dEvA iti# tisra AhutI̍ rjuhOtyEtAvantO̍ vai sajAtA̍ yE mahAntO yE kṣullakA̍ yAḥ striyastAnEvAva# rundhE ( ) ta Enamava̍ruddhA̍ upa# tiṣṭhantE||37

verses.padam: - Padam yat|nava̱m|ait|tat|navanItamiti̍ nava# - nItam|aBavat|yat|asarpat|tat|sarpiḥ|aBavat|yat|addhri̍yata|tat|GRutam|aBavat|aśvinO̱ḥ|prAṇa̍ iti# pra-anaḥ|asi|tasya|tE|dattAm|yayO̱ḥ|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|asi|svAhA̱|indra̍sya|prAṇa̍ iti# pra-anaḥ|asi|tasya|tE|dadAtu|yasya̍|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|asi|svAhA̱|mitrAvaru̍ṇayOriti̍# mitrA - varuṇayOḥ|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|asi|tasya|tE|dattAm|yayO̱ḥ|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|asi|svAhA̱|viśvE̍ṣAm|dEvAnA̱m|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|asi|38 (50)
verses.samhita: yannavamait tannavanItamaBavad-yadasa̍rpat̍ tath sarpiraBavad-yadaddhi̍yata̍ tad GRutamaBavadaśvinO̱ḥ̍ prAṇO&si̍ tasya# tE dattAM ~MyayO̱ḥ prAṇO&si svAhEndrasya̍ prAṇO&si̍ tasya# tE dadAtu yasya# prAṇO&si svAhA# mitrAvaruṇayOḥ̍ prAṇO&si̍ tasya# tE dattAM ~MyayO̱ḥ prAṇO&si svAhA viśvEṣAM̍ dEvAnA̱M prAṇO&si̍ - [ ] 38

verses.padam: - Padam tasya|tE|dadatu|yEṣA̱m|prAṇa̍ iti# pra-anaḥ|asi|svAhA̱|GRutasya̍|dhArA̱m|amRuta̍sya|panthA̱m|indrE̍ṇa|dattAm|praya̍tAmiti̍ pra - yatAm|marudBiriti# marut - Biḥ||tat|tvA|viṣṇuḥ|parIti̍|apaśyat|tat|tvA|iḍA̱|gavi̍|aira̍yat||pAvamAnEna̍|tvA|stOmE̍na|gAyatrasya̍|vartanyA|upAṃqśOrityu̍pa-aṃqśOḥ|vIryE̍ṇa|dEvaḥ|tvA|savitA|uditi̍|sRujatu|jIvAta̍vE|jIvanasyAyai̱|bRuhadrathantarayOriti̍# bRuhat - rathantarayO̱ḥ|tvA|stOmEna|triṣṭuBa̍ḥ|vartanyA|śukrasya̍|vIryE̍ṇa|dEvaḥ|tvA|savitA|uditi̍|39̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tasya# tE dadatu yEṣA̱M prAṇO&si svAhA# GRutasya dhArAmamRuta̍sya̍ panthAmindrEṇa̍ dattAM prayatAM̍ marudBiḥ|tat̍ tvA viṣṇuḥ paryapaśyat̍ tat tvEḍA gavyairayat||pAvamAnEna̍# tvA stOmEna̍ gAyatrasya# vartanyOpAṃqśO rvIryEṇa̍ dEvastvA# savitOth sRujatu̍ jIvAtavE̍ jIvanasyAyai# bRuhad-rathantarayO̱stvA stOmEna̍ triṣṭuBO# vartanyA śukrasya# vIryEṇa̍ dEvastvA# savitOth - [ ] 39

verses.padam: - Padam sRujatu|jIvAtavE|jIvanasyAyai̱|agnEḥ|tvA|mAtra̍yA|jaga̍tyai|vartanyA|Agrayaṇasya̍|vIryE̍ṇa|dEvaḥ|tvA|savitA|uditi̍|sRujatu|jIvAta̍vE|jIvanasyAyai̱|imam|agnE|Ayu̍ṣE|varca̍sE|kRudhi|priyam|rEta̍ḥ|varuṇa|sOma|rAjann||mAtA|iva|asmai|aditE|śarma̍|yacCa|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|jara̍daṣṭiriti̍ jarat̍ - aṣṭiḥ|yathA̱|asat||agniḥ|Ayu̍ṣmAn|saḥ|vanaspati̍Biriti̍ vanaspati-Biḥ|Ayu̍ṣmAn|tEna̍|tvA|Ayu̍ṣA|Ayu̍ṣmantam|karOmi|sOma̍ḥ|Ayu̍ṣmAn̍ ( )|saḥ|OṣadhIBirityOṣa̍dhi̍ - Biḥ|yajñaḥ|AyuṣmAn|saḥ|dakṣi̍ṇABiḥ|brahma̍|Ayu̍ṣmat|tat|brAhmaṇaiḥ|Ayu̍ṣmat|dEvAḥ|Ayu̍ṣmantaḥ|tE|amRutE̍na|pitara̍ḥ|Ayu̍ṣmantaḥ|tE|svadhayEti̍# sva - dhayA̱|Ayuṣmantaḥ|tEna̍|tvA|Ayu̍ṣA|Ayu̍ṣmantam|karOmi||40̍ (75) (viśvEṣAM̍ dEvAnA̱M prAṇO&si̍ - triṣṭuBO# vartanyA śukrasya# vIryEṇa̍ dEvastvA# savitOth - sOma AyuṣmAn̍ - pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A10)
verses.samhita: sRujatu̍ jIvAtavE̍ jIvanasyAyA# agnEstvA mAtrayA̍ jagatyai̍ vartanyA&&grayaṇasya̍# vIryEṇa̍ dEvastvA# savitOth sRujatu̍ jIvAtavE̍ jIvanasyAyA# imamagna̍ AyuṣE̍ varcasE̍ kRudhi priyaṃ rEtO# varuṇa sOma rAjann|mA tEvA̱smA aditE śarma# yacCa viśvE# dEvA jaradaṣṭiryathA&sa̍t||agnirAyu̍ṣmAnth̍ sa vanaspatiBirAyu̍ṣmAn̍ tEna tvA&&yuṣA&&yuṣmantaM̍ karOmi sOma AyuṣmAnth̍ ( ) sa OṣadhIBi̍ ryajña AyuṣmAnth̍ sa dakṣiṇABi̍ rbrahmA&&yuṣmat̍ tad-brA̱hmaṇairAyuṣmad̍ dEvA AyuṣmantastE̍&mRutE̍na̍ pitara AyuṣmantastE̍ svadhayA&&yuṣmantastEna̍ tvA &&yuṣA&& yuṣmantaM̍ karOmi||40 (viśvEṣAM̍ dEvAnA̱M prAṇO&si̍ - triṣṭuBO# vartanyA śukrasya# vIryEṇa̍ dEvastvA# savitOth - sOma AyuṣmAn̍ - pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam agnim|vai|Etasya|śarI̍ram|gacCati|sOma̱m|rasa̍ḥ|varu̍ṇaḥ|Enam|varuṇapAśEnEti̍# varuṇa - pAśEna|gRuhṇAti|sara̍svatIm|vAk|agnAviṣṇU̍ ityagnA - viṣṇU̱|AtmA|yasya|jyOk|Amaya̍ti|yaḥ|jyOgA̍mayAvIti̍ jyOk - AmayAvI|syAt|yaḥ|vA|kAmayEta|sarva̱m|Ayu̍ḥ|iyAm|iti̍|tasmai̱|EtAm|iṣṭi̱m|niriti̍|vapEt|AgnEyam|aṣṭAka̍pAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|saumyam|carum|vAruṇam|daśakapAlamiti̍ daśa# - kapAlam|sArasvatam|carum|AgnAvaiṣṇavamityA̱gnA - vaiṣṇavam|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|agnEḥ|Eva|asya|śarIram|niṣkrIṇAtIti̍# niḥ - krIṇAti|sOmA̱t|rasa̱m|41̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agniM ~MvA Etasya śarIraM̍ gacCati sOmaṃq rasO varuṇa̍ EnaM ~MvaruṇapAśEna# gRuhṇAti sarasvatIM̍ ~MvAgagnAviṣṇU# AtmA yasya jyOgAmayati̍ yO jyOgAmayAvI̍ syAdyO vA# kAmayEta̍ sarvamAyuriyAmiti̍ tasmA# EtAmiṣṭiM nirvapEdAgnEya̍ -maṣṭAkapAlaṃ̍ saumyaM caruM ~MvAruṇaM̍ daśakapAlaṃ̍ sArasvataM carumA̱gnAvaiṣṇava-mEkAdaśakapAla-magnErEvAsya̍ śarIraM̍ niṣkrIṇAti sOmAdrasaM̍ - [ ] 41

verses.padam: - Padam vAruṇEna|Eva|Enam|varuṇapAśAditi̍# varuṇa - pAśAt|mu~jcati|sArasvatEna|vAca̱m|dadhAti|agniḥ|sarvA̱ḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|viṣṇu̍ḥ|yajñaḥ|dEvatA̍Biḥ|ca|Eva|Enam|yajñEna̍|ca|Biṣajyati|uta|yadi̍|itAsuritIta̍ - asuḥ|Bavati|jIva̍ti|Eva|yat|nava̱m|ait|tat|nava̍nItamiti̍ nava-nItam|aBavat|iti̍|Ajya̱m|avEti̍|IkṣatE|rUpam|Eva|asya|Etat|mahimAna̱m|vyAca̍ṣṭa̍ iti# vi-AcaṣṭE|aśvinO̱ḥ|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|asi|iti|Aha|aśvinau̱|vai|dEvAnA̱m|42̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ~MvAruṇEnaivainaM̍ ~MvaruṇapAśAn mu~jcati̍ sArasvatEna vAcaM̍ dadhAtyagniḥ sarvA# dEvatA viṣṇuryajñO̍ dEvatABiścaivaina̍M̍ ~MyajñEna# ca Biṣajyatyuta yadItAsu rBavati̍ jIvatyEva̍ yannavamait tannavanItama-̍ BavadityAjya- mavE̱kṣatErUpamEvAsyai-tanmahimAnaM̍ ~MvyAcaṣṭE&śvinO̱ḥ̍ prAṇO&sItyA̍hAśvinau̍ vai dEvAnA̱M - [ ] 42

verses.padam: - Padam Biṣajau̱|tAByA̱m|Eva|asmai|BEṣajam|karOti|indrasya|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|asi|iti|Aha|indriyam|Eva|asminn|EtEna̍|dadhAti|mitrAvaru̍ṇayAriti̍# mitrA - varuṇayOḥ|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|asi|iti|Aha|prAṇApAnAviti̍# prAṇa - apAnau|Eva|asminn|EtEna|dadhAti|viśvE̍ṣAm|dEvAnA̱m|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|asi|iti|Aha|vIrya̱m|Eva|asminn|EtEna̍|dadhAti|GRutasya̍|dhArA̱m|amRuta̍sya|panthA̱m|iti̍|Aha|yathAyajuriti̍# yathA - yajuḥ|Eva|Etat|pAvamAnEna|tvA|stOmE̍na|iti̍|43̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Biṣajau tAByAmEvAsmai̍# BEṣajaM karOtIndra̍sya̍ prAṇO# &sItyAhEndriya-̍ mEvAsminnEtEna̍# dadhAti mitrAvaruṇayOḥ̍ prAṇO&sItyA̍ha̍ prAṇApAnAvE- vAsminnEtEna̍# dadhAti viśvEṣAM̍ dEvAnA̱M prAṇO&sItyA̍ha̍ vIryamEvAsmi̍nnEtEna̍# dadhAti GRutasya dhArAmamRuta̍sya̍ panthAmityAha̍ yathAyajurEvaitat pAvamAnEna̍# tvA stOmEnEtyA# - [ ] 43

verses.padam: - Padam Aha|prAṇamiti# pra - anam|Eva|asminn|EtEna|dadhAti|bRuhadrathantarayOriti̍# bRuhat-rathantarayO̱ḥ|tvA|stOmEna|iti̍|Aha|Oja̍ḥ|Eva|asminn|EtEna̍|dadhAti|agnEḥ|tvA|mAtra̍yA|iti̍|Aha|AtmAna̱m|Eva|asminn|EtEna̍|dadhAti|Rutvija̍ḥ|parIti̍|Ahuḥ|yAva̍ntaḥ|Eva|Rutvija̍ḥ|tE|Enam|Biṣajyanti|brahmaṇa̍ḥ|hasta̱m|anvAraByEtya̍nu̍ - AraBya|parIti̍|Ahuḥ|EkadhEtyE̍ka̍ - dhA|Eva|yajamAnE|Ayu̍ḥ|dadhati|yat|Eva|tasya̍|tat|hira̍ṇyAt|44̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -ha prAṇamEvAsminnEtEna̍# dadhAti bRuhad-rathantarayO̱stvA stOmEnEtyAhauja# EvAsminnEtEna̍# dadhAtyagnEstvA mAtrayEtyAhA-&&tmAna̍-mEvAsmi̍nnEtEna̍# dadhAtyRutvijaḥ paryAhuryAva̍nta̍ Evartvijasta EnaM̍ Biṣajyanti brahmaṇO hastamanvAraBya̍ paryAhurEkadhaiva̍ yajamAna̍ Ayurdadhati̍ yadEva tasya taddhiraṇyAd̍ - [ ] 44

verses.padam: - Padam GRutam|niriti|pibati|Ayu̍ḥ|vai|GRutam|amRuta̱m|hira̍ṇyam|amRutA̱t|Eva|Ayu̍ḥ|niriti̍|pibati|śatamA̍namiti̍# śata - mAnam|Bavati|śatAyuriti# śata - Ayuḥ|puruṣaḥ|śatEndri̍ya̍ iti# śata - indriyaḥ|Ayuṣi|Eva|indriyE|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|athO̍ iti|Kalu̍|yAva̍tIḥ|samA̱ḥ|Eṣyann|manyE̍ta|tAva̍nmAnamiti̍ tAvat̍ - mAnam|syAt|samRuddhyA̍ iti sam - Ruddhyai|imam|agnE|AyuṣE|varca̍sE|kRudhi|iti̍|Aha|Ayu̍ḥ|Eva|asminn|varca̍ḥ|dadhAti|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|jara̍daṣṭiriti̍ jarat̍ - aṣṭiḥ|yathA̱|asat|iti̍# ( )|Aha|jaradaṣṭimiti̍ jarat̍ - aṣṭim|Eva|Enam|karOti|agniḥ|AyuṣmAn|iti̍|hasta̱m|gRuhṇAti|EtE|vai|dEvAḥ|Ayu̍ṣmantaḥ|tE|Eva|asminn|Ayu̍ḥ|dadhati|sarva̱m|Ayu̍ḥ|Eti||45̍ (72) (rasaM̍ - dEvAnAṅq-stOmEnEti-hiraṇyA-dasaditi-dvAviṃ̍śatiśca)̍ (A11)
verses.samhita: GRutaM niṣpibatyAyurvai̍ GRutamamRutaṃq hiraṇyamamRutA̍dEvA̍ &&yurniṣpibati̍ śatamAnaM̍ Bavati śatAyuḥ puruṣaḥ̍ śatEndriya̍ AyuṣyEvEndriyE̍ pratitiṣṭhatyathO̍ Kalu yAvatIḥ̍ samA# Eṣyan manyEta̍ tAvanmAnaṅ̍ syAth samRuddhyA̍ imamagna̍ AyuṣE̍ varcasE̍ kRudhItyAhA &&yurEvAsmin.̍ varcO# dadhAti viśvE# dEvA jaradaṣṭiryathA̍ &sadityA# ( ) -ha jaradaṣṭimEvaina̍M̍ karOtyagni-rAyuṣmAniti̍ hastaM̍ gRuhṇAtyEtE vai dEvA Ayuṣmantasta̍ EvAsminnAyurdadhati̍ sarvamAyurEti||45̍ (rasaM-dEvAnAṅq-stOmEnEti-hira̍ṇyA-dasaditi-dvAviṃ̍śatiśca)(A11)̍

verses.padam: - Padam prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|varuṇAya|aśva̱m|anayat|saḥ|svAm|dEvatA̱m|ArcCat|saḥ|parIti̍|adIryata|saḥ|Etam|vAruṇam|catu̍ṣkapAlamiti̍ catuḥ̍ - kapAlam|apaśyat|tam|niriti|avapat|tata̍ḥ|vai|saḥ|varuṇapAśAditi̍# varuṇa - pAśAt|amucyata|varuṇaḥ|vai|Etam|gRuhṇAti|yaḥ|aśva̱m|pratigRuhṇAtIti̍# prati - gRuhṇAti|yAva̍taḥ|aśvAn̍|pratigRuhṇIyAditi̍# prati - gRuhṇIyAt|tAvataḥ|vAruṇAn|catu̍ṣkapAlAniti̍ catuḥ̍ - kapAlAn|niriti|vapEt|varu̍ṇam|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|Enam|varuṇapAśAditi̍# varuṇa - pAśAt|mu~jcati|46 (50)
verses.samhita: prajApati̍ rvaruṇAyAśva̍manayath̍ sa svAM dEvatAmArcCath̍ sa paryadIryata̍ sa EtaM ~MvAruṇaM̍ catuṣ-kapAlamapaśyat̍ taM niravapat̍ tatO vai sa varuṇa-̍ pAśAdamucyata̍ varuṇO̍ vA EtaM gRuhṇAti̍ yO&śvaM̍ pratigRuhṇAti yAvatO&śvA̱n pratigRuhṇIyAt tAvatO̍ vAruṇAn catuṣkapAlAn̍ nirvapEd-varu̍ṇamEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvainaM̍ ~MvaruṇapAśAn -mu~jcati̍ - [ ] 46

verses.padam: - Padam catuṣkapAlA̍ iti catuḥ̍ - kapAlAḥ|Bavanti|catuṣpAditi̍ catuḥ̍ - pAt|hi|aśvaḥ|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|Eka̱m|atiriktamityati̍# - riktam|niriti|vapEt|yam|Eva|pratigrAhIti̍# prati - grAhI|Bavati|yam|vA|na|addhyEtItya̍dhi̍ - Eti|tasmA̱t|Eva|varuṇapAśAditi̍# varuṇa - pAśAt|mucyatE|yadi|apa̍ram|pratigrAhIti̍# prati - grAhI|syAt|sauryam|EkakapAlamityEka̍# - kapAlam|anu|niriti̍|vapEt|amum|Eva|Adityam|uccAramityu̍t̍ - cAram|kurutE|apaḥ|avaBRuthamityava̍ -BRutham|avEti|Eti|aPsvitya̍p̍ - su|vai|varuṇaḥ|sAkṣAditi̍# sa-akṣAt|Eva|varuṇam|avEti̍|yajatE|apOnaptrIyamitya̍paḥ̍ - naptrIya̱m|carum ( )|punaḥ|EtyEtyA̱̍ - itya|niriti̍|vapEt|aPsuyO̍nirityaPsu̍ - yOniḥ|vai|aśvaḥ|svAm|Eva|Enam|yOni̱m|gamayati|saḥ|Enam|śAntaḥ|upEti̍|tiṣṭhatE||47̍ (67) (mu~jcati - caruṃ - saptadaśa̍ ca) (A12)
verses.samhita: catuṣkapAlA̍ Bavanti catuṣpAddhyaśvaḥ̍ samRuddhyA̍ EkamatiriktaM̍ nirvapEd-yamEva̍ pratigrAhI̍ Bavati̍ yaM ~MvA nAddhyEti tasmAdEva̍ varuṇapAśAn̍ mucyatE̍ yadyaparaM̍ pratigrAhI syAth sauryamEkakapAlamanu̍ nirvapEdamumEvA̍ &&dityamuccAraM̍ kurutE̍ &pO&vaBRuthamavai̱tyaPsu̍ vai varuṇaḥ̍ sAkṣAdEva varuṇamava̍# yajatE &pOnaptrIyaM̍ caruM ( ) punarEtya nirvapEdaPsu̍ yOnirvA̍ aśvaḥ svAmEvainaM~MyOniM̍ gamayati sa Enaṃ̍ śAnta upa# tiṣṭhatE||47

verses.padam: - Padam yA|vAm|indrAvaruṇEtI̱ndrA - varuṇA|yatavyA̱|tanUḥ|tayA̱|imam|aṃhasaḥ|mu~jcatam|yA|vAm|indrAvaruṇEtI̱ndrA̍ - varuṇA|sahasyA̱|rakṣasyA̱|tEjasyA̱|tanUḥ|tayA̱|imam|aṃhasaḥ|mu~jcatam|yaḥ|vAm|indrAvaruṇAvitI̱ndrA̍ - varuṇau|agnau|srAmaḥ|tam|vAm|EtEna̍|avEti̍|yajE|yaḥ|vAm|indrAvaruṇEtI̱ndrA̍ - varuṇA|dvipAthsviti# dvipAt - su|paśuṣu|catu̍ṣpAthsviti̍ catuṣpAt̍ - su|gOṣṭha iti# gO- sthE|gRuhEṣu|aPsvitya̍p̍ - su|OṣadhIṣu|vanaspati̍ṣu|srAma̍ḥ|tam|vAm|EtEna̍|avEti̍|yajE|indra̍ḥ|vai|Etasya̍|48̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yA vAmindrAvaruṇA̍ yatavyA# tanUstayEmamaṃ hasO̍ mu~jcataM ~MyA vAmindrA̍ varuṇA sahasyA# rakṣasyA# tEjasyA# tanUstayE mamaṃ hasO̍ mu~jcataM ~MyO vAmindrA̍ varuṇA vagnau srAmastaM ~MvA# mE tEnA vayajEyO̍ vAmindrA̍ varuṇA dvipAthsu# paśuṣu catuṣpAthsu̍ gOṣṭhE gRuhEṣvaP^^svOṣadhIṣu̍ vanaspatiṣu̍ srAmastaM ~MvA# mE tEnAva# yaja indrO vA EtasyE̱ - [ ] 48

verses.padam: - Padam indriyEṇa|apEti̍|krAmati|varu̍ṇaḥ|Enam|varuṇapAśEnEti̍# varuṇa - pAśEna|gRuhṇAti|yaḥ|pApmanA̱|gRuhItaḥ|Bava̍ti|yaḥ|pApmanA̱|gRuhItaḥ|syAt|tasmai̱|EtAm|aindrAvaruṇImityai̱ndrA̍ - varuṇIm|payasyA̱m|niriti|vapEt|indra̍ḥ|Eva|asminn|indriyam|dadhAti|varu̍ṇaḥ|Enam|varuṇapAśAditi̍# varuṇa - pAśAt|mu~jcati|payasyA̱|Bavati|payaḥ|hi|vai|EtasmA̱t|apakrAmatItya̍pa̍ - krAmati|atha̍|Eṣaḥ|pApmanA̱|gRuhItaḥ|yat|payasyA̱|Bava̍ti|paya̍ḥ|Eva|asminn|tayA̱|dadhAti|payasyA̍yAm|49̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -ndriyEṇApa# krAmati varuṇa̍ EnaM ~MvaruṇapAśEna# gRuhṇAti yaḥ pApmanA# gRuhItO Bavati̍ yaḥ pApmanA# gRuhItaḥ syAt tasmA# EtAmai̱ndrAvaruṇIM payasyA̱M̍ nirvapEdindra̍# EvAsminnindriyaM̍ dadhAti̍ varuṇa̍ EnaM ~MvaruṇapAśAn-mu~jcati̍ payasyA# Bavati payO hi vA EtasmAdapakrAmatyathaiṣa̍ pApmanA# gRuhItO yat payasyA̍# Bavati̍ paya# EvAsmin tayA# dadhAti payasyAyAM̍ - [ ] 49

verses.padam: - Padam purOḍAśa̱m|avEti|dadhAti|AtmanvantamityA̱tmann̍ - vanta̱m|Eva|Enam|karOti|athO iti|Ayata̍navantamityAyata̍na̍ - vantam|Eva|caturddhEti# catuḥ - dhA|vIti|Uhati|dikṣu|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|puna̍ḥ|samiti̍|Uhati|digBya̍ iti# dik - Byaḥ|Eva|asmai|BEṣajam|karOti|samUhyEti# saM - Uhya|avEti̍|dyati|yathA̱|Avi̍ddhamityA̍ - viddham|niṣkRuntatIti# niḥ - kRuntati|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|yaḥ|vAm|indrAvaruṇAvitI̱ndrA̍ - varuṇau|agnau|srAmaḥ|tam|vAm|EtEna̍|avEti̍|yajE|iti̍|Aha|duri̍ṣṭyA̍ iti duḥ - iṣṭyAḥ|Eva|Enam|pAti ( )|yaḥ|vAm|indrAvaruṇEtI̱ndrA - varuṇA|dvipAthsviti# dvipAt - su|paśuṣu|srAma̍ḥ|tam|vAm|EtEna̍|avEti̍|yajE|iti̍|Aha|EtAva̍tIḥ|vai|Apa̍ḥ|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|vanaspata̍yaḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|paśavaḥ|upajIvanIyA̍ ityupa̍ - jIvanIyA̱ḥ|tAḥ|Eva|asmai|varuṇapAśAditi# varuṇa - pAśAt|mu~jcati||50 (76) (Etasya# - payasyAyAM̍ - pAti - ṣaḍviṃśatiśca̍ ) (A13)
verses.samhita: purOḍAśamava# dadhAtyAtmanvantamEvaina̍M̍ karOtyathO# AyatanavantamEva̍ caturddhA̍ vyUhati̍ dikṣvEva̍ pratitiṣṭhati̍ punaḥ samUhati̍ digBya EvAsmai# BEṣajaM karOti̍ samUhyAva# dyati yathA&&viddhaM̍ niṣkRuntati# tAdRugEva tadyO vAmindrAvaruṇAvagnau̍ srAmastaM ~MvAmEtEnAva̍# yaja ityAha̍ duriṣ^^ṭyA̍ EvainaM̍ pAti ( ) yO vA# mindrA varuṇA dvipAthsu# paśuṣu srAmastaM ~MvA# mE tEnAva# yaja ityAhaitAva̍tIrvA̍ Apa OṣadhayO̍ vanaspatayaḥ̍ prajAḥ paśava# upajIvanIyAstA EvAsmai# varuṇapAśAn-mu~jcati||50̍

verses.padam: - Padam saḥ|pratnavaditi# pratna - vat|nIti|kAvyA̱|indra̱m|vaḥ|viśvata̍ḥ|parIti̍|indra̱m|nara̍ḥ||tvam|naḥ|sOma|viśvata̍ḥ|rakṣa̍|rAjann|aGAyata̍ ityaGa̍ - yataḥ||na|riṣyEt|tvAvata̍ iti tva - vataḥ|saKA̱||yA|tE|dhAmAni|divi|yA|pRuthivyAm|yA|parva̍tEṣu|Oṣa̍dhIṣu|aPsitya̍p̍ - su||tEBiḥ|naḥ|viśvai̱ḥ|sumanA̍ iti# su-manA̱ḥ|ahEḍann|rAjann̍|sOma|pratIti̍|havyA|gRuBAya||agnI̍ṣOmEtyagnI̱̍ - sOmA|savEdasEti̍ sa - vEdasA|sahUtI̍ iti sa - hUtI|vanatam|giraḥ||samiti̍|dEvatrEti̍# dEva - trA|baBUvathuḥ||yuvam|51 (50)
verses.samhita: - ndraM naraḥ>4̍ indraM narO# nEmadhitA̍ havantE yatpAryA# yunajatE̍ dhiyastAḥ|śUrO nRuṣAtA̍ śavasaścakAna̍ A gOmati̍ vrajE BajA̍ tvannaḥ||̍

verses.padam: - Padam EtAni|divi|rOcanAni̍|agniḥ|ca|sOma|sakra̍tU̍ iti sa - kratU|adhattam||yuvam|sindhUn|aBiśa̍stErityaBi̍ - śastEḥ|avadyAt|agnIṣOmAvityagnI̱̍ - sOmau|amu~jcatam|gRuBItAn||agnI̍ṣOmAvityagnI̱̍ - sOmau|imam|sviti|mE|śRuṇutam|vRuṣaṇA|hava̱m|pratIti̍||sUktAnIti̍# su - uktAni|haryatam|Bava̍tam|dAśuṣE̱|maya̍ḥ||Eti̍|anyam|divaḥ|mAtariśvA̱|jaBAra|ama̍thnAt|anyam|parIti̍|śyEnaḥ|adrE̱ḥ||agnI̍ṣOmEtyagnI̱̍ - sOmA|brahmaṇA|vAvRudhAnA|urum|yajñAya̍|cakrathuḥ|u|lOkam||agnI̍ṣOmEtyagnI̱̍ - sOmA|haviṣaḥ|prasthi̍tasyEti̍ pra - sthitasya|vItam|52 (50)
verses.samhita: -mEtAni# divi rOcanAnyagniśca̍# sOma sakratU̍ adhattaM||yuvaṃ sindhUṃ# raBiśastEravadyA-dagnI̍ṣOmA-vamu̍~jcataM̍ gRuBItAn||agnIṣOmAvimaṃ̍ su mE# śRuṇutaM ~MvRuṣaṇA̍ hava̱M|prati# sUktAni# haryataM BavataM̍ dAśuṣE mayaḥ||A&nyaM̍ divO mAtariśvA̍# jaBArA&mathnAdanyaM̍ pari# śyEnO adrE̱ḥ|agnIṣOmA̍ brahmaṇA̍ vAvRudhAnOruM ~MyajñAya# cakrathuru lOkaM||agnIṣOmA̍ haviṣaḥ prasthitasya̍ vItaṃ - [ ] 52

verses.padam: - Padam haryatam|vRuṣaṇA|juṣEthA̱m||suśarmAṇEti̍# su - śarmAṇA|svavasEti̍# su - avasA|hi|BUtam|atha̍|dhattam|yaja̍mAnAya|śam|yOḥ||Eti̍|pyAyasva|samiti̍|tE||gaṇAnA̱m|tvA|gaṇapa̍timiti̍# gaṇa - patim|havAmahE|kavim|kavInAm|upamaśravastamamityu̍pamaśra̍vaḥ-tamam||jyEṣṭharAjamiti̍# jyEṣṭha-rAja̱m|brahmaṇAm|brahmaṇaḥ|patE|Eti̍|naḥ|śRuṇvann|UtiBirityUti̍ - Biḥ|sIda|sAdanam||saḥ|it|janE̍na|saḥ|viśA|saḥ|janma̍nA|saḥ|putraiḥ|vAja̱m|BaratE|dhanA̱|nRuBiriti̍ nRu - Biḥ||dEvAnA̱m|yaḥ|pitara̱m|AvivAsatItyA̱̍ - vivAsati|53̍ (50)
verses.samhita: - saM tE̱>6 saM tE payAṃsi̍ samu# yantu vAjAḥ saM ~MvRuṣṇiyAn.̍ yaBimAtiṣAhaḥ|ApyAya̍mAnO̍ amRutAya̍ sOma divi śravAṅsyuttamAni̍# dhiṣva||

verses.padam: - Padam śraddhAmanA̍ iti# śraddhA - manAḥ|haviṣA̱|brahmaṇaḥ|pati̱m||saḥ|suṣṭuBEti̍# su - stuBA̱|saḥ|RukvatA|gaṇEna̍|valam|rurOja|Paligam|ravE̍ṇa||bRuhaspati̍ḥ|ustriyA̱ḥ|havyasUda̍ iti# havya - sUdaḥ|kani̍kradat|vAva̍śatIḥ|uditi̍|Ajat||maru̍taḥ|yat|ha|vaḥ|divaḥ|yA|vaḥ|śarma̍||aryamA|Eti̍|yAti|vRuṣaBaḥ|tuvi̍ṣmAn|dAtA|vasU̍nAm|puruhUta̍ iti# puru - hUtaḥ|aṛhann||sahasrAkṣa̍ iti# sahasra - akṣaḥ|gOtraBiditi# gOtra-Bit|vajrabAhuriti̍ vajra# - bAhuḥ|asmAsu|dEvaḥ|dravi̍ṇam|dadhAtu||yE|tE|aryamann|bahava̍ḥ|dEvayAnA̍ iti# dEva - yAnA̱ḥ|panthAnaḥ|54̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -yA vaḥ śarma>8̍ yA vaḥ śarma# śaśamAnAya santi# tridhAtUni̍ dAśuṣE# yacCatAdhi|asmaByaM̍ tAni# marutO vi yanta̍ rayiM nO# dhatta vRuṣaṇaḥ suvIra̱M||(Appearing in ṭś1.5.11.5 ) OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ hariḥ OM 2.4 dvitIyakAṇḍE caturthaḥ praśnaḥ - iṣṭividhAnaM

verses.padam: - Padam rAjann|divaḥ|AcarantItyA̱ - caranti||tEBi̍ḥ|naḥ|dEva|mahi̍|śarma̍|yacCa|śam|naḥ|Edhi|dvipada̍ iti# dvi - padE̱|śam|catuṣpada̍ iti catuḥ̍ - padE||buddhnAt|agra̱m|a~ggirOBiritya~ggi̍raḥ-Biḥ|gRuṇAnaḥ|vIti̍|parva̍tasya|dRuṃqhitAni̍|airat||rujat|rOdhAṃ̍si|kRutrimA̍ṇi|EṣAm|sOma̍sya|tA|madE̱|indra̍ḥ|cakAra||buddhnAt|agrE̍ṇa|vIti̍|mimAya|mAnai̱ḥ|vajrE̍ṇa|KAni̍|atRuṇat|nadInA̱m||vRuthA̱|asRujat|pathiBiriti̍# pathi - Biḥ|dIrGayAthairiti# dIrGa - yAthaiḥ|sOmasya|tA|madE̱|indra̍ḥ|cakAra||55̍ (50)
verses.samhita: rAjan diva Acaranti|tEBi̍rnO̍ dEva mahi śarma# yacCa śaM na# Edhi dvipadE śaM catuṣpadE||buddhnAdagra-ma~ggi̍rOBi-rgRuṇAnO̍ vi parvatasya̍ dRuṃhitAnyairat|rujadrOdhAṃ̍sikRutrimA̱ṇyEṣAṃqsOma̍syatAmadaindra̍ścakAra||buddhnAdagrE̍ṇa̍ vi mimAya̍ mAnairvajrEṇa̍ KAnyatRuṇannadInA̱M|vRuthA̍# &sRujat pathiBi# rdIrGayAthaiḥ sOmasya̍ tA mada indraścakAra||55̍

verses.padam: - Padam prEti|yaḥ|jajñE|vidvAn|asya|bandhu̱m|viśvA̍ni|dEvaḥ|jani̍mA|vivakti||brahma̍|brahma̍ṇaḥ|uditi̍|jaBAra|maddhyA̱t|nIcA|uccA|svadhayEti̍# sva - dhayA̱|aBi|prEti|tasthau||mahAn|mahI̍ iti|astaBAyat|vIti̍|jAtaḥ|dyAm|sadma̍|pArtthi̍vam|ca|raja̍ḥ||saḥ|buddhnAt|Aṣṭa|januṣA̱|aBIti̍|agra̱m|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|yasya̍|samrAḍiti̍# saM-rAṭ||buddhnAt|yaḥ|agra̱m|aByartItyaBi-arti̍|Oja̍sA|bRuhaspati̱m|Eti̍|vivAsanti|dEvAḥ̍ ( )||Binat|valam|vIti|pura̍ḥ|dardarIti|kani̍kradat|suva̍ḥ|apaḥ|jigAya||56̍ (59) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 14 Anuvaakams :- (AdityEByO# - dEvA vai mRutyO - rdEvA vai - satrama# - ryamṇE -prajApatEstraya̍striṃśat̍ - prajApati̍ rdEvEByO&nnAdyaM̍ -dEvAsurAstAn - rajanO̍ - dhruvO&si̍ - yannava# - magniM ~Mvai -prajApati̍ rvaruṇAya̍ - yA vAmindrA̍ varuṇA - sa pratnava̍ -ccaturdaśa)̍ Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (AdityEBya - stvaṣṭu# - rasmai dAnakAmA̍ - EvAva# rundhE - &gniM ~Mvai - sa pratnavath̍ – ṣaṭpa~jcAśat̍ ) First and Last Padam of ṭhird Prasnam of Kandam 2:- (AdityEByaḥq - suvarapO̍ jigAya̍ )||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM dvitIyakAṇḍE pada pAṭhE tRutIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||
verses.samhita: pra yO jajñE vidvAṃ asya bandhuM ~MviśvAni̍ dEvO janimA̍ vivakti|brahma brahmaṇa̍ ujjaBAra̍ maddhyA̱nnIcAduccA svadhayA&Bi pratasthau||mahAn̍ mahI astaBAyadvi̍ jAtO dyAṃ sadma pArthivaM̍ ca rajaḥ|sa̍ buddhnAdA̱ṣṭa januṣA&ByagraM bRuhaspati# rdEvatAyasya# samrAṭ||buddhnAdyO agramaByartyOja̍sA̍ bRuhaspatimA vivAsanti̍ dEvAḥ ( )|BinadvalaM ~Mvi purO# dardarIti kanikradath̍ suvarapO̍ jigAya||56̍ praśna kOrvai with starting padams of 1 to 14 Anuvaakams :- (AdityEByO# - dEvA vai mRutyO - rdEvA vai - satrama# - ryamṇE -prajApatEstraya̍striṃśat̍ - prajApati̍ rdEvEByO&nnAdyaM̍ -dEvAsurAstAn - rajanO̍ - dhruvO&si̍ - yannava# - magniM ~Mvai - prajApati̍ rvaruṇAya̍ - yA vAmindrA̍ varuṇA - sa pratnava̍ -ccaturdaśa)̍ kOrvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (AdityEBya - stvaṣṭu# - rasmai dAnakAmA̍ - EvAva# rundhE - &gniM ~Mvai - sa pratnavath̍ - ṣaṭpa~jcAśat̍ ) first and last padam of third praśnam of kAṇḍam 2:- (AdityEByaḥq - suvarapO̍ jigAya̍ )||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM dvitIyakAṇḍE tRutIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||2.3.1 Appendix

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAḥ|manuṣyA̱ḥ|pitaraḥ|tE|anyata̍ḥ|Asann|asu̍rAḥ|rakṣAṃ̍si|piśAcAḥ|tE|anyata̍ḥ|tEṣA̱m|dEvAnA̱m|uta|yat|alpa̱m|lOhi̍tam|aku̍rvann|tat|rakṣAṃ̍si|rAtrI̍Biriti̍ rAtri-Biḥ|asuBnann|tAn|subdhAn|mRutAn|aBi|vIti̍|aucCat|tE|dEvAḥ|aviduḥ|yaḥ|vai|naḥ|ayam|mriyatE̱|rakṣAṃ̍si|vai|imam|Gnanti|iti̍|tE|rakṣAṃ̍si|upEti̍|amantrayanta|tAni̍|abruvann|vara̱m|vRuṇAmahai|yat|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvA manuṣyA̱ḥ̍ pitarastE̱&nyata# AsannasurA̍ rakṣAṃsi̍ piśAcAstE̱ &nyatastEṣA̱M dEvAnAmuta̍ yadalpaM ~MlOhitamaku̍rvan̍ tad-rakṣAṃsi̍ rAtrIBirasuBnan̍ tAnth subdhAn mRutAnaBi vyau̱cCat tE dEvA aviduryO̍ vai nO&yaM mriyatE rakṣAṃsi̍ vA imaM GnantIti tE rakṣAṅqsyupAmantrayanta̍ tAnyabruvan.̍ varaM̍ ~MvRuṇAmahai ya - [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam asurAn|jayA̍ma|tat|naḥ|saha|asat|iti̍|tata̍ḥ|vai|dEvAḥ|asu̍rAn|ajayann|tE|asu̍rAn|jitvA|rakṣAṃ̍si|apEti̍|anudanta|tAni̍|rakṣAṃ̍si|anRu̍tam|akarta|iti̍|samantamiti̍# saM - antam|dEvAn|parIti|aviśann|tE|dEvAḥ|agnau|anAthanta|tE|agnayE̱|prava̍ta̍ iti pra - vatE|purOḍAśa̱m|aṣṭAkapAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|niriti|avapann|agnayE̱|vibAdhava̍ta̍ iti# vibAdha - vatE|agnayE̱|pratIkavata̍ iti pratIka̍ - vatE|yat|agnayE̱|pravata̍ iti pra - vatE|niravapanniti̍# niḥ - avapann|yAni̍|Eva|purastA̱t|rakṣAṃ̍si|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -dasurAn̍ jayAma̍ tannaḥ̍ sahAsaditi tatO vai dEvA asurAnajayan̍ tE&surAn̍ jitvArakṣAṅqsyapAnudanta̍ tAni rakṣAṅqsyanRutama̍ kartEti# samantaM dEvAn paryaviśan̍ tE dEvA agnAvanAthanta̍ tE̱&gnayE pravatE̍ purOḍAśamaṣṭAka̍pAlaM̍ niravapannagnayE̍# vibAdhavatE&gnayE̍ pratIkavatE̍ yadagnayE pravatE̍ niravapanq.̍ yAnyEva purastAd-rakṣAṅqsyA - [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam Asann|tAni̍|tEna̍|prEti̍|anudanta|yat|agnayE̱|vibAdhava̍ta̍ iti# vibAdha - vatE|yAni|Eva|aBita̍ḥ|rakṣAṃ̍si|Asann̍|tAni̍|tEna̍|vIti̍|abAdhanta|yat|agnayE̱|pratI̍kavata̍ iti pratIka̍ - vatE|yAni|Eva|paścAt|rakṣAṃ̍si|Asann̍|tAni̍|tEna̍|apEti̍|anudanta|tata̍ḥ|dEvAḥ|aBa̍vann|parEti̍|asu̍rAḥ|yaḥ|BrAtRu̍vyavAniti̍ BrAtRuvya̍ - vAn|syAt|saḥ|sparddhamAnaḥ|EtayA̱|iṣṭyA̱|yajEta|agnayE̱|prava̍ta̍ iti pra - vatE|purOḍAśa̱m|aṣṭAkapAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|agnayE̱|vibAdhava̍ta̍ iti# vibAdha - vatE|3 (50)
verses.samhita: -santAni tEna prAṇudanta̍ yadagnayE# vibAdhavatE̍ yAnyEvABitO rakṣAṅqsyAsan tAni tEna vyabAdhanta̍ yadagnayE pratIkavatE̍ yAnyEva paścAd-rakṣAṅqsyAsan tAni tEnApAnudanta̍ tatO# dEvA aBavan̍ parAsurA̍ yO BrAtRuvyavAnth̍ syAth sa sparddhamAna̍ EtayEṣ^^ṭyA# yajEtAgnayE pravatE̍ purOḍAśamaṣṭAka̍pAlaM̍ nirvapEdagnayE̍# vibAdhavatE̍ - [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam agnaya̱|pratIkavata̍ iti pratIka̍ - vatE|yat|agnayE̱|pravata̍ iti pra - vatE|nirvapatIti# niḥ - vapati|yaḥ|Eva|asmAt|śrEyAn̍|BrAtRu̍vyaḥ|tam|tEna̍|prEti̍|nudatE|yat|agnayE̱|vibAdhava̍ta̍ iti# vibAdha - vatE|yaḥ|Eva|EnEna|sadRu~g~giti# sa - dRu~g|tam|tEna|vIti̍|bAdhatE|yat|agnayE̱|pratI̍kavata̍ iti pratIka̍ - vatE|yaḥ|Eva|asmAt|pApIyAn|tam|tEna̍|apEti̍|nudatE|prEti̍|śrEyAṃ̍sam|BrAtRu̍vyam|nudatE|atIti̍|sadRuśa̱m|krAmati|na|Enam|pApI̍yAn|ApnOti|yaḥ|Evam̍ ( )|vidvAn|EtayA̱|iṣṭyA̱|yajatE||4̍ (54) (vRuṇAmahai yat - purastAd rakṣAṃsi-̍ vapEdagnayE# vibAdhavata̍ - EvaM - catvAri# ca) (A1)
verses.samhita: &gnayE pratIkavatE̍ yadagnayE pravatE̍ nirvapati̍ ya EvAsmAcCrEyAn-BrAtRuvyastaM̍ tEna praṇudatE̍ yadagnayE# vibAdhavatE̍ ya EvainEna̍ sadRu~gtaM tEna vi bAdhatE̍ yadagnayE pratIkavatE̍ ya EvAsmAt pApIyAn̍ taM tEnApa# nudatE pra śrEyAṃsaM̍ BrAtRuvyaM̍ nudatEti# sadRuśaM̍ krAmati nainaM pApIyAnApnOti̍ ya EvaM ( ) ~MvidvAnEtayEṣ^^ṭyA yajatE||4̍

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAsurA iti# dEva - asurAḥ|saM~MyattA̍ iti saM - yattAḥ|Asann|tE|dEvAḥ|abruvann|yaḥ|naḥ|vIryAvattama̍ iti# vIryAvat̍ - tamaḥ|tam|anviti|samAra̍BAmahA̍ iti# saM - AraBAmahai|iti̍|tE|indra̱m|abruvann|tvam|vai|naḥ|vIryA̍vattama̍ iti# vIryAvat̍ - tamaḥ|asi|tvAm|anviti|samAra̍BAmahA̍ iti# saM-AraBAmahai|iti̍|saḥ|abravIt|tisraḥ|mE|imAḥ|tanuva̍ḥ|vIryA̍vatIriti̍# vIrya# - vatIḥ|tAḥ|prIṇIta|atha|asu̍rAn|aBIti̍|Baviṣyatha|iti̍|tAḥ|vai|brUhi|iti̍|abruvann|iyam|aṃqhOmugityaṃ̍haḥ̍ -muk|iyam|vimRudhEti# vi - mRudhA|iyam|indriyAvatItI̱ndriya - vatI|5 (50)
verses.samhita: dEvAsurAḥ saM~MyattA̍ Asan tE dEvA abruvanq.̍ yO nO# vIryAvattamastamanu̍# samAraBAmahA̍ iti ta indramabruvan̍ tvaM ~Mvai nO# vIryAvattamO&si̍ tvAmanu# samAraBAmahA̍ iti sO̱&bravIt tisrO ma# imAstanuvO# vIryAvatIstAḥ̍ prIṇItAthA-su̍rAnaBi̍ BaviṣyathEti̍ tA vai brUhItyabruvanniyamaṃ̍# hOmugiyaM ~MvimRudhEyami̍ndriyAvatI̍ - [ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam iti|abravIt|tE|indrA̍ya|aṃqhOmuca̍ ityaṃhaḥ̍ - mucE̱|purOḍAśa̱m|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|avapann|indrA̍ya|vaimRudhAya̍|indrA̍ya|indriyAva̍ta̍ itI̱ndriya - vatE|yat|indrAya|aṃqhOmuca̍ ityaṃhaḥ̍ - mucE̱|niravapanniti̍# niḥ - avapann|aṃha̍saḥ|Eva|tEna̍|amucyanta|yat|indrA̍ya|vaimRudhAya̍|mRudha̍ḥ|Eva|tEna̍|apEti̍|aGnata|yat|indrA̍ya|indriyAva̍ta̍ itI̱ndriya - vatE|indriyam|Eva|tEna|Atmann|adadhata|traya̍striṃśatkapAlamiti̍ trayastriṃśat̍ - kapAlam|purOḍAśa̱m|niriti|avapann|traya̍striṃśaditi̍ trayaḥ̍ - triṃqśat|vai|dEvatA̱ḥ|tAḥ|indraḥ|Atmann|anviti̍|samAra̍BaMyatEti̍# saM - AraBaMyata|BUtyai̱|6̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -tyabravItta̍ indrAyAṃ̍ hOmucE# purOḍAśamEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ niravapannindrA̍ya̍ vaimRudhAyE-ndrAyEndriyAva̍tE̍ yadindrAyAṃ̍ hOmucE# niravapannaṃha̍sa̍ Eva tEnAmucyanta̍ yadindrAya̍ vai mRudhAya mRudha# Eva tEnApA̱GnatayadindrAyEndriyAva̍ta̍ indriyamEva tEnA*&&tmannadadhata̍ trayastriṃśatkapAlaM̍ purOḍAśaM niravapan̍ trayastriṃśadvai̍ dEvatAstA indra# Atmannanu# samAraBaMyata̍ BUtyai - [ ] 6

verses.padam: - Padam tAm|vAva|dEvAḥ|vijitimiti̍ vi - jitim|uttamAmityut̍ - tamAm|asuraiḥ|vIti̍|ajayanta|yaḥ|BrAtRu̍vyavAniti̍ BrAtRuvya̍ - vAn|syAt|saḥ|sparddhamAnaḥ|EtayA̱|iṣṭyA̱|yajEta|indrA̍ya|aṃqhOmuca̍ ityaṃhaḥ̍ - mucE̱|purOḍAśa̱m|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|indrA̍ya|vaimRudhAya̍|indrA̍ya|indriyAva̍ta̍ itI̱ndriya - vatE|aṃhasA|vai|Eṣaḥ|gRuhItaḥ|yasmA̱t|śrEyAn̍|BrAtRu̍vyaḥ|yat|indrA̍ya|aṃqhOmuca̍ ityaṃhaḥ̍ - mucE̱|nirvapatIti# niḥ - vapati|aṃha̍saḥ|Eva|tEna̍|mucyatE|mRudhA|vai|Eṣaḥ|aBiṣa̍ṇṇa̍ ityaBi - sannaḥ|yasmA̱t|samAnEṣu|anyaḥ|śrEyAna̍|uta|7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tAM ~MvAva dEvA vijiti-muttamA-masu̍rai-rvya̍jayantayO̍ BrAtRuvyavAnth-̍ syAth sa sparddhamAna̍ EtayEṣ^^ṭyA# yajEtEndrAyAṃ̍ hOmucE# purOḍAśamEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapEdindrA̍ya̍ vaimRudhAyEndrAyEndriyAvatE&ṃ̍ hasA̍ vA Eṣa gRuhItO̍ yasmAcCrEyAn BrAtRuvyOyadindrA̍yAṃ̍ hOmucE# nirvapatyaṃhasa̍ Eva tEna# mucyatEmRudhA vA EṣO&Biṣa̍ṇṇO̍ yasmA̱th samAnEṣvanyaḥ śrEyAnutA̍ - [ ] 7

verses.padam: - Padam aBrAtRuvyaḥ|yat|indrA̍ya|vaimRudhAya̍|mRudha̍ḥ|Eva|tEna̍|apEti̍|hatE|yat|indrA̍ya|indriyAva̍ta̍ itI̱ndriya - vatE|indriyam|Eva|tEna|Atmann|dhattE|traya̍striṃśatkapAlamiti̍ trayastriṃśat̍ - kapAlam|purOḍAśa̱m|niriti|vapati|traya̍striṃśaditi̍ trayaḥ̍ - triṃqśat|vai|dEvatA̱ḥ|tAḥ|Eva|yajamAnaḥ|Atmann|anviti̍|samAra̍BaMyata̍ iti# saM - AraBaMyatE|BUtyai̱|sA|vai|EṣA|viji̍tiriti̍ vi - jitiḥ|nAma|iṣṭi̍ḥ|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|EtayA̱|iṣṭyA̱|yaja̍tE|uttamAmityu̍t̍ - tamAm|Eva|vijitimiti̍ vi - jitim|BrAtRuvyEṇa|vIti̍|jayatE||8̍ (49)
verses.samhita: -&BrAtRuvyO̍ yadindrAya̍ vaimRudhAya mRudha# Eva tEnApa# hatEyadindrAyEndriyAva̍ta̍ indriyamEva tEnAtman dhattE̍ trayastriṃśatkapAlaM̍ purOḍAśaM nirvapati̍ trayastriṃśadvai̍ dEvatAstA Eva yajamAna̍ Atmannanu# samAraBaMyatE̍ BUtyai sA vA EṣA vijitirnAmEṣṭirya̍ EvaM ~MvidvAnEtayEṣ^^ṭyA yajata̍ uttamAmEva vijitiM̍ BrAtRuvyEṇa̍ vi jayatE||8̍ (indriyAvatI̍ - BUtyA# - utai - kAnna pa~jcAśacca̍)̍

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAsurA iti# dEva - asurAḥ|saM~MyattA̍ iti saM - yattAḥ|Asann|tEṣA̱m|gAyatrI|Ojaḥ|bala̱m|indriyam|vIrya̱m|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|paśUn|sagRuMhyEti# saM - gRuhya|AdAyEtyA̱̍ - dAya|apakramyEtya̍pa̍ - kramya|atiṣṭhat|tE|amanyanta|yatarAn|vai|iyam|upAvarthsyatItyu̍pa̍ - Avarthsyati|tE|idam|Baviṣyanti|iti̍|tAm|vIti̍|ahvayanta|viśva̍karmanniti̍ viśva# - karmann|iti|dEvAḥ|dABi̍|iti̍|asu̍rAḥ|sA|na|anyatarAn|cana|upAva̍rtatEtyu̍pa̍ - Avartata|tE|dEvAḥ|Etat|yaju̍ḥ|apaśyann|Oja̍ḥ|asi|saha̍ḥ|asi|bala̱m|asi|9̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvAsurAḥ saM~MyattA̍ Asan tEṣA̱M gAyatryOjO balamindriyaM̍ ~MvIryaM̍ prajAM paśUnth sagRuMhyA *&&dAyA-pakramyA̍tiṣṭhat̍ tE&manyanta̍ yatarAn. vA iyamupAvarthsyati̍ ta idaM BaviṣyantIti̍ tAM ~Mvyahvayanta̍ viśvakarmanniti̍# dEvA dABItyasurAḥ̍ sA nAnyatarAṅśca-nOpAva̍rtata̍ tE dEvA Etad-yajurapaśyannOjO̍&si̍ sahO&si̍ balamasi̍ - [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam BrAjaḥ|asi|dEvAnA̱m|dhAma̍|nAma̍|asi|viśva̱m|asi|viśvAyuriti̍# viśva - Ayuḥ|sarva̱m|asi|sarvAyuriti# sarva - Ayuḥ|aBiBUrityaBi̍ - BUḥ|iti|vAva|dEvAḥ|asu̍rAṇAm|Oja̍ḥ|bala̱m|indriyam|vIrya̱m|prajAmiti̍# pra-jAm|paśUn|avRu~jjata|yat|gAyatrI|apakramyEtyapa̍ - kramya|ati̍ṣṭhat|tasmA̱t|EtAm|gAyatrI|iti̍|iṣṭi̱m|Ahuḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|vai|gAyatrI|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|vai|tat|apakramyEtyapa̍ - kramya|atiṣṭhat|yat|EtayA̱|dEvAḥ|asu̍rAṇAm|Oja̍ḥ|bala̱m|indriyam|vIrya̱m|10̍ (50)
verses.samhita: BrAjO&si̍ dEvAnAM dhAma nAmA&si̍ viśvamasi̍ viśvAyuḥ sarvamasi̍ sarvAyuraBiBUriti̍ vAva dEvA asurAṇAmOjO̍ balamindriyaM̍ ~MvIryaM̍ prajAM paśUnavRu~jjata̍ yad-gAyatrya̍pakramyAti̍ṣṭhat̍ tasmAdEtAM̍ gAyatrItIṣṭi̍mAhuḥ̍ saM~MvathsarO vai gAyatrI̍ saM~MvathsarO̍ vai tadapakramyA̍tiṣṭhad-yadEtayA̍# dEvA asurAṇAmOjO̍ balamindriyaM̍ ~MvIryaM# - [ ] 10

verses.padam: - Padam prajAmiti# pra - jAm|paśUn|avRu~jjata|tasmA̱t|EtAm|saM~Mvarga̍ iti# saM - vargaḥ|iti|iṣṭi̱m|Ahuḥ|yaḥ|BrAtRu̍vyavAniti̍ BrAtRuvya̍ - vAn|syAt|saḥ|sparddhamAnaḥ|EtayA̱|iṣṭyA̱|yajEta|agnayE̱|saM~MvargAyEti̍# saM - vargAya|purOḍAśa̱m|aṣṭAka̍pAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|tam|śRutam|Asa̍nnamityA̍ - sannam|EtEna|yaju̍ṣA|aBIti̍|mRuśEt|Oja̍ḥ|Eva|bala̱m|indriyam|vIrya̱m|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|paśUn|BrAtRuvyasya|vRu~gktE|Bava̍ti|AtmanA̱|parEti̍|asya|BrAtRu̍vyaḥ|Bavati||11̍ (45) (balamasyE̍ - tayA# dEvA asurAṇAmOjO̍ balamindriyaM̍ ~MvIryaM̍ - pa~jcacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: prajAM paśUnavRu~jjata̍ tasmAdEtAṃ̍ saM~Mvarga̍ itIṣṭimAhuryO̍ BrAtRuvyavAnth^^syAth̍ sasparddhamAna̍ EtayEṣ^^ṭyA# yajEtAgnayE# saM~MvargAya# purOḍAśamaṣṭAka̍pAlaM̍ nirvapEt^^taṃśRutamAsa̍nnamEtEna̍ yajuṣA&Bi̍ mRuśEdOja̍# Eva balamindriyaM̍ ~MvIryaM̍ prajAM paśUn BrAtRuvyasya̍ vRu~gktE BavatyAtmanA̍ parA̱sya BrAtRuvyO̍ Bavati||11 (balamasyE̍ - tayA# dEvA asurAṇAmOjO̍ balamindriyaM̍ ~MvIryaM̍ - pa~jcacatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajA iti# pra-jAḥ|asRujata|tAḥ|asmAt|sRuṣṭAḥ|parAcIḥ|Ayann|tAḥ|yatra̍|ava̍sann|tata̍ḥ|garmut|uditi̍|atiṣṭhat|tAḥ|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|ca|anvavai̍tAmitya̍nu̍ - avaitAm|saḥ|abravIt|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|anayA̱|tvA|prEti̍|tiṣṭhAni|atha̍|tvA|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|upAvarthsyantItyu̍pa̍ - Avarthsyanti|iti̍|tam|prEti̍|atiṣṭhat|tata̍ḥ|vai|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA - patim|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|upAvartantEtyu̍pa̍ - Avartanta|yaḥ|prajAkA̍ma̍ iti# prajA - kAmaḥ|syAt|tasmai̱|Etam|prAjApatyamiti# prAjA - patyam|gArmutam|carum|niriti|vapEt|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA - patim|12 (50)
verses.samhita: prajApatiḥ̍ prajA asRujata̍ tA asmAth̍ sRuṣṭAḥ parAcIrAyan̍ tA yatrAvasan̍ tatO# garmududatiṣṭhat̍ tA bRuhaspatiścAnvavai̍tAṃq̍ sO̱&bravId bRuhaspatiranayA̱̍ tvA pratiṣṭhAnyatha̍# tvA prajA upAvarthsyantIti̍ taM prAtiṣṭhat̍ tatO vai prajApatiM̍ prajA upAvartanta̍ yaḥ prajAkAmaḥ̍ syAt tasmA# EtaM prAjApatyaM̍ gA̱rmutaM caruM nirvapEt̍ prajApati̍ - [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmai|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|prEti|janayati|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|paśUn|asRujata|tE|asmAt|sRuṣṭAḥ|parA̱~jcaḥ|Ayann|tE|yatra|ava̍sann|tata̍ḥ|garmut|uditi̍|atiṣṭhat|tAn|pUṣA|ca|anvavai̍tAmitya̍nu̍ - avaitAm|saḥ|abravIt|pUṣA|anayA̱|mA|prEti̍|tiṣṭha|atha̍|tvA|paśava̍ḥ|upAva̍rthsyantItyu̍pa̍ - Avarthsyanti|iti̍|mAm|prEti̍|tiṣṭha|iti̍|sOma̍ḥ|abravIt|mama̍|vai|13̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -mEva svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmai̱ prajAM prajanayatiprajApa̍tiḥ̍ paśUnasRujata̍ tE̱&smAth sRuṣṭAḥ parA̱~jca Ayan tE yatrAvasan̍ tatO# garmududatiṣṭhat̍ tAn pUṣA cAnvavaitAṃq̍ sO̱&bravIt pUṣA&nayA# mA pratiṣṭhAtha# tvA paśava# upAvarthsyantIti̍ mAM pratiṣṭhEti sOmO̱&bravIn mama vA - [ ] 13

verses.padam: - Padam akRuṣṭapacyamityakRuṣṭa̍ - pacyam|iti|uBau|vAm|prEti̍|tiṣṭhAni|iti̍|abravIt|tau|prEti̍|atiṣṭhat|tata̍ḥ|vai|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA - patim|paśavaḥ|upAva̍rtantEtyu̍pa-Ava̍rtanta|yaḥ|paśukA̍ma̍ iti# paśu - kAmaḥ|syAt|tasmai̱|Etam|sOmApauṣṇamiti# sOmA - pauṣṇam|gArmutam|carum|niriti|vapEt|sOmApUṣaṇAviti̍# sOmA - pUṣaṇau̱|Eva|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga- dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tau|Eva|asmai|paśUn|prEti̍|janayataḥ|sOma̍ḥ|vai|rEtOdhA̍ iti# rEtaḥ - dhAḥ|pUṣA|paśUnAm|prajanayitEti# pra - janayitA|sOmaḥ|Eva|asmai|rEta̍ḥ|dadhA̍ti|pUṣA̍ ( )|paśUn|prEti|janayati||14̍ (53)
verses.samhita: akRuṣṭapacyamityuBau̍ vAM pratiṣṭhAnItya̍bravIt̍ tau prAtiṣṭhat̍ tatO vai prajApatiM̍ paśava# upAvartanta̍ yaḥ paśukAmaḥ̍ syAt tasmA# Etaṃ sOmApauṣṇaM̍ gA̱rmutaM caruM nirvapEth̍ sOmApUṣaṇAvEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati tAvEvAsmai# paśUn prajanayataḥ̍ sOmO vai rEtOdhAḥ̍ pUṣA paśUnAM̍ prajanayitA̍ sOma# EvAsmai rEtO dadhAti̍ pUṣA ( ) paśUn prajanayati||14̍

verses.padam: - Padam agnE̱|gOBiḥ|naḥ|Eti̍|gahi|indO̍ iti|puṣṭyA|juṣasva|naḥ||indra̍ḥ|dhartA|gRuhEṣu̍|naḥ||savitA|yaḥ|sahasriya̍ḥ|saḥ|naḥ|gRuhEṣu̍|rAraṇat||Eti̍|pUṣA|Etu|Eti̍|vasu̍||dhAtA|dadAtu|naḥ|rayim|IśA̍naḥ|jaga̍taḥ|pati̍ḥ||saḥ|naḥ|pUrṇEna̍|vAvanat||tvaṣṭA̱|yaḥ|vRuṣaBaḥ|vRuṣA̱|saḥ|naḥ|gRuhEṣu̍|rAraṇat||sahasrE̍ṇa|ayutE̍na|ca|yEna̍|dEvAḥ|amRuta̱m|15̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agnE gOBirna̍ A gahIndO# puṣ^^ṭyA juṣasva̍ naḥ|indrO# dhartA gRuhEṣu# naḥ||savitA yaḥ sahasriyaḥ̍ sa nO# gRuhEṣu# rAraṇat|A pUṣA EtvA vasu||dhAtA̍ dadAtu̍ nO rayimIśAnO̍ jagataspati̍ḥ|sa̍ naḥ̍ pUrṇEna# vAvanat||tvaṣṭA yO vRuṣaBO̍ vRuṣA sa nO# gRuhEṣu# rAraṇat|sahasrEṇAyutE̍na̍ ca||yEna# dEvA amRutaM̍ - [ ] 15

verses.padam: - Padam dIrGam|śravaḥ|divi|aira̍yanta||rAya̍ḥ|pOṣa|tvam|asmaByamityasma̍ - Byam|gavA̱m|kulmim|jIvasE̱|Eti|yuvasva||agniḥ|gRuhapa̍tiriti̍# gRuha - patiḥ|sOmaḥ|viśvavaniriti̍# viśva - vaniḥ|savitA|sumEdhA̍ iti# su-mEdhAḥ|svAhA̱||agnE̱|gRuhapata iti# gRuha - patE|yaḥ|tE|GRutyaḥ|BAgaḥ|tEna̍|saha̍ḥ|Oja̍ḥ|Akrama̍mAṇAyEtyA̱-krama̍mAṇAya|dhEhi|śraṣṭhyA̱t|pathaḥ|mA|yOṣam|mUrddhA|BUyAsam|svAhA̱||16̍ (38) (amRuta# - maṣṭAtriṃśacca)̍ (A5)
verses.samhita: dIrGaṅ śravO# divyairayanta|rAya̍spOṣa̍ tvamasmaByaM gavA̱M kulmiM jIvasa A yuvasva||agni̍ rgRuhapatiḥ̍ sOmO# viśvavaniḥ̍ savitA sumEdhAḥ̍ svAhA̱||agnE# gRuhapatE yastE GRutyO# BAgastEna saha Oja# AkramamAṇAya̍ dhEhi śraiṣ^^ṭhyA̱tpathO mA yOṣaM̍ mUrddhA BUyAsaṅq̍ svAhA̱||16 (amRuta# - maṣṭAtriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam citrayA̱|yajEta|paśukAma̍ iti# paśu - kAmaḥ|iyam|vai|citrA|yat|vai|asyAm|viśva̱m|BUtam|adhIti|prajAya̍ta̍ iti# pra - jAyatE|tEna̍|iyam|citrA|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|citrayA̱|paśukA̍ma̍ iti# paśu - kAmaḥ|yajatE|prEti̍|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|mithunaiḥ|jAyatE|prEti|Eva|AgnEyEna̍|vApayati|rEta̍ḥ|saumyEna̍|dadhAti|rEta̍ḥ|Eva|hitam|tvaṣṭA̱|rUpAṇi̍|vIti̍|karOti|sArasvatau|Bavataḥ|Etat|vai|daivya̱m|mithunam|daivya̱m|Eva|asmai|17̍ (50)
verses.samhita: citrayA# yajEta paśukAma̍ iyaM ~Mvai citrA yadvA asyAM ~MviśvaM̍ BUtamadhi# prajAyatE̍ tE nEya~jcitrA ya EvaM ~MvidvAṅ ścitrayA# paśukAmO̍ yajatE̍ pra prajayA# paśuBi# rmithunai rjAyatE̍ praivAgnEyEna# vApayati rEtaḥ̍ saumyEna# dadhAti rEta# Eva hitaM tvaṣṭA# rUpAṇi vi karOtisArasvatau̍ Bavata̍ Etadvai daivyaM̍ mithunaM daivyamEvAsmai̍# - [ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam mithunam|maddhyataḥ|dadhAti|puṣṭyai̱|prajananAyEti̍# pra - jananAya|sinIvAlyai|caruḥ|Bavati|vAk|vai|sinIvAlI|puṣṭi̍ḥ|Kalu̍|vai|vAk|puṣṭi̱m|Eva|vAca̱m|upEti̍|Eti|aindraḥ|uttama̍ ityut̍ - tamaḥ|Bavati|tEna|Eva|tat|mithunam|sapta|EtAni̍|havIṃṣi̍|Bavanti|sapta|grAmyAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|sapta|AraṇyAḥ|sapta|CandAṃ̍si|uBaya̍sya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|atha|EtAḥ|Ahu̍tIrityA̍ - hutIḥ|juhOti|EtE|vai|dEvAḥ|puṣṭipataya̍ iti puṣṭi# - patayaḥ|tE|Eva ( )|asminn|puṣṭi̱m|dadhati|puṣyati|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|athO iti|yat|EtAḥ|Ahu̍tIrityA̍ - hutIḥ|juhOti|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai||18 (62)
verses.samhita: mithunaM maddhyatO̍ dadhAti̍ puṣ^^ṭyai̱ prajananAya̍ sinIvAlyai carurBavati̍ vAgvai sinIvAlI̍ puṣṭiḥ Kalu vai vAkpuṣṭimEva̍ vAcamupai̱tyaindra uttamO̍ Bavati̍ tEnaiva tanmithunaṃ̍ saptaitAni# havIṃṣi# Bavanti sapta grAmyAḥ paśavaḥ̍ saptAraṇyAḥ sapta CandAṅsyu-BayasyA-va̍ruddhyA̍ athaitA AhutI̍ rjuhOtyEtE vai dEvAḥ puṣṭipatayasta̍ EvA ( ) smin puṣṭiM̍ dadhati puṣyati̍ prajayA# paśuBirathO yadEtA AhutI̍ rjuhOti pratiṣṭhityai||18̍

verses.padam: - Padam mArutam|asi|marutA̱m|Ojaḥ|apAm|dhArA̱m|Bindhi|ramaya̍ta|marutaḥ|śyEnam|Ayina̱m|manO̍javasamiti̍ manaḥ̍ - javasam|vRuṣaṇam|suvRuktimiti̍# su - vRuktim||yEna|śarddha̍ḥ|ugram|ava̍sRuṣṭamityava̍# - sRuṣṭam|Eti|tat|aśvinA|parIti̍|dhattam|svasti||purOvAta̍ iti# puraḥ - vAtaḥ|vaṛṣann|jinvaḥ|AvRudityA̱̍ - vRut|svAhA̱|vAtAvaditi# vAta - vat|vaṛṣann|ugraḥ|AvRudityA̱̍ - vRut|svAhA̱|stanayann|vaṛṣann̍|BImaḥ|AvRudityA̱̍ - vRut|svAhA̱|anaśani|avasPUrjannityava-sPUrjann̍|didyut|vaṛṣann̍|tvEṣaḥ|AvRudityA̱̍ - vRut|svAhA̱|atirAtramityati̍ - rAtram|vaṛṣann|pUrtiḥ|AvRudityA̱̍ - vRut|19 (50)
verses.samhita: mArutamasi̍ marutAmOjO&pAM dhArA̱M Bindhi ramayata̍ marutaḥ śyEnamAyinaM manOjava̍ saM ~MvRuṣaṇaṃ̍ suvRuktiM||yEna śarddha# ugramava-sRuṣṭamEti̍ tadaśvinA̍ pari# dhattaṅ svasti|purOvAtO vaṛṣa~jjinvarAvRuth-svAhA̍# vAtAvad- vaṛṣannugrarAvRuth̍ svAhA̱ stanayan vaṛṣan̍ BImarAvath^^svAhA# &naśanyavasPUrja̍n-didyud-vaṛṣa̍n-tvEṣarAvRuth̍ svAhA# &tirAtraM ~Mvaṛṣan̍ pUrtirAvRuth - [ ] 19

verses.padam: - Padam svAhA̱|bahu|ha|ayam|avRuṣAt|iti|śrutaḥ|AvRudityA̱̍ - vRut|svAhA̱|AtapatItyA̱ - tapati|vaṛṣann̍|virAḍiti̍# vi - rAṭ|AvRudityA̱ - vRut|svAhA̱|avasPUrjannityava̍ - sPUrjann|didyud|vaṛṣann̍|BUtaḥ|AvRudityA̱̍ - vRut|svAhA̱|mAndA̱ḥ|vAśA̱ḥ|śundhyU̱ḥ|ajirAḥ||jyOti̍ṣmatIḥ|tama̍svarIḥ|unda̍tIḥ|suPE̍nA̍ iti su - PEnAḥ||mitraBRuta̍ iti mitra# - BRutaḥ|kṣatraBRuta̍ iti kṣatra# - BRutaḥ|surA̱ṣṭrA iti su - rAṣṭrAḥ|iha|mA|avata||vRuṣṇaḥ|aśva̍sya|sadAMnamiti̍# saM - dAna̱m|asi|vRuṣṭyai̱|tvA|upEti|nahyAmi||20̍ (42) (pUrtirAvRud - dvicatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: svAhA# bahu hAyamavRuṣAditi̍# śrutarAvRuth svAhA &&tapati̍ vaṛṣan-virAḍAvRuth̍ svAhA# &vasPUrjan-didyud-vaṛṣa̍n̍ BUtarAvRuth svAhAmAndA vAśAḥ śundhyUrajirAḥ|jyOti̍ṣmatI-stama̍svarI-runda̍tIḥ̍ suPEnAḥ|mitra̍BRutaḥ̍ kṣatraBRutaḥ̍ surA̱ṣṭrA iha mA&vata||vRuṣṇO̍ aśvasya̍ sandAnamasi̍ vRuṣ^^ṭyai tvOpa# nahyAmi||20 (pUrtirAvRud - dvicatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam dEvA̱ḥ|vasavyAḥ|agnE̱|sOma|sUrya||dEvA̱ḥ|śarmaṇyAḥ|mitrAvaruṇEti̍ mitrA̱ - varuṇA|aryamann||dEvA̱ḥ|sapItaya iti# sa - pItayaḥ|apA̱m|napAt|AśuhEmannityAśu̍ - hEmann||udnaḥ|datta|udadhimityuda̍ - dhim|Binta|divaḥ|parjanyA̱t|antarikṣAt|pRuthivyAḥ|tata̍ḥ|naḥ|vRuṣṭyA̱|avata||divA̱|cit|tama̍ḥ|kRuṇvanti|parjanyE̍na|udavAhEnEtyu̍da̍ - vAhEna||pRuthivIm|yat|vyundantIti̍# vi-undanti||Eti̍|yam|nara̍ḥ|sudAna̍va̍ iti# su-dAnavaḥ|dadAśuṣE̱|divaḥ|kOśa̱m|acu̍cyavuḥ||vIti̍|parjanyA̱ḥ|sRujanti|rOda̍sI̍ iti|anviti̍|dhanva̍nA|yanti|21̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvA# vasavyA agnE# sOma sUrya||dEvA̱ḥ śarmaṇyA mitrAvaruṇA&ryamann||dEvA̱ḥ̍ sapItayO &pA̱n-napAdAśuhEmann|udnO dattOdadhiM̍ Bintta̍ divaḥ parjanyAdantari̍kṣAt-pRuthivyAstatO̍# nO vRuṣ^^ṭyA&vata||divA̍# cittamaḥ̍ kRuṇvanti parjanyEnO-davAhEna̍|pRuthivIM̍ ~Myad vyundanti||Ayan̍ naraḥ̍ sudAnavO̍ dadAśuṣE# divaḥ kOśamacucyavuḥ|vi̍ parjanyA̱ḥ sRujanti rOdasI̍ anu dhanvanA̍ yanti - [ ] 21

verses.padam: - Padam vRuṣṭayaḥ||uditi̍|Irayatha|marutaḥ|samudrataḥ|yUyam|vRuṣṭim|varq.ṣayatha|purIṣiṇaḥ||na|vaḥ|dasrAḥ|upEti̍|dasyanti|dhEnava̍ḥ|śuBa̱m|yAtAm|anviti̍|rathA̱ḥ|avRuthsata||sRuja|vRuṣṭim|divaḥ|Eti̍|adBiritya̍t̍ - Biḥ|samudram|pRuṇa||abjA ityap̍ - jAḥ|asi|prathamajA iti# prathama - jAḥ|bala̱m|asi|samudriya̱m||uditi|naBaMqya|pRuthivIm|Bindhi|idam|divyam|naBa̍ḥ||udnaḥ|divyasya̍|naḥ|dEhi|IśA̍naḥ|vIti̍|sRuja|dRuti̱m||yE|dEvAḥ̍ ( )|diviBAgA̍ iti# divi - BAgAḥ|yE|antarikṣaBAgA̍ ityantarikṣa̍ - BAgAḥ|yE|pRuthiviBAgA̍ iti# pRuthivi - BAgAḥ||tE|imam|yajñam|avantu|tE|idam|kṣEtra̱m|Eti|viśantu|tE|idam|kṣEtra̱m|anu̍|vIti̍|viśantu||22̍ (70) (yanti - dEvA - viṃśatiśca̍)̍ (A8)
verses.samhita: vRuṣṭayaḥ||udI̍rayathA̍ marutaḥ samudratO yUyaM ~MvRuṣṭiM ~MvaṛṣayathA̍ purIṣiṇaḥ|na vO# dasrA upa# dasyanti dhEnavaḥ śuBaM̍ ~MyAtAmanu rathA# avRuthsata||sRujA vRuṣṭiM diva A&dBiḥ samudraM̍ pRuṇa||abjA̍ asi̍ prathamajA balamasi̍ samudriya̱M||unnamBaya̍ pRuthivIM BindhIdaM divyaM naBaḥ|udnO̍ divyasya# nO dEhIśAnO̍ visRujA̍ dRuti̱M||yE dEvA ( ) diviBAgA̍ yE̱&ntarikṣa̍ BAgA yE pRuthivi̍ BAgAḥ|ta̍ imaM ~Myajñamavantu̍ ta idaM kṣEtramA viśantu̍ ta idaM kṣEtramanu vi viśantu||22̍ (yanti - dEvA - viṃśatiśca̍)̍

verses.padam: - Padam mArutam|asi|marutA̱m|Ojaḥ|iti̍|kRuṣṇam|vAsa̍ḥ|kRuṣṇatU̍ṣamiti̍# kRuṣṇa - tUṣam|parIti|dhattE|Etat|vai|vRuṣṭyai̱|rUpam|sarU̍pa̍ iti sa - rUpaḥ|Eva|BUtvA|parjanya̱m|vaṛqṣayati|ramayata|marutaḥ|śyEnam|Ayina̱m|iti̍|paścAdvAtamiti̍# paścAt - vAtam|pratIti|mIvati|purOvAtamiti̍# puraḥ - vAtam|Eva|janayati|varq.ṣasya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|vAtanAmAnIti# vAta - nAmAni|juhOti|vAyuḥ|vai|vRuṣṭyA̱ḥ|IśE|vAyum|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga- dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|saḥ|Eva|asmai|parjanya̱m|vaṛqṣayati|aṣṭau|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mArutamasi̍ marutAmOja iti# kRuṣṇaM ~MvAsaḥ̍ kRuṣṇatUṣaM̍ pari# dhatta Etadvai vRuṣ^^ṭyai# rUpaṃ sarUpa̍ Eva BUtvA parjanyaM̍ ~Mvaṛṣayatiramayata̍ marutaḥ śyEnamAyinamiti# paścAdvAtaM prati# mIvati purOvAtamEva janayati̍ varq.ṣasyA varuddhyai̍ vAtanAmAni# juhOti vAyurvai vRuṣ^^ṭyA# IśE vAyumEva svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati sa EvAsmai# parjanyaM̍ ~Mvaṛṣayatyaṣṭau - [ ] 23

verses.padam: - Padam juhOti|catasraḥ|vai|diśa̍ḥ|cata̍sraḥ|avAntaradiśA̍ ityavAntara̍ - diśAḥ|digBya iti# dik - Byaḥ|Eva|vRuṣṭi̱m|sam|prEti|cyAvayati|kRuṣṇAjina̍ iti# kRuṣṇa-ajinE|samiti|yauti|haviḥ|Eva|akaḥ|antarvEdItya̍ntaḥ̍ - vEdi|samiti|yauti|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|yatInAm|adyamA̍nAnAm|śIrq.ṣAṇi̍|parEti̍|apatann|tE|KarjUrA̱ḥ|aBavann|tEṣA̱m|rasa̍ḥ|Urddhvaḥ|apatat|tAni̍|karIrA̍ṇi|aBavann|saumyAni̍|vai|karIrA̍ṇi|saumyA|Kalu̍|vai|Ahu̍tirityA̍ - hutiḥ|divaḥ|vRuṣṭi̱m|cyAvayati|yat|karIrAṇi|Bava̍nti|24̍ (50)
verses.samhita: juhOti̍ catasrO̍ vai diśaścatasrO&vAntaradiśA̍ digBya Eva vRuṣṭiṃq saM pra cyAvayati̍ kRuṣṇAjinE saM~Myauti̍ havirEvAkarantarvEdi̍ saM~Myautya varuddhyai̍ yatInAmadyamA̍nAnAṃ̍ śIrq.ṣAṇi parA&patantE̍ KarjUrA# aBavan-tEṣAṃq rasa# UrddhvO&patat-tAni̍# karIrA̱ṇya-Bavanth saumyAni vai karIrAṇi̍ saumyA Kalu vA Ahuti̍ rdivO vRuṣṭiM̍ cyAvayati yatkarIrAṇi̍ Bavanti̍ - [ ] 24

verses.padam: - Padam saumyayA̱|Eva|AhutyEtyA - hutyA|divaḥ|vRuṣṭi̱m|avEti|rundhE|madhu̍ṣA|samiti̍|yauti|apAm|vai|Eṣaḥ|Oṣa̍dhInAm|rasa̍ḥ|yat|madhu̍|adBya̍ ityat̍ - Byaḥ|Eva|OṣadhIBya̍ ityOṣadhi̍ - Byaḥ|vaṛqṣati|athO iti|adBya̍ ityat̍ - Byaḥ|Eva|OṣadhIBya̍ ityOṣadhi̍ - Byaḥ|vRuṣṭi̱m|nIti|nayati|mAndA̱ḥ|vAśA̱ḥ|iti̍|samiti̍|yauti|nAmadhEyairiti̍# nAma-dhEyai̱ḥ|Eva|EnAḥ|acCa|Eti|athO̍ iti|yathA̱|brUyAt|asau̱|Eti̍|ihi|iti̍|Evam|Eva|EnAḥ|nAmadhEyairiti̍# nAma-dhEyai̱ḥ|Eti|25̍ (50)
verses.samhita: saumyayaivA&&*hutyA̍ divO vRuṣṭimava# rundhE madhuṣA̍ saM ~Myau̱tyapAM ~MvA Eṣa OṣadhInAṃq̍ rasO yanmaddhvadBya EvauṣadhIByO̍ vaṛṣatyathO# adBya EvauṣadhIByO̍ vRuṣṭiniM nayati̍ mAndA vAśA iti saM~Myauti̍ nAmadhEyairEvainA̍ acCaityathO yathA̱ brUyAdasA vEhItyEvamEvainA# nAmadhEyairA - [ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam cyAvayati|vRuṣṇaḥ|aśva̍sya|sadAMnamiti̍# saM - dAna̱m|asi|vRuṣṭyai̱|tvA|upEti|nahyAmi|iti̍|Aha|vRuṣA̱|vai|aśva̍ḥ|vRuṣA̱|parjanya̍ḥ|kRuṣṇaḥ|iva|Kalu̍|vai|BUtvA|vaṛqṣati|rUpEṇa̍|Eva|Enam|samiti̍|arddhayati|varq.ṣasya̍|ava̍ruddhya̍ ityava# - ruddhyai||26 (29) (aṣṭau - Bavanti̍ - nAmadhEyairai - kAnna triṃqśacca)̍ (A9)
verses.samhita: cyAvayati̍ vRuṣṇO aśvasya̍ sandAnamasi̍ vRuṣ^^ṭyai tvOpa# nahyAmItyAha̍ vRuṣA vA aśvO vRuṣA# parjanyaḥ̍ kRuṣṇa iva̍ Kalu vai BUtvA vaṛṣati̍ rUpEṇaivainaṃq samarddhayati̍ varq.ṣasyA varuddhyai||26̍ (aṣṭau - Bavanti̍ - nAmadhEyairai - kAnna triṃqśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam dEvA̱ḥ|vasavyAḥ|dEvA̱ḥ|śarmaṇyAḥ|dEvA̱ḥ|sapItaya iti# sa - pItayaḥ|iti|Eti̍|baddhnAti|dEvatA̍Biḥ|Eva|anvahamitya̍nu̍ - aham|vRuṣṭi̱m|icCati|yadi|vaṛṣE̱t|tAva̍ti|Eva|hOtavya̱m|yadi̍|na|vaṛṣE̱t|śvaḥ|BUtE|haviḥ|niriti̍|vapEt|ahOrAtrE̍ ityahaḥ̍ - rAtrE|vai|mitrAvaruṇAviti̍# mitrA - varuṇau|ahOrAtrAByAmitya̍haḥ̍ - rAtrAByA̱m|Kalu|vai|parjanya̍ḥ|vaṛqṣati|nakta̱m|vA|hi|divA̱|vA|vaṛṣa̍ti|mitrAvaru̍ṇAviti̍# mitrA - varuṇau|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tau|Eva|asmai|27̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvA# vasavyA dEvA̱ḥ śarmaṇyA dEvA̱ḥ sapItaya ityA baddhnAti̍ dEvatABirEvAnvahaM̍ ~MvRuṣṭimicCati̍ yadi vaṛṣEt-tAvatyEva̍ hOtavya̍M̍ ~Myadi na vaṛṣEcCvO BUtE havirnirvapEdahOrAtrE̍ vai mitrAvaruṇAvahOrAtrAByAM̍ Kalu vai parjanyO# vaṛṣati naktaM̍ ~MvA hi divA# vA vaṛṣati̍ mitrAvaruṇAvEva̍ svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati tAvEvAsmA# - [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam ahOrAtrAByAmityahaḥ-rAtrAByA̱m|parjanya̱m|vaṛqṣayataḥ|agnayE̱|dhAmacCada̍ iti# dhAma - CadE̱|purOḍAśa̱m|aṣṭAkapAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|mArutam|saptaka̍pAlamiti̍# sapta - kapAlam|sauryam|EkakapAlamityEka̍# - kapAlam|agniḥ|vai|itaḥ|vRuṣṭi̱m|uditi|Irayati|maruta̍ḥ|sRuṣṭAm|nayanti|yadA|Kalu̍|vai|asau|Adityaḥ|nya~g̍|raśmiBiriti̍# raśmi - Biḥ|paryAvartata̍ iti# pari - AvartatE|atha̍|vaṛqṣati|dhAmacCaditi̍# dhAma - Cat|iva|Kalu|vai|BUtvA|vaṛqṣati|EtAḥ|vai|dEvatA̱ḥ|vRuṣṭyA̱ḥ|IśatE|tAḥ|Eva|svEna̍|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|upEti̍|dhAvati|tAḥ|28̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ahOrAtrAByA̱M parjanyaM# ~MvaṛṣayatO&gnayE# dhAmacCadE# purOḍAśamaṣṭAka̍pAlaM̍ nirvapEnmArutaṃ̍ saptakapAlaṃ̍ sauryamEkakapAlamagnirvA̍ itO vRuṣṭimudIrayati̍ marutaḥ̍ sRuṣṭAM nayanti̍ yadA Kalu vA asAvAdityO̍ nya~g-raśmiBi̍ḥ̍ paryAvartatE&thavaṛṣatidhAmacCadi̍va̍ Kalu vai BUtvA vaṛṣatyEtA̍ vai dEvatA vRuṣ^^ṭyA# IśatE tA Eva svEna# BAgadhEyEnOpa# dhAvati tA - [ ] 28

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|asmai|parjanya̱m|vaṛqṣayanti|uta|avaṛṣiṣyann|vaṛṣa̍ti|Eva|sRuja|vRuṣṭim|divaḥ|Eti̍|adBiritya̍t̍ - Biḥ|samudram|pRuṇa|iti|Aha|imAḥ|ca|Eva|amUḥ|ca|apaḥ|samiti̍|arddhayati|athO̍ iti|ABiḥ|Eva|amUḥ|acCa̍|Eti|abjA̍ ityap̍ - jAḥ|asi|prathamajA iti# prathama - jAḥ|bala̱m|asi|samudriya̱m|iti|Aha|yathAyajuriti̍# yathA - yajuḥ|Eva|Etat|uditi|naBaMqya|pRuthivIm|iti̍|vaṛqṣAhvAmiti̍# vaṛṣa - hvAm|juhOti|EṣA|vai ( )|OṣadhInAm|vRuṣṭivaniriti̍# vRuṣṭi - vaniḥ|tayA̱|Eva|vRuṣṭi̱m|Eti̍|cyAvayati|yE|dEvAḥ|diviBA̍gA̍ iti# divi - BAgAḥ|iti|kRuṣṇAjinamiti̍# kRuṣṇa - ajinam|avEti|dhUnOti|imE|Eva|asmai|lOkAḥ|prItAḥ|aBIṣṭA̍ ityaBi - iṣṭAḥ|Bavanti||29 (71) (asmai - dhAvati tA - vA - Ekaviṃśatiśca̍ ) (A10)
verses.samhita: EvAsmai# parjanyaM̍ ~MvaṛṣayantyutA vaṛṣiṣyan̍ vaṛṣatyEva̍ sRujA vRuṣṭiM diva A*&dBiḥ samudraM̍ pRuṇEtyAhEmAścaivA-mUścApaḥ̍ samarddhayatyathO̍# ABirEvA-mUracCai̱tyabjA asi̍ prathamajA balamasi̍ samudriyamityAha̍ yathAyajurEvaita-dunnaM̍ Baya pRuthivImiti# vaṛṣAhvAM juhOtyEṣA̍ vA ( ) OṣadhInAM̍ ~MvRuṣṭivanistayaiva vRuṣṭimA cyAvayati̍ yE dEvA diviBAgA̍ iti# kRuṣṇAjinamava# dhUnOtIma EvAsmai# lOkAḥ prItA aBIṣṭA# Bavanti||29

verses.padam: - Padam sarvAṇi|CandAṃ̍si|EtasyA̱m|iṣṭyA̱m|anUcyAnItya̍nu̍ - ucyAni|iti̍|Ahuḥ|triṣṭuBa̍ḥ|vai|Etat|vIrya̱m|yat|kakut|uṣṇihA̱|jaga̍tyai|yat|uṣṇihakakuBAvityu̍ṣṇiha̍ - kakuBau̱|anvAhEtyanu̍ - Aha|tEna̍|Eva|sarvA̍ṇi|CandAṃ̍si|avEti̍|rundhE|gAyatrI|vai|EṣA|yat|uṣṇihA̱|yAni̍|catvAri̍|adhIti̍|akṣarA̍ṇi|catu̍ṣpAda̍ iti catuḥ̍ - pAdaḥ|Eva|tE|paśavaḥ|yathA̱|purOḍAśE̱|purOḍAśa̍ḥ|adhIti̍|Evam|Eva|tat|yat|Ruci|adhIti̍|akṣarA̍ṇi|yat|jaga̍tyA|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sarvAṇi̍ CandAṅsyEtasyA-miṣṭyA̍-manUcyAnItyA̍hu-striṣṭuBO̍ vA EtadvIryaM̍ ~Myat kakuduṣṇihA jagatyai̍ yaduṣṇiha-kakuBA̍vanvAha̍ tEnaiva sarvAṇi̍ CandAṅqsyava# rundhE gAyatrI vA EṣA yaduṣṇihA yAni# catvAryaddhyakṣarAṇi̍ catuṣpAda̍ Eva tE paśavOyathA# purOḍAśE# purOḍAśO&ddhyEvamEva tad-yad-RucyaddhyakṣarAṇi̍ yajjagatyA̍ - [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam paridaddhyAditi# pari-daddhyAt|anta̱m|yajñam|gamayEt|triṣṭuBA̱|parIti|dadhAti|indriyam|vai|vIrya̱m|triṣṭuk|indriyE|Eva|vIryE̱|yajñam|pratIti̍|sthApayati|na|anta̱m|gamayati|agnE̱|trI|tE|vAji̍nA|trI|sadhasthEti̍# sadha - sthA|iti|trivatyEti̍ tri - vatyA|parIti|dadhAti|sarUpatvAyEti̍# sarUpa - tvAya|sarva̍ḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yajñaḥ|yat|traidhAtavIya̱m|kAmA̍ya̍ kAmAyEti kAmAya̍ - kAmAya|prEti|yujyatE|sarvE̱Byaḥ|hi|kAmE̱Byaḥ|yajñaḥ|prayujyata̍ iti# pra - yujyatE̱|traidhAtavIyEna|yajEta|aBicarannitya̍Bi̍ - carann|sarva̍ḥ|vai|31(50)̍
verses.samhita: paridaddhyAdantaM̍ ~MyajñaM gamayEt̍ triṣṭuBA pari# dadhAtIndriyaM ~Mvai vIryaM̍ triṣṭugindriya̍ Eva vIryE# yajñaM pratiṣṭhApayati̍ nAntaM̍ gamayatyagnE trI tE vAjinA̍ trI ṣadhasthEti trivatyA̍ pari# dadhAti sarUpatvAya sarvO vA Eṣa yajñO yat traidhAtavIyaM̍ kAmAya-kAmAya̍ prayujyatE̍ sarvE̱ByO hi kAmE̱ByO yajñaḥ prayujyatE̱̍ traidhAtavIyEna̍ yajEtABicaranth sarvO vA- [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam Eṣaḥ|yajñaḥ|yat|traidhAtavIya̱m|sarvEṇa|Eva|Enam|yajñEna̍|aBIti̍|carati|stRuṇutE|Eva|Enam|EtayA̱|Eva|yajEta|aBicaryamA̍ṇa̍ ityaBi-caryamA̍ṇaḥ|sarva̍ḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yajñaḥ|yat|traidhAtavIya̱m|sarvE̍ṇa|Eva|yajñEna̍|yajatE|na|Enam|aBicarannitya̍Bi̍ - carann|stRuṇutE|EtayA̱|Eva|yajEta|sahasrE̍ṇa|yakṣyamA̍ṇaḥ|prajA̍tamiti̍ pra - jAtam|Eva|Enat|dadAti|EtayA̱|Eva|yajEta|sahasrEṇa|IjAnaḥ|anta̱m|vai|Eṣaḥ|paśUnAm|gacCati|32̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Eṣa yajñO yat traidhAtavIyaṃq̍ sarvEṇaivaina̍M̍ ~MyajñEnABi carati̍ stRuṇuta EvainamEtayaiva̍ yajEtABicaryamA̍ṇaḥ̍ sarvO vA Eṣa yajñO yat traidhAtavIyaṃq̍ sarvEṇaiva̍ yajñEna# yajatE nainamaBicara̍006C;̱th̍ stRuṇuta Etayaiva yajEta̍ sahasrEṇa̍ yakṣyamAṇaḥ̍ prajAtamEvaina̍d-dadAtyEtayaiva̍ yajEta̍ sahasrEṇEjAnO&ntaM̍ ~MvA Eṣa paśUnAM̍ gacCati̍ - [ ] 32

verses.padam: - Padam yaḥ|sahasrEṇa|yaja̍tE|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|Kalu|vai|paśUn|asRujata|tAn|traidhAtavIyE̍na|Eva|asRujata|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|traidhAtavIyE̍na|paśukA̍ma̍ iti# paśu - kAmaḥ|yajatE|yasmA̱t|Eva|yOnE̱ḥ|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|paśUn|asRujata|tasmA̱t|Eva|EnAn|sRujatE|upEti̍|Enam|utta̍ramityut̍ - taram|sahasra̱m|namati|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|Eti|vRuścyatE|yaḥ|yakṣyE|iti̍|uktvA|na|yaja̍tE|traidhAtavIyE̍na|yajEta|sarva̍ḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yajñaḥ|33̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yaḥ sahasrEṇa̍ yajatE̍ prajApatiḥ̍ Kalu vai paśUnasRujata̍ tAṅstraidhAta̍ vIyE-naivAsRu̍jata̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAṅ straidhAtavIyE̍napaśukA̍mO̍ yajatE̍ yasmAdEva̍ yOnE̱ḥ prajApatiḥ̍ paśUnasRujata̍ tasmAdEvainA̱nth̍ sRujata upainamutta̍raṃ̍ sahasraM̍ namati dEvatA̱ByO vA Eṣa A vRuścyatE̍ yO yakṣya ityuktvA na yajatE̍ traidhAtavIyEna̍ yajEta sarvO vA Eṣa yajñO - [ ] 33

verses.padam: - Padam yat|traidhAtavIya̱m|sarvEṇa|Eva|yajñEna̍|yajatE|na|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|Eti̍|vRuścyatE|dvAda̍śakapAla̍ iti dvAdaśa-kapAlaḥ|purOḍAśa̍ḥ|Bavati|tE|traya̍ḥ|catu̍ṣkapAlA̍ iti catuḥ-kapAlAḥ|triṣṣamRuddhatvAyEti̍# triṣṣamRuddha - tvAya|traya̍ḥ|purOḍAśA̱ḥ|Bavanti|traya̍ḥ|imE|lOkAḥ|EṣAm|lOkAnA̱m|Aptyai̱|utta̍ra̍ uttara ityuttaraḥ̍ -uttaraḥ|jyAyAn|Bavati|Evam|iva|hi|imE|lOkAḥ|yavamaya̍ iti# yava - mayaḥ|maddhyE̱|Etat|vai|antari̍kṣasya|rUpam|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|sarvEṣAm|aBigamayannitya̍Bi̍ - gamayann|avEti̍|dyati|aCa̍baMṭkAramityaCa̍baMṭ̍ - kAram|hiraṇyam|dadAti|tEja̍ḥ|Eva|34̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yat traidhAtavIyaṃq̍ sarvEṇaiva̍ yajñEna# yajatE na dEvatA̱Bya A vRuścyatE̍ dvAdaśakapAlaḥ̍ purOḍAśO# Bavati tE trayaścatuṣkapAlA-striṣṣamRuddhatvAya̍ trayaḥ̍ purOḍAśA# Bavanti traya# imE lOkA EṣAM ~MlOkAnAmAptyA uttara-uttarO̍ jyAyA̱n BavatyEvamiva̍ hImE lOkA yavamayO̍ maddhya# EtadvA antarikṣasya̍ rUpaṃ samRuddhyai̍ sarvEṣAmaBigamayannava̍# dyatyaCabaMṭkAraṃq̍ hiraṇyaM̍ dadAti tEja# EvA - [ ] 34

verses.padam: - Padam avEti|rundhE|tArpyam|dadAti|paśUn|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|dhEnum|dadAti|Aśiṣa̍ ityA̱ - śiṣaḥ|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|sAmna̍ḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|varṇa̍ḥ|yat|hira̍ṇyam|yaju̍ṣAm|tArpyam|ukthAmadAnAmityu̍ktha̍ - madAnA̱m|dhEnuḥ|EtAn|Eva|sarvAn|varṇAn̍|avEti̍|rundhE||35̍ (30) (jagatyA̍ - &Bicaranth sarvO vai - gacCati̍ - yajña - stEja# Eva - triṃqśacca)̍ (A11)
verses.samhita: &va# rundhE tArpyaM dadAti̍ paśUnEvAva# rundhE dhEnuM dadAtyAśiṣa̍# EvAva# rundhE sAmnO vA Eṣa varṇO yaddhiraṇyaM̍ ~MyajuṣAM̍ tArpyamukthAmadAnA̱M̍ dhEnurEtAnEva sarvAnq. varṇAnava# rundhE||35 (jagatyA̍ - &Bicaranth sarvO vai - gacCati̍ - yajña - stEja# Eva - triṃqśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam tvaṣṭA̱|hataputra̍ iti# hata - putraḥ|vIndramiti vi - indram|sOma̱m|Eti|aharat|tasminn̍|indra̍ḥ|upahavamityu̍pa-havam|aicCata|tam|na|upEti̍|ahvayata|putram|mE|avadhIḥ|iti̍|saḥ|yajñavEśasamiti̍# yajña - vEśasam|kRutvA|prAsahEti# pra - sahA̱|sOma̱m|apibat|tasya|yat|atyaśi̍ṣyatEtya̍ti̍ - aśiṣyata|tat|tvaṣṭA̱|AhavanIyamityA̱̍ - havanIya̱m|upa|prEti̍|avartayat|svAhA̱|indra̍śatruritIndra̍# - śatruḥ|varddhasva|iti|saḥ|yAva̍t|Urddhvaḥ|parAviddhyatIti̍# parA - viddhyati|tAva̍ti|svayam|Eva|vIti̍|aramata|yadi̍|vA|tAva̍t|pravaṇamiti̍# pra - vanam|36 (50)
verses.samhita: tvaṣṭA# hataputrO̍ vIndraṃq sOmamA&harat̍ tasminnindra# upahavamai̱cCata taM nOpA̱hvayata putraM mE&vadhIriti̍ sa yajñavEśasaM̍ kRutvA prAsahA sOmamapibat̍ tasya yadatyaśiṣyata̍ tat tvaṣṭA&&havanIyamupa̍ prAvartayath̍ svAhEndraśatrurvarddhasvEti̍ sa yAvadUrddhvaḥ̍ parAviddhya̍ti̍ tAvati̍ svayamEva vyaramata̍ yadi# vA tAvat̍ pravaṇa - [ ] 36

verses.padam: - Padam AsI̱t|yadi|vA|tAva̍t|adhIti̍|agnEḥ|AsI̱t|saḥ|saMqBavanniti̍# saM - Bavann|agnIṣOmAvityagnI̍ - sOmau̱|aBi|samiti|aBavat|saḥ|iṣumAtrami̍ṣumAtramitI̍ṣumAtraM̍ - iṣumAtram|viṣva~g|avarddhata|saḥ|imAn|lOkAn|avRuṇOt|yat|imAn|lOkAn|avRu̍ṇOt|tat|vRutrasya̍|vRutratvamiti̍# vRutra - tvam|tasmA̱t|indraḥ|abiBEt|apIti̍|tvaṣṭA̱|tasmai̱|tvaṣṭA̱|vajra̱m|asi~jcat|tapa̍ḥ|vai|saḥ|vajra̍ḥ|AsIt|tam|udya̍ntumityut̍ - yantum|na|aśaknOt|atha|vai|taṛhi̍|viṣṇu̍ḥ|37̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -mAsIdyadi# vA tAvadaddhyagnErAsIth sa saMqBavannagnIṣOmA̍vaBi̍ samaBavath̍ sa iṣumAtrami̍ṣumAtraM̍ ~Mviṣva~g~gavarddhata̍ sa imAM ~MlOkAnavRuṇOdya-dimAM̍ ~MlOkAnavRuṇOt̍ tad-vRutrasya# vRutratvaM tasmAdindrO&biBEdapi̍ tvaṣṭA tasmai tvaṣṭA vajramasi~jcat̍ tapO vai sa vajra# AsIt tamudyantuM̍ nAśaknOdatha̍ vai taṛhi viṣṇu# - [ ] 37

verses.padam: - Padam anyA|dEvatA̱|AsIt|saḥ|abravIt|viṣṇO̱|Eti|ihi|idam|Eti̍|hariṣyAvaḥ|yEna̍|ayam|idam|iti̍|saḥ|viṣṇu̍ḥ|trEdhA|AtmAna̱m|vi|nIti̍|adhatta|pRuthivyAm|tRutI̍yam|antari̍kṣE|tRutI̍yam|divi|tRutI̍yam|aBiparyAvartAditya̍Bi̍ - paryAvartAt|hi|abiBEt|yat|pRuthivyAm|tRutI̍yam|AsI̱t|tEna̍|indra̍ḥ|vajra̱m|uditi̍|ayacCat|viṣṇva̍nusthita̍ iti viṣṇu# - anusthitaḥ|saḥ|abravIt|mA|mE|prEti|hAḥ|asti̍|vai|idam|38̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -ranyA dEvatA# &&sIth sO̱&bravId-viṣṇavEhIdamA hariṣyAvO̍ yEnAyamidamitisa viṣṇustrEdhA&&tmAnaM̍ ~Mvinyadhatta̍ pRuthivyAM tRutIyamantari̍kṣE̍ tRutIyaM̍ divi tRutIya-maBiparyAvartAd-dhyabi̍BEdyat-̍ pRuthivyAM̍ tRutIyamAsIt̍ tEnEndrO vajramudayacCad-viṣṇva̍nusthitaḥ̍ sO̱&bravInmA mE pra hArasti vA idaM - [ ] 38

verses.padam: - Padam mayi|vIrya̱m|tat|tE|prEti̍|dAsyAmi|iti̍|tat|asmai|prEti̍|ayacCat|tat|pratIti̍|agRuhṇAt|adhA̱ḥ|mA|iti̍|tat|viṣṇa̍vE|ati̍|prEti̍|ayacCat|tat|viṣṇu̍ḥ|pratIti̍|agRuhṇAt|asmAsu̍|indra̍ḥ|indriyam|dadhAtu|iti̍|yat|antari̍kṣE|tRutI̍yam|AsI̱t|tEna̍|indra̍ḥ|vajra̱m|uditi̍|ayacCat|viṣṇva̍nusthita̍ iti viṣṇu# - anusthitaḥ|saḥ|abravIt|mA|mE|prEti|hAḥ|asti̍|vai|idam|39̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mayi# vIryaM̍ tat tE pradA̱syAmIti tadasmai̍ prAyacCat̍ tat pratyagRuhṇAdadhA̍ mEti tad-viṣṇavE&ti prAyacCat̍ tad-viṣṇuḥ pratyagRuhṇA-dasmAsvindra̍# indriyaM dadhAtviti̍ yadantarikṣE̍ tRutIyamAsIt̍ tEnEndrO vajramudayacCad-̍ viṣṇvanusthitaḥ̍ sO̱&bravInmA mE prahArasti vA idaM - [ ] 39

verses.padam: - Padam mayi|vIrya̱m|tat|tE|prEti̍|dAsyAmi|iti̍|tat|asmai|prEti̍|ayacCat|tat|pratIti̍|agRuhṇAt|dviḥ|mA|adhAḥ|iti̍|tat|viṣṇa̍vE|ati̍|prEti̍|ayacCat|tat|viṣṇu̍ḥ|pratIti̍|agRuhṇAt|asmAsu̍|indra̍ḥ|indriyam|dadhAtu|iti̍|yat|divi|tRutI̍yam|AsI̱t|tEna̍|indra̍ḥ|vajra̱m|uditi̍|ayacCat|viṣṇva̍nusthita̍ iti viṣṇu# - anusthitaḥ|saḥ|abravIt|mA|mE|prEti|hAḥ|yEna̍|aham|40̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mayi# vIryaM̍ tat tE pra dA̱syAmIti tadasmai̍ prAyacCat̍ tat pratyagRuhṇAd̍ dvirmA&dhA̍ iti tad-viṣṇavE&ti prAyacCat̍ tad-viṣṇuḥ pratyagRuhṇAdasmAsvindra̍# indriyaM dadhAtviti̍ yaddivi tRutIyamAsIt̍ tEnEndrO vajramudayacCad-viṣṇva̍nusthitaḥ̍ sO̱&bravInmA mE prahAryEnAha - [ ] 40

verses.padam: - Padam idam|asmi|tat|tE|prEti̍|dAsyAmi|iti̍|tvI(3)|iti̍|abravIt|sadhAMmiti̍# saM - dhAm|tu|samiti|dadhAvahai|tvAm|Eva|prEti̍|viśAni|iti̍|yat|mAm|praviśEriti̍# pra-viśEḥ|kim|mA|Bu~jjyAḥ|iti|abravIt|tvAm|Eva|indhIya|tava̍|BOgA̍ya|tvAm|prEti̍|viśEyam|iti̍|abravIt|tam|vRutraḥ|prEti̍|aviśat|udara̱m|vai|vRutraḥ|kṣut|Kalu̍|vai|manuṣya̍sya|BrAtRu̍vyaḥ|yaḥ|41̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -midamasmi tat tE pradA̱syAmIti tvI(3) ityabravIth̍ sandhAM tu sandadhAvahai̍ tvAmEva praviśAnIti̍ yanmAM praviśEḥ̍ kiM mA# Bu~jjyA ityabravIt̍ tvAmEvEndhIya̍ tava BOgAya̍ tvAM praviśEyamitya̍bravIt̍ taM ~MvRutraḥ prAviśadudaraM̍ ~Mvai vRutraḥ kṣut Kalu vai manuṣya̍sya̍ BrAtRuvyO̍ ya - [ ] 41

verses.padam: - Padam Evam|vEda|hanti̍|kṣudha̱m|BrAtRu̍vyam|tat|asmai|prEti̍|ayacCat|tat|pratIti̍|agRuhṇAt|triḥ|mA|adhAḥ|iti̍|tat|viṣṇa̍vE|ati̍|prEti̍|ayacCat|tat|viṣṇu̍ḥ|pratIti̍|agRuhṇAt|asmAsu̍|indra̍ḥ|indriyam|dadhAtu|iti̍|yat|triḥ|prEti̍|aya̍cCat|triḥ|pratyagRu̍hṇAditi̍# prati – agRuhṇAt|tat|tridhAtOriti̍# tri - dhAtO̱ḥ|tridhAtutvamiti# tridhAtu - tvam|yat|viṣṇuḥ|anvati̍ṣṭhatEtya̍nu̍ - atiṣṭhata|viṣṇa̍vE|ati̍|prEti̍|aya̍cCat|tasmA̱t|aindrAvaiṣṇavamityai̱ndrA̍ - vaiṣṇavam|haviḥ|Bavati ( )|yat|vai|idam|kim|ca|tat|asmai|tat|prEti|ayacCat|Ruca̍ḥ|sAmA̍ni|yajUṃ̍ṣi|sahasra̱m|vai|asmai|tat|prEti̍|ayacCat|tasmA̱t|sahasra̍dakṣiṇamiti̍# sahasra# - dakṣiṇam||42 (71) (pravaṇaM - ~Mviṣṇu- rvA ida- mida - mahaM - ~MyO - Bava̍ - tyEka# viṃśatiśca) (A12)
verses.samhita: EvaM ~MvEda hanti kṣudhaM BrAtRuvyaM̍ tadasmai̍ prAyacCat^^tat̍ pratyagRuhṇAt-̍ trirmA&dhA̍ iti tad-viṣṇavE&ti prAyacCat̍ tad-viṣṇuḥ pratyagRuhṇAdasmAsvindra̍# indriyaM dadhAtviti̍ yattriḥ prAyacCat̍ triḥ pratyagRuhṇAt̍ tat tridhAtO̱stridhAtutvaM ~Myad-viṣṇuranvati̍ṣṭhata̍ viṣṇavE&ti prAyacCat̍ tasmAdaindrAvaiṣṇavaṃ̍ havirBavati̍ ( ) yadvA idaM ki~jca tadasmai̍ tat prAyacCad̍ Rucaḥ sAmAni̍ yajUṃṣi̍ sahasraM ~MvA asmai̍ tat prAyacCat̍ tasmA̱th sahasradakṣiṇaM||42̍

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAḥ|vai|rAjanyA̱t|jAyamAnAt|abiBayuḥ|tam|antaḥ|Eva|santa̱m|dAmnA̱|apEti̍|auBaMqnn|saḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|apO̱bdha̍ ityapa-̍ ubdhaḥ|jAyatE|yat|rAjanyaḥ|yat|vai|Eṣaḥ|ana̍pObdha̍ ityanapa̍ - ubdhaḥ|jAyEta|vRutrAn|Gnann|carEt|yam|kAmayE̍ta|rAjanya̱m|ana̍pObdha̍ ityanapa̍ - ubdhaḥ|jAyEta|vRutrAn|Gnann|carEt|iti|tasmai̱|Etam|aindrAbAṛqhaspatyamityai̱ndrA-bAṛqhaspatyam|carum|niriti̍|vapEt|aindraḥ|vai|rAjanya̍ḥ|brahma̍|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|brahma̍ṇA|Eva|Enam̍ ( )|dAmnaḥ|apOMBa̍nAditya̍pa-uBaM̍nAt|mu~jcati|hiraṇmaya̱m|dAma̍|dakṣi̍ṇA|sAkṣAditi̍# sa-akṣAt|Eva|Enam|dAmnaḥ|apOMBa̍nAditya̍pa̍ - uBaMnAt|mu~jcati||43̍ (62)
verses.samhita: dEvA vai rAjanyA̱-jjAya̍mAnA-dabiBayu-stamantarEva̍ santaM dAmnA &pau̱mBanth sa vA EṣO&pO̱bdhO jAyatE yad-rAjanyO̍# yadvA EṣO&napObdhO̍ jAyEta̍ vRutrAn Gnaṅ ścarEdyaM̍ kAmayEta̍ rAjanyamana̍pObdhO̍ jAyEta vRutrAn Gnaṅ ścarEditi̍ tasmA# Etamai̱ndrA bAṛhaspatyaM caruM nirvapEdaindrO̍ vai rAjanyO̱̍ brahma bRuhaspati rbrahmaṇaivainaM̍ ( ) dAmnO&pOMBanAn̍ mu~jcati hiraṇmayaM dAma dakṣiṇA̍ sAkṣAdEvainaM dAmnO&pOMBanAn̍ mu~jcati||43

verses.padam: - Padam navOnava̍ iti navaḥ̍ - navaḥ|Bavati|jAyamAnaḥ|ahnA̱m|kEtuḥ|uṣasA̱m|Eti|agrE̱||BAgam|dEvEBya̍ḥ|vIti̍|dadhAti|AyannityA̱̍ - yann|prEti|candramA̱ḥ|tirati|dIrGam|Ayu̍ḥ||yam|AdityAḥ|aṃqśum|ApyAyayantItyA̱̍ - pyAyayanti|yam|akṣi̍tam|akṣi̍tayaḥ|piba̍nti||tEna̍|naḥ|rAjA̱|varu̍ṇaḥ|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|Eti̍|pyAyayantu|Buva̍nasya|gOpA̍ iti# gO - pAḥ||prAcyA̱m|diśi|tvam|indra|asi|rAjA̱|uta|udI̱cyAm|vRutrahanniti# vRutra - hann|vRutrahEti# vRutra - hA|asi||yatra|yanti̍|srOtyAḥ|tat|44̍ (50)
verses.samhita: navOnavO̍ Bavati jAyamAnO&hnA̱M̍ kEturuṣasA# mEtyagrE̱|BAgaM dEvEByO vidadhAtyAyan̍ pracandramA̱stirati dIrGamAyuḥ||yamA̍dityA̍ aṃqśumA̱pyAyayanti̍ yamakṣita-makṣi̍tayaḥ̍ pibanti|tEna̍# nO rAjA varuṇO̍ bRuhaspatirA pyAyayantu̍ Buvanasya̍ gOpAḥ||prAcyA̱M diśi tvamindrAsi̍ rAjOtOdI̱cyAM ~MvRutrahan vRutrahA&si|yatra̍ yanti# srOtyAsta - [ ] 44

verses.padam: - Padam jitam|tE|dakṣiṇataḥ|vRuṣaBaḥ|Edhi|havyaḥ||indra̍ḥ|jayAti|na|parEti̍|jayAtai|adhirAja̍ ityadhi̍ - rAjaḥ|rAjasviti rAja# - su|rAjayAti||viśvA̱ḥ|hi|BUyAḥ|pRutanAḥ|aBiṣṭIḥ|upasadya̍ ityupa̍ - sadyaḥ|namasya̍ḥ|yathA̱|asa̍t||asya|it|Eva|prEti̍|riricE|mahitvamiti̍# mahi - tvam|divaḥ|pRuthivyAḥ|parIti|antari̍kṣAt||svarAḍiti̍# sva - rAṭ|indraḥ|damE̱|Eti̍|viśvagU̱rta̍ iti# viśva-gUrtaḥ|svariḥ|amatraḥ|vavakṣE|raṇA̍ya||aBIti̍|tvA|śUra|nOnumaḥ|adu̍gdhAḥ|iva|dhEnava̍ḥ||IśA̍nam|45̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -jjitaM tE# dakṣiṇatO vRuṣaBa̍ Edhi̍ havyaḥ||indrO̍# jayAti na parA# jayAtA adhirAjO rAjasu̍ rAjayAti|viśvA hi BUyAḥ pRutanA̍ aBiṣṭIrupasadyO̍# namasyO# yathA&sat||asyEdEva̍ prariricE̍ mahitvaM divaḥ pRuthivyAḥ̍ paryantarikṣAt|svarAḍindrO̍ dama A viśvagU̱rtaḥ svariramatrO̍ vavakṣE raṇAya||aBi̍ tvA# śUra nOnumO&dugdhA̍ iva dhEnavaḥ|IśA̍na-̍ [ ] 45

verses.padam: - Padam asya|jagataḥ|suvardRuśamiti̍# suvaḥ - dRuśa̱m|IśAnam|indra|tasthuṣa̍ḥ||tvAm|it|hi|havA̍mahE|sAtA|vAja̍sya|kArava̍ḥ||tvAm|vRutrEṣu̍|indra|satpa̍timiti̍ sat - patim|naraḥ|tvAm|kAṣṭhA̍su|arva̍taḥ||yat|dyAva̍ḥ|indra|tE|śatam|śatam|BUmI̱ḥ|uta|syuḥ||na|tvA|vajrinn|sahasra̱m|sUryA̱ḥ|anviti̍|na|jAtam|aṣṭa|rOda̍sI̍ iti||piba̍|sOma̱m|indra|manda̍tu|tvA|yam|tE|suṣAva̍|haryaśvEti̍# hari - aśva|adriḥ||46̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -masya jagataḥ̍ suvardRuśamIśAnamindra̍ tasthuṣaḥ||tvAmiddhi̍ havAmahE̍ sAtA vAjasya̍ kAravaḥ|tvAM̍ ~MvRutrEṣvindra̍ satpatiM̍ narastvAM kAṣṭhAsvarvataḥ||yaddyAva̍indratEśataṃ̍ śataM BUmIruta̍ syuḥ|na tvA# vajrinth sahasraṃq sUryA anu na jAtamaṣṭa̍ rOdasI||pibA̍ sOmamindra̍ mandatu̍ tvA yantE# suṣAva# haryaśvAdriḥ|46̍

verses.padam: - Padam sOtuḥ|bAhuByAmiti# bAhu - ByAm|suyata̍ iti su - yataḥ|na|arvA̱||rEvatI̱ḥ|naḥ|sadhamAda iti# sadha - mAdaḥ|indrE̱|santu|tuvivA̍jA̍ iti# tuvi - vAjAḥ||kṣumantaḥ|yABi̍ḥ|madE̍ma||uditi̍|agnE|śuca̍yaḥ|tava̍|vIti̍|jyOti̍ṣA|uditi̍|u|tyam|jAtavE̍dasamiti̍# jAta - vEdasam|sapta|tvA|haritaḥ|rathE̱|vaha̍nti|dEva|sUrya||śOciṣkE̍śamiti̍# śOciḥ - kEśam|vicakṣaṇEti# vi - cakṣaṇa||citram|dEvAnA̱m|uditi|agAt|anI̍kam|cakṣu̍ḥ|mitrasya̍|varu̍ṇasya|agnEḥ||Eti̍|aprAḥ|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|antarikṣam|sUrya̍ḥ|AtmA|jaga̍taḥ|tasthuṣa̍ḥ|47̍ (50)
verses.samhita: - dutyaM jAtavEdasaṃ>3̍ udu tyaM jAtavEdasaM̍ dEvaM ~Mvahanti̍ kEtavaḥ|̍

verses.padam: - Padam ca||viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|RutAvRudha ityRuta̍ - vRudhaḥ|RutuBirityRutu-Biḥ|havanaśruta̍ iti# havana - śrutaḥ||juṣantA̱m|yujya̱m|paya̍ḥ||viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|śRuṇuta|imam|hava̱m|mE|yE|antari̍kṣE|yE|upEti̍|dyavi̍|stha||yE|agnijihvA̍ ityagni̍ - jihvAḥ|uta|vA|yajatrAḥ|AsadyEtyA̱̍ - sadya|asminn|barqḥiṣi̍|mAdayaddhvam||48̍ (30) (ta - dIśAna̍ - madri# - stasthuṣa# - striṃqśacca)̍ (A14) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 14 Anuvaakams :- (dEvA manuṣyA̍# - dEvasurA abruvan̍ - dEvAsurAstEṣA̱M gAyatrI - prajApatistA̍ yatrA& - gnE gOBiḥ̍ - citrayA# - mArutaM - dEvA# vasavyA agnE# - mArutamiti - dEvA# vasavyA dEvA̱ḥ śarmaṇyAḥ - sarvAṇi̍ - tvaṣṭA# hataputrO̍ - dEvA vai rAjanyA̱n̍ - navOnava̍ - ścaturdaśa̍ ) Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (dEvA manuṣyA̱ḥ̍ - prajAM paśun - dEvA# vasavyAḥ - paridadhyadida- mas^^mya - ṣṭA catvAriṃśat̍ ) First and Last Padam of Fourth Prasnam of Kandam 2:- (dEvA manuṣyA̍# - mAdayadhvaM)||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE dvitIyakAṇḍE caturthaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||
verses.samhita: śca||viśvE# dEvA RutAvRudha̍# RutuBiṛ̍ havanaśrutaḥ|juṣantAM̍ ~MyujyaM payaḥ||viśvE̍# dEvAḥ śRuṇutEmaṃ havaM̍ mE yE antarikṣE̍ ya upa dyaviṣṭha|yE agnijihvA̍ uta vA yajatrA̍ AsadyAsmin barqḥiṣi# mAdayaddhvaM||48 (ta - dIśAna̍ - madri# - stasthuṣa# - striṃqśacca)̍ (A14) praśna kOrvai with starting padams of 1 to 14 Anuvaakams :- (dEvA manuṣyA̍# - dEvasurA abruvan̍ - dEvAsurAstEṣA̱M gAyatrI - prajApatistA̍ yatrA& - gnE gOBiḥ̍ - citrayA# - mArutaM - dEvA# vasavyA agnE# - mArutamiti - dEvA# vasavyA dEvA̱ḥ śarmaṇyAḥ - sarvAṇi̍ - tvaṣṭA# hataputrO̍ - dEvA vai rAjanyA̱n̍ - navOnava̍ - ścaturdaśa̍ ) kOrvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (dEvA manuṣyA̱ḥ̍ - prajAM paśun - dEvA# vasavyAḥ - paridadhyadida- mas^^mya - ṣṭA catvAriṃśat̍ ) first and last padam of fourth praśnam of kAṇḍam 2:- (dEvA manuṣyA̍# - mAdayadhvaM)||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM dvitIyakAṇḍE caturthaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||2.4.1 Appendix

verses.padam: - Padam viśvarUpa̍ iti# viśva - rUpaḥ|vai|tvAṣṭraḥ|purOhita̍ iti# puraḥ-hitaḥ|dEvAnA̱m|AsIt|svasrIyaḥ|asu̍rAṇAm|tasya̍|trIṇi̍|śIṛqṣAṇi̍|Asann|sOmapAnamiti̍# sOma - pAna̱m|surApAnamiti# surA - pAna̱m|annAdanamitya̍nna̍ - adanam|saḥ|pratyakṣamiti̍# prati - akṣa̱m|dEvEByaḥ|BAgam|avadat|parOkṣamiti̍# paraḥ - akṣa̱m|asurEByaḥ|sarva̍smai|vai|pratyakṣamiti̍# prati - akṣa̱m|BAgam|vadanti|yasmai̱|Eva|parOkṣamiti# paraḥ - akṣa̱m|vadanti|tasya̍|BAgaḥ|uditaḥ|tasmA̱t|indra̍ḥ|abiBEt|IdRu~g|vai|rAṣṭram|vIti̍|paryAva̍rtayatIti̍# pari - Avartayati|iti̍|tasya̍|vajra̱m|AdAyEtyA̱̍ - dAya|śIṛqṣAṇi̍|acCinat|yat|sOmapAnamiti̍# sOma-pAna̱m|1 (50)
verses.samhita: viśvarUpO̍ vai tvAṣṭraḥ purOhitO̍ dEvAnAmAsIth̍ svasrIyO&surAṇAM̍ tasya trIṇi# śIrq.ṣAṇyAsanth-sOmapAnaṃ̍# surApAna-mannAda̍naṃq̍ sa pratyakṣaM̍ dEvEByO# BAgamavadat̍ parOkṣamasurEByaḥ̍ sarvasmai̍ vai pratyakṣaM̍ BAgaM ~Mvadanti̍ yasmA# Eva parOkṣaM ~Mvadanti̍ tasya# BAga uditastasmAdindrO̍# &biBEdIdRu~g vai rAṣṭraM ~Mvi paryAvartayatIti̍ tasya vajramAdAya̍# śIrq.ṣAṇyacCinadyath̍ sOmapAna̍ - [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam AsI̱t|saḥ|kapi~jjalaḥ|aBavat|yat|surApAnamiti̍# surA - pAna̱m|saḥ|kalavi~gkaḥ|yat|annAda̍namitya̍nna-ada̍nam|saḥ|tittiriḥ|tasya̍|a~jjalinA̱|brahmahatyAmiti̍# brahma-hatyAm|upEti|agRuhṇAt|tAm|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM - vathsaram|abiBaḥ|tam|BUtAni|aBIti̍|akrOśann|brahma̍hanniti̍ brahma# - hann|iti|saḥ|pRuthivIm|upEti̍|asIdat|asyai|brahmahatyAyA̍ iti# brahma - hatyAyai̱|tRutIyam|pratIti̍|gRuhAṇa|iti̍|sA|abravIt|vara̱m|vRuṇai|KAtAt|parABaviṣyantIti̍# parA - BaviṣyantI̱|manyE|tataḥ|mA|parEti̍|BUvam|iti̍|purA|tE|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -mAsIth sa kapi~jjalO̍ &Bavad yath surApAnaṃq̍ sa kalavi~gkO̍ yadannAdanaṃq̍ sa tittiristasyA̱~jjalinA̱̍ brahmahatyAmupAgRuhṇAt̍ tAṃ saM~Mvathsarama̍biBastaM̍ BUtAnyaByakrOśan̍ brahmahanniti̍ sa pRuthivImupA̍sIdadasyai̍ brahmahatyAyai̍ tRutIyaM̍ prati# gRuhAṇEti sA&bravIdvara̍M̍ ~MvRuṇai KAtAt parABaviṣyantI̍# manyE tatO mA parA# BUvamitipurA̍ tE-̍ [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam saM~MvathsarAditi# saM - vathsarAt|apIti|rOhAt|iti̍|abravIt|tasmA̱t|purA|saM~MvathsarAditi̍# saM - vathsarAt|pRuthivyai|KAtam|apIti|rOhati|vArE̍vRutamiti̍ vArE̱ - vRutam|hi|asyai|tRutIyam|brahmahatyAyA̍ iti# brahma - hatyAyai̱|pratIti|agRuhṇAt|tat|svakRu̍tamiti̍ sva - kRutam|iriṇam|aBavat|tasmA̱t|Ahi̍tAgnirityAhi̍ta̍ - agniḥ|śraddhAdEva̍ iti# śraddhA - dEvaḥ|svakRuta̍ iti sva - kRutE|iriṇE|na|avEti̍|syEt|brahmahatyAyA̍ iti# brahma - hatyAyai̱|hi|Eṣaḥ|varṇaḥ|saḥ|vanaspatIn̍|upEti̍|asIdat|asyai|brahmahatyAyA̍ iti# brahma - hatyAyai̱|tRutIyam|pratIti̍|gRuhṇIta|iti̍|tE|abruvann|vara̱m|vRuṇAmahai|vRukṇAt|3̍ (50)
verses.samhita: saM~MvathsarAdapi# rOhAdityabravIt̍ tasmA̱t purA saM~MvathsarAt̍ pRuthivyai̍ KAtamapi# rOhati vArEvRutaṅq̍ hyasyai̍ tRutIyaM̍ brahmahatyAyai pratyagRuhṇAt̍ tath svakRutamiri̍ṇamaBavat̍ tasmAdAhitAgniḥ̍ śraddhAdEvaḥ̍ svakRuta̍ iriṇE̍ nAva# syEd-brahmahatyAyai hyEṣa̍ varṇaḥ sa vanaspatInupAsIdadasyai̍ brahmahatyAyai̍ tRutIyaM̍ prati# gRuhṇItEti tE̱&bruvan varaM̍ ~MvRuṇAmahai vRukṇAt - [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam parABaviṣyanta iti# parA-Baviṣyantaḥ|manyAmahE|tata̍ḥ|mA|parEti̍|BUma|iti̍|Avraśca̍nAdityA̱-vraśca̍nAt|vaḥ|BUyAṃ̍saḥ|uditi̍|tiṣṭhAn|iti̍|abravIt|tasmA̱t|Avraśca̍nAdityA̱̍ - vraścanAt|vRukṣAṇA̱m|BUyAṃ̍saḥ|uditi̍|tiṣṭhanti|vArE̍vRutamiti̍ vArE̱ - vRutam|hi|EṣAm|tRutIyam|brahmahatyAyA̍ iti# brahma - hatyAyai̱|pratIti|agRuhṇann|saḥ|niryAsa̍ iti# niḥ - yAsaḥ|aBavat|tasmA̱t|niryAsasyEti# niḥ - yAsasya|na|Aśya̱m|brahmahatyAyA̍ iti# brahma-hatyAyai̱|hi|Eṣaḥ|varṇaḥ|athO̍ iti|Kalu̍|yaḥ|Eva|lOhi̍taḥ|yaḥ|vA|Avraśca̍nAdityA̱̍ - vraścanAt|niryEṣatIti̍# niḥ - yEṣati|tasya̍|na|Aśya̱m|4̍ (50)
verses.samhita: parABaviṣyantO̍# manyAmahE tatO mA parA# BUmEtyAvraścanAdvO̍ BUyAṃsa̍ uttiṣṭhAnitya̍bravIt̍ tasmAdAvraśca̍nAd-vRukṣAṇAM̍ BUyAṃsa̍ uttiṣṭhanti̍ vArEvRutaṅq̍ hyEṣAM̍ tRutIyaM̍ brahmahatyAyai pratyagRuṇhanthsa̍ niryAsO̍# &Bavat tasmA̱nniryAsasya nA&&*śyaM̍ brahmahatyAyai hyEṣa̍ varṇO&thO Kalu ya Eva lOhitO̍ yO vA&&vraścanAnniryEṣa̍ti̍ tasya nA&&śyaM̍ - [ ] 4

verses.padam: - Padam kAma̱m|anyasya|saḥ|strIṣaṃqsAdamiti̍# strI - saṃqsAdam|upEti|asIdat|asyai|brahmahatyAyA̍ iti# brahma - hatyAyai̱|tRutIyam|pratIti̍|gRuhṇIta|iti̍|tAḥ|abruvann|vara̱m|vRuṇAmahai|Rutvi̍yAt|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|vindAmahai|kAma̱m|Eti|vija̍nitOriti̍ vi - janitOḥ|samiti|BavAma|iti̍|tasmA̱t|Rutvi̍yAt|striya̍ḥ|prajAmiti̍# pra-jAm|vindantE|kAma̱m|Eti|vija̍nitOriti̍ vi - janitOḥ|samiti|Bavanti|vArE̍vRutamiti̍ vArE̱ - vRutam|hi|AsAm|tRutIyam|brahmahatyAyA̍ iti# brahma - hatyAyai̱|pratIti|agRuhṇann|sA|mala̍vadvAsA̍ iti malavat̍ - vAsAḥ|aBavat|tasmA̱t|malavadvAsasEti̍ malavat̍ - vAsasA|na|samiti|vadEta|5̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kAmamanyasyasastrI̍ṣaṃsAda-mupA̍sIdadasyai̍ brahmahatyAyai̍ tRutIyaM̍ prati# gRuhṇItEti tA abruvan̍ varaM̍ ~MvRuṇAmahA RutviyAt̍ prajAM ~MvindAmahai̍ kAmamA vijanitOḥ̍ saM BavAmEti̍ tasmAdRutviyAth̍ striyaḥ̍ prajAM ~MvindantE̍ kAmamA vijanitOḥ̍ saMBavanti̍ vArEvRutaṅq̍ hyAsAM̍ tRutIyaM̍ brahmahatyAyai pratyagRuhṇanth̍ sA malavadvAsA̍ aBavat tasmAn-malavad-vAsasA̍ na saM~MvadEta̍ - [ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam na|saha|AsIta|na|asyAḥ|anna̱m|adyAt|brahmahatyAyA iti# brahma - hatyAyai̱|hi|EṣA|varṇa̱m|pratimucyEti# prati-mucya|AstE̱|athO̍ iti|Kalu̍|Ahuḥ|aBya~jja̍namitya̍Bi̍ - a~jjanam|vAva|striyAḥ|anna̱m|aBya~jja̍namitya̍Bi̍ - a~jjanam|Eva|na|pratigRuhyamiti̍# prati - gRuhya̱m|kAma̱m|anyat|iti|yAm|mala̍vadvAsasamiti̍ malavat̍ - vAsasam|saBaMvantIti# saM - Bavanti|yaḥ|tata̍ḥ|jAya̍tE|saḥ|aBiśasta̍ ityaBi-śastaḥ|yAm|ara̍ṇyE|tasyai̱|stEnaḥ|yAm|parA̍cIm|tasyai̱|hrItamuKIti̍# hrIta - muKI|apagalBa ityapa̍ - galBaḥ|yA|snAti|tasyA̱ḥ|aPsitya̍p̍ - su|mArukaḥ|yA|6̍ (50)
verses.samhita: na sahA&&sIta̍ nAsyA annamadyAd-brahmahatyAyai̍ hyEṣA̍ varṇaM̍ pratimucyA &&stE&thO KalvAhuraBya~jja̍naM̍ ~MvAva striyA annamaBya~jja̍namEva̍ na pratigRuhyaM̍ kAmamanyaditi̍ yAM malavad-vAsasaṃ̍ saBaMvanti̍ yastatO jAyatE̍ sO&BiśastO̍ yAmaraṇyE̍ tasyai̱ stEnO yAM parAcIM̍ tasyai̱ hrItamuKyapagalBO̍ yA snAti tasyA# aPsu mArukO̍ yA - [ ] 6

verses.padam: - Padam aBya~gkta ityaBi̍ - a~gktE|tasyai̱|duścarmEti# duḥ - carmA̱|yA|praliKata iti# pra - liKatE̱|tasyai̱|Kalatiḥ|apamArItyapa̍ - mArI|yA|A~gkta ityA̱ - a~gktE|tasyai̱|kAṇaḥ|yA|dataḥ|dhAvatE|tasyai̱|śyAvadanniti̍# śyAva - dann|yA|naKAni|nikRuntata̍ iti# ni - kRuntatE̱|tasyai̱|kunaKI|yA|kRuṇatti|tasyai̱|klIbaḥ|yA|rajju̱m|sRujati̍|tasyA̱ḥ|udbandhu̍ka̍ ityut̍ - bandhukaḥ|yA|parṇEna̍|piba̍ti|tasyA̱ḥ|unmAdu̍ka̍ ityut̍ - mAdukaḥ|yA|KarvEṇa̍|piba̍ti|tasyai̱|Karvaḥ|tisraḥ|rAtrI̱ḥ|vratam|carEt|a~jjalinA̱|vA|pibE̱t|aKa̍rvEṇa|vA̍ ( )|pAtrEṇa|prajAyA̍ iti# pra - jAyai̱|gOpIthAya||7̍ (53)
verses.samhita: &Bya~gktE tasyai# duścarmA yA praliKatE̍ tasyai# KalatirapamArI̍ yA&&~gktE tasyai# kAṇO yA datO dhAvatE̍ tasyai̱ śyAvadanq. yA naKAni# nikRuntatE tasyai# kunaKI yA kRuṇatti tasyai̱ klIbO yA rajjuṃ# sRujati tasyA# ud-bandhukO̍ yA parṇEna pibati̍ tasyA# unmAdukO̍ yA KarvEṇa pibati̍ tasyai# KarvastisrO rAtrI̱rvrataM carEda~jjalinA̍# vA pibEdaKarvEṇa̍ vA ( ) pAtrEṇa̍ prajAyai# gOpIthAya||7̍

verses.padam: - Padam tvaṣṭA̱|hataputra̍ iti# hata-putraḥ|vIndramiti vi - indram|sOma̱m|Eti|aharat|tasminn̍|indra̍ḥ|upahavamityu̍pa-havam|aicCata|tam|na|upEti̍|ahvayata|putram|mE|avadhIḥ|iti̍|saḥ|yajñavEśasamiti̍# yajña - vEśasam|kRutvA|prAsahEti# pra - sahA̱|sOma̱m|apibat|tasya|yat|atyaśi̍ṣyatEtya̍ti̍ - aśiṣyata|tat|tvaṣṭA̱|AhavanIyamityA̱-havanIya̱m|upa̍|prEti̍|avartayat|svAhA̱|indra̍śatruritIndra̍# - śatruḥ|varddhasva|iti|yat|ava̍rtayat|tat|vRutrasya̍|vRutratvamiti̍# vRutra-tvam|yat|abravIt|svAhA̱|indra̍śatruritIndra̍# - śatruḥ|varddhasva|iti|tasmA̱t|asya|8̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tvaṣṭA# hataputrO̍ vIndraṃq sOmamA&harat̍ tasminnindra# upahavamai̱cCata taM nOpA̱hvayata putraM mE&vadhIriti̍ sa yajñavEśasaM̍ kRutvA prAsahA sOmamapibat̍ tasya yadatyaśiṣyata̍ tat tvaṣṭA&&havanIyamupa̍ prAvartayath̍ svAhEndraśatru-rvarddhasvEti̍ yadavartayat̍ tad-vRutrasya# vRutratvaM ~MyadabravIth̍ svAhEndraśatru-rvarddhasvEti̍ tasmAdasyE-̍ [ ] 8

verses.padam: - Padam indraḥ|śatru̍ḥ|aBavat|saḥ|saBaMvanniti̍# saM - Bavann|agnIṣOmAvityagnI̍ - sOmau̱|aBi|samiti|aBavat|saḥ|iṣumAtrami̍ṣumAtramitI̍ṣumAtraM̍ - iṣumAtram|viṣva~g|avarddhata|saḥ|imAn|lOkAn|avRuṇOt|yat|imAn|lOkAn|avRu̍ṇOt|tat|vRutrasya̍|vRutratvamiti̍# vRutra - tvam|tasmA̱t|indraḥ|abiBEt|saḥ|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA-patim|upEti|adhAvat|śatru̍ḥ|mE|ajani|iti̍|tasmai̱|vajra̱m|siktvA|prEti̍|ayacCat|EtEna̍|jahi|iti̍|tEna̍|aBIti̍|Ayata|tau|abrUtAm|agnIṣOmAvityagnI̍ - sOmau̱|mA|9 (50)
