verses.samhita: -ndraḥ śatruraBavath̍ sa saBaMvannagnIṣOmA̍vaBi̍ samaBavath̍ sa iṣumAtrami̍ṣumAtraM̍ ~Mviṣva~g~gavarddhata̍ sa imAM ~MlOkAnavRuṇOdyadimAM̍ ~MlOkAnavRuṇOt̍ tad-vRutrasya# vRutratvaM tasmAdindrO&biBEth̍ sa prajApatimupA̍dhAva-cCatru̍rmE&̍ janIti tasmai vajraṃ# siktvA prAyacCadEtEna̍# jahIti tEnAByAyata̍ tAvabrUtAmagnIṣOmau̍ mA - [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam prEti|hAḥ|Avam|antaḥ|svaḥ|iti̍|mama̍|vai|yuvam|sthaḥ|iti̍|abravIt|mAm|aBi|Eti̍|itam|iti̍|tau|BAgadhEyamiti̍# BAga - dhEya̱m|aicCEtAm|tAByA̱m|Etam|agnIṣOmIyamityagnI̍ - sOmIya̱m|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|pUrṇamAsa̍ iti# pUrṇa - mAsE|prEti|ayacCat|tau|abrUtAm|aBIti̍|saMda̍ṣṭAviti̍ saM - daṣṭau|vai|svaḥ|na|śaknuvaḥ|aitumityA - Etum|iti|saḥ|indra̍ḥ|Atmana̍ḥ|śItarUrAviti̍# śIta - rUrau|ajanayat|tat|śItarUrayOriti# śIta - rUrayO̱ḥ|janma|yaḥ|EvaM|śItarUrayOriti̍# śIta - rUrayO̱ḥ|janma|vEda̍|10̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prahArAvamantaḥ̍ sva iti mama vai yuvaṅstha ityabravIn̍ mAmaByEtamiti tau BAgadhEya̍maicCEtAM̍ tAByA-mEtama̍gnIṣOmIya-mEkA̍daśakapAlaM̍ pUrṇamAsE̍ prAyacCat̍ tAvabrUtAmaBi̍ saMdaṣṭau̍ vai svO na śaknuva̍ aitumiti sa indra# Atmanaḥ̍ śItarUrAvajanayat̍ tacCItarUrayOrjanma̍ ya Evaṃ śItarUrayOrjanma̍ vEda - [ ] 10

verses.padam: - Padam na|Enam|śItarUrAviti# śIta - rUrau|hataḥ|tAByA̱m|Enam|aBIti|anayat|tasmA̱t|ja~jjaByamA̍nAt|agnIṣOmAvityagnI̍ - sOmau̱|niriti|akrAmatAm|prAṇApAnAviti̍# prAṇa - apAnau|vai|Enam|tat|ajahitAm|prAṇa iti# pra - anaḥ|vai|dakṣaḥ|apAna̍ ityapa̍ - anaḥ|kratuḥ|tasmA̱t|ja~jjaByamA̍naḥ|brUyAt|mayi̍|dakṣakratU̍ iti# dakṣa-kratU|iti|prAṇApAnAviti̍# prAṇa - apAnau|Eva|Atmann|dhattE|sarva̱m|Ayuḥ|Eti|saḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|vRutrAt|nirqḥUyEti̍# niḥ - hUya|vArtra̍Gnamiti̍ vArtra# - Gnam|haviḥ|pUrṇamAsa̍ iti# pUrṇa - mAsE|niriti|avapat|Gnanti̍|vai|Enam|pUrṇamA̍sa̍ iti# pUrṇa - mAsE|Eti|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: nainaṃ# śItarUrau hatastAByA̍mEnamaBya̍nayat̍ tasmA̱-jja~jjaByamAnAdagnIṣOmau̍ nirakrAmatAM̍ prAṇApAnau vA EnaM̍ tadajahitAM̍ prAṇO vai dakṣO&pAnaḥ̍ kratustasmA̱-jja~jjaByamAnO̍ brUyAnmayi# dakṣakratU iti# prAṇApAnAvEvA&&tman dhattE̍ sarvamAyurEti̍ sa dEvatA# vRutrAnnirqḥUya vArtraGnaṃ̍ haviḥ pUrṇamAsE̍ niravapad̍ Gnanti vA EnaM̍ pUrṇamAsa̍ A - [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam amAvAsyAyAmitya̍mA̍ - vAsyAyAm|pyAyayanti|tasmA̱t|vArtra̍GnI̍ iti vArtra# - GnI|pUrṇamAsa̍ iti# pUrṇa - mAsE|anviti|ucyEtE̍ iti|vRudha̍nvatI̍ iti vRudhann# - vatI|amAvAsyAyAmitya̍mA̍ - vAsyAyAm|tat|saṅqsthApyEti̍# saM - sthApya|vArtra̍Gnamiti̍ vArtra# - Gnam|haviḥ|vajra̱m|AdAyEtyA̱ - dAya|puna̍ḥ|aBIti̍|Ayata|tE̍ iti|abrUtAm|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|mA|prEti|hAḥ|AvayO̱ḥ|vai|śritaḥ|iti̍|tE̍ iti|abrUtAm|vara̱m|vRuṇAvahai|nakṣa̍travihitEti̍ nakṣatra̍ - vihitA|aham|asAni|iti̍|asau|abravIt|citravi̍hitEti̍# citra - vihitA|aham|iti|iyam|tasmA̱t|nakṣa̍travihitEti̍ nakṣatra̍ - vihitA|asau|citravihitEti̍# citra - vihitA|iyam|yaḥ|Evam|dyAvApRuthivyOriti̍ dyAvA̱ - pRuthivyOḥ|12 (50)
verses.samhita: &mAvAsyA̍yAM̍ pyAyayanti tasmAd-vArtraGnI̍ pUrṇamAsE &nU̱cyEtE vRudhanvatI̍ amAvAsyAyAM̍ tath saṅqsthApya vArtraGnaṃ̍ havirvajramAdAya̍ punaraByA̍yata̍ tE abrUtAM̍ dyAvApRuthivI̍ mA pra hArAvayOrvai̍ śrita iti tE abrUtAM̍ ~MvaraM̍ ~MvRuṇAvahai nakṣatravihitA-&hamasAnItyasAva̍bravI-̍ ccitravihitA-̍ &hamitIyaM tasmAnnakṣatravihitA&sau̍ citravihitE&yaM̍ ~Mya EvaM dyAvApRuthivyO̍ - [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam vara̱m|vEda|Eti̍|Enam|vara̍ḥ|gacCati|saḥ|AByAm|Eva|prasU̍ta̍ iti pra - sUtaḥ|indraḥ|vRutram|ahann|tE|dEvAḥ|vRutram|hatvA|agnIṣOmAvityagnI̍ - sOmau̱|abruvann|havyam|naḥ|vahatam|iti|tau|abrUtAm|apa̍tEjasAvityapa̍-tEjasau|vai|tyau|vRutrE|vai|tyayO̱ḥ|tEja̍ḥ|iti̍|tE|abruvann|kaḥ|idam|acCa̍|Eti|iti̍|gauḥ|iti̍|abruvann|gauḥ|vAva|sarva̍sya|mitram|iti̍|sA|abravIt|13̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -rvaraM ~MvEdainaM ~MvarO# gacCati sa AByAmEva prasUta̍ indrO# vRutramahan̍ tE dEvA vRutraṃ hatvA&gnIṣOmAvabruvan.̍ havyaM nO# vahatamiti tAvabrUtAmapa̍tEjasau̍ vai tyau vRutrE vai tyayOstEja iti tE̱&bruvan ka idamacCaitIti gaurityabruvan̍ gaurvAva sarvasya̍ mitramiti sA&bravI̍ - [ ] 13

verses.padam: - Padam vara̱m|vRuṇai|mayi|Eva|satA|uBayE̍na|BunajAddhvai|iti̍|tat|gauḥ|Eti̍|aharat|tasmA̱t|gavi̍|satA|uBayE̍na|Bu~jjatE|Etat|vai|agnEḥ|tEja̍ḥ|yat|GRutam|Etat|sOma̍sya|yat|paya̍ḥ|yaḥ|EvaM|agnIṣOma̍yOrityagnI-sOma̍yOḥ|tEja̍ḥ|vEda̍|tEjasvI|Eva|Bavati|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|kidEMqvatya̍miti̍# kiM - dEvatya̱m|paurṇamAsamiti# paurṇa - mAsam|iti|prAjApatyamiti̍# prajA - patyam|iti|brUyAt|tEna̍|indra̱m|jyEṣṭham|putram|niravA̍sAyayaditi̍# niḥ-avAsAyayat|iti̍|tasmA̱t̍ ( )|jyEṣṭham|putram|dhanEna|nirava̍sAyayantIti̍# niḥ - avasAyayanti||14̍ (54)
verses.samhita: -dvaraM̍ ~MvRuṇai mayyEva satO&BayEna̍ BunajAddhvA iti tad-gaurA&harat̍ tasmAd-gavi# satOBayEna̍ Bu~jjata EtadvA agnEstEjO yad GRutamEtath sOmasya̍ yat payO ya EvamagnIṣOmayO̍ stEjO vEda# tEjasvyEva̍ Bavati̍ brahmavAdinO# vadanti kiMdEvatyaM̍ paurṇamAsamiti# prAjApatyamiti# brUyAt tEnEndraM̍ jyEṣṭhaM putraM niravAsAyayaditi̍ tasmA̱- ( ) -jjyEṣṭhaM putraM dhanEna̍ niravasAyayanti||14̍

verses.padam: - Padam indra̱m|vRutram|jaGnivAṃsa̱m|mRudhaḥ|aBi|prEti̍|avEpanta|saḥ|Etam|vaimRudham|pUrṇamA̍sa̍ iti# pUrṇa - mAsE|anunirvApyamitya̍nu̍ - nirvApya̱m|apaśyat|tam|niriti|avapat|tEna̍|vai|saḥ|mRudha̍ḥ|apEti̍|ahata|yat|vaimRudhaḥ|pUrṇamA̍sa̍ iti# pUrṇa - mAsE|anunirvApya# ityanu̍ - nirvApyaḥ|Bava̍ti|mRudha̍ḥ|Eva|tEna̍|yaja̍mAnaḥ|apEti̍|hatE|indra̍ḥ|vRutram|hatvA|dEvatA̍Biḥ|ca|indriyEṇa̍|ca|vIti̍|Arddhyata|saḥ|Etam|AgnEyam|aṣṭAka̍pAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|amAvAsyAyAmitya̍mA̍ - vAsyAyAm|apaśyat|aindram|dadhi̍|15̍ (50)
verses.samhita: indraM̍ ~MvRutraM jaGnivAṃsaM̍ mRudhO&Bi prAvEpanta̍ sa EtaM ~MvaimRudhaM̍ pUeṇamAsE&nunirvApya̍mapaśyat̍ taM niravapat̍ tEna vai sa mRudhO&pAhata̍ yadvaimRudhaḥ̍ pUrṇamAsE&nunirvApyO̍# Bavati̍ mRudha# Eva tEna yajamAnO̍ &pa# hata indrO# vRutraṃ hatvA dEvatABiścEndriyEṇa̍# ca vyA̱rddhyata sa EtamA̱gnEya-maṣṭAkapAla-mamAvAsyA̍yAmapaśyadaindraM̍ dadhi - [ ] 15

verses.padam: - Padam tam|niriti|avapat|tEna̍|vai|saḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|ca|indriyam|ca|avEti̍|arundha|yat|AgnEyaḥ|aṣṭAka̍pAla̍ ityaṣṭA - kapAlaḥ|amAvAsyAyAmitya̍mA̍ - vAsyAyAm|Bava̍ti|aindram|dadhi̍|dEvatA̱ḥ|ca|Eva|tEna̍|indriyam|ca|yaja̍mAnaḥ|avEti̍|rundhE|indra̍sya|vRutram|jaGnuṣa̍ḥ|indriyam|vIrya̱m|pRuthivIm|anu̍|vIti̍|ArcCat|tat|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|vIrudha̍ḥ|aBavann|saḥ|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA - patim|upEti|adhAvat|vRutraM|mE|jaGnuṣa̍ḥ|indriyam|vIrya̱m|16̍ (50)
verses.samhita: taM niravapat̍ tEna vai sa dEvatA̱ścEndriyaM cAvArundhayadA̱gnEyO̱̍ &ṣṭAkapAlO̍ &mAvAsyAyAM̍ BavatyaindraM̍ dadhi# dEvatA̱ścaiva tEnE̱ndriyaM ca yajamAnO&va̍# rundha indrasya̍ vRutraM jaGnuṣa# indriyaM ~MvIryaM̍ pRuthivImanu vyA̱rcCat tadOṣadhayO̍ vIrudhO&Bavanthsa̍ prajApatimupA̍dhAvad-vRutraM̍ mE# jaGnuṣa# indriyaM ~MvIryaM̍ - [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam pRuthivIm|anu|vIti̍|Arat|tat|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|vIrudha̍ḥ|aBUvann|iti̍|saḥ|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|paśUn|abravIt|Etat|asmai|samiti|nayata|iti̍|tat|paśava̍ḥ|Oṣa̍dhIBya̍ ityOṣadhi̍ - Byaḥ|adhIti|Atmann|samiti̍|anayann|tat|pratIti̍|aduhann|yat|samana̍yanniti̍# saM - anayann|tat|sAnAMqyyasyEti̍# sAM - nAyyasya|sAnAMqyyatvamiti̍# sAMnAyya - tvam|yat|pratyaduhanniti̍# prati - aduhann|tat|pratidhuṣa̍ iti# prati - dhuṣaḥ|pratidhuktvamiti̍# pratidhuk - tvam|samiti|anaiṣuḥ|pratIti̍|adhukṣann|na|tu|mayi̍|śrayatE|iti̍|abravIt|Etat|asmai|17̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pRuthivImanu vyArat̍ tadOṣadhayO̍ vIrudhO&BUvanniti̍ sa prajApatiḥ̍ paśUnabravIdEtada̍smai̍ saM nayatEti̍ tat paśava OṣadhIByO̍ &dhyAtmanth samanayan̍ tat pratyaduhana.̍ yath samanayan̍ tath sA̱M nAyyasya# sAMnAyyatvaM ~Myat pratyaduhan̍ tat pratidhuṣa̍ḥ̍ pratidhuktvaṃ samanaiṣuḥ̍ pratyadhukṣan̍ na tu mayi# śrayata ityabravIdEtada̍smai̍ - [ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam śRutam|kuruta|iti|abravIt|tat|asmai|śRutam|akurvann|indriyam|vAva|asminn|vIrya̱m|tat|aśrayann|tat|śRutasya̍|śRutatvamiti̍# śRuta - tvam|samiti|anaiṣuḥ|pratIti̍|adhukṣann|śRutam|akrann|na|tu|mA|dhinOti|iti̍|abravIt|Etat|asmai|dadhi̍|kuruta|iti̍|abravIt|tat|asmai|dadhi̍|akurvann|tat|Enam|adhinOt|tat|daddhnaḥ|dadhitvamiti̍# dadhi - tvam|brahmavAdina iti# brahma-vAdinaḥ|vadanti|daddhnaḥ|pUrva̍sya|avadEyamitya̍va̍ - dEya̱m|18 (50)
verses.samhita: śRutaM kurutEtya̍bravIt̍ tadasmai̍ śRuta-makurvannindriyaM̍ ~MvAvAsmin̍ vIryaM̍ tadaśrayan̍ tacCRutasya# śRutatvaṃ samanaiṣuḥ̍ pratyadhukṣa~jCRutama̍kran̍ na tu mA# dhinOtItyabravIdEtada̍smai̍ dadhi# kurutEtyabravIt̍ tadasmai̍ daddhyakurvan̍ tadEnamadhinOt̍ taddaddhnO dadhitvaM̍ brahmavAdinO̍# vadanti daddhnaḥ pUrvasyAvadEyaM̍ - [ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam dadhi|hi|pUrva̱m|kriyatE̱|iti̍|anA̍dRutyEtyanA̱̍ - dRutya|tat|śRutasya|Eva|pUrva̍sya|avEti̍|dyEt|indriyam|Eva|asminn|vIrya̱m|śritvA|daddhnA|upari̍ṣṭAt|dhinOti|yathApUrvamiti̍# yathA - pUrvam|upEti|Eti|yat|pUtIkai̱ḥ|vA|parṇavalkairiti̍# parṇa - valkaiḥ|vA|Ata~jcyAdityA̱ - ta~jcyAt|saumyam|tat|yat|kvalaiḥ|rAkṣasam|tat|yat|taṇḍulaiḥ|vaiśvadEvamiti̍# vaiśva - dEvam|tat|yat|Ata~jcanEnEtyA̱̍ - ta~jcanEna|mAnuṣam|tat|yat|daddhnA|tat|sEndramiti̍ sa - indram|daddhnA|Eti|tanakti|19̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dadhi hi pUrvaM̍ kriyata ityanAdRutya̍ tacCRutasyaiva pUrvasyAva# dyEdindriyamEvAsmin̍ vIryaṅ# śritvA daddhnO pariṣṭAddhinOti̍ yathApUrvamupaiti̍ yat pUtIkai̱rvA parṇavalkairvA# &&ta~jcyAth saumyaM tadyat kvalai̍ rAkṣasaM tadyat taṇḍulairvai̱śvadEvaM̍ tadyadAta~jcanEna̍ mAnuṣaM tad-yad-daddhnA tath sEndraM̍ daddhnA &&tanakti̍ - [ ] 19

verses.padam: - Padam sEndratvAyEti# sEndra - tvAya|agnihOtrOcCEṣaṇamitya̍gnihOtra̍ - ucCEṣaṇam|aByAtanaktItya̍Bi̍ - Atanakti|yajñasya̍|saMta̍tyA̍ iti saM-tatyai|indraḥ|vRutram|hatvA|parA̱m|parAvatamiti̍# parA - vata̱m|agacCat|apEti|arAdham|iti̍|manya̍mAnaḥ|tam|dEvatA̱ḥ|praiṣamiti̍# pra - Eṣa̱m|aicCann|saḥ|abravIt|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|yaḥ|prathamaḥ|anuvindatItyanu̍ - vindati|tasya̍|prathamam|BAgadhEyamiti̍# BAga - dhEya̱m|iti|tam|pitara̍ḥ|anviti̍|avindann|tasmA̱t|pitRuBya̍ iti# pitRu - Byaḥ|pUrvEdyuḥ|kriyatE|saḥ|amAvAsyAmitya̍mA̍ - vAsyA̱m|prati|Eti̍|agacCat|tam|dEvAḥ|aBi|samiti̍|agacCanta|amA|vai|naḥ|20̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sEndratvAyA̱-gnihOtrOcCEṣaṇamaByA-tanakti̍ yajñasya saMtatyA̍ indrO# vRutraṃ hatvA parA̱M parAvata-magacCa-dapA̍rAdhamiti̍ manyamAnastaM̍ dEvatAḥ praiṣamaicCanth̍ sO̱&bravIt prajApatiryaḥ̍ prathamO̍&nuvindati̍ tasya# prathamaM BAgadhEyamiti̍ taM pitarO&nvavindan̍ tasmA̱t pitRuByaḥ̍ pUrvEdyuḥ kriyatE̍ sO&mAvAsyA̱M̍ pratyA&gacCat̍ taM dEvA aBi samagacCantAmA̍ vai nO- [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam adya|vasu|vasati|iti̍|indra̍ḥ|hi|dEvAnA̱m|vasu̍|tat|amAvAsyA̍yA̍ ityamA̍ - vAsyAyAḥ|amAvAsyatvamitya̍mAvAsya̍ - tvam|brahmavAdina iti# brahma-vAdinaḥ|vadanti|kiMqdEvatya̍miti̍# kiM - dEvatya̱m|sAnAMqyyamiti# sAM - nAyyam|iti|vaiśvadEvamiti̍# vaiśva - dEvam|iti|brUyAt|viśvE̱|hi|tat|dEvAḥ|BAgadhEyamiti̍# BAga - dhEya̱m|aBIti|samaga̍cCantEti̍# saM - agacCanta|iti̍|athO̍ iti|Kalu̍|aindram|iti̍|Eva|brUyAt|indra̱m|vAva|tE|tat|Biṣajyanta̍ḥ|aBi|samiti̍|agacCanta|iti̍||21̍ (42) (dadhi# - mE jaGnuṣa# indriyaM ~MvIrya# - mityabravIdEtada̍smA̍ - avadEyaM̍ - tanakti - nO - dvicatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: &dya vasu# vasatItIndrO hi dEvAnAM ~Mvasu tadamAvAsyA̍yA̍ amAvAsyatvaM brahmavAdinO̍# vadanti kiMdEvatyaṃ# sAMnAyyamiti# vaiśvadEvamiti# brUyAd-viśvE hi taddEvA BAgadhEya̍maBi̍ samagacCantEtyathO̍ KalvaindramityEva brUyAdindraM̍ ~MvAva tE tad-BiṣajyantO&Bi̍ samagacCantEti̍||21̍ (dadhi# - mE jaGnuṣa# indriyaM ~MvIrya# - mityabravIdEtada̍smA̍ - avadEyaM̍ - tanakti - nO - dvicatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam brahmavAdina iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|saḥ|tu|vai|daṛqśapUrṇamAsAviti̍# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsau|yajEta|yaḥ|Enau|sEndrAviti sa - indrau|yajEta|iti̍|vaimRudhaḥ|pUrṇamA̍sa̍ iti# pUrṇa - mAsE|anunirvApya# ityanu̍ - nirvApyaḥ|Bavati|tEna̍|pUrṇamA̍sa̍ iti# pUrṇa - mAsaḥ|sEndra iti sa - indraḥ|aindram|dadhi|amAvAsyA̍yAmitya̍mA̍ - vAsyAyAm|tEna̍|amAvAsyEtya̍mA̍ - vAsyA̱|sEndrEti sa - indrA|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|daṛqśapUrṇamAsAviti# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsau|yajatE|sEndrAviti̍ sa - indrau|Eva|Enau|yajatE|śvaḥ śva iti śvaḥ - śvaḥ|asmai|IjAnAya|vasI̍yaḥ|Bavati|dEvAḥ|vai|yat|yajñE|aku̍rvata|tat|asu̍rAḥ|akurvata|tE|dEvAḥ|EtAm|22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: brahmavAdinO# vadanti sa tvai da#ṛśapUrṇamAsau̍ yajEta̍ ya Enau̍ sEndrau yajEtEti# vaimRudhaḥ pUrṇamAsE̍ &nunirvApyO# Bavati tEna# pUrṇamAsaḥ̍ sEndra# aindraM daddhyamAvAsyA̍yAM̍ tEnAmAvAsyA̍# sEndrA ya EvaM ~MvidvAn daṛśapUrṇamAsau̍ yajatE̍ sEndrAvEvainau̍# yajatE śvaḥ śvO̱&smA IjAnAya vasIyO̍ Bavati dEvA vai yad-yajñE &kurvatatadasu̍rA̍ akurvata tE dEvA EtA - [ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam iṣṭi̱m|apaśyann|AgnAvaiṣṇavamityA̱gnA - vaiṣṇavam|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlAm|sarasvatyai|carum|sara̍svatE|carum|tAm|paurṇamAsamiti̍# paurṇa - mAsam|saṅqsthApyEti# saM - sthApya|anu̍|niriti̍|avapann|tata̍ḥ|dEvAḥ|aBa̍vann|parEti̍|asu̍rAḥ|yaḥ|BrAtRu̍vyavAniti̍ BrAtRuvya̍ - vAn|syAt|saḥ|paurṇamAsamiti# paurṇa - mAsam|saṅqsthApyEti# saM-sthApya|EtAm|iṣṭi̱m|anu̍|niriti̍|vapEt|paurṇamAsEnEti̍# paurṇa - mAsEna|Eva|vajra̱m|BrAtRu̍vyAya|prahRutyEti̍# pra - hRutya|AgnAvaiṣṇavEnEtyA̱gnA-vaiṣṇavEna̍|dEvatA̱ḥ|ca|yajñam|ca|BrAtRu̍vyasya|vRu~gktE|mithunAn|paśUn|sArasvatAByA̱m|yAva̍t|Eva|asya|asti̍|tat|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -miṣṭi-mapaśyan-nAgnAvaiṣṇava-mEkA̍daśakapAlaṃq̍ sarasvatyai̍ caruṃ sarasvatE̍ caruM tAM pau̱rṇamAsaṃ saṅqsthApyAnu niravapan̍ tatO# dEvA aBavan̍ parA&surA̍ yO BrAtRuvyavAnthsyAth̍ sa pau̱rṇamAsaṃ saqṅqsthApyaitAmiṣṭimanu nirvapEt̍ paurṇamAsEnaiva vajraM BrAtRuvyAya̍ prahRutyA̱&&gnAvaiṣṇavEna# dEvatA̱śca yajñaM ca BrAtRuvyasya̍ vRu~gktE mithunAn paśUnth sArasvatAByAM̍ ~MyAvadEvAsyAsti̍ tath - [ ] 23

verses.padam: - Padam sarva̱m|vRu~gktE|paurṇamAsImiti# paurṇa - mAsIm|Eva|yajEta|BrAtRuvyavAniti̍ BrAtRuvya̍ - vAn|na|amAvAsyAmitya̍mA-vAsyA̱m|hatvA|BrAtRu̍vyam|na|Eti̍|pyAyayati|sAkapraMqsthAyIyEnEti̍# sAkaM - prasthAyIyEna|yajEta|paśukA̍ma̍ iti# paśu - kAmaḥ|yasmai̱|vai|alpEna|AharantItyA̱̍ - haranti|na|AtmanA̱|tRupya̍ti|na|anyasmai̱|dadAti|yasmai̱|mahatA|tRupya̍ti|AtmanA̱|dadA̍ti|anyasmai̱|mahatA|pUrṇam|hOtavya̱m|tRuptaḥ|Eva|Enam|indra̍ḥ|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu-Biḥ|tarpayati|dArupAtrEṇEti# dAru - pAtrEṇa|juhOti|na|hi|mRunmayamiti̍# mRut - maya̱m|AhutimityA̍ - hutim|AnaśE|audubaMram|24̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sarvaM̍ ~MvRu~gktE paurṇamAsImEva yajEta̍ BrAtRuvyavAnnAmA̍vAsyAṃ̍# hatvA BrAtRuvyaM̍ nA&&pyAyayati̍ sAkaMprasthAyIyEna̍ yajEta paśukAmOyasmai̍ vA alpEnA&&hara̍nti̍ nA&&tmanA tRupyati̍ nAnyasmai# dadAti yasmai# mahatA tRupyatyAtmanA̍ dadA̱tyanyasmai# mahatA pUrṇaṃ hOtavya̍M̍ tRupta Evainamindraḥ̍ prajayA# paśuBistarpayati̍ dArupAtrEṇa# juhOti na hi mRunmayamAhutimAnaśa̍ audumbaraM̍ - [ ] 24

verses.padam: - Padam Bavati|Urk|vai|udubaMraḥ|Urk|paśava̍ḥ|UrjA|Eva|asmai|Urja̱m|paśUn|avEti̍|rundhE|na|aga̍taśrIrityaga̍ta̍ - śrIḥ|mahEndramiti# mahA - indram|yajEta|trayaḥ|vai|gataśri̍ya̍ iti# gata - śriyaḥ|śuśruvAn|grAmaṇIriti# grAma - nIḥ|rAjanyaḥ|tEṣA̱m|mahEndra̍ iti# mahA-indraḥ|dEvatA̱|yaḥ|vai|svAm|dEvatA̱m|atiyajata̍ ityati̍ - yajatE|prEti̍|svAyai̱|dEvatA̍yai|cyavatE|na|parA̱m|prEti̍|ApnOti|pApI̍yAn|Bavati|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM-vathsaram|indra̱m|yajEta|saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM - vathsaram|hi|vratam|na|atIti|svA|25̍ (50)
verses.samhita: BavatyUrgvA udumbara̍ Urk paśava# UrjaivAsmA UrjaM̍ paśUnava# rundhE nAgataśrIrmahEndraM̍ ~MyajEta̍ trayO vai gataśriyaḥ̍ śuśruvAn grAmaṇI̍ rAjanya̍stEṣA̱M̍ mahEndrO dEvatA yO vai svAM dEvatAmati̍ yajatE̍ prasvAyai# dEvatAyaicyavatE̍ na parAM prApnOti̍ pApIyAn̍ Bavati saM~Mvathsara-mindraM̍ ~MyajEta saM~Mvathsaraṃ hi vrataM nAti svai - [ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|Enam|dEvatA̱|ijyamAnA|BUtyai̱|indhE|vasI̍yAn|Bavati|saM~MvathsarasyEti̍# saM - vathsarasya|parastA̱t|agnayE̱|vratapa̍taya̍ iti# vrata - patayE|purOḍAśa̱m|aṣṭAkapAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM - vathsaram|Eva|Enam|vRutram|jaGnivAṃsa̱m|agniḥ|vratapatiriti̍# vrata-patiḥ|vratam|Eti|laBaMqyati|tata̍ḥ|adhIti̍|kAma̱m|yajEta||26̍ (30) (EtAM - ta - daudumbaraṅq̍ - svA - triṃqśacca# ) (A4)
verses.samhita: -vainaM̍ dEvatEjyamAnA̍ BUtyA# indhE vasIyAn̍ Bavati saM~Mvathsarasya# parastAdagnayE̱̍ vratapatayE̍ purOḍAśamaṣṭAka̍pAlaM̍ nirvapEth̍ saM~MvathsaramEvainaM̍ ~MvRutraM jaGnivAṃ̍ samagni-rvratapa̍ti-rvratamA̍ lamBayati̍ tatO&dhi kAmaM̍ ~MyajEta||26

verses.padam: - Padam na|asOmayAjItyasO̍ma̍ - yAjI|samiti|nayEt|anA̍gatamityanA̱̍ - gatam|vai|Etasya|paya̍ḥ|yaḥ|asO̍mayAjItyasO̍ma̍ - yAjI|yat|asOmayAjItyasO̍ma-yAjI|sanaMyEditi̍# saM - nayE̱t|parimOṣa iti# pari - mOṣaḥ|Eva|saḥ|anRutam|karOti|athO̍ iti|parEti̍|Eva|sicyatE|sOmayAjIti̍# sOma - yAjI|Eva|samiti|nayEt|paya̍ḥ|vai|sOma̍ḥ|paya̍ḥ|sAnAMqyyamiti̍# sAM - nAyyam|payasA|Eva|paya̍ḥ|Atmann|dhattE|vIti̍|vai|Etam|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|arddhayati|varddhayati|asya|BrAtRu̍vyam|yasya̍|haviḥ|niru̍ptamiti̍ niḥ - uptam|purastA̱t|candramA̱ḥ|27 (50)
verses.samhita: nAsOmayAjI̍ saM nayEdanA̍gataM̍ ~MvA Etasya payO yO&sOmayAjI̍ yadasOmayAjI̍ saM naya̱t parimOṣa Eva sO&nRutaM̍ karOtyathO paraiva sicyatE̍ sOmayAjyEva̍ saM nayEt̍ payO vai sOmaḥ payaḥ̍ sAMnAyyaM payasaiva̍ paya# Atman dhattE̍ vi vA EtaM prajayA# paśuBirarddhayati̍ varddhayatyasya̍ BrAtRuvyaM̍ ~Myasya# havirniruptaM̍ purastA̱ccandramA# - [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam aBIti|udEtItyu̍t̍ - Eti|trEdhA|taṇḍulAn|vIti̍|BajEt|yE|maddhyamAḥ|syuḥ|tAn|agnayE̱|dAtrE|purOḍAśa̱m|aṣṭAka̍pAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|kuryAt|yE|sthaviṣṭhAḥ|tAn|indrA̍ya|pradAtra̍ iti# pra - dAtrE|dadhann|carum|yE|aṇiṣṭhAḥ|tAn|viṣṇa̍vE|śipiviṣṭAyEti̍# śipi - viṣṭAya|śRutE|carum|agniḥ|Eva|asmai|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|prajanayatIti# pra - janayati|vRuddhAm|indra̍ḥ|prEti̍|yacCati|yajñaḥ|vai|viṣṇu̍ḥ|paśava̍ḥ|śipi̍ḥ|yajñE|Eva|paśuṣu̍|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|na|dvE̍ iti|28̍ (50)
verses.samhita: aByudEti̍# trEdhA taṇḍulAn.̍ vi BajEdyE̍ maddhyamAḥ̍ syustAnagnayE# dAtrE purOḍAśa̍maṣṭAka̍pAlaM̍ kuryAdyE sthaviṣṭhAstAnindrA̍ya̍ pradAtrE dadhaṅścaruM ~MyE&ṇiṣṭhAstAn.̍ viṣṇavE̍ śipiviṣṭAya# śRutE carumagnirEvAsmai̱ prajAM prajanaya̍ti̍ vRuddhAmindraḥ prayacCati̍ yajñO vai viṣṇuḥ̍ paśavaḥ śipiryajña̍ Eva paśuṣu pratitiṣṭhati̍ na dvE - [ ] 28

verses.padam: - Padam yajEta|yat|pUrvayA|saMpratIti̍# saM - prati|yajEta|utta̍rayEtyut̍ - tarayA|CabaMṭ|kuryAt|yat|uttarayEtyut̍ - tarayA|saMqpratIti# saM-prati|yajEta|pUrva̍yA|CabaMṭ|kuryAt|na|iṣṭi̍ḥ|Bava̍ti|na|yajñaḥ|tat|anviti̍|hrItamuKIti̍# hrIta - muKI|apagalBa ityapa̍ - galBaḥ|jAyatE|EkA̱m|Eva|yajEta|pragalBa iti# pra - galBaḥ|asya|jAyatE|anAdRutyEtyanA̱-dRutya|tat|dvE̍ iti|Eva|yajEta|yajñamuKamiti̍# yajña - muKam|Eva|pUrvayA|AlaBa̍ta̍ ityA̱ - laBatE|yaja̍tE|utta̍rayEtyut̍ - tarayA|dEvatA̱ḥ|Eva|pUrvayA|avarundha̍ ityava̍ - rundhE|indriyam|uttarayEtyut̍ - tarayA|dEvalOkamiti# dEva - lOkam|Eva|29 (50)
verses.samhita: yajEta̍ yat pUrvayA̍ saMprati yajEtOttarayA̍ CambaṭkuryAdyadutta̍rayA̍ samprati yajEta̍ pUrvayA̍ CambaṭkuryAnnEṣṭirBava̍ti̍ na yajñastadanu# hrItamuKyapagalBO̍ jAyata̍ EkAmEva̍ yajEta̍ pragalBO̱&sya jAyatE &nAdRutya̍ tad dvE Eva yajEta̍ yajña muKamEva pUrvayA&&laBa̍tE̍ yajata̍ uttarayA̍ dEvatA# Eva pUrvayA̍ &varundha indriya-mutta̍rayA̍ dEvalOkamEva - [ ] 29

verses.padam: - Padam pUrvayA|aBijayatItya̍Bi̍ - jayati|manuṣyalOkamiti̍# manuṣya - lOkam|uttarayEtyut̍ - tarayA|BUyasaḥ|yajñakratUniti̍# yajña - kratUn|upEti|Eti|EṣA|vai|sumanA̍ iti# su - manA̱ḥ|nAma|iṣṭi̍ḥ|yam|adya|IjAnam|paścAt|candramA̱ḥ|aBIti̍|udEtItyu̍t̍ - Eti|asminn|Eva|asmai|lOkE|arddhu̍kam|Bavati|dAkṣAyaṇayajñEnEti̍# dAkṣAyaṇa - yajñEna|suvargakA̍ma̍ iti# suvarga - kAmaḥ|yajEta|pUrṇamAsa̍ iti# pUrṇa - mAsE|samiti|nayEt|maitrAvaruṇyEti̍# maitrA - varuṇyA|AmikṣayA|amAvAsyA̍yAmitya̍mA̍ - vAsyAyAm|yajEta|pUrṇamA̍sa̍ iti# pUrṇa - mAsE|vai|dEvAnA̱m|sutaḥ|tEṣA̱m|Etam|arddhamAsamityarddha̍ - mAsam|prasuta̍ iti pra - sutaḥ|tEṣA̱m|maitrAvaruṇIti# maitrA - varuṇI|vaśA|amAvAsyAyAmitya̍mA̍ - vAsyAyAm|anUbandhyEtya̍nu̍ - bandhyA̱|yat|30 (50)
verses.samhita: pUrvayA&Bijaya̍ti̍ manuṣyalOkamuttarayA̍ BUyasO̍ yajñakratUnupai̱tyEṣA vai sumanA nAmEṣṭiryamadyEjAnaM paścAccandramA# aByudEtyasminnEvAsmai̍# lOkE&rddhukaM̍ Bavati dAkṣAyaṇa yajñEna# suvargakAmO̍ yajEta pUrṇamAsE̍ saM nayEn-maitrAvaruṇyA̍ &&mikṣayA̍ &mAvAsyAyAM̍ ~MyajEta pUrṇamAsE̍ vai dEvAnAṃ# sutastEṣAmEtama̍rddhamAsaM̍ prasutastEṣA̱M̍ maitrAvaruṇI vaśA&mAvAsyA̍yA-manUbandhyA̍# yat - [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam pUrvEdyuḥ|yajatE|vEdi̱m|Eva|tat|karOti|yat|vathsAn|apAkarOtItya̍pa-AkarOti̍|sadOhavirddhAnE̍ iti# sadaḥ-havirddhAnE|Eva|samiti|minOti|yat|yaja̍tE|dEvaiḥ|Eva|sutyAm|samiti̍|pAdayati|saḥ|Etam|arddhamAsamitya̍rddha̍ - mAsam|sadhamAdamiti# sadha - mAda̱m|dEvaiḥ|sOma̱m|pibati|yat|maitrAvaruṇyEti# maitrA - varuṇyA|AmikṣayA|amAvAsyA̍yAmitya̍mA̍ - vAsyAyAm|yaja̍tE|yA|Eva|asau|dEvAnA̱m|vaśA|anUbandhyEtya̍nu̍ - bandhyA̱|sO iti|Eva|EṣA|Etasya̍|sAkṣAditi̍# sa - akṣAt|vai|Eṣaḥ|dEvAn|aByArOhatItya̍Bi̍ - ArOhati|yaḥ|EṣAm|yajñam|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pU̱rvEdyu ryajatE̍ vEdimEva̍ tat karOti̍ yad vathsAnapAkarOti̍# sadOhavirddhAnE Eva saM minOti̍ yadyajatE̍ dEvairEva sutyAṃ saM pAdayati̍ sa EtamarddhamAsaṃ̍ sadhamAda̍M̍ dEvaiḥ sOmaM̍ pibati yan-mai̱trAvaruṇyA &&mikṣayA̍ &mAvAsyAyAM̍ ~MyajatE̍ yaivAsau dEvAnA̱M ~MvaśA&nUbandhyA̍# sO Evaiṣaitasya# sAkṣAdvA Eṣa dEvAnaByArOhati̍ ya EṣAM̍ ~Myajña - [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam aByArOhatItyaBi̍ - ArOhati|yathA̱|Kalu̍|vai|śrEyAn̍|aByArU̍ḍha̍ ityaBi̍ - ArUḍhaḥ|kAmaya̍tE|tathA̱|karOti|yadi̍|avaviddhyatItya̍va̍ - viddhyati|pApI̍yAn|Bavati|yadi̍|na|avaviddhyatItya̍va̍ - viddhyati|sadRu~g~giti̍# sa - dRu~g|vyAvRutkAma̍ iti# vyAvRut - kAmaḥ|EtEna|yajñEna̍|yajEta|kṣurapa̍viriti̍# kṣura - paviḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|yajñaḥ|tAjak|puṇyaḥ|vA|Bava̍ti|prEti̍|vA|mIyatE|tasya̍|Etat|vratam|na|anRu̍tam|vadEt|na|mAṃqsam|aśnIyAt|na|striya̱m|upEti̍|iyAt|na|asya|palpU̍lanEna|vAsa̍ḥ|palpUlayEyuḥ̍ ( )|Etat|hi|dEvAḥ|sarva̱m|na|kurvanti||32̍ (56)
verses.samhita: -maByArOha̍ti̍ yathA Kaluvai śrEyAnaByArU̍ḍhaḥ̍ kAmayatE̍ tathA# karOti yadyavaviddhya̍ti̍ pApIyAn̍ Bavati yadi nAvaviddhyati̍ sadRu~g vyAvRutkAma̍ EtEna# yajñEna# yajEta kṣurapavirhyE̍ṣa̍ yajñastAjak puṇyO# vA Bavati̍ pra vA# mIyatE tasyaitadvrataM nAnRutaM̍ ~MvadEnna mAṃq samaśnIyAnna̍ striyamupEyAnnAsya̍ palpUlanEna̍ vAsaḥ̍ palpUlayEyu ( ) -rEtaddhi dEvAḥ sarvaM na kurvanti||32̍

verses.padam: - Padam Eṣaḥ|vai|dEvaratha iti# dEva - rathaḥ|yat|daṛqśapUrṇamAsAviti# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsau|yaḥ|daṛqśapUrṇamAsAviti# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsau|iṣṭvA|sOmEna|yaja̍tE|ratha̍spaṣṭa̍ iti ratha# - spaṣṭE|Eva|avasAna ityava-sAnE̱|varE̱|dEvAnA̱m|avEti̍|syati|EtAni̍|vai|a~ggAparUṃqṣItya~ggA̱̍ - parUṃṣi|saM~MvathsarasyEti̍# saM - vathsarasya|yat|daṛqśapUrṇamAsAviti̍# daṛśa-pUrṇamAsau|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|daṛqśapUrṇamAsAviti# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsau|yajatE|a~ggAparUṃqṣItya~ggA̱̍ - parUṃṣi|Eva|saM~MvathsarasyEti̍# saM - vathsarasya|pratIti̍|dadhAti|EtE̍ iti|vai|saM~MvathsarasyEti̍# saM - vathsarasya|cakṣu̍ṣI̍ iti|yat|daṛqśapUrṇamAsAviti̍# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsau|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|daṛqśapUrṇamAsAviti# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsau|yajatE|tAByA̱m|Eva|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|anviti|paśyati|33̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Eṣa vai dEvarathO̍ yad-daṛśapUrṇamAsau̍ yO daṛśapUrṇamAsAviṣṭvA̍ sOmEna̍ yajatE̍ rathaspaṣṭa̍ EvAvasAnE varE# dEvAnAmava# syatyEtAni vA a~ggAparUṃṣi̍ saM~Mvathsarasya yad-daṛśapUrṇamAsau̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAn daṛśapUrṇamAsau̍ yajatE-&~ggAparUṅṣyEva̍ saM~Mvathsarasya̍ prati# dadhAtyE tE vai saM~Mvathsarasya̍ cakṣuṣI̍ yad-daṛśapUrṇamAsau̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAn daṛśapUrṇamAsau̍ yajatE̍ tAByAmEva̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamanu# paśya - [ ] 33

verses.padam: - Padam EṣA|vai|dEvAnA̱m|vikrA̱ntiriti vi - krAntiḥ|yat|daṛqśapUrṇamAsAviti# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsau|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|daṛqśapUrṇamAsAviti# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsau|yajatE|dEvAnA̱m|Eva|vikrA̱ntimiti̍ vi - krAntim|anu|vIti̍|kramatE|Eṣaḥ|vai|dEvayAna̍ iti# dEva - yAnaḥ|panthA̱ḥ|yat|daṛqśapUrṇamAsAviti̍# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsau|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|daṛqśapUrṇamAsAviti# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsau|yajatE|yaḥ|Eva|dEvayAna̍ iti# dEva-yAnaḥ|panthA̱ḥ|tam|samArO̍hatIti̍# saM - ArOhati|Etau|vai|dEvAnA̱m|harI̍ iti|yat|daṛqśapUrṇamAsAviti̍# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsau|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|daṛqśapUrṇamAsAviti# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsau|yajatE|yau|Eva|dEvAnA̱m|harI̍ iti|tAByA̱m|34̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -tyEṣA vai dEvAnAM ~MvikrA̱nti ryad-daṛśapUrṇamAsau̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAn daṛśapUrṇamAsau̍ yajatE̍ dEvAnAmEva̍ vikrA̱ntimanu vikramata̍ Eṣa vai dEvayAnaḥ̍ panthA yad-daṛśapUrṇamAsau̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAn daṛśapUrṇamAsau̍ yajatE̍ ya Eva dEvayAnaḥ̍ panthAstaṃ samArOhatyEtau̍ vai dEvAnAṃq harI yad-daṛśapUrṇamAsau̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAn daṛśpUrṇamAsau̍ yajatE̍ yAvEva dEvAnAṃq harI tAByA# - [ ] 34

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|EByaḥ|havyam|vahati|Etat|vai|dEvAnA̱m|Asya̱m|yat|daṛqśapUrṇamAsAviti# daṛśa-pUrṇamAsau|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|daṛqśapUrṇamAsAviti# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsau|yajatE|sAkṣAditi̍# sa - akṣAt|Eva|dEvAnA̱m|AsyE̱|juhOti|Eṣaḥ|vai|havirddhAnIti# haviḥ - dhAnI|yaḥ|daṛqśapUrṇamAsayAjIti# daṛśapUrṇamAsa - yAjI|sAyaMprAtariti̍# sAyaM - prAtaḥ|agnihOtramityagni̍ - hOtram|juhOti|yajatE|daṛqśapUrṇamAsAviti̍# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsau|aharaharityaha̍ḥ̍ - ahaḥ|havirddhAninAmiti# haviḥ - dhAninA̱m|sutaḥ|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|daṛqśapUrṇamAsAviti# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsau|yajatE|havirddhAnIti̍# haviḥ - dhAnI|asmi|iti|sarva̱m|Eva|asya|barqḥiṣya̱m|dattam|Bavati|dEvAḥ|vai|aha̍ḥ|35̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -mEvaiByO# havyaM ~MvahatyEtadvai̍ dEvAnAmAsya̍M̍ ~Myad-daṛśapUrṇamAsau̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAn daṛśapUrṇamAsau̍ yajatE̍ sAkṣAdEva dEvAnAmAsyE̍# juhOtyEṣa vai havirddhAnI̍ yO daṛśapUrṇamAsayAjI̍ sAyaMprAtaragnihOtraM̍ juhOti̍ yajatE̍ daṛśapUrṇamAsA-vaharahaṛ-havirddhAninAṃ̍# sutO ya EvaM ~MvidvAn daṛśapUrṇamAsau̍ yajatE̍ havirddhAnyasmIti̍ sarvamEvAsya̍# baṛhiṣyaM̍ dattaM Bavati̍ dEvAvA aha# - [ ] 35

verses.padam: - Padam yajñiya̱m|na|avindann|tE|daṛqśapUrṇamAsAviti# daṛśa-pUrṇamAsau|apunann|tau|vai|Etau|pUtau|mEddhyau̱|yat|daṛqśapUrṇamAsAviti# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsau|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|daṛqśapUrṇamAsAviti# daṛśa-pUrṇamAsau|yajatE|pUtau|Eva|Enau|mEddhyau̱|yajatE|na|amAvAsyA̍yAmitya̍mA̍ - vAsyAyAm|ca|paurṇamAsyAmiti̍# paurṇa - mAsyAm|ca|striya̱m|upEti|iyAt|yat|upEyAdityu̍pa̍ - iyAt|nirindriya̍ iti niḥ - indriyaḥ|syAt|sOmasya|vai|rAjña̍ḥ|arddhamAsasyEtya̍rddha̍ - mAsasya|rAtra̍yaḥ|patna̍yaḥ|Asann|tAsA̱m|amAvAsyA̍mitya̍mA-vAsyA̱m|ca|paurṇamAsImiti̍# paurṇa-mAsIm|ca|na|upEti|ait|36̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -ryajñiyaM nAvindan̍ tE daṛśapUrṇamAsAva̍punan̍ tau vA Etau pUtau mEddhyau yad-daṛśapUrṇamAsau̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAn daṛśapUrṇamAsau̍ yajatE̍ pUtAvEvainau mEddhyau# yajatE nAmAvAsyA̍yAM̍ ca paurṇamAsyAM ca striya-mupEyAdya-̍ dupEyAnniri̍ndriyaḥ̍ syAt sOmasya̍ vai rAjñO̱&rddhamAsasya rAtrayaḥ̍ patnaya̍ Asan tAsAmamAvAsyA̱M̍ ca paurṇamAsIM ca nOpait - [ ] 36

verses.padam: - Padam tE iti|Enam|aBi|samiti̍|anahyEtAm|tam|yakṣma̍ḥ|ArcCat|rAjA̍nam|yakṣma̍ḥ|Arat|iti̍|tat|rAjayakṣmasyEti̍# rAja - yakṣmasya|janma̍|yat|pApI̍yAn|aBa̍vat|tat|pApayakṣmasyEti̍# pApa - yakṣmasya|yat|jAyAByA̱m|avi̍ndat|tat|jAyEnya̍sya|yaḥ|Evam|EtEṣA̱m|yakṣmA̍ṇAm|janma̍|vEda̍|na|Enam|EtE|yakṣmA̱ḥ|vindanti|saḥ|EtE̍ iti|Eva|namasyann|upEti̍|adhAvat|tE̍ iti|abrUtAm|vara̱m|vRuṇAvahai|Avam|dEvAnA̱m|BAgadhE̍ iti# BAga - dhE|asAva|37 (50)
verses.samhita: tE EnamaBi̍ samanahyEtAM̍ taM ~Myakṣma# ArcCad-rAjAnaM̍ ~Myakṣma# Araditi tad-rAjayakṣmasya̍ janma yat pApIyAnaBa̍vat̍ tat pApayakṣmasya̍ yajjAyAByAmavindat̍ tajjAyEnyasya̍ ya EvamEtEṣAM ~MyakṣmAṇAM̍ janma vEda nainamEtE̍ yakṣmAvindanti̍ sa EtE Eva namasyannupA̍dhAvat̍ tE abrUtAM̍ ~MvaraM̍ ~MvRuṇAvahA AvaM dEvAnA̱M BAgadhE asAvA̍ - [ ] 37

verses.padam: - Padam Avat|adhIti|dEvAḥ|ijyAntai|iti̍|tasmA̱t|sadRuśI̍nAm|rAtrI̍ṇAm|amAvAsyA̍yAmitya̍mA̍ - vAsyAyAm|ca|paurṇamAsyAmiti̍# paurṇa-mAsyAm|ca|dEvAḥ|ijyantE|EtE iti|hi|dEvAnA̱m|BAgadhE̍ iti# BAga - dhE|BAgadhA iti# BAga - dhAḥ|asmai|manuṣyA̱ḥ|Bavanti|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|BUtAni̍|kṣudha̱m|aGnann|sadyaḥ|manuṣyA̱ḥ|arddhamAsa̍ ityarddha̍ - mAsE|dEvAḥ|mAsi|pitaraḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsarE|vanaspatayaḥ|tasmA̱t|aha̍raharityaha̍ḥ̍ - ahaḥ|manuṣyA̱ḥ|aśanam|icCantE|arddhamAsa̍ ityarddha-mAsE|dEvAḥ|ijyantE|mAsi|pitRuBya̍ iti# pitRu - Byaḥ|kriyatE|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsarE|vanaspatayaḥ|Pala̱m̍ ( )|gRuhṇanti|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|hanti̍|kṣudha̱m|BrAtRu̍vyam||38̍ (57) (paśyati - tAByA -maha# - rai - dasAva - Palaṃ# - sapta ca)̍ (A6)
verses.samhita: -vadadhi# dEvA ijyAntA̍ iti tasmA̱th sadRuśInAṃq̍ rAtrIṇAmamAvAsyA̍yAM̍ ca paurṇamAsyAM ca# dEvA ijyanta̍ EtE hi dEvAnA̱M BAgadhE BAgadhA̍ asmai̍ manuṣyA# Bavanti ya EvaM ~MvEda# BUtAni kṣudhamaGnanth̍ sadyO manuṣyA̍# arddhamAsE dEvA mAsi pitaraḥ̍ saM~MvathsarE vanaspataya-stasmA-daha̍raha-rmanuṣyA̍# aśanamicCantE̍ &rddhamAsE dEvA ijyantE̍ mAsi pitRuByaḥ̍ kriyatE saM~MvathsarE vanaspatayaḥ̍ PalaM̍ ( ) gRuhṇanti ya EvaM ~MvEda hanti kṣudhaM BrAtRuvyaM||38̍ (paśyati - tAByA -maha# - rai - dasAva -Palaṃ# -sapta ca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAḥ|vai|na|Ruci|na|yajuṣi|aśrayanta|tE|sAmann̍|Eva|aśrayanta|him|karOti|sAma̍|Eva|akaḥ|him|karOti|yatra̍|Eva|dEvAḥ|aśra̍yanta|tata̍ḥ|Eva|EnAn|prEti̍|yu~gktE|him|karOti|vAcaḥ|Eva|Eṣaḥ|yOga̍ḥ|him|karOti|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|Eva|tat|yajamAnaḥ|sRujatE|triḥ|prathamAm|anviti̍|Aha|triḥ|uttamAmityu̍t̍ - tamAm|yajñasya|Eva|tat|barq.sam|39̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvA vai narci na yajuṣyaśrayanta̍ tE sAmannEvAśra̍yanta̍ hiM karOti̍ sAmaivAkaqrqḥim karOtiyatraivadEvA̍ aśrayanta̍ tata# EvainAn prayu~gktE̍ hiM karOti̍ vAca Evaiṣa yOgO hiM karOti̍ prajA Eva tad-yajamAnaḥ̍ sRujatE triḥ prathamAmanvA̍ha̍ triruttamAM̍ ~Myajñasyaiva tad barq.sam - [ ] 39

verses.padam: - Padam nahyati|aprasraṃsAyEtyapra̍# - sraṃqsAya|saMtatamiti̍ saM - tatam|anviti|Aha|prAṇAnAmiti̍# pra - anAnA̱m|annAdyasyEtyanna̍ - adyasya|saMta̍tyA̍ iti saM - tatyai|athO iti|rakṣa̍sAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa# - hatyai|rAthantarImiti̍ rAtha̱M - tarIm|prathamAm|anviti|Aha|rAtha̍ntara̍ iti rAtha̱M-taraḥ|vai|ayam|lOkaḥ|imam|Eva|lOkam|aBIti|jayati|triḥ|vIti̍|gRuhṇAti|traya̍ḥ|imE|lOkAḥ|imAn|Eva|lOkAn|aBIti̍|jayati|bAṛha̍tIm|uttamAmityu̍t̍ - tamAm|anviti|Aha|bAṛha̍taḥ|vai|asau|lOkaḥ|amum|Eva|lOkam|aBIti̍|jayati|prEti̍|vaḥ|40̍ (50)
verses.samhita: nahyatyapra̍sraṃsAya̍ saMtatamanvA̍ha̍ prAṇAnAmannAdya̍sya̍ saMtatyA̍ athO rakṣasAmapa̍hatyai̍ rAthataMrIM̍ prathamAmanvAha̍ rAthataMrO̍ vA ayaM ~MlOka imamEva lOkamaBi jayati̍ trirvi gRuhṇAti̍ traya# imE lOkA imAnEva lOkAnaBi jayati̍ bAṛhatImuttamA-manvA̍ha̍ bAṛhatO̍ vA asau lOkO&mumEva̍ lOkamaBi jayati̍ pra vO - [ ] 40

verses.padam: - Padam vAjA̱ḥ|iti|ani̍ruktAmityani̍ḥ̍ - uktAm|prAjApatyAmiti# prAjA - patyAm|anviti|Aha|yajñaḥ|vai|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|yajñam|Eva|prajApatimiti̍# prajA-patim|Eti|raBatE|prEti̍|vaḥ|vAjA̱ḥ|iti̍|anviti̍|Aha|anna̱m|vai|vAja̍ḥ|anna̱m|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|prEti̍|vaḥ|vAjA̱ḥ|iti̍|anviti̍|Aha|tasmA̱t|prAcIna̱m|rEta̍ḥ|dhIyatE|agnE̱|Eti̍|yAhi|vItayE̱|iti̍|Aha|tasmA̱t|pratIcI̱ḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|jAyantE|prEti|vaḥ|vAjA̱ḥ|41̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vAjA ityaniruktAM̍ prAjApatyAmanvAha̍ yajñO vai prajApatiryajñamEva̍ prajApatimA̍ raBatE̍ pravO vAjA ityanvAhAnnaM ~Mvai vAjO&nnamEvAva̍# rundhE pravO vAjA ityanvAha̍ tasmA̱t prAcInaṃq rEtO# dhIyatE&gna A yAhi̍ vItaya ityAha̍ tasmA̱t pratIcI̱ḥ prajA jAyantE̍ pravO vAjA - [ ] 41

verses.padam: - Padam iti|anviti̍|Aha|mAsA̱ḥ|vai|vAjA̱ḥ|ad^^rdhamAsA̍ ityad^^rdha̍ - mAsAḥ|aBidyava̍ ityaBi - dyavaḥ|dEvAḥ|haviṣmantaḥ|gauḥ|GRutAcI̱|yajñaḥ|dEvAn|jigAti|yaja̍mAnaḥ|sumnayuriti̍# sumna - yuḥ|idam|asi|idam|asi|iti|Eva|yajñasya̍|priyam|dhAma̍|avEti̍|rundhE|yam|kAmayE̍ta|sarva̱m|Ayu̍ḥ|iyAt|iti̍|prEti̍|vaḥ|vAjA̱ḥ|iti̍|tasya̍|anUcyEtya̍nu̍ - ucya|agnE̱|Eti̍|yAhi|vItayE̱|iti̍|saMta̍tamiti̍ saM - tatam|uttaramityut̍ - taram|ad^^rdharcamityad^^rdha̍ - Rucam|Eti|laBEta|42̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ityanvAha̍ mAsA vai vAjA# arddhamAsA aBidyavO̍ dEvA haviṣmantO̍ gaurGRutAcI# yajñO dEvA~jjigAti̍ yajamAnaḥ̍ sumnayu-ridamasIdamasItyEva̍ yajñasya# priyaM dhAmAva# rundhE yaM kAmayEta̍ sarvamAyuriyAditi̍ pra vO vAjA iti tasyAnUcyAgna A yAhi̍ vItaya iti saMtatamutta̍ra-marddharcamA̍ laBEta̍ - [ ] 42

verses.padam: - Padam prAṇEnEti# pra - anEna|Eva|asya|apAnamitya̍pa̍ - anam|dAdhAra|sarva̱m|Ayuḥ|Eti|yaḥ|vai|aratnim|sAmidhEnInAmiti̍# sAM - idhEnInA̱m|vEda|aratnau|Eva|BrAtRu̍vyam|kurutE|ad^^rdharcAvitya̍d^^rdha̍ - Rucau|samiti|dadhAti|Eṣaḥ|vai|aratniḥ|sAmidhEnInAmiti̍# sAM - idhEnInA̱m|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|aratnau|Eva|BrAtRu̍vyam|kurutE|RuṣEr̍.̍ RuṣErityRuṣE̱ḥ - RuṣEḥ|vai|EtAḥ|nirmitA̍ iti niḥ-mitAḥ|yat|sAmidhEnya# iti# sAM - idhEnyaḥ|tAḥ|yat|asa̍M~MyuktA̍ ityasa̱M - yuktAḥ|syuḥ|prajayEti# pra - jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|yajamAnasya|vIti̍|tiṣṭhErann|ad^^rdharcAvitya̍d^^rdha̍ - Rucau|samiti|dadhAti|samiti̍# ( )|yunakti|Eva|EnAḥ|tAḥ|asmai|saM~MyuktA̍ iti saM - yuktAḥ|avaruddhA̍ ityava# - ruddhAḥ|sarvA̱m|AśiṣamityA̱ - śiṣa̱m|duhrE||43 (60)
verses.samhita: prAṇEnaivAsyApAnaM̍ dAdhAra̍ sarvamAyurEti̍ yO vA aratniṃ̍ sAmidhEnInAM̍ ~MvEdAratnAvEva̍ BrAtRuvyaM̍ kurutE&rddharcau saM dadhAtyEṣa̍ vA aratniḥ̍ sAmidhEnInAM̍ ~Mya EvaM ~MvEdAratnAvEva̍ BrAtRuvyaM̍ kuruta Ruṣaṛ̍ RuṣErvA EtA nirmitA̍ yath sAmidhEnya̍stA̍ yadasaM̍ ~MyuktAḥ syuḥ prajayA# paśuBi ryajamAnasya̍ vi tiṣṭhErannarddharcau̍ saM dadhAti̍ saM ( ) ~MyunaktyEvainAstA̍ asmai̍ saM~MyuktA̍ avaruddhAḥ̍ sarvAmAśiṣa̍M̍ duhrE||43

verses.padam: - Padam ayajñaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yaḥ|asAmA|agnE̱|Eti̍|yAhi|vItayE̱|iti̍|Aha|rathantarasyEti̍# rathaM-tarasya|Eṣaḥ|varṇa̍ḥ|tam|tvA|samidBiriti̍# samit - Biḥ|a~ggiraḥ|iti|Aha|vAmadEvyasyEti̍# vAma - dEvyasya|Eṣaḥ|varṇa̍ḥ|bRuhat|agnE|suvIryamiti̍# su - vIrya̱m|iti|Aha|bRuhataḥ|Eṣaḥ|varṇa̍ḥ|yat|Etam|tRucam|anvAhEtya̍nu̍ - Aha|yajñam|Eva|tat|sAma̍nvantamiti̍ sAmann# - vantam|karOti|agniḥ|amuṣminn|lOkE|AsI̱t|Adityaḥ|asminn|tau|imau|lOkau|aśA̱ntau|44̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ayajñO̍ vA Eṣa yO&sAmA&gna̍ A yAhi̍ vItaya ityAha̍ rathaMtarasyaiṣa varṇastaM tvA# samidBira~ggira̍ ityAha̍ vAmadEvyasyaiṣa varṇO# bRuhadagnE̍ suvIryamityAha̍ bRuhata Eṣa varṇO yadEtaM tRucamanvAha# yajñamEva tath sAmanvantaM̍ karOtyagniramuṣmin̍ ~MlOka AsIdAdityO̱&smin̍ tAvimau lOkAvaśA̱ntA - [ ] 44

verses.padam: - Padam AstAm|tE|dEvAḥ|abruvann|Eti|ita|imau|vi|parIti̍|UhAma|iti̍|agnE̱|Eti̍|yAhi|vItayE̱|iti̍|asminn|lOkE|agnim|adadhuḥ|bRuhat|agnE|suvIryamiti̍# su - vIrya̱m|iti|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|Adityam|tata̍ḥ|vai|imau|lOkau|aśAmyatAm|yat|Evam|anvAhEtya̍nu̍ - Aha|anayO̱ḥ|lOkayO̱ḥ|śAntyai̱|śAmya̍taḥ|asmai|imau|lOkau|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|pa~jca̍daśEti̍ pa~jca# - daśa|sAmidhEnIriti# sAM - idhEnIḥ|anviti|Aha|pa~jca̍daśEti̍ pa~jca# - daśa|45 (50)
verses.samhita: vAstAM tE dEvA abruvannEtEmau̍ vi paryUhAmEtyagna̍ A yAhi̍ vItaya ityasmin ~MlOkE̱&gnimadadhu̍ rbRuhadagnE̍ suvIryamityamuṣmin̍ ~MlOka AdityaM̍ tatO vA imau lOkAvaśAmyatAM̍ ~MyadEvamanvAhAnayO̱ rlOkayOḥ śAntyai śAmyatO&smA̍ imau lOkau ya EvaM ~MvEda pa~jcadaśa̍ sAmidhEnIranvAha̍ pa~jcadaśa̍ - [ ] 45

verses.padam: - Padam vai|arddhamAsasyEtyarddha̍ - mAsasya|rAtra̍yaḥ|arddhamAsaśa̍ ityarddhamAsa̍ - śaḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|ApyatE|tAsA̱m|trIṇi|ca|śatAni̍|ṣaṣṭiḥ|ca|akṣarA̍ṇi|tAva̍tIḥ|saM~MvathsarasyEti̍# saM - vathsarasya|rAtra̍yaḥ|akṣaraśa̍ ityakṣara-śaḥ|Eva|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM - vathsaram|ApnOti|nRumEdha iti# nRu - mEdhaḥ|ca|paru̍cCEpaḥ|ca|brahmavAdyamiti̍# brahma - vAdya̱m|avadEtAm|asminn|dArau̱|ArdrE|agnim|janayAva|yataraḥ|nau|brahmIyAn|iti̍|nRumEdha̍ iti# nRu - mEdhaḥ|aBIti̍|avadat|saḥ|dhUmam|ajanayat|paru̍cCEpaḥ|aBIti̍|avadat|saḥ|agnim|ajanayat|RuṣE̱|iti̍|abravIt|46̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vA arddhamAsasya̍ rAtrayO&rddhamAsaśaḥ̍ saM~Mvathsara̍ A̱pyatE tAsAM trIṇi# ca śatAni# ṣaṣṭiścAkṣarAṇi̍ tAvatIḥ̍ saM~Mvathsarasya rAtrayO&kṣaraśa̍ Eva saM~MvathsaramA̱pnOti̍ nRumEdhaśca̍ parucCEpaśca̍ brahmavAdyamavadEtAmasmin̍ dArAvArdrE̱&gniM̍ janayAva̍ yatarO nau brahmIyAniti̍# nRumEdhO&Byavadath̍ sa dhUmamajanayat̍ parucCEpO̍ &Byavadath̍ sO̱&gnimajanayadRuṣa̍ ityabravId-̍ [ ] 46

verses.padam: - Padam yat|samAvat|vidva|kathA|tvam|agnim|ajI̍janaḥ|na|aham|iti̍|sAmidhEnInAmiti̍# sAM - idhEnInA̱m|Eva|aham|varṇa̱m|vEda|iti|abravIt|yat|GRutavaditi̍# GRuta-vat|padam|anUcyata ityanu̍ - ucyatE̱|saḥ|AsAm|varṇaḥ|tam|tvA|samidBiriti̍# samit - Biḥ|a~ggiraḥ|iti|Aha|sAmidhEnIṣviti̍# sAM - idhEnIṣu|Eva|tat|jyOti̍ḥ|janayati|striya̍ḥ|tEna̍|yat|Ruca̍ḥ|striya̍ḥ|tEna̍|yat|gAyatriya̍ḥ|striya̍ḥ|tEna̍|yat|sAmidhEnya̍# iti# sAM - idhEnyaḥ|vRuṣa̍ṇvatImiti̍ vRuṣaṇ# - vatIm|anviti|Aha|47̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yath samAvadvidva̍ kathA tvamagnimajIjanO̍ nAhamiti# sAmidhEnInAmEvAhaM̍ ~MvarṇaM̍ ~MvEdEtyabravIdyad̍ GRutavat̍ padamanUcyatE̍ sa AsAM̍ ~MvarṇastaM tvA# samidBira~ggira̍ ityAha̍ sAmidhEnIṣvEva tajjyOti# rjanayati striyastEna yadRucaḥ striyastEna yad-gAyatriyaḥ̍ striyastEna yath sAmidhEnyO̍# vRuṣaṇvatI-manvA̍ha̍ - [ ] 47

verses.padam: - Padam tEna|puṅsva̍tIḥ|tEna̍|sEndrA̍ iti sa - indrAḥ|tEna|mithunAḥ|agniḥ|dEvAnA̱m|dUtaḥ|AsI̱t|uśanA̱|kAvyaḥ|asu̍rAṇAm|tau|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA - patim|praśnam|aitAm|saḥ|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|agnim|dUtam|vRuṇImahE|iti|aBIti̍|paryAva̍rtatEti̍# pari - Avartata|tata̍ḥ|dEvAḥ|aBa̍vann|parEti̍|asu̍rAḥ|yasya̍|Evam|viduṣa̍ḥ|agnim|dUtam|vRuṇImahE|iti̍|anvAhEtya̍nu̍ - Aha|Bava̍ti|AtmanA̱|parEti̍|asya|BrAtRu̍vyaḥ|Bavati|addhvarava̍tImitya̍ddhvara-vatIm|anvati̍|Aha|BrAtRu̍vyam|Eva|EtayA̱|48̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tEna puṅsvatIstEna̍ sEndrAstEna# mithunA agnirdEvAnA̱M dUta AsIduśanA̍# kAvyO&surAṇAM̍ tau prajApatiM̍ praśnamaitAṃq̍ sa prajApatiragniM̍ dUtaM ~MvRuṇImaha̍ ityaBi paryAvartata̍ tatO# dEvA aBavan̍ parA&surA̍ yasyaivaM ~MviduṣO&gniM dUtaM ~MvRuṇImaha̍ ityanvAha BavatyAtmanA̍ parA̱&sya BrAtRuvyO̍ BavatyaddhvaravatImanvA̍ha̍ BrAtRuvyamEvaitayA̱̍ - [ ] 48

verses.padam: - Padam dhvarati|śOciṣkEśa̍ iti# śOciḥ - kEśaḥ|tam|ImahE|iti|Aha|pavitra̱m|Eva|Etat|yaja̍mAnam|Eva|EtayA̱|pavayati|sami̍ddha̍ iti saM - iddhaḥ|agnE|AhutEtyA̱ - huta|iti|Aha|paridhimiti̍# pari - dhim|Eva|Etam|parIti|dadhAti|aska̍ndAya|yat|ata̍ḥ|Ud^^rdhvam|aByAdaddhyAditya̍Bi̍ - AdaddhyAt|yathA̱|bahiḥ paridhIti# bahiḥ - paridhi|skandati|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|traya̍ḥ|vai|agnaya̍ḥ|havyavAha̍na̍ iti# havya - vAhanaḥ|dEvAnA̱m|kavyavAha̍na̍ iti# kavya - vAhanaḥ|pitRuṇAm|sahara̍kṣA̍ iti# saha - rakṣAḥ|asurAṇAm|tE|Etaṛhi̍|Eti̍|śaṃqsantE|mAm|variṣyatE|mAm|49̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dhvarati śOciṣkEśastamI̍maha̍ ityAha̍ pavitramEvaitad-yaja̍mAnamEvaitayA̍# pavayati samiddhO̍ agna AhutEtyAha̍ paridhimEvaitaM pari# dadhAtyaskandAya̍ yadata# UrddhvamaByAdaddhyAdyathA̍# bahiḥ paridhi skandati̍ tAdRugEva tat trayO vA agnayO# havyavAhanO̍ dEvAnA̱M kavyavAhanaḥ̍ pitRuṇAṃ saharakṣA̍ asurAṇAM̍ ta EtarhyA śaṃsantE̍ mAM ~MvariṣyatE̍ mA - [ ] 49

verses.padam: - Padam iti|vRuṇIddhvam|havyavAha̍namiti̍# havya - vAhanam|iti̍|Aha|yaḥ|Eva|dEvAnA̱m|tam|vRuṇItE|Ara.ṣEyam|vRuṇItE|bandhO̱ḥ|Eva|na|Eti|athO̍ iti|saMta̍tyA̍ iti saM - tatyai|parastA̱t|arvAcaḥ|vRuṇItE|tasmA̱t|parastA̱t|arvA~jca̍ḥ|manuṣyAn̍|pitara̍ḥ|anu̍|prEti̍|pipatE||50̍ (29) (aśA̱ntA - vAha pa~jcadaśA̍ - bravI - danvAhai̍ - tayA# - variṣyatE mA - mEkAnnatriṃqśacca)̍ (A8)
verses.samhita: -miti# vRuṇIddhvaṃ havyavAha̍namityA̍ha̍ ya Eva dEvAnAM taM ~MvRuṇIta̍ AṛṣEyaM ~MvRuṇItE̍ bandhOrEva̍ naityathO saMtatyai̍ parastAdarvAcO̍# vRuṇItE tasmA̱t parastAdarvA~jcO̍# manuṣyA̱n pitarO&nu pra pipatE||50̍ (aśA̱ntA - vAha pa~jcadaśA̍ - bravI - danvAhai̍ - tayA# - variṣyatE mA - mEkAnnatriṃqśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam agnE̱|mahAn|asi|iti|Aha|mahAn|hi|Eṣaḥ|yat|agniḥ|brAhmaṇa|iti̍|Aha|brAhmaṇaḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|BArata|iti̍|Aha|Eṣaḥ|hi|dEvEBya̍ḥ|havyam|Bara̍ti|dEvEddha̍ iti# dEva - iddhaḥ|iti|Aha|dEvAḥ|hi|Etam|aindha̍ta|manvi̍ddha̍ iti manu# - iddhaḥ|iti|Aha|manu̍ḥ|hi|Etam|utta̍ra̍ ityut - taraḥ|dEvEByaḥ|aindha̍|Ruṣi̍ṣṭuta̍ ityRuṣi# - stutaḥ|iti|Aha|Ruṣa̍yaḥ|hi|Etam|astu̍vann|viprA̍numadita̍ iti vipra# - anumaditaḥ|iti|Aha|51̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agnE# mahAṃ asItyAha̍ mahAn. hyEṣa̍ yadagni rbrA̱hmaṇEtyAha̍ brAhmaṇO hyEṣa̍ BAratEtyA̍haiṣa̍ hi dEvEByO# havyaM Barati̍ dEvEddha ityAha̍ dEvA hyEtamaindha̍ta̍ manviddha̍ ityAha̍ manurhyEtamutta̍rO̍ dEvEBya aindhaṛṣiṣṭuta̍ ityAhaṛṣayO̍ hyEtamastu̍van̍ viprAnumadita̍ ityAha̍ - [ ] 51

verses.padam: - Padam viprA̱ḥ|hi|EtE|yat|śuśruvAṃsaḥ|kaviśasta̍ iti# kavi - śastaḥ|iti|Aha|kavaya̍ḥ|hi|EtE|yat|śuśruvAṃsa̍ḥ|brahma̍saṃśita̍ iti brahma# - saṃqśitaḥ|iti|Aha|brahma̍saṃśita̍ iti brahma# - saṃqśitaḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|GRutAhavana̍ iti# GRuta - Ahavanaḥ|iti|Aha|GRutAhutiriti̍# GRuta-Ahutiḥ|hi|asya|priyatamEti# priya - tamA|praṇIriti# pra - nIḥ|yajñAnA̱m|iti|Aha|praṇIriti̍# pra-nIḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|yajñAnA̱m|rathIḥ|addhvarAṇA̱m|iti|Aha|Eṣaḥ|hi|dEvaratha̍ iti# dEva - rathaḥ|atUrtaḥ|hOtA̱|iti̍|Aha|na|hi|Etam|kaḥ|cana|52̍ (50)
verses.samhita: viprA hyEtE̍ yacCuśruvAṃsa̍ḥ̍ kaviśasta ityAha̍ kavayO hyEtE̍ yacCuśruvAṃsO̍ brahmasaṃśita̍ ityAha̍ brahmasaṃśitO̍ hyEṣa̍ GRutAhavana̍ ityAha̍ GRutAhutirhyasya̍ priyatamA̍ praṇIryajñAnAmityAha̍ praṇIrhyEṣa̍ yajñAnAṃ# rathIraddhvarAṇAmityA̍haiṣa̍ hi dEvarathO̍&tUrtO̍ hOtEtyAha̍ na hyEtaM̍ kaścana - [ ] 52

verses.padam: - Padam tarati|tUrṇi̍ḥ|havyavAḍiti̍# havya - vAṭ|iti|Aha|sarva̱m|hi|Eṣaḥ|tara̍ti|AspAtra̱m|juhUḥ|dEvAnA̱m|iti̍|Aha|juhUḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|dEvAnA̱m|camasaḥ|dEvapAna̍ iti# dEva - pAnaḥ|iti̍|Aha|camasaḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|dEvapAna̍ iti# dEva - pAnaḥ|arAn|iva|agnE|nEmiḥ|dEvAn|tvam|pariBUriti̍# pari-BUḥ|asi|iti|Aha|dEvAn|hi|Eṣaḥ|pariBUriti̍# pari - BUḥ|yat|brUyAt|Eti|vaha|dEvAn|dEvayata̍ iti# dEva - yatE|yajamAnAya|iti̍|BrAtRu̍vyam|asmai|53̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tarati̍ tUrṇiṛ̍ havyavAḍityAha̍ sarvaṅqhyEṣa̍ taratyAspAtraM̍ juhUrdEvAnAmityAha̍ juhUrhyEṣa̍ dEvAnA̱M camasO dEvapAna̍ ityAha̍ camasO hyEṣa̍ dEvapAnO&rAṃ̍ ivAgnE̍ nEmirdEvAṅstvaM pariBUrasItyA̍ha̍ dEvAn hyEṣa̍ pariBUryad-brUyAdA̍ vaha̍ dEvAn dEvayatE̍ yajamAnAyEti̍ BrAtRuvyamasmai-̍ [ ] 53

verses.padam: - Padam janayEt|Eti|vaha|dEvAn|yaja̍mAnAya|iti̍|Aha|yaja̍mAnam|Eva|EtEna̍|vad^^rdhayati|agnim|agnE|Eti̍|vaha|sOma̱m|Eti̍|vaha|iti̍|Aha|dEvatA̱ḥ|Eva|tat|yathApUrvamiti̍# yathA - pUrvam|upEti|hvayatE|Eti̍|ca|agnE|dEvAn|vaha̍|suyajEti̍# su - yajA̱|ca|yaja|jAtavEda iti# jAta-vEdaḥ|iti|Aha|agnim|Eva|tat|samiti̍|śyati|saḥ|asya|saṃśi̍ta̍ iti saM - śitaḥ|dEvEByaḥ|havyam|vahati|agniḥ|hOtA̱|54̍ (50)
verses.samhita: janayEdA vaha̍ dEvAn. yajamAnAyEtyA̍ha̍ yajamAnamEvaitEna̍# varddhayatyagnimagna̍ A vaha̍ sOmamA vahEtyAha̍ dEvatA# Eva tad-yathApUrvamupa̍# hvayata A cA̱gnE dEvAn. vaha# suyajA# ca yaja jAtavEda ityAhAgnimEva̍ tath saṅ śyati̍ sO̱&sya saṃśitO̍ dEvEByO# havyaM ~Mvahatyagniṛ̍ hOtE - [ ] 54

verses.padam: - Padam iti|Aha|agniḥ|vai|dEvAnA̱m|hOtA̱|yaḥ|Eva|dEvAnA̱m|hOtA̱|tam|vRuṇItE|smaḥ|vayam|iti̍|Aha|AtmAna̱m|Eva|sattvamiti̍# sat - tvam|gamayati|sAdhu|tE|yajamAna|dEvatA̱|iti|Aha|AśiṣamityA̱̍ - śiṣa̱m|Eva|EtAm|Eti|śAstE|yat|brUyAt|yaḥ|agnim|hOtA̍ram|avRu̍thAḥ|iti̍|agninA̱|uBayata̍ḥ|yaja̍mAnam|parIti̍|gRuhṇIyAt|pramAyu̍ka̍ iti# pra - mAyukaḥ|syAt|yajamAnadEvatyEti̍# yajamAna - dEvatyA̱|vai|juhUḥ|BrAtRuvyadEvatyEti# BrAtRuvya - dEvatyA̱|upaBRudityupa̍ - BRut|55 (50)
verses.samhita: -tyAhAgnirvai̍ dEvAnAṃq hOtA ya Eva dEvAnAṃq hOtA taM ~MvRuṇItEsmO̍ vayamityAhA&&tmAna̍mEva̍ sattvaM gamayati̍ sAdhu tE# yajamAna dEvatEtyAhA&&śiṣa̍mEvaitAmA̍ śA̱stE yadbrUyAd-yO̱&gniṃ hOtAramavRu̍thA̍ ityagninOBayatO̍ yajamAnaM̍ pari# gRuhṇIyAt pramAyukaḥ̍ syAd-yajamAnadEvatyA# vai juhUrBrAtRuvya̍ dEvatyOpaBRud̍ - [ ] 55

verses.padam: - Padam yat|dvE iti|iva|brUyAt|BrAtRu̍vyam|asmai|janayEt|GRutava̍tImiti̍# GRuta - vatIm|addhvaryO iti|sruca̱m|Eti̍|asyasva|iti̍|Aha|yaja̍mAnam|Eva|EtEna̍|vad^^rdhayati|dEvAyuvamiti̍# dEva - yuva̱m|iti|Aha|dEvAn|hi|EṣA|ava̍ti|viśvavA̍rAmiti̍# viśva-vArAm|iti|Aha|viśva̱m|hi|EṣA|ava̍ti|IḍA̍mahai|dEvAn|IḍEnyAn̍|namasyAma̍|namasyAn̍|yajA̍ma|yajñiyAn̍|iti̍|Aha|manuṣyA̱ḥ|vai|IḍEnyA̱ḥ|pitara̍ḥ|namasyA̱ḥ|dEvAḥ|yajñiyA̱ḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|Eva̍ ( )|tat|yathABAgamiti# yathA - BAgam|yajati||56 (53)
verses.samhita: yad-dvE iva̍ brUyAd BrAtRuvyamasmai̍ janayEd GRutavatImaddhvaryO̍ srucamA&syasvEtyAha̍ yajamAna̍ mEvaitEna# varddhayati dEvAyuvamityAha̍ dEvAn. hyEṣA&va̍ti̍ viśvavArAmityA̍ha̍ viśvaṅq hyEṣA&vatIḍA̍mahai̍ dEvAṃ IḍEnyA̱nnamasyAma# namasyAn# yajAma̍ yajñiyAnityAhamanuṣyA̍# vA IḍEnyA̱ḥ pitarO# namasyA# dEvA yajñiyA# dEvatA# Eva ( ) tad-yathABAgaM̍ ~Myajati||56̍

verses.padam: - Padam trIn|tRucAn|anviti|brUyAt|rAjanya̍sya|traya̍ḥ|vai|anyE|rAjanyA̱t|puru̍ṣAḥ|brAhmaṇaḥ|vaiśya̍ḥ|śUdraḥ|tAn|Eva|asmai|anu̍kAnityanu̍# - kAn|karOti|pa~jcadaśEti̍ pa~jca# - daśa|anviti|brUyAt|rAjanya̍sya|pa~jcadaśa̍ iti# pa~jca-daśaḥ|vai|rAjanyaḥ|svE|Eva|Enam|stOmE̱|pratIti̍|sthApayati|triṣṭuBA̱|parIti̍|daddhyAt|indriyam|vai|triṣṭuk|indriyakA̍ma̍ itI̱ndriya - kAmaḥ|Kalu|vai|rAjanya̍ḥ|yajatE|triṣṭuBA̱|Eva|asmai|indriyam|parIti̍|gRuhṇAti|yadi̍|kAmayE̍ta|57̍ (50)
verses.samhita: trIṅstRucAnanu# brUyAd-rAjanyasya̍ trayO vA anyE rAjanyA̱t̍ puruṣA̍ brAhmaṇO vaiśyaḥ̍ śUdrastAnEvAsmA anukAn̍ karOti pa~jcadaśAnu̍# brUyAd-rAjanyasya̍ pa~jcadaśO vai rAjanya̍ḥ̍ sva Evainaṅq stOmE pratiṣṭhApayati̍ triṣṭuBA pari# daddhyAdindriyaM ~Mvai triṣṭugindriyakA̍maḥ̍ Kalu vai rAjanyO̍# yajatE triṣṭuBaivAsmA# indriyaM pari# gRuhṇAti yadi# kAmayEta-̍ [ ] 57

verses.padam: - Padam brahmavarcasamiti# brahma-varcasam|astu|iti|gAyatriyA|parIti̍|daddhyAt|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|vai|gAyatrI|brahmavarcasamiti# brahma - varcasam|Eva|Bavati|saptadaśEti# sapta - daśa|anviti|brUyAt|vaiśya̍sya|saptadaśa̍ iti# sapta - daśaḥ|vai|vaiśyaḥ|svE|Eva|Enam|stOmE̱|pratIti̍|sthApayati|jaga̍tyA|parIti̍|daddhyAt|jAga̍tAḥ|vai|paśava̍ḥ|paśukA̍ma̍ iti# paśu - kAmaḥ|Kalu|vai|vaiśya̍ḥ|yajatE|jaga̍tyA|Eva|asmai|paśUn|parIti̍|gRuhṇAti|Eka̍viṃśatimityEka̍# - viṃqśatim|anviti|brUyAt|pratiṣṭhAkA̍masyEti̍# pratiṣṭhA - kAmasya|Ekaviṃqśa ityEka-viṃqśaḥ|stOmA̍nAm|pratiṣṭhEti̍# prati - sthA|pratiṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|58 (50)
verses.samhita: brahmavarcasamastviti# gAyatriyA pari# daddhyAd-brahmavarcasaM ~Mvai gAyatrI̍ brahmavarcasamEva̍ Bavati̍ saptadaśAnu# brUyAd-vaiśyasya̍ saptadaśO vai vaiśyaḥ sva Evainaṅq stOmE prati# ṣṭhApayatijagatyA̍ pari# daddhyAjjAgatA̍ vai paśavaḥ̍ paśukAmaḥ̍ Kalu vai vaiśyO# yajatE jagatyaivAsmai̍# paśUn pari# gRuhṇAtyE kaviṃ̍ śatimanu# brUyAt pratiṣṭhAkAmasyai̍ kaviṃqśaḥ stOmAnAM̍ pratiṣṭhA pratiṣṭhityai̍ - [ ] 58

verses.padam: - Padam caturviṃśatimiti̍ catuḥ̍ - viṃqśatim|anviti|brUyAt|brahmavarcasakA̍masyEti̍# brahmavarcasa - kAmasya|caturviṃśatyakṣarEti̍ caturviṃśati̍ - akṣarA|gAyatrI|gAyatrI|brahmavarcasamiti# brahma - varcasam|gAyatriyA|Eva|asmai|brahmavarcasamiti# brahma - varcasam|avEti|rundhE|triṃqśata̱m|anviti̍|brUyAt|anna̍kAmasyEtyanna̍# - kAmasya|triṃqśadakṣarEti̍# triṃqśat - akṣarA|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|anna̱m|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjEti# vi - rAjA̱|Eva|asmai|annAdyamityanna̍ - adya̱m|avEti|rundhE|dvAtriṃ̍śatam|anviti̍|brUyAt|pratiṣṭhAkA̍masyEti̍# pratiṣṭhA - kAmasya|dvAtriṃśadakṣarEti̍ dvAtriṃśat̍ - akṣarA|anuṣṭugityanu̍ - stuk|anuṣṭubityanu̍ - stup|CandasAm|pratiṣṭhEti̍# prati - sthA|pratiṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|ṣaṭtriṃśatamiti̍ ṣaṭ-triṃqśatam|anviti|brUyAt|paśukA̍masyEti̍# paśu - kAmasya|ṣaṭtriṃśadakṣarEti̍ ṣaṭtriṃśat̍ - akṣarA|bRuhatI|bAṛhatAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|bRuhatyA|Eva|asmai|paśUn|59̍ (50)
verses.samhita: caturviṃśatimanu̍# brUyAd-brahmavarcasa-kAmasya̍ caturviṃśatyakṣarA̍ gAyatrI gAyatrI̍ brahmavarcasaM̍ gAyatriyaivAsmai̱̍ brahmavarcasamava# rundhE triṃqśatamanu# brUyAdannakAmasya̍ triṃqśadakṣarA̍ virAḍannaM̍ ~MvirAḍ virAjaivAsmA# annAdyamava# rundhE dvAtriṃśatamanu̍# brUyAt pratiṣṭhAkAmasya̍ dvAtriṃśadakṣarA̍ &nuṣṭuganuṣṭup̍ CandasAM̍ pratiṣṭhA pratiṣṭhityai̍ ṣaṭtriṃśatamanu̍# brUyAt paśukAmasya̍ ṣaṭtriṃśadakṣarA̍ bRuhatI bAṛhatAḥ̍ paśavO# bRuhatyaivAsmai# paśU - [ ] 59

verses.padam: - Padam avEti|rundhE|catu̍ścatvAriṃśatamiti̍ catuḥ̍ - catvAriṃqśatam|anviti|brUyAt|indriyakA̍masyEtI̱ndriya̍ - kAmasya|catuścatvAriṃśadakṣarEti̍ catuścatvAriṃśat̍ - akṣarA|triṣṭuk|indriyam|triṣṭup|triṣṭuBA̱|Eva|asmai|indriyam|avEti|rundhE|aṣṭAca̍tvAriṃśatamityaṣṭA̍ - catvAriṃqśatam|anviti|brUyAt|paśukA̍masyEti̍# paśu - kAmasya|aṣṭAcatvAriṃśadakṣarEtyaṣṭAca̍tvAriṃśat̍ - akṣarA|jagatI|jAga̍tAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|jaga̍tyA|Eva|asmai|paśUn|avEti̍|rundhE|sarvA̍ṇi|CandAṃ̍si|anviti̍|brUyAt|bahuyAjina̍ iti# bahu - yAjinaḥ|sarvA̍ṇi|vai|Etasya̍|CandAṃ̍si|ava̍ruddhAnItyava̍# - ruddhAni|yaḥ|bahuyAjIti# bahu - yAjI|aparimitamityapa̍ri̍ - mitam|anviti|brUyAt|apa̍rimitasyEtyapa̍ri̍ - mitasya|avaruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai||60 (47) (kAmayEta̍ - pratiṣṭhityai̍ - paśUnth - saptacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A10)
verses.samhita: -nava# rundhE catuścatvAriṃśatamanu̍# brUyAdindriyakAmasya̍ catuścatvAriṃśadakṣarA̍ triṣṭugindriyaM̍ triṣṭup triṣṭuBaivAsmA# indriyamava# rundhE &ṣṭAcatvAriṃ̍ śatamanu# brUyAt paśukAmasyAṣṭAca̍tvAriṃśadakṣarA̍ jagatI̍ jAgatAḥ̍ paśavOjagatyaivAsmai̍# paśUnava# rundhE sarvAṇi̍ CandAṅq syanu# brUyAd-bahuyAjinaḥ sarvAṇi̍ vA Etasya CandAṅqsya varuddhAni̍ yO bahuyAjyapa̍rimitamanu̍# brUyAdaparimitasyA̍ varudhyai||60̍ (kAmayEta̍ - pratiṣṭhityai̍ - paśUnth - saptacatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam nivItamiti̍ ni - vItam|manuṣyAṇAm|prAcInAvItamiti̍# prAcIna - AvItam|pitRuṇAm|upavItamityupa̍# - vItam|dEvAnA̱m|upEti|vyayatE|dEvalakṣmamiti̍# dEva - lakṣmam|Eva|tat|kurutE|tiṣṭhann|anviti̍|Aha|tiṣṭhann̍|hi|Aśru̍tataramityAśru̍ta̍ - taram|vadati|tiṣṭhann̍|anviti̍|Aha|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|aBiji̍tyA̍ ityaBi - jityai|AsInaḥ|yajati|asminn|Eva|lOkE|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|yat|krau~jcam|anvAhEtya̍nu-Aha̍|Asuram|tat|yat|mandram|mAnuṣam|tat|yat|antarA|tat|sadE̍vamiti̍ sa - dEvam|antarA|anUcyamityanu̍ - ucya̱m|sadEvatvAyEti# sadEva - tvAya|vidvAṃsa̍ḥ|vai|61̍ (50)
verses.samhita: nivItaM̍ manuṣyAṇAM̍ prAcInAvItaM pitRuṇAmupa̍vItaM̍ dEvAnAmupa# vyayatE dEvalakṣmamEva tat kurutE̍ tiṣṭhannanvAha̍ tiṣṭhana. hyAśrutataraM̍ ~Mvadati̍ tiṣṭhannanvAha̍ suvargasya# lOkasyABijityA̍ AsInO̍ yajatyasminnEva lOkE pratitiṣṭhati̍ yat krau~jcamanvAhA&&suraM̍ tad-yanmandraM mAnuṣaM̍ tadyadantarA̍ tath sadEvamantarA&nUcyaṃ̍# sadEvatvAya# vidvAṃsO vai - [ ] 61

verses.padam: - Padam purA|hOtAraḥ|aBUvann|tasmA̱t|vidhRu̍tA̍ iti vi - dhRutAḥ|addhvAnaḥ|aBU̍vann|na|panthA̍naḥ|samiti̍|arukṣann|antarvEdItya̍ntaḥ̍ - vEdi|anyaḥ|pAdaḥ|Bava̍ti|bahirvEdIti̍# bahiḥ - vEdi|anyaḥ|atha|anviti̍|Aha|addhva̍nAm|vidhRu̍tyA̍ iti vi - dhRutyai|pathAm|asaṃrOhAyEtyasa̱M̍ - rOhAya|athO iti|BUtam|ca|Eva|Baviṣyat|ca|avEti̍|rundhE|athO̍ iti|pari̍mitamiti̍ pari# - mitam|ca|Eva|aparimitamityapa̍ri̍ - mitam|ca|avEti|rundhE|athO̍ iti|grAmyAn|ca|Eva|paśUn|AraṇyAn|ca|avEti̍|rundhE|athO̍ iti|62̍ (50)
verses.samhita: purA hOtArO&BUvan̍ tasmAd-vidhRutA̍ addhvAnO&BUvan̍ na panthAnaḥ̍ samarukṣannantarvEdya̍nyaḥ̍ pAdO Bavati̍ bahirvEdyanyO&thAnvAhAddhva̍nAM̍ ~MvidhRutyai̍ pathAmasaṃ# rOhAyAthO# BUtaMcaiva BaviṣyaccAva̍# rundhE&thO parimitaM̍ caivAparimitaM̍ cAva# rundhE&thO̱ grAmyAṅścaiva paśUnAraṇyAṅścAva̍# rundhE&thO# - [ ] 62

verses.padam: - Padam dEvalOkamiti# dEva - lOkam|ca|Eva|manuṣyalOkamiti# manuṣya - lOkam|ca|aBIti|jayati|dEvAḥ|vai|sAmidhEnIriti̍# sAM - idhEnIḥ|anUcyEtyanu̍ - ucya|yajñam|na|anviti̍|apaśyann|saḥ|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|tUṣṇIm|AGAramityA̱-GAram|Eti|aGArayat|tata̍ḥ|vai|dEvAḥ|yajñam|anviti̍|apaśyann|yat|tUṣṇIm|AGAramityA̱̍ - GAram|AGArayatItyA̱ - GArayati|yajñasya̍|anu̍KyAtyA̍ ityanu# - KyAtyai|athO iti|sAmidhEnIriti̍# sAM - idhEnIḥ|Eva|aBIti|anakti|alU̱kṣaḥ|Bavati|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|athO̍ iti|tarpaya̍ti|Eva|EnAḥ|tRupya̍ti|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|63 (50)
verses.samhita: dEvalOkaM caiva manuṣya̍ lOkaM cABi jayati̍ dEvA vai sAmidhEnIranUcya̍# yajñaM nAnvapaśyanthsa̍ prajApatistUṣṇI-mA̍GAramA̍ &GArayat̍ tatO vai dEvA yajñamanvapaśyanq.̍ yat tUṣṇImAGAra-mA̍GAraya̍ti̍ yajñasyAnuKyAtyA̍ athO# sAmidhEnIrEvABya-naktyalU̱kṣO̍ Bavati ya EvaM ~MvEdAthO# tarpayatyEvainA-stRupya̍ti̍ prajayA# paśuBi - [ ] 63

verses.padam: - Padam yaḥ|Evam|vEda|yat|Eka̍yA|AGArayEdityA̱̍ - GArayE̱t|EkA̱m|prIṇIyAt|yat|dvAByA̱m|dvE iti|prIṇIyAt|yat|tisRuBiriti̍# tisRu - Biḥ|atIti|tat|rEcayEt|mana̍sA|Eti̍|GArayati|mana̍sA|hi|anA̱ptam|ApyatE̱|tirya~jca̱m|Eti̍|GArayati|aCa̍baMṭkAramityaCa̍baMṭ̍ - kAram|vAk|ca|manaḥ|ca|ArtIyEtAm|aham|dEvEBya̍ḥ|havyam|vahAmi|iti̍|vAk|abravIt|aham|dEvEBya̍ḥ|iti̍|mana̍ḥ|tau|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA - patim|praśnam|aitAm|saḥ|abravIt|64 (50)
verses.samhita: -rya EvaM ~MvEda yadEkayA̍ &&GArayEdEkA̱M prIṇIyAdyad dvAByAM dvE prIṇIyAdyad̍ tisRuBirati tadrEcayEtmanasA̍ &&GArayati̍ manasA̍ hyanA̱ptamApyatE# tirya~jcamA GArayatyaCa̍mbaṭkAraM̍ ~MvAk ca manaścA̍ &&rtIyEtAmahaM dEvEByO# havyaM ~MvahAmIti̍ vAgabravIdahaM̍ dEvEBya iti manastau prajApatiM̍ praśnamaitAṃq̍ sO̱&bravIt - [ ] 64

verses.padam: - Padam prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|dUtIḥ|Eva|tvam|manasaḥ|asi|yat|hi|mana̍sA|dhyAya̍ti|tat|vAcA|vada̍ti|iti̍|tat|Kalu̍|tuBya̱m|na|vAcA|juhavann|iti̍|abravIt|tasmA̱t|mana̍sA|prajApa̍taya̍ iti# prajA - patayE|juhvati|manaḥ|iva|hi|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajApatEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|Aptyai̱|paridhIniti# pari - dhIn|samiti|mArṣṭi|punAti̍|Eva|EnAn|triḥ|maddhyamam|traya̍ḥ|vai|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|prAṇAniti# pra - anAn|Eva|aBiti|jayati|triḥ|dakṣiṇAd^^rdhya̍miti̍# dakṣiṇa - ad^^rdhya̱m|trayaḥ|65̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prajApatirdUtIrEva̍ tvaM manasO&si̍ yaddhi manasA̍ dhyAyati̍ tadvAcA vadatIti tat Kalu tuByaM na vAcA juhavannitya̍bravIt̍ tasmAnmanasA̍ prajApatayE̍ juhvatimana# iva hi prajApatiḥ̍ prajApatErAptyai̍# paridhInthsaM mA̱rṣṭi punAtyEvainAn^^trirmaddhyamaM̍ trayO vai prAṇAḥ prAṇAnEvABi jayati̍ trirdakṣiṇArddhyaM̍# traya# - [ ] 65

verses.padam: - Padam imE|lOkAḥ|imAn|Eva|lOkAn|aBIti|jayati|triḥ|uttarAd^^rdhya̍mityu̍ttara̍ - ad^^rdhya̱m|trayaḥ|vai|dEvayAnA̍ iti# dEva - yAnA̱ḥ|panthAnaḥ|tAn|Eva|aBIti̍|jayati|triḥ|upEti̍|vAjayati|traya̍ḥ|vai|dEvalOkA̍ iti# dEva - lOkAḥ|dEvalOkAniti# dEva - lOkAn|Eva|aBIti|jayati|dvAda̍śa|samiti̍|padyantE|dvAda̍śa|mAsA̱ḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM - vathsaram|Eva|prIṇAti|athO iti|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM - vathsaram|Eva|asmai|upEti|dadhAti|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|sama̍ṣṭyA̍ iti saM - aṣṭyai|AGAramityA̱ - GAram|Eti|GArayati|tiraḥ|iva|66̍ (50)
verses.samhita: imE lOkA imAnEva lOkAnaBi jayati̍ triruttarArddhya̍M̍ trayO vai dEvayAnAḥ̍ panthAnastAnEvABi̍ jayati̍ trirupa# vAjayati trayO vai dEvalOkA̍ dEvalOkAnEvABi̍ jayati̍ dvAdaśa̍ saM padyantE̍ dvAdaśa̍ mAsA̱ḥ saM~MvathsaraḥsaM~MvathsaramEva̍ prIṇAtyathO̍# saM~MvathsaramEvAsmAupa# dadhAti suvargasya# lOkasya samaṣ^^ṭyA̍ AGAramA GArayati̍ tira iva̍ - [ ] 66

verses.padam: - Padam vai|suvarga iti# suvaḥ - gaḥ|lOkaḥ|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|Eva|asmai|lOkam|prEti|rOcayati|Rujum|Eti̍|GArayati|Rujuḥ|iva|hi|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|saMtatamiti̍ saM - tatam|Eti|GArayati|prAṇAnAmiti̍# pra - anAnA̱m|annAdyasyEtyanna̍ - adyasya|saMta̍tyA̍ iti saM - tatyai|athO iti|rakṣa̍sAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa# - hatyai|yam|kAmayEta|pramAyu̍ka̍ iti# pra - mAyukaḥ|syAt|iti̍|jihmam|tasya̍|Eti̍|GArayEt|prAṇamiti̍# pra-anam|Eva|asmAt|jihmam|nayati|tAjak|prEti|mIyatE|śira̍ḥ|vai|Etat|yajñasya̍|yat|AGAra̍ ityA̱ - GAraḥ|AtmA|dhruvA|67 (50)
verses.samhita: vai suvargO̍ lOkaḥ suvargamEvAsmai̍# lOkaM prarOcayatyRujumA̍ GArayatyRujuri̍va̍ hi prAṇaḥ saMtatamA̍ GArayati̍ prAṇAnAmannAdya̍sya̍ saMtatyA̍ athO rakṣasAmapa̍hatyai̍ yaM kAmayEta̍ pramAyukaḥ̍ syAditi# jihmaM tasyA &&GArayEt̍ prAṇamEvAsmA̱jjihmaM nayati̍ tAjak pramIyatEśirO̍ vA Etad-yajñasya yadAGAra̍ AtmA dhruvA - [ ] 67

verses.padam: - Padam AGAramityA̱ - GAram|AGAryEtyA̱ - GArya|dhruvAm|samiti̍|anakti|Atmann|Eva|yajñasya̍|śira̍ḥ|pratIti̍|dadhAti|agniḥ|dEvAnA̱m|dUtaḥ|AsI̱t|daivya̍ḥ|asu̍rAṇAm|tau|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA - patim|praśnam|aitAm|saḥ|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|brAhmaṇam|abravIt|Etat|vIti|brUhi|iti̍|Eti̍|śrAvaya|iti̍|idam|dEvAḥ|śRuṇuta|iti̍|vAva|tat|abravIt|agniḥ|dEvaḥ|hOtA̱|iti̍|yaḥ|Eva|dEvAnA̱m|tam|avRuṇIta|tata̍ḥ|dEvAḥ|68̍ (50)
verses.samhita: &&GAramAGArya# dhruvAṃ samanaktyAtmannEva̍ yajñasya śiraḥ prati# dadhAtyagnirdEvAnA̱M dUta AsId daivyO&surAṇAM̍ tau prajApatiM̍ praśnamaitAṃq̍ sa prajApati̍ rbrAhmaṇamabravIdEtadvi̍ brUhItyA śrAvayEtIdaM̍ dEvAḥ̍ śRuṇutEti vAva tadabravIdagni̍ rdEvO hOtEti ya Eva dEvAnAM tamavRuṇIta̍ tatO# dEvA - [ ] 68

verses.padam: - Padam aBavann|parEti̍|asu̍rAḥ|yasya̍|Evam|viduṣa̍ḥ|pravaramiti̍# pra - varam|pravRuṇata iti# pra - vRuṇatE̱|Bavati|AtmanA̱|parEti̍|asya|BrAtRu̍vyaḥ|Bavati|yat|brAhmaṇaḥ|ca|abrA̱hmaṇaḥ|ca|praśnam|EyAtAmityA̱̍ - iyAtA̱m|brAhmaṇAya|adhIti̍|brUyAt|yat|brAhmaṇAya̍|addhyAhEtya̍dhi-Aha̍|AtmanE̱|adhIti̍|Aha|yat|brAhmaṇam|parAhEti̍# parA - Aha|AtmAna̱m|parEti̍|Aha|tasmA̱t|brAhmaṇaḥ|na|parOcya̍ iti# parA-ucyaḥ||69̍ (40) (vA - AraṇyAṅścAva̍# rundhE&thO# - paśuBiḥ - sO̱&bravId - dakṣiṇArdhyaM# traya# -iva - dhruvA - dEvA - ścatvAriṃqśacca̍# ) (A11)
verses.samhita: aBavan̍ parA&surA̍ yasyaivaM ~Mviduṣaḥ̍ pravaraM pravRuṇatE̍ BavatyAtmanA̍ parA̱&sya BrAtRuvyO̍ Bavati yadbrA̱hmaṇaścA brA̱hmaṇaśca praśnamEyAtA̱M brAhmaṇAyAdhi# brUyAd yad brA̱hmaṇAyAddhyAhA &&tmanE&ddhyAha̍ yadbrA̱hmaṇaM parAhA&&tmAnaM parA&&ha̍ tasmA̱d brAhmaṇO na parOcyaḥ||69̍

verses.padam: - Padam Ayuḥ|tE|AyurdA̍ ityAyuḥ̍ - dAḥ|agnE|Eti|pyAyasva|samiti̍|tE|avEti̍|tE|hEḍa̍ḥ|uditi̍|uttamamityu̍t̍ - tamam|prEti|naḥ|dEvI|Eti̍|naḥ|divaḥ|agnA̍viṣṇU̍ ityagnA̱-viṣṇU|agnAviṣṇU̍ ityagnA̱ - viṣṇU|imam|mE|varuṇa|tat|tvA|yAmi|uditi|u|tyam|citram||apAm|napA̱t|Eti̍|hi|asthA̱t|upasthamityupa̍ - stham|jihmAnA̱m|Ud^^rdhvaḥ|vidyutamiti# vi - dyuta̱m|vasAnaḥ||tasya̍|jyEṣṭha̱m|mahimAna̱m|vaha̍ntIḥ|hira̍ṇyavarṇA̍ iti hiraṇya̍ - varṇAḥ|parIti|yanti|yahvIḥ||samiti̍|70̍ (50)
verses.samhita: - myu dutyaM>13, citraM >14 udu tyaM jAtavEdasaM̍ dEvaM ~Mvahanti̍ kEtavaḥ|dRuśE̍ viśvAya̍ sUrya̱M||citraM dEvAnA-mudagAdanI̍kaM̍ cakṣu# rmitrasya varuṇasyA&gnEḥ|A&prA̍ dyAvApRuthivI̍ antarikṣaṃq̍ sUrya# AtmA jagatastasthuṣa̍śca||

verses.padam: - Padam anyAḥ|yanti|upEti̍|yanti|anyAḥ|samAnam|Urvam|nadya̍ḥ|pRuṇanti||tam|u|śuci̱m|śuca̍yaḥ|dIdivAṃsa̱m|apAm|napA̍tam|parIti̍|tasthuḥ|Apa̍ḥ||tam|asmE̍rAḥ|yuvataya̍ḥ|yuvA̍nam|marmRujyamA̍nAḥ|parIti̍|yanti|Apa̍ḥ||saḥ|śukrEṇa̍|śikva̍nA|rEvat|agniḥ|dIdAya̍|aniddhmaḥ|GRutani̍rṇigiti̍# GRuta - nirṇik|aPsvityap̍ - su||indrAvaruṇayOritIndrA̱̍ - varuṇayOḥ|aham|samrAjOriti̍# saM - rAjO̱ḥ|avaḥ|Eti̍|vRuṇE||tA|naḥ|mRuḍAtaḥ|IdRuśE̱||indrA̍varuṇEtIndrA̱̍ - varuṇA|yuvam|addhvarAya|naḥ|71̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -manyA yantyupa# yantyanyAḥ samAnamUrvaM̍ nadyaḥ̍ pRuṇanti|tamU śuciṃq śucayO̍ dIdivAṃ samapAM̍ napAtaM̍ paritasthurApa̍ḥ|tamasmE̍rA̍ yuvatayO yuvAnaM̍ marmRujyamAnAḥ̍ pari# yantyApaḥ||sa̍ śukrEṇa śikvanA̍ rEvadagnirdIdAyAniddhmO̍ GRutanirṇigaPsu||indrAvaru̍ṇayOrahaṃsamrAjOrava̍ A vRuṇE|tA̍ nO# mRuḍAta IdRuśE̱||indrAvaruṇA̍ yuvamaddhvarAya̍# nO - [ ] 71

verses.padam: - Padam viśE|janAya|mahi̍|śarma̍|yacCatam||dIrGapra̍yajyumiti̍# dIrGa - prayajyum|atIti|yaḥ|vanuṣyati̍|vayam|jayEma|pRuta̍nAsu|dUḍhya̍ḥ||Eti̍|naḥ|mitrAvaruṇEti̍# mitrA - varuṇA|prEti|bAhavA̱||tvam|naḥ|agnE|varu̍ṇasya|vidvAn|dEvasya̍|hEḍa̍ḥ|avEti̍|yAsisIṣṭhAḥ||yaji̍ṣṭhaḥ|vahni̍tama̍ iti vahni-tamaḥ|śOśu̍cAnaḥ|viśvA̱|dvEṣAṃ̍si|prEti̍|mumugdhi|asmat||saḥ|tvam|naḥ|agnE|avamaḥ|Bava|UtI|nEdi̍ṣṭhaḥ|asyAḥ|uṣasa̍ḥ|vyu̍ṣṭAviti̍ vi - uṣṭau||avEti|yakṣva|naḥ|varu̍ṇam|72̍ (50)
verses.samhita: - A nO# mitrAvaruṇA>15, pra bAhavA̱>16 A nO# mitrAvaruṇA GRutairgavyUtimukṣataM|madhvA̍ rajAṃsi̍ sukratU||pra bAhavA# sisRutaM jIvasE# na A nO gavyUtimukṣataM̍ GRutEna|A̍ nO janE̱ śravayataM ~MyuvAnA śrutaM mE# mitrAvaruṇA havEmA||

verses.padam: - Padam rarAṇaḥ|vIhi|mRuḍIkam|suhava̍ iti# su - havaḥ|naḥ|Edhi||praprEti̍ pra - pra|ayam|agniḥ|Baratasya|śRuṇvE|vIti̍|yat|sUrya̍ḥ|na|rOca̍tE|bRuhat|BAḥ||aBIti̍|yaḥ|pUrum|pRuta̍nAsu|tasthau|dIdAya̍|daivya̍ḥ|ati̍thiḥ|śivaḥ|naḥ||prEti̍|tE|yakṣi|prEti̍|tE|iyarmi|manma̍|Buva̍ḥ|yathA̱|vandya̍ḥ|naḥ|havE̍ṣu||dhanvann̍|iva|prapEti̍# pra - pA|asi|tvam|agnE|iyakṣavE̱|pUravE̱|pratna|rAjann||73 (50)
verses.samhita: rarAṇO̍ vIhi mRuḍIkaṃ̍ suhavO# na Edhi||praprAyamagnirBaratasya̍# śRuṇvE vi yath sUryO na rOcatE̍ bRuhadBAḥ|aBi yaḥ pUruM pRutanAsu̍ tasthau dIdAya daivyO atithiḥ̍ śivO naḥ||pra̍ tE# yakṣi pra ta# iyarmi manma BuvO yathA vandyO# nO havEṣu|dhanva̍nniva̍ prapA asi̍ tvamagna̍ iyakṣavE# pUravE̱ pratna rAjann||73

verses.padam: - Padam vIti|pAja̍sA|vIti̍|jyOti̍ṣA||saḥ|tvam|agnE|pratI̍kEna|pratIti̍|Oṣa|yAtudhAnya̍# iti# yAtu - dhAnyaḥ||urukṣayEṣvityu̍ru̍ - kṣayEṣu|dIdya̍t||tam|supratI̍kamiti̍# su - pratIkam|sudRuśamiti̍# su - dRuśa̱m|sva~jca̱m|avidvAṃsaḥ|viduṣṭa̍ramiti̍# viduḥ - taram|sapEma||saḥ|yakṣat|viśvA̱|vayunAni|vidvAn|prEti̍|havyam|agniḥ|amRutE̍ṣu|vOcat||aṃqhOmuca̍ ityaṃhaḥ̍ - mucE̱|vivEṣa|yat|mA|vIti̍|naḥ|indra|indra̍|kṣatram|indriyAṇi̍|śatakratO̍ iti# śata-kratO|anviti|tE|dAyi||74̍ (44) (yahvIḥ sa - madhvarAya̍# nO - varuṇaṃ̍ - rAjaṅq -ścatuścatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A12) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 12 Anuvaakams :- (viśvarUpa̍ - stvaṣṭE - ndraM̍ ~MvRutraM - brahmavAdinaḥ̍ sa tvai - nA&sOmayAjyE̍ - ṣa vai dEvarathO̍ - dEvA vai narci nA - yajñO - &gnE# mahAn - trIn - nivIta̍ - mAyuṣṭE̍ - dvAdaśa)̍ Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (viśvarUpO̍ - nainaṃ# śItarUrA - vadya vasu# - pUrvEdyu - rvAjA itya - gnE# mahAn - nivIta̍ - manyA yanti - catuḥ̍ saptatiḥ ) First and Last Padam of Fifth Prasnam of Kandam 2:- (viśvarUpO - &nu# tE dAyi)||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE dvitIyakAṇḍE pa~jcamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||
verses.samhita: indriyAṇi# śatakratO>23, &nu# tE dAyi>24 indriyAṇi# śatakratO yA tE janEṣu̍ pa~jcasu|indra̍ tAni# ta A vRuṇE||anu̍# tE dAyi maha indriyAya̍# satrAtE viśvamanu# vRutrahatyE̱|anu# kṣatramanu sahO# yajatrEndra# dEvEBiranu# tE nRuṣahyE̱||(Appearing in ṭś- 1.6.12.1) ================================ OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ, hariḥ OM 2.6 dvitIyakAṇḍE ṣaṣṭhaḥ praśnaḥ - avaśiṣṭakarmABidhAnaM

verses.padam: - Padam samidha iti# saM - idhaḥ|yajati|vasantam|Eva|RutUnAm|avEti̍|rundhE|tanUnapA̍tamiti̍ tanU̱ - napAtam|yajati|grIṣmam|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|iḍaḥ|yajati|varq.ṣAḥ|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|barqḥiḥ|yajati|śarada̱m|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|svAhAkAramiti̍# svAhA - kAram|yajati|hEmantam|Eva|avEti|rundhE|tasmA̱t|svAhA̍kRutA̍ iti svAhA̱-kRutAḥ|hEmann|paśava̍ḥ|avEti̍|sIdanti|samidha̍ iti# saM - idhaḥ|yajati|uṣasa̍ḥ|Eva|dEvatA̍nAm|avEti̍|rundhE|tanUnapA̍tamiti̍ tanU̱ - napAtam|yajati|yajñam|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: samidhO# yajati vasantamEvartUnAmava# rundhE tanUnapAtaM̍ ~Myajati grIṣmamEvAva# rundha iḍO yajati̍ varq.ṣA EvAva# rundhE barqḥiryajati̍ śaradamEvAva̍# rundhE svAhAkAraM ~Myajati̍ hEmantamEvAva# rundhE tasmAth svAhAkRutA̍ hEman̍ paśavO&va# sIdanti samidhO# yajatyuṣasa# Eva dEvatAnAmava̍# rundhE tanUnapAtaM̍ ~Myajati yajñamEvAva# rundha - [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam iḍaḥ|yajati|paśUn|Eva|avEti|rundhE|barqḥiḥ|yajati|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|Eva|avEti|rundhE|samAna̍yata̍ iti# saM - AnayatE|upaBRuta̍ ityupa̍ - BRutaḥ|tEja̍ḥ|vai|Ajya̱m|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|barqḥiḥ|prajAsviti# pra - jAsu|Eva|tEja̍ḥ|dadhAti|svAhAkAramiti̍# svAhA-kAram|yajati|vAca̱m|Eva|avEti|rundhE|daśa̍|samiti̍|padyantE|daśA̱kṣarEti̍ daśa# - akṣarA|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|anna̱m|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjEti# vi - rAjA̱|Eva|annAdyamityanna̍ - adya̱m|avEti|rundhE|samidha̍ iti# saM - idhaḥ|yajati|asminn|Eva|lOkE|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|tanUnapA̍tamiti̍ tanU̱ - napAtam|yajati|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: iḍO yajati̍ paśUnEvAva# rundhE baṛhiryajati̍ prajAmEvAva# rundhE samAnayata̍ upaBRutastEjO vA AjyaM̍ prajA barqḥiḥ prajAsvEva tEjO# dadhAti svAhAkAraM ~Myajati̍ vAcamEvAva̍# rundhE daśa saM padyantE̍ daśA̱kṣarA virAḍannaM̍ ~MvirAḍvirAjai vAnnAdyamava# rundhE samidhO# yajatyasminnEva lOkE pratitiṣṭhati̍ tanUnapAtaM̍ ~Myajati - [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam yajñE|Eva|antarikṣE|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|iḍaḥ|yajati|paśuṣu̍|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|barqḥiḥ|yajati|yE|Eva|dEvayAnA̍ iti# dEva - yAnA̱ḥ|panthAnaḥ|tEṣu̍|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|svAhAkAramiti̍# svAhA - kAram|yajati|suvarga iti# suvaḥ - gE|Eva|lOkE|pratIti|tiṣṭhati|EtAva̍ntaḥ|vai|dEvalOkA̍ iti# dEva - lOkAḥ|tEṣu|Eva|yathApUrvamiti̍# yathA - pUrvam|pratIti|tiṣṭhati|dEvAsurA̍ iti# dEva-asurAḥ|Eṣu|lOkEṣu|asparddhanta|tE|dEvAḥ|prayAjairiti̍# pra-yAjaiḥ|EByaḥ|lOkEByaḥ|asu̍rAn|prEti̍|anudanta|tat|prayAjAnAmiti̍# pra - yAjAnA̱m|3 (50)
verses.samhita: yajña EvAntarikṣE̍ prati# tiṣṭhatIḍO yajati̍ paśuṣvEva pratitiṣṭhati̍ baraḥiryajati̍ ya Eva dEvayAnAḥ̍ panthAnastEṣvEva̍ pratitiṣṭhati̍ svAhAkAraM ~Myajati̍ suvarga Eva lOkE prati# tiṣṭhatyEtAvantO̍ vai dEvalOkAstEṣvEva̍ yathApUrvaM̍ pratitiṣṭhati̍ dEvAsurA Eṣu lOkEṣvasparddhanta̍ tE dEvAḥ prayAjairEByO̍ lOkEByO &surAn̍ prAṇudanta̍ tat prayAjAnA̱M̍ - [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam prayAjatvamiti# prayAja - tvam|yasya|Evam|viduṣa̍ḥ|prayAjA̍ iti# pra-yAjAḥ|ijyantE̱|prEti|EByaḥ|lOkEBya̍ḥ|BrAtRu̍vyAn|nudatE|aBikrAmamitya̍Bi̍ - krAma̱m|juhOti|aBijityA̍ ityaBi - jityai|yaḥ|vai|prayAjAnAmiti# pra - yAjAnA̱m|mithunam|vEda|prEti̍|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|mithunaiḥ|jAyatE|samidha iti# saM - idhaḥ|bahvIḥ|iva|yajati|tanUnapA̍tamiti̍ tanU̱ - napAtam|Eka̱m|iva|mithunam|tat|iḍaḥ|bahvIḥ|iva|yajati|barqḥiḥ|Eka̱m|iva|mithunam|tat|Etat|vai|prayAjAnAmiti̍# pra - yAjAnA̱m|mithunam|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|prEti̍|4̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prayAjatvaM ~MyasyaivaM ~Mviduṣaḥ̍ prayAjA ijyantE praiByO lOkEByO BrAtRuvyAnnudatE̍ &BikrAmaM̍ juhOtyaBijityai̍ yO vai prayAjAnA̱M̍ mithunaM ~MvEda pra prajayA# paśuBi# rmithunai rjAyatE̍ samidhO# bahvIriva̍ yajati tanUnapAtamEka̍miva̍ mithunaM tadiḍO bahvIriva̍ yajati barqḥirEkamiva̍ mithunaM tadEtadvai prayAjAnA̱M̍ mithunaM ~Mya EvaM ~MvEda pra - [ ] 4

verses.padam: - Padam prajayEti# pra - jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|mithunaiḥ|jAyatE|dEvAnA̱m|vai|aniṣṭAḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|Asann̍|atha̍|asu̍rAḥ|yajñam|ajiGAṃqsann|tE|dEvAḥ|gAyatrIm|vIti̍|auhann|pa~jca̍|akṣarA̍ṇi|prAcInA̍ni|trIṇi̍|pratIcInA̍ni|tata̍ḥ|varma̍|yajñAya̍|aBa̍vat|varma̍|yaja̍mAnAya|yat|prayAjAnUyAjA̍ iti# prayAja - anUyAjAḥ|ijyantE̱|varma|Eva|tat|yajñAya̍|kriyatE|varma̍|yaja̍mAnAya|BrAtRu̍vyABiBUtyA̍ iti BrAtRuvya̍ - aBiBUtyai|tasmA̱t|varUtham|purastA̱t|vaṛṣI̍yaḥ|paścAt|hrasI̍yaḥ|dEvAḥ|vai|purA|rakṣO̱Bya̍ iti rakṣaḥ-Byaḥ|5̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prajayA# paśuBi# rmithunai rjAyatE̍ dEvAnAM ~MvA aniṣṭA̍ dEvatA AsannathAsurA̍ yajñamajiGAṃ̍ san tE dEvA gAyatrIM̍ ~Mvyauhan̍ pa~jcAkṣarAṇi̍ prAcInAni̍ trIṇi# pratIcInAni̍ tatO varma# yajñAyABavadvarma̍ yajamAnAya̍ yat prayAjAnUyAjA̍ ijyantE varmaiva tadyajñAya# kriyatE varma yajamAnAya̍ BrAtRuvyABiBUtyai̍ tasmAd-varUthaM̍ purastAd-vaṛṣIyaḥ̍ paścAddhrasIyO̍ dEvA vai purA rakṣO̱Bya - [ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam iti|svAhAkArEṇEti̍# svAhA - kArEṇa|prayAjEṣviti̍# pra - yAjEṣu|yajñam|saṅqsthApyamiti̍# saM - sthApya̱m|apaśyann|tam|svAhAkArEṇEti# svAhA - kArEṇa|prayAjEṣviti̍# pra - yAjEṣu|samiti̍|asthApayann|vIti̍|vai|Etat|yajñam|Cindanti|yat|svAhAkArEṇEti̍# svAhA - kArEṇa|prayAjEṣviti̍# pra- yAjEṣu|saṅqsthApayantIti̍# saM - sthApayanti|prayAjAniti̍# pra - yAjAn|iṣṭvA|havIṃṣi|aBIti̍|GArayati|yajñasya̍|saMta̍tyA̍ iti saM - tatyai|athO iti|haviḥ|Eva|akaḥ|athO̍ iti|yathApUrvamiti̍# yathA - pUrvam|upEti|Eti|pitA|vai|prayAjA̍ iti# pra - yAjAḥ|prajEti# pra - jA|anUyAjA ityanu̍ - yAjAḥ|yat|prayAjAniti# pra - yAjAn|iṣṭvA|havIṃṣi|aBiGArayatItya̍Bi̍ - GArayati|pitA|Eva|tat|putrEṇa̍|sAdhA̍raṇam|6̍ (50)
verses.samhita: iti# svAhAkArEṇa# prayAjEṣu# yajñaṃ saṅqsthApyamapaśyan̍ taṅ svAhAkArEṇa̍# prayAjEṣu samasthApayan̍ vi vA Etad-yajñaM Cindanti̍ yath svAhAkArEṇa̍# prayAjEṣu# saṅsthApayanti̍ prayAjAniṣṭvA havIṅṣyaBi GArayati̍ yajñasya saMtatyA̍ athO# havirEvAkarathO# yathApUrvamupaiti̍ pitA vai prayAjAḥ̍ prajA&nUyAjA̍ yat prayAjAniṣṭvA̍ havIṅṣyaBiGAraya̍ti̍ pitaiva tat putrEṇa sAdhAraṇaM̍ - [ ] 6

verses.padam: - Padam kurutE|tasmA̱t|Ahuḥ|yaḥ|ca|Evam|vEda|yaḥ|ca|na|kathA|putrasya̍|kEva̍lam|kathA|sAdhA̍raṇam|pituḥ|iti̍|aska̍nnam|Eva|tat|yat|prayAjEṣviti̍# pra - yAjEṣu|iṣṭEṣu̍|skanda̍ti|gAyatrI|Eva|tEna̍|garBa̱m|dhattE|sA|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|paśUn|yajamAnAya|prEti̍|janayati||7̍ (35) (yajati yajñAmEvAva# rundhE - tanUnapAtaM̍ ~Myajati - prayAjAnA# - mEvaM ~MvEda pra - rakṣO̱Byaḥ - sAdhAraṇaM̍ - pa~jcatriṃśacca̍ ) (A1)
verses.samhita: kurutE tasmAdAhuryaścaivaM̍ ~MvEda yaśca na kathA putrasya kEvalaM̍ kathA sAdhAraṇaM̍ piturityaskannamEva̍ tadyat prayAjEṣviṣṭEṣu̍ skandati̍ gAyatryEva̍ tEna garBaM̍ dhattE sA prajAM paśUn. yajamAnAya̍ prajanayati||7̍

verses.padam: - Padam cakṣuṣI̍ iti|vai|EtE̍ iti|yajñasya̍|yat|Ajya̍BAgavityAjya̍# - BAgau|yat|AjyaBAgAvityAjya̍-BAgau|yaja̍ti|cakṣu̍ṣI̍ iti|Eva|tat|yajñasya̍|pratIti̍|dadhAti|pUrvArddha̍ iti# pUrva - arddhE|juhOti|tasmA̱t|pUrvArddha iti# pUrva - arddhE|cakṣuṣI̍ iti|prabAhugiti̍# pra - bAhuk|juhOti|tasmA̱t|prabAhugiti̍# pra - bAhuk|cakṣu̍ṣI̍ iti|dEvalOkamiti̍# dEva-lOkam|vai|agninA̱|yajamAnaḥ|anviti̍|paśyati|pitRulOkamiti̍# pitRu-lOkam|sOmEna|uttarArddha̍ ityuttara-arddhE|agnayE̱|juhOti|dakṣiṇArddha̍ iti# dakṣiṇa-arddhE|sOmAya|Evam|iva|hi|imau|lOkau|anayO̱ḥ|lOkayO̱ḥ|anu̍KyAtyA̍ ityanu# - KyAtyai|rAjAnau|vai|Etau|dEvatA̍nAm|8̍ (50)
verses.samhita: cakṣuṣI̍ vA EtE yajñasya yadAjyaBAgau̍ yadAjyaBAgau̍ yajati̍ cakṣuṣI̍ Eva tad-yajñasya prati# dadhAti pUrvArddhE juhOti̍ tasmA̱t pUrvArddhE cakṣuṣI̍ prabAhug-juhOti̍ tasmA̱t prabAhuk cakṣuṣI̍ dEvalOkaM ~MvA agninA yajamAnO&nu̍# paśyati pitRulOkaṃ sOmEnOttarArddhE̱̍ &gnayE# juhOti dakṣiṇArddhE sOmAyaivami̍va̍ hImau lOkAvanayO̱ rlOkayOranuKyAtyai̍ rAjAnau̍ vA Etau dEvatAnAM̍ - [ ] 8

verses.padam: - Padam yat|agnIṣOmAvityagnI-sOmau̱|antarA|dEvatA̱ḥ|ijyEtE iti|dEvatA̍nAm|vidhRu̍tyA̍ iti vi - dhRutyai|tasmA̱t|rAjñA̱|manuṣyA̱ḥ|vidhRutA̍ iti vi - dhRutAḥ|brahmavAdina iti# brahma-vAdinaḥ|vadanti|kim|tat|yajñE|yaja̍mAnaḥ|kurutE|yEna̍|anyatO̍data̍ ityanyataḥ̍ - dataḥ|ca|paśUn|dAdhAra|uBayatO̍data̍ ityuBayata̍ḥ-dataḥ|ca|iti̍|Ruca̱m|anUcyEtya̍nu̍ - ucya|Ajya̍BAgasyEtyAjya̍# - BAgasya|juṣAṇEna|yajati|tEna̍|anyatO̍data̍ ityanyataḥ̍ - dataḥ|dAdhAra|Ruca̱m|anUcyEtyanu̍ - ucya|haviṣa̍ḥ|RucA|yajati|tEna̍|uBayatO̍data̍ ityuBayata̍ḥ̍ - dataḥ|dAdhAra|mUrddhanvatIti# mUrddhann - vatI̱|purOnuvAkyEti# puraḥ-anuvAkyA̱|Bavati|mUrddhAna̱m|Eva|Enam|samAnAnA̱m|karOti|9 (50)
verses.samhita: ~MyadagnIṣOmAvantarA̍ dEvatA# ijyEtE dEvatAnAM̍ ~MvidhRutyai̍ tasmAd-rAjñA# manuṣyA# vidhRutA̍ brahmavAdinO# vadanti kiM tad-yajñE yajamAnaḥ̍ kurutE yEnAnyatOdataśca̍ paśUn dAdhA-rOBayatO̍data-ścEtyRuca̍-manUcyA̍ &&jyaBAgasya̍ juṣAṇEna# yajati tEnAnyatOdatO̍ dAdhArarcamanUcya̍# haviṣa# RucA yajati̍ tEnOBayatO̍datO̍ dAdhAra mUrddhanvatI# purO&nuvAkyA# Bavati mUrddhAnamEvainaṃ̍# samAnAnA̱M karOti - [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam niyutvatyEti# ni - yutvatyA|yajati|BrAtRu̍vyasya|Eva|paśUn|nIti̍|yuvatE|kEśina̱m|ha|dArByam|kEśI|sAtya̍kAmiriti̍ sAtya# - kAmiḥ|uvAca|saptapadAmiti̍# sapta - padAm|tE|śakvarIm|śvaḥ|yajñE|prayOktAsa̍ iti# pra-yOktAsE̱|yasyai̱|vIryEṇa|prEti̍|jAtAn|BrAtRu̍vyAn|nudatE̱|pratIti̍|janiṣyamA̍ṇAn|yasyai̱|vIryE̍ṇa|uBayO̱ḥ|lOkayO̱ḥ|jyOti̍ḥ|dhattE|yasyai̱|vIryE̍ṇa|pUrvArddhEnEti̍# pUrva - arddhEna|anaḍvAn|Bunakti̍|jaGanArddhEnEti̍# jaGana - arddhEna|dhEnuḥ|iti̍|purastA̱llakṣmEti̍# purastA̱t - lakṣmA|purOnuvAkyEti# puraḥ - anuvAkyA̱|Bavati|jAtAn|Eva|BrAtRuvyAn|prEti̍|nudatE|upari̍ṣṭAllakṣmEtyupari̍ṣṭAt̍ - lakṣmA|10 (50)
verses.samhita: niyutvatyA̍ yajati BrAtRuvyasyaiva̍ paśUn ni yuvatE̍ kEśinaṃha̍ dArByaM kEśI sAtyakAmiruvAca̍ saptapadAM̍ tE śakvarIṅq̍ śvO yajñE prayOktAsE̍ yasyai# vIryEṇa̍ pra jAtAn BrAtRuvyAnnudatE̍ prati# janiṣyamAṇAna.̍ yasyai# vIryEṇOBayO̱̍ rlOkayO rjyOti# rddhattE yasyai# vIryEṇa̍ pUrvArddhEnAnaḍvAn̍ Bunakti# jaGanArddhEna# dhEnuriti# purastA̱llakṣmA purO&nuvAkyA# Bavati jAtAnEva BrAtRuvyAn̍ praṇudata̍ upariṣṭAllakṣmA̍ - [ ] 10

verses.padam: - Padam yAjyA̱|janiṣyamAṇAn|Eva|pratIti̍|nudatE|purastA̱llakṣmEti̍# purastA̱t - lakṣmA|purOnuvAkyEti# puraḥ - anuvAkyA̱|Bavati|asminn|Eva|lOkE|jyOtiḥ|dhattE|upari̍ṣṭAllakṣmEtyupari̍ṣṭAt̍ - lakṣmA|yAjyA̱|amuṣminn|Eva|lOkE|jyOti̍ḥ|dhattE|jyOti̍ṣmantau|asmai|imau|lOkau|Bavataḥ|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|purastA̱llakṣmEti̍# purastA̱t - lakṣmA|purOnuvAkyEti# puraḥ - anuvAkyA̱|Bavati|tasmA̱t|pUrvArddhEnEti# pUrva - arddhEna|anaḍvAn|Bunakti|upari̍ṣṭAllakṣmEtyupari̍ṣṭAt̍ - lakṣmA|yAjyA̱|tasmA̱t|jaGanArddhEnEti# jaGana - arddhEna|dhEnuḥ|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|Bu~gktaḥ|Enam|Etau|vajra̍ḥ|Ajya̱m|vajra̍ḥ|Ajya̍BAgAvityAjya̍# - BAgau|11 (50)
verses.samhita: yAjyA# janiṣyamAṇAnEva̍ pratinudatE̍ purastA̱llakṣmA purO&nuvAkyA# BavatyasminnEva lOkE jyOtirddhatta̍ upariṣṭAllakṣmA̍ yAjyA&muṣmi̍nnEva̍ lOkE jyOtirddhattE̍ jyOtiṣmantAvasmA̍ imau lOkau BavatO̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda# purastA̱llakṣmA purO&nuvAkyA# Bavati tasmA̱t pUrvArddhEnAnaḍvAn̍ Bunaktyupari̍ṣṭAllakṣmA̍ yAjyA# tasmA̱jjaGanArddhEna# dhEnurya EvaM ~MvEda# Bu~gkta EnamEtau̍ vajra AjyaM ~Mvajra AjyaBAgau̍ - [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam vajraḥ|vaṣaṭkAra̍ iti# vaṣaṭ - kAraḥ|trivRutamiti# tri - vRuta̱m|Eva|vajra̱m|saBRuMtyEti# saM - BRutya|BrAtRu̍vyAya|prEti̍|harati|aCa̍baMṭkAramityaCa̍baMṭ̍ - kAram|apagUryEtyapa̍ - gUrya|vaṣa̍ṭ|karOti|stRutyai̱|gAyatrI|purOnuvAkyEti̍# puraḥ - anuvAkyA̱|Bavati|triṣṭuk|yAjyA̱|brahmann|Eva|kṣatram|anvAra̍BaMyatItya̍nu̍ - AraBaMyati|tasmA̱t|brAhmaṇaḥ|muKya̍ḥ|muKya̍ḥ|Bavati|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|prEti̍|Eva|Enam|purOnuvAkya̍yEti̍# puraḥ - anuvAkyayA|Aha|prEti̍|nayati|yAjya̍yA|gamaya̍ti|vaṣaṭkArEṇEti̍# vaṣaṭ - kArEṇa|Eti̍|Eva|Enam|purOnuvAkya̍yEti̍# puraḥ-anuvAkyayA|dattE|prEti̍|yacCati|yAjya̍yA|pratIti̍|12̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vajrO# vaṣaṭkArastrivRutamEva̍ vajraṃ# samBRutya BrAtRuvyAya̍ pra haratyacCa̍mbaṭkAra-mapagUrya̍ vaṣaṭkarOti̍ stRutyai# gAyatrI purO&nuvAkyA̍# Bavati triṣṭug yAjyA̱ brahmannEva̍ kṣatramanvAraM̍ Bayati tasmA̱dbrAhmaṇO muKyO muKyO# Bavati ya EvaM ~MvEda praivainaM̍ purO&nuvAkyayA̍ &&ha praṇayati̍ yAjyayA̍ gamayati̍ vaṣaṭkArEṇaivainaM̍ purO&nuvAkyayA̍ dattE prayacCati̍ yAjyayA̍ prati# - [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam vaṣaṭkArEṇEti# vaṣaṭ - kArEṇa|sthApayati|tripadEti̍# tri - padA̱|purOnuvAkyEti# puraḥ - anuvAkyA̱|Bavati|trayaḥ|imE|lOkAḥ|Eṣu|Eva|lOkEṣu̍|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|catu̍ṣpadEti̍ catuḥ̍ - padA|yAjyA̱|catuṣpada̍ iti catuḥ-padaḥ|Eva|paśUn|avEti̍|rundhE|dvyakṣara̍ iti# dvi - akṣaraḥ|vaṣaṭkAra iti# vaṣaṭ - kAraḥ|dvipAditi# dvi-pAt|yajamAnaḥ|paśuṣu̍|Eva|upari̍ṣṭAt|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|gAyatrI|purOnuvAkyEti̍# puraḥ - anuvAkyA̱|Bavati|triṣṭuk|yAjyA̱|EṣA|vai|saptapadEti# sapta - padA|śakvarI|yat|vai|EtayA̱|dEvAḥ|aśi̍kṣann|tat|aśaknuvann|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|śaknOti̍|Eva̍ ( )|yat|śikṣati||13̍ (52)
verses.samhita: vaṣaṭkArEṇa# sthApayati tripadA# purO&nuvAkyA# Bavati traya# imE lOkA EṣvEva̍ lOkEṣu pratitiṣṭhati̍ catuṣpadA̍ yAjyA# catuṣpada̍ Eva paśUnava# rundhE dvyakṣarO vaṣaṭkArO̍ dvipAd-yajamAnaḥ̍ paśuṣvEvOpariṣṭAt̍ pratitiṣṭhati̍ gAyatrI purO&nuvAkyA̍# Bavati triṣṭug yAjyaiṣA̍ vai saptapadA̍ śakvarI̍ yadvA EtayA# dEvA aśikṣan̍ tadaśaknuvanq.̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda# śaknOtyEva ( ) yacCikṣati||13̍

verses.padam: - Padam prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|dEvEByaḥ|yajñAn|vyAdi̍śaditi̍# vi - Adiśat|saḥ|Atmann|Ajya̱m|adhatta|tam|dEvAḥ|abruvann|Eṣaḥ|vAva|yajñaḥ|yat|Ajya̱m|apIti̍|Eva|naḥ|atra̍|astu|iti̍|saḥ|abravIt|yajAn̍|vaḥ|Ajya̍BAgAvityAjya̍# - BAgau|upEti|stRuṇAn|aBIti̍|GArayAn|iti̍|tasmA̱t|yaja̍nti|Ajya̍BAgAvityAjya̍# - BAgau|upEti|stRuṇanti|aBIti̍|GArayanti|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|kasmA̱t|satyAt|yAtayA̍mAnIti̍# yAta - yAmAni|anyAni|havIṃṣi̍|ayA̍tayAmamityayA̍ta-yAmam|Ajya̱m|iti̍|prAjApatyamiti̍# prAjA - patyam|14 (50)
verses.samhita: prajApati̍ rdEvEByO# yajñAn vyAdiśath̍ sa AtmannAjyamadhatta̍ taM dEvA abruvannEṣa̍ vAva yajñO yadAjyamapyEva nO&trAstviti sO̱&bravId-yajAn# va AjyaBAgAvupa̍# stRuṇAnaBi GArayAniti̍ tasmAd-yajantyA-jyaBAgAvupa̍# stRuṇantyaBi GArayanti̍ brahmavAdinO# vadanti kasmA̱th satyAd- yAtayAmAnyanyAni̍# havIṅ-ṣyayAtayAma-mAjyamiti̍# prAjApatya - [ ] 14

verses.padam: - Padam iti|brUyAt|ayA̍tayAmEtyayA̍ta̍ - yAmA|hi|dEvAnA̱m|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|iti|CandAṃ̍si|dEvEBya̍ḥ|apEti̍|akrAmann|na|vaḥ|aBAgAni̍|havyam|vakṣyAmaḥ|iti̍|tEBya̍ḥ|Etat|caturavattamiti̍# catuḥ - avattam|adhArayann|purOnuvAkyAyA̍ iti# puraḥ - anuvAkyAyai|yAjyA̍yai|dEvatA̍yai|vaṣaṭkArAyEti̍# vaṣaṭ - kArAya|yat|caturavattamiti̍# catuḥ - avattam|juhOti|CandAṃ̍si|Eva|tat|prIṇAti|tAni̍|asya|prItAni̍|dEvEBya̍ḥ|havyam|vahanti|a~ggi̍rasaḥ|vai|itaḥ|uttamA̍ ityut̍ - tamAḥ|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Ayann|tat|Ruṣayaḥ|yajñavAstviti̍# yajña - vAstu|aByavAyannityaBi̍ - avAyann|tE|15̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -miti# brUyAdayAtayAmA̍ hi dEvAnA̱M prajApatiriti̍ CandAṃsi̍ dEvEByO&pA̱krAman na vO&BAgAni̍# havyaM ~MvakṣyAma̍ iti tEBya# Eta-ccaturavatta-ma̍dhArayan̍ purO&nuvAkyAyai̍ yAjyAyai̍ dEvatAyai̍ vaṣaṭkArAya yaccaturavattaM̍ juhOti CandAṅsyEva̍ tat prIṇAti̍ tAnyasya̍ prItAni# dEvEByO# havyaM ~Mvahantya~ggi̍rasO̍ vA ita uttamAḥ̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyan̍ tadRuṣayO̍ yajñavAstvaByavAyan̍ tE# - [ ] 15

verses.padam: - Padam apaśyann|purOḍAśa̱m|kUrmam|BUtam|sarpantam|tam|abruvann|indrA̍ya|dhriyasva|bRuhaspata̍yE|dhriyasva|viśvE̱Byaḥ|dEvEBya̍ḥ|dhriyasva|iti̍|saḥ|na|addhriyata|tam|abruvann|agnayE̱|dhriyasva|iti̍|saḥ|agnayE̱|addhriyata|yat|AgnEyaḥ|aṣṭAka̍pAla̍ ityaṣṭA - kapAlaḥ|amAvAsyAyAmitya̍mA̍ - vAsyAyAm|ca|paurṇamAsyAmiti̍# paurṇa - mAsyAm|ca|acyutaḥ|Bavati|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|aBiji̍tyA̍ ityaBi - jityai|tam|abruvann|kathA|ahAsthAḥ|iti|anu̍pAkta̍ ityanupa̍ - aktaḥ|aBUvam|iti|abravIt|yathA̱|akṣa̍ḥ|anu̍pAkta̍ ityanupa̍ - aktaḥ|16 (50)
verses.samhita: &paśyan purOḍAśaM̍ kUrmaM BUtaṃ sarpantaM̍ tamabruvannindrA̍ya̍ dhriyasva bRuhaspatayE̍ dhriyasva viśvE̱ByO dEvEByO̱ dhriyasvEti sa nAddhriyata̍ tamabruvannagnayE̱̍ dhriyasvEti sO̱&gnayE̱&ddhriyata yadA̱gnEyO̱- &ṣṭAkapAlO-̍ &mAvAsyAyAM̍ ca paurṇamAsyAM cA̱cyutO Bavati̍ suvargasya# lOkasyABijityai̍ tamabruvan̍ kathA&hA̱sthA ityanupAktO̍ &BUvamityabravId-yathA&kṣO&nu̍pAktO̍ - [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam avArcCatItyava̍ - RucCati|Evam|avEti̍|Aram|iti̍|upari̍ṣṭAt|aByajyEtya̍Bi̍ - ajya|adhastA̱t|upEti̍|anakti|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|sama̍ṣṭyA̍ iti saM-aṣṭyai|sarvAṇi|kapAlA̍ni|aBIti̍|prathayati|tAva̍taḥ|purOḍAśAn̍|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|aBIti̍|jayati|yaḥ|vida̍gdha̍ iti vi - dagdhaḥ|saḥ|nairq.Ruta iti# naiḥ-Rutaḥ|yaḥ|aśRutaḥ|saḥ|raudraḥ|yaḥ|śRutaḥ|saḥ|sadE̍va̍ iti sa - dEvaḥ|tasmA̱t|avidahatEtyavi̍# - dahatA|śRutakRuMtya iti# śRutaM - kRutyaḥ|sadEvatvAyEti̍# sadEva - tvAya|Basma̍nA|aBIti̍|vAsayati|tasmA̱t|mAṃqsEna̍|asthi̍|Cannam|vEdEna̍|aBIti̍|vAsayati|tasmA̱t|17̍ (50)
verses.samhita: &vArcCatyEvamavA̍# &&ramityupariṣṭA-daByajyAdhastA-dupA̍nakti̍ suvargasya# lOkasya samaṣ^^ṭyai̍ sarvAṇi̍ kapAlA̱nyaBi prathayati̍ tAvataḥ̍ purOḍAśAnamuṣmi̍n̍ ~MlOkE&Bi̍ jayati̍ yO vidagdhaḥ̍ sa naiṛRutO̍ yO&śRutaḥ̍ sa raudrO yaḥ śRutaḥ sa sadEvastasmAdavi̍dahatA̍ śRutakRuMtyaḥ̍ sadEvatvAya BasmanA&Bi̍ vAsayati̍ tasmA̱nmAṃq sEnAsthi# CannaM ~MvEdEnABi vAsayati̍ tasmAt - [ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam kEśai̱ḥ|śiraḥ|Cannam|pracyu̍tamiti̍ pra - cyutam|vai|Etat|asmAt|lOkAt|agatam|dEvalOkamiti̍# dEva - lOkam|yat|śRutam|haviḥ|anaBiGAritamityana̍Bi̍ - GAritam|aBiGAryEtyaBi̍ - GArya|uditi̍|vAsayati|dEvatrEti̍# dEva - trA|Eva|Enat|gamayati|yadi|Eka̱m|kapAla̱m|naśyE̱t|Eka̍ḥ|mAsa̍ḥ|saM~MvathsarasyEti̍# saM - vathsarasya|ana̍vEta̍ ityanava̍ - itaḥ|syAt|atha|yaja̍mAnaḥ|prEti̍|mIyEta|yat|dvE̍ iti|naśyE̍tAm|dvau|mAsau̱|saM~MvathsarasyEti̍# saM - vathsarasya|ana̍vEtAvityana̍va̍ - itau|syAtA̱m|atha|yaja̍mAnaḥ|prEti̍|mIyEta|saKyAMyEti̍# saM - KyAya|uditi̍|vAsayati|yaja̍mAnasya|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kEśaiḥ śiraḥ̍ CannaM pracyutaM̍ ~MvA EtadasmAl lOkAdagataM̍ dEvalOkaM ~MyacCRutaṃ haviranaBiGArita-maBiGAryOd-vA̍sayati̍ dEvatraivainad-gamayati̍ yadyEkaM̍ kapAlaM naśyEdEkO mAsaḥ̍ saM~MvathsarasyAnavEtaḥ̍ syAdatha yajamAnaḥ̍ pramIyEta̍ yad dvE naśyEtAM̍ dvau mAsau# saM~MvathsarasyAnavEtau̍ syAtAmatha yajamAnaḥ̍ pramIyEta̍ sa~gKyAyOd-vAsayati̍ yajamAnasya̍ - [ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam gOpIthAya|yadi̍|naśyE̱t|Aśvinam|dvikapAlamiti̍# dvi - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|dyAvApRuthivya̍miti̍# dyAvA - pRuthivya̱m|EkakapAlamityEka̍-kapAlam|aśvinau̱|vai|dEvAnA̱m|Biṣajau̱|tAByA̱m|Eva|asmai|BEṣajam|karOti|dyAvApRuthivya̍# iti# dyAvA - pRuthivyaḥ|Eka̍kapAla̍ ityEka-kapAlaḥ|Bavati|anayO̱ḥ|vai|Etat|naśyati|yat|naśya̍ti|anayO̱ḥ|Eva|Enat|vindati|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai||19 (32) (prajApatyaM - tE - &kṣO&nupAktO̍ - vEdEnABi vAsayati̍ tasmAd - yajamAnasya̍ - dvAtriṃśacca)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: gOpIthAya yadi naśyEdAśvinaM̍ dvikapAlaM̍ nirvapEd̍ dyAvApRuthivya-̍ mEkakapAlamaśvinau̍ vai dEvAnA̱M Biṣajau tAByAmEvAsmai̍# BEṣajaM karOti̍ dyAvApRuthivya# EkakapAlO̍ BavatyanayOrvA Etannaśyati̍ yannaśya-̍ tyanayOrEvaina̍d-vindati̍ pratiṣṭhityai||19̍ (prajApatyaM - tE - &kṣO&nupAktO̍ - vEdEnABi vAsayati̍ tasmAd - yajamAnasya̍ - dvAtriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam dEvasya|tvA|savituḥ|prasava̍ iti# pra - savE|iti|sPyam|Eti̍|dattE|prasU̱tyA̍ iti pra - sUtyai|aśvinO̱ḥ|bAhuByAmiti# bAhu-ByAm|iti|Aha|aśvinau̱|hi|dEvAnA̱m|addhvaryU̍ iti|AstA̱m|pUṣṇaḥ|hastA̱ByAm|iti̍|Aha|yatyai̱|śataBRu̍ṣṭiriti̍# śata - BRuṣṭiḥ|asi|vAnaspatyaḥ|dviṣataḥ|vadhaḥ|iti|Aha|vajra̱m|Eva|tat|samiti̍|śyati|BrAtRu̍vyAya|prahariṣyanniti̍# pra - hariṣyann|stabaMqyajuriti# staMba - yajuḥ|harati|EtAvatI|vai|pRuthivI|yAva̍tI|vEdi̍ḥ|tasyA̱ḥ|EtAva̍taḥ|Eva|BrAtRu̍vyam|niriti̍|Bajati|20̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvasya# tvA savituḥ prasava̍ iti sPyamA dattE̍ prasU̱tyA aśvinO̱ rbAhuByAmityAhA-śvinau̍ hi dEvAnAmaddhvaryU̍ AstA̱M pUṣṇO hastA̱ByAmityAha̍ yatyai# śataBRuṣṭirasi̍ vAnaspatyO dviṣatO̍ vadha ityAha̍ vajramEva̍ tath saṅśyati̍ BrAtRuvyAya̍ prahariṣyanth stamba̍ yajuṛ haratyEtAva̍tI̍ vai pRuthivI̍ yAvatI̍ vEdistasyA# EtAvata̍ Eva BrAtRuvyaM̍ nirBajati̍ - [ ] 20
