verses.samhita: agninA# rayimaśnavat̍ pOṣamEva̍ divEdivE|yaśasa̍M̍ ~MvIravattamaM||gOmAṃ̍# agnE&vimAṃ̍ aśvI yajñO nRuvathsaKA̍ sadamidapramRuṣyaḥ|iḍA̍vAṃ̍ EṣO asura̍ prajAvA̱n dIrGO rayiḥ pRuthubudhnaḥ̍ saBAvAn||ApyA̍yasva>1,̍ santE̱>2||iha tvaṣṭAramagriyaM̍ ~MviśvarUpamupa̍# hvayE|asmAkamastu̍ kEvalaḥ||tanna̍sturIpamadha̍# pOṣayitnu dEva# tvaṣṭarvi rarAṇaḥ̍ syasva|yatO̍# vIraḥ - [ ] 35

verses.padam: (Padam) karmaṇyaḥ|sudakṣa̍ iti# su - dakṣaḥ|yuktagrAvEti̍# yukta - grAvA|jAyatE|dEvakA̍ma̍ iti# dEva - kAmaḥ||śivaḥ|tvaṣṭaḥ|iha|Eti|gahi|viBuriti̍# vi - Buḥ|pOṣE̱|uta|tmanA̱||yajñE yajña̍ iti# yajñE - yajñE|naḥ|uditi|ava||piśa~gga̍rUpa̍ iti# piśa~gga-rUpaḥ|suBara̍ iti# su - Baraḥ|vayOdhA̍ iti# vayaḥ - dhAḥ|śruṣṭI|vIraḥ|jAyatE|dEvakAma̍ iti# dEva - kAmaḥ||prajAmiti# pra - jAm|tvaṣṭA̱|vIti|syatu|nABi̱m|asmE̍ iti|atha̍|dEvAnA̱m|apIti̍|Etu|pAtha̍ḥ||prEti̍|naḥ|dEvI|Eti̍|naḥ|divaḥ||pIpivAṃsa̱m|sara̍svataḥ|stana̱m|yaḥ|viśvada̍ṛśata̍ iti# viśva - darq.śataḥ||dhukṣImahi|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|iṣa̱m||36 (50)
verses.samhita: karmaṇya̍ḥ̍ sudakṣO# yuktagrAvA̍ jAyatE̍ dEvakAmaḥ||śivastva̍ṣṭarihA&&*̍ gahi̍ viBuḥ pOṣa# utatmanA̱|yajñEyajñE̍ na udava||piśa~gga̍rUpaḥ̍ suBarO# vayOdhAḥ śruṣṭI vIrO jAyatE̍ dEvakAmaḥ|prajAM̍ tvaṣṭA viṣyatu̍ nABimasmE̍ athA# dEvAnAmapyEtu̍ pAthaḥ||praṇO̍dE>3̍ vyA, nO# divaḥ >4||pIpivAṃ saṃq sarasvataḥ̍ stanaM ~MyO viśvadaṛśataḥ|dhukṣImahi̍# prajAmiṣa̱M||36

verses.padam: (Padam) yE|tE|sarasvaḥ|Urmayaḥ|madhu̍manta̍ iti madhu# - mantaḥ|GRutaścuta iti# GRuta - ścutaḥ||tEṣA̱m|tE|sumnam|ImahE||yasya̍|vratam|paśava̍ḥ|yanti̍|sarvE̱|yasya̍|vratam|upatiṣṭha̍nta̍ ityupa̍ -tiṣṭhantE|Apa̍ḥ||yasya̍|vratE|puṣṭipatiriti̍# puṣṭi-patiḥ|nivi̍ṣṭa̍ iti ni - viṣṭaḥ|tam|sarasvantam|ava̍sE|havEma||divyam|suparṇamiti̍# su - parṇam|vayasam|bRuhanta̱m|apAm|garBa̱m|vRuṣaBam|OṣadhInAm||aBIpataḥ|vRuṣṭyA|tarpaya̍ntam|tam|sara̍svantam|ava̍sE|huvEma||sinI̍vAli|pRuthu̍ṣṭuka̍ iti pRuthu# - stukE|yA|dEvAnA̱m|asi|svasA̱||juṣasva̍|havyam|37̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yE tE# sarasva UrmayO madhumantO̍ GRutaścutaḥ|tEṣA̱M̍ tE sumnamImahE||yasya̍# vrataM paśavO yanti sarvE yasya# vratamupatiṣṭha̍nta̍ Apaḥ|yasya̍# vratE puṣṭipatirnivi̍ṣṭastaṃ̍ sarasvantamava̍sE̍ huvEma||divyaṃ suparṇaM̍ ~MvayasaM̍ bRuhantamapAM̍ garBaM̍ ~MvRuṣaBamOṣadhInAM|aBIpatO̍ vRuṣṭyA tarpayantaM̍ taṃ sarasvantamava̍sE̍ huvEma||sinIvAli̍ pRuthuṣṭukE̍ yA dEvAnAmasi svasA̱|juṣasva# havya - [ ] 37

verses.padam: (Padam) AhutamityA̍ - hutam|prajAmiti# pra-jAm|dEvi|didiḍḍhi|naḥ||yA|supAṇiriti# su - pAṇiḥ|sva~gguririti# su - a~gguriḥ|suṣUmEti# su - sUmA̱|bahusUvarIti# bahu - sUvarI||tasyai̱|viśpatni̍yai|haviḥ|sinIvAlyai|juhOtana||indra̱m|vaḥ|viśvata̍ḥ|parIti̍|indra̱m|nara̍ḥ||asi̍tavarṇA̍ ityasita̍ - varṇAḥ|harayaḥ|suparṇA̍ iti# su - parṇAḥ|mihaḥ|vasA̍nAḥ|diva̱m|uditi̍|patanti||tE|Eti̍|avavRutrann|sada̍nAni|kRutvA|At|it|pRuthivI|GRutaiḥ|vIti̍|udyatE||hira̍ṇyakEśa̍ iti hiraṇya̍ - kEśaḥ|rajasaḥ|visAra̍ iti# vi - sArE|ahiḥ|dhuni̍ḥ|vAta̍ḥ|iva|dhrajI̍mAn||śuci̍BrAjA̍ iti śuci# - BrAjAḥ|uṣasaḥ|38̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mAhutaM̍ prajAM dEvi̍ didiḍḍhi naḥ||yA supAṇiḥ̍ sva~gguriḥ̍ suṣUmA# bahusUvarI|tasyai̍# viśpatniyai̍ haviḥ sinIvAlyai̍ juhOtana||indra̍M̍ ~MvO viśvatasparI>5, ndraM naraḥ>6||asi̍tavarṇA̍ harayaḥ̍ suparṇA mihO vasAnA̍ divamut patanti||ta̍ A&vavRutranth̍ sadanAni̍ kRutvA&&dit pRuthivI̍ GRutairvyudyatE||hira̍ṇyakEśO̍ rajasO̍ visArE&hirdhunirvAta# iva dhrajImAn|śuci̍BrAjA̍ uṣasO - [ ] 38

verses.padam: (Padam) navEdAḥ|yaśa̍svatIḥ|apasyuva̍ḥ|na|satyAḥ||Eti̍|tE|suparṇA̍ iti# su - parṇAḥ|aminanta|Evai̱ḥ|kRuṣṇaḥ|nOnAva|vRuṣaBaḥ|yadi|idam||śivABi̍ḥ|na|smaya̍mAnABiḥ|Eti̍|agAt|pata̍nti|miha̍ḥ|stanaya̍nti|aBrA||vAśrA|iva|vidyuditi̍# vi-dyut|mimAti|vathsam|na|mAtA|siṣakti||yat|EṣAm|vRuṣṭiḥ|asarji||parva̍taḥ|cit|mahi̍|vRuddhaḥ|biBAya|divaḥ|cit|sAnu̍|rEjata|svanE|vaḥ||yat|krIḍa̍tha|marutaḥ|39̍ (50)
verses.samhita: navEdA̍ yaśasvatIrapasyuvO̍ na satyAḥ||A tE# suparṇA aminanta̍ Evai̱ḥ kRuṣṇO nOnAva̍ vRuṣaBO yadIdaM|śivABirna smayamAnABirA&gAt̍ patanti̍ mihaḥ̍ stanayantyaBrA||vAśrEva̍# vidyunmimAti̍ vathsaM na mAtA siṣakti|yadE̍ṣAM̍ ~MvRuṣṭirasarji||parva̍taścinmahi̍# vRuddhO biBAya̍ divaścith sAnu# rEjata svanE vaḥ|yat̍ krIḍatha̍ maruta - [ ] 39

verses.padam: (Padam) Ruṣṭimanta ityRuṣṭi-manta̍ḥ|Apa̍ḥ|iva|saddhriya̍~jcaḥ|dhavaddhvE||aBIti̍|kranda|stanaya̍|garBa̱m|Eti̍|dhAḥ|udanvatEtyu̍dann̍ - vatA̱|parIti|dIya|rathE̍na||dRuti̱m|sviti̍|kaṛqṣa|viṣi̍tamiti̍ vi - sitam|nya~jcam|samAḥ|Bavantu|udvatEtya̍t̍ - vatA̱|nipAdA iti# ni - pAdAḥ||tvam|tyA|cit|acyutA|agnE̱|paśuḥ|na|yava̍sE||dhAma̍|ha|yat|tE|ajara|vanA̱|vRuścanti̍|śikva̍saḥ||agnE̱|BUrI̍ṇi|tava̍|jAtavEda̍ iti# jAta - vEdaḥ|dEva|svadhAva̍ iti# svadhA - vaḥ|amRutasya|dhAma̍||yAḥ|ca|40̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Ruṣṭimanta Apa# iva saddhriya~jcO̍ dhavaddhvE||aBi kranda̍ stanaya garBamA dhA# udanvatA pari# dIyA rathEna|dRutiṃq̍ su kaṛṣa̍ viṣitaM̍ nya~jcaṃ̍ samA BavantUdvatA̍# nipAdAḥ||tvaM tyA cidacyutA&gnE# paśurna yavasE|dhAmA̍# ha yat tE# ajara vanA# vRuścanti śikvasaḥ||agnE̍ BUrIṇi̍ tava# jAtavEdO dEva# svadhAvO&mRutasya̍ dhAma|yAśca̍# - [ ] 40

verses.padam: (Padam) mAyAḥ|mAyinA̱m|viśvaminvEti# viśvam-inva|tvE iti|pUrvIḥ|sandadhuriti̍# saM - dadhuḥ|pRuṣṭabandhO iti# pRuṣṭa - bandhO||divaḥ|naḥ|vRuṣṭim|marutaḥ|rarIddhvam|prEti|pinvata|vRuṣṇa̍ḥ|aśva̍sya|dhArA̱ḥ||arvA~g|EtEna̍|stanayitnunA̱|Eti̍|ihi|apaḥ|niṣi~jcanniti̍# ni -si~jcann|asuraḥ|pitA|naḥ||pinva̍nti|apaḥ|maruta̍ḥ|sudAna̍va̍ iti# su - dAnavaḥ|paya̍ḥ|GRutavaditi̍# GRuta - vat|vidathEṣu|ABuva̍ ityA̱ - Buvaḥ||atya̱m|na|mihE|vIti̍|nayanti|vAjina̱m|uthsa̱m|duhanti|stanaya̍ntam|akṣi̍tam||udapruta̍ ityuda̍ - prutaḥ|marutaḥ|tAn|iyarta|vRuṣṭi̱m|41̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mAyA mAyinA̱M ~Mviśvaminva tvE pUrvIḥ sandadhuḥ̍ pRuṣṭabandhO||divO̍ nO# vRuṣṭiM marutO̍ rarIddhvaM prapinvata̍ vRuṣṇO aśvasya̍ dhArA̱ḥ|arvA~gEtEna# stanayitnunEhyapO niṣi~jcannasu̍raḥ̍ pitA naḥ||pinva̍ntyapO̍ marutaḥ̍ sudAnavaḥ̍ payO# GRutavadvidathE̱ṣvA̍ Buvaḥ|atyaM̍ na mihE vi nayanti̍ vAjinamuthsaM̍ duhanti stanayantamakṣi̍taM||udaprutO̍# marutastAṃ iyarta̍ vRuṣṭiM - [ ] 41

verses.padam: (Padam) yE|viśvE̱|marutaḥ|junanti̍||krOśA̍ti|gardA̱|kanyA̱|iva|tunnA|pEru̱m|tu~jjAnA|patyA̱|iva|jAyA||GRutEna̍|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|madhunA|samiti̍|ukṣata|paya̍svatIḥ|kRuṇuta|Apa̍ḥ|Oṣa̍dhIḥ||Urja̱m|ca|tatra̍|sumatimiti̍# su - matim|ca|pinvatha|yatra|naraḥ|marutaḥ|si~jcatha̍|madhu̍||uditi̍|u|tyam|citram||aurvaBRuguvadityau̱vaBRugu̍ - vat|śuci̱m|apnavAnavadityapnavAna̍ - vat|Eti|huvE||agnim|samudravA̍sasamiti̍# samudra - vAsasam||Eti|savam|savituḥ|yathA|Baga̍sya̍ ( )|iva|Bujim|huvE||agnim|samudravAsasamiti̍# samudra - vAsasam||huvE|vAtasvanamiti̍ vAta# - svanam|kavim|parjanyakrandyamiti̍# parjanya# - krandyam|sahaḥ||agnim|samudravA̍sasamiti̍# samudra - vAsasam||42 (62) (vIra - iṣaṃ# - havya - muṣasO# - maruta - śca - vRuṣṭiM - Bagasya̍ - dvAdaśa̍ ca) (A11) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 11 Anuvaakams :- (prajApatirakAmayatai̍ - ṣa tE# gAyatrO - yajñaM ~Mvai - prajApatErjAya̍mAnAḥ̍ - prAjApatyA - yO vA ayathAdEvata̍ - miṣṭargO# - nigrAByA̱ḥ stha - yO vai dEvA - ~jjuṣṭO - &gninA# rayi - mEkAdaśa̍ ) Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (prajApatirakAmayata̍ - prajApatErjAya̍mAnA̍ - vyAyacCantE̍ - mahyamimA̍ - nmAyA mAyinAn - dvicatvAriṃśat)̍ First and Last Padam of First Prasnam Of Kandam 3:- (prajApatirakAmayatA̍ -&gniṃ samudravA̍sasaM̍ )||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM tRutIyakAṇḍE pada pAṭhE prathamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||=================================
verses.samhita: ~MyE viśvE# marutO# junanti|krOśA̍ti̍ gardA# kanyEva̍ tunnA pEruM̍ tu~jjAnA patyEva̍ jAyA||GRutEna dyAvApRuthivI̍ madhunA̍ samukṣata̍ payasvatIḥ̍ kRuṇatA&&*pa OṣadhIḥ|Urja̍M̍ ca tatra# sumatiM ca# pinvatha yatrA# narO marutaḥ si~jcathA madhu||udutyaM̍ >7, citraM >8||aurva-BRuguvacCucimapnavAnavadA̍ huvE|agniṃ̍ samudravA̍sasaM||A̍ savaṃ saviturya̍thA̍ BagasyE̍ ( ) va Bujiṃ huvE|agniṃ̍ samudravA̍sasaM||huvE̍ vAtasvanaM̍ kaviM parjanyakrandyaṃq̍ sahaḥ|agniṃ̍ samudravA̍sasaM||42̍ (vIra - iṣaṃ# - havya - muṣasO# - maruta - śca - vRuṣṭiM - Bagasya̍ - dvAdaśa̍ ca) (A11) praśna korvai with starting padams of 1 to 11 anuvAkams :- (prajApatirakAmayatai̍ - ṣa tE# gAyatrO - yajñaM ~Mvai - prajApatErjAya̍mAnAḥ̍ - prAjApatyA - yO vA ayathAdEvata̍ - miṣṭargO# - nigrAByA̱ḥ stha - yO vai dEvA - ~jjuṣṭO - &gninA# rayi - mEkAdaśa̍ ) korvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (prajApatirakAmayata̍ - prajApatErjAya̍mAnA̍ - vyAyacCantE̍ - mahyamimA̍ - nmAyA mAyinAn - dvicatvAriṃśat)̍ first and last padam of first praśnam of kAṇḍam 3:- (prajApatirakAmayatA̍ -&gniṃ samudravA̍sasaM̍ )||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM tRutIyakAṇḍE prathamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||3.1.1 appendix 1. 3.1.11.1 - A pyAyasva̍ >1 ApyAsva̍ samEtu̍ tE viśvataḥ̍ sOma vRuṣṇiyaM|BavA̍ vAjasya̍ saMgathE||(Appearing in ṭś 4-2-7-4) 2. 3.1.11.1 - santE# >2 saM tE payAṃsi̍ samu# yantu vAjAḥ saM ~MvRuṣṇiyAn.̍ yaBimAtiṣAhaḥ|ApyAya̍mAnO̍ amRutAya̍ sOma divi śravAṅsyuttamAni̍# dhiṣva||(Appearing in ṭś 4-2-7-4) 3 & 4. 3.1.11.2 - praṇO# dEvyA>3, nO# divaḥ>4 praṇO# dEvI sarasvatI̍ vAjEBirvAjinI̍vatI|dhInAma̍vitrya̍vatu||A̍ nO# divO bRuhataḥ̍ parvatAdA̍ sarasvatI̍ yajatA gantu̍ yajñaM|havaM̍ dEvI jujuṣAṇA̍ GRutAcI# śagmAM nO vAcamuśatI̍ śRuṇOtu|̍

verses.padam: - Padam yaḥ|vai|pavamAnAnAm|anvArOhAnitya̍nu̍ - ArOhAn|vidvAn|yajatE|anviti̍|pava̍mAnAn|Eti̍|rOhati|na|pava̍mAnEByaḥ|avEti̍|CidyatE|śyEnaḥ|asi|gAyatraCa̍ndA̍ iti# gAyatra-CandAḥ|anviti|tvA|Eti̍|raBE|svasti|mA|samiti̍|pAraya|suparṇa̍ iti# su - parṇaḥ|asi|triṣṭupCandA̍ iti# triṣṭup - CandAḥ|anviti|tvA|Eti̍|raBE|svasti|mA|samiti̍|pAraya|saGA̱|asi|jaga̍tICandA̍ iti jagatI̍ - CandAḥ|anviti|tvA|Eti̍|raBE|svasti|mA|samiti̍|pAraya|iti̍|Aha|EtE|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yO vai pavamAnAnAmanvArOhAn.̍ vidvAn. yajatE&nu pavamAnAnA̍ rOhati̍ na pavamAnEByO-&va̍# cCidyatE śyEnO&si̍ gAyatraCandA̍ anu tvA&&raBE̍ svasti mA saM pAraya̍ suparṇO&si̍ triṣṭupCandA̍ anu tvA&&raBE̍ svasti mA saM pAraya̍ saGA&si̍ jagatICandA̍ anu tvA&&raBE̍ svasti mA saMpArayEtyA̍haitE-̍ [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam vai|pavamAnAnAm|anvArOhA̍ ityanu̍ - ArOhAḥ|tAn|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|yajatE|anviti̍|pava̍mAnAn|Eti̍|rOhati|na|pava̍mAnEByaḥ|avEti̍|CidyatE|yaḥ|vai|pava̍mAnasya|saMta̍timiti̍ saM - tatim|vEda|sarva̱m|Ayu̍ḥ|Eti|na|purA|Ayu̍ṣaḥ|prEti̍|mIyatE|paśumAniti̍# paśu-mAn|Bavati|vindatE̱|prajAmiti# pra - jAm|pavamAnasya|grahA̱ḥ|gRuhyantE|atha̍|vai|asya|EtE|agRu̍hItAḥ|drOṇakalaśa̍ iti# drOṇa - kalaśaḥ|AdhavanIya ityA̱ - dhavanIyaḥ|pUtaBRuditi̍# pUta-BRut|tAn|yat|agRuhItvA|upAkuryAdityu̍pa̍ - AkuryAt|pavamAnam|vIti̍|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vai pavamAnAnAmanvArOhAstAn.̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAn. yajatE&nu pavamAnAnA̍ rOhati̍ na pavamAnEByO&va̍# cCidyatE yO vai pavamAnasya̍ santatiM̍ ~MvEda sarvamAyurEti̍ na purA&&yuṣaḥ̍ pra mIyatE̍ paśumAn Bavati̍ vindatE̱ prajAM pavamAnasya̍ grahA# gRuhyantE&tha vA asyaitE&gRu̍hItA̍ drOṇakalaśa AdhavanIya̍ḥ̍ pUtaBRut tAn. yadagRuhItvOpAkuryAt̍ pavamAnaM̍ ~Mvi - [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam CindyAt|tam|vicCidyamAnamiti̍# vi - CidyamAnam|addhvaryOḥ|prAṇa̍ iti# pra -anaḥ|anu|vIti̍|CidyEta|upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|prajApataya̍ iti# prajA-patayE|tvA|iti|drOṇakalaśamiti̍# drOṇa - kalaśam|aBIti|mRuśEt|indrA̍ya|tvA|iti̍|AdhavanIyamityA̱̍ - dhavanIya̱m|viśvE̱Byaḥ|tvA|dEvEByaḥ|iti̍|pUtaBRutamiti̍# pUta - BRuta̱m|pavamAnam|Eva|tat|samiti̍|tanOti|sarva̱m|Ayu̍ḥ|Eti|na|purA|Ayu̍ṣaḥ|prEti̍|mIyatE|paśumAniti̍# paśu - mAn|Bavati|vindatE̱|prajAmiti# pra - jAm||3 (42) (EtE - vi - dvicatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A1)
verses.samhita: cCindyAt̍ taM ~MvicCidyamAnamaddhvaryOḥ̍ prAṇO&nu vicCidyE-tOpayAmagRu̍hItO&si̍ prajApatayE̍ tvEti# drOṇakalaśamaBi mRuśEdindrA̍ya̍ tvEtyAdhavanIyaM̍ ~MviśvE̱ByastvA dEvEBya iti# pUtaBRutaM pavamAnamEva̍ tath saM tanOti̍ sarvamAyurEti̍ na purA&&yuṣaḥ̍ pramIyatE̍ paśumAn Bavati̍ vindatE̱ prajAM||3 (EtE - vi - dvicatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam trIṇi|vAva|sava̍nAni|atha̍|tRutIya̱m|sava̍nam|avEti̍|lupaMqnti|anaṃqśu|kurvanta̍ḥ|upAṃqśumityu̍pa̍ - aṃqśum|hutvA|upAṃqśupAtra ityupAṃśu̍ - pAtrE|aṃqśum|avAsyEtyava̍ - asya|tam|tRutIyasavana̍ iti# tRutIya - savanE|apisRujyEtyapi̍ - sRujya|aBIti̍|sunuyAt|yat|ApyAyayatIyA̱̍ - pyAyayati|tEna̍|aṃqśumadityaṃ̍śu-mat|yat|aBiṣuṇOtItya̍Bi-sunOti̍|tEna̍|RujIṣi|sarvA̍ṇi|Eva|tat|sava̍nAni|aṃqśumantItyaṃ̍śu̍ - manti|śukravantIti̍# śukra - vanti|samAvad̍ vIryAṇIti# samAvat̍ - vIryAṇi|karOti|dvau|samudrau|vitatAviti̍ vi - tatau|ajUryau|paryAvartEtE̍ iti# pari-AvartEtE|jaṭharA̱|iva|pAdA̱ḥ||tayO̱ḥ|paśya̍ntaḥ|atIti̍|yanti|anyam|apa̍śyantaḥ|4̍ (50)
verses.samhita: trIṇi vAva savanAnyatha̍# tRutIyaṃq savanamava̍# lumpantyanaṃqśu kurvanta# upAṃqśuṃhutvOpAṃśupAtrE&ṃ̍śumavAsya̍ tantRutIyasavanE̍# &pisRujyABi ṣuṇuyAdyadA̱pyAyaya̍ti̍ tEnAṃśumadyada̍BiṣuṇOti̍ tEnarjIṣi̍ sarvA̱ṇyEva tath savanAnyaṃśumanti̍# śukravanti̍ samAvadvIryAṇi̍ karOti dvau samudrau̍ vitatAvajUryau̍ paryAvartEtE̍ jaṭharEva̍ pAdA̱ḥ|tayOḥ paśyantO̍ ati# yantyanyamapaśyantaḥ̍ - [ ] 4

verses.padam: - Padam sEtunA|atIti̍|yanti|anyam||dvE̍ iti|dradha̍sI̍ iti|satatI̍ iti# sa - tatI̱|vastE|Ekaḥ|kEśI|viśvA̱|Buva̍nAni|vidvAn||tirOdhAyEti̍# tiraḥ - dhAya|Eti|asi̍tam|vasA̍naḥ|śukram|Eti̍|dattE|anuhAyEtya̍nu̍ - hAya|jAryai||dEvAḥ|vai|yat|yajñE|aku̍rvata|tat|asu̍rAḥ|akurvata|tE|dEvAḥ|Etam|mahAyajñamiti̍# mahA - yajñam|apaśyann|tam|atanvata|agnihOtramityagni̍ - hOtram|vratam|akurvata|tasmA̱t|dvivrata̍ iti dvi - vrataḥ|syAt|dviḥ|hi|agnihOtramityagni̍ - hOtram|juhvati|paurṇamAsamiti̍# paurṇa - mAsam|yajñam|agnIṣOmIyamityagnI̍ - sOmIya̱m|5 (50)
verses.samhita: sEtunA&ti# yantyanyaM||dvE dradhasI̍ satatI# vasta Ekaḥ̍ kEśI viśvA BuvanAni̍ vidvAn|tirOdhAyaityasitaM̍ ~MvasAnaḥ̍ śukramA dattE̍ anuhAya# jAryai||dEvA vai yadyajñE&kurvata̍ tadasurA̍ akurvata tE dEvA EtaM mahAyajñama̍paśyan̍ tamatanvatAgnihOtraM̍ ~Mvratamakurvata̍ tasmAd dvivrataḥ̍ syAd dvirhyagnihOtraM̍ juhvati̍ paurṇamAsaM ~MyajñamagnIṣOmIya̍M̍ - [ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam paśum|akurvata|dArśyam|yajñam|AgnEyam|paśum|akurvata|vaiśvadEvamiti# vaiśva - dEvam|prAtassavanamiti# prAtaḥ - savanam|akurvata|varuṇapraGAsAniti# varuṇa - praGAsAn|mAddhyandinam|sava̍nam|sAkamEdhAniti̍# sAka - mEdhAn|pitRuyajñamiti# pitRu - yajñaM|tryabaMkAniti̍ tri - abaMqkAn|tRutIyasavanamiti# tRutIya - savanam|akurvata|tam|EṣAm|asurAḥ|yajñam|anvavA̍jigAṃsannitya̍nu-avA̍jigAṃsann|tam|na|anvavA̍yannitya̍nu-avA̍yann|tE|abruvann|addhvartavyAḥ|vai|imE|dEvAḥ|aBUvann|iti̍|tat|addhvarasya̍|addhvaratvamitya̍ddhvara̍ - tvam|tataḥ|dEvAḥ|aBa̍vann|parEti̍|asu̍rAḥ|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|sOmE̍na|yaja̍tE|Bava̍ti|AtmanA̱|parEti̍# ( )|asya|BrAtRuvyaḥ|Bavati||6̍ (53)
verses.samhita: paśumakurvata̍ dArśyaM ~MyajñamA̱gnEyaM paśumakurvata̍ vaiśvadEvaM prAtassavana̍ -makurvata̍ varuṇapraGAsAn mAddhyadiMnaṃq̍ savanaṃ̍ sAkamEdhAn pitRuyajñaM̍ tryambakAṅ-stRutIyasavanama̍kurvata̍ tamEṣAmasu̍rA̍ yajña -manvavAjigAṃsan̍ taM nA&nvavAyan̍ tE̱&bruvannaddhvartavyA vA imE dEvA aBUvanniti̍ tadaddhvarasyA̱̍ &ddhvaratvaM tatO# dEvA aBavan̍ parA&surA̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAnth sOmEna̍ yajatE̍ BavatyAtmanA̍ parA̱ ( ) &sya BrAtRuvyO̍ Bavati||6

verses.padam: - Padam pariBUriti# pari - BUḥ|agnim|pariBUriti# pari - BUḥ|indra̱m|pariBUriti# pari - BUḥ|viśvAn|dEvAn|pariBUriti̍# pari - BUḥ|mAm|saha|brahmavarcasEnEti# brahma - varcasEna|saḥ|naḥ|pavasva|śam|gavE̱|śam|janA̍ya|śam|arva̍tE|śam|rAjann|Oṣa̍dhIBya̍ ityOṣadhi̍ - Byaḥ|acCinnasya|tE|rayipata̍ iti# rayi - patE|suvIryasyEti# su - vIryasya|rAyaḥ|pOṣa̍sya|daditAra̍ḥ|syAma||tasya̍|mE|rAsva|tasya̍|tE|BakṣIya|tasya̍|tE|idam|uditi̍|mRujE||prAṇAyEti̍# pra -anAya|mE|varcOdA̍ iti# varcaḥ - dAḥ|varcasE|pavasva|apAnAyEtyapa̍# - anAya|vyAnAyEti̍# vi - anAya|vAcE|7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pariBUragniM pariBUrindra̍M̍ pariBUrviśvA̱n dEvAn pariBUrmAṃ̍ saha brahmavarcasEna̍ sa naḥ̍ pavasva śaM gavE śaM janAya̍ śamarvatE̍ śaṃ rAjannOṣa̍dhIByO̍ &cCinnasya̍ tE rayipatE suvIryasya̍ rAyaspOṣasya̍ daditAraḥ̍ syAma|tasya# mE rAsva tasya# tE BakṣIya tasya# ta idamunmRujE||prAṇAya̍# mE varcOdA varcasE̍ pavasvA pAnAya# vyAnAya# vAcE - [ ] 7

verses.padam: - Padam dakṣakratuByAmiti# dakṣakratu - ByAm|cakṣurByAmiti̍ cakṣuḥ̍ - ByAm|mE|varcOdAviti# varcaḥ-dau|varcasE|pavEthAm|śrOtrA̍ya|AtmanE̱|a~ggE̱Byaḥ|Ayu̍ṣE|vIryA̍ya|viṣṇO̱ḥ|indra̍sya|viśvE̍ṣAm|dEvAnA̱m|jaṭhara̱m|asi|varcOdA̍ iti# varcaḥ-dAḥ|mE|varcasE|pavasva|kaḥ|asi|kaḥ|nAma̍|kasmai̱|tvA|kAya̍|tvA|yam|tvA|sOmE̍na|atI̍tRupam|yam|tvA|sOmE̍na|amI̍madam|suprajA̍ iti# su - prajAḥ|prajayEti# pra - jayA̱|BUyAsam|suvIra iti# su - vIraḥ|vIraiḥ|suvarcA̍ iti# su - varcA̱ḥ|varcasA|supOṣa̍ iti# su - pOṣaḥ|pOṣai̱ḥ|viśvE̱Byaḥ|mE|rUpEBya̍ḥ|varcOdA̍ iti# varcaḥ - dAḥ|8 (50)
verses.samhita: dakṣakratuByAM̍ cakṣurByAM̍ mE varcOdau varcasE̍ pavEthAṅq śrOtrAyA̍ &&*tmanE &~ggE̱Bya AyuṣE̍ vIryAya̍ viṣṇOrindrasya̍ viśvEṣAM̍ dEvAnA̱M jaṭharamasi̍ varcOdA mE varcasE̍ pavasva kO&si̍ kO nAma kasmai̱ tvA kAya# tvA yaM tvA sOmEnAtItRupaM̍ ~MyaM tvA sOmEnAmImadaṃ̍ suprajAḥ prajayA# BUyAsaṃ suvIrO# vIraiḥ suvarcA varcasA̍ supOṣaḥ pOṣai-rviśvE̱ByO mE rUpEByO# varcOdA- [ ] 8

verses.padam: - Padam varcasE|pavasva|tasya̍|mE|rAsva|tasya̍|tE|BakṣIya|tasya̍|tE|idam|uditi̍|mRujE||buBU̍ṣann|avEti̍|IkṣEta|Eṣaḥ|vai|pAtri̍yaḥ|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|yajñaḥ|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|tam|Eva|tarpayati|saḥ|Enam|tRuptaḥ|BUtyA̱|aBIti|pavatE|brahmavarcasakA̍ma̍ iti# brahmavarcasa-kAmaḥ|avEti|IkṣEta|Eṣaḥ|vai|pAtri̍yaḥ|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|yajñaḥ|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|tam|Eva|tarpayati|saḥ|Enam|tRuptaḥ|brahmavarcasEnEti# brahma - varcasEna|aBIti̍|pavatE|AmayAvI|9̍ (50)
verses.samhita: varcasE̍ pavasva tasya# mE rAsva tasya# tE BakṣIya tasya# ta idamunmRujE||buBU̍ṣannavE̱kṣEtaiṣa̍ vai pAtriyaḥ̍ prajApatiryajñaḥ̍ prajApatistamEva̍ tarpayati̍ sa EnaM̍ tRuptO BUtyA&Bi pavatE̍ brahmavarcasakAmO-&vE̱kṣEtaiṣa vai pAtriyaḥ̍ prajApatiryajñaḥ̍ prajApatistamEva̍ tarpayati̍ sa EnaM̍ tRuptO brahmavarcasEnABi̍ pavata̍ AmayAvya - [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam avEti|IkṣEta|Eṣaḥ|vai|pAtri̍yaḥ|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|yajñaḥ|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|tam|Eva|tarpayati|saḥ|Enam|tRuptaḥ|AyuṣA|aBIti̍|pavatE|aBicarannitya̍Bi̍ - carann|avEti̍|IkṣEta|Eṣaḥ|vai|pAtri̍yaḥ|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|yajñaḥ|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|tam|Eva|tarpayati|saḥ|Enam|tRuptaḥ|prAṇApAnAByAmiti# prAṇa - apAnAByA̱m|vAcaḥ|dakṣakratuByAmiti# dakṣakratu - ByAm|cakṣurByAmiti̍ cakṣuḥ̍ - ByAm|śrOtrA̱ByAm|Atmanaḥ|a~ggE̱Byaḥ|Ayu̍ṣaḥ|antaḥ|Eti|tAjak|prEti̍|dhanvati||10̍ (45) (vAcE-rUpEByO# varcOdA - AmayAvI̍ - pa~jcacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: vE̱kṣEtaiṣa vai pAtriyaḥ̍ prajApatiryajñaḥ̍ prajApatistamEva̍ tarpayati̍ sa EnaM̍ tRupta AyuṣA&Bi̍ pavatE&BicarannavE̱kṣEtaiṣa̍ vai pAtriyaḥ̍ prajApatiryajñaḥ̍ prajApatistamEva̍ tarpayati̍ sa EnaM̍ tRuptaḥ prAṇApAnAByA̱M̍ ~MvAcO dakṣakratuByAM̍ cakṣurByAṅq̍ śrOtrA̱ByA-mAtmanO&~ggE̱Bya AyuṣO&ntarE̍ti̍ tAjak pra dhanvati||10̍ (vAcE-rUpEByO# varcOdA - AmayAvI̍ - pa~jcacatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam sPyaḥ|svastiḥ|viGana iti# vi - Ganaḥ|svastiḥ|paṛśuḥ|vEdi̍ḥ|paraśuḥ|naḥ|svastiḥ||yajñiyA̱ḥ|yajñakRuta̍ iti# yajña-kRutaḥ|stha|tE|mA|asminn|yajñE|upEti̍|hvayaddhvam|upEti̍|mA|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱-pRuthivI|hvayEtAm|upEti|AstAva̍ ityA̱ - stAvaḥ|kalaśaḥ|sOma̍ḥ|agniḥ|upEti̍|dEvAḥ|upEti̍|yajñaḥ|upEti̍|mA|hOtrA̱ḥ|upahava̍ ityupa-havE|hvayantAm|nama̍ḥ|agnayE̱|maKaGna̍ iti# maKa-GnE|maKasya|mA|yaśa̍ḥ|aryAt|iti̍|AhavanIyamityA̱̍ - havanIya̱m|upEti|tiṣṭhatE|yajñaḥ|vai|maKaḥ|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sPyaḥ svastirviGanaḥ̍ svastiḥ paṛśurvEdiḥ̍ paraśurnaḥ̍ svastiḥ|yajñiyA# yajñakRutaḥ̍ stha tE mAsmin yajña upa# hvayaddhvamupa# mA dyAvApRuthivI̍ hvayEtAmupA̱&&*stAvaḥ̍ kalaśaḥ sOmO# agnirupa# dEvA upa# yajña upa# mA hOtrA# upahavE hvayantAM̍ namO&gnayE# maKaGnEmaKasya# mA yaśO̱&ryAdityAhavanIyamupa̍# tiṣṭhatE yajñO vai maKO - [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam yajñam|vAva|saḥ|tat|ahann|tasmai̱|Eva|namaskRutyEti# namaḥ - kRutya|sada̍ḥ|prEti̍|sarpati|Atmana̍ḥ|anA̱rtyai|nama̍ḥ|rudrAya̍|maKaGna̍ iti# maKa - GnE|namaskRutyEti̍ namaḥ-kRutyA|mA|pAhi|iti̍|AgnI̱ddhramityAgni̍# - iddhram|tasmai̱|Eva|namaskRutyEti# namaḥ - kRutya|sada̍ḥ|prEti̍|sarpati|Atmana̍ḥ|anA̱rtyai|nama̍ḥ|indrA̍ya|maKaGna̍ iti# maKa - GnE|indriyam|mE|vIrya̱m|mA|niriti|vadhIḥ|iti̍|hOtrIya̱m|AśiṣamityA̱̍ - śiṣa̱m|Eva|EtAm|Eti|śAstE|indriyasya̍|vIrya̍sya|ani̍rGAtAyEtyani̍ḥ̍ - GAtAya|yAḥ|vai|12 (50)
verses.samhita: yajñaM ~MvAva sa tadahan̍ tasmA# Eva namaskRutya̍ sadaḥ prasarpatyAtmanO&nA̱rtyai̍ namO# rudrAya# maKaGnE namaskRutyA̍ mA pAhItyAgnI̱ddhraM tasmA# Eva namaskRutya̍ sadaḥ prasarpatyAtmanO&nA̱rtyai̍ nama indrAya̍ maKaGna indriyaM̍ mE# vIryaM̍ mA nirvadhIriti̍# hOtrIyamAśiṣa̍mEvaitAmA̍ śA̱staindriyasya# vIryasyAni̍rGAtAya̍ yA vai - [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam dEvatA̱ḥ|sadasi|Arti̱m|ArpayantItyA̱̍ - arpayanti|yaḥ|tAḥ|vidvAn|prasarpatIti̍# pra - sarpati|na|sada̍si|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCati|nama̍ḥ|agnayE̱|maKaGna̍ iti# maKa - GnE|iti|Aha|EtAḥ|vai|dEvatA̱ḥ|sada̍si|Arti̱m|Eti̍|arpayanti|tAḥ|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|prasarpatIti̍# pra - sarpati|na|sada̍si|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCati|dRuḍhE̍ iti|sthaḥ|śithirE̍ iti|samIcI̍ iti|mA|aṃha̍saḥ|pAtam|sUrya̍ḥ|mA|dEvaḥ|divyAt|aṃha̍saḥ|pAtu|vAyuḥ|antari̍kṣAt|13̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvatAḥ sadasyArtimArpaya̍nti̍ yastA vidvAn prasarpati̍ na sadasyArtimArcCati̍ namO&gnayE# maKaGna ityAhaitA̍ vai dEvatAḥ sadasyArtimA&rpayanti̍ tA ya EvaM ~MvidvAn prasarpati̍ na sadasyArtimArcCati̍ ddRuḍhE sthaḥ̍ śithirE samIcI mA&ṃhasaspAtaṃq̍ sUryO# mA dEvO divyAdaṃhasaspAtu̍ vAyurantarikṣA̍ - [ ] 13

verses.padam: - Padam agniḥ|pRuthivyAḥ|yamaḥ|pitRuBya iti# pitRu - Byaḥ|sarasvatI|manuṣyE̱Byaḥ|dEvI̍ iti|dvArau|mA|mA|samiti̍|tAptam|nama̍ḥ|sada̍sE|nama̍ḥ|sada̍saḥ|pata̍yE|nama̍ḥ|saKI̍nAm|purOgAṇAmiti̍# puraḥ - gAnA̱m|cakṣuṣE|nama̍ḥ|divE|nama̍ḥ|pRuthivyai|ahE̱|daidhiṣavya|uditi̍|ata̍ḥ|tiṣṭha|anyasya̍|sada̍nE|sIda|yaḥ|asmat|pAka̍tara̍ iti pAka# - taraḥ|uditi|nivata̍ iti# ni-vataḥ|uditi̍|udvata̍ ityut̍ - vataḥ|ca|gEṣam|pAtam|mA|dyAvApRuthivI̍ iti# dyAvA - pRuthivI|adya|ahnaḥ|sada̍ḥ|vai|prasarpa̍ntamiti̍# pra - sarpantam|14̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dagniḥ pRuthivyA̍ yamaḥ pitRuByaḥ sarasvatI̍ manuṣyE̱ByO dEvI̱ dvArau mA mA saM tA̱ptaM namaḥ sadasE̍ namaḥ sadasaspata̍yE̍ namaḥ saKInAM̍ purOgAṇAM cakṣuṣE̍ namO# divE namaḥ̍ pRuthivyA ahE# daidhiṣavyOdatastiṣṭhA&nyasya̍ sadanE̍ sIda yO̱&smat pAkatara̍ unnivata ududvataśca̍ gEṣaM pAtaM mA̱ dyAvApRuthivI adyAhnaḥ sadO vai prasarpantaM̍ - [ ] 14

verses.padam: - Padam pitaraḥ|anu̍|prEti̍|sarpanti|tE|Enam|IśvarAḥ|hiṃsi̍tOḥ|sada̍ḥ|prasRupyEti̍# pra - sRupya|dakṣiṇArddhamiti̍# dakṣiṇa - arddham|parEti|IkṣEta|Eti̍|aganta|pitaraḥ|pitRumAniti̍# pitRu - mAn|aham|yuṣmABiḥ|BUyAsam|suprajasa̍ iti# su-prajasaḥ|mayA̱|yUyam|BUyAsta|iti̍|tEBya̍ḥ|Eva|namaskRutyEti̍# namaḥ-kRutya|sada̍ḥ|prEti̍|sarpati|Atmana̍ḥ|anA̱rtyai||15̍ (33) (maKO - vA - antarikṣAt̍ - prasarpantaM̍ - trayastriṃśacca)̍ (A4)
verses.samhita: pitarO&nu prasarpanti̍ ta EnamIśvarA̍ hiṃsitOḥ̍ sadaḥ̍ prasRupya# dakṣiṇArddhaM parE̱kṣEtA&ganta̍ pitaraḥ pitRumAnahaM ~MyuṣmABirBUyAsaṃ̍ suprajasO mayA# yUyaM BUyAstEti̍ tEBya# Eva namaskRutya̍ sadaḥ prasarpatyAtmanO&nA̱rtyai||15̍ (maKO - vA - antarikṣAt̍ - prasarpantaM̍ - trayastriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam Bakṣa|Eti̍|ihi|mA|Eti̍|viśa|dIrGAyutvAyEti̍# dIrGAyu - tvAya|śantanutvAyEti̍# śantanu - tvAya|rAyaḥ|pOṣA̍ya|varca̍sE|suprajAstvAyEti̍# suprajAḥ-tvAya|Eti̍|ihi|vasO̍ iti|purOvasO̍ iti# puraḥ - vasO|priyaḥ|mE|hRudaḥ|asi|aśvinO̱ḥ|tvA|bAhuByAmiti# bAhu- ByAm|saGyAsam|nRucakṣasamiti̍# nRu - cakṣasam|tvA|dEva|sOma|sucakṣA̍ iti# su - cakṣA̱ḥ|avEti|KyEṣam|mandrA|aBiBU̍tirityaBi̍ - BUtiḥ|kEtuḥ|yajñAnA̱m|vAk|juṣAṇA|sOmasya|tRupyatu|mandrA|sva̍rvAcIti̍ su - arvAcI|aditiḥ|anA̍hataśIrṣṇItyanA̍hata̍ - śIrṣṇI|vAk|juṣAṇA|sOmasya|tRupyatu|Eti̍|ihi|viśvacarq.ṣaṇa̍ iti# viśva - carq.ṣaṇE|16 (50)
verses.samhita: BakṣEhi mA &&viśa̍ dIrGAyutvAya# śantanutvAya# rAyaspOṣAya̍ varcasE̍ suprajAstvAyEhi# vasO purO vasO priyO mE# hRudO̱&syaśvinO̱stvA bAhuByAṃ# saGyAsaM nRucakṣasaM̍ tvA dEva sOma sucakṣA ava# KyEṣaM mandrA&BiBUtiḥ̍ kEturyajñAnAM ~MvAgjuṣAṇA̍ sOmasya̍ tRupyatu mandrA svarvAcyadi̍tiranA̍hata̍ śIrṣṇI vAgjuṣAṇA̍ sOmasya̍ tRupyatvEhi# viśvacaṛṣaṇE - [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam śaBUMriti# śaM - BUḥ|mayOBUriti# mayaḥ - BUḥ|svasti|mA|harivarṇEti# hari - varṇa|prEti|cara|kratvE̱|dakṣA̍ya|rAyaḥ|pOṣA̍ya|suvIratA̍yA̍ iti# su-vIratAyai|mA|mA|rAjann|vIti̍|bIBiṣaḥ|mA|mE|hArdi̍|tviṣA|vadhIḥ||vRuṣa̍ṇE|śuṣmA̍ya|Ayu̍ṣE|varca̍sE||vasu̍mad̍ gaṇasyEti vasumat̍ - gaṇasya|sOma|dEva|tE|mativida iti# mati - vidaḥ|prAtassavanasyEti̍# prAtaḥ - savanasya|gAyatraCa̍ndasa̍ iti# gAyatra - Candasaḥ|indrapItasyEtIndra̍# - pItasya|narAśaṃsapItasyEti̍ narAśaṃsa# - pItasya|pitRupItasyEti̍# pitRu - pItasya|madhumata̍ iti madhu# - mataḥ|upahUtasyEtyupa̍# - hUtasya|upahUta̍ ityupa# - hUtaḥ|BakṣayAmi|rudravadgaṇasyEti̍# rudravat̍ - gaṇasya|sOma|dEva|tE|mativida iti# mati - vidaḥ|mAddhya̍ndinasya|sava̍nasya|triṣṭupCa̍ndasa̍ iti# triṣṭup - Candasaḥ|indrapItasyEtIndra̍# - pItasya|narAśaṃsapItasyEti̍ narAśaṃsa# - pItasya|17 (50)
verses.samhita: śamBUrmayOBUḥ̍ svasti mA# harivarṇa pracara̍ kratvE dakṣAya̍ rAyaspOṣAya̍ suvIratAyai̍ mA mA# rAjan. vi bIBiṣO̍ mA mE hArdi# tviṣA vadhIḥ|vRuṣa̍ṇE̍ śuṣmAyA&&yuṣE̍ varcasE||vasu̍mad-gaṇasya̍ sOma dEva tE matividaḥ̍ prAtassavanasya# gAyatraCandasa̍ indrapItasya̍ narAśaṃsapItasya̍ pitRupItasya̍ madhumata̍ upahUtasyOpa̍hUtO̍ BakṣayAmi rudravad-gaṇasya̍ sOma dEva tE matividO mAddhyandinasya̍ savanasya̍ triṣṭupCandasa̍ indrapItasya̍ narAśaṃ sapItasya̍ - [ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam pitRupItasyEti̍# pitRu - pItasya|madhumata̍ iti madhu# - mataḥ|upahUtasyEtyupa̍# - hUtasya|upahUta̍ ityupa# - hUtaḥ|BakṣayAmi|AdityavadgaṇasyEtyA̍dityava̍t̍ - gaṇasya|sOma|dEva|tE|mativida iti# mati - vidaḥ|tRutIya̍sya|sava̍nasya|jaga̍tICandasa̍ iti jagatI̍ - Candasaḥ|indrapItasyEtIndra̍# - pItasya|narAśaṃsapItasyEti̍ narAśaṃsa# - pItasya|pitRupItasyEti̍# pitRu - pItasya|madhumata̍ iti madhu# - mataḥ|upahUtasyEtyupa̍# - hUtasya|upahUta̍ ityupa-hUtaḥ|BakṣayAmi||Eti̍|pyAyasva|samiti̍|Etu|tE|viśvata̍ḥ|sOma|vRuṣṇi̍yam||Bava̍|vAja̍sya|sa~ggatha̍ iti# saM - gathE||hinva|mE|gAtrA̱|hariva̍ iti# hari - vaḥ|gaṇAn|mE|mA|vIti|tItRuṣaḥ||śivaḥ|ma|saptarq.ṣIniti̍# sapta-RuṣIn|upEti|tiṣṭhasva|mA|mE|avA~g̍|nABi̱m|atIti̍|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pitRupItasya̍ madhumata̍ upahUtasyOpa̍hUtO̍ BakṣayAmyAdityavad-gaṇasya̍ sOma dEva tE matividastRutIya̍sya̍ savanasya̍ jagatICandasa̍ indrapItasya̍ narAśaṃ sapItasya̍ pitRupItasya̍ madhumata̍ upahUtasyOpa̍hUtO̍ BakṣayAmi||ApyAyasva̍ samEtu̍ tE viśvataḥ̍ sOma vRuṣṇiyaM|BavA̍ vAjasya̍ sa~ggathE||hinva# mE gAtrA# harivO gaṇAn mE mA vitItRuṣaḥ|śivO̍ mE# saptarq.ṣInupa# tiṣṭhasva mA mE&vA~gnABimati# - [ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam gAḥ||apAma|sOma̱m|amRutA̱ḥ|aBUma|ada̍rśma|jyOti̍ḥ|avi̍dAma|dEvAn||kim|asmAn|kRuṇavat|arA̍tiḥ|kim|u|dhUrtiḥ|amRuta|martya̍sya||yat|mE|Atmana̍ḥ|mindA|aBU̱t|agniḥ|tat|puna̍ḥ|Eti̍|ahAḥ|jAtavE̍dA̍ iti# jAta - vEdAḥ|vicaṛṣaṇiriti̍ vi - carq.ṣaṇiḥ||punaḥ|agniḥ|cakṣu̍ḥ|adAt|puna̍ḥ|indra̍ḥ|bRuhaspati̍ḥ||puna̍ḥ|mE|aśvinA|yuvam|cakṣu̍ḥ|Eti̍|dhattam|akṣyOḥ||iṣṭaya̍juṣa̍ itIṣṭa-yajuṣaḥ|tE|dEva|sOma|stutastOmasyEti̍# stuta - stOmasya|19 (50)
verses.samhita: gAḥ||apAma̍ sOmamamRutA̍# aBUmA&darśma̍ jyOtiravidAma̍ dEvAn|kimasmAn kRuṇavadarA̍tiḥ̍ kimu# dhUrtiramRuta̍ martyasya||yanma̍# AtmanO# mindA&BUdagnistat̍ punarA&hA̱rjAtavEdA̍ vicaṛṣaṇiḥ||puna̍ragniścakṣu̍radAt-punarindrO̍ bRuhaspatiḥ|puna̍rmE̍ aśvinA yuvaM cakṣurA dhattamakṣyOḥ||iṣṭaya̍juṣastE̍ dEva sOma stutastOmasya̍ - [ ] 19

verses.padam: - Padam śastOkthasyEti# śasta - ukthasya|harivata̍ iti hari# - vataḥ|indrapItasyEtIndra̍# - pItasya|madhumata̍ iti madhu# - mataḥ|upahUtasyEtyupa̍# - hUtasya|upahUta̍ ityupa# - hUtaḥ|BakṣayAmi||ApUryA ityA̱ - pUryA̱ḥ|stha|Eti|mA|pUrayata|prajayEti̍# pra-jayA̱|ca|dhanEna|ca||Etat|tE|tata|yE|ca|tvAm|anviti̍|Etat|tE|pitAmaha|prapitAmahEti̍# pra - pitAmaha|yE|ca|tvAm|anviti|atra̍|pitaraḥ|yathABAgamiti̍# yathA-BAgam|mandaddhvam|namaḥ|vaḥ|pitaraḥ|rasA̍ya|nama̍ḥ|vaḥ|pitaraḥ|śuṣmA̍ya|nama̍ḥ|vaḥ|pitaraḥ|jIvAya̍|nama̍ḥ|vaḥ|pitaraḥ|20̍ (50)
verses.samhita: śastOkthasya̍ harivata̍ indrapItasya̍ madhumata̍ upahUtasyOpa̍hUtO̍ BakṣayAmi||ApUryAḥ sthA&&mA# pUrayata prajayA# ca dhanEna̍ ca||Etat tE# tata yE ca tvAmanvEtat tE# pitAmaha prapitAmaha yE ca tvAmanvatra# pitarO yathABAgaM mandaddhvaM̍ namO# vaḥ pitarO rasAya̍ namO# vaḥ pitaraḥ śuṣmAya̍ namO# vaḥ pitarO jIvAya namO# vaḥ pitaraḥ - [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam svadhAyA iti# sva - dhAyai̱|namaḥ|vaḥ|pitaraḥ|manyavE̱|nama̍ḥ|vaḥ|pitaraḥ|GOrAya̍|pita̍raḥ|nama̍ḥ|vaḥ|yE|Etasminn̍|lOkE|stha|yuṣmAn|tE|anviti̍|yE|asminn|lOkE|mAm|tE|anviti̍|yE|Etasminn̍|lOkE|stha|yUyam|tEṣA̱m|vasi̍ṣṭhAḥ|BUyAsta|yE|asminn|lOkE|aham|tEṣA̱m|vasi̍ṣṭhaḥ|BUyAsam|prajA̍pata̍ iti prajA̱-patE|na|tvat|EtAni|anyaḥ|viśvA̱|jAtAni̍|parIti̍|tA|baBUva||21̍ (50)
verses.samhita: svadhAyai namO# vaḥ pitarO manyavE namO# vaḥ pitarO GOrAya pitarO̍ namO# vO ya Etasmin̍ ~MlOkEstha yuṣmAṅstE&nu yE̱&smin ~MlOkE mAM tE&nu ya Etasmin̍ ~MlOkE stha yUyaM tEṣAM ~MvasiṣṭhA̍ BUyAsta yE̱&smin ~MlOkE&haM̍ tEṣAM ~MvasiṣṭhO̍ BUyAsaM prajApatE̍ na tvadEtAnyanyO viśvA# jAtAni paritA baBUva|21̍

verses.padam: - Padam yatkAmA̍ iti yat - kAmAḥ|tE|juhumaḥ|tat|naḥ|astu|vayam|syAma|patayaḥ|rayIṇAm||dEvakRu̍tasyEti̍# dEva - kRutasya|Enasaḥ|avayaja̍namitya̍va̍ - yajanam|asi|manuṣya̍kRutasyEti̍# manuṣya# - kRutasya|Enasaḥ|avayaja̍namitya̍va̍ - yajanam|asi|pitRukRu̍tasyEti̍# pitRu - kRutasya|Enasaḥ|avayaja̍namitya̍va̍ - yajanam|asi|aPsvitya̍p-su|dhautasya̍|sOma|dEva|tE|nRuBiriti̍ nRu - Biḥ|sutasya|iṣṭaya̍juṣa̍ itIṣṭa - yajuṣaḥ|stutastOmasyEti̍# stuta - stOmasya|śastOkthasyEti# śasta - ukthasya|yaḥ|Bakṣaḥ|aśvasanirityaśva̍ - saniḥ|yaḥ|gOsaniriti̍# gO - saniḥ|tasya̍|tE|pitRuBiriti̍# pitRu - Biḥ|BakṣaM kRutasyEti̍# BakṣaM - kRutasya|upahUtasyEtyupa̍# - hUtasya|upahUta̍ ityupa# - hUtaḥ|BakṣayAmi||22 (44) (viśvacaṛṣaṇE - triṣṭupCandasa̍ indrapItasya̍ narAśaṃ sapItasyA̍ - &ti# -stutastOmasya̍ - jIvAya namO# vaḥ pitarO - baBUva - catuścatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A5)
verses.samhita: yat kAmAstE̍ juhumastannO# astu vayaṅ syAma̍ patayO̍ rayIṇAM||dEvakRutasyaina̍sO̍ &vayajanamasi̍ manuṣyakRutasyaina̍sO̍ &vayajanamasi̍ pitRukRutasyaina̍sO̍ &vayajanamasyaPsu̍ dhautasya# sOma dEva tE nRuBiḥ̍ sutasyEṣṭa yajuṣaḥ̍ stutastOmasya̍ śastOkthasya̍ yO BakṣOaśvasaniryO̍ gOsanistasya# tE pitRuBirBakṣaM̍ kRutasyO-pa̍hUtasyOpa̍hUtO̍ BakṣayAmi||22 (viśvacaṛṣaṇE - triṣṭupCandasa̍ indrapItasya̍ narAśaṃ sapItasyA̍ - &ti# -stutastOmasya̍ - jIvAya namO# vaḥ pitarO - baBUva - catuścatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam mahInAm|payaḥ|asi|viśvE̍ṣAm|dEvAnA̱m|tanUḥ|RuddhyAsa̱m|adya|pRuṣa̍tInAm|graha̱m|pRuṣa̍tInAm|graha̍ḥ|asi|viṣṇO̱ḥ|hRuda̍yam|asi|Eka̱m|iṣa|viṣṇu̍ḥ|tvA|anu̍|vIti̍|cakramE|BUtiḥ|daddhnA|GRutEna̍|varddhatAm|tasya̍|mA|iṣṭasya̍|vItasya̍|dravi̍ṇam|Eti̍|gamyAt|jyOti̍ḥ|asi|vaiśvAnaram|pRuśni̍yai|dugdham|yAva̍tI̍ iti|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱-pRuthivI|mahitvEti# mahi - tvA|yAvat|ca|sapta|sindha̍vaḥ|vitasthuriti̍# vi - tasthuḥ||tAvantam|indra|tE|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mahInAM payO&si̍ viśvEṣAM̍ dEvAnA̱M tanUr RuddhyAsamadya̍ pRuṣatInAM̍ grahaM pRuṣatInAM̍ grahO&si̍ viṣṇOrqḥRudayamasyEka̍miṣa̍ viṣṇustvA&nu vicakramE̍ BUtirdaddhnA GRutEna# varddhatAM tasya# mEṣṭasya# vItasya draviṇamA̍ gamyAjjyOti̍rasi̍ vaiśvAnaraM pRuś~jiyai̍ dugdhaM ~MyAvatI̍ dyAvApRuthivI̍ mahitvA̍ yAvacca̍ sapta sindhavO̍ vitasthuḥ|tAvantamindra̍ tE - [ ] 23

verses.padam: - Padam graha̱m|saha|UrjA|gRuhṇAmi|astRutam||yat|kRuṣṇaśakuna̍ iti# kRuṣṇa - śakunaḥ|pRuṣadAjyamiti# pRuṣat - Ajyam|avamRuśEdityava̍ - mRuśEt|śUdrAḥ|asya|pramAyukA̍ iti# pra - mAyukAḥ|syuḥ|yat|śvA|avamRuśEditya̍va̍ - mRuśEt|catuṣpAda̍ iti catuḥ̍ - pAdaḥ|asya|paśavaḥ|pramAyu̍kA̍ iti# pra - mAyukAḥ|syuḥ|yat|skandE̱t|yaja̍mAnaḥ|pramAyu̍ka̍ iti# pra - mAyukaḥ|syAt|paśava̍ḥ|vai|pRuṣadAjyamiti̍# pRuṣat-Ajyam|paśavaḥ|vai|Etasya̍|skandanti|yasya̍|pRuṣadAjyamiti̍# pRuṣat - Ajyam|skandati|yat|pRuṣadAjyamiti̍# pRuṣat - Ajyam|punaḥ|gRuhṇAti̍|paśUn|Eva|asmai|puna̍ḥ|gRuhṇAti|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|vai|pRuṣadAjyamiti# pRuṣat - Ajyam|prAṇa iti# pra - anaḥ|vai||24 (50)
verses.samhita: grahaṃ# sahOrjA gRuhṇAmyastRu̍taM||yat̍ kRuṣṇaśakunaḥ̍ pRuṣadAjyama̍vamRuśEcCUdrA̍ asya̍ pramAyukAḥ̍ syuryacCvA &vamRuśEccatu̍ṣpAdO&sya̍ paśavaḥ̍ pramAyukAḥ̍ syuryath skandEd-yajamAnaḥ̍ pramAyukaḥ̍ syAt paśavO vai pRuṣadAjyaM̍ paśavO vA Etasya# skandanti yasya# pRuṣadAjyaṅ skandati̍ yat pRuṣadAjyaM̍ punargRuhṇAti̍# paśUnEvAsmai punargRuhṇAti̍ prAṇO vai pRuṣadAjyaM̍ prAṇO vA - [ ] 24

verses.padam: - Padam Etasya|skandati|yasya̍|pRuṣadAjyamiti̍# pRuṣat - Ajyam|skandati|yat|pRuṣadAjyamiti̍# pRuṣat - Ajyam|punaḥ|gRuhṇAti̍|prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|Eva|asmai|punaḥ|gRuhṇAti|hira̍ṇyam|avadhAyEtya̍va̍ - dhAya|gRuhṇAti|amRuta̱m|vai|hira̍ṇyam|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|pRuṣadAjyamiti# pRuṣat - Ajyam|amRuta̱m|Eva|asya|prAṇa iti# pra - anE|dadhAti|śatamAnamiti̍# śata-mAnam|Bavati|śatAyuriti# śata - Ayuḥ|puruṣaḥ|śatEndri̍ya̍ iti# śata-indriyaḥ|Ayuṣi|Eva|indriyE|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|aśva̱m|avEti̍|GrApayati|prAjApatya̍ iti# prAjA - patyaḥ|vai|aśvaḥ|prAjApatya̍ iti# prAjA - patyaḥ|prAṇa iti# pra-anaḥ|svAt|Eva|asmai|yOnE̱ḥ|prAṇamiti# pra - anam ( )|niriti|mimItE|vIti̍|vai|Etasya̍|yajñaḥ|CidyatE|yasya̍|pRuṣadAjyamiti̍# pRuṣat - Ajyam|skandati|vaiṣṇavyA|RucA|puna̍ḥ|gRuhṇAti|yajñaḥ|vai|viṣṇu̍ḥ|yajñEna̍|Eva|yajñam|samiti̍|tanOti||25̍ (72) (tE - pRuṣadAjyaM prAṇO vai - yOnE̱ḥ prAṇaM - dvAviṃśatiśca)̍ (A6)
verses.samhita: Etasya# skandati yasya# pRuṣadAjyaṅ skandati̍ yat pRuṣadAjyaM̍ punargRuhṇAti̍# prAṇamEvAsmai punargRuhṇAti̍ hiraṇyamavadhAya̍# gRuhṇAtyamRutaM ~Mvai hiraṇyaM̍ prAṇaḥ pRuṣadAjyamamRuta̍mEvAsya̍# prAṇE dadhAti̍ śatamAnaM̍ Bavati śatAyuḥ puruṣaḥ̍ śatEndriya̍ AyuṣyEvEndriyE̍ pratitiṣṭhatyaśvamava̍# GrApayati prAjApatyO vA aśvaḥ̍ prAjApatyaḥ prAṇaḥ svAdEvAsmai yOnE̱ḥ prAṇaM ( ) nirmimItE̍ vi vA Etasya# yajñaśCidyatE̍ yasya# pRuṣadAjyaṅ skandati̍ vaiṣṇavyarcA punargRuhṇAti̍ yajñO vai viṣṇuryajñEnaiva̍ yajñaṃ saM tanOti||25̍ (tE - pRuṣadAjyaM prAṇO vai - yOnE̱ḥ prAṇaM - dvAviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam dEva|savitaḥ|Etat|tE|prEti̍|Aha|tat|prEti̍|ca|suva|prEti̍|ca|yaja|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|brahmA|Ayu̍ṣmatyAḥ|Rucaḥ|mA|gAta|tanUpAditi̍# tanU - pAt|sAmnaḥ|satyAḥ|vaḥ|Aśiṣa̍ ityA̱ - śiṣaḥ|santu|satyAḥ|AkU̍taya̍ ityA-kUtayaḥ|Rutam|ca|satyam|ca|vadata|stuta|dEvasya|savituḥ|prasava̍ iti# pra - savE|stutasya|stutam|asi|Urja̱m|mahya̱m|stutam|duhAm|Eti̍|mA|stutasya̍|stutam|gamyAt|śastrasya̍|śastram|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEva# savitarEtat tE prA&&*ha tat pra ca# suva pra ca# yaja bRuhaspatirbrahmA̍ &&yuṣmatyA̍ RucO mA gAta̍ tanUpAth sAmnaḥ̍ satyA va# Aśiṣaḥ̍ santu satyA AkUtaya̍ RutaM ca# satyaM ca# vadata stuta dEvasya# savituḥ prasavE̍ stutasya# stutamasyUrjaM mahyaṅ# stutaM duhAmA̍ mA̱ stutasya# stutaM gamyAcCastrasya̍# śastra - [ ] 26

verses.padam: - Padam asi|Urja̱m|mahya̱m|śastram|duhAm|Eti|mA|śastrasya̍|śastram|gamyAt|indriyAva̍nta̍ itI̱ndriya - vantaḥ|vanAmahE|dhukṣImahi|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|iṣa̱m||sA|mE|satyA|AśIrityA̱ - śIḥ|dEvEṣu|BUyAt|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|mA|Eti|gamyAt||yajñaḥ|baBUva|saḥ|Eti̍|baBUva|saḥ|prEti̍|jajñE|saḥ|vAvRudhE||saḥ|dEvAnA̱m|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|baBUva|saḥ|asmAn|adhipatInityadhi̍# - patIn|karOtu|vayam|syAma|patayaḥ|rayIṇAm||yajñaḥ|vA|vai|27̍ (50)
verses.samhita: masyUrjaM mahyaṃ# śastraM duhAmA̍ mA# śastrasya# śastraM gamyA-dindriyAva̍ntO̍ vanAmahE dhukṣImahi# prajAmiṣa̱M||sA mE# satyA&&śIrdEvEṣu# BUyAd-brahmavarcasaM mA&& gamyAt||yajñO̍ baBUva̍ sa A baBUva̍ saprajajñE̍ sa vAvRudhE|sa̍ dEvAnAmadhi-patirbaBUva̍ sO asmAṃ adhipatIn̍ karOtu vayaṅ syAma̍ patayO̍ rayIṇAM||yajñO vA vai - [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam yajñapatimiti̍# yajña - patim|duhE|yajñapatiriti̍# yajña-patiḥ|vA|yajñam|duhE|saḥ|yaḥ|stutaśastrayOriti# stuta - śastrayO̱ḥ|dOha̱m|avidvAn|yaja̍tE|tam|yajñaḥ|duhE|saḥ|iṣṭvA|pApI̍yAn|Bavati|yaḥ|EnayOḥ|dOha̱m|vidvAn|yaja̍tE|saḥ|yajñam|duhE|saḥ|iṣṭvA|vasI̍yAn|Bavati|stutasya̍|stutam|asi|Urja̱m|mahya̱m|stutam|duhAm|Eti̍|mA|stutasya̍|stutam|gamyAt|śastrasya̍|śastram|asi|Urja̱m|mahya̱m|śastram|duhAm̍ ( )|Eti|mA|śastrasya̍|śastram|gamyAt|iti̍|Aha|Eṣaḥ|vai|stutaśastrayOriti̍# stuta - śastrayO̱ḥ|dOhaḥ|tam|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|yaja̍tE|duhE|Eva|yajñam|iṣṭvA|vasI̍yAn|Bavati||28̍ (72) (śastraM - ~Mvai - śastranduhAM̍ - dvAviṃśatiśca)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: yajñapatiM̍ duhE yajñapatirvA̍ yajñaM duhE̍ sa yaḥ stutaśastrayOrdOhama̍ vidvAna.̍ yajatE̍ taM ~MyajñO duhE̍ sa iṣṭvA pApIyAn̍ Bavati ya EnayOrdOha̍M̍ ~MvidvAn. yajatE̍ sa yajñaM duhE̍ sa iṣṭvA vasIyAn̍ Bavati stutasya# stutamasyUrjaM mahyaṅ# stutaM duhAmA̍ mA̱ stutasya# stutaM gamyAcCastrasya̍# śastramasyUrjaM mahyaṃ# śastraM duhA̍ ( ) mA mA# śastrasya# śastraM gamyAdityA̍haiṣa̍ vai stutaśastrayOrdOhastaM̍ ~Mya EvaM ~MvidvAn. yajatE̍ duha Eva yajñamiṣṭvA vasIyAn̍ Bavati||28 (śastraM - ~Mvai - śastranduhAM̍ - dvAviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam śyEnAya|patva̍nE|svAhA̱|vaṭ|svayama̍BigUrtAyEti̍# svayaM - aBigUrtAya|namaḥ|viṣṭaBAMyEti̍# vi - staBAMya|dharma̍ṇE|svAhA̱|vaṭ|svayama̍BigUrtAyEti̍# svayaM - aBigUrtAya|namaḥ|paridhaya̍ iti# pari - dhayE̱|janaprathanAyEti̍# jana - prathanAya|svAhA̱|vaṭ|svayama̍BigUrtAyEti̍# svayaM - aBigUrtAya|namaḥ|UrjE|hOtrA̍ṇAm|svAhA̱|vaṭ|svayama̍BigUrtAyEti̍# svayaM - aBigUrtAya|namaḥ|paya̍sE|hOtrA̍ṇAm|svAhA̱|vaṭ|svayama̍BigUrtAyEti̍# svayaM - aBigUrtAya|namaḥ|prajApa̍taya̍ iti# prajA-patayE|manavE|svAhA̱|vaṭ|svayama̍BigUrtAyEti̍# svayaM - aBigUrtAya|namaḥ|Rutam|RutapA̍ ityRuta̍ - pAḥ|suvarvAḍiti# suvaḥ - vAṭ|svAhA̱|vaṭ|svayamaBigUrtAyEti̍# svayaM - aBigUrtAya|namaḥ|tRupaMntA̱m|hOtrA̱ḥ|madhO̱ḥ|GRutasya̍|yajñapa̍timiti̍# yajña - patim|Ruṣayaḥ|Ena̍sA|29̍ (50)
verses.samhita: śyEnAya patvanE̍ svAhA vaṭthsvayamaBigUrtAya̍ namO# viṣṭamBAya dharmaṇE̍ svAhA vaṭthsvayamaBigUrtAya̍ namaḥ̍ paridhayE# janaprathanAya̍ svAhA vaṭthsvayamaBigUrtAya̍ nama# UrjE hOtrAṇAṅq̍ svAhA vaṭthsvayamaBigUrtAya̍ namaḥ payasE̍ hOtrAṇAṅq̍ svAhA vaṭthsvayamaBigUrtAya̍ namaḥ̍ prajApatayE̍ manavE̍ svAhA vaṭthsvayamaBigUrtAya̍ nama# RutamRutapAḥ̍ suvarvAṭthsvAhA vaṭthsvayamaBigUrtAya̍ namastRuMpantAṃq̍ hOtrA madhO̱rGRutasya# yajñapatimRuṣa̍ya̍ EnasA̍ - [ ] 29

verses.padam: - Padam Ahuḥ||prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|nirBaktA̍ iti niḥ - BaktAḥ|anutapyamAnA̍ ityanu-tapyamA̍nAḥ|madhavyau̱|stOkau|apEti̍|tau|rarAdha||samiti̍|naḥ|tAByA̱m|sRujatu|viśvakarmEti̍# viśva - karmA|GOrAḥ|Ruṣayaḥ|nama̍ḥ|astu|EByaḥ||cakṣu̍ṣaḥ|EṣAm|mana̍saḥ|ca|sadhAMviti̍# saM - dhau|bRuhaspatayE|mahi̍|sat|dyumaditi̍# dyu - mat|namaḥ||nama̍ḥ|viśvaka̍rmaṇa̍ iti# viśva - karmaṇE|saḥ|u|pAtu|asmAn|ananyAn|sOmapAniti# sOma - pAn|manyamAnaḥ||prAṇasyEti̍# pra - anasya|vidvAn|samara̍ iti# saM-arE|na|dhIraḥ|Ena̍ḥ|cakRuvAn|mahi̍|baddhaḥ|EṣAm||tam|viśvakarmanniti̍# viśva - karmann|30 (50)
verses.samhita: &&huḥ|prajA nirBaktA̍ anutapyamAnA̍ madhavyau̱ stOkAvapa tau rarAdha||saM̍ nastAByAṃ# sRujatuviśvakarmA̍ GOrA RuṣayO̍ namO# astvEByaḥ|cakṣuṣa̍ EṣAM manasaśca̍ sandhau bRuhaspatayE̍ mahi ṣad dyumannamaḥ||namO̍# viśvakarmaṇE̍ sa u# pAtvasmAnananyAnth-sO̍mapAn̍ manyamAnaḥ|prAṇasya̍# vidvAnth samarE̍ na dhIra EnaścakRuvAn̍ mahi# baddha EṣAM||taM̍ ~Mviśvakarman̍ - [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam prEti|mu~jca|svastayE̱|yE|Bakṣaya̍ntaḥ|na|vasU̍ni|AnRuhuḥ||yAn|agnaya̍ḥ|anvata̍pyantEtya̍nu̍ - atapyanta|dhiṣṇi̍yAḥ|iyam|tEṣA̱m|avayA|duri̍ṣṭyA̍ iti duḥ - iṣṭyai|sviṣṭimiti̍ su - iṣṭim|naḥ|tAm|kRuṇOtu|viśvakarmEti# viśva - karmA||namaḥ|pitRuBya̍ iti# pitRu - Byaḥ|aBIti|yE|naḥ|aKyann̍|yajñakRuta̍ iti# yajña - kRutaḥ|yajñakA̍mA̍ iti# yajña - kAmAḥ|sudEvA iti# su - dEvAḥ|akAmAḥ|vaḥ|dakṣiṇAm|na|nInima|mA|naḥ|tasmA̱t|Ena̍saḥ|pApayiṣṭa||yAva̍ntaḥ|vai|sadasyA̱ḥ|tE|sarvE̱|dakṣiṇyA̱ḥ|tEBya̍ḥ|yaḥ|dakṣi̍ṇAm|na|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -pra mu~jcA̍ svastayE yE BakṣayantO̍ na vasU̱nyAnRuhuḥ|yAnagnayO&nvatapyanta̍ dhiṣṇiyA̍ iyaM tEṣAmavayA̍ duriṣṭyai̍ sviṣṭiM̍ nastAM kRuṇOtu̍ viśvakarmA||nama̍ḥ̍ pitRuByO# aBi yE nO aKyan.̍ yajñakRutO# yajñakAmAḥ̍ sudEvA akAmA̍ vO dakṣiṇAM̍ na nInima̍ mA nastasmA dEnasaḥ̍ pApayiṣṭa|yAvantO̍ vai sadasyA̱stE̍ sarvE# dakṣiṇyA̱stEByO yO dakṣiṇAM̍ na- [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam nayE̱t|Eti|EByaḥ|vRuścyEta|yat|vaiśvakarmaṇAnIti̍# vaiśva - karmaṇAni|juhOti̍|sadasyAn̍|Eva|tat|prIṇAti|asmE̍ iti|dEvAsaḥ|vapu̍ṣE|cikithsata|yam|AśirA̱|daMpa̍tI̍ iti|vAmam|aśnutaḥ||pumAn̍|putraḥ|jAyatE|vindatE̱|vasu̍|atha̍|viśvE̱|arapAḥ|EdhatE|gRuhaḥ||AśIrdAyEtyA̍śIḥ̍ - dAyA|daMpatI̍ iti|vAmam|aśnutAm|ari̍ṣṭaḥ|rAya̍ḥ|sacatAm|samO̍kasEti̍ saM - OkasA||yaḥ|Eti|asi̍cat|saMdu̍gdhamiti̍ saM - dugdham|kuByAM|saha|iṣṭEna|yAmann̍|ama̍tim|jahAtu|saḥ||sarpirgrIvIti̍# sarpiḥ - grIvI|32 (50)
verses.samhita: nayEdaiByO# vRuścyEta yad-vai̱śvakarmaṇAni# juhOti# sadasyAnEva̍ tat prIṇAtyasmE̍ dEvAsO̍ vapuṣE̍ cikithsata yamAśirA dampatI̍ vAmamaś~jutaḥ|pumA̱n̍ putrO jAyatE̍ vindatE vasvatha viśvE# arapA EdhatE̍ gRuhaḥ||AśIrdAyA dampatI̍ vAmamaś~jutAmari̍ṣṭO̍ rAyaḥ̍ sacatAṃq samOkasA|ya̍ A&sicath̍ saM dugdhaM̍ kumByA sahEṣṭEna yAmannamatiM̍ jahAtu saḥ||sarpirgrIvI - [ ] 32

verses.padam: - Padam pIvarI|asya|jAyA|pIvA̍naḥ|putrAḥ|akRu̍śAsaḥ|asya||sahajA̍niriti̍# saha - jAniḥ|yaḥ|sumaKasyamAna̍ iti# su - maKasyamAnaḥ|indrA̍ya|Aśira̱m|saha|kuByAM|adA̱t||AśIrityA̱̍ - śIḥ|mE|Urja̱m|uta|suprajAstvamiti# suprajAḥ - tvam|iṣa̱m|dadhAtu|draviṇam|sava̍rcasamiti̍ sa - varcasam||sajaMyanniti # saM - jayann|kṣEtrA̍ṇi|saha̍sA|aham|indra|kRuṇvAnaḥ|anyAn|adha̍rAn|sapatnAn̍||BUtam|asi|BUtE|mA|dhAḥ|muKa̱m|asi|muKa̱m|BUyAsam|dyAvA̍pRuthivIByAmiti̍ dyAvA̱ - pRuthivIByA̱m|tvA|parIti|gRuhṇAmi|viśvE̱|tvA|dEvAḥ|vaiśvAnarAḥ|33̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pIvaryasya̍ jAyA pIvAnaḥ̍ putrA akRuśAsO̍ asya|sahajAniryaḥ̍ sumaKasyamA̍na̍ indrAyA&&*śiraṃ̍# saha kumByA&dA̱t||AśIrma Urjamuta̍ suprajAstvamiṣa̍M̍ dadhAtu draviṇaṃq̍ savarcasaM|saM̍ jayan kṣEtrAṇi̍ sahasA&hami̍ndra̍ kRuṇvAnO anyAṃ adharAnthsapatnAn̍||BUtama̍si̍ BUtE mA# dhA muKamasi̍ muKaM̍ BUyAsaM dyAvApRuthivIByA̱M̍ tvA parigRuhṇAmi̍ viśvE̱ tvA dEvA vai̱śvAnarAḥ - [ ] 33

verses.padam: - Padam prEti|cyAvayantu|divi|dEvAn|dRuṃqha|antari̍kṣE|vayAṃ̍si|pRuthivyAm|pArthi̍vAn|dhruvam|dhruvEṇa̍|haviṣA̱|avEti̍|sOma̱m|nayAmasi||yathA̱|naḥ|sarva̱m|it|jaga̍t|ayakṣmam|sumanA̍ iti# su - manA̱ḥ|asat||yathA̱|naḥ|indra̍ḥ|it|viśa̍ḥ|kEva̍lIḥ|sarvA̱ḥ|sama̍nasa̍ iti sa - manasaḥ|karat||yathA̱|naḥ|sarvA̱ḥ|it|diśa̍ḥ|asmAka̱m|kEva̍lIḥ|asann̍||34̍ (40) (EnasA̍ - viśvakarman - yO dakṣiṇAM̍ na - sarpirgrIvI̍ - vai̱śvanarA - ścatvAriṃqśacca̍)̍ (A8)
verses.samhita: pracyAvayantu̍ divi dEvAn dRuṃhAntari̍kṣE̍ vayAṃsi̍ pRuthivyAM pArthivAn̍ dhruvaM dhruvEṇa# haviṣA&va sOmaM̍ nayAmasi|yathA# naḥ sarvamijjagadayakṣmaṃ̍ sumanA asat|yathA̍# na indra idviśaḥ kEvalIḥ̍ sarvAḥ samanasaḥ̍ karat|yathA̍# naḥ sarvA iddiśO&smAkaM kEvalIrasann̍||34̍ (EnasA̍ - viśvakarman - yO dakṣiṇAM̍ na - sarpirgrIvI̍ - vai̱śvanarA - ścatvAriṃqśacca̍)̍

verses.padam: - Padam yat|vai|hOtA̱|addhvaryum|aByAhvayata̍ ityaBi̍ - AhvayatE|vajra̱m|Enam|aBi|prEti̍|vartayati|uktha̍śA̍ ityuktha-śAḥ|iti̍|Aha|prAtassavanamiti̍# prAtaḥ - savanam|pratigIryEti# prati - gIrya|trIṇi̍|EtAni̍|akṣarA̍ṇi|tripadEti̍# tri - padA̱|gAyatrI|gAyatram|prAtassavanamiti# prAtaḥ - savanam|gAyatriyA|Eva|prAtassavana iti# prAtaḥ - savanE|vajra̱m|antaḥ|dhattE|uktham|vAci|iti|Aha|mAddhya̍ndinam|sava̍nam|pratigIryEti̍# prati - gIrya|catvAri̍|EtAni̍|akṣarA̍ṇi|catu̍ṣpadEti̍ catuḥ̍ - padA|triṣṭup|traiṣṭuBam|mAddhya̍ndinam|sava̍nam|triṣṭuBA̱|Eva|mAddhya̍ndinE|sava̍nE|vajra̱m|antaḥ|dhattE|35̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yadvai hOtA̱&ddhvaryumaByAhvaya̍tE̍ vajramEnamaBi̍ pravartayatyuktha̍śA̍ ityAha̍ prAtassavanaM pratigIrya̍ trIṇyEtAnyakṣarAṇi̍ tripadA# gAyatrI gAyatraM̍ prAtassavanaM̍ gAyatriyaiva̍ prAtassavanE̍ vajramantarddha̍tta̍ ukthaM ~MvAcItyAha̍ mAddhyadiMnaṃq̍ savanaM̍ pratigIrya# catvAryEtAnya-kṣarAṇi̍ catuṣpadA̍ triṣṭup traiṣṭuBaM̍ mAddhyadiMnaṃq̍ savanaM̍ triṣṭuBaiva mAddhyandinE̍ savanE̍ vajramantarddha̍tta-̍ [ ] 35

verses.padam: - Padam uktham|vAci|indrAya|iti̍|Aha|tRutIyasavanamiti̍# tRutIya -savanam|pratigIryEti# prati - gIrya|sapta|EtAni̍|akṣarA̍ṇi|saptapadEti̍# sapta - padA|śakvarI|śAkvaraḥ|vajra̍ḥ|vajrE̍ṇa|Eva|tRutIyasavana̍ iti# tRutIya - savanE|vajra̱m|antaḥ|dhattE|brahmavAdina iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|saḥ|tu|vai|adhvaryuḥ|syAt|yaḥ|yathAsavanamiti̍# yathA - savanam|pratigara iti# prati - garE|CandAṃsi|sapAMqdayEditi̍# saM - pAdayE̱t|tEjaḥ|prAtassavana̍ iti# prAtaḥ - savanE|Atmann|dadhIta|indriyam|mAdhya̍ndinE|sava̍nE|paśUn|tRutIyasavana̍ iti# tRutIya - savanE|iti|uktha̍śA̍ ityuktha# - śAḥ|iti|Aha|prAtassavanamiti̍# prAtaḥ - savanam|pratigIryEti# prati - gIrya|trIṇi̍|EtAni̍|akṣarA̍ṇi|36̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ukthaM ~MvAcIndrAyEtyAha̍ tRutIyasavanaM pratigIrya̍# saptaitAnyakṣarAṇi̍ saptapadA̍ śakvarI̍ śAkvarO vajrO vajrEṇaiva̍ tRutIyasavanE̍ vajramantarddha̍ttE̍ brahmavAdinO# vadanti sa tvA addhvaryuḥ̍ syAdyO yathAsavanaM̍ pratigarE̍ CandAṃsi̍ sampAdayEt tEjaḥ̍ prAtaḥ savana Atman dadhItEndriyaM̍ mAddhyandinE̍ savanE̍ paśUṅ stRutIyasavana̍ ityukthaśA̍ ityAha̍ prAtassavanaM pratigIrya̍ trIṇyEtAnyakṣarAṇi̍ - [ ] 36

verses.padam: - Padam tripadEti# tri - padA̱|gAyatrI|gAyatram|prAtassavanamiti# prAtaḥ - savanam|prAtassavana iti# prAtaḥ - savanE|Eva|pratigara iti# prati - garE|CandAṃsi|samiti̍|pAdayati|athO̍ iti|tEja̍ḥ|vai|gAyatrI|tEja̍ḥ|prAtassavanamiti̍# prAtaḥ - savanam|tEjaḥ|Eva|prAtassavana̍ iti# prAtaḥ - savanE|Atmann|dhattE|uktham|vAci|iti|Aha|mAddhya̍ndinam|sava̍nam|pratigIryEti̍# prati - gIrya|catvAri̍|EtAni̍|akṣarA̍ṇi|catu̍ṣpadEti̍ catuḥ̍ - padA|triṣṭup|traiṣṭuBam|mAddhya̍ndinam|sava̍nam|mAddhya̍ndinE|Eva|sava̍nE|pratigara̍ iti# prati - garE|CandAṃsi|samiti̍|pAdayati|athO̍ iti|indriyam|vai|triṣṭuk|indriyam|mAddhya̍ndinam|sava̍nam|37̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tripadA# gAyatrI gAyatraM̍ prAtassavanaM̍ prAtassavana̍ Eva pratigarE̍ CandAṃsi̍ saMpAdayatyathO̍ tEjO vai gAyatrI̍ tEjaḥ̍ prAtaḥ savanaM tEja# Eva prAtassavana̍ Atman dhatta̍ ukthaM ~MvAcItyAha̍ mAddhyandinaṃq̍ savanaM̍ pratigIrya# catvAryEtAnyakṣarAṇi̍ catuṣpadA̍ triṣṭup traiṣṭuBaM̍ mAddhyandinaṃq̍ savanaM̍ mAddhyadiMna̍ Eva savanE̍ pratigarE CandAṃsi̍ saMpAdayatyathO̍# indriyaM ~Mvai triṣṭugindriyaM̍ mAddhyadiMnaṃq̍ savana̍ - [ ] 37

verses.padam: - Padam indriyam|Eva|mAddhyandinE|sava̍nE|Atmann|dhattE|uktham|vAci|indrA̍ya|iti̍|Aha|tRutIyasavanamiti̍# tRutIya - savanam|pratigIryEti# prati - gIrya|sapta|EtAni̍|akṣarA̍ṇi|saptapadEti̍# sapta - padA|śakvarI|śAkvarAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|jAga̍tam|tRutIyasavanamiti̍# tRutIya - savanam|tRutIyasavana iti# tRutIya - savanE|Eva|pratigara iti# prati - garE|CandAṃsi|samiti̍|pAdayati|athO̍ iti|paśava̍ḥ|vai|jaga̍tI|paśava̍ḥ|tRutIyasavanamiti̍# tRutIya - savanam|paśUn|Eva|tRutIyasavana iti# tRutIya - savanE|Atmann|dhattE|yat|vai|hOtA̱|addhvaryum|aByAhvayata̍ ityaBi̍ - AhvayatE|Avya̱m|asminn|dadhAti|tat|yat|na|38̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -mindriyamEva mAddhyandinE̍ savana̍ Atman dhatta̍ ukthaM ~MvAcIndrAyEtyAha̍ tRutIyasavanaM pratigIrya̍# saptaitAnyakṣarAṇi̍ saptapadA̍ śakvarI̍ śAkvarAḥ paśavO jAgataM̍ tRutIyasavanaM tRutIyasavana̍ Eva pratigarE̍ CandAṃsi̍ saMpAdayatyathO̍# paśavO vai jagatI̍ paśavastRutIyasavanaM̍ paśUnEva tRutIyasavana̍ Atman dhattE̍ yadvai hOtA̱&ddhvaryumaByAhvaya̍ta̍ Avyamasmin̍ dadhAti tadyannA - [ ] 38

verses.padam: - Padam apahanItEtyapa# - hanIta|purA|asya|saM~MvathsarAditi̍# saM - vathsarAt|gRuhE|Eti|vEvIrann|śOṃsA̱|mOda̍ḥ|iva|iti̍|pratyAhva̍yata̍ iti# prati - AhvayatE|tEna̍|Eva|tat|apEti̍|hatE|yathA̱|vai|Aya̍tAmityA̍ - yatAm|pratIkṣata̍ iti# prati - IkṣatE|Evam|addhvaryuḥ|pratigaramiti̍# prati - garam|pratIti|IkṣatE|yat|aBipratigRuṇIyAditya̍Bi̍ - pratigRuṇIyAt|yathA̱|AyatayEtyA̍ - yatayA|samRucCata iti# saM - RucCatE̱|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|yat|arddharcAdityarddha-RucAt|lupyE̍ta|yathA̱|dhAva̍dBya̍ iti dhAvat̍ - Byaḥ|hIyatE|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|prabAhugiti̍# pra - bAhuk|vai|RutvijA̱m|udgIthA̍ ityut-gIthAḥ|udgItha̍ ityut̍ - gIthaḥ|Eva|udgAtRuṇAmityut-gAtRuṇAm|39̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pahanIta̍ purA&sya# saM~MvathsarAd-gRuha A vEvIra~jCOṃsA̍ mOda# ivEti# pratyAhvayatE̍ tEnaiva tadapa# hatE yathA vA AyatAM̍ pratIkṣata̍ Evamaddhvaryuḥ̍ pratigaraM̍ pratI̱kṣatE yadaBi̍ pratigRuṇIyAdyathA &&yatayA̍ samRucCatE# tAdRugEva tadyadarddharcAllupyE̍ta̍ yathA dhAvadByO̍ hIyatE̍ tAdRugEva tat prabAhugvA RutvijAmudgIthA̍ udgItha̍ EvOd-gAtRuṇA̍ - [ ] 39

verses.padam: - Padam Rucaḥ|praṇava iti# pra - navaḥ|ukthaśaṃqsinAmityuktha̍ - śaṃqsinA̱m|pratigara iti# prati - garaḥ|addhvaryUṇAm|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|pratigRuṇAtIti# prati-gRuṇAti|annAda̍ ityanna̍ - adaḥ|Eva|Bavati|Eti|asya|prajAyAmiti̍# pra - jAyA̱m|vAjI|jAyatE|iyam|vai|hOtA̱|asau|addhvaryuḥ|yat|AsInaḥ|śaṃsa̍ti|asyAḥ|Eva|tat|hOtA̱|na|Eti|AstE̱|iva|hi|iyam|athO̍ iti|imAm|Eva|tEna̍|yaja̍mAnaḥ|duhE|yat|tiṣṭhann̍|pratigRuṇAtIti̍# prati - gRuṇAti|amuṣyA̱ḥ|Eva|tat|addhvaryuḥ|na|Eti|40̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mRucaḥ praṇava̍ ukthaśaṃqsinA̱M̍ pratigarO̱&ddhvaryUṇAM ~Mya EvaM ~MvidvAn pratigRuṇAtya̍nnAda̍ Eva BavatyA&sya̍# prajAyA̱M ~MvAjI jAyata̍ iyaM ~Mvai hOtA&sAvaddhvaryuryadAsI̍naḥ̍ śaṃ satyasyA̍ Eva taddhOtA naityAsta# iva hIyamathO# imAmEva tEna yajamAnO̍ duhE yat tiṣṭhan̍ pratigRuṇAtyamuṣyA# Eva tadaddhvaryurnaiti̍ - [ ] 40

verses.padam: - Padam tiṣṭhati|iva|hi|asau|athO̍ iti|amUm|Eva|tEna̍|yaja̍mAnaḥ|duhE|yat|AsI̍naḥ|śaṃsa̍ti|tasmA̱t|itaḥ̍ pradAnamitItaḥ̍ - pradAnam|dEvAḥ|upEti|jIvanti|yat|tiṣṭhann̍|pratigRuṇAtIti̍# prati - gRuṇAti|tasmA̱t|amuta̍ḥ̍ pradAnamityamutaḥ̍ - pradAnam|manuṣyA̱ḥ|upEti|jIvanti|yat|prA~g|AsI̍naḥ|śaṃsa̍ti|pratya~g|tiṣṭhann̍|pratigRuṇAtIti̍# prati - gRuṇAti|tasmA̱t|prAcIna̱m|rEta̍ḥ|dhIyatE|pratIcI̱ḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|jAyantE|yat|vai|hOtA̱|addhvaryum|aByAhvayata̍ ityaBi̍ - AhvayatE|vajra̱m|Enam|aBi|prEti̍|vartayati̍ ( )|parA~g|Eti̍|vartatE|vajra̱m|Eva|tat|nIti̍|karOti||41̍ (58) (savanE̍ vajramantardha̍ttE̍ - trIṇyEtAnyakṣarAṇI̍ - ndriyaM mAdhyandinaṃq̍ savanaM̍ - nO - dgAtRuṇA̍ - madhvaryurnaiti̍# - vartayatya - ṣṭau ca)̍ (A9)
verses.samhita: tiṣṭhatIva̍ hyasAvathO̍# amUmEva tEna yajamAnO̍ duhE yadAsInaḥ̍ śaṃsati̍ tasmAditaḥ̍ pradAnaM̍ dEvA upa# jIvanti yat tiṣṭhan̍ pratigRuṇAti tasmAdamuta̍ḥ̍ pradAnaM manuṣyA# upa# jIvanti yat prA~gAsInaḥ̍ śaṃsati̍ pratya~g tiṣṭhan̍ pratigRuṇAti tasmA̱t prAcInaṃq rEtO# dhIyatE pratIcI̱ḥ prajA jAyantE̍ yadvai hOtA̱&ddhvaryumaByAhvaya̍tE̍ vajramEnamaBi̍ pravartayati̍ ( ) parA~gA vartatE̍ vajramEva̍ tanni karOti||41̍ (savanE̍ vajramantardha̍ttE̍ - trIṇyEtAnyakṣarAṇI̍ - ndriyaM mAdhyandinaṃq̍ savanaM̍ - nO - dgAtRuṇA̍ - madhvaryurnaiti̍# - vartayatya - ṣṭau ca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam upayAmagRuhIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|vAkṣasaditi# vAkṣa - sat|asi|vAkpAByAmiti# vAk - pAByA̱m|tvA|kratupAByAmiti# kratu - pAByA̱m|asya|yajñasya|dhruvasya̍|addhya̍kṣAByAmityadhi̍# - akṣAByAm|gRuhṇAmi|upayAmagRuhIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|RutasadityRuta̍ - sat|asi|cakṣuṣpAByAmiti# cakṣuḥ - pAByA̱m|tvA|kratupAByAmiti# kratu - pAByA̱m|asya|yajñasya|dhruvasya̍|addhya̍kṣAByAmityadhi̍# - akṣAByAm|gRuhṇAmi|upayAmagRuhIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|śrutasaditi# śruta - sat|asi|śrOtrapAByAmiti# śrOtra - pAByA̱m|tvA|kratupAByAmiti# kratu - pAByA̱m|asya|yajñasya|dhruvasya̍|addhya̍kṣAByAmityadhi̍# - akṣAByAm|gRuhṇAmi|dEvEByaḥ|tvA|viśvadE̍vEBya̍ iti# viśva-dEvEByaḥ|tvA|viśvE̱Byaḥ|tvA|dEvEByaḥ|viṣṇO̱|urukramEtyu̍ru̍ - krama|Eṣaḥ|tE|sOmaḥ|tam|rakṣasva|42̍ (50)
verses.samhita: upayAmagRuhItO&si̍ vAkṣasadasi̍ vAkpAByA̱M tvA kratupAByAmasya̍ yajñasya# dhruvasyA&ddhya-kṣAByAM̍ gRuhṇA-myupayAmagRuhItO&syRutasada̍si̍ cakṣuṣpAByA̱M tvA kratupAByAmasya̍ yajñasya# dhruvasyA&ddhyakṣAByAM̍ gRuhṇAmyupayAmagRuhItO&si̍ śrutasadasi̍ śrOtrapAByA̱M tvA kratupAByAmasya̍ yajñasya# dhruvasyA&ddhyakṣAByAM̍ gRuhṇAmi dEvEByastvA̍ viśvadEvEByastvA̍ viśvE̱ByastvA dEvEByO viṣṇavurukramaiṣa̍ tE sOmastaṃ rakṣasva̍ - [ ] 42

verses.padam: - Padam tam|tE|duścakṣA iti# duḥ - cakṣA̱ḥ|mA|avEti|Kyat|mayi̍|vasu̍ḥ|purOvasuriti̍# puraḥ - vasuḥ|vAkpA̍ iti# vAk - pAḥ|vAca̱m|mE|pAhi|mayi|vasu̍ḥ|vidadva̍suriti̍# vidat - vasuḥ|cakṣuṣpA iti# cakṣuḥ - pAḥ|cakṣuḥ|mE|pAhi|mayi̍|vasu̍ḥ|saM~Myad̍ vasuriti̍# saM~Myat - vasuḥ|śrOtrapA iti# śrOtra-pAḥ|śrOtra̱m|mE|pAhi|BUḥ|asi|śrEṣṭhaḥ|raśmInAm|prAṇapA̍ iti# prAṇa - pAḥ|prAṇamiti# pra- anam|mE|pAhi|dhUḥ|asi|śrEṣṭhaḥ|raśmInAm|apAnapA̍ ityapAna̍ - pAḥ|apAnamityapa̍ - anam|mE|pAhi|yaḥ|naḥ|indravAyU itI̱ndra - vAyU|mitrAvaruṇAviti# mitrA - varuṇau|aśvinau|aBidAsatItyaBi̍ - dAsati|BrAtRu̍vyaḥ̍ ( )|utpipIta̍ ityut̍ - pipItE|śuBaḥ|patI̍ iti|idam|aham|tam|adha̍ram|pAdayAmi|yathA̱|indra|aham|uttama̍ ityut̍ - tamaḥ|cEtayAni||43̍ (63)
verses.samhita: taM tE# duścakṣA mA&va# Kyanmayi vasuḥ̍ purOvasurvAkpA̍ vAcaM̍ mE pAhi mayi vasurvidadva̍suścakṣuṣpAścakṣu̍r̍ mE pAhi mayi vasuḥ̍ saM~Myadvasuḥ̍ śrOtrapAḥ śrOtraM̍ mE pAhi BUrasi̍ śrEṣṭhO# raśmInAM prAṇapAḥ̍ prAṇaM mE# pAhi dhUrasi̍ śrEṣṭhO# raśmInAmapAnapA̍ apAnaM̍ mE# pAhi yO na# indravAyU mitrAvaruṇA-vaśvinAvaBidAsati̍ BrAtRuvya̍ ( ) utpipItE̍ śuBaspatI idamahaM tamadharaM̍ pAdayAmi yathE̱ndrA&hamuttamaścEtayA̍ni||43̍

verses.padam: - Padam prEti|saḥ|agnE|tava̍|UtiBirityUti̍ - Biḥ|suvIrABiriti̍# su - vIrABiḥ|tarati|vAja̍karmaBiriti̍ vAjakarma̍ - Biḥ||yasya|tvam|saKyam|Avi̍tha||prEti̍|hOtrE̱|pUrvyam|vaca̍ḥ|agnayE̱|Barata|bRuhat||vipAmiti̍# vi - pAm|jyOtIṃṣi|biBra̍tE|na|vEdhasE̱||agnE̱|trI|tE|vAji̍nA|trI|sadhasthEti̍# sadha - sthA|tisraḥ|tE|jihvAḥ|RutajAtEtyRuta̍ - jAta|pUrvIḥ||tisraḥ|u|tE|tanuvaḥ|dEvavA̍tA̍ iti# dEva - vAtAḥ|tABiḥ|naḥ|pAhi|gira̍ḥ|apra̍yucCannityapra̍# - yucCann||samiti|vAm|karma̍ṇA|samiti̍|iṣA|44̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pra sO agnE̍ tavOtiBiḥ̍ suvIrABistarati̍ vAjakarmaBiḥ|yasya̍ tvaṃ saKyamAvitha||pra̍ hOtrE# pUrvyaM ~MvacO&gnayE# BaratA bRuhat|vipAM jyOtIṃṣi̍ biBratE̍ na vEdhasE̱||agnE trI tE vAjinA̍ trI ṣadhasthA# tisrastE# jihvA RutajAta̍ pUrvIḥ|tisra u# tE tanuvO# dEvavAtAstABi̍rnaḥ̍ pAhi girO aprayucCann||saM̍ ~MvAm karmaṇA̍ samiṣA - [ ] 44

verses.padam: - Padam hinOmi|indrAviṣṇU̍ itIndrA̱ - viṣṇU|apasaḥ|pArE|asya||juṣEthA̱m|yajñam|dravi̍ṇam|ca|dhattam|ari̍ṣṭaiḥ|naḥ|pathiBiriti̍# pathi-Biḥ|pArayantA||uBA|jigyathuḥ|na|parEti̍|jayEthE̍ iti|na|parEti̍|jigyE|kataraḥ|cana|EnOḥ||indra̍ḥ|ca|viṣṇO̍ iti|yat|apa̍spRudhEthAm|trEdhA|sahasra̱m|vIti̍|tat|airayEthAm||trIṇi̍|AyUṃ̍ṣi|tava̍|jAtavEda̍ iti# jAta - vEdaḥ|tisraḥ|AjAnIrityA̱ - jAnI̱ḥ|uṣasaḥ|tE|agnE|tABi̍ḥ||dEvAnA̱m|ava̍ḥ|yakṣi|vidvAn|atha̍|45̍ (50)
verses.samhita: hinOmIndrA̍-viṣṇU̍ apasaspArE̍ asya|juṣEthA̱M ~MyajñaM draviṇaM̍ ca dhattamariṣṭairnaḥ̍ pathiBiḥ̍ pArayantA||uBA̍ jigyathurna̍ parA# jayEthE na parA# jigyE kataraścanainO̱ḥ|indraśca̍ viṣṇO yadapaspRudhEthAM̍ trEdhA sahasraM ~Mvi tadairayEthAM||trIṇyAyUṃ̍ṣi̍ tava# jAtavEdastisra AjAnIruṣasa̍stE̍ agnE|tABirdEvAnAmavO̍# yakṣi vidvAnathA# - [ ] 45

verses.padam: - Padam Bava|yajamAnAya|śam|yOḥ||agniḥ|trIṇi̍|tridhAtUnIti̍# tri - dhAtUni|Eti̍|kṣEti|vidathA̱|kaviḥ||saḥ|trIn|EkAdaśAn|iha||yakṣa̍t|ca|pipraya̍t|ca|naḥ|vipra̍ḥ|dUtaḥ|pari̍ṣkRutaḥ||naBa̍ntAm|anyakE|samE||indrA̍viṣṇU̍ itIndrA̱-viṣṇU|dRuṃqhitAḥ|śaMbarasya|nava̍|pura̍ḥ|navatim|ca|śnathiṣṭam||śatam|varcina̍ḥ|sahasra̱m|ca|sAkam|hathaḥ|aprati|asu̍rasya|vIrAn||uta|mAtA|mahiṣam|anviti̍|avEnat|amI̍ iti|tvA̍ ( )|jahati|putra|dEvAḥ||atha|abravIt|vRutram|indra̍ḥ|haniṣyann|saKE̱|viṣṇO̍ iti|vitaramiti̍# vi - taram|vIti|kramasva||46̍ (63) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 11 Anuvaakams :- (yO vai pavamAnAnAM̍ - trIṇi# - pariBUraḥ - sPyaḥ svasti - rBakṣEhi# - mahInAM payO&si̍ - dEva# savitarEtattE̱ - śyEnAya - yadvai hOtO# - payAmagRuhItO&si̍ vAkṣasat - pra sO agna̍ - EkAdaśa̍ ) Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (yO vai - sPyaḥ svastiḥ - svadhAyai namaḥ - pramu~jca̍ - tiṣṭhatIva̍ - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśat̍ ) First and Last Padam of śecond Prasnam Of Kandam 3:- (yO vai pavamAnAnAM̍ - vikramasva)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE tRutIyakAṇḍE dvitIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||-------------------------------------------------------
verses.samhita: -Bava yajamAnAya̍ śaM~MyOḥ||agnistrIṇi# tridhAtUnyA kṣEti̍ vidathA# kaviḥ|sa trIṃrEkAdaśAṃ̍ iha||yakṣacca̍ piprayacca̍ nO viprO# dUtaḥ pariṣkRutaḥ|naBa̍ntAmanyakE̍ samE||indrA̍viṣṇU̍ dRuṃhitAḥ śambarasya̍ nava purO# navatiM ca-̍ ś~jathiṣṭaM|śataM ~Mvarcinaḥ̍ sahasraM̍ ca sAkaṃ hathO apratyasu̍rasya̍ vIrAn||uta mAtA mahiṣa̍ manvavEnadamI̍ tvA# ( ) jahati putra dEvAḥ|athA̱bravId-vRutramindrO# haniṣyanth-saKE# viṣṇO vitaraM ~Mvikramasva||46̍ praśna KOrvai with starting padams of 1 to 11 anuvAkams :- (yO vai pavamAnAnAM̍ - trIṇi# - pariBUraḥ - sPyaḥ svasti - rBakṣEhi# - mahInAM payO&si̍ - dEva# savitarEtattE̱ - śyEnAya - yadvai hOtO# - payAmagRuhItO&si̍ vAkṣasat - pra sO agna̍ - EkAdaśa̍ ) korvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (yO vai - sPyaḥ svastiḥ - svadhAyai namaḥ - pramu~jca̍ - tiṣṭhatIva̍ - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśat̍ ) first and last padam of śecond praśnam of kAṇḍam 3:- (yO vai pavamAnAnAM̍ - vikramasva)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM tRutIyakAṇḍE dvitIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||--------------------------------------------------------- 3.3 tRutIyakAṇḍE tRutIyaḥ praśnaḥ - vaikRutavidhInAmaBidhAnaM

verses.padam: - Padam agnE̱|tEjasvinn|tEjasvI|tvam|dEvEṣu|BUyAḥ|tEja̍svantam|mAm|Ayu̍ṣmantam|varca̍svantam|manuṣyE̍ṣu|kuru|dIkṣAyai̱|ca|tvA|tapa̍saḥ|ca|tEja̍sE|juhOmi|tEjOviditi̍# tEjaḥ - vit|asi|tEjaḥ|mA|mA|hAsIt|mA|aham|tEja̍ḥ|hAsiṣam|mA|mAm|tEja̍ḥ|hAsIt|indra̍|Ojasvinn|OjasvI|tvam|dEvEṣu̍|BUyAḥ|Oja̍svantam|mAm|Ayu̍ṣmantam|varca̍svantam|manuṣyE̍ṣu|kuru|brahma̍ṇaḥ|ca|tvA|kṣatrasya̍|ca|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agnE# tEjasvin tEjasvI tvaM dEvEṣu# BUyAstEjasvantaM̍ mAmAyuṣmantaM̍ ~MvarcasvantaM̍ manuṣyEṣu̍ kuru dIkṣAyai# ca tvA tapasaśca̍ tEjasE̍ juhOmi tEjOvidasi̍ tEjO# mA mA hAsInmA&haM̍ tEjO# hAsiṣaM mA mAM tEjO# hAsIdindraujasvinnOjasvI̍ tvaM dEvEṣu# BUyA OjasvantaM̍ mAmAyuṣmantaM̍ ~MvarcasvantaM̍ manuṣyEṣu̍ kuru brahmaṇaśca̍ tvA kṣatrasya cau - [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam OjasE|juhOmi|OjOvidityO̍jaḥ̍ - vit|asi|Ojaḥ|mA|mA|hAsIt|mA|aham|Oja̍ḥ|hAsiṣam|mA|mAm|Oja̍ḥ|hAsIt|sUrya̍|BrAjasvinn|BrAjasvI|tvam|dEvEṣu̍|BUyAḥ|BrAja̍svantam|mAm|Ayu̍ṣmantam|varca̍svantam|manuṣyE̍ṣu|kuru|vAyOḥ|ca|tvA|apAm|ca|BrAja̍sE|juhOmi|suvarviditi̍# suvaḥ - vit|asi|suvaḥ|mA|mA|hAsIt|mA|aham|suva̍ḥ|hAsiṣam|mA|mAm|suva̍ḥ|hAsIt|mayi̍# ( )|mEdhAm|mayi|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|mayi|agniḥ|tEja̍ḥ|dadhAtu|mayi̍|mEdhAm|mayi̍|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|mayi|indra̍ḥ|indriyam|dadhAtu|mayi̍|mEdhAm|mayi̍|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|mayi|sUrya̍ḥ|BrAja̍ḥ|dadhAtu||2̍ (73) (kṣatrasya# ca - mayi - trayOviṃśatiśca)̍ (A1)
verses.samhita: - jasE̍ juhOmyOjOvidasyOjO# mA mA hAsInmA&hamOjO̍# hAsiṣaM mA mAmOjO# hAsIth sUrya# BrAjasvin BrAjasvI tvaM dEvEṣu# BUyA BrAjasvantaM̍ mAmAyuṣmantaM̍ ~MvarcasvantaM̍ manuṣyEṣu̍ kuru vAyOśca# tvA&pA~jca BrAjasE̍ juhOmisuvarvidasi̍ suvarmA̍ mA hAsInmA&haṃ̍ suvaṛhAsiṣaM̍ mA mAṃ suvaṛhAsIn̍ mayi# ( ) mEdhAM mayi# prajAM mayyagnistEjO# dadhAtu mayi# mEdhAM mayi# prajAM mayIndra# indriyaM dadhAtu̍ mayi# mEdhAM mayi# prajAM mayi sUryO BrAjO# dadhAtu||2 (kṣatrasya# ca - mayi - trayOviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam vAyuḥ|hikaMqrtEti# hiM - kartA|agniḥ|prastOtEti# pra - stOtA|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|sAma|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|udgAtEtyu̍t̍ - gAtA|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|upagAtAra ityupa̍ - gAtAraḥ|maruta̍ḥ|pratihartAra̍ iti# prati - hartAraḥ|indra̍ḥ|nidhanamiti̍# ni - dhana̱m|tE|dEvAḥ|prAṇaBRuta iti# prAṇa - BRutaḥ|prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|mayi|dadhatu|Etat|vai|sarva̱m|addhvaryuḥ|upAkurvannityu̍pa̍ - Akurvann|udgAtRuBya ityudgAtRu̍ - Byaḥ|upAkarOtItyu̍pa̍ - AkarOti|tE|dEvAḥ|prAṇaBRuta̍ iti# prAṇa - BRutaḥ|prAṇamiti̍# pra-anam|mayi|dadhatu|iti̍|Aha|Etat|Eva|sarva̱m|Atmann|dhattE|iḍA̱|dEvahUriti̍# dEva - hUḥ|manuḥ|yajñanIriti̍# yajña - nIḥ|bRuhaspatiḥ|ukthAmadAnItyu̍ktha̍ - madAni|śaṃqsiṣat|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|3̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vAyuṛhikaMrtA&gniḥ̍ prastOtA̍ prajApatiḥ̍ sAma bRuhaspatirudgAtA̍ viśvE# dEvA upagAtArO̍# marutaḥ̍ pratihartAra indrO# nidhanantE dEvAḥ prAṇaBRuta̍ḥ̍ prAṇaM mayi# dadhatvEtadvai sarvamaddhvaryu-ru̍pAkurvannu̍dgAtRuBya̍# upAkarOti̍ tE dEvAḥ prAṇaBRuta̍ḥ̍ prAṇaM mayi# dadhatvityAhaitadEva̍ savarmAtman̍ dhatta̍ iḍA# dEvahU rmanu-ryajñanI-rbRuhaspati̍rukthAmadAni̍# śaṃsiṣad viśvE# dEvAḥ - [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam sUktavAca iti# sUkta - vAcaḥ|pRuthi̍vi|mAtaḥ|mA|mA|hiṃqsIḥ|madhu̍|maniṣyE|madhu̍|janiṣyE|madhu̍|vakṣyAmi|madhu̍|vadiṣyAmi|madhu̍matImiti̍ madhu# - matIm|dEvEByaḥ|vAca̱m|udyAsam|śuśrUṣEṇyA̱m|manuṣyE̱Byaḥ|tam|mA|dEvAḥ|avantu|śOBAyai̱|pitara̍ḥ|anviti̍|madantu||4̍ (28) (śaṃqsiṣad viśvE# dEvA - aṣṭAviṃśatiśca)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: sU̱ktavAcaḥ pRuthivi̍ mAtarmA mAhiṃsI̍ rmadhu# maniṣyE madhu# janiṣyE madhuvakṣyAmi̍ madhuvadiṣyAmi̍ madhumatIM̍ dEvEByO vAcamudyAsaṃ̍ śuśrUṣEṇyA̱M manuṣyE̱ByastaM mA# dEvA avantu̍ śOBAyai# pitarO&nu# madantu||4 (śaṃqsiṣad viśvE# dEvA - aṣṭAviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam vasavaḥ|tvA|prEti̍|vRuhantu|gAyatrEṇa̍|Canda̍sA|agnEḥ|priyam|pAtha̍ḥ|upEti̍|ihi|rudrAḥ|tvA|prEti̍|vRuhantu|traiṣṭu̍BEna|Canda̍sA|indra̍sya|priyam|pAtha̍ḥ|upEti̍|ihi|AdityAḥ|tvA|prEti̍|vRuhantu|jAga̍tEna|Canda̍sA|viśvE̍ṣAm|dEvAnA̱m|priyam|pAtha̍ḥ|upEti̍|ihi|mAndA̍su|tE|śukra|śukram|Eti̍|dhUnOmi|BandanA̍su|kOta̍nAsu|nUta̍nAsu|rEśI̍ṣu|mEṣI̍ṣu|vAśI̍ṣu|viśvaBRuthsviti̍# viśvaBRut - su|mAddhvIṣu|kakuhAsu̍|śakva̍rIṣu|5̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vasavastvA̍ pravahantu̍ gAyatrEṇa CandasA&gnEḥ̍ priyaM pAtha upEhi̍ rudrAstvA pravRuhantu̍ traiṣṭuBEna̍ CandasEndrasya̍ priyaM pAtha upE̱hyAdityAstvA pravRuhantu̍ jAgatEna̍ CandasA̍ viśvEṣAM̍ dEvAnA̱M priyaM pAtha upEhi̍ mAndAsu̍ tE śukra śukramA dhUnOmi̍ BandanAsu̍ kOtanAsu̍ nUtanAsu̍ rEśIṣu̍ mEṣIṣu̍ vAśIṣu̍ viśvaBRuthsu mAddhvIṣu̍ kakuhAsu śakvarIṣu̍ - [ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam śukrAsu|tE|śukra|śukram|Eti̍|dhUnOmi|śukram|tE|śukrEṇa̍|gRuhṇAmi|ahna̍ḥ|rUpEṇa̍|sUrya̍sya|raśmiBiriti̍# raśmi-Biḥ||Eti|asminn|ugrAḥ|acucyavuḥ|divaḥ|dhArA̱ḥ|asaścata||kakuham|rUpam|vRuṣaBasya̍|rOcatE|bRuhat|sOma̍ḥ|sOma̍sya|purOgA̍ iti# puraḥ - gAḥ|śukraḥ|śukrasya|purOgA̍ iti# puraḥ - gAḥ||yat|tE|sOma|adA̱Byam|nAma|jAgRu̍vi|tasmai̱|tE|sOma|sOmA̍ya|svAhA̱|uśik|tvam|dEva|sOma|gAyatrEṇa̍|Canda̍sA|agnEḥ|6̍ (50)
verses.samhita: śukrAsu# tE śukra śukramA dhUnOmi̍ śukraM tE# śukrEṇa# gRuhṇAmyahnO# rUpEṇa sUryasya̍ raśmiBiḥ||A&smi̍nnugrA̍ acucyavurdivO̍ dhArA# asaścata||kakuhaṃ rUpaM ~MvRuṣaBasya̍# rOcatE bRuhath sOmaḥ sOmasya̍ purOgAḥ śukraḥ śukrasya# purOgAḥ||yat tE# sOmAdA̱ByaM nAma jAgRuvi̍ tasmai# tE sOma sOmAya̍ svAhOśik tvaM dEva̍ sOma gAyatrEṇa CandasA&gnEḥ̍ - [ ] 6

verses.padam: - Padam priyam|pAthaḥ|apIti̍|ihi|vaśI|tvam|dEva|sOma|traiṣṭu̍BEna|Canda̍sA|indra̍sya|priyam|pAtha̍ḥ|apIti̍|ihi|asmathsaKEtyasmat̍ - saKA|tvam|dEva|sOma|jAgatEna|Canda̍sA|viśvE̍ṣAm|dEvAnA̱m|priyam|pAtha̍ḥ|apIti̍|ihi|Eti̍|naḥ|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|Etu|parAvata iti# parA-vataḥ|Eti̍|antari̍kṣAt|divaḥ|pari̍||Ayu̍ḥ|pRuthivyAḥ|adhIti̍|amRuta̱m|asi|prAṇAyEti̍# pra - anAya|tvA||indrAgnI̍ itI̱ndra-agnI|mE|varcaḥ|kRuṇutAm|varca̍ḥ|sOma̍ḥ|bRuhaspati̍ḥ̍ ( )||varcaḥ|mE|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|varca̍ḥ|mE|dhattam|aśvinA||dadhanvE|vA|yat|Im|anviti̍|vOca̍t|brahmA̍ṇi|vEḥ|u|tat||parIti̍|viśvA̍ni|kAvyA̱|nEmiḥ|cakram|iva|aBavat||7̍ (75) (śakvarIṣva̍ - gnE - rbRuhaspatiḥ - pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: priyaM pAthO apIhi̍ vaśI tvaM dEva̍ sOma traiṣṭuBEna̍ CandasEndrasya̍ priyaM pAthO apI̱hyasmathsaKA̍ tvaM dEva̍ sOma jAgatEna̍ CandasA̍ viśvEṣAM̍ dEvAnA̱M priyaM pAthO apIhyA naḥ̍ prAṇa Etu̍ parAvata A&ntarikṣAddivaspari̍|Ayu̍ḥ̍ pRuthivyA addhyamRutamasi̍ prAṇAya# tvA||indrAgnI mE varcaḥ̍ kRuṇutAM ~Mvarcaḥ sOmO bRuhaspatiḥ̍ ( )|varcO# mE viśvEdEvA̍ varcO# mE dhattamaśvinA||dadhanvE vA yadImanu vOcadbrahmAṇi̍ vEru tat|pari viśvAni̍ kAvyA# nEmiścakramivA̍ Bavat||7 (śakvarIṣva̍ - gnE - rbRuhaspatiḥ - pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam Etat|vai|apAm|nAmadhEyamiti# nAma - dhEya̱m|guhya̱m|yat|AdhAvA ityA̱ - dhAvAḥ|mAndAsu|tE|śukra|śukram|Eti̍|dhUnOmi|iti̍|Aha|apAm|Eva|nAmadhEyEnEti̍# nAma - dhEyEna|guhyE̍na|divaḥ|vRuṣṭi̱m|avEti̍|rundhE|śukram|tE|śukrEṇa̍|gRuhṇAmi|iti̍|Aha|Etat|vai|ahna̍ḥ|rUpam|yat|rAtri̍ḥ|sUrya̍sya|raśmaya̍ḥ|vRuṣṭyA̱ḥ|IśatE|ahna̍ḥ|Eva|rUpEṇa̍|sUrya̍sya|raśmiBiriti̍# raśmi - Biḥ|divaḥ|vRuṣṭi̱m|cyAvayati|Eti|asminn|ugrAḥ|8̍ (50)
verses.samhita: EtadvA apAM nAmadhEyaM̍ guhyaM ~MyadAdhAvA̍ mAndAsu̍ tE śukra śukramA dhUnOmItyA̍hApAmEva̍ nAmadhEyE̍na̍ guhyEna̍ divO vRuṣṭimava# rundhE śukraM tE# śukrEṇa# gRuhṇAmItyAhaitadvA̍ ahnO# rUpaM ~MyadrAtriḥ sUryasya̍ raśmayO vRuṣṭyA# IśatE&hna# Eva rUpEṇa sUryasya̍ raśmiBirdivO̍ vRuṣṭiM̍ cyAvayatyA&sminnugrA̍ - [ ] 8

verses.padam: - Padam acucyavuḥ|iti|Aha|yathAyajuriti̍# yathA-yajuḥ|Eva|Etat|kakuham|rUpam|vRuṣaBasya|rOcatE|bRuhat|iti̍|Aha|Etat|vai|asya|kakuham|rUpam|yat|vRuṣṭi̍ḥ|rUpEṇa̍|Eva|vRuṣṭi̱m|avEti̍|rundhE|yat|tE|sOma|adA̱Byam|nAma̍|jAgRu̍vi|iti̍|Aha|Eṣaḥ|ha|vai|haviṣA̱|haviḥ|yajati|yaḥ|adA̱Byam|gRuhItvA|sOmA̍ya|juhOti̍|parEti̍|vai|Etasya̍|Ayu̍ḥ|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|Eti|9 (50)
verses.samhita: acucyavurityA̍ha̍ yathAyajurEvaitat kakuhaṃ̍ rUpaM ~MvRuṣaBasya̍# rOcatE bRuhadityAhaitadvA̍ asya̍ kakuhaṃ rUpaM ~Myad-vRuṣṭI# rUpEṇaiva vRuṣṭimava# rundhE yattE# sOmAdA̱ByaM nAma jAgRuvItyAhaiṣa̍ ha vai haviṣA# haviryajati̍ yO&dA̱ByaM gRuhItvA sOmAya̍ juhOtiparA vA EtasyA&&*yuḥ̍ prAṇa Eti̍ - [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam yaḥ|aṃqśum|gRuhṇAti|Eti̍|naḥ|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|Etu|parAvata iti# parA - vataḥ|iti̍|Aha|Ayu̍ḥ|Eva|prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|Atmann|dhattE|amRuta̱m|asi|prAṇAyEti# pra - anAya|tvA|iti̍|hira̍ṇyam|aBi|vIti̍|aniti|amRuta̱m|vai|hira̍ṇyam|Ayu̍ḥ|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|amRutEna|Eva|Ayu̍ḥ|Atmann|dhattE|śatamA̍namiti̍# śata - mAnam|Bavati|śatAyuriti# śata - Ayuḥ|puruṣaḥ|śatEndri̍ya̍ iti# śata - indriyaḥ|Ayuṣi|Eva|indriyE|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|apaḥ|upEti̍|spRuśati|BEṣajam|vai|Apa̍ḥ̍ ( )|BEṣajam|Eva|kurutE||10 (53)
verses.samhita: yO&ṃśuM̍ gRuhṇAtyA naḥ̍ prAṇa Etu̍ parAvata ityAhA&&*yurEva̍ prAṇamAtman dhattE̍ &mRutamasi̍ prAṇAya tvEti hiraṇyamaBi̍ vyanityamRutaM̍ ~Mvai hiraṇyamAyu̍ḥ̍ prAṇO&mRutE̍naivA&&*yu̍rAtman̍ dhattE̍ śatamAnaM̍ Bavati śatAyuḥ puruṣaḥ̍ śatEndriya̍ AyuṣyEvEndriyE̍ pratitiṣṭhatyapa̍ upa# spRuśati BEṣajaM ~MvA ApO# ( ) BEṣajamEva kurutE||10̍

verses.padam: - Padam vAyuḥ|asi|prAṇa iti# pra - anaḥ|nAma|savituḥ|Adhi̍patya̍ ityAdhi# - patyE|apAnamityapa̍ - anam|mE|dAḥ|cakṣuḥ|asi|śrOtra̱m|nAma̍|dhAtuḥ|Adhi̍patya̍ ityAdhi-patyE|Ayu̍ḥ|mE|dAḥ|rUpam|asi|varṇa̍ḥ|nAma̍|bRuhaspatE̱ḥ|Adhi̍patya̍ ityAdhi# - patyE|prajAmiti# pra-jAm|mE|dAḥ|Rutam|asi|satyam|nAma|indra̍sya|Adhi̍patya̍ ityAdhi# - patyE|kṣatram|mE|dAḥ|BUtam|asi|Bavya̱m|nAma|pitRuṇAm|Adhi̍patya̍ ityAdhi# - patyE|apAm|OṣadhInAm|garBa̱m|dhAḥ|Rutasya̍|tvA|vyO̍mana̍ iti vi - OmanE|Rutasya|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vAyurasi̍ prAṇO nAma# saviturAdhipatyE&pAnaM̍ mE# dAścakṣurasi̍ śrOtraM nAma# dhAturAdhipatya̍ AyurmE̍ dA rUpamasi̍ varṇO nAma bRuhaspatErAdhipatyE̍ prajAM mE# dA Rutamasi̍ satyaM nAmEndrasyA&&*dhipatyE̍ kṣatraM mE# dA BUtamasi̍ BavyaM nAma# pitRuṇAmAdhipatyE&pA-mOṣa̍dhInAM̍ garBaM̍ dhA Rutasya# tvA vyOmana̍ Rutasya# - [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam tvA|viBUmana̍ iti vi - BUmanE|Rutasya|tvA|vidha̍rmaṇa̍ iti vi - dharmaṇE|Rutasya|tvA|satyAya̍|Rutasya̍|tvA|jyOti̍ṣE|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|virAjamiti# vi - rAja̱m|apaśyat|tayA̱|BUtam|ca|Bavya̱m|ca|asRujata|tAm|RuṣiBya̍ ityRuṣi# - Byaḥ|tiraḥ|adadhAt|tAm|jamadagniḥ|tapa̍sA|apaśyat|tayA̱|vai|saḥ|pRuśnIn̍|kAmAn̍|asRujata|tat|pRuśnI̍nAm|pRuśnitvamiti̍# pRuśni - tvam|yat|pRuśnayaḥ|gRuhyantE̱|pRuśnIn̍|Eva|taiḥ|kAmAn̍|yaja̍mAnaḥ|avEti̍|rundhE|vAyuḥ|asi|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|12 (50)
verses.samhita: tvA viBUmana̍ Rutasya# tvA vidharmaṇa̍ Rutasya# tvA satyAyartasya# tvA jyOtiṣE̍ prajApati̍ rvirAjamapaśyat̍ tayA# BUtaM ca BavyaM̍ cA sRujata tAmRuṣiByastirO̍&dadhAt̍ tAM jamadagnistapa̍sA&̍ paśyat tayA vai sa pRuś~jIn kAmAnasRujata̍ tat pRuś~jInAM̍ pRuś~jitvaM ~Myat pRuś~jayO̍ gRuhyantE pRuś~jInEva̍ taiḥ kAmAnq. yajamAnO&va̍# rundhE vAyurasi̍ prAṇO - [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam nAma|iti̍|Aha|prAṇApAnAviti̍# prAṇa-apAnau|Eva|avEti|rundhE|cakṣu̍ḥ|asi|śrOtra̱m|nAma̍|iti̍|Aha|Ayu̍ḥ|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|rUpam|asi|varṇa̍ḥ|nAma̍|iti̍|Aha|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|Eva|avEti|rundhE|Rutam|asi|satyam|nAma̍|iti̍|Aha|kṣatram|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|BUtam|asi|Bavya̱m|nAma̍|iti̍|Aha|paśava̍ḥ|vai|apAm|Oṣa̍dhInAm|garBa̍ḥ|paśUn|Eva|13̍ (50)
verses.samhita: nAmEtyAha̍ prAṇApAnAvEvAva# rundhE cakṣurasi̍ śrOtraM nAmEtyAhA&&yurEvAva̍# rundhE rUpamasi̍ varṇO nAmEtyAha̍ prajAmEvAva# rundhaRutamasi̍ satyaM nAmEtyAha̍ kṣatramEvAva# rundhE BUtamasi̍ BavyaM nAmEtyAha̍ paśavO vA apAmOṣadhInAM̍ garBaḥ̍ paśUnEvA - [ ] 13

verses.padam: - Padam avEti|rundhE|EtAva̍t|vai|puru̍ṣam|parita̍ḥ|tat|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|Rutasya̍|tvA|vyO̍mana̍ iti vi - OmanE|iti|Aha|iyam|vai|Rutasya̍|vyO̍mEti̍ vi - Oma|imAm|Eva|aBIti|jayati|Rutasya̍|tvA|viBU̍mana̍ iti vi-BUmanE|iti|Aha|antari̍kṣam|vai|Rutasya̍|viBUmEti̍ vi - BUma|antarikṣam|Eva|aBIti̍|jayati|Rutasya̍|tvA|vidha̍rmaṇa̍ iti vi - dharmaṇE|iti|Aha|dyauḥ|vai|Rutasya̍|vidharmEti̍ vi -dharma|diva̱m|Eva|aBIti|jayati|Rutasya̍|14̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -va# rundha EtAvadvai puruṣaM̍ paritastadEvAva# rundha Rutasya# tvA vyOmana̍ ityAhEyaM̍ ~MvA Rutasya vyOmEmAmEvABi̍ jayatyRutasya̍# tvA viBUmana̍ ityAhA&ntari̍kṣaM̍ ~MvA Rutasya viBUmAntari̍kṣamEvABi̍ jayatyRutasya̍# tvA vidharmaṇa̍ ityAha̍ dyaurvA Rutasya vidharma̍ divamEvABi̍ jayatyRutasya̍-̍ [ ] 14

verses.padam: - Padam tvA|satyAya|iti̍|Aha|diśa̍ḥ|vai|Rutasya̍|satyam|diśa̍ḥ|Eva|aBIti̍|jayati|Rutasya̍|tvA|jyOti̍ṣE|iti̍|Aha|suvarga̍ iti# suvaḥ - gaḥ|vai|lOkaḥ|Rutasya|jyOti̍ḥ|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|Eva|lOkam|aBIti|jayati|EtAva̍ntaḥ|vai|dEvalOkA̍ iti# dEva - lOkAḥ|tAn|Eva|aBIti|jayati|daśa̍|samiti̍|padyantE|daśA̱kṣarEti̍ daśa# - akṣarA|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|anna̱m|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjIti# vi - rAji|Eva|annAdya̍ ityanna̍ - adyE̱|pratIti|tiṣṭhati||15̍ (46) (vyOmana̍ Rutasya# - prAṇaḥ - paśunEva - vidharma̍ divamEvABi̍ jayatyRutasya̍ -ṣaṭcatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A5)
verses.samhita: tvA satyAyEtyAha̍ diśO vA Rutasya# satyaM diśa# EvABi jayatyRutasya̍# tvA jyOtiṣa̍ ityAha̍ suvargO vai lOka Rutasya jyOtiḥ̍ suvargamEva lOkamaBi jayatyEtAva̍ntO̍ vai dEvalOkAstAnEvABi̍ jayati̍ daśa saMpadyantE̍ daśA̱kṣarA virAḍannaM̍ ~MvirAḍ virAjyEvAnnAdyE pratitiṣṭhati||15̍ (vyOmana̍ Rutasya# - prAṇaḥ - paśunEva - vidharma̍ divamEvABi̍ jayatyRutasya̍ -ṣaṭcatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAḥ|vai|yat|yajñEna|na|avAru̍ndhatEtya̍va̍ - arundhata|tat|parai̱ḥ|avEti̍|arundhata|tat|parA̍ṇAm|paratvamiti̍# para - tvam|yat|parE̱|gRuhyantE̱|yat|Eva|yajñEna|na|avarundha̍ ityava-rundhE|tasya̍|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# -ruddhyai|yam|prathamam|gRuhṇAti|imam|Eva|tEna̍|lOkam|aBIti̍|jayati|yam|dvitIya̱m|antari̍kṣam|tEna̍|yam|tRutIya̱m|amum|Eva|tEna̍|lOkam|aBIti̍|jayati|yat|EtE|gRuhyantE̱|EṣAm|lOkAnA̱m|aBiji̍tyA̍ ityaBi - jityai|16 (50)
verses.samhita: dEvA vai yad-yajñEna nAvArundhata̍ tat parairavArundhata̍ tat parAṇAM̍ paratvaM ~Myat parE# gRuhyantE yadEva yajñEnanAvarundhE̍ tasyAvaruddhyai̍ yaM prathamaM̍ gRuhṇAtImamEva tEna# lOkamaBi jayatiyaM̍ dvitIyamantari̍kṣaM̍ tEna yaM tRutIyamamumEva̍ tEna# lOkamaBi jayati̍ yadEtE gRuhyanta# EṣAM ~MlOkAnAmaBiji̍tyA̍ - [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam uttarEṣvityut̍ - tarEṣu|ahaḥ svityahaḥ-su|amuta̍ḥ|arvA~jca̍ḥ|gRuhyantE|aBijityEtya̍Bi-jitya̍|Eva|imAn|lOkAn|puna̍ḥ|imam|lOkam|pratyava̍rOhantIti̍# prati - avarOhanti|yat|pUrvE̍ṣu|ahaḥ̍ svityahaḥ# - su|itaḥ|parA̱~jcaḥ|gRuhyantE̱|tasmA̱t|itaḥ|parA̱~jcaḥ|imE|lOkAḥ|yat|uttarEṣvityut̍ - tarEṣu|ahaḥ svityahaḥ# - su|amutaḥ|arvA~jca̍ḥ|gRuhyantE̱|tasmA̱t|amuta̍ḥ|arvA~jca̍ḥ|imE|lOkAḥ|tasmA̱t|ayA̍tayAmna̍ ityayAta-yAmnaḥ|lOkAn|manuṣyA̱ḥ|upEti̍|jIvanti|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|kasmA̱t|satyAt|adBya̍ ityat̍ - Byaḥ|Oṣadhayaḥ|samiti̍|Bavanti|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|17̍ (50)
verses.samhita: uttarEṣvaha̍ḥ̍ svamutO&rvA~jcO# gRuhyantE &BijityaivEmAM ~MlOkAn punarimaM̍ ~MlOkaM pratyavarOhanti̍ yat pUrvEṣvahaḥ̍ svitaḥ parA̱~jcO gRuhyantE tasmAditaḥ̍ parA̱~jca imE lOkA yaduttarEṣvaha̍ḥ̍ svamutO&rvA~jcO# gRuhyantE tasmAdamutO̍ &rvA~jca# imE lOkAstasmAdayAtayAmnO̍ lOkAn manuṣyA̍# upa# jIvanti brahmavAdinO# vadanti kasmA̱th satyAdadBya Oṣadhayaḥ̍ saM BavantyOṣa̍dhayO̍ - [ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam manuṣyAṇAm|anna̱m|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA - patim|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|anu|prEti̍|jAyantE|iti̍|parAn̍|anviti̍|iti̍|brUyAt|yat|gRuhṇAti̍|adBya̍ ityat̍ - Byaḥ|tvA|OṣadhIBya̍ ityOṣadhi̍ - Byaḥ|gRuhṇAmi|iti|tasmA̱t|adBya̍ ityat-Byaḥ|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|samiti̍|Bavanti|yat|gRuhṇAti̍|Oṣa̍dhIBya̍ ityOṣadhi̍ - Byaḥ|tvA|prajABya iti# pra - jAByaḥ|gRuhṇAmi|iti̍|tasmA̱t|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|manuṣyA̍ṇAm|anna̱m|yat|gRuhṇAti̍|prajABya̍ iti# pra - jAByaḥ|tvA|prajApa̍taya̍ iti# prajA - patayE|gRuhṇAmi|iti|tasmA̱t|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA - patim|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|anu|prEti̍|jAyantE||18̍ (48) (aBijityai̍ - BavantyOṣadhayO̍ - &ṣṭA catvAriṃśacca)̍ (A6)
verses.samhita: manuṣyAṇAmanna̍M̍ prajApatiM̍ prajA anu prajAyanta̍ iti parAnanviti# brUyAd-yad-gRuhṇAtyadByastvauṣadhIByO̍ gRuhṇAmIti tasmAdadBya̍ Oṣadhayaḥ̍ saMBavanti̍ yad-gRuhṇAtyOṣadhIByastvA̍ prajAByO# gRuhṇAmIti tasmAdOṣadhayO̍ manuṣyAṇAmannaM̍ ~Myad-gRuhṇAti# prajAByastvA̍ prajApatayE̍ gRuhṇAmIti tasmA̱t prajApatiM̍ prajA anu prajAyantE||18̍ (aBijityai̍ - BavantyOṣadhayO̍ - &ṣṭA catvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|dEvAsurAniti# dEva - asurAn|asRujata|tat|anviti|yajñaḥ|asRujyata|yajñam|CandAṃ̍si|tE|viṣva̍~jcaḥ|vIti̍|akrAmann|saḥ|asu̍rAn|anviti̍|yajñaḥ|apEti̍|akrAmat|yajñam|CandAṃ̍si|tE|dEvAḥ|amanyanta|amI̍ iti|vai|idam|aBUvann|yat|vayam|smaḥ|iti̍|tE|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA-patim|upEti|adhAvann|saḥ|abravIt|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|CandasAm|vIrya̱m|AdAyEtyA̱̍ - dAya|tat|vaḥ|prEti̍|dAsyAmi|iti̍|saḥ|Canda̍sAm|vIrya̱m|19̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prajApatirdEvAsurAna̍# sRujata tadanu# yajñO&sRujyata̍ yajñaM CandAṃsi̍ tE viṣva~jcO̍ vyakrAmanth̍ sO&surAnanu̍# yajñO&pA̱krAmad-yajñaM CandAṃsi̍ tE dEvA amanyantAmI̍ vA idamaBUvana.̍ yad-vayaṅ sma iti tE prajApatimupA̍&dhAvanth̍ sO̱&bravIt-prajApatiśCanda̍sAM̍ ~MvIryamAdAya̍ tadvaḥ pra dA̱syAmIti sa CandasAM̍ ~MvIrya# - [ ] 19

verses.padam: - Padam AdAyEtyA̱-dAya|tat|EByaḥ|prEti̍|ayacCat|tat|anviti̍|CandAṃ̍si|apEti̍|akrAmann|CandAṃ̍si|yajñaḥ|tata̍ḥ|dEvAḥ|aBa̍vann|parEti̍|asu̍rAḥ|yaḥ|Evam|Canda̍sAm|vIrya̱m|vEda̍|Eti̍|śrAvaya|astu̍|śrauṣa̍ṭ|yaja̍|yE|yajA̍mahE|vaṣaṭkAra̍ iti# vaṣaṭ - kAraḥ|Bavati|AtmanA̱|parEti̍|asya|BrAtRu̍vyaḥ|Bavati|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|kasmai̱|kam|addhvaryuḥ|Eti̍|śrAvayati|iti̍|Canda̍sAm|vIryA̍ya|iti̍|brUyAt|Etat|vai|20̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mAdAya tadE̱Byaḥ prAyacCat̍ tadanu CandAṅqsyapA̱&krAman CandAṃsi̍ yajñastatO# dEvA aBavan̍ parA&surA̍ ya EvaM CandasAM̍ ~MvIryaM̍ ~MvEdA&& śrAvayA&stu̍ śrauṣaḍ yaja yE yajAmahE̍ vaṣaṭkArO BavatyAtmanA̍ parA̱&sya BrAtRuvyO̍ Bavati brahmavAdinO# vadanti kasmai kamaddhvaryurA̍ śrAvayatIti̍ CandasAM̍ ~MvIryAyEti̍# brUyAdE tad vai - [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam CandasAm|vIrya̱m|Eti̍|śrAvaya|astu̍|śrauṣa̍ṭ|yaja̍|yE|yajA̍mahE|vaṣaṭkAra̍ iti# vaṣaṭ - kAraḥ|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|savI̱ryairiti̍ sa - vIryaiḥ|Eva|CandOBiriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|arcati|yat|kim|ca|arcati|yat|indra̍ḥ|vRutram|ahann̍|amEddhyam|tat|yat|yatIn̍|apAva̍paditya̍pa̍ - avapat|amEddhyam|tat|atha̍|kasmA̱t|aindraḥ|yajñaḥ|Eti̍|saṅsthA̍tOriti̍ saM - sthAtOḥ|iti|Ahuḥ|indra̍sya|vai|EṣA|yajñiyA̱|tanUḥ|yat|yajñaḥ|tAm|Eva|tat̍ ( )|yajanti|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|upEti̍|Enam|yajñaḥ|namati||21̍ (58)
verses.samhita: CandasAM̍ ~MvIryamA̍ śrAvayA&stu̍ śrauṣaḍ yaja yE yajAmahE̍ vaṣaṭkArO ya EvaM ~MvEda savI̱ryairEva CandOBirarcati̍ yat kiM cArcati̍ yadindrO# vRutramahanna-mEddhyaM̍ tad-yad-yatInapAva̍pada-mEddhyaM̍ tadatha kasmAdaindrO̍ yajña A saṅsthAtOrityA̍hurindra̍sya̍ vA EṣA yajñiyA# tanUryad-yajñastAmEva ta ( ) dyajanti̍ ya EvaM ~MvEdOpainaM̍ ~MyajñO namati||21̍

verses.padam: - Padam AyurdA ityAyuḥ̍ - dAḥ|agnE|haviṣaḥ|juṣAṇaḥ|GRutapra̍tIka̍ iti# GRuta - pratIkaḥ|GRutayOniriti̍# GRuta-yOniḥ|Edhi||GRutam|pItvA|madhu|cAru̍|gavya̱m|pitA|iva|putram|aBIti̍|rakṣatAt|imam||Eti̍|vRuścyatE|vai|Etat|yaja̍mAnaḥ|agniByAmityagni̍ - ByAm|yat|EnayOḥ|śRutakRuMtyEti# śRutaM - kRutya|atha̍|anyatra̍|avaBRuthamitya̍va̍ - BRutham|avaitItyava̍ - Eti|AyurdA̍ ityAyuḥ̍ - dAḥ|agnE|haviṣaḥ|juṣAṇaḥ|iti̍|avaBRuthamitya̍va̍ - BRutham|avaiṣyannityava-Eṣyann|juhuyAt|AhutyEtyA̍ - hutyA|Eva|Enau|śamayati|na|Arti̱m|Eti|RucCati|yaja̍mAnaḥ|yat|kusI̍dam|22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: AyurdA agnE̍ haviṣO# juṣAṇO GRutapratIkO̍ GRutayOnirEdhi|GRutaM̍ pItvA madhucAru gavyaM̍ pitEvaputramaBi̍ rakṣatAdimaM||A̍ vRuścyatE̍ vA Etad-yajamAnO&gniByAM̍ ~MyadEnayOḥ̍ śRutaM kRutyAthA&nyatrA-vaBRuthamavaityA̍yurdA̍ agnE̍ haviṣO# juṣAṇa ityavaBRuthama̍vaiṣyan̍ juhuyAdAhu̍tyaivainau̍# śamayati nA&&*rtimArcCati̍ yajamAnO̍ yat kusIda̍ - [ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam apratIttamityapra̍ti-ittam|mayi̍|yEna̍|yamasya̍|balinA̱|carA̍mi||iha|Eva|sann|nirava̍daya̍ iti# niḥ-avadayE|tat|Etat|tat|agnE|anRuṇaḥ|BavAmi||viśva̍lOpEti̍ viśva# - lOpa|viśvadAvasyEti# viśva - dAvasya|tvA|Asann|juhOmi|agdhAditya̍gdha̍ - at|Ekaḥ|ahutAditya̍huta̍ - at|Ekaḥ|samasanAditi̍# samasana - at|Ekaḥ||tE|naḥ|kRuṇvantu|BEṣajam|sada̍ḥ|saha̍ḥ|varE̱ṇyam||ayam|naḥ|naBa̍sA|puraḥ|saṅqsPAna̍ iti# saM - sPAnaḥ|aBIti̍|rakṣatu||gRuhAṇA̱m|asa̍martyA̍ ityasa̱M - Rutyai|bahavaḥ|naḥ|gRuhAḥ|asann||saḥ|tvam|naḥ|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mapratIttaM̍ mayi yEna# yamasya# balinA carAmi|ihaiva̍ san niravadayE̍ tadEtat tadagnE̍ anRuṇO BavAmi|viśva̍lOpa̍ viśvadAvasya# tvA &&sa~jjuhOmyagdhAdEkO̍# &hutAdEkaḥ̍ samasanAdEkaḥ|tEna̍ḥ̍ kRuṇvantu BEṣajaṃ sadaḥ sahO varE̱ṇyaM||ayaM nO naBasA̍ puraḥ saṅqsPAnO# aBi rakṣatu|gRuhAṇAmasa̍martyai̍ bahavO# nO gRuhA asann||sa̍ tvannO# - [ ] 23

verses.padam: - Padam naBasaḥ|patE|Urja̱m|naḥ|dhEhi|BadrayA̱||punaḥ|naḥ|naṣṭam|Eti̍|kRudhi|puna̍ḥ|naḥ|rayim|Eti̍|kRudhi||dEva̍|saṅqsPAnEti̍# saM - sPAna|sahasrapOṣasyEti# sahasra - pOṣasya|IśiṣE|saḥ|naḥ|rAsva|ajyA̍nim|rAyaḥ|pOṣa̱m|suvIryamiti̍# su - vIrya̱m|saM~MvathsarIṇAmiti# saM - vathsarIṇA̱m|svastim||agniḥ|vAva|yamaḥ|iyam|yamI|kusIdam|vai|Etat|yamasya̍|yaja̍mAnaḥ|Eti̍|dattE|yat|Oṣa̍dhIBirityOṣa̍dhi̍ - Biḥ|vEdi̱m|stRuṇAti|yat|anu̍pauṣyEtyanu̍pa̍ - Oṣya|prayAyAditi# pra - yAyAt|grIvabaddhamiti# grIva - baddham|Enam|24 (50)
verses.samhita: naBasaspata UrjaM̍ nO dhEhi BadrayA̱|punarnO̍ naṣṭamA kRudhi̍ punarnO̍ rayimA kRudhi||dEva̍# saṅsPAna sahasrapOṣasyEśiṣE̍ sa nO# rAsvA&jyAniṃ̍ rAyaspOṣaṃ# suvIryaṃ# saM~MvathsarIṇAṅ# svastiM||agnirvAva yama iyaM ~MyamI kusIdaM̍ ~MvA Etad-yamasya yajamAna̍ A dattE̍ yadOṣadhIBirvEdiṅ̍# stRuṇAti yadanupauṣya̍ prayAyAdgrIvabaddhamE̍na̍ - [ ] 24

verses.padam: - Padam amuṣminn|lOkE|nEnIyErann|yat|kusI̍dam|apra̍tIttamityapra̍ti̍ - ittam|mayi|iti̍|upEti̍|Oṣati|iha|Eva|sann|yamam|kusI̍dam|niravadAyEti̍# niḥ - avadAya|anRuṇaḥ|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ-gam|lOkam|Eti|yadi|miśram|iva|carE̱t|a~jjalinA̱|saktUn̍|pradAvya̍# iti# pra - dAvyE̱|juhuyAt|Eṣaḥ|vai|agniḥ|vaiśvAnaraḥ|yat|pradAvya# iti# pra - dAvyaḥ|saḥ|Eva|Enam|svadayati|ahnA̱m|vidhAnyAmiti̍# vi - dhAnyA̱m|aikAṣṭakAyAmityEka̍ - aṣṭakAyA̱m|apUpam|catuḥ̍ śarAvamiti catuḥ̍ - śarAvam|paktvA|prAtaḥ|EtEna|kakṣa̱m|upEti̍|OṣEt|yadi̍|25̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mamuṣmin̍ ~MlOkE nEnIyEranq.̍ yat kusIdamapra̍tIttaM̍ mayItyupauṣatIhaiva̍ san. yamaM kusIdaM̍ niravadAyAnRuṇaḥ̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamEtiyadi̍# miśramiva̍ carEda~jjalinA̍ saktU̱n pradAvyE# juhuyAdEṣa vA agnirvai̱śvAnarO yat pradAvya̍ḥ̍ sa EvainaṅsvadayatyahnA̱M̍ ~MvidhAnyA-mEkAṣṭakAyA̍mapUpaM̍ catuḥ̍ śarAvaM paktvA prAtarEtEna kakṣamupauṣEdyadi̍ - [ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam dahati|puṇyasamamiti̍# puṇya - sama̱m|Bavati|yadi|na|daha̍ti|pApasamamiti̍# pApa - sama̱m|EtEna|ha|sma|vai|Ruṣa̍yaḥ|purA|vijñAnEnEti̍# vi - jñAnEna|dIrGasatramiti̍# dIrGa - satram|upEti|yanti|yaḥ|vai|upadraṣṭAramityu̍pa̍ - draṣṭAra̱m|upaśrOtAramityupa̍ - śrOtAra̱m|anuKyAtAramityanu̍ - KyAtAra̱m|vidvAn|yajatE|samiti̍|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|iṣṭApUrtEnEtI̱ṣṭa̍ - pUrtEna|gacCatE|agniḥ|vai|upadraṣṭEtyu̍pa-draṣṭA|vAyuḥ|upaśrOtEtyu̍pa̍ - śrOtA|Adityaḥ|anuKyAtEtyanu-KyAtA|tAn|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|yaja̍tE|samiti̍|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|iṣṭApUrtEnEtI̱ṣṭa̍ - pUrtEna|gacCatE|ayam|naḥ|naBa̍sA|puraḥ|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dahati̍ puṇyasamaM̍ Bavati yadi na dahati̍ pApasamamEtEna̍# hasma vA Ruṣayaḥ̍ purA vijñAnEna̍ dIrGasatramupa# yanti yO vA upadraṣṭAra̍mupa-śrOtAra̍manuKyAtAra̍M̍ ~MvidvAn. yajatE̍ samamuṣmin̍ ~MlOka iṣṭApUrtEna̍# gacCatE&gnirvA upadraṣṭA̍ vAyurupaśrOtA̍ &&dityO&nuKyAtA̍ tAn. ya EvaM ~MvidvAn. yajatE̍ samamuṣmin̍ ~MlOka iṣṭApUrtEna̍# gacCatE &yaM nO naBasA̍ pura - [ ] 26

verses.padam: - Padam iti|Aha|agniḥ|vai|naBa̍sA|puraḥ|agnim|Eva|tat|Aha|Etat|mE|gOpAya|iti̍|saḥ|tvam|naḥ|naBasaḥ|patE|iti̍|Aha|vAyuḥ|vai|naBa̍saḥ|pati̍ḥ|vAyum|Eva|tat|Aha|Etat|mE|gOpAya|iti̍|dEva̍|saṅqsPAnEti̍# saM - sPAna|iti|Aha|asau|vai|Adityaḥ|dEvaḥ|saṅqsPAna̍ iti# saM - sPAnaḥ|Adityam|Eva|tat|Aha|Etat|mE|gOpAya|iti̍# ( )||27 (50)
verses.samhita: ityAhAgnirvai̍ naBasA̍ purO̱&gnimEva tadAhaitanmE̍# gOpAyEti sa tvaM nO# naBasaspata ityAha̍ vAyurvai naBasaspati̍rvAyumEva̍ tadAhaitanmE̍# gOpAyEti dEva# saṅsPAnEtyAhA&sau̍ vA AdityO̍ dEvaḥ saṅqsPAna# AdityamEva tadAhaitanmE̍# gOpAyEti||27̍
