verses.padam: - Padam dadE|Rutasya|dhAmna̍ḥ|amRuta̍sya|yOnE̱ḥ||Eti̍|naḥ|gOṣu̍|viśatu|Eti̍|Oṣa̍dhIṣu|jahA̍mi|sEdim|ani̍rAm|amI̍vAm||agnE̱|tava̍|śrava̍ḥ|vaya̍ḥ|mahi̍|BrAjanti|arcaya̍ḥ|viBAvasO̍ iti# viBA - vasO||bRuhadBAnO̍ iti bRuhat̍ - BAnO|śavasA|vAja̱m|ukthya̱m|dadhA̍si|dAśuṣE̱|kavE||irajyann|agnE|prathayasva|jantuBiriti̍# jantu-Biḥ|asmE iti|rAya̍ḥ|amartya||saḥ|darq.śatasya̍|vapu̍ṣaḥ|vIti̍|rAjasi|pRuṇakṣi̍|sAnasim|rayim||Urja̍ḥ|napAt|jAta̍vEda̍ iti jAta# - vEdaḥ|suśastiBiriti# suśasti - Biḥ|mandasva|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dada̍ Rutasya dhAmnO# amRutasya̍ yOnE̱ḥ|A nO gOṣu# viśatvauṣadhIṣu̍ jahAmi̍ sEdimanirAmamI̍vAM||agnE̍ tava śravO vayO mahi# BrAjantyarcayO# viBAvasO|bRuhad-BAnO̍ śavasA̍ vAjamukthya̍M̍ dadhAsi̍ dAśuṣE# kavE||irajyannagnE̍ prathayasva jantuBirasmE̍ rAyO# amartya|sa daṛśatasya̍ vapuṣO̍ vi rAjasi̍ pRuṇakṣi# sAnasiṃ rayiM||UrjO# napAjjAtavEdaḥ̍ suśastiBi-rmandasva̍ - [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam dhItiBiriti# dhIti-Biḥ|hitaḥ||tvE iti|iṣa̍ḥ|samiti̍|dadhuḥ|BUri̍rEtasa̍ iti BUri# - rEtasaḥ|citrOtaya̍ iti# citra - Utayaḥ|vAmajAtA̍ iti# vAma - jAtAḥ||pAvakavarcA̍ iti# pAvaka - varcAḥ|śukravarcA̍ iti# śukra - varcAḥ|anUnavarcA̍ ityanUna̍ - varcAḥ|uditi|iyarq.ṣi|BAnunA̱||putraḥ|pitarA̱|vicaranniti̍# vi-carann|upEti̍|avasi|uBE̍ iti|pRuṇakṣi|rOda̍sI̍ iti||RutAvA̍namityRuta̍ - vAnam|mahiṣam|viśvacaṛṣaṇimiti̍# viśva - carq.ṣaṇim|agnim|sumnAya|dadhirE|puraḥ|janA̱ḥ||śrutka̍rṇamiti̍ śrut-karṇam|saprathastamamiti̍# saprathaḥ-tamam|tvA|girA|daivya̱m|mAnu̍ṣA|yugA||niṣkartAramiti̍# niḥ - kartAra̱m|addhvarasya|pracE̍tasamiti̍ pra - cEtasam|kṣayantam|rAdha̍sE|mahE||rAtim|BRugU̍ṇAm|uśija̱m|kavikra̍tumiti̍# kavi - kratum|pRuṇakṣi|sAnasim|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dhItiBiṛhitaḥ|tvE̍ iṣaḥ saM dadhu-rBUri̍rEtasa-ścitrO̍ tayO̍ vAmajAtAḥ||pAvakava̍rcAḥ̍ śukravarcA̍ anUnavarcA̍ udiyaṛṣi̍ BAnunA̱|putraḥ pitarA# vicarannupAvasyuBE̍ pRuṇakṣi̍ rOdasI||RutAvA̍naM̍ mahiṣaM ~Mviśvacaṛṣaṇimagniṃ̍ sumnAya# dadhirE purO janA̱ḥ|śrutkarṇaṃ̍ saprathastamaM̍ tvA girA daivyaM mAnuṣA̍ yugA||niṣkartAra-maddhvarasya̍ pracEtasaM̍ kṣayantaṃq̍ rAdhasE̍ mahE|rAtiM BRugUṇAmuśija̍M̍ kavikratuM̍ pRuṇakṣi# sAnasiṃ - [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam rayim||citaḥ|stha|paricita̍ iti# pari - citaḥ|Ud^^rdhvacita̍ ityU̱d^^rdhva - citaḥ|śrayaddhvam|tayA̱|dEvata̍yA|a~ggirasvat|dhruvAḥ|sIdata||Eti̍|pyAyasva|samiti̍|Etu|tE|viśvata̍ḥ|sOma|vRuṣṇi̍yam||Bava̍|vAja̍sya|sa~ggatha̍ iti# saM-gathE||samiti|tE|payAṃ̍si|samiti̍|u|yantu|vAjA̱ḥ|samiti̍|vRuṣṇi̍yAni|aBimAtiṣAha̍ ityaBimAti̍ - sAhaḥ||ApyAya̍mAna̍ ityA̱ - pyAyamAnaḥ|amRutA̍ya|sOma|divi|śravAṃ̍si|uttamAnItyu̍t̍ - tamAni|dhiṣva||32̍ (39) (A - mandasva̍ - sAnasi - mEkAnnacatvAriṃqśacca̍)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: rayiM||citaḥ̍ stha paricita# Urddhvacitaḥ̍ śrayaddhvaM tayA# dEvatayA&~ggirasvad-dhruvAḥ̍ sIdata||A̍ pyAyasva̍ samEtu̍ tE viśvataḥ̍ sOma vRuṣṇiyaM|BavA̍ vAjasya̍ sa~ggathE||saM tE payAṃsi̍ samu# yantu vAjAḥ saM ~MvRuṣṇiyA-nyaBimAtiṣAha̍ḥ|ApyAya̍mAnO̍ amRutAya̍ sOma divi śravAṅsyuttamAni̍# dhiṣva||32 (A - mandasva̍ - sAnasi - mEkAnnacatvAriṃqśacca̍)̍

verses.padam: - Padam aBIti|asthAt|viśvA̱ḥ|pRuta̍nAḥ|arA̍tIḥ|tat|agniḥ|Aha|tat|u|sOma̍ḥ|Aha||bRuhaspati̍ḥ|savitA|tat|mE|Aha|pUṣA|mA|adhAt|sukRutasyEti̍# su - kRutasya|lOkE||yat|akra̍ndaḥ|prathamam|jAya̍mAnaḥ|udyannityu̍t-̍ yann|samudrAt|uta|vA|purIṣAt||śyEnasya̍|pakṣA|hariṇasya̍|bAhU̍ iti|upa̍stutamityupa̍# - stutam|janima|tat|tE|arvann||apAm|pRuṣṭham|asi|yOni̍ḥ|agnEḥ|samudram|aBita̍ḥ|pinva̍mAnam||vad^^rdha̍mAnam|mahaḥ|33̍ (50)
verses.samhita: aByasthAd-viśvAḥ̍ pRutanA̍ arAtIstadagnirA̍ha̍ tadu sOma# Aha|bRuhaspatiḥ̍ savitA tanma# Aha pUṣA mA&dhAth̍ sukRutasya# lOkE||yadakrandaḥ̍ prathamaM jAyamAna̍ udyanth samudrAduta̍ vA purIṣAt|śyEnasya̍# pakṣA hariṇasya̍# bAhU upastutaM̍ janima̍ tat tE# arvann||apAM pRuṣṭhamasi̍ yOniragnEḥ̍ samudramaBitaḥ̍ pinvamAnaM|varddha̍mAnaM̍ maha - [ ] 33

verses.padam: - Padam Eti|ca|puṣka̍ram|divaḥ|mAtra̍yA|variṇA|prathasva||brahma̍|jajñAnam|prathamam|purastA̱t|vIti̍|sImataḥ|suruca̍ iti# su - rucaḥ|vEnaḥ|Avaḥ||saḥ|buddhniyA̱ḥ|upamA̍ ityupa-mAḥ|asya|viṣṭhA̍ iti# vi-sthAḥ|sataḥ|ca|yOni̱m|asataḥ|ca|viva̍ḥ||hiraṇyagarBa̍ iti# hiraṇya - garBaḥ|samiti|avartata|agrE̱|BUtasya̍|jAtaḥ|pati̍ḥ|Eka̍ḥ|AsIt||saḥ|dAdhAra|pRuthivIm|dyAm|uta|imAm|kasmai̱|dEvAya̍|haviṣA̱|vidhEma||draPsaḥ|caskanda|pRuthivIm|anviti̍|34̍ (50)
verses.samhita: A ca puṣkaraM̍ divO mAtrayA̍ variṇA prathasva||brahma̍# jajñAnaM prathamaM̍ purastAdvi sImataḥ̍ surucO# vEna Avaḥ|sa̍ buddhniyA# upamA asya̍ viṣṭhAḥ sataśca yOnimasataśca̍ vivaḥ||hiraṇyagarBaḥ̍ samavartatAgrE̍# BUtasya# jAtaḥ patirEka# AsIt|sa dAdhAra̍ pRuthivIM dyAmutEmAM kasmai# dEvAya# haviṣA# vidhEma||draPsaścaskanda̍ pRuthivImanu - [ ] 34

verses.padam: - Padam dyAm|imam|ca|yOni̱m|anviti|yaḥ|ca|pUrva̍ḥ||tRutIya̱m|yOni̱m|anviti̍|sa~jcara̍ntamiti̍# saM - carantam|draPsam|juhOmi|anviti̍|sapta|hOtrA̱ḥ||nama̍ḥ|astu|sarpEBya̍ḥ|yE|kE|ca|pRuthivIm|anu̍||yE|antari̍kṣE|yE|divi|tEBya̍ḥ|sarpEBya̍ḥ|nama̍ḥ||yE|adaḥ|rOcanE|divaḥ|yE|vA|sUrya̍sya|raśmiṣu̍||yEṣA̱m|aPsvitya̍p-̍ su|sadaḥ|kRutam|tEBya̍ḥ|sarpEBya̍ḥ|nama̍ḥ||yAḥ|iṣa̍vaḥ|yAtudhAnA̍nAmiti̍# yAtu - dhAnAnAm̍ ( )|yE|vA|vanaspatIn|anu̍||yE|vA|avaṭEṣu̍|śEra̍tE|tEBya̍ḥ|sarpEBya̍ḥ|nama̍ḥ||35̍ (61)
verses.samhita: -dyAmimaM ca yOnimanu yaśca pUrvaḥ|tRutIyaM̍ ~MyOnimanu# sa~jcarantaM̍ draPsaM juhOmyanu̍# sapta hOtrA̱ḥ||namO# astu sarpEByO yE kE ca# pRuthivImanu|yE̍ antarikṣE̍ yE divi tEByaḥ̍ sarpEByO namaḥ||yE̍&dO̍ rOcanE̍ divO yE vA sUryasya̍ raśmiṣu|yEṣA̍maPsu̍ sadaḥ̍ kRutaM tEByaḥ̍ sarpEByO namaḥ||yA̍ iṣavO̍ yAtu dhAnAnAM̍ ( ) ~MyE# vA vanaspatIṃqranu|yE̍ vA&vaṭEṣu̍ śEratE̍ tEByaḥ̍ sarpEByO namaḥ||35̍

verses.padam: - Padam dhruvA|asi|dharuṇA̱|astRutA|viśvaka̍rmaṇEti̍# viśva - karmaṇA|sukRutEti su - kRutA||mA|tvA|samudraḥ|uditi|vadhIt|mA|suparṇa̍ iti# su - parṇaḥ|avyathamAnA|pRuthivIm|dRuṃqha||prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|tvA|sAdayatu|pRuthivyAḥ|pRuṣṭhE|vyacasvatIm|pratha̍svatIm|pratha̍ḥ|asi|pRuthivI|asi|BUḥ|asi|BUmi̍ḥ|asi|adi̍tiḥ|asi|viśvadhA̍yA̍ iti# viśva - dhAyAḥ|viśvasya|Buva̍nasya|dhartrI|pRuthivIm|yacCa|pRuthivIm|dRuṃqha|pRuthivIm|mA|hiṃqsIḥ|viśva̍smai|prAṇAyEti̍# prA - anAya|apAnAyEtya̍pa̍ - anAya|vyAnAyEti̍# vi - anAya|udAnAyEtyu̍t̍ - anAya|pratiṣṭhAyA̍ iti# prati - sthAyai̱|36 (50)
verses.samhita: dhruvA&si# dharuṇA&stRutA̍ viśvakarmaṇA̍ sukRutA|mA̍ tvA# samudra udvadhInmA̍ suparṇO̍ vyathamAnA̍ pRuthivIM dRuṃha||prajApa̍tistvA̍ sAdayatu pRuthivyAḥ pRuṣṭhE vyacasvatIM̍ prathasvatIM̍ prathO&si̍ pRuthivyasi̍ BUrasi̍ BUmirasyadi̍tirasi̍ viśvadhAyA̍ viśvasya̍ Buvanasya̍ dhartrI pRuthivIM̍ ~MyacCa̍ pRuthivIM dRuṃha̍ pRuthivIM mA hiṃsIrviśva̍smai̍ prAṇAyApAnAya̍# vyAnAyOdAnAya̍# pratiṣṭhAyai# - [ ] 36

verses.padam: - Padam caritrAya|agniḥ|tvA|aBIti̍|pAtu|mahyA|svastyA|CardiṣA̱|śanta̍mEnEti̍ śaM - tamEna|tayA̱|dEvatayA|a~ggirasvat|dhruvA|sIda||kAṇḍA̱tkAṇḍAditi̍ kAṇḍAt - kAṇḍAt|prarOhantIti# pra - rOhantI|paru̍ṣaḥparuṣa̍ iti paruṣaḥ-paruṣaḥ|pari̍||EvA|naḥ|dUrvE|prEti̍|tanu|sahasrE̍ṇa|śatEna̍|ca||yA|śatEna̍|pratanOṣIti̍# pra - tanOṣi|sahasrE̍ṇa|virOhasIti̍# vi-rOhasi||tasyA̱ḥ|tE|dEvi|iṣṭakE|vidhEma̍|haviṣA̱|vayam||aṣA̍ḍhA|asi|saha̍mAnA|saha̍sva|arA̍tIḥ|saha̍sva|arAtIyataḥ|saha̍sva|pRuta̍nAḥ|saha̍sva|pRutanyataḥ||sahasra̍vIryEti̍# sahasra# - vIryA|37 (50)
verses.samhita: caritrAyA-gnistvA&Bi̍ pAtu̍ mahyA svastyA CardiṣA śantamEna̍ tayA# dEvatayA&~ggirasvad-dhruvA̍ sIda||kAṇḍA̱t̍ kAṇḍAt prarOhantI̍ paruṣaḥparuṣaḥ̍ pari|EvA̍ nO# dUrvE pra tanu̍ sahasrEṇa̍ śatEna# ca||yA śatEna# pratanOṣi# sahasrEṇa̍ virOhasi|tasyA̱stE̍ dEvIṣṭakE vidhEma# haviṣA# vayaM||aṣAḍhA&si̍ sahamAnA̍ sahasvArAtIḥ̍ sahasvArAtIyataḥ̍ sahasva̍ pRutanAḥ̍ sahasva̍ pRutanyataḥ|sahasravIryA̍ - [ ] 37

verses.padam: - Padam asi|sA|mA|jinva||madhu|vAtA̱ḥ|RutAyata̍ ityRuta̍ - yatE|madhu|kṣaranti|sindha̍vaḥ||mAddhvI̱ḥ|naḥ|santu|Oṣa̍dhIḥ||madhu̍|nakta̱m|uta|uṣasi̍|madhu̍maditi̍ madhu# - mat|pArthivam|raja̍ḥ||madhu̍|dyauḥ|astu|naḥ|pitA||madhu̍mAniti̍ madhu-mAn|naḥ|vanaspati̍ḥ|madhu̍mAniti̍ madhu# - mAn|astu|sUryaḥ||mAddhvI̱ḥ|gAva̍ḥ|Bavantu|naḥ||mahI|dyauḥ|pRuthivI|ca|naḥ|imam|yajñam|mimikṣatAm||pipRutAm|naḥ|BarI̍maBiriti̍ BarIma̍ - Biḥ||tat|viṣṇO̱ḥ|paramam|38 (50)
verses.samhita: -si sA mA# jinva||madhu vAtA# RutAyatE madhu# kṣaranti sindhavaḥ|mAddhvI̱rnaḥ̍ santvOṣadhIḥ||madhu̍ naktamutOṣasi̍ madhumat̍ pArthivaṃq̍ rajaḥ|madhu̍ dyaurastu̍ naḥ pitA||madhumAn̍ nO vanaspati-rmadhumAṃ̍ astu sUryaḥ|mAddhvIrgAvO̍# Bavantu naḥ||mahI dyauḥ pRuthivI̍ ca# na imaM ~MyajñaM mimikṣatAM|pipRutAM̍ nO BarImaBiḥ||tad-viṣṇO̱ḥ̍ paramaM - [ ] 38

verses.padam: - Padam padam|sadA̱|paśyanti|sUrayaḥ||divi|iva|cakṣu̍ḥ|Ata̍tamityA-tatam||dhruvA|asi|pRuthivi|saha̍sva|pRutanyataḥ||syUtA|dEvEBi̍ḥ|amRutE̍na|Eti̍|agAḥ||yAḥ|tE|agnE|sUryE̱|ruca̍ḥ|udyata̍ ityut̍ - yataḥ|diva̱m|AtanvantItyA̱ - tanvanti|raśmiBiriti̍# raśmi - Biḥ||tABiḥ|sarvA̍Baḥ|rucE|janA̍ya|naḥ|kRudhi||yAḥ|vaḥ|dEvAḥ|sUryE̱|ruca̍ḥ|gOṣu̍|aśvE̍ṣu|yAḥ|ruca̍ḥ||indrA̱gnI̍ itIndra# - agnI|tABiḥ|sarvA̍Baḥ|ruca̱m|naḥ|dhatta|bRuhaspatE||virAḍiti̍# vi - rAṭ|39 (50)
verses.samhita: padaṃ sadA# paśyanti sUrayaḥ|divIva̍ cakṣurAtataM||dhruvA&si̍# pRuthivi sahasva̍ pRutanyataḥ|syUtA dEvEBiramRutEnA̍ &&gA̱ḥ||yAstE# agnE sUryE ruca# udyatO divamAtanvanti̍# raśmiBiḥ|tABiḥ̍ sarvABI̍ rucE janAya̍ naskRudhi||yA vO# dEvAḥ sUryE rucO gOṣvaśvEṣu̍ yA rucaḥ|indrA̱gnI̍ tABiḥ sarvABI̍ rucaM̍ nO dhatta bRuhaspatE||virAḍ - [ ] 39

verses.padam: - Padam jyOtiḥ|adhArayat|samrAḍiti̍# sam-rAṭ|jyOtiḥ|adhArayat|svarAḍiti̍# sva - rAṭ|jyOtiḥ|adhArayat||agnE̱|yukṣva|hi|yE|tava̍|aśvA̍saḥ|dEva|sAdhava̍ḥ||ara̱m|vaha̍nti|Aśava̍ḥ||yukṣva|hi|dEvahUta̍mAniti̍# dEva - hUtamAn|aśvAn̍|agnE|rathIḥ|iva||nIti̍|hOtA̱|pUrvyaḥ|sadaḥ||draPsaḥ|caskanda|pRuthivIm|anviti̍|dyAm|imam|ca|yOni̱m|anviti̍|yaḥ|ca|pUrva̍ḥ||tRutIya̱m|yOni̱m|anviti̍|sa~jcara̍ntamiti̍# saM - carantam|draPsam|juhOmi|anviti̍|sapta|40̍ (50)
verses.samhita: jyOtiradhArayath̍ samrAḍ jyOtiradhArayath̍ svarAḍ jyOtiradhArayat||agnE̍# yukṣvA hi yE tavAśvAsO̍ dEva sAdhavaḥ|araM̍ ~MvahantyAśava̍ḥ||yukṣvA̍ hi dEvahUta̍mAṃq̍ aśvAṃ# agnE rathIriva|ni̍ hOtA# pUrvyaḥ sadaḥ||draPsaśca̍skanda̍ pRuthivImanu dyAmimaM ca yOnimanu yaśca pUrvaḥ|tRutIyaM̍ ~MyOnimanu# sa~jcarantaM̍ draPsaM juhOmyanu̍# sapta - [ ] 40

verses.padam: - Padam hOtrA̱ḥ||aBU̱t|idam|viśvasya|Buva̍nasya|vAji̍nam|agnEḥ|vaiśvAnarasya̍|ca||agniḥ|jyOti̍ṣA|jyOti̍ṣmAn|rukmaḥ|varca̍sA|varca̍svAn||RucE|tvA|rucE|tvA|samiti̍|it|sravanti|sarita̍ḥ|na|dhEnA̱ḥ||antaḥ|hRudA|mana̍sA|pUyamA̍nAḥ||GRutasya̍|dhArA̱ḥ|aBIti̍|cAkaśImi||hiraṇyaya̍ḥ|vEtasaḥ|maddhyE̱|AsAm||tasminn̍|suparṇa̍ iti# su - parṇaḥ|madhukRuditi# madhu - kRut|kulAyI|Bajann|AstE|madhu̍|dEvatA̱Byaḥ||tasya̍|AsatE|hara̍yaḥ|sapta|tIrE̱̍ ( )|svadhAmiti# sva-dhAm|duhAnAḥ|amRuta̍sya|dhArA̱m||41̍ (54)
verses.samhita: hOtrA̱ḥ||aBUdidaM̍ ~Mviśvasya̍ Buvanasya̍ vAjinamagnE-rvai̱śvAnarasya̍# ca|agnirjyOtiṣA̍ jyOtiṣmAn̍ rukmO varcasA̍ varcasvAn||RucE̍ tvA# rucE tvA samith sravanti̍ saritO na dhEnA̱ḥ|antaṛhRudA manasA̍ pUyamAnAḥ||GRutasya̍ dhArA# aBi cAkaśImi|hiraṇyayO̍# vEtasO maddhya# AsAM||tasmiṉthsuparṇO madhukRut̍ kulAyI̍ BajannAstE̍ madhu# dEvatA̱Byaḥ|tasyA# sa tE harayaḥ̍ sapta tIrE̱ ( ) svadhAM duhAnA̍ amRutasya̍ dhArA̱M||41

verses.padam: - Padam Adityam|garBa̱m|payasA|sama~jjanniti̍# saM - a~jjann|sahasrasya|pratimAmiti̍# prati - mAm|viśvarUpamiti̍# viśva-rUpam||parIti|vRu~ggdhi|hara̍sA|mA|aBIti̍|mRukṣaḥ|śatAyu̍ṣamiti̍# śata - Ayuṣam|kRuṇuhi|cIyamAnaḥ||imam|mA|hiṃqsIḥ|dvipAdamiti̍# dvi - pAda̱m|paśUnAm|sahasrAkṣEti̍ sahasra̍ - akṣa|mEdhE̱|Eti|cIyamA̍naḥ||mayum|Araṇyam|anviti̍|tE|diśAmi|tEna̍|cinvAnaḥ|tanuva̍ḥ|nIti̍|sIda||vAta̍sya|dhrAji̱m|varu̍ṇasya|nABi̱m|aśva̱m|jajñAnam|sarirasya̍|maddhyE̱||śiśu̱m|nadInA̱m|hari̱m|adri̍buddhamityadri̍# - buddham|agnE̱|mA|hiṃqsIḥ|42 (50)
verses.samhita: AdityaM garBaM payasA̍ sama~jjanth sahasrasya̍ pratimAM ~MviśvarUpaM|pari̍# vRu~ggdhi harasA̍ mA&Bi mRukṣaḥ̍ śatAyuṣaM̍ kRuṇuhi cIyamAnaḥ||imaM̍ mA hiṃsIrdvipAda̍M̍ paśUnAṃ sahasrAkṣa̍ mEdha A cIyamAnaḥ|mayumA̍raṇyamanu̍# tE diśAmi tEna# cinvAnastanuvO ni ṣIda||vAta̍sya̍ dhrAjiM ~Mvaruṇasya̍ nABimaśvaM̍ jajñAnaṃ sarirasya̍ maddhyE̱|śiśuM̍ nadInAṃq harimadribuddhamagnE̍ mA hiṃsIḥ̍ - [ ] 42

verses.padam: - Padam paramE|vyOmanniti̍ vi - Omann||imam|mA|hiṃqsIḥ|EkaśaPamityEka̍# - śaPam|paśUnAm|kanikradam|vAjina̱m|vAjinEṣu||gauram|Araṇyam|anviti̍|tE|diśAmi|tEna̍|cinvAnaḥ|tanuva̍ḥ|nIti̍|sIda||aja̍sram|indu̱m|aruṣam|Buraṇyum|agnim|IḍE|pUrvaci̍ttAviti̍# pUrva - cittau|namOBiriti̍ namaḥ̍ - Biḥ||saḥ|parvaBiriti̍ parva# - Biḥ|Rutuśa ityRutu̍ - śaḥ|kalpamAnaḥ|gAm|mA|hiṃqsIḥ|adi̍tim|virAjamiti̍# vi - rAja̱m||imam|samudram|śatadhAramiti̍# śata - dhAram|uthsa̱m|vyacyamAnamiti̍# vi - acyamAnam|Buva̍nasya|maddhyE̱||GRutam|duhA̍nAm|adi̍tim|janA̍ya|agnE̱|mA|43̍ (50)
verses.samhita: paramE vyOmann||imaM̍ mA hiṃsIrEka̍śaPaM̍ paśUnAM kanikradaM̍ ~MvAjinaM ~MvAjinEṣu|gauramA̍raṇyamanu̍# tE diśAmi tEna# cinvAnastanuvO ni ṣIda||aja̍sramindu̍maruṣaM̍ BuraṇyumagnimI̍ḍE̍ pUrvacittau̍ namOBiḥ|sa̍ parvaBiṛRutuśaḥ̍ kalpamAnO̍ gAM mA hiṃsIradi̍tiM̍ ~MvirAja̱M||imaṃ samudraṃ̍ śatadhAramuth-sa̍M̍ ~MvyacyamAnaM̍ Buvanasya̍ maddhyE̱|GRutaM duhAnAmadi̍tiM̍ janAyAgnE mA - [ ] 43

verses.padam: - Padam hiṃqsIḥ|paramE|vyOmanniti̍ vi - Omann||gavayam|Araṇyam|anviti|tE|diśAmi|tEna̍|cinvAnaḥ|tanuva̍ḥ|nIti̍|sIda||varU̱trim|tvaṣṭu̍ḥ|varu̍ṇasya|nABi̱m|avi̱m|jajñAnAm|raja̍saḥ|para̍smAt||mahIm|sAhasrIm|asu̍rasya|mAyAm|agnE̱|mA|hiṃqsIḥ|paramE|vyO̍manniti̍ vi - Omann||imAm|UrṇAyum|varuṇasya|mAyAm|tvaca̱m|paśUnAm|dvipadAmiti̍# dvi - padA̱m|catuṣpadAmiti̍ catuḥ̍ - padAm||tvaṣṭuḥ|prajAnAmiti̍# pra - jAnA̱m|prathamam|janitra̱m|agnE̱|mA|hiṃqsIḥ|paramE|vyOmanniti̍ vi - Omann||uṣṭra̱m|Araṇyam|anviti|44̍ (50)
verses.samhita: hiṃsIḥ̍ paramE vyOmann|gavayamA̍raṇyamanu̍# tE diśAmi tEna# cinvAnastanuvO ni ṣIda||varU̱triM̍ tvaṣṭurvaruṇasya̍ nABimaviM̍ jajñAnAṃ rajasaḥ̍ parasmAt|mahIṃ̍ sAhasrImasu̍rasya̍ mAyAmagnE mA hiṃsIḥ̍ paramE vyOmann||imAmU̱rṇAyuM̍ ~Mvaruṇasya̍ mAyAM tvacaM̍ paśUnAM dvipadAM catuṣpadAM|tvaṣṭu̍ḥ̍ prajAnA̱M prathamaM janitramagnE mA hiṃsIḥ̍ paramE vyOmann|uṣṭra̍mAraṇyamanu̍# - [ ] 44

verses.padam: - Padam tE|diśAmi|tEna|cinvAnaḥ|tanuva̍ḥ|nIti̍|sIda||yaḥ|agniḥ|agnEḥ|tapa̍saḥ|adhIti̍|jAtaḥ|śOcA̱t|pRuthivyAḥ|uta|vA|divaḥ|pari̍||yEna̍|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|viśvakarmEti# viśva - karmA|vyAnaḍiti# vi - Anaṭ|tam|agnE|hEḍa̍ḥ|parIti̍|tE|vRuṇaktu||ajA|hi|agnEḥ|aja̍niṣṭa|garBA̱t|sA|vai|apaśyat|janitAra̱m|agrE̱||tayA̱|rOha̱m|Ayann|upEti̍|mEddhyA̍saḥ|tayA̱|dEvAḥ|dEvatA̱m|agrE̱|Ayann||śaraBam̍ ( )|Araṇyam|anviti|tE|diśAmi|tEna̍|cinvAnaḥ|tanuva̍ḥ|nIti̍|sIda||45̍ (59) (agnE mA hiṃsI̍ - ragnE mOṣṭramA̍ - raṇyamanu# - śaraBan - nava# ca) (A10)
verses.samhita: tE diśAmi tEna# cinvAnastanuvO ni ṣIda||yO̍ agniragnEsta-pasO&dhi# jAtaḥ śOcA̱t pRuthivyA uta vA# divaspari|yEna̍# prajA viśvakarmA̍ vyAnaṭ tamagnE̍ hEḍaḥ pari# tE vRuṇaktu||ajA hyagnEraja̍niṣṭa̍ garBAth sA vA apaśyajjanitAramagrE̱|tayA̍ rOhamAyannupa̍ mEddhyAsastayA̍# dEvA dEvatAmagra# Ayann|śaraBa-( )-mAraṇyamanu̍# tE diśAmi tEna# cinvAnastanuvO niṣIda||45̍ (agnE mA hiṃsI̍ - ragnE mOṣṭramA̍ - raṇyamanu# - śaraBan - nava# ca) (A10) special KOrvai

verses.padam: - Padam indrA̱gnI itIndra# - agnI|rOcanA|divaḥ|parIti|vAjE̍ṣu|BUṣathaḥ||tat|vAm|cEti|prEti̍|vIrya̱m||śnatha̍t|vRutram|uta|sanOti|vAja̱m|indrA̱|yaḥ|agnI̍ iti|sahu̍rI̍ iti# sa - hurI|saparyAt||irajyantA̱|vasavyasya|BUrE̱ḥ|saha̍stamEti̍ sahaḥ̍ - tamA|sahasA|vAjayantEti̍# vAja - yantA̱||prEti|carq.ṣaṇiBya̍ iti# caṛṣaṇi-Byaḥ|pRutanA|havEṣu|prEti̍|pRuthivyAḥ|riricAthE̍ iti|divaḥ|ca||prEti̍|sindhu̍Bya̍ iti sindhu# - Byaḥ|prEti|giriBya̍ iti# giri - Byaḥ|mahitvEti# mahi - tvA|prEti|indrAgnI̍ itI̱ndra - agnI|viśvA̱|BuvanA|atIti̍|anyA||maru̍taḥ|yasya̍|hi|46̍ (50)

- Padam kṣayE̱|pAtha|divaḥ|vimahasa iti# vi - mahasaḥ||saḥ|sugOpAtama̍ iti# sugOpa - tamaḥ|janaḥ||yajñaiḥ|vA|yajñavAhasa̍ iti# yajña - vAhasaḥ|viprasya|vA|matInAm||maru̍taḥ|śRuṇuta|hava̱m||śriyasE̱|kam|BAnuBiriti̍# BAnu - Biḥ|samiti|mimikṣirE|tE|raśmiBiriti̍# raśmi - Biḥ|tE|RukvaBirityRukva̍# - Biḥ|suKAdaya iti# su - KAdayaḥ||tE|vAśI̍manta̍ iti vAśi# - mantaḥ|iṣmiṇaḥ|aBI̍ravaḥ|vidrE|priyasya̍|mAru̍tasya|dhAmna̍ḥ||avEti̍|tE|hEḍa̍ḥ|uditi̍|uttamamityu̍t̍ - tamam||kayA̱|naḥ|citraḥ|Eti|Buvat|UtI|sadAvRu̍dha̍ iti# sadA - vRudhaḥ|saKA̱||kayA̱|śaciṣṭhayA|vRutA||47̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -ava# tE hEḍa> 1, uduttamaM̍ >2 ava# tE hEḍO# varuṇa namOBirava̍# yajñEBirImahE̍ havirBiḥ|kṣaya̍nnasmaBya̍masura̍ pracEtO rAjannEnA(gm)si̍ śiśrathaḥ kRutAni||udu̍ttamaM̍ ~Mvaruṇa̍ pAśamasmadavA̍&dhamaM̍ ~Mvimadhyamaṅ̍ śrathAya|athA̍# vayamAditya̍ vratE tavA&nAgasO̍ aditayE̍ syAma||

verses.padam: - Padam kaḥ|adya|yu~gktE|dhuri|gAḥ|Rutasya|śimI̍vataḥ|BAmina̍ḥ|durqḥRuṇAyUniti̍# duḥ - hRuṇAyUn||AsanniṣUnityAsann̍ - iṣUn|hRuthsvasa iti# hRuthsu - asaḥ|mayOBUniti̍# mayaḥ - BUn|yaḥ|EṣAm|BRutyAm|Ruṇadhat|saḥ|jIvAt||agnE̱|naya̍|Eti̍|dEvAnA̱m|śam|naḥ|Bavantu|vAjE̍vAja̍ iti vAjE̱ - vAjE||aPsvityap-̍ su|agnE|sadhiḥ|tava̍|saḥ|Oṣa̍dhIḥ|anviti̍|ruddhyasE||garBE̱|sann|jAyasE|puna̍ḥ||vRuṣA̱|sOma|dyumAniti̍# dyu-mAn|asi|vRuṣA̱|dEva|vRuṣavrata̍ iti vRuṣa-vrataḥ||vRuṣA̱|dharmA̍ṇi|dadhiṣE||imam|mE̍ ( )|varuṇa|tat|tvA|yAmi|tvam|naḥ|agnE|saḥ|tvam|naḥ|agnE||48 (61) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 11 Anuvaakams :- (viṣṇOḥ kramO&si̍ - divaspa - ryannapatE̍ - &pEta̍ - samitaM̍ - ~MyA jAtA - mA nO# hiṃsI - daByasthAd̍ - dhruvA - &syAditya~ggarBa̍ - mindrA̱gnI rOca - naikAdaśa̍ ) Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (viṣṇO# - rasmin havyE - ti# tvA&haM - dhItiBi - rhOtrA# - aṣṭAcatvAriṃśat)̍ First and Last Padam Of śecond Prasnam of 4th Kandam (viṣṇOḥ kramO&si̍ - tvannO# agnE sa tvannO# agnE )||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE caturtha kAṇḍE dvitIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||
verses.samhita: (appearing in ṭś 4.2.11.3) =========================== OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ , hariḥ OM 4.5 caturthakAṇḍE pa~jcamaḥ praśnaḥ - hOmavidhinirUpaṇaM

verses.padam: - Padam apAm|tvA|Emann|sAdayAmi|apAm|tvA|Odmann̍|sAdayAmi|apAm|tvA|Basmann̍|sAdayAmi|apAm|tvA|jyOti̍ṣi|sAdayAmi|apAm|tvA|aya̍nE|sAdayAmi|arṇavE|sada̍nE|sIda|samudrE|sada̍nE|sIda|salilE|sada̍nE|sIda|apAm|kṣayE̱|sIda|apAm|sadhi̍ṣi|sIda|apAm|tvA|sada̍nE|sAdayAmi|apAm|tvA|sadhastha̍ iti# sadha - sthE|sAdayAmi|apAm|tvA|purIṣE|sAdayAmi|apAm|tvA|yOnau̱̍ ( )|sAdayAmi|apAm|tvA|pAthasi|sAdayAmi|gAyatrI|Canda̍ḥ|triṣṭup|Canda̍ḥ|jaga̍tI|Canda̍ḥ|anuṣṭubitya̍nu̍ - stup|Candaḥ|pa~gktiḥ|Canda̍ḥ||1̍ (65)
verses.samhita: apAM tvEma̱nth sAdayAmyapAM tvOdma̱nth sAdayAmyapAM tvA Basma̱nth sAdayAmyapAM tvA jyOtiṣi̍ sAdayAmyapAM tvA&yanE̍ sAdayAmyarṇavE sadanE̍ sIda samudrE sadanE̍ sIda salilE sadanE̍ sIdApAM kṣayE# sIdApAṃ sadhiṣi̍ sIdApAM tvA sadanE̍ sAdayAmyapAM tvA# sadhasthE# sAdayAmyapAM tvA purIṣE̍ sAdayAmyapAM tvA yOnau# ( ) sAdayAmyapAM tvA pAthasi̍ sAdayAmi gAyatrI Canda-striṣṭup̍ CandO jagatI̍ CandO&nuṣṭup̍ Candaḥ̍ pa~gktiśCandaḥ||1̍

verses.padam: - Padam ayam|puraḥ|Buvaḥ|tasya̍|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|BauvAyanaḥ|vasantaḥ|prAṇAyanaḥ|gAyatrI|vAsantI|gAyatriyai|gAyatram|gAyatrAt|upAṃqśurityupa̍ - aṃqśuḥ|upAṃqśOrityupa-aṃqśOḥ|trivRuditi̍# tri - vRut|trivRuta iti# tri - vRutaḥ|rathantaramiti̍# rathaM - taram|rathantarAditi# rathaM - tarAt|vasiṣṭhaḥ|Ruṣi̍ḥ|prajApa̍tigRuhItayEti̍# prajApati̍ - gRuhItayA|tvayA̱|prAṇamiti# pra - anam|gRuhṇAmi|prajABya iti# pra - jAByaḥ|ayam|dakṣiṇA|viśvakarmEti̍# viśva - karmA|tasya|mana̍ḥ|vaiśvakarmaṇamiti̍# vaiśva - karmaṇam|grIṣmaḥ|mAnasaḥ|triṣṭuk|graiṣmI|triṣṭuBaḥ|aiḍam|aiḍAt|antaryAma̍ ityantaḥ̍ - yAmaḥ|antaryAmAdityantaḥ̍ - yAmAt|pa~jcadaśa iti# pa~jca - daśaḥ|pa~jcadaśAditi# pa~jca-daśAt|bRuhat|bRuhataḥ|BaradvAjaḥ|Ruṣi̍ḥ|prajApa̍tigRuhItayEti̍# prajApati̍ - gRuhItayA|tvayA̱|manaḥ|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ayaM purO Buvastasya# prAṇO BauvAyanO̍ vasantaḥ̍ prAṇAyanO̍ gAyatrI̍ vAsantI̍ gAyatriyai̍ gAyatraM̍ gAyatrAdu̍pAṃq̍ śurupAṃq̍ śOstrivRut trivRutO# rathantaraṃ rathantarAd-vasi̍ṣṭha̍ Ruṣiḥ̍ prajApati̍ gRuhItayA tvayA̱ prAṇaM gRuhṇAmi̍ prajAByO&yaM dakṣiṇA̍ viśvakarmA̍ tasya manO# vaiśvakarmaṇaM grIṣmO mAnasastriṣṭuggraiṣmI̍ triṣṭuBa# aiḍamaiḍA-dantaryAmO̱̍ &ntaryAmAt pa~jcadaśaḥ̍ pa~jcadaśAd-bRuhad-bRu̍hatO̍ BaradvAja̍ Ruṣiḥ̍ prajApati̍ gRuhItayA tvayA manO# - [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam gRuhṇAmi|prajABya iti# pra - jAByaḥ|ayam|paścAt|viśvavya̍cA̍ iti# viśva - vyacAḥ|tasya|cakṣu̍ḥ|vaiśvavyacasamiti̍# vaiśva - vyacasam|varq.ṣAṇi|cAkṣuṣAṇi̍|jaga̍tI|vArq.ṣI|jaga̍tyAḥ|Rukṣa̍mam|Rukṣa̍mAt|śukraḥ|śukrAt|saptadaśa̍ iti# sapta - daśaḥ|saptadaśAditi# sapta-daśAt|vairUpam|vairUpAt|viśvAmitra̍ iti# viśva - mitraḥ|Ruṣiḥ|prajApa̍tigRuhItayEti̍# prajApati̍ - gRuhItayA|tvayA̱|cakṣuḥ|gRuhṇAmi|prajABya̍ iti# pra - jAByaḥ|idam|uttarAdityu̍t̍ - tarAt|suvaḥ|tasya̍|śrOtra̱m|sauvam|śarat|śrautrI|anuṣṭubitya̍nu̍ - stup|śAradI|anuṣṭuBa ityanu̍ - stuBaḥ|svAram|svArAt|manthI|manthina̍ḥ|Ekaviṃqśa̍ ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|EkaviṃqśAdityEka̍ - viṃqśAt|vairAjam|vairAjAt|jamadagniḥ|Ruṣi̍ḥ|prajApa̍tigRuhItayEti̍# prajApati̍ - gRuhItayA|3 (50)
verses.samhita: gRuhṇAmi prajAByO&yaM paścAd-viśvavyacAstasya̍ cakṣurvaiśvavyacasaM̍ ~Mvarq.ṣAṇi# cAkṣuṣAṇi jagatI̍ vArq.ṣI jagatyA̍ RukṣamamRukṣa̍mAcCukraḥ̍ śukrAth saptadaśaḥ̍ saptadaśAd-vai̍rUpaM̍ ~MvairUpAd-viśvAmi̍tra̍ Ruṣiḥ̍ prajApati̍ gRuhItayA tvayA cakṣurgRuhṇAmi̍ prajABya# idamuttarAth̍ suvastasya śrOtraṃ# sauvaṃ śaracCrautryanuṣṭup-CA̍radya̍nuṣṭuBa̍ḥ̍ svAraṅ svArAnmanthI manthina# Ekaviṃqśa EkaviṃqśAd̍ vairAjaM̍ ~MvairAjAjjamada̍gnirq.̍ Ruṣiḥ̍ prajApati̍ gRuhItayA - [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam tvayA̱|śrOtra̱m|gRuhṇAmi|prajABya iti# pra-jAByaḥ|iyam|upari̍|matiḥ|tasyai̱|vAk|mAtI|hEmantaḥ|vAcyAyanaḥ|pa~gktiḥ|haimantI|pa~gktyai|nidhana̍vaditi̍# nidhana# - vat|nidhanavata̍ iti# nidhana# - vataḥ|Agrayaṇaḥ|AgrayaṇAt|triṇavatrayastriṃqśAviti# triṇava - trayastriṃqśau|triṇavatrayastriṃqśAByAmiti# triṇava - trayastriṃqśAByA̱m|śAkvararaivatE iti# śAkvara - raivatE|śAkvararaivatAByAmiti# śAkvara - raivatAByA̱m|viśvakarmEti# viśva - karmA|Ruṣiḥ|prajApa̍tigRuhItayEti̍# prajApati̍ - gRuhItayA|tvayA̱|vAca̱m|gRuhṇAmi|prajABya iti# pra - jAByaḥ||4̍ (30) (tvayA manO-jamada̍gnirq.Ruṣi̍ḥ̍ prajApatigRuhItayA-triṃqśacca̍)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: tvayA śrOtraM̍ gRuhṇAmi prajABya# iyamupari# matistasyai vA~gmAtI hEmantO̍ vA̱cyAyanaḥ pa~gktiṛhaimantI̍ paktyaiM nidhanavannidhana̍vata̍ Agrayaṇa A̱grayaṇAt triṇavatrayastriṃqśau̍ triṇavatrayastriṃqśAByAṃ̍# śAkvararaivatE śA̱kvararaivatAByA̱M ~Mviśvakarmaṛṣiḥ̍ prajApati̍ gRuhItayA tvayA vAcaM̍ gRuhṇAmi prajAByaḥ||4̍ (tvayA manO-jamada̍gnirq.Ruṣi̍ḥ̍ prajApatigRuhItayA-triṃqśacca̍)̍

verses.padam: - Padam prAcI̱|diśAm|vasantaḥ|RutUnAm|agniḥ|dEvatA̱|brahma|dravi̍ṇam|trivRuditi̍# tri - vRut|stOmaḥ|saḥ|u|pa~jcadaśava̍rtaniriti̍# pa~jcadaśa - vartaniḥ|tryaviriti# tri - aviḥ|vaya̍ḥ|kRutam|ayA̍nAm|purOvAta̍ iti# puraḥ - vAtaḥ|vAtaḥ|sAna̍gaḥ|Ruṣi̍ḥ|dakṣiṇA|diśAm|grIṣmaḥ|RutUnAm|indra̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|kṣatram|dravi̍ṇam|pa~jcadaśa̍ iti# pa~jca - daśaḥ|stOmaḥ|saḥ|u|saptadaśava̍rtaniriti̍# saptadaśa - vartaniḥ|dityavAḍiti# ditya - vAṭ|vayaḥ|trEtA̱|ayA̍nAm|dakṣiṇAdvAta̍ iti# dakṣiṇAt - vAtaḥ|vAtaḥ|sanAtana̍ iti# sanA - tanaḥ|Ruṣi̍ḥ|pratIcI̱|diśAm|varq.ṣAḥ|RutUnAm|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|dEvatA̱|viṭ|5̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prAcI# diśAM ~Mvasanta̍ RutUnAmagnirdEvatA̍ brahma draviṇaM̍ trivRuth stOmaḥ sa u# pa~jcadaśavartani-stryavirvaya̍ḥ̍ kRutamayAnAM̍ purOvAtO vAtaḥ sAnaga̍ RuṣirdakṣiṇA̍ diśAM grIṣma RutUnAmindrO̍# dEvatA̱ kṣatraM draviṇaM̍ pa~jcadaśaḥ stOmaḥ sa u# saptadaśa vartani-rdi̍tyavAḍ-vayastrEtA&yA̍nAM̍ dakṣiṇAdvAtO vAtaḥ̍ sanAtana Ruṣiḥ̍ pratIcI# diśAM ~Mvarq.ṣA RutUnAM̍ ~MviśvE# dEvA dEvatA viḍ-[ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam draviṇam|saptadaśa̍ iti# sapta-daśaḥ|stOmaḥ|saḥ|u|Ekaviṃqśava̍rtanirityE̍kaviṃqśa̍ - vartaniḥ|trivathsa iti# tri-vathsaḥ|vayaḥ|dvAparaḥ|ayA̍nAm|paścAdvAta̍ iti# paścAt-vAtaḥ|vAtaḥ|ahaBUna̍ḥ|Ruṣi̍ḥ|udI̍cI|diśAm|śarat|RutUnAm|mitrAvaru̍ṇAviti̍# mitrA - varuṇau|dEvatA̱|puṣṭam|dravi̍ṇam|Ekaviṃqśa̍ ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|stOmaḥ|saḥ|u|triṇavava̍rtaniriti̍# triṇava - vartaniḥ|turyavAḍiti# turya - vAṭ|vayaḥ|Askanda̍ ityA̱ - skandaḥ|ayAnAm|uttarAdvAta̍ ityuttarAt̍ - vAtaḥ|vAtaḥ|pratnaḥ|Ruṣi̍ḥ|Ud^^rdhvA|diśAm|hEmantaśiśirAviti̍# hEmanta - śiśirau|RutUnAm|bRuhaspatiḥ|dEvatA̱|varca̍ḥ|dravi̍ṇam|triṇava̍ iti tri# - navaḥ|stOmaḥ|saḥ|u|trayastriṃqśava̍rtaniriti̍# trayastriṃqśa - vartaniḥ|paṣṭhavAditi# paṣṭha - vAt|vayaḥ̍ ( )|aBiBUrityaBi̍ - BUḥ|ayAnAm|viṣvagvAta̍ iti# viṣvak - vAtaḥ|vAtaḥ|suparṇa̍ iti# su - parṇaḥ|Ruṣiḥ|pitara̍ḥ|pitAmahAḥ|parE̱|ava̍rE|tE|naḥ|pAntu|tE|naḥ|avantu|asminn|brahmann̍|asminn|kṣatrE|asyAm|AśiṣItyA̱̍ - śiṣi|asyAm|purOdhAyAmiti̍# puraḥ - dhAyA̱m|asminn|karmann|asyAm|dEvahU̱tyAmiti̍# dEva-hUtyAm||6 (78) (viṭ - paṣṭhavAd̍ vayO - &ṣṭAviṃśatiśca)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: draviṇaṃ̍ saptadaśa stOmaḥ sa u# vEkaviṃq śavartani-strivathsO̍ vayO̱ dvAparO&yAnAM̍ paścAdvAtO vAtO&haBUna̍ RuṣirudIcI̍ diśAṃ śarad-RutUnAM̍ mitrAvaruṇau̍ dEvatA# puṣṭaM draviṇamEkaviṃqśaḥ̍ stOmaḥ sa u# triṇavavartani-sturyavAḍ̍ vaya# AskandO &yAnAmuttarAd-vAtO̍ vAtaḥ̍ pratna RuṣirUrddhvA̍ diśAṃ hEmantaśiśirAvRu̍tUnAM̍ bRuhaspatirdEvatA̍ varcO draviṇaM̍ triṇava stOmaḥ sa u# trayastriṃqśavartaniḥ̍ paṣṭhavAdvayO# ( ) &BiBUrayAnAM̍ ~MviṣvagvAtO vAtaḥ̍ suparṇa Ruṣiḥ̍ pitaraḥ̍ pitAmahAḥ parE&varE̍ tE naḥ̍ pAntu tE nO&vantvasmin̍ brahmannasmin̍ kṣatrE̱&syA-mAśiṣyasyAM purOdhAyA̍masmin̍ karmannasyAM̍ dEvahU̱tyAM||6 (viṭ - paṣṭhavAd̍ vayO - &ṣṭAviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam dhruvakṣitIriti̍# dhruva - kṣitiḥ|dhruvayOniriti̍# dhruva-yOniḥ|dhruvA|asi|dhruvAm|yOni̱m|Eti|sIda|sAddhyA||uKya̍sya|kEtum|prathamam|purastA̱t|aśvinA̱|addhvaryU̍ iti|sAdayatAm|iha|tvA||svE|dakṣE̱|dakṣa̍pitEti̍ dakṣa# - pitA|iha|sIda|dEvatrEti# dEva - trA|pRuthivI|bRuhatI|rarAṇA||svAsasthEti̍# su - AsasthA|tanuvA̱|samiti|viśasva|pitA|iva|Edhi|sUnavE̱|Eti̍|suśEvEti̍# su - śEvA̱|aśvinA̱|addhvaryU iti|sAdayatAm|iha|tvA||kulAyinI̱|vasu̍matIti̍ vasu# - matI|vayOdhA iti# vayaḥ - dhAḥ|rayim|naḥ|vad^^rdha|bahulam|suvIramiti# su - vIra̱m||7 (50)
verses.samhita: dhruvakṣiti̍ -rdhruvayOni-rdhruvA&si̍# dhruvAM ~MyOnimA sIda̍ sAddhyA|uKyasya̍ kEtuM prathamaM̍ purastAdaśvinA̱&ddhvaryU̍ sAdayatAmiha̍ tvA̱||svE dakṣE dakṣapitEha̍ sIda̍ dEvatrA pRuthivI̍ bRuhatI̍ rarAṇA|svAsasthA̍ tanuvA saM ~Mviśasva̍ pitEvaidhi̍ sUnava A suśEvA&śvinA̱ddhvaryU sAdayatAmiha̍ tvA̱||kulAyinI vasumatI̍ vayOdhA rayiM nO# varddha bahulaṃ suvIra̱M|7

verses.padam: - Padam apEti|ama̍tim|durmatimiti̍# duḥ - matim|bAdhamAnA|rAyaḥ|pOṣE̱|yajñapa̍timiti̍# yajña - patim|ABajantItyA̱ - BajantI|suva̍ḥ|dhEhi|yaja̍mAnAya|pOṣa̱m|aśvinA̱|addhvaryU̍ iti|sAdayatAm|iha|tvA||agnEḥ|purI̍ṣam|asi|dEvayAnIti̍# dEva - yAnI̱|tAm|tvA|viśvE̱|aBIti|gRuṇantu|dEvAḥ||stOma̍pRuṣṭhEti̍ stOma# - pRuṣṭhA|GRutavatIti# GRuta - vatI|iha|sIda|prajAvaditi# prajA - vat|asmE iti|dravi̍ṇA|Eti̍|yajasva|AśvinA̱|addhvaryU̍ iti|sAdayatAm|iha|tvA||divaḥ|mUd^^rdhA|asi|pRuthivyAḥ|nABi̍ḥ|viṣṭaMBanIti̍# vi - staMBanI|diśAm|adhi̍patnItyadhi̍# - patnI|BuvanAnAm||8̍ (50)
verses.samhita: apAmatiM̍ durmatiM bAdhamAnA̍ rAyaspOṣE# yajñapatimABaja̍ntI̍ suvarddhEhi̍ yajamAnAya̍ pOṣamaśvinA̱&ddhvaryU̍ sAdayatAmiha̍ tvA̱||agnEḥ purIṣamasi̍ dEvayAnI tAM tvA viśvE# aBi gRuṇantu̍ dEvAḥ|stOmapRuṣṭhA̍ GRutavatIha̍ sIda̍ prajAvadasmE̍ draviṇA &&*yajasvAśvinA̱̍ &ddhvaryU sAdayatAmiha̍ tvA̱||divO mUrddhA&si# pRuthivyA nABirviṣṭaMBa̍nI̍ diśAmadhipatnI̍ BuvanAnAM|8̍

verses.padam: - Padam Urmiḥ|draPsaḥ|apAm|asi|viśvakarmEti# viśva - karmA|tE|Ruṣiḥ|aśvinA̱|addhvaryU̍ iti|sAdayatAm|iha|tvA||sajUriti̍# sa - jUḥ|RutuBirityRutu - Biḥ|sajUriti# sa - jUḥ|vidhABiriti# vi-dhABiḥ|sajUriti̍# sa-jUḥ|vasuBiriti̍ vasu-Biḥ|sajUriti̍# sa - jUḥ|rudraiḥ|sajUriti# sa - jUḥ|Adityaiḥ|sajUriti# sa - jUḥ|viśvai̱ḥ|dEvaiḥ|sajUriti# sa - jUḥ|dEvaiḥ|sajUriti# sa - jUḥ|dEvaiḥ|vayOnAdhairiti# vayaḥ - nAdhaiḥ|agnayE̱|tvA|vaiśvAnarAya|aśvinA̱|addhvaryU̍ iti|sAdayatAm|iha|tvA||prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|mE|pAhi|apAnamityapa̍ - anam|mE|pAhi|vyAnamiti# vi-anam|mE|pAhi|cakṣuḥ|mE|urvyA̍ ( )|vIti|BAhi|śrOtra̱m|mE|ślOkaya|apaḥ|pinva|Oṣa̍dhIḥ|jinva|dvipAditi̍# dvi - pAt|pAhi|catuṣpAditi̍ catuḥ̍ - pAt|ava|divaḥ|vRuṣṭi̱m|Eti|Iraya||9̍ (67)
verses.samhita: UrmirdraPsO apAmasi̍ viśvakarmA̍ ta RuṣiraśvinA̱&ddhvaryU̍ sAdayatAmiha̍ tvA̱||sajUṛRutuBiḥ̍ sajUrvidhABiḥ̍ sajUrvasuBiḥ̍ sajU rudraiḥ sajUrAdityaiḥ̍ sajUrviśvai̱rdEvaiḥ sajUrdEvaiḥ sajUrdEvairvayO-nAdhairagnayE̱̍ tvA vaiśvAnarAyAśvinA̱&ddhvaryU sAdayatAmiha̍ tvA̱||prAṇaM mE# pAhyapAnaM mE# pAhi vyAnaM mE# pAhi cakṣurma̍ urvyA ( ) vi BAhi̍ śrOtraM̍ mE ślOkayApa-spinvauṣadhIrjinva̍ dvipAt pAhi̍ catuṣpAdava̍ divO vRuṣṭimEraya||9̍

verses.padam: - Padam tryaviriti# tri - aviḥ|vaya̍ḥ|triṣṭup|Canda̍ḥ|dityavAḍiti̍# ditya - vAṭ|vayaḥ|virAḍiti̍# vi - rAṭ|Candaḥ|pa~jcA̍viriti̍ pa~jca-aviḥ|vaya̍ḥ|gAyatrI|Canda̍ḥ|trivathsa̍ iti# tri - vathsaḥ|vayaḥ|uṣṇihA̱|Canda̍ḥ|turyavAḍiti̍# turya - vAṭ|vayaḥ|anuṣṭubitya̍nu̍ - stup|Candaḥ|paṣṭhavAditi̍# paṣṭha - vAt|vayaḥ|bRuhatI|Canda̍ḥ|ukṣA|vaya̍ḥ|satObRu̍hatIti̍# sataḥ - bRuhatI|Candaḥ|RuṣaBaḥ|vaya̍ḥ|kakut|Canda̍ḥ|dhEnuḥ|vaya̍ḥ|jaga̍tI|Canda̍ḥ|anaḍvAn|vaya̍ḥ|pa~gktiḥ|Canda̍ḥ|bastaḥ|vaya̍ḥ|vivalamiti̍# vi - valam|Candaḥ|vRuṣṇiḥ|vaya̍ḥ|viśAlamiti̍# vi-śAlam|Candaḥ|puru̍ṣaḥ|vaya̍ḥ̍ ( )|tandram|Candaḥ|vyAGraḥ|vaya̍ḥ|anA̍dhRuṣṭamityanA̱̍ - dhRuṣṭam|Candaḥ|siṃqhaḥ|vaya̍ḥ|Cadiḥ|Canda̍ḥ|viṣṭaBaM̍ iti# vi - staBaMḥ|vayaḥ|adhi̍patirityadhi̍-patiḥ|Canda̍ḥ|kṣatram|vaya̍ḥ|maya̍ndam|Canda̍ḥ|viśvakarmEti̍# viśva - karmA|vayaḥ|paramEṣṭhI|Canda̍ḥ|mUd^^rdhA|vaya̍ḥ|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|Candaḥ||10̍ (76) (puruṣO̍ vayaḥ - ṣaḍ viṃśatiśca)̍ (A5)
verses.samhita: tryavirvayastriṣṭup̍ CandO# dityavAḍ vayO# virAṭ Candaḥ pa~jcAvirvayO̍# gAyatrI CandastrivathsO̍ vaya# uṣṇihA Canda# sturyavAḍ vayO&nuṣṭup̍ Candaḥ̍ paṣṭhavAd vayO# bRuhatI Canda# ukṣA vayaḥ̍ satObRuhatI̍ Canda# RuṣaBO vayaḥ̍ kakucCandO# dhEnurvayO jagatI̍ CandO&naḍvAn.̍ vayaḥ̍ pa~gkti śCandO# bastO vayO# vivalaM CandO# vRuṣṇirvayO# viśAlaM Candaḥ puruṣO̍ vaya# ( ) standraM CandO̱ vyAGrO vayO&nAdhRuṣṭaM̍ Candaḥ̍ siṃqhO vaya# śCadi śCandO# viṣṭaBOM ~MvayO&dhipati̍ śCandaḥ̍ kṣatraM ~MvayO mayandaM̍ CandO# viśvakarmA̍ vayaḥ̍ paramEṣṭhI CandO# mUrddhA vayaḥ̍ prajApati̍ śCandaḥ||10̍ (puruṣO̍ vayaḥ - ṣaḍ viṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam indrA̱gnI itIndra# - agnI|avyathamAnAm|iṣṭa̍kAm|dRuṃqhatam|yuvam||pRuṣṭhEna̍|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ -pRuthivI|antarikṣam|ca|vIti̍|bAdhatAm||viśvakarmEti̍# viśva - karmA|tvA|sAdayatu|antarikṣasya|pRuṣṭhE|vyaca̍svatIm|pratha̍svatIm|BAsva̍tIm|sUrimatImiti̍# sUri - matI̱m|Eti|yA|dyAm|BAsi̍|Eti̍|pRuthivIm|Eti̍|uru|antari̍kṣam|antari̍kṣam|yacCa|antari̍kṣam|dRuṃqha|antari̍kṣam|mA|hiṃqsIḥ|viśva̍smai|prAṇAyEti̍# prA - anAya|apAnAyEtya̍pa̍ - anAya|vyAnAyEti̍# vi - anAya|udAnAyEtyu̍t̍ - anAya|pratiṣṭhAyA̍ iti# prati - sthAyai̱|caritrAya|vAyuḥ|tvA|aBIti̍|pAtu|mahyA|svastyA|CardiṣA̱|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: indrA̱gnI avyathamAnAmiṣṭa̍kAM̍ dRuṃhataM ~MyuvaM|pRuṣṭhEna dyAvApRuthivI̍ antarikṣaM̍ ca vi bAdhatAM||viśvaka̍rmA̍ tvA sAdayatvantarikṣasya̍ pRuṣṭhE vyacasvatIM̍ prathasvatIM̍ BAsvatIṃ̍ sUrimatImA yA dyAM BAsyA pRuthivImOrva̍ntari̍kṣa-mantari̍kṣaM̍ ~MyacCAntarikṣaM̍ dRuṃhAntarikṣaM̍ mA hiṃsI̍ rviśvasmai̍ prAṇAyApAnAya̍# vyAnAyOdAnAya̍# pratiṣṭhAyai# caritrAya̍ vAyustvA&Bi pAtu̍ mahyA svastyA CardiṣA - [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam śantamEnEti̍ śaM - tamEna|tayA̱|dEvatayA|a~ggirasvat|dhruvA|sIda||rAjñI̱|asi|prAcI̱|dik|virAḍiti̍# vi-rAṭ|asi|dakṣiṇA|dik|samrAḍiti# saM - rAṭ|asi|pratIcI̱|dik|svarAḍiti# sva - rAṭ|asi|udIcI|dik|adhi̍patnItyadhi̍-patnI|asi|bRuhatI|dik|Ayu̍ḥ|mE|pAhi|prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|mE|pAhi|apAnamityapa̍ - anam|mE|pAhi|vyAnamiti# vi - anam|mE|pAhi|cakṣuḥ|mE|pAhi|śrOtra̱m|mE|pAhi|mana̍ḥ|mE|jinva|vAca̱m|mE|pinva̍ ( )|AtmAna̱m|mE|pAhi|jyOtiḥ|mE|yacCa||12̍ (56)
verses.samhita: śantamEna̍ tayA# dEvatayA&~ggirasvad-dhruvA̍ sIda||rAjñya̍si̍ prAcI dig-virAḍasi̍ dakṣiṇA diK samrAḍasi̍ pratIcI diK-svarAḍasyudIcI̍ digadhipatnyasi̍ bRuhatI digAyurmE̍ pAhi prAṇaM mE# pAhyapAnaM mE# pAhi vyAnaM mE# pAhi cakṣurmE̍ pAhi śrOtraM̍ mE pAhi manO# mE jinva vAcaM̍ mE pinvA ( ) &&tmAnaM̍ mE pAhi jyOtirmE̍ yacCa||12

verses.padam: - Padam mA|Candaḥ|pramEti̍# pra - mA|Candaḥ|pratimEti̍# prati-mA|Candaḥ|asrIviḥ|Canda̍ḥ|pa~gktiḥ|Canda̍ḥ|uṣṇihA̱|Canda̍ḥ|bRuhatI|Canda̍ḥ|anuṣṭubitya̍nu̍ - stup|Candaḥ|virAḍiti̍# vi - rAṭ|Candaḥ|gAyatrI|Canda̍ḥ|triṣṭup|Canda̍ḥ|jaga̍tI|Canda̍ḥ|pRuthivI|Canda̍ḥ|antari̍kṣam|Canda̍ḥ|dyauḥ|Canda̍ḥ|samA̱ḥ|Canda̍ḥ|nakṣa̍trAṇi|Canda̍ḥ|mana̍ḥ|Canda̍ḥ|vAk|Canda̍ḥ|kRuṣiḥ|Canda̍ḥ|hira̍ṇyam|Canda̍ḥ|gauḥ|Canda̍ḥ|ajA|Canda̍ḥ|aśva̍ḥ|Canda̍ḥ||agniḥ|dEvatA̱|13̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mA Candaḥ̍ pramA Candaḥ̍ pratimA CandO̱&srIvi śCandaḥ̍ pa~gkti śCanda# uṣṇihA CandO# bRuhatI CandO&nuṣṭup̍ CandO# virAṭ CandO# gAyatrI Canda-striṣṭup̍ CandO jagatI̍ Candaḥ̍ pRuthivI CandO &ntarikṣaM̍ CandO dyau śCandaḥ samA śCandO nakṣatrAṇi̍ CandO mana śCandO vAk Candaḥ̍ kRuṣi śCandO hiraṇyaM̍ CandO gau śCandO &jA CandO &śva śCandaḥ||agnirdEvatA̍ - [ ] 13

verses.padam: - Padam vAtaḥ|dEvatA̱|sUrya̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|candramA̱ḥ|dEvatA̱|vasa̍vaḥ|dEvatA̱|rudrAḥ|dEvatA̱|AdityAḥ|dEvatA̱|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|dEvatA̱|maruta̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|indra̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|varu̍ṇaḥ|dEvatA̱|mUd^^rdhA|asi|rAṭ|dhruvA|asi|dharuṇA̱|yantrI|asi|yami̍trI|iṣE|tvA|UrjE|tvA|kRuṣyai|tvA|kṣEmA̍ya|tvA|yantrI̱|rAṭ|dhruvA|asi|dhara̍ṇI|dhartrI|asi|dhari̍trI|Ayu̍ṣE|tvA̍ ( )|varcasE|tvA|Oja̍sE|tvA|balA̍ya|tvA||14̍
verses.samhita: vAtO# dEvatA sUryO# dEvatA# candramA# dEvatA vasavO̍ dEvatA# rudrA dEvatA# &&dityA dEvatA viśvE# dEvA dEvatA# marutO# dEvatA bRuhaspati# rdEvatEndrO# dEvatA varuṇO̍ dEvatA# mUrddhA&si rAḍ dhruvA&si# dharuṇA# yantryasi̍ yamitrIṣE̍ tvOrjE tvA# kRuṣyai tvA kṣEmAya̍ tvA yantrI rAḍ dhruvA&si dharaṇI̍ dhartryasi̍ dharitryAyuṣE̍ tvA ( ) varcasE̍ tvaujasE̍ tvA balAya̍ tvA||14

verses.padam: - Padam Aśuḥ|trivRuditi# tri-vRut|BAntaḥ|pa~jcadaśa iti# pa~jca-daśaḥ|vyOmEti̍ vi - Oma|saptadaśa iti# sapta - daśaḥ|pratU̱rtiriti pra-tUrtiḥ|aṣṭAdaśa ityaṣṭA-daśaḥ|tapa̍ḥ|navadaśa̍ iti# nava-daśaḥ|aBivarta ityaBi̍ - vartaḥ|saviṃqśa iti# sa - viṃqśaḥ|dharuṇaḥ|Ekaviṃqśa̍ ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|varcaḥ|dvAviṃqśaḥ|saBaMra̍ṇa̍ iti# saM - Baraṇaḥ|trayOviṃqśa̍ iti# trayaḥ - viṃqśaḥ|yOniḥ|caturviṃqśa̍ iti# catuḥ - viṃqśaḥ|garBA̱ḥ|pa~jcaviṃqśa iti# pa~jca - viṃqśaḥ|Ojaḥ|triṇava̍ iti# tri - navaḥ|kratuḥ|Ekatriṃqśa̍ ityEka̍ - triṃqśaḥ|pratiṣṭhEti# prati - sthA|trayastriṃqśa iti# trayaḥ - triṃqśaḥ|braddhnasya|viṣṭapa̱m|catustriṃqśa̍ iti# catuḥ - triṃqśaḥ|nAkaḥ|ṣaṭtriṃqśa̍ iti# ṣaṭ - triṃqśaḥ|vivarta iti# vi - vartaḥ|aṣṭAcatvAriṃqśa ityaṣṭA-catvAriṃqśaḥ|dhartraḥ|catuṣṭOma̍ iti# catuḥ-stOmaḥ||15 (37) (Aśuḥ - saptatriṃśat)̍ (A8)
verses.samhita: AśustrivRud-BAntaḥ pa~jcadaśO̍ vyOma̍ saptadaśaḥ pratU̱rtiraṣṭAdaśa stapO# navadaśO# &Bivartaḥ saviṃqśO̍ dharuṇa# EkaviṃqśO varcO̱ dvAviṃqśaḥ saMBaraṇastrayOviṃqśO̍ yOniścaturviṃqśO̍ garBA̱ḥ pa~jcaviṃqśa Ojastriṇavaḥ̍ kraturEkatriṃqśaḥ̍ pratiṣṭhA̍ trayastriṃqśO̍ braddhnasya# viṣṭapaM̍ catustriṃqśO nAkaḥ̍ ṣaṭtriṃqśO vivartO̱&ṣṭAcatvAriṃqśO̍ dhartraścatuṣṭOmaḥ||15̍ (Aśuḥ - saptatriṃśat)̍

verses.padam: - Padam agnEḥ|BAgaḥ|asi|dIkṣAyA̱ḥ|AdhipatyamityAdhi̍# - patyam|brahma|spRutam|trivRuditi̍# tri - vRut|stOmaḥ|indra̍sya|BAgaḥ|asi|viṣṇO̱ḥ|Adhi̍patyamityAdhi̍# - patyam|kṣatram|spRutam|pa~jcadaśa iti# pa~jca - daśaḥ|stOmaḥ|nRucakṣa̍sAmiti̍# nRu - cakṣasAm|BAgaḥ|asi|dhAtuḥ|Adhi̍patyamityAdhi̍# - patyam|janitra̱m|spRutam|saptadaśa iti# sapta - daśaḥ|stOmaḥ|mitrasya̍|BAgaḥ|asi|varu̍ṇasya|Adhi̍patyamityAdhi̍# - patyam|divaḥ|vRuṣṭiḥ|vAtA̱ḥ|spRutAḥ|Ekaviṃqśa ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|stOmaḥ|adi̍tyai|BAgaḥ|asi|pUṣṇaḥ|Adhi̍patyamityAdhi̍# - patyam|Ojaḥ|spRutam|triṇava̍ iti# tri - navaḥ|stOmaḥ|vasU̍nAm|BAgaḥ|asi|16̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agnErBAgO&si̍ dIkṣAyA AdhipatyaM̍ brahma# spRutaM trivRuth stOma indrasya̍ BAgO&si̍ viṣṇOrAdhipatyaM̍ kṣatraṅ spRutaM pa~jcadaśaḥ̍ stOmO# nRucakṣasAM̍ BAgO&si̍ dhAturAdhipatyaM̍ janitraṅ# spRutaṃ saptadaśaḥ̍ stOmO# mitrasya# BAgO&si̍ varuṇasyA&&dhi̍patyaM̍ divO vRuṣṭirvAtA̱ḥ spRutA Ekaviṃqśaḥ̍ stOmO&dityai̍ BAgO&si̍ pUṣṇa AdhipatyamOja̍ḥ̍ spRutaM triṇavaḥ̍ stOmO vasUnAM̍ BAgO&si-̍ [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam rudrAṇA̱m|AdhipatyamityAdhi̍# - patyam|catuṣpAditi̍ catuḥ-pAt|spRutam|caturviṃqśa̍ iti# catuḥ-viṃqśaḥ|stOmaḥ|AdityAnA̱m|BAgaḥ|asi|marutA̱m|Adhi̍patyamityAdhi̍# - patyam|garBA̱ḥ|spRutAḥ|pa~jcaviṃqśa iti# pa~jca - viṃqśaḥ|stOmaḥ|dEvasya̍|savituḥ|BAgaḥ|asi|bRuhaspatE̱ḥ|Adhi̍patyamityAdhi̍# - patyam|samIcI̱ḥ|diśaḥ|spRutAḥ|catuṣṭOma̍ iti# catuḥ-stOmaḥ|stOmaḥ|yAvA̍nAm|BAgaḥ|asi|ayA̍vAnAm|Adhi̍patyamityAdhi̍# - patyam|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|spRutAḥ|catuścatvAriṃqśa iti# catuḥ - catvAriṃqśaḥ|stOmaḥ|RuBUṇAm|BAgaḥ|asi|viśvE̍ṣAm|dEvAnA̱m|Adhi̍patyamityAdhi̍-patyam|BUtam|niśA̱ntamiti̍ ni - śAntam|spRutam|trayastriṃqśa iti# trayaḥ - triṃqśaḥ|stOmaḥ||17̍ (46) (vasUnAM̍ BAgO&si̍ - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A9)
verses.samhita: rudrAṇAmAdhipatyaM̍ catuṣpAth̍ spRutaM caturviṃqśaḥ̍ stOma# AdityAnA̱M BAgO&si̍ marutAmAdhipatyaM̍ garBA̱ḥ spRutAḥ pa~jcaviṃqśaḥ̍ stOmO# dEvasya# saviturBAgO&si̍ bRuhaspatErAdhipatyaṃ̍ samIcIrdiśaḥ̍ spRutAścatuṣṭOmaḥ̍ stOmO yAvAnAM̍ BAgO̱&syayAvAnAmAdhi̍patyaM̍ prajAḥ spRutA-ścatu-ścatvAriṃqśaḥ̍ stOma# RuBUṇAM BAgO&si̍ viśvEṣAM̍ dEvAnAmAdhipatyaM̍ BUtaM niśA̱ntaṅ spRutaM trayastriṃqśaḥ̍ stOmaḥ||17̍ (vasUnAM̍ BAgO&si̍ - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam EkayA|astuvata|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|adhIyanta|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|adhipatirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|AsIt|tisRuBiriti# tisRu - Biḥ|astuvata|brahma|asRujyata|brahma̍ṇaḥ|pati̍ḥ|adhi̍patirityadhi̍-patiḥ|AsIt|pa~jcaBiriti̍# pa~jca-Biḥ|astuvata|BUtAni|asRujyanta|BUtAnA̱m|pati̍ḥ|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|AsIt|saptaBiriti# sapta - Biḥ|astuvata|saptarq.ṣaya iti# sapta - Ruṣayaḥ|asRujyanta|dhAtA|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|AsIt|navaBiriti# nava - Biḥ|astuvata|pitaraḥ|asRujyanta|adi̍tiḥ|adhi̍patnItyadhi̍-patnI|AsIt|EkAdaśaBirityE̍kAdaśa̍ - Biḥ|astuvata|Rutavaḥ|asRujyanta|Artavaḥ|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|AsIt|trayOdaśaBiriti# trayOdaśa - Biḥ|astuvata|mAsA̱ḥ|asRujyanta|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|adhipatirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|18 (50)
verses.samhita: EkayA&stuvata̍ prajA adhIyanta̍ prajApatiradhi̍patirAsIt̍ tisRuBirastuvata̍ brahmAsRujyata̍ brahmaṇaspati-radhi̍patirAsIt̍ pa~jcaBirastuvata̍ BUtAnyasRujyanta̍ BUtAnAM patiradhipatirAsIth̍ saptaBirastuvata̍ saptarq.ṣayO&sRujyanta̍ dhAtA-dhipatirAsI-nnavaBi̍rastuvata̍ pitarO-&sRujyantA-&*di̍tiradhi̍patnyAsI-dEkAdaśaBi̍-rastuvatartavO̍&̍ sRujyantA- &&rtavO-&dhipati-rAsIt̍ trayOdaśaBi-rastuvata̍ mAsA# asRujyanta saM~MvathsarO&dhipati-̍ [ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam AsIt|pa~jcadaśaBiriti# pa~jcadaśa -Biḥ|astuvata|kṣatram|asRujyata|indraḥ|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|AsIt|saptadaśaBiriti# saptadaśa-Biḥ|astuvata|paśavaḥ|asRujyanta|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|AsIt|navadaśaBiriti# navadaśa -Biḥ|astuvata|śUdrAryAviti# śUdra - aryau|asRujyEtAm|ahOrAtrE ityahaḥ̍ - rAtrE|adhipatnI̍ ityadhi-̍ patnI|AstAm|EkaviṃśatyEtyEka̍# - viṃqśatyA|astuvata|EkaśaPA̍ ityEka# - śaPAḥ|paśavaḥ|asRujyanta|varu̍ṇaḥ|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|AsIt|trayOviṃśatyEti̍ trayaḥ-viṃqśatyA|astuvata|kṣudrAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|asRujyanta|pUṣA|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|AsIt|pa~jcaviṃśatyEti̍ pa~jca# - viṃqśatyA|astuvata|AraṇyAḥ|paśavaḥ|asRujyanta|vAyuḥ|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|AsIt|saptaviṃśatyEti̍# sapta - viṃqśatyA|astuvata|dyAvApRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|vIti|19̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -rAsIt pa~jcadaśaBirastuvata̍ kṣatramasRujyatEndrO̍ &dhipatirAsIth-saptadaśaBi̍rastuvata̍ paśavO&sRujyanta̍ bRuhaspatiradhipati-rAsInnavadaśaBi̍-rastuvata̍ śUdrAryAvasRujyEtAmahOrAtrE̍ adhipatnI̍ AstAmEkaviṃ̍ śatyA&stuvataikaśaPAḥ̍ paśavO&sRujyanta̍ varuṇO &dhipatirAsIt̍ trayOviṃśatyA&stuvata̍ kṣudrAḥ paśavO&sRujyanta̍ pUṣA &dhipatirAsIt̍ pa~jcaviṃśatyA̍ &stuvatA*&&raṇyAḥ paśavO&sRujyanta̍ vAyuradhipatirAsIth̍ saptaviṃśatyA&stuvata̍ dyAvApRuthivI̍ vyai-̍ [ ] 19

verses.padam: - Padam EtAm|vasavaḥ|rudrAḥ|AdityAḥ|anu̍|vIti̍|Ayann|tEṣA̱m|Adhi̍patyamityAdhi̍# - patyam|AsIt|navaviṃśatyEti̍ nava# - viṃqśatyA|astuvata|vanaspatayaḥ|asRujyanta|sOma̍ḥ|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|AsIt|EkatriṃśatEtyE̍ka-triṃqśatA|astuvata|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|asRujyanta|yAvAnAm|ca|ayA̍vAnAm|ca|Adhi̍patyamityAdhi̍# - patyam|AsIt|trayastriṃśatEti̍ trayaḥ-triṃqśatA|astuvata|BUtAni̍|aśAmyann|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|paramEṣṭhI|adhipatirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|AsIt||20 (35) (saM~MvathsarO&dhipati-̍ rvi - pa~jcatriṃśacca)̍ (A10)
verses.samhita: -tAM ~MvasavO̍ rudrA AdityA̍ anu vyAyan̍ tEṣAmAdhipatyamAsI-nnava̍viṃ̍ śatyA&stuvata vanaspatayO&sRujyanta̍ sOmO &dhipatirAsI-dEka̍triṃśatA̍ &stuvata prajA asRujyanta̍ yAvAnAM̍ cAyAvAnAM̍ cA&&dhipatyamAsIt̍ trayastriṃśatA̍ &stuvata BUtAnyaśAmyan̍ prajApatiḥ̍ paramEṣṭhyadhipatirAsIt||20̍ (saM~MvathsarO&dhipati-̍ rvi - pa~jcatriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam iyam|Eva|sA|yA|prathamA|vyaucCaditi# vi - aucCat|antaḥ|asyAm|carati|praviṣṭEti̍ pra - viṣṭA||vadhUḥ|jajAna|navagaditi# nava - gat|janitrI|traya̍ḥ|EnAm|mahimAna̍ḥ|sacantE||Canda̍svatI̍ iti|uṣasA̱|pEpi̍śAnE̍ iti|samAnam|yOni̱m|anviti̍|sa~jcara̍ntI̍ iti# saM - carantI||sUrya̍patnI̍ iti sUrya# - patnI|vIti|carataḥ|prajAnatI̍ iti# pra-jAnatI|kEtum|kRuṇvAnE iti|ajarE̍ iti|BUri̍rEtasEti̍ BUri# - rEtasA||Rutasya|panthA̱m|anviti̍|tisraḥ|Eti̍|aguḥ|traya̍ḥ|GarmAsa̍ḥ|anviti̍|jyOti̍ṣA|Eti̍|aguḥ||prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|EkA̱|rakṣati|Urja̱m|EkA̱|21̍ (50)
verses.samhita: iyamEva sA yA prathamA̍ vyaucCadantarasyAM̍ carati̍ praviṣṭA|vadhUrja̍jAna̍ navagajjanitrI̍ traya# EnAM mahimAnaḥ̍ sacantE||CandasvatI̍ uṣasA pEpiśAnE̍ samAnaM ~MyOnimanu# sa~jcarantI|sUrya̍patnI̍ vi carataḥ̍ prajAnatI kEtuM kRuṇvAnE̍ ajara BUrirEtasA||Rutasya̍ panthAmanu# tisra A&gustrayO# GarmAsO anu jyOtiṣA&&guḥ|prajAmEkA̍ rakṣatyUrjamEkA̱ -[ ] 21

verses.padam: - Padam vratam|EkA̱|rakṣati|dEvayUnAmiti# dEva - yUnAm||catuṣṭOma iti# catuḥ-stOmaḥ|aBavat|yA|turIyA̱|yajñasya|pakṣau|Ruṣayaḥ|Bava̍ntI||gAyatrIm|triṣṭuBa̱m|jaga̍tIm|anuṣṭuBamitya̍nu-stuBa̱m|bRuhat|arkam|yu~jjAnAḥ|suva̍ḥ|Eti̍|aBarann|idam||pa~jcaBiriti̍# pa~jca - Biḥ|dhAtA|vIti|dadhau|idam|yat|tAsA̱m|svasRU̱ḥ|ajanayat|pa~jca̍pa~jcEti̍ pa~jca# - pa~jca||tAsA̱m|u|yanti|prayavEṇEti# pra - yavEna|pa~jca̍|nAnA̱|rUpAṇi̍|krata̍vaḥ|vasA̍nAḥ||triṃqśat|svasA̍raḥ|upEti̍|yanti|niṣkRutamiti̍# niḥ - kRutam|samAnam|kEtum|pratimu~jcamAnA̍ iti# prati - mu~jcamAnAḥ||22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vratamEkA# rakṣati dEvayUnAM||catuṣṭOmO aBavadyA̍ turIyA# yajñasya# pakṣAvRuṣayO̍ BavantI|gAyatrIM̍ triṣṭuBaM jagatImanuṣṭuBa̍M̍ bRuhadarkaM ~Myu~jjAnAḥ̍ suvarA&BarannidaM||pa~jcaBi̍rddhAtA̍ vi dadhAvidaM̍ ~Myat tAsAṅq svasRUrajanayat̍ pa~jcapa~jca|tAsA̍mu̍ yanti prayavEṇa pa~jca nAnA# rUpAṇi kratavO̍ vasAnAḥ||triṃqśath̍ svasAra̍ upayanti̍ niṣkRutaṃ samAnaM̍ kEtuM pratimu~jcamA̍nAḥ|22̍

verses.padam: - Padam RutUn|tanvatE|kavayaḥ|prajAnatIriti̍# pra - jAnatIḥ|maddhyECandasa̍ iti maddhyE̱ - Candasaḥ|parIti|yanti|BAsva̍tIḥ||jyOti̍ṣmatI|pratIti̍|mu~jcatE|naBa̍ḥ|rAtrI̱|dEvI|sUrya̍sya|vratAni̍||vIti̍|paśyanti|paśava̍ḥ|jAya̍mAnAḥ|nAnA̍rUpA̍ iti nAnA̱ - rUpAḥ|mAtuḥ|asyAḥ|upastha ityupa - sthE||EkAṣṭakEtyEka-̍ aṣṭakA|tapasA|tapya̍mAnA|jajAna̍|garBa̱m|mahimAna̱m|indra̱m||tEna̍|dasyUn̍|vIti̍|asahanta|dEvAḥ|hantA|asu̍rAṇAm|aBavat|śacI̍Biriti̍ śaci# - Biḥ||anAnujAmityanA̍nu̍ - jAm|anujAmityanu-jAm|mAm|akarta|satyam|vada̍ntI|anviti̍|icCE|Etat||BUyAsa̱m|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: RutUṅstanvatE̍ kavayaḥ̍ prajAnatIrmaddhyECandasaḥ̍ pari# yanti BAsvatIḥ||jyOti̍ṣmatI̍ prati# mu~jcatE naBO rAtrI# dEvI sUryasya̍ vratAni|vi̍ paśyanti̍ paśavO jAyamAnA̍ nAnArUpA̍ mAturasyA upasthE̱||EkAṣṭakA tapasA̍ tapyamAnA̍ jajAna garBaM̍ mahimAnamindra̱M|tEna dasyUn vyasahanta̍ dEvA hantA&surAṇA-maBavacCacI̍Biḥ||anA̍nujAmanujAM̍ mAmakarta̍ satyaM ~MvadantyanvicCa̍ Etat|BUyAsa# -[ ] 23

verses.padam: - Padam asya|sumatAviti# su - matau|yathA̱|yUyam|anyA|vaḥ|anyAm|atIti|mA|prEti̍|yukta||aBU̱t|mama̍|sumatAviti̍# su - matau|viśvavEdA̍ iti# viśva - vEdAḥ|Aṣṭa|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati - sthAm|avidat|hi|gAdham||BUyAsa̱m|asya|sumatAviti̍# su - matau|yathA̱|yUyam|anyA|vaḥ|anyAm|atIti|mA|prEti̍|yukta||pa~jca̍|vyu̍ṣṭIriti̍ vi - uṣṭIḥ|anviti|pa~jca̍|dOhA̱ḥ|gAm|pa~jca̍nAmnImiti̍ pa~jca# - nAmnIm|Rutavaḥ|anviti̍|pa~jca̍||pa~jca̍|diśa̍ḥ|pa~jcadaśEnEti̍# pa~jca - daśEna|klRuptAḥ|samAnamU̱d^^rdhnIriti̍# samAna - mUd^^rdhnIḥ|aBIti|lOkam|Eka̱m||24̍ (50)
verses.samhita: masya sumatau yathA# yUyamanyA vO# anyAmati mA pra yukta||aBUnmama̍# sumatau viśvavEdA̍ Aṣṭa# pratiṣṭhAmavidaddhi̍ gAdhaM|BUyAsamasya̍ sumatau yathA# yUyamanyA vO# anyAmati mA prayukta||pa~jca̍ vyuṣṭIranu̍ pa~jca dOhA gAM pa~jcanAmnImRutavO&nu̍ pa~jca|pa~jca̍ diśaḥ̍ pa~jcadaśEna# klRuptAḥ samAnamU̱rddhnIraBi̍ lOkamEka̱M||24

verses.padam: - Padam Rutasya|garBa̍ḥ|prathamA|vyUṣuṣIti̍# vi - UṣuṣI̱|apAm|EkA̱|mahimAna̱m|biBarti||sUryasya|EkA̱|cara̍ti|niṣkRutEṣviti̍# niḥ-kRutEṣu|Garmasya̍|EkA̱|savitA|EkA̱m|nIti̍|yacCati||yA|prathamA|vyaucCaditi̍# vi - aucCat|sA|dhEnuḥ|aBavat|yamE||sA|naḥ|paya̍svatI|dhukṣva|utta̍rAmuttarAmityutta̍rAM-uttarAm|samA̱m||śukraṛṣaBEti̍# śukra - RuṣaBA|naBasA|jyOti̍ṣA|Eti̍|agAt|viśvarUpEti̍# viśva - rUpA|śabalIḥ|agnikEturityagni̍ - kEtuḥ||samAnam|artha̱m|svapasyamAnEti# su-apasyamAnA|biBra̍tI|jarAm|ajarE|uṣaḥ|Eti̍|agAḥ||RutUnAm|patnI̱̍ ( )|prathamA|iyam|Eti|agAt|ahnA̱m|nEtrI|janitrI|prajAnAmiti̍# pra - jAnA̱m||EkA̱|satI|bahudhEti# bahu - dhA|uṣaḥ|vIti|ucCasi|ajI̱rṇA|tvam|jarayasi|sarva̱m|anyat||25̍ (69) (UrjamEkA̱ - pratimu~jcamAnA̍ - BUyAsa - mEkaM - patnyE kAnna viṃśatiśca̍)̍ (A11)
verses.samhita: Rutasya garBaḥ̍ prathamA vyUṣuṣyapAmEkA# mahimAnaM̍ biBarti|sUryasyaikA carati̍ niṣkRutEṣu# GarmasyaikA# savitaikAM ni yacCati||yA̍ prathamA̍ vyaucCath sA dhEnuraBavadyamE|sA̍ naḥ payasvatI̍ dhukṣvOttarAmuttarAṃq̍ samA̱M||śukraṛṣaBA̍ naBasA̍ jyOtiṣA &&*gA̱d-viśvarUpA̍ śabalIragnikEtuḥ|samAnamarthaṅ̍# svapasyamAnA̍ biBratI̍ jarAmajara̍ uṣa A&gA̱ḥ||RutUnAM patnI̱ ( ) prathamEyamA&gAdahnA̱M nEtrI janitrI̍ prajAnA̱M|EkA# satI bahudhOṣO̍ vyucCasyajI̱rṇA̍ tvaM jarayasi̍ sarvamanyat||25̍ (UrjamEkA̱ - pratimu~jcamAnA̍ - BUyAsa - mEkaM - patnyE kAnna viṃśatiśca̍)̍

verses.padam: - Padam agnE̱|jAtAn|prEti|nuda|naḥ|sapatnAn̍|pratIti̍|ajA̍tAn|jAtavEda̍ iti# jAta - vEdaḥ|nudasva||asmE iti|dIdihi|sumanA̍ iti# su - manA̱ḥ|ahEḍann|tava̍|syAm|śarmann̍|trivarU̍tha̍ iti# tri-varUthaḥ|udBidityu̍t̍ - Bit||sahasA|jAtAn|prEti̍|nuda|naḥ|sapatnAn̍|pratIti̍|ajA̍tAn|jAtavEda̍ iti# jAta - vEdaḥ|nudasva||adhIti|naḥ|brUhi|sumanasyamA̍na̍ iti# su - manasyamAnaḥ|vayam|syAma|prEti̍|nuda|naḥ|sapatnAn̍||catuścatvAriṃqśa̍ iti# catuḥ - catvAriṃqśaḥ|stOmaḥ|varca̍ḥ|dravi̍ṇam|ṣOḍaśaḥ|stOma̍ḥ|Oja̍ḥ|dravi̍ṇam|pRuthivyAḥ|purI̍ṣam|asi|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agnE# jAtAn praṇudA̍ naḥ sapatnAn pratyajAtA~jjAtavEdO̍ nudasva|asmE dIdihi̍ sumanA ahEḍan̍ tava# syAṃq śarman̍ trivarUtha̍ udBit||sahasA̍ jAtAn praṇudAnaḥ̍ sapatnAn pratyajAtA~jjAtavEdO̍ nudasva|adhi# nO brUhi sumanasyamAnO̍ vayaṅ syAma̍ praṇudA̍ naḥ sapatnAn||catuścatvAriṃqśaḥ̍ stOmO varcO draviṇaṃ̍ ṣOḍaśaḥ stOma OjO draviṇaM̍ pRuthivyAḥ purIṣamasya-̍ [ ] 26

verses.padam: - Padam aPsaḥ|nAma̍||Eva̍ḥ|Canda̍ḥ|vari̍vaḥ|Canda̍ḥ|śaBUMriti̍# śaM - BUḥ|Candaḥ|pariBUriti̍# pari - BUḥ|Candaḥ|AcCat|Canda̍ḥ|mana̍ḥ|Canda̍ḥ|vyaca̍ḥ|Canda̍ḥ|sindhu̍ḥ|Canda̍ḥ|samudram|Canda̍ḥ|salilam|Canda̍ḥ|saM~Myaditi̍# saM - yat|Candaḥ|viyaditi̍# vi - yat|Candaḥ|bRuhat|Canda̍ḥ|rathantaramiti̍# rathaM - taram|Candaḥ|nikAya̍ iti# ni - kAyaḥ|Candaḥ|vivadha̍ iti# vi-vadhaḥ|Candaḥ|gira̍ḥ|Canda̍ḥ|Braja̍ḥ|Canda̍ḥ|saṣṭubiti̍# sa - stup|Candaḥ|anuṣṭubitya̍nu̍ - stup|Candaḥ|kakut|Canda̍ḥ|trikakuditi̍# tri - kakut|Candaḥ|kAvyam|Canda̍ḥ|a~gkupam|Canda̍ḥ|27̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -PsO nAma|Eva̍ śCandO variva̍ śCandaḥ̍ śaBUM śCandaḥ̍ pariBU śCanda# AcCacCandO mana śCandO vyaca śCandaḥ sindhu śCandaḥ̍ samudraM Candaḥ̍ salilaM Candaḥ̍ saM~MyacCandO# viyacCandO# bRuhacCandO# rathantaraM CandO# nikAya śCandO# vivadha śCandO gira śCandO Braja śCandaḥ̍ saṣṭup CandO# &nuṣṭup Candaḥ̍ kakucCanda# strikakucCandaḥ̍ kAvyaM CandO̱ -&~gkupaM Candaḥ̍ - [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam padapa~gktiriti̍# pada - pa~gktiḥ|Candaḥ|akṣara̍pa~gktirityakṣara̍# - pa~gktiḥ|Candaḥ|viṣṭArapa̍~gktiriti̍# viṣṭAra - pa~gktiḥ|Candaḥ|kṣuraḥ|BRujvAn̍|Canda̍ḥ|pracCat|Canda̍ḥ|pakṣaḥ|Canda̍ḥ|Eva̍ḥ|Canda̍ḥ|vari̍vaḥ|Canda̍ḥ|vaya̍ḥ|Canda̍ḥ|vayaskRuditi̍# vayaḥ - kRut|Candaḥ|viśAlamiti̍# vi - śAlam|Candaḥ|viṣpa̍rdhA̍ iti viḥ-spad^^rdhAḥ|Candaḥ|Cadiḥ|Canda̍ḥ|dUrOhaṇamiti̍# dUḥ - rOhaṇam|Candaḥ|tandram|Canda̍ḥ|a~gkA~gkam|Canda̍ḥ||28̍ (33) (asya - ~gkupa~jCanda - strayastriṃśacca)̍ (A12)
verses.samhita: padapa~gkti̍ śCandO &kṣarapa~gkti̍ śCandO# viṣṭArapa~gkti̍ śCandaḥ̍ kṣurO BRujvA~jCandaḥ̍ pracCacCandaḥ̍ pakṣa śCanda Eva śCandO variva̍ śCandO vaya śCandO# vayaskRucCandO# viśAlaM CandO viṣparddhA̍ śCanda# śCadi śCandO# dUrOhaṇaM CandastandraM̍ CandO̱ &~gkA~gkaM Candaḥ||28̍ (asya - ~gkupa~jCanda - strayastriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam agniḥ|vRutrAṇi|ja~gGanat|draviṇasyuḥ|vipanyayEti̍# vi - panyayA̱||samiddha̍ iti# sam - iddhaḥ|śukraḥ|Ahuta̍ ityA - hutaḥ||tvam|sOma|asi|satpatiriti̍ sat - patiḥ|tvam|rAjA̱|uta|vRutrahEti# vRutra - hA||tvam|Badraḥ|asi|kratuḥ||BadrA|tE|agnE|svanIkEti̍# su - anIka|sandRugEti# saM - dRuk|GOrasya|sataḥ|viṣu̍ṇasya|cAru̍ḥ||na|yat|tE|śOciḥ|tama̍sA|vara̍nta|na|dhvasmAna̍ḥ|tanuvi̍|rEpa̍ḥ|Eti̍|dhuḥ||Badram|tE|agnE|sahasinn|anI̍kam|upAkE|Eti̍|rOcatE|sUrya̍sya||29̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agnirvRutrAṇi# ja~gGanad draviṇasyurvipanyayA̱|sami̍ddhaḥ̍ śukra Ahutaḥ||tvaṃ̍ sOmAsi̍ satpatistvaṃ̍ rAjOta vRutrahA|tvaM̍ BadrO asi̍ kratuḥ||BadrA̍ tE# agnE svanIka sadRuMgGOrasya# satO viṣuṇasya̍ cAruḥ|na̍ yat tE# śOcistamasA̍ varanta̍ na dhvasmAnastanuvi̍ rEpa A dhuḥ||BadraM̍ tE# agnE sahasinnanIkamupAka̍ A rOcatE̍ sUryasya|29̍

verses.padam: - Padam ruśat|dRuśE|dadRuśE|naktayA|cit|arU̱kṣitam|dRuśE|Eti̍|rUpE|anna̱m||saḥ|EnA|anI̍kEna|suvidatra̍ iti# su-vidatraḥ|asmE̍ iti|yaṣṭA̱|dEvAn|Aya̍jiṣṭha̍ ityA - yajiṣṭhaḥ|svasti||adabdhaḥ|gOpA̍ iti gO-pAḥ|uta|naḥ|paraspA iti# paraḥ-pAḥ|agnE̱|dyumaditi# dyu - mat|uta|rEvat|didIhi||svasti|naḥ|divaḥ|agnE|pRuthivyAḥ|viśvAyuriti# viśva - Ayuḥ|dhEhi|yajathAya|dEva||yat|sImahi̍|divijAtEti̍# divi - jAta|praśastamiti̍ pra - śastam|tat|asmAsu|dravi̍ṇam|dhEhi|citram||yathA̱|hOtaḥ|manu̍ṣaḥ|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ruśad-dRuśE̍ dadRuśE̍ naktayA cidarU̱kṣitaM dRuśa A rUpE anna̱M||sainA&nIkEna̍ suvidatrO# asmE yaṣṭA# dEvAṃ Ayajiṣṭhaḥ̍ svasti|adabdhO̍ gOpA uta naḥ̍ paraspA agnE̱ dyumaduta rEvad didIhi||svasti̍ nO# divO agnE̍ pRuthivyA viśvAyurddhEhi̍ yajathAya̍ dEva|yath sImahi# divijAta praśastaM̍ tadasmAsu draviṇaM̍ dhEhi citraM||yathA# hOtarmanuṣO̍ - [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam dEvatAtEti# dEva - tAtA|yajñEBiḥ|sUnO̍ iti|sahasaḥ|yajA̍si||EvA|naḥ|adya|samanA|samAnAn|uśann|agnE|uśataḥ|yakṣi|dEvAn||agnim|IḍE|purOhi̍tamiti̍# puraḥ - hitam|yajñasya|dEvam|Rutvija̱m||hOtA̍ram|ratnadhAta̍mamiti̍# ratna - dhAtamam||vRuṣA̱|sOma|dyumAniti̍# dyu-mAn|asi|vRuṣA̱|dEva|vRuṣavrata̍ iti vRuṣa# - vrataḥ||vRuṣA̱|dharmAṇi|dadhiṣE||sAnta̍panA̍ iti sAM - tapanAḥ|idam|haviḥ|marutaḥ|tat|jujuṣṭana||yuṣmAka̍|UtI|riśAdasa̍ iti# riśa - adasaḥ||yaḥ|naḥ|martaḥ|vasavaḥ|durqḥRuṇAyuriti̍# duḥ - hRuṇAyuḥ|tiraḥ|satyAni|marutaḥ|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvatAtA̍ yajñEBiḥ̍ sUnO sahasO yajAsi|EvA̍ nO# adya samanA̍ samAnAnu-śanna̍gna̍ uśatO yakṣi̍ dEvAn||agnimIḍE̍ purOhitaM̍ ~Myajñasya# dEvamRutvija̱M|hOtAraṃ̍ ratnadhAtamaM||vRuṣA̍# sOma dyumAṃ asi̍ vRuṣA# dEva vRuṣavrataḥ|vRuṣA̍ dharmAṇi̍ dadhiṣE||sAntapanA̍ idaṃ havirmarutastajju̍juṣṭana|yuṣmAkOtI̍ riśAdasaḥ||yO̍ nO martO# vasavO duṛhRuṇAyustiraḥ satyAni# marutO - [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam jiGAṃsAt||druhaḥ|pAśa̱m|pratIti̍|saḥ|mucIṣṭa|tapi̍ṣṭhEna|tapa̍sA|hantana|tam||saM~MvathsarIṇA̍ iti# saM - vathsarIṇA̱ḥ|marutaḥ|svarkA̍ iti# su - arkAḥ|urukṣayA ityuru̍ - kṣayA̱ḥ|sagaṇA̍ iti sa - gaṇAḥ|mAnuṣEṣu||tE|asmat|pAśAn̍|prEti̍|mu~jcantu|aṃha̍saḥ|sAntapanA̍ iti# sAM - tapanAḥ|madirAḥ|mAdayiṣṇavaḥ||piprIhi|dEvAn|uśataḥ|yaviṣṭha|vidvAn|RutUn|Rutupata̍ ityRutu-patE|yaja|iha||yE|daivyA̱ḥ|Rutvija̍ḥ|tEBi̍ḥ|agnE|tvam|hOtRU̍ṇAm|asi|Aya̍jiṣṭha̍ ityA - yajiṣṭhaḥ||agnE̱|yat|adya|viśaḥ|addhvarasya|hOtaḥ|pAvaka|32̍ (50)
verses.samhita: jiGAṃsAt|druhaḥ̍ pAśaM prati sa mucIṣṭa̍ tapiṣṭhEna̍ tapasA̍ hantanA taM||saM~MvathsarIṇA# marutaḥ̍ svarkA urukṣayAḥ̍ sagaṇA̍ mAnuṣEṣu|tE̱&smat̍ pAśAn pra mu~jcantvaṃha̍saḥ̍ sAntapanA madirA̍ mAdayiṣṇava̍ḥ||piprIhi̍ dEvAṃ uśatO̍ yaviṣṭha̍ vidvAṃ RutUṃṛRutupatE̍ yajEha|yE daivyA# RutvijastEBiragnE̍ tvaṃ hOtRUṇAmasyAya̍jiṣṭhaḥ||agnE̍ yadadya viśO addhvarasya̍ hOtaḥ pAvaka̍ - [ ] 32

verses.padam: - Padam śOcE|vEḥ|tvam|hi|yajvA̱||RutA|yajAsi|mahinA|vIti|yat|BUḥ|havyA|vaha|yaviṣṭha|yA|tE|adya||agninA̱|rayim|aśnavat|pOṣa̱m|Eva|divEdi̍va̍ iti# divE - divE||yaśasa̱m|vIravattamamiti̍# vIravat̍ - tamam||gayasPAna iti# gaya - sPAnaḥ|amIvahEtya̍mIva̍ - hA|vasuviditi# vasu - vit|puṣṭivad^^rdhana̍ iti# puṣṭi - vardhanaḥ||sumitra̍ iti# su - mitraḥ|sOma|naḥ|Bava||gRuhamEdhAsa̍ iti gRuha# - mEdhAsaḥ|Eti|gata|maru̍taḥ|mA|apEti̍|BUtana||pramu~jcanta̍ iti# pra - mu~jcantaḥ|naḥ|aṃha̍saḥ||pUrvIBi̍ḥ|hi|dadAśima|śaradBiriti̍# śarat - Biḥ|marutaḥ|vayam||mahOBiriti̍ mahaḥ̍ - Biḥ|33 (50)
verses.samhita: śOcE vEṣṭvaṃ hi yajvA̱|RutA yajAsi̍ mahinA vi yadBUṛhavyA vaha̍ yaviṣṭha yA tE# adya||agninA# rayimaśnavat̍ pOṣamEva̍ divEdivE|yaśasa̍M̍ ~MvIravattamaM||gayasPAnO̍# amIvahA vasuvit̍ puṣṭivarddha̍naḥ|sumitraḥ̍ sOma̍ nO Bava||gRuhamEdhAsa̍ A gata̍ marutO̍ mA&pa# BUtana|pramu~jcantO# nO aṃhasaḥ||pUrvIBirqḥi̍ dadAśima̍ śaradBirmarutO̍ vayaM|mahOBi-̍ [ ] 33

verses.padam: - Padam carq.ṣaṇInAm||prEti|buddhniyA̱|IratE|vaḥ|mahAṃ̍si|prEti̍|nAmA̍ni|prayajyava̍ iti# pra - yajyavaḥ|tiraddhvam||sahasriya̱m|damya̱m|BAgam|Etam|gRuhamEdhIyamiti# gRuha - mEdhIya̱m|marutaḥ|juṣaddhvam||upEti|yam|Eti̍|yuvatiḥ|sudakṣamiti̍# su-dakṣa̱m|dOṣA|vastO̱ḥ|haviṣmatI|GRutAcI̱||upEti̍|sva|Enam|arama̍tiḥ|vasUyuriti̍# vasU - yuḥ||imO iti|agnE|vItata̍mAnIti̍# vIta - tamAni|havyA|ajasraḥ|vakṣi|dEvatA̍timiti̍# dEva - tAtim|acCa||pratIti̍|naḥ|Im|suraBIṇi̍|viyantu||krIḍam|vaḥ|śad^^rdha̍ḥ|mAru̍tam|anarvAṇa̱m|rathEśuBamiti̍# rathE - śuBa̱m||34 (50)
verses.samhita: -ścaṛṣaṇInAM||prabuddhniyA# IratE vO mahAṃsi̍ praṇAmAni̍ prayajyavastiraddhvaM|sahasriyaM damyaM̍ BAgamEtaM gRuhamEdhIya̍M̍ marutO juṣaddhvaM||upa yamEti# yuvatiḥ sudakṣaM̍ dOṣA vastOr.̍ haviṣmatI̍ GRutAcI̱|upa svainamarama̍tirva-sUyuḥ||imO̍ agnE̍ vItatamAni̍ havyA &jasrO̍ vakṣi dEvatAtimacCa̍|prati̍# na Iṃ suraBIṇi# viyantu||krIḍaM ~Mvaḥ śarddhO mArutamanarvAṇaṃ̍# rathEśuBa̱M|34

verses.padam: - Padam kaṇvA̱ḥ|aBi|prEti|gAyata||atyA̍saḥ|na|yE|maruta̍ḥ|sva~jca̍ḥ|yakṣadRuśa̍ iti# yakṣa - dRuśaḥ|na|śuBaya̍nta|maryA̱ḥ||tE|harmyEṣṭhA̍ iti# harmyE-sthAḥ|śiśavaḥ|na|śuBrAḥ|vathsAsa̍ḥ|na|prakrIḍina̍ iti# pra - krIḍinaḥ|payOdhA̍ iti# payaḥ - dhAḥ||prEti|EṣAm|ajmE̍ṣu|vithurA|iva|rEjatE|BUmi̍ḥ|yAmE̍ṣu|yat|ha|yu~jjatE̱|śuBE||tE|krIḍaya̍ḥ|dhuna̍yaḥ|BrAja̍dRuṣṭaya̍ iti BrAjat̍ - Ruṣṭayaḥ|svayam|mahitvamiti# mahi - tvam|panayanta|dhUtayaḥ||upahvarEṣvityu̍pa-hvarEṣu̍|yat|aci̍ddhvam|yayim|vaya̍ḥ|iva|marutaḥ|kEna̍|35̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kaṇvA# aBi pra gAyata||atyA̍sO̍ na yE marutaḥ sva~jcO# yakṣadRuśO na śuBayanta̍ maryA̱ḥ|tE harmyEṣṭhAḥ̍ śiśavO̍ na śuBrA vathsAsO na prakrIḍina̍ḥ̍ payOdhAḥ||praiṣAmajmEṣu̍ vithurEva# rEjatE BUmiryAmEṣu̍ yaddha# yu~jjatE# śuBE|tE krIḍayO dhunayO̍ BrAjadRuṣṭayaḥ̍ svayaM mahitvaM̍ panayanta̍ dhUtayaḥ||upahvarEṣu̍ yadaciddhvaM̍ ~MyayiM ~Mvaya# iva marutaḥ kEna# - [ ] 35

verses.padam: - Padam cit|pathA||ścOtanti|kOśA̱ḥ|upEti̍|vaḥ|rathE̍ṣu|Eti̍|GRutam|ukṣata|madhu̍varṇamiti̍ madhu# - varṇam|arcatE||agnima̍gnimityagnim̍ - agnim|havImaBiriti̍ havIma̍ - Biḥ|sadA̱|havanta|viśpati̱m||havyavAhamiti# havya - vAha̱m|purupriyamiti# puru - priyam||tam|hi|śaśvantaḥ|Iḍa̍tE|srucA|dEvam|GRutaścutEti̍# GRuta - ścutA̱||agnim|havyAya|vOḍha̍vE||indrA̱gnI̍ itIndra# - agnI|rOcanA|divaḥ|śnathat|vRutram|indra̱m|vaḥ|viśvata̍ḥ|parIti̍|indra̱m|nara̍ḥ|viśva̍karmanniti̍ viśva# - karmann|haviṣA̱|vAvRudhAnaḥ|viśvakarmanniti̍ viśva# - karmann|haviṣA̱|vad^^rdhanEna||36̍ (46) (sUryasya̍ - manuṣO̍ - marutaḥ - pAvaka̍ - mahOBI̍ - rathEśuBa - ~gkEna - ṣaḍcatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A13) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 13 Anuvaakams :- (apAntvEma# - nnayaM purO Buvaḥ - prAcI̱ - dhruvakṣiti̍ - stryavi - rindrA̱gnI - mA Canda# - AśustrivRu - dagnErBAgO̱ - &syEka# - yEyamEva sA yA - &gnE# jAtA - nagnirvRutrAṇi - trayOdaśa̍ ) Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (apAntvE - ndrA̱gnI - iyamEva - dEvatAtA̍ - ṣaṭtriṃśat̍ ) First and Last Padam of ṭhird Prasnam of Kandam 4 :- (apAntvEman̍ - haviṣA vardhanEna)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE caturtha kAṇḍE tRutIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||-----------------------------------------------------------------------
verses.samhita: viśvakarman.̍ haviṣA# vAvRudhAnO>5, viśvakarman.̍ haviṣA vardhanEna̍ > 6 viśvakarman.̍ haviṣA# vAvRudhAnaḥ svayaM ~Myajasva̍ tanuvaM̍ juṣAṇaḥ|muhyantvanyE̍ aBitaḥ̍ sapatnA# ihAsmAkaM̍ maGavA# sUrirastu||viśva̍karman.̍ haviṣA vardhanEna̍ trAtAramindramakRuṇOravadhyaM|tasmai̍ viśaḥ samanamanta̍ pUrvIrayamugrO vihavyO̍# yathAsat||̍

verses.padam: - Padam raśmiḥ|asi|kṣayAya|tvA|kṣaya̱m|jinva|prEtiriti̍ pra - itiḥ|asi|dharmAya|tvA|dharma̱m|jinva|anvi̍tirityanu̍# - itiḥ|asi|divE|tvA|diva̱m|jinva|sandhiriti# saM - dhiḥ|asi|antarikṣAya|tvA|antari̍kṣam|jinva|pratidhiriti̍# prati-dhiḥ|asi|pRuthivyai|tvA|pRuthivIm|jinva|viṣṭaBaM iti# vi-staBaMḥ|asi|vRuṣṭyai̱|tvA|vRuṣṭi̱m|jinva|pravEti# pra - vA|asi|ahnE̱|tvA|ahaḥ|jinva|anuvEtya̍nu̍ - vA|asi|rAtriyai|tvA|rAtri̱m|jinva|uśik|asi|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: raśmirasi̍ kṣayAya̍ tvA kṣayaM̍ jinva prEtirasi̍ dharmAya̍ tvA dharmaM̍ jinvAnvitirasi̍ divE tvA divaM̍ jinva sandhirasyantari̍kṣAya̍ tvA&ntarikṣaM̍ jinva pratidhirasi̍ pRuthivyai tvA# pRuthivIM jinva̍ viṣṭaBOM&si̍ vRuṣṭyai̱ tvA vRuṣṭiM̍ jinva pravA&syahnE tvA&harjinvAnu̍ vA&si rAtriyai̍ tvA rAtriM̍ jinvO śigasi̍ - [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam vasuBya̍ iti vasu# - Byaḥ|tvA|vasUn|jinva|prakEta̍ iti# pra - kEtaḥ|asi|rudrEByaḥ|tvA|rudrAn|jinva|sudItiriti̍# su- dItiḥ|asi|AdityEByaḥ|tvA|AdityAn|jinva|Oja̍ḥ|asi|pitRuBya̍ iti# pitRu - Byaḥ|tvA|pitRUn|jinva|tantuḥ|asi|prajABya̍ iti# pra - jAByaḥ|tvA|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|jinva|pRutanAṣAṭ|asi|paśuBya iti# paśu - Byaḥ|tvA|paśUn|jinva|rEvat|asi|OṣadhIBya̍ ityOṣadhi̍ - Byaḥ|tvA|OṣadhIḥ|jinva|aBijiditya̍Bi̍ - jit|asi|yuktagrAvEti# yukta - grAvA|indrAya|tvA|indra̱m|jinva|adhi̍patirityadhi̍-patiḥ|asi|prAṇAyEti̍# pra-anAya|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vasuByastvA̍ vasU̱~jjinva prakEtO&si̍ rudrEByastvA̍ rudrA~jjinva̍ sudItirasyAdityEBya̍stvA̍ &&dityA~jjinvaujO&si̍ pitRuByastvA̍ pitRU~jjinva̍ tanturasi̍ prajAByastvA̍ prajA jinva̍ pRutanAṣAḍasi̍ paśuByastvA̍ paśU~jjinva̍ rEvadasyOṣadhIBya-stvauṣa̍dhI-rjinvABijida̍si̍ yuktagrAvEndrAya̍ tvEndraM̍ jinvAdhipatirasi̍ prAṇAya# - [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam tvA|prAṇamiti# pra - anam|jinva|yantA|asi|apAnAyEtyapa̍ - anAya|tvA|apAnamitya̍pa̍ - anam|jinva|saṃqsarpa iti# saM - sarpaḥ|asi|cakṣu̍ṣE|tvA|cakṣu̍ḥ|jinva|vayOdhA̍ iti# vayO - dhAḥ|asi|śrOtrAya|tvA|śrOtra̱m|jinva|trivRuditi̍# tri - vRut|asi|pravRuditi# pra - vRut|asi|saM~MvRuditi# saM - vRut|asi|vivRuditi vi - vRut|asi|saṃqrOha iti# saM - rOhaḥ|asi|nIrOha iti# niḥ - rOhaḥ|asi|prarOha iti# pra - rOhaḥ|asi|anurOha ityanu̍ - rOhaḥ|asi|vasukaḥ|asi|vEṣaśririti̍ vEṣa# - śriḥ|asi|vasyaṣṭiḥ|asi||3̍ (43) (uśigasi̍ - prAṇAya - tricatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A1)
verses.samhita: tvA prAṇaM jinva̍ yantA&syapAnAya̍# tvA&pAnaM jinva̍ saṃqsarpO&si̍ cakṣuṣE̍ tvA cakṣurjinva̍ vayOdhA asi̍ śrOtrAya̍ tvA śrOtraM̍ jinva trivRudasi̍ pravRudasi̍ saM~MvRudasi̍ vivRudasi̍ saṃrOhO&si̍ nIrOhO&si̍ prarOhO̱&syanurOhO&si̍ vasukO&si̍ vEṣaśrirasi̍ vasyaṣṭirasi||3̍ (uśigasi̍ - prAṇAya - tricatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam rAjñI̱|asi|prAcI̱|dik|vasavaḥ|tE|dEvAḥ|adhi̍pataya̍ ityadhi# - patayaḥ|agniḥ|hEtInAm|pratidhartEti# prati - dhartA|trivRuditi# tri-vRut|tvA|stOmaḥ|pRuthivyAm|śrayatu|Ajya̱m|uktham|avya̍thayat|staBnAtu|rathantaramiti̍# rathaM - taram|sAma|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|asi|dakṣiṇA|dik|rudrAḥ|tE|dEvAḥ|adhipataya̍ ityadhi# - patayaḥ|indraḥ|hEtInAm|pratidhartEti̍# prati - dhartA|pa~jcadaśa iti# pa~jca - daśaḥ|tvA|stOmaḥ|pRuthivyAm|śrayatu|pra̍ ugam|uktham|avya̍thayat|staBnAtu|bRuhat|sAma̍|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|samrAḍiti# saM - rAṭ|asi|pratIcI̱|dik|4 (50)
verses.samhita: rAjñyasi̍ prAcI digvasavastE̍ dEvA adhipatayO&gniṛhE̍tInAM̍ pratidhartA̍# trivRut tvA stOmaḥ̍ pRuthivyAṅ śrayatvAjya̍-mukthamavya̍thayath̍ staBnAtu rathantaraṃ sAma pratiṣṭhityai̍ virAḍasi̍ dakṣiṇA digrudrAstE# dEvA adhipataya̍ indrO# hEtInAM pratidhartA̍ pa~jcadaśastvA̍ stOmaḥ̍ pRuthivyAṅ śrayatu̍ pra-ugamukthamavya̍thayath̍ staBnAtu bRuhath sAma pratiṣṭhityai̍ samrAḍasi̍ pratIcI di- [ ] 4

verses.padam: - Padam AdityAḥ|tE|dEvAḥ|adhipataya̍ ityadhi# - patayaḥ|sOmaḥ|hEtInAm|pratidhartEti̍# prati - dhartA|saptadaśa iti# sapta - daśaḥ|tvA|stOmaḥ|pRuthivyAm|śrayatu|marutvatIya̱m|uktham|avya̍thayat|staBnAtu|vairUpam|sAma̍|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|svarAḍiti# sva - rAṭ|asi|udIcI|dik|viśvE̱|tE|dEvAḥ|adhi̍pataya̍ ityadhi# - patayaḥ|varuṇaḥ|hEtInAm|pratidhartEti̍# prati - dhartA|Ekaviṃqśa ityEka-viṃqśaḥ|tvA|stOma̍ḥ|pRuthivyAm|śrayatu|niṣkE̍valyam|uktham|avya̍thayat|staBnAtu|vairAjam|sAma̍|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|adhipatnItyadhi̍# - patnI|asi|bRuhatI|dik|marutaḥ|tE|dEvAḥ|adhi̍pataya̍ ityadhi# - patayaḥ|5 (50)
verses.samhita: gAdityAstE̍# dEvA adhipatayaḥ̍ sOmO# hEtInAM pratidhartA̍ saptadaśastvA̍ stOmaḥ̍ pRuthivyAṅ śrayatu̍ marutvatIyamuktha-mavya̍thayath̍ staBnAtu vairUpaṃ sAma pratiṣṭhityAyai̍ svarAḍasyudIcI̍ dig viśvE# tE dEvA adhipatayO̍ varuṇO̍ hEtInAm pratidhartaika̍viṃqśa̍ stvA stOmaḥ̍ pRuthivyAṅ śrayatu̍ niṣkEvalya-mukthamavya̍thayath̍ staBnAtu vairAjaṃ sAma pratiṣṭhityA̍ adhipatnyasi̍ bRuhatI di~gmarutastE̍ dEvA adhipatayO̍ - [ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam bRuhaspatiḥ|hEtInAm|pratidhartEti̍# prati - dhartA|triṇavatrayastriṃqśAviti# triṇava - trayastriṃqśau|tvA|stOmau̱|pRuthivyAm|śrayatAm|vaiśvadEvAgnimArutE iti# vaiśvadEva-agnimArutE|ukthE iti|avya̍thayantI̍ iti|staBnItAm|śAkvararaivatE̍ iti# śAkvara - raivatE|sAmanI̍ iti|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|antarikṣAya|Ruṣa̍yaḥ|tvA|prathamajA̍ iti# prathama - jAḥ|dEvEṣu|divaḥ|mAtra̍yA|variṇA|prathantu|vidhartEti̍# vi - dhartA|ca|ayam|adhipatirityadhi̍-patiḥ|ca|tE|tvA|sarvE̱|saM~MvidAnA̍ iti# saM - vidAnAḥ|nAkasya|pRuṣṭhE|suvarga̍ iti# suvaḥ - gE|lOkE|yajamAnam|ca|sAdayantu||6̍ (40) (pratIcI di~g - marutastE̍ dEvA adhipataya̍ - ścatvAriṃqśacca)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: bRuhaspatiṛhEtInAM̍ pratidhartA̍ triṇavatrayastriṃqśau̍ tvA stOmau# pRuthivyAṅ śrayatAM̍ ~MvaiśvadEvAgnimArutE ukthE avyathayantI̍ staBnItAṃ śAkvararaivatE sAmanI̍ pratiṣṭhityA̍ antarikṣAyaṛṣa̍yastvA̍ prathamajA dEvEṣu# divO mAtrayA̍ variṇA prathantu̍ vidhartA cAyamadhipatiśca̍ tE tvA sarvE# saM~MvidAnA nAkasya̍ pRuṣṭhE suvargE̍ lOkE yajamAnaM̍ ca sAdayantu||6 (pratIcI di~g - marutastE̍ dEvA adhipataya̍ - ścatvAriṃqśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam ayam|puraḥ|harikEśa̍ iti hari# - kEśaḥ|sUryaraśmiriti̍ sUrya# - raśmiḥ|tasya|rathagRuthsa̍ iti# ratha - gRuthsaḥ|ca|rathaujA̍ iti ratha# - OjAḥ|ca|sEnAnigrAmaṇyAviti̍# sEnAni - grAmaṇyau̱|pu~jjikasthalEti# pu~jjika - sthalA|ca|kRutasthalEti# kRuta - sthalA|ca|aPsarasau̱|yAtudhAnA iti# yAtu - dhAnA̱ḥ|hEtiḥ|rakṣAṃsi|prahE̍tiriti̍ pra-hEtiḥ|ayam|dakṣiṇA|viśvakarmEti# viśva - karmA|tasya|rathasvana̍ iti# ratha - svanaḥ|ca|rathEcitra̍ iti rathE̱ - citraḥ|ca|sEnAnigrAmaṇyAviti̍# sEnAni - grAmaṇyau̱|mEnakA|ca|sahajanyEti# saha - janyA|ca|aPsarasau̱|da~gṇavaḥ|paśava̍ḥ|hEtiḥ|pauru̍ṣEyaḥ|vadhaḥ|prahE̍tiriti̍ pra - hEtiḥ|ayam|paścAt|viśvavyacA̍ iti# viśva - vyacAḥ|tasya|ratha̍prOta̍ iti ratha-prOtaḥ|ca|asa̍maratha̍ ityasama̍ - rathaḥ|ca|sEnAnigrAmaṇyAviti̍# sEnAni - grAmaṇyau̱|pramlOcantIti# pra - mlOcantI|ca|7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ayaM purO harikEśaḥ̍ sUryaraśmistasya̍# rathagRuthsaśca rathaujAśca̍ sEnAni grAmaṇyau# pu~jjikasthalA ca# kRutasthalA cA̱Psarasau# yAtudhAnA# hEtI rakṣAṃsi̍ prahEti̍ rayaM dakṣiṇA̍ viśva karmA̍ tasya# rathasvanaśca rathEcitraśca̍ sEnAni grAmaṇyau# mEnakA ca# sahajanyA cA̱Psarasau# da~gṇavaḥ̍ paśavO# hEtiḥ pauruṣEyO̍ vadhaḥ prahEti̍ rayaM paścAd viśvavyacA̍ stasya ratha# prOtaścA-samarathaśca̍ sEnAni grAmaṇyau̱ pramlOcantI̍ cA -[ ] 7

verses.padam: - Padam anumlOcantItyanu̍ - mlOcantI|ca|aPsarasau̱|sarpAḥ|hEtiḥ|vyAGrAḥ|prahE̍tiriti̍ pra - hEtiḥ|ayam|uttarAdityut-tarAt|saMq~Myadva̍suriti̍# saM~Myat - vasuḥ|tasya|sEnajiditi̍# sEna-jit|ca|suṣEṇa iti# su - sEnaḥ|ca|sEnAnigrAmaṇyA̍viti̍# sEnAni - grAmaṇyau̱|viśvAcI̱|ca|GRutAcI̱|ca|aPsarasau̱|Apaḥ|hEti|vAta̍ḥ|prahE̍tiriti̍ pra - hEtiḥ|ayam|upari|arvAgva̍surityarvAk̍ - vasuḥ|tasya|tArkṣya̍ḥ|ca|ari̍ṣṭanEmirityari̍ṣṭa̍ - nEmiḥ|ca|sEnAnigrAmaṇyAviti̍# sEnAni - grAmaṇyau̱|urvaśI̱|ca|pUrvacittiriti̍# pUrva - cittiḥ|ca|aPsarasau̱|vidyuditi# vit - yut|hEtiḥ|avasPUrjannityava̍ - sPUrjann|prahE̍tiriti̍ pra - hEtiḥ|tEByaḥ|nama̍ḥ|tE|naḥ|mRuḍayantu|tE|yam|8̍ (50)
verses.samhita: numlOcantI-cAPsarasau̍# sarpA hEti rvyAGrAḥ prahEti̍ raya muttarAth̍ saMya~Md- vasustasya̍# sEnajicca# suṣEṇaśca̍ sEnAni grAmaṇyau# viśvAcI# ca GRutAcI# cAPsarasA vApO# hEti rvAtaḥ prahEti̍ rayamuparya rvAgva-sustasya̍ tArkṣya-ścAriṣṭa-nEmiśca̍ sEnAni grAmaṇyA# vurvaśI# ca pUrvacittiścA-Psarasau̍# vidyuddhEtira-vasPUrjan̍ prahEti̍ stEByO namastE nO# mRuḍayantu tE yaM - [ ] 8

verses.padam: - Padam dviṣmaḥ|yaḥ|ca|naḥ|dvEṣṭi|tam|vaḥ|jaMBE̱|dadhAmi|AyOḥ|tvA|sada̍nE|sAdayAmi|ava̍taḥ|CAyAyA̱m|nama̍ḥ|samudrAya̍|nama̍ḥ|samudrasya̍|cakṣa̍sE|paramEṣṭhI|tvA|sAdayatu|divaḥ|pRuṣṭhE|vyaca̍svatIm|pratha̍svatIm|viBUma̍tImiti̍# vi - BUmatIm|praBUma̍tImiti̍# pra - BUmatIm|pariBUma̍tImiti̍# pari - BUmatIm|diva̱m|yacCa|diva̱m|dRuṃqha|diva̱m|mA|hiṃqsIḥ|viśva̍smai|prAṇAyEti̍# pra - anAya|apAnAyEtya̍pa̍ - anAya|vyAnAyEti̍# vi - anAya|udAnAyEtyu̍t̍ - anAya|pratiṣṭhAyA̍ iti# prati - sthAyai̱|caritrAya|sUrya̍ḥ|tvA|aBIti̍|pAtu|mahyA|svastyA̍ ( )|CardiṣA̱|śantamEnEti̍ śaM - tamEna|tayA̱|dEvatayA|a~ggirasvat|dhruvA|sIda||prOtha̍t|aśva̍ḥ|na|yava̍sE|aviṣyann|yadA|mahaḥ|saM~Mvara̍ṇAditi̍# saM - varaṇAt|vyasthAditi̍# vi - asthA̱t||At|asya|vAtaḥ|anviti̍|vAti|śOciḥ|adha̍|sma|tE|vraja̍nam|kRuṣṇam|asti||9̍ (78) (pramlOcantI̍ ca - yaṅ - svastyA - &ṣṭAviṃśatiśca)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: dviṣmO yaśca# nO dvEṣṭi taM ~MvO jaMBE# dadhAmyAyOstvA sadanE̍ sAdayAmyavata̍ śCAyAyAM namaḥ̍ samudrAya namaḥ̍ samudrasya cakṣasE̍ paramEṣṭhI tvA# sAdayatu divaḥ pRuṣṭhE vyacasvatIM̍ prathasvatIM̍ ~MviBUmatIM̍ praBUmatIM̍ pariBUmatIM̍ divaM̍ ~MyacCa divaM̍ dRuṃha divaM mA hiṃsIrviśva̍smai̍ prAṇAyApAnAya̍# vyAnAyOdAnAya̍# pratiṣṭhAyai# caritrAya̍ sUryastvA&Bi̍ pAtu̍ mahyA svastyA ( ) CardiṣA śantamEna̍ tayA# dEvatayA&~ggirasvad-dhruvA̍ sIda||prOthadaśvO̍ na yavasE̍ aviṣyan. yadA mahaḥ sa~MvaraṇAd̍ vyasthA̱t|Adasya̍ vAtO anu# vAti śOciradha# sma tE vrajanaM̍ kRuṣṇamasti||9̍ (pramlOcantI̍ ca - yaṅ - svastyA - &ṣṭAviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam agniḥ|mUd^^rdhA|divaḥ|kakut|patiḥ|pRuthivyAḥ|ayam||apAm|rEtAṃ̍si|jinvati||tvAm|agnE|puṣka̍rAt|adhIti̍|atha̍rvA|niriti̍|amanthata||mUd^^rdhnaḥ|viśva̍sya|vAGata̍ḥ||ayam|agniḥ|sahasriṇa̍ḥ|vAja̍sya|śatina̍ḥ|pati̍ḥ||mUd^^rdhA|kaviḥ|rayIṇAm||Buva̍ḥ|yajñasya̍|raja̍saḥ|ca|nEtA|yatra̍|niyudBiriti̍# niyut - Biḥ|sacasE|śivABi̍ḥ||divi|mUd^^rdhAna̱m|dadhiṣE|suvarq.ṣAmiti̍# suvaḥ - sAm|jihvAm|agnE|cakRuṣE|havyavAhamiti# havya - vAha̱m||abAdhi|agniḥ|samidhEti̍# sam - idhA̱|janAnAm|10̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agnirmUrddhA divaḥ kakut patiḥ̍ pRuthivyA ayaM|apAṃ rEtAṃsi̍ jinvati||tvAmagnE̍ puṣkarAdaddhyatha̍rvA̍ niramanthata|mUrddhnO̍ viśvasya̍ vAGataḥ||ayamagniḥ̍ sahasriṇO̍ vAjasya̍ śatinaspatiḥ|mUrddhA̍ kavI rayIṇAM||BuvO̍# yajñasya rajasaśca̍ nEtA yatrA# niyudBiḥ sacasE̍ śivABiḥ|divi̍ mUrddhAnaM̍ dadhiṣE suvarq.ṣAM jihvAmagnE̍ cakRuṣE havyavAha̱M||abO̱ddhyagniḥ samidhA janAnAM̍ - [ ] 10

verses.padam: - Padam pratIti|dhEnum|iva|AyatImityA̱̍ - yatIm|uṣAsa̱m||yahvAḥ|iva|prEti|vayAm|ujjihA̍nA̍ ityut̍ - jihAnAḥ|prEti̍|BAnava̍ḥ|sisratE|nAka̱m|acCa̍||avO̍cAma|kavayE̱|mEddhyA̍ya|vaca̍ḥ|vandAru̍|vRuṣaBAya̍|vRuṣṇE̱||gavi̍ṣṭhiraḥ|nama̍sA|stOma̱m|agnau|divi|iva|rukmam|urvya~jca̱m|aśrEt||jana̍sya|gOpA̍ iti# gO - pAḥ|ajaniṣṭa|jAgRuviḥ|agniḥ|sudakṣa̍ iti# su - dakṣaḥ|suvitAya̍|navya̍sE||GRutapra̍tIka̍ iti# GRuta - pratIkaḥ|bRuhatA|divispRuśEti# divi - spRuśA̱|dyumaditi# dyu - mat|vIti|BAti|BaratEBya̍ḥ|śuci̍ḥ||tvAm|agnE|a~ggi̍rasaḥ|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prati# dhEnumivA̍ yatImuṣAsa̱M|yahvA iva̍ pravayA mujjihAnAḥ̍ pra BAnavaḥ̍ sisratE nAkamacCa||avO̍cAma̍ kavayE mEddhyAya̍ vacO# vandAru# vRuṣaBAya vRuṣṇE̱|gaviṣṭhirO̍ namasA̍ stOmamagnau̍ divIva# rukmamurvya~jcamaśrEt||jana̍sya̍ gOpA ajaniṣṭa̍ jAgRuviragniḥ̍ sudakṣaḥ̍ suvitAya navyasE|GRutapra̍tIkO̍ bRuhatA divispRuśA̱̍ dyumadvi BAti̍ BaratEByaḥ śuciḥ||tvAma̍gnE̍ a~ggirasO̍ - [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam guhA̱|hitam|anviti|avindann|śiśriyAṇam|vanE̍vana̍ iti vanE̱ - vanE||saḥ|jAyasE|mathyamAnaḥ|saha̍ḥ|mahat|tvAm|Ahuḥ|saha̍saḥ|putram|a~ggiraḥ||yajñasya̍|kEtum|prathamam|purOhi̍tamiti̍# puraḥ - hitam|agnim|naraḥ|triṣadhastha̍ iti# tri - sadhasthE|samiti|indhatE||indrE̍ṇa|dEvaiḥ|sarathamiti̍# sa - ratha̱m|saḥ|barqḥiṣi|sIda̍t|nIti̍|hOtA̱|yajathA̍ya|sukraturiti̍# su - kratuḥ||tvAm|citraśravastamEti̍# citraśravaḥ-tama|havantE|vikṣu|jantava̍ḥ||śOciṣkE̍śamiti̍# śOciḥ - kEśam|purupriyEti# puru - priya|agnE̱|havyAya|vOḍha̍vE||saKA̍yaḥ|samiti̍|vaḥ|samya~jca̱m|iṣa̱m|12̍ (50)
verses.samhita: guhA# hitamanva-vinda~jCiśriyAṇaM̍ ~MvanEvanE|sa̍ jAyasE̍ mathyamAnaḥ̍ sahO# mahat tvAmAhuḥ̍ sahasasputrama̍~ggiraḥ||yajñasya̍# kEtuM prathamaM̍ purOhitamagniM̍ narastriṣadhasthE̍ samindhatE|indrE̍ṇa̍ dEvaiḥ sarathaṃq sa barqḥiṣi sIdanni hOtA# yajathAya̍ sukratuḥ||tvAM̍ citraśravastama̍ havantE̍ vikṣu jantavaḥ|śOciṣkE̍śaM̍ purupriyAgnE# havyAya vOḍhavE||saKA̍yaḥ̍ saM~Mvaḥ̍ samya~jcamiṣaṅq - [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam stOma̱m|ca|agnayE̱||vaṛṣiṣṭhAya|kṣitInAm|Urjaḥ|naptrE̱|saha̍svatE||saṃsamiti̍ sam - sam|it|yuvasE|vRuṣann|agnE̱|viśvAni|aryaḥ|A||iḍaḥ|padE|samiti̍|iddhyasE|saḥ|naḥ|vasU̍ni|Eti̍|Bara||EnA|vaḥ|agnim|nama̍sA|Urjaḥ|napA̍tam|Eti̍|huvE||priyam|cEti̍ṣṭham|aratim|svaddhvaramiti̍# su - addhvaram|viśvasya|dUtam|amRuta̱m||saḥ|yOjatE|aruṣaḥ|viśvaBO̍jasEti̍# viśva - BOjasA|saḥ|dudravat|svAhuta̍ iti su - Ahutaḥ||subrahmEti# su - brahmA̱|yajñaḥ|suśamIti# su - śamI̱|13 (50)
verses.samhita: stOmaM̍ cAgnayE̱|vaṛṣiṣṭhAya̍ kṣitInAmUrjO naptrE sahasvatE||saṃsamidyu̍vasE̍ vRuṣannagnE viśvA̱nyarya A|iḍaspadE samiddhyasE̍ sa nO vasUnyA Bara||EnA̍ vO# agniM namasOrjO̍ napAtamA̍ huvE|priyaM̍ cEtiṣṭhamaratiṅ̍ svaddhvaraM̍ ~Mviśvasya̍ dUtamamRuta̱M||sa yOjatE̍ aruṣO viśvaBOjasA̍ sa dudravath̍ svAhutaḥ|subrahmA̍# yajñaḥ suśamI - [ ] 13

verses.padam: - Padam vasUnAm|dEvam|rAdha̍ḥ|janA̍nAm||uditi̍|asya|śOciḥ|asthAt|AjuhvA̍nasyEtyA̱̍ - juhvAnasya|mIḍhuṣa̍ḥ||uditi̍|dhUmAsa̍ḥ|aruṣAsa̍ḥ|divispRuśa̍ iti# divi - spRuśaḥ|samiti̍|agnim|indhatE|nara̍ḥ||agnE̱|vAja̍sya|gOma̍ta̍ iti gO-mataḥ|IśAnaḥ|sahasaḥ|yahO̍ iti||asmE̍ iti|dhEhi|jAtavEda̍ iti# jAta - vEdaḥ|mahi|śrava̍ḥ||saḥ|idhAnaḥ|vasu̍ḥ|kaviḥ|agniḥ|IḍEnya̍ḥ|girA||rEvat|asmaByamityasma̍ - Byam|purvaṇIkEti# puru-anIka|dIdihi||kṣapaḥ|rAjann|uta|tmanA̱|agnE̱|vastO̱ḥ|uta|uṣasaḥ||saḥ|tigmajaBEMti̍# tigma - jaBaMq|14 (50)
verses.samhita: vasUnAM̍ dEvaṃ rAdhO janAnAM||uda̍sya̍ śOcirasthAdA-juhvA̍nasya̍ mIḍhuṣaḥ|uddhamAsO̍# aruṣAsO# divispRuśaḥ samagnimindhatE̍ naraḥ||agnE̍ vAjasya̍ gOmata̍ IśAnaḥ̍ sahasO yahO|asmE dhEhi̍ jAtavEdO mahi śravaḥ||sa̍ idhAnO̍ vasuṣkavi-ragnirIḍEnyO̍# girA|rEvadasmaByaM̍ purvaṇIka dIdihi||kṣapO rAjannuta̍ tmanA&gnE vastOrutOṣasa̍ḥ|sa̍ tigmajaMBa̍ - [ ] 14

verses.padam: - Padam rakṣasaḥ|daha|prati̍||Eti̍|tE|agnE|idhImahi|dyumantamiti̍# dyu - manta̱m|dEva|ajara̱m||yat|ha|syA|tE|panIyasI|samiditi̍# saM - it|dIdayati|dyavi̍|iṣa̱m|stOtRuBya̍ iti# stOtRu - Byaḥ|Eti|Bara||Eti̍|tE|agnE|RucA|haviḥ|śukrasya̍|jyOtiṣaḥ|patE||suścandrEti̍ su-candra|dasma|viśpa̍tE|havya̍vAḍiti̍ havya# - vAṭ|tuBya̱m|hUyatE|iṣa̱m|stOtRuBya iti# stOtRu - Byaḥ|Eti|Bara||uBE̍ iti|suścandrEti̍# su - candra|sarpiṣaḥ|darvI̍ iti|śrIṇIṣE|Asani̍||utO̍ iti|naḥ|uditi̍|pupUryAḥ|15̍ (50)
verses.samhita: rakṣasO# daha prati||A̍ tE# agna idhImahi dyumantaM̍ dEvAjara̱M|yaddha syA tE panIyasI̍ samid-dIdayati̍ dyavIṣaṅ# stOtRuBya A Bara||A̍ tE# agna RucA haviḥ śukrasya# jyOtiṣaspatE|suścandra̍ dasma viśpatE̍ havyavAṭ̍ tuByaṃ# hUyata iṣaṅ# stOtRuBya A Bara||uBE̍ suścandra̍ sarpiṣO darvI̱ śrIṇIṣa Asani|utO̍ na ut pupUryA-̍ [ ] 15

verses.padam: - Padam ukthEṣu|śavasaḥ|patE|iṣa̱m|stOtRuBya̍ iti# stOtRu - Byaḥ|Eti|Bara||agnE̱|tam|adya|aśva̱m|na|stOmai̱ḥ|kratu̱m|na|Badram|hRudispRuśamiti̍# hRudi - spRuśa̱m||RuddhyAma|tE|Ohai̱ḥ||adha̍|hi|agnE|kratO̱ḥ|Badrasya̍|dakṣa̍sya|sAdhOḥ||rathIḥ|Rutasya̍|bRuhataḥ|baBUtha̍||ABiḥ|tE|adya|gIrBiḥ|gRuṇanta̍ḥ|agnE̱|dAśE̍ma||prEti̍|tE|divaḥ|na|stanayanti|śuṣmA̱ḥ||EBiḥ|naḥ|arkaiḥ|Bava̍|naḥ|arvA~g|16̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ukthEṣu# śavasaspata iṣaṅ# stOtRuBya A Bara||agnE̍ tamadyAśvaM na stOmaiḥ kratuM na Badraṃ hRudispRuśa̱M|RuddhyAmA̍# ta Ohai̱ḥ||adhA hyagnE̍ kratO̱rBadrasya dakṣasya̍ sAdhOḥ|rathIṛRutasya# bRuhatO baBUtha||ABiṣṭE̍# adya gIrBirgRuṇantO&gnE dAśEma|pra̍ tE# divO na stanayanti̍ śuṣmA̱ḥ||EBirnO# arkairBavA# nO arvA~gK - [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam suvaḥ|na|jyOti̍ḥ||agnE̱|viśvE̍Biḥ|sumanA̍ iti# su - manA̱ḥ|anIkaiḥ||agnim|hOtA̍ram|manyE|dAsva̍ntam|vasO̱ḥ|sUnum|saha̍saḥ|jAtavE̍dasamiti̍# jAta - vEdasam||vipra̱m|na|jAtavEdasamiti̍# jAta - vEdasam||yaḥ|Ud^^rdhvayA̱|svaddhvara iti# su - addhvaraḥ|dEvaḥ|dEvAcyA̱|kRupA||GRutasya|viBrA̱ṣṭimiti̍ vi - BrAṣṭim|anviti|śukraśO̍ciṣa̍ iti# śukra - śOciṣaḥ|AjuhvAnasyEtyA̱̍ - juhvAnasya|sarpiṣa̍ḥ||agnE̱|tvam|naḥ|anta̍maḥ||uta|trAtA|śivaḥ|Bava|varUthya̍ḥ||tam|tvA|śOciṣṭha|dIdivaḥ||sumnAya̍|nUnam|ImahE|saKi̍Bya̍ iti saKi# - Byaḥ||vasuḥ|agniḥ|vasu̍śravA̍ iti vasu# - śravAḥ ( )||acCa|nakṣi|dyumatta̍ma̍ iti# dyumat - tamaḥ|rayim|dAḥ||17 (55) (janAnA̍ - ma~ggirasa̍ - iṣaṃ# - suśamI# - tigmajaMBa - pupUryA - arvA~g - vasuśravAḥ̍ - pa~jca# ca) (A4)
verses.samhita: suvarna jyOtiḥ|agnE̍ viśvEBiḥ̍ sumanA anIkaiḥ||agniṃ̍ hOtAraM̍ manyE dAsvantaM̍ ~MvasO̱ḥ sUnuṃ sahasO̍ jAtavEdasaM|vipraM̍ na jAtavEdasaM|ya̍ UrddhvayA̱ svaddhvarO dEvO dEvAcyA# kRupA|GRutasya viBrA̱ṣṭimanu# śukraśOciṣa̍ AjuhvAnasya̍ sarpiṣaḥ||agnE̍ tvaM nO antamaḥ|uta̍ trAtA śivO Bava̍ varUthyaḥ||taM̍ tvA# śOciṣṭha dIdivaḥ|sumnAya# nUnamImahE̍ saKiByaḥ||vasu̍ragnirvasu̍śravAḥ̍ ( )|acCA# nakṣi dyumattamO̍ rayiM dA̱ḥ||17

verses.padam: - Padam indrAgniByAmitI̱ndrAgni - ByAm|tvA|sayujEti# sa - yujA̱|yujA|yunajmi|AGArAByAmityA̱-GArAByA̱m|tEjasA|varca̍sA|ukthEBi̍ḥ|stOmE̍Biḥ|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|rayyai|pOṣAya|sajAtAnAmiti̍# sa-jAtAnA̱m|maddhyamasthEyAyEti# maddhyama-sthEyAya|mayA̱|tvA|sayujEti̍# sa-yujA̱|yujA|yunajmi|abAM|dulA|nitatniriti# ni - tatniḥ|aBrayantI|mEGaya̍ntI|varq.ṣaya̍ntI|cupuṇIkA̱|nAma̍|asi|prajApa̍tinEti̍# prajA - patinA|tvA|viśvABiḥ|dhIBiḥ|upEti̍|dadhAmi|pRuthivI|udapuramityu̍da̍ - puram|annEna|viṣṭA|manuṣyA̱ḥ|tE|gOptAra̍ḥ|agniḥ|viya̍tta̍ iti# vi - yattaḥ|asyAm|tAm|aham|prEti|padyE|sA|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: indrAgniByA̱M tvA sayujA# yujA yunajmyA̍ GArAByAM tEjasA̍ varcasO̍ kthEBiḥ stOmEBi̍ śCandOBI̍ rayyai pOṣAya̍ sajAtAnA̱M maddhyamasthEyAya̍ mayA̱ tvA sayujA# yujA yunajmyabAM̍ dulA nitatni̍ raBrayantI̍ mEGayantI̍ varq.ṣayantI̍ cupuṇIkA nAmAsi̍ prajApatinA̍ tvA viśvABirddhIBirupa̍# dadhAmi pRuthivyudapuramannE̍na̍ viṣṭA manuṣyA̱stE̍ gOptArO &gnirviyattO&syAM̍ tAmahaM pra# padyE sA - [ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam mE|śarma|ca|varma̍|ca|astu|adhi̍dyaurityadhi̍# - dyauḥ|antarikṣam|brahma̍ṇA|viṣṭA|maruta̍ḥ|tE|gOptAra̍ḥ|vAyuḥ|viya̍tta̍ iti vi - yattaḥ|asyAm|tAm|aham|prEti|padyE|sA|mE|śarma̍|ca|varma̍|ca|astu|dyauḥ|apa̍rAjitEtyapa̍rA̍ - jitA|amRutEna|viṣṭA|AdityAḥ|tE|gOptAra̍ḥ|sUrya̍ḥ|viya̍tta̍ iti vi-yattaḥ|asyAm|tAm|aham|prEti|padyE|sA|mE|śarma̍|ca|varma̍|ca|astu||19̍ (48) (sA - &ṣṭAcatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A5)
verses.samhita: mE śarma# ca varma# cAstvadhi# dyaurantarikṣaM̍ brahmaṇA̍ viṣṭA marutastE̍ gOptArO# vAyurviyattO&syAM̍ tAmahaM pra padyE̍ sA mE śarma# ca varma# cAstu dyauraparAjitA&mRutE̍na̍ viṣṭA&&dityAstE# gOptAraḥ sUryO viyattO&syAM̍ tAmahaM pra padyE̍ sA mE śarma# ca varma# cAstu||19 (sA - &ṣṭAcatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam bRuhaspatiḥ|tvA|sAdayatu|pRuthivyAḥ|pRuṣṭhE|jyOti̍ṣmatIm|viśva̍smai|prAṇAyEti̍# pra-anAya|apAnAyEtya̍pa̍ - anAya|viśva̱m|jyOti̍ḥ|yacCa|agniḥ|tE|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|viśvakarmEti# viśva - karmA|tvA|sAdayatu|antarikṣasya|pRuṣṭhE|jyOti̍ṣmatIm|viśva̍smai|prAṇAyEti̍# pra - anAya|apAnAyEtya̍pa̍ - anAya|viśva̱m|jyOti̍ḥ|yacCa|vAyuḥ|tE|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|tvA|sAdayatu|divaḥ|pRuṣṭhE|jyOtiṣmatIm|viśva̍smai|prAṇAyEti̍# pra - anAya|apAnAyEtya̍pa̍ - anAya|viśva̱m|jyOti̍ḥ|yacCa|paramEṣṭhI|tE|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|purOvAtasaniriti# purOvAta - saniḥ|asya|aBrasaniritya̍Bra̍ - saniḥ|asi|vidyuthsaniriti̍# vidyut - saniḥ|20̍ (50)
verses.samhita: bRuhaspatistvA̍ sAdayatu pRuthivyAḥ pRuṣṭhE jyOtiṣmatIM̍ ~Mviśvasmai̍ prAṇAyApAnAya̍ viśvaM jyOtiryacCA-̍ gnistE&dhipati̍ rviśvakarmA̍ tvA sAdayatvantarikṣasya̍ pRuṣṭhE jyOtiṣmatIM̍ ~Mviśvasmai̍ prAṇAyApAnAya̍ viśvaM jyOtiryacCa̍ vAyustE&dhipatiḥ̍ prajApatistvA̍ sAdayatu divaḥ pRuṣṭhE jyOtiṣmatIM̍ ~Mviśvasmai̍ prAṇAyApAnAya̍ viśvaM jyOtiryacCa̍ paramEṣṭhI tE&dhipatiḥ̍ purOvAtasanirasya̍ Brasanirasi̍ vidyuthsani# - [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam asi|stanayitnusaniriti# stanayitnu - saniḥ|asi|vRuṣṭisaniriti̍# vRuṣṭi - saniḥ|asi|agnEḥ|yAnI̱|asi|dEvAnA̱m|agnEyAnItya̍gnE-yAnI̱|asi|vAyOḥ|yAnI̱|asi|dEvAnA̱m|vAyOyAnIti̍# vAyO - yAnI̱|asi|antarikṣasya|yAnI̱|asi|dEvAnA̱m|antarikṣayAnItya̍ntarikṣa̍ - yAnI̱|asi|antarikṣam|asi|antari̍kṣAya|tvA|salilAya̍|tvA|sarṇI̍kAya|tvA|satI̍kAyEti̍ sa - tIkAya|tvA|kEtAya|tvA|pracE̍tasa̍ iti pra - cEtasE|tvA|vivasvatE|tvA|divaḥ|tvA|jyOti̍ṣE|AdityEBya̍ḥ|tvA|RucE|tvA|rucE|tvA|dyutE|tvA̍ ( )|BAsE|tvA|jyOtiṣE|tvA|yaśOdAmiti̍# yaśaḥ-dAm|tvA|yaśasi|tEjOdAmiti̍# tEjaḥ - dAm|tvA|tEjasi|payOdAmiti̍# payaḥ - dAm|tvA|payasi|varcOdAmiti̍# varcaḥ-dAm|tvA|varcasi|draviṇOdAmiti̍# draviṇaḥ - dAm|tvA|draviṇE|sAdayAmi|tEna̍|Ruṣi̍ṇA|tEna̍|brahma̍ṇA|tayA̱|dEvata̍yA|a~ggirasvat|dhruvA|sIda||21̍ (79) (vidyuthsani# - rdyutE tvai - kAnna triṃqśacca)̍ (A6)
verses.samhita: -rasi stanayitnusanirasi̍ vRuṣṭisanirasya-gnEryAnya̍si̍ dEvAnAmagnE̍ yAnyasi̍ vAyOryAnyasi̍ dEvAnA̱M ~MvAyOyAnyasyantari̍kṣasya̍ yAnyasi̍ dEvAnA-̍ mantarikṣayAnyasya-ntari̍kṣamasyantari̍kṣAya̍ tvA salilAya# tvA sarṇIkAya̍ tvA satIkAya̍ tvA kEtAya̍ tvA pracEtasE̍ tvA vivasvatE̍ tvA divastvA jyOtiṣa̍ AdityEByastvarcE̍ tvA# rucE tvA̱ dyutE tvA# ( ) BAsE tvA jyOtiṣE̍ tvA yaśOdAM tvA yaśasi̍ tEjOdAM tvA tEjasi̍ payOdAM tvA payasi̍ varcOdAM tvA varcasi̍ draviṇOdAM tvA draviṇE̍ sAdayAmi tEnaṛṣiṇA̍ tEna brahmaṇA̍ tayA# dEvatayA&~ggirasvad̍ dhruvA sIda||21̍ (vidyuthsani# - rdyutE tvai - kAnna triṃqśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam BUyaskRuditi# BUyaḥ - kRut|asi|varivaskRuditi# varivaḥ - kRut|asi|prAcI̱|asi|Ud^^rdhvA|asi|antarikṣasadityantarikṣa̍ - sat|asi|antarikṣE|sIda|aPsuṣaditya̍Psu̍ - sat|asi|śyEnasaditi# śyEna-sat|asi|gRuddhrasaditi# gRuddhra-sat|asi|suparṇasaditi# suparṇa - sat|asi|nAkasaditi# nAka - sat|asi|pRuthivyAḥ|tvA|draviṇE|sAdayAmi|antari̍kṣasya|tvA|dravi̍ṇE|sAdayAmi|divaḥ|tvA|dravi̍ṇE|sAdayAmi|diśAm|tvA|dravi̍ṇE|sAdayAmi|draviṇOdAmiti̍# draviṇaḥ - dAm|tvA|draviṇE|sAdayAmi|prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|mE|pAhi|ApAnamityapa̍ - anam|mE|pAhi|vyAnamiti# vi - anam|mE|22 (50)
verses.samhita: BUyaskRudasi̍ varivaskRudasi̍ prAcyasyUrddhvA&sya̍-ntarikṣasada̍sya-ntari̍kṣE̍ sIdA-Psuṣadasi̍ śyEnasadasi̍ gRuddhrasadasi̍ suparṇasadasi̍ nAkasadasi̍ pRuthivyAstvA draviṇE̍ sAdayAmya-ntarikṣasya̍ tvA draviṇE̍ sAdayAmi divastvA draviṇE̍ sAdayAmi diśAM tvA draviṇE̍ sAdayAmi draviṇOdAM tvA draviṇE̍ sAdayAmi prAṇaM mE# pAhya-pAnaM mE# pAhi vyAnaM mE# - [ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam pAhi|Ayuḥ|mE|pAhi|viśvAyuriti̍# viśva-Ayuḥ|mE|pAhi|sarvAyuriti# sarva - Ayuḥ|mE|pAhi|agnE̱|yat|tE|para̱m|hRut|nAma|tau|Eti̍|ihi|samiti̍|raBAvahai|pA~jca̍janyEṣviti̍ pA~jca# - janyEṣu|apIti|Edhi|agnE|yAvA̱ḥ|ayA̍vAḥ|EvA̱ḥ|UmA̱ḥ|sabda̍ḥ|saga̍raḥ|sumEka̍ iti# su - mEkaḥ||23̍ (32) (vyAnaM mE-dvAtriṃśacca)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: pAhyAyurmE̍ pAhi viśvAyurmE̍ pAhi sarvAyurmE̍ pAhyagnE yat tE paraṃq hRunnAma tAvEhi saṃ raBAvahai̍ pA~jca# janyEṣva-pyE̱ddhyagnE yAvA ayAvA̍ EvA UmAḥ sabdaḥ sagaraḥ̍ sumEkaḥ||23̍ (vyAnaM mE-dvAtriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam agninA̱|viśvAṣAṭ|sUryEṇa|svarAḍiti̍# sva - rAṭ|kratvA̱|śacIpatiḥ|RuṣaBEṇa̍|tvaṣṭA̱|yajñEna̍|maGavAniti̍# maGa-vAn|dakṣiṇayA|suvarga̍ iti# suvaḥ - gaḥ|manyunA̱|vRutrahEti# vRutra - hA|sauhA̱rdyEna|tanUdhA iti# tanU - dhAḥ|annEna|gaya̍ḥ|pRuthivyA|asanOt|RugBirityRu̍k̍ - Biḥ|annAda ityanna̍ - adaḥ|vaṣaṭkArEṇEti# vaṣaṭ - kArEṇa|Ruddhaḥ|sAmnA̱|tanUpA̍ iti# tanU - pAḥ|virAjEti# vi - rAjA̱|jyOtiṣmAn|brahma̍ṇA|sOmapA̍ iti# sOma - pAḥ|gOBiḥ|yajñam|dAdhAra|kṣatrEṇa̍|manuṣyAn̍|aśvE̍na|ca|rathE̍na|ca|vajrI|RutuBirityRutu̍ - Biḥ|praBuriti# pra - Buḥ|saM~MvathsarEṇEti# saM - vathsarEṇa|pariBUriti̍# pari - BUḥ|tapasA|anA̍dhRuṣṭa̍ ityanA̱ - dhRuṣṭaḥ|sUryaḥ|sann|tanUBi̍ḥ||24̍ (49)
