verses.padam: - Padam jaGAsa|sarvA̱|tA|tE|apIti̍|dEvEṣu̍|astu||mA|tvA|agniḥ|dhvanayit|dhUmaga̍ndhiriti̍# dhUma - gandhiḥ|mA|uKA|BrAjanti|aBIti̍|vikta|jaGri̍ḥ||iṣṭam|vItam|aBigU̱rtamityaBi̍ - gUrtam|vaṣaṭkRutamiti̍ vaṣaṭ̍ - kRutam|tam|dEvAsaḥ|pratIti̍|gRuBṇanti|aśva̱m||yat|aśvA̍ya|vAsa̍ḥ|upastRuṇantItyu̍pa̍ - stRuṇanti|adhIvAsamitya̍dhi̍ - vAsam|yA|hiraṇyAni|asmai||sandAnamiti̍# saM - dAna̱m|arvantam|paḍbI̍śam|priyA|dEvEṣu̍|Eti̍|yAmayanti||yat|tE|sAdE|maha̍sA|śUkRu̍tasyEti̍ śU - kRutasya|pArṣṇiyA|vA|kaśa̍yA|44̍ (50)
verses.samhita: jaGAsa sarvA tA tE api# dEvEṣvastu||mA̍ tvA&gni-rddhvanayid-dhUmaga̍ndhirmOKA̍ BrAjantyaBi̍ vikta̍ jaGriḥ|iṣṭaM̍ ~MvItamaBigU̱rtaM ~MvaṣaṭkRutaM̍ taM dEvAsaḥ prati# gRuBṇantyaśva̱M||yadaśvAya̍ vAsa# upastRuṇantyadhIvAsaM̍ ~MyA hiraṇyAnyasmai|sandAnamarva̍ntaM̍ paḍbIśaM̍ priyA dEvEṣvA yAmayanti||yat̍ tE# sAdE mahasA̍ śUkRutasya̍ pArṣṇiyA̍ vA kaśayA̍ - [ ] 44

verses.padam: - Padam vA|tutOda||srucA|iva|tA|haviṣa̍ḥ|addhvarEṣu̍|sarvA̱|tA|tE|brahma̍ṇA|sUdayAmi||catu̍striṃśaditi̍ catuḥ̍ - triṃqśat|vAjinaḥ|dEvaba̍ndhOriti̍# dEva - bandhOḥ|va~gkrI̱ḥ|aśvasya|svadhi̍tiriti̍ sva - dhitiḥ|samiti|Eti||acCi̍drA|gAtrA̱|vayunA̱|kRuṇOta|paru̍ṣparuriti̍ paruḥ̍ - paruḥ|anuGuṣyEtyanu-Guṣya̍|vIti̍|śasta||Eka̍ḥ|tvaṣṭu̍ḥ|aśva̍sya|viśastEti̍# vi - śastA|dvA|yantArA̱|Bavataḥ|tathA̱|Rutuḥ||yA|tE|gAtrAṇAm|RututhEtyRu̍tu̍ - thA|kRuṇOmi|tAtEti̍ tA - tA|piṇḍAnAm|prEti̍|juhOmi|agnau||mA|tvA|tapat|45̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vA tutOda|srucEva̍ tA haviṣO# addhvarEṣu sarvA tA tE brahmaṇA̍ sUdayAmi||catustriṃśad-vAjinO̍# dEvabandhO-rva~gkrI-raśva̍sya̍ svadhitiḥ̍ samEti|acCi̍drA̍ gAtrA# vayunA# kRuṇOta paruṣparuranuGuṣyA̍ vi śasta||Ekastvaṣṭuraśva̍syA̍ viśastA dvA yantArA# Bavatastathartuḥ|yA tE gAtrAṇAmRututhA̍ kRuṇOmi tAtA piṇḍAnAM̍ pra juhOmyagnau||mA̍ tvA# tapat - [ ] 45

verses.padam: - Padam priyaḥ|AtmA|apiyantamityapi̍ - yanta̱m|mA|svadhitiriti̍ sva - dhitiḥ|tanuvaḥ|Eti̍|tiṣṭhipat|tE||mA|tE|gRuddhnuḥ|aviśastEtya̍vi̍ - śastA|atihAyEtyati-hAya̍|CidrA|gAtrA̍ṇi|asinA̱|mithu̍|kaḥ||na|vai|u|Etat|mriyasE|na|riṣyasi|dEvAn|it|Eṣi|pathiBiriti̍# pathi - Biḥ|sugEBiriti# su - gEBiḥ||harI̍ iti|tE|yu~jjA̱|pRuṣa̍tI̍ iti|aBUtAm|upEti̍|asthAt|vAjI|dhuri|rAsa̍Basya||sugavyamiti̍# su - gavya̱m|naḥ|vAjI|svaśviyamiti̍# su - aśviyam|puṃqsaḥ|putrAn|uta|viśvApuṣamiti̍# viśva -puṣa̱m|rayim ( )||anAgAstvamityanAgAḥ̍ - tvam|naḥ|aditiḥ|kRuṇOtu|kṣatram|naḥ|aśva̍ḥ|vanatAm|haviṣmAn̍||46̍ (59) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 9 Anuvaakams :- (aśman - ya imO - dEna̍ - mAśuḥ - prAcI̱M - jImUtasya̍ - yadakrandO̍ - mA nO# mitrO - yE vAjinaM - nava)̍ Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (aśman̍ - manOyujaM - prAcImanu - śarma# yacCatu - tEṣAmaBigU̱rtiḥ̍ - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśat)̍ First and Last Padam of śixth Prasam of KAndam 4 :- (aśman̍ - haviṣmAn)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE caturtha kAṇḍE ṣaṣṭhaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||--------------------------------------
verses.samhita: priya AtmA&piyantaM mA svadhitistanuva̍ A tiṣṭhipat̍ tE|mA tE# gRuddhnu-raviśastA&tihAya̍# CidrA gAtrA̱ṇyasinA mithU# kaḥ||na vA uvEtanmri̍yasE̍ na riṣyasi̍ dEvAṃ idEṣi̍ pathiBiḥ̍ sugEBiḥ|harI̍# tE yu~jjA pRuṣatI̍ aBUtAmupA̱sthAd-vAjI dhuri rAsaBasya||sugavya̍M̍ nO vAjI svaśviyaM̍ puṃqsaḥ putrAṃ uta viśvApuṣaṃ̍# rayiM ( )|anAgAstvaM nO aditiḥ̍ kRuṇOtu kṣatraM nO aśvO# vanatAṃ haviṣmAn||46̍ praśna kOrvai with starting padams of 1 to 9 anuvAkams :- (aśman - ya imO - dEna̍ - mAśuḥ - prAcI̱M - jImUtasya̍ - yadakrandO̍ - mA nO# mitrO - yE vAjinaM - nava)̍ kOrvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (aśman̍ - manOyujaM - prAcImanu - śarma# yacCatu - tEṣAmaBigU̱rtiḥ̍ - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśat)̍ first and last padam of sixth Prasam of Kaandam 4 :- (aśman̍ - haviṣmAn)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM caturtha kAṇḍE ṣaṣṭhaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||OM namaḥ paramAtmanE , śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ , śrI guruByO namaḥ , hariḥ OM 4.7 caturthakAṇḍE saptamaḥ praśnaḥ - vasOrdhArAdiśiṣṭa saMskArABidhAnaM

verses.padam: - Padam agnAviṣṇU̍ ityagnA̱ - viṣṇU|sajOṣasEti# sa - jOṣasA|imAḥ|vad^^rdhantu|vAm|gira̍ḥ||dhyumnaiḥ|vAjE̍Biḥ|Eti̍|gatam||vAja̍ḥ|ca|mE|prasava̍ iti# pra-savaḥ|ca|mE|prayatiriti̍ pra-yatiḥ|ca|mE|prasitiriti̍ pra-sitiḥ|ca|mE|dhItiḥ|ca|mE|kratuḥ|ca|mE|svara̍ḥ|ca|mE|ślOka̍ḥ|ca|mE|śrAvaḥ|ca|mE|śruti̍ḥ|ca|mE|jyOti̍ḥ|ca|mE|suva̍ḥ|ca|mE|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|ca|mE|apAna ityapa̍ - anaḥ|1 (50)
verses.samhita: agnAviṣṇU̍ sajOṣasEmA̍ varddhantu̍ vAM giraḥ|dhyunaiMrvAjE̍BirA̍ gataM||vAja̍śca̍ mE prasavaśca# mE prayatiśca̍ mE prasitiśca̍ mE dhItiśca# mE kratuśca̍ mE svaraśca̍ mE ślOkaśca̍ mE śrAvaśca# mE śrutiśca̍ mE jyOtiśca̍ mE suvaśca̍ mE prAṇaśca# mE &pAna - [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam ca|mE|vyAna iti# vi-anaḥ|ca|mE|asuḥ|ca|mE|cittam|ca|mE|AdhI̍tamityA̍ - dhItam|ca|mE|vAk|ca|mE|manaḥ|ca|mE|cakṣu̍ḥ|ca|mE|śrOtra̱m|ca|mE|dakṣa̍ḥ|ca|mE|bala̱m|ca|mE|Oja̍ḥ|ca|mE|saha̍ḥ|ca|mE|Ayu̍ḥ|ca|mE|jarA|ca|mE|AtmA|ca|mE|tanUḥ|ca|mE̍ ( )|śarma|ca|mE|varma̍|ca|mE|a~ggA̍ni|ca|mE|asthAni̍|ca|mE|parUṃ̍ṣi|ca|mE|śarI̍rAṇi|ca|mE||2̍ (68)
verses.samhita: -śca# mE vyAnaśca mE &suśca̍ mE cittaM ca# ma AdhItaM̍ ca mE vAkca# mE manaśca̍ mE cakṣuśca̍ mE śrOtraM̍ ca mE dakṣaśca̍ mE balaM̍ ca ma Ojaśca̍ mE sahaśca̍ ma Ayuśca̍ mE jarA ca# ma AtmA ca# mE tanUśca# mE ( ) śarma# ca mE varma# ca mE &~ggAni̍ ca mE &sthAni# ca mE parUṃṣi̍ ca mE śarIrAṇi̍ ca mE||2

verses.padam: - Padam jyaiṣṭhya̱m|ca|mE|AdhipatyamityAdhi̍-patyam|ca|mE|manyuḥ|ca|mE|BAma̍ḥ|ca|mE|ama̍ḥ|ca|mE|aBaM̍ḥ|ca|mE|jEmA|ca|mE|mahimA|ca|mE|varimA|ca|mE|prathimA|ca|mE|varṣmA|ca|mE|drAGuyA|ca|mE|vRuddham|ca|mE|vRuddhi̍ḥ|ca|mE|satyam|ca|mE|śraddhEti̍# śrat - dhA|ca|mE|jagat|ca|3̍ (50)
verses.samhita: jyaiṣṭhyaM̍ ca ma AdhipatyaM̍ ca mE manyuśca# mE BAmaśca̍ mE &maśca̍ mE &BaMśca̍ mE jEmA ca# mE mahimA ca# mE varimA ca# mE prathimA ca# mE varṣmA ca# mE drAGuyA ca# mE vRuddhaM ca# mE vRuddhiśca̍ mE satyaM ca# mE śraddhA ca# mE jagacca̍ - [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam mE|dhana̱m|ca|mE|vaśaḥ|ca|mE|tviṣi̍ḥ|ca|mE|krIḍA|ca|mE|mOda̍ḥ|ca|mE|jAtam|ca|mE|janiṣyamA̍ṇam|ca|mE|sUktamiti̍# su - uktam|ca|mE|sukRutamiti# su - kRutam|ca|mE|vittam|ca|mE|vEdya̱m|ca|mE|BUtam|ca|mE|Baviṣyat|ca|mE|sugamiti# su - gam|ca|mE|supathamiti# su - patha̱m|ca|mE|Ruddham|ca|mE|Ruddhiḥ̍ ( )|ca|mE|klRuptam|ca|mE|klRuptiḥ|ca|mE|matiḥ|ca|mE|sumatiriti̍# su - matiḥ|ca|mE||4 (64)
verses.samhita: -mE dhanaM̍ ca mE vaśaśca̍ mE tviṣiśca̍ mE krIḍA ca# mE mOdaśca̍ mE jAtaM ca# mE janiṣyamAṇaM̍ ca mE sUktaM ca# mE sukRutaM ca# mE vittaM ca# mE vEdyaM̍ ca mE BUtaMca# mE Baviṣyacca# mE sugaM ca# mE supathaM̍ ca ma RuddhaM ca# ma Ruddhi# ( ) śca mE klRuptaM ca# mE klRuptiśca̍ mE matiśca# mE sumatiśca# mE||4

verses.padam: - Padam śam|ca|mE|mayaḥ|ca|mE|priyam|ca|mE|anukAma̍ ityanu̍ - kAmaḥ|ca|mE|kAmaḥ|ca|mE|saumanasaḥ|ca|mE|Badram|ca|mE|śrEya̍ḥ|ca|mE|vasya̍ḥ|ca|mE|yaśa̍ḥ|ca|mE|Baga̍ḥ|ca|mE|dravi̍ṇam|ca|mE|yantA|ca|mE|dhartA|ca|mE|kṣEma̍ḥ|ca|mE|dhRuti̍ḥ|ca|mE|viśva̱m|ca|5̍ (50)
verses.samhita: śaM ca# mE mayaśca̍ mE priyaM ca# mE &nukAmaśca# mE kAmaśca̍ mE saumanasaśca# mE BadraM ca# mE śrEyaśca̍ mE vasyaśca̍ mE yaśaśca̍ mE Bagaśca̍ mE draviṇaM̍ ca mE yantA ca# mE dhartA ca# mE kṣEmaśca̍ mE dhRutiśca̍ mE viśvaM̍ ca - [ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam mE|mahaḥ|ca|mE|saM~Mviditi̍# sam-vit|ca|mE|jñAtra̱m|ca|mE|sUḥ|ca|mE|prasUriti# pra - sUḥ|ca|mE|sIra̱M|ca|mE|layaḥ|ca|mE|Rutam|ca|mE|amRuta̱m|ca|mE|ayakṣmam|ca|mE|anAmayat|ca|mE|jIvAtu̍ḥ|ca|mE|dIrGAyutvamiti̍# dIrGAyu - tvam|ca|mE|anamitram|ca|mE|aBayam|ca|mE|sugamiti̍# su-gam|ca|mE|śayanam̍ ( )|ca|mE|sUṣEti# su - uṣA|ca|mE|sudinamiti# su - dina̱m|ca|mE||6 (58)
verses.samhita: mE mahaśca̍ mE saM~Mvicca# mE jñAtraM̍ ca mE sUśca# mE prasUśca# mE sIraM̍ ca mE layaśca# ma RutaM ca# mE &mRutaM̍ ca mE&yakṣmaM ca mE &nAmayacca̍ mE jIvAtuśca̍ mE dIrGAyutvaM ca# mE &namitraM ca mE &BayaM̍ ca mE sugaM ca# mE śayanaM̍ ( ) ca mE sUṣA ca# mE sudinaM̍ ca mE||6

verses.padam: - Padam Urk|ca|mE|sUnRutA̱|ca|mE|payaḥ|ca|mE|rasa̍ḥ|ca|mE|GRutam|ca|mE|madhu̍|ca|mE|sagdhi̍ḥ|ca|mE|sapI̍tiriti̍ sa - pItiḥ|ca|mE|kRuṣiḥ|ca|mE|vRuṣṭiḥ|ca|mE|jaitra̱m|ca|mE|audBi̍dyamityaut-Bidyam|ca|mE|rayiḥ|ca|mE|rAya̍ḥ|ca|mE|puṣṭam|ca|mE|puṣṭi̍ḥ|ca|mE|viBviti̍# vi - Bu|ca|7 (50)
verses.samhita: Urkca# mE sUnRutA# ca mE payaśca̍ mE rasaśca̍ mE GRutaM ca# mE madhu# ca mE sagdhiśca̍ mE sapItiśca̍ mE kRuṣiśca# mE vRuṣṭiśca̍ mE jaitraM̍ ca ma audBidyaM̍ ca mE rayiśca# mE rAyaśca̍ mE puṣṭaM ca# mE puṣṭiśca̍ mE viBu ca# - [ ] 7

verses.padam: - Padam mE|praBviti# pra - Bu|ca|mE|bahu|ca|mE|BUyaḥ|ca|mE|pUrṇam|ca|mE|pUrṇata̍ramiti̍# pUrṇa - taram|ca|mE|akṣitiḥ|ca|mE|kUya̍vAḥ|ca|mE|anna̱m|ca|mE|akṣu̍t|ca|mE|vrIhaya̍ḥ|ca|mE|yavA̱ḥ|ca|mE|mAṣA̱ḥ|ca|mE|tilA̱ḥ|ca|mE|mudgAḥ|ca|mE|KalvA̱ḥ|ca|mE|gOdhUmA̱ḥ|ca|mE|masurA̱ḥ̍ ( )|ca|mE|priyaMgavaḥ|ca|mE|aṇa̍vaḥ|ca|mE|śyAmAkA̱ḥ|ca|mE|nIvArA̱ḥ|ca|mE||8̍ (64)
verses.samhita: mE praBu ca# mE bahu ca# mE BUyaśca̍ mE pUrṇaM ca# mE pUrṇataraM̍ ca mE &kṣitiśca̍ mE kUyavAśca̍ mE&nnaM̍ ca mE &kṣucca̍ mE vrIhayaśca̍ mE yavA̱śca mE mAṣA̱śca mE tilA̱śca mE mudgAśca# mE KalvA̱śca mE gOdhUmA̱śca mE masurA̱- ( ) -śca mE priyaMgavaśca̍ mE &ṇavaśca̍ mE śyAmAkA̱śca mE nIvArA̱śca mE||8

verses.padam: - Padam aśmA̱|ca|mE|mRuttikA|ca|mE|giraya̍ḥ|ca|mE|parva̍tAḥ|ca|mE|sika̍tAḥ|ca|mE|vanaspata̍yaḥ|ca|mE|hira̍ṇyam|ca|mE|aya̍ḥ|ca|mE|sIsa̱m|ca|mE|trapu̍|ca|mE|śyAmam|ca|mE|lOham|ca|mE|agniḥ|ca|mE|Apa̍ḥ|ca|mE|vIrudha̍ḥ|ca|mE|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|ca|mE|kRuṣṭapacyamiti̍# kRuṣṭa - pacyam|ca|9 (50)
verses.samhita: aśmA# ca mE mRuttikA̍ ca mE girayaśca̍ mE parvatAśca̍ mE sikatAśca̍ mE vanaspatayaśca̍ mE hiraṇyaM̍ ca mE &yaśca̍ mE sIsaM̍ ca mE trapuśca̍ mE śyAmaM ca# mE lOhaM ca# mE&gniśca# ma Apaśca̍ mEvIrudhaśca̍ ma Oṣadhayaśca̍ mE kRuṣṭapacyaM ca# - [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam mE|akRuṣṭapacyamityakRuṣṭa̍ - pacyam|ca|mE|grAmyAḥ|ca|mE|paśavaḥ|AraṇyAḥ|ca|yajñEna̍|kalpantAm|vittam|ca|mE|vitti̍ḥ|ca|mE|BUtam|ca|mE|BUti̍ḥ|ca|mE|vasu̍|ca|mE|vasatiḥ|ca|mE|karma̍|ca|mE|śakti̍ḥ|ca|mE|artha̍ḥ|ca|mE|Ema̍ḥ|ca|mE|iti̍ḥ|ca|mE|gati̍ḥ|ca|mE||10̍ (48) (kRuṣṭapacyaM cA - &ṣṭAcatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A5)
verses.samhita: mE &kRuṣṭapacyaM ca# mE grAyAMśca# mE paśava# AraṇyAśca# yajñEna# kalpantAM ~MvittaM ca# mE vittiśca̍ mE BUtaM ca# mE BUtiśca̍ mE vasu# ca mE vasatiśca# mE karma# ca mE śaktiśca̍ mE&rthaśca̍ ma Emaśca̍ ma itiśca̍ mE gatiśca̍ mE||10 (kRuṣṭapacyaM cA - &ṣṭAcatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam agniḥ|ca|mE|indraḥ|ca|mE|sOma̍ḥ|ca|mE|indra̍ḥ|ca|mE|savitA|ca|mE|indra̍ḥ|ca|mE|sara̍svatI|ca|mE|indra̍ḥ|ca|mE|pUṣA|ca|mE|indra̍ḥ|ca|mE|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|ca|mE|indra̍ḥ|ca|mE|mitraḥ|ca|mE|indra̍ḥ|ca|mE|varu̍ṇaḥ|ca|mE|indra̍ḥ|ca|mE|tvaṣṭA̱|ca|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agniśca# ma indraśca̍ mE sOmaśca̍ ma indraśca̍ mE savitA ca# ma indraśca̍ mE sarasvatI̍ ca ma indraśca̍ mE pUṣA ca# ma indraśca̍ mE bRuhaspatiśca̍ ma indraśca̍ mE mitraśca# ma indraśca̍ mE varuṇaśca̍ ma indraśca̍ mE tvaṣṭA# ca - [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam mE|indraḥ|ca|mE|dhAtA|ca|mE|indra̍ḥ|ca|mE|viṣṇu̍ḥ|ca|mE|indra̍ḥ|ca|mE|aśvinau̱|ca|mE|indra̍ḥ|ca|mE|maruta̍ḥ|ca|mE|indra̍ḥ|ca|mE|viśvE̱|ca|mE|dEvAḥ|indra̍ḥ|ca|mE|pRuthivI|ca|mE|indra̍ḥ|ca|mE|antari̍kṣam|ca|mE|indra̍ḥ|ca|mE|dyauḥ|ca|mE̍ ( )|indraḥ|ca|mE|diśa̍ḥ|ca|mE|indra̍ḥ|ca|mE|mUrddhA|ca|mE|indra̍ḥ|ca|mE|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|ca|mE|indraḥ|ca|mE||12̍ (71) (tvaṣṭA# ca - dyauśca# ma - Ekaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A6)
verses.samhita: ma indraśca̍ mE dhAtA ca# ma indraśca̍ mE viṣṇuśca̍ ma indraśca̍ mE &śvinau# ca ma indraśca̍ mE marutaśca̍ ma indraśca̍ mE viśvE# ca mE dEvA indraśca̍ mE pRuthivI ca# ma indraśca̍ mE&ntarikṣaM̍ ca ma indraśca̍ mE dyauśca# ma ( ) indraśca̍ mE diśaśca̍ ma indraśca̍ mE mUrddhA ca# ma indraśca̍ mE prajApatiśca̍ ma indraśca̍ mE||12 (tvaṣṭA# ca - dyauśca# ma - Ekaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam aṃqśuḥ|ca|mE|raśmiḥ|ca|mE|adA̱Byaḥ|ca|mE|adhipatirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|ca|mE|upAṃqśurityupa-aṃqśuḥ|ca|mE|antaryAma̍ ityantaḥ-yAmaḥ|ca|mE|aindravAyava̍ ityai̱ndra-vAyavaḥ|ca|mE|maitrAvaruṇa iti# maitrA - varuṇaḥ|ca|mE|Aśvinaḥ|ca|mE|pratiprasthAna iti# prati - prasthAnaḥ|ca|mE|śukraḥ|ca|mE|manthI|ca|mE|Agrayaṇaḥ|ca|mE|vaiśvadEva̍ iti# vaiśva - dEvaḥ|ca|mE|dhruvaḥ|ca|mE|vaiśvAnaraḥ|ca|mE|RutugrahA ityRutu̍ - grahAḥ|ca|13 (50)
verses.samhita: aṃqśuśca# mE raśmiśca mE &dA̱Byaśca mE&dhipatiśca̍ ma upAṃqśuśca# mE &ntaryAmaśca# ma aindravAyavaśca# mE maitrAvaruṇaśca# ma Aśvinaśca# mE pratiprasthAnaśca̍ mE śukraśca# mE manthI ca# ma Agrayaṇaśca# mE vaiśvadEvaśca# mE dhruvaśca# mE vaiśvAnaraśca# ma RutugrahAśca-̍ [ ] 13

verses.padam: - Padam mE|atigrAhyA̱ ityati-grAhyA̱ḥ|ca|mE|aindrAgna̍ ityai̱ndra-agnaḥ|ca|mE|vaiśvadEva iti# vaiśva - dEvaḥ|ca|mE|marutvatIyA̱ḥ|ca|mE|mAhEndra iti# mAhA - indraḥ|ca|mE|Adityaḥ|ca|mE|sAvitraḥ|ca|mE|sArasvataḥ|ca|mE|pauṣṇaḥ|ca|mE|pAtnIvata iti# pAtnI-vataḥ|ca|mE|hAriyOjana iti# hAri-yOjanaḥ|ca|mE||14 (34) (RutugrahAśca - catustriṃśacca̍ ) (A7)
verses.samhita: mE &tigrAhyA̱śca ma aindrAgnaśca# mE vaiśvadEvaśca# mE marutvatIyA̱śca mE mAhEndraśca# ma Adityaśca# mE sAvitraśca# mE sArasvataśca# mE pauṣṇaśca# mE pAtnIvataśca# mE hAriyOjanaśca# mE||14

verses.padam: - Padam iddhmaḥ|ca|mE|barqḥiḥ|ca|mE|vEdiḥ|ca|mE|dhiṣṇi̍yAḥ|ca|mE|sruca̍ḥ|ca|mE|camasAḥ|ca|mE|grAvA̍ṇaḥ|ca|mE|svara̍vaḥ|ca|mE|uparavA̍ ityupa̍ - ravAḥ|ca|mE|adhiṣavaṇE̍ ityadhi̍ - savanE|ca|mE|drOṇakalaśa̍ iti# drOṇa-kalaśaḥ|ca|mE|vAyavyAni|ca|mE|pUtaBRuditi̍# pUta - BRut|ca|mE|AdhavanIya ityA̱ - dhavanIyaḥ|ca|mE|AgnI̱ddhramityAgni̍-iddhram|ca|mE|havid^^rdhAnamiti̍# haviḥ - dhAna̱m|ca|mE|gRuhAḥ|ca ( )|mE|sadaḥ|ca|mE|purOḍAśA̱ḥ|ca|mE|pacatAḥ|ca|mE|avaBRutha̍ ityava̍ - BRuthaḥ|ca|mE|svagAkAra iti# svagA - kAraḥ|ca|mE||15 (66)
verses.samhita: iddhmaśca# mE barqḥiśca# mE vEdiśca̍ mE dhiṣṇiyAśca̍ mE srucaśca̍ mE camasAśca# mE grAvAṇaśca̍ mE svaravaśca̍ ma uparavAśca# mE &dhiṣavaṇE̍ ca mE drOṇakalaśaśca# mE vAyavyAni̍ ca mE pUtaBRucca# ma AdhavanIyaśca̍ ma AgnI̱ddhraM ca mE havirddhAnaM̍ ca mE gRuhAśca# ( ) mE sadaśca̍ mE purOḍAśA̱śca mE pacatAśca# mE&vaBRuthaśca# mE svagAkAraśca# mE||15

verses.padam: - Padam agniḥ|ca|mE|Garmaḥ|ca|mE|arkaḥ|ca|mE|sUryaḥ|ca|mE|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|ca|mE|aśvamEdha ityaśva-mEdhaḥ|ca|mE|pRuthivI|ca|mE|adi̍tiḥ|ca|mE|diti̍ḥ|ca|mE|dyauḥ|ca|mE|śakva̍rIḥ|a~ggula̍yaḥ|diśa̍ḥ|ca|mE|yajñEna̍|kalpantAm|Ruk|ca|mE|sAma̍|ca|mE|stOma̍ḥ|ca|mE|yaju̍ḥ|ca|mE|dIkṣA̍ ( )|ca|mE|tapaḥ|ca|mE|Rutuḥ|ca|mE|vratam|ca|mE|ahOrAtrayOritya̍haḥ̍ - rAtrayO̱ḥ|vRuṣṭyA|bRuhadrathantarE iti# bRuhat - rathantarE|ca|mE|yajñEna|kalpEtAm||16̍ (68)
verses.samhita: agniśca# mE Garmaśca# mE&rkaśca# mE sUryaśca̍ mE prAṇaśca# mE &śvamEdhaśca# mE pRuthivI ca mE &ditiśca̍ mE ditiśca̍ mE dyauśca# mE śakvarIra~ggula̍yO̍ diśaśca̍ mE yajñEna# kalpantA- mRukca# mE sAma# ca mE stOmaśca̍ mE yajuśca̍ mE dIkṣA ( ) ca# mE tapaśca̍ ma Rutuśca# mE vrataM ca# mE &hOrAtrayO̱ rvRuṣṭyA bRuhadrathantarE̍ ca# mE yajñEna# kalpEtAM||16

verses.padam: - Padam garBA̱ḥ|ca|mE|vathsAḥ|ca|mE|tryaviriti# tri - aviḥ|ca|mE|tryavIti̍# tri - avI|ca|mE|dityavAḍiti# ditya - vAṭ|ca|mE|dityauhI|ca|mE|pa~jcAviriti̍ pa~jca# - aviḥ|ca|mE|pa~jcAvIti# pa~jca-avI|ca|mE|trivathsa iti# tri-vathsaḥ|ca|mE|trivathsEti# tri - vathsA|ca|mE|turyavAḍiti# turya - vAṭ|ca|mE|turyauhI|ca|mE|paṣṭhavAditi# paṣṭha - vAt|ca|mE|paṣṭhauhI|ca|mE|ukṣA|ca|mE|vaśA|ca|mE|RuṣaBaḥ|ca|17 (50)
verses.samhita: garBA̱śca mE vathsAśca# mE tryaviśca̍ mE tryavI ca# mE dityavAṭ ca# mE dityauhI ca# mE pa~jcAviśca̍ mE pa~jcAvI ca# mE trivathsaśca# mE trivathsA ca# mE turyavAṭ ca# mE turyauhI ca# mE paṣṭhavAc ca# mE paṣṭhauhI ca# ma ukṣA ca# mE vaśA ca# ma RuṣaBaśca -̍ [ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam ma|vEhat|ca|mE|anaḍvAn|ca|mE|dhEnuḥ|ca|mE|Ayuḥ|yajñEna̍|kalpatAm|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|yajñEna|kalpatAm|apAna̍ ityapa̍ - anaḥ|yajñEna|kalpatAm|vyAna̍ iti# vi - anaḥ|yajñEna|kalpatAm|cakṣu̍ḥ|yajñEna̍|kalpatAm|śrOtra̱m|yajñEna̍|kalpatAm|mana̍ḥ|yajñEna̍|kalpatAm|vAk|yajñEna̍|kalpatAm|AtmA|yajñEna̍|kalpatAm|yajñaḥ|yajñEna̍|kalpatAm||18̍ (40) (RuṣaBaśca# - catvAriṃqśacca)̍ (A10)
verses.samhita: mE vEhacca# mE &naḍvAn ca# mE dhEnuśca# ma AyuryajñEna̍# kalpatAM prAṇO yajñEna# kalpatA-mapAnO yajñEna# kalpatAM ~MvyAnO yajñEna# kalpatAM cakṣu-ryajñEna̍# kalpatAṅq śrOtraM̍ ~MyajñEna# kalpatAM manO# yajñEna# kalpatAM ~MvAg yajñEna# kalpatA-mAtmA yajñEna# kalpatAM ~MyajñO yajñEna# kalpatAM||18 (RuṣaBaśca# - catvAriṃqśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam EkA̱|ca|mE|tisraḥ|ca|mE|pa~jca|ca|mE|sapta|ca|mE|nava̍|ca|mE|EkA̍daśa|ca|mE|trayO̍daśEti̍ trayaḥ̍ - daśa|ca|mE|pa~jcadaśEti̍ pa~jca-daśa|ca|mE|saptadaśEti̍# sapta - daśa|ca|mE|navadaśEti̍ nava# - daśa|ca|mE|EkaviṃśatirityEka̍# - viṃqśatiḥ|ca|mE|trayOviṃśatiriti̍ trayaḥ-viṃqśatiḥ|ca|mE|pa~jca̍viṃśatiriti̍ pa~jca-viṃqśatiḥ|ca|mE|saptaviṃ̍śatiriti̍# sapta -viṃqśatiḥ|ca|mE|navaviṃśatiriti̍ nava# - viṃqśatiḥ|ca|mE|EkatriṃśadityEka̍# - triṃqśat|ca|mE|trayastriṃśaditi̍ trayaḥ̍ - triṃqśat|ca|19 (50)
verses.samhita: EkA# ca mE tisraśca# mE pa~jca# ca mE sapta ca# mE nava# ca ma EkAdaśa̍ ca mE trayOdaśa̍ ca mE pa~jcadaśa̍ ca mE saptadaśa̍ ca mE navadaśa̍ ca ma Ekaviṃśatiśca̍ mE trayOviṃśatiśca̍ mE pa~jcaviṃśatiśca̍ mE saptaviṃśatiśca̍ mE navaviṃśatiśca̍ ma Ekatriṃśacca̍ mE trayastriṃśacca-̍ [ ] 19

verses.padam: - Padam mE|catasraḥ|ca|mE|aṣṭau|ca|mE|dvAda̍śa|ca|mE|ṣOḍa̍śa|ca|mE|viṃśatiḥ|ca|mE|catu̍rviṃśatiriti̍ catuḥ̍ - viṃqśatiḥ|ca|mE|aṣṭAviṃśatirityaṣṭA̍ - viṃqśatiḥ|ca|mE|dvAtriṃśat|ca|mE|ṣaṭtriṃ̍śaditi̍ ṣaṭ - triṃqśat|ca|mE|catvAriṃqśat|ca|mE|catuścatvAriṃśaditi̍ catuḥ̍ - catvAriṃqśat|ca|mE|aṣṭAcatvAriṃśadityaṣṭA̍ - catvAriṃqśat|ca|mE|vAjaḥ|ca|prasava̍ iti# pra - savaḥ|ca|apija ityapi-jaḥ|ca|kratu̍ḥ|ca|suva̍ḥ|ca|mUd^^rdhA|ca|vyaśni̍ya̍ iti# vi - aśniyaḥ̍ ( )|ca|antyAyanaḥ|ca|antyaḥ|ca|Bauvanaḥ|ca|Buva̍naḥ|ca|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|ca||20 (61) (trayastriṃśacca̍ - vyaś~jiya̍ - EkAdaśa̍ ca ) (A11)
verses.samhita: mE catasraśca̍ mE &ṣṭau ca# mE dvAdaśa̍ ca mE ṣOḍaśa̍ ca mE viṃśatiśca# mE caturviṃśatiśca̍ mE &ṣṭAviṃśatiśca̍ mE dvAtriṃśacca̍ mE ṣaṭ-triṃśacca̍ mE catvAriṃqśacca# mE catuścatvAriṃśacca̍ mE &ṣṭAcatvAriṃśacca̍ mE vAjaśca̍ prasavaścA-pijaśca̍ kratuśca̍ suvaśca̍ mUrddhA ca vyaś~jiyaścA-̍ ( ) -ntyAyanaścA- ntyaśca̍ Bauvanaśca BuvanaścA-dhi̍patiśca||20̍

verses.padam: - Padam vAjaḥ|naḥ|sapta|pradiśa̍ iti# pra - diśaḥ|cata̍sraḥ|vA|parAvata̍ iti# parA - vataḥ||vAja̍ḥ|naḥ|viśvai̱ḥ|dEvaiḥ|dhana̍sAtAviti̍ dhana# - sAtau|iha|avatu||viśvE̱|adya|marutaḥ|viśvE̱|UtI|viśvE̱|Bavantu|agnaya̍ḥ|sami̍ddhA̍ iti saM - iddhAḥ||viśvE̱|naḥ|dEvAḥ|avasA|Eti̍|gamantu|viśva̱m|astu|dravi̍ṇam|vAja̍ḥ|asmE̍ iti||vAja̍sya|prasavamiti̍# pra - savam|dEvAḥ|rathai̱ḥ|yAta|hiraṇyayai̱ḥ||agniḥ|indraḥ|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|maruta̍ḥ|sOma̍pItaya̍ iti sOma# - pItayE||vAjEvAja̍ iti vAjE̱ - vAjE|avata|vAjinaḥ|naḥ|dhanEṣu|21̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vAjO# naḥ sapta pradiśaścatasrO̍ vA parAvataḥ|vAjO̍# nO viśvai̱rdEvai-rdhanasAtAvihAva̍tu||viśvE̍# adya marutO viśva# UtI viśvE# Bavantvagnayaḥ samiddhAḥ|viśvE̍# nO dEvA avasA&& gamantu̍ viśvamastu̍ draviṇaM̍ ~MvAjO# asmE||vAjasya̍ prasavaM dEvA̍ rathai̱ryAtA hiraṇyayai̱ḥ|agnirindrO bRuhaspatirmarutaḥ̍ sOmapItayE||vAjE̍vAjE̍ &vata vAjinO nO dhanEṣu̍ - [ ] 21

verses.padam: - Padam viprAḥ|amRutAḥ|RutajñA ityRuta̍ - jñAḥ||asya|maddhvaḥ|pibata|mAdaya̍ddhvam|tRuptAḥ|yAta|pathiBiriti̍# pathi - Biḥ|dEvayAnairiti# dEva - yAnai̱ḥ||vAjaḥ|purastA̱t|uta|maddhyataḥ|naḥ|vAja̍ḥ|dEvAn|RutuBirityRutu̍ - Biḥ|kalpayAti||vAjasya|hi|prasava̍ iti# pra - savaḥ|nannamIti|viśvA̱ḥ|AśA̱ḥ|vAja̍patiriti̍ vAja# - patiḥ|BavEyam||payaḥ|pRuthivyAm|paya̍ḥ|Oṣa̍dhIṣu|paya̍ḥ|divi|antari̍kṣE|paya̍ḥ|dhAm||paya̍svatIḥ|pradiśa̍ iti# pra - diśaḥ|santu|mahya̱m||samiti̍|mA|sRujAmi|paya̍sA|GRutEna̍|samiti̍|mA|sRujAmi|apaḥ|22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: viprA amRutA RutajñAḥ|asya maddhvaḥ̍ pibata mAdayaddhvaM̍ tRuptA yAta̍ pathiBirdEvayAnai̱ḥ||vAja̍ḥ̍ purastAduta̍ maddhyatO̍ nO vAjO# dEvAṃ RutuBiḥ̍ kalpayAti|vAjasya̍ hi prasavO̍ nannamIti̍ viśvA AśA vAjapatirBavEyaM||paya̍ḥ̍ pRuthivyAM paya OṣadhIṣu̍ payO# divyantari̍kṣE̍ payO# dhAM|payasvatIḥ̍ pradiśaḥ̍ santu mahya̱M||saM mA# sRujAmi payasA̍ GRutEna saM mA# sRujAmyapa - [ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam OṣadhIBirityOṣa̍dhi̍ - Biḥ||saḥ|aham|vAja̱m|sanEyam|agnE||naktOṣAsA̱|samanasEti̍ sa-manasA|virUpE̍ iti vi-rUpE|dhApayEtE̍ iti|śiśu̱m|Eka̱m|samIcI̍ iti||dyAvA̱|kṣAma̍|rukmaḥ|antaḥ|vIti̍|BAti|dEvAḥ|agnim|dhArayann|draviṇOdA̍ iti# draviṇaḥ - dAḥ||samudraḥ|asi|naBasvAn|ArdradA̍nurityArdra-dAnuḥ|śaBUMriti̍# śaM-BUḥ|mayOBUriti# mayaḥ-BUḥ|aBIti|mA|vAhi|svAhA̱|mArutaḥ|asi|marutA̱m|gaṇaḥ|śaBUMriti̍# śaM - BUḥ|mayOBUriti# mayaḥ - BUḥ|aBIti|mA|vAhi|svAhA̱|avasyuḥ|asi|duva̍svAn|śaBUMriti̍# śaM - BUḥ|mayOBUriti# mayaḥ - BUḥ|aBIti|mA̍ ( )|vAhi|svAhA̱||23 (52)
verses.samhita: OṣadhIBiḥ|sO̍&haM̍ ~MvAjaṃ# sanEyamagnE||naktOṣAsA samanasA̍ virUpE̍ dhApayEtE̍ śiśumEkaṃ# samIcI|dyAvA kṣAmA# rukmO antarvi BAti̍ dEvA agniM dhArayan̍ draviṇOdAḥ||samudrO&si̍ naBasvAnArdradA̍nuḥ̍ śaBUMrmayOBUraBi̍ mA# vAhi svAhA# mArutO&si̍ marutA̱M gaṇaḥ śaBUMrmayOBUraBi̍ mA# vAhi svAhA# &vasyurasi̍ duvasvA~jCaBUMrma̍yOBUraBi̍ mA# ( ) vAhi svAhA̱||23

verses.padam: - Padam agnim|yunajmi|śavasA|GRutEna̍|divyam|suparṇamiti̍# su - parṇam|vayasA|bRuhanta̱m||tEna̍|vayam|patEma|braddhnasya̍|viṣṭapa̱m|suva̍ḥ|ruhA̍ṇAḥ|adhIti̍|nAkE̱|uttama̍ ityut̍ - tamE||imau|tE|pakṣau|ajarau̱|patatriṇaḥ|yAByA̱m|rakṣAṃ̍si|apahaṃsItya̍pa̍ - haṃsi|agnE||tAByA̱m|patEma|sukRutAmiti̍# su - kRutA̱m|u|lOkam|yatra|Ruṣa̍yaḥ|prathamajA̍ iti# prathama - jAḥ|yE|purAṇAḥ||cit|asi|samudrayOniriti̍# samudra - yOniḥ|induḥ|dakṣa̍ḥ|śyEnaḥ|RutAvEtyRuta̍ - vA||hiraṇyapakṣa̍ iti hiraṇya̍ - pakṣaḥ|śakunaḥ|Buraṇyuḥ|mahAn|sadhastha iti# sadha - sthE|dhruvaḥ|24 (50)
verses.samhita: agniM ~Myunajmi̍ śavasA̍ GRutEna# divyaṃ suparṇaM̍ ~MvayasA̍ bRuhanta̱M|tEna# vayaM patEma̍ braddhnasya# viṣṭapaṃq suvO ruhAṇA̍ adhi nAka# uttamE||imau tE# pakṣAvajarau# patatriṇO yAByAṃq rakṣAṅ-syapahaṅ-sya̍gnE|tAByA̱M̍ patEma sukRutAmu̍ lOkaM ~Myatraṛṣayaḥ̍ prathamajA yE purAṇAḥ||cida̍si̍ samudrayOnirindurdakṣa̍ḥ̍ śyEna RutAvA̱|hiraṇyapakṣaḥ̍ śakunO Buraṇyu-rmahAnth̍ sadhasthE̱ dhruva - [ ] 24

verses.padam: - Padam Eti|niṣa̍tta̍ iti ni - sattaḥ||namaḥ|tE|astu|mA|mA|hiṃqsIḥ|viśva̍sya|mUd^^rdhann|adhIti̍|tiṣṭhasi|śritaḥ||samudrE|tE|hRuda̍yam|antaḥ|Ayu̍ḥ|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|BuvanEṣu|arpi̍tE̍ iti||udnaḥ|datta|udadhimityu̍da̍ - dhim|Binta|divaḥ|parjanyA̱t|antarikṣAt|pRuthivyAḥ|tata̍ḥ|naḥ|vRuṣṭyA̱|avata||divaḥ|mUd^^rdhA|asi|pRuthivyAḥ|nABi̍ḥ|Urk|apAm|Oṣa̍dhInAm||viśvAyuriti̍# viśva - Ayuḥ|śarma|saprathA̍ iti# sa - prathA̱ḥ|namaḥ|pathE||yEna̍|Ruṣa̍yaḥ|tapa̍sA|satram|25̍ (50)
verses.samhita: A niṣattaḥ||nama̍stE̍ astu mA mA# hiṃsIrviśvasya̍ mUrddhannadhi# tiṣṭhasi śritaḥ|samudrE tE hRudaya-mantarAyu-rdyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ BuvanEṣvarpi̍tE||udnO̍ dattOdadhiM̍ Bintta̍ divaḥ parjanyAdantari̍kṣAt̍ pRuthivyAstatO# nO vRuṣṭyAvata|divO̍ mUrddhA&si# pRuthivyA nABirUrgapAmOṣadhInAM|viśvAyuḥ̍ śarma# saprathA namaspathE||yEnaṛṣa̍yastapa̍sA̍ satra - [ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam Asata|indhA̍nAḥ|agnim|suva̍ḥ|ABara̍nta̍ ityA̱ - Barantaḥ||tasminn̍|aham|nIti̍|dadhE|nAkE̱|agnim|Etam|yam|Ahuḥ|mana̍vaḥ|stIrṇaba̍ṛhiṣamiti̍# stIrṇa - barqḥiṣam||tam|patnIBiḥ|anviti̍|gacCEma|dEvAḥ|putraiḥ|BrAtRu̍Biriti̍ BrAtRu# - Biḥ|uta|vA|hiraṇyaiḥ||nAka̱m|gRuhṇAnAḥ|sukRutasyEti̍# su - kRutasya|lOkE|tRutIyE̱|pRuṣṭhE|adhIti̍|rOcanE|divaḥ||Eti̍|vacaḥ|maddhya̱m|aruhat|Buraṇyuḥ|ayam|agniḥ|satpa̍tiriti̍ sat - patiḥ|cEkitAnaḥ||pRuṣṭhE|pRuthivyAḥ|nihi̍ta̍ iti ni - hitaḥ|davidyutat|adhaspadamitya̍dhaḥ̍ - padam|kRuṇutE|26 (50)
verses.samhita: mAsatEndhAnA̍ agniṃ suvarABara̍ntaḥ|tasmi̍nnahaM̍ ni dadhE̍ nAkE# agnimEtaM ~MyamAhurmanava̍ stIrṇabaṛhiṣaM||taM̍ patnIBiranu̍# gacCEma dEvAḥ putrairBrAtRuBiruta̍ vA hiraṇyaiḥ|nAka̍M̍ gRuhṇAnAḥ sukRutasya̍# lOkE tRutIyE# pRuṣṭhE adhi# rOcanE divaḥ||A vAcO maddhya-maruhad-Buraṇyuraya-magniḥ̍ satpatiścEki̍tAnaḥ|pRuṣṭhE̍ pRuthivyA̍ nihitO̍ davidyutadadhaspadaM̍ kRuṇutE̍ - [ ] 26

verses.padam: - Padam yE|pRutanyavaḥ||ayam|agniḥ|vIrata̍ma̍ iti# vIra - tamaḥ|vayOdhA iti# vayaḥ - dhAḥ|sahasriyaḥ|dIpyatAm|apra̍yucCannityapra̍# - yucCann||viBrAjamAna̍ iti# vi - BrAjamAnaḥ|sarirasya̍|maddhyE̱|upa̍|prEti̍|yAta|divyAni̍|dhAma̍||sam|prEti̍|cyavaddhvam|anviti̍|sam|prEti̍|yAta|agnE̱|pathaḥ|dEvayAnAniti̍# dEva - yAnAn|kRuṇuddhvam||asminn|sadhastha̍ iti# sadha - sthE|adhIti|utta̍rasminnityut-tarasminn|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|yaja̍mAnaḥ|ca|sIdata||yEna̍|sahasra̱m|vaha̍si|yEna̍|agnE|sarvavEdasamiti̍# sarva - vEdasam||tEna|imam|yajñam|naḥ|vaha|dEvayAna̍ iti# dEva - yAnaḥ|yaḥ|27̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yE pRutanyava̍ḥ||ayamagnirvIrata̍mO̍ vayOdhAḥ sahasriyO̍# dIpyatAmaprayucCann|viBrAja̍mAnaḥ̍ sarirasya maddhya upa pra yAta̍ divyAni dhAma||saM̍ pra cyavaddhvamanu̍ saM pra yAtAgnE# pathO dEvayAnA̱n̍ kRuṇuddhvaM|asminth sadhasthE addhyuttarasmin̍ viśvE# dEvA yajamAnaśca̍ sIdata||yEnA# sahasraM ~Mvahasi̍ yEnA̱gnE sarvavEdasaM|tEnEmaM ~MyajñaM nO# vaha dEvayAnO ya - [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam uttama ityut-tamaḥ||uditi̍|buddhyasva|agnE|pratIti̍|jAgRuhi|Enam|iṣṭApUrtE̍ itI̱ṣṭA - pUrtE|samiti|sRujEthAm|ayam|ca||puna̍ḥ|kRuṇvann|tvA|pitara̱m|yuvA̍nam|anvAtAṃ̍sIditya̍nu-AtAṃ̍sIt|tvayi̍|tantu̱m|Etam||ayam|tE|yOni̍ḥ|Rutviya̍ḥ|yata̍ḥ|jAtaḥ|arO̍cathAḥ||tam|jAnann|agnE|Eti̍|rOha|atha̍|naḥ|vad^^rdhaya|rayim||28̍ (37) (dhruvaḥ - satraM - kRuṇutE̍ - yaḥ - saptatriṃśacca̍ ) (A13)
verses.samhita: uttamaḥ||ud-bu̍ddhyasvAgnE̍ prati# jAgRuhyEna miṣṭApUrtE saṃ sRujEthAmayaM̍ ca|puna̍ḥ̍ kRuṇvaṅstvA# pitaraM ~MyuvAna-manvAtAṃ̍sIt̍ tvayi tantumEtaM||ayaM̍ tE yOniṛRutviyO̍ yatO# jAtO arOcathAḥ|taM̍ jAnannagna̍ A rOhAthA# nO varddhayA rayiM||28

verses.padam: - Padam mama|agnE|varca̍ḥ|vihavEṣviti̍# vi - havEṣu|astu|vayam|tvA|indhA̍nAḥ|tanuva̱m|puṣEma||mahya̱m|namantAm|pradiśa̍ iti# pra - diśaḥ|cata̍sraḥ|tvayA̱|addhya̍kṣEṇEtyadhi̍# - akṣEṇa|pRutanAḥ|jayEma||mama̍|dEvAḥ|vihava̍ iti# vi - havE|santu|sarvE̱|indrAvanta̍ itIndra# - vantaḥ|marutaḥ|viṣṇu̍ḥ|agniḥ||mama̍|antari̍kṣam|uru|gOpam|astu|mahya̱m|vAta̍ḥ|pavatAm|kAmE̱|asminn||mayi̍|dEvAḥ|dravi̍ṇam|Eti̍|yajantAm|mayi̍|AśIrityA̱̍ - śIḥ|astu|mayi|dEvahU̍tiriti̍# dEva - hUtiḥ||daivyA̱|hOtArA|vaniṣanta|29̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mamA̱gnE varcO# vihavEṣvastu̍ vayaM tvEndhAnA̍ stanuvaM̍ puṣEma|mahyaM̍ namantAM pradiśaścatasra̍ stvayA-&ddhyakṣEṇa̍ pRutanA̍ jayEma||mama# dEvA vihavE̍ santu̍ sarva indrAvantO̍ marutO viṣṇuragniḥ|mamAntari̍kṣa̍ muru gOpamastu̍ mahyaM ~MvAtaḥ̍ pavatAM kAmE# asminn||mayi# dEvA draviṇa̍ mAyajantAM̍ mayyA śIrastu̍ mayi# dEvahUtiḥ|daivyA̍ hOtArA̍ vaniṣanta - [ ] 29

verses.padam: - Padam pUrvE̱|ariṣṭAḥ|syAma|tanuvA̱|suvIrA̍ iti# su - vIrA̱ḥ||mahya̱m|yajantu|mama|yAni̍|havyA|AkU̍tirityA̍ - kUtiḥ|satyA|manasaḥ|mE|astu||Ena̍ḥ|mA|nIti̍|gAm|katamat|cana|aham|viśvE̱|dEvAsaḥ|adhIti̍|vOcata|mE||dEvI̱ḥ|ṣaḍurvIriti̍# ṣaṭ - urvIḥ|uru|naḥ|kRuṇOta|viśvE̱|dEvAsaḥ|iha|vIrayaddhvam||mA|hAsmahi|prajayEti# pra - jayA̱|mA|tanUBiḥ|mA|radhAma|dviṣatE|sOma|rAjann||agniḥ|manyum|pratinudanniti̍# prati - nudann|purastA̱t|30 (50)
verses.samhita: pUrvE &riṣṭAḥ̍ syAma tanuvA# suvIrA̱ḥ||mahyaM̍ ~Myajantu mama yAni# havyA&&kUtiḥ̍ satyA manasO̍ mE astu|EnO mAnigA̱M katamaccanAhaM ~MviśvE# dEvAsO adhivOca̍ tA mE||dEvI̱ḥ ṣaḍurvIruruṇaḥ̍ kRuṇOta viśvE# dEvA sa iha vIrayaddhvaM|mAhA̱smahi̍ prajayA mA tanUBirmA radhAma̍ dviṣatE sOma̍ rAjann||agnirmanyuM pratinudan̍ purastA- [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam adabdhaḥ|gOpA̍ iti# gO - pAḥ|parIti|pAhi|naḥ|tvam||pratya~jca̍ḥ|yantu|niguta̍ iti# ni - gutaḥ|puna̍ḥ|tE|amA|EṣAm|cittam|prabudhEti̍# pra - budhA̱|vIti|nEśat||dhAtA|dhAtRuṇAm|Buva̍nasya|yaḥ|pati̍ḥ|dEvam|savitAra̱m|aBimAtiṣAhamitya̍BimAti̍ - sAha̱m||imam|yajñam|aśvinA̱|uBA|bRuhaspatiḥ|dEvAḥ|pAntu|yaja̍mAnam|nyarthAditi̍# ni- arthAt||uruvyacA ityuru-vyacA̱ḥ|naḥ|mahiṣaḥ|śarma̍|yaṃqsat|asminn|havE̱|puruhUta̍ iti# puru - hUtaḥ|purukṣu||saḥ|naḥ|prajAya iti# pra - jAyai̱|haryaśvEti# hari - aśva|mRuḍaya|indra|mA|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dadabdhO̍ gOpAḥ paripAhi̍ nastvaM|pratya~jcO# yantu nigutaḥ punastE# &maiṣA̱M cittaM prabudhA vinEśat||dhAtA̍ dhAtRuṇAM̍ Buvanasya̍ yaspati# rdEvaṃ savitAra̍maBi̍ mAtiṣAha̱M|imaM ~Myajña maśvinOBA bRuhaspati# rdEvAḥ pA̱ntu yajamAnaM̍ nyartthAt||uruvyacA# nO mahiṣaḥ śarma# yaṃ sadasmin. havE# puruhUtaḥ purukṣu|sa̍ naḥ̍ prajAyai# haryaśva mRuḍayEndra mA - [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam naḥ|rIriṣaḥ|mA|parEti|dAḥ||yE|naḥ|sapatnA̱ḥ|apEti̍|tE|Bavantu|indrAgniByAmitI̱ndrAgni-ByAm|avEti̍|bAdhAmahE|tAn||vasa̍vaḥ|rudrAḥ|AdityAḥ|uparispRuśamityu̍pari̍ - spRuśa̱m|mA|ugram|cEttAram|adhirAjamitya̍dhi̍ - rAjam|akrann||arvA~jca̱m|indra̱m|amutaḥ|havAmahE|yaḥ|gOjiditi̍# gO - jit|dhanajiditi# dhana - jit|aśvajidityaśva̍ - jit|yaḥ||imam|naḥ|yajñam|vihava iti# vi - havE|juṣasva|asya|kurmaḥ|hariva iti# hari - vaḥ|mEdina̱m|tvA||32 (43) (vaniṣanta - purastAn - mA - tricatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A14)
verses.samhita: nO# rIriṣO mA parA# dAḥ||yE naḥ̍ sapatnA apatE BavantvindrA-gniByAmava̍# bAdhAmahE tAn|vasavO̍ rudrA AdityA̍ upari̍ spRuśaM̍ mOgraM cEttAramadhi̍ rAjamakrann||arvA~jca̍ mindramamutO̍# havAmahE yO gOjid-dhana-jida̍śva-jidyaḥ|imannO̍# yajñaM ~MvihavE̍ juṣasvAsya̍ kurmO̍ harivO mEdinaM̍ tvA||32 (vaniṣanta - purastAn - mA - tricatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam agnEḥ|manvE|prathamasya|pracE̍tasa̍ iti pra - cEtasaḥ|yam|pA~jcajanyamiti̍ pA~jca# - janyam|bahavaḥ|samindhata̍ iti# sam - indhatE̱||viśvasyAm|viśi|praviviśivAṃsamiti̍# pra - viviśivAṃsa̱m|ImahE|saḥ|naḥ|mu~jcatu|aṃhasaḥ||yasya̍|idam|prAṇaditi̍# pra - anat|nimiṣaditi# ni - miṣat|yat|Ejati|yasya̍|jAtam|jana̍mAnam|ca|kEva̍lam||staumi̍|agnim|nAthitaḥ|jOhavImi|saḥ|naḥ|mu~jcatu|aṃha̍saḥ||indra̍sya|manyE|prathamasya̍|pracE̍tasa̍ iti pra - cEtasaḥ|vRutraGna iti# vRutra-Gnaḥ|stOmA̱ḥ|upEti|mAm|upAgurityu̍pa̍ - Aguḥ||yaḥ|dAśuṣa̍ḥ|sukRuta̍ iti# su - kRutaḥ|hava̱m|upEti̍|gantA̱|33̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agnErmanvE̍ prathamasya pracEtasO̍ yaM pA~jcajanyaM̍ bahavaḥ̍ samindhatE̱|viśvasyAM̍ ~Mviśi praviviśivAṃ̍ samImahE̍ sa nO# mu~jcatvaṃ hasaḥ||yasyEdaM̍ prAṇannimiṣad̍ yadEjati̍ yasya# jAtaM janamAnaM̍ ca kEvalaM|staumyagniM̍ nAthitO̍ jOhavImi̍ sa nO# mu~jcatvaṃ hasaḥ||indra̍sya̍ manyE prathamasya pracEtasO̍ vRutraGnaḥ stOmA upa mAmupAguḥ|yO̍ dAśuṣaḥ̍ sukRutO havamupa gantA - [ ] 33

verses.padam: - Padam saḥ|naḥ|mu~jcatu|aṃhasaḥ||yaḥ|sagrAMqmamiti̍# sam - grAmam|nayati|samiti̍|vaśI|yudhE|yaḥ|puṣṭAni̍|saṃqsRujatIti̍# saM-sRujati|trayAṇi̍||staumi̍|indra̱m|nAthitaḥ|jOhavImi|saḥ|naḥ|mu~jcatu|aṃha̍saḥ||manvE|vAm|mitrAvaruṇEti̍# mitrA - varuṇA|tasya|vittam|satyau̍jasEti̍ satya# - OjasA|dRuṃqhaṇA|yam|nudEthE iti||yA|rAjA̍nam|sarathamiti̍# sa-ratha̱m|yAthaḥ|ugrA|tA|naḥ|mu~jcatam|Agasaḥ||yaḥ|vAm|ratha̍ḥ|Rujura̍śmirityRuju̍ - raśmiḥ|satyadharmEti# satya - dharmA|mithu|cara̍ntam|upayAtItyu̍pa̍ - yAti|dUṣayann̍||staumi̍|34̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sa nO# mu~jcatvaṃ hasaḥ||yaḥ̍ saMgrAmaM̍ nayati̍ saM~M ~MvaśI yudhE yaḥ puṣṭAni# saṃsRujati# trayAṇi|staumIndra̍M̍ nAthitO jOhavImi̍ sa nO# mu~jcatvaṃ hasaḥ||manvE̍ vA̱M mitrA varuṇA tasya# vittaṃq satyaujasA̍ dRuṃhaṇA yaM nudEthE̱|yA rAjAnaṃ̍ sarathaM̍ ~MyAtha ugrA̍ tA nO# mu~jcatamAgasaḥ||yO̍ vAṃq ratha# Rujuraśmiḥ̍ satyadharmA̍ mithu ścaranta-mupayAti̍# dUṣayann|staumi̍# - [ ] 34

verses.padam: - Padam mitrAvaruṇEti# mitrA - varuṇA|nAthitaḥ|jOhavImi|tau|naḥ|mu~jcatam|Aga̍saḥ||vAyOḥ|savituḥ|vidathA̍ni|manmahE|yau|AtmanvadityA̱tmann̍ - vat|biBRutaḥ|yau|ca|rakṣataḥ||yau|viśva̍sya|pariBU̍ iti# pari - BUḥ|baBUvatuḥ|tau|naḥ|mu~jcatam|Aga̍saḥ||upEti̍|śrEṣṭhA̱ḥ|naḥ|Aśiṣa̍ ityA̱ - śiṣaḥ|dEvayO̱ḥ|dharmE̱|asthirann||staumi̍|vAyum|savitAra̱m|nAthitaḥ|jOhavImi|tau|naḥ|mu~jcatam|Aga̍saḥ||rathIta̍mAviti̍# rathi - tamau|rathInAm|ahvE|UtayE̱|śuBa̱M|gamiṣṭhau|suyamE̍Biriti̍# su - yamEBiḥ|aśvai̱ḥ||yayO̱ḥ|35̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mitrAvaruṇA̍ nAthitO jOhavImi̍ tau nO# mu~jcatamAgasaḥ||vAyOḥ̍ savitu̍ rvidathAni̍ manmahE yAvA̱tmanvad-biBRutO̍ yau ca rakṣataḥ|yau̍ viśvasya̍ pariBU baBUvatustau̍ nO# mu~jcatamAgasaḥ||upa̍ śrEṣṭhAna̍ AśiṣO# dEvayOrddharmE# asthirann|staumi# vAyuṃ savitAra̍M̍ nAthitO jOhavImi̍ tau nO# mu~jcatamAgasaḥ||rathIta̍mau̍ rathInAmahva̍ UtayE śuBaM gamiṣṭhau̍ suyamEBiraśvai̱ḥ|yayO̱̍ -[ ] 35

verses.padam: - Padam vAm|dEvau|dEvEṣu|ani̍śitamityani̍-śitam|Oja̍ḥ|tau|naḥ|mu~jcatam|Aga̍saḥ||yat|ayA̍tam|vahatum|sUryAyA̱ḥ|tricakrEṇEti̍# tri - cakrEṇa|saṃqsadamiti̍# sam - sada̱m|icCamAnau||staumi̍|dEvau|aśvinau̱|nAthitaḥ|jOhavImi|tau|naḥ|mu~jcatam|Aga̍saḥ||marutA̱m|manvE|adhIti̍|naḥ|bruvantu|prEti̍|imAm|vAca̱m|viśvA̱m|avantu|viśvE̱||AśUn|huvE|suyamAniti̍# su - yamAn|UtayE̱|tE|naḥ|mu~jcantu|Ena̍saḥ||tigmam|Ayu̍dham|vIḍitam|saha̍svat|divyam|śarddha̍ḥ|36̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -rvAM dEvau dEvEṣva-niśita-mOjastau̍ nO# mu~jcatamAgasaḥ||yadayA̍taM̍ ~Mva~Mhatuṃ sUryAyA̱-stricakrEṇa# saṃq sadamicCamA̍nau|staumi̍# dEvA vaśvinau# nAthitO jOhavImi̍ tau nO# mu~jcatamAgasaḥ||marutA̱M̍ manvE adhinO̍ bruvantu prEmAM ~MvAcaM ~MviśvA# mavantu viśvE̱|AśUn. huvE̍ suyamAnUtayE̍ tE nO# mu~jcantvEnasaḥ||tigmamAyu̍dhaM̍ ~MvIḍitaṃ sahasvad̍ divyaṃ śarddhaḥ - [ ] 36

verses.padam: - Padam pRutanAsu|jiṣṇu||staumi̍|dEvAn|maruta̍ḥ|nAthitaḥ|jOhavImi|tE|naḥ|mu~jcantu|Ena̍saḥ||dEvAnA̱m|manvE|adhIti̍|naḥ|bruvantu|prEti̍|imAm|vAca̱m|viśvA̱m|avantu|viśvE̱||AśUn|huvE|suyamAniti̍# su - yamAn|UtayE̱|tE|naḥ|mu~jcantu|Ena̍saḥ||yat|idam|mA|aBiśOcatItya̍Bi-śOca̍ti|pauru̍ṣEyEṇa|daivyE̍na||staumi̍|viśvAn̍|dEvAn|nAthitaḥ|jOhavImi|tE|naḥ|mu~jcantu|Ena̍saḥ||anviti̍|naḥ|adya|anu̍matiriyanu̍# - matiḥ|anviti|37̍ (50)
verses.samhita: - anunO&dyAnu̍mati̍ >1, ranvidanumatE̍ tvaM >2 anu# nO&dyA&numatiryajñaM̍ dEvEṣu# manyatAM|agniśca# havyavAhanO̍ BavatAM̍ dAśuṣE mayaḥ||anvida̍numatE̍ tvaM manyAsai̍ śa~jcanaḥ̍ kRudhi|kratvE dakṣAya̍ nO hinu praṇa AyUṃṣi̍ tAriṣaḥ||

verses.padam: - Padam it|anumata ityanu̍ - matE|tvam|vaiśvAnaraḥ|naḥ|UtyA|pRuṣṭaḥ|divi||yE iti|apra̍thEtAm|ami̍tEBiḥ|OjO̍BirityOja̍ḥ̍ - Biḥ|yE iti|pratiṣṭhE̍ iti# prati - sthE|aBavatAm|vasU̍nAm||staumi̍|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|nAthitaḥ|jOhavImi|tE iti|naḥ|mu~jcatam|aṃha̍saḥ||urvI̍ iti|rOdasI̍ iti|vari̍vaḥ|kRuṇOtam|kṣEtra̍sya|patnI̍ iti|adhIti̍|naḥ|brUyAtam||staumi̍|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|nAthitaḥ|jOhavImi|tE iti|naḥ|mu~jcatam|aṃha̍saḥ||yat|tE|vayam|puruṣatrEti̍# puruṣa-trA|yaviṣṭha|avidvAṃsaḥ|cakRuma|kat|cana|38̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -vai̱śvAnarO na# UtyA>3, pRuṣṭO divi> 4 vaiśvAnarO na# UtyA && pra yAtu̍ parAvataḥ|agnirukthEna̍ vAhasA||pRuṣṭO̍ divi pRuṣṭO agniḥ pRuthivyAM̍ pRuṣṭO viśvA OṣadhIrA̍ vivEśa|vaiśvAnaraḥ̍ sahasA̍ pRuṣṭO agniḥ sanO divA sa riṣaḥ pAtu̍ nakta̱M||

verses.padam: - Padam Agaḥ||kRudhi|sviti̍|asmAn|adi̍tEḥ|anA̍gAḥ|vIti̍|EnAṃ̍si|śiśrathaḥ|viṣva̍k|agnE||yathA̱|ha|tat|vasavaḥ|gaurya̱m|cit|padi|sitAm|amu̍~jcata|yajatrAḥ||EvA|tvam|asmat|prEti̍|mu~jca|vIti̍|aṃha̍ḥ|prEti̍|atAri|agnE|pratarAmiti̍# pra - tarAm|naḥ|Ayuḥ||39̍ (34) (gantA# - dUṣayanth staumi - yayOḥ - śarddhO& - numatiranu̍# - cana - catustriṃśacca)̍ (A15) śpecial Korvai for Anuvaakam A-15 (agnErmanvE̍ - yasyEda- mindrasya̍ - yaḥ saM̍ grAmamindraṃq - sa nO# mu~jcatvaṃ hasaḥ|manvE̍ vAntA nO# mu~jcatamAgasaḥ|yO̍ vA̱M - vAyO- rupa# - rathItamau̍ - yadayAta-maśvinau̍ - tau nO# mu~jcatamAgasaḥ|marutA̱n-̍ tigmaM - marutO# - dEvAnAM - ~MyadidaM ~MviśvAn - tE nO# mu~jcantvEnasaḥ|anu̍# na - urvI - dyAvApRuthivI̍ - tE nO# mu~jcatamaṃhasO̍ yattai̱|caturaṃ hasaḥ̍ ṣAḍAgasaścaturEna̍sO̍ dviraṃhasaḥ|Prasna̍ Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 15 Anuvaakams :- agnAviṣṇU̍ - jyaiṣṭhayaṃq - śa~jcO - rkcA - &śmA# cA - gniścA- &ṃqśu - ścEddhmaścA -&gniśca# GarmA - garBA - ścaikA# ca - vAjO# nO - agniM ~Myunajmi̍ - mamA̱&gnE - agnErmanvE̍ - pa~jcadaśa|Korvai̍ with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (agnAviṣṇU̍ - agniśca - vAjO# nO - adabdhO̍ gOpA-navatriṃśat̍ ) First and Last Padam of śeventh Prasnam of Kandam 4:- (agnAviṣṇU̍ - pratarAnna Ayuḥ̍ ) Kanda Korvai with starting Padams of 7 Prasanas of Kandam 4:- (yu~jjAnO - viṣṇO-̍ rapAṃq - raśmi - rnamO -&śma - agnAviṣṇU̍ - sapta )||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM caturthakAṇḍE pada pAṭhE saptamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||||iti caturthaM kAṇḍaM||-------------------------------------------
verses.samhita: &&*gaḥ|kRudhI̍ svasmAṃ̍ aditEranA̍gA̍ vyEnAṃsi̍ śiśrathO viṣvagagnE||yathA̍# ha tad vasavO̍ gauryaM̍ cit padiṣitA mamu~jcatA̍ yajatrAḥ|EvA tvamasmat pramu~jcA̍ vyaṃhaḥ prAtA̱ryagnE pratarAnna Ayuḥ||39̍ (gantA# - dUṣayanth staumi - yayOḥ - śarddhO& - numatiranu̍# - cana - catustriṃśacca)̍ (A15) special kOrvai for anuvAkam A-15 (agnErmanvE̍ - yasyEda- mindrasya̍ - yaḥ saM̍ grAmamindraṃq - sa nO# mu~jcatvaṃ hasaḥ|manvE̍ vAntA nO# mu~jcatamAgasaḥ|yO̍ vA̱M - vAyO- rupa# - rathItamau̍ - yadayAta-maśvinau̍ - tau nO# mu~jcatamAgasaḥ|marutA̱n-̍ tigmaM - marutO# - dEvAnAM - ~MyadidaM ~MviśvAn - tE nO# mu~jcantvEnasaḥ|anu̍# na - urvI - dyAvApRuthivI̍ - tE nO# mu~jcatamaṃhasO̍ yattai̱|caturaṃ hasaḥ̍ ṣAḍAgasaścaturEna̍sO̍ dviraṃhasaḥ|praśna̍ kOrvai with starting padams of 1 to 15 anuvAkams :- agnAviṣṇU̍ - jyaiṣṭhayaṃq - śa~jcO - rkcA - &śmA# cA - gniścA- &ṃqśu - ścEddhmaścA -&gniśca# GarmA - garBA - ścaikA# ca - vAjO# nO - agniM ~Myunajmi̍ - mamA̱&gnE - agnErmanvE̍ - pa~jcadaśa|kOrvai̍ with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (agnAviṣṇU̍ - agniśca - vAjO# nO - adabdhO̍ gOpA - navatriṃśat̍ ) first and last padam of seventh praśnam of kAṇḍam 4:- (agnAviṣṇU̍ - pratarAnna Ayuḥ̍ ) kAṇḍa kOrvai with starting padams of 7 Prasanas of kAṇḍam 4:-(yu~jjAnO - viṣṇO-̍ rapAṃq - raśmi - rnamO -&śma - agnAviṣṇU̍ - sapta )||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM caturthakAṇḍE saptamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||||iti caturthaM kAṇḍaM||4.7.1 appendix

verses.padam: - Padam sAvitrAṇi|juhOti|prasU̱tyA̍ iti pra - sUtyai|caturgRuhItEnEti# catuḥ - gRuhItEna|juhOti|catu̍ṣpAda̍ iti catuḥ-pAdaḥ|paśava̍ḥ|paśUn|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|cata̍sraḥ|diśa̍ḥ|dikṣu|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|CandAṃ̍si|dEvEBya̍ḥ|apEti̍|akrAmann|na|vaḥ|aBAgAni̍|havyam|vakṣyAmaḥ|iti̍|tEBya̍ḥ|Etat|caturgRuhItamiti̍# catuḥ - gRuhItam|adhArayann|purOnuvAkyAyA̍ iti# puraḥ - anuvAkyAyai|yAjyA̍yai|dEvatA̍yai|vaṣaṭkArAyEti̍# vaṣaṭ - kArAya|yat|caturgRuhItamiti̍# catuḥ - gRuhItam|juhOti|CandAṃ̍si|Eva|tat|prIṇAti|tAmi̍|asya|prItAni̍|dEvEBya̍ḥ|havyam|vahanti|yam|kAmayE̍ta|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sAvitrAṇi# juhOti prasU̱tyai caturgRuhItEna# juhOti catuṣpAdaḥ̍ paśavaḥ̍ paśUnEvA&va# rundhE catasrO̍ diśO# dikṣvEva̍ prati# tiṣṭhati CandAṃsi̍ dEvEByO &pA̱&krAman na vO# BAgAni# havyaM ~MvakṣyAma̍ iti tEBya# Etaccatu-rgRuhItama̍-dhArayan̍ purO&nu vAkyAyai̍ yAjyAyai̍ dEvatAyai̍ vaṣaṭkArAya yaccaturgRuhItaM̍ juhOti CandAṅsyEva̍ tat prIṇAti̍ tAnyasya̍ prItAni# dEvEByO# havyaM ~Mvahanti̍ yaM kAmayEta̍ - [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam pApIyAn|syAt|iti̍|Ekai̍kamityEka̱m̍ - Ekam|tasya|juhuyAt|Ahu̍tIBirityAhu̍ti̍ - Biḥ|Eva|Enam|avEti|gRuhṇAti|pApI̍yAn|Bavati|yam|kAmayE̍ta|vasI̍yAn|syAt|iti̍|sarvA̍ṇi|tasya̍|anudrutyEtya̍nu̍ - drutya|juhuyAt|AhutyEtyA̍ - hutyA|Eva|Enam|aBIti|kramayati|vasI̍yAn|Bavati|athO̍ iti|yajñasya̍|Eva|EṣA|aBikrA̱ntirityaBi̍ - krAntiḥ|Eti|vai|Eṣaḥ|yajñamuKAditi̍# yajña-muKAt|RuddhyA̱ḥ|yaḥ|agnEḥ|dEvatAyAḥ|Eti̍|aṣṭau|EtAni̍|sAvitrAṇi̍|Bavanti|aṣṭAkṣarEtyaṣṭA̍ - akṣarA|gAyatrI|gAyatraḥ|2 (50)
verses.samhita: pApIyAnth̍ syAdityEkaikaM̍ tasya# juhuyA-dAhutIBirEvainamapa̍# gRuhṇAti pApIyAn̍ Bavati yaM kAmayEta̍ vasIyAnth̍ syAditi sarvAṇi̍ tasyA&nudrutya̍# juhuyAdAhutyaivaina̍maBi̍ kramayati̍ vasIyAn̍ BavatyathO# yajñasyaivaiṣA-&BikrA̱ntirEti vA Eṣa yajñamuKA-dRuddhyA̍ yO̱&gnErdEvatAyA̍ EtyaṣṭAvEtAni# sAvitrAṇi# BavantyaṣṭAkṣarA̍ gAyatrI gAyatrO̱̍ - [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam agniḥ|tEna|Eva|yajñamuKAditi̍# yajña - muKAt|RuddhyA̱ḥ|agnEḥ|dEvatAyai|na|Eti|aṣṭau|sAvitrAṇi̍|Bavanti|Ahu̍tirityA̍ - hUtiḥ|navamI|trivRutamiti# tri - vRuta̱m|Eva|yajñamuKa iti# yajña - muKE|vIti|yAtayati|yadi̍|kAmayE̍ta|CandAṃ̍si|yajñayaśasEnEti̍# yajña - yaśasEna|arpayEyam|iti̍|Ruca̱m|antamAm|kuryAt|CandAṃ̍si|Eva|yajñayaśasEnEti̍# yajña - yaśasEna|arpayati|yadi̍|kAmayE̍ta|yaja̍mAnam|yajñayaśasEnEti̍# yajña - yaśasEna|arpayEyam|iti̍|yaju̍ḥ|antamam|kuryAt|yaja̍mAnam|Eva|yajñayaśasEnEti̍# yajña - yaśasEna|arpayati|RucA|stOma̱m|samiti̍|ad^^rdhaya|iti̍|3̍ (50)
verses.samhita: &gnistEnaiva yajñamuKAdRuddhyA̍# agnErdEvatAyai̍ naityaṣṭau sAvitrAṇi̍# BavantyAhutirnavamI̍ trivRutamEva̍ yajñamuKE̍ viyAtayati̍ yadi# kAmayEta̍ CandAṃsi̍ yajñayaśasEnA̱ &rpayEyamityRucamantamAM̍ kuryAcCandAṅ̍syEva̍ yajñayaśasEnA̱̍ &rpayati yadi# kAmayEta̍ yajamAnaM̍ ~MyajñayaśasEnA̱-&rpayEyamiti yajurantamaM̍ kuryAd-yaja̍mAnamEva̍ yajñayaśasEnA̱-&rpayatyRucA̍ stOmaṃq samarddhayEtyA̍# - [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam Aha|samRuddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|catuBiriti# catuḥ - Biḥ|aBri̱m|Eti|dattE|catvAri̍|CandAṃ̍si|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|Eva|dEvasya|tvA|savituḥ|prasava̍ iti# pra - savE|iti|Aha|prasU̱tyA̍ iti pra - sUtyai|agniḥ|dEvEByaḥ|nilA̍yata|saḥ|vEṇu̱m|prEti̍|aviśat|saḥ|EtAm|Utim|anu̍|samiti̍|acarat|yat|vEṇO̱ḥ|suṣiram|suṣirA|aBri̍ḥ|Bavati|sayOnitvAyEti̍# sayOni - tvAya|saḥ|yatra̍yatrEti̍ yatra# - yatra|avasat|tat|kRuṣṇam|aBavat|kalmAṣI|Bavati|rUpasa̍mRuddhyA̍ iti# rUpa - samRuddhyai|uBayataḥ kṣṇUrityuBayataḥ-kṣṇUḥ|Bavati|itaḥ|ca̍ ( )|amutaḥ|ca|arkasya̍|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|vyAmamAtrIti# vyAma - mAtrI|Bavati|EtAvat|vai|puru̍ṣE|vIrya̱m|vIrya̍sammitEti̍# vIrya# - sammitA|aparimitEtyapa̍ri-mitA|Bavati|apa̍rimitasyEtyapa̍ri̍ - mitasya|avaruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|yaḥ|vanaspatInAm|Palagrahiriti̍# Pala - grahiḥ|saḥ|EṣAm|vIryA̍vAniti̍# vIrya# - vAn|Palagrahiriti# Pala - grahiḥ|vEṇu̍ḥ|vaiṇavI|Bavati|vIrya̍sya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai||4 (77) (kAmayEta̍ - gAyatrO̱ - &rddhayEti# - ca - saptaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A1)
verses.samhita: -ha samRuddhyai̍ caturBiraBrimA dattE̍ catvAri CandAṃsi̍ CandOBirEva̍ dEvasya# tvA savituḥ prasava̍ ityAha̍ prasU̱tyA agnirdEvEByO nilAyata̍ sa vEṇuM prA&viśath̍ sa EtAmUtimanu samacarad-yad-vEṇO̱ḥ̍ suṣiraṃ suṣirA-&Bri̍rBavati̍ sayOnitvAya sa yatrayatrA&va̍sat̍ tat kRuṣṇamaBavat̍ kalmAṣI Bavati̍ rUpasamRuddhyA̍ uBayataḥ kṣṇUrBavatItaścA&-(̍ ) -mutaścA&rkasyA-va̍ruddhyai̍ vyAmamAtrI BavatyEtAvadvai̍ puruṣE̍ vIryaM̍ ~MvIryasammitA̍ &parimitA̍ Bavatya-parimitasyA&̍ varuddhyai̍ yO vanaspatInAM̍ Palagrahiḥ sa EṣAM̍ ~MvIryAvAn̍ PalagrahirvEṇu-rvaiṇavI̍ Bavati̍ vIryasyA̍ varuddhyai||4̍ (kAmayEta̍ - gAyatrO̱ - &rddhayEti# - ca - saptaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam vyRuddhamiti̍ vi - Ruddham|vai|Etat|yajñasya|yat|ayajuṣkEṇEtya̍yajuḥ-kEna|kriyatE̱|imAm|agRuBṇann|raśanAm|Rutasya̍|iti̍|aśvABidhAnImitya̍śva̍ - aBidhAnI̱m|Eti|dattE|yaju̍ṣkRutyA̍ iti yajuḥ-kRutyai|yajñasya̍|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM-Ruddhyai|pratU̱rtamiti pra - tUrtam|vAjinn|Eti|drava|iti̍|aśva̱m|aBIti̍|dadhAti|rUpam|Eva|asya|Etat|mahimAna̱m|vyAca̍ṣṭa̍ iti# vi - AcaṣṭE|yu~jjAthA̱m|rAsa̍Bam|yuvam|iti̍|gardaBam|asa̍ti|Eva|gardaBam|pratIti̍|sthApayati|tasmA̱t|aśvA̱t|gardaBaḥ|asa̍ttara̍ ityasat̍ - taraḥ|yOgEyOga̍ iti yOgE̱ - yOgE|tavastaramiti̍# tavaḥ - taram|iti|Aha|5̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vyRuddhaM̍ ~MvA Etad-yajñasya yadayajuṣkE̍ṇa̍ kriyata# imAmagRuBṇan̍ raśanA-mRutasyEtyaśvABidhAnImA̍ dattE̍ yajuṣkRutyai̍ yajñasya samRuddhyai̍ pratU̱rtaM ~MvAjinnA dravEtyaśvamaBi̍ dadhAti̍ rUpamEvAsyaitan mahimAnaM̍ ~MvyAcaṣṭE̍ yu~jjAthAṃq rAsaBaM̍ ~Myuvamiti# gardaBamasEtyEva̍ gardaBaM̍ prati# ṣṭhApayati tasmAdaśvA̱d-gardaBO&sattarO̍ yOgEyOgE̍ tavastaramityA̍ha̍ - [ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam yOgEyOga̍ iti yOgE̱ - yOgE|Eva|Enam|yu~gktE|vAjEvAja̍ iti vAjE̱- vAjE|havAmahE|iti|Aha|anna̱m|vai|vAja̍ḥ|anna̱m|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|saKA̍yaḥ|indra̱m|UtayE̱|iti̍|Aha|indriyam|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|agniḥ|dEvEBya̍ḥ|nilA̍yata|tam|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|anviti|avindat|prAjApatya̍ iti# prAjA - patyaḥ|aśvaḥ|aśvE̍na|samiti̍|Barati|anu̍vittyA̍ ityanu# - vittyai|pApavasyasamiti# pApa - vasyasam|vai|Etat|kriyatE|yat|śrEyasA|ca|pApI̍yasA|ca|samAnam|karma̍|kurvanti̍|pApI̍yAn|6̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yOgEyOga̍ EvainaM̍ ~Myu~gktE vAjEvAjE̍ havAmaha ityAhAnnaM ~Mvai vAjO-&nnamEvAva̍# rundhE saKAya̍ indramUtaya̍ ityAhEndriyamEvAva̍# rundhE &gnirdEvEByO nilAyata̍ taM prajApatiranva̍vindat̍ prAjApatyO&śvO &śvEna̍ saM Baratyanu̍vittyai̍ pApavasyasaM ~MvA Etat kriyatE̍ yacCrEyasA̍ ca pApIyasA̍ ca samAnaM karma# kurvanti pApIyAnq.̍ - [ ] 6

verses.padam: - Padam hi|aśvA̱t|gardaBaḥ|aśva̱m|pUrva̱m|nayanti|pApavasyasasyEti# pApa - vasyasasya|vyAvRu̍ttyA̍ iti# vi - AvRuttyai|tasmA̱t|śrEyAṃ̍sam|pApI̍yAn|paścAt|anviti̍|Eti|bahuḥ|vai|Bava̍taḥ|BrAtRu̍vyaḥ|Bava̍ti|iva|Kalu̍|vai|Eṣaḥ|yaḥ|agnim|cinutE|vajrI|aśva̍ḥ|pratUrvanniti̍# pra - tUrvann|Eti̍|ihi|avakrAmannitya̍va̍ - krAmann|aśa̍stIḥ|iti̍|Aha|vajrE̍ṇa|Eva|pApmAna̱m|BrAtRu̍vyam|avEti̍|krAmati|rudrasya̍|gAṇa̍patyAditi̍ gAṇa# - patyAt|iti|Aha|raudrAḥ|vai|paśava̍ḥ|rudrAt|Eva|7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: hyaśvA̱d-gardaBO&śvaM pUrvaM̍ nayanti pApavasya-sasya vyAvRuttyai̍ tasmAcCrEyAṃsaM̍ pApIyAn̍ paścAdanvEti̍ bahurvai BavatO̍ BrAtRuvyO̍ BavatIva̍ Kalu vA Eṣa yO̱&gniM cinutE̍ vajryaśvaḥ̍ pratUrvannEhyava-krAmanna-śa̍stIrityA̍ha̍ vajrEṇaiva̍ pApmAnaM BrAtRuvyamava̍# krAmati rudrasya gAṇapatyAdityA̍ha̍ raudrA vai paśavO# rudrAdEva - [ ] 7

verses.padam: - Padam paśUn|niryAcyEti# niḥ - yAcya|AtmanE̱|karma̍|kurutE|pUṣṇA|sayujEti̍# sa-yujA̱|saha|iti|Aha|pUṣA|vai|addhva̍nAm|sanEMqtEti̍# saM - nEtA|samaṣṭyA̍ iti saM - aṣṭyai|purIṣAyatana̍ iti purIṣa̍ - Ayatanaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|agniḥ|a~ggirasaḥ|vai|Etam|agrE̱|dEvatA̍nAm|samiti̍|aBarann|pRuthivyAḥ|sadhasthAditi̍# sadha - sthAt|agnim|purIṣya̱m|a~ggirasvat|acCa|ihi|iti̍|Aha|sAya̍tanamiti̍ sa - Ayatanam|Eva|Enam|dEvatABiḥ|samiti̍|Barati|agnim|purIṣya̱m|a~ggirasvat|acCa̍|imaḥ|iti̍|Aha|yEna̍|8̍ (50)
verses.samhita: paśUn niryAcyA&&*tmanE karma# kurutE pUṣṇA sayujA# sahEtyAha̍ pUṣA vA addhvanAṃ̍ sannEtA samaṣṭyai̍ purIṣAyatanO̍ vA Eṣa yadagnira~ggirasO̍ vA EtamagrE# dEvatAnAṃq̍ samaBaran̍ pRuthivyAḥ sadhasthAdagniM̍ purIṣya̍-ma~ggirasva-dacCEhItyA̍ha̍ sAyatanamEvaina̍M̍ dEvatABiḥ̍ saM BaratyagniM̍ purIṣya̍-ma~ggirasva-̍ dacCEma̍ ityAha̍ yEna# - [ ] 8

verses.padam: - Padam sagaMcCata̍ iti# saM - gacCatE|vAja̱m|Eva|asya|vRu~gktE|prajApa̍taya̍ iti# prajA - patayE|pratiprOcyEti# prati - prOcya|agniḥ|saBRuMtya̍ iti# saM - BRutyaḥ|iti̍|Ahuḥ|iyam|vai|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|tasyA̱ḥ|Etat|śrOtra̱m|yat|valmIkaḥ|agnim|purIṣya̱m|a~ggirasvat|BariṣyAmaḥ|iti̍|valmIkavapAmiti̍# valmIka - vapAm|upEti|tiṣṭhatE|sAkṣAditi̍# sa-akṣAt|Eva|prajApataya̍ iti# prajA - patayE|pratiprOcyEti# prati - prOcya|agnim|samiti̍|Barati|agnim|purIṣya̱m|a~ggirasvat|BarAmaḥ|iti̍|Aha|yEna̍|sagaMcCa̍ta̍ iti# saM-gacCatE|vAja̱m|Eva|asya|vRu~gktE|anviti̍|agniḥ|uṣasA̱m|agra̱m|9̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sa~ggacCatE̍ vAjamEvAsya̍# vRu~gktE prajApatayE̍ pratiprOcyAgniḥ samBRutya ityAhuriyaM̍ ~Mvai prajApatistasyA̍# EtacCrOtraM ~MyadvalmIkO&gniM purIṣya̍-ma~ggirasvad-Ba̍riṣyAma̍ iti# valmIkavapAmupa# tiṣṭhatE sAkṣAdEva prajApatayE̍ pratiprOcyA&gniṃ saM BaratyagniM̍ purIṣya̍-ma~ggirasvad-Ba̍rAma̍ ityAha̍ yEna# sagaMcCatE̍ vAjamEvAsya̍# vRu~gktE &nvagniruṣasAmagra# - [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam aKyat|iti|Aha|anu̍KyAtyA̍ ityanu# - KyAtyai|AgatyEtyA̱ - gatya|vAjI|addhva̍naḥ|AkramyEtyA̱̍ - kramya|vAjinn|pRuthivIm|iti̍|Aha|icCati̍|Eva|Enam|pUrva̍yA|vindati̍|utta̍rayEtyut̍ - tarayA|dvAByA̱m|Eti|kramayati|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|anurUpAByAmityanu̍# - rUpAByAm|tasmA̱t|anurUpA̍ ityanu-rUpAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|prEti̍|jAyantE|dyauḥ|tE|pRuṣṭham|pRuthivI|sadhasthamiti̍# sadha - stham|iti|Aha|EByaḥ|vai|Etam|lOkEBya̍ḥ|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|samiti|airayat|rUpam|Eva|asya|Etat|mahimAna̱m|vyAca̍ṣṭa̍ iti# vi - AcaṣṭE|vajrI|vai̍ ( )|Eṣaḥ|yat|aśvaḥ|dadBiriti̍# dat - Biḥ|anyatOdadBya̍ ityanyatOdat-Byaḥ|BUyAn̍|lOma̍Biriti̍ lOma-Biḥ|uBayAda̍dBya̍ ityuBayAda̍t̍ - Byaḥ|yam|dviṣyAt|tam|adhaspadamityadhaḥ̍ - padam|dhyAyEt|vajrEṇa|Eva|Enam|stRuṇutE||10̍ (67)
verses.samhita: maKyadityAhA-nuKyAtyA̍ Agatya# vAjyaddhvana̍ Akramya# vAjin pRuthivImityAhEcCatyEvainaM̍ pUrvayA̍ vindatyuttarayA̍ dvAByAmA kramayati̍ pratiṣṭhityA̍ anurUpAByAM̍ tasmAdanurUpAḥ̍ paśavaḥ prajAyantE̍ dyaustE# pRuṣṭhaM pRuthivI̍ sadhasthamityAhaiByO̍ vA EtaM ~MlOkEByaḥ̍ prajApatiḥ̍ samairayad̍ rUpamEvAsyai-tanmahimAnaM̍ ~MvyAcaṣṭE̍ vajrI vA ( ) Eṣa yadaśvO# dad-BiranyatOdadByO̍ BUyAM ~MlOmaBiruBayAda̍dByO̍ yaM dviṣyAt tamadhaspadaM̍ dhyAyEd-vajrE̍ṇaivainaṅ̍# stRuṇutE||10

verses.padam: - Padam uditi|krAma|uditi̍|akramIt|iti̍|dvAByA̱m|uditi̍|kramayati|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|anurUpAByAmityanu̍-rUpAByAm|tasmA̱t|anu̍rUpA̍ ityanu-rUpAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|prEti̍|jAyantE|apaḥ|upEti̍|sRujati|yatra̍|vai|Apa̍ḥ|upagacCantItyu̍pa̍ - gacCanti|tat|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|Oṣa̍dhIḥ|pratitiṣṭha̍ntIriti̍# prati - tiṣṭhantIḥ|paśava̍ḥ|anu̍|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|paśUn|yajñaḥ|yajñam|yaja̍mAnaḥ|yaja̍mAnam|prajA̍ iti# pra-jAḥ|tasmA̱t|apaḥ|upEti|sRujati|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|yat|addhvaryuḥ|anagnau|AhutimityA̍ - hutim|juhuyAt|andhaḥ|addhvaryuḥ|11 (50)
verses.samhita: utkrAmO-dakramIditi̍ dvAByAmutkramayati̍ pratiṣṭhityA̍ anurUpAByAM̍ tasmAdanurUpAḥ̍ paśavaḥ prajAyantE̍ &pa upa# sRujati yatra vA Apa# upa gacCanti̍ tadOṣadhayaḥ̍ prati# tiṣṭhantyOṣadhIḥ̍ pratitiṣṭhantIḥ̍ paśavO&nu prati# tiṣṭhanti paśUn. yajñO yajñaM ~MyajamAnO̍ yajamAnaM̍ prajAstasmAdapa̍ upa# sRujati pratiṣṭhityai̍ yadaddhvaryu-ra̍nagnAvAhu̍tiM̍ juhuyAdandhO̱ &ddhvaryuḥ - [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam syAt|rakṣAṃsi|yajñam|hanyuḥ|hira̍ṇyam|upAsyEtyu̍pa̍ - asya|juhOti|agnivatItya̍gni̍ - vati|Eva|juhOti|na|andhaḥ|addhvaryuḥ|Bava̍ti|na|yajñam|rakṣAṃ̍si|Gnanti|jiGa̍rmi|agnim|mana̍sA|GRutEna̍|iti̍|Aha|mana̍sA|hi|puru̍ṣaḥ|yajñam|aBigacCatItya̍Bi̍ - gacCati|pratikṣyantamiti̍# prati - kṣyanta̱m|BuvanAni|viśvA̱|iti̍|Aha|sarva̱m|hi|Eṣaḥ|pratya~g|kṣEti̍|pRuthum|tiraścA|vaya̍sA|bRuhanta̱m|iti̍|Aha|alpa̍ḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|jAtaḥ|mahAn|12̍ (50)
verses.samhita: syAd-rakṣAṃsi̍ yajñaṃ hanyurqḥira̍ṇyamupAsya̍# juhOtyagnivatyEva juhOti̍ nAndhO̱-&ddhvaryurBavati̍ na yajñaṃ rakṣAṃsi̍ Gnanti jiGarmyagniM̍ manasA̍ GRutEnEtyAha̍ manasA̍ hi puruṣO̍ yajñamaBigacCa̍ti̍ pratikṣyantaM BuvanAni̍ viśvEtyAha̍ sarvaṅq hyEṣa̍ pratya~g kṣEti# pRuthuM tiraścA̍ vayasA̍ bRuhantamityAhA&lpO hyEṣa̍ jAtO mahAn - [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam Bavati|vyaci̍ṣṭham|anna̱m|raBasam|vidA̍nam|iti̍|Aha|anna̱m|Eva|asmai|svadayati|sarva̱m|asmai|svadatE|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|Eti̍|tvA|jiGarmi|vaca̍sA|GRutEna̍|iti̍|Aha|tasmA̱t|yat|puru̍ṣaḥ|mana̍sA|aBigacCatItya̍Bi̍ - gacCati|tat|vAcA|vadati|arakṣasA̱|iti̍|Aha|rakṣa̍sAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa# - hatyai|maryaśrIriti̍ marya# - śrIḥ|spRuhayadvarṇa̍ iti# spRuhayat-varṇaḥ|agniḥ|iti|Aha|apa̍citimityapa̍-citim|Eva|asminn|dadhAti|apa̍citimAnityapa̍citi̍ - mAn|Bavati|yaḥ|Evam|13 (50)
verses.samhita: Bavati̍ vyaciṣṭhamannaṃ̍# raBasaM ~MvidAnamityAhA̍ &nnamEvA&smai̱̍ svadayati sarvamasmai̍ svadatE ya EvaM ~MvEdA &&*tvA# jiGarmi vacasA̍ GRutEnEtyAha̍ tasmAd-yat puruṣO̍ manasA-&BigacCa̍ti̍ tad-vAcA vadatya̍ rakṣasEtyAha̍ rakṣasAmapa̍hatyai̍ maryaśrIḥ̍ spRuhayad-varṇO̍ agnirityAhA-pacitimEvA-&smi̍n̍ dadhAtya-pacitimAn̍ Bavati ya EvaM - [ ] 13

verses.padam: - Padam vEda|mana̍sA|tu|vai|tAm|Aptu̱m|arqḥati|yAm|addhvaryuḥ|anagnau|Ahu̍timityA̍ - hutim|juhOti|mana̍svatIByAm|juhOti|Ahu̍tyOrityA̍ - hUtyOḥ|Aptyai̱|dvAByA̱m|pratiṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|yajñamuKE yajñamuKa̍ iti# yajñamuKE - yajñamuKE|vai|kriyamAṇE|yajñam|rakṣAṃ̍si|jiGAṃqsanti|Etaṛhi̍|Kalu̍|vai|Etat|yajñamuKamiti̍# yajña - muKam|yaṛhi|Enat|Ahu̍tirityA̍ - hutiḥ|aśnutE|parIti|liKati|rakṣa̍sAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa# - hatyai|tisRuBiriti# tisRu - Biḥ|parIti|liKati|trivRuditi̍# tri - vRut|vai|agniḥ|yAvAn|Eva|agniḥ|tasmA̱t|rakṣAṃ̍si|apEti̍|hanti|14̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ~MvEda manasA̍ tvai tAmAptumaṛhati̍ yAmaddhvaryura̍-nagnAvAhu̍tiM̍ juhOti manasvatIByAM̍ juhOtyAhutyOrAptyai̍ dvAByAM pratiṣṭhityai̍ yajñamuKE yajñamuKE̍ vai kriyamAṇE̍ yajñaṃ rakṣAṃsi̍ jiGAṃ santyEtaṛhi Kalu vA Etad-yajñamuKaM̍ ~MyaṛhyEnadAhu̍tiraśnutE̍ pari# liKati rakṣasAmapa̍hatyai̍ tisRuBiḥ pari# liKati trivRudvA agniryAvAnEvA-&gnistasmAd-rakṣAṅqsyapa̍# hanti - [ ] 14

verses.padam: - Padam gAyatriyA|parIti|liKati|tEja̍ḥ|vai|gAyatrI|tEja̍sA|Eva|Enam|parIti̍|gRuhṇAti|triṣṭuBA̱|parIti̍|liKati|indriyam|vai|triṣṭuk|indriyEṇa̍|Eva|Enam|parIti̍|gRuhṇAti|anuṣṭuBEtya̍nu̍ - stuBA̱|parIti|liKati|anuṣṭubitya̍nu̍ - stup|sarvAṇi|CandAṃ̍si|pariBUriti̍# pari - BUḥ|paryA̱ptyA iti pari# - Aptyai|maddhyataḥ|anuṣṭuBEtyanu̍ - stuBA̱|vAk|vai|anuṣṭubityanu̍ - stup|tasmA̱t|maddhyataḥ|vAcA|vadAmaḥ|gAyatriyA|prathamayA̱|parIti|liKati|atha̍|anuṣṭuBEtya̍nu̍ - stuBA̱|atha|triṣṭuBA̱|tEja̍ḥ|vai|gAyatrI̍ ( )|yajñaḥ|anuṣṭugityanu̍ - stuk|indriyam|triṣṭup|tEjasA|ca|Eva|indriyEṇa̍|ca|uBayata̍ḥ|yajñam|parIti̍|gRuhṇAti||15̍ (63) (andhO̱&ddhvaryu - rmahAn - Bavati̍ ya Evaṃ - hanti̍ - triṣṭuBA tEjO vai gAyatrI̍ - trayOdaśa̍ ca) (A3)
verses.samhita: gAyatriyA pari# liKati tEjO vai gAyatrI̍ tEjasaivainaM̍ parigRuhṇAti̍ triṣṭuBA pari# liKatIndriyaM ~Mvai triṣṭugindriyEṇaivainaM̍ pari# gRuhṇAtyanuṣṭuBA pari# liKatyanuṣṭuP sarvAṇi̍ CandAṃsi̍ pariBUḥ paryA̱ptyai maddhyatO&nuṣṭuBA̍ vAgvA anuṣṭup̍ tasmA̱n maddhyatO vAcA vadAmO̍ gAyatriyA prathamayA̍ pari# liKatyathA-&nuṣṭuBA&tha̍# triṣṭuBA tEjO vai gAyatrI̍ ( ) yajñO# &nuṣṭugindriyaM̍ triṣṭup tEjasA̍ caivEndriyEṇa# cOBayatO# yajñaM pari# gRuhṇAti||15

verses.padam: - Padam dEvasya|tvA|savituḥ|prasava̍ iti# pra - savE|iti|Kanati|prasU̱tyA̍ iti pra - sUtyai|athO iti|dhUmam|Eva|EtEna̍|janayati|jyOti̍ṣmantam|tvA|agnE|supratI̍kamiti̍# su - pratIkam|iti̍|Aha|jyOti̍ḥ|Eva|EtEna̍|janayati|saḥ|agniḥ|jAtaḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|śucA|Arpayat|tam|dEvAḥ|ad^^rdharcEnEtyaqd^^rdha̍ - RucEna|aśamayann|śivam|prajABya̍ iti# pra - jAByaḥ|ahiṃ̍santam|iti̍|Aha|prajABya̍ iti# pra - jAByaḥ|Eva|Enam|śamayati|dvAByA̱m|Kanati|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|apAm|pRuṣṭham|asi|iti|puṣkaraparṇamiti̍# puṣkara - parṇam|Eti|16̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvasya# tvA savituḥ prasava̍ iti# Kanati prasU̱tyA athO# dhUmamEvaitEna# janayati jyOtiṣmantaM̍ tvA&gnE supratIkamityA̍ha̍ jyOtirEvaitEna̍# janayati sO̱&gnirjAtaḥ prajAḥ śucA&&rpayat̍ taM dEvA arddharcEnA̍-śamayacCivaM̍ prajAByO&hiṃ# santamityAha̍ prajABya# Evainaṃ# śamayati dvAByA̱M Kanati pratiṣṭhityA̍ apAM pRuṣṭhamasIti# puṣkaraparṇamA - [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam harati|apAm|vai|Etat|pRuṣṭham|yat|puṣkaraparṇamiti# puṣkara - parṇam|rUpEṇa|Eva|Enat|Eti̍|harati|puṣkaraparṇEnEti̍# puṣkara - parṇEna|samiti̍|Barati|yOni̍ḥ|vai|agnEḥ|puṣkaraparṇamiti̍# puṣkara - parṇam|sayOnimiti̍ sa-yOnim|Eva|agnim|samiti|Barati|kRuṣṇAjinEnEti̍# kRuṣṇa-ajinEna|samiti̍|Barati|yajñaḥ|vai|kRuṣṇAjinamiti̍# kRuṣṇa - ajinam|yajñEna|Eva|yajñam|samiti̍|Barati|yat|grAmyAṇA̱m|paśUnAm|carma̍ṇA|saBaMrEditi̍# saM - BarE̱t|grAmyAn|paśUn|śucA|arpayEt|kRuṣṇAjinEnEti# kRuṣṇa - ajinEna|samiti̍|Barati|AraṇyAn|Eva|paśUn|17̍ (50)
verses.samhita: haratyapAM̍ ~MvA Etat pRuṣṭhaM ~Myat puṣkaraparṇaṃ̍ rUpEṇaivainadA harati̍ puṣkaraparṇEna saM Barati̍ yOnirvA agnEḥ puṣkaraparṇaṃ̍ sayOnimEvAgniṃ̍ saMBarati̍ kRuṣṇAjinEna saMBarati̍ yajñO vai kRuṣṇAjinaM̍ ~MyajñEnaiva yajñaṃ saMBarati̍ yad grAmyAṇA̱M paśUnAM carmaṇA̍ saBaMrE̱d grAmyAn paśU~jCucA&rpayEt̍ kRuṣṇAjinEna saMBaratyAraṇyAnEva̍ paśUn - [ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam śucA|arpayati|tasmA̱t|samAvat|paśUnAm|prajAya̍mAnAnAmiti̍# pra-jAyamAnAnAm|AraṇyAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|kanI̍yAṃsaḥ|śucA|hi|RutAḥ|lOmataḥ|samiti̍|Barati|ata̍ḥ|hi|asya|mEddhya̱m|kRuṣṇAjinamiti̍# kRuṣṇa - ajinam|ca|puṣkaraparṇamiti# puṣkara - parṇam|ca|samiti|stRuṇAti|iyam|vai|kRuṣṇAjinamiti̍# kRuṣṇa - ajinam|asau|puṣkaraparṇamiti# puṣkara - parṇam|AByAm|Eva|Enam|uBayataḥ|parIti̍|gRuhṇAti|agniḥ|dEvEBya̍ḥ|nilA̍yata|tam|atha̍rvA|anviti̍|apaśyat|atha̍rvA|tvA|prathamaḥ|niriti̍|amanthat|agnE|iti̍|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: śucA&rpayati̍ tasmA̱th samAvat̍ paśUnAM prajAyamAnAnA-mAraṇyAḥ̍ paśavaḥ kanIyAṃsaḥ̍ śucA hyRutA̍ lOmataḥ̍ saMBaratyatO̍ hyasya̍ mEddhyaM̍ kRuṣṇAjinaM ca# puṣkaraparṇaM ca saṅ stRuṇAtIyaM̍ ~Mvai kRuṣṇAjinamasau̍ puṣkaraparṇa-mAByA-mEvaina̍-muBayataḥ̍ parigRuhṇAtya-gnirdEvEByO̍ nilAyata̍ tamatharvA-&nvapaśyadatha̍rvA̍ tvA prathamO niramanthadagna̍ ityA# - [ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam Aha|yaḥ|Eva|Enam|anvapaśyaditya̍nu-apa̍śyat|tEna̍|Eva|Enam|samiti̍|Barati|tvAm|agnE|puṣka̍rAt|adhIti̍|iti̍|Aha|puṣkaraparṇa̍ iti# puṣkara - parṇE|hi|Enam|upaśritamityupa̍# - śritam|avindat|tam|u|tvA|daddhya~g|Ruṣi̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|daddhya~g|vai|Atharvaṇaḥ|tEjasvI|AsIt|tEja̍ḥ|Eva|asminn|dadhAti|tam|u|tvA|pAthyaḥ|vRuṣA̱|iti̍|Aha|pUrva̱m|Eva|uditam|utta̍rEṇEtyut̍ - tarEṇa|aBIti|gRuṇAti|19̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -ha ya Evainamanvapa̍śyat̍ tEnaivainaṃq saMBarati̍ tvAmagnE̍ puṣkarAdadhItyA̍ha̍ puṣkaraparṇE hyEnamupa̍śrita-mavi̍ndat̍ tamu# tvA daddhya~g~gRuṣirityAha̍ daddhya~gvA Atharvaṇa-stE̍jasvyA̍sIt̍ tEja# EvAsmin̍ dadhAti tamu# tvA pAthyO vRuṣEtyAha̍ pUrvamEvOdita-mutta̍rEṇABi̍ gRuṇAti̍ - [ ] 19

verses.padam: - Padam catasRuBiriti# catasRu-Biḥ|samiti|Barati|catvAri̍|CandAṃ̍si|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ-Biḥ|Eva|gAyatrIBi̍ḥ|brAhmaṇasya̍|gAyatraḥ|hi|brAhmaṇaḥ|triṣṭugBiriti̍# triṣṭuk - Biḥ|rAjanyasya|traiṣṭu̍Baḥ|hi|rAjanya̍ḥ|yam|kAmayE̍ta|vasI̍yAn|syAt|iti̍|uBayI̍Biḥ|tasya̍|samiti̍|BarEt|tEja̍ḥ|ca|Eva|asmai|indriyam|ca|samIcI̍ iti|dadhAti|aṣṭABiḥ|samiti̍|Barati|aṣṭAkṣarEtyaṣṭA-̍ akṣarA|gAyatrI|gAyatraḥ|agniḥ|yAvAn|Eva|agniḥ|tam|samiti̍|Barati|sIda̍|hOtaḥ|iti̍# ( )|Aha|dEvatA̱ḥ|Eva|asmai|samiti|sAdayati|nIti̍|hOtA̱|iti̍|manuṣyAn̍|samiti̍|sIdasva|iti̍|vayAṃ̍si|jani̍ṣva|hi|jEnya̍ḥ|agrE̱|ahnA̱m|iti̍|Aha|dEvamanuṣyAniti̍# dEva - manuṣyAn|Eva|asmai|saṃsannAniti̍ saM - sannAn|prEti|janayati||20̍ (77) (ai - va paśU - niti# - gRuṇAti - hOtariti# - saptaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A4)
verses.samhita: catasRuBiḥ saMBarati̍ catvAri CandAṃsi̍ CandOBirEva̍ gAyatrIBi̍rbrAhmaṇasya̍# gAyatrO hi brA̱hmaṇa-striṣṭugBI# rAjanyasya̍ traiṣṭuBO̍ hi rAjanyO̍# yaM kAmayEta̍ vasIyAnth-syAdityuBayI̍Bistasya̍ saMBarEt̍ tEjaścaivA&smA̍# indriyaM ca# samIcI# dadhAtyaṣṭABiḥ saMBaratyaṣṭAkṣa̍rA̍ gAyatrI gAyatrO̱̍ &gniryAvAnEvA&gnistaṃ̍ saMBarati̍ sIda# hOtarityA-̍ ( ) -ha dEvatA# EvAsmai saṃ sAdayati̍ ni hOtEti# manuṣyA̱nth saṃ sIdasvEti̍ vayAṃsi̍ janiṣvA̍ hi jEnyO agrE ahnAmityAha̍ dEva manuṣyAnEvA&smai saṃsannAn̍ prajanayati||20̍ (ai - va paśU - niti# - gRuṇAti - hOtariti# - saptaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam krUram|iva|vai|asyAḥ|Etat|karOti|yat|Kanati|apaḥ|upEti̍|sRujati|Apa̍ḥ|vai|śAntAḥ|śAntABi̍ḥ|Eva|asyai|śuca̱m|śamayati|samiti̍|tE|vAyuḥ|mAtariśvA̱|dadhAtu|iti̍|Aha|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|vai|vAyuḥ|prAṇEnEti# pra - anEna|Eva|asyai|prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|samiti|dadhAti|samiti̍|tE|vAyuḥ|iti̍|Aha|tasmA̱t|vAyupra̍cyutEti̍# vAyu - pracyutA|divaḥ|vRuṣṭiḥ|IrtE|tasmai̱|ca|dEvi|vaṣa̍ṭ|astu|21̍ (50)
verses.samhita: krUramiva̍ vA asyA̍ Etat karOti̍ yat Kanatyapa̍ upa# sRujatyApO vai śAntAḥ śAntABirEvA&syai̍ śucaṃ# śamayati saM tE# vAyurmAtariśvA̍# dadhAtvityAha̍ prAṇO vai vAyuḥ prAṇEnaivAsyai̱ prAṇaṃ saM dadhAti̍ saM tE# vAyurityAha̍ tasmA̱d-vAyupracyutA̍ divO vRuṣṭirIrtE̍ tasmai# ca dEvi vaṣaḍastu̍ - [ ] 21

verses.padam: - Padam tuBya̱m|iti|Aha|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutava̍ḥ|Rutuṣu̍|Eva|vRuṣṭi̱m|dadhAti|tasmA̱t|sarvAn̍|RutUn|varq.ṣati|yat|vaṣaṭkuryAditi̍# vaṣaṭ - kuryAt|yAtayAmEti# yAta - yAmA|asya|vaṣaṭkAra iti# vaṣaṭ - kAraḥ|syAt|yat|na|vaṣaṭkuryAditi# vaṣaṭ - kuryAt|rakṣAṃsi|yajñam|hanyuḥ|vaṭ|iti̍|Aha|parOkṣamiti̍# paraḥ - akṣa̱m|Eva|vaṣaṭ|karOti|na|asya|yAtayAmEti̍# yAta - yAmA|vaṣaṭkAra iti# vaṣaṭ - kAraḥ|Bavati|na|yajñam|rakṣAṃ̍si|Gnanti|sujA̍ta̍ iti su - jAtaḥ|jyOtiṣA|saha|iti̍|anuṣṭuBEtya̍nu̍ - stuBA̱|upEti|nahyati|anuṣṭubitya̍nu̍ - stup|22 (50)
verses.samhita: tuByamityAha̍ ṣaḍvA Rutava# RutuṣvEva vRuṣṭiM̍ dadhAti tasmAth sarvAnRutUn.̍ vaṛṣati̍ yad-vaṣaṭkuryAd-yAtayA̍mA&sya̍ vaṣaṭkAraḥ syAdyanna vaṣaṭkuryAd̍ rakṣAṃsi̍ yajñaṃ hanyurvaḍityA̍ha̍ parOkṣamEva̍ vaṣaṭ̍ karOti nAsya# yAtayAmA̍ vaṣaṭkArO Bavati̍ na yajñaṃ rakṣAṃsi̍ Gnanti sujAtO̍ jyOtiṣA̍ sahEtyanuṣṭuBOpa̍# nahyatyanuṣṭu - [ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam sarvAṇi|CandAṃ̍si|CandAṃ̍si|Kalu̍|vai|agnEḥ|priyA|tanUḥ|priyayA̱|Eva|Enam|tanuvA̱|parIti̍|dadhAti|vEdu̍kaḥ|vAsa̍ḥ|Bavati|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|vAruṇaḥ|vai|agniḥ|upa̍naddha̍ ityupa# - naddhaḥ|uditi|u|tiṣṭha|svaddhvarEti̍# su - addhvara|Ud^^rdhvaḥ|u|sviti|naḥ|UtayE̱|iti̍|sAvitrIByA̱m|uditi̍|tiṣṭhati|savitRupra̍sUta̍ iti# savitRu - prasUtaḥ|Eva|asya|Ud^^rdhvAm|varuṇamEnimiti# varuṇa - mEnim|uditi|sRujati|dvAByA̱m|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|saḥ|jAtaḥ|garBaḥ|asi|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -PsarvAṇi̍ CandAṃsi̍ CandAṃsi̍ Kalu vA agnEḥ priyA tanUḥ priyayaivainaM̍ tanuvA pari# dadhAti vEdukO̍ vAsO# Bavatiya EvaM ~MvEda# vAruṇO vA agnirupanaddha̍ udu# tiṣṭha svaddhvarOrddhva U ṣuṇa# Utaya iti# sAvitrIByAmut tiṣṭhati̍ savitRuprasUta̍ EvAsyOrddhvAM ~MvaruṇamEnimuth̍ sRujati̍ dvAByAM pratiṣṭhityai̍ sa jAtO garBO# asi - [ ] 23

verses.padam: - Padam rOdasyOḥ|iti̍|Aha|imE̍ iti|vai|rOda̍sI̍ iti|tayO̱ḥ|Eṣaḥ|garBa̍ḥ|yat|agniḥ|tasmA̱t|Evam|Aha|agnE̱|cAru̍ḥ|viBRu̍ta̍ iti vi - BRutaḥ|OṣadhIṣu|iti̍|Aha|yadA|hi|Etam|viBarantIti̍# vi - Baranti|atha̍|cAru̍tara̍ iti cAru# - taraḥ|Bavati|prEti̍|mAtRuBya̍ iti# mAtRu - Byaḥ|adhIti|kani̍kradat|gAḥ|iti̍|Aha|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|vai|asya|mAtara̍ḥ|tABya̍ḥ|Eva|Enam|prEti̍|cyAvayati|sthiraḥ|Bava|vIḍva̍~gga̍ iti# vIḍu - a~ggaḥ|iti|gardaBE|Eti̍|sAdayati|24̍ (50)
verses.samhita: rOdasyOrityA̍hEmE̍ vai rOdasI̍ tayOrEṣa̍ garBO yadagni-stasmA-dEvamAhAgnE̍ cArurviBRuta̍ OṣadhIṣvityA̍ha̍ yadA hyEtaM̍ ~MviBarantyatha cArutarO̍ Bavati̍ pra mAtRuByO adhi kanikradad-gA̍ ityAhauṣadhayO̍ vA asya̍ mAtarastABya# EvainaM pracyAvayati̍ sthirO Bava̍ vIḍva~gga̍ iti# gardaBa A sAdayati̍ - [ ] 24

verses.padam: - Padam samiti|nahyati|Eva|Enam|EtayA̱|sthEmnE|gardaBEna̍|samiti̍|Barati|tasmA̱t|gardaBaḥ|paśUnAm|BAraBArita̍ma̍ iti# BAraBAri - tamaḥ|gardaBEna|samiti̍|Barati|tasmA̱t|gardaBaḥ|apIti̍|anAlEśa̍ ityanA̍ - lEśE|atIti|anyAn|paśUn|mEdyati|anna̱m|hi|EnEna|arkam|saBaMrantIti̍# saM - Baranti|gardaBEna̍|samiti̍|Barati|tasmA̱t|gardaBaḥ|dvirEtA̍ iti# dvi-rEtA̱ḥ|sann|kaniṣṭham|paśUnAm|prEti̍|jAyatE|agniḥ|hi|asya|yOni̱m|nirdahatIti̍# niḥ - dahati|prajAsviti̍# pra - jAsu|vai|Eṣaḥ|Etaṛhi̍|ArU̍ḍha̍ ityA - rUḍhaḥ|25 (50)
verses.samhita: saM nahyatyEvaina̍mEtayA̱̍ sthEmnE gardaBEna̍ saMBarati̍ tasmA̱d gardaBaḥ paśUnAM̍ BAraBArita̍mO̍ gardaBEna saM Barati̍ tasmA̱d gardaBO-&pyanAlEśE-&tyanyAn̍ paśUn mE̱dyatyannaṅq hyEnEnA&rkaṃ̍ saBaMranti̍ gardaBEna saMBarati̍ tasmA̱d gardaBO dvirEtAḥ san kaniṣṭhaM̍ paśUnAM prajAyatE&gniṛhya̍sya̍ yOniM̍ nirdahati̍ prajAsu vA Eṣa EtaṛhyArUḍhaḥ̍ - [ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam saḥ|Iśvaraḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|śucA|pradaha iti# pra-dahaḥ|śivaḥ|Bava|prajABya̍ iti# pra - jAByaḥ|iti̍|Aha|prajABya̍ iti# pra - jAByaḥ|Eva|Enam|śamayati|mAnu̍ṣIByaḥ|tvam|a~ggiraḥ|iti̍|Aha|mAnavya̍ḥ|hi|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|mA|dyAvApRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|aBIti|śUśucaḥ|mA|antari̍kṣam|mA|vanaspatIn̍|iti̍|Aha|EByaḥ|Eva|Enam|lOkEBya̍ḥ|śamayati|prEti̍|Etu|vAjI|kani̍kradat|iti̍|Aha|vAjI|hi|Eṣaḥ|nAna̍dat|rAsa̍Baḥ|patvA̱|iti̍|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sa I̱śvaraḥ prajAḥ śucA pradahaḥ̍ śivO Bava̍ prajABya ityAha̍ prajABya# Evainaṃ# śamayati mAnuṣIByastvama̍~ggira̍ ityAha̍ mAnavyO# hi prajA mA dyAvApRuthivI̍ aBi śUśucO̍ mA&ntarikṣaM̍ mA vanaspatInityAhaiBya̍ EvainaM̍ ~MlOkEByaḥ̍ śamayati praitu# vAjI kanikradadityA̍ha̍ vAjI hyEṣa̍ nAnadad-rAsa̍Baḥ̍ patvEtyA# - [ ] 26

verses.padam: - Padam Aha|rAsaBaḥ|iti̍|hi|Etam|Ruṣa̍yaḥ|ava̍dann|Barann̍|agnim|purIṣya̱m|iti̍|Aha|agnim|hi|Eṣaḥ|Bara̍ti|mA|pAdi|Ayu̍ṣaḥ|purA|iti̍|Aha|Ayu̍ḥ|Eva|asminn|dadhAti|tasmA̱t|gardaBaḥ|sarva̱m|Ayu̍ḥ|Eti|tasmA̱t|gardaBE|purA|Ayu̍ṣaḥ|pramI̍ta̍ iti pra-mItE|biByati|vRuṣA̱|agnim|vRuṣaṇam|Barann̍|iti̍|Aha|vRuṣA̱|hi|Eṣaḥ|vRuṣA̱|agniḥ|apAm|garBa̱m|27̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -ha rAsaBa̍ iti hyEtamRuṣayO&va̍dan̍ BarannagniM̍ purIṣya̍mityA̍hA&gniṅ̍ hyEṣa̍ Barati̍ mA pAdyAyuṣaḥ̍ purEtyAhA&&*yurEvA&smi̍n̍ dadhAti tasmA̱d gardaBaḥ sarvamAyurEti̍ tasmA̱d gardaBE purA&&yuṣaḥ̍ pramItE̍ biByati vRuṣA&gniM ~MvRuṣaṇaM̍ BarannityAha̍ vRuṣA hyEṣa̍ vRuṣA&gnirapAM garBaṃ# - [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam samudriya̱m|iti|Aha|apAm|hi|Eṣaḥ|garBa̍ḥ|yat|agniḥ|agnE̱|Eti̍|yAhi|vItayE̱|iti̍|vai|imau|lOkau|vIti̍|aitAm|agnE̱|Eti̍|yAhi|vItayE̱|iti̍|yat|Aha̍|anayO̱ḥ|lOkayO̱ḥ|vItyA̍ iti vi - ityai|pracyuta̍ iti pra - cyutaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|AyatanAdityA̱̍ - yatanAt|aga̍taḥ|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati - sthAm|saḥ|Etaṛhi|addhvaryum|ca|yaja̍mAnam|ca|dhyAyati|Rutam|satyam|iti̍|Aha|iyam|vai|Rutam|asau|28̍ (50)
verses.samhita: samudriya-mityAhA&pAṅ̍ hyEṣa̍ garBO yadagniragna A yAhi̍ vItaya iti vA imau lOkau vyaitAmagna̍ A yAhi̍ vItaya iti yadAhA &nayO̱rlOkayO-rvItyai pracyutO̍ vA Eṣa AyatanAdaga̍taḥ̍ pratiṣṭhAṃ sa EtaṛhyaddhvaryuM̍ ca yajamAnaM̍ ca ddhyAyatyRutaṃ satyamityAhEyaM̍ ~MvA Rutamasau - [ ] 28

verses.padam: - Padam satyam|anayO̱ḥ|Eva|Enam|pratIti|sthApayati|na|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCati|addhvaryuḥ|na|yaja̍mAnaḥ|varu̍ṇaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yaja̍mAnam|aBi|Eti̍|Eti|yat|agniḥ|upa̍naddha̍ ityupa# - naddhaḥ|Oṣadhayaḥ|pratIti̍|gRuhṇIta|agnim|Etam|iti̍|Aha|śAntyai̱|vyasyanniti̍# vi - asyann|viśvA̱ḥ|ama̍tIḥ|arA̍tIḥ|iti̍|Aha|rakṣa̍sAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa# - hatyai|niṣIdanniti# ni-sIdann|naḥ|apEti̍|durmatimiti̍# duḥ - matim|hanat|iti|Aha|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|Oṣadhayaḥ|pratIti̍|mOdaddhvam|29̍ (50)
verses.samhita: satyamanayOrEvainaM̍ prati# ṣṭhApayati nA&&*rtimArcCatyaddhvaryurna̍ yajamAnO̍ varuṇO̍ vA Eṣa yajamAnamaByaiti̍ yadagnirupanaddha̍ Oṣadhayaḥ̍ prati# gRuhṇItAgnimEta-mityAha̍ śAntyai vyasyan viśvA amatIrarA̍tI-rityA̍ha̍ rakṣasAmapa̍hatyai̍ niṣIdan̍ nO apa# durmatiṃ hanadityA̍ha̍ pratiṣṭhityA̍ Oṣadhayaḥ̍ pratimOdaddhva̍ - [ ] 29

verses.padam: - Padam Enam|iti|Aha|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|vai|agnEḥ|BAgadhEyamiti̍# BAga - dhEya̱m|tABiḥ|Eva|Enam|samiti̍|ad^^rdhayati|puṣpA̍vatIriti̍ puṣpa# - vatIḥ|supippalA iti# su-pippalAḥ|iti|Aha|tasmA̱t|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|Pala̱m|gRuhṇanti|ayam|vaḥ|garBa̍ḥ|Rutviya̍ḥ|pratnam|sadhasthamiti̍# sadha - stham|Eti|asadat|iti̍|Aha|yABya̍ḥ|Eva|Enam|pracyAvayatIti̍# pra - cyAvayati|tAsu̍|Eva|Enam|pratIti̍|sthApayati|dvAByA̱m|upAva̍haratItyu̍pa̍ - avaharati|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai||30 (42) (astva - nuṣṭu - basi̍ - sAdayatyA - rUḍhaḥ-patvEti-garBa̍-masau̍ - mOdaddhvaM̍ - dvicatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A5)
verses.samhita: mEnamityAhauṣadhayO̍ vA agnErBAgadhEyaM̍ tABirEvainaṃq̍ samarddhayati̍ puṣpAvatIḥ̍ supippalA ityAha̍ tasmAdOṣadhayaḥ̍ PalaM̍ gRuhṇantya yaM ~MvO garBa# Rutviyaḥ̍ pratnaṃ sadhasthamA-&sadadityA̍ha̍ yABya# EvainaM̍ pracyAvayati̍ tAsvEvainaM pratiṣṭhApayati̍ dvAByAmupAva̍harati̍ pratiṣṭhityai||30̍ (astva - nuṣṭu - basi̍ - sAdayatyA - rUḍhaḥ-patvEti-garBa̍-masau̍ - mOdaddhvaM̍ - dvicatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam vAruṇaḥ|vai|agniḥ|upanaddha̍ ityupa# - naddhaḥ|vIti|pAja̍sA|iti̍|vIti̍|sraṃqsayati|savitRupra̍sUta̍ iti# savitRu - prasUtaḥ|Eva|asya|viṣUcIm|varuṇamEnimiti̍# varuṇa - mEnim|vIti|sRujati|apaḥ|upEti̍|sRujati|Apa̍ḥ|vai|śAntAḥ|śAntABi̍ḥ|Eva|asya|śuca̱m|śamayati|tisRuBiriti̍# tisRu - Biḥ|upEti|sRujati|trivRuditi̍# tri -vRut|vai|agniḥ|yAvAn|Eva|agniḥ|tasya̍|śuca̱m|śamayati|mitraḥ|saṃqsRujyEti̍# saM - sRujya|pRuthivIm|iti̍|Aha|mitraḥ|vai|śivaḥ|dEvAnA̱m|tEna̍|Eva|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vAruṇO vA agnirupanaddhO̍ vi pAjasEti visraṃsayati̍ savitRuprasUta̍ EvAsya viṣUcIM̍ ~MvaruṇamEniM ~MvisRujatyapa̍ upa# sRujatyApO vai śAntAḥ śAntABirEvAsya̍ śucaṃ# śamayati tisRuBirupa# sRujati trivRudvA agniryAvAnEvA-gnistasya̍ śucaṃ# śamayati mitraḥ saṃqsRujya# pRuthivImityAha̍ mitrO vai śivO dEvAnAM tEnaivai - [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam Enam|samiti|sRujati|śAntyai̱|yat|grAmyAṇA̱m|pAtrA̍ṇAm|kapAlai̱ḥ|saṃqsRujEditi̍# saM - sRujEt|grAmyAṇi|pAtrA̍ṇi|śucA|arpayEt|armakapAlairitya̍rma-kapAlaiḥ|samiti̍|sRujati|EtAni̍|vai|anupajIvanIyAnItya̍nupa̍ - jIvanIyAni|tAni̍|Eva|śucA|arpayati|śarka̍rABiḥ|samiti̍|sRujati|dhRutyai̱|athO̍ iti|śantvAyEti̍# śaM - tvAya|ajalOmairitya̍ja-lOmaiḥ|samiti̍|sRujati|EṣA|vai|agnEḥ|priyA|tanUḥ|yat|ajA|priyayA̱|Eva|Enam|tanuvA̱|samiti̍|sRujati|athO̍ iti|tEja̍sA|kRuṣṇAjinasyEti̍# kRuṣṇa - ajinasya|lOma̍Biriti̍ lOma# - Biḥ|samiti|32̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -naṃq saṃ sRujati̍ śAntyai yadgrAmyAṇAM pAtrAṇAM̍ kapAlai̱ḥ saṃsRujEd-grAmyAṇi pAtrAṇi̍ śucA&rpayEdarmakapAlaiḥ̍ saṃ sRujatyEtAni̍ vA anupajIvanIyAni̍ tAnyEva śucA&rpayati̍ śarkarABiḥ̍ saṃ sRujati̍ dhRutyA athO# śatvAMyA# jalOmaiḥ saṃ sRujatyEṣA̍ vA agnEḥ priyA tanUryadajA priyayaivainaM̍ tanuvA saṃ sRujatyathO̍ tEjasA̍ kRuṣṇAjinasya lOmaBiḥ̍ saṃ - [ ] 32

verses.padam: - Padam sRujati|yajñaḥ|vai|kRuṣṇAjinamiti# kRuṣṇa - ajinam|yajñEna|Eva|yajñam|samiti̍|sRujati|rudrAḥ|saBRuMtyEti̍# saM - BRutya|pRuthivIm|iti̍|Aha|EtAḥ|vai|Etam|dEvatA̱ḥ|agrE̱|samiti̍|aBarann|tABi̍ḥ|Eva|Enam|samiti̍|Barati|maKasya̍|śira̍ḥ|asi|iti̍|Aha|yajñaḥ|vai|maKaḥ|tasya̍|Etat|śira̍ḥ|yat|uKA|tasmA̱t|Evam|Aha|yajñasya̍|padE̍ iti|sthaḥ|iti̍|Aha|yajñasya̍|hi|EtE̍ iti|33̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sRujati̍ yajñO vai kRuṣṇAjinaM̍ ~MyajñEnaiva yajñaṃ saṃ sRujati̍ rudrAḥ saBRuMtya# pRuthivImityAhaitA̍ vA EtaM dEvatA agrE samaBaran̍ tABirEvainaṃq̍ saMBarati̍ maKasya śirO&sItyAha̍ yajñO vai maKastasyaita-cCirO yaduKA tasmAdEvamA̍ha̍ yajñasya# padE stha ityAha̍ yajñasya hyEtE̍ - [ ] 33

verses.padam: - Padam padE iti|athO̍ iti|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|prEti|anyABi̍ḥ|yacCa̍ti|anviti̍|anyaiḥ|mantrayatE|mithunatvAyEti̍# mithuna - tvAya|tryu̍ddhimiti̍ tri - uddhim|karOti|trayaḥ|imE|lOkAḥ|EṣAm|lOkAnA̱m|Aptyai̱|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ-Biḥ|karOti|vIrya̱m|vai|CandAṃ̍si|vIryE̍ṇa|Eva|EnAm|karOti|yaju̍ṣA|bila̱m|karOti|vyAvRu̍ttyA̍ iti# vi - AvRuttyai|iya̍tIm|karOti|prajApa̍tinEti̍# prajA - patinA|yajñamuKEnEti# yajña-muKEna|saMmi̍tAmiti̍ saM - mitAm|dvistanAmiti# dvi - stanAm|karOti|dyAvApRuthivyOriti̍ dyAvA̱ - pRuthivyOḥ|dOhAya|catu̍ḥstanAmiti̍ catuḥ̍ - stanAm|karOti|paśUnAm|dOhAya|aṣṭAsta̍nAmityaṣṭA̍ - stanAm|karOti|CandasAm|dOhA̍ya|navA̱śrimiti̍ nava# - aśrim|aBicarata̍ ityaBi̍ - carataḥ̍ ( )|kuryAt|trivRutamiti# tri - vRuta̱m|Eva|vajra̱m|saBRuMtyEti# saM - BRutya|BrAtRu̍vyAya|prEti̍|harati|stRutyai̱|kRutvAya̍|sA|mahIm|uKAm|iti̍|nIti̍|dadhAti|dEvatA̍su|Eva|EnAm|pratIti̍|sthApayati||34̍ (71) (tEnaiva - lOmaBiḥ̍ sa - mEtE - aBicara̍ta̍ - Ekaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A6)
verses.samhita: padE athO pratiṣṭhityai̍ prAnyABi-ryacCatyanvanyai-rmantrayatE̍ mithunatvAya tryuddhiM̍ karOti traya# imE lOkA EṣAM ~MlOkAnAmAptyai CandOBiḥ̍ karOti vIryaM̍ ~Mvai CandAṃsi̍ vIryEṇaivainA̱M̍ karOti yajuṣA̍ bilaM̍ karOti vyAvRuttyA̍ iyatIM̍ karOti prajApatinA̍ yajñamuKEna saMmitAM̍ dvistanAM karOti̍ yAvApRuthivyOrdOhA̍ya̍ catuḥstanAM̍ karOti paśUnAM dOhAyAṣṭAsta̍nAM̍ karOti CandasAM̍ dOhAya̍ navA̱śri-maBicarataḥ̍ ( ) kuryAt trivRutamEva̍ vajraṃ# saBRuMtya BrAtRuvyAya̍ praharati̍ stRutyai# kRutvAya sA mahImuKAmiti ni dadhAti̍ dEvatA̱svEvainAM pratiṣṭhApayati||34̍ (tEnaiva - lOmaBiḥ̍ sa - mEtE - aBicara̍ta̍ - Ekaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam saptaBiriti# sapta - Biḥ|dhUpayati|sapta|vai|śIrq.ṣaṇyA̱ḥ|prAṇA iti# pra - anAḥ|śiraḥ|Etat|yajñasya̍|yat|uKA|śIrq.ṣann|Eva|yajñasya̍|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|dadhAti|tasmA̱t|sapta|śIra.ṣann|prAṇA iti# pra - anAḥ|aśvaśakEnEtyaśva-śakEna̍|dhUpayati|prAjApatya̍ iti# prAjA-patyaḥ|vai|aśvaḥ|sayOnitvAyEti̍# sayOni-tvAya|adi̍tiḥ|tvA|iti̍|Aha|iyam|vai|adi̍tiḥ|adi̍tyA|Eva|adi̍tyAm|Kanati|asyAḥ|akrU̍raMkArAyEtyakrU̍raM̍ - kArAya|na|hi|svaḥ|svam|hinasti|dEvAnA̱m|tvA|patnI̱ḥ|iti̍|Aha|dEvAnA̱m|35̍ (50)
verses.samhita: saptaBirddhUpayati̍ sapta vai śIṛṣaṇyA̱ḥ̍ prAṇAḥ śira# Etad-yajñasya yaduKA śIṛqṣannEva yajñasya# prAṇAn dadhAti̍ tasmA̱th sapta śIṛqṣan prAṇA aśvaśakEna̍# dhUpayati prAjApatyO vA aśvaḥ̍ sayOnitvAyA- ditistvEtyA̍hEyaM̍ ~MvA aditiradi̍tyaivAdi̍tyAM̍ KanatyasyA akrUraMkArAya̍ na hi svaḥ svaṃ hinasti# dEvAnA̱M tvA patnIrityAha̍ dEvAnAM - [ ] 35

verses.padam: - Padam vai|EtAm|patnayaḥ|agrE̱|akurvann|tABi̍ḥ|Eva|EnAm|dadhAti|dhiṣaṇA̱ḥ|tvA|iti̍|Aha|vidyAḥ|vai|dhiṣaṇA̱ḥ|vidyABi̍ḥ|Eva|EnAm|aBIti̍|indhE|gnAḥ|tvA|iti̍|Aha|CandAṃ̍si|vai|gnAḥ|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|Eva|EnAm|śrapayati|varU̱trayaḥ|tvA|iti|Aha|hOtrA̱ḥ|vai|varU̱trayaḥ|hOtrA̍Biḥ|Eva|EnAm|pacati|jana̍yaḥ|tvA|iti̍|Aha|dEvAnA̱m|vai|patnI̱ḥ|36̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ~MvA EtAM patnayO&grE&kurvan̍ tABirEvainA̱M̍ dadhAti dhiṣaṇAstvEtyAha̍ vidyA vai dhiṣaṇA# vidyABirEvainA̍maBIndhE̍ gnAstvEtyAha̍ CandAṃsi̍ vai gnA śCandOBirEvainAṅ̍# śrapayati varU̱trayasttvEtyAha̍ hOtrA vai varU̱trayO hOtrABirEvainA̱M̍ pacati janayastvEtyA̍ha̍ dEvAnAM ~Mvai patnI - [ ] 36

verses.padam: - Padam janayaḥ|tABi̍ḥ|Eva|EnAm|pacati|ṣaḍBiriti̍# ṣaṭ - Biḥ|pacati|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutavaḥ|RutuBirityRutu̍ - Biḥ|Eva|EnAm|pacati|dviḥ|pacantu|iti̍|Aha|tasmA̱t|dviḥ|saM~MvathsarasyEti̍# saM-vathsarasya|sasyam|pacyatE|vAruṇI|uKA|aBIddhEtyaBi-iddhA|maitriyA̱|upEti̍|Eti|śAntyai̱|dEvaḥ|tvA|savitA|uditi̍|vapatu|iti̍|Aha|savitRupra̍sUta̍ iti# savitRu - prasUtaḥ|Eva|EnAm|brahmaṇA|dEvatA̍Biḥ|uditi̍|vapati|apa̍dyamAnA|pRuthivi|AśA̱ḥ|diśa̍ḥ|Eti̍|pRuṇa|37̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -rjanayastABi̍rEvainA̱M̍ pacati ṣaḍBiḥ pacati̍ ṣaḍvA Rutava# RutuBirEvainA̱M̍ pacati dviḥ pacantvityAha̍ tasmAd dviḥ saM~Mvathsarasya̍# sasyaM pacyatE̍ vAruṇyuKA&BIddhA̍# maitriyOpaiti̍ śAntyai# dEvastvA# savitOd-vapatvityA̍ha̍ savitRuprasUta̍ EvainAM brahmaṇA̍ dEvatABirud-va̍patyapa̍dyamAnA̍ pRuthivyAśA diśa A pRuṇE - [ ] 37

verses.padam: - Padam iti|Aha|tasmA̱t|agniḥ|sarvA̱ḥ|diśa̍ḥ|anu̍|vIti̍|BAti|uditi̍|tiṣṭha|bRuhatI|Bava|UrdhvA|tiṣṭha|dhruvA|tvam|iti̍|Aha|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|asurya̱m|pAtra̱m|anA̱cCRuṇṇamityanA̱ - CRuṇṇam|Eti|CRuṇatti|dEvatrEti̍# dEva-trA|akaḥ|ajakṣIrEṇEtyaja̍ - kṣIrEṇa|Eti̍|CRuṇatti|paramam|vai|Etat|paya̍ḥ|yat|ajakṣIramitya̍ja̍ - kṣIram|paramEṇa|Eva|EnAm|paya̍sA|Eti̍|CRuṇatti|yaju̍ṣA|vyAvRu̍ttyA̍ iti# vi - AvRuttyai|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|Eti|CRuṇatti|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|vai|EṣA ( )|kriyatE|CandOBiriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|Eva|CandAṃsi|Eti̍|CRuṇatti||38̍ (56)
verses.samhita: -tyAha̍ tasmAdagniḥ̍ sarvA diśO&nu viBAtyuttiṣṭha̍ bRuhatI BavOrddhvA̍ tiṣṭha̍ dhruvA tvamityAha̍ pratiṣṭhityA̍ asuryaM̍ pAtramanA̱cCRuṇṇamA-cCRuṇatti̍ dEvatrA-&karajakṣIrEṇA-&&*cCRu̍ṇatti̍ paramaM ~MvA Etat payO yadajakṣIraM̍ paramEṇaivainAM̍ payasA&&cCRuṇatti̍ yajuṣA̍ vyAvRuttyai̍ CandOBirA̍ cCRuṇatti̍ CandOBirvA̍ EṣA ( ) kriyatE̍ CandOBirEva̍ CandAṅqsyA cCRuṇatti||38̍

verses.padam: - Padam EkaviṃśatyEtyEka̍# - viṃqśatyA|mAṣai̱ḥ|puruṣaśIra.ṣamiti# puruṣa - śIra.ṣam|acCa|Eti|amEddhyAḥ|vai|mAṣA̱ḥ|amEddhyam|puruṣaśIrq.ṣamiti̍# puruṣa - śIrq.qṣam|amEddhyaiḥ|Eva|asya|amEddhyam|niravadAyEti# niḥ - avadAya|mEddhya̱m|kRutvA|Eti̍|harati|Eka̍viṃśatirityEka̍# - viṃqśatiḥ|Bavanti|Ekaviṃqśa ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|vai|puruṣaḥ|puru̍ṣasya|Aptyai̱|vyRu̍ddhamiti̍ vi - Ruddham|vai|Etat|prAṇairiti# pra - anaiḥ|amEddhyam|yat|puruṣaśIrq.ṣamiti# puruṣa - śIrq.ṣam|saptadhEti# sapta - dhA|vitRuṇṇAmiti̍ vi - tRuṇṇAm|valmIkavapAmiti# valmIka-vapAm|prati|nIti̍|dadhAti|sapta|vai|śIra.ṣaṇyA̱ḥ|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|prAṇairiti# pra - anaiḥ|Eva|Enat|samiti|ad^^rdhayati|mEddhyatvAyEti̍# mEddhya - tvAya|yAva̍ntaḥ|39̍ (50)
verses.samhita: EkaviṃśatyA̍ mAṣai̱ḥ puruṣaśIrq.ṣa-macCai̱tyamEddhyA vai mAṣA# amEddhyaM puruṣaśIrq.ṣa-ma̍mEddhyairEvA-syA̍-mEddhyaM̍ niravadAya̍ mEddhyaM̍ kRutvA &&haratyEka̍viṃśati-rBavantyEkaviṃqśO̍ vai puruṣaḥ̍ puruṣasyA&&*ptyai̍ vyRuddhaM̍ ~MvA Etat prAṇairamEddhyaM̍ ~Myat puruṣaśIrq.ṣaṃ̍ saptadhA̍ vitRuṇṇAM̍ ~MvalmIkavapAM prati ni dadhAti̍ sapta vai śIṛṣaṇyA̱ḥ̍ prAṇAḥ prAṇairEvainath-samarddhayati̍ mEddhyatvAya yAvantO̍ - [ ] 39

verses.padam: - Padam vai|mRutyubandhava̍ iti# mRutyu - bandhavaḥ|tEṣA̱m|yamaḥ|AdhipatyamityAdhi̍# - patyam|parIti|iyAya|yamagAthABiriti̍# yama - gAthABiḥ|parIti̍|gAyati|yamAt|Eva|Enat|vRu~gktE|tisRuBiriti̍# tisRu - Biḥ|parIti|gAyati|traya̍ḥ|imE|lOkAḥ|EByaḥ|Eva|Enat|lOkEBya̍ḥ|vRu~gktE|tasmA̱t|gAya̍tE|na|dEya̱m|gAthA̱|hi|tat|vRu~gktE|agniBya̍ ityagni-Byaḥ|paśUn|Eti|laBatE|kAmA̱ḥ|vai|agnaya̍ḥ|kAmAn̍|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|yat|paśUn|na|AlaBEtEtyA̱̍ - laBEta|ana̍varuddhA̍ ityanava̍ - ruddhAḥ|asya|40 (50)
verses.samhita: vai mRutyubandhavastEṣA̱M̍ ~Myama AdhipatyaM̍ parIyAya̍ yamagAthABiḥ parigAyati̍ yamAdEvainad-vRu~gktE̍ tisRuBiḥ parigAyati̍ traya# imE lOkA EBya EvainallOkEByO̍# vRu~gktE tasmAd-gAyatE̍ na dEyaM gAthA hi tad-vRu~gktE̱ &gniByaḥ̍ paśUnA laBatE̍ kAmA vA agnayaḥ kAmAnEvAva̍# rundhE yat paśUn nA&&*laBEtA&navaruddhA̍ asya - [ ] 40

verses.padam: - Padam paśavaḥ|syuḥ|yat|parya̍gnikRutAniti̍ paryagni̍ - kRutAn|uthsRujEdityut̍ - sajEt|yajñavEśasamiti# yajña-vEśasam|kuryAt|yat|saṅqsthApayEditi# saM - sthApayE̱t|yAtayAmAnIti̍# yAta - yAmAni|śIrq.ṣAṇi|syuḥ|yat|paśUn|AlaBa̍ta̍ ityA̱ - laBatE|tEna̍|Eva|paśUn|avEti̍|rundhE|yat|parya̍gnikRutAniti̍ paryagni̍ - kRutAn|uthsRujatItyut-sRujati̍|śIrṣṇAm|ayA̍tayAmatvAyEtyayA̍tayAma̍ - tvAya|rAjApatyEnEti# prAjA - patyEna|samiti̍|sthApayati|yajñaḥ|vai|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|yajñE|Eva|yajñam|pratIti|sthApayati|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|asRujata|saḥ|riricAnaḥ|amanyata|saḥ|EtAḥ|AprIrityA̱ - prIḥ|apaśyat|tABiḥ|vai|saḥ|muKataḥ|41̍ (50)
verses.samhita: paśavaḥ̍ syuryat paryagnikRutAnuth-sRujEd-ya̍jñavEśasaM̍ kuryAd-yath̍ saṅsthApayE̱d-yAtayA̍mAni̍ śIrq.ṣAṇi# syuryat paśUnAlaBatE̍ tEnaiva paśUnava# rundhE yat paryagnikRutAnuth-sRujati̍# śIrṣṇA-mayAtayAmatvAya̍ prAjApatyEna saṅ sthApayati̍ yajñO vai prajApatiryajña̍ Eva yajñaM pratiṣṭhApayati̍ prajApatiḥ̍ prajA asRujata̍ sa riricAnO̍&manyata̍ sa EtA AprIrapaśyat̍ tABirvai sa muKata̍ - [ ] 41

verses.padam: - Padam AtmAna̱m|Eti|aprIṇIta|yat|EtAḥ|Apriya̍ ityA̱-priyaḥ|Bava̍nti|yajñaḥ|vai|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|yajñam|Eva|EtABiḥ|muKataḥ|Eti̍|prIṇAti|apa̍rimitaCandasa̍ ityaparimita̍ - Candasaḥ|Bavanti|aparimita̍ ityapari̍ - mitaḥ|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajApatEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|Aptyai̱|UnAtiriktA ityUna̍ - atiriktAḥ|mithunAḥ|prajA̱tyA iti pra - jAtyai|lOmaśam|vai|nAma|Etat|Canda̍ḥ|prajApa̍tEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|paśavaḥ|lOmaśAḥ|paśUn|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|sarvA̍ṇi|vai|EtAḥ|rUpAṇi̍|sarvA̍ṇi|rUpAṇi̍|agnau|cityE̱|kriyantE|tasmA̱t|EtAḥ|agnEḥ|citya̍sya|42̍ (50)
verses.samhita: AtmAnamA &prIṇIta̍ yadEtA ApriyO Bavanti̍ yajñO vai prajApati-ryajñamEvaitABi̍rmuKata̍ A prIṇAtya-pa̍rimitaCandasO̍ Bavantyaparimitaḥ̍ prajApatiḥ̍ prajApatErAptyA̍# UnAtiriktA mithunAḥ̍ prajA̱tyai lOmaśaM ~Mvai nAmaitacCandaḥ̍ prajApatEḥ̍ paśavO# lOmaśAḥ paśUnEvA&va# rundhE sarvAṇi̍ vA EtA rUpAṇi sarvAṇi̍ rUpAṇyagnau cityE̱ kriyantE tasmAdEtA̍ agnEścityasya̍ - [ ] 42

verses.padam: - Padam Bavanti|EkaviṃśatimityEka̍# - viṃqśatim|sAmidhEnIriti# sAM - idhEnIḥ|anviti|Aha|ruk|vai|Ekaviṃqśa̍ ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|ruca̱m|Eva|gacCati|athO iti|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati - sthAm|Eva|pratiṣṭhEti# prati - sthA|hi|Ekaviṃqśa ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|caturviṃśatimiti̍ catuḥ̍ - viṃqśatim|anviti|Aha|catu̍rviṃśatiriti̍ catuḥ̍ - viṃqśatiḥ|ad^^rdhamAsA ityad^^rdha̍ - mAsAḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|agniḥ|vaiśvAnaraḥ|sAkṣAditi# sa - akṣAt|Eva|vaiśvAnaram|avEti|rundhE|parA̍cIḥ|anviti̍|Aha|parA~g̍|iva|hi|suvarga̍ iti# suvaḥ - gaḥ|lOkaḥ|samA̱ḥ|tvA|agnE|Rutavaḥ|vad^^rdhayantu|iti̍|Aha|samA̍Biḥ|Eva|agnim|vad^^rdhayati|43̍ (50)
verses.samhita: BavantyE kaviṃ̍ śatiṃ sAmidhEnIranvAha̍ rugvA EkaviṃqśO̍ rucamEva̍ gacCatyathO̱̍ pratiṣṭhAmEva pratiṣṭhA̍ hyEkaviṃqśa-ścatu̍rviṃśatimanvA̍ha̍ caturviṃśatirarddhamAsAḥ̍ saM~Mvathsaraḥ̍ saM~MvathsarO̱&gnirvai̱śvAnaraḥ̍ sAkṣAdEva vai̱śvAnaramava# rundhE parAcIranvA̍ha̍ parA~giva̍ hi suvargO̍ lOkaḥ samA̱stvA&gna RutavO# varddhayantvityAha̍ samABirEvA&gniM̍ ~Mvarddhaya̍ - [ ] 43

verses.padam: - Padam RutuBirityRutu - Biḥ|saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM - vathsaram|viśvA̱ḥ|Eti|BAhi|pradiśa̍ iti# pra - diśaḥ|pRuthivyAḥ|iti̍|Aha|tasmA̱t|agniḥ|sarvA̱ḥ|diśa̍ḥ|anu̍|vIti̍|BAti|pratIti̍|auhatAm|aśvinA̱|mRutyum|asmAt|iti̍|Aha|mRutyum|Eva|asmAt|apEti̍|nudati|uditi̍|vayam|tama̍saḥ|parIti̍|iti̍|Aha|pApmA|vai|tama̍ḥ|pApmAna̱m|Eva|asmAt|apEti̍|hanti|aga̍nma|jyOti̍ḥ|uttamamityu̍t̍ - tamam|iti|Aha|asau|vai|Adityaḥ̍ ( )|jyOtiḥ|uttamamityu̍t-tamam|Adityasya̍|Eva|sAyu̍jyam|gacCati|na|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|tiṣṭhati|na|asya|śrIḥ|tiṣṭhati|yasya|EtAḥ|kriyantE̱|jyOti̍ṣmatIm|uttamAmityu̍t̍ - tamAm|anviti|Aha|jyOti̍ḥ|Eva|asmai|upari̍ṣṭAt|dadhAti|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|anu̍KyAtyA̍ ityanu# - KyAtyai||44 (78) (yAvantO̍ - &sya - muKata - ścityasya̍ - varddhaya - tyAdityO̱ - &ṣṭAviṃśatiśca)̍ (A8)
verses.samhita: tyRutuBiḥ̍ saM~MvathsaraM ~MviśvA A BAhi̍ pradiśaḥ̍ pRuthivyA ityAha̍ tasmAdagniḥ̍ sarvA diśO&nu viBAti̍ pratyauhatAmaśvinA̍# mRutyumasmAdityA̍ha̍ mRutyumEvA&smAdapa# nudatyudvayaM tamasasparItyA̍ha̍ pApmA vai tamaḥ̍ pApmAnamEvAsmAdapa̍# hantyaganma̍ jyOtiruttama-mityA̍hA&sau̍ vA AdityO̍ ( ) jyOtiruttama-mA̍dityasyaiva̍ sAyujyaM̍ gacCati na saM~Mvathsarasti̍ṣṭhati̍ nAsya śrIstiṣṭhati̍ yasyaitAḥ kriyantE jyOtiṣmatI-muttamAmanvA̍ha̍ jyOtirEvAsmA̍# upariṣṭAd̍ dadhAti suvargasya# lOkasyAnuKyAtyai||44̍ (yAvantO̍ - &sya - muKata - ścityasya̍ - varddhaya - tyAdityO̱ - &ṣṭAviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam ṣaḍBiriti# ṣaṭ - Biḥ|dIkṣayati|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutavaḥ|RutuBirityRutu-Biḥ|Eva|Enam|dIkṣayati|saptaBiriti̍# sapta - Biḥ|dIkṣayati|sapta|CandAṃsi|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|Eva|Enam|dIkṣayati|viśvE̱|dEvasya|nEtuḥ|iti̍|anuṣṭuBEtya̍nu̍ - stuBA̱|uttamayEtyut̍ - tamayA̱|juhOti|vAk|vai|anuṣṭubityanu̍ - stup|tasmA̱t|prAṇAnAmiti# pra - anAnA̱m|vAk|uttamEtyut̍ - tamA|EkasmAt|akṣarA̱t|anA̱ptam|prathamam|padam|tasmA̱t|yat|vAcaḥ|anA̱ptam|tat|manuṣyA̱ḥ|upEti̍|jIvanti|pUrṇayA̱|juhOti|pUrṇaḥ|iva|hi|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|45 (50)
