verses.padam: - Padam indrA̱gnI itIndra# - agnI|avyathamAnAm|iti̍|svayamAtRuṇṇAmiti̍# svayaM - AtRuṇṇAm|upEti|dadhAti|indrAgniByAmitI̱ndrAgni̍ - ByAm|vai|imau|lOkau|vidhRutAviti̍ vi - dhRutau|anayO̱ḥ|lOkayO̱ḥ|vidhRutyA̍ iti vi - dhRutyai|adhRutA|iva|vai|EṣA|yat|maddhyamA|citi̍ḥ|antari̍kṣam|iva|vai|EṣA|indrA̱gnI̍ itIndra# - agnI|iti|Aha|indrAgnI̍ itI̱ndra - agnI|vai|dEvAnA̱m|OjOBRutAvityOjaḥ̍ - BRutau̱|OjasA|Eva|EnAm|antari̍kṣE|cinutE|dhRutyai̱|svayamAtRuṇṇAmiti̍# svayaM - AtRuṇṇAm|upEti|dadhAti|antari̍kṣam|vai|svayamAtRuṇṇEti̍# svayaM-AtRuṇṇA|antarikṣam|Eva|upEti̍|dhattE|aśva̱m|upEti̍|6̍ (50)
verses.samhita: indrA̱gnI avyathamAnAmiti̍# svayamAtRuṇṇAmupa# dadhAtIndrAgniByAM ~MvA imau lOkau vidhRutAvanayO̱-rlOkayO-rvidhRu̍tyA̍ adhRutEva̍ vA EṣA yanmaddhyamA̍ citirantari̍kṣamiva̍ vA EṣEndrA̱gnI ityAhEndrAgnI̍ vai dEvAnAmOjO̍ BRutAvOjasaivainA̍-mantari̍kṣE̍ cinutE dhRutyai̱ svayamAtRuṇṇAmupa# dadhAtyantarikṣaM̍ ~Mvai svayamAtRuṇṇA̍ &ntarikṣamEvOpa̍# dhattE &śvamupa# - [ ] 6

verses.padam: - Padam GrApayati|prAṇamiti# pra - anam|Eva|asyAm|dadhAti|athO iti|prAjApatya̍ iti# prAjA - patyaḥ|vai|aśvaḥ|prajApa̍tinEti̍# prajA - patinA|Eva|agnim|cinutE|svayamAtRuṇṇEti# svayaM - AtRuṇṇA|Bavati|prAṇAnAmiti# pra - anAnA̱m|uthsRuṣṭya̍ ityut - sRuṣṭyai|athO iti|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|anu̍KyAtyA̍ ityanu# - KyAtyai|dEvAnA̱m|vai|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|yatAm|diśaḥ|samiti̍|avlIyanta|tE|EtAḥ|diśyA̱ḥ|apaśyann|tAḥ|upEti̍|adadhata|tABi̍ḥ|vai|tE|diśa̍ḥ|adRuṃqhann|yat|diśyA̱ḥ|upadadhAtItyu̍pa̍ - dadhAti|diśAm|vidhRu̍tyA̍ iti vi - dhRutyai|daśa|prAṇaBRuta̍ iti# prAṇa - BRutaḥ|purastA̱t|upEti̍|7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: GrApayati prAṇamEvAsyA̱M dadhAtyathO̱ prAjApatyO vA aśvaḥ̍ prajApatinaivAgniM̍ cinutE̍ svayamAtRuṇṇA Bavati̍ prAṇAnAmuthsRuṣṭyA̍ athO# suvargasya# lOkasyAnuKyAtyai̍ dEvAnAM ~Mvai suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM ~MyatAM diśaḥ samavlIyanta̍ ta EtA diśyA# apaśyan tA upAdadhata̍ tABirvai tE diśO&dRuṃhanq̍ yaddiśyA# upadadhAti̍ diśAM ~MvidhRutyai̍ daśa# prAṇaBRutaḥ̍ purastAdupa# - [ ] 7

verses.padam: - Padam dadhAti|nava|vai|puru̍ṣE|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|nABiḥ|daśamI|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|Eva|purastA̱t|dhattE|tasmA̱t|purastA̱t|prAṇA iti# pra - anAḥ|jyOtiṣmatIm|uttamAmityu̍t̍ - tamAm|upEti|dadhAti|tasmA̱t|prAṇAnAmiti̍# pra - anAnA̱m|vAk|jyOtiḥ|uttamEtyu̍t̍ - tamA|daśa|upEti̍|dadhAti|daśA̱kṣarEti̍ daśa# - akṣarA|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|CandasAm|jyOti̍ḥ|jyOti̍ḥ|Eva|purastA̱t|dhattE|tasmA̱t|purastA̱t|jyOti̍ḥ|upEti̍|AsmahE|CandAṃ̍si|paśuṣu̍|Ajim|ayuḥ|tAn|bRuhatI|uditi̍|ajayat|tasmA̱t|bAṛha̍tAḥ|8̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dadhAti nava vai puruṣE̍ prAṇA nABirdaśamI̍ prAṇAnEva purastA̱ddhattE tasmA̱t purastA̱t prAṇA jyOtiṣmatI-muttamAmupa̍# dadhAti tasmA̱t prAṇAnAM ~MvAgjyOtiruttamA̍ daśOpa# dadhAti daśA̱kṣarA virAḍ virAṭ CandasAM̍ jyOtirjyOtirEva̍ purastA̱ddhattE tasmA̱t purastAjjyOtirupA̱ &&*smahE CandAṃsi̍ paśuṣvAjimayustAn̍ bRuhatyuda̍jayat̍ tasmAd-bAṛhatAḥ̍ - [ ] 8

verses.padam: - Padam paśavaḥ|ucyantE|mA|Canda̍ḥ|iti̍|dakṣiṇataḥ|upEti̍|dadhAti|tasmA̱t|dakṣiṇAvRu̍ta̍ iti# dakṣiṇA - AvRutaḥ|mAsA̱ḥ|pRuthivI|Candaḥ|iti̍|paścAt|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|agniḥ|dEvatA̱|iti|uttarata̍ ityut̍ - tarataḥ|Ojaḥ|vai|agniḥ|Oja̍ḥ|Eva|uttarata̍ ityut-tarataḥ|dhattE|tasmA̱t|uttaratO&BiprayAyItyu̍ttarataḥ̍ - aBiprayAyI|jayati|ṣaṭtriṃśaditi̍ ṣaṭ - triṃqśat|samiti|padyantE|ṣaṭtriṃ̍śadakṣarEti̍ ṣaṭtriṃśat̍ - akṣarA|bRuhatI|bAṛhatAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|bRuhatyA|Eva|asmai|paśUn|avEti̍|rundhE|bRuhatI|Canda̍sAm|svArA̱jyamiti̍ sva - rAjyam|parIti|iyAya|yasya̍|EtAḥ|9̍ (50)
verses.samhita: paśava# ucyantE mA Canda iti# dakṣiṇata upa# dadhAti tasmA̱d-dakṣiṇA vRutO̍ mAsA̱ḥ pRuthivI Canda iti# paścAt pratiṣṭhityA̍ agnirdEvatEtyuttarata̍ OjO vA agnirOja# EvOttaratO̍ dhattE̍ tasmAduttaratO̍ &BiprayAyI jayati̍ ṣaṭtriṃśath̍ saMpadyantE̍ ṣaṭtriṃśadakṣarA̍ bRuhatI bAṛhatAḥ̍ paśavO# bRuhatyaivAsmai# paśUnava# rundhE bRuhatI CandasAṅq̍ svArA̱jyaM parIyAya̍ yasyaitA - [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam upadhIyanta ityupa-dhIyantE̱|gacCa̍ti|svArA̱jyamiti̍ sva-rAjyam|sapta|vAlaKilyA̍ iti vAla# - KilyAḥ|purastA̱t|upEti|dadhAti|sapta|paścAt|sapta|vai|śIṛqṣaṇyA̱ḥ|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|dvau|avA̱~jcau|prAṇAnAmiti# pra - anAnA̱m|savIryatvAyEti# savIrya - tvAya|mUd^^rdhA|asi|rAṭ|iti̍|purastA̱t|upEti̍|dadhAti|yantrI̱|rAṭ|iti̍|paścAt|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|Eva|asmai|samIcaḥ|dadhAti||10̍ (34) (aśvamupa# - purastAdupa - bAṛhatA̍ - EtA - ścatustriṃśacca)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: upadhIyantE̍ gacCati̍ svArA̱jyaṃ sapta vAlaKilyAḥ̍ purastAdupa# dadhAti sapta paścAth sapta vai śIṛṣaṇyA̱ḥ̍ prAṇA dvAvavA̱~jcau prAṇAnAṃ# savIryatvAya# mUrddhA&si rAḍiti# purastAdupa# dadhAti yantrI rAḍiti# paścAt prAṇAnEvAsmai# samIcO# dadhAti||10 (aśvamupa-purastAdupa-bAṛha̍tA-EtA-ścatu̍striṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAḥ|vai|yat|yajñE|akurvata|tat|asu̍rAḥ|akurvata|tE|dEvAḥ|EtAḥ|akṣṇayAstOmIyA̍ ityakṣṇayA-stOmIyA̱ḥ|apaśyann|tAḥ|anyathA̱|anUcyEtya̍nu̍ - ucya|anyathA̱|upEti̍|adadhata|tat|asu̍rAḥ|na|anvavA̍yannitya̍nu̍ - avAyann|tata̍ḥ|dEvAḥ|aBa̍vann|parEti̍|asu̍rAḥ|yat|akṣṇayAstOmIyA̍ ityakṣṇayA̍ - stOmIyA̱ḥ|anyathA̱|anUcyEtyanu̍ - ucya|anyathA̱|upadadhAtItyu̍pa-dadhA̍ti|BrAtRu̍vyABiBUtyA̍ iti BrAtRuvya̍ - aBiBUtyai|Bavati|AtmanA̱|parEti̍|asya|BrAtRu̍vyaḥ|Bavati|Aśuḥ|trivRuditi̍# tri - vRut|iti|purastA̱t|upEti̍|dadhAti|yajñamuKamiti̍# yajña - muKam|vai|trivRuditi# tri - vRut|11 (50)
verses.samhita: dEvA vai yad-yajñE &kurvata̍ tadasurA̍ akurvata tE dEvA EtA akṣṇayAstOmIyA̍# apaśyan tA anyathA &nUcyA-nyathOpAdadhata̍ tadasurA̍ nAnvavAyan̍ tatO# dEvA aBavan̍ parA&surA̍ yadakṣṇayAstOmIyA̍# anyathA &nUcyAnyathOpa̍ dadhAti̍ BrAtRuvyABiBUtyai̍ BavatyAtmanA̍ parA̱&sya BrAtRuvyO̍ BavatyA-śustrivRuditi# purastAdupa# dadhAti yajñamuKaM ~Mvai trivRu - [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam yajñamuKamiti# yajña - muKam|Eva|purastA̱t|vIti|yAtayati|vyO̍mEti̍ vi - Oma|saptadaśa iti# sapta - daśaḥ|iti|dakṣiṇataḥ|anna̱m|vai|vyO̍mEti̍ vi - Oma|anna̱m|saptadaśa iti# sapta - daśaḥ|anna̱m|Eva|dakṣiṇataḥ|dhattE|tasmA̱t|dakṣiṇEna|anna̱m|adyatE|dharuṇa̍ḥ|Ekaviṃqśa̍ ityEka-viṃqśaḥ|iti̍|paścAt|pratiṣṭhEti̍# prati - sthA|vai|Ekaviṃqśa ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|pratiṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|BAntaḥ|pa~jcadaśa iti# pa~jca - daśaḥ|iti|uttarata̍ ityut̍ - tarataḥ|Ojaḥ|vai|BAntaḥ|Oja̍ḥ|pa~jcadaśa̍ iti# pa~jca - daśaḥ|Ojaḥ|Eva|uttarata̍ ityut̍ - tarataḥ|dhattE|tasmA̱t|uttaratO&BiprayAyItyuttarataḥ̍ - aBiprayAyI|jayati|pratU̱rtiriti pra - tUrtiḥ|aṣṭAdaśa ityaṣṭA̍ - daśaḥ|iti|purastA̱t|12̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -dyajñamuKamEva̍ purastAdvi yAtayati̍ vyOma̍ saptadaśa iti# dakṣiṇatO &nnaM ~Mvai vyOmA&nnaṃ̍# saptadaśO&nnamEva̍ dakṣiṇatO̍ dhattE̍ tasmAd-dakṣiṇEnAnna̍madyatE̍ dharuṇa# Ekaviṃqśa iti# paścAt pratiṣṭhA̍ vA Ekaviṃqśaḥ̍ pratiṣṭhityai̍ BAntaḥ pa~jcadaśa̍ ityuttarata̍ OjO vai BAnta Ojaḥ̍ pa~jcadaśa Oja# EvOttaratO̍ dhattE̍ tasmAduttaratO̍ &BiprayAyI jayati̍ pratU̱rtiraṣṭAdaśa iti# purastA- [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam upEti|dadhAti|dvau|trivRutAviti̍# tri - vRutau̱|aBipUrvamityaBi̍ - pUrvam|yajñamuKa iti# yajña - muKE|vIti|yAtayati|aBivarta̍ ityaBi̍ - vartaḥ|saviṃqśa iti# sa-viṃqśaḥ|iti|dakṣiṇataḥ|anna̱m|vai|aBivarta̍ ityaBi̍ - vartaḥ|anna̱m|saviṃqśa iti# sa - viṃqśaḥ|anna̱m|Eva|dakṣiṇataḥ|dhattE|tasmA̱t|dakṣiṇEna|anna̱m|adyatE|varca̍ḥ|dvAviṃqśaḥ|iti̍|paścAt|yat|viṃqśatiḥ|dvE̍ iti|tEna̍|virAjAviti̍# vi-rAjau̱|yat|dvE iti|pratiṣṭhEti̍# prati - sthA|tEna|virAjOriti̍# vi - rAjO̱ḥ|Eva|aBipUrvamityaBi̍ - pUrvam|annAdya ityanna̍ - adyE̱|pratIti|tiṣṭhati|tapa̍ḥ|navadaśa̍ iti# nava - daśaḥ|iti|uttarata̍ ityut-̍ tarataḥ|tasmA̱t|savyaḥ|13 (50)
verses.samhita: -dupa# dadhAti dvau trivRutAvaBipUrvaM̍ ~MyajñamuKE̍ vi yAtayatyaBivartaḥ̍ saviṃqśa̍ iti# dakṣiṇatO&nnaM ~MvA aBivartO&nnaṃ̍# saviṃqśO&nnamEva̍ dakṣiṇatO̍ dhattE̍ tasmAd-dakṣiṇEnAnna̍madyatE̍ varcO̱ dvAviṃqśa iti# paścAd-yad-viṃśatirdvE̍ tEna# virAjau yad dvE pratiṣṭhA̍ tEna# virAjOrEvA-Bi̍pUrvamannAdyE̍ pratitiṣṭhati̍ tapO# navadaśa ityuttara̍ tasmA̱th savyO - [ ] 13

verses.padam: - Padam hastayOḥ|tapasvita̍ra̍ iti# tapasvi - taraḥ|yOniḥ|caturviṃqśa̍ iti# catuḥ - viṃqśaḥ|iti|purastA̱t|upEti̍|dadhAti|catu̍rviṃśatyakṣarEti̍ caturviṃśati̍ - akṣarA|gAyatrI|gAyatrI|yajñamuKamiti# yajña - muKam|yajñamuKamiti# yajña - muKam|Eva|purastA̱t|vIti|yAtayati|garBA̱ḥ|pa~jcaviṃqśa̍ iti# pa~jca - viṃqśaḥ|iti|dakṣiṇataḥ|anna̱m|vai|garBA̱ḥ|anna̱m|pa~jcaviṃqśa̍ iti# pa~jca - viṃqśaḥ|anna̱m|Eva|dakṣiṇataḥ|dhattE|tasmA̱t|dakṣiṇEna|anna̱m|adyatE|Oja̍ḥ|triṇava̍ iti# tri - navaḥ|iti|paścAt|imE|vai|lOkAḥ|triṇava̍ iti# tri - navaḥ|Eṣu|Eva|lOkEṣu|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|saBaMra̍ṇa̍ iti# saM - Baraṇaḥ|trayOviṃqśa̍ iti# trayaḥ - viṃqśaḥ|iti|14̍ (50)
verses.samhita: hastayOstapasvita̍rO̍ yOniścaturviṃqśa̍ iti# purastAdupa# dadhAti caturviṃśatyakṣarA̍ gAyatrI gAyatrI̍ yajñamuKaM̍ ~MyajñamuKamEva̍ purastAd-viyAtayati̍ garBA̱ḥ pa~jcaviṃqśa iti# dakṣiṇatO&nnaM ~Mvai garBA annaM̍ pa~jcaviṃqśOnnamEva̍ dakṣiṇatO̍ dhattE̍ tasmAd dakṣiṇEnAnna̍madyata̍ Ojastriṇava̍ iti# paścAdimE vai lOkAstriṇava̍ EṣvEva̍ lOkEṣu pratitiṣṭhati̍ saBaMraṇastrayOviṃqśa̍ ityu# - [ ] 14

verses.padam: - Padam uttarata ityut̍ - tarataḥ|tasmA̱t|savyaḥ|hastayOḥ|saBAMqrya̍tara̍ iti# saMBArya# - taraḥ|kratuḥ|Ekatriṃqśa̍ ityEka̍ - triṃqśaḥ|iti|purastA̱t|upEti̍|dadhAti|vAk|vai|kratu̍ḥ|yajñamuKamiti̍# yajña - muKam|vAk|yajñamuKamiti# yajña - muKam|Eva|purastA̱t|vIti|yAtayati|braddhnasya̍|viṣṭapa̱m|catustriṃqśa̍ iti# catuḥ - triṃqśaḥ|iti|dakṣiṇataḥ|asau|vai|Adityaḥ|braddhnasya̍|viṣṭapa̱m|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|Eva|dakṣiṇataḥ|dhattE|tasmA̱t|dakṣiṇaḥ|ad^^rdha̍ḥ|brahmavarcasita̍ra̍ iti# brahmavarcasi - taraḥ|pratiṣṭhEti# prati - sthA|trayastriṃqśa iti# trayaḥ-triṃqśaḥ|iti|paścAt|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati-sthityai|nAka̍ḥ|ṣaṭtriṃqśa̍ iti# ṣaṭ-triṃqśaḥ|iti|uttarata̍ ityut-tarataḥ|suvarga̍ iti# suvaḥ - gaḥ|vai ( )|lOkaḥ|nAkaḥ|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|sama̍ṣṭyA̍ iti saM - aṣṭyai||15 (55) (vai trivRu - diti# purastA̱th - savya - strayOviṃqśa̍ iti# - suvargO vai - pa~jca# ca) (A3) śpecial Korvai for Anuvaakam 3 Aśu - rvyOma̍ - dharuṇO# - BAntaḥ - pratU̱rtira -BivartO - varca - stapO - yOni - rgarBA - Ojaḥ̍ - saBaMraṇaḥ̍ - kratu# - rbraddhrasya# - pratiṣṭhA - nAkaḥ - ṣOḍaśa)̍
verses.samhita: -ttaratastasmA̱th savyO hastayOḥ̍ samBAryataraḥ̍ kraturEkatriṃqśa̍ iti# purastAdupa# dadhAti vAgvai kraturyajñamuKaM̍ ~MvAgyajñamuKamEva̍ purastAdvi yAtayati̍ braddhnasya# viṣṭapaM̍ catustriṃqśa iti# dakṣiṇatO&sau̍ vA AdityO̍ braddhnasya# viṣṭapaM̍ brahmavarcasamEva dakṣiṇatO̍ dhattE̍ tasmAd dakṣiṇO&rddhO̱ brahmavarcasitaraḥ̍ pratiṣṭhA trayastriṃqśa̍ iti# paścAt pratiṣṭhityai̍ nAkaḥ̍ ṣaṭtriṃqśa ityuttarataḥ̍ suvargO̍ vai ( ) lOkO nAkaḥ̍ suvargasya# lOkasya samaṣṭyai||15̍ (vai trivRu - diti# purastA̱th - savya - strayOviṃqśa̍ iti# - suvargO vai - pa~jca# ca) (A3) śpEcial KOrvai fOr anuvAkam 3 Aśu - rvyOma̍ - dharuṇO# - BAntaḥ - pratU̱rtira -BivartO - varca - stapO - yOni - rgarBA - Ojaḥ̍ - saBaMraṇaḥ̍ - kratu# - rbraddhrasya# - pratiṣṭhA - nAkaḥ - ṣOḍaśa)̍

verses.padam: - Padam agnEḥ|BAgaḥ|asi|iti|purastA̱t|upEti̍|dadhAti|yajñamuKamiti̍# yajña - muKam|vai|agniḥ|yajñamuKamiti# yajña-muKam|dIkṣA|yajñamuKamiti# yajña - muKam|brahma|yajñamuKamiti̍# yajña - muKam|trivRuditi# tri - vRut|yajñamuKamiti# yajña-muKam|Eva|purastA̱t|vIti|yAtayati|nRucakṣa̍sAmiti̍# nRu - cakṣasAm|BAgaḥ|asi|iti̍|dakṣiṇataḥ|śuśruvAṃsa̍ḥ|vai|nRucakṣa̍sa̍ iti# nRu - cakṣasaḥ|anna̱m|dhAtA|jAtAya̍|Eva|asmai|anna̱m|apIti̍|dadhAti|tasmA̱t|jAtaḥ|anna̱m|atti|janitra̱m|spRutam|saptadaśa̍ iti# sapta - daśaḥ|stOmaḥ|iti̍|Aha|anna̱m|vai|janitra̱m|16̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agnErBAgO&sIti̍# purastAdupa# dadhAti yajñamuKaM ~MvA agniryajñamuKaM̍ dIkṣA yajñamuKaM̍ brahma# yajñamuKaM trivRud-yajñamuKamEva̍ purastAdvi yAtayati̍ nRucakṣasAM̍ BAgO&sIti̍# dakṣiṇataḥ śuśruvAṃsO̍ vai nRucakṣasO&nnaM̍ dhAtA jAtAyaivAsmA annamapi# dadhAti tasmA̱jjAtO&nnamatti̍ janitraṅ# spRutaṃ saptadaśaḥ̍ stOma ityAhA&nnaM ~Mvai janitra - [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam anna̱m|saptadaśa iti# sapta - daśaḥ|anna̱m|Eva|dakṣiṇataḥ|dhattE|tasmA̱t|dakṣiṇEna|anna̱m|adyatE|mitrasya̍|BAgaḥ|asi|iti̍|paścAt|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|vai|mitraḥ|apAna ityapa̍ - anaḥ|varuṇaḥ|prAṇApAnAviti̍# prAṇa - apAnau|Eva|asminn|dadhAti|divaḥ|vRuṣṭiḥ|vAtA̱ḥ|spRutAḥ|Ekaviṃqśa ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|stOmaḥ|iti̍|Aha|pratiṣṭhEti̍# prati - sthA|vai|Ekaviṃqśa ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|pratiṣṭhityA̍ iti prati-sthityai|indra̍sya|BAgaḥ|asi|iti̍|uttarata̍ ityut̍ - tarataḥ|Ojaḥ|vai|indra̍ḥ|Oja̍ḥ|viṣṇu̍ḥ|Oja̍ḥ|kṣatram|Oja̍ḥ|pa~jcadaśa̍ iti# pa~jca - daśaḥ|17 (50)
verses.samhita: -mannaṃ# saptadaśO-&nnamEva̍ dakṣiṇatO̍ dhattE̍ tasmAd dakṣiṇEnA-nna̍madyatE̍ mitrasya# BAgO&sIti̍# paścAt prAṇO vai mitrO&pAnO̍ varuṇaḥ̍ prAṇApAnAvEvAsmin̍ dadhAti divO vRuṣṭirvAtA̱ḥ spRutA Ekaviṃqśaḥ̍ stOma ityAha̍ pratiṣṭhA vA Ekaviṃqśaḥ̍ pratiṣṭhityA̍ indrasya̍ BAgO&sItyu̍ttarata̍ OjO vA indra OjO viṣṇurOjaḥ̍ kṣatramOjaḥ̍ pa~jcadaśa - [ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam Ojaḥ|Eva|uttarata̍ ityut̍ - tarataḥ|dhattE|tasmA̱t|uttaratO&BiprayAyItyuttarataḥ-aBiprayAyI|jayati|vasU̍nAm|BAgaḥ|asi|iti̍|purastA̱t|upEti̍|dadhAti|yajñamuKamiti̍# yajña-muKam|vai|vasavaḥ|yajñamuKamiti̍# yajña - muKam|rudrAḥ|yajñamuKamiti# yajña - muKam|caturviṃqśa iti# catuḥ - viṃqśaḥ|yajñamuKamiti# yajña - muKam|Eva|purastA̱t|vIti|yAtayati|AdityAnA̱m|BAgaḥ|asi|iti̍|dakṣiṇataḥ|anna̱m|vai|AdityAḥ|anna̱m|maruta̍ḥ|anna̱m|garBA̱ḥ|anna̱m|pa~jcaviṃqśa̍ iti# pa~jca - viṃqśaḥ|anna̱m|Eva|dakṣiṇataḥ|dhattE|tasmA̱t|dakṣiṇEna|anna̱m|adyatE|adi̍tyai|BAgaḥ|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Oja# EvOttaratO̍ dhattE̍ tasmAduttaratO-&BiprayAyI̍ jayati̍ vasUnAM̍ BAgO&sIti̍# purastAdupa# dadhAti yajñamuKaM ~Mvai vasavO̍ yajñamuKaṃ rudrA yajñamuKaM̍ caturviṃqśO̍ yajñamuKamEva̍ purastAdvi yAtayatyAdityAnA̱M̍ BAgO&sIti̍# dakṣiṇatO&nnaM ~MvA AdityA̍ annaM̍ marutO&nnaM garBA annaM̍ pa~jcaviṃqśO&nnamEva̍ dakṣiṇatO̍ dhattE̍ tasmAd dakṣiṇEnA&nna̍madyatE̍ &dityai̍ BAgO# - [ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam asi|iti|paścAt|pratiṣṭhEti̍# prati - sthA|vai|aditiḥ|pratiṣṭhEti̍# prati - sthA|pUṣA|pratiṣṭhEti# prati - sthA|triṇava iti# tri - navaḥ|pratiṣṭhityA̍ iti prati-sthityai|dEvasya̍|savituḥ|BAgaḥ|asi|iti̍|uttarata̍ ityut̍ - tarataḥ|brahma|vai|dEvaḥ|savitA|brahma̍|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|brahma̍|catuṣṭOma̍ iti# catuḥ - stOmaḥ|brahmavarcasamiti# brahma - varcasam|Eva|uttarata ityut̍ - tarataḥ|dhattE|tasmA̱t|uttara̍ ityut - taraḥ|ad^^rdhaḥ|brahmavarcasita̍ra̍ iti# brahmavarcasi - taraḥ|sAvitravatIti# sAvitra - vatI|Bavati|prasU̱tyA iti pra - sUtyai|tasmA̱t|brAhmaṇAnA̱m|udIcI|saniḥ|prasUtEti̍ pra - sUtA|dhartraḥ|catuṣṭOma iti# catuḥ - stOmaḥ|iti|purastA̱t|upEti̍|dadhAti|yajñamuKamiti̍# yajña - muKam|vai|dhartraḥ|19 (50)
verses.samhita: &sIti# paścAt pratiṣṭhA̍ vA aditiḥ̍ pratiṣṭhA pUṣA pratiṣṭhA̍ triṇavaḥ̍ pratiṣṭhityai̍ dEvasya# saviturBAgO&̍ sItyuttaratO̍ brahma vai dEvaḥ savitA̍ brahma bRuhaspatirbrahma# catuṣṭOmO brahmavarcasamEvOtta̍ratO̍ dhattE̍ tasmAduttarO&rddhO̱ brahmavarcasitaraḥ̍ sAvitravatI̍ Bavati prasU̱tyai tasmA̱d brAhmaṇAnAmudIcI̍ saniḥ prasUtA̍ dhartraścatuṣṭOma̍ iti# purastAdupa# dadhAti yajñamuKaM ~Mvai dhartrO - [ ] 19

verses.padam: - Padam yajñamuKamiti# yajña - muKam|catuṣṭOma iti# catuḥ - stOmaḥ|yajñamuKamiti# yajña - muKam|Eva|purastA̱t|vIti|yAtayati|yAvA̍nAm|BAgaḥ|asi|iti̍|dakṣiṇataḥ|mAsA̱ḥ|vai|yAvA̱ḥ|ad^^rdhamAsA̍ ityad^^rdha̍ - mAsAḥ|ayAvAḥ|tasmA̱t|dakṣiṇAvRu̍ta̍ iti# dakṣiṇA - AvRutaḥ|mAsA̱ḥ|anna̱m|vai|yAvA̱ḥ|anna̱m|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|anna̱m|Eva|dakṣiṇataḥ|dhattE|tasmA̱t|dakṣiṇEna|anna̱m|adyatE|RuBUṇAm|BAgaḥ|asi|iti̍|paścAt|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|vivarta iti# vi - vartaḥ|aṣṭAcatvAriṃqśa ityaṣṭA-catvAriṃqśaḥ|iti̍|uttarata̍ ityut-tarataḥ|anayO̱ḥ|lOkayO̱ḥ|savIryatvAyEti̍# savIrya - tvAya|tasmA̱t|imau|lOkau|samAva̍dvIryAviti̍# samAvat̍ - vIryau|20 (50)
verses.samhita: yajñamuKaM̍ catuṣṭOmO̍ yajñamuKamEva̍ purastAdvi yAtayati̍ yAvAnAM̍ BAgO&sIti̍# dakṣiṇatO mAsA vai yAvA# arddhamAsA ayAvA-stasmA̱d-dakṣiṇAvRu̍tO̍ mAsA annaM ~Mvai yAvA annaM̍ prajA annamEva̍ dakṣiṇatO̍ dhattE̍ tasmAd dakṣiṇEnA-nna̍madyata̍ RuBUṇAM BAgO&sIti̍# paścAt pratiṣṭhityai̍ vivartO̱ &ṣṭAcatvAriṃqśa ityuttaratO̍&nayO̱rlOkayO̱ḥ̍ savIryatvAya tasmAdimau̍ lOkau samAvad-vIryau̍ - [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam yasya|muKya̍vatIriti̍ muKya# - vatIḥ|purastA̱t|upadhIyanta ityupa̍ - dhIyantE̱|muKyaḥ|Eva|Bavati|Eti̍|asya|muKya̍ḥ|jAyatE|yasya̍|anna̍vatIrityanna̍# - vatIḥ|dakṣiṇataḥ|atti|anna̱m|Eti̍|asya|annAda̍ ityanna̍ - adaḥ|jAyatE|yasya|pratiṣṭhAva̍tIriti̍# pratiṣṭhA - vatIḥ|paścAt|pratIti|Eva|tiṣṭhati|yasya̍|Oja̍svatIḥ|uttarata̍ ityut̍ - tarataḥ|OjasvI|Eva|Bavati|Eti|asya|OjasvI|jAyatE|arkaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|agniḥ|tasya̍|Etat|Eva|stOtram|Etat|śastram|yat|EṣA|vidhEti̍# vi - dhA|21 (50)
verses.samhita: yasya muKyavatIḥ̍ purastAdupadhIyantE̍ muKya# Eva BavatyA&sya̍ muKyO# jAyatE yasyA-nnavatI̍ - rdakṣiṇatO-&ttyannamA&syA̱nnAdO jAyatE̍ yasya# pratiṣṭhAvatIḥ̍ paścAt pratyEva tiṣṭhati̍ yasyaujasvatIruttarata̍ OjasvyE̍va̍ BavatyA&syau̍jasvI̍ jAyatE̍ &rkO vA Eṣa yadagnistasyaitadEva stOtramEtacCastraM ~MyadEṣA vidhA - [ ] 21

verses.padam: - Padam vidhIyata iti# vi - dhIyatE̱|arkE|Eva|tat|arkya̱m|anu|vIti̍|dhIyatE|atti̍|anna̱m|Eti̍|asya|annAda̍ ityanna̍ - adaḥ|jAyatE|yasya|EṣA|vidhEti̍# vi - dhA|vidhIyata iti# vi - dhIyatE̱|yaḥ|u|ca|EnAm|Evam|vEda|sRuṣṭI̱ḥ|upEti̍|dadhAti|yathAsRuṣṭamiti̍# yathA - sRuṣṭam|Eva|avEti|rundhE|na|vai|idam|divA̱|na|nakta̱m|AsIt|avyA̍vRuttamityavi̍# - AvRuttam|tE|dEvAḥ|EtAḥ|vyuṣṭIriti̍ vi - uṣṭIḥ|apaśyann|tAḥ|upEti|adadhata|tata̍ḥ|vai|idam̍ ( )|vIti|aucCat|yasya̍|EtAḥ|upadhIyanta̍ ityupa̍ - dhIyantE̱|vIti|Eva|asmai|ucCati|athO̍ iti|tama̍ḥ|Eva|apEti̍|hatE||22̍ (64) śpecial Korvai for Anuvaakam 4 (agnE - rnRucakṣasAM̍ - janitraM̍ - mitra - syEndrasya̍ -vasUnA̍ - mAdityAnA - madityai̍ - dEvasya# savituḥ - sAvitrava̍tI̍ - dhartrO - yAvAnA-mRuBUṇAM̍ - ~Mvivarta̍ - ścaturdaśa)̍
verses.samhita: vidhIyatE&rka̍ Eva tadarkyamanu̍ vi dhIyatE̍ &ttyannamA&syA̱nnAdO jAyatE̍ yasyaiṣA vidhA vidhIyatE̍ ya u# cainAmEvaM ~MvEda sRuṣṭIrupa# dadhAti yathAsRuṣṭamEvAva# rundhE na vA idaM divA na naktamAsIdavyA̍vRuttaM̍ tE dEvA EtA vyuṣṭIrapaśyan̍ tA upAdadhata̍ tatO vA idaM ( ) ~Mvyau̱cCad-yasyaitA upadhIyantE̍ vyEvAsmA̍# ucCatyathO tama# EvApahatE||22̍ śpEcial KOrvai fOr anuvAkam 4 (agnE - rnRucakṣasAM̍ - janitraM̍ - mitra - syEndrasya̍ -vasUnA̍ - mAdityAnA - madityai̍ - dEvasya# savituḥ - sAvitrava̍tI̍ - dhartrO - yAvAnA-mRuBUṇAM̍ - ~Mvivarta̍ - ścaturdaśa)̍

verses.padam: - Padam agnE̱|jAtAn|prEti|nuda|naḥ|sapatnAn̍|iti̍|purastA̱t|upEti̍|dadhAti|jAtAn|Eva|BrAtRu̍vyAn|prEti̍|nudatE|saha̍sA|jAtAn|iti̍|paścAt|janiṣyamA̍ṇAn|Eva|pratIti̍|nudatE|catuścatvAriṃqśa̍ iti# catuḥ - catvAriṃqśaḥ|stOmaḥ|iti̍|dakṣiṇataḥ|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|vai|catuścatvAriṃqśa iti# catuḥ - catvAriṃqśaḥ|brahmavarcasamiti# brahma - varcasam|Eva|dakṣiṇataḥ|dhattE|tasmA̱t|dakṣiṇaḥ|ad^^rdha̍ḥ|brahmavarcasita̍ra̍ iti# brahmavarcasi - taraḥ|ṣOḍaśaḥ|stOmaḥ|iti̍|uttarata̍ ityut̍ - tarataḥ|Ojaḥ|vai|ṣOḍaśaḥ|Oja̍ḥ|Eva|uttarata̍ ityut̍ - tarataḥ|dhattE|tasmA̱t|23 (50)
verses.samhita: agnE# jAtAn praṇudA̍ naḥ sapatnAniti# purastAdupa# dadhAti jAtAnEva BrAtRuvyAn̍ praṇudatE̍ sahasA̍ jAtAniti# paścAjjaniṣyamA̍ṇAnEva̍ prati# nudatE catuścatvAriṃqśaḥ stOma iti# dakṣiṇatO brahmavarcasaM̍ ~Mvai catuścatvAriṃqśO̍ brahmavarcasamEva̍ dakṣiṇatO̍ dhattE̍ tasmAd dakṣiṇO&rddhO̱ brahmavarcasitaraḥ̍ ṣOḍaśaḥ stOma ityuttarata̍ OjO vai ṣOḍaśa̍ Oja# EvOttaratO̍ dhattE̍ tasmA# - [ ] 23

verses.padam: - Padam uttaratO&BiprayAyItyuttarataḥ̍ - aBiprayAyI|jayati|vajraḥ|vai|catuścatvAriṃqśa̍ iti# catuḥ-catvAriṃqśaḥ|vajraḥ|ṣOḍaśaḥ|yat|EtE̍ iti|iṣṭa̍kE̍ iti|upadadhAtItyu̍pa̍ - dadhAti|jAtAn|ca|Eva|janiṣyamA̍ṇAn|ca|BrAtRu̍vyAn|praṇudyEti̍# pra-nudya|vajra̱m|anu̍|prEti̍|harati|stRutyai̱|purI̍ṣavatImiti̍ purIṣa-vatIm|maddhyE̱|upEti̍|dadhAti|purI̍ṣam|vai|maddhya̱m|Atmana̍ḥ|sAtmA̍namiti̍ sa - AtmAnam|Eva|agnim|cinutE|sAtmEti sa - AtmA|amuṣminn|lOkE|Bavati|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|EtAḥ|vai|asapatnAḥ|nAma̍|iṣṭa̍kAḥ|yasya̍|EtAḥ|upadhIyanta̍ ityupa̍ - dhIyantE̱|24 (50)
verses.samhita: duttaratO&BiprayAyI jayati̍ vajrO vai catuścatvAriṃqśO̍ vajraḥ̍ ṣOḍaśO yadEtE iṣṭakE̍ upadadhAti̍ jAtAṅścaiva janiṣyamA̍ṇAṅśca̍ BrAtRuvyAn̍ praṇudya vajramanu praharati̍ stRutyai purIṣavatIM̍ maddhya upadadhAti̍ purIṣaM̍ ~Mvai maddhyamAtmanaḥ̍ sAtmAnamEvAgniM̍ cinutE̍ sAtmA&muṣmin̍ ~MlOkE Bavati̍ ya EvaM ~MvEdaitA vA asapatnA̍ nAmEṣṭakA̍ yasyaitA upadhIyantE̍ - [ ] 24

verses.padam: - Padam na|asya|sapatnaḥ|Bavati|paśuḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|agniḥ|virAja̍ iti# vi - rAjaḥ|uttamAyAmityu̍t̍ - tamAyA̱m|cityA̱m|upEti|dadhAti|virAjamiti̍# vi - rAja̱m|Eva|uttamAmityut̍ - tamAm|paśuṣu|dadhAti|tasmA̱t|paśumAniti̍# paśu - mAn|uttamAmityut̍ - tamAm|vAca̱m|vadati|daśadaśEti̍ daśa# - daśa|upEti|dadhAti|savIryatvAyEti̍# savIrya-tvAya|akṣṇayA|upEti̍|dadhAti|tasmA̱t|akṣṇayA|paśava̍ḥ|a~ggA̍ni|prEti̍|haranti|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|yAni|vai|CandAṃ̍si|suvargyA̍ṇIti̍# suvaḥ - gyAni|Asann̍|taiḥ|dEvAḥ|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Ayann|tEna|Ruṣa̍yaḥ|25̍ (50)
verses.samhita: nAsya# sapatnO# Bavati paśurvA Eṣa yadagnirvirAja# uttamAyAM cityAmupa# dadhAti virAjamEvOttamAM̍ paśuṣu# dadhAti tasmA̱t paśumAnuttamAM̍ ~MvAcaM̍ ~Mvadati daśadaśOpa̍# dadhAti savIryatvAyA̱&kṣṇayOpa# dadhAti tasmAdakṣṇayA̍ paśavO&~ggAni̍ praharanti̍ pratiṣṭhityai̍ yAni vai CandAṃsi̍ suvargyA̱ṇyAsan tairdEvAḥ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyan̍ tEnaṛṣayO̍ - [ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam aśrAmyann|tE|tapaḥ|atapyanta|tAni̍|tapa̍sA|apaśyann|tEBya̍ḥ|EtAḥ|iṣṭa̍kAḥ|niriti̍|amimata|Eva̍ḥ|Canda̍ḥ|vari̍vaḥ|Canda̍ḥ|iti̍|tAḥ|upEti̍|adadhata|tABi̍ḥ|vai|tE|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ-gam|lOkam|Ayann|yat|EtAḥ|iṣṭakAḥ|upadadhAtItyu̍pa̍ - dadhAti|yAni̍|Eva|CandAṃ̍si|suvargyA̍ṇIti̍# suvaḥ-gyAni|taiḥ|Eva|yaja̍mAnaḥ|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Eti|yajñEna|vai|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|asRujata|tAḥ|stOmaBAgairiti̍ stOma# - BAgaiḥ|Eva|asRujata|yat|26 (50)
verses.samhita: &śrAmyan tE tapO&tapyanta̍ tAni tapasA&paśyan̍ tEBya# EtA iṣṭakA̍ niramimatEvaśCandO̍ varivaśCanda̍ iti tA upAdadhata̍ tABirvai tE suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyana.̍ yadEtA iṣṭakA̍ upadadhAti̍ yAnyEva CandAṃsi̍ suvargyAṇi̍ tairEva yajamAnaḥ̍ suvargaM ~MlOkamEti̍ yajñEna vai prajApatiḥ̍ prajA asRujata̍ tAḥ stOma# BAgairEvA&sRujata̍ yath - [ ] 26

verses.padam: - Padam stOmaBAgA̍ iti stOma# - BAgAḥ|upadadhAtItyupa̍ - dadhAti|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|Eva|tat|yajamAnaḥ|sRujatE|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|vai|Etat|yajñasya̍|tEja̍ḥ|samiti̍|aBarat|yat|stOma̍BAgA̍ iti stOma# - BAgAḥ|yat|stOmaBAgA̍ iti stOma# - BAgAḥ|upadadhAtItyupa̍ - dadhAti|satE̍jasamiti̍ sa - tEjasam|Eva|agnim|cinutE|bRuhaspatiḥ|vai|EtAm|yajñasya̍|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati - sthAm|apaśyat|yat|stOmaBAgA̍ iti stOma# - BAgAḥ|yat|stOmaBAgA̍ iti stOma# - BAgAḥ|upadadhAtItyupa̍ - dadhAti|yajñasya̍|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati-sthityai|saptasaptEti̍# sapta - sapta|upEti|dadhAti|savIryatvAyEti̍# savIrya - tvAya|tisraḥ|maddhyE̱|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai||27 (43) ( uttaratO dhattE̍ tasmA# - dupadhIyanta - RuṣayO̍ - &sRujata yat - tricatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A5)
verses.samhita: stOma# BAgA upadadhAti̍ prajA Eva tad-yajamAnaḥ̍ sRujatE bRuhaspatirvA Etad-yajñasya tEjaḥ samaBaradyath̍ stOmaBAgA̍ yath stOmaBAgA̍ upadadhAti̍ satEjasamEvAgniM̍ cinutE̍ bRuhaspatirvA EtAM ~Myajñasya# pratiṣṭhAmapaśyadyath̍ stOmaBAgA̍ yath stOmaBAgA̍ upadadhAti̍ yajñasya pratiṣṭhityai̍ saptasaptOpa# dadhAti savIryatvAya# tisrO maddhyE pratiṣṭhityai||27̍ ( uttaratO dhattE̍ tasmA# - dupadhIyanta - RuṣayO̍ - &sRujata yat - tricatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam raśmiḥ|iti|Eva|Adityam|asRujata|prEtiriti̍ pra - itiḥ|iti|dharma̱m|anvi̍tirityanu̍# - itiḥ|iti|diva̱m|sandhiriti̍# saM - dhiḥ|iti|antari̍kṣam|pratidhiriti̍# prati - dhiḥ|iti|pRuthivIm|viṣṭaBaM̍ iti# vi - staBaMḥ|iti|vRuṣṭi̱m|pravEti̍# pra - vA|iti|aha̍ḥ|anuvEtya̍nu-vA|iti̍|rAtri̱m|uśik|iti̍|vasUn̍|prakEta̍ iti# pra - kEtaḥ|iti|rudrAn|sudItiriti̍# su-dItiḥ|iti|AdityAn|Oja̍ḥ|iti̍|pitRUn|tantu̍ḥ|iti̍|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|pRutanAṣAṭ|iti|paśUn|rEvat|iti̍|Oṣa̍dhIḥ|aBijiditya̍Bi̍ - jit|asi|yuktagrAvEti# yukta - grAvA|28 (50)
verses.samhita: raśmirityEvA &&dityamasRujata̍ prEtiriti dharmamanvitiriti̍ divaṃ# sadhiMrityantarikṣaM̍ pratidhiriti# pRuthivIM ~MviṣṭamBa̍ iti vRuṣṭiM̍ pravEtyaharanuvEti̍ rAtrimuśigiti̍ vasU̱n prakEta iti# rudrAnth sudItirityA̍dityAnOja̍ iti# pitRUṅstanturiti# prajAḥ pRutanAṣAḍiti̍# paśUn rEvadityO-ṣadhIraBijida̍si̍ yuktagrAvE - [ ] 28

verses.padam: - Padam indrAya|tvA|indra̱m|jinva|iti̍|Eva|dakṣiṇataḥ|vajra̱m|parIti̍|auhat|aBiji̍tyA̍ ityaBi - jityai|tAḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|apaprAṇA̍ ityapa# - prAṇAḥ|asRujata|tAsu|adhi̍patirityadhi̍-patiḥ|asi|iti̍|Eva|prAṇamiti̍# pra-anam|adadhAt|yantA|iti|apAnamitya̍pa̍ - anam|saṃqsarpa iti# saM - sarpaḥ|iti̍|cakṣu̍ḥ|vayOdhA̍ iti# vayaḥ - dhAḥ|iti|śrOtra̱m|tAḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|prAṇatIriti# pra - anatIḥ|apAnatIrityapa̍ - anatIḥ|paśyantIḥ|śRuṇvatIḥ|na|mithunI|aBavann|tAsu̍|trivRuditi̍# tri - vRut|asi|iti|Eva|mithunam|adadhAt|tAḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra-jAḥ|mithunI|29 (50)
verses.samhita: -ndrAya̍ tvEndraM̍ jinvEtyEva dakṣiṇatO̍ vajraM paryauhadaBiji̍tyai̍ tAḥ prajA apaprAṇA̍ asRujata tAsvadhipatirasItyEva̍ prAṇamadadhA-dyantEtya̍pAnaṃ̍ saṃqsarpa iti cakṣurvayOdhA̍ iti śrOtraM tAḥ prajAḥ prAṇatIra̍pAnatIḥ̍ paśyantIḥ̍ śRuṇvatIrna mithunI̍ aBavan̍ tAsu# trivRudasItyEva mithunama̍dadhAt̍ tAḥ prajA mithunI̍ - [ ] 29

verses.padam: - Padam BavantIḥ|na|prEti̍|ajAyanta|tAḥ|saṃqrOha̍ iti# saM - rOhaḥ|asi|nIrOha iti# niḥ - rOhaḥ|asi|iti|Eva|prEti̍|ajanayat|tAḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|prajAtA̍ iti pra-jAtAḥ|na|pratIti|atiṣṭhann|tAḥ|vasukaḥ|asi|vEṣa̍śririti̍ vEṣa-śriḥ|asi|vasya̍ṣṭiḥ|asi|iti̍|Eva|Eṣu|lOkEṣu̍|pratIti̍|asthApayat|yat|Aha̍|vasukaḥ|asi|vEṣa̍śririti̍ vEṣa# - śriḥ|asi|vasyaṣṭiḥ|asi|iti̍|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|Eva|prajAtA̍ iti pra - jAtAḥ|Eṣu|lOkEṣu|pratIti̍|sthApayati|sAtmEti̍ sa - AtmA|antarikṣam̍ ( )|rOhati|saprAṇa̍ iti sa - prAṇaḥ|amuṣminn|lOkE|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|avya̍d^^rdhuka̍ ityavi# - ad^^rdhukaḥ|prAṇApAnAByAmiti# prAṇa - apAnAByA̱m|Bavati|yaḥ|Evam|vEda||30̍ (62)
verses.samhita: BavantIrna̍ prAjAyanta̍ tAḥ saṃrOhO̍&si̍ nIrOhO&sItyEva̍ prA&janayat̍ tAḥ prajAḥ prajAtA̍ na pratyatiṣṭhan̍ tA vasukO̍&si̍ vEṣaśrirasi̍ vasyaṣṭirasItyEvaiṣu̍ lOkEṣu pratyasthApayadyadAha̍# vasukO&si̍ vEṣaśrirasi̍ vasyaṣṭirasIti̍# prajA Eva prajAtA̍ Eṣu lOkEṣu pratiṣṭhApayati̍ sAtmA&ntarikṣaṃ̍ ( ) rOhati saprAṇO&muṣmi̍n̍ ~MlOkE prati# tiṣṭhatyavyarddhukaḥ̍ prAṇApAnAByA̱M Bavati ya EvaM ~MvEda||30̍

verses.padam: - Padam nAkasadBiriti# nAkasat - Biḥ|vai|dEvAḥ|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Ayann|tat|nAkasadAmiti# nAka - sadA̱m|nAkasattvamiti# nAkasat - tvam|yat|nAkasada iti# nAka - sadaḥ|upadadhAtItyu̍pa̍ - dadhAti|nAkasadBiriti̍# nAkasat - Biḥ|Eva|tat|yajamAnaḥ|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ-gam|lOkam|Eti|suvarga iti# suvaḥ-gaḥ|vai|lOkaḥ|nAkaḥ|yasya̍|EtAḥ|upadhIyanta̍ ityupa̍ - dhIyantE̱|na|asmai|aka̱m|Bavati|yajamAnAyatanamiti# yajamAna - Ayatanam|vai|nAkasada iti# nAka - sadaḥ|yat|nAkasada̍ iti# nAka - sadaḥ|upadadhAtItyu̍pa̍ - dadhAti|Ayata̍namityA̱̍ - yatanam|Eva|tat|yaja̍mAnaḥ|kurutE|pRuṣṭhAnA̱m|vai|Etat|tEja̍ḥ|saMBRu̍tamiti̍ saM - BRutam|yat|nAkasada iti# nAka - sadaḥ|yat|nAkasada̍ iti# nAka - sadaḥ|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: nAkasadBirvai dEvAḥ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyan̍ tannAkasadA̱M̍ nAkasattvaM ~MyannAkasada̍# upadadhAti̍ nAkasadBirEva̍ tad-yajamAnaḥ̍ suvargaM ~MlOkamEti̍ suvargO vai lOkO nAkO yasyaitA upadhIyantE̍ nAsmA akaM̍ Bavati yajamAnAyatanaM ~Mvai nAkasadO̍ yannAkasada̍# upadadhA̱tyAyatanamEva̍ tad-yajamAnaḥ̍ kurutE pRuṣṭhAnAM ~MvA Etat tEjaḥ saMBRutaM̍ ~MyannAkasadO̍ yannAkasada̍# - [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam upadadhAtItyupa̍ - dadhAti|pRuṣṭhAnA̱m|Eva|tEja̍ḥ|avEti̍|rundhE|pa~jcacOḍA̍ iti# pa~jca - cOḍA̱ḥ|upEti|dadhAti|aPsarasa̍ḥ|Eva|Enam|EtAḥ|BUtAḥ|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|upEti̍|śErE|athO̍ iti|tanUpAnIriti̍# tanU - pAnI̱ḥ|Eva|EtAḥ|yajamAnasya|yam|dviṣyAt|tam|upadadhadityu̍pa̍ - dadhat|dhyAyEt|EtABya̍ḥ|Eva|Enam|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|Eti̍|vRuścati|tAjak|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCati|utta̍rA̍ ityut - tarAḥ|nAkasadBya iti# nAkasat-Byaḥ|upEti|dadhAti|yathA̱|jAyAm|AnIyEtyA̱̍ - nIya|gRuhEṣu̍|niṣAdayatIti̍# ni - sAdayati|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|32̍ (50)
verses.samhita: upadadhAti̍ pRuṣṭhAnAmEva̍ tEjO&va# rundhE pa~jcacOḍA upa# dadhAtyaPsarasa# EvainamEtA̍ BUtA amuṣmin̍ ~MlOka upa# śErE&thO# tanUpAnIrEvaitA̍ yajamAnasya̍ yaM dviṣyAt tamupadadha̍ddhyAyEdEtABya̍# EvainaM̍ dEvatA̱Bya A vRuścati̍ tAjagArtimArcCatyuttarA̍ nAkasadBya upadadhAti̍ yathA# jAyAmAnIya# gRuhEṣu# niṣAdayati̍ tAdRugEva tat - [ ] 32

verses.padam: - Padam paścAt|prAcI̱m|uttamAmityut̍ - tamAm|upEti|dadhAti|tasmA̱t|paścAt|prAcI̱|patnI̱|anviti̍|AstE|svayamAtRuṇṇAmiti̍# svayaM - AtRuṇṇAm|ca|vikarṇImiti# vi - karṇIm|ca|uttamE ityut̍ - tamE|upEti|dadhAti|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|vai|svayamAtRuṇṇEti# svayaM - AtRuṇṇA|Ayuḥ|vikarṇIti̍# vi - karṇI|prAṇamiti# pra - anam|ca|Eva|Ayuḥ|ca|prAṇAnAmiti̍# pra - anAnA̱m|uttamAvityut̍ - tamau|dhattE|tasmA̱t|prAṇa iti# pra - anaḥ|ca|Ayuḥ|ca|prAṇAnAmiti̍# pra - anAnA̱m|uttamAvityut̍ - tamau|na|anyAm|uttarAmityut̍ - tarAm|iṣṭakAm|upEti̍|daddhyAt|yat|anyAm|utta̍rAmityut̍ - tarAm|iṣṭakAm|upadaddhyAdityu̍pa̍ - daddhyAt|paśUnAm|33 (50)
verses.samhita: paścAt prAcImuttamAmupa̍# dadhAti tasmA̱t paścAt prAcI patnyanvA̱stE svayamAtRuṇṇAM ca# vikarṇIM cO̱ttamE upa# dadhAti prAṇO vai svayamAtRuṇṇA&&yu̍rvikarṇI̍ prAṇaM caivA&&*yuśca̍ prAṇAnAmuttamau̍ dhattE̍ tasmA̱t prAṇaścA&&*yuśca̍ prAṇAnAmuttamau̍ nAnyAmuttarAmiṣṭa̍kAmupa̍# daddhyAd-yadanyAmuttarA-miṣṭa̍kA-mupadaddhyAt̍ paśUnAM̍ - [ ] 33

verses.padam: - Padam ca|yajamAnasya|ca|prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|ca|Ayuḥ|ca|apIti̍|daddhyAt|tasmA̱t|na|anyA|uttarEtyut-tarA|iṣṭa̍kA|upadhEyEtyu̍pa̍ - dhEyA̱|svayamAtRuṇṇAmiti# svayaM - AtRuṇṇAm|upEti|dadhAti|asau|vai|svayamAtRuṇṇEti̍# svayaM - AtRuṇṇA|amUm|Eva|upEti|dhattE|aśva̱m|upEti̍|GrApayati|prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|Eva|asyAm|dadhAti|athO iti|prAjApatya̍ iti# prAjA - patyaḥ|vai|aśvaḥ|prajApa̍tinEti̍# prajA - patinA|Eva|agnim|cinutE|svayamAtRuṇṇEti# svayaM - AtRuṇṇA|Bavati|prAṇAnAmiti# pra - anAnA̱m|uthsRuṣṭyA̍ ityut - sRuṣṭyai|athO iti|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|anu̍KyAtyA̍ ityanu# - KyAtyai|EṣA|vai ( )|dEvAnA̱m|vikrA̱ntiriti vi - krAntiḥ|yat|vikarṇIti# vi - karṇI|yat|vikarṇImiti# vi - karṇIm|upadadhAtItyupa̍ - dadhAti|dEvAnA̱m|Eva|vikrA̱ntimiti̍ vi- krAntim|anu|vIti̍|kramatE|uttarata̍ ityut̍ - tarataḥ|upEti|dadhAti|tasmA̱t|uttarata̍ upacAra̍ ityuttarataḥ̍ - upacAraḥ|agniḥ|vAyumatIti# vAyu - matI̱|Bavati|samiddhyA̍ iti saM - iddhyai||34 (72) (saMBRutaM̍ ~MyannAkasadO̍ yannAkasada̍ - stat - paśUnA-mEṣA̍ vai-dvAviṃśatiśca)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: ca yajamAnasya̍ ca prAṇaM cA&&*yuścApi# daddhyAt tasmAnnA-nyOttarEṣṭakOpadhEyA̱̍ svayamAtRuṇṇAmupa# dadhAtyasau vai svayamAtRuṇṇA-̍ &mUmEvOpa# dhattE &śvamupa# GrApayati prAṇamEvAsyA̱M dadhAtyathO̱ prAjApatyO vA aśvaḥ̍ prajApatinaivAgniM̍ cinutE̍ svayamAtRuṇṇA Bavati̍ prAṇAnAmuthsRuṣṭyA̍ athO# suvargasya# lOkasyA&nuKyAtyA̍ EṣA vai ( ) dEvAnAM ~MvikrA̱ntiryad-vikarṇI̍ yad-vikarṇImu̍padadhA̍ti̍ dEvAnAmEva̍ vikrA̱ntimanu vikramata̍ uttarata upadadhAti̍ tasmAduttarata̍ upacArO&gni̍ rvAyumatI̍# Bavati samiddhyai||34̍ (saMBRutaM̍ ~MyannAkasadO̍ yannAkasada̍ - stat - paśUnA-mEṣA̍ vai-dvAviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam CandAṃsi|upEti̍|dadhAti|paśava̍ḥ|vai|CandAṃ̍si|paśUn|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|CandAṃ̍si|vai|dEvAnA̱m|vAmam|paśava̍ḥ|vAmam|Eva|paśUn|avEti̍|rundhE|EtAm|ha|vai|yajñasE̍na̍ iti# yajña - sEnaḥ|caitriyAyaṇaḥ|citi̱m|vidAm|cakAra|tayA̱|vai|saḥ|paśUn|avEti|arundha|yat|EtAm|upadadhAtItyu̍pa̍ - dadhAti|paśUn|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|gAyatrIḥ|purastA̱t|upEti̍|dadhAti|tEja̍ḥ|vai|gAyatrI|tEja̍ḥ|Eva|35̍ (50)
verses.samhita: CandAṅqsyupa# dadhAti paśavO vai CandAṃsi̍ paśUnEvAva# rundhE CandAṃsi̍ vai dEvAnA̱M ~MvAmaM paśavO# vAmamEva paśUnava# rundha EtAṃ ha vai yajñasEna-ścaitriyAyaṇa-ściti̍M̍ ~MvidAM cakAra̍ tayA vai sa paśUnavArundha̍ yadEtAmupadadhA̍ti̍ paśUnEvAva# rundhE gAyatrIḥ purastAdupa# dadhAti tEjO vai gAyatrI̍ tEja# Eva - [ ] 35

verses.padam: - Padam muKataḥ|dhattE|mUd^^rdhanvatIriti# mUrdhann - vatI̱ḥ|Bavanti|mUd^^rdhAna̱m|Eva|Enam|samAnAnA̱m|karOti|triṣṭuBaḥ|upEti̍|dadhAti|indriyam|vai|triṣṭuk|indriyam|Eva|maddhyataḥ|dhattE|jaga̍tIḥ|upEti̍|dadhAti|jAga̍tAḥ|vai|paśava̍ḥ|paśUn|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|anuṣṭuBa̍ ityanu̍ - stuBaḥ|upEti̍|dadhAti|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|vai|anuṣṭubityanu̍ - stup|prAṇAnAmiti# pra - anAnA̱m|uthsRuṣṭyA̍ ityut - sRuṣṭyai|bRuhatIḥ|uṣṇihA̱ḥ|pa~gktIḥ|akṣarapa~gktIrityakṣara̍# - pa~gktIḥ|iti|viṣu̍rUpAṇIti̍ viṣu# - rUpAṇi|CandAṃsi|upEti̍|dadhAti|viṣu̍rUpA̍ iti viṣu# - rUpAḥ|vai|paśavaḥ|paśava̍ḥ|36̍ (50)
verses.samhita: muKatO̍ dhattE̍ mUrddhanvatI̱rBavanti mUrddhAnamEvainaṃ̍# samAnAnA̱M karOti triṣṭuBa upa# dadhAtIndriyaM ~Mvai triṣṭugindriyamEva̍ maddhyatO̍ dhattE̍ jagatIrupa̍# dadhAti jAgatA̍ vai paśavaḥ̍ paśUnEvAva# rundhE &nuṣṭuBa upa# dadhAti prAṇA vA anuṣṭup̍ prAṇAnAmuthsRuṣṭyai̍ bRuhatIruṣṇihA̱ḥ pa~gktIrakṣarapa~gktIriti̍ viṣurUpAṇi̍ CandAṅqsyupa# dadhAti viṣurUpA̍ vai paśavaḥ̍ paśavaḥ - [ ] 36

verses.padam: - Padam CandAṃsi|viṣu̍rUpAniti̍ viṣu# - rUpAn|Eva|paśUn|avEti|rundhE|viṣu̍rUpamiti̍ viṣu-rUpam|asya|gRuhE|dRuśyatE|yasya̍|EtAḥ|upadhIyanta̍ ityupa̍ - dhIyantE̱|yaḥ|u|ca|EnAḥ|Evam|vEda|ati̍cCandasamityati̍# - Candasam|upEti|dadhAti|ati̍cCandA̍ ityati# - CandAḥ|vai|sarvAṇi|CandAṃ̍si|sarvE̍Biḥ|Eva|Enam|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ-Biḥ|cinutE|varṣma̍|vai|EṣA|Canda̍sAm|yat|ati̍cCandA̍ ityati# - CandAḥ|yat|aticCandasamityati̍# - Candasam|upadadhAtItyupa̍ - dadhAti|varṣma̍|Eva|Enam|samAnAnA̱m|karOti|dvipadA̍ iti# dvi - padA̱ḥ|upEti|dadhAti|dvipAditi̍# dvi - pAt|yajamAnaḥ̍ ( )|pratiṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai||37 (51)
verses.samhita: -CandAṃsi̍ viṣurUpAnEva̍ paśUnava# rundhE viṣurUpamasya̍ gRuhE dRuśyatE̍ yasyaitA upadhIyantE̍ ya u# cainA EvaM ~MvEdA&*ticCandasamupa̍# dadhAtyaticCandA̍ vai sarvAṇi̍ CandAṃsi̍ sarvEBirEvainaM̍ CandOBiścinutE̍ varṣma vA EṣA CandasAM̍ ~MyadaticCandA̍ yadaticCandasa-mupadadhA̍ti̍ varṣmaivainaṃ# samAnAnA̱M karOti dvipadA upa# dadhAti dvipAd-yajamAnaḥ̍ ( ) pratiṣṭhityai||37̍

verses.padam: - Padam sarvA̱Byaḥ|vai|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|agniḥ|cIyatE|yat|sayuja iti# sa - yujaḥ|na|upadaddhyAdityu̍pa̍ - dadhyAt|dEvatA̱ḥ|asya|agnim|vRu~jjIrann|yat|sayuja iti# sa - yujaḥ|upadadhAtItyu̍pa̍ - dadhAti|AtmanA̱|Eva|Enam|sayujamiti̍# sa-yuja̱m|cinutE|na|agninA̱|vIti|RuddhyatE|athO̍ iti|yathA̱|puru̍ṣaḥ|snAva̍Biriti̍ snAva# - Biḥ|saMtata̍ iti saM-tataḥ|Evam|Eva|EtABiḥ|agniḥ|saMta̍ta̍ iti saM-tataḥ|agninA̱|vai|dEvAḥ|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Ayann|tAḥ|amUḥ|kRuttikAḥ|aBavann|yasya̍|EtAḥ|upadhIyanta̍ ityupa̍ - dhIyantE̱|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|Eva|38 (50)
verses.samhita: sarvA̱ByO vai dEvatA̱ByO&gniścIyatE̍ yath sayujO nOpadaddhyAd̍ dEvatA# asyAgniM ~MvRu~jjIranq.̍ yath sayuja# upadadhA̱tyAtmanaivainaṃ# sayujaM̍ cinutE nAgninA vyRuddhyatE&thO̍ yathA puruṣaḥ̍ snAvaBiḥ̍ saMtata̍ EvamEvaitABiragniḥ̍ saMtatO̍ &gninA vai dEvAḥ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyan̍ tA amUḥ kRuttikA̍ aBavanq yasyaitA upa̍ dhIyantE# suvargamEva - [ ] 38

verses.padam: - Padam lOkam|Eti|gacCati|prakAśamiti̍# pra-kAśam|citram|Eva|Bavati|maṇḍalEṣṭakA iti# maṇḍala - iṣṭakAḥ|upEti|dadhAti|imE|vai|lOkAḥ|maṇḍalEṣṭakA̍ iti# maṇḍala - iṣṭakAḥ|imE|Kalu|vai|lOkAḥ|dEvapurA̍ iti# dEva-purAḥ|dEvapurA iti-purAḥ|Eva|prEti̍|viśati|na|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCati|agnim|cikyAnaḥ|viśvajyO̍tiṣa̍ iti# viśva - jyOtiṣaḥ|upEti|dadhAti|imAn|Eva|EtABi̍ḥ|lOkAn|jyOti̍ṣmataḥ|kurutE|athO̍ iti|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|Eva|EtAḥ|yajamAnasya|dAddhrati|EtAḥ|vai|dEvatA̱ḥ|suvargyA̍# iti# suvaḥ - gyA̱ḥ|tAḥ|Eva ( )|anvAraByEtyanu̍ - AraBya|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Eti||39 (54)
verses.samhita: lOkamEti̍ gacCati̍ prakAśaM citramEva Bavati̍ maṇḍalEṣṭakA upa# dadhAtImE vai lOkA maṇḍalEṣṭakA̍ imE Kalu vai lOkA dEvapurA̍ dEvapurA̍ Eva praviśati̍ nA&&*rtimArcCatyagniM̍ cikyAnO̍ viśvajyOtiṣa̍ upa# dadhAtImAnEvaitABi-rlOkAn̍ jyOtiṣmataḥ̍ kurutE&thO̱ prAṇAnEvaitA yajamAnasya̍ dAddhratyEtA vai dEvatA̱ḥ suvargyA̱stA EvA- ( ) -nvAraBya# suvargaM ~MlOkamEti||39̍

verses.padam: - Padam vRuṣṭisanIriti# vRuṣṭi - sanI̱ḥ|upEti|dadhAti|vRuṣṭi̱m|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|yat|EkadhEtyE̍ka̍ - dhA|upadaddhyAdityupa̍ - daddhyAt|Eka̱m|Rutum|vaṛqṣEt|anuparihAramityanu̍ - parihAra̱m|sAdayati|tasmA̱t|sarvAn|RutUn|vaṛqṣati|purOvAtasaniriti̍# purOvAta - saniḥ|asi|iti̍|Aha|Etat|vai|vRuṣṭyai̱|rUpam|rUpEṇa̍|Eva|vRuṣṭi̱m|avEti̍|rundhE|saM~MyAnI̍Biriti̍# saM - yAnIBiḥ|vai|dEvAḥ|imAn|lOkAn|samiti̍|ayuḥ|tat|saM~MyAnI̍nAmiti̍# saM - yAnInAm|saM~MyAnitvamiti̍# saM~MyAni - tvam|yat|saM~MyAnIriti# saM - yAnI̱ḥ|upadadhAtItyupa̍ - dadhAti|yathA̱|aPsvitya̍p̍ - su|nAvA|saM~MyAtIti# saM - yAti|Evam|40̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vRuṣṭisanIrupa# dadhAti vRuṣṭimEvAva̍# rundhE yadEkadhOpa̍daddhyAdEka̍mRutuM̍ vaṛṣEdanuparihAraṃ̍# sAdayati tasmAth sarvAnRutUn.̍ vaṛṣati̍ purOvAtasani-rasItyA̍haitadvai̍ vRuṣṭyai# rUpaṃ rUpEṇaiva vRuṣṭimava# rundhE saM~MyAnIBirvai̍ dEvA imAn ~MlOkAnth samayustath̍ saM~MyAnInAṃ̍ saM~MyAnitvaM ~Myath saM~MyAnIrupadadhA̍ti̍ yathA&Psu nAvA saM~MyAtyEva - [ ] 40

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|EtABiḥ|yaja̍mAnaḥ|imAn|lOkAn|samiti̍|yAti|plavaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|agnEḥ|yat|saM~MyAnIriti̍# saM - yAnI̱ḥ|yat|saM~MyAnIriti# saM - yAnI̱ḥ|upadadhAtItyupa-dadhA̍ti|plavam|Eva|Etam|agnayE̱|upEti̍|dadhAti|uta|yasya̍|EtAsu̍|upa̍hitAsvityupa̍# - hitAsu|Apaḥ|agnim|hara̍nti|ahRu̍taḥ|Eva|asya|agniḥ|AdityEṣṭakA̍ ityAditya̍ - iṣṭakAḥ|upEti|dadhAti|AdityAḥ|vai|Etam|BUtyai̱|pratIti̍|nudantE|yaḥ|ala̱m|BUtyai̱|sann|BUti̱m|na|prApnOtIti̍# pra - ApnOti|AdityAḥ|41̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -mEvaitABi ryajamAna̍ imAn ~MlOkAnth saM ~MyAti̍ plavO vA EṣO̱&gnEryath saM~MyAnIryath saM~MyAnIrupadadhA̍ti̍ plavamEvaitamagnaya upadadhAtyuta̍ yasyaitAsUpahitAsvApO&gniṃ̍ harantyahRuta̍ EvAsyA-gnirAdityEṣṭakA̍ upa# dadhAtyAdityA vA EtaM BUtyai pratinudantE̍ yO&laM BUtyai san BUtiM na prApnOtyAdityA̍ - [ ] 41

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|Enam|BUti̱m|gamayanti|asau|vai|Etasya|Adityaḥ|ruca̱m|Eti̍|dattE|yaḥ|agnim|citvA|na|rOca̍tE|yat|AdityEṣṭakA̍ ityAditya̍ - iṣṭakAḥ|upadadhAtItyupa̍ - dadhAti|asau|Eva|asminn|Adityaḥ|ruca̱m|dadhAti|yathA̱|asau|dEvAnA̱m|rOca̍tE|Evam|Eva|Eṣaḥ|manuṣyA̍ṇAm|rOcatE|GRutEṣṭakA̍ iti# GRuta - iṣṭakAḥ|upEti|dadhAti|Etat|vai|agnEḥ|priyam|dhAma̍|yat|GRutam|priyEṇa̍|Eva|Enam|dhAmnA̱|samiti̍|ad^^rdhayati|42̍ (50)
verses.samhita: EvainaM BUtiM̍ gamayantyasau vA EtasyA&&*dityO̍ rucamA dattE̍ yO̱&gniM citvA na rOcatE̍ yadAdityEṣṭakA̍ upadadhA̱tyasAvE-vAsmi̍nnAdityO̍ rucaM̍ dadhAti yathA&sau dEvAnAṃq rOcata̍ EvamEvaiṣa manuṣyA̍ṇAṃ̍ rOcatE GRutEṣṭakA upa# dadhAtyEtadvA agnEḥ priyaM dhAma yad-GRutaM priyEṇaivainaM dhAmnA samarddhayatya̍ - [ ] 42

verses.padam: - Padam athO iti|tEja̍sA|anuparihAramitya̍nu̍ - parihAra̱m|sAdayati|aparivargamityapa̍ri̍ - vargam|Eva|asminn|tEjaḥ|dadhAti|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|agnim|acinuta|saḥ|yaśasA|vIti̍|Ad^^rdhyata|saḥ|EtAḥ|yaśOdA̍ iti# yaśaḥ - dAḥ|apaśyat|tAḥ|upEti|adhatta|tABi̍ḥ|vai|saḥ|yaśa̍ḥ|Atmann|adhatta|yat|yaśOdA̍ iti# yaśaḥ - dAḥ|upadadhAtItyupa̍ - dadhAti|yaśa̍ḥ|Eva|tABi̍ḥ|yaja̍mAnaḥ|Atmann|dhattE|pa~jca̍|upEti̍|dadhAti|pA~gkta̍ḥ|puru̍ṣaḥ|yAvAn̍|Eva|puru̍ṣaḥ|tasminn̍|yaśa̍ḥ|dadhAti||43̍ (49)
verses.samhita: -thO tEjasA̍ &nuparihAraṃ# sAdaya-tyaparivarga-mEvAsmin̍ tEjO# dadhAti prajApatiragnima̍cinuta̍ sa yaśasA̍ vyA̱rddhyata sa EtA yaśOdA̍ apaśyat̍ tA upAdhatta̍ tABirvai sa yaśa# Atmannadhatta̍ yadyaśOdA̍ upadadhA̍ti̍ yaśa# Eva tABiryajamAna̍ Atman dhattE̍ pa~jcOpa# dadhAti pA~gktaḥ puruṣO̍ yAvAnEva̍ puruṣastasminq̍ yaśO# dadhAti||43

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAsurA iti# dEva-asurAḥ|saM~MyattA̍ iti saM - yattAḥ|Asann|kanIyAṃsaḥ|dEvAḥ|Asann̍|BUyAṃ̍saḥ|asu̍rAḥ|tE|dEvAḥ|EtAḥ|iṣṭa̍kAḥ|apaśyann|tAḥ|upEti̍|adadhata|BUyaskRuditi̍# BUyaḥ - kRut|asi|iti|Eva|BUyAṃ̍saḥ|aBavann|vanaspati̍Biriti̍ vanaspati# - Biḥ|OṣadhIBirityOṣa̍dhi̍ - Biḥ|varivaskRuditi# varivaḥ - kRut|asi|iti|imAm|ajayann|prAcI̱|asi|iti̍|prAcI̱m|diśa̱m|ajayann|Ud^^rdhvA|asi|iti̍|amUm|ajayann|antarikṣasaditya̍ntarikṣa̍ - sat|asi|antarikṣE|sIda|iti̍|antari̍kṣam|ajayann|tata̍ḥ|dEvAḥ|aBa̍vann|44̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvAsurAḥ saM~MyattA̍ Asan kanIyAṃsO̍ dEvA Asan BUyAṃqsO-&surAstE̍ dEvA EtA iṣṭakA̍ apaśyan tA upAdadhata̍ BUyaskRudasItyEva BUyAṃsO&Bavan̍ vanaspatiBi-rOṣa̍dhIBi-rvarivaskRudasItI-mAma̍jayan̍ prAcyasIti prAcIM diśamajayannUrddhvA̍ &sItyamUmajayan-nantarikṣasada̍syantari̍kṣE̍ sIdEtya-ntarikṣamajayan̍ tatO# dEvA aBavan̍ - [ ] 44

verses.padam: - Padam parEti|asu̍rAḥ|yasya̍|EtAḥ|upadhIyanta̍ ityupa̍ - dhIyantE̱|BUyAn|Eva|Bavati|aBIti̍|imAn|lOkAn|jayati|Bava̍ti|AtmanA̱|parEti̍|asya|BrAtRu̍vyaḥ|Bavati|aPsuṣaditya̍Psu̍ - sat|asi|śyEnasaditi# śyEna - sat|asi|iti|Aha|Etat|vai|agnEḥ|rUpam|rUpEṇa̍|Eva|agnim|avEti̍|rundhE|pRuthivyAḥ|tvA|dravi̍ṇE|sAdayAmi|iti̍|Aha|imAn|Eva|EtABi̍ḥ|lOkAn|dravi̍ṇAvata̍ iti draviṇa̍ - vataḥ|kurutE|AyuṣyA̱ḥ|upEti|dadhAti|Ayu̍ḥ|Eva|45̍ (50)
verses.samhita: parA&surA̍ yasyaitA upadhIyantE̍ BUyAnEva̍ BavatyaBImAn̍ ~MlOkAn jayati̍ BavatyAtmanA̍ parA̱&sya BrAtRuvyO̍ BavatyaPsuṣadasi̍ śyEnasadasItyAhaitadvA̍ agnE rUpaṃ rUpEṇaivAgnimava# rundhE pRuthivyAstvA draviṇE̍ sAdayAmI-tyAhEmAnEvaitABi̍-rlOkAn̍ draviṇAvataḥ̍ kuruta AyuṣyA# upa# dadhAtyAyurEvA̍ - [ ] 45

verses.padam: - Padam asminn|dadhAti|agnE̱|yat|tE|para̱m|hRut|nAma|iti̍|Aha|Etat|vai|agnEḥ|priyam|dhAma̍|priyam|Eva|asya|dhAma̍|upEti̍|ApnOti|tau|Eti̍|ihi|samiti̍|raBAvahai|iti̍|Aha|vIti̍|Eva|EnEna|parIti̍|dhattE|pA~jca̍janyEṣviti̍ pA~jca# - janyEṣu|apIti|Edhi|agnE|iti̍|Aha|Eṣaḥ|vai|agniḥ|pA~jca̍janya̍ iti pA~jca# - janyaḥ|yaḥ|pa~jcacitIka̍ iti pa~jca-citIkaḥ|tasmA̱t|Evam|Aha|RutavyA̱ḥ|upEti̍# ( )|dadhAti|Etat|vai|RutUnAm|priyam|dhAma|yat|RutavyA̱ḥ|RutUnAm|Eva|priyam|dhAma̍|avEti̍|rundhE|sumEka̍ iti# su - mEkaḥ|iti̍|Aha|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|vai|sumEka iti# su - mEkaḥ|saM~MvathsarasyEti̍# saM - vathsarasya|Eva|priyam|dhAma̍|upEti̍|ApnOti||46̍ (76) (aBava̍ - nnAyurEva̍ - rtavyA# upa - ṣaḍviṃśatiśca)̍ (A11)
verses.samhita: -smin̍ dadhAtyagnE yattE paraṃq hRunnAmEtyAhaitadvA̍ agnEḥ priyaM dhAma# priyamEvAsya dhAmOpA̱&&*pnOti tAvEhi saṃ raBAvahA̍ ityAha̍ vyEvainE̍na̍ pari# dhattE pA~jcajanyEṣvapyE̱ddhyagna̍ ityAhaiṣa̍ vA agniḥ pA~jcajanyO̍ yaḥ pa~jcacitIka-stasmA̍dEvamA̍hartavyA̍# upa# ( ) dadhAtyEtadvA RutUnAM̍ priyaM dhAma yadRutavyA̍# RutUnAmEva priyaM dhAmAva# rundhE sumEka ityAha̍ saM~MvathsarO vai sumEkaḥ̍ saM~Mvathsarasyaiva priyaM dhAmOpA̱&&*pnOti||46 (aBava̍ - nnAyurEqva̍ - rtavyA# upa - ṣaḍviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam prajApatEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|akṣi|aśvayat|tat|parEti̍|apatat|tat|aśva̍ḥ|aBavat|yat|aśva̍yat|tat|aśva̍sya|aśvatvamitya̍śva-̍ tvam|tat|dEvAḥ|aśvamEdhEnEtyaśva̍ - mEdhEna|Eva|pratIti̍|adadhuḥ|Eṣaḥ|vai|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA - patim|sarva̱m|karOti|yaḥ|aśvamEdhEnEtyaśva̍ - mEdhEna|yaja̍tE|sarva̍ḥ|Eva|Bavati|sarva̍sya|vai|EṣA|prAya̍ścittiḥ|sarva̍sya|BEṣajam|sarva̱m|vai|EtEna̍|pApmAna̱m|dEvAḥ|atarann|apIti̍|vai|EtEna̍|brahmahatyAmiti̍# brahma - hatyAm|atarann|sarva̱m|pApmAna̱m|47 (50)
verses.samhita: prajApatErakṣya̍śvayat̍ tat parA&patat̍ tadaśvO&Bavad-yadaśva̍yat̍ tadaśvasyAśvatvaM̍ taddEvA aśvamEdhEnaiva̍ pratyadadhurEṣa̍ vai prajApatiṃq̍ sarvaM̍ karOti yO̱&śvamEdhEna yajatE̍ sarva# Eva Bavati̍ sarvasya̍ vA EṣA prAyaścittiḥ̍ sarvasya̍ BEṣajaṃ sarvaM ~MvA EtEna# pApmAnaM̍ dEvA atarannapi̍ vA EtEna# brahmahatyAmataranth̍ sarvaM̍ pApmAnaM̍ - [ ] 47

verses.padam: - Padam tarati|tarati|brahmahatyAmiti̍# brahma - hatyAm|yaḥ|aśvamEdhEnEtyaśva̍ - mEdhEna|yaja̍tE|yaḥ|u|ca|Enam|Evam|vEda̍|utta̍ramityut̍ - taram|vai|tat|prajApatEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|akṣi|aśvayat|tasmA̱t|aśva̍sya|uttarata̍ ityut̍ - tarataḥ|avEti|dyanti|dakṣiṇataḥ|anyEṣA̱m|paśUnAm|vaitasaḥ|kaṭa̍ḥ|Bavati|aPsuyO̍nirityaPsu̍ - yOniḥ|vai|aśvaḥ|aPsuja̍ ityaPsu̍ - jaḥ|vEtasaḥ|svE|Eva|Enam|yOnau̱|pratIti|sthApayati|catuṣṭOma̍ iti# catuḥ - stOmaḥ|stOmaḥ|Bavati|saraṭ|ha|vai|aśva̍sya|sakthi̍|Eti̍|avRuhat̍ ( )|tat|dEvAḥ|catuṣṭOmEnEti# catuḥ-stOmEna|Eva|pratIti̍|adadhuḥ|yat|catuṣṭOma̍ iti# catuḥ - stOmaḥ|stOmaḥ|Bava̍ti|aśva̍sya|sarvatvAyEti̍# sarva - tvAya||48̍ (62) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 12 Anuvaakams :- (uthsannayajña - indrA̱gnI - dEvA vA akṣṇayAstOmIyA̍# - agnErBAgO̱ - &syagnE# jAtAn - raśmiriti# - nAkasadBiḥ -CandAṃsi̍ - sarvA̱ByO - vRuṣṭisanI̱ - rdEvAsurAḥ kanIyAṃsaḥ̍ - prajApatErakṣi̍ - dvAdaśa̍ ) Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (uthsannayajñO - dEvA vai - yasya muKyavatI̍ - rnAkasadBirE̍ - vai tABira̍ - ṣṭAcatvAriṃśat)̍ First and Last Padam of ṭhird Prasnam of 5th Kandam (uthsannayajñaḥ - sarvatvAya̍)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE pa~jcamakAṇḍE tRutIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||------------------------------------
verses.samhita: tarati tarati̍ brahmahatyAM ~MyO̱&śvamEdhEna yajatE̍ ya u# cainamEvaM ~MvEdOttaraM̍ ~Mvai tat prajApatErakṣya̍śvayat̍ tasmAdaśvasyOttaratO&va̍# dyanti dakṣiṇatO̱&nyEṣA̱M paśUnAM ~Mvaitasaḥ̍ kaṭO# BavatyaPsuyOnirvA̍ aśvO̱&PsujO vEtasaḥ̍ sva EvainaM ~MyOnau pratiṣṭhApayati̍ catuṣṭOmaḥ stOmO# Bavati saraḍḍha vA aśvasya̍ sakthyA&vRuhat̍ ( ) tad-dEvAścatuṣṭOmEnaiva̍ pratyadadhuryacca̍tuṣṭOmaḥ̍ stOmO Bavatyaśvasya̍ sarvatvAya||48̍ praśna kOrvai with starting padams of 1 to 12 anuvAkams :- (uthsannayajña - indrA̱gnI - dEvA vA akṣṇayAstOmIyA̍# - agnErBAgO̱ - &syagnE# jAtAn - raśmiriti# - nAkasadBiḥ -CandAṃsi̍ - sarvA̱ByO - vRuṣṭisanI̱ - rdEvAsurAḥ kanIyAṃsaḥ̍ - prajApatErakṣi̍ - dvAdaśa̍ ) kOrvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (uthsannayajñO - dEvA vai - yasya muKyavatI̍ - rnAkasadBirE̍ - vai tABira̍ - ṣṭAcatvAriṃśat)̍ first and last padam of third praśnam of 5th kAṇḍam (uthsannayajñaḥ - sarvatvAya̍)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pa~jcamakAṇḍE tRutIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||------------------------------------ OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ hariḥ OM 5.4 pa~jcamakAṇḍE caturthaḥ praśnaḥ - iṣṭakAtrayABidhAnaM

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAsurA iti# dEva - asurAḥ|saM~MyattA̍ iti saM-yattAḥ|Asann|tE|na|vIti|ajayanta|saḥ|EtAḥ|indra̍ḥ|tanUḥ|apaśyat|tAḥ|upEti̍|adhatta|tABi̍ḥ|vai|saḥ|tanuva̱m|indriyam|vIrya̱m|Atmann|adhatta|tata̍ḥ|dEvAḥ|aBa̍vann|parEti̍|asu̍rAḥ|yat|indratanUritI̱ndra̍ - tanUḥ|upadadhAtItyupa̍ - dadhAti|tanuva̱m|Eva|tABi̍ḥ|indriyam|vIrya̱m|yaja̍mAnaḥ|Atmann|dhattE|athO̍ iti|saindramiti̍ sa - indram|Eva|agnim|satanumiti̍ sa - tanum|cinutE|Bavati|AtmanA̱|parEti̍|asya|BrAtRu̍vyaḥ|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvAsurAḥ saM~MyattA̍ Asan tE na vyajayanta̍ sa EtA indrastanUra̍paśyat̍ tA upAdhatta̍ tABirvai sa tanuvamindriyaM̍ ~MvIryamAtmanna̍dhatta̍ tatO# dEvA aBavan̍ parA&surA̍ yadindratanUru̍padadhA̍ti̍ tanuvamEva̍ tABirindriyaM̍ ~MvIryaM̍ ~MyajamAna̍ Atman dhattE&thO sEndramEvAgniṃ̍ satanuM̍ cinutE BavatyAtmanA̍ parA̱&sya BrAtRuvyO̍ - [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam Bavati|yajñaḥ|dEvEByaḥ|apEti̍|akrAmat|tam|avarudhamitya̍va̍ - rudha̱m|na|aśaknuvann|tE|EtAḥ|yajñatanUriti# yajña - tanUḥ|apaśyann|tAḥ|upEti|adadhata|tABi̍ḥ|vai|tE|yajñam|avEti̍|arundhata|yat|yajñatanUriti̍# yajña - tanUḥ|upadadhAtItyupa̍ - dadhAti|yajñam|Eva|tABi̍ḥ|yaja̍mAnaḥ|avEti̍|rundhE|traya̍striṃśatamiti̍ trayaḥ̍ - triṃqśatam|upEti|dadhAti|traya̍striṃśaditi̍ trayaḥ̍ - triṃqśat|vai|dEvatA̱ḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|Eva|avEti|rundhE|athO̍ iti|sAtmA̍namiti̍ sa - AtmAnam|Eva|agnim|satanumiti̍ sa-tanum|cinutE|sAtmEti sa - AtmA|amuṣmin|lOkE|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Bavati yajñO dEvEByO&pA̱krAmat tamavarudhaM̍ nAśaknuvanta̍ EtA yajñatanUra̍paśyan̍ tA upAdadhata̍ tABirvai tE yajñamavArundhata̍ yad-yajñatanUru̍padadhA̍ti̍ yajñamEva tABiryajamAnO&va̍# rundhE trayastriṃ̍ śatamupa# dadhAti trayastriṃśadvai̍ dEvatA# dEvatA# EvAva# rundhE &thO sAtmAnamEvAgniṃ̍ satanuM̍ cinutE sAtmA&muṣmin̍ ~MlOkE - [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam Bavati|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|jyOti̍ṣmatIḥ|upEti̍|dadhAti|jyOti̍ḥ|Eva|asminn|dadhAti|EtABi̍ḥ|vai|agniḥ|citaḥ|jvalati|tABi̍ḥ|Eva|Enam|samiti̍|indhE|uBayO̱ḥ|asmai|lOkayO̱ḥ|jyOti̍ḥ|Bavati|nakṣatrEṣṭakA̍ iti# nakṣatra - iṣṭakAḥ|upEti|dadhAti|EtAni̍|vai|divaḥ|jyOtIṃ̍ṣi|tAni̍|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|sukRutAmiti̍# su - kRutA̱m|vai|EtAni|jyOtIṃ̍ṣi|yat|nakṣa̍trAṇi|tAni̍|Eva|ApnOti|athO̍ iti|anUkAśamitya̍nu̍ - kAśam|Eva|EtAni|3̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Bavati̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda jyOtiṣmatIrupa̍# dadhAti jyOtirEvAsmi̍n̍ dadhAtyEtABirvA agniścitO jvalati̍ tABirEvainaṃq̍ samindha̍ uBayOrasmai̍ lOkayOrjyOtirBavati̍ nakṣatrEṣṭakA upa# dadhAtyEtAni vai divO jyOtIṃṣi̍ tAnyEvAva# rundhE sukRutAM ~MvA EtAni jyOtIṃṣi̍ yannakṣatrAṇi̍ tAnyEvA&&*pnOtyathO# anUkAśamEvaitAni - [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam jyOtIṃṣi|kurutE|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|anu̍KyAtyA̍ ityanu# - KyAtyai|yat|saṅspRuṣṭA̍ iti saM - spRuṣṭAḥ|upadaddhyAdityupa-daddhyAt|vRuṣṭyai̱|lOkam|apIti̍|daddhyAt|ava̍ṛṣukaḥ|parjanya̍ḥ|syAt|asaṅ̍spRuṣṭA̍ ityasa̱M - spRuṣṭAḥ|upEti|dadhAti|vRuṣṭyai̱|Eva|lOkam|karOti|vaṛṣu̍kaḥ|parjanya̍ḥ|Bavati|purastA̱t|anyAḥ|pratIcI̱ḥ|upEti̍|dadhAti|paścAt|anyAḥ|prAcI̱ḥ|tasmA̱t|prAcInA̍ni|ca|pratIcInA̍ni|ca|nakṣa̍trAṇi|Eti̍|vartantE||4̍ (41) (BrAtRuvyO̍ - lOka - EvaitAnyE - kacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A1)
verses.samhita: jyOtIṃṣi̍ kurutE suvargasya# lOkasyAnuKyAtyai̍ yath saṅspRuṣṭA̍ upadaddhyAd-vRuṣṭyai# lOkamapi# daddhyAdavaṛṣukaḥ̍ parjanyaḥ̍ syAdasaṅspRuṣṭA̍ upa# dadhAti vRuṣṭyA# Eva lOkaM karOti̍ vaṛṣukaḥ̍ parjanyO# Bavati purastAdanyAḥ̍ pratIcIrupa# dadhAti paścAdanyAḥ prAcIstasmA̱t prAcInAni̍ ca pratIcInAni̍ ca nakṣatrAṇyA̍ vartantE||4̍ (BrAtRuvyO̍ - lOka - EvaitAnyE - kacatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam RutavyA̱ḥ|upEti|dadhAti|RutUnAm|klRuptyai̱|dvadvaMmiti̍# dvaM-dvam|upEti|dadhAti|tasmA̱t|dvadvaMmiti̍# dvaM - dvam|Rutavaḥ|adhRu̍tA|iva|vai|EṣA|yat|maddhyamA|citi̍ḥ|antari̍kṣam|iva|vai|EṣA|dvadvaMmiti̍# dvaM - dvam|anyAsu|citI̍ṣu|upEti̍|dadhAti|cata̍sraḥ|maddhyE̱|dhRutyai̱|antaśślEṣa̍ṇamitya̍ntaḥ̍ - ślEṣaṇam|vai|EtAḥ|citI̍nAm|yat|RutavyA̱ḥ|yat|RutavyA̱ḥ|upadadhAtItyu̍pa̍ - dadhAti|citI̍nAm|vidhRu̍tyA̍ iti vi - dhRutyai|avakAm|anu̍|upEti̍|dadhAti|EṣA|vai|agnEḥ|yOni̍ḥ|sayO̍nimiti̍ sa - yOnim|5 (50)
verses.samhita: RutavyA# upa# dadhAtyRutUnAM klRuptyai̱ dvadvaMmupa# dadhAti tasmA̱d dvandvamRutavO &dhRutEva̍ vA EṣA yanmaddhyamA̍ citirantari̍kṣamiva̍ vA EṣA dvadvaMmanyAsu citIṣUpa# dadhAti catasrO̍ maddhyE dhRutyA# antaśślEṣaṇaM̍ ~MvA EtAścitInAM̍ ~MyadRutavyA̍# yadRutavyA̍# upadadhAti̍ citInAM̍ ~MvidhRutyA̍ avakAmanUpa̍# dadhAtyEṣA vA agnEryOniḥ sayOni̍ - [ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|agnim|cinutE|uvAca|ha|viśvAmi̍tra̍ iti# viśva-mitraḥ|adat|it|saḥ|brahma̍ṇA|anna̱m|yasya̍|EtAḥ|upadhIyAntA̍ ityupa̍ - dhIyAntai̱|yaḥ|u|ca|EnAḥ|Evam|vEdat|iti̍|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|vai|Etam|pratiṣṭhAyA iti# prati - sthAyai̱|nudatE|yaḥ|agnim|citvA|na|pratitiṣṭhatIti# prati - tiṣṭhati|pa~jca̍|pUrvA̱ḥ|cita̍yaḥ|Bavanti|atha̍|ṣaṣṭhIm|citi̱m|cinutE|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutava̍ḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM-vathsaraḥ|Rutuṣu|Eva|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsarE|pratIti|tiṣṭhati|EtAḥ|vai|6̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -mEvAgniM cinuta̍ uvAca# ha viśvAmitrO &dadith sa brahmaṇA&*nnaM ~MyasyaitA upadhIyAntai̍ ya u# cainA EvaM ~MvEdaditi# saM~MvathsarO vA EtaM pratiṣṭhAyai̍# nudatE yO̱&gniM citvA na pratitiṣṭha̍ti̍ pa~jca pUrvAścitayO̍ Bavantyatha# ṣaṣṭhIM citiM̍ cinutE ṣaḍvA Rutavaḥ̍ saM~Mvathsara RutuṣvEva saM~MvathsarE̍ pratitiṣṭhatyE̍ tA vA - [ ] 6

verses.padam: - Padam adhipatnIrityadhi̍# - patnIḥ|nAma|iṣṭa̍kAḥ|yasya̍|EtAḥ|upadhIyanta̍ ityupa̍ - dhIyantE̱|adhipatirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|Eva|samAnAnA̱m|Bavati|yam|dviṣyAt|tam|upadadhadityupa-dadha̍t|dhyAyEt|EtABya̍ḥ|Eva|Enam|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|Eti̍|vRuścati|tAjak|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCati|a~ggi̍rasaḥ|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|yantaḥ|yA|yajñasya̍|niṣkRu̍tiriti̍ niḥ-kRutiḥ|AsI̱t|tAm|RuṣiBya̍ ityRuṣi-Byaḥ|pratIti̍|auhann|tat|hira̍ṇyam|aBavat|yat|hiraṇyaśalkairiti̍# hiraṇya - śalkaiḥ|prOkṣatIti# pra - ukṣati|yajñasya̍|niṣkRu̍tyA̍ iti niḥ - kRutyai|athO iti|BEṣajam|Eva|asmai|karOti|7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: adhipatnIrnAmEṣṭa̍kA̍ yasyaitA upadhIyantE&dhi̍patirEva̍ samAnAnA̱M̍ Bavati yaM dviṣyAt tamupadadha̍d̍ dhyAyEdEtABya# EvainaM̍ dEvatA̱Bya A vRuścati̍ tAjagArtimArcCatya~ggirasaḥ̍ suvargaM ~MlOkaM ~MyantO yA yajñasya niṣkRutirAsIt̍ tAmRuṣiByaḥ̍ pratyauhan̍ taddhiraṇyamaBavadya-ddhi̍raṇyaśalkaiḥ̍ prOkṣati# yajñasya niṣkRutyA̍ athO# BEṣajamEvAsmai# karOtya - [ ] 7

verses.padam: - Padam athO iti|rUpEṇa̍|Eva|Enam|samiti̍|ad^^rdhayati|athO̍ iti|hira̍ṇyajyOtiṣEti̍ hiraṇya̍ - jyOtiṣA|Eva|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Eti|sAhasravatEti# sAhasra - vatA|prEti|ukṣati|sAhasraḥ|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajApatEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|Aptyai̱|imAḥ|mE|agnE|iṣṭakAḥ|dhEnava̍ḥ|santu|iti̍|Aha|dhEnUḥ|Eva|EnAḥ|kurutE|tAḥ|Enam|kAmaduGA̍ iti# kAma - duGA̱ḥ|amutra|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|upEti̍|tiṣṭhantE||8̍ (39) (sayOni̍ - mEtA vai - karOtyE̍ - kAnnacatvAriṃqśacca̍)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: -thO# rUpEṇaivainaṃq samarddhayatyathO̍ hiraṇyajyOtiṣaiva̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamEti̍ sAhasravatA̍ prOkṣati̍ sAhasraḥ prajApatiḥ̍ prajApatErAptyA̍# imA mE# agna iṣṭakA̍ dhEnavaḥ̍ santvityAha̍ dhEnUrEvainA̱ḥ kurutE tA EnaM̍ kAmaduGA# amutrAmuṣmin̍ ~MlOka upa# tiṣṭhantE||8 (sayOni̍ - mEtA vai - karOtyE̍ - kAnnacatvAriṃqśacca̍)̍

verses.padam: - Padam rudraḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|agniḥ|saḥ|Etaṛhi|jAtaḥ|yaṛhi̍|sarva̍ḥ|citaḥ|saḥ|yathA̱|vathsaḥ|jAtaḥ|stana̱m|prEPsatIti̍# pra - IPsati|Evam|vai|Eṣaḥ|Etaṛhi̍|BAgadhEyamiti̍# BAga-dhEya̱m|prEti|IPsati|tasmai̱|yat|Ahu̍timityA-hutim|na|juhuyAt|addhvaryum|ca|yaja̍mAnam|ca|dhyAyEt|śatarudrIyamiti̍# śata - rudrIya̱m|juhOti|BAgadhEyEnEti# BAga - dhEyEna|Eva|Enam|śamayati|na|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCati|addhvaryuḥ|na|yaja̍mAnaḥ|yat|grAmyAṇA̱m|paśUnAm|9̍ (50)
verses.samhita: rudrO vA Eṣa yadagniḥ sa Etaṛhi# jAtO yaṛhi sarvaścitaḥ̍ sa yathA# vathsO jAtaḥ stanaM̍ prEPsatyEvaM ~MvA Eṣa Etaṛhi# BAgadhEyaM prEPsati̍ tasmai yadAhutiM̍ na juhuyAda̍ddhvaryuM̍ ca yajamAnaM̍ ca dhyAyEcCatarudrIyaM̍ juhOti BAgadhEyEnaivainaṃ̍# śamayati nA&&*rtimArcCatyaddhvaryurna̍ yajamAnO̍ yad grAmyAṇA̱M paśUnAM - [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam payasA|juhuyAt|grAmyAn|paśUn|śucA|arpayEt|yat|AraṇyAnA̱m|AraṇyAn|jartilayavAgvEti̍# jartila - yavAgvA̱|vA|juhuyAt|gavIdhukayavAgvEti# gavIdhuka - yavAgvA̱|vA|na|grAmyAn|paśUn|hinasti|na|AraṇyAn|athO̍ iti|Kalu̍|Ahuḥ|anA̍hutirityanA̱-hutiḥ|vai|jartilA̱ḥ|ca|gavIdhu̍kAḥ|ca|iti̍|ajakṣIrEṇEtya̍ja̍ - kṣIrEṇa|juhOti|AgnEyI|vai|EṣA|yat|ajA|AhutyEtyA̍ - hutyA|Eva|juhOti|na|grAmyAn|paśUn|hinasti|na|AraṇyAn|a~ggi̍rasaḥ|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|yantaḥ|10̍ (50)
verses.samhita: payasA̍ juhuyAd grAmyAn paśU~jCucA &rpayEd-yadAraṇyAnA̍-mAraṇyAn̍ jartilayavAgvA̍# vA juhuyAd gavIdhukayavAgvA̍# vA na grAmyAn paśUn. hinasti nA&&*raṇyAnathO KalvAhuranA̍hutirvai̍ jartilA̱śca gavIdhukAścEtya̍# jakṣIrEṇa# juhOtyAgnEyI vA EṣA yadajA&&hutyaiva̍ juhOti̍ na grAmyAn paśUn. hinasti nA&&*raṇyAna~ggirasaḥ̍ suvargaM ~MlOkaM ~MyantO - [ ] 10

verses.padam: - Padam ajAyA̱m|Garmam|prEti|asi~jcann|sA|śOca̍ntI|parṇam|parEti̍|ajihIta|saḥ|arkaḥ|aBavat|tat|arkasya̍|arkatvamitya̍rka̍ - tvam|arkaparṇEnEtyarka̍ - parṇEna|juhOti|sayOnitvAyEti̍# sayOni - tvAya|uda~g̍|tiṣṭhann̍|juhOti|EṣA|vai|rudrasya̍|dik|svAyA̱m|Eva|diśi|rudram|nirava̍dayata̍ iti# niḥ-avadayatE|caramAyA̱m|iṣṭa̍kAyAm|juhOti|antataḥ|Eva|rudram|nirava̍dayata̍ iti# niḥ - avadayatE|trEdhAviBaktamiti̍# trEdhA - viBaktam|juhOti|trayaḥ|imE|lOkAḥ|imAn|Eva|lOkAn|samAva̍dvIryAniti̍# samAvat̍ - vIryAn|karOti|iyati|agrE̱|juhOti|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -&jAyA̱M GarmaM prAsi~jcanthsA̍ śOcantI̍ parṇaM parA&jihIta̍ sO̱(1q)&rkO&Bavat̍ tadarkasyA̱-rkatvamarkaparṇEna̍# juhOti sayOnitvAyOda~g tiṣṭhan̍ juhOtyEṣA vai rudrasya diK svAyAmEva̍ diśi rudraM niravadayatE̍ caramAyAmiṣṭakAyAM̍ juhOtyantata Eva rudraM niravadayatE̍ trEdhAviBaktaM juhOti̍ traya# imE lOkA imAnEva lOkAnth samAvadvIryAn̍ karOtIyatyagrE# juhOtya - [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam atha|iya̍ti|atha̍|iya̍ti|traya̍ḥ|imE|lOkAḥ|EByaḥ|Eva|Enam|lOkEBya̍ḥ|śamayati|tisraḥ|utta̍rA̍ ityut - tarAḥ|AhutIrityA-hutIḥ|juhOti|ṣaṭ|samiti̍|padyantE|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutava̍ḥ|RutuBirityRutu̍ - Biḥ|Eva|Enam|śamayati|yat|anuparikrAmamityanu̍ - parikrAma̱m|juhuyAt|antaravacAriṇamityantaḥ̍ - avacAriṇa̱m|rudram|kuryAt|athO iti|Kalu̍|Ahuḥ|kasyA̱m|vA|aha̍|diśi|rudraḥ|kasyA̱m|vA|iti̍|anuparikrAmamitya̍nu̍ - parikrAma̱m|Eva|hOtavya̱m|aparivargamityapa̍ri̍ - vargam|Eva|Enam|śamayati|12 (50)
verses.samhita: -thEyatyathEyati̍ traya# imE lOkA EBya EvainaM̍ ~MlOkEByaḥ̍ śamayati tisra uttarA̍ AhutIrjuhOti̍ ṣaṭ thsaM padyantE̍ ṣaḍ vA Rutava# RutuBirEvainaṃ̍# śamayati yadanuparikrAma̍M̍ juhuyAdantaravacAriṇaṃ̍# rudraM kuryAdathO̍ KalvAhuḥ̍ kasyAM ~MvA&ha# diśi rudraḥ kasyAM ~MvEtyanuparikrAma̍mEva̍ hOtavya̍-mapa̍rivargamEvainaṃ̍# śamayatyE - [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam EtAḥ|vai|dEvatA̱ḥ|suvargyA# iti# suvaḥ - gyA̱ḥ|yAḥ|uttamA ityut-tamAḥ|tAḥ|yaja̍mAnam|vAcayati|tABi̍ḥ|Eva|Enam|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ-gam|lOkam|gamayati|yam|dviṣyAt|tasya|saMqcara̍ iti# saM - carE|paśUnAm|nIti|asyEt|yaḥ|prathamaḥ|paśuḥ|aBitiṣṭhatItya̍Bi̍ - tiṣṭhati|saḥ|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCati||13̍ (30) (paśUnAM - ~MyantO - &gnE# juhOtya - parivargamEvainaṃ̍# śamayati - triṃqśacca)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: -tAvai dEvatA̱ḥ suvargyAyA̍ uttamAstA̍ yajamAnaM̍ ~MvAcayati tABirEvainaṃ̍# suvargaM ~MlOkaM gamayati̍ yaM dviṣyAt tasya# sa~jcarE paśUnAM̍ nyasyEd̍ yaḥ prathamaḥ̍ paśuraBitiṣṭha̍ti̍ sa ArtimArcCati||13̍ (paśUnAM - ~MyantO - &gnE# juhOtya - parivargamEvainaṃ̍# śamayati - triṃqśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam aśmann|Urja̱m|iti̍|parIti̍|si~jcati|mArjaya̍ti|Eva|Enam|athO̍ iti|tarpaya̍ti|Eva|saḥ|Enam|tRuptaḥ|akṣu̍ddhyann|aśO̍cann|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|upEti̍|tiṣṭhatE|tRupya̍ti|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|tAm|naḥ|iṣa̱m|Urja̱m|dhatta|marutaḥ|saṃqrarAṇA̍ iti# saM - rarAṇAḥ|iti|Aha|anna̱m|vai|Urk|anna̱m|maruta̍ḥ|anna̱m|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|aśmann̍|tE|kṣut|amum|tE|śuk|14̍ (50)
verses.samhita: aśmannUrjamiti pari# ṣi~jcati mArjayatyEvainamathO̍# tarpayatyEva̍ sa EnaM̍ tRuptO &kṣuddhya-nnaśO̍ca-nnamuṣmi̍n̍ ~MlOka upa# tiṣṭhatE tRupyati̍ prajayA# paśuBirya EvaM ~MvEda tAM na iṣamUrjaM̍ dhatta marutaḥ saṃrarAṇA ityAhAnnaM ~MvA UrgannaM̍ marutO&nnamEvAva̍# rundhE &śmaṅstE̍ kṣudamuM tE śu - [ ] 14

verses.padam: - Padam RucCatu|yam|dviṣmaḥ|iti|Aha|yam|Eva|dvEṣṭi̍|tam|asya|kṣudhA|ca|śucA|ca|arpayati|triḥ|pariṣi~jcanniti̍# pari - si~jcann|parIti|Eti|trivRuditi̍# tri-vRut|vai|agniḥ|yAvAn|Eva|agniḥ|tasya̍|śuca̱m|śamayati|triḥ|puna̍ḥ|parIti̍|Eti|ṣaṭ|samiti̍|padyantE|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutava̍ḥ|RutuBirityRutu-Biḥ|Eva|asya|śuca̱m|śamayati|apAm|vai|Etat|puṣpa̱m|yat|vEtasaḥ|apAm|15̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -gRucCatu̍ yaM dviṣma ityAha̍ yamEva dvEṣṭi tamasya̍ kṣudhA ca# śucA cA̱rpayati triḥ pariṣi~jcan̍ paryEti̍ trivRudvA agniryAvAnEvA-gnistasya̍ śucaṃ# śamayati triḥ punaḥ paryEti̍ ṣaṭ thsaM padyantE̍ ṣaḍ vA Rutava# RutuBirEvAsya̍ śucaṃ# śamayatyapAM ~MvA Etat puṣpaM ~MyadvEtasO̍&pAṃ̍ - [ ] 15

verses.padam: - Padam śaraḥ|ava̍kAḥ|vEtasaśAKayEti̍# vEtasa - śAKayA̱|ca|avakABiḥ|ca|vIti̍|kaṛqṣati|Apa̍ḥ|vai|śAntAḥ|śAntABi̍ḥ|Eva|asya|śuca̱m|śamayati|yaḥ|vai|agnim|citam|prathamaḥ|paśuḥ|adhikrAmatItya̍dhi-krAma̍ti|Iśvaraḥ|vai|tam|śucA|pradaha̍ iti# pra - dahaḥ|maṇḍUkE̍na|vIti̍|kaṛqṣati|Eṣaḥ|vai|paśUnAm|anupajIvanIya̍ ityanupa̍ - jIvanIyaḥ|na|vai|Eṣaḥ|grAmyEṣu|paśuṣu̍|hitaḥ|na|AraṇyEṣu̍|tam|Eva|śucA|arpayati|aṣṭABiḥ|vIti̍|kaṛqṣati|16̍ (50)
verses.samhita: śarO&vakA̍ vEtasaśAKayA cAvakABiśca̍ vi kaṛṣatyApO̍ vai śAntAḥ śAntABirEvAsya̍ śucaṃ# śamayati yO vA agniM citaM prathamaḥ̍ paśuradhikrAma̍tIśvarO̍ vai taṃ śucA pradahO# maṇḍUkEna̍ vikaṛṣatyEṣa̍ vai paśUnA-ma̍nupajIvanIyO̍ na vA Eṣa grAmyEṣu# paśuṣu# hitO nA&&*raṇyEṣu tamEva śucA&rpayatyaṣṭABirvi̍ kaṛṣatya̍ - [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam aṣṭAkṣarEtyaṣṭA-akṣarA|gAyatrI|gAyatraḥ|agniḥ|yAvAn|Eva|agniḥ|tasya̍|śuca̱m|śamayati|pAvakava̍tIBiriti̍# pAvaka - vatIBiḥ|anna̱m|vai|pAvakaḥ|annEna|Eva|asya|śuca̱m|śamayati|mRutyuḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|agniḥ|brahma̍ṇaḥ|Etat|rUpam|yat|kRuṣṇAjinamiti̍# kRuṣṇa - ajinam|kArṣṇI iti|upAnahau̱|upEti̍|mu~jcatE|brahma̍ṇA|Eva|mRutyOḥ|antaḥ|dhattE|antaḥ|mRutyOḥ|dhattE|antaḥ|annAdyAditya̍nna̍ - adyA̱t|iti|Ahuḥ|anyAm|upamu~jcata̍ ityupa̍ - mu~jcatE̱|anyAm|na|antaḥ|17 (50)
verses.samhita: -ṣṭAkṣarA̍ gAyatrI gAyatrO̱&gniryAvA̍-nEvA&gnistasya̍ śucaṃ# śamayati pAvakavatIBirannaM̍ ~Mvai pAvakO&nnE̍naivAsya̍ śucaṃ# śamayati mRutyurvA Eṣa yadagnirbrahmaṇa̍ EtadrUpaM ~Myat kRuṣṇAjinaM̍ kArṣṇI# upAnahAvupa# mu~jcatE brahmaṇaiva̍ mRutyOrantarddhattE̍ &ntarmRutyOrddhattE̍ &ntarannAdyA- dityAhuranyA-mu̍pamu~jcatE&nyAM̍ nAnta - [ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|mRutyOḥ|dhattE|avEti|annAdyamitya̍nna̍ - adya̱m|rundhE|namaḥ|tE|hara̍sE|śOciṣE̱|iti̍|Aha|namaskRutyEti̍# namaḥ - kRutya|hi|vasI̍yAṃsam|upacarantItyu̍pa̍ - caranti|anyam|tE|asmat|tapantu|hEtaya̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|yam|Eva|dvEṣṭi̍|tam|asya|śucA|arpayati|pAvakaḥ|asmaByamityasma̍ - Byam|śivaḥ|Bava|iti|Aha|anna̱m|vai|pAvakaḥ|anna̱m|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|dvAByA̱m|adhIti̍|krAmati|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|apasyavatIByAmitya̍pasya̍# - vatIByAm|śAntyai̱||18 (49)
verses.samhita: -rEva mRutyOrddhattE &vA&nnAdyaṃ# rundhE namastE̍ harasE̍ śOciṣa ityAha̍ namaskRutya hi vasIyAṃ̍ samupacarantyanyaM̍ tE# asmat tapantu̍ hEtaya ityAha̍ yamEva dvEṣṭi tamasya̍ śucA&rpayati̍ pAvakO asmaByaṃ# śivO BavEtyAhAnnaM ~Mvai pAvakO&nna̍mEvAva̍# rundhE dvAByAmadhi# krAmati pratiṣṭhityA̍ apasyavatIByAṃq̍ śAntyai̱||18

verses.padam: - Padam nRuṣada iti# nRu - sadE̱|vaṭ|iti|vyAGA̍rayatIti̍# vi-AGArayati|pa~gktyA|AhutyEtyA-hutyA|yajñamuKamiti̍# yajña - muKam|Eti|raBatE|akṣṇayA|vyAGA̍rayatIti̍# vi - AGArayati|tasmA̱t|akṣṇayA|paśava̍ḥ|a~ggA̍ni|prEti̍|haranti|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|yat|vaṣaṭkuryAditi# vaṣaṭ - kuryAt|yAtayAmEti# yAta - yAmA|asya|vaṣaṭkAra iti# vaṣaṭ-kAraḥ|syAt|yat|na|vaṣaṭkuryAditi# vaṣaṭ - kuryAt|rakṣAṃsi|yajñam|hanyuḥ|vaṭ|iti̍|Aha|parOkṣamiti̍# paraḥ - akṣa̱m|Eva|vaṣaṭ|karOti|na|asya|yAtayAmEti̍# yAta - yAmA|vaṣaṭkAra iti# vaṣaṭ - kAraḥ|Bavati|na|yajñam|rakṣAṃ̍si|Gnanti|hutAda̍ iti# huta - adaḥ|vai|anyE|dEvAḥ|19̍ (50)
verses.samhita: nRuṣadE vaḍiti vyAGArayati̍ pa~gktyA&&hutyA̍ yajñamuKamA raBatE̍ &kṣṇayA vyAGArayati̍ tasmAdakṣṇayA̍ paśavO&~ggAni̍ praharanti̍ pratiṣṭhityai̍ yadvaṣaṭkuryAd-yAtayA̍mA&sya̍ vaṣaṭkAraḥ syAdyanna vaṣaṭkuryAd-rakṣAṃ̍si̍ yajñaṃ hanyurvaḍityA̍ha̍ parOkṣamEva̍ vaṣaṭ̍ karOti nAsya# yAtayAmA̍ vaṣaṭkArO Bavati̍ na yajñaṃ rakṣAṃsi̍ Gnanti hutAdO vA anyE dEvA - [ ] 19

verses.padam: - Padam ahutAda ityahuta̍ - adaḥ|anyE|tAn|agniciditya̍gni-cit|Eva|uBayAn̍|prIṇAti|yE|dEvAḥ|dEvAnA̱m|iti̍|daddhnA|madhumiśrEṇEti̍# madhu - miśrEṇa|avEti̍|ukṣati|hutAda̍ iti# huta - adaḥ|ca|Eva|dEvAn|ahutAda̍ ityahuta̍ - adaḥ|ca|yaja̍mAnaḥ|prIṇAti|tE|yaja̍mAnam|prIṇanti|daddhnA|Eva|hutAda̍ iti# huta - adaḥ|prIṇAti̍|madhu̍ṣA|ahutAda̍ ityahuta̍ - adaḥ|grAmyam|vai|Etat|anna̱m|yat|dadhi̍|Araṇyam|madhu̍|yat|daddhnA|madhumiśrEṇEti̍# madhu - miśrEṇa|avOkṣatItya̍va̍ - ukṣati|uBaya̍sya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - rudhyai|grumuṣṭinA̱|avEti|ukṣati|prAjApatya̍ iti# prAjA-patyaḥ|20 (50)
verses.samhita: ahutAdO&nyE̍ tAnagnicidEvOBayA̱n̍ prIṇAti yE dEvA dEvAnAmiti# daddhnA madhumiśrEṇAvO̱kṣati̍ hutAdaścaiva̍ dEvAnahutAda̍śca̍ yajamAnaḥ̍ prIṇAti tE yajamAnaM̍ prIṇanti daddhnaiva hutAdaḥ̍ prIṇAti madhuṣA̍ &hutAdO̱ grAmyaM ~MvA EtadannaM ~MyaddaddhyAraṇyaM̍ madhu yaddadhnA madhumiśrEṇA-̍ vOkṣatyuBayasyA&va̍ruddhyai̍ grumuṣṭinA&vO̱kṣati prAjApatyO - [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam vai|grumuṣṭiḥ|sayOnitvAyEti# sayOni - tvAya|dvAByA̱m|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|anuparicAramityanu̍ - paricAra̱m|avEti|ukṣati|apa̍rivargamityapa̍ri̍ - vargam|Eva|EnAn|prIṇAti|vIti|vai|Eṣaḥ|prAṇairiti̍# pra - anaiḥ|prajayEti# pra - jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|RuddhyatE|yaḥ|agnim|cinvann|adhikrAmatItyadhi̍ - krAmati|prAṇadA̍ iti# prAṇa - dAḥ|apAnadA ityapAna̍ - dAḥ|iti|Aha|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|Eva|Atman|dhattE|varcOdA iti# varcaḥ - dAḥ|varivOdA iti# varivaḥ - dAḥ|iti|Aha|prajEti̍# pra - jA|vai|varcaḥ|paśava̍ḥ|vari̍vaḥ|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|Eva|paśUn|Atmann|dhattE|indraḥ|vRutram|ahann|tam|vRutraḥ|21̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vai grumuṣṭiḥ̍ sayOnitvAya̍ dvAByAM pratiṣṭhityA̍ anuparicAra-mavO̱kṣatya-parivargamEvainA̱n̍ prIṇAti vi vA Eṣa prAṇaiḥ prajayA# paśuBiṛRuddhyatE̍ yO̱&gniM cinvannadhikrAma̍ti̍ prAṇadA apAnadA̍ ityAha̍ prAṇAnEvA&&tman dhattE̍ varcOdA varivOdA̍ ityAha̍ prajA vai varcaḥ̍ paśavO varivaḥ̍ prajAmEva paśUnAtman dhatta̍ indrO# vRutramahantaM̍ ~MvRutrO - [ ] 21

verses.padam: - Padam hataḥ|ṣOḍaśaBiriti# ṣOḍaśa - Biḥ|BOgaiḥ|asinAt|saḥ|EtAm|agnayE̱|anIkavata̍ ityanIka̍ - vatE|AhutimityA̍ - hutim|apaśyat|tAm|ajuhOt|tasya|agniḥ|anI̍kavAnityanI̍ka̍ - vAn|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|prItaḥ|ṣOḍaśadhEti̍# ṣOḍaśa-dhA|vRutrasya|BOgAn|apIti̍|adahat|vaiśvakarmaṇEnEti̍# vaiśva - karmaṇEna|pApmana̍ḥ|niriti̍|amucyata|yat|agnayE̱|anI̍kavata̍ ityanIka̍ - vatE|AhutimityA̍ - hutim|juhOti|agniḥ|Eva|asya|AnI̍kavAnityanI̍ka̍ - vAn|svEna|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|prItaḥ|pApmAna̱m|apIti̍|dahati|vaiśvakarmaṇEnEti̍# vaiśva - karmaṇEna|pApmana̍ḥ|niriti̍|mucyatE|yam|kAmayE̍ta|ciram|pApmana̍ḥ|22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: hataḥ ṣOḍaśaBi̍rBOgaira̍sinAth̍ sa EtAmagnayE&nIkavata̍ Ahutimapaśyat̍ tAmajuhOt̍ tasyAgniranI# kavAnthsvEna# BAgadhEyEna̍ prItaḥ ṣOḍaśadhA̍ vRutrasya# BOgAnapyadahad-vaiśvakarmaṇEna̍# pApmanO niramucyata̍ yadagnayE&nIkavata̍ AhutiM̍ juhOtyagnirEvA-&syAnIkavAnthsvEna̍# BAgadhEyEna̍ prItaḥ pApmAnamapi# dahati vaiśvakarmaṇEna# pApmanO nirmucyatE̍ yaM kAmayEta̍ ciraM pApmanO - [ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam niriti|mucyEta|iti̍|Ekai̍kamityEka̱M-Ekam|tasya̍|juhuyAt|ciram|Eva|pApmana̍ḥ|niriti̍|mucyatE|yam|kAmayE̍ta|tAjak|pApmana̍ḥ|niriti̍|mucyEta|iti̍|sarvA̍ṇi|tasya̍|anudrutyEtya̍nu-drutya̍|juhuyAt|tAjak|Eva|pApmana̍ḥ|niriti̍|mucyatE|athO̍ iti|Kalu̍|nAnA̱|Eva|sUktAByAmiti̍# su - uktAByA̱m|juhOti|nAnA̱|Eva|sUktayOriti# su - uktayO̱ḥ|vIrya̱m|dadhAti|athO iti|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai||23 (40) (dEvAḥ - prAjApatyO̍ - vRutra - ściraM pApmana# - ścatvAriṃqśacca)̍ (A5)
verses.samhita: nirmucyEtEtyEkai̍kaM̍ tasya# juhuyAcciramEva pApmanO nirmucyatE̍ yaM kAmayEta̍ tAjak pApmanO nirmucyEtEti̍ sarvAṇi̍ tasyAnudrutya̍# juhuyAt tAjagEva pApmanO nirmucyatE&thO̍ Kalu nAnaiva sUktAByA̱M juhOti nAnaiva sUktayO̱rvIryaM̍ dadhAtyathO pratiṣṭhityai||23̍ (dEvAḥ - prAjApatyO-vRutra̍ - ściraM pApmana# - ścatvAriṃqśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam uditi|Enam|uttarAmityu̍t̍ - tarAm|naya|iti|samidha̍ iti# saM - idhaḥ|Eti̍|dadhAti|yathA̱|jana̱m|yatE|avasam|karOti̍|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|tisraḥ|Eti̍|dadhAti|trivRuditi̍# tri - vRut|vai|agniḥ|yAvAn|Eva|agniḥ|tasmai̱|BAgadhEyamiti̍# BAga - dhEya̱m|karOti|audubaMrIḥ|Bavanti|Urk|vai|udubaMra̍ḥ|Urja̱m|Eva|asmai|apIti̍|dadhAti|uditi̍|u|tvA|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|iti̍|Aha|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|vai|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|prAṇairiti# pra - anaiḥ|24 (50)
verses.samhita: udEnamuttarAM̍ nayEti# samidha A dadhAti̍ yathA janaM̍ ~MyatE&vasaM̍ karOti# tAdRugEva tat tisra A dadhAti̍ trivRudvA agniryAvAnE-vAgnistasmai̍# BAgadhEyaM̍ karOtyaudumbarI-rBavantyUrgvA̍ udumbara̍ UrjamEvAsmA̍ api# dadhAtyudu# tvA viśvE# dEvA ityAha̍ prAṇA vai viśvE# dEvAḥ prAṇai - [ ] 24

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|Enam|uditi|yacCatE|agnE̱|Bara̍ntu|citti̍Biriti̍ citti# - Biḥ|iti|Aha|yasmai̱|Eva|Enam|cittAya̍|udyacCa̍ta̍ ityut-yacCa̍tE|tEna̍|Eva|Enam|samiti̍|arddhayati|pa~jca̍|diśa̍ḥ|daivI̱ḥ|yajñam|avantu|dEvIḥ|iti̍|Aha|diśa̍ḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|anviti̍|pracyava̍ta̍ iti# pra - cyavatE|apEti̍|ama̍tim|durmatimiti̍# duḥ - matim|bAdhamAnAḥ|iti̍|Aha|rakṣa̍sAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa# - hatyai|rAyaḥ|pOṣE̱|yajñapatimiti̍# yajña-patim|ABajantIrityA̱̍ - BajantIḥ|iti̍|Aha|paśava̍ḥ|vai|rAyaḥ|pOṣa̍ḥ|25̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -rEvainamudyacCatE̍ &gnE Barantu̍ cittiBirityA̍ha̍ yasmA# EvainaM̍ cittAyOdyacCatE̍ tEnaivainaṃq samarddhayati̍ pa~jca diśO daivI̱ryajñamavantu̍ dEvIrityAha̍ diśO hyEṣO&nu̍# pracyavatE &pAmatiM̍ durmatiM bAdhamAnA̍ ityAha̍ rakṣasAmapa̍hatyai̍ rAyaspOṣE# yajñapati-mABaja̍ntIrityA̍ha̍ paśavO vai rAyaspOṣaḥ̍ - [ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam paśUn|Eva|avEti|rundhE|ṣaḍBiriti̍# ṣaṭ-Biḥ|harati|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutavaḥ|RutuBirityRutu̍ - Biḥ|Eva|Enam|harati|dvE iti|parigRuhya̍vatI̍ iti# parigRuhya# - vatI|Bavataḥ|rakṣasAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa# - hatyai|sUryaraśmiriti̍ sUrya# - raśmiḥ|harikEśa̍ iti hari-kEśaḥ|purastA̱t|iti̍|Aha|prasU̱tyA̍ iti pra-sUtyai|tataḥ|pAvakAḥ|Aśiṣa̍ ityA̱ - śiṣaḥ|naḥ|juṣantAm|iti̍|Aha|anna̱m|vai|pAvakaḥ|anna̱m|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|dEvAsurA̍ iti# dEva-asurAḥ|saM~MyattA̍ iti saM - yattAḥ|Asann|tE|dEvAḥ|Etat|apratirathamityapra̍ti̍ - ratham|apaśyann|tEna|vai|tE|aprati|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: paśUnEvAva# rundhE ṣaḍBiṛharati̍ ṣaḍ vA Rutava# RutuBirEvainaṃ̍# harati dvE parigRuhya̍vatI̍ BavatO rakṣasAmapa̍hatyai̍ sUryaraśmirqḥari̍kEśaḥ̍ purastAdityAha̍ prasU̱tyai tataḥ̍ pAvakA AśiṣO# nO juṣantAmityAhAnnaM ~Mvai pAvakO&nna̍mEvAva̍# rundhE dEvAsurAḥ saM~MyattA̍ Asan tE dEvA Eta-dapratiratha-mapaśyan̍ tEna vai tE̱ pratya - [ ] 26

verses.padam: - Padam asurAn|ajayann|tat|apra̍tirathasyEtyapra̍ti̍ - rathasya|apratirathatvamityapratiratha̍ - tvam|yat|apratirathamityapra̍ti-ratham|dvitIya̍ḥ|hOtA̱|anvAhEtya̍nu̍ - Aha|aprati|Eva|tEna̍|yaja̍mAnaḥ|BrAtRu̍vyAn|jayati|athO̍ iti|ana̍Bijitamityana̍Bi̍ - jitam|Eva|aBIti|jayati|daśarcamiti̍# daśa - Rucam|Bavati|daśA̱kṣarEti daśa# - akṣarA|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjEti# vi - rAjA̱|imau|lOkau|vidhRutAviti̍ vi - dhRutau|anayO̱ḥ|lOkayO̱ḥ|vidhRutyA̍ iti vi - dhRutyai|athO iti|daśA̱kṣarEti̍ daśa# - akṣarA|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|anna̱m|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjIti# vi - rAji|Eva|annAdya̍ ityanna̍ - adyE̱|pratIti|tiṣṭhati|asa̍t|iva|vai|antari̍kṣam|antari̍kṣam|iva|AgnI̱dhramityAgni̍# - idhram|AgnI̱ddhra ityAgni# - iddhrE|27 (50)
verses.samhita: -surAnajayan̍ tadapratirathasyA-pratirathatvaM̍ ~MyadapratirathaM̍ dvitIyO hOtA&nvAhA̱pratyEva̍ tEna yajamAnO̍ BrAtRuvyAn̍ jayatyathO anaBijitamEvABi̍ jayati̍ daśarcaM Bavati̍ daśA̱kṣarA virAḍ virAjEmau lOkau vidhRutA̍ vanayO̱rlOkayOrvidhRutyA̍ athO daśA̱kṣarA virAḍannaM̍ ~MvirAḍ virAjyEvAnnAdyE pratitiṣṭhatyasa̍diva̍ vA antarikṣamantari̍kṣamivA̍ &&*gnI̱ddhramAgnIddhrE - [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam aśmAnam|nIti̍|dadhAti|sattvAyEti̍# sat - tvAya|dvAByA̱m|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|vimAna iti# vi - mAnaḥ|Eṣaḥ|divaḥ|maddhyE̱|AstE|iti̍|Aha|vIti̍|Eva|EtayA̱|mimItE|maddhyE̱|divaḥ|nihi̍ta̍ iti ni - hitaḥ|pRuśniḥ|aśmA̱|iti̍|Aha|anna̱m|vai|pRuśni̍|anna̱m|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|catasRuBiriti̍# catasRu-Biḥ|Eti|pucCA̱t|Eti|catvAri̍|CandAṃ̍si|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|Eva|indra̱m|viśvA̱ḥ|avIvRudhann|iti|Aha|vRuddhi̱m|Eva|upAva̍rtata̍ ityupa-Ava̍rtatE|vAjA̍nAm|satpa̍timiti̍ sat - patim|pati̱m|28 (50)
verses.samhita: &śmAnaM̍ ni dadhAti̍ sattvAya dvAByAM pratiṣṭhityai̍ vimAna# Eṣa divO maddhya# Asta ityAha̍ vyEvaitayA̍# mimItE maddhyE# divO nihitaḥ̍ pRuśniraśmEtyAhAnnaM ~Mvai pRuśnyannamEvAva̍# rundhE catasRuBirA pucCAdEti̍ catvAri CandAṃsi̍ CandOBirEvEndraM̍ ~MviśvA# avIvRudhannityAha̍ vRuddhimEvOpAva̍rtatE̍ vAjAnAṃq̍ satpatiM̍ pati - [ ] 28

verses.padam: - Padam iti|Aha|anna̱m|vai|vAja̍ḥ|anna̱m|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|sumnahUriti̍# sumna - hUḥ|yajñaḥ|dEvAn|Eti|ca|vakṣat|iti̍|Aha|prajEti̍# pra - jA|vai|paśavaḥ|sumnam|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|Eva|paśUn|Atmann|dhattE|yakṣat|agniḥ|dEvaḥ|dEvAn|Eti̍|ca|vakṣat|iti̍|Aha|svagAkRu̍tyA̍ iti# svagA - kRutyai|vAjasya|mA|prasavEnEti̍# pra - savEna|udgrABEṇEtyU̍t-grABEṇa̍|uditi̍|agraBIt|iti̍|Aha|asau|vai|Adityaḥ|udyannityu̍t̍ - yann|udgrABa ityut̍ - grABaḥ|Eṣaḥ ( )|nimrOcanniti# ni - mrOcann|nigrABa̍ iti# ni - grABaḥ|brahmaṇA|Eva|AtmAna̱m|udgRuhṇAtItyu̍t̍ - gRuhṇAti|brahma̍ṇA|BrAtRu̍vyam|nIti̍|gRuhṇAti||29̍ (60)
verses.samhita: -mityAhA&nnaM ~Mvai vAjO&nnamEvAva̍# rundhE sumnahUryajñO dEvAṃ A ca# vakṣadityAha̍ prajA vai paśavaḥ̍ sumnaM prajAmEva paśUnAtman dhattE̍ yakṣadagnirdEvO̍ dEvAṃ A ca# vakṣadityAha̍ svagAkRutyai̍ vAjasya̍ mA prasavEnO̱d-grABEṇOdagraBIdityA̍hAsau̍ vA Aditya̍ udyannudgrABa̍ Eṣa ( ) nimrOcan̍ nigrABO brahmaṇaivA&&*tmAna̍mud-gRuhṇAti̍ brahmaṇA̍ BrAtRuvyaM̍ ni gRuhṇAti||29̍

verses.padam: - Padam prAcI̱m|anviti|pradiśamiti̍# pra-diśa̱m|prEti|ihi|vidvAn|iti̍|Aha|dEvalOkamiti̍# dEva - lOkam|Eva|EtayA̱|upAvartata̍ ityupa̍ - AvartatE|krama̍ddhvam|agninA̱|nAka̱m|iti̍|Aha|imAn|Eva|EtayA̱|lOkAn|kramatE|pRuthivyAḥ|aham|uditi̍|antari̍kṣam|Eti̍|aruham|iti̍|Aha|imAn|Eva|EtayA̱|lOkAn|samArO̍hatIti̍# saM - ArOhati|suva̍ḥ|yanta̍ḥ|na|apEti̍|IkṣantE|iti̍|Aha|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|Eva|EtayA̱|lOkam|Eti|agnE̱|prEti|ihi|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prAcImanu# pradiśaM prEhi# vidvAnityAha̍ dEvalOka-mEvaitayOpAvartatE̍ kramaddhvamagninA̍ nAka-mityAhEmAnEvaitayA̍# lOkAn kramatE̍ pRuthivyA ahamudantarikṣamA̍ &ruhamityA̍hEmAnEvaitayA̍# lOkAnth samArOhati̍ suvaryantO nApE̱kṣanta ityAha̍ suvargamEvaitayA# lOkamEtyagnE prEhi# - [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam prathamaḥ|dEvayatAmiti# dEva - yatAm|iti|Aha|uBayE̍ṣu|Eva|EtayA̱|dEvamanuṣyEṣviti̍# dEva - manuṣyEṣu|cakṣu̍ḥ|dadhAti|pa~jcaBiriti̍# pa~jca - Biḥ|adhIti|krAmati|pA~gkta̍ḥ|yajñaḥ|yAvAn̍|Eva|yajñaḥ|tEna̍|saha|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Eti|naktOṣAsA̱|iti|purOnuvAkyA̍miti̍# puraḥ - anuvAkyA̱m|anviti|Aha|pratyai̱|agnE̱|sahasrAkṣEti̍# sahasra - akṣa|iti|Aha|sAhasraḥ|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajApatEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|Aptyai̱|tasmai̱|tE|vidhEma|vAjAya|svAhA̱|iti̍|Aha|anna̱m|vai|vAja̍ḥ|anna̱m|Eva|avEti̍|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prathamO dEvayatA-mityA̍hOBayE̱ṣvEvaitayA̍# dEvamanuṣyEṣu cakṣurdadhAti̍ pa~jcaBiradhi# krAmati pA~gktO# yajñO yAvAnEva̍ yajñastEna# saha suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamEti̍ naktOṣAsEti# purO&nuvAkyAmanvA̍ha̍ pratyA agnE# sahasrAkṣEtyAha̍ sAhasraḥ prajApatiḥ̍ prajApatErAptyai̍ tasmai# tE vidhEma vAjAya̍ svAhEtyAhAnnaM ~Mvai vAjO&nnamEvAva̍# - [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam rundhE|daddhnaḥ|pUrṇAm|audubaMrIm|svayamAtRuṇṇAyAmiti̍# svayaM - AtRuṇṇAyA̱m|juhOti|Urk|vai|dadhi|Urk|udubaMra̍ḥ|asau|svayamAtRuṇṇEti̍# svayaM - AtRuṇṇA|amuṣyA̱m|Eva|Urja̱m|dadhAti|tasmA̱t|amutaḥ|arvAcI̱m|Urja̱m|upEti̍|jIvAmaḥ|tisRuBiriti̍# tisRu - Biḥ|sAdayati|trivRuditi# tri - vRut|vai|agniḥ|yAvAn|Eva|agniḥ|tam|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati-sthAm|gamayati|prEddha iti pra - iddhaḥ|agnE|dIdihi|puraḥ|naḥ|iti|audu̍baMrIm|Eti̍|dadhAti|EṣA|vai|sUrmI|karṇa̍kAvatIti̍ karṇaka̍ - vati|EtayA̱|ha|sma|32 (50)
verses.samhita: rundhE daddhnaḥ pUrṇAmaudumbarIṅ̍ svayamAtRuṇṇAyA̱M juhOtyUrgvai daddhyUrgudumbarO&sau̍ svayamAtRuṇṇA̍ &muṣyAmEvOrja̍M̍ dadhAti tasmAdamutO&rvAcImUrjamupa̍# jIvAmastisRuBiḥ̍ sAdayati trivRudvA agniryAvAnEvAgnistaM̍ pratiṣṭhAM̍ gamayati̍ prEddhO# agnE dIdihi purO na ityaudumbarImA̍ dadhAtyEṣA̍ vai sUrmI karṇakAvatyEtayA̍# ha sma - [ ] 32

verses.padam: - Padam vai|dEvAḥ|asurAṇAm|śatataṛqhAniti̍# śata-tarqḥAn|tRuṃqhanti|yat|EtayA̱|samidhamiti# saM - idha̱m|AdadhAtItyA̱ - dadhAti|vajra̱m|Eva|Etat|śataGnImiti̍# śata - GnIm|yajamAnaḥ|BrAtRu̍vyAya|prEti̍|harati|stRutyai̱|acCa̍baMṭkAramityaCa̍baMṭ-kAram|vidhEma̍|tE|paramE|janmann̍|agnE|iti̍|vaika̍~gkatIm|Eti̍|dadhAti|BAḥ|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|tAm|savituḥ|varE̱ṇyasya|citrAm|iti̍|śamImayImiti̍# śamI - mayI̱m|śAntyai̱|agniḥ|vA|ha|vai|agnicitamityagni̍ - cita̱m|duhE|agnicidityagni̍ - cit|vA|agnim|duhE|tAm|33 (50)
verses.samhita: vai dEvA asurAṇAṃ̍ śatatarqḥAṅ stRuṃhanti̍ yadEtayA# samidhamAdadhA̍ti̍ vajramEvaitacCa̍taGnIM̍ ~MyajamAnO̍ BrAtRuvyAya̍ praharati̍ stRutyA acCambaṭkAraM̍ ~MvidhEma# tE paramE janmannagna̍ iti vaika~gkatImA̍ dadhAti̍ BA EvAva# rundhE tAṃ saviturvarE̱ṇyasya̍ citrAmiti# śamImayIṃq śAntyA# agnirvA# ha vA agnicita̍M̍ duhE̱&gnicidvA&gniM duhE̍ tAṃ - [ ] 33

verses.padam: - Padam savituḥ|varE̱ṇyasya|citrAm|iti|Aha|Eṣaḥ|vai|agnEḥ|dOha̍ḥ|tam|asya|kaṇva̍ḥ|Eva|śrAyasaḥ|avEt|tEna̍|ha|sma|Enam|saḥ|duhE|yat|EtayA̱|samidhamiti̍# saM - idha̱m|AdadhAtItyA̱ - dadhAti|agniciditya̍gni̍ - cit|Eva|tat|agnim|duhE|sapta|tE|agnE|samidha iti# saM - idhaḥ|sapta|jihvAḥ|iti̍|Aha|sapta|Eva|asya|sAptA̍ni|prIṇAti|pUrṇayA̱|juhOti|pUrṇaḥ|iva|hi|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajApatEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|34 (50)
verses.samhita: saviturvarE̱ṇyasya̍ citrAmityAhaiṣa̍ vA agnErdOhastamasya̍ kaṇva# Eva śrAyasO̍&vEt̍ tEna# ha smainaṃq sa duhE̍ yadEtayA# samidha-mAdadhA̱tyagnicidEva̍ tadagniM duhE̍ sapta tE# agnE samidhaḥ̍ saptajihvA ityAha̍ saptaivAsya sAptAni̍ prIṇAti pUrṇayA# juhOti pUrṇa iva̍ hi prajApatiḥ̍ prajApatE̍ - [ ] 34

verses.padam: - Padam Aptyai̱|nyUnayEti̍ ni-UnayA|juhOti|nyUnAditi̍ ni - UnAt|hi|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|asRujata|prajAnAmiti̍# pra - jAnA̱m|sRuṣṭyai̱|agniḥ|dEvEByaḥ|nilA̍yata|saḥ|diśa̍ḥ|anu̍|prEti̍|aviśat|juhva̍t|mana̍sA|diśa̍ḥ|dhyAyEt|digBya̍ iti# dik - Byaḥ|Eva|Enam|avEti|rundhE|daddhnA|purastA̱t|juhOti|AjyE̍na|upari̍ṣṭAt|tEja̍ḥ|ca|Eva|asmai|indriyam|ca|samIcI̍ iti|dadhAti|dvAda̍śakapAla̍ iti dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlaḥ|vaiśvAnaraḥ|Bavati|dvAdaśa|mAsA̱ḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM-vathsaraḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM-vathsaraḥ|agniḥ|vaiśvAnaraḥ|sAkṣAditi# sa - akṣAt|35 (50)
verses.samhita: -rAptyai nyUnayA̍ juhOti nyUnAddhi̍ prajApatiḥ̍ prajA asRujata̍ prajAnAṃq sRuṣṭyA# agnirdEvEByO nilAyata̍ sa diśO&nu prA&viśajjuhvanmana̍sA̍ diśO̱ ddhyAyE ddigBya Evainamava# rundhE daddhnA purastA̱jjuhOtyA- jyEnOpari̍ṣṭAt̍ tEjaścaivAsmA̍# indriyaM ca# samIcI# dadhAti dvAdaśakapAlO̍ vaiśvAnarO Bavati̍ dvAdaśa̍ mAsA̱ḥ saM~Mvathsaraḥ saM~MvathsarO̱-&gnirvai̱śvAnaraḥ̍ sAkṣA - [ ] 35

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|vaiśvAnaram|avEti|rundhE|yat|prayAjAnUyAjAniti̍# prayAja - anUyAjAn|kuryAt|vikastiriti̍ vi - kastiḥ|sA|yajñasya|darvihOmamiti̍# darvi - hOmam|karOti|yajñasya|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|rAṣṭram|vai|vaiśvAnaraḥ|viṭ|marutaḥ|vaiśvAnaram|hutvA|mArutAm|juhOti|rAṣṭrE|Eva|viśa̱m|anviti̍|baddhnAti|uccaiḥ|vaiśvAnarasya̍|Eti̍|śrAvayati|upAṅqśvityu̍pa̍ - aṃqśu|mArutAn|juhOti|tasmA̱t|rAṣṭram|viśa̱m|atIti|vadati|mArutAḥ|Bavanti|maruta̍ḥ|vai|dEvAnA̱m|viśa̍ḥ|dEvaviśEnEti̍# dEva - viśEna|Eva|asmai|manuṣyaviśamiti̍# manuṣya - viśam ( )|avEti|rundhE|sapta|Bavanti|saptaga̍ṇA̍ iti# sapta - gaṇAḥ|vai|marutaḥ|gaṇaśa̍ iti# gaṇa - śaḥ|Eva|viśa̱m|avEti|rundhE|gaṇEna̍|gaṇam|anudrutyEtya̍nu̍ - drutya|juhOti|viśa̱m|Eva|asmai|anu̍vartmAnamityanu̍# - vartmAnam|karOti||36 (71) (agnE prEhya - va# - sma - duhE tAM - prajApatEḥ̍ - sAkṣAn - manuṣyaviśa̍ - mEkaviṃśatiśca̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: -dEva vai̱śvAnaramava# rundhE yat prayAjAnUyAjAn̍ kuryAdvikastiḥ̍ sA yajñasya# darvihOmaM karOti̍ yajñasya pratiṣṭhityai̍ rAṣṭraM ~Mvai vai̱śvAnarO viṇmarutO# vaiśvAnaraṃ hutvA mArutAn̍ juhOti̍ rAṣṭra Eva viśamanu# baddhnAtyuccai-rvai̱śvAnarasyA&& śrAvayatyupAṃqśu̍ mArutAn̍ juhOti̍ tasmA̱d-rAṣṭraM ~Mviśamati# vadati mArutA Bavanti̍ marutO vai dEvAnAM ~MviśO# dEvaviśEnaivAsmai# manuṣyaviśa ( ) -mava# rundhE sapta Bavanti̍ saptagaṇA̍ vai marutO# gaṇaśa Eva viśamava# rundhE gaṇEna# gaṇamanudrutya̍# juhOti viśamEvAsmA̍ anuvartmAnaM̍ karOti||36 (agnE prEhya - va# - sma - duhE tAM - prajApatEḥ̍ - sAkṣAn - manuṣyaviśa̍ - mEkaviṃśatiśca̍

verses.padam: - Padam vasO̱ḥ|dhArA̱m|juhOti|vasO̱ḥ|mE|dhArA̱|asat|iti|vai|EṣA|hUyatE|GRutasya̍|vai|Enam|EṣA|dhArA̱|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|pinva̍mAnA|upEti̍|tiṣṭhatE|AjyE̍na|juhOti|tEja̍ḥ|vai|Ajya̱m|tEja̍ḥ|vasO̱ḥ|dhArA̱|tEja̍sA|Eva|asmai|tEja̍ḥ|avEti̍|rundhE|athO̍ iti|kAmA̱ḥ|vai|vasO̱ḥ|dhArA̱|kAmAn̍|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|yam|kAmayE̍ta|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|asya|annAdyamityanna̍ - adya̱m|vIti|37̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vasOrddhArA̱M juhOti vasO̱rmE dhArA&saditi̍ vA EṣA hUyatE̍ GRutasya vA EnamEṣA̍ dhArA&muṣmin̍ ~MlOkE pinvamAnOpa̍# tiṣṭhata AjyEna̍ juhOti tEjO vA AjyaM tEjO vasOrddhArA tEjasaivAsmai̍ tEjO&va# rundhE&thO kAmA vai vasOrddhArA kAmAnEvAva̍# rundhE yaM kAmayEta̍ prAṇAnasyAnnAdyaM̍ ~Mvi - [ ] 37

verses.padam: - Padam CindyAm|iti|vigrAhamiti̍# vi - grAha̱m|tasya|juhuyAt|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|Eva|asya|annAdyamityanna̍ - adya̱m|vIti|Cinatti|yam|kAmayE̍ta|prAṇAniti̍# pra-anAn|asya|annAdyamityanna̍ - adya̱m|samiti|tanuyAm|iti̍|saMta̍tAmiti̍ saM - tatAm|tasya|juhuyAt|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|Eva|asya|annAdyamityanna̍ - adya̱m|samiti|tanOti|dvAda̍śa|dvAdaśAni̍|juhOti|dvAda̍śa|mAsA̱ḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM-vathsaraḥ|saM~MvathsarEṇEti# saM - vathsarEṇa|Eva|asmai|anna̱m|avEti̍|rundhE|anna̱m|ca|mE|akṣu̍t|ca|mE|iti̍|Aha|Etat|vai|38̍ (50)
verses.samhita: cCindyAmiti̍# vigrAhaM tasya# juhuyAt prAṇAnEvAsyAnnAdyaM ~MvicCinatti̍ yaM kAmayEta̍ prAṇAnasyAnnAdyaṃq̍ saM tanuyAmiti̍ saM tatAM̍ tasya# juhuyAt prAṇAnEvAsyAnnAdyaṃq saM tanOti̍ dvAdaśa̍ dvAdaśAni# juhOti dvAdaśa̍ mAsA̱ḥ saM~Mvathsaraḥ saM~MvathsarEṇai̍ vAsmA annamava# rundhE &nnaM̍ ca mE&kṣucca̍ ma ityAhai̍ tad vA - [ ] 38

verses.padam: - Padam annasya|rUpam|rUpEṇa̍|Eva|anna̱m|avEti̍|rundhE|agniḥ|ca|mE|Apa̍ḥ|ca|mE|iti̍|Aha|EṣA|vai|anna̍sya|yOni̍ḥ|sayOnIti̍ sa - yOni|Eva|anna̱m|avEti|rundhE|ad^^rdhEndrAṇItya̍d^^rdha̍ - indrAṇi|juhOti|dEvatA̱ḥ|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|yat|sarvE̍ṣAm|ad^^rdham|indra̍ḥ|pratIti̍|tasmA̱t|indra̍ḥ|dEvatA̍nAm|BUyiṣṭhaBAkta̍ma̍ iti# BUyiṣṭhaBAk-tamaḥ|indra̱m|uttaramityut̍ -taram|Aha|indriyam|Eva|asminn|upariṣṭAt|dadhAti|yajñAyudhAnIti̍# yajña-AyudhAni|juhOti|yajñaḥ|39̍ (50)
verses.samhita: annasya̍ rUpaṃ rUpEṇaivAnnamava# rundhE &gniśca# ma Apaśca̍ ma ityAhaiṣA̍ vA annasya̍ yOniḥ sayO̱nyEvAnnamava# rundhE-&rddhEndrAṇi# juhOti dEvatA# EvAva# rundhE yath sarvEṣA-marddhamindraḥ̍ prati tasmAdindrO# dEvatAnAM̍ BUyiṣṭhaBAktama̍ indramuttaramAhE-ndriyamEvAsmi̍-nnupari̍ṣṭAd̍ dadhAti yajñAyudhAni# juhOti yajñO - [ ] 39
