verses.padam: - Padam BUtEṣṭakA iti# BUta - iṣṭakAḥ|upEti|dadhAti|atrAtrEtyatra̍-atra|vai|mRutyuḥ|jAyatE|yatra̍yatrEti̍ yatra-yatra|Eva|mRutyuḥ|jAya̍tE|tata̍ḥ|Eva|Enam|avEti̍|yajatE|tasmA̱t|agniciditya̍gni̍ - cit|sarva̱m|Ayuḥ|Eti|sarvE̱|hi|asya|mRutyava̍ḥ|avE̱ṣṭA̍ ityava# - iṣṭAḥ|tasmA̱t|agnicidityagni̍ - cit|na|aBicaritavA̍ ityaBi-caritavai|pratyak|Enam|aBicAra ityaBi̍ - cAraḥ|stRuṇutE|sUyatE̱|vai|Eṣaḥ|yaḥ|agnim|cinutE|dEvasuvAmiti# dEva - suvAm|EtAni|havIṃṣi̍|Bavanti|EtAva̍ntaḥ|vai|dEvAnA̱m|savAḥ|tE|Eva|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: BUtEṣṭakA upa# dadhAtyatrA̱tra vai mRutyurjAyatE̍ yatrayatraiva̍ mRutyurjAyatE̍ tata# Evainamava# yajatE tasmAdagnicith̍ sarvamAyurEti̍ sarvE hyasya̍ mRutyavO &vE̱ṣṭAstasmA-dagnicinnA-Bica̍ritavai̍ pratyagEna-maBicAraḥ̍ stRuṇutE̍ sUyatE vA Eṣa yO̱&gniM cinutE̍ dEvasuvAmEtAni̍# havIṃṣi# BavantyEtAvantO̍ vai dEvAnAṃ# savAsta EvA - [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam asmai|savAn|prEti|yacCanti|tE|Enam|suvantE|savaḥ|agniḥ|varuṇasava̍ iti# varuṇa - savaḥ|rAjasUyamiti# rAja - sUya̱m|brahmasava iti# brahma-savaḥ|cityaḥ|dEvasya̍|tvA|savituḥ|prasava̍ iti# pra - savE|iti|Aha|savitRupra̍sUta̍ iti# savitRu-prasUtaḥ|Eva|Enam|brahmaṇA|dEvatA̍Biḥ|aBIti̍|si~jcati|anna̍syAnnasyEtyanna̍sya̍ - annasya|aBIti|si~jcati|anna̍syAnnasyEtyanna̍sya̍ - annasya|avaruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|purastA̱t|pratya~jca̱m|aBIti|si~jcati|purastA̱t|hi|pratIcIna̱m|anna̱m|adyatE̱|śIṛqṣataḥ|aBIti̍|si~jcati|śIṛqṣataḥ|hi|anna̱m|adyatE̱|Eti̍|muKA̱t|anvava̍srAvayatItya̍nu̍ - avasrAvayati|12̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -smai# savAn pra yacCanti̍ ta Enaṃ̍ suvantE savO̱&gnirvaruṇasavO̍ rAjasUya̍M̍ brahmasavaścityO# dEvasya# tvA savituḥ prasava̍ ityAha̍ savitRuprasUta̍ EvainaM brahmaṇA̍ dEvatABiraBi̍ ṣi~jcatyanna̍-syAnnasyABi̍ ṣi~jcatyanna̍-syAnnasyA-va̍ruddhyai̍ purastA̱t pratya~jcamaBi̍ ṣi~jcati̍ purastAddhi pratIcI-namanna̍madyatE̍# śIṛṣatO&Bi̍ ṣi~jcati̍ śIṛṣatO hyannamadyata̍ A muKAdanvava̍srAvayati̍ - [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam muKataḥ|Eva|asmai|annAdyamityanna̍ -adya̱m|dadhAti|agnEḥ|tvA|sAmrA̱jyEnEti sAM - rAjyEna|aBIti|si~jcAmi|iti̍|Aha|Eṣaḥ|vai|agnEḥ|savaḥ|tEna̍|Eva|Enam|aBIti̍|si~jcati|bRuhaspatE̱ḥ|tvA|sAmrA̱jyEnEti̍ sAM-rAjyEna|aBIti|si~jcAmi|iti̍|Aha|brahma̍|vai|dEvAnA̱m|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|brahma̍ṇA|Eva|Enam|aBIti̍|si~jcati|indra̍sya|tvA|sAmrA̱jyEnEti̍ sAM - rAjyEna|aBIti|si~jcAmi|iti̍|Aha|indriyam|Eva|asminn|upari̍ṣṭAt|dadhAti|Etat|13̍ (50)
verses.samhita: muKata EvAsmA# annAdyaM̍ dadhAtyagnEstvA sAmrA̱jyEnABi ṣi~jcAmItyA̍haiṣa̍ vA agnEḥ savastEnaivainamaBi̍ ṣi~jcati̍ bRuhaspatE̱stvA sAmrA̱jyEnABiṣi~jcAmItyA̍ha̍ brahma vai dEvAnAM bRuhaspatirbrahmaṇaivaina̍maBi̍ ṣi~jcatIndra̍sya̍ tvA sAmrA̱jyEnABi ṣi~jcA-mItyA̍hEndriyamEvAsmi̍-nnupari̍ṣṭAd̍ dadhAtyE ta - [ ] 13

verses.padam: - Padam vai|rAjasUyasyEti# rAja - sUyasya|rUpam|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|agnim|cinutE|uBau|Eva|lOkau|aBIti̍|jayati|yaḥ|ca|rAjasUyEnEti̍# rAja - sUyEna|IjAnasya̍|yaḥ|ca|agnicita̍ ityagni̍ - citaḥ|indra̍sya|suṣuvAṇasya̍|daśadhEti̍# daśa - dhA|indriyam|vIrya̱m|parEti|apatat|tat|dEvAḥ|sautrAmaṇyA|samiti̍|aBarann|sUyatE̱|vai|Eṣaḥ|yaḥ|agnim|cinutE|agnim|citvA|sautrAmaṇyA|yajEta|indriyam|Eva|vIrya̱m|saBRuMtyEti̍# saM - BRutya|Atmann|dhattE||14̍ (48) (ta EvA - nvavasrAvayatyE̍ - ta - daṣṭAcatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: -dvai rAjasUya̍sya̍ rUpaM ~Mya EvaM ~MvidvAnagniM cinuta̍ uBAvEva lOkAvaBi jayati̍ yaśca# rAjasUyEnEjAnasya̍ yaścA̱gnicita indrasya̍ suṣuvAṇasya# daśadhEndriyaM ~MvIryaM̍ parA&patat̍ taddEvAḥ sau̱trAmaṇyA samaBaranth̍ sUyatE vA Eṣa yO̱&gniM cinutE̱&gniM̍ citvA sau̱trAmaṇyA yajEtEndriyamEva̍ vIryaṃ# saBRuMtyA&&*tman dhattE||14̍ (ta EvA - nvavasrAvayatyE̍ - ta - daṣṭAcatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam sajUriti# sa - jUḥ|abdaḥ|ayA̍vaBirityayA̍va̍ - Biḥ|sajUriti# sa - jUḥ|uṣAḥ|aruṇIBiḥ|sajUriti̍# sa - jUḥ|sUryaḥ|Eta̍śEna|sajOṣAviti̍# sa - jOṣau̱|aśvinA̱|daṃsOBiriti̍ daṃsaḥ̍ - Biḥ|sajUriti# sa-jUḥ|agniḥ|vaiśvAnaraḥ|iḍABiḥ|GRutEna̍|svAhA̱|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM-vathsaraḥ|vai|abdaḥ|mAsA̱ḥ|ayA̍vAḥ|uṣAḥ|aru̍ṇI|sUrya̍ḥ|Eta̍śaḥ|imE̍ iti|aśvinA̱|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|agniḥ|vaiśvAnaraḥ|paśavaḥ|iḍA̱|paśava̍ḥ|GRutam|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM - vathsaram|paśavaḥ|anu̍|prEti̍|jAyantE|saM~MvathsarEṇEti̍# saM - vathsarEṇa|Eva|asmai|paśUn|prEti̍|janayati|darBastabaM̍ iti# darBa - stabEM|juhOti|yat|15 (50)
verses.samhita: sajUrabdO&yAvaBiḥ̍ sajUruṣA aruṇIBiḥ̍ sajUḥ sUrya EtaśEna̍ sajOṣAvaśvinA̍ daṃsOBiḥ̍ sajUragnirvai̱śvAnara iḍABirGRutEna̍ svAhA# saM~MvathsarO vA abdO mAsA ayAvA̍ uṣA aruṇI̍ sUrya Etaśa̍ imE aśvinA# saM~MvathsarO̱&gnirvai̱śvAnaraḥ paśava iḍA# paśavO# GRutaṃ saM~MvathsaraM̍ paśavO&nu pra jAyantE̍ saM~MvathsarEṇaivAsmai# paśUn prajanayati̍ darBastambE juhOti̍ ya - [ ] 15

verses.padam: - Padam vai|asyAḥ|amRuta̱m|yat|vIrya̱m|tat|darBAḥ|tasminn|juhOti|prEti̍|Eva|jAyatE|annAda̍ ityanna̍ - adaḥ|Bavati|yasya|Evam|juhva̍ti|EtAḥ|vai|dEvatA̱ḥ|agnEḥ|purastA̱dBAgA̍ iti# purastA̱t - BAgAḥ|tAḥ|Eva|prIṇAti|athO iti|cakṣu̍ḥ|Eva|agnEḥ|purastA̱t|pratIti̍|dadhAti|ana̍ndhaḥ|Bavati|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|Apa̍ḥ|vai|idam|agrE̱|salilam|AsIt|saḥ|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|puṣkaraparṇa iti# puṣkara - parṇE|vAtaḥ|BUtaḥ|alElAyat|saḥ|16̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -dvA asyA amRutaM ~Myad-vIryaM̍ tad-darBAstasmin̍ juhOti praiva jAyatE̍ &nnAdO Bavati̍ yasyaivaM juhvatyEtA̍ vai dEvatA# agnEḥ purastA̱dBAgAstA Eva prIṇAtyathO̍ cakṣurEvAgnEḥ̍ purastAt prati# dadhAtyanandhO̍ Bavati ya EvaM ~MvEdA&&*pO vA idamagrE# salilamAsIth̍ sa prajApatiḥ̍ puṣkaraparṇE vAtO# BUtO&lElAyath̍ saḥ - [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam pratiṣṭhAmiti# prati - sthAm|na|avindata|saḥ|Etat|apAm|kulAya̱m|apaśyat|tasminn|agnim|acinuta|tat|iyam|aBavat|tata̍ḥ|vai|saḥ|pratIti̍|atiṣṭhat|yAm|purastA̱t|upAda̍dhAdityu̍pa̍ - adadhAt|tat|śira̍ḥ|aBavat|sA|prAcI̱|dik|yAm|dakṣiṇataḥ|upAda̍dhAdityu̍pa̍ - adadhAt|saḥ|dakṣi̍ṇaḥ|pakṣaḥ|aBavat|sA|dakṣiṇA|dik|yAm|paścAt|upAda̍dhAdityu̍pa-ada̍dhAt|tat|pucCa̱m|aBavat|sA|pratIcI̱|dik|yAm|uttarata̍ ityut̍ - tarataḥ|upAdadhAdityu̍pa̍ - adadhAt|17̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pratiṣṭhAM̍ nA&vindata̍ sa EtadapAM kulAyamapaśyat̍ tasminnagnima̍cinuta̍ tadiyamaBavat̍ tatO vai sa pratyatiṣṭhadyAM̍ purastAdupA-da̍dhAt̍ tacCirO# &Bavath sA prAcI digyAM dakṣiṇata̍ upAdadhAth̍ sa dakṣiṇaḥ̍ pakṣO&Bavath̍ sA dakṣiṇA̍ digyAM paścA-dupAdadhAt̍ tat pucCamaBavath̍ sA pratIcI digyAmuttarata̍ upAdadhAth̍ - [ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam saḥ|uttara̍ ityut - taraḥ|pakṣaḥ|aBavat|sA|udIcI|dik|yAm|upari̍ṣṭAt|upAda̍dhAdityu̍pa̍ - adadhAt|tat|pRuṣṭham|aBavat|sA|Ud^^rdhvA|dik|iyam|vai|agniḥ|pa~jcE̱ṣṭaka̍ iti pa~jca-iṣṭakaḥ|tasmA̱t|yat|asyAm|Kana̍nti|aBIti̍|iṣṭa̍kAm|tRundanti̍|aBIti̍|śarka̍rAm|sarvA̱|vai|iyam|vayO̱Bya̍ iti vayaḥ̍ - Byaḥ|nakta̱m|dRuśE|dIpyatE|tasmA̱t|imAm|vayAṃsi|nakta̱m|na|adhIti̍|AsatE|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|agnim|cinutE|pratIti̍|Eva|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sa uttaraḥ̍ pakṣO&Bavath̍ sOdIcI̍ digyAmupariṣṭA-dupAda̍dhAt̍ tat pRuṣṭhamaBavath̍ sOrddhvA digiyaM ~MvA agniḥ pa~jcE̱ṣṭaka-stasmAd-yadasyAM KanantyaBIṣṭa̍kAM̍ tRundantyaBi śarkarAṃq̍ sarvA vA iyaM ~MvayO̱ByO naktaM̍ dRuśE dI̱pyatE tasmAdimAM̍ ~MvayAṃsi̍ naktaM nAddhyAsatE̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAnagniM cinutE̍ pratyEva - [ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam tiṣṭhati|aBIti|diśa̍ḥ|jayati|AgnEyaḥ|vai|brAhmaṇaḥ|tasmA̱t|brAhmaṇAya̍|sarvA̍su|dikṣu|ad^^rdhu̍kam|svAm|Eva|tat|diśa̱m|anviti̍|Eti|apAm|vai|agniḥ|kulAya̱m|tasmA̱t|Apa̍ḥ|agnim|hAru̍kAḥ|svAm|Eva|tat|yOni̱m|prEti̍|viśanti||19̍ (32) (yada-̍ lElAyath sa-uttarata̍ upAdadhA-dEva̍ - dvAtriṃśacca)̍ (A4)
verses.samhita: tiṣṭhatyaBi̍ diśO# jayatyAgnEyO vai brA̱hmaṇastasmA̱d-brAhmaṇAya sarvAsu̍ dikṣvarddhukaṅq̍ svAmEva tad-diśamanvE̱tyapAM ~MvA agniḥ kulAyaM tasmAdApO&gniṃ hArukAḥ̍ svAmEva tad-yOniM praviśanti||19̍ (yada-̍ lElAyath sa-uttarata̍ upAdadhA-dEva̍ - dvAtriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM - vathsaram|uKya̱m|BRutvA|dvitIyE̱|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsarE|AgnEyam|aṣṭAkapAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|niriti|vapEt|aindram|EkA̍daśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|vaiśvadEvamiti# vaiśva - dEvam|dvAdaśakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|bAṛqhaspatyam|carum|vaiṣṇavam|trikapAlamiti# tri - kapAlam|tRutIyE̱|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsarE|aBijitEtyaBi̍ - jitA̱|yajEta|yat|aṣṭAkapAla̍ ityaṣṭA - kapAlaḥ|Bavati|aṣṭAkṣarEtyaṣṭA̍ - akṣarA|gAyatrI|AgnEyam|gAyatram|prAtassavanamiti# prAtaḥ - savanam|prAtassavanamiti# prAtaḥ-savanam|Eva|tEna|dAdhAra|gAyatrIm|Canda̍ḥ|yat|EkA̍daśakapAla̍ ityEkAdaśa̍ - kapAlaḥ|Bavati|EkA̍daśAkṣarEtyEkA̍daśa̍ - akṣarA|triṣṭuk|aindram|traiṣṭuBam|mAddhya̍ndinam|sava̍nam|mAddhya̍ndinam|Eva|sava̍nam|tEna̍|dAdhAra|triṣṭuBa̱m|20̍ (50)
verses.samhita: saM~MvathsaramuKyaM̍ BRutvA dvitIyE# saM~Mvathsara A̱gnEyamaṣṭAkapAlaM̍ nirvapEdaindra-mEkA̍daśakapAlaM̍ ~MvaiśvadEvaM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ bAṛhaspatyaM caruM ~Mvai̱ṣṇavaM trikapAlaM̍ tRutIyE# saM~MvathsarE&BijitA̍# yajEta yadaṣṭAkapAlO̍ BavatyaṣṭAkṣa̍rA̍ gAyatryA̱gnEyaM gAyatraM̍ prAtassavanaM̍ prAtassavanamEva̍ tEna# dAdhAra gAyatrIM CandO yadEkAdaśakapAlO̍ BavatyEkAdaśAkṣarA̍ triṣṭugaindraM traiṣṭuBaM̍ mAddhyandinaṃq̍ savanaM̍ mAddhyandinamEva̍ savanaM̍ tEna# dAdhAra triṣṭuBaM - [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam Candaḥ|yat|dvAda̍śakapAla̍ iti dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlaḥ|Bavati|dvAda̍śAkṣarEti̍ dvAdaśA-akṣarA|jaga̍tI|vaiśvadEvamiti̍# vaiśva - dEvam|jAgatam|tRutIyasavanamiti̍# tRutIya - savanam|tRutIyasavanamiti# tRutIya - savanam|Eva|tEna|dAdhAra|jaga̍tIm|Canda̍ḥ|yat|bAṛqhaspatyaḥ|caruḥ|Bava̍ti|brahma̍|vai|dEvAnA̱m|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|brahma̍|Eva|tEna̍|dAdhAra|yat|vaiṣṇavaḥ|trikapAla̍ iti# tri - kapAlaḥ|Bavati|yajñaḥ|vai|viṣṇu̍ḥ|yajñam|Eva|tEna̍|dAdhAra|yat|tRutIyE̱|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsarE|aBijitEtyaBi̍ - jitA̱|yajatE|aBiji̍tyA̍ ityaBi - jityai|yat|saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM - vathsaram|uKya̱m|biBarti|imam|Eva|21̍ (50)
verses.samhita: CandO yad-dvAdaśakapAlO̍ Bavati̍ dvAdaśAkṣarA̍ jagatI̍ vaiśvadEvaM jAgataM̍ tRutIyasavanaM tRutIyasavanamEva̍ tEna# dAdhAra jagatIM̍ CandO yad-bAṛhaspatyaścarurBava̍ti̍ brahma vai dEvAnAM bRuhaspatirbrahmaiva tEna# dAdhAra yad-vai̱ṣṇavastrikapAlO̍ Bavati̍ yajñO vai viṣṇuryajñamEva̍ tEna# dAdhAra yat tRutIyE# saM~MvathsarE&BijitA̍ yajatE&Biji̍tyai̍ yath saM~MvathsaramuKya̍M̍ biBartImamEva - [ ] 21

verses.padam: - Padam tEna|lOkam|spRuṇOti|yat|dvitIyE̱|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsarE|agnim|cinutE|antarikṣam|Eva|tEna̍|spRuṇOti|yat|tRutIyE̱|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsarE|yajatE|amum|Eva|tEna̍|lOkam|spRuṇOti|Etam|vai|para̍ḥ|AṭṇAraḥ|kakṣIvAniti̍# kakṣI - vAn|auśijaḥ|vItahavya̍ iti# vIta - havyaḥ|śrAyasaḥ|trasadasyuḥ|paurukuthsya̍ iti# pauru - kuthsyaḥ|prajAkAmA̍ iti# prajA-kAmAḥ|acinvata|tataḥ|vai|tE|sahasraṃ̍sahasramiti̍# sahasra̱M - sahasram|putrAn|avindanta|prathatE|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu-Biḥ|tAm|mAtrA̱m|ApnOti|yAm|tE|agacCann|yaḥ|Evam̍ ( )|vidvAn|Etam|agnim|cinutE||22 (54)
verses.samhita: tEna# lOkaṅ spRuṇOti̍ yad dvitIyE# saM~MvathsarE̱&gniM cinutE̱̍ &ntarikṣamEva̍ tEna# spRuṇOti yat tRutIyE# saM~MvathsarE yajatE&mumEva̍ tEna# lOkaṅ spRuṇOtyEtaM̍ ~Mvai para# AṭṇAraḥ kakṣIvAṃ# auśijO vItahavyaḥ̍ śrAyasastrasadasyuḥ̍ paurukuthsyaḥ prajAkAmA̍ acinvata tatO vai tE sahasraṃ# sahasraM putrAnavindanta̍ prathatE̍ prajayA# paśuBistAM mAtrAmApnOti̍ yAM tE&gacCanq̍ ya EvaM ( ) ~MvidvAnEtamagniM cinutE||22̍

verses.padam: - Padam prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|agnim|acinuta|saḥ|kṣurapaviriti̍# kṣura - paviḥ|BUtvA|atiṣṭhat|tam|dEvAḥ|biByataḥ|na|upEti̍|Ayann|tE|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|AtmAna̱m|CAdayitvA|upEti|Ayann|tat|Canda̍sAm|Candastvamiti̍# Candaḥ - tvam|brahma|vai|CandAṃ̍si|brahma̍ṇaḥ|Etat|rUpam|yat|kRuṣṇAjinamiti̍# kRuṣṇa - ajinam|kArṣṇI iti|upAnahau̱|upEti̍|mu~jcatE|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|Eva|AtmAna̱m|CAdayitvA|agnim|upEti|carati|Atmana̍ḥ|ahiṃ̍sAyai|dEvanidhiriti̍# dEva - nidhiḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|nIti|dhIyatE|yat|agniḥ|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prajApatiragnima̍cinuta̍ sa kṣurapavirBUtvA&ti̍ṣṭhat̍ taM dEvA biByatO̍ nOpA&&*yan̍ tE CandOBirAtmAna̍M̍ CAdayitvOpA&&*yan̍ tacCandasAM̍ CandastvaM brahma vai CandAṃsi̍ brahmaṇa̍ Etad-rUpaM ~Myat kRuṣṇAjinaM̍ kArṣṇI# upAnahAvupa# mu~jcatE CandOBirEvA&&*tmAna̍M̍ CAdayitvA&gnimupa# caratyAtmanO&hiṃsAyai̍ dEvanidhirvA Eṣa ni dhIyatE̍ yadagni - [ ] 23

verses.padam: - Padam anyE|vA|vai|nidhimiti# ni - dhim|aguptam|vindanti̍|na|vA|prati̍|prEti̍|jAnAti|uKAm|Eti̍|krAmati|AtmAna̱m|Eva|adhipAmitya̍dhi̍ - pAm|kurutE|guptyai̱|athO iti|Kalu̍|Ahuḥ|na|AkramyEtyA̱̍ - kramyA̱|iti|naiṛqRutIti̍# naiḥ-RutI|uKA|yat|AkrAmEdityA̱ - krAmE̱t|niṛRutyA̍ iti niḥ-Rutyai|AtmAna̱m|apIti|daddhyAt|tasmA̱t|na|AkramyEtyA̱-kramyA̱|puruṣaśIrq.ṣamiti̍# puruṣa - śIrq.ṣam|upEti|dadhAti|guptyai̱|athO̍ iti|yathA̱|brUyAt|Etat|mE|gOpAya|iti̍|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|24̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -ranyE vA vai nidhimaguptaM̍ ~Mvindanti na vA prati pra jAnAtyuKAmA̍ krAmatyAtmAna̍mEvAdhipAM̍ kurutE̍ guptyA athO KalvAhurnA&&kramyEti̍# naiṛRutyuKA̍ yadAkrAmEnniṛRutyA̍ AtmAnamapi# daddhyAt tasmAnnA&&kramyA# puruṣaśIrq.ṣamupa# dadhAti guptyA athO yathA̱ brUyAdEtanmE# gOpAyEti# tAdRugEva tat - [ ] 24

verses.padam: - Padam prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|vai|atharvA|agniḥ|Eva|daddhya~g|Atharvaṇaḥ|tasya̍|iṣṭa̍kAḥ|asthAni̍|Etam|ha|vAva|tat|Ruṣi̍ḥ|aByanU̍vAcEtya̍Bi̍ - anUvAca|indra̍ḥ|dadhIcaḥ|asthaBirityastha̍ - Biḥ|iti|yat|iṣṭa̍kABiḥ|agnim|cinOti̍|sAtmA̍namiti̍ sa - AtmAnam|Eva|agnim|cinutE|sAtmEti sa - AtmA|amuṣminn|lOkE|Bavati|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|śarI̍ram|vai|Etat|agnEḥ|yat|citya̍ḥ|AtmA|vaiśvAnaraḥ|yat|citE|vaiśvAnaram|juhOti̍|śarI̍ram|Eva|saṅqskRutya̍|25̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prajApatirvA̍ atharvA̍ &gnirEva daddhya~g~gAtharvaṇastasyEṣṭa̍kA̍ asthAnyEtaṃ ha vAva tad-RuṣiraByanU̍vAcEndrO̍# dadhIcO asthaBiriti yadiṣṭakABiragniM̍ cinOti sAtmAnamEvAgniM̍ cinutE̍ sAtmAmuṣmin̍ ~MlOkE Bavati̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda śarIraM̍ ~MvA EtadagnEryaccitya# AtmA vai̱śvAnarO yaccitE vai̱śvAnaraM juhOti śarIramEva̍ saṅqskRutyA - [ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam aByArOhatItya̍Bi̍ - ArOhati|śarI̍ram|vai|Etat|yaja̍mAnaḥ|samiti̍|kurutE|yat|agnim|cinutE|yat|citE|vaiśvAnaram|juhOti̍|śarI̍ram|Eva|saṅqskRutya̍|AtmanA̱|aByArO̍hatItya̍Bi̍ -ArOhati|tasmA̱t|tasya̍|na|avEti̍|dyanti|jIvann̍|Eva|dEvAn|apIti̍|Eti|vaiśvAnaryA|RucA|purI̍ṣam|upEti̍|dadhAti|iyam|vai|agniḥ|vaiśvAnaraḥ|tasya̍|EṣA|citi̍ḥ|yat|purI̍ṣam|agnim|Eva|vaiśvAnaram|cinutE|EṣA|vai|agnEḥ̍ ( )|priyA|tanUḥ|yat|vaiśvAnaraḥ|priyAm|Eva|asya|tanuva̱m|avEti|rundhE||26̍ (60) (agni - stath - saṅqskRutyA - gnE - rdaśa# ca) (A6)
verses.samhita: -ByArOhati̍ śarIraM̍ ~MvA Etad-yajamAnaḥ̍ saṅ skurutE̍ yadagniM cinutE̍ yaccitE vai̱śvAnaraM juhOti śarIramEva̍ saṅqskRutyA &&*tmanA&ByArOhati̍ tasmAt tasya nAva# dyanti jIvannEva̍ dEvAnapyEti̍ vaiśvAnaryarcA purIṣamupa̍# dadhAtIyaM ~MvA agnirvai̱śvAnarastasyaiṣA citiryat purIṣamagnimEva̍ vai̱śvAnaraM cinuta̍ EṣA vA agnEḥ ( ) priyA tanUryad-vai̱śvAnaraḥ priyAmEvAsya# tanuvamava# rundhE||26

verses.padam: - Padam agnEḥ|vai|dIkṣayA̱|dEvAḥ|virAjamiti# vi-rAja̱m|Apnuvann|tisraḥ|rAtrI̱ḥ|dIkṣitaḥ|syAt|tripadEti# tri - padA̱|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjamiti# vi - rAja̱m|ApnOti|ṣaṭ|rAtrI̱ḥ|dIkṣitaḥ|syAt|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutavaḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjamiti# vi - rAja̱m|ApnOti|daśa|rAtrI̱ḥ|dIkṣitaḥ|syAt|daśA̱kṣarEti̍ daśa# - akṣarA|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjamiti# vi - rAja̱m|ApnOti|dvAdaśa|rAtrI̱ḥ|dIkṣitaḥ|syAt|dvAda̍śa|mAsA̱ḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjamiti# vi - rAja̱m|ApnOti|trayOdaśEti̍ trayaḥ̍ - daśa|rAtrI̱ḥ|dIkṣitaḥ|syAt|trayOdaśEti̍ trayaḥ̍ - daśa|27 (50)
verses.samhita: agnErvai dIkṣayA# dEvA virAjamApnuvan̍ tisrO rAtrI̱rdIkṣitaḥ syA̱t tripadA# virAḍ virAjamApnOti̍ ṣaḍ-rAtrI̱rdIkṣitaḥ syAth ṣaḍ vA Rutavaḥ̍ saM~Mvathsaraḥ saM~MvathsarO̍ virAḍ virAjamApnOti̍ daśa rAtrI̱rdIkṣitaḥ syAd-daśA̱kṣarA virAḍ virAjamApnOti̍ dvAdaśa̍ rAtrI̱rdIkṣitaḥ syAd dvAdaśa̍ mAsA̱ḥ saM~Mvathsaraḥ saM~MvathsarO̍ virAḍ virAjamApnOti̍ trayOdaśa̍ rAtrI̱rdIkṣitaḥ syAt trayOdaśa̍ - [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam mAsA̱ḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM-vathsaraḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM-vathsaraḥ|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjamiti# vi - rAja̱m|ApnOti|pa~jcadaśEti̍ pa~jca# - daśa|rAtrI̱ḥ|dIkṣitaḥ|syAt|pa~jcadaśEti̍ pa~jca# - daśa|vai|ad^^rdhamAsasyEtyaqd^^rdha̍ - mAsasya|rAtra̍yaḥ|ad^^rdhamAsaśa̍ ityaqd^^rdhamAsa̍ - śaḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|ApyatE|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjamiti# vi - rAja̱m|ApnOti|saptadaśEti# sapta - daśa|rAtrI̱ḥ|dIkṣitaḥ|syAt|dvAdaśa|mAsA̱ḥ|pa~jca̍|Rutava̍ḥ|saḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjamiti# vi - rAja̱m|ApnOti|caturviṃśatimiti̍ catuḥ̍ - viṃqśatim|rAtrI̱ḥ|dIkṣitaḥ|syAt|caturviṃśatiriti̍ catuḥ̍ - viṃqśatiḥ|ad^^rdhamAsA ityad^^rdha-mAsAḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjamiti# vi - rAja̱m|ApnOti|triṃqśata̱m|rAtrI̱ḥ|dIkṣitaḥ|syAt|28 (50)
verses.samhita: mAsA̱ḥ saM~Mvathsaraḥ saM~MvathsarO̍ virAḍ virAjamApnOti̍ pa~jcadaśa̍ rAtrI̱rdIkṣitaḥ syAt pa~jcadaśa̍ vA arddhamAsasya̍ rAtrayO&rddhamAsaśaḥ̍ saM~Mvathsara̍ A̱pyatE saM~MvathsarO virAḍ virAjamApnOti̍ saptadaśa̍ rAtrI̱rdIkṣitaḥ syAd dvAdaśa̍ mAsAḥ pa~jcartavaḥ sa saM~Mvathsaraḥ̍ saM~MvathsarO̍ virAḍ virAjamApnOti̍ caturviṃśatiṃq̍ rAtrI̱rdIkṣitaḥ syA-ccaturviṃśatirarddhamAsAḥ̍ saM~Mvathsaraḥ̍ saM~MvathsarO̍ virAḍ virAjamApnOti̍ triṃqśataṃq rAtrI̱rdIkṣitaḥ syA̱t - [ ] 28

verses.padam: - Padam triṃqśadakṣarEti̍# triṃqśat - akṣarA|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjamiti# vi - rAja̱m|ApnOti|mAsa̱m|dIkṣitaḥ|syAt|yaḥ|mAsaḥ|saḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjamiti# vi - rAja̱m|ApnOti|caturaḥ|mAsaḥ|dIkṣitaḥ|syAt|catura̍ḥ|vai|Etam|mAsaḥ|vasa̍vaḥ|abiBaruḥ|tE|pRuthivIm|Eti̍|ajayann|gAyatrIm|Canda̍ḥ|aṣṭau|rudrAḥ|tE|antari̍kṣam|Eti̍|ajayann|triṣṭuBa̱m|Canda̍ḥ|dvAda̍śa|AdityAḥ|tE|diva̱m|Eti̍|ajayann|jaga̍tIm|Canda̍ḥ|tata̍ḥ|vai|tE̍ ( )|vyAvRutamiti# vi - AvRuta̱m|agacCann|śraiṣṭhya̱m|dEvAnA̱m|tasmA̱t|dvAdaśa|mAsaḥ|BRutvA|agnim|cinvIta|dvAda̍śa|mAsA̱ḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|agniḥ|cityaḥ|tasya̍|ahOrAtrAṇItya̍haḥ̍ - rAtrAṇi|iṣṭa̍kAḥ|AptEṣṭa̍kamityApta-iṣṭakam|Enam|cinutE|athO̍ iti|vyAvRutamiti̍# vi - AvRuta̱m|Eva|gacCati|śraiṣṭhya̱m|samAnAnA̱m||29 (78) (syAt trayOdaśa̍ - triṃqśataṃq rAtrI̱rdIkṣitaḥ syAd - vai tE̱ - &ṣṭAviṃśatiśca)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: triṃqśadakṣarA̍ virAḍ virAjamApnOti̍ mAsaM̍ dIkṣitaḥ syAd-yO mAsaḥ sa saM~Mvathsaraḥ̍ saM~MvathsarO̍ virAḍ virAjamApnOti̍ caturO# mAsO dI̱kṣitaḥ syA̱ccaturO vA EtaM mAsO vasavO&biBarustE̍ pRuthivImA&ja̍yan̍ gAyatrIM CandO&ṣṭau rudrAstE̱-&ntarikṣamA&ja̍yan̍ triṣṭuBaM CandO dvAdaśA-&&dityAstE̍ divamA&jayan̍ jagatIM̍ CandastatO vai tE ( ) vyAvRuta-magacCa~jCraiṣṭhya̍M̍ dEvAnAM tasmAd dvAdaśa̍ mAsO BRutvA&gniM cinvIta̍ dvAdaśa̍ mAsA̱ḥ saM~Mvathsaraḥ saM~MvathsarO̱̍ -&gniścityastasyA-hOrAtrAṇIṣṭa̍kA̍ AptEṣṭakamEnaM̍ cinutE&thO̱ vyAvRutamEva̍ gacCati̍ śraiṣṭhyaṃ# samAnAnA̱M||29 (syAt trayOdaśa̍ - triṃqśataṃq rAtrI̱rdIkṣitaḥ syAd - vai tE̱ - &ṣṭAviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam suvargAyEti# suvaḥ - gAya|vai|Eṣaḥ|lOkAya̍|cIyatE|yat|agniḥ|tam|yat|na|anvArOhEditya̍nu̍ - ArOhE̱t|suvargAditi# suvaḥ-gAt|lOkAt|yajamAnaḥ|hIyEta|pRuthivIm|Eti̍|akramiṣam|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|mA|mA|hAsIt|antarikṣam|Eti̍|akramiṣam|prajEti̍# pra - jA|mA|mA|hAsIt|diva̱m|Eti|akramiṣam|suva̍ḥ|aganma|iti̍|Aha|Eṣaḥ|vai|agnEḥ|anvArOha̍ ityanu-ArOhaḥ|tEna̍|Eva|Enam|anvArO̍hatItya̍nu̍ - ArOhati|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|sama̍ṣṭyA̍ iti saM - aṣṭyai|yat|pakṣasammitAmiti̍# pakṣa - sammitAm|minuyAt|30 (50)
verses.samhita: suvargAya vA Eṣa lOkAya# cIyatE yadagnistaM ~MyannAnvArOhE̱th suvargAllOkAd-yajamAnO̍ hIyEta pRuthivImA&kramiṣaM̍ prAṇO mA mA hAsIdantari̍kṣamA&kra̍miṣaM̍ prajA mA mA hAsId-divamA&kra̍miṣaṃq̍ suvaraganmEtyA̍haiṣa̍ vA agnEranvArOhastEnaivaina̍-manvArO̍hati̍ suvargasya# lOkasya samaṣṭyai̍ yat pakṣasammitAM̍ minuyAt - [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam kanIyAṃsam|yajñakratumiti̍# yajña - kratum|upEti|iyAt|pApI̍yasI|asya|Atmana̍ḥ|prajEti̍# pra - jA|syAt|vEdisammitAmiti̍ vEdi# - sammitAm|minOti|jyAyAṃsam|Eva|yajñakratumiti̍# yajña - kratum|upEti|Eti|na|asya|Atmana̍ḥ|pApI̍yasI|prajEti̍# pra - jA|Bavati|sAhasram|cinvIta|prathamam|cinvAnaḥ|sahasrasammita̍ iti# sahasra# - sammitaḥ|vai|ayam|lOkaḥ|imam|Eva|lOkam|aBIti|jayati|dviṣA̍hasramiti̍ dvi - sAhasram|cinvIta|dvitIya̱m|cinvAnaḥ|dviṣAhasramiti̍ dvi - sAhasram|vai|antarikṣam|antari̍kṣam|Eva|aBIti̍|jayati|triṣA̍hasramiti̍ tri - sAhasram|cinvIta|tRutIya̱m|cinvAnaḥ|31 (50)
verses.samhita: kanIyAṃsaM̍ ~MyajñakratumupEyAt̍ pApIyasyasyA̍ &&tmanaḥ̍ prajA syAd-vEdisammitAM̍ minOti jyAyAṃsamEva̍ yajñakratumupai̍ti̍ nAsyA&&*tmanaḥ pApIyasI̍ prajA Bavati̍ sAhasraM cinvIta̍ prathamaM cinvAnaḥ̍ sahasrasammitO̍ vA ayaM ~MlOka imamEva lOkamaBi jayati̍ dviṣAhasraM̍ cinvIta dvitIyaM̍ cinvAnO dviṣAhasraM̍ ~MvA antarikṣa-mantari̍kṣamEvABi̍ jayati̍ triṣAhasraM̍ cinvIta tRutIyaM̍ cinvAna - [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam triṣAhasra̍ iti tri - sAhasraḥ|vai|asau|lOkaḥ|amum|Eva|lOkam|aBIti|jayati|jAnudaGnamiti̍# jAnu - daGnam|cinvIta|prathamam|cinvAnaḥ|gAyatriyA|Eva|imam|lOkam|aByArOhatItya̍Bi̍ - ArOhati|nABidaGnamiti̍# nABi - daGnam|cinvIta|dvitIya̱m|cinvAnaḥ|triṣṭuBA̱|Eva|antarikṣam|aByArO̍hatItya̍Bi̍ - ArOhati|grIvadaGnamiti̍# grIva - daGnam|cinvIta|tRutIya̱m|cinvAnaḥ|jagatyA|Eva|amum|lOkam|aByArO̍hatItya̍Bi̍ - ArOhati|na|agnim|citvA|rAmAm|upEti̍|iyAt|ayOnau|rEta̍ḥ|dhAsyAmi|iti̍|na|dvitIya̱m|citvA|anyasya̍|striya̱m|32̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -striṣAhasrO̍ vA asau lOkO# &mumEva lOkamaBi jayati̍ jAnudaGnaM cinvIta̍ prathamaM cinvAnO̍ gAyatriyaivEmaM̍ ~MlOkamaByArOhati̍ nABidaGnaM cinvIta̍ dvitIyaM̍ cinvAnastriṣṭuBaivA-ntarikṣa-maByArO̍hati̍ grIvadaGnaM cinvIta̍ tRutIyaM̍ cinvAnO jagatyaivAmun̍ ~MlOkamaByArOhati̍ nAgniM citvA rAmAmupEyAdayOnau̍ rEtO# dhAsyAmIti na dvitIyaM̍ citvA&nyasya striya - [ ] 32

verses.padam: - Padam upEti|iyAt|na|tRutIya̱m|citvA|kAm|cana|upEti̍|iyAt|rEta̍ḥ|vai|Etat|nIti̍|dhattE|yat|agnim|cinutE|yat|upEyAdityu̍pa̍ - iyAt|rEtasA|vIti̍|RuddhyEta|athO̍ iti|Kalu̍|Ahuḥ|aprajasyamitya̍pra-jasyam|tat|yat|na|upEyAdityu̍pa̍ - iyAt|iti|yat|rEtassicAviti̍# rEtaḥ - sicau̱|upadadhAtItyupa̍ - dadhAti|tE̍ iti|Eva|yaja̍mAnasya|rEta̍ḥ|biBRutaḥ|tasmA̱t|upEti̍|iyAt|rEta̍saḥ|aska̍ndAya|trIṇi̍|vAva|rEtAṃ̍si|pitA|putraḥ|pautra̍ḥ|33̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -mupEyAnna̍ tRutIyaM̍ citvA kAM canOpEyAd-rEtO̍ vA Etanni dhattE̍ yadagniM cinutE̍ yadupEyAd-rEta̍sA̍ vyRuddhyEtA&thO̍ KalvAhura̍ prajasyaM tad-yannOpEyAditi yad-rEtassicA̍vupadadhA̍ti̍ tE Eva yajamAnasya̍ rEtO# biBRutastasmA-dupEyAd-rEtasO-&ska̍ndAya̍ trIṇi vAva rEtAṃsi̍ pitA putraḥ pautrO - [ ] 33

verses.padam: - Padam yat|dvE iti|rEtassicAviti̍# rEtaḥ-sicau̱|upadaddhyAdityupa-dadhyAt|rEta̍ḥ|asya|vIti̍|CindyAt|tisraḥ|upEti̍|dadhAti|rEta̍saḥ|saMta̍tyA̍ iti saM - tatyai|iyam|vAva|prathamA|rEtassigiti# rEtaḥ - sik|vAk|vai|iyam|tasmA̱t|paśyanti|imAm|paśya̍nti|vAca̱m|vada̍ntIm|antari̍kṣam|dvitIyA̱|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|vai|antarikṣam|tasmA̱t|na|antari̍kṣam|paśya̍nti|na|prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|asau|tRutIyA̱|cakṣuḥ|vai|asau|tasmA̱t|paśya̍nti|amUm|paśya̍nti|cakṣu̍ḥ|yaju̍ṣA|imAm|ca|34̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yad dvE rEtassicA̍vupadaddhyAd-rEtO̱&sya̍ vicCindyAt̍ tisra upa# dadhAti rEtasaḥ̍ saMtatyA̍ iyaM ~MvAva prathamA̍ rEtassig̍ vAgvA iyaM tasmAt paśyantImAM̍ paśyanti̍ vAcaM ~MvadantImantari̍kṣaM̍ dvitIyA̱ prAṇO vA antarikṣaM̍ tasmAnnA&ntarikṣaM̍ paśyanti̍ na prAṇamasau tRutIyA cakṣurvA asau tasmAt paśyantyamUM̍ paśyanti̍ cakṣuryajuṣEmAM̍ cA - [ ] 34

verses.padam: - Padam amUm|ca|upEti|dadhAti|mana̍sA|maddhyamAm|EṣAm|lOkAnA̱m|klRuptyai̱|athO̍ iti|prAṇAnAmiti̍# pra - anAnA̱m|iṣṭaḥ|yajñaḥ|BRuguBiriti̍ BRugu# - Biḥ|AśIrdA ityAśIḥ̍ - dAḥ|vasuBiriti̍ vasu# - Biḥ|tasya|tE|iṣṭasya̍|vItasya̍|dravi̍ṇA|iha|BakṣIya|iti̍|Aha|stutaśastrE̍ iti# stuta - śastrE|Eva|EtEna|duhE|pitA|mAtariśvA̱|acCi̍drA|padA|dhAḥ|acCi̍drAḥ|uśija̍ḥ|padA|anviti̍|takṣuḥ|sOma̍ḥ|viśvaviditi̍# viśva - vit|nEtA|nEṣat|bRuhaspatiḥ|ukthAmadAnItyu̍ktha̍ - madAni|śaṃqsiṣat|iti̍|Aha|Etat|vai̍ ( )|agnEḥ|uktham|tEna|Eva|Enam|anviti̍|śaṃqsati||35̍ (57)
verses.samhita: -mUM cOpa# dadhAti manasA̍ maddhyamAmEṣAM ~MlOkAnAM klRuptyA athO̱ prAṇAnAmiṣṭO̍ yajñO BRuguBirAśIrdA̍ vasuBistasya̍# ta iṣṭasya# vItasya draviṇEha̍ BakṣIyEtyA̍ha̍ stutaśastrE EvaitEna# duhE pitA mAtariśvA&cCi̍drA̍ padA dhA acCidrA̍ uśijaḥ̍ padA&nu# takṣuḥ sOmO# viśvavinnEtA nEṣad-bRuhaspati̍rukthAmadAni̍# śaṃsiṣadityAhaitadvA̍ ( ) agnErukthaM tEnaivainamanu# śaṃsati||35

verses.padam: - Padam sUyatE̱|vai|Eṣaḥ|agnInAm|yaḥ|uKAyA̱m|BriyatE̱|yat|adhaḥ|sAdayE̱t|garBA̱ḥ|prapAdukA̍ iti# pra - pAdukAḥ|syuḥ|athO̍ iti|yathA̱|savAt|pratyavarOhatIti̍# prati - avarOhati|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|AsandI|sAdayati|garBA̍ṇAm|dhRutyai̱|apra̍pAdAyEtyapra̍# - pAdAya|athO iti|savam|Eva|Enam|karOti|garBa̍ḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|uKya̍ḥ|yOni̍ḥ|śikya̱m|yat|śikyA̱t|uKAm|nirUhEditi̍# niḥ - UhE̱t|yOnE̱ḥ|garBa̱m|niriti|hanyAt|ṣaḍu̍dyAmamiti̍ ṣaṭ-udyAmam|śikya̱m|Bavati|ṣOḍhAvihita iti# ṣOḍhA - vihitaḥ|vai|36 (50)
verses.samhita: sUyatE vA EṣO̱&gnInAM ~Mya uKAyA̱M BriyatE yadadhaḥ sAdayEd-garBA̱ḥ prapAdukAḥ̍ syurathO yathA# savAt pratyavarOha̍ti̍ tAdRugEva tadAsandI̍ sAdayati̍ garBAṇAM̍ dhRutyA aprapAdAyAthO̍# savamEvainaM̍ karOti garBO vA Eṣa yaduKyO yOniḥ̍ śikyaM̍ ~MyacCikyAduKAM̍ nirUhEd-yOnErgarBaM niṛhaṇyAth̍ ṣaḍudyAmaṃ̍ śikyaM̍ Bavati ṣOḍhA vihitO vai - [ ] 36

verses.padam: - Padam puruṣaḥ|AtmA|ca|śira̍ḥ|ca|catvAri̍|a~ggA̍ni|Atmann|Eva|Enam|biBarti|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|agniḥ|tasya|uKA|ca|ulUKa̍lam|ca|stanau̱|tau|asya|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|upEti|jIvanti|yat|uKAm|ca|ulUKa̍lam|ca|upadadhAtItyu̍pa̍ - dadhAti|tAByA̱m|Eva|yaja̍mAnaḥ|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|agnim|duhE|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|agniḥ|tasya|trEdhAvihitA̍ iti# trEdhA - vihitAḥ|iṣṭakAḥ|prAjApatyA̍ iti# prAjA - patyAḥ|vaiṣṇavIḥ|37 (50)
verses.samhita: puruṣa̍ AtmA ca śiraśca̍ catvArya~ggA̱nyAtmannEvainaM̍ biBarti prajApatirvA̍ Eṣa yadagnistasyOKA cOlUKalaM̍ ca stanau tAvasya̍ prajA upa# jIvanti yaduKAM cOlUKalaM̍ cOpadadhAti̍ tAByAmEva̍ yajamAnO&muṣmi̍n̍ ~MlOkE̱&gniM duhE̍ saM~MvathsarO vA Eṣa yadagnistasya# trEdhAvihitA iṣṭakAḥ̍ prAjApatyA vai̱ṣṇavI - [ ] 37

verses.padam: - Padam vaiśvakarmaṇIriti# vaiśva - karmaṇIḥ|ahOrAtrAṇItyahaḥ̍ - rAtrAṇi|Eva|asya|prAjApatyA̍ iti# prAjA - patyAḥ|yat|uKya̱m|biBarti|prAjApatyA̍ iti# prAjA-patyAḥ|Eva|tat|upEti|dhattE|yat|samidha̍ iti# saM - idhaḥ|AdadhAtItyA̱̍ - dadhAti|vaiṣṇavAḥ|vai|vanaspata̍yaḥ|vaiṣṇavIḥ|Eva|tat|upEti̍|dhattE|yat|iṣṭa̍kABiḥ|agnim|cinOti̍|iyam|vai|viśvakarmEti̍# viśva - karmA|vaiśvakarmaṇIriti# vaiśva - karmaṇIḥ|Eva|tat|upEti|dhattE|tasmA̱t|Ahuḥ|trivRuditi̍# tri - vRut|agniḥ|iti|tam|vai|Etam|yaja̍mAnaḥ|Eva|cinvIta|yat|asya|anyaḥ̍ ( )|cinuyAt|yat|tam|dakṣiṇABiḥ|na|rAdhayE̱t|agnim|asya|vRu~jjIta|yaḥ|asya|agnim|cinuyAt|tam|dakṣi̍ṇABiḥ|rAdhayEt|agnim|Eva|tat|spRuṇOti||38̍ (70) (ṣOḍhAvihitO vai - vai̱ṣṇavI - ranyO - viṃśatiśca̍)̍ (A9)
verses.samhita: -rvai̱śvakarmaṇI-rahOrAtrAṇyEvAsya̍# prAjApatyA yaduKyaM̍ biBarti# prAjApatyA Eva tadupa# dhattE yath samidha# AdadhAti̍ vaiṣṇavA vai vanaspatayO̍ vaiṣṇavIrEva tadupa# dhattE yadiṣṭakABiragniM̍ cinOtIyaM ~Mvai viśvakarmA̍ vaiśvakarmaṇIrEva tadupa# dhattE tasmA-dAhu-strivRudagniriti̍ taM ~MvA EtaM ~MyajamAna̍ Eva cinvIta̍ yadasyAnya̍ ( ) ścinuyAdyat̍ taM dakṣiṇABirna̍ rAdhayEdagnima̍sya̍ vRu~jjIta yO̱&syA&gniM cinuyAt̍ taM dakṣiṇABI̍ rAdhayEdagnimEva tath spRuṇOti||38̍ (ṣOḍhAvihitO vai - vai̱ṣṇavI - ranyO - viṃśatiśca̍)̍

verses.padam: - Padam prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|agnim|acinuta|RutuBirityRutu - Biḥ|saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM - vathsaram|vasantEna|Eva|asya|pUrvAd^^rdhamiti̍# pUrva - ad^^rdham|acinuta|grIṣmEṇa|dakṣi̍ṇam|pakṣam|varq.ṣABi̍ḥ|pucCa̱m|śaradA̱|utta̍ramityut̍ - taram|pakṣam|hEmantEna|maddhya̱m|brahma̍ṇA|vai|asya|tat|pUrvAd^^rdhamiti̍# pUrva - ad^^rdham|acinuta|kṣatrEṇa|dakṣi̍ṇam|pakṣam|paśuBiriti̍# paśu - Biḥ|pucCa̱m|viśA|uttaramityut̍ - taram|pakṣam|AśayA̱|maddhya̱m|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|agnim|cinutE|RutuBirityRutu - Biḥ|Eva|Enam|cinutE|athO iti|Etat|Eva|sarva̱m|avEti̍|39̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prajApati-ragni-ma̍cinutartuBi̍ḥ̍ saM~MvathsaraM ~MvasantEnaivAsya̍# pUrvArddhamacinuta̍ grIṣmEṇa dakṣiṇaM̍ pakṣaM ~Mvarq.ṣABiḥ pucCaṃ# śaradOttaraM̍ pakṣaṃ hEmantEna̍ maddhyaM brahmaṇA̍ vA asya̍ tat pU̱rvArddhamacinuta̍ kṣatrEṇa dakṣiṇaM̍ pakṣaM paśuBiḥ pucCaM̍ ~MviśOttaraM̍ pakṣamAśayA maddhyaM ~Mya EvaM ~MvidvAnagniM cinuta̍ RutuBirEvaina̍M̍ cinutE&thO# EtadEva sarvamava# - [ ] 39

verses.padam: - Padam rundhE|śRuṇvanti|Enam|agnim|cikyAnam|atti̍|anna̱m|rOca̍tE|iyam|vAva|prathamA|citi̍ḥ|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|vanaspata̍yaḥ|purI̍ṣam|antari̍kṣam|dvitIyA̱|vayAṃ̍si|purI̍ṣam|asau|tRutIyA̱|nakṣa̍trAṇi|purI̍ṣam|yajñaḥ|caturthI|dakṣi̍ṇA|purI̍ṣam|yaja̍mAnaḥ|pa~jcamI|prajEti̍# pra - jA|purIṣam|yat|trici̍tIkamiti̍ tri - citIkam|cinvIta|yajñam|dakṣiṇAm|AtmAna̱m|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|antaḥ|iyAt|tasmA̱t|pa~jcacitIka̍ iti pa~jca# - citIkaḥ|cEtavyaḥ|Etat|Eva|sarva̱m|spRuṇOti|yat|tisraḥ|cita̍yaḥ|40̍ (50)
verses.samhita: rundhE śRuṇvantyEnamagniM̍ cikyAnamattyannaṃq̍ rOcata̍ iyaM ~MvAva prathamA̍ citirOṣadhayO̍ vanaspatayaḥ̍ purIṣamantari̍kṣaM̍ dvitIyA vayAṃsi̍ purIṣamasau̍ tRutIyA nakṣatrAṇi̍ purIṣaM̍ ~MyajñaścaturthI̍ dakṣiṇA̍ purIṣaM̍ ~MyajamAnaḥ̍ pa~jcamI prajA purIṣaM̍ ~Myat tricitIkaM̍ cinvIta yajñaM dakṣiṇAmAtmAna̍M̍ prajAmantariyAt̍ tasmAt pa~jcacitIkaścEtavya̍# EtadEva sarvaṅ# spRuṇOti yat tisraścitaya̍ - [ ] 40

verses.padam: - Padam trivRuditi# tri - vRut|hi|agniḥ|yat|dvE iti|dvipAditi̍# dvi - pAt|yajamAnaḥ|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|pa~jca|cita̍yaḥ|Bavanti|pA~gkta̍ḥ|puru̍ṣaḥ|AtmAna̱m|Eva|spRuṇOti|pa~jca̍|cita̍yaḥ|Bavanti|pa~jcaBiriti̍# pa~jca - Biḥ|purIṣaiḥ|aBIti̍|Uhati|daśa̍|samiti̍|padyantE|daśA̱kṣara̍ iti daśa# - akṣaraḥ|vai|puruṣaḥ|yAvAn̍|Eva|puru̍ṣaḥ|tam|spRuṇOti|athO̍ iti|daśA̱kṣarEti̍ daśa# - akṣarA|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|anna̱m|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjIti# vi - rAji|Eva|annAdya̍ ityanna̍ - adyE̱|pratIti|tiṣṭhati|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|vai|ṣaṣṭhI|citiḥ|Rutava̍ḥ|purI̍ṣam̍ ( )|ṣaṭ|citayaḥ|Bavanti|ṣaṭ|purI̍ṣAṇi|dvAda̍śa|samiti̍|padyantE|dvAda̍śa|mAsA̱ḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsarE|Eva|pratIti|tiṣṭhati||41̍ (65)
verses.samhita: -strivRuddhyagniryad̍ dvE dvipAd-yajamAnaḥ̍ pratiṣṭhityai̍ pa~jca citayO̍ Bavanti pA~gktaḥ puruṣa̍ AtmAnamEva̍ spRuṇOti̍ pa~jca citayO̍ Bavanti pa~jcaBiḥ purIṣairaByU̍hati̍ daśa saM padyantE̍ daśA̱kṣarO vai puruṣO̍ yAvAnEva̍ puruṣastaṅ̍ spRuṇOtyathO̍ daśA̱kṣarA virAḍannaM̍ ~MvirAḍ virAjyEvAnnAdyE prati# tiṣṭhati saM~MvathsarO vai ṣaṣṭhI citiṛRutavaḥ̍ purIṣaṃq̍ ( ) ṣaṭ citayO̍ Bavanti ṣaṭ purIṣAṇi̍ dvAdaśa̍ saM padyantE̍ dvAdaśa̍ mAsA̱ḥ saM~Mvathsaraḥ saM~Mvathsara̍ Eva prati# tiṣṭhati||41

verses.padam: - Padam rOhitaḥ|dhUmrarO̍hita̍ iti# dhUmra - rOhitaḥ|karkandhurOhita̍ iti# karkandhu# - rOhitaḥ|tE|prAjApatyA iti# prAjA - patyAḥ|baBruḥ|aruṇabaBruritya̍ruṇa̍ - baBruḥ|śukabaBruriti̍ śuka# - baBruḥ|tE|raudrAḥ|śyEtaḥ|śyEtAkṣa̍ iti# śyEta - akṣaḥ|śyEtagrIva̍ iti śyEta# - grIvaḥ|tE|pitRudEvatyA# iti# pitRu - dEvatyA̱ḥ|tisraḥ|kRuṣṇAḥ|vaśAḥ|vAruṇyaḥ|tisraḥ|śvEtAḥ|vaśAḥ|saurya̍ḥ|maitrAbAṛqhaspatyA̍ iti# maitrA - bAṛqhaspatyAḥ|dhUmralalAmA̍ iti# dhUmra - lalAmAḥ|tUparAḥ||42 (26) (rOhitaḥ-ṣaḍvaṃ̍śatiḥ)̍ (A11)
verses.samhita: rOhitO̍ dhUmrarOhitaḥ̍ karkandhurOhitastE̍ prAjApatyA̍ baBruraruṇaba̍Bruḥ̍ śukabaBrustE̍ raudrAḥ śyEtaḥ̍ śyEtAkṣaḥ śyEtagrIvastE̍ pitRudEvatyA̱stisraḥ̍ kRuṣṇA vaśA vAruṇya̍stisraḥ̍ śvEtA vaśAḥ sauryO# maitrAbAṛhaspatyA dhUmralalAmAstUparAḥ||42̍ (rOhitaḥ-ṣaḍvaṃ̍śatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: - Padam pRuśniḥ|tiraścIna̍pRuśniriti̍# tiraścIna# - pRuśniḥ|Ud^^rdhvapRuśnirityUd^^rdhva̍ - pRuśniḥ|tE|mArutAḥ|PalgUḥ|lOhitOrṇIti# lOhita - UrṇIḥ|balakṣI|tAḥ|sArasvatyaḥ|pRuṣa̍tI|sthUlapRu̍ṣatIti̍# sthUla - pRuṣatI|kṣudrapRuṣatIti̍# kṣudra-pRuṣatI|tAḥ|vaiśvadEvya# iti# vaiśva - dEvyaḥ|tisraḥ|śyAmAḥ|vaśAḥ|pauṣṇiya̍ḥ|tisraḥ|rOhi̍ṇIḥ|vaśAḥ|maitriya̍ḥ|aindrAbAṛqhaspatyA̍ ityai̱ndrA - bAṛqhaspatyAḥ|aruṇalalAmA̍ ityaruṇa̍ - lalAmAḥ|tUparAḥ||43 (26) (pRuśniḥ - ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A12)
verses.samhita: pRuśni-stiraścIna̍-pRuśnirUrddhva-pRu̍śnistE̍ mArutAḥ̍ PalgUrlOhitOrṇI̍ balakṣI̍ tAḥ sArasvatya̍ḥ̍ pRuṣatI̍ sthUlapRuṣatI̍ kṣudrapRuṣatI̍ tA vai̱śvadEvyastisraḥ̍ śyAmA vaśAḥ pauṣṇiyastisrO̍ rOhiṇIrvaśA̍ maitriya# aindrAbAṛhaspatyA aruṇala̍lAmAstUparAḥ||43̍ (pRuśniḥ - ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: - Padam śitibAhuriti# śiti - bAhuḥ|anyataśśitibAhurityanyata̍ḥ̍ -śitibAhuḥ|samantaśitibAhuriti̍# samanta - śitibAhuḥ|tE|aindravAyavA ityai̱ndra - vAyavAḥ|śitirandhra iti# śiti - randhraḥ|anyata̍śśitirandhra̍ ityanyataḥ̍ - śitirandhraḥ|samantaśitirandhra̍ iti# samanta - śitirandhraḥ|tE|maitrAvaruṇA iti# maitrA - varuṇAḥ|śuddhavAla̍ iti# śuddha-vAlaḥ|sarvaśuddhavAla̍ iti# sarva-śuddhavAlaḥ|maṇivAla̍ iti# maṇi - vAlaḥ|tE|AśvinAḥ|tisraḥ|śilpAḥ|vaśAḥ|vaiśvadEvya# iti# vaiśva - dEvyaḥ|tisraḥ|śyEnI̱ḥ|paramEṣṭhinE̱|sOmApauṣṇA̍ iti# sOmA - pauṣṇAḥ|śyAmalalAmA̍ iti# śyAma - lalAmAḥ|tUparAḥ||44 (25) (śitibAhuḥ pa~jcaviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A13)
verses.samhita: śitibAhu-ranyataśśitibAhuḥ̍ samanta śitibAhusta̍ ai̱ndravAyavAḥ śitirandhrO̍ &nyataśśitirandhraḥ̍ samantaśitirandhrastE̍ mai̱trAvaruṇAḥ śuddhavAlaḥ̍ sarvaśuddhavAlO̍ maṇivAlasta̍ A̱śvinAstisraḥ śilpA vaśA vai̱śvadEvyastisraḥ̍ śyEnI̱ḥ paramEṣṭhinE# sOmApauṣṇAḥ śyAmalalAmAstUparAḥ||44̍ (śitibAhuḥ pa~jcaviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: - Padam unnata ityut̍ - nataḥ|RuṣaBaḥ|vAmanaḥ|tE|aindrAvaruṇA ityai̱ndrA - varuṇAḥ|śitikakuditi̍ śiti# - kakut|śitipRuṣṭha iti# śiti - pRuṣṭhaḥ|śitiBasaditi̍ śiti# - Basat|tE|aindrAbAṛqhaspatyA ityai̱ndrA - bAṛqhaspatyAḥ|śitipAditi# śiti - pAt|śityOṣṭha iti# śiti - Oṣṭhaḥ|śitiBruriti̍# śiti - Bruḥ|tE|aindrAvaiṣṇavA ityai̱ndrA - vaiṣṇavAḥ|tisraḥ|siddhmAḥ|vaśAḥ|vaiśvakarmaṇya# iti# vaiśva-karmaṇyaḥ|tisraḥ|dhAtrE|pRuṣOdarA̍ iti# pRuṣa - udarAḥ|aindrApauṣṇA ityai̱ndrA - pauṣṇAḥ|śyEtalalAmA̍ iti śyEta# - lalAmAḥ|tUparAḥ||45 (25) (unnataḥ pa~jcaviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A14)
verses.samhita: unnata RuṣaBO̍ vAmanasta̍ ai̱ndrAvaruṇAḥ śitikakucCitipRuṣṭhaḥ̍ śitiBasat̍ ta ai̱ndrAbAṛhaspatyAḥ śitipAcCityOṣṭha̍ḥ̍ śitiBrusta ai̱ndrAvaiṣṇavAstisraḥ siddhmA vaśA vai̱śvakarmaṇyastisrO̍ dhAtrE pRuṣOdarA̍ ai̱ndrApauṣṇAḥ śyEtalalAmAstUparAḥ||45̍ (unnataḥ pa~jcaviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: - Padam karṇAḥ|trayaḥ|yAmAḥ|saumyAḥ|traya̍ḥ|śviti~ggAḥ|agnayE̱|yavi̍ṣṭhAya|traya̍ḥ|nakulAḥ|tisraḥ|rOhi̍ṇIḥ|tryavya̍ iti# tri - avyaḥ|tAḥ|vasU̍nAm|tisraḥ|aruṇAḥ|dityauhya̍ḥ|tAḥ|rudrAṇA̱m|sOmaindrA̍ iti# sOma - aindrAḥ|baBrulalAmA̍ iti# baBru - lalAmAḥ|tUparAḥ||46 (23) (karṇAstrayO# - viṃśatiḥ) (A15)
verses.samhita: karṇAstrayO# yAmAḥ saumyAstrayaḥ̍ śviti~ggA agnayE yaviṣṭhAya̍ trayO# nakulAstisrO rOhiṇIstryavyastA̍ vasUnAM̍ tisrO&ruṇA̍ dityauhya̍stA̍ rudrAṇAṃ# sOmaindrA baBrulalAmAstUparAḥ||46̍

verses.padam: - Padam śuṇṭhAḥ|trayaḥ|vaiṣṇavAḥ|adhIlOdhakarṇA̍ ityadhIlOdha̍ - karṇA̱ḥ|trayaḥ|viṣṇa̍vE|urukramAyEtyu̍ru̍ - kramAya|laPsudina̍ḥ|traya̍ḥ|viṣṇa̍vE|urugAyAyEtyu̍ru̍ - gAyAya|pa~jcA̍vIriti̍ pa~jca# - avIḥ|tisraḥ|AdityAnA̱m|trivathsA iti# tri - vathsAḥ|tisraḥ|a~ggirasAm|aindrAvaiṣṇavA̍ ityai̱ndrA - vaiṣṇavAḥ|gauralalAmA̍ iti# gaura - lalAmAḥ|tUparAḥ||47 (20) (śuṇṭhA - viṃśatiḥ)̍ (A16)
verses.samhita: śuṇṭhAstrayO# vaiṣṇavA adhIlOdhakarṇAstrayO̍ viṣṇava̍ urukramAya# laPsudinastrayO viṣṇava̍ urugAyAya pa~jcAvIstisra̍ AdityAnA̱M̍ trivathsA-stisrO-&~ggirasAmaindrAvaiṣṇavA̍ gauralalAmAstUparAḥ||47̍ (śuṇṭhA - viṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: - Padam indrAya|rAjñE̱|traya̍ḥ|śitipRuṣṭhA̍ iti# śiti - pRuṣṭhAḥ|indrAya|adhirAjAyEtya̍dhi̍ - rAjAya|traya̍ḥ|śiti̍kakuda̍ iti śiti# - kakudaḥ|indrAya|svarAjña̍ iti# sva - rAjñE̱|trayaḥ|śiti̍Basada̍ iti śiti# - Basadaḥ|tisraḥ|turyauhyaḥ|sAddhyAnA̱m|tisraḥ|paṣṭhauhya̍ḥ|viśvE̍ṣAm|dEvAnA̱m|AgnEndrAḥ|kRuṣṇala̍lAmA̍ iti# kRuṣṇa - lalAmAḥ|tUparAḥ||48 (22) (indrAya̍ rAjñE - dvAviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A17)
verses.samhita: indrAya̍ rAjñE trayaḥ̍ śitipRuṣṭhA indrAyA-dhirAjAya̍ trayaḥ śitikakuda̍ indrAya̍ svarAjñE trayaḥ śitiBasa-dastisrastu̍ryauhya̍ḥ̍ sAddhyAnA̱M tisraḥ paṣṭhauhyO̍# viśvEṣAM̍ dEvAnAmAgnEndrAḥ̍ kRuṣṇalalAmAstUparAḥ||48̍ (indrAya̍ rAjñE - dvAviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: - Padam adityai|traya̍ḥ|rOhitaitA̍ iti# rOhita - EtAḥ|indrAṇyai|trayaḥ|kRuṣṇaitA̍ iti# kRuṣṇa - EtAḥ|kuhvai̱|trayaḥ|aruṇaitA̍ ityaruṇa̍ - EtAḥ|tisraḥ|dhEnavaḥ|rAkAyai̱|traya̍ḥ|anaḍvAha̍ḥ|sinIvAlyai|AgnAvaiṣṇavA̍ ityA̱gnA - vaiṣṇavAḥ|rOhitalalAmA̍ iti rOhita̍ - lalAmAḥ|tUparAḥ||49 (18)
verses.samhita: adityai̍ trayO# rOhitaitA indrAṇyai̍ trayaḥ̍ kRuṣṇaitAḥ kuhvai̱ trayO&ruṇaitAstisrO̍ dhEnavO# rAkAyai trayO&naḍvAha̍ḥ̍ sinIvAlyA A̱gnAvaiṣṇavA rOhitalalAmAstUparAḥ||49̍

verses.padam: - Padam saumyAḥ|trayaḥ|piśa~ggA̱ḥ|sOmA̍ya|rAjñE̱|traya̍ḥ|sAra~ggA̱ḥ|pArjanyAḥ|naBO̍rUpA̍ iti naBaḥ-rUpAḥ|tisraḥ|ajAḥ|malaḥAḥ|indrAṇyai|tisraḥ|mEṣya̍ḥ|AdityAḥ|dyAvApRuthivyA̍# iti# dyAvA - pRuthivyA̱ḥ|mAla~ggA̱ḥ|tUparAḥ||50 (19) (saumyA - EkAnnaviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A19)
verses.samhita: saumyAstrayaḥ̍ piśaMgAḥ sOmAya̍ rAjñE trayaḥ̍ sAra~ggA̱ḥ pArjanyA naBOrUpAstisrO̍&jA̍ malaḥA indrAṇyai̍ tisrO mEṣya# AdityA dyAvApRuthivyA̍# mAlaMgA̱stUparAḥ||50 (saumyA - EkAnnaviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: - Padam vAruṇAḥ|trayaḥ|kRuṣṇala̍lAmA̍ iti# kRuṣṇa - lalAmAḥ|varuṇAya|rAjñE̱|traya̍ḥ|rOhi̍talalAmA̍ iti rOhita̍ - lalAmAḥ|varuṇAya|riśAda̍sa̍ iti# riśa - adasE|traya̍ḥ|aruṇala̍lAmA̍ ityaruṇa̍ - lalAmAḥ|śilpAḥ|trayaḥ|vaiśvadEvA̍ iti# vaiśva - dEvAḥ|trayaḥ|pRuśna̍yaḥ|sarvadEvatyA̍# iti# sarva - dEvatyA̱ḥ|aindrAsUrA ityai̱ndrA - sUrAḥ|śyEtalalAmA̍ iti śyEta# - lalAmAḥ|tUparAḥ||51 (20) (vAruṇA - viṃśatiḥ)̍ (A20)
verses.samhita: vAruṇAstrayaḥ̍ kRuṣṇalalAmA̍ varuṇAya̍ rAjñE trayO rOhitalalAmA̍ varuṇAya̍ riśAdasE̍ trayO&ruṇala̍lAmAḥ̍ śilpAstrayO# vaiśvadEvAstrayaḥ pRuśnayaḥ̍ sarvadEvatyA# aindrAsUrAḥ śyEtalalAmAstUparAḥ||51̍ (vAruṇA - viṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: - Padam sOmAya|svarAjña̍ iti# sva - rAjñE̱|anOvAhAvityanaḥ̍ - vAhau|anaḍvAhau̱|indrAgniByAmitI̱ndrAgni - ByAm|OjOdAByAmityOjaḥ-dAByA̱m|uṣṭA̍rau|indrAgniByAmitI̱ndrAgni-ByAm|baladAByAmiti̍# bala - dAByA̱m|sIravAhAviti# sIra - vAhau|avI iti|dvE̍ iti|dhEnU̍ iti|BaumI̍ iti|digBya̍ iti# dik - Byaḥ|vaḍabE̍ iti|dvE̍ iti|dhEnU̍ iti|BaumI̍ iti|vairAjI̍ iti|puruṣI̍ iti|dvE̍ iti|dhEnU̍ iti|BaumI̍ iti|vAyavE̱|ArOhaṇavAhAvityA̍rOhaṇa̍ - vAhau|anaḍvAhau̱|vAruṇI iti|kRuṣṇE̍ iti|vaśE̍ iti|arAḍyau̱|divyau|RuṣaBau|parimarAviti̍# pari - marau||52 (34) (sOmAya̍ svarAjñE - catustriṃśat)̍ (A21)
verses.samhita: sOmAya̍ svarAjñE-&nOvAhAva̍naḍvAhA̍-vindrAgniByA̍-mOjOdAByAmuṣṭA̍rA-vindrAgniByA̱M̍ baladAByAṃ# sIravAhAvavI dvE dhEnU BaumI digByO vaḍabE̍ dvE dhEnU BaumI vairAjI̍ puruṣI̍ dvE dhEnU BaumI vayava# ArOhaṇavAhAvanaḍvAhau̍# vAruṇI kRuṣṇE vaśE arAḍyau̍# divyAvRuṣaBau̍ parimarau||52̍ (sOmAya̍ svarAjñE - catustriṃśat)̍

verses.padam: - Padam EkAdaśa|prAtaḥ|gavyAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|Eti̍|laByantE|Cagalaḥ|kalmAṣa̍ḥ|kikidIviḥ|vidIgaya̍ḥ|tE|tvAṣṭrAḥ|saurIḥ|nava̍|śvEtAḥ|vaśAḥ|anUbandhyA̍# ityanu̍ - bandhyA̱ḥ|Bavanti|AgnEyaḥ|aindrAgna ityai̱ndra - agnaḥ|Aśvinaḥ|tE|viśAlayUpa iti# viśAla - yUpE|Eti|laByantE||53̍ (25) (aikAdaśa̍ prAtaḥ - pa~jcaviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A22)
verses.samhita: EkAdaśa̍ prAtargavyAḥ paśava A laByantE̍ Cagalaḥ kalmAṣaḥ̍ kikidIvirvidIgayastE̍ tvAṣṭrAḥ saurIrnava# śvEtA vaśA anUbandhyA̍# BavantyAgnEya ai̱ndrAgna A̱śvinastE viśAlayUpa̍ A laByantE||53̍ (aikAdaśa̍ prAtaḥ - pa~jcaviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: - Padam piśa~ggA̱ḥ|trayaḥ|vAsantAḥ|sAra~ggA̱ḥ|traya̍ḥ|graiṣmA̱ḥ|pRuṣa̍ntaḥ|traya̍ḥ|vAṛṣi̍kAḥ|pRuśna̍yaḥ|traya̍ḥ|śAradAḥ|pRuśnisakthA̍ iti# pRuśni - sakthAḥ|trayaḥ|haima̍ntikAḥ|avaliptA̍ ityava-liptAḥ|traya̍ḥ|śaiśirAḥ|saM~MvathsarAyEti̍# saM - vathsarAya|niva̍kṣasa̍ iti ni - vakṣasaḥ||54 (20) (piśa~ggA# - viṃśatiḥ) (A23) śpecial Korvai for Anuvaakam 12 to 20 rOhitaḥ̍ kRuṣṇA dhUmralalAmAḥ̍ - pRuśniḥ̍ śyAmA aruṇala̍lAmAḥ̍ -śitibAhuḥ śilpAḥ śyEnI̱ḥ śyAmalalAmA̍ - unnataḥ siddhmA dhAtrE pauṣṇAḥ śyEtalalAmAḥ̍ - karṇA baBrulalAmAḥ̍ - śuṇṭhA gauralalAmA̍ - indrAya̍ kRuṣṇAlalAmA̍ - adityai̍ rOhita̍ lalAmaḥ -saumyA mAla~ggA# - vAruṇAḥ sUrAḥ śyEtalalAmA̍ - daśa|Prasna̍ Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 23 Anuvaakams :- (hiraṇyavarṇA̍ - apAM grahA̱n - BUtEṣṭakAḥ - sajUḥ - saM~MvathsaraM̍ - prajApatiḥ̍ sa kṣurapavi̍ - ravagnErvai dIkṣayA# - suvargAya taM ~Myanna - sUyatE̱ - prajApatir̍ RutuBI - rOhitaḥ̍ - pRuśniḥ̍ - śitibAhu - runnataḥ̍ - karṇAḥ - śuṇṭhA - indrAyA- dityai̍ - saumyA - vAruṇAḥ̍ - sOmAyai - kAdaśa̍ - piśa~ggA - strayOviṃśatiḥ)̍ Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (hiraṇyavarṇA̍ - BUtEṣṭakAḥ - CandO yat - kanIyAṃsan-trivRuddhya̍gni̍ - rvAruṇA̍ - ścatuṣpa~jcAśat̍ ) First and Last Padam of śixth Prasnam of 5th Kandam (hiraṇyavarṇA̍ - nivakṣasaḥ)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE pa~jcamakAṇḍE ṣaṣṭhaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||========================================
verses.samhita: piśa~ggAstrayO# vAsantAḥ sAra~ggAstrayO graiṣmAḥ pRuṣantastrayO̍ vAṛṣikAḥ̍ pRuśnayastrayaḥ̍ śAradAḥ pRuśnisakthAstrayO̍ haimantikA̍ avaliptAstrayaḥ̍ śaiśirAḥ saM~MvathsarAya̍ nivakṣasaḥ||54̍ (piśa~ggA# - viṃśatiḥ) (A23) special kOrvai for anuvAkam 12 to 20 rOhitaḥ̍ kRuṣṇA dhUmralalAmAḥ̍ - pRuśniḥ̍ śyAmA aruṇala̍lAmAḥ̍ -śitibAhuḥ śilpAḥ śyEnI̱ḥ śyAmalalAmA̍ - unnataḥ siddhmA dhAtrE pauṣṇAḥ śyEtalalAmAḥ̍ - karṇA baBrulalAmAḥ̍ - śuṇṭhA gauralalAmA̍ - indrAya̍ kRuṣṇAlalAmA̍ - adityai̍ rOhita̍ lalAmaḥ -saumyA mAla~ggA# - vAruṇAḥ sUrAḥ śyEtalalAmA̍ - daśa|praśna̍ kOrvai with starting padams of 1 to 23 anuvAkams :- (hiraṇyavarṇA̍ - apAM grahA̱n - BUtEṣṭakAḥ - sajUḥ - saM~MvathsaraM̍ - prajApatiḥ̍ sa kṣurapavi̍ - ravagnErvai dIkṣayA# - suvargAya taM ~Myanna - sUyatE̱ - prajApatir̍ RutuBI - rOhitaḥ̍ - pRuśniḥ̍ - śitibAhu - runnataḥ̍ - karṇAḥ - śuṇṭhA - indrAyA- dityai̍ - saumyA - vAruṇAḥ̍ - sOmAyai - kAdaśa̍ - piśa~ggA - strayOviṃśatiḥ)̍ kOrvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (hiraṇyavarṇA̍ - BUtEṣṭakAḥ - CandO yat - kanIyAṃsan-trivRuddhya̍gni̍ - rvAruṇA̍ - ścatuṣpa~jcAśat̍ ) first and last padam of sixth praśnam of 5th kAṇḍam (hiraṇyavarṇA̍ - nivakṣasaḥ)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pa~jcamakAṇḍE ṣaṣṭhaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ hariḥ OM 5.7 pa~jcamakAṇḍE saptamaḥ praśnaḥ-upAnuvAkyAvaśiṣṭakarmanirUpaṇaM

verses.padam: - Padam yaḥ|vai|ayathAdEvatamityaya̍thA-dEvatam|agnim|cinutE|Eti̍|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|vRuścyatE|pApI̍yAn|Bavati|yaḥ|yathAdEvatamiti̍# yathA - dEvatam|na|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|Eti|vRuścyatE|vasI̍yAn|Bavati|AgnEyyA|gAyatriyA|prathamAm|citi̱m|aBIti̍|mRuśEt|triṣṭuBA̱ḥ|dvitIyA̱m|jaga̍tyA|tRutIyA̱m|anuṣṭuBEtya̍nu̍ - stuBA̱|caturthIm|pa~gktyA|pa~jcamIm|yathAdEvatamiti# yathA - dEvatam|Eva|agnim|cinutE|na|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|Eti|vRuścyatE|vasI̍yAn|Bavati|iḍA̍yai|vai|EṣA|viBa̍ktiriti̍ vi - Baktiḥ|paśavaḥ|iḍA̱|paśuBiriti̍# paśu-Biḥ|Enam|1 (50)
verses.samhita: yO vA ayathAdEvatamagniM̍ cinuta̍ A dEvatA̱ByO vRuścyatE pApIyAn̍ Bavati yO yathAdEvataM̍ na dEvatA̱Bya A vRuścyatE̍ vasIyAn̍ BavatyAgnEyyA gAyatriyA̍ prathamAM̍ citimaBi̍ mRuśEt̍ triṣṭuBA̱ dvitIyAM jagatyA̍ tRutIyAmanuṣṭuBA̍# caturthIM pa~gktyA pa~jcamIM̍ ~MyathAdEvatamEvAgniM̍ cinutE̍ na dEvatA̱Bya A vRuścyatE̍ vasIyAn̍ BavatIḍAyai̍ vA EṣA viBaktiḥ̍ paśava iḍA# paśuBirEnaM̍ - [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam cinutE|yaḥ|vai|prajApataya̍ iti# prajA - patayE|pratiprOcyEti# prati - prOcya|agnim|cinOti̍|na|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCati|aśvau̱|aBita̍ḥ|tiṣṭhEtAm|kRuṣṇaḥ|uttarata̍ ityut̍ - tarataḥ|śvEtaḥ|dakṣiṇaḥ|tau|AlaByEtyA̱̍ - laBya|iṣṭa̍kAḥ|upEti̍|daddhyAt|Etat|vai|prajApa̍tEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|rUpam|prAjApatya iti# prAjA - patyaḥ|aśvaḥ|sAkṣAditi̍# sa - akṣAt|Eva|prajApataya̍ iti# prajA - patayE|pratiprOcyEti# prati - prOcya|agnim|cinOti|na|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCati|Etat|vai|ahna̍ḥ|rUpam|yat|śvEtaḥ|aśva̍ḥ|rAtri̍yai|kRuṣṇaḥ|Etat|ahna̍ḥ|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -cinutE yO vai prajApatayE̍ prati prOcyAgniM cinOti nA&&*rtimArcCa-tyaśvAvaBita̍stiṣṭhEtAM̍ kRuṣṇa uttarataḥ̍ śvEtO dakṣiṇastAvAlaByEṣṭa̍kA̍ upa# daddhyAdEtadvai prajApatE̍ rUpaM prAjApatyO&śva̍ḥ̍ sAkṣAdEva prajApatayE̍ pratiprOcyAgniM cinOti̍ nA&&*rtimArcCatyEtadvA̍ ahnO# rUpaM ~MyacCvEtO&śvO rAtriyai̍ kRuṣṇa EtadahnO# - [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam rUpam|yat|iṣṭakAḥ|rAtri̍yai|purI̍ṣam|iṣṭa̍kAḥ|upadhAsyannityu̍pa̍ - dhAsyann|śvEtam|aśva̱m|aBIti|mRuśEt|purI̍ṣam|upadhAsyannityu̍pa̍ - dhAsyann|kRuṣṇam|ahOrAtrAByAmityahaḥ̍ - rAtrAByA̱m|Eva|Enam|cinutE|hiraṇyapAtramiti# hiraṇya-pAtram|madhO̱ḥ|pUrṇam|dadAti|madhavyaḥ|asAni|iti̍|sauryA|citravatyEti̍# citra-vatyA|avEti|IkṣatE|citram|Eva|Bavati|maddhyandi̍nE|aśva̱m|avEti̍|GrApayati|asau|vai|Adityaḥ|indra̍ḥ|Eṣaḥ|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|prAjApatya iti# prAjA - patyaḥ|aśvaḥ|tam|Eva|sAkṣAditi̍# sa - akṣAt|RuddhnOti||3 (48) (Ena - mEtadahnO - &ṣṭAcatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A1)
verses.samhita: rUpaM ~MyadiṣṭakA̍ rAtriyai̍ purIṣamiṣṭa̍kA̍ upadhAsya~jCvEta-maśvamaBi̍ mRuśEt̍ purIṣamupadhAsyan̍ kRuṣṇamahOrAtrAByA̍mEvaina̍M̍ cinutE hiraṇya pAtraM madhO̱ḥ pUrṇaM dadAti̍ madhavyO# &sAnIti# sauryA citravatyA&vE̱kṣatE citramEva Bavati̍ maddhyandinE&śvamava# GrApayatyasau vA Aditya̍ indra# Eṣa prajApatiḥ̍ prAjApatyO&śvastamEva sAkṣAdRuddhnOti||3̍ (Ena - mEtadahnO - &ṣṭAcatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam tvAm|agnE|vRuṣaBam|cEkitAnam|puna̍ḥ|yuvA̍nam|janayann̍|upAgAmityu̍pa-̍ AgA̱m||asthUri|naḥ|gAṛhapatyAnIti̍ gAṛha# - patyAni|santu|tigmEna|naḥ|brahma̍ṇA|samiti̍|śiśAdhi||paśava̍ḥ|vai|EtE|yat|iṣṭa̍kAḥ|cityA̱ciMtyAmiti̍ cityA̱M - cityAm|RuṣaBam|upEti|dadhAti|mithunam|Eva|asya|tat|yajñE|karOti|prajana̍nAyEti̍# pra - jananAya|tasmA̱t|yUthEyU̍tha̍ iti# yUthE - yUthE|RuṣaBaḥ||saM~MvathsarasyEti# saM - vathsarasya|pratimAmiti̍# prati - mAm|yAm|tvA|rAtri|upAsata̍ ityupa̍ - AsatE||prajAmiti̍# pra- jAm|suvIrAmiti# su - vIrA̱m|kRutvA|viśva̱m|Ayuḥ|vIti̍|aśnavat||prAjApatyAmiti̍# prAjA - patyAm|4 (50)
verses.samhita: tvAmagnE̍ vRuṣaBaM cEkitAnaM̍ punaryuvAnaM̍ janayannupAgA̱M|asthUri̍ ṇO gAṛhapatyAni̍ santu tigmEna# nO brahmaṇA̍ saṃ śiśAdhi||paśavO̍ vA EtE yadiṣṭakAścityA̱M̍ cityAmRuṣaBamupa# dadhAti mithunamEvAsya tad-yajñE karOti̍ prajananAya̍ tasmA̱d-yUthEyUtha̍ RuṣaBaḥ||saM~Mvathsarasya# pratimAM ~MyAM tvA# rAtryupAsatE|prajAṃ̍ suvIrA̱M kRutvA viśvamAyurvyaśnavat||prAjApatyA̍ - [ ] 4

verses.padam: - Padam EtAm|upEti|dadhAti|iyam|vAva|EṣA|EkAṣṭakEtyE̍ka̍ - aṣṭakA|yat|Eva|EkAṣṭakAyAmityEka̍ - aṣṭakAyA̱m|anna̱m|kriyatE̱|tat|Eva|EtayA̱|avEti|rundhE|EṣA|vai|prajApa̍tEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|kAmaduGEti# kAma - duGA̱|tayA̱|Eva|yajamAnaḥ|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|agnim|duhE|yEna̍|dEvAḥ|jyOti̍ṣA|Ud^^rdhvAḥ|udAyannityu̍t̍ - Ayann|yEna̍|AdityAḥ|vasa̍vaḥ|yEna̍|rudrAḥ||yEna̍|a~ggi̍rasaḥ|mahimAna̱m|Anaśuḥ|tEna̍|Etu|yaja̍mAnaḥ|svasti||suvargAyEti̍# suvaḥ - gAya|vai|Eṣaḥ|lOkAya̍|5̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -mEtAmupa# dadhAtIyaM ~MvA vaiṣaikA̱ṣṭakA yadEvaikA̱ṣṭakAyAmannaM̍ kriyatE tadEvaitayAva# rundha EṣA vai prajApatEḥ̍ kAmaduGA tayaiva yajamAnO&muṣmi̍n̍ ~MlOkE̱&gniM duhE̍ yEna# dEvA jyOtiṣOrddhvA̍ udAyanq yEnA&&dityA̍ vasavO̍ yEna# rudrAḥ|yEnA~ggirasO̍ mahimAna-mAnaśustEnai̍tu̍ yajamAnaḥ̍ svasti||suvargAya vA Eṣa lOkAya# - [ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam cIyatE|yat|agniḥ|yEna|dEvAḥ|jyOti̍ṣA|ud^^rdhvAḥ|udAyannityu̍t-Ayann̍|iti̍|uKya̱m|samiti̍|indhE|iṣṭa̍kAḥ|Eva|EtAḥ|upEti̍|dhattE|vAnaspatyAḥ|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|sama̍ṣṭyA̍ iti saM - aṣṭyai|śatAyudhAyEti̍# śata - AyudhAya|śatavI̱ryAyEti# śata - vIryAya|śatOtaya̍ iti# śata - UtayE|aBimAtiṣAha ityaBimAti̍ - sAhE̱||śatam|yaḥ|naḥ|śaradaḥ|ajI̍tAn|indra̍ḥ|nEṣat|atIti̍|duritAnIti̍# duḥ - itAni|viśvA̱||yE|catvAra̍ḥ|pathaya̍ḥ|dEvayAnA̍ iti# dEva - yAnA̱ḥ|antarA|dyAvApRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|viyantIti# vi - yanti||tEṣA̱m|yaḥ|ajyA̍nim|ajI̍tim|AvahAdityA̱̍ - vahA̱t|tasmai̱|naḥ|dEvAḥ|6 (50)
verses.samhita: cIyatE yadagniryEna# dEvA jyOtiṣOrddhvA̍ udAyannityuKyaṃq samindha̍ iṣṭakA̍ EvaitA upa# dhattE vAnaspatyAḥ suvargasya̍# lOkasya samaṣṭyai̍ śatAyudhAya̍ śatavI̱ryAya śatOtayE̍ &BimAtiṣAhE̱|śataM ~MyO naḥ̍ śaradO ajItAnindrO̍# nEṣadati# duritAni viśvA̱||yE catvAraḥ̍ pathayO# dEvayAnA# antarA dyAvApRuthivI̍ viyanti|tEṣAM̍ ~MyO ajyAni-̍ majIti-mAvahAt̍ tasmai# nO dEvAḥ - [ ] 6

verses.padam: - Padam parIti|datta|iha|sarvE̱||grIṣmaḥ|hEmantaḥ|uta|naḥ|vasantaḥ|śarat|vaṛqṣAḥ|suvitam|naḥ|astu||tEṣA̱m|RutUnAm|śataśA̍radAnAmiti̍# śata - śAradAnAm|nivAta iti# ni - vAtE|EṣAm|aBayE|syAma||iduvathsarAyEtI̍du̍ - vathsarAya|parivathsarAyEti̍# pari - vathsarAya|saM~MvathsarAyEti̍# saM - vathsarAya|kRuṇuta|bRuhat|nama̍ḥ||tEṣA̱m|vayam|sumatAviti̍# su - matau|yajñiyAnAm|jyOk|ajI̍tAḥ|aha̍tAḥ|syAma||BadrAt|naḥ|śrEya̍ḥ|samiti̍|anaiṣṭa|dEvAḥ|tvayA̱|avasEna̍|samiti̍|aśImahi|tvA||saḥ|naḥ|mayOBUriti̍# mayaḥ-BUḥ|pitO iti|7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pari# dattEha sarvE̱||grIṣmO hEmanta̍ uta nO# vasantaḥ śarad varq.ṣAḥ suvitannO̍# astu|tEṣAmRutUnAṃ̍ śata śAradAnAM̍ nivAta EṣAmaBa̍yE̍ syAma||iduvathsarAya# parivathsarAya# saMva~MthsarAya# kRuṇutA bRuhannamaḥ|tEṣA̱M̍ ~Mvayaṃ sumatau̍ yajñiyAnAM̍ jyOgajItA̍ ahatAḥ̍ syAma||BadrAnnaḥ śrEyaḥ samanaiṣṭa̍ dEvAstvayA&vasEna̍ samaśImahi̍ tvA|sa nO# mayO BUḥ pitO̍ - [ ] 7

verses.padam: - Padam Eti|viśasva|śam|tOkAya̍|tanuvE̱|syOnaḥ||ajyA̍nIḥ|EtAḥ|upEti̍|dadhAti|EtAḥ|vai|dEvatA̱ḥ|apa̍rAjitA̍ ityaparA̍ - jitAḥ|tAḥ|Eva|prEti|viśati|na|Eva|jIyatE|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|yat|ad^^rdhamAsA̍ ityad^^rdha̍ - mAsAḥ|mAsA̱ḥ|Rutavaḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|OṣadhIḥ|paca̍nti|atha̍|kasmA̱t|anyABya̍ḥ|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|Agrayaṇam|niriti̍|upyatE|iti̍|EtAḥ|hi|tat|dEvatA̱ḥ|udaja̍yannityu̍t̍ - ajayann|yat|RutuBya̍ ityRutu-Byaḥ|nirvapEditi# niḥ - vapE̱t|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|samadamiti# sa - mada̱m|daddhyAt|Agrayaṇam ( )|nirupyEti# niḥ - upya|EtAḥ|Ahu̍tIrityA-̍ hutIḥ|juhOti|ad^^rdhamAsAnityardha̍ - mAsAn|Eva|mAsAn|RutUn|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM - vathsaram|prIṇAti|na|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|samadamiti# sa - mada̱m|dadhAti|BadrAt|naḥ|śrEyaḥ|samiti̍|anaiṣṭa|dEvAḥ|iti̍|Aha|hutAdyAyEti̍# huta - adyAya|yaja̍mAnasya|apa̍rABAvAyEtyapa̍rA̍ - BAvAya||8 (75) (prajApatyAM - ~MlOkAya# - dEvAḥ - pitO - dadhyAdAgrayaṇaM - pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: A viśasva̍ śaM tOkAya# tanuvE̱ syOnaḥ||ajyAnIrEtA̍ upa# dadhAtyEtA vai dEvatA aparAjitAstA̍ Eva pra viśati̍ naiva jIyatE̍ brahmavAdinO# vadanti yadarddhamAsA̍ mAsA# Rutavaḥ̍ saM~Mvathsara OṣadhIḥ̍ pacantyatha kasmAdanyAByO̍# dEvatA̱Bya AgrayaṇaM nirupyata̍ ityEtA hi tad-dEvatA# udajayanq̍ yadRutuByO# nirvapE̱d dEvatA̱Byaḥ samadaM̍ daddhyAdAgrayaṇaM ( ) nirupyaitA AhutI̍ rjuhOtyarddhamAsAnEva mAsAnRutUnth̍ saM~MvathsaraM̍ prIṇAti̍ na dEvatA̱Byaḥ samadaM̍ dadhAti BadrAnnaḥ śrEyaḥ samanaiṣṭa̍ dEvA ityAha̍ hutAdyAya̍ yajamAnasyA&*pa̍rABAvAya||8̍ (prajApatyAM - ~MlOkAya# - dEvAḥ - pitO - dadhyAdAgrayaṇaM - pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam indrasya|vajra̍ḥ|asi|vArtra̍Gna̍ iti vArtra# - Gnaḥ|tanUpA iti# tanU - pAḥ|naḥ|pratispaśa iti# prati - spaśaḥ||yaḥ|naḥ|purastA̱t|dakṣiṇataḥ|paścAt|uttarata ityut̍ - tarataḥ|aGAyurityaGa̍ - yuḥ|aBidAsatItyaBi̍ - dAsati|Etam|saḥ|aśmA̍nam|RucCatu||dEvAsurA̍ iti# dEva - asurAḥ|saM~MyattA̍ iti saM - yattAḥ|Asann|tE|asurAḥ|digBya̍ iti# dik-Byaḥ|Eti|abAdhanta|tAn|dEvAḥ|iṣvA̱|ca|vajrE̍ṇa|ca|apEti̍|anudanta|yat|vajriṇI̱ḥ|upadadhAtItyu̍pa-dadhA̍ti|iṣvA̱|ca|Eva|tat|vajrE̍ṇa|ca|yaja̍mAnaḥ|BrAtRu̍vyAn|apEti̍|nudatE|dikṣu|upEti̍|9̍ (50)
verses.samhita: indrasya̍ vajrO&si̍ vArtraGnastanUpA̍ naḥ̍ pratispaśaḥ|yO naḥ̍ purastA̱d dakṣiṇataḥ paścA-duttaratO̍-&GAyura̍BidAsa̍tyEtaṃ̍ sO&śmAnamRucCatu||dEvAsurAḥ̍ saM~MyattA̍ Asan tE&surA̍ digBya A&bAdhanta̍ tAn dEvA iṣvA# ca vajrEṇa̍ cApAnudanta̍ yad-vajriṇIrupadadhAtIṣvA̍# caiva tad-vajrEṇa̍ ca yajamAnO̍ BrAtRuvyAnapa̍# nudatE dikṣUpa# - [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam dadhAti|dEvapurA iti# dEva - purAḥ|Eva|EtAḥ|tanUpAnIriti# tanU - pAnI̱ḥ|parIti|UhatE|agnA̍viṣṇU̍ ityagnA̱ - viṣṇU|sajOṣasEti# sa - jOṣasA|imAḥ|vad^^rdhantu|vAm|gira̍ḥ||dyumnaiḥ|vAjE̍Biḥ|Eti̍|gatam||brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|yat|na|dEvatA̍yai|juhva̍ti|atha̍|kidEMqvatyEti̍# kiM - dEvatyA̱|vasO̱ḥ|dhArA̱|iti|agniḥ|vasu̍ḥ|tasya̍|EṣA|dhArA̱|viṣṇu̍ḥ|vasu̍ḥ|tasya̍|EṣA|dhArA̱|AgnAvaiṣṇavyEtyA̱gnA̍ - vaiṣṇavyA|RucA|vasO̱ḥ|dhArA̱m|juhOti|BAgadhEyEnEti# BAga - dhEyEna|Eva|Enau|samiti̍|ad^^rdhayati|athO̍ iti|EtAm|10̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dadhAti dEvapurA EvaitAstanUpAnIḥ̍ paryUhatE̍ &gnAviṣṇU̍ sajOṣasEmA̍ varddhantu̍ vAgiMraḥ|dyumnairvAjE̍BirA̍ gataM||brahmavAdinO̍# vadanti yanna dEvatAyai̍ juhvatyatha# kiM dEvatyA# vasOrddhArEtyagni-rvasustasyaiṣA dhArA viṣṇu-rvasustasyaiṣA dhArA̱ &&gnAvaiṣṇavyarcA vasOrddhArA̱M juhOti BAgadhEyEnaivainau̍ samarddhayatyathO̍# EtA- [ ] 10

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|AhutimityA̍ - hutim|AyatanavatImityAyata̍na̍ - vatIm|karOti|yatkAma̍ iti yat - kAmaḥ|EnAm|juhOti|tat|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|rudraḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|agniḥ|tasya̍|EtE̍ iti|tanuvau̱|GOrA|anyA|śivA|anyA|yat|śatarudrIyamiti̍# śata-rudrIya̱m|juhOti|yA|Eva|asya|GOrA|tanUḥ|tAm|tEna̍|śamayati|yat|vasO̱ḥ|dhArA̱m|juhOti̍|yA|Eva|asya|śivA|tanUḥ|tAm|tEna̍|prIṇAti|yaḥ|vai|vasO̱ḥ|dhArA̍yai|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -mEvAhutimAyata̍navatIM̍ karOti yatkAma̍ EnAM juhOti tadEvAva# rundhE rudrO vA Eṣa yadagnistasyaitE tanuvau# GOrA&nyA śivA&nyA yacCatarudrIya̍M̍ juhOti yaivAsya# GOrA tanUstAM tEna# śamayati yad-vasOrddhArA̱M juhOti yaivAsya# śivA tanUstAM tEna# prIṇAti yO vai vasOrddhArAyai̍ - [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam pratiṣṭhAmiti# prati - sthAm|vEda|pratIti̍|Eva|tiṣṭhati|yat|Ajya̱m|ucCiṣyEtEtyu̍t̍ - śiṣyEta|tasminn̍|brahmaudanamiti̍# brahma - Odanam|pacEt|tam|brAhmaṇAḥ|catvAraḥ|prEti̍|aśnIyuḥ|Eṣaḥ|vai|agniḥ|vaiśvAnaraḥ|yat|brAhmaṇaḥ|EṣA|Kalu̍|vai|agnEḥ|priyA|tanUḥ|yat|vaiśvAnaraḥ|priyAyA̱m|Eva|EnAm|tanuvA̱m|pratIti̍|sthApayati|cata̍sraḥ|dhEnUḥ|dadyAt|tABi̍ḥ|Eva|yaja̍mAnaḥ|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|agnim|duhE||12̍ (46) (upai - tAM - dhArAyai̍ - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: pratiṣṭhAM ~MvEda pratyEva tiṣṭhati̍ yadAjyamucCiṣyE̍ta̍ tasmin̍ brahmaudanaM pacEt̍ taM brA̱hmaṇAścatvAraḥ prAśnIyurEṣa̍ vA agnirvai̱śvAnarO yadbrA̱hmaṇa EṣA Kalu vA agnEḥ priyA tanUryad-vai̱śvAnaraḥ priyAyAmEvainA̱M̍ tanuvAM prati# ṣṭhApayati catasrO̍ dhEnUrdadyAt̍ tABirEva̍ yajamAnO&muṣmi̍n̍ ~MlOkE̱&gniM duhE||12̍ (upai - tAM - dhArAyai̍ - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam citti̱m|juhOmi|manasA|GRutEna̍|iti̍|Aha|adA̱ByA|vai|nAma̍|EṣA|Ahu̍tirityA-hutiḥ|vaiśvakarmaṇIti̍# vaiśva - karmaṇI|na|Enam|cikyAnam|BrAtRuvyaḥ|daBnOti|athO̍ iti|dEvatA̱ḥ|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|agnE̱|tam|adya|iti̍|pa~gktyA|juhOti|pa~gktyA|AhutyEtyA̍ - hutyA|yajñamuKamiti# yajña - muKam|Eti|raBatE|sapta|tE|agnE|samidha̍ iti# saM - idhaḥ|sapta|jihvAḥ|iti̍|Aha|hOtrA̱ḥ|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|agniḥ|dEvEBya̍ḥ|apEti̍|akrAmat|BAgadhEyamiti̍# BAga - dhEya̱m|13 (50)
verses.samhita: cittiM̍ juhOmi manasA̍ GRutEnEtyAhAdA̱ByA vai nAmaiṣA&&*hutirvaiśvakarmaṇI̍ nainaM̍ cikyAnaM BrAtRuvyO̍ daBnOtyathO# dEvatA# EvAva# rundhE &gnE tamadyEti# pa~gktyA juhOti̍ pa~gktyA&&hutyA̍ yajñamuKamA raBatE̍ sapta tE# agnE samidhaḥ̍ saptajihvA ityAha̍ hOtrA# EvAva# rundhE &gnirdEvEByO&pA̱krAmad-BAgadhEya# - [ ] 13

verses.padam: - Padam icCamAnaḥ|tasmai̱|Etat|BAgadhEyamiti̍# BAga - dhEya̱m|prEti|ayacCann|Etat|vai|agnEḥ|agnihOtramitya̍gni̍ - hOtram|Etaṛhi|Kalu̍|vai|Eṣaḥ|jAtaḥ|yaṛhi̍|sarva̍ḥ|citaḥ|jAtAya̍|Eva|asmai|anna̱m|apIti̍|dadhAti|saḥ|Enam|prItaḥ|prIṇAti|vasI̍yAn|Bavati|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma-vAdinaḥ|vadanti|yat|Eṣaḥ|gAṛha̍patya̍ iti gAṛha-patyaḥ|cIyatE̱|atha̍|kva̍|asya|AhavanIya̍ ityA̱ - havanIyaḥ|iti̍|asau|Adityaḥ|iti̍|brUyAt|Etasminn̍|hi|sarvA̱Byaḥ|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|juhva̍ti|14̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -micCamAnastasmA̍# Etad-BAgadhEyaM̍ prAyacCannEtadvA̍ agnEragnihOtramEtaṛhi̍ Kalu vA Eṣa jAtO yaṛhi sarvaścitO̍ jAtAyaivAsmA annamapi# dadhAti sa EnaM̍ prItaḥ prIṇAti̍ vasIyAn̍ Bavati brahmavAdinO# vadanti yadEṣa gAṛhapatyaścIyatE&tha̍ kvA̱syA&&havanIya ityasAvAditya̍ iti# brUyAdEtasminqḥi sarvA̱ByO dEvatA̱ByO juhvati̍ - [ ] 14

verses.padam: - Padam yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|agnim|cinutE|sAkṣAditi# sa - akṣAt|Eva|dEvatA̱ḥ|RuddhnOti|agnE̱|yaśasvinn|yaśasA|imam|arpaya|indrA̍vatImitIndra̍# - vatIm|apacitImityapa̍# - citIm|iha|Eti|vaha||ayam|mUd^^rdhA|paramEṣṭhI|suvarcA̍ iti# su - varcA̱ḥ|samAnAnA̱m|uttamaślOka̍ ityuttama̍ - ślOkaḥ|astu||Badram|paśyantaḥ|upEti̍|sEduḥ|agrE̱|tapa̍ḥ|dIkṣAm|Ruṣa̍yaḥ|suvarvida̍ iti# suvaḥ - vidaḥ||tata̍ḥ|kṣatram|bala̱m|Oja̍ḥ|ca|jAtam|tat|asmai|dEvAḥ|aBi|samiti̍|namantu||dhAtA|vidhAtEti̍# vi - dhAtA|paramA|15 (50)
verses.samhita: ya EvaM ~MvidvAnagniM cinutE̍ sAkṣAdEva dEvatA# RuddhnOtyagnE# yaśasvinq yaśasE̍ mamarpayEndrA̍vatI̍ mapacitI̍ mihA&&vaha|ayaM̍ mUrddhA paramEṣṭhI̍ suvarcA̱ḥ samAnAnAmuttama̍ ślOkO̍ astu||BadraM paśyanta̍ upa# sEduragrE tapO# dIkṣAmRuṣayaḥ̍ suvarvidaḥ|tata̍ḥ̍ kṣatraM balamOjaśca̍ jAtaM tadasmai dEvA aBi saM namantu||dhAtA̍ vidhAtA̍ paramO̍ - [ ] 15

verses.padam: - Padam uta|sadRuMgiti# saM - dRuk|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|paramEṣṭhI|virAjEti# vi - rAjA̱||stOmA̱ḥ|CandAṃsi|nivida̍ iti# ni - vidaḥ|mE|Ahuḥ|Etasmai̱|rAṣṭram|aBi|samiti̍|namAma||aByAva̍rtaddhvamitya̍Bi̍ - Avartaddhvam|upEti̍|mA|Eti̍|ita|sAkam|ayam|śAstA|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|vaḥ|astu||asya|vijñAnamiti# vi - jñAna̱m|anu|samiti̍|raBaddhvam|imam|paścAt|anviti̍|jIvAtha|sarvE̱||rAṣṭraBRuta̍ iti# rAṣṭra - BRutaḥ|EtAḥ|upEti̍|dadhAti|EṣA|vai|agnEḥ|citi̍ḥ|rAṣṭraBRuditi̍# rAṣṭra - BRut|tayA̱|Eva|asminn|rAṣṭram|dadhAti ( )|rAṣṭram|Eva|Bavati|na|asmAt|rAṣṭram|BraṃqśatE||16 (57)
verses.samhita: -ta sandRuk prajApatiḥ̍ paramEṣṭhI virAjA̱|stOmAḥ CandAṃsi̍ nividO# ma AhurEtasmai# rAṣṭramaBi saM namAma||aByAva̍rtaddhvamupa̍ mEta# sAkamayaṃ śAstA&dhipatirvO̍ astu|asya vijñAnamanu saṃ raBaddhvamimaM̍ paścAdanu# jIvAtha sarvE̱||rAṣṭraBRuta# EtA upa# dadhAtyEṣA vA agnEścitI# rAṣṭraBRut tayaivAsmin̍ rAṣṭraM dadhAti̍ ( ) rAṣṭramEva Bavati̍ nAsmA̱d rAṣṭraM BraṃśatE||16̍

verses.padam: - Padam yathA̱|vai|putraḥ|jAtaḥ|mriyatE̱|Evam|vai|Eṣaḥ|mriyatE|yasya|agniḥ|uKya̍ḥ|udvAyatIyu̍t̍ - vAyati|yat|nirmanthya̍miti̍# niḥ - manthya̱m|kuryAt|vIti|CindyAt|BrAtRu̍vyam|asmai|janayEt|saḥ|Eva|puna̍ḥ|parIddhya̍ iti# pari-iddhyaḥ|svAt|Eva|Enam|yOnE̱ḥ|janayati|na|asmai|BrAtRu̍vyam|janayati|tama̍ḥ|vai|Etam|gRuhṇAti|yasya̍|agniḥ|uKya̍ḥ|udvAyatItyu̍t̍ - vAyati|mRutyuḥ|tama̍ḥ|kRuṣṇam|vAsa̍ḥ|kRuṣṇA|dhEnuḥ|dakṣi̍ṇA|tama̍sA|17̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yathA vai putrO jAtO mriyata# EvaM ~MvA Eṣa mriyatE̍ yasyAgniruKya# udvAyati̍ yannirmanthya̍M̍ kuryAd-vicCindyAd-BrAtRu̍vyamasmai̍ janayEth sa Eva punaḥ̍ parIddhyaḥ svAdEvainaM ~MyOnE̱rjanayati nAsmai BrAtRuvyaM̍ janayati tamO vA EtaM gRuhṇAti̍ yasyAgniruKya# udvAyati̍ mRutyustamaḥ̍ kRuṣṇaM ~MvAsaḥ̍ kRuṣṇA dhEnurdakṣiṇA̍ tamasai̍ - [ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|tamaḥ|mRutyum|apEti̍|hatE|hira̍ṇyam|dadAti|jyOti̍ḥ|vai|hira̍ṇyam|jyOti̍ṣA|Eva|tama̍ḥ|apEti̍|hatE|athO̍ iti|tEja̍ḥ|vai|hira̍ṇyam|tEja̍ḥ|Eva|Atmann|dhattE|suva̍ḥ|na|Garmaḥ|svAhA̱|suva̍ḥ|na|arkaḥ|svAhA̱|suva̍ḥ|na|śukraḥ|svAhA̱|suva̍ḥ|na|jyOti̍ḥ|svAhA̱|suva̍ḥ|na|sUrya̍ḥ|svAhA̱|arkaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|agniḥ|asau|Adityaḥ|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -va tamO# mRutyumapa# hatE hiraṇyaM̍ dadAti jyOtirvai hiraṇyaM̍ jyOtiṣaiva̍ tamO&pa# hatE&thO tEjO vai hiraṇyaM̍ tEja# EvA&&*tman dhattE̍ suvarna Garmaḥ svAhA suvarnA&rkaḥ svAhA suvarna śukraḥ svAhA suvarna jyOtiḥ svAhA suvarna sUryaḥ svAhA &rkO vA Eṣa yadagnirasAvAdityO̱̍ - [ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam aśvamEdha ityaśva̍ - mEdhaḥ|yat|EtAḥ|AhutIrityA̍ - hutIḥ|juhOti|arkAśvamEdhayOritya̍rka̍ - aśvamEdhayO̱ḥ|Eva|jyOtIṃṣi|samiti̍|dadhAti|Eṣaḥ|ha|tu|vai|arkAśvamEdhItya̍rka-aśvamEdhI|yasya̍|Etat|agnau|kriyatE̱|Apa̍ḥ|vai|idam|agrE̱|salilam|AsIt|saḥ|EtAm|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prathamAm|citi̱m|apaśyat|tAm|upEti|adhatta|tat|iyam|aBavat|tam|viśvakarmEti̍# viśva - karmA|abravIt|upEti|tvA|Eti̍|ayAni|iti̍|na|iha|lOkaḥ|asti|iti̍|19̍ (50)
verses.samhita: &śvamEdhO yadEtA AhutI̍ rjuhOtyarkA-śvamEdhayO̍rEva̍ jyOtIṃṣi̍ saM dadhAtyEṣa̍ ha tvA arkAśvamEdhI̍ yasyaitadagnau kriyata ApO vA idamagrE# salilamAsIth̍ sa EtAM prajApatiḥ̍ prathamAM citimapaśyat̍ tAmupAdhatta̍ tadiyamaBavat̍ taM ~MviśvakarmA&bravIdupa̍ tvA&&yAnIti nEha lOkO̱&stItya# - [ ] 19

verses.padam: - Padam abravIt|saḥ|EtAm|dvitIyA̱m|citi̱m|apaśyat|tAm|upEti|adhatta|tat|antari̍kṣam|aBavat|saḥ|yajñaḥ|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA - patim|abravIt|upEti|tvA|Eti̍|ayAni|iti̍|na|iha|lOkaḥ|asti|iti̍|abravIt|saḥ|viśvaka̍rmAṇamiti̍# viśva-karmAṇam|abravIt|upEti|tvA|Eti̍|ayAni|iti̍|kEna̍|mA|upaiṣyasItyu̍pa̍ - aiṣyasi|iti̍|diśyA̍Biḥ|iti̍|abravIt|tam|diśyA̍Biḥ|upaidityu̍pa̍ - ait|tAḥ|upEti|adhatta|tAḥ|diśa̍ḥ|20̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -bravIth sa EtAM dvitIyAM citimapaśyat̍ tAmupAdhatta̍ tadantarikṣamaBavath̍ sa yajñaḥ prajApatimabravIdupa̍ tvA&&yAnIti nEha lOkO̱&stItyabravIth̍ sa viśvakarmAṇa-mabravIdupa̍ tvA&&yAnIti kEna# mOpaiṣyasIti diśyABiritya̍bravIt̍ taM diśyABirupait̍ tA upAdhatta̍ tA diśO# - [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam aBavann|saḥ|paramEṣṭhI|prajApatimiti̍# prajA-patim|abravIt|upEti|tvA|Eti̍|ayAni|iti̍|na|iha|lOkaḥ|asti|iti̍|abravIt|saḥ|viśvaka̍rmAṇamiti̍# viśva - karmAṇam|ca|yajñam|ca|abravIt|upEti|vAm|Eti̍|ayAni|iti̍|na|iha|lOkaḥ|asti|iti̍|abrUtAm|saḥ|EtAm|tRutIyA̱m|citi̱m|apaśyat|tAm|upEti̍|adhatta|tat|asau|aBavat|saḥ|Adityaḥ|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA-patim|abravIt|upEti|tvA|21̍ (50)
verses.samhita: &Bavanth sa paramEṣṭhI̍ prajApatimabravIdupa̍ tvA&&*yAnIti nEha lOkO̱&stItyabravIth̍ sa viśvakarmAṇaM̍ ca yajñaM cA̱bravIdupa# vAmA &yAnIti nEha lOkO̱&stItyabrUtAṃq̍ sa EtAM tRutIyAM citimapaśyat̍ tAmupAdhatta̍ tadasAvaBavath̍ sa Adityaḥ̍ prajApati-mabravIdupa̍ tvA - [ ] 21

verses.padam: - Padam Eti|ayAni|iti̍|na|iha|lOkaḥ|asti|iti̍|abravIt|saḥ|viśvaka̍rmAṇamiti̍# viśva - karmAṇam|ca|yajñam|ca|abravIt|upEti|vAm|Eti̍|ayAni|iti̍|na|iha|lOkaḥ|asti|iti̍|abrUtAm|saḥ|paramEṣṭhina̱m|abravIt|upEti̍|tvA|Eti̍|ayAni|iti̍|kEna̍|mA|upaiṣyasItyu̍pa̍ - aiṣyasi|iti̍|lOkaMqpRuṇayEti̍# lOkaM - pRuṇayA̱|iti|abravIt|tam|lOkapRuMqṇayEti̍# lOkaM - pRuṇayA̱|upaidityupa̍ - ait|tasmA̱t|ayAtayAmnItyayA̍ta̍ - yAmnI|lOkapRuMqṇEti# lOkaM - pRuṇA|ayAtayAmEtyayA̍ta̍ - yAmA|hi|asau|22 (50)
verses.samhita: &&yAnIti nEha lOkO̱&stItyabravIth̍ sa viśvakarmAṇaM̍ ca yajñaM cA̱bravIdupa# vAmA&yAnIti nEha lOkO̱&stItyabrUtAṃq̍ sa paramEṣṭhina̍mabravIdupa̍ tvA&&yAnIti kEna# mOpaiṣyasIti# lOkaM pRuṇayEtyabravIt̍ taM ~MlOkaM̍ pRuṇayOpait tasmAdayAtayAmnI̍ lOkaM pRuṇA&yAtayAmA̍ hyasA̍ - [ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam Adityaḥ|tAn|Ruṣayaḥ|abruvann|upEti̍|vaḥ|Eti̍|ayAma|iti̍|kEna̍|naḥ|upaiṣyathEtyu̍pa̍ - aiṣyatha|iti̍|BUmnA|iti̍|abruvann|tAn|dvAByA̱m|citI̱ByAmiti̍# citi# - ByAm|upAyannityupa̍ - Ayann|saḥ|pa~jca̍citIka̍ iti pa~jca-citIkaḥ|samiti̍|apadyata|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|agnim|cinutE|BUyAn̍|Eva|Bavati|aBIti̍|imAn|lOkAn|jayati|viduḥ|Enam|dEvAḥ|athO̍ iti|EtAsA̱m|Eva|dEvatA̍nAm|sAyu̍jyam|gacCati||23̍ (45) (tamasA̍ - &&dityO̱ - &stIti - diśa# - Adityaḥ prajApatimabravIdupa̍# tvA - &sau - pa~jcacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A5)
verses.samhita: -vAdityastAnRuṣa̍yO̍ &bruvannupa# va A&yAmEti kEna# na upaiṣyathEti# BUmnEtyabruvan̍ tAn dvAByAM citI̱ByAmupAyanth sa pa~jcacitIkaḥ̍ samapadyata̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAnagniM cinutE̍ BUyAnEva̍ BavatyaBImAn̍ ~MlOkA~jjayati̍ vidurEnaM̍ dEvA athO# EtAsAmEva̍ dEvatAnAṃq̍ sAyujyaM̍ gacCati||23 (tamasA̍ - &&dityO̱ - &stIti - diśa# - Adityaḥ prajApatimabravIdupa̍# tvA - &sau - pa~jcacatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam vayaḥ|vai|agniḥ|yat|agniciditya̍gni̍ - cit|pakṣiṇaḥ|aśnIyAt|tam|Eva|agnim|adyAt|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCEt|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM - vathsaram|vratam|carEt|saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM - vathsaram|hi|vratam|na|atIti|paśuḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|agniḥ|hinasti̍|Kalu̍|vai|tam|paśuḥ|yaḥ|Enam|purastA̱t|pratya~jca̱m|upacaratItyu̍pa̍ - carati|tasmA̱t|paścAt|prA~g|upacarya̍ ityupa̍ - caryaḥ|Atmana̍ḥ|ahiṃ̍sAyai|tEja̍ḥ|asi|tEja̍ḥ|mE|yacCa|pRuthivIm|yacCa|24̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vayO vA agniryadagnicit̍ pakṣiṇO̱&śnIyAt tamEvAgnimadyAdA-rtimArcCE̱th̍ saM~MvathsaraM ~MvrataM carEth̍ saM~Mvathsaraṃ hi vrataM nAti# paśurvA Eṣa yadagniṛhinasti Kalu vai taM paśurya EnaM̍ purastA̱t pratya~jcamupacara̍ti̍ tasmA̱t paścAt prA~gupacarya̍# AtmanO&hiṃsAyai̍ tEjO&si̍ tEjO# mE yacCa pRuthivIM ~MyacCa̍ - [ ] 24

verses.padam: - Padam pRuthivyai|mA|pAhi|jyOtiḥ|asi|jyOti̍ḥ|mE|yacCa|antari̍kṣam|yacCa|antari̍kṣAt|mA|pAhi|suva̍ḥ|asi|suva̍ḥ|mE|yacCa|diva̱m|yacCa|divaḥ|mA|pAhi|iti̍|Aha|EtABi̍ḥ|vai|imE|lOkAḥ|vidhRu̍tA̍ iti vi - dhRutAḥ|yat|EtAḥ|upadadhAtItyupa̍ - dadhAti|EṣAm|lOkAnA̱m|vidhRu̍tyA̍ iti vi - dhRutyai|svayamAtRuṇṇA iti# svayaM - AtRuṇṇAḥ|upadhAyEtyupa̍ - dhAya|hiraṇyEṣṭakA̍ iti# hiraṇya - iṣṭakAḥ|upEti|dadhAti|imE|vai|lOkAḥ|svayamAtRuṇṇA̍ iti# svayaM-AtRuṇṇAḥ|jyOtiḥ|hira̍ṇyam|yat|svayamAtRuṇṇA̍ iti# svayaM - AtRuṇṇAḥ|upadhAyEtyupa̍ - dhAya|25̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pRuthivyai mA# pAhi jyOtirasi̍ jyOtirmE̍ yacCAntarikṣaM̍ ~MyacCAntarikṣAnmA̍ pAhi suvarasi̍ suvarmE̍ yacCa divaM̍ ~MyacCa divO mA# pAhItyAhaitABirvA̍ imE lOkA vidhRutA̍ yadEtA upadadhA̱tyEṣAM̍ ~MlOkAnAM ~MvidhRutyai̍ svayamAtRuṇṇA upadhAya̍# hiraṇyEṣṭakA upadadhAtImE̍ vai lOkAḥ svayamAtRuṇṇA̍ jyOtirqḥiraṇyaM̍ ~Myath svayamAtRuṇṇA̍ upadhAya̍# - [ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam hiraṇyEṣṭakA iti# hiraṇya - iṣṭakAḥ|upadadhAtItyupa̍ - dadhAti|imAn|Eva|EtABi̍ḥ|lOkAn|jyOti̍ṣmataḥ|kurutE|athO̍ iti|EtABi̍ḥ|Eva|asmai|imE|lOkAḥ|prEti̍|BAnti|yAḥ|tE|agnE|sUryE̱|ruca̍ḥ|udyata̍ ityut̍ - yataḥ|diva̱m|AtanvantItyA̱ - tanvanti|raśmiBiriti̍# raśmi - Biḥ||tABiḥ|sarvA̍Biḥ|rucE|janA̍ya|naḥ|kRudhi||yAḥ|vaḥ|dEvAḥ|sUryE̱|ruca̍ḥ|gOṣu̍|aśvE̍ṣu|yAḥ|ruca̍ḥ||indrA̱gnI̍ itIndra-agnI|tABi̍ḥ|sarvA̍Biḥ|ruca̱m|naḥ|dhatta|bRuhaspatE||ruca̱m|naḥ|dhEhi|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: hiraṇyEṣṭakA upadadhA̍tI-mAnEvaitABi̍-rlOkA-~jjyOti̍ṣmataḥ̍ kurutE&thO# EtABirEvAsmA̍# imE lOkAḥ pra BA̱nti yAstE# agnE sUryE ruca# udyatO divamAtanvanti̍# raśmiBiḥ|tABiḥ̍ sarvABI̍ rucE janAya̍ naskRudhi||yA vO# dEvAḥ sUryE rucO gOṣvaśvEṣu̍ yA rucaḥ|indrA̱gnI̍ tABiḥ sarvABI̍ rucaM̍ nO dhatta bRuhaspatE||rucannO̍ dhEhi - [ ] 26

verses.padam: - Padam brAhmaṇEṣu|ruca̱m|rAjasviti̍ rAja# - su|naḥ|kRudhi||ruca̱m|viśyEṣu|śUdrEṣu̍|mayi̍|dhEhi|rucA|ruca̱m||dvEdhA|vai|agnim|cikyAnasya̍|yaśa̍ḥ|indriyam|gacCati|agnim|vA|citam|IjAnam|vA|yat|EtAḥ|Ahu̍tIrityA̍ - hutIḥ|juhOti|Atmann|Eva|yaśa̍ḥ|indriyam|dhattE|Iśvaraḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|Arti̱m|ArtOrityA̍ - artOḥ|yaḥ|agnim|cinvann|adhikrAmatItyadhi̍ - krAmati|tat|tvA|yAmi|brahma̍ṇA|vanda̍mAnaḥ|iti̍|vAruṇyA|RucA|27̍ (50)
verses.samhita: brAhmaṇEṣu rucaṃq rAjasu̍ naskRudhi|rucaM̍ ~MviśyEṣu̍ śUdrEṣu mayi# dhEhi rucA ruca̱M||dvEdhA vA agniM cikyAnasya̍ yaśa# indriyaM gacCatyagniM̍ ~MvA# citamIjAnaM̍ ~MvA yadEtA AhutIrjuhOtyAtmannEva̍ yaśa# indriyaM dhatta̍ IśvarO vA Eṣa ArtimArtOryO̱&gniM cinvannadhi̍ krAmati̍ tattvA# yAmi brahmaṇA̍ vandamAna̍ iti# vAruṇyarcA - [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam juhuyAt|śAntiḥ|Eva|EṣA|agnEḥ|gupti̍ḥ|Atmana̍ḥ|haviṣkRu̍ta̍ iti# haviḥ - kRutaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yaḥ|agnim|cinutE|yathA̱|vai|haviḥ|skandati|Evam|vai|Eṣaḥ|skandati|yaḥ|agnim|citvA|striya̱m|upaitItyu̍pa̍ - Eti|maitrAvaruṇyEti̍# maitrA - varuṇyA|AmikṣayA|yajEta|maitrAvaruṇatAmiti̍# maitrA - varuṇatA̱m|Eva|upEti|Eti|Atmana̍ḥ|aska̍ndAya|yaḥ|vai|agnim|RutusthAmityRu̍tu̍ - sthAm|vEda|RutuṛRu̍turityRutuḥ̍ - Rutuḥ|asmai|kalpamAnaḥ|Eti|pratIti̍|Eva|tiṣṭhati|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|vai|agniḥ|28 (50)
verses.samhita: juhuyAcCAnti̍rEvaiṣA̍ &gnErguptirAtmanO̍# haviṣkRutO̍ vA Eṣa yO̱&gniM cinutE̍ yathA vai haviḥ skandatyEvaM̍ ~MvA Eṣa skandati̍ yO̱&gniM citvA striyamupaiti̍# maitrAvaruṇyA&&*mikṣayA̍ yajEta maitrAvaruṇatA-̍ mEvOpai̱tyAtmanO &skandAya̍ yO vA agnimRutusthAM̍ ~MvEdartuṛRuturasmai̍ kalpamAna̍ Eti pratyEva tiṣṭhati̍ saM~MvathsarO vA agnir - [ ] 28

verses.padam: - Padam RutusthA ityRutu̍ - sthAḥ|tasya|vasantaḥ|śira̍ḥ|grIṣmaḥ|dakṣi̍ṇaḥ|pakṣaḥ|varq.ṣAḥ|pucCa̱m|śarat|utta̍ra̍ ityut - taraḥ|pakṣaḥ|hEmantaḥ|maddhya̱m|pUrvapakṣA iti# pUrva - pakṣAḥ|citayaḥ|aparapakṣA̍ ityapara̍ - pakṣAḥ|purIṣam|ahOrAtrAṇItya̍haḥ-rAtrAṇi̍|iṣṭa̍kAḥ|Eṣaḥ|vai|agniḥ|RutusthA̍ ityRutu̍ - sthAḥ|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|RutuṛRu̍turityRutuḥ̍ - Rutuḥ|asmai|kalpamAnaḥ|Eti|pratIti̍|Eva|tiṣṭhati|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|vai|Etam|jyaiṣṭhyakAma̍ iti jyaiṣṭhya# - kAmaḥ|nIti|adhatta|tata̍ḥ|vai|saḥ|jyaiṣṭhya̱m|agacCat|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|agnim|cinutE̍ ( )|jyaiṣṭhya̱m|Eva|gacCati||29 (53)
verses.samhita: RutusthAstasya̍# vasantaḥ śirO̱ grIṣmO dakṣiṇaḥ̍ pakṣO varq.ṣAḥ pucCaṃ# śaraduttaraḥ̍ pakṣO hEmantO̍ maddhyaM̍ pUrvapakṣA-ścitayO&parapakṣAḥ̍ purIṣa-mahOrAtrAṇIṣṭa̍kA̍ Eṣa vA agniṛRutusthA̍ ya EvaM ~MvEdartuṛRuturasmai̍ kalpamAna̍ Eti pratyEva tiṣṭhati̍ prajApatirvA̍ EtaM jyaiṣṭhyakAmO̍ nyadhatta̍ tatO vai sa jyaiṣṭhyamagacCadya̍ EvaM ~MvidvAnagniM cinutE̍ ( ) jyaiṣṭhyamEva̍ gacCati||29̍

verses.padam: - Padam yat|AkUtAdityA̍ - kUtAt|samasusrOditi̍# saM - asusrOt|hRudaḥ|vA|mana̍saḥ|vA|saMBRu̍tamiti̍ saM - BRutam|cakṣuṣaḥ|vA||tam|anu̍|prEti̍|ihi|sukRutasyEti̍# su - kRutasya|lOkam|yatra̍|Ruṣa̍yaḥ|prathamajA̍ iti# prathama-jAḥ|yE|purAṇAḥ||Etam|sadhasthEti# sadha - stha|parIti|tE|dadAmi|yam|AvahAdityA̱̍ - vahA̱t|śEvadhimiti# śEva - dhim|jAtavEdA̍ iti# jAta - vEdAḥ||anvAgantEtyanu-AgantA|yajñapa̍tiriti̍# yajña-patiḥ|vaḥ|atra|tam|sma|jAnIta|paramE|vyO̍manniti̍ vi-Omann||jAnItAt|Enam|paramE|vyOmanniti̍ vi - Omann|dEvA̱ḥ|sadhasthA iti# sadha - sthAḥ|vida|rUpam|asya||yat|AgacCAdityA̱ - gacCA̱t|30 (50)
verses.samhita: yadAkUtAth̍ samasusrOddhRudO̍ vA manasO̍ vA saMBRutaM̍ cakṣuṣO̍ vA|tamanu prEhi# sukRutasya# lOkaM ~Myatraṛṣayaḥ̍ prathamajA yE purAṇAḥ||Etaṃ̍ sadhastha̍ pari# tE dadAmi yamAvahA̱cCEvadhiM jAtavEdAḥ|anvAgantA̍ yajñapatirvO̍ atra taṅ sma# jAnIta paramE vyOmann||jAnItAdE̍naM̍ paramE vyOman̍ dEvA̱ḥ sadhasthA vida rUpamasya|yadAgacCA̱t̍ - [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam pathiBiriti# pathi - Biḥ|dEvayAnairiti# dEva - yAnai̱ḥ|iṣṭApUrtE itI̱ṣṭA-pUrtE|kRuṇutAt|Aviḥ|asmai||sam|prEti|cyavaddhvam|anviti̍|sam|prEti̍|yAta|agnE̱|pathaḥ|dEvayAnAniti̍# dEva - yAnAn|kRuṇuddhvam||asminn|sadhastha̍ iti# sadha - sthE|adhIti|utta̍rasminnityut̍ - tarasminn|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|yajamAnaḥ|ca|sIdata||prastarEṇEti̍# pra - starEṇa|paridhinEti̍# pari - dhinA̱|srucA|vEdyA̱|ca|barqḥiṣA̱||RucA|imam|yajñam|naḥ|vaha|suvaḥ|dEvEṣu̍|ganta̍vE||yat|iṣṭam|yat|parAdAnamiti̍# parA - dAna̱m|yat|dattam|yA|ca|dakṣiṇA||tat|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pathiBirdEvayAnai̍riṣṭApUrtE̍ kRuṇutAdAvira̍smai||saM̍ pra cyavaddhvamanu̍ saM pra yAtAgnE# pathO dEvayAnA̱n̍ kRuṇuddhvaM|asminth sadhasthE addhyuttarasmin̍ viśvE# dEvA yajamAnaśca̍ sIdata||prastarEṇa# paridhinA̱ srucA vEdyA# ca barqḥiṣA̱|RucEmaM ~MyajñaM nO# vaha suvardEvEṣu̍ gantavE||yadiṣṭaM̍ ~Myat parAdAnaM̍ ~MyaddattaM ~MyA ca dakṣiṇA|ta̍ - [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam agniḥ|vaiśvakarmaṇa iti# vaiśva - karmaṇaḥ|suvaḥ|dEvEṣu̍|naḥ|dadhat||yEna̍|sahasra̱m|vaha̍si|yEna̍|agnE|sarvavEdasamiti̍# sarva - vEdasam||tEna|imam|yajñam|naḥ|vaha|suva̍ḥ|dEvEṣu̍|ganta̍vE||yEna̍|agnE|dakṣi̍ṇAḥ|yuktAḥ|yajñam|vaha̍nti|Rutvija̍ḥ||tEna̍|imam|yajñam|naḥ|vaha|suva̍ḥ|dEvEṣu̍|ganta̍vE||yEna̍|agnE|sukRuta̍ iti# su - kRutaḥ|pathA|madhO̱ḥ|dhArA̱ḥ|vyAnaśuriti̍# vi - Anaśuḥ||tEna|imam|yajñam|naḥ|vaha|suva̍ḥ|dEvEṣu̍|ganta̍vE̍ ( )||yatra|dhArA̱ḥ|ana̍pEtA̍ ityanapa̍ - itAḥ|madhO̱ḥ|GRutasya|ca|yAḥ||tat|agniḥ|vaiśvakarmaṇa̍ iti# vaiśva - karmaṇaḥ|suvaḥ|dEvEṣu̍|naḥ|dadhat||32̍ (64)
verses.samhita: -dagnirvai̱śvakarmaṇaḥ suvardEvEṣu̍# nO dadhat||yEnA# sahasraM ~Mvahasi̍ yEnA̱gnE sarvavEdasaM|tEnEmaM ~MyajñaM nO# vaha suvardEvEṣu̍ gantavE||yEnA̱gnE̍ dakṣiṇA̍ yuktA yajñaM ~MvahantyRutvija̍ḥ|tEnEmaM̍ ~MyajñaM nO# vaha suvardEvEṣu̍ gantavE||yEnA̱gnE̍ sukRutaḥ̍ pathA madhOrddhArA̱ vyAnaśuḥ|tEnEmaM ~MyajñaM nO# vaha suvardEvEṣu̍ gantavE̍ ( )||yatra dhArA anapEtA̍ madhO̱rGRutasya# ca yAḥ|tadagnirvai̱śvakarmaṇaḥ suvardEvEṣu̍# nO dadhat||32

verses.padam: - Padam yAḥ|tE|agnE|samidha iti# saM - idhaḥ|yAni̍|dhAma̍|yA|jihvA|jAtavEda̍ iti# jAta-vEdaḥ|yaḥ|arciḥ||yE|tE|agnE|mEḍayaḥ|yE|inda̍vaḥ|tEBi̍ḥ|AtmAna̱m|cinuhi|prajAnanniti̍# pra - jAnann||uthsannayajña ityuthsanna̍ - yajñaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|agniḥ|kim|vA|aha|Etasya̍|kriyatE̱|kim|vA|na|yat|vai|addhvaryuḥ|agnEḥ|cinvann|antarEtIya̍ntaḥ̍ - Eti|Atmana̍ḥ|vai|tat|antaḥ|Eti|yAḥ|tE|agnE|samidha̍ iti# saM - idhaḥ|yAni̍|33̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yAstE# agnE samidhO yAni dhAma yA jihvA jAtavEdO̍ yO arciḥ|yE tE# agnE mEḍayO ya indavastEBi̍rAtmAna̍M̍ cinuhi prajAnann||uthsannayajñO vA Eṣa yadagniḥ kiM ~MvA&haitasya# kriyatE kiM ~MvA na yadvA addhvaryu-ragnEścinvanna̍-ntarEtyAtmanO̍ vai tadantarEti̍ yAstE# agnE samidhO yAni - [ ] 33

verses.padam: - Padam dhAma|iti̍|Aha|EṣA|vai|agnEḥ|svayaMqcitiriti̍# svayaM - citiḥ|agniḥ|Eva|tat|agnim|cinOti|na|addhvaryuḥ|Atmanaḥ|antaḥ|Eti|cata̍sraḥ|AśA̱ḥ|prEti̍|carantu|agnaya̍ḥ|imam|naḥ|yajñam|nayatu|prajAnanniti̍# pra - jAnann||GRutam|pinvann|ajara̱m|suvIramiti̍# su-vIra̱m|brahma|samiditi̍# saM - it|Bavati|AhutInAmityA̍ - hutInAm||suvargAyEti# suvaḥ - gAya|vai|Eṣaḥ|lOkAya̍|upEti̍|dhIyatE|yat|kUrmaḥ|cata̍sraḥ|AśA̱ḥ|prEti̍|carantu|agnaya̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|34̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dhAmEtyAhaiṣA̍ vA agnEḥ svayaM̍ citiragnirEva tadagniM cinOti̍ nAddhvaryurAtmanO&ntarEti̍ catasra̍ AśAḥ pracarantvagnaya̍# imaM nO# yajñaM nayatu̍ prajAnann|GRutaM pinvannajaraṃ̍# suvIraM brahma# samid-BavatyAhu̍tInAM||suvargAya̍ vA Eṣa lOkAyOpa# dhIyatE yat kUrmaścatasra̍ AśAḥ pra carantvagnaya̍ ityAha̍ - [ ] 34

verses.padam: - Padam diśaḥ|Eva|EtEna̍|prEti̍|jAnAti|imam|naḥ|yajñam|nayatu|prajAnanniti̍# pra - jAnann|iti|Aha|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|aBinI̱tyA̍ ityaBi-nItyai|brahma|samiditi̍# saM - it|Bavati|AhutInAmityA̍ - hutInAm|iti|Aha|brahma̍ṇA|vai|dEvAḥ|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Ayann|yat|brahmaṇvatyEti̍ brahmaṇ# - vatyA|upadadhAtItyupa̍ - dadhAti|brahma̍ṇA|Eva|tat|yaja̍mAnaḥ|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Eti|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|agniḥ|tasya|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|paśavaḥ|CandAṃ̍si|rUpam|sarvAn̍|varṇAn̍|iṣṭa̍kAnAm̍ ( )|kuryAt|rUpEṇa|Eva|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|paśUn|CandAṃsi|avEti̍|rundhE|athO̍ iti|prajABya̍ iti# pra - jAByaḥ|Eva|Enam|paśuBya̍ iti# paśu-Byaḥ|CandO̱Bya iti Candaḥ̍ - Byaḥ|avaruddhyEtyava̍ - ruddhya|cinutE||35̍ (66) (yAnya - gnaya ityAhE - ṣṭakAnAṃq̍ - ṣOḍaśa̍ ca) (A8)
verses.samhita: diśa# EvaitEna pra jAnAtImaM̍ nO# yajñaM nayatu̍ prajAnannityAha̍ suvargasya# lOkasyABinI̱tyai brahma# samid-BavatyAhu̍tInA-mityA̍ha̍ brahmaṇA̍ vai dEvAḥ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyanq̍ yad-brahmaṇvatyOpadadhA̍ti̍ brahmaṇaiva̍ tad-yajamAnaḥ̍ suvargaM ~MlOkamEti̍ prajApatirvA̍ Eṣa yadagnistasya# prajAḥ paśavaḥ CandAṃsi̍ rUpaṃ sarvAnq varṇAniṣṭakAnAM̍ ( ) kuryAd rUpEṇaiva prajAM paśUn CandAṅqsyava# rundhE&thO̱ prajABya# EvainaM̍ paśuByaḥ CandO̱ByO &varuddhya# cinutE||35

verses.padam: - Padam mayi|gRuhṇAmi|agrE̱|agnim|rAyaḥ|pOṣA̍ya|suprajAstvAyEti̍# suprajAḥ - tvAya|suvIryAyEti̍# su - vIryAya||mayi̍|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|mayi|varca̍ḥ|dadhAmi|ari̍ṣṭAḥ|syAma|tanuvA̱|suvIrA̍ iti# su - vIrA̱ḥ||yaḥ|naḥ|agniḥ|pitaraḥ|hRuthsviti# hRut - su|antaḥ|amartyaḥ|martyAn̍|AvivEśEtyA̱̍ - vivEśa||tam|Atmann|parIti̍|gRuhṇImahE|vayam|mA|saḥ|asmAn|avahAyEtya̍va̍ - hAya|parEti̍|gAt||yat|addhvaryuḥ|Atmann|agnim|agRu̍hItvA|agnim|cinuyAt|yaḥ|asya|svaḥ|agniḥ|tam|apIti̍|36̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mayi# gRuhṇAmyagrE# agniṃ rAyaspOṣAya̍ suprajAstvAya# suvIryAya|mayi̍# prajAM mayi varcO# dadhAmyariṣṭAḥ̍ syAma tanuvA# suvIrA̱ḥ||yO nO# agniḥ pitarO̍ hRuthsvantarama̍rtyO̍ martyAṃ# AvivEśa|tamAtman̍ pari# gRuhṇImahE vayaM mA sO asmAṃ avahAya̍ parA# gAt||yadaddhvaryurAtmannagnima-gRu̍hItvA&gniM̍ cinuyAdyO̱&sya̍ svO̱&gnistamapi - [ ] 36

verses.padam: - Padam yajamAnAya|cinuyAt|agnim|Kalu̍|vai|paśava̍ḥ|anu̍|upEti̍|tiṣṭhantE|apakrAmu̍kA̍ ityapa̍ - krAmukAḥ|asmAt|paśava̍ḥ|syuḥ|mayi̍|gRuhṇAmi|agrE̱|agnim|iti̍|Aha|Atmann|Eva|svam|agnim|dAdhAra|na|asmAt|paśava̍ḥ|apEti̍|krAmanti|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma-vAdinaḥ|vadanti|yat|mRut|ca|Apa̍ḥ|ca|agnEḥ|anAdyam|atha̍|kasmA̱t|mRudA|ca|adBiritya̍t-Biḥ|ca|agniḥ|cIyatE|iti̍|yat|adBiritya̍t̍ - Biḥ|saM~MyautIti# saM - yauti|37̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yajamAnAya̍ cinuyAdagniM Kalu vai paśavO&nUpa# tiṣṭhantE&pakrAmukA̍ asmAt paśavaḥ̍ syurmayi# gRuhṇAmyagrE# agnimityAhA&&tmannEva̍ svamagniM dAdhAra̍ nAsmA̱t paśavO&pa# krAmanti brahmavAdinO# vadanti yanmRuccA&&paścAgnEra̍nAdyamatha̍ kasmA̱nmRudA cAdBiścAgniścIyata̍ iti yadadBiḥ saM ~Myau - [ ] 37

verses.padam: - Padam Apaḥ|vai|sarvA̱ḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|dEvatA̍Biḥ|Eva|Enam|samiti̍|sRujati|yat|mRudA|cinOti̍|iyam|vai|agniḥ|vaiśvAnaraḥ|agninA̱|Eva|tat|agnim|cinOti|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|yat|mRudA|ca|adBiritya̍t̍ - Biḥ|ca|agniḥ|cIyatE̱|atha|kasmA̱t|agniḥ|ucyatE|iti̍|yat|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|cinOti|agnaya̍ḥ|vai|CandAṃ̍si|tasmA̱t|agniḥ|ucyatE|athO̍ iti|iyam|vai|agniḥ|vaiśvAnaraḥ|yat|38̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -tyApO vai sarvA# dEvatA# dEvatABirEvainaṃq̍ saṃ sRujati̍ yanmRudA cinOtIyaM ~MvA agnirvai̱śvAnarO̱&gninaiva tadagniM cinOti̍ brahmavAdinO# vadanti yanmRudA cAdBiścAgniścIyatE&tha kasmAdagniru̍cyata̍ iti yacCandOBi-ścinOtyagnayO̍ vai CandAṃsi̍ tasmAdagniru̍cyatE&thO̍# iyaM ~MvA agnirvai̱śvAnarO ya - [ ] 38

verses.padam: - Padam mRudA|cinOti|tasmA̱t|agniḥ|ucyatE|hiraṇyEṣṭakA̍ iti# hiraṇya - iṣṭakAḥ|upEti|dadhAti|jyOti̍ḥ|vai|hira̍ṇyam|jyOti̍ḥ|Eva|asminn|dadhAti|athO̍ iti|tEja̍ḥ|vai|hira̍ṇyam|tEja̍ḥ|Eva|Atmann|dhattE|yaḥ|vai|agnim|sarvatO̍muKamiti̍# sarvataḥ̍ - muKam|cinutE|sarvAsu|prajAsviti̍# pra - jAsu|anna̱m|atti|sarvA̱ḥ|diśa̍ḥ|aBIti̍|jayati|gAyatrIm|purastA̱t|upEti̍|dadhAti|triṣṭuBa̱m|dakṣiṇataḥ|jaga̍tIm|paścAt|anuṣṭuBamitya̍nu-stuBa̱m|uttarata̍ ityut-tarataḥ|pa~gktim|maddhya̱|Eṣaḥ|vai̍ ( )|agniḥ|sarvatOmuKa̍ iti# sarvataḥ̍ - muKaḥ|tam|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|cinutE|sarvAsu|prajAsviti̍# pra-jAsu|anna̱m|atti|sarvA̱ḥ|diśa̍ḥ|aBIti̍|jayati|athO̍ iti|diśi|Eva|diśa̱m|prEti̍|vayati|tasmA̱t|diśi|dik|prOtEti̍ pra - utA||39 (75) (api-saM~Myauti̍-vaiśvAnarO̍ ya-dEṣa vai-pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A9)
verses.samhita: -nmRudA cinOti tasmAdagniru̍cyatE̍ hiraṇyEṣṭakA upa# dadhAti jyOtirvai hiraṇyaM̍ jyOtirEvA&smi̍n̍ dadhAtyathO tEjO vai hiraṇyaM̍ tEja# EvA&&*tman dhattE̍ yO vA agniṃ sarvatOmuKaM̍ cinutE sarvAsu̍ prajAsvannamatti̍ sarvA diśO&Bi jayati̍ gAyatrIM purastAdupa# dadhAti triṣṭuBaM̍ dakṣiṇatO jagatIM̍ paścAdanuṣṭuBa̍muttarataḥ̍ pa~gktiM maddhya# Eṣa vA ( ) agniḥ sarvatOmuKastaM̍ ~Mya EvaM ~MvidvAṅścinutE̍ sarvAsu̍ prajAsvannamatti̍ sarvA diśO&Bi jayatyathO̍# diśyEva̍ diśaM pra vayati̍ tasmA̱d-diśi dik prOtA̱||39 (api-saM~Myauti̍-vaiśvAnarO̍ ya-dEṣa vai-pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|agnim|asRujata|saḥ|asmAt|sRuṣṭaḥ|prA~g|prEti|adravat|tasmai̱|aśva̱m|pratIti̍|Asyat|saḥ|dakṣiṇA|Eti̍|avartata|tasmai̱|vRuṣṇim|pratIti̍|Asyat|saḥ|pratya~g|Eti̍|avartata|tasmai̱|RuṣaBam|pratIti̍|Asyat|saḥ|uda~g̍|Eti̍|avartata|tasmai̱|bastam|pratIti̍|Asyat|saḥ|Ud^^rdhvaḥ|adravat|tasmai̱|puru̍ṣam|pratIti̍|Asyat|yat|paśuśIrq.ṣAṇIti̍# paśu - śIrq.ṣAṇi|upadadhAtItyu̍pa̍ - dadhAti|sarvata̍ḥ|Eva|Enam|40̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prajApatiragnima̍sRujata̍ sO̱&smAth sRuṣṭaḥ prA~g prA&*dravat̍ tasmA aśvaM pratyA̱syath sa dakṣiṇA&&va̍rtata̍ tasmai# vRuṣṇiM pratyA̱syath sa pratya~g~gA&vartata̍ tasmA# RuṣaBaM pratyA̱syath sa uda~g~gA&vartata̍ tasmai̱ bastaM pratyA̱syath sa UrddhvO̱&dravat tasmai puruṣaM̍ pratyA̱syadyat paśuśIrq.ṣAṇyu̍padadhA̍ti̍ sarvata# Evaina# - [ ] 40

verses.padam: - Padam avaruddhyEtyava̍ - ruddhya|cinutE|EtAḥ|vai|prAṇaBRuta̍ iti# prAṇa - BRutaḥ|cakṣu̍ṣmatIḥ|iṣṭa̍kAḥ|yat|paśuśIṛqṣAṇIti̍# paśu - śIṛqṣAṇi|yat|paśuśIṛqṣAṇIti̍# paśu - śIṛqṣAṇi|upadadhAtItyu̍pa̍ - dadhAti|tABi̍ḥ|Eva|yaja̍mAnaḥ|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|prEti̍|aniti|athO̍ iti|tABi̍ḥ|Eva|asmai|imE|lOkAḥ|prEti̍|BAnti|mRudA|aBilipyEtya̍Bi̍ - lipya|upEti̍|dadhAti|mEddhyatvAyEti̍# mEddhya-tvAya|paśuḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|agniḥ|anna̱m|paśava̍ḥ|Eṣaḥ|Kalu̍|vai|agniḥ|yat|paśuśIṛqṣAṇIti̍# paśu-śIṛqṣAṇi|yam|kAmayE̍ta|kanI̍yaḥ|asya|anna̱m|41̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mavaruddhya# cinuta EtA vai prAṇaBRuta-ścakṣu̍ṣmatIriṣṭa̍kA̍ yat paśuśIṛṣAṇi̍ yat paśuśIṛṣAṇyu̍padadhA̍ti̍ tABirEva̍ yajamAnO&muṣmi̍n̍ ~MlOkE prAṇityathO tABirEvAsmA̍# imE lOkAḥ pra BA̱nti mRudA&BilipyOpa# dadhAti mEddhyatvAya# paśurvA Eṣa yadagnirannaM̍ paśava# Eṣa Kalu vA agniryat paśuśIrq.ṣAṇi̍ yaM kAmayEta̍ kanIyO&syAnnaṅ̍# - [ ] 41

verses.padam: - Padam syAt|iti|sataMqrAmiti̍# saM - tarAm|tasya|paśuśIṛqṣAṇIti̍# paśu - śIṛqṣAṇi|upEti̍|daddhyAt|kanI̍yaḥ|Eva|asya|anna̱m|Bavati|yam|kAmayE̍ta|samAva̍t|asya|anna̱m|syAt|iti̍|maddhyataḥ|tasya̍|upEti̍|daddhyAt|samAva̍t|Eva|asya|anna̱m|Bavati|yam|kAmayE̍ta|BUya̍ḥ|asya|anna̱m|syAt|iti̍|antE̍ṣu|tasya̍|vyudUhyEti̍# vi - udUhya|upEti̍|daddhyAt|antataḥ|Eva|asmai|anna̱m|avEti̍|rundhE|BUya̍ḥ|asya|anna̱m|Bavati̍ ( )||42 (50)
verses.samhita: syAditi# saMtarAM tasya# paśuśIrq.ṣAṇyupa# daddhyAt kanIya̍ EvAsyAnnaM̍ Bavati yaM kAmayEta̍ samAvadasyAnnaṅ̍# syAditi# maddhyatastasyOpa# daddhyAth samAva-dEvAsyAnna̍M̍ Bavati yaM kAmayEta̍ BUyO&syA&nnaṅ# syAdityantEṣu̍ tasya# vyudUhyOpa# daddhyAdantata EvAsmA annamava# rundhE BUyO&syAnnaM̍ Bavati ( )||42

verses.padam: - Padam stEgAn|daṅṣṭrA̱ByAm|maṇḍUkAn|jaMByE̍Biḥ|Ada̍kAm|KAdEna̍|Urja̱m|saṃqsUdEnEti̍# saM-sUdEna|ara̍ṇyam|jAMbI̍lEna|mRuda̱m|barsvE̍Biḥ|śarka̍rABiḥ|ava̍kAm|ava̍kABiḥ|śarka̍rAm|uthsAdEnEtyu̍t̍ - sAdEna|jihvAm|avakrandEnEtya̍va̍ - krandEna|tAlu̱m|sara̍svatIm|jihvAgrEṇEti̍# jihvA - agrEṇa||43̍ (22) (stEgAn - dvAviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A11)
verses.samhita: stEgAn daṅṣṭrA̱ByAM maṇḍUkAn jaMByEBirAda̍kAM-KAdEnOrjaṃ̍# saṃ sUdEnA*&raṇyaM̍ jAMbIlEna̍ mRudaM̍ baṛsvEBiḥ̍ śarkarABirava̍kAmava̍kABiḥ̍ śarkarAmuthsAdEna̍# jihvAmavakrandEna̍ tAluṃq sarasvatIM̍ jihvAgrEṇa||43̍ (stEgAn - dvAviṃśatiḥ)̍
