verses.padam: - Padam vAja̱m|hanU̱ByAmiti hanu# - ByAm|apaḥ|AsyEna|AdityAn|śmaśru̍Biriti̍ śmaśru# - Biḥ|upayAmamityupa̍ - yAmam|adharEṇa|OṣṭhE̍na|sat|utta̍rEṇEtyut̍ - tarEṇa|antarEṇa|anUkAśamitya̍nu̍ - kAśam|prakAśEnEti# pra - kAśEna|bAhya̱m|stanayitnum|nirbAdhEnEti̍# niḥ-bAdhEna|sUryAgnI̍ iti# sUrya-agnI|cakṣurByAmiti̍ cakṣuḥ̍ - ByAm|vidyutAviti# vi - dyutau̱|kanAnakAByAm|aśani̱m|mastiṣkE̍ṇa|bala̱m|majjaBiriti̍# majja - Biḥ||44 (25) (vAjaM pa~jcaviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A12)
verses.samhita: vAjaṃq hanU̱ByAmapa AsyEnA&&*dityA-~jCmaśru̍Bi-rupayAma-madha̍rEṇOṣṭhE̍na̍ saduttarEṇAnta̍rEṇA-nUkAśaM̍ prakAśEna̍ bAhyaṅ# stanayitnuM nirbAdhEna̍# sUryAgnI cakṣurByAM̍ ~Mvidyutau# kanAnakAByAmaśani̍M̍ mastiṣkEṇa̍ balaM̍ majjaBiḥ||44̍ (vAjaM pa~jcaviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: - Padam kUrmAn|śaPaiḥ|acCalABiḥ|kapi~jja̍lAn|sAma̍|kuṣṭhi̍kABiḥ|javam|ja~gGA̍Biḥ|agadam|jAnu̍ByAmiti̍ jAnu-ByAm|vIrya̱m|kuhAByA̱m|Bayam|pracAlAByAmiti̍# pra - cAlAByA̱m|guhA̱|upapakṣAByAmityupa̍ - pakṣAByA̱m|aśvinau̱|aṃsA̱ByAm|aditim|śIrṣṇA|niṛRu̍timiti̍ niḥ - Rutim|nirjA̱lmakEnEti niḥ-jAlmakEna|śIrṣṇA||45 (23) (kUrmAn-trayOviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A13)
verses.samhita: kUrmA-~jCaPairacCalABiḥ̍ kapi~jjalAnthsAma̍ kuṣṭhikABirjavaM̍ ja~gGABiragadaM̍ jAnuByAM̍ ~MvIryaM̍ kuhAByA̱M BayaM pracAlAByAM̍ guhOpapakṣAByA̍-maśvinAvaṃ̍ sA̱ByAmaditiṃ̍ śIrṣṇA niṛRutiM̍ nirjA̱lmakEna śIrṣṇA||45 (kUrmAn-trayOviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: - Padam yOktra̱m|gRuddhrABiḥ|yugam|Ana̍tEnEtyA̍ - natEna|cittam|manyABiḥ|sakrOMqśAniti̍# saM - krOśAn|prAṇairiti# pra - anaiḥ|prakAśEnEti# pra - kAśEna|tvaca̱m|parAkAśEnEti̍# parA - kAśEna|anta̍rAm|maśakAn̍|kEśai̱ḥ|indra̱m|svapasEti̍# su - apasA|vahE̍na|bRuhaspati̱m|śakunisAdEnEti̍# śakuni - sAdEna|ratha̱m|uṣṇihA̍Biḥ||46̍ (21) (yOktra - mEkaviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A14)
verses.samhita: yOktraM gRuddhrABiryugamAna̍tEna̍ cittaM manyABiḥ̍ saMkrOśAn prAṇaiḥ prakAśEna̍ tvacaM̍ parAkAśEnAntarAM̍ maśakAn kEśairindraṅq svapasA̍ vahEna̍ bRuhaspatiṃ# śakunisAdEna rathamuṣṇihA̍Biḥ||46̍ (yOktra - mEkaviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: - Padam mitrAvaruṇAviti̍# mitrA - varuṇau|śrOṇI̱ByAmiti̍ śrOṇi# - ByAm|indrAgnI itI̱ndra - agnI|śiKaṇḍAByA̱m|indrAbRuhaspatI itIndrA̱ - bRuhaspatI̱|UruByAmityUru - ByAm|indrAviṣṇU itIndrA̱ - viṣṇU̱|aṣṭhIvadByAmityaṣṭhIvat̍ - ByAm|savitAra̱m|pucCEna|gandharvAn|śEpE̍na|aPsarasa̍ḥ|muṣkAByA̱m|pava̍mAnam|pAyunA̱|pavitra̱m|pOtrA̱ByAm|Akrama̍ṇamityA̱̍ - kramaṇam|sthUrAByA̱m|pratikrama̍ṇamiti̍# prati - kramaṇam|kuṣṭhA̱ByAm||47̍ (22) (mitrAvaruṇau̍ - dvAviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A15)
verses.samhita: mitrAvaruṇau̍ śrOṇI̱ByAmindrAgnI śiKaṇḍAByA-mindrAbRuhaspatI̍# UruByAmindrAviṣṇU# aṣṭhIvadByAṃ# savitAraM pucCEna̍ gandharvA~jCEpEnA-PsarasO̍# muṣkAByAM pavamAnaM̍ pAyunA# pavitraM pOtrA̱ByAmAkramaṇaṅ̍ sthUrAByA̱M pratikramaṇaM̍ kuṣṭhA̱ByAM||47 (mitrAvaruṇau̍ - dvAviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: - Padam indrasya|krOḍaḥ|adi̍tyai|pAjasya̱m|diśAm|jatrava̍ḥ|jImUtAn̍|hRudayaupaśAByAmiti̍# hRudaya - aupaśAByA̱m|antarikṣam|puritatA̱|naBa̍ḥ|udaryE̍ṇa|indrAṇIm|plIhnA|valmIkAn̍|klOmnA|girIn|plAśiBiriti̍# plAśi-Biḥ|samudram|udarEṇa|vaiśvAnaram|Basma̍nA||48̍ (22)
verses.samhita: indrasya̍ krOḍO &dityai̍ pAjasyaM̍ diśAM jatravO# jImUtA̱n hRudayaupaśAByA-mantari̍kṣaM̍ puritatA naBa# udaryEṇEndrAṇIM̍ plIhnA valmIkA̱n klOmnA girIn plAśiBiḥ̍ samudramudarEṇa̍ vaiśvAnaraM BasmanA||48̍

verses.padam: - Padam pUṣṇaḥ|vaniṣṭhuḥ|andhAhErityandha-ahEḥ|sthUragudEti̍# sthUra - gudA|sarpAn|gudABiḥ|RutUn|pRuṣṭIBiriti̍# pRuṣṭi - Biḥ|diva̱m|pRuṣṭhEna|vasU̍nAm|prathamA|kIka̍sA|rudrAṇA̱m|dvitIyA̱|AdityAnA̱m|tRutIyA̱|a~ggi̍rasAm|caturthI|sAddhyAnA̱m|pa~jcamI|viśvE̍ṣAm|dEvAnA̱m|ṣaṣṭhI||49̍ (24) (pUṣṇa - ścaturviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A17)
verses.samhita: pUṣṇO vaniṣṭhura̍ndhAhEḥ̍ sthUragudA̍ sarpAn gudABiṛ̍ RutUn pRuṣṭIBirdivaM̍ pRuṣṭhEna vasUnAM̍ prathamA kIkasA̍ rudrAṇA̱M dvitIyA# &&dityAnA̱M tRutIyA &~ggirasAM̍ caturthI sAddhyAnA̱M pa~jcamI viśvEṣAM̍ dEvAnAṃ# ṣaṣṭhI||49 (pUṣṇa - ścaturviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: - Padam Ojaḥ|grIvABi̍ḥ|niṛRu̍timiti̍ niḥ-Rutim|asthaBirityastha-Biḥ|indra̱m|svapasEti# su - apasA|vahE̍na|rudrasya̍|vicala̍ iti# vi - calaḥ|skandhaḥ|ahOrAtrayOrityahaḥ̍ - rAtrayO̱ḥ|dvitIyaḥ|ad^^rdhamAsAnAmitya̍d^^rdha̍ - mAsAnA̱m|tRutIyaḥ|mAsAm|caturthaḥ|RutUnAm|pa~jcamaḥ|saM~MvathsarasyEti̍# saM - vathsarasya|ṣaṣṭhaḥ||50̍ (20) (OjO# - viṃśatiḥ) (A18)
verses.samhita: OjO̱ grIvABir-niṛRutimasthaBirindraṅq̍ svapasA̍ vahEna̍ rudrasya# vicalaḥ skandhO# &hOrAtrayO̱rdvitIyO̱ &rddhamAsAnA̱M tRutIyO# mAsAM caturtha̍ RutUnAM̍ pa~jcamaḥ̍ saM~Mvathsarasya̍# ṣaṣṭhaḥ||50

verses.padam: - Padam AnandamityA̱ - nandam|nandathunA|kAma̱m|pratyAsAByAmiti̍# prati - AsAByA̱m|Bayam|śitImaByAmiti# śitIma - ByAm|praśiṣamiti# pra - śiṣa̱m|praśAsAByAmiti# pra - śAsAByA̱m|sUryAcandramasAviti# sUryA - candramasau̱|vRukyA̱ByAm|śyAmaśabalAviti# śyAma - śabalau|matasnAByAm|vyu̍ṣṭimiti̍ vi-uṣṭim|rUpEṇa|nimru̍ktimiti̍ ni-mruktim|arUpEṇa||51̍ (16) (Anandaṃ - ṣOḍaśa)̍ (A19)
verses.samhita: AnandaM nandathunA̍ kAmaM̍ pratyAsAByA̱M Bayaṃ śitImaByA̱M̍ praśiṣaM̍ praśAsAByAṃ# sUryAcandramasau vRukyA̱ByAṅ śyAmaśabalau matasnAByAM̍ ~Mvyuṣṭiṃ̍ rUpEṇa nimruktimarU̍pEṇa||51̍ (Anandaṃ - ṣOḍaśa)̍

verses.padam: - Padam ahaḥ|mAṃqsEna̍|rAtri̱m|pIva̍sA|apaḥ|yUṣEṇa̍|GRutam|rasE̍na|śyAm|vasa̍yA|dUṣIkA̍Biḥ|hrAduni̱m|aśru̍Birityaśru̍# - Biḥ|pRuṣvA̱m|diva̱m|rUpEṇa|nakṣa̍trAṇi|prati̍rUpEṇEti̍ prati# - rUpEṇa|pRuthivIm|carmaṇA|CavIm|CavyA̱|upAkRu̍tAyEtyu̍pa̍ - AkRutAya|svAhA̱|Ala̍bdhAyEtyA̍ - labdhAya|svAhA̱|hutAya|svAhA̱||52̍ (28) (ahara̍ - ṣṭAviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A20)
verses.samhita: aharmAṃqsEna̍ rAtriM pIvasA&pO̍ yUṣEṇa# GRutaṃ rasEna̍ śyAM ~MvasayA̍ dUṣIkABi-rhrAduni-maśru̍Biḥ̍ pRuṣvAM divaṃ# rUpEṇa nakṣatrAṇi̍ pratirUpEṇa̍ pRuthivIM carmaṇA̍ CavIM CavyO# pAkRutAya̍ svAhA &&labdhAya̍ svAhA# hutAya svAhA̱||52 (ahara̍ - ṣṭAviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: - Padam agnEḥ|pakṣatiḥ|sarasvatyai|nipa̍kṣatiriti̍ ni-pakṣatiḥ|sOmasya|tRutIyA̱|apAm|caturthI|Oṣa̍dhInAm|pa~jcamI|saM~MvathsarasyEti̍# saM - vathsarasya|ṣaṣṭhI|marutA̱m|saptamI|bRuhaspatE̱ḥ|aṣṭamI|mitrasya̍|navamI|varu̍ṇasya|daśamI|indra̍sya|EkAdaśI|viśvE̍ṣAm|dEvAnA̱m|dvAdaśI|dyAvA̍pRuthivyOriti̍ dyAvA̱-pRuthivyOḥ|pArśvam|yamasya|pAṭUraḥ||53̍ (29) (agnE-rEkAnna triṃqśat) (A21)
verses.samhita: agnEḥ pakṣatiḥ̍ sarasvatyai̍ nipakṣatiḥ̍ sOmasya̍ tRutIyA&pAM caturthyOṣa̍dhInAM̍ pa~jcamI saM~Mvathsarasya̍# ṣaṣṭhI marutAṃ# saptamI bRuhaspatEraṣṭamI̍ mitrasya# navamI varuṇasya̍ daśamIndrasyaikAdaśI̍ viśvEṣAM̍ dEvAnA̱M dvAdaśI dyAvApRuthivyOḥ̍ pArśvaM ~Myamasya# pAṭUraḥ||53

verses.padam: - Padam vAyOḥ|pakṣatiḥ|sarasvataḥ|nipa̍kṣatiriti̍ ni - pakṣatiḥ|candramasaḥ|tRutIyA̱|nakṣa̍trAṇAm|caturthI|savituḥ|pa~jcamI|rudrasya̍|ṣaṣṭhI|sarpAṇA̱m|saptamI|aryamṇaḥ|aṣṭamI|tvaṣṭu̍ḥ|navamI|dhAtuḥ|daśamI|indrAṇyAḥ|EkAdaśI|adi̍tyai|dvAdaśI|dyAvA̍pRuthivyOriti̍ dyAvA̱ - pRuthivyOḥ|pArśvam|yamyai̱|pAṭUraḥ||54 (28) (vAyO - raṣṭAviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A22)
verses.samhita: vAyOḥ pakṣatiḥ̍ sarasvatO̍ nipakṣati-ścandrama̍sa-stRutIyA̍ nakṣatrAṇAM̍ caturthI savituḥ̍ pa~jcamI̍ rudrasya# ṣaṣṭhI sarpAṇAṃ# saptamyaryamṇO̱&ṣṭamI̍ tvaṣṭurnavamI̍ dhAturdaśamIndrAṇyA̍ EkAdaśyadi̍tyai̍ dvAdaśI dyAvApRuthivyOḥ̍ pArśvaM ~Myamyai# pAṭUraḥ||54 (vAyO - raṣṭAviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: - Padam panthA̱m|anUvRugByAmityanUvRuk̍ - ByAm|saMtatimiti̍ saM-tatim|snAvanyA̱ByAm|śukAn|pittEna̍|harimAṇa̱m|yaknA|halI̱kṣṇAn|pApavAtEnEti̍# pApa - vAtEna|kUśmAn|śaka̍Biriti̍ śaka# - Biḥ|śavartAn|UvaddhyEna|śuna̍ḥ|viśasa̍nEnEti̍# vi - śasanEna|sarpAn|lOhitagandhEnEti̍# lOhita - gandhEna|vayAṃ̍si|pakvagandhEnEti̍# pakva - gandhEna|pipIli̍kAḥ|praśAdEnEti̍# pra - śAdEna||55̍ (22) (panthAM - dvAviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A23)
verses.samhita: panthAmanUvRugByAṃq̍ saMtatiṅ̍ snAvanyA̱ByAṃq śukA̱n pittEna# harimAṇaM̍ ~MyaknA halI̱kṣṇAn pApavAtEna# kUśmA~jCakaBiḥ̍ śavartAnUvaddhyEna̍ śunO# viśasanEna̍ sarpAn ~MlOhitagandhEna̍ vayAṃsi̍ pakvagandhEna# pipIlikAḥ̍ praśAdEna||55̍ (panthAM - dvAviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: - Padam kramai̱ḥ|atIti|akramIt|vAjI|viśvai̱ḥ|dEvaiḥ|yajñiyai̱ḥ|saM~MvidAna̍ iti# saM - vidAnaḥ||saḥ|naḥ|naya|sukRutasyEti# su - kRutasya|lOkam|tasya̍|tE|vayam|svadhayEti̍# sva-dhayA̱|madEma||56 (18)
verses.samhita: kramairatyakramId-vAjI̍ viśvai̱rdEvairyajñiyai̱ḥ saM~MvidAnaḥ|sa nO# naya sukRutasya# lOkaM tasya# tE vayaṅ svadhayA# madEma||56

verses.padam: - Padam dyauḥ|tE|pRuṣṭham|pRuthivI|sadhasthamiti# sadha - stham|AtmA|antarikṣam|samudraḥ|yOni̍ḥ|sUrya̍ḥ|tE|cakṣu̍ḥ|vAta̍ḥ|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|candramA̱ḥ|śrOtra̱m|mAsA̱ḥ|ca|ad^^rdhamAsA ityad^^rdha̍ - mAsAḥ|ca|parvAṇi|Rutava̍ḥ|a~ggA̍ni|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|mahimA||57 (25) (dyau - pa~jcaviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A25)
verses.samhita: dyaustE# pRuṣṭhaM pRuthivI̍ sadhasthamAtmAntari̍kṣaṃ̍ samudrO yOniḥ sUryastE̍ cakṣurvAtaḥ̍ prAṇaścandramAḥ śrOtraM mAsA̱ścArddhamAsAśca parvA̱ṇyRutavO~ggAni̍ saM~MvathsarO mahimA||57̍ (dyau - pa~jcaviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: - Padam agniḥ|paśuḥ|AsIt|tEna|ayajanta|saḥ|Etam|lOkam|ajayat|yasminn̍|agniḥ|saḥ|tE|lOkaḥ|tam|jEṣyasi|atha̍|avEti̍|jiGra|vAyuḥ|paśuḥ|AsIt|tEna̍|ayajanta|saḥ|Etam|lOkam|ajayat|yasminn̍|vAyuḥ|saḥ|tE|lOkaḥ|tasmA̱t|tvA|antaḥ|EṣyAmi|yadi̍|na|avajiGrasItya̍va-jiGra̍si|Adityaḥ|paśuḥ|AsIt|tEna̍|ayajanta|saḥ|Etam|lOkam|ajayat|yasminn̍# ( )|Adityaḥ|saḥ|tE|lOkaḥ|tam|jEṣyasi|yadi|avajiGrasItya̍va̍ - jiGrasi||58̍ (58) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 26 Anuvaakams :- (yO vA ayathAdEvata̍ - ntvAmagna̍ - indrasya̍ - cittiM - ~MyathA vai - vayO vai - yadAkUtAd̍ - yAstE# agnE - mayi# gRuhṇAmi - prajApatiḥ̍ sO̱&smAth - stEgAn - vAjaM̍ - kUrmAn - yOktraM̍ - mitrAvaruṇA̍ - vindrasya̍ - pUṣṇa - Oja# - Ananda - maha# - ragnE - rvAyOḥ - panthAM - kramai - rdyaustE - &gniḥ paśurAsIth̍ - ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ)̍ Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (yO vA - EvA&&huti̍ - maBavan - pathiBi# - ravarudhyA# - &&nanda - maṣṭau pa~jcaśat̍ ) First and Last Padam of śeventh Prasnam Of 5th Kandam :- (yO vA ayathAdEvataM̍ - ~MyadyavajiGra̍si̍ ) Kaanda Korvai with starting Padams of 7 Prasanams Of Kandam 5:- ( sAvitrAṇi - viṣṇumuKA̍ - uthsannayajñO - dEvAsurA̍ - yadEkEna̍ - hiraṇyavarṇA̍ - yO vA-̍ sapta )||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE pa~jcamakAṇḍE saptamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||||iti pa~jcamaM kAṇḍaM||========================================
verses.samhita: agniḥ paśurAsIt̍ tEnAyajanta̍ sa EtaM ~MlOkamajayad-yasmi̍nnagniḥ̍ sa tE# lOkastaM jE̱ṣyasyathAva# jiGra vAyuḥ paśurAsIt̍ tEnAyajanta̍ sa EtaM ~MlOkamajayad-yasmi̍n̍ vAyuḥ sa tE# lOkastasmA̱t tvA&ntarE̱ṣyAmi yadi nAvajiGrasyAdityaḥ̍ paśurAsIt̍ tEnAyajanta̍ sa EtaM ~MlOkamajayad̍ yasmi# -( )-nnAdityaḥ sa tE# lOkastaM jE̱ṣyasi yadyavajiGra̍si||58̍ praśna kOrvai with starting padams of 1 to 26 anuvAkams :- (yO vA ayathAdEvata̍ - ntvAmagna̍ - indrasya̍ - cittiM - ~MyathA vai - vayO vai - yadAkUtAd̍ - yAstE# agnE - mayi# gRuhṇAmi - prajApatiḥ̍ sO̱&smAth - stEgAn - vAjaM̍ - kUrmAn - yOktraM̍ - mitrAvaruṇA̍ - vindrasya̍ - pUṣṇa - Oja# - Ananda - maha# - ragnE - rvAyOḥ - panthAM - kramai - rdyaustE - &gniḥ paśurAsIth̍ - ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ)̍ kOrvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (yO vA - EvA&&huti̍ - maBavan - pathiBi# - ravarudhyA# - &&nanda - maṣṭau pa~jcaśat̍ ) first and last padam of seventh praśnam of 5th kAṇḍam :- (yO vA ayathAdEvataM̍ - ~MyadyavajiGra̍si̍ ) KAṇḍa kOrvai with starting padams of 7 Prasanams of kAṇḍam 5:- ( sAvitrAṇi - viṣṇumuKA̍ - uthsannayajñO - dEvAsurA̍ - yadEkEna̍ - hiraṇyavarṇA̍ - yO vA-̍ sapta )||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pa~jcamakAṇḍE saptamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||||iti pa~jcamaM kAṇḍaM||===========================

verses.padam: - Padam prAcInavaṃśamiti̍# prAcIna# - vaṃqśam|karOti|dEvamanuṣyA iti# dEva - manuṣyAḥ|diśaḥ|vIti̍|aBajanta|prAcI̱m|dEvAḥ|dakṣiṇA|pitara̍ḥ|pratIcI̱m|manuṣyA̱ḥ|udI̍cIm|rudrAḥ|yat|prAcIna̍vaṃśamiti̍# prAcIna# - vaṃqśam|karOti|dEvalOkamiti̍# dEva - lOkam|Eva|tat|yajamAnaḥ|upAva̍rtata̍ ityupa̍ - AvartatE|parIti̍|śrayati|antaṛhi̍ta̍ ityantaḥ - hitaḥ|hi|dEvalOka iti# dEva - lOkaḥ|manuṣyalOkAditi# manuṣya - lOkAt|na|asmAt|lOkAt|svEtavyamiti̍ su - Etavyam|iva|iti|Ahuḥ|kaḥ|hi|tat|vEda̍|yadi̍|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|asti̍|vA|na|vA|iti̍|dikṣu|atIkAśAn|karOti|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prAcInavaṃśaM̍ karOti dEvamanuṣyA diśO vyaBajanta̍ prAcI̱M dEvA dakṣiṇA̍ pitaraḥ̍ pratIcI̱M manuṣyA# udIcIṃ̍ rudrA yat prAcInavaṃśaM̍ karOti# dEvalOkamEva tad-yajamAna̍ upAvartatE̍ pari# śrayatyantaṛhitOhi̍ dEvalOkO̍ manuṣyalOkA-nnAsmAllOkAth̍ svEtavyamivEtyA̍huḥ̍ kO hi tad-vEda yad-yamuṣmi~MllOkE&sti̍# vA na vEti# dikṣvatI̍ kAśAn karO̍ - [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam uBayO̱ḥ|lOkayO̱ḥ|aBijityA̍ ityaBi - jityai|kEśaśmaśrviti# kEśa-śmaśru|vapatE|naKAni|nIti̍|kRuntatE|mRutA|vai|EṣA|tvak|amEddhyA|yat|kEśaśmaśrviti̍# kEśa - śmaśru|mRutAm|Eva|tvaca̱m|amEddhyAm|apahatyEtyapa-hatya̍|yajñiya̍ḥ|BUtvA|mEdha̱m|upEti̍|Eti|a~ggi̍rasaḥ|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|yantaḥ|aPsvitya̍p-su|dIkṣAtapasI̍ iti# dIkṣA-tapasI̱|prEti|avEśayann|aPsvitya̍p-̍ su|snAti|sAkṣAditi# sa - akṣAt|Eva|dIkṣAtapasI iti# dIkṣA - tapasI̱|avEti|rundhE|tIrthE|snAti|tIrthE|hi|tE|tAm|prEti̍|avE̍śayann|tIrthE|snAti|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -tyuBayO̱rlOkayO-raBiji̍tyai̍ kEśaśmaśru vapatE̍ naKAni ni kRuntatE̍ mRutA vA EṣA tvagamEddhyA̍ yat kEśaśmaśru̍ mRutAmEva tvacama-mEddhyAma̍pahatya̍# yajñiyO# BUtvA mEdhamupaitya~ggirasaḥ̍ suvargaM ~MlOkaM ~MyantO&Psu dI̱kṣAtapasI prAvEśayannaPsu̍ snAti̍ sAkṣAdEva dI̱kṣAtapasI ava# rundhE tIrthE snAti̍ tIrthE hi tE tAM prAvEśayan̍ tIrthE snAti̍ - [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam tIrtham|Eva|samAnAnA̱m|Bavati|apaḥ|aśnAti|antarataḥ|Eva|mEddhyaḥ|Bavati|vAsa̍sA|dIkṣayati|saumyam|vai|kṣauma̱m|dEvata̍yA|sOma̱m|Eṣaḥ|dEvatA̱m|upEti̍|Eti|yaḥ|dIkṣa̍tE|sOma̍sya|tanUḥ|asi|tanuva̱m|mE|pAhi|iti̍|Aha|svAm|Eva|dEvatA̱m|upEti̍|Eti|athO̍ iti|AśiṣamityA̱̍ - śiṣa̱m|Eva|EtAm|Eti|śAstE|agnEḥ|tUṣAdhAnamiti̍# tUṣa - AdhAna̱m|vAyOḥ|vAtapAnamiti# vAta-pAna̱m|pitRuṇAm|nIviḥ|OṣadhInAm|praGAta̍ iti# pra - GAtaḥ|3 (50)
verses.samhita: tIrthamEva samAnAnA̱M̍ BavatyapO̱&śnAtyantarata Eva mEddhyO# Bavati vAsasA̍ dIkṣayati saumyaM ~Mvai kṣaumaM̍ dEvatayA̍ sOmamEṣa̍ dEvatAmupaiti̍ yO dIkṣatE̍ sOmasya̍ tanUrasi̍ tanuvaM̍ mE pAhItyAha̍ svAmEva dEvatAmupaityathO# AśiṣamEvaitAmA̍ śA̱stE &gnEstUṣAdhAna̍M̍ ~MvAyOrvAtapAna̍M̍ pitRuṇAM nIvirOṣadhInAM̍ praGAta - [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam AdityAnA̱m|prAcInatAna iti# prAcIna - tAnaḥ|viśvEṣAm|dEvAnA̱m|Otu̍ḥ|nakṣa̍trAṇAm|atIkAśAḥ|tat|vai|Etat|sarvadEvatya̍miti̍# sarva - dEvatya̱m|yat|vAsaḥ|yat|vAsa̍sA|dIkṣaya̍ti|sarvA̍Biḥ|Eva|Enam|dEvatA̍Biḥ|dIkṣayati|bahiḥprA̍ṇa̍ iti# bahiḥ - prAṇaḥ|vai|manuṣyaḥ|tasya̍|aśa̍nam|prAṇa̍ iti# pra -anaḥ|aśnAti|saprA̍ṇa̍ iti sa - prAṇaḥ|Eva|dIkṣatE|Aśitaḥ|Bavati|yAvAn̍|Eva|asya|prAṇa̍ iti# pra -anaḥ|tEna|saha|mEdha̱m|upEti̍|Eti|GRutam|dEvAnA̱m|mastu̍|pitRuṇAm|niṣpa̍kvamiti̍ niḥ - pakvam|manuṣyAṇAm|tat|vai|4̍ (50)
verses.samhita: AdityAnA̱M̍ prAcInatAnO viśvEṣAM̍ dEvAnAmOtu rnakṣatrAṇA-matIkAśAstadvA̍ Etath sarva̍ dEvatyaM̍ ~Myad-vAsO yad-vAsasA̍ dIkṣayati̍ sarvABirEvaina̍M̍ dEvatABi-rdIkṣayati̍ bahiḥprAṇO̍ vai manuṣya̍sta-syAśa̍naM̍ prAṇO̱-&śnAti saprAṇa̍ Eva dI̱kṣata AśitO̍ Bavati yAvAnEvAsya̍# prAṇastEna# saha mEdhamupaiti̍ GRutaM dEvAnAM mastu# pitRuṇAM niṣpakvaM̍ manuṣyAṇAM̍ tadvA - [ ] 4

verses.padam: - Padam Etat|sarvadEvatyamiti̍# sarva - dEvatya̱m|yat|navanItamiti̍ nava# - nItam|yat|navanItEnEti̍ nava# - nItEna|aBya~gkta ityaBi̍ - a~gktE|sarvA̱ḥ|Eva|dEvatA̱ḥ|prIṇAti|pracyuta̍ iti pra - cyutaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|asmAt|lOkAt|agataḥ|dEvalOkamiti̍# dEva - lOkam|yaḥ|dIkṣitaḥ|antarA|iva|navanItamiti̍ nava# - nItam|tasmA̱t|navanItEnEti̍ nava# - nItEna|aBIti|a~gktE|anulOmamitya̍nu̍ - lOmam|yajuṣA|vyAvRu̍ttyA̍ iti# vi - AvRuttyai|indra̍ḥ|vRutram|ahann|tasya̍|kanIni̍kA|parEti̍|apatat|tat|A~jja̍namityA̱-a~jja̍nam|aBavat|yat|A~gkta̍ ityA̱ - a~gktE|cakṣuḥ|Eva|BrAtRu̍vyasya|vRu~gktE|dakṣi̍ṇam|pUrva̱m|Eti̍|a~gktE|5̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Etath sarvadEvatya̍M̍ ~MyannavanItaM̍ ~MyannavanItEnABya~gktE̍ sarvA# Eva dEvatA̱ḥ prIṇAti pracyutO̍ vA EṣO̱&smAllOkAdagatO̍ dEvalOkaM ~MyO dI̱kṣitO̱ &ntarEva navanItaM̍ tasmA-nnavanItEnABya̍~gktE̍ &nulOmaM ~MyajuṣA̍ vyAvRuttyA̍ indrO# vRutramahan̍ tasya# kanInikA̍ parA&patat̍ tadA~jjanama-BavadyadA~gktE̍ cakṣurEva̍ BrAtRuvyasya̍ vRu~gktE dakṣiṇaM̍ pUrvamA&~gktE# - [ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam savyam|hi|pUrva̱m|manuṣyA̱ḥ|A~jjata ityA̱ - a~jjatE̱|na|nIti|dhAvatE|nIti̍|iva|hi|manuṣyA̱ḥ|dhAva̍ntE|pa~jca̍|kRutva̍ḥ|Eti̍|a~gktE|pa~jcA̱kṣarEti̍ pa~jca-akṣarA|pa~gktiḥ|pA~gkta̍ḥ|yajñaḥ|yajñam|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|pari̍mitamiti̍ pari# - mitam|Eti|a~gktE|apa̍rimitamityapa̍ri̍ - mitam|hi|manuṣyA̱ḥ|A~jjata ityA̱ - a~jjatE̱|satUlayEti̍ sa-tUlayA|Eti|a~gktE|apa̍tUlayEtyapa̍-tUlayA|hi|manuṣyA̱ḥ|A~jjata̍ ityA̱ - a~jjatE̱|vyAvRuttyA̍ iti# vi - AvRuttyai|yat|apa̍tUlayEtyapa̍# - tUlayA|A~jjItEtyA̱ - a~jjIta|vajraḥ|iva|syAt|satU̍layEti̍ sa - tUlayA|Eti|a~gktE|mitratvAyEti̍# mitra - tvAya|6̍ (50)
verses.samhita: savyaṃ hi pUrvaM̍ manuṣyA# A~jjatE na ni dhAvatE̍ nIva hi manuṣyA̍# dhAvantE̍ pa~jca kRutva A&~gktE pa~jcA̱kṣarA pa~gktiḥ pA~gktO# yajñO yajñamEvAva# rundhE parimitamA~gktE̍ &parimitaṃq̍ hi manuṣyA̍# A~jjatE satUlayA&&~gktE-̍ &patUlayA̍ hi manuṣyA̍# A~jjatE vyAvRuttyai̍ yadapatUlayA~jjIta̍ vajra# iva syAth satUlayA&&~gktE̍# mitratvAyE - [ ] 6

verses.padam: - Padam indraḥ|vRutram|ahann|saḥ|apaḥ|aBIti̍|amriyata|tAsA̱m|yat|mEddhya̱m|yajñiya̱m|sadE̍vamiti̍ sa - dEvam|AsI̱t|tat|apa|uditi̍|akrAmat|tE|darBAḥ|aBavann|yat|darBapu~jjIlairiti̍# darBa - pu~jjIlaiḥ|pavayati|yAḥ|Eva|mEddhyA̱ḥ|yajñiyA̱ḥ|sadE̍vA̍ iti sa - dEvAḥ|Apaḥ|tABi̍ḥ|Eva|Enam|pavayati|dvAByA̱m|pavayati|ahOrAtrAByAmitya̍haḥ-rAtrAByA̱m|Eva|Enam|pavayati|triBiriti̍# tri - Biḥ|pavayati|trayaḥ|imE|lOkAḥ|EBiḥ|Eva|Enam|lOkaiḥ|pavayati|pa~jcaBiriti̍# pa~jca - Biḥ|7 (50)
verses.samhita: -ndrO# vRutramahanthsO̱&(1q)pO̱&(1q)Bya̍-mriyata̍ tAsAM ~MyanmEddhyaM̍ ~Myajñiyaṃq sadEvamAsIt̍ tadapOdakrAmat̍ tE darBA aBavana.̍ yaddarBapu~jjIlaiḥ̍ pavayati̍ yA Eva mEddhyA# yajñiyAḥ sadEvA̍ ApastABirEvaina̍M̍ pavayati dvAByA̱M pavayatya-hOrAtrAByAmEvaina̍M̍ pavayati triBiḥ pavayati̍ traya# imE lOkA EBirEvainaM̍ ~MlOkaiḥ pavayati̍ pa~jcaBiḥ̍ - [ ] 7

verses.padam: - Padam pavayati|pa~jcA̱kṣarEti pa~jca# - akṣarA|pa~gktiḥ|pA~gktaḥ|yajñaḥ|yajñAya̍|Eva|Enam|pavayati|ṣaḍBiriti̍# ṣaṭ - Biḥ|pavayati|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutavaḥ|RutuBirityRutu̍ - Biḥ|Eva|Enam|pavayati|saptaBiriti# sapta - Biḥ|pavayati|sapta|CandAṃsi|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|Eva|Enam|pavayati|navaBiriti# nava - Biḥ|pavayati|nava|vai|puru̍ṣE|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|saprAṇamiti̍ sa-prAṇam|Eva|Enam|pavayati|EkaviṃśatyEtyEka̍-viṃqśatyA|pavayati|daśa̍|hastyA̱ḥ|a~ggula̍yaḥ|daśa̍|padyA̱ḥ|AtmA|Ekaviṃqśa̍ ityEka# - viṃqśaḥ|yAvAn|Eva|puru̍ṣaḥ|tam|apa̍rivargamityapa̍ri̍ - vargam|8 (50)
verses.samhita: pavayati pa~jcA̱kṣarA pa~gktiḥ pA~gktO# yajñO yajñAyaivainaM̍ pavayati ṣaḍBiḥ pavayati̍ ṣaḍvA Rutava# RutuBirEvaina̍M̍ pavayati saptaBiḥ̍ pavayati sapta CandAṃsi̍ CandOBirEvaina̍M̍ pavayati navaBiḥ̍ pavayati nava vai puruṣE̍ prAṇAḥ saprAṇamEvaina̍M̍ pavayatyEkaviṃśatyA̍ pavayati daśa hastyA# a~ggulayO̍ daśa padyA# AtmaikaviṃqśO̍ yAvAnEva̍ puruṣastamapa̍rivargaM̍ - [ ] 8

verses.padam: - Padam pavayati|citpatiriti# cit - patiḥ|tvA|punAtu|iti̍|Aha|mana̍ḥ|vai|citpatiriti̍# cit - patiḥ|mana̍sA|Eva|Enam|pavayati|vAkpatiriti̍# vAk - patiḥ|tvA|punAtu|iti̍|Aha|vAcA|Eva|Enam|pavayati|dEvaḥ|tvA|savitA|punAtu|iti̍|Aha|savitRupra̍sUta̍ iti# savitRu - prasUtaḥ|Eva|Enam|pavayati|tasya|tE|pavitrapata̍ iti# pavitra - patE|pavitrEṇa|yasmai̱|kam|punE|tat|śakEyam|iti̍|Aha|AśiṣamityA̱̍ - śiṣa̱m|Eva|EtAm|Eti|śAstE||9̍ (48) (atIkAśAn karOtya̍ - vEśayan̍ tirttha snAti̍ - praGAtO - manuṣyA̍ṇAM̍ tadvA - A&~gktE# - mitratvAya# - pa~jcaBi - raparivarga̍ - maṣṭAcatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A1)
verses.samhita: pavayati citpatistvA̍ punAtvityAha̍ manO vai citpatirmanasaivaina̍M̍ pavayati vAkpatistvA̍ punAtvityAha̍ vAcaivainaM̍ pavayati dEvastvA# savitA punAtvityA̍ha̍ savitRuprasUta̍ EvainaM̍ pavayati tasya# tE pavitrapatE pavitrEṇa̍ yasmai kaM punE tacCakEyamityA̍-hA&&*śiṣa̍mEvaitAmA̍ śA̱stE||9 (atIkAśAn karOtya̍ - vEśayan̍ tirttha snAti̍ - praGAtO - manuṣyA̍ṇAM̍ tadvA - A&~gktE# - mitratvAya# - pa~jcaBi - raparivarga̍ - maṣṭAcatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam yAvantaḥ|vai|dEvAḥ|yajñAya̍|apu̍nata|tE|Eva|aBavann|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|yajñAya̍|punItE|Bava̍ti|Eva|bahiḥ|pavayitvA|antaḥ|prEti̍|pAdayati|manuṣyalOka̍ iti# manuṣya - lOkE|Eva|Enam|pavayitvA|pUtam|dEvalOkamiti# dEva - lOkam|prEti|nayati|adI̱kṣitaḥ|Eka̍yA|AhutyEtyA̍ - hutyA|iti|Ahuḥ|sruvEṇa̍|cata̍sraḥ|juhOti|dIkṣitatvAyEti̍# dIkṣita-tvAya|srucA|pa~jcamIm|pa~jcA̱kṣarEti̍ pa~jca# - akṣarA|pa~gktiḥ|pA~gktaḥ|yajñaḥ|yajñam|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|AkU̱tyA̍ ityA - kUtyai|prayuja iti# pra - yujE̱|agnayE̱|10 (50)
verses.samhita: yAvantO̍ vai dEvA yajñAyApunata̍ ta EvABavana.̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAn. yajñAya# punItE BavatyEva̍ bahiḥ pavayitvA&ntaḥ̍ pra pAdayati̍ manuṣyalOka EvainaM̍ pavayitvA pUtaM dEvalOkaM̍ pra ṇayatyadI̱kṣita̍ EkayA&&hutyEtyAhuḥ̍ sruvEṇa catasrO̍ juhOti dIkṣitatvAya# srucA pa~jcamIM̍ pa~jcA̱kṣarA pa~gktiḥ pA~gktO# yajñO yajñamEvAva# rundha AkU̱tyai prayujE&gnayE - [ ] 10

verses.padam: - Padam svAhA̱|iti|Aha|AkUtyEtyA̍ - kUtyA|hi|puruṣaḥ|yajñam|aBIti̍|prayu~gkta̍ iti# pra-yu~gktE|yajEya|iti̍|mEdhAyai̱|mana̍sE|agnayE̱|svAhA̱|iti̍|Aha|mEdhayA̱|hi|mana̍sA|puru̍ṣaḥ|yajñam|aBigacCatItya̍Bi̍ - gacCati|sara̍svatyai|pUṣṇE|agnayE̱|svAhA̱|iti̍|Aha|vAk|vai|sara̍svatI|pRuthivI|pUṣA|vAcA|Eva|pRuthivyA|yajñam|prEti̍|yu~gktE|Apa̍ḥ|dEvIḥ|bRuhatIḥ|viśvaśaBuMqva̍ iti# viśva-śaBuMqvaḥ|iti|Aha|yAḥ|vai|varṣyA̱ḥ|tAḥ|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: svAhEtyAhA&&*kU̱tyA hi puruṣO̍ yajñamaBi prayu~gktE̍ yajEyEti# mEdhAyai manasE&gnayE̍ svAhEtyAha̍ mEdhayA hi manasA̍ puruṣO̍ yajñamaBigacCa̍ti̍ sarasvatyai̍ pUṣṇE̱&gnayE svAhEtyAha̍ vAgvai sarasvatI̍ pRuthivI pUṣA vAcaiva pRuthivyA̍ yajñaM prayu~gkta̍ ApO# dEvI-rbRuhatI-rviśvaśaMBuva ityAha̍ yA vai varṣyAstA - [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam Apaḥ|dEvIḥ|bRuhatIḥ|viśvaśa̍BuMva̍ iti# viśva - śaBuMqvaḥ|yat|Etat|yajuḥ|na|brUyAt|divyAḥ|Apa̍ḥ|aśA̱ntAḥ|imam|lOkam|Eti̍|gacCEyuḥ|Apa̍ḥ|dEvIḥ|bRuhatIḥ|viśvaśaBuMqva̍ iti# viśva-śaBuMqvaḥ|iti|Aha|asmai|Eva|EnAḥ|lOkAya̍|śamayati|tasmA̱t|śAntAḥ|imam|lOkam|Eti̍|gacCanti|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ -pRuthivI|iti|Aha|dyAvA̍pRuthivyOriti̍ dyAvA̱-pRuthivyOḥ|hi|yajñaḥ|uru|antarikṣam|iti̍|Aha|antari̍kṣE|hi|yajñaḥ|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|naḥ|haviṣA̱|vRudhAtu|12̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ApO# dEvI-rbRuhatI-rviśvaśa̍BuMvO̍ yadEtad-yajurna brUyAd-divyA ApO&śA̱ntA imaM ~MlOkamA gacCEyurApO̍# dEvI-rbRuhatI-rviśvaśaMBuva ityAhAsmA̍ EvainA# lOkAya# śamayati tasmA̱cCAntA imaM ~MlOkamA gacCanti̍ dyAvApRuthivI̍ ityAha̍ dyAvApRuthivyOṛhi̍ yajña urvantari̍kṣa-mityA̍hAntari̍kṣE̍ hi yajñO bRuhaspatirnO̍ haviṣA# vRudhAtvi - [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam iti|Aha|brahma̍|vai|dEvAnA̱m|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|brahma̍ṇA|Eva|asmai|yajñam|avEti̍|rundhE|yat|brUyAt|vidhEḥ|iti̍|yajñasthAṇumiti̍# yajña - sthAṇum|RucCEt|vRudhAtu|iti|Aha|yajñasthAṇumiti̍# yajña - sthAṇum|Eva|parIti|vRuṇakti|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|yajñam|asRujata|saḥ|asmAt|sRuṣṭaḥ|parA~g|ait|saḥ|prEti̍|yaju̍ḥ|avlI̍nAt|prEti̍|sAma̍|tam|Ruk|uditi̍|ayacCat|yat|Ruk|udaya̍cCadityu̍t̍ - ayacCat|tat|audgrahaṇasyEtyau̱t-grahaṇasya̍|audgrahaṇatvamityau̱dgrahaṇa̍ - tvam|RucA|13 (50)
verses.samhita: -tyAha̍ brahma vai dEvAnAM bRuhaspati-rbrahmaṇaivAsmai̍# yajñamava# rundhE yad- brUyAd-vidhEriti̍# yajñasthAṇumRucCEd-vRudhAtvityA̍ha̍ yajñasthAṇumEva pari# vRuṇakti prajApati-ryajñama̍sRujata̍ sO̱&smAth sRuṣṭaḥ parA~gaith̍ sa pra yajuravlInAt̍ pra sAma tamRugudayacCad-yadRugudaya̍cCat̍ tadau̱d-grahaṇasyau̱d-grahaṇatva mRucA - [ ] 13

verses.padam: - Padam juhOti|yajñasya|udya̍tyA̍ ityut - yatyai|anuṣṭubityanu̍ - stup|CandasAm|uditi̍|ayacCat|iti̍|Ahuḥ|tasmA̱t|anuṣṭuBEtya̍nu̍ - stuBA̱|juhOti|yajñasya|udya̍tyA̍ ityut - yatyai|dvAdaśa|vAthsabandhAnIti̍# vAthsa - bandhAni|uditi̍|ayacCann|iti̍|Ahuḥ|tasmA̱t|dvAdaśaBiriti̍# dvAdaśa-Biḥ|Athsabandhavida iti# vAthsabandha - vidaḥ|dIkṣayanti|sA|vai|EṣA|Ruk|anuṣṭugitya̍nu̍ - stuk|vAk|anuṣṭugityanu̍ - stuk|yat|EtayA̱|RucA|dIkṣayati|vAcA|Eva|Enam|sarva̍yA|dIkṣayati|viśvE̱|dEvasya̍|nEtuḥ|iti̍|Aha|sAvitrI|EtEna̍|marta̍ḥ|vRuṇIta|saKyam|14̍ (50)
verses.samhita: juhOti̍ yajñasyOdyatyA̍ anuṣṭup-CandasA-muda̍yacCadityA̍-hustasmA̍danuṣṭuBA̍# juhOti yajñasyOdyatyai̍ dvAdaśa̍ vAthsabandhAnyudayacCa-nnityA̍hu-stasmA̱d-̍ dvAdaśaBi-rvAthsabandhavidO̍# dIkṣayanti sA vA Eṣarganuṣṭug-vAga̍nuṣṭug-yadEtayarcA̍ dIkṣayati̍ vAcaivainaṃq sarvayA̍ dIkṣayati viśvE# dEvasya# nEturityAha̍ sAvitryEtEna̍ martO# vRuṇIta saKya - [ ] 14

verses.padam: - Padam iti|Aha|pitRudEvatyEti̍# pitRu - dEvatyA̱|EtEna|viśvE̱|rAyaḥ|iṣuddhyasi|iti̍|Aha|vaiśvadEvIti̍# vaiśva-dEvI|EtEna|dyumnam|vRuṇIta|puṣyasE̱|iti̍|Aha|pauṣṇI|EtEna̍|sA|vai|EṣA|Ruk|sarvadEvatyEti̍# sarva - dEvatyA̱|yat|EtayA̱|RucA|dIkṣayati|sarvA̍Biḥ|Eva|Enam|dEvatA̍Biḥ|dIkṣayati|saptAkṣa̍ramiti̍# sapta - akṣaram|prathamam|padam|aṣṭAkṣarAṇItyaṣṭA̍ -akṣarAṇi|trIṇi|yAni̍|trIṇi̍|tAni̍|aṣṭau|upEti̍|yanti|yAni̍|catvAri̍|tAni̍|aṣṭau|yat|aṣṭAkṣarEtyaṣṭA̍ - akṣarA|tEna|15̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -mityAha̍ pitRudEvatyaitEna̍ viśvE# rAya iṣuddhyasItyA̍ha̍ vaiśvadEvyEtEna̍# dyumnaM ~MvRuṇIta̍ puṣyasa ityAha̍ pauṣṇyEtEna̍ sA vA EṣarKsarvadEvatyA̍# yadEtayarcA dIkṣayati̍ sarvABirEvaina̍M̍ dEvatABirdIkṣayati̍ saptAkṣaraM̍ prathamaM padamaṣṭAkṣarAṇi̍ trIṇi yAni trIṇi tAnyaṣṭAvupa# yanti yAni# catvAri tAnyaṣṭau yadaṣṭAkṣarA̍ tEna# - [ ] 15

verses.padam: - Padam gAyatrI|yat|EkAdaśAkṣarEtyEkA̍daśa̍ - akṣarA|tEna|triṣṭuk|yat|dvAda̍śAkṣarEti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - akṣarA|tEna|jaga̍tI|sA|vai|EṣA|Ruk|sarvA̍ṇi|CandAṃ̍si|yat|EtayA̱|RucA|dIkṣaya̍ti|sarvE̍Biḥ|Eva|Enam|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|dIkṣayati|saptAkṣaramiti̍# sapta - akṣaram|prathamam|padam|saptapadEti# sapta - padA|śakvarI|paśava̍ḥ|śakva̍rI|paśUn|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|Eka̍smAt|akṣarA̱t|anA̱ptam|prathamam|padam|tasmA̱t|yat|vAcaḥ|anA̱ptam|tat|manuṣyA̱ḥ|upEti̍|jIvanti|pUrṇayA̱|juhOti̍ ( )|pUrṇaḥ|iva|hi|prajApatiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|prajApatEriti̍# prajA-patEḥ|Aptyai̱|nyUnayEti̍ ni-UnayA|juhOti|nyUnAditi̍ ni - UnAt|hi|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|asRujata|prajAnAmiti̍# pra-jAnA̱m|sRuṣṭyai̱||16 (65)
verses.samhita: gAyatrI yadEkAdaśAkṣarA̍ tEna# triṣṭugyad dvAdaśAkṣarA̍ tEna jagatI̍ sA vA EṣarKsarvAṇi̍ CandAṃsi̍ yadEtayarcA dIkṣayati̍ sarvEBirEvainaM̍ CandOBirdIkṣayati̍ saptAkṣaraM̍ prathamaM padaṃ saptapadA̍ śakvarI̍ paśavaḥ śakvarI̍ paśUnEvAva# rundha EkasmAdakṣarAdanA̱ptaM̍ prathamaM padaM tasmAd-yad-vAcO&nA̱ptaM tanmanuṣyA̍# upa# jIvanti pUrṇayA# juhOti ( ) pUrṇa iva̍ hi prajApatiḥ̍ prajApatErAptyai̍ nyUnayA̍ juhOti nyUnAddhi̍ prajApatiḥ̍ prajA asRujata̍ prajAnAṃq sRuṣṭyai̱||16

verses.padam: - Padam RuKsAmE ityRuk-sAmE|vai|dEvEBya̍ḥ|yajñAya̍|ati̍ṣṭhamAnE̍ iti|kRuṣṇa̍ḥ|rUpam|kRutvA|apakramyEtya̍pa̍ -kramya|atiṣṭhatAm|tE|amanyanta|yam|vai|imE̍ iti|upAvarthsyata̍ ityupa-Avarthsyata̍ḥ|saḥ|idam|Baviṣyati|iti̍|tE̍ iti|upEti̍|amantrayanta|tE̍ iti|ahOrAtrayOritya̍haḥ̍ - rAtrayO̱ḥ|mahimAna̱m|apanidhAyEtyapa̍ - nidhAya|dEvAn|upAva̍rtEtAmityu̍pa-Ava̍rtEtAm|Eṣaḥ|vai|Rucaḥ|varṇa̍ḥ|yat|śuklam|kRuṣṇAjinasyEti̍# kRuṣṇa - ajinasya|Eṣaḥ|sAmna̍ḥ|yat|kRuṣṇam|RuKsAmayOrityRu̍k̍ - sAmayO̱ḥ|śilpE iti|sthaḥ|iti̍|Aha|RuKsAmE̍ ityRuk̍ - sAmE|Eva|avEti|rundhE|Eṣaḥ|17̍ (50)
verses.samhita: RuK sAmE vai dEvEByO# yajñAyA&tiṣṭhamAnE̍ kRuṣṇO# rUpaM kRutvA- &pakramyAtiṣṭhatAM̍ tE&manyanta̍ yaM ~MvA imE upAvarthsyataḥ̍ sa idaM BaviṣyatIti̍ tE upAmantrayanta̍ tE ahOrAtrayO̱-rmahimAna̍-mapanidhAya̍# dEvAnupAvartEtAmEṣa̍ vA RucO varṇO yacCuklaM kRuṣṇAjinasyaiṣa̍ sAmnO yat kRuṣṇamRuKsAmayOḥ̍ śilpE̱ stha ityAharKsAmE̍ EvAva# rundha Eṣa - [ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam vai|ahnaḥ|varṇa̍ḥ|yat|śuklam|kRuṣṇAjinasyEti̍# kRuṣṇa - ajinasya|Eṣaḥ|rAtri̍yAḥ|yat|kRuṣṇam|yat|Eva|EnayOḥ|tatra̍|nya̍ktamiti̍ ni-aktam|tat|Eva|avEti|rundhE|kRuṣṇAjinEnEti̍# kRuṣṇa-ajinEna|dIkṣayati|brahma̍ṇaḥ|vai|Etat|rUpam|yat|kRuṣṇAjinamiti̍# kRuṣṇa - ajinam|brahmaṇA|Eva|Enam|dIkṣayati|imAm|dhiya̱m|śikṣa̍mAṇasya|dEva|iti̍|Aha|yathAyajuriti̍# yathA - yajuḥ|Eva|Etat|garBaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|dIkṣitaḥ|ulba̱m|vAsa̍ḥ|prEti̍|UrṇutE|tasmA̱t|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vA ahnO varṇO yacCuklaM kRuṣṇAjinasyaiṣa̍ rAtriyA̍ yat kRuṣṇaM ~MyadEvainayOstatra̍ nyaktaM̍ tadEvAva# rundhE kRuṣṇAjinEna# dIkṣayati brahmaṇO̍ vA Etad-rUpaM ~Myat kRuṣṇAjinaM̍ brahmaṇaivaina̍M̍ dIkṣayatImAM dhiyaṃq śikṣamAṇasya̍ dEvEtyAha̍ yathAyajurEvaitad-garBO vA Eṣa yad-dI̱kṣita ulbaM ~MvAsaḥ prOrṇutE̍ tasmAd - [ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam garBA̱ḥ|prAvRutAḥ|jAyantE|na|purA|sOma̍sya|krayAt|apEti̍|UrṇvIta|yat|purA|sOma̍sya|krayAt|apOrṇvItEtya̍pa-UrṇvIta|garBA̱ḥ|prajAnAmiti̍# pra - jAnA̱m|parApAtukA̍ iti# parA-pAtukAḥ|syuḥ|krItE|sOmE̱|apEti̍|UrṇutE|jAya̍tE|Eva|tat|athO̍ iti|yathA̱|vasI̍yAṃsam|pratyapOrṇuta̍ iti# prati -apOrṇutE|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|a~ggirasaḥ|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|yantaḥ|Urja̱m|vIti̍|aBajanta|tata̍ḥ|yat|atyaśi̍ṣyatEtya̍ti̍ - aśiṣyata|tE|śarAḥ|aBavann|Urk|vai|śarAḥ|yat|śaramayIti̍# śara - mayI̱|19 (50)
verses.samhita: garBAḥ prAvRutA̍ jAyantE na purA sOmasya̍ krayAdapO̱rṇvIta yat purA sOmasya̍ krayAdapOrṇvIta̍ garBA̱ḥ prajAnA̱M parApAtukAḥ̍ syuḥ krItE sOmE&pO̱rṇutE jAyata̍ Eva tadathO yathA vasIyAṃ̍ saM pratyapOrṇutE tAdRugEva tada~ggirasaḥ̍ suvargaM ~MlOkaM ~Myanta UrjaM ~MvyaBajanta̍ tatO yadatyaśiṣyata̍ tE śarA aBavannUrgvai̍ śarA yacCaramayI̍ - [ ] 19

verses.padam: - Padam mEKalA|Bava̍ti|Urja̱m|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|maddhyataḥ|samiti̍|nahyati|maddhyataḥ|Eva|asmai|Urja̱m|dadhAti|tasmA̱t|maddhyataḥ|UrjA|Bu~jjatE|Ud^^rdhvam|vai|puru̍ṣasya|nAByai̱|mEddhya̱m|avAcIna̱m|amEddhyam|yat|maddhyataḥ|sannahyatIti̍# saM - nahyati|mEddhya̱m|ca|Eva|asya|amEddhyam|ca|vyAva̍rtayatIti̍# vi-Avartayati|indra̍ḥ|vRutrAya̍|vajra̱m|prEti̍|aharat|saḥ|trEdhA|vIti̍|aBavat|sPyaḥ|tRutI̍yam|ratha̍ḥ|tRutI̍yam|yUpa̍ḥ|tRutI̍yam|20̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mEKalA̍ BavatyUrjamEvAva̍# rundhE maddhyataḥ saMnahyati̍ maddhyata EvAsmA UrjaM̍ dadhAti tasmA̱nmaddhyata UrjA Bu~jjata̍ UrddhvaM ~Mvai puruṣasya̍ nAByai mEddhya-mavAcIna̍-mamEddhyaM̍ ~Myanmaddhyataḥ̍ sanaMhyati̍ mEddhyaM̍ caivAsyAmEddhyaM̍ ca vyAvartayatIndrO̍# vRutrAya vajraM prAharath̍ sa trEdhA vyaBavath̍ sPyastRutIyaṃq̍ rathastRutIyaM̍ ~MyUpastRutIyaM̍ - [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam yE|antaśśarA ityantaḥ-śarAḥ|aśI̱ryanta|tE|śarAḥ|aBavann|tat|śarAṇA̱m|śaratvamiti̍# śara-tvam|vajraḥ|vai|śarAḥ|kṣut|Kalu̍|vai|manuṣya̍sya|BrAtRu̍vyaḥ|yat|śaramayIti̍# śara - mayI̱|mEKalA|Bava̍ti|vajrE̍ṇa|Eva|sAkṣAditi̍# sa-akṣAt|kṣudha̱m|BrAtRuvyam|maddhyataḥ|apEti̍|hatE|trivRuditi̍# tri - vRut|Bavati|trivRuditi# tri - vRut|vai|prAṇa iti# pra -anaḥ|trivRutamiti# tri - vRuta̱m|Eva|prAṇamiti# pra - anam|maddhyataḥ|yajamAnE|dadhAti|pRuthvI|Bavati|rajjU̍nAm|vyAvRu̍tyA̍ iti# vi - AvRutyai|mEKa̍layA|yaja̍mAnam|dIkṣayati|yOktrE̍ṇa|patnI̱m|mithunatvAyEti̍# mithuna - tvAya|21̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ~MyE̱&ntaḥ śarA aśI̱ryanta tE śarA aBavan̍ tacCarAṇAṃ# śaratvaM ~MvajrO vai śarAḥ kṣut Kalu vai manuṣya̍sya̍ BrAtRuvyO̍ yacCaramayI̍ mEKalA̍ Bavati̍ vajrEṇaiva̍ sAkṣAt kṣudhaM BrAtRuvyaM̍ maddhyatO&pa# hatE trivRud-Bavati̍ trivRudvai prAṇastrivRutamEva̍ prAṇaM maddhyatO̍ yajamAnE̍ dadhAti pRuthvI Bavati̍ rajjUnAM̍ ~MvyAvRutyai̍ mEKalayA̍ yajamAnaM̍ dIkṣayati yOktrEṇa̍ patnI̱M mithunatvAya# - [ ] 21

verses.padam: - Padam yajñaḥ|dakṣiṇAm|aBIti̍|addhyAyat|tAm|samiti̍|aBavat|tat|indra̍ḥ|acAyat|saḥ|amanyata|yaḥ|vai|itaḥ|janiṣyatE̱|saḥ|idam|Baviṣyati|iti̍|tAm|prEti̍|aviśat|tasyA̱ḥ|indra̍ḥ|Eva|ajAyata|saḥ|amanyata|yaḥ|vai|mat|itaḥ|apa̍raḥ|janiṣyatE̱|saḥ|idam|Baviṣyati|iti̍|tasyA̱ḥ|anumRuśyEtya̍nu̍ - mRuśya|yOni̱m|Eti̍|acCinat|sA|sUtavaśEti̍# sUta - vaśA|aBavat|tat|sUtavaśAyA̍ iti# sUta - vaśAyai|janma|22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yajñO dakṣiṇAmaBya̍ddhyAyat̍ tAṃ samaBavat̍ tadindrO-&cAyath̍ sO&manyata̍ yO vA itO janiṣyatE̍ sa idaM BaviṣyatIti̍ tAM prAviśat̍ tasyA indra# EvAjAyata̍ sO&manyata̍ yO vai maditO &parO̍ janiṣyatE sa idaM BaviṣyatIti̍ tasyA# anumRuśya yOnimA-&cCinath̍ sA sUtavaśA&Bavat̍ tath sUtavaśAyai̍ janma - [ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam tAm|hastE̱|nIti|avEṣṭayata|tAm|mRugEṣu̍|nIti̍|adadhAt|sA|kRuṣṇaviṣAṇEti̍# kRuṣṇa - viṣAṇA|aBavat|indrasya|yOni̍ḥ|asi|mA|mA|hiṃqsIḥ|iti̍|kRuṣṇaviṣAṇAmiti̍# kRuṣṇa - viṣAṇAm|prEti|yacCati|sayO̍nimiti̍ sa - yOnim|Eva|yajñam|karOti|sayOnimiti̍ sa - yOnim|dakṣiṇAm|sayO̍nimiti̍ sa - yOnim|indra̱m|sayOnitvAyEti# sayOni-tvAya|kRuṣyai|tvA|susasyAyA̍ iti# su - sasyAyai̱|iti|Aha|tasmA̱t|akRuṣṭapacyA̍ ityakRuṣṭa̍ - pacyAḥ|Oṣadhayaḥ|pacyantE|supippalABya̍ iti# su - pippalAByaḥ|tvA|Oṣa̍dhIBya̍ ityOṣadhi̍ - Byaḥ|iti|Aha|tasmA̱t|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|Pala̱m|gRuhṇanti|yat|hastE̍na|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tAṃ hastE nyavEṣṭayata̍ tAM mRugEṣu nyadadhAth̍ sA kRuṣṇaviṣAṇA-̍ &Bavadindra̍sya̍ yOnirasi̍ mA mA# hiṃsIriti# kRuṣṇaviṣAṇAM pra yacCati̍ sayOnimEva̍ yajñaM karOti̍ sayOniM̍ dakṣiṇAṃq̍ sayOnimindraṃ̍# sayOnitvAya# kRuṣyai tvA# susasyAyA ityAha̍ tasmAdakRuṣṭapacyA̍ Oṣadhayaḥ̍ pacyantE supippalABya-stvauṣadhIBya̍ ityAha̍ tasmAdOṣadhayaḥ̍ PalaM̍ gRuhṇanti yaddhastEna̍ - [ ] 23

verses.padam: - Padam kaṇḍUyEta|pAmanamBAvu̍kA̍ iti# pAmanam - BAvukAḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|syuḥ|yat|smayEta|nagnamBAvu̍kA̍ iti# nagnam - BAvukAḥ|kRuṣṇaviṣAṇayEti̍# kRuṣṇa-viṣAṇayA̱|kaṇḍUyatE|apigRuhyEtyapi̍ - gRuhya|smayatE|prajAnAmiti̍# pra - jAnA̱m|gOpIthAya|na|purA|dakṣi̍ṇAByaḥ|nEtO̱ḥ|kRuṣṇaviṣAṇAmiti̍# kRuṣṇa - viṣAṇAm|avEti|cRutEt|yat|purA|dakṣi̍ṇAByaḥ|nEtO̱ḥ|kRuṣṇaviṣAṇAmiti̍# kRuṣṇa-viṣAṇAm|avacRutEdityava-cRutEt|yOni̍ḥ|prajAnAmiti̍# pra - jAnA̱m|parApAtukEti# parA - pAtukA|syAt|nItAsu̍|dakṣi̍ṇAsu|cAtvA̍lE|kRuṣṇaviṣAṇAmiti̍# kRuṣṇa - viṣAṇAm|prEti|asyati|yOni̍ḥ|vai|yajñasya̍|cAtvA̍lam|yOni̍ḥ|kRuṣṇaviṣAṇEti̍# kRuṣṇa - viṣAṇA|yOnau̱|Eva|yOni̱m|dadhAti|yajñasya|sayOnitvAyEti̍# sayOni - tvAya||24̍ (48) (rundha Eṣa - tasmA̱ - cCaramayI - yUpastRutIyaM̍ - mithunatvAya - janma - hastEnA̍ - &ṣṭAcatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: kaṇḍUyEta# pAmanaM BAvukAḥ̍ prajAḥ syuryath smayEta̍ nagnaM BAvukAḥ̍ kRuṣṇaviṣAṇayA# kaṇḍUyatE&pigRuhya# smayatE prajAnA̱M gOpIthAya na purA dakṣiṇAByO̍ nEtO̱ḥ kRuṣṇaviṣAṇAmava# cRutEdyat purA dakṣiṇAByO̍ nEtO̱ḥ kRuṣṇaviṣAṇAmava̍ cRutEdyOniḥ̍ prajAnA̱M parApAtukA̍ syAnnItAsu dakṣiṇAsu̍ cAtvAlE̍ kRuṣṇaviṣAṇAM prAsyati̍ yOnirvai yajñasya cAtvAlaM̍ ~MyOniḥ̍ kRuṣṇaviṣAṇA yOnAvEva̍ yOniM̍ dadhAti yajñasya# sayOnitvAya||24̍ (rundha Eṣa - tasmA̱ - cCaramayI - yUpastRutIyaM̍ - mithunatvAya - janma - hastEnA̍ - &ṣṭAcatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam vAk|vai|dEvEByaḥ|apEti̍|akrAmat|yajñAya̍|ati̍ṣṭhamAnA|sA|vanaspatIn̍|prEti̍|aviśat|sA|EṣA|vAk|vanaspati̍ṣu|vadati|yA|dunduBau|yA|tUṇa̍vE|yA|vIṇA̍yAm|yat|dIkṣitadaṇḍamiti̍# dIkṣita-daṇḍam|prayacCatIti# pra-yacCati|vAca̱m|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|audu̍mbaraḥ|Bavati|Urk|vai|udubaMra̍ḥ|Urja̱m|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|muKE̍na|sammi̍ta̍ iti saM - mitaḥ|Bavati|muKataḥ|Eva|asmai|Urja̱m|dadhAti|tasmA̱t|muKataḥ|UrjA|Bu~jjatE|25 (50)
verses.samhita: vAgvai dEvEByO &pA̱krAmad-yajñAyAtiṣṭhamAnA̍ sA vanaspatIn prAviśath̍ saiṣA vAgvanaspatiṣu̍ vadati yA dunduBau̍ yA tUṇavE̍ yA vIṇAyAM̍ ~Myad-dI̱kṣitadaṇḍaM prayacCati̍ vAcamEvAva̍# rundha audubaMrO̍ BavatyUrgvA udubaMra̍ UrjamEvAva̍# rundhE muKEna̍ saMmitO̍ Bavati muKata EvAsmA UrjaM̍ dadhAti tasmA̱n muKata UrjA Bu~jjatE̍ - [ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam krItE|sOmE̱|maitrAvaruṇAyEti# maitrA - varuṇAya|daṇḍam|prEti̍|yacCati|maitrAvaruṇa̍ iti# maitrA - varuṇaḥ|hi|purastA̱t|RutvigBya ityRutvik - Byaḥ|vAca̱m|viBajatIti# vi - Bajati|tAm|Rutvija̍ḥ|yaja̍mAnE|pratIti̍|sthApayanti|svAhA̱|yajñam|mana̍sA|iti̍|Aha|mana̍sA|hi|puru̍ṣaḥ|yajñam|aBigacCatItya̍Bi̍ - gacCati|svAhA̱|dyAvA̍pRuthivIByAmiti̍ dyAvA̱ - pRuthivIByA̱m|iti|Aha|dyAvA̍pRuthivyOriti̍ dyAvA̱-pRuthivyOḥ|hi|yajñaḥ|svAhA̱|urOḥ|antarikṣAt|iti̍|Aha|antari̍kṣE|hi|yajñaḥ|svAhA̱|yajñam|vAtA̱t|Eti̍|raBE|iti̍|Aha|ayam|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: krItE sOmE# maitrAvaruṇAya# daṇḍaM pra yacCati̍ maitrAvaruṇO hi purastA-dRutvigByO̍ vAcaM̍ ~MviBajati̍ tAmRutvijO yajamAnE̍ prati# ṣṭhApayanti svAhA# yajñaM manasEtyAha̍ manasA̍ hi puruṣO̍ yajñamaBigacCa̍ti̍ svAhA dyAvApRuthivIByA̍ -mityAha̍ dyAvApRuthivyOṛhi̍ yajñaḥ svAhOrOra-ntarikṣA̍ -dityAhAntari̍kṣE̍ hi yajñaḥ svAhA# yajñaM ~MvAtAdA raBa̍ ityAhAyaM̍ - [ ] 26

verses.padam: - Padam vAva|yaḥ|pavatE|saḥ|yajñaḥ|tam|Eva|sAkṣAditi̍# sa-akṣAt|Eti|raBatE|muṣṭI̍ iti|karOti|vAca̱m|yacCati|yajñasya̍|dhRutyai̱|adI̱kṣiṣṭa|ayam|brAhmaṇaḥ|iti̍|triḥ|upAṅqśvityu̍pa̍ - aṃqśu|Aha|dEvEByaḥ|Eva|Enam|prEti̍|Aha|triḥ|uccaiḥ|uBayE̱Byaḥ|Eva|Enam|dEvamanuṣyEBya̍ iti# dEva - manuṣyEByaḥ|prEti̍|Aha|na|purA|nakṣa̍trEByaḥ|vAca̱m|vIti̍|sRujEt|yat|purA|nakṣa̍trEByaḥ|vAca̱m|visRujEditi̍# vi - sRujEt|yajñam|vIti|CindyAt|27̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ~MvAva yaḥ pavatE̍ sa yajñastamEva sAkṣAdA raBatE̍ muṣṭI karOti̍ vAcaM̍ ~MyacCati yajñasya dhRutyA adI̱kṣiṣṭAyaM brA̱hmaṇa iti trirupAṅqśvA̍ha̍ dEvEBya# EvainaM prA&&*ha triruccairuBayE̱Bya EvainaM̍ dEvamanuṣyEByaḥ prA&&*ha na purA nakṣatrEByO̍ vAcaM ~Mvi sRujEd-yatpurA̍ nakṣatrEByO̍ vAcaM̍ ~MvisRujEd- yajñaM ~MvicCindyA̍ - [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam uditEṣvityut̍ - itEṣu|nakṣatrEṣu|vratam|kRuṇuta|iti̍|vAca̱m|vIti̍|sRujati|yajñavra̍ta̍ iti# yajña-vrataḥ|vai|dIkṣitaḥ|yajñam|Eva|aBIti|vAca̱m|vIti̍|sRujati|yadi̍|visRujEditi̍# vi - sRujEt|vaiṣṇavIm|Ruca̱m|anviti|brUyAt|yajñaḥ|vai|viṣṇu̍ḥ|yajñEna̍|Eva|yajñam|samiti̍|tanOti|daivI̱m|dhiya̱m|manAmahE|iti̍|Aha|yajñam|Eva|tat|mradayati|supArEti̍# su - pArA|naḥ|asat|vaśE̱|iti|Aha|vyu̍ṣṭimiti̍ vi - uṣṭim|Eva|avEti|rundhE|28̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -duditEṣu̍ nakṣatrEṣu̍ vrataM kRuṇutEti̍ vAcaM ~Mvi sRujati̍ yajñavratO̍ vai dI̱kṣitO yajñamEvABi vAcaM ~Mvi sRujati̍ yadi# visRujEd-vai̱ṣṇavImRucamanu# brUyAd-yajñO vai viṣṇuryajñEnaiva̍ yajñaṃ saM tanOti̍ daivIM dhiyaM̍ manAmaha ityAha̍ yajñamEva tanmradayati̍ supArA nO# asadvaśa ityAha̍ vyuṣṭimEvAva̍# rundhE - [ ] 28

verses.padam: - Padam brahmavAdina iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|hOtavya̱m|dIkṣitasya̍|gRuhA(3)̍ i|na|hOtavyA(3)m|iti|haviḥ|vai|dIkṣitaḥ|yat|juhuyAt|yaja̍mAnasya|avadAyEtya̍va̍ - dAya|juhuyAt|yat|na|juhuyAt|yajñaparuriti̍# yajña - paruḥ|antaḥ|iyAt|yE|dEvAḥ|manOjAtA̍ iti manaḥ̍ - jAtAḥ|manOyuja iti# manaḥ-yujaḥ|iti̍|Aha|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|vai|dEvAḥ|manOjAtA̍ iti manaḥ̍ - jAtAḥ|manOyuja iti# manaḥ - yujaḥ|tEṣu̍|Eva|parOkṣamiti̍# paraḥ - akṣa̱m|juhOti|tat|na|iva|hutam|na|iva|ahutam|svapanta̱m|vai|dIkṣitam|rakṣAṃ̍si|jiGAṃqsanti|agniḥ|29̍ (50)
verses.samhita: brahmavAdinO# vadanti hOtavyaM̍ dIkṣitasya# gRuhA(3) i na hOtavyA(3)miti̍# havirvai dI̱kṣitO yajjuhuyAd-yaja̍mAnasyAvadAya̍# juhuyAd-yanna juhuyAd-ya̍jñaparurantari̍yAdyE̍ dEvA manOjAtA̍ manOyuja ityAha̍ prAṇA vai dEvA manOjAtA̍ manOyujastEṣvEva parOkṣaM̍ juhOti tannEva# hutaM nEvAhutaṅ̍ svapantaM ~Mvai dI̱kṣitaṃ rakṣAṃsi̍ jiGAṃsantyagniḥ- [ ] 29

verses.padam: - Padam Kalu|vai|rakṣOhEti̍# rakṣaḥ - hA|agnE̱|tvam|sviti|jAgRuhi|vayam|sviti̍|mandiṣImahi|iti̍|Aha|agnim|Eva|adhipAmitya̍dhi̍ - pAm|kRutvA|svapiti|rakṣasAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa# - hatyai|avratyam|iva|vai|Eṣaḥ|karOti|yaḥ|dIkṣitaḥ|svapiti|tvam|agnE|vratapA̍ iti# vrata-pAḥ|asi|iti|Aha|agniḥ|vai|dEvAnA̱m|vratapa̍tiriti̍# vrata - patiḥ|saḥ|Eva|Enam|vratam|Eti|lamBayati|dEvaḥ|Eti̍|martyE̍ṣu|Eti̍|iti̍|Aha|dEvaḥ|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Kalu vai rakṣOhA&gnE̍ tvaṃ su jAgRuhi̍ vayaṃ su mandiṣImahItyA̍hAgni-mEvAdhipAM̍ kRutvA svapiti̍ rakṣasAmapa̍hatyA̍ avratyamiva̍ vA Eṣa karOti̍ yO dI̱kṣitaḥ svapiti̍ tvamagnE̍ vratapA asItyAhAgnirvai̍ dEvAnA̱M ~Mvratapatiḥ̍ sa EvainaM̍ ~MvratamA laBaMyati̍ dEva A martyEṣvEtyAha̍ dEvO - [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam hi|Eṣaḥ|sann|martyEṣu|tvam|yajñEṣu̍|Iḍya̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|Etam|hi|yajñEṣu̍|Iḍa̍tE|apEti̍|vai|dIkṣitAt|suṣupuṣa̍ḥ|indriyam|dEvatA̱ḥ|krAmanti|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|aBIti̍|mAm|Eti̍|avavRutrann|iti̍|Aha|indriyEṇa̍|Eva|Enam|dEvatA̍Biḥ|samiti̍|nayati|yat|Etat|yaju̍ḥ|na|brUyAt|yAva̍taḥ|Eva|paśUn|aBIti̍|dIkṣE̍ta|tAva̍ntaḥ|asya|paśava̍ḥ|syuḥ|rAsva̍|iya̍t|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: hyEṣa̍ san martyEṣu̍ tvaM ~MyajñEṣvIḍya ityAhaitaṃ̍ hi yajñEṣvIḍatE&pa vai dI̱kṣitAth suṣupuṣa̍# indriyaM dEvatA̱ḥ krAmanti viśvE# dEvA aBi mAmA&vavRutra-nnityA̍-hEndriyEṇaivaina̍M̍ dEvatABiḥ̍ saM nayati̍ yadEtad-yajurna brUyAd-yAvata̍ Eva paśUnaBi dIkṣEta̍ tAvantO&sya̍ paśavaḥ̍ syU rAsvEyath̍ - [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam sOma|Eti|BUya̍ḥ|Bara|iti̍|Aha|apa̍rimitAnityapa̍ri-mitAn|Eva|paśUn|avEti̍|rundhE|candram|asi|mama̍|BOgA̍ya|Bava|iti̍|Aha|yathAdEvatamiti̍# yathA - dEvatam|Eva|EnAḥ|pratIti|gRuhṇAti|vAyavE̱|tvA|varu̍ṇAya|tvA|iti̍|yat|Evam|EtAḥ|na|anudiśEditya̍nu̍ - diśEt|ayathAdEvatamityaya̍thA̍ - dEvatam|dakṣiṇAḥ|gamayEt|Eti̍|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|vRuścyEta|yat|Evam|EtAḥ|anudiśatItya̍nu̍ - diśati|yathAdEvatamiti̍# yathA - dEvatam|Eva|dakṣiṇAḥ|gamayati|na|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|Eti̍|32̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sOmA&&* BUyO# BarEtyAhA-parimitAnEva̍ paśUnava# rundhE candramasi̍ mama BOgAya̍ BavEtyAha̍ yathAdEvatamEvainAḥ prati# gRuhṇAti vAyavE̱ tvA varuṇAya̍ tvEti yadEvamEtA nAnudiśEdaya̍thAdEvataM̍ dakṣiṇA̍ gamayEdA dEvatA̱ByO vRuścyEta yadEvamEtA anudiśati̍# yathAdEvatamEva dakṣiṇA̍ gamayati na dEvatA̱Bya A - [ ] 32

verses.padam: - Padam vRuścyatE|dEvI̱ḥ|Apaḥ|apAm|napAt|iti|Aha|yat|vaḥ|mEddhya̱m|yajñiya̱m|sadE̍vamiti̍ sa - dEvam|tat|vaḥ|mA|avEti|kramiṣam|iti̍|vAva|Etat|Aha|acCi̍nnam|tantu̱m|pRuthivyAḥ|anviti̍|gEṣam|iti̍|Aha|sEtu̱m|Eva|kRutvA|atIti̍|Eti||33̍ (33) (Bu~jjatE - &yaM - CindyAd̍ - rundhE - &gni - rAha̍ dEva - iyad̍ - dEvatA̱Bya A - trayastriṃśacca)̍ (A4)
verses.samhita: vRuścyatE̍ dEvIrApO̍ apAM napAdityAha̍ yadvO mEddhyaM̍ ~Myajñiyaṃq sadEvaM̍ tadvO mA&va# kramiṣamiti vAvaitadAhAcCinnaM̍ tantuM̍ pRuthivyA anu# gEṣamityAha̍ sEtumEva̍ kRutvA&tyEti||33̍ (Bu~jjatE - &yaM - CindyAd̍ - rundhE - &gni - rAha̍ dEva - iyad̍ - dEvatA̱Bya A - trayastriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAḥ|vai|dEvayajanamiti̍# dEva - yajanam|addhyavasAyEtya̍dhi̍ - avasAya|diśa̍ḥ|na|prEti̍|ajAnann|tE|anyaḥ|anyam|upEti̍|adhAvann|tvayA̱|prEti̍|jAnAma|tvayA̱|iti̍|tE|adi̍tyAm|samiti̍|addhrayanta|tvayA̱|prEti̍|jAnAma|iti̍|sA|abravIt|vara̱m|vRuṇai|matprA̍yaṇA̍ iti mat - prAyaṇAḥ|Eva|vaḥ|yajñAḥ|madudayanA̍ iti mat-udayanAḥ|asann|iti|tasmA̱t|Adityaḥ|prAyaṇIya̍ iti# pra-ayanIyaḥ|yajñAnA̱m|Adityaḥ|udayanIya̍ ityut̍ - ayanIyaḥ|pa~jca̍|dEvatA̱ḥ|yajati|pa~jca̍|diśa̍ḥ|diśAm|prajñA̱tyA̍ iti pra - jñAtyai|34 (50)
verses.samhita: dEvA vai dEvayaja̍na-maddhyavasAya̍ diśO na prAjAnan̍ tE̱(1q)&nyO̱-&nyamupAdhAvan̍ tvayA pra jAnAma̍ tvayEti tE&dityAṃq̍ samaqddhrayanta̍ tvayA pra jAnAmEti̍ sA&bravId-vara̍M̍ ~MvRuṇai matprAyaṇA̍ Eva vO# yajñA madudayanA̍ asanniti tasmAdAdityaḥ̍ prAyaṇIyO̍# yajñAnAmAditya̍ udayanIyaḥ̍ pa~jca# dEvatA# yajati pa~jca diśO# diśAM prajñA̱tyA - [ ] 34

verses.padam: - Padam athO iti|pa~jcA̱kṣarEti̍ pa~jca# - akṣarA|pa~gktiḥ|pA~gktaḥ|yajñaḥ|yajñam|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|pathyA̱m|svastim|ayajann|prAcI̱m|Eva|tayA̱|diśa̱m|prEti̍|ajAnann|agninA̱|dakṣiṇA|sOmE̍na|pratIcI̱m|savitrA|udI̍cIm|adi̍tyA|Ud^^rdhvAm|pathyA̱m|svastim|yajati|prAcI̱m|Eva|tayA̱|diśa̱m|prEti̍|jAnAti|pathyA̱m|svastim|iṣṭvA|agnIṣOmAvityagnI-sOmau̱|yajati|cakṣu̍ṣI̍ iti|vai|EtE̍ iti|yajñasya̍|yat|agnIṣOmAvityagnI̍ - sOmau̱|tAByA̱m|Eva|anviti|paśyati|35̍ (50)
verses.samhita: athO pa~jcA̱kṣarA pa~gktiḥ pA~gktO# yajñO yajñamEvAva# rundhE pathyAṅ# svastimayajan̍ prAcImEva̍ tayA diśaM prAjAnannagninA̍# dakṣiṇA sOmEna̍ pratIcIṃ# savitrOdIcI-madi̍tyOrddhvAM̍ pathyAṅ# svastiM ~Myajati̍ prAcImEva̍ tayA diśaM pra jAnAti̍ pathyAṅ# svastimiṣṭvA&gnIṣOmau# yajati cakṣuṣI̍ vA EtE yajñasya yadagnIṣOmau tAByAmEvAnu̍# paśya - [ ] 35

verses.padam: - Padam agnIṣOmAvityagnI - sOmau̱|iṣṭvA|savitAra̱m|yajati|savitRuprasUta̍ iti# savitRu - prasUtaḥ|Eva|anviti|paśyati|savitAra̱m|iṣṭvA|adi̍tim|yajati|iyam|vai|adi̍tiḥ|asyAm|Eva|pratiṣṭhAyEti̍# prati - sthAya|anviti̍|paśyati|adi̍tim|iṣṭvA|mArutIm|Ruca̱m|anviti̍|Aha|maruta̍ḥ|vai|dEvAnA̱m|viśa̍ḥ|dEvaviśamiti̍# dEva - viśam|Kalu|vai|kalpa̍mAnam|manuṣyaviśamiti̍# manuṣya-viśam|anviti|kalpatE|yat|mArutIm|Ruca̱m|anvAhEtya̍nu-Aha̍|viśAm|klRuptyai̱|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|prayAjavaditi̍# prayAja - vat|ananUyAjamityananu̍ - yAjam|prAyaṇIyamiti# pra - ayaṇIya̱m|kArya̱m|anUyAjavadityanUyAja̍ - vat|36 (50)
verses.samhita: -tyagnIṣOmAviṣṭvA̍ savitAra̍M̍ ~Myajati savitRuprasUta̍ EvAnu# paśyati savitAramiṣṭvA&di̍tiM̍ ~MyajatIyaM ~MvA aditirasyAmEva̍ pratiṣṭhAyAnu̍# paśyatyaditimiṣṭvA̍ mArutImRucamanvA̍ha̍ marutO vai dEvAnAM ~MviśO# dEvaviśAM Kalu vai kalpamAnaM̍ manuṣyaviśamanu# kalpatE yan mArutImRuca̍manvAha̍# viśAM klRuptyai̱ brahmavAdinO# vadanti prayAjavadananUyAjaM̍ prAyaṇIya̍M̍ kArya-manUyAjava̍# - [ ] 36

verses.padam: - Padam aprayAjamityapra̍ - yAjam|udayanIyamityut̍ - ayanIya̱m|iti|imE|vai|prayAjA̍ iti# pra - yAjAḥ|amI iti|anUyAjA̍ ityanu̍ - yAjAḥ|sA|Eva|sA|yajñasya|santa̍tiriti̍ saM - tatiḥ|tat|tathA̱|na|kArya̱m|AtmA|vai|prayAjA iti# pra - yAjAḥ|prajEti# pra - jA|anUyAjA ityanu-yAjAḥ|yat|prayAjAniti̍# pra-yAjAn|antariyAdityantaḥ̍ - iyAt|AtmAna̱m|antaḥ|iyAt|yat|anUyAjAnityanu̍ - yAjAn|antariyAdityantaḥ̍ - iyAt|prajAmiti# pra-jAm|antaḥ|iyAt|yataḥ|Kalu̍|vai|yajñasya̍|vita̍tasyEti̍ vi-tatasya|na|kriyatE̱|tat|anviti|yajñaḥ|parEti̍|Bavati|yajñam|parABava̍ntamiti̍# parA - Bavantam|yaja̍mAnaḥ|anu̍|37̍ (50)
verses.samhita: daprayAja-mudayanIyamitImE̍ vai prayAjA̍ amI anUyAjAḥ̍ saiva sA yajñasya santatistat̍ tathA na kAryamAtmA̍ vai prayAjAḥ̍ prajA&nUyAjA̍ yat prayAjA-na̍ntariyAdAtmAna̍ma-ntari̍yAd-yada̍nUyAjA-na̍ntariyAt̍ prajAmantariyAdyataḥ̍ Kalu vai yajñasya vitatasya̍ na kriyatE tadanu# yajñaḥ parA# Bavati yajñaM parABava̍ntaM̍ ~MyajamAnO&nu̍ - [ ] 37

verses.padam: - Padam parEti|Bavati|prayAjavaditi̍# prayAja - vat|Eva|anUyAjavadityanUyAja̍ - vat|prAyaṇIyamiti# pra - ayanIya̱m|kArya̱m|prayAjavaditi# prayAja - vat|anUyAjavadityanUyAja-vat|udayanIyamityu̍t-ayanIya̱m|na|AtmAna̱m|antarEtItya̍ntaḥ-Eti̍|na|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|na|yajñaḥ|parABavatIti# parA - Bavati|na|yaja̍mAnaḥ|prAyaṇIyasyEti̍# pra - ayanIyasya|niṣkAsE|udayanIyamityu̍t̍ - ayanIya̱m|aBi|niriti|vapati|sA|Eva|sA|yajñasya̍|santa̍tiriti̍ saM - tatiḥ|yAḥ|prAyaṇIyasyEti# pra - ayanIyasya|yAjyA̱ḥ|yat|tAḥ|udayanIyasyEtyu̍t-ayanIya̍sya|yAjyA̱ḥ|kuryAt|parA~g̍|amum|lOkam|Eti̍|rOhEt|pramAyu̍ka̍ iti# pra - mAyukaḥ|syAt|yAḥ|prAyaṇIyasyEti̍# pra - ayanIyasya|purOnuvAkyA̍# iti# puraḥ - anuvAkyA̱ḥ|tAḥ ( )|udayanIyasyEtyut̍ - ayanIyasya|yAjyA̱ḥ|karOti|asminn|Eva|lOkE|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati||38̍ (58)
verses.samhita: parA# Bavati prayAjavadEvA-nU̍yAjava̍t̍ prAyaṇIyaM̍ kAryaM̍ prayAjavadanUyAjava̍-dudayanIyaM̍ nA&&*tmAnamantarEti̍ na prajAM na yajñaḥ parABava̍ti̍ na yajamAnaḥ̍ prAyaṇIyasya̍ niṣkAsa udayanIya̍maBi̍ nirvapati̍ saiva sA yajñasya santatiryAḥ̍ prAyaṇIya̍sya̍ yAjyA# yat tA udayanIya̍sya̍ yAjyA̱ḥ kuryAt parA~gamuM̍ ~MlOkamA rOhEt̍ pramAyukaḥ̍ syAdyAḥ prAyaṇIya̍sya̍ purO&nuvAkyA̱stA ( ) udayanIya̍sya̍ yAjyA̱ḥ karOtyasminnEva lOkE prati# tiṣṭhati||38

verses.padam: - Padam kadrUḥ|ca|vai|suparṇIti# su - parṇI|ca|AtmarUpayOrityA̱tma - rUpayO̱ḥ|aspad^^rdhEtAm|sA|kadrUḥ|suparṇImiti# su-parṇIm|ajayat|sA|abravIt|tRutIyasyAm|itaḥ|divi|sOma̍ḥ|tam|Eti̍|hara|tEna̍|AtmAna̱m|niriti̍|krIṇIṣva|iti̍|iyam|vai|kadrUḥ|asau|suparṇIti̍# su-parṇI|CandAṃsi|sauparṇEyAḥ|sA|abravIt|asmai|vai|pitarau̱|putrAn|biBRutaḥ|tRutIya̍syAm|itaḥ|divi|sOma̍ḥ|tam|Eti̍|hara|tEna̍|AtmAna̱m|niriti̍|krIṇIṣva|39̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kadrUśca vai suparṇI̍ cA̱&&*tmarUpayOrasparddhEtAṃq̍ sA kadrUḥ suparṇIma̍jayath̍ sA&bravIt̍ tRutIyasyAmitO̍ divi sOmastamA hara̍ tEnA&&*tmAnaM niṣkrIṇIṣvEtIyaM̍ ~Mvai kadrUrasau suparṇI̍ CandAṃsi̍ sauparṇEyAḥ sAbravIdasmai̍ vai pitarau# putrAn biBRuta-stRutIya̍syAmitO̍ divi sOmastamA hara̍ tEnA&&*tmAnaM niṣkrIṇIṣvE̍ - [ ] 39

verses.padam: - Padam iti|mA|kadrUḥ|avOcat|iti̍|jaga̍tI|uditi̍|apatat|catu̍rdaśAkṣarEti̍ caturdaśa̍ - akṣarA|satI|sA|aprApyEtyapra# - Apya|nIti|avartata|tasyai̱|dvE̍ iti|akṣarE̍ iti|amIyEtAm|sA|paśuBiriti̍# paśu - Biḥ|ca|dIkṣayA̱|ca|Eti|agacCat|tasmA̱t|jaga̍tI|Canda̍sAm|paśavya̍tamEti̍# paśavya# - tamA|tasmA̱t|paśumantamiti# paśu - manta̱m|dIkṣA|upEti|namati|triṣṭuk|uditi̍|apatat|trayO̍daśAkṣarEti̍ trayOdaśa̍ - akṣarA|satI|sA|aprApyEtyapra# - Apya|nIti|avartata|tasyai̱|dvE̍ iti|akṣarE̍ iti|amIyEtAm|sA|dakṣi̍ṇABiḥ|ca|40̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ti# mA kadrUravOcaditi̍ jagatyudapata-ccatu̍rdaśAkṣarA̍ satI sA &prA̱pya nyavartata̍ tasyai dvE akṣarE# amIyEtAṃq sA paśuBiśca̍ dIkṣayA cA&gacCat̍ tasmAjjagatI̍ CandasAM̍ paśavyatamA̍ tasmA̱t paśumantaM̍ dIkṣOpa# namati triṣṭugudapatat̍ trayOdaśAkṣarA̍ satI sA &prA̱pya nyavartata̍ tasyai dvE akṣarE# amIyEtAṃq sA dakṣiṇABiśca̍ - [ ] 40

verses.padam: - Padam tapasA|ca|Eti̍|agacCat|tasmA̱t|triṣṭuBa̍ḥ|lOkE|mAddhya̍ndinE|sava̍nE|dakṣi̍ṇAḥ|nIyantE|Etat|Kalu̍|vAva|tapa̍ḥ|iti̍|Ahuḥ|yaḥ|svam|dadA̍ti|iti̍|gAyatrI|uditi̍|apatat|catu̍rakṣarEti̍ catuḥ̍ - akṣarA|satI|ajayA̱|jyOtiṣA|tam|asyai|ajA|aBIti̍|arundha|tat|ajAyA̱ḥ|ajatvamitya̍ja-tvam|sA|sOma̱m|ca|Eti̍|aha̍rat|catvAri̍|ca|akṣarA̍ṇi|sA|aṣṭAkṣarEtyaṣṭA̍ - akṣarA|samiti|apadyata|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|41̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tapasA̍ cA&gacCat̍ tasmA̱t triṣṭuBO# lOkE mAddhyandinE̍ savanE̍ dakṣiṇA̍ nIyanta Etat Kalu vAva tapa ityAhuryaḥ̍ svaM dadAtIti# gAyatryudapataccatu̍rakṣarA̍ satyajayA̍ jyOtiṣA̍ tamasyA̍ ajA&Byarundha̍ tadajAyA# ajatvaṃ sA sOmaM cA&&haraccatvAri̍# cAkṣarAṇi̍ sA&ṣṭAkṣarA̍ samapadyata̍ brahmavAdinO# vadanti - [ ] 41

verses.padam: - Padam kasmA̱t|satyAt|gAyatrI|kaniṣṭhA|Canda̍sAm|satI|yajñamuKamiti̍# yajña - muKam|parIti|iyAya|iti̍|yat|Eva|adaḥ|sOma̱m|Eti̍|aha̍rat|tasmA̱t|yajñamuKamiti̍# yajña - muKam|parIti|ait|tasmA̱t|tEjasvinI̍tamEti̍# tEjasvinI̱-tamA|padByAmiti# pat-ByAm|dvE iti|sava̍nE̍ iti|samagRu̍hṇAditi̍# saM - agRuhṇAt|muKE̍na|Eka̱m|yat|muKE̍na|samagRu̍hṇAditi̍# saM - agRuhṇAt|tat|adhayat|tasmA̱t|dvE̍ iti|sava̍nE̍ iti|śukrava̍tI̍ iti# śukra - vatI|prAtassavanamiti# prAtaḥ - savanam|ca|mAddhyandinam|ca|tasmA̱t|tRutIyasavana̍ iti# tRutIya - savanE|RujIṣam|aBIti|sunvanti|dhItam|iva|hi|manya̍ntE|42̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kasmA̱th satyAd-gAyatrI̍ kaniṣṭhA̍ CandasAṃ̍ satI yajñamuKaM̍ parIyAyEti̍ yadEvAdaḥ sOmamA&harat̍ tasmA̱d-yajñamuKaM paryait tasmA̱t tEjasvinItamA̍ padByAM dvE savanE̍ samagRuhṇAn̍ muKEnaikaM ~MyanmuKEna̍ samagRuhṇAt̍ tadadhayat̍ tasmAd dvE savanE̍ śukravatI̍ prAtassavanaM ca mAddhyandinaM̍ ca tasmA̱t tRutIya savana RujIṣamaBi̍ ṣuṇvanti̍ dhItamiva̍ hi manyanta̍ - [ ] 42

verses.padam: - Padam Aśira̱m|avEti|nayati|saśukratvAyEti̍# saśukra - tvAya|athO̍ iti|samiti̍|Barati|Eva|Enat|tam|sOma̱m|AhriyamA̍ṇamityA̱̍ - hriyamAṇam|gandharvaḥ|viśvAva̍suriti̍# viśva - vasuḥ|parIti|amuṣṇAt|saḥ|tisraḥ|rAtrI̱ḥ|pari̍muṣita̍ iti pari# - muṣitaḥ|avasat|tasmA̱t|tisraḥ|rAtrI̱ḥ|krItaḥ|sOmaḥ|vasati|tE|dEvAḥ|abruvann|strIkA̍mA̍ iti strI - kAmAḥ|vai|gandharvAḥ|striyA|niriti|krIṇAma|iti̍|tE|vAca̱m|striya̱m|Eka̍hAyanImityEka̍# - hAyanIm|kRutvA|tayA̱|niriti|akrIṇann|sA|rOhit|rUpam|kRutvA|gandharvEBya̍ḥ|43̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Aśiramava# nayati saśukratvAyAthO saM BaratyEvainat̍ taṃ sOma-mAhriyamA̍ṇaM̍ gandharvO viśvAvasaḥ̍ paryamuṣṇAth̍ sa tisrO rAtrIḥ parimuṣitO&vasat̍ tasmA̱t tisrO rAtrI̱ḥ krItaḥ sOmO# vasati tE dEvA abruvanth̍ strIkAmA̍ vai gandharvA̍ sstriyA niṣkrIṇAmEti̍ tE vAcaṅq striyamEkahAyanIM̍ kRutvA tayA nirakrIṇanth̍ sA rOhid-rUpaM kRutvA gandharvEByO̍-̍ [ ] 43

verses.padam: - Padam apakramyEtyapa̍ - kramya|atiṣṭhat|tat|rOhita̍ḥ|janma̍|tE|dEvAḥ|abruvann|apEti̍|yuṣmat|akra̍mIt|na|asmAn|upAva̍rtata̍ ityupa̍ - AvartatE|vIti̍|hvayAmahai|iti̍|brahma̍|gandharvAḥ|ava̍dann|agA̍yann|dEvAḥ|sA|dEvAn|gAya̍taḥ|upAva̍rtatEtyu̍pa-Ava̍rtata|tasmA̱t|gAya̍ntam|striya̍ḥ|kAmayantE|kAmu̍kAḥ|Enam|striya̍ḥ|Bavanti|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|athO̍ iti|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|apIti̍|janyE̍ṣu|Bava̍ti|tEBya̍ḥ|Eva|dadati|uta|yat|bahuta̍yA̍ iti# bahu - tayAḥ|44 (50)
verses.samhita: &pakramyAtiṣṭhat̍ tad-rOhitO janma tE dEvA abruvannapa̍# yuṣmadakramI-nnAsmAnu-pAva̍rtatE̍ vi hvayAmahA̍ iti brahma# gandharvA avadannagA̍yan̍ dEvAḥ sA dEvAn gAyata̍ upAvartata̍ tasmAd-gAyantaṅq̍ striyaḥ̍ kAmayantE kAmukA̍ Enaṅq striyO# Bavanti ya EvaM ~MvEdAthO ya EvaM ~MvidvAnapi janyEṣu̍ Bavati̍ tEBya# Eva dadatyuta̍ yad-bahutayA̍ - [ ] 44

verses.padam: - Padam Bavanti|Eka̍hAyanyEtyEka̍# - hAyanyA|krIṇAti|vAcA|Eva|Enam|sarvayA|krIṇAti|tasmA̱t|Eka̍hAyanA̍ ityEka-hAyanAḥ|manuṣyA̱ḥ|vAca̱m|vadanti|akU̍ṭayA|aka̍rṇayA|akA̍ṇayA|aślO̍ṇayA|asa̍ptaśaPayEtyasa̍pta̍ - śaPayA|krIṇAti|sarvayA|Eva|Enam|krIṇAti|yat|śvEtayA̱|krIṇIyAt|duścarmEti̍# duḥ - carmA̱|yajamAnaḥ|syAt|yat|kRuṣṇayA̱|anustaraṇItya̍nu̍ - staraṇI|syAt|pramAyu̍ka̍ iti# pra - mAyukaḥ|yaja̍mAnaḥ|syAt|yat|dvirUpayEti̍# dvi - rUpayA̱|vAtraGnIti vAtra# - GnI|syAt|saḥ|vA|anyam|jinIyAt|tam|vA|anyaḥ|jinIyAt|aruṇayA̱|pi~ggAkṣyEti# pi~gga - akṣyA ( )|krIṇAti|Etat|vai|sOmasya|rUpam|svayA̱|Eva|Enam|dEvata̍yA|krIṇAti||45̍ (60)
verses.samhita: BavantyEkahAyanyA̍ krIṇAti vAcaivainaṃq sarvayA̍ krIṇAti tasmAdEkahAyanA̍ manuṣyA# vAcaM̍ ~MvadantyakUṭayA̍ &karṇayA&̍ kAṇayAślO̍ṇayA̍ &saptaśaPayA̍ krIṇAti sarvayaivaina̍M̍ krIṇAti yacCvEtayA̱ krIṇIyAd-duścarmA yajamAnaḥ̍ syAdyat kRuṣṇayA-&nustara̍ṇI̍ syAt pramAyukO̍ yajamAnaḥ̍ syAdyad dvirUpayA̍ vAtraGnI̍ syAth sa vA&nyaM jinIyAt̍ taM ~MvA&nyO jinIyAdaruṇayA̍# pi~ggAkṣyA ( ) krIṇAtyEtadvai̍ sOmasya̍ rUpaṅ svayaivainaM̍ dEvatayA̍ krIṇAti||45

verses.padam: - Padam tat|hiraṇyam|aBavat|tasmA̱t|adBya̍ ityat̍ - Byaḥ|hiraṇyam|punanti|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|kasmA̱t|satyAt|anasthikE̍na|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|pravIyanta̍ iti# pra - vIyantE|asthanvatIritya̍sthann̍ - vatI̱ḥ|jAyantE|iti|yat|hira̍ṇyam|GRutE|avadhAyEtya̍va̍ - dhAya|juhOti̍|tasmA̱t|anasthikE̍na|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|prEti|vIyantE|asthanvatIritya̍sthann̍ - vatI̱ḥ|jAyantE|Etat|vai|agnEḥ|priyam|dhAma|yat|GRutam|tEja̍ḥ|hira̍ṇyam|iyam|tE|śukra|tanUḥ|idam|varca̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|satE̍jasamiti̍ sa - tEjasam|Eva|Enam|satanumiti̍ sa - tanum|46 (50)
verses.samhita: taddhiraṇyamaBavat̍ tasmAdadByO̍ hiraṇyaM̍ punanti brahmavAdinO# vadanti kasmA̱th satyAdanasthikE̍na̍ prajAḥ pravIyantE̍ &sthanvatI̱rjAyanta iti yaddhiraṇyaM̍ GRutE&vadhAya̍# juhOti tasmAdanasthikE̍na̍ prajAḥ pra vIyantE̍ &sthanvatI̱rjAyanta EtadvA agnEḥ priyaM dhAma yad-GRutaM tEjO hiraṇyamiyantE̍# śukra tanUridaM ~Mvarca ityAha̍ satEjasamEvainaṃq̍ satanuM̍ - [ ] 46

verses.padam: - Padam karOti|athO iti|samiti̍|Barati|Eva|Enam|yat|aba̍ddham|avadaddhyAditya̍va̍ -daddhyAt|garBA̱ḥ|prajAnAmiti# pra - jAnA̱m|parApAtukA̍ iti# parA-pAtukAḥ|syuḥ|baddham|avEti̍|dadhAti|garBA̍ṇAm|dhRutyai̱|niṣṭarkya̱m|baddhnAti|prajAnAmiti̍# pra - jAnA̱m|prajananAyEti̍# pra-jananAya|vAk|vai|EṣA|yat|sOmakrayaṇIti̍# sOma - krayaṇI|jUḥ|asi|iti̍|Aha|yat|hi|mana̍sA|java̍tE|tat|vAcA|vada̍ti|dhRutA|mana̍sA|iti̍|Aha|mana̍sA|hi|vAk|dhRutA|juṣṭA̱|viṣṇa̍vE|iti̍|Aha|47̍ (50)
verses.samhita: karOtyathO saM BaratyEvainaM̍ ~Myadabaddhama-vadaddhyAd-garBA̱ḥ̍ prajAnA̱M parApAtukAḥ̍ syurbaddhamava# dadhAti garBAṇAM̍ dhRutyai# niṣṭarkyaM̍ baddhnAti prajAnA̱M prajananAya̍ vAgvA EṣA yath sOmakraya̍ṇI̍ jUrasItyAha̍ yaddhi manasA̍ javatE̍ tad-vAcA vadati̍ dhRutA manasEtyAha̍ manasA̍ hi vAgdhRutA juṣṭA viṣṇava̍ ityAha̍ - [ ] 47

verses.padam: - Padam yajñaḥ|vai|viṣṇuḥ|yajñAya̍|Eva|EnAm|juṣṭA̱m|karOti|tasyA̱ḥ|tE|satyasa̍vasa̍ iti# satya - savasaḥ|prasava iti# pra - savE|iti|Aha|savitRupra̍sUtAmiti̍# savitRu - prasUtAm|Eva|vAca̱m|avEti|rundhE|kAṇḍE̍kAṇḍa̍ iti kAṇḍE̱-kAṇḍE|vai|kriyamAṇE|yajñam|rakṣAṃ̍si|jiGAṃqsanti|Eṣaḥ|Kalu̍|vai|ara̍kṣOhata̍ ityarakṣaḥ̍ - hataḥ|panthA̱ḥ|yaḥ|agnEḥ|ca|sUryasya|ca|sUrya̍sya|cakṣu̍ḥ|Eti̍|aruham|agnEḥ|akṣṇaḥ|kanIni̍kAm|iti̍|Aha|yaḥ|Eva|ara̍kṣOhata̍ ityarakṣaḥ-hataḥ|panthA̱ḥ|tam|samArO̍hatIti̍# saM - ArOhati|48̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yajñO vai viṣṇu# ryajñAyaivainAM juṣṭA̱M karOti tasyA̱stE satyasavasaḥ̍ prasava ityAha̍ savitRu-prasUtAmEva̍ vAcamava# rundhE kAṇḍEkAṇḍE̍ vai kriyamAṇE̍ yajñaṃ rakṣAṃsi̍ jiGAṃsantyEṣa Kalu vA arakṣOhataḥ̍ panthA yO̱&gnEśca sUryasya̍ ca sUryasya̍ cakṣurA-&ruhamagnErakṣṇaḥ̍ kanInikAmityA̍ha̍ ya EvArakṣOhataḥ̍ panthAstaṃ samArOhati̍ - [ ] 48

verses.padam: - Padam vAk|vai|EṣA|yat|sOmakrayaṇIti# sOma - krayaṇI|cit|asi|manA|asi|iti̍|Aha|śAsti̍|Eva|EnAm|Etat|tasmA̱t|śiṣṭAḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|jAyantE|cit|asi|iti|Aha|yat|hi|mana̍sA|cEtaya̍tE|tat|vAcA|vada̍ti|manA|asi|iti̍|Aha|yat|hi|mana̍sA|aBigacCatItya̍Bi̍ - gacCati|tat|karOti̍|dhIḥ|asi|iti̍|Aha|yat|hi|mana̍sA|dhyAya̍ti|tat|vAcA|49̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vAgvA EṣA yath sOmakraya̍ṇI̍ cidasi̍ manA&sItyAha̍ śAstyEvainAmEtat̍ tasmA̱cCiṣṭAḥ prajA jAyantE̍ cidasItyAha̍ yaddhi manasA̍ cEtayatE̍ tad-vAcA vadati̍ manA&sItyAha̍ yaddhi manasA&BigacCa̍ti̍ tat karOti dhIrasItyAha̍ yaddhi manasA̍ dhyAyati̍ tad-vAcA - [ ] 49

verses.padam: - Padam vadati|dakṣi̍ṇA|asi|iti̍|Aha|dakṣi̍ṇA|hi|EṣA|yajñiyA̱|asi|iti̍|Aha|yajñiyA̱m|Eva|EnAm|karOti|kṣatriyA̱|asi|iti̍|Aha|kṣatriyA̱|hi|EṣA|adi̍tiḥ|asi|uBayata̍śśIrṣṇItyu̍Bayata̍ḥ̍ - śIrṣṇI|iti|Aha|yat|Eva|Adityaḥ|prAyaṇIya̍ iti# pra - ayaṇIyaḥ|yajñAnA̱m|Adityaḥ|udayanIya̍ ityut̍ - ayanIyaḥ|tasmA̱t|Evam|Aha|yat|aba̍ddhA|syAt|aya̍tA|syAt|yat|padibaddhEti̍# padi - baddhA|anustaraṇItyanu̍ - staraṇI|syAt|pramAyu̍ka̍ iti# pra - mAyukaḥ|yaja̍mAnaḥ|syAt|50̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vadati̍ dakṣiṇA&sItyA̍ha̍ dakṣiṇA̍ hyEṣA̍ yajñiyA&sItyAha̍ yajñiyAmEvainA̱M̍ karOti kṣatriyAsItyAha̍ kṣatriyA hyEṣA̍ &ditirasyuBayata̍śśIrṣṇItyA̍ha̍ yadEvA&&*dityaḥ prAyaṇIyO̍# yajñAnAmAditya̍ udayanIya-stasmA̍dEvamA̍ha̍ yadabaddhA̍ syAdayatA̍ syAdyat padibaddhA-&nustara̍ṇI̍ syAt pramAyukO̍ yajamAnaḥ̍ syA - [ ] 50

verses.padam: - Padam yat|karṇagRuhItEti# karṇa-gRuhItA|vArtraGnIti vArtra# - GnI|syAt|saḥ|vA|anyam|jinIyAt|tam|vA|anyaḥ|jinIyAt|mitraḥ|tvA|padi|baddhnAtu|iti|Aha|mitraḥ|vai|śivaḥ|dEvAnA̱m|tEna̍|Eva|EnAm|padi|baddhnAti|pUṣA|addhva̍naḥ|pAtu|iti̍|Aha|iyam|vai|pUṣA|imAm|Eva|asyAḥ|adhipAmitya̍dhi̍ - pAm|akaḥ|samaṣṭyA̍ iti saM - aṣṭyai|indrAya|addhya̍kṣAyEtyadhi̍# - akṣAya|iti|Aha|indra̱m|Eva|asyAḥ|addhya̍kṣamityadhi̍# - akṣam|karOti|51 (50)
verses.samhita: -dyat karṇagRuhItA̍ vArtraGnI̍ syAth sa vA&nyaM jinIyAt̍ taM ~MvA&nyO jinIyAnmitrastvA̍# padi baddhnAtvityA̍ha̍ mitrO vai śivO dEvAnAM tEnaivainA̱M padi baddhnAti̍ pUṣA&ddhvanaḥ̍ pAtvityAhEyaM̍ ~Mvai pUṣEmAmEvAsyA# adhipAmakaḥ̍ samaṣṭyA̍ indrAyA-ddhyakṣAyEtyAhEndra̍mEvAsyA̍ addhyakṣaM̍ karO - [ ] 51

verses.padam: - Padam anviti|tvA|mAtA|manyatAm|anviti̍|pitA|iti̍|Aha|anu̍matayEtyanu̍# - matayA|Eva|EnayA|krIṇAti|sA|dEvi|dEvam|acCa|ihi|iti̍|Aha|dEvI|hi|EṣA|dEvaḥ|sOma̍ḥ|indrA̍ya|sOma̱m|iti̍|Aha|indrA̍ya|hi|sOma̍ḥ|Ahriyata̍ ityA̱ - hriyatE̱|yat|Etat|yajuḥ|na|brUyAt|parA̍cI|Eva|sOmakrayaṇIti̍# sOma - krayaṇI|iyAt|rudraḥ|tvA|Eti̍|vartayatu|iti̍|Aha|rudraḥ|vai|krUraḥ|52̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -tyanu# tvA mAtA manyatAmanu̍# pitEtyAhA-numatayaivaina̍yA̍ krIṇAti sA dEvi̍ dEvamacCEhItyAha̍ dEvI hyEṣA̍ dEvaḥ sOma indrAya̍ sOmamityAhEndrAya̍ hi sOma# AhriyatE yadEtad-yajurna brUyAt parA̱cyEva sOmakraya̍ṇIyAd-rudrastvA&&̍ vartayatvityA̍ha̍ rudrO vai krUrO - [ ] 52

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAnA̱m|tam|Eva|asyai|parastA̱t|dadhAti|AvRuttyA̍ ityA - vRuttyai|krUram|iva|vai|Etat|karOti|yat|rudrasya|kIrtaya̍ti|mitrasya̍|pathA|iti̍|Aha|śAntyai̱|vAcA|vai|Eṣaḥ|vIti̍|krIṇItE|yaḥ|sOmakrayaṇyEti̍# sOma - krayaṇyA|svasti|sOma̍saKEti̍ sOma# - saKA|punaḥ|Eti̍|ihi|saha|rayyA|iti̍|Aha|vAcA|Eva|vikrIyEti̍# vi - krIya|puna̍ḥ|Atman|vAca̱m|dhattE|anu̍padAsukEtyanu̍pa̍ - dAsukA|asya|vAk|Bavati|yaḥ|Evam|vEda# ( )||53 (50)
verses.samhita: dEvAnAM tamEvAsyai# parastA̱d-dadhAtyAvRuttyai̍ krUramiva̍ vA Etat karOti̍ yad-rudrasya# kIrtayati̍ mitrasya# pathEtyAha̍ śAntyai# vAcA vA Eṣa vi krIṇItE̍ yaḥ sOmakraya̍ṇyA̍ svasti sOmasaKA̍ punarEhi# saha rayyEtyAha̍ vAcaiva vikrIya punarAtman̍ vAcaM̍ dhattE&nupadAsukA&sya̍ vAgBavati̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda# ( )||53

verses.padam: - Padam ṣaṭ|padAni|anu̍|nIti̍|krAmati|ṣaḍahamiti̍# ṣaṭ - aham|vAk|na|atIti|vadati|uta|saM~MvathsarasyEti̍# saM-vathsarasya|aya̍nE|yAva̍tI|Eva|vAk|tAm|avEti̍|rundhE|saptamE|padE|juhOti|saptapadEti̍# sapta - padA|śakvarI|paśava̍ḥ|śakva̍rI|paśUn|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|sapta|grAmyAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|sapta|AraṇyAḥ|sapta|CandAṃ̍si|uBaya̍sya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|vasvI̱|asi|rudrA|asi|iti|Aha|rUpam|Eva|asyAḥ|Etat|mahimAna̱m|54̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ṣaṭ padAnyanu ni krAmati̍ ṣaḍahaM ~MvA~gnAti# vadatyuta saM~MvathsarasyAya̍nE̍ yAvatyEva̍ vAktAmava# rundhE saptamE padE juhOti̍ saptapadA̍ śakvarI̍ paśavaḥ śakvarI̍ paśUnEvAva# rundhE sapta grAmyAḥ paśavaḥ̍ saptA*&&raṇyAḥ sapta CandAṅ-syuBayasyA-va̍ruddhyai̍ vasvyasi̍ rudrA&sItyAha̍ rUpamEvAsyA# Etan mahimAnaM̍ - [ ] 54

verses.padam: - Padam vyAcaṣṭa̍ iti# vi-AcaṣṭE|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|tvA|sumnE|raṇvatu|iti̍|Aha|brahma̍|vai|dEvAnA̱m|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|brahma̍ṇA|Eva|asmai|paśUn|avEti̍|rundhE|rudraḥ|vasu̍Biriti̍ vasu# - Biḥ|Eti|cikEtu|iti̍|Aha|AvRu̍ttyA̍ ityA - vRuttyai|pRuthivyAḥ|tvA|mUd^^rdhann|Eti|jiGarmi|dEvayaja̍na̍ iti# dEva-yajanE|iti̍|Aha|pRuthivyAḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|mUd^^rdhA|yat|dEvayaja̍namiti̍# dEva - yajanam|iḍA̍yAḥ|padE|iti̍|Aha|iḍA̍yai|hi|Etat|padam|yat|sOmakraya̍ṇyA̍ iti# sOma - krayaṇyai|GRutavatIti̍# GRuta-vati|svAhA̱|55 (50)
verses.samhita: ~MvyAcaṣṭE̍ bRuhaspatistvA̍ sumnE raṇvatvityA̍ha̍ brahma vai dEvAnAM bRuhaspati-rbrahmaṇaivAsmai̍# paśUnava# rundhE rudrO vasuBirA̍ cikEtvityAhA&&*vRu̍ttyai̍ pRuthivyAstvA# mUrddhannA jiGarmi̍ dEvayajana̍ ityAha̍ pRuthivyA hyEṣa̍ mUrddhA yad-dEvayaja̍namiḍA̍yAḥ̍ pada ityAhEḍAyai̍ hyEtat̍ padaM ~Myath sOmakraya̍ṇyai̍ GRutavati̍ svAhE - [ ] 55

verses.padam: - Padam iti|Aha|yat|Eva|asyai|padAt|GRutam|apI̱ḍyata|tasmA̱t|Evam|Aha|yat|addhvaryuḥ|anagnau|Ahu̍timityA̍ - hutim|juhuyAt|andhaḥ|addhvaryuḥ|syAt|rakṣAṃsi|yajñam|hanyuḥ|hira̍ṇyam|upAsyEtyu̍pa̍ - asya|juhOti|agnivatItya̍gni̍ - vati|Eva|juhOti|na|andhaḥ|addhvaryuḥ|Bava̍ti|na|yajñam|rakṣAṃ̍si|Gnanti|kAṇḍE̍kAṇḍa̍ iti kAṇḍE̱ - kAṇḍE|vai|kriyamAṇE|yajñam|rakṣAṃ̍si|jiGAṃqsanti|pari̍liKitamiti̍ pari# - liKitam|rakṣaḥ|pari̍liKitA̍ iti pari# - liKitAḥ|arAtayaḥ|iti̍|Aha|rakṣa̍sAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa# - hatyai|56 (50)
verses.samhita: -tyAha̍ yadEvAsyai# padAd-GRutamapI̱ḍyata tasmAdEvamA̍ha̍ yadaddhvaryura̍nagnAvAhu̍tiM̍ juhuyAdandhO̱&ddhvaryuḥ syAd-rakṣAṃsi̍ yajñaṃ hanyurqḥira̍ṇyamupAsya̍# juhOtyagnivatyEva juhOti̍ nAndhO̱&ddhvaryu rBavati̍ na yajñaṃ rakṣAṃsi̍ Gnanti kAṇḍEkAṇḍE̍ vai kriyamAṇE̍ yajñaṃ rakṣAṃsi̍ jiGAṃsanti pariliKitaṃq̍ rakṣaḥ pariliKitA̍ arAtaya̍ ityAha̍ rakṣasAmapa̍hatyA̍ - [ ] 56

verses.padam: - Padam idam|aham|rakṣasaḥ|grIvAḥ|apIti̍|kRuntAmi|yaḥ|asmAn|dvEṣṭi̍|yam|ca|vayam|dviṣmaḥ|iti̍|Aha|dvau|vAva|puru̍ṣau|yam|ca|Eva|dvEṣṭi̍|yaḥ|ca|Enam|dvEṣṭi̍|tayO̱ḥ|Eva|ana̍ntarAyamityana̍ntaḥ̍ - Ayam|grIvAḥ|kRuntati|paśavaḥ|vai|sOmakraya̍ṇyA̍ iti# sOma - krayaṇyai|padam|yAvattmUtamiti̍# yAvat - tmUtam|samiti|vapati|paśUn|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|asmE̍ iti|rAya̍ḥ|iti̍|samiti̍|vapati|AtmAna̱m|Eva|addhvaryuḥ|57̍ (50)
verses.samhita: idamahaṃ rakṣasO̍ grIvA api# kRuntAmi yO̱&smAn dvEṣṭi yaM ca# vayaM dviṣma ityAha̍ dvau vAva puruṣau̍ yaM caiva dvEṣṭi yaścainaM dvEṣṭi tayOrEvAna̍ntarAyaM̍ grIvAḥ kRuntati̍ paśavO vai sOmakraya̍ṇyai̍ padaM ~MyAvattmUtaṃ̍ saM ~Mvapati̍ paśUnEvAva# rundhE&smE rAya iti saM ~MvapatyAtmAna̍-mEvAddhvaryuḥ̍ - [ ] 57

verses.padam: - Padam paśuBya iti# paśu - Byaḥ|na|antaḥ|Eti|tvE iti|rAya̍ḥ|iti̍|yaja̍mAnAya|prEti̍|yacCati|yaja̍mAnE|Eva|rayim|dadhAti|tOtE̱|rAya̍ḥ|iti̍|patni̍yai|ad^^rdhaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|Atmana̍ḥ|yat|patnI̱|yathA̱|gRuhEṣu̍|nidhatta̍ iti# ni - dhattE|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|tvaṣṭImatI|tE|sapEya|iti̍|Aha|tvaṣṭA̱|vai|paśUnAm|mithunAnA̱m|rUpakRuditi̍# rUpa - kRut|rUpam|Eva|paśuṣu|dadhAti|asmai|vai|lOkAya̍|gAṛha̍patya̍ iti gAṛha# - patyaḥ|Eti|dhIyatE̍ ( )|amuṣmai̱|AhavanIya ityA̱ - havanIyaḥ|yat|gAṛha̍patya̍ iti gAṛha-̍ patyE|upavapEdityupa̍ - vapE̱t|asminn|lOkE|paśumAniti# paśu - mAn|syAt|yat|AhavanIya ityA̱ - havanIyE̱|amuṣminn|lOkE|paśumAniti̍# paśu - mAn|syAt|uBayO̱ḥ|upEti|vapati|uBayO̱ḥ|Eva|Enam|lOkayO̱ḥ|paśumantamiti̍# paśu - manta̱m|karOti||58 (74) (mahimAnaṅq - svAhA - &pahatyA̍ - adhvaryu - dhIyatE̍ - caturviṃśatiśca)̍ (A8)
verses.samhita: paśuByO nAntarEti̍ tvE rAya iti yajamAnAya̍ pra yacCati̍ yajamAna̍ Eva rayiM dadhAti̍ tOtE rAya iti patniyA̍ arddhO vA Eṣa AtmanO yat patnI yathA# gRuhEṣu# nidhattE tAdRugEva tat tvaṣṭImatI̍ tE sapEyEtyAha̍ tvaṣṭA vai paśUnAM̍ mithunAnAṃ̍# rUpakRud-rUpamEva paśuṣu# dadhAtyasmai vai lOkAya gAṛhapatya̍ A dhIyatE̍ ( ) &muṣmA# AhavanIyO yad-gAṛhapatya̍ upavapEdasmin̍ ~MlOkE paśamAnth̍ syAd-yadAhavanIyE̍ &muṣmin̍ ~MlOkE paśumAnth̍ syAduBayOrupa̍# vapatyuBayOrEvaina̍M̍ ~MlOkayO̱ḥ paśumantaM̍ karOti||58 (mahimAnaṅq - svAhA - &pahatyA̍ - adhvaryu - dhIyatE̍ - caturviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam brahmavAdina iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|vicitya̍ iti# vi-cityaḥ|sOmA(3)ḥ|na|vicityA(3)̍ iti vi - cityA(3)ḥ|iti|sOma̍ḥ|vai|Oṣa̍dhInAm|rAjA̱|tasminn̍|yat|Apa̍nnamityA̍ - pannam|grasitam|Eva|asya|tat|yat|vicinuyAditi# vi - cinuyAt|yathA̱|AsyA̱t|grasitam|niṣKidatIti# niḥ - Kidati|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|yat|na|vicinuyAditi̍# vi - cinuyAt|yathA̱|akṣann|ApannamityA̍ - pannam|vidhAvatIti# vi - dhAvati|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|kṣOdhu̍kaḥ|addhvaryuḥ|syAt|kṣOdhu̍kaḥ|yaja̍mAnaḥ|sOma̍vikrayinniti̍ sOma# -vikrayinn|sOma̱m|śOdhaya|iti|Eva|brUyAt|yadi̍|ita̍ram|59̍ (50)
verses.samhita: brahmavAdinO# vadanti vicityaḥ sOmA(3) na vicityA(3) iti sOmO vA OṣadhInAṃq̍ rAjA tasmina. yadApannaM̍ grasitamEvAsya tad-yad-vicinuyAd-yathA̍ &&syA̱dgrasitaM niṣKidati̍# tAdRugEva tadyanna vicinuyAd-yathA̍ &kṣannApannaM̍ ~MvidhAvati̍ tAdRugEva tat kṣOdhukO̍ &ddhvaryuḥ syAt kṣOdhukO̍ yajamAnaḥ̍ sOmavikrayinth̍ sOmaṃ# śOdhayEtyEva brUyAd̍ yadItaraM̍ - [ ] 59

verses.padam: - Padam yadi|ita̍ram|uBayE̍na|Eva|sOmavikrayiṇamiti̍# sOma - vikrayiṇa̱m|arpayati|tasmA̱t|sOmavikrayIti# sOma - vikrayI|kṣOdhukaḥ|aruṇaḥ|ha|sma|Aha|aupa̍vEśirityaupa̍-vEśiḥ|sOmakraya̍ṇa̍ iti# sOma - krayaṇE|Eva|aham|tRutIyasavanamiti̍# tRutIya - savanam|avEti|rundhE|iti̍|paśUnAm|carmann̍|mimItE|paśUn|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|paśava̍ḥ|hi|tRutIya̱m|sava̍nam|yam|kAmayE̍ta|apaśuḥ|syAt|iti̍|Rukṣataḥ|tasya̍|mimIta|Rukṣam|vai|apaśavyam|apaśuḥ|Eva|Bavati|yam|kAmayE̍ta|paśumAniti̍# paśu - mAn|syAt|60 (50)
verses.samhita: ~MyadItaramuBayE̍naiva̍ sOmavikrayiṇa̍-marpayati̍ tasmA̱th sOmavikrayI kṣOdhukO̍ &ruṇO ha# smA&&*haupavEśiḥ̍ sOmakrayaṇa̍ EvAhaM tRutIya̍ savanamava# rundha iti# paśUnAM carman̍ mimItE paśUnEvAva# rundhE paśavO hi tRutIyaṃq savanaM̍ ~MyaM kAmayEtApaśuḥ̍ syAdityRukṣatastasya̍# mimItarkṣaM ~MvA apaśavyama̍paśurEva̍ Bavati̍ yaM kAmayEta̍ paśumAnth syA - [ ] 60

verses.padam: - Padam iti|lOmataḥ|tasya̍|mimIta|Etat|vai|paśUnAm|rUpam|rUpEṇa̍|Eva|asmai|paśUn|avEti̍|rundhE|paśumAniti̍# paśu - mAn|Eva|Bavati|apAm|antE̱|krIṇAti|sarasamiti̍ sa-rasam|Eva|Enam|krIṇAti|amAtyaḥ|asi|iti̍|Aha|amA|Eva|Enam|kurutE|śukraḥ|tE|graha̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|śukraḥ|hi|asya|graha̍ḥ|ana̍sA|acCa̍|yAti|mahimAna̱m|Eva|asya|acCa̍|yAti|ana̍sA|61̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -diti# lOmatastasya# mimItaitadvai paśUnAṃ̍ rUpaṃ rUpEṇaivAsmai# paśUnava# rundhE paśumAnEva BavatyapAmantE̱̍ krIṇAti sarasamEvaina̍M̍ krIṇAtya-mAtyO&sItyAhAmaivaina̍M̍ kurutE śukrastE graha ityAha̍ śukrO hyasya̍ grahO &nasA&cCa# yAti mahimAna-mEvAsyAcCa̍# yAtyanasA - [ ] 61

verses.padam: - Padam acCa|yAti|tasmA̱t|anOvAhya̍mitya̍naḥ̍ - vAhya̱m|samE|jIvanam|yatra̍|Kalu̍|vai|Etam|śIrṣṇA|hara̍nti|tasmA̱t|śIrq.ṣahArya̍miti̍# śIṛṣa-hArya̱m|girau|jIvanam|aBIti̍|tyam|dEvam|savitAra̱m|iti̍|ati̍cCandasEtyati̍# - CandasA|RucA|mimIta|aticCandA̍ ityati# - CandAḥ|vai|sarvAṇi|CandAṃ̍si|sarvE̍Biḥ|Eva|Enam|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ-Biḥ|mimItE|varṣma̍|vai|EṣA|Canda̍sAm|yat|ati̍cCandA̍ ityati# - CandAḥ|yat|aticCandasEtyati̍-CandasA|RucA|mimI̍tE|varṣma̍|Eva|Enam|samAnAnA̱m|karOti|Eka̍yaikayEtyEka̍yA̍ - EkayA|uthsargamityut̍ - sarga̱m|62 (50)
verses.samhita: &cCa# yAti tasmAdanOvAhyaṃ̍# samE jIvanaM̍ ~Myatra Kalu vA Etaṃ śIrṣṇA haranti̍ tasmA̱cCIṛṣahAryaM̍ girau jIvanamaBi̍ tyaM dEvaṃ savitAramityati̍-cCandasarcA̍ mimItE̍ &ticCandA̍ vai sarvAṇi̍ CandAṃsi̍ sarvEBirEvainaM̍ CandOBirmimItE̍ varṣma vA EṣA CandasAM̍ ~MyadaticCandA̍ yadaticCandasarcA̍ mimItE̍ varṣmaivainaṃ# samAnAnA̱M karOtyEkayaikayOth̍ sargaM-̍ [ ] 62

verses.padam: - Padam mimItE|ayAtayAmniyAyAtayAmniyEtyayA̍tayAmniyA-ayAtayAmniyA|Eva|Enam|mimItE|tasmA̱t|nAnA̍vIryA̍ iti nAnA̱ - vIryAḥ|a~ggulayaḥ|sarvA̍su|a~gguṣṭham|upa̍|nIti̍|gRuhṇAti|tasmA̱t|samAva̍dvIrya̍ iti# samAvat̍ - vIryaḥ|anyABiḥ|a~gguli̍Biritya~gguli̍# - Biḥ|tasmA̱t|sarvA̱ḥ|anu|samiti̍|carati|yat|saha|sarvA̍Biḥ|mimI̍ta|saṅśli̍ṣṭA̍ iti saM - śliṣṭAḥ|a~ggulayaḥ|jAyErann|Eka̍yaikayEtyEka̍yA-EkayA|uthsargamityu̍t̍ - sarga̱m|mimItE|tasmA̱t|viBaktA̍ iti vi - BaktAḥ|jAyantE|pa~jca|kRutva̍ḥ|yaju̍ṣA|mimItE|pa~jcA̱kṣarEti̍ pa~jca# - akṣarA|pa~gktiḥ|pA~gktaḥ|yajñaḥ|yajñam|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|pa~jca̍|kRutva̍ḥ|tUṣṇIm|63̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mimItE &yAtayAmniyAyAtayAmniyaivaina̍M̍ mimItE tasmAnnAnAvIryA̍ a~ggulayaḥ̍ sarvA̱sva~gguṣṭhamupa ni gRuhṇAti̍ tasmA̱th samAvadvIryO&nyABi̍-ra~gguli̍BistasmAth̍ sarvA anu saM carati̍ yath saha sarvABirmimI̍ta̍ saṅśliṣṭA̍ a~ggulayO̍ jAyEra-nnEkayaikayOth̍ sargaM̍ mimItE tasmAd viBaktA̍ jAyantE pa~jca kRutvO yajuṣA̍ mimItE pa~jcA̱kṣarA pa~gktiḥ pA~gktO# yajñO yajñamEvAva# rundhE pa~jca kRutvastUṣṇIM-̍ [ ] 63

verses.padam: - Padam daśa|samiti̍|padyantE|daśA̱kṣarEti̍ daśa# - akṣarA|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|anna̱m|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjEti# vi - rAjA̱|Eva|annAdyamityanna̍ -adya̱m|avEti|rundhE|yat|yaju̍ṣA|mimI̍tE|BUtam|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|yat|tUṣṇIm|Baviṣyat|yat|vai|tAvAn̍|Eva|sOma̍ḥ|syAt|yAva̍ntam|mimI̍tE|yaja̍mAnasya|Eva|syAt|na|apIti̍|sadasyA̍nAm|prajABya̍ iti# pra - jAByaḥ|tvA|iti̍|upa̍|samiti̍|Uhati|sadasyAn̍|Eva|anvABa̍jatItya̍nu-ABa̍jati|vAsa̍sA|upEti̍|nahyati|sarvadEvatya̍miti̍# sarva - dEvatya̱m|vai|64 (50)
verses.samhita: -daśa saM padyantE̍ daśA̱kṣarA virAḍannaM̍ ~MvirAḍ virAjaivAnnAdyamava# rundhE yad yajuṣA̍ mimItE̍ BUtamEvAva# rundhE yat tUṣṇIM Baviṣyad-yad-vai̍ tAvAnEva̍ sOmaḥ syAd yAvantaM̍ mimItE̍ yajamAnasyaiva̍ syAnnApi# sadasyAnAM̍ prajAByastvEtyupa samUhati̍ sadasyAnEvAnvA̍ Bajati̍ vAsasOpa# nahyati sarvadEvatyaM̍ ~Mvai - [ ] 64

verses.padam: - Padam vAsaḥ|sarvA̍Biḥ|Eva|Enam|dEvatA̍Biḥ|samiti̍|ad^^rdhayati|paśava̍ḥ|vai|sOma̍ḥ|prAṇAyEti̍# pra - anAya|tvA|iti̍|upEti̍|nahyati|prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|Eva|paśuṣu|dadhAti|vyAnAyEti̍# vi - anAya|tvA|iti̍|anviti̍|śRunthati|vyAnamiti̍# vi - anam|Eva|paśuṣu|dadhAti|tasmA̱t|svapanta̱m|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|na|jahati||65 (33) (itaraM̍ - paśumAnth syA̱d - yAtyanasO̍ - thsargaM̍ - tUṣṇIṃ - sarvadEvatya̍M̍ ~Mvai - trayastriṃśacca)̍ (A9)
verses.samhita: vAsaḥ sarvABirEvaina̍M̍ dEvatABiḥ̍ samarddhayati̍ paśavO vai sOmaḥ̍ prAṇAya tvEtyupa# nahyati prAṇamEva paśuṣu# dadhAti vyAnAya tvEtyanu# śRunthati vyAnamEva paśuṣu# dadhAti tasmA̱th svapantaM̍ prAṇA na jahati||65̍ (itaraM̍ - paśumAnth syA̱d - yAtyanasO̍ - thsargaM̍ - tUṣṇIṃ - sarvadEvatya̍M̍ ~Mvai - trayastriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam yat|kalayA̱|tE|śaPEna|tE|krIṇAni|iti̍|paṇE̍ta|agO̍arGamityagO̱̍ - arGam|sOma̱m|kuryAt|agOarGamityagO̱̍ - arGam|yajamAnam|agO̍arGamityagO̱-arGam|addhvaryum|gOḥ|tu|mahimAna̱m|na|avEti̍|tirEt|gavA̱|tE|krIṇAni|iti̍|Eva|brUyAt|gOarGamiti̍# gO - arGam|Eva|sOma̱m|karOti|gOarGamiti̍# gO - arGam|yajamAnam|gOarGamiti̍# gO - arGam|addhvaryum|na|gOḥ|mahimAna̱m|avEti|tirati|ajayA̱|krIṇAti|sata̍pasamiti̍ sa - tapasam|Eva|Enam|krIṇAti|hiraṇyEna|krIṇAti|saśu̍kramiti̍ sa - śukram|Eva|66 (50)
verses.samhita: yat kalayA# tE śaPEna# tE krIṇAnIti paṇEtAgOarGaṃq̍ sOmaM̍ kuryAdagOarGaM̍ ~MyajamAna-magO̍arGamaddhvaryuM̍ gOstu mahimAnaM̍ nAva# tirEd gavA# tE krIṇAnItyEva brUyAd̍ gOarGamEva sOmaM̍ karOti# gOarGaM ~MyajamAnaM̍ gOarGamaddhvaryuM̍ na gOrmahimAnamava̍# tiratyajayA̱ krIṇAti satapasamEvaina̍M̍ krIṇAti hiraṇyEna̍ krIṇAti saśukramEvai̍ - [ ] 66

verses.padam: - Padam Enam|krIṇAti|dhEnvA|krIṇAti|sAśiramiti̍ sa - Aśiram|Eva|Enam|krIṇAti|RuṣaBEṇa|krIṇAti|sEndramiti̍ sa-indram|Eva|Enam|krIṇAti|anaḍuhA̱|krIṇAti|vahniḥ|vai|anaḍvAn|vahni̍nA|Eva|vahni̍|yajñasya̍|krIṇAti|mithunAByA̱m|krIṇAti|mithunasya̍|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|vAsasA|krIṇAti|sarvadEvatya̍miti̍# sarva - dEvatya̱m|vai|vAsaḥ|sarvA̱Byaḥ|Eva|Enam|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|krIṇAti|daśa̍|samiti̍|padyantE|daśA̱kṣarEti̍ daśa# - akṣarA|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|anna̱m|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjEti# vi - rAjA̱|Eva|annAdyamityanna̍ -adya̱m|avEti|rundhE|67̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -naM̍ krIṇAti dhEnvA krIṇAti̍ sAśiramEvaina̍M̍ krIṇAtyRuṣaBEṇa# krIṇAti sEndramEvaina̍M̍ krIṇAtyanaḍuhA̱ krIṇAti vahnirvA anaḍvAn.̍ vahninaiva̍ vahni# yajñasya# krIṇAti mithunAByA̱M krIṇAti mithunasyAva-ruddhyai̍ vAsasA̍ krIṇAti sarvadEvatyaM̍ ~Mvai vAsaḥ sarvA̱Bya EvainaM̍ dEvatA̱Byaḥ krIṇAti daśa saM padyantE̍ daśA̱kṣarA virAḍannaM̍ ~MvirAḍ virAjaivAnnAdyamava# rundhE - [ ] 67

verses.padam: - Padam tapasaḥ|tanUḥ|asi|prajApa̍tEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|varṇaḥ|iti̍|Aha|paśuBya̍ iti# paśu - Byaḥ|Eva|tat|addhvaryuḥ|nIti|hnutE|Atmana̍ḥ|anA̱vraskAyEtyanA̱̍ - vraskAya|gacCati|śriya̱m|prEti̍|paśUn|ApnOti|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|śukram|tE|śukrEṇa̍|krIṇAmi|iti̍|Aha|yathAyajuriti̍# yathA-yajuḥ|Eva|Etat|dEvAḥ|vai|yEna|hira̍ṇyEna|sOma̱m|akrI̍ṇann|tat|aBIṣahEtya̍Bi-sahA̱|puna̍ḥ|Eti̍|adadata|kaḥ|hi|tEja̍sA|vikrEṣyata̍ iti# vi - krEṣyatE̱|iti|yEna̍|hira̍ṇyEna|68̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tapasastanUra̍si̍ prajApatErvarṇa̍ ityAha̍ paśuBya# Eva tadaddhvaryurni̍# hnuta̍ AtmanO&nA̱vraskAya gacCati̍ śriyaM pra paśUnA̱pnOti ya EvaM ~MvEda# śukraM tE# śukrEṇa# krIṇAmItyAha̍ yathA yajurEvaitad dEvA vai yEna hiraṇyEna̍ sOmamakrIṇan̍ tadaBIṣahA̍ punarA&dadata̍ kO hi tEjasA̍ vikrEṣyata iti yEna hiraṇyEna̍ - [ ] 68

verses.padam: - Padam sOma̱m|krIṇIyAt|tat|aBIṣahEtyaBa̍ - sahA̱|punaḥ|Eti̍|dadIta|tEja̍ḥ|Eva|Atmann|dhattE|asmE̍ iti|jyOti̍ḥ|sOmavikrayiṇIti̍# sOma-vikrayiṇi|tama̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|jyOti̍ḥ|Eva|yaja̍mAnE|dadhAti|tama̍sA|sOmavikrayiṇamiti̍# sOma - vikrayiṇa̱m|arpayati|yat|anupagrathyEtyanu̍pa̍ - grathya|hanyAt|dandaśUkA̱ḥ|tAm|samA̱m|sarpAḥ|syuḥ|idam|aham|sarpAṇA̱m|dandaśUkAnAm|grIvAḥ|upEti̍|grathnAmi|iti̍|Aha|ada̍ndaśUkAḥ|tAm|samA̱m|sarpAḥ|Bavanti|tama̍sA|sOmavikrayiṇamiti̍# sOma - vikrayiṇa̱m|viddhyati|svAna|69̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sOmaM̍ krIṇIyAt tadaBIṣahA̍ punarA dadIta̍ tEja# EvA&&tman dhattE&smE̍ jyOtiḥ̍ sOmavikrayiṇi tama ityAha̍ jyOtirEva̍ yajamAnE̍ dadhAti tamasA̍ sOmavikrayiṇamarpayati̍ yadanupagrathya̍ hanyAd-dandaśUkAstAṃ̍ samAṃ# sarpAḥ syuridamahaṃ̍ sarpAṇA̱M dandaśUkAnAM̍ grIvA upa# grathnAmItyAhA-dandaśUkAstAṃ̍ samAṃ# sarpA Bavanti̍ tamasA̍ sOmavikrayiṇaM̍ ~Mviddhyati svAna - [ ] 69

verses.padam: - Padam BrAja|iti̍|Aha|EtE|vai|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|sOma̱m|arakṣann|tEBya̍ḥ|adhIti̍|sOma̱m|Eti̍|aharann|yat|EtEBya̍ḥ|sOmakraya̍ṇAniti̍# sOma - krayaṇAn|na|anudiśEditya̍nu̍ - diśEt|akrItaḥ|asya|sOma̍ḥ|syAt|na|asya|EtE|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|sOma̱m|rakṣEyuḥ|yat|EtEBya̍ḥ|sOmakraya̍ṇAniti̍# sOma - krayaṇAn|anudiśatItya̍nu̍ - diśati|krItaḥ|asya|sOma̍ḥ|Bavati|EtE|asya|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|sOma̱m|rakṣanti||70̍ (44) (saśukramEva̍ - rundha̍ - iti yEna hiraṇyEna̍ - svAna - catuścatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A10)
verses.samhita: BrAjEtyAhaitE̍ vA amuṣmin̍ ~MlOkE sOmamarakṣan̍ tEByO&dhi sOmamA&haranq.̍ yadEtEByaḥ̍ sOmakrayaṇA-nnAnu̍diśEdakrI̍tO&sya̍ sOmaḥ̍ syAnnAsyaitE# &muṣmin̍ ~MlOkE sOmaṃ# rakṣEyuryadEtEByaḥ̍ sOmakrayaṇAnanudiśati̍# krItO̱&sya sOmO# BavatyEtE̱&syAmuṣmin̍ ~MlOkE sOmaṃ# rakṣanti||70 (saśukramEva̍ - rundha̍ - iti yEna hiraṇyEna̍ - svAna - catuścatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam vAruṇaḥ|vai|krItaḥ|sOmaḥ|upa̍naddha̍ ityupa-naddhaḥ|mitraḥ|naḥ|Eti̍|ihi|sumi̍tradhA̍ iti sumitra̍ - dhAḥ|iti|Aha|śAntyai̱|indra̍sya|Urum|Eti̍|viśa|dakṣi̍ṇam|iti̍|Aha|dEvAḥ|vai|yam|sOma̱m|akrI̍ṇann|tam|indra̍sya|Urau|dakṣi̍ṇE|Eti̍|asAdayann|Eṣaḥ|Kalu̍|vai|Etaṛhi̍|indra̍ḥ|yaḥ|yaja̍tE|tasmA̱t|Evam|Aha|uditi̍|Ayu̍ṣA|svAyuṣEti̍# su - AyuṣA̱|iti|Aha|dEvatA̱ḥ|Eva|anvAraByEtya̍nu̍ - AraBya|uditi̍|71̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vAruṇO vai krItaḥ sOma upanaddhO̍ mitrO na Ehi sumitradhA̍ ityAha̍ śAntyA indrasyOrumA̍ viśa̍ dakṣiṇamityA̍ha̍ dEvA vai yaṃ sOmamakrIṇan̍ tamindrasyOrau̍ dakṣiṇa̍ A &sAdayannEṣa̍ Kalu vA EtaṛhIndrO yO yajatE̍ tasmAdEvamAhOdAyu̍ṣA̍ svAyuṣEtyAha̍ dEvatA# EvA-nvAraByOt - [ ] 71

verses.padam: - Padam tiṣṭhati|uru|antarikṣam|anviti̍|ihi|iti̍|Aha|antarikṣadEvatya̍# ityantarikṣa̍ - dEvatyaḥ|hi|Etaṛhi̍|sOma̍ḥ|adi̍tyAḥ|sada̍ḥ|asi|adi̍tyAḥ|sada̍ḥ|Eti̍|sIda|iti̍|Aha|yathAyajuriti̍# yathA-yajuḥ|Eva|Etat|vIti|vai|Enam|Etat|ad^^rdhayati|yat|vAruṇam|santa̱m|maitram|karOti̍|vAruṇyA|RucA|Eti̍|sAdayati|svayA̱|Eva|Enam|dEvata̍yA|samiti̍|ad^^rdhayati|vAsa̍sA|paryAna̍hyatIti̍# pari - Anahyati|sarvadEvatya̍miti̍# sarva -dEvatya̱m|vai|vAsaḥ|sarvA̍Biḥ|Eva|72̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tiṣṭhatyu-rva̍ntari̍kṣa-manvihItyA̍hA-ntarikṣadEvatyO̱(1q)̍ hyEtaṛhi̍ sOmO&dityAḥ̍ sadO&syadityAḥ̍ sada A sIdEtyAha̍ yathAyajurEvaitad dvi vA EnamEtada̍rddhayati̍ yad vAruṇaṃ̍ santaM̍ maitraM karOti# vAruṇyarcA&&̍ sAdayati̍ svayaivainaM̍ dEvatayA̍ samarddhayati̍ vAsasA̍ paryAnahyati̍ sarvadEvatyaM̍ ~Mvai vAsaḥ sarvABirEvai̍ - [ ] 72

verses.padam: - Padam Enam|dEvatABiḥ|samiti̍|ad^^rdhayati|athO̍ iti|rakṣa̍sAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa-hatyai|vanE̍ṣu|vIti̍|antari̍kṣam|tatAna|iti̍|Aha|vanE̍ṣu|hi|vIti̍|antari̍kṣam|tatAna̍|vAja̱m|arvathsvityarva̍t̍ - su|iti|Aha|vAja̱m|hi|arvathsvityarva̍t̍ - su|payaḥ|aGniyAsu̍|iti̍|Aha|paya̍ḥ|hi|aGniyAsu̍|hRuthsviti̍# hRut - su|kratu̱m|iti|Aha|hRuthsviti̍# hRut-su|hi|kratu̱m|varuṇaḥ|vikṣu|agnim|iti̍|Aha|varu̍ṇaḥ|hi|vikṣu|agnim|divi|sUrya̱m|73̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -naM̍ dEvatABiḥ̍ samarddhayatyathO̍ rakṣasAmapa̍hatyai̍ vanEṣu̍ vyantari̍kṣaM̍ tatAnEtyAha̍ vanEṣu̍ hi vyantari̍kṣaM̍ tatAna vAjamarvathsvityAha̍ vAjaṅq hyarvathsu̍ payO# aGniyAsvityAha̍ payO hyaGniyAsu̍# hRuthsu kratumityAha̍ hRuthsu hi kratuM ~MvaruṇO̍ vikṣvagnimityA̍ha̍ varuṇO̍ hi vikṣvagniM̍ divi sUrya - [ ] 73

verses.padam: - Padam iti|Aha|divi|hi|sUrya̱m|sOma̱m|adrau̱|iti̍|Aha|grAvA̍ṇaḥ|vai|adra̍yaḥ|tEṣu̍|vai|Eṣaḥ|sOma̱m|dadhAti|yaḥ|yaja̍tE|tasmA̱t|Evam|Aha|uditi̍|u|tyam|jAtavE̍dasamiti̍# jAta - vEdasam|iti|sauryA|RucA|kRuṣṇAjinamiti̍# kRuṣṇa - ajinam|pratyAnahyatIti̍# prati-Anahyati|rakṣa̍sAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa# - hatyai|usrau̱|Eti|itam|dhUrq.ṣAhAviti̍# dhUḥ - sAhau|iti|Aha|yathAyajuriti̍# yathA - yajuḥ|Eva|Etat|prEti|cyavasva|Buvaḥ|patE|iti̍|Aha|BUtAnA̱m|hi|74̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mityAha̍ divi hi sUryaṃq sOmamadrAvityAha̍ grAvAṇO̍ vA adrayastEṣu̍ vA Eṣa sOmaM̍ dadhAti yO yajatE̍ tasmAdEvamAhOdu̍ tyaM jAtavEdasamiti̍# sauryarcA kRuṣṇAjinaM̍ pratyAnahyati̍ rakṣasAmapa̍hatyA̍ usrAvEtaM̍ dhUṛṣAhAvityAha̍ yathAyajurEvaitat pra cyavasva̍ Buvaspata ityAha̍ BUtAnAṅq hyE# - [ ] 74

verses.padam: - Padam Eṣaḥ|patiḥ|viśvA̍ni|aBIti̍|dhAmA̍ni|iti̍|Aha|viśvA̍ni|hi|Eṣaḥ|aBIti̍|dhAmA̍ni|pracyava̍ta̍ iti# pra - cyavatE|mA|tvA|pariparIti̍# pari - parI|vidat|iti|Aha|yat|Eva|adaḥ|sOma̱m|AhriyamA̍ṇamityA̱̍ - hriyamAṇam|gandharvaḥ|viśvAva̍suriti̍# viśva - vasuḥ|paryamuṣṇAditi̍# pari - amuṣṇAt|tasmA̱t|Evam|Aha|apa̍rimOṣAyEtyapa̍ri̍ - mOṣAya|yajamAnasya|svastyayanIti̍# svasti - ayanI|asi|iti̍|Aha|yaja̍mAnasya|Eva|Eṣaḥ|yajñasya̍|anvAramBa̍ ityanu̍ - AramBaḥ|anavacCittyA̍ ityanava̍ - Cityai|varuṇaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yaja̍mAnam|aBi|Eti̍|Eti|yat|75̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -ṣa patirviśvA̱nyaBi dhAmAnItyAha̍ viśvAni̍ hyE̱(1q) ṣO&Bi̍ dhAmAni̍ pracyavatE̍ mA tvA# pariparI vidadityA̍ha̍ yadEvAdaḥ sOmamAhriyamA̍ṇaM̍ gandharvO viśvAvasuḥ̍ paryamuṣṇAt̍ tasmA-dEvamAhApa̍rimOṣAya̍ yajamAnasya̍ svastyayanyasItyA̍ha̍ yajamAnasyaivaiṣa̍ yajñasyA̱nvAraBOM &navacCittyai̍ varuṇO̍ vA Eṣa yajamAnamaByaiti̍ yat - [ ] 75

verses.padam: - Padam krItaḥ|sOmaḥ|upa̍naddha̍ ityupa# - naddhaḥ|namaḥ|mitrasya̍|varu̍ṇasya|cakṣa̍sE|iti̍|Aha|śAntyai̱|Eti̍|sOma̱m|vaha̍nti|agninA̱|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhatE|tau|saBaMva̍ntAviti̍# saM - Bavantau|yaja̍mAnam|aBi|samiti̍|Bavataḥ|purA|Kalu̍|vAva|Eṣaḥ|mEdhA̍ya|AtmAna̱m|AraByEtyA̱-raBya̍|carati|yaḥ|dIkṣitaḥ|yat|agnIṣOmIyamitya̍gnI̍ - sOmIya̱m|paśum|AlaBata̍ ityA̱ - laBatE|Atmaniṣkraya̍ṇa̍ ityA̱tma - niṣkrayaṇaḥ|Eva|asya|saḥ|tasmA̱t|tasya̍|na|Aśya̱m|puruṣaniṣkraya̍ṇa̍ iti# puruṣa - niṣkrayaṇaḥ|iva|hi|athO̍ iti|Kalu̍|Ahuḥ̍ ( )|agnIṣOmA̱ByAmityagnI - sOmA̱ByAm|vai|indraḥ|vRutram|ahann|iti̍|yat|agnIṣOmIyamitya̍gnI̍ - sOmIya̱m|paśum|AlaBata̍ ityA̱-laBatE|vArtra̍Gna̍ iti vArtra# - Gnaḥ|Eva|asya|saḥ|tasmA̱t|u|Aśya̱m|vAruṇyA|RucA|parIti|carati|svayA̱|Eva|Enam|dEvata̍yA|parIti̍|carati||76̍ (77) (anvAraByOth - sarvABirEva̍ - sUryaM̍ - BUtAnAṅq hyE# - ti ya - dAhuḥ̍ - saptaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A11) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 11 Anuvaakams :- (prAcInavaṃśaM̍ -~MyAvanta̍ - RuKsAmE - vAgvai dEvEByO# - dEvA vai dEvayaja̍naM̍ - kadrUśca - taddhiraṇyaṃq̍ - ṣaṭ padAni# - brahmavAdinO# vicityO - yat kalayA# tE - vAruṇO vai krItaḥ sOma - EkAdaśa)̍ Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (prAcInavaṃśaṅq̍ - svAhEtyAha̍ - yE̱&ntaḥ śarA - hyEṣa̍ saM - tapasA̍ ca - yatkarṇagRuhI̍ - tEti# lOmatO - vAruṇaḥ̍ - ṣaṭth saptatiḥ̍ ) First and Last Padam of First Prasnam of 6th Kandam (prAcInavaṃ̍ śaM - pari# carati)||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE ṣaṣṭhakAṇḍE prathamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||===================================
