verses.samhita: krItaḥ sOma upanaddhO̍ namO# mitrasya varuṇasya̍ cakṣasa̍ ityAha̍ śAntyA A sOmaM ~MvahantyagninA̍ prati# tiṣṭhatE tau saBaMvantau̍ yajamAnamaBi̍ saM Bavataḥ̍ purA Kalu vAvaiṣa mEdhAyA&&*tmAna̍mAraBya̍# carati yO dI̱kṣitO yadagnIṣOmIya̍M̍ paśumAlaBata̍ Atmaniṣkrayaṇa̍ EvAsya sa tasmAt tasya nA&&*śyaM̍ puruṣaniṣkrayaṇa̍ iva hyathO KalvAhu̍ ( ) ragnIṣOmA̱ByAM ~MvA indrO# vRutramahanniti̍ yadagnIṣOmIya̍M̍ paśumAlaBata̍ vArtraGna̍ EvAsya sa tasmA̱d-vAśyaM̍ ~MvAruṇyarcA pari# carati svayaivainaM̍ dEvatayA̍ pari# carati||76 (anvAraByOth - sarvABirEva̍ - sUryaM̍ - BUtAnAṅq hyE# - ti ya - dAhuḥ̍ - saptaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A11) praśna kOrvai with starting padams of 1 to 11 anuvAkams :- (prAcInavaṃśaM̍ -~MyAvanta̍ - RuKsAmE - vAgvai dEvEByO# - dEvA vai dEvayaja̍naM̍ - kadrUśca - taddhiraṇyaṃq̍ - ṣaṭ padAni# - brahmavAdinO# vicityO - yat kalayA# tE - vAruṇO vai krItaḥ sOma - EkAdaśa)̍ kOrvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (prAcInavaṃśaṅq̍ - svAhEtyAha̍ - yE̱&ntaḥ śarA - hyEṣa̍ saM - tapasA̍ ca - yatkarṇagRuhI̍ - tEti# lOmatO - vAruṇaḥ̍ - ṣaṭth saptatiḥ̍ ) first and last padam Of first praśnam Of 6th KAṇḍam (prAcInavaṃ̍ śaM - pari# carati)||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM ṣaṣṭhakAṇḍE prathamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||------------------------------------ OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ hariḥ OM 6.2 ṣaṣṭhakAṇḍE dvitIyaḥ praśnaḥ - sOmamantrabrAhmaṇanirUpaṇaM

verses.padam: - Padam yat|uBau|vimucyEti# vi-mucya|Atithyam|gRuhṇIyAt|yajñam|vIti̍|CindyAt|yat|uBau|avi̍mucyEtyavi̍# - mucya|yathA̱|anAgatAyEtyanA̱-gatAya|Atithyam|kriyatE̱|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|vimu̍kta̍ iti vi - muktaḥ|anyaḥ|anaḍvAn|Bavati|avi̍mukta̍ ityavi# - muktaḥ|anyaḥ|atha|Atithyam|gRuhṇAti|yajñasya̍|santa̍tyA̍ iti saM - tatyai|patnI̱|anvAraBata̍ ityanu̍ - AraBatE|patnI̱|hi|pArI̍ṇahyasyEti̍ pAri# - nahyasya|IśE̱|patniyA|Eva|anu̍matamityanu̍# - matam|niriti|vapati|yat|vai|patnI̱|yajñasya̍|karOti̍|mithunam|tat|athO̍ iti|patni̍yAḥ|Eva|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yaduBau vimucyA&&*tithyaM̍ gRuhṇIyAd-yajñaM̍ ~MvicCindyAd-yaduBAva-vi̍mucya̍ yathA&nAgatAyA&&tithyaM̍ kriyatE# tAdRugEva tad-vimuktO-&nyO̍&naḍvAn̍ Bavatya vimuktO&nyO-&thA̍&&*tithyaM̍ gRuhṇAti̍ yajñasya santatyai̍ patnyanvAraBatE̍ patnI hi pArIṇahyasyEśE̍ patniyai̍ vAnumataM̍ nirvapati̍ yadvai patnI# yajñasya# karOti# mithunaM tadathO patniyA̍ Evai- [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam Eṣaḥ|yajñasya|anvAramBa̍ ityanu̍ - AramBaḥ|anavacCittyA̍ ityanava̍ - Cittyai|yAvadBiriti̍ yAvat̍ - Biḥ|vai|rAjA̱|anucarairityanu̍ - caraiḥ|AgacCatItyA̱ - gacCati|sarvE̱Byaḥ|vai|tEBya̍ḥ|Atithyam|kriyatE|CandAṃ̍si|Kalu̍|vai|sOma̍sya|rAjña̍ḥ|anucarAṇItya̍nu̍ - carAṇi|agnEḥ|Atithyam|asi|viṣṇa̍vE|tvA|iti̍|Aha|gAyatriyai|Eva|EtEna̍|karOti|sOma̍sya|Atithyam|asi|viṣṇa̍vE|tvA|iti̍|Aha|triṣṭuBE̱|Eva|EtEna̍|karOti|ati̍thEḥ|Atithyam|asi|viṣṇa̍vE|tvA|iti̍|Aha|jaga̍tyai|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -ṣa yajñasyA̱nvAraBOM &navacCittyai̍ yAvad-Birvai̍ rAjA&nucarairAgacCa̍ti̍ sarvE̱ByO vai tEBya# AtithyaM kriyatE̍ CandAṃsi̍ Kalu vai sOmasya̍ rAjñO&nucarAṇyagnE-rA̍tithyama̍si̍ viṣṇavE̍ tvEtyAha̍ gAyatriyA EvaitEna# karOti sOmasyA&&*tithyama̍si̍ viṣṇavE̍ tvEtyAha̍ triṣṭuBa# EvaitEna# karOtyatithErAtithyama̍si̍ viṣṇavE̍ tvEtyAha̍ jagatyA-̍ [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|EtEna|karOti|agnayE̱|tvA|rAyaspOṣadAvnna̍ iti# rAyaspOṣa - dAvnnE̱|viṣṇavE|tvA|iti̍|Aha|anuṣṭuBa̍ ityanu̍ - stuBE̱|Eva|EtEna|karOti|śyEnAya̍|tvA|sOmaBRuta̍ iti# sOma - BRutE̱|viṣṇavE|tvA|iti̍|Aha|gAyatriyai|Eva|EtEna̍|karOti|pa~jca̍|kRutva̍ḥ|gRuhṇAti|pa~jcA̱kṣarEti̍ pa~jca# - akṣarA|pa~gktiḥ|pA~gktaḥ|yajñaḥ|yajñam|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|kasmA̱t|satyAt|gAyatriyai|uBayata̍ḥ|Atithyasya̍|kriyatE|iti̍|yat|Eva|adaḥ|sOma̱m|Eti̍|3̍ (50)
verses.samhita: EvaitEna# karOtyagnayE̱ tvA rAyaspOṣadAvnnE viṣṇavE̍ tvEtyAhAnuṣṭuBa̍# EvaitEna# karOti śyEnAya# tvA sOmaBRutE viṣṇavE̍ tvEtyAha̍ gAyatriyA EvaitEna# karOti pa~jca kRutvO# gRuhṇAti pa~jcA̱kṣarA pa~gktiḥ pA~gktO# yajñO yajñamEvAva# rundhE brahmavAdinO# vadanti kasmA̱th satyAd-gAyatriyA̍ uBayata̍# Atithyasya# kriyata iti yadEvAdaḥ sOmamA- [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam aharat|tasmA̱t|gAyatriyai|uBayata̍ḥ|Atithyasya̍|kriyatE|purastA̱t|ca|upari̍ṣṭAt|ca|śira̍ḥ|vai|Etat|yajñasya̍|yat|Atithyam|nava̍kapAla̍ iti nava# - kapAlaḥ|purOḍAśaḥ|Bavati|tasmA̱t|navadhEti̍# nava - dhA|śiraḥ|viṣyU̍tamiti̍ vi - syUtam|navakapAla̍ iti nava# - kapAlaḥ|purOḍAśaḥ|Bavati|tE|traya̍ḥ|trikapAlA̍ iti# tri - kapAlAḥ|trivRutEti# tri - vRutA̱|stOmEna|saMmi̍tA̍ iti saM - mitAḥ|tEjaḥ|trivRuditi̍# tri - vRut|tEjaḥ|Eva|yajñasya̍|śIrq.ṣann|dadhAti|nava̍kapAla̍ iti nava-kapAlaḥ|purOḍAśa̍ḥ|Bavati|tE|traya̍ḥ|trikapAlA̍ iti# tri - kapAlAḥ|trivRutEti# tri-vRutA̱|prAṇEnEti# pra-anEna|saMmi̍tA̍ iti saM-mitAḥ|trivRuditi# tri - vRut|vai|4 (50)
verses.samhita: &harat̍ tasmA̱d-gAyatriyA uBayata̍# Atithyasya# kriyatE purastA̱ccO pariṣṭAcca̍ śirO vA Etad yajñasya yadAtithyaM̍ navakapAlaḥ̍ purOḍAśO# Bavati tasmA̱nnavadhA śirO viṣyUtaM̍ navakapAlaḥ̍ purOḍAśO# Bavati tE trayastrikapAlAstrivRutA̍ stOmEna̍ saMmitAstEja̍strivRut̍ tEja# Eva yajñasya# śIrq.ṣan dadhAti̍ navakapAlaḥ̍ purOḍAśO# Bavati tE trayastrikapAlAstrivRutA̱̍ prAṇEna saMmitAstrivRudvai-̍ [ ] 4

verses.padam: - Padam prAṇa iti# pra -anaḥ|trivRutamiti# tri - vRuta̱m|Eva|prAṇamiti# pra -anam|aBipUrvamityaBi̍ - pUrvam|yajñasya|śIrq.ṣann|dadhAti|prajApa̍tEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|vai|EtAni|pakṣmA̍ṇi|yat|aśvavAlA̍ ityaśva̍ - vAlAḥ|aikṣavI iti|tiraścI̍ iti|yat|Aśva̍vAla̍ ityAśva# - vAlaḥ|prastara iti# pra - staraḥ|Bavati|aikṣavI̍ iti|tiraścI̍ iti|prajApa̍tEriti̍# prajA -patEḥ|Eva|tat|cakṣuḥ|samiti̍|Barati|dEvAḥ|vai|yAḥ|Ahu̍tIrityA̍ - hutIḥ|ajuhavuḥ|tAḥ|asu̍rAḥ|niṣkAva̱m|Adann|tE|dEvAḥ|kArṣmarya̱m|apaśyann|karmaṇya̍ḥ|vai|karma̍|EnEna|kurvIta|iti̍|tE|kArṣmaryamayAniti̍# kArṣmarya - mayAn|paridhIniti̍# pari - dhIn|5 (50)
verses.samhita: prAṇa-strivRutamEva̍ prAṇamaBipUrvaM̍ ~Myajñasya# śIrq.ṣan dadhAti̍ prajApatErvA̍ EtAni pakṣmAṇi̍ yadaśvavAlA̍ ai̱kṣavI tiraścI yadAśvavAlaḥ̍ prastarO BavatyaikṣavI̍ tiraścI̱ prajApatErEva̍ taccakṣuḥ saMBarati̍ dEvA vai yA AhutIraju̍havustA̍ asurA̍ niṣkAvamAdan̍ tE dEvAḥ kA̱rṣmaryamapaśyan̍ karmaṇyO# vai karmainEna̍ kurvItEti tE kA̱rṣmaryamayA̱n paridhIna-̍ [ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam akurvata|taiḥ|vai|tE|rakṣAṃsi|apEti̍|aGnata|yat|kArṣmaryamayA̍ iti# kArṣmarya - mayA̱ḥ|paridhaya iti# pari - dhayaḥ|Bava̍nti|rakṣa̍sAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa# - hatyai|samiti|sparq.śayati|rakṣa̍sAm|ana̍nvavacArAyEtyana̍nu̍ - avacArAya|na|purastA̱t|parIti|dadhAti|Adityaḥ|hi|Eva|udyannityu̍t-̍ yann|purastA̱t|rakṣAṃsi|apahantItya̍pa̍ - hanti|Ud^^rdhvE̍ iti|samidhAviti̍# saM - idhau̱|Eti|dadhAti|upari̍ṣṭAt|Eva|rakṣAṃ̍si|apEti̍|hanti|yaju̍ṣA|anyAm|tUṣṇIm|anyAm|mithunatvAyEti̍# mithuna - tvAya|dvE̍ iti|Eti̍|dadhAti|dvipAditi̍# dvi - pAt|yajamAnaḥ|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|brahmavAdina iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|6̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -kurvata tairvai tE rakṣAṅqsyapA̱Gnata yat kA̱rṣmaryamayA̱ḥ paridhayO Bavanti̍ rakṣasAmapa̍hatyai̍ saṅ spaṛśayati̍ rakṣasAmana̍nva-vacArAya̍ na purastAt pari# dadhAtyAdityO hyEvOdyan̍ purastAd-rakṣAṅsyapahantyUrddhvE̍ samidhAvA dadhAtyupari̍ṣṭAdEva̍ rakṣAṅqsyapa# hanti yajuṣA&nyAM̍ tUṣṇImanyAM mithunatvAya̍ dvE A dadhAti̍ dvipAd-yajamAnaḥ̍ pratiṣṭhityai̍ brahmavAdinO# vadantya- [ ] 6

verses.padam: - Padam agniḥ|ca|vai|Etau|sOmaḥ|ca|kathA|sOmA̍ya|Atithyam|kriyatE̱|na|agnayE̱|iti̍|yat|agnau|agnim|mathitvA|praharatIti̍# pra - harati|tEna̍|Eva|agnayE̱|Atithyam|kriyatE|athO̍ iti|Kalu̍|Ahuḥ|agniḥ|sarvA̱ḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|iti̍|yat|haviḥ|AsAdyEtyA̱̍ - sAdya|agnim|mantha̍ti|havyAya̍|Eva|Asa̍nnAyEtyA̍ - sannAya|sarvA̱ḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|janayati||7 (41) (patniyA̍ Eva - jagatyA̍ - A - trivRudvai - paridhIn̍ - vadantyE̍ - kacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A1)
verses.samhita: -gniśca vA Etau sOmaśca̍ kathA sOmAyA&&*tithyaM̍ kriyatE nAgnaya iti yadagnAvagniM mathitvA̍ praharati̍ tEnaivAgnaya# AtithyaM kriyatE̍ &thO KalvAhuragniḥ̍ sarvA# dEvatA iti yaddhavirAsAdyAgniM manthati̍ havyAyaivA&&*sannAya̍ sarvA# dEvatA# janayati||7 (patniyA̍ Eva - jagatyA̍ - A - trivRudvai - paridhIn̍ - vadantyE̍ - kacatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAsurA iti# dEva - asurAḥ|saM~MyattA̍ iti saM-yattAḥ|Asann|tE|dEvAḥ|mithaḥ|vipriyA̍ iti vi - priyAḥ|Asann|tE|anyaḥ|anyasmai̱|jyaiṣṭhyAya|ati̍ṣṭhamAnAḥ|pa~jcadhEti̍# pa~jca-dhA|vIti|akrAmann|agniḥ|vasu̍Biriti̍ vasu# - Biḥ|sOmaḥ|rudraiḥ|indra̍ḥ|marudBiriti̍# marut - Biḥ|varuṇaḥ|Adityaiḥ|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|viśvai̱ḥ|dEvaiḥ|tE|amanyanta|asu̍rEByaḥ|vai|idam|BrAtRu̍vyEByaḥ|raddhyAmaḥ|yat|mithaḥ|vipri̍yA̍ iti vi - priyAḥ|smaḥ|yAḥ|naḥ|imAḥ|priyAḥ|tanuvaḥ|tAḥ|samava̍dyAmahA̍ iti# saM - avadyAmahai|tABya̍ḥ|saḥ|niriti̍|RucCAt|yaḥ|8̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvAsurAḥ saM~MyattA̍ Asan tE dEvA mithO vipriyA̍ Asan tE̱&(1q)nyO̱&nyasmai jyaiṣṭhyAyAtiṣṭhamAnAḥ̍ pa~jcadhA vyakrAmannagnirvasu̍Biḥ̍ sOmO# rudrairindrO# marudBi-rvaruṇa̍ Adityai-rbRuhaspati-rviśvai̱rdEvaistE# &manyantAsurEByO̍ vA idaM BrAtRuvyEByO̍ raddhyAmO yanmithO vipriyAḥ̍ smO yA na# imAḥ priyAstanuvastAḥ samavadyAmahai̍ tAByaḥ sa niṛRucCAdyO-̍ [ ] 8

verses.padam: - Padam naḥ|prathamaḥ|anyaḥ|anyasmai̱|druhyA̱t|iti|tasmA̱t|yaḥ|satA̍nUnaptriṇAmiti̍ sa - tAnUnaptriṇAm|prathamaḥ|druhyati|saḥ|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCati|yat|tAnUnaptramiti̍# tAnU - naptram|samavadyatIti# saM-avadyati|BrAtRu̍vyABiBUtyA̍ iti BrAtRuvya-aBiBUtyai|Bava̍ti|AtmanA̱|parEti̍|asya|BrAtRu̍vyaḥ|Bavati|pa~jca̍|kRutva̍ḥ|avEti̍|dyati|pa~jcadhEti̍# pa~jca - dhA|hi|tE|tat|samavAdyantEti# saM - avAdyanta|athO̍ iti|pa~jcA̱kṣarEti̍ pa~jca# - akṣarA|pa~gktiḥ|pA~gktaḥ|yajñaḥ|yajñam|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|Apa̍taya̍ ityA - patayE|tvA|gRuhṇAmi|iti|Aha|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|vai|9 (50)
verses.samhita: naḥ̍ prathamO̱(1q)&nyO̱&nyasmai druhyAditi tasmAdyaḥ satAnUnaptriṇAM̍ prathamO druhyati̍ sa ArtimArcCati̍ yat tAnUnaptraṃ̍ samavadyati̍ BrAtRuvyABiBUtyai̍ BavatyAtmanA̍ parA̱&sya BrAtRuvyO̍ Bavati pa~jca kRutvO&vadyati̍ pa~jcadhA hi tE tath samavAdyantAthO̍ pa~jcA̱kṣarA pa~gktiḥ pA~gktO# yajñO yajñamEvAva# rundha ApatayE̍ tvA gRuhṇAmItyAha̍ prAṇO vA- [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam ApatirityA̍ - patiḥ|prAṇamiti# pra - anam|Eva|prIṇAti|paripataya̍ iti pari# - patayE|iti|Aha|mana̍ḥ|vai|pari̍patiriti̍ pari# - patiḥ|manaḥ|Eva|prIṇAti|tanUnaptra̍ iti tanU̱ - naptrE̱|iti|Aha|tanuva̍ḥ|hi|tE|tAḥ|samavAdyantEti̍# saM- avAdyanta|śAkvarAya̍|iti̍|Aha|śaktyai̱|hi|tE|tAḥ|samavAdyantEti̍# saM-avAdyanta|śakmann̍|Oji̍ṣṭhAya|iti̍|Aha|Oji̍ṣṭham|hi|tE|tat|Atmana̍ḥ|samavAdyantEti̍# saM-avAdyanta|anA̍dhRuṣṭamityanA̱̍ - dhRuṣṭam|asi|anAdhRuṣyamityanA̍ - dhRuṣyam|iti|Aha|anA̍dhRuṣṭamityanA̱̍ - dhRuṣṭam|hi|Etat|anAdhRuṣyamityanA̍ - dhRuṣyam|dEvAnA̱m|Ojaḥ|10̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Apatiḥ̍ prAṇamEva prIṇAti̍ paripataya̍ ityAha̍ manO vai paripatirmana̍# Eva prIṇAti̍ tanUnaptra ityAha̍ tanuvO hi tE tAḥ samavAdya̍nta̍ śAkvarAyEtyAha̍ śaktyai hi tE tAḥ samavAdya̍nta̍ śakma- nnOjiṣṭhAyEtyAhauji̍ṣṭhaṃq̍ hi tE ta dAtmanaḥ̍ samavAdyantA--nAdhRuṣṭamasyanAdhRuṣya-mityAhAnA̍dhRuṣṭaṅq̍ hyEtada̍nAdhRuṣyaM̍ dEvAnAmOja- [ ] 10

verses.padam: - Padam iti|Aha|dEvAnA̱m|hi|Etat|Oja̍ḥ|aBiśastipA̍ ityaBiśasti-pAḥ|anaBiśastEnyamitya̍naBi̍ - śastEnyam|iti|Aha|aBiśastipA̍ ityaBiśasti̍ - pAḥ|hi|Etat|anaBiśastEnyamityanaBi̍ - śastEnyam|anviti|mE|dIkṣAm|dIkṣApa̍tiriti̍# dIkṣA - patiḥ|manyatAm|iti|Aha|yathAyajuriti̍# yathA - yajuḥ|Eva|Etat|GRutam|vai|dEvAḥ|vajra̱m|kRutvA|sOma̱m|aGnann|antikam|iva|Kalu|vai|asya|Etat|caranti|yat|tAnUnaptrEṇEti̍# tAnU - naptrEṇa|pracarantIti̍# pra - caranti|aṃqśuraṃ̍śurityaṃqśuḥ-aṃqśuḥ|tE|dEva|sOma|Eti̍|pyAyatAm|iti̍|Aha|yat|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ityAha̍ dEvAnAṅq hyEtadOjO̍&BiśastipA̍ anaBiśastEnyamityA̍hA-BiśastipA̍ hyEtada̍# -naBiśastEnyamanu# mE dIkṣAM dIkṣApati-rmanyatAmityA̍ha̍ yathAyajurEvaitad-GRutaM ~Mvai dEvA vajraM̍ kRutvA sOmamaGna-nnantikami̍va̍ Kalu vA asyaitacca̍ranti̍ yat tAnUnaptrEṇa̍# pracarantyaṃq̍ śuraṃ# śustE dEva sOmA&& *pyAyatAmityA̍ha̍ ya- [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|asya|apuvAyatE̱|yat|mIyatE|tat|Eva|asya|EtEna̍|Eti̍|pyAyayati|Eti̍|tuBya̱m|indra̍ḥ|pyAyatAm|Eti̍|tvam|indrA̍ya|pyAyasva|iti̍|Aha|uBau|Eva|indra̱m|ca|sOma̱m|ca|Eti̍|pyAyayati|Eti̍|pyAyaya|saKIn̍|sanyA|mEdhayA̱|iti̍|Aha|Rutvija̍ḥ|vai|asya|saKA̍yaḥ|tAn|Eva|Eti̍|pyAyayati|svasti|tE|dEva|sOma|sutyAm|aśIya|12̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -dEvAsyApuvAyatE̍ yanmIyatE-tadEvAsyaitEnA&&̍ *pyAyayatyA̍ tuByamindraḥ̍ pyAyatAmA tvamindrAya̍ pyAyasvEtyA-hOBAvEvEndra̍M̍ ca sOmaM cA&&*pyAyayatyA̍ pyAyaya̍ saKI̱nth sanyA mEdhayEtyAhartvijO̍ vA asya̍ saKAyastAnEvA&&*pyA̍yayati̍ svasti tE# dEva sOma sutyAmaśIyE-̍ [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam iti|Aha|AśiṣamityA̱-śiṣa̱m|Eva|EtAm|Eti̍|śAstE|prEti̍|vai|EtE|asmAt|lOkAt|cyavantE|yE|sOma̱m|ApyAyayantItyA̱-pyAyaya̍nti|antarikṣadEvatya̍# ityantarikṣa-dEvatya̍ḥ|hi|sOma̍ḥ|ApyA̍yita̍ ityA - pyAyitaḥ|Eṣṭaḥ|rAya̍ḥ|prEti̍|iṣE|BagA̍ya|iti̍|Aha|dyAvA̍pRuthivIByAmiti̍ dyAvA̱ - pRuthivIByA̱m|Eva|namaskRutyEti# namaḥ - kRutya|asminn|lOkE|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|dEvAsurA̍ iti# dEva - asurAḥ|saM~MyattA̍ iti saM - yattAḥ|Asann|tE|dEvAḥ|biByataḥ|agnim|prEti̍|aviśann|tasmA̱t|Ahuḥ|agniḥ|sarvA̱ḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|iti̍|tE|13̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -tyAhA̍ &&*śiṣamEvaitAmA̍ śA̱stE pra vA EtE̱&smA-llOkAccyavantE̍ yE sOmamA-pyAyaya̍ntya-ntarikṣadEvatyO̍# hi sOma ApyAyita̍ EṣṭA rAyaḥ prEṣE BagAyEtyAha̍ dyAvApRuthivIByA̍mEva̍ namaskRutyAsmin̍ ~MlOkE prati# tiṣṭhanti dEvAsurAḥ saM~MyattA̍ Asan tE dEvA biByatO&gniM̍ prAviśan̍ tasmAdAhuragniḥ̍ sarvA# dEvatA iti tE̱- [ ] 13

verses.padam: - Padam agnim|Eva|varUtham|kRutvA|asu̍rAn|aBIti̍|aBavann|agnim|iva|Kalu̍|vai|Eṣaḥ|prEti̍|viśati|yaḥ|avAntaradIkṣAmitya̍vAntara̍ - dIkṣAm|upaitItyupa̍ - Eti|BrAtRu̍vyABiBUtyA̍ iti BrAtRuvya̍ - aBiBUtyai|Bavati|AtmanA̱|parEti̍|asya|BrAtRu̍vyaḥ|Bavati|AtmAna̱m|Eva|dIkṣayA̱|pAti|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|avAntaradIkṣayEtyavAntara̍ - dIkṣayA̱|santarAmiti# saM - tarAm|mEKalAm|samAya̍cCata̍ iti# saM - AyacCatE|prajEti̍# pra - jA|hi|Atmanaḥ|anta̍ratarEtyanta̍ra̍ - tarA|taptavrata̍ iti# tapta - vrataḥ|Bavati|madantIBiḥ|mArjayatE|niriti̍|hi|agniḥ|śItEna̍|vAya̍ti|sami̍ddhyA̍ iti saM-iddhyai|yA|tE|agnE ( )|rudriyA|tanUḥ|iti̍|Aha|svayA̱|Eva|Enat|dEvata̍yA|vratayati|sayOnitvAyEti̍# sayOni - tvAya|śAntyai̱||14̍ (61)
verses.samhita: &gnimEva varUthaM̍ kRutvA &surAnaBya̍Bava-nnagnimi̍va̍ Kalu vA Eṣa praviśati̍ yO&vAntaradIkṣAmupaiti̍ BrAtRuvyABiBUtyai̍ BavatyAtmanA̍ parA̱&sya BrAtRuvyO̍ BavatyAtmAnamEva̍ dIkṣayA# pAti prajAmavAntaradIkṣayA̍# santarAM mEKalAṃ̍ samAyacCatE̍ prajA hyA̱tmanO&ntaratarA̍ taptavratO̍ Bavati madantIBirmArjayatE̍ nirhyagniḥ̍ śItEna vAyati̍ samiddhyai̍ yA tE# agnE ( ) rudriyA̍ tanUrityAha̍ svayaivainad̍ dEvatayA̍ vratayati sayOnitvAya śAntyai̱||14

verses.padam: - Padam tEṣA̱m|asurAṇAm|tisraḥ|pura̍ḥ|Asann|ayasmayI̱|avamA|atha̍|rajatA|atha̍|hari̍ṇI|tAḥ|dEvAḥ|jEtu̱m|na|aśaknuvann|tAḥ|upasadEtyu̍pa̍ - sadA̱|Eva|ajigIṣann|tasmA̱t|Ahuḥ|yaḥ|ca|Evam|vEda|yaḥ|ca|na|upasadEtyu̍pa̍ - sadA̱|vai|mahApuramiti# mahA - puram|jayanti|iti|tE|iṣu̱m|samiti̍|akurvata|agnim|anI̍kam|sOma̱m|śalyam|viṣṇu̱m|tEja̍nam|tE|abruvann|kaḥ|imAm|asiṣyati|iti̍|15̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tEṣAmasurAṇAM̍ tisraḥ pura# Asa-nnayasma-yyavamA&tha̍# rajatA&tha hariṇI̍ tA dEvA jEtuM nAśaknuvan̍ tA upasadaivAji̍gIṣan̍ tasmAdAhuryaścaivaM̍ ~MvEda yaśca nOpasadA vai mahApuraM̍ jayantIti̍ ta iṣuṃq samaskurvatA-̍ gnimanIkaṃq̍ sOmaṃ# śalyaM ~MviṣṇuM tEjanaM̍ tE̱&bruvan ka imAmasiṣyatIti̍-̍ [ ] 15

verses.padam: - Padam rudraḥ|iti|abruvann|rudraḥ|vai|krUraḥ|saḥ|asyatu|iti̍|saḥ|abravIt|vara̱m|vRuṇai|aham|Eva|paśUnAm|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|asAni|iti|tasmA̱t|rudraḥ|paśUnAm|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|tAm|rudraḥ|avEti|asRujat|saḥ|tisraḥ|pura̍ḥ|BitvA|EByaḥ|lOkEBya̍ḥ|asu̍rAn|prEti̍|anudata|yat|upasada̍ ityupa̍ - sadaḥ|upasadyanta̍ ityupa-sadyantE̱|BrAtRu̍vyaparAṇutyA̍ iti BrAtRuvya-parAṇutyai|na|anyAm|Ahu̍timityA̍ - hutim|purastA̱t|juhuyAt|yat|anyAm|AhutimityA̍ - hutim|purastA̱t|juhuyAt|16 (50)
verses.samhita: rudra ityabruvan̍ rudrO vai krUraḥ sO̱&syatviti sO̱&bravId varaM̍ ~MvRuṇA ahamEva paśUnA-madhi̍patirasAnIti̍ tasmA̱d rudraḥ paśUnA-madhi̍patistAṃ̍ rudrO&vAsRujath̍ sa tisraḥ purO# BittvaiByO lOkEByO- &surAn̍ prAṇudata̍ yadupasada̍# upasadyantE BrAtRuvyaparAṇutyai̍ nAnyAmAhutiM̍ purastA̱-jjuhuyAd-yadanyAmAhutiM̍ purastA̱jjuhuyA- [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam anyat|muKa̱m|kuryAt|sruvEṇa|AGAramityA̱̍ - GAram|Eti|GArayati|yajñasya̍|prajñA̱tyA̍ iti pra - jñAtyai|parA~g|atikramyEtya̍ti̍ - kramya|juhOti|parA̍caḥ|Eva|EByaḥ|lOkEBya̍ḥ|yaja̍mAnaḥ|BrAtRu̍vyAn|prEti̍|nudatE|puna̍ḥ|atyAkramyEtya̍ti̍ - Akramya|upasadamityu̍pa̍ - sada̱m|juhOti|praṇudyEti# pra - nudya|Eva|EByaḥ|lOkEBya̍ḥ|BrAtRu̍vyAn|jitvA|BrAtRuvyalOkamiti̍# BrAtRuvya - lOkam|aByArOhatItya̍Bi̍ - ArOhati|dEvAḥ|vai|yAḥ|prAtaḥ|upasada̍ ityupa̍ - sadaḥ|upAsI̍dannityu̍pa̍ - asIdann|ahna̍ḥ|tABi̍ḥ|asu̍rAn|prEti̍|anudanta|yAḥ|sAyam|rAtri̍yai|tABi̍ḥ|yat|sAyamprA̍tariti̍# sAyam - prAtaḥ|upasada ityupa̍ - sadaḥ|17̍ (50)
verses.samhita: danyanmuKaM̍ kuryAth sruvEṇA&GAramA̍ GArayati̍ yajñasya prajñA̱tyai parA~gatikramya̍# juhOti parAca̍ EvaiByO lOkEByO yajamAnO̍ BrAtRuvyAn̍ pra ṇudatE̍ punaratyAkramyO̍pasada̍M̍ juhOti praṇudyaivaiByO lOkEByO BrAtRuvyA~jjitvA̍ BrAtRuvyalOka-maByArO̍hati̍ dEvA vai yAḥ prAtarupasada̍# upAsIda-nnahnastABirasu̍rAn̍ prAṇudanta̍ yAḥ sAyaṃ rAtriyai̍ tABiryath sAyaM prAtarupasada̍-̍ [ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam upasadyanta ityupa̍ - sadyantE̱|ahOrAtrAByAmityahaḥ̍ - rAtrAByA̱m|Eva|tat|yajamAnaḥ|BrAtRu̍vyAn|prEti̍|nudatE|yAḥ|prAtaḥ|yAjyA̱ḥ|syuḥ|tAḥ|sAyam|purOnuvAkyA̍# iti# puraḥ - anuvAkyA̱ḥ|kuryAt|ayAtayAmatvAyEtyayA̍tayAma̍ - tvAya|tisraḥ|upasada ityupa̍ - sadaḥ|upEti̍|Eti|traya̍ḥ|imE|lOkAḥ|imAn|Eva|lOkAn|prIṇAti|ṣaṭ|samiti̍|padyantE|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutava̍ḥ|RutUn|Eva|prIṇAti|dvAda̍śa|ahInE̱|sOmE̱|upEti̍|Eti|dvAda̍śa|mAsA̱ḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM - vathsaram|Eva|prIṇAti|caturviṃśatiriti̍ catuḥ̍ - viṃqśatiḥ|samiti|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: upasadyantE# &hOrAtrAByAmEva̍ tad-yajamAnO̍ BrAtRuvyAn̍ pra ṇudatE̍ yAḥ prAtaryAjyA̱ḥ syustAḥ sAyaM purO&nuvAkyA̱ḥ̍ kuryAdayAtayAmatvAya̍ tisra upasada̍ upaiti̍ traya# imE lOkA imAnEva lOkAn prIṇAti̍ ṣaṭth saM padyantE̍ ṣaḍvA Rutava# RutUnEva prIṇAti̍ dvAdaśAhInE̍ sOma upaiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ mAsA̱ḥ saM~Mvathsaraḥ savaMthsaramEva̍ prIṇAti̍ caturviṃśatiḥ̍ saM- [ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam padyantE|caturviṃśatiriti̍ catuḥ̍ - viṃqśatiḥ|ad^^rdhamAsA ityad^^rdha̍ - mAsAḥ|ad^^rdhamAsAnityardha̍ - mAsAn|Eva|prIṇAti|ArA̱grAmityArA̱ - agrAm|avAntaradIkṣAmityavAntara̍ - dIkṣAm|upEti|iyAt|yaḥ|kAmayE̍ta|asminn|mE|lOkE|ad^^rdhu̍kam|syAt|iti̍|Eka̱m|agrE̱|atha̍|dvau|atha̍|trIn|atha̍|catura̍ḥ|EṣA|vai|ArAgrEtyArA̱̍ - agrA|avAntaradIkṣEtyavAntara̍ - dIkṣA|asminn|Eva|asmai|lOkE|ad^^rdhukam|Bavati|parOva̍rIyasImiti̍# paraḥ - varIyasIm|avAntaradIkṣAmityavAntara̍ - dIkṣAm|upEti|iyAt|yaḥ|kAmayE̍ta|amuṣminn̍|mE|lOkE|ad^^rdhu̍kam|syAt|iti̍|catura̍ḥ|agrE̱̍ ( )|atha|trIn|atha̍|dvau|atha̍|Eka̱m|EṣA|vai|parOva̍rIyasIti̍# paraḥ - varIyasi|avAntaradIkṣEtyavAntara̍ - dIkṣA|amuṣminn|Eva|asmai|lOkE|ad^^rdhu̍kam|Bavati||19̍ (66) (asiṣyatIti# - juhuyAth - sAyaM prAtarupasada̍ - ścaturviṃśatiḥ̍ saM - caturO&grE - ṣOḍaśa̍ ca) (A3)
verses.samhita: padyantE̍ caturviṃśati-rarddhamAsA̍ arddhamAsAnEva̍ prIṇAtyArA̱grA-mavAntaradIkṣA-mupE̍yAdyaḥ̍ kAmayEtA&smin̍ mE# lOkE&rddhukaṅ̍ syAdityEkamagrE&tha dvAvatha trInatha# catura# EṣA vA ArA̱grA &vAntaradIkṣA &sminnEvAsmai# lOkE&rddhukaM̍ Bavati parOvarIyasI-mavAntaradIkṣA-mupE̍yAdyaḥ̍ kAmayEtAmuṣmi̍n̍ mE lOkE&rddhukaṅ̍ syAditi# caturO&grE ( ) &tha trInatha dvAvathaikamEṣA̍ vai parOvarIyasya-vAntaradIkṣA̍ &muṣminnEvAsmai̍# lOkE&rddhukaM̍ Bavati||19

verses.padam: - Padam suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|vai|EtE|lOkam|yanti|yE|upasada ityupa̍ - sadaḥ|upayantIyu̍pa̍ - yanti|tEṣA̱m|yaḥ|unnaya̍ta̍ ityut̍ - nayatE|hIya̍tE|Eva|saḥ|na|uditi̍|anEṣi|iti̍|sU̱nnIyamiti̍ su - unnIyam|iva|yaḥ|vai|svArthEtAmiti# svArtha-itA̱m|yatAm|śrAntaḥ|hIyatE|uta|saḥ|niṣṭyAya̍|saha|vasati|tasmA̱t|sakRut|unnIyEtyu̍t-nIya̍|na|apa̍ram|uditi̍|nayEta|daddhnA|uditi̍|nayEta|Etat|vai|paśUnAm|rUpam|rUpEṇa̍|Eva|paśUn|avEti̍|rundhE|20̍ (50)
verses.samhita: suvargaM ~MvA EtE lOkaM ~Myanti̍ ya upasada̍# upayanti tEṣAM ~Mya unnayatE̍ hIyata̍ Eva sa nOdanEṣIti̍ sU̱nnIyamiva yO vai svArthEtA̱M ~MyatAṅ śrAntO hIyata̍ uta sa niṣṭyAya# saha vasati̍ tasmA̱th sakRudunnIya nAparamunna̍yEta̍ daddhnOnnayEtaitadvai̍ paśUnAṃ̍ rUpaṃ rUpEṇaiva paśUnava# rundhE- [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam yajñaḥ|dEvEByaḥ|nilA̍yata|viṣṇu̍ḥ|rUpam|kRutvA|saḥ|pRuthivIm|prEti̍|aviśat|tam|dEvAḥ|hastAn̍|saṃqraByEti̍# saM - raBya|aicCann|tam|indra̍ḥ|uparyu̍parItyupari̍# - upari|atIti|akrAmat|saḥ|abravIt|kaḥ|mA|ayam|uparyu̍parItyupari̍# - upari|atIti|akramIt|iti̍|aham|durga̍ iti# duḥ - gE|hantA̱|iti|atha̍|kaḥ|tvam|iti̍|aham|durgAditi̍# duḥ - gAt|AhartEtyA - hartA|iti|saḥ|abravIt|durga̍ iti# duḥ - gE|vai|hantA̱|avOcathAḥ|varAhaḥ|ayam|vAmamOṣa iti# vAma - mOṣaḥ|21 (50)
verses.samhita: yajñO dEvEByO nilAyata̍ viṣṇU# rUpaM kRutvA sa pRuthivIM̍ prAviśat̍ taM dEvA hastA̱nth saṃq raByai̱cCan tamindra# uparyuparyatya̍krAmath̍ sO̱&bravIt kO mA&yamuparyuparyatya̍kramI-dityahaM̍ durgE hantEtyatha kastvamityahaM durgAdAhartEti sO̱&bravId durgE vai hantA&vOcathA̍ varAhO&yaM̍ ~MvAmamOṣaḥ-̍ [ ] 21

verses.padam: - Padam saptAnAm|girIṇAm|parastA̱t|vittam|vEdya̱m|asurAṇAm|biBarti|tam|jahi|yadi̍|durga̍ iti# duḥ - gE|hantA̱|asi|iti̍|saḥ|darBapu~jjIlamiti̍# darBa - pu~jjIlam|udvRuhyEtyut̍ - vRuhya|sapta|girIn|BitvA|tam|ahann|saḥ|abravIt|durgAditi̍# duḥ - gAt|vai|AhartEtyA - hartA|avOcathAḥ|Etam|Eti|hara|iti̍|tam|EByaḥ|yajñaḥ|Eva|yajñam|Eti̍|aharat|yat|tat|vittam|vEdya̱m|asu̍rAṇAm|avi̍ndanta|tat|Eka̱m|vEdyai̱|vEditvamiti̍# vEdi - tvam|asurAṇAm|22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: saptAnAM̍ girIṇAM̍ parastA̱dvittaM ~MvEdyamasurAṇAM̍ biBarti taM jahi̍ yadi# durgE hantA&sIti sa darBapu~jjIlamud-vRuhya̍# sapta girIn BittvA tamahanth̍ sO̱&bravId durgAdvA AhartAvOcathA̍ EtamA harEti tamE̱ByO yajña Eva yajñamA&haradyat̍ tadvittaM ~MvEdyamasurAṇA-mavi̍ndanta̍ tadEkaM ~MvEdyai# vEditvamasurAṇAM-̍ [ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam vai|iyam|agrE̱|AsIt|yAvat|AsI̍naḥ|parApaśyatIti̍# parA - paśyati|tAva̍t|dEvAnA̱m|tE|dEvAḥ|abruvann|astu̍|Eva|naḥ|asyAm|apIti̍|iti̍|kiya̍t|vaḥ|dAsyAmaḥ|iti̍|yAva̍t|iyam|salAvRukI|triḥ|parikrAmatIti̍# pari-krAmati|tAva̍t|naḥ|datta|iti̍|saḥ|indra̍ḥ|salAvRukI|rUpam|kRutvA|imAm|triḥ|sarvata̍ḥ|parIti̍|akrAmat|tat|imAm|avindanta|yat|imAm|avi̍ndanta|tat|vEdyai̱|vEditvamiti̍# vEdi - tvam|23 (50)
verses.samhita: ~MvA iyamagra# AsId yAvadAsInaḥ̍ parApaśyati̍ tAvad̍ dEvAnAM tE dEvA abruvannastvEva̍ nO&syAmapIti kiyadvO̍ dAsyAma iti yAvadiyaṃ̍ salAvRukI̍ triḥ parikrAma̍ti̍ tAvannO̍ dattEti sa indraḥ̍ salAvRukI rUpaM kRutvEmAM triḥ sarvataḥ paryakrAmat̍ tadimAmavindanta̍ yadimAmavindanta̍ tad vEdyai# vEditvaṃ- [ ] 23

verses.padam: - Padam sA|vai|iyam|sarvA̱|Eva|vEdiḥ|iya̍ti|śakṣyAmi|iti̍|tu|vai|avamAyEtya̍va̍ - mAya|yajantE|triṃqśat|padAni̍|paścAt|tiraścI̱|Bavati|ṣaṭtriṃ̍śaditi̍ ṣaṭ - triṃqśat|prAcI̱|caturviṃśatiriti̍ catuḥ̍ - viṃqśatiḥ|purastA̱t|tiraścI̱|daśadaśEti̍ daśa-daśa|samiti̍|padyantE|daśA̱kṣarEti̍ daśa# - akṣarA|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|anna̱m|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjEti# vi - rAjA̱|Eva|annAdyamityanna̍ - adya̱m|avEti|rundhE|uditi̍|hanti|yat|Eva|asyAḥ|amEddhyam|tat|apEti̍|hanti|uditi̍|hanti|tasmA̱t|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|parEti̍|Bavanti̍ ( )|barqḥiḥ|stRuṇAti|tasmA̱t|Oṣadhayaḥ|puna̍ḥ|Eti̍|Bavanti|utta̍ramityut̍ - taram|barqḥiṣaḥ|uttarabarqḥirityu̍ttara̍ - barqḥiḥ|stRuṇAti|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|vai|barqḥiḥ|yajamAnaḥ|uttarabaraḥirityu̍ttara̍ - baraḥiḥ|yajamAnam|Eva|aya̍jamAnAt|utta̍ramityut̍ - taram|karOti|tasmA̱t|yajamAnaḥ|aya̍jamAnAt|utta̍ra̍ ityut - taraḥ||24 (75) (rundhE - vAmamOṣO - vEditvamasu̍rAṇAM̍ - ~MvEditvaM - Bavanti̍ - pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A4)
verses.samhita: sA vA iyaṃ sarvaiva vEdiriyati̍ śakṣyAmIti tvA avamAya̍# yajantE triṃqśat padAni# paścAt tiraścI# Bavati ṣaṭtriṃśat̍ prAcI caturviṃśatiḥ̍ purastA̱t tiraścI daśadaśa̍ saMpadyantE̍ daśA̱kṣarA virAḍannaM̍ ~MvirAḍ virAjaivAnnAdyamava# rundha uddhanti̍ yadEvAsyA# amEddhyaM tadapa# hantyuddhanti̍ tasmAdOṣadhayaḥ̍ parA# Bavanti ( ) barqḥiḥ stRuṇAti̍ tasmAdOṣadhayaḥ̍ punarA Bavantyutta̍raM̍ barqḥiṣa# uttarabarqḥiḥ stRuṇAti̍ prajA vai barqḥiryajamAna̍ uttara barqḥi ryajamAna-mEvA-ya̍jamAnAdutta̍raM̍ karOti tasmAd-yajamAnO̍ &yajamAnAdutta̍raḥ||24̍ (rundhE - vAmamOṣO - vEditvamasu̍rAṇAM̍ - ~MvEditvaM - Bavanti̍ - pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam yat|vai|anIśAnaḥ|BAram|Adatta̍ ityA̱ - dattE|vIti|vai|saḥ|liśatE|yat|dvAda̍śa|sAhnasyEti̍# sa - ahnasya|upasada̍ ityupa̍ - sadaḥ|syuḥ|tistraḥ|ahIna̍sya|yajñasya̍|vilOmEti̍ vi - lOma|kriyEta|tisraḥ|Eva|sAhnasyEti# sa - ahnasya|upasada̍ ityupa̍ - sadaḥ|dvAda̍śa|ahIna̍sya|yajñasya̍|savIryatvAyEti̍# savIrya - tvAya|athO̍ iti|salOmEti̍ sa-lOma|kriyatE|vathsasya|Eka̍ḥ|stana̍ḥ|BAgI|hi|saḥ|atha̍|Eka̱m|stana̱m|vratam|upEti̍|Eti|atha̍|dvau|atha̍|trIn|atha̍|catura̍ḥ|Etat|vai|25̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yadvA anIśAnO̍ BAramAdattE̍ vi vai sa liśatE̍ yad dvAdaśa̍ sAhnasyOpasadaḥ̍ syustistrO&hIna̍sya̍ yajñasya vilOma̍ kriyEta tisra Eva sAhnasyOpasadO̍ dvAdaśAhIna̍sya̍ yajñasya# savIryatvAyAthO salOma̍ kriyatE vathsasyaikaḥ stanO# BAgI hi sO&thaikaṅq stanaM̍ ~Mvratamupaityatha dvAvatha trInatha# catura# Etadvai- [ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam kṣurapavIti# kṣura - pavi|nAma|vratam|yEna̍|prEti̍|jAtAn|BrAtRu̍vyAn|nudatE̱|pratIti̍|janiṣyamA̍ṇAn|athO̍ iti|kanI̍yasA|Eva|BUya̍ḥ|upEti̍|Eti|catura̍ḥ|agrE̱|stanAn̍|vratam|upEti̍|Eti|atha̍|trIn|atha̍|dvau|atha̍|Eka̱m|Etat|vai|sujaGanamiti̍# su - jaGanam|nAma|vratam|tapasya̱m|suvargya̍miti̍# suvaḥ - gya̱m|athO iti|prEti̍|Eva|jAyatE|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|yavAgUḥ|rAjanyasya|vratam|krUrA|iva|vai|yavAgUḥ|krUraḥ|iva|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kṣurapavi̍ nAma# vrataM ~MyEna pra jAtAn BrAtRuvyAn̍ nudatE prati# janiṣyamAṇAnathO̍ kanIyasaiva̍ BUya upaiti̍ caturO&grE stanA̱n vratamupaityatha trInatha dvAvathaikamEtadvai̍ sujaGanaM̍ nAma# vrataM tapasyaṃ̍# suvargyamathO̍ praiva jAyatE̍ prajayA# paśuBiryavAgU̍ rAjanya̍sya̍ vrataM krUrEva vai yavAgUḥ̍ krUra iva-̍ [ ] 26

verses.padam: - Padam rAjanyaḥ|vajra̍sya|rUpam|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM-Ruddhyai|AmikṣA̱|vaiśyasya|pAkayajñasyEti̍# pAka - yajñasya|rUpam|puṣṭyai̱|paya̍ḥ|brAhmaṇasya̍|tEja̍ḥ|vai|brAhmaṇaḥ|tEja̍ḥ|paya̍ḥ|tEja̍sA|Eva|tEja̍ḥ|paya̍ḥ|Atmann|dhattE|athO̍ iti|paya̍sA|vai|garBA̱ḥ|vad^^rdhantE|garBa̍ḥ|iva|Kalu̍|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|dIkṣitaḥ|yat|asya|paya̍ḥ|vratam|Bava̍ti|AtmAna̱m|Eva|tat|vad^^rdhayati|trivra̍ta̍ iti tri - vrataḥ|vai|manuḥ|AsIt|dvivra̍tA̍ iti dvi - vratAḥ|asurAḥ|Eka̍vratA̍ ityEka# - vratAḥ|27 (50)
verses.samhita: rAjanyO# vajrasya̍ rUpaṃ samRuddhyA̍ AmikṣA vaiśyasya̍ pAkayajñasya# rUpaM puṣṭyai payO̱ brAhmaṇasya tEjO vai brA̱hmaṇastEjaḥ payastEjasaiva̍ tEjaḥ paya# Atman dhattE &thO payasA̍ vai garBA# varddhantE garBa# iva Kalu vA Eṣa yad dI̱kṣitO yadasya̍ payO̱ vrataM BavatyAtmAna̍mEva̍ tad varddhayati̍ trivratO̍ vai manurAsId̍ dvivratA̍ asurA̍ EkavratA-̍ [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAḥ|prAtaḥ|maddhyandinE|sAyam|tat|manO̱ḥ|vratam|AsIt|pAkayajñasyEti̍# pAka - yajñasya|rUpam|puṣṭyai̱|prAtaḥ|ca|sAyam|ca|asu̍rAṇAm|nirmaddhyamiti̍# niḥ-maddhyam|kṣudhaḥ|rUpam|tataḥ|tE|parEti̍|aBavann|maddhyandi̍nE|maddhyarAtra̍ iti# maddhya - rAtrE|dEvAnA̱m|tataḥ|tE|aBavann|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ-gam|lOkam|Ayann|yat|asya|maddhyandinE|maddhyarAtra̍ iti# maddhya-rAtrE|vratam|Bavati|maddhyataḥ|vai|annE̍na|Bu~jjatE|maddhyataḥ|Eva|tat|Urja̱m|dhattE|BrAtRu̍vyABiBUtyA̍ iti BrAtRuvya̍ - aBiBUtyai|Bavati|AtmanA̱|28̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvAḥ prAtarmaddhyaMdinE̍ sAyaM tan manO̱rvratamAsIt̍ pAkayajñasya# rUpaM puṣṭyai̱ prAtaśca# sAyaM cAsurAṇAM̍ nirmaddhyaM kṣudhO rUpaM tatastE parA&Bavan̍ maddhyaMdinE̍ maddhyarAtrE dEvAnAM tatastE&Bavanth̍ suvargaM ~MlOkamAyanq.̍ yadasya̍ maddhyaMdinE̍ maddhyarAtrE vrataM Bavati̍ maddhyatO vA annEna̍ Bu~jjatE maddhyata Eva tadUrjaM̍ dhattE BrAtRuvyABiBUtyai̍ BavatyAtmanA-̍ [ ] 28

verses.padam: - Padam parEti|asya|BrAtRu̍vyaḥ|Bavati|garBa̍ḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|dIkṣitaḥ|yOni̍ḥ|dIkṣitavimitamiti̍# dIkṣita - vimitam|yat|dIkṣitaḥ|dIkṣitavimitAditi# dIkṣita - vimitAt|pravasEditi# pra - vasE̱t|yathA̱|yOnE̱ḥ|garBaḥ|skanda̍ti|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|na|pravastavya̍miti̍# pra - vastavya̱m|Atmanaḥ|gOpIthAya̍|Eṣaḥ|vai|vyAGraḥ|kulagOpa̍ iti# kula - gOpaḥ|yat|agniḥ|tasmA̱t|yat|dIkṣitaḥ|pravasEditi# pra - vasE̱t|saḥ|Enam|Iśvaraḥ|anUtthAyEtyanu̍ - utthAya|hantO̱ḥ|na|pravastavya̍miti̍# pra - vastavya̱m|Atmanaḥ|guptyai̱|dakṣiṇataḥ|śayE|Etat|vai|yaja̍mAnasya̍ ( )|AyatanamityA̱̍ - yatanam|svE|Eva|Ayata̍na̍ ityA̱-yatanE|śayE|agnim|aByAvRutyEtya̍Bi-AvRutya̍|śayE|dEvatA̱ḥ|Eva|yajñam|aByAvRutyEtya̍Bi̍ -AvRutya|śayE||29̍ (63)
verses.samhita: parA̱&sya BrAtRuvyO̍ Bavati garBO vA Eṣa yad dI̱kṣitO yOni# rdIkṣitavimitaM ~Myad dI̱kṣitO dI̱kṣitavimitAt pravasEd yathA yOnErgarBaḥ skandati̍ tAdRugEva tanna pravastavya̍mAtmanO̍# gOpIthAyaiṣa vai vyAGraḥ kulagOpO̍ yadagnistasmAd yad dI̱kṣitaḥ pravasEth sa EnamIśvarO̍&nUtthAya̍ hantOrna pravastavya̍mAtmanO̍ guptyai# dakṣiṇataḥ śaya̍ Etadvai yajamAnasyA̍ ( ) &&*yatanaṅqsva̍ EvA&&*yatanE̍ śayE &gnimaByAvRutya̍# śayE dEvatA# Eva yajñamaByAvRutya̍# śayE||29

verses.padam: - Padam purOhaviṣIti̍# puraḥ-haviṣi|dEvayajana̍ iti# dEva-yajanE|yAjayEt|yam|kAmayE̍ta|upEti̍|Enam|utta̍ra̍ ityut - taraḥ|yajñaḥ|namEt|aBIti|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ-gam|lOkam|jayEt|iti|Etat|vai|purOha̍viriti̍# puraḥ-haviḥ|dEvayajanamiti̍# dEva-yajanam|yasya̍|hOtA̱|prAtaranuvAkamiti̍# prAtaḥ-anuvAkam|anubruvannityanu̍ - bruvann|agnim|apaḥ|Adityam|aBIti|vipaśyatIti̍# vi-paśyati|upEti̍|Enam|utta̍ra̍ ityut - taraḥ|yajñaḥ|namati|aBIti|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|jayati|AptE|dEvayajana̍ iti# dEva-yajanE|yAjayEt|BrAtRu̍vyavantamiti̍ BrAtRuvya̍ - vantam|panthA̱m|vA|adhisparq.qśayEdityadhi-sparq.śayE̱t|kartam|vA|yAva̍t|na|ana̍sE|yAtavai|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: purOhaviṣi̍ dEvayajanE̍ yAjayEdyaM kAmayEtOpainamutta̍rO̍ yajñO namEdaBi̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM jayEdityEtadvai̍ purOhavirdEvayaja̍naM̍ ~Myasya hOtA̱ prAtaranuvAka -manubruva-nnagnimapa̍ AdityamaBi̍ vipaśyatyupainamutta̍rO̍ yajñO namatyaBi̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM jayatyAptE̍ dEvayaja̍nE̍ yAjayEd -BrAtRuvyavantaM̍ panthA̱M ~MvA&dhisparq.śayE̱t kartaM ~MvA yAvannAnasE̍ yAtavai- [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam na|rathAya|Etat|vai|Aptam|dEvayaja̍namiti̍# dEva - yajanam|ApnOti̍|Eva|BrAtRu̍vyam|na|Enam|BrAtRu̍vyaḥ|ApnOti|EkO̱nnata̍ ityEka-unnatE|dEvayaja̍na̍ iti# dEva - yajanE|yAjayEt|paśukA̍mamiti̍# paśu - kAmam|EkO̱nnatAdityEka# - unnatAt|vai|dEvayajanAditi̍# dEva - yajanAt|a~ggi̍rasaḥ|paśUn|asRujanta|antarA|sadOhavid^^rdhAnE̍ iti# sadaḥ-havid^^rdhAnE|unnatamityut̍ - natam|syAt|Etat|vai|EkO̱nnatamityEka# - unnatam|dEvayajanamiti̍# dEva - yajanam|paśumAniti̍# paśu - mAn|Eva|Bavati|tryunnata̍ iti tri - unnatE|dEvayajana̍ iti# dEva - yajanE|yAjayEt|suvargakA̍mamiti̍# suvarga - kAmam|tryunnatAditi̍ tri - unnatAt|vai|dEvayajanAditi̍# dEva - yajanAt|a~ggi̍rasaḥ|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Ayann|antarA|AhavanIyamityA̱-havanIya̱m|ca|havid^^rdhAnamiti# haviḥ - dhAna̱m|ca|31 (50)
verses.samhita: na rathAyaitadvA̍ AptaM dEvayaja̍namApnOtyEva̍ BrAtRuvyaM̍ nainaM BrAtRuvya̍ ApnOtyEkO̱nnatE dEvayajanE̍ yAjayEt paśukAma-mEkO̱nnatAdvai̍ dEvayaja̍nAda~ggi̍rasaḥ̍ paśUnasRujantAntarA̍ sadOhavirddhAnE̍ unnataṅ̍ syAdEtadvA̍ EkO̱nnataM dEvayajanaM̍ paśumAnEva Bavati̍ tryunnatE̍ dEvayajanE̍ yAjayEth suvargakAmaM̍ tryunnatAdvai̍ dEvayaja̍nAda~ggi̍rasaḥ̍ suvargaM ~MlOkamAya-nnantarA̍ &&havanIyaM̍ ca havirddhAnaM̍ cO- [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam unnatamityut̍ - natam|syAt|antarA|havid^^rdhAnamiti# haviḥ - dhAna̱m|ca|sadaḥ|ca|antarA|sada̍ḥ|ca|gAṛha̍patyamiti̍ gAṛha# - patyam|ca|Etat|vai|tryunnatamiti̍ tri - unnatam|dEvayajanamiti̍# dEva - yajanam|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|Eva|lOkam|Eti|pratiṣṭhita̍ iti prati# - sthitE|dEvayajana̍ iti# dEva - yajanE|yAjayEt|pratiṣṭhAkA̍mamiti̍# pratiṣṭhA - kAmam|Etat|vai|pratiṣṭhitamiti̍ prati# - sthitamq|dEvayajanamiti̍# dEva - yajanam|yat|sarvata̍ḥ|samam|pratIti̍|Eva|tiṣṭhati|yatra̍|anyA^^a̍nyA̍ ityanyAḥ - anyAḥ|Oṣadhayaḥ|vyati̍ṣaktA̍ iti# vi - atiṣaktAḥ|syuḥ|tat|yAjayEt|paśukA̍mamiti̍# paśu - kAmam|Etat|vai|paśUnAm|rUpam|rUpEṇa|Eva|asmai|paśUn|32̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -nnataṅ syAdantarA̍ havirddhAna̍M̍ ca sadaścAntarA̍ sadaśca̍ gAṛhapatyaM̍ caitadvai tryunnataM̍ dEvayajanaṃ̍ suvargamEva lOkamEti̍ pratiṣṭhitE̍ dEvayajanE̍ yAjayEt pratiṣṭhAkAmamEtadvai̍ pratiṣṭhitaM̍ dEvayajanaM̍ ~Myath sarvataḥ̍ samaM pratyEva tiṣṭhati̍ yatrAnyA anyA̍ OṣadhayO̍ vyatiṣaktAḥ̍ syustad-yAjayEt̍ paśukAmamEtadvai̍ paśUnAṃ̍ rUpaṃ rUpEṇaivAsmai# paśU- [ ] 32

verses.padam: - Padam avEti|rundhE|paśumAniti̍# paśu - mAn|Eva|Bavati|niṛRutigRuhIta̍ iti niṛRuti̍ - gRuhItE|dEvayajana̍ iti# dEva-yajanE|yAjayEt|yam|kAmayE̍ta|niṛRutyEti̍ niḥ - RutyA|asya|yajñam|grAhayEyam|iti|Etat|vai|niṛRu̍tigRuhItamiti̍ niṛRuti̍ - gRuhItam|dEvayajanamiti̍# dEva - yajanam|yat|sadRuśyai̱|satyA̱ḥ|Rukṣam|niṛRutyEti̍ niḥ - RutyA|Eva|asya|yajñam|grAhayati|vyAvRutta̍ iti# vi-AvRuttE|dEvayaja̍na̍ iti# dEva - yajanE|yAjayEt|vyAvRutkA̍mamiti̍# vyAvRut-kAmam|yam|pAtrE̱|vA|talpE̱|vA|mImAṃsErann|prAcIna̱m|AhavanIyAdityA̱̍ -havanIyA̱t|pravaṇamiti# pra - vanam|syAt|pratIcIna̱m|gAṛhapatyAditi̍ gAṛha# - patyAt|Etat|vai|vyAvRuttamiti̍# vi - AvRuttam|dEvayaja̍namiti̍# dEva - yajanam|vIti̍|pApmanA̱̍ ( )|BrAtRuvyEṇa|Eti̍|vartatE|na|Enam|pAtrE̱|na|talpE̱|mImAṃqsantE|kAryE̱|dEvayaja̍na̍ iti# dEva-yajanE|yAjayEt|BUti̍kAmamiti̍ BUti# - kAmam|kAryaḥ|vai|puru̍ṣaḥ|Bava̍ti|Eva||33̍ (68)
verses.samhita: nava# rundhE paśumAnEva Bavati̍ niṛRutigRuhItE̍ dEvayajanE̍ yAjayEdyaM kAmayEta̍ niṛRutyAsya̍ yajñaM grAhayEyamityEtadvai̍ niṛRutigRuhItaM̍ dEvayajanaM̍ ~Myath sadRuśyai# satyA# RukṣaM niṛRutyaivAsya̍# yajñaM grAhayati̍ vyAvRuttE̍ dEvayajanE̍ yAjayEd vyAvRutkAmaM̍ ~MyaM pAtrE# vA talpE# vA mImAṃsEran̍ prAcInamAhavanIyA̱t̍ pravaṇaṅ syA̱t pratIcInaM gAṛhapatyAdEtadvai̍ vyAvRuttaM̍ dEvayajanaM̍ ~Mvi pApmanA ( ) BrAtRuvyEṇA-̍ &&*vartatE̍ nainaM pAtrE na talpE# mImAṃ santE kAryE# dEvayajanE̍ yAjayEd-BUtikAmaM̍ kAyA# vai puruṣO̍ BavatyEva||33̍

verses.padam: - Padam tEByaḥ|uttaravEdirityu̍ttara̍ - vEdiḥ|siṃqhIḥ|rUpam|kRutvA|uBayAn|antarA|apakramyEtya̍pa̍ - kramya|atiṣṭhat|tE|dEvAḥ|amanyanta|yatarAn|vai|iyam|upAvarthsyatItyu̍pa-Avarthsyati̍|tE|idam|Baviṣyanti|iti̍|tAm|upEti̍|amantrayanta|sA|abravIt|vara̱m|vRuṇai|sarvAn̍|mayA̱|kAmAn̍|vIti̍|aśnavatha|pUrvA̱m|tu|mA|agnEḥ|Ahu̍tirityA̍ - hutiḥ|aśnavatai|iti|tasmA̱t|uttaravEdimityu̍ttara̍ - vEdim|pUrvA̱m|agnEḥ|vyAGArayantIti̍# vi-AGArayanti|vArE̍vRutamiti̍ vArE̱-vRutam|hi|asyai|śamyayA|parIti̍|mimItE|34̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tEBya# uttaravEdiḥ siṃqqhI rUpaM kRutvOBayA-nantarA&pakramyA̍tiṣṭhat̍ tE dEvA amanyanta̍ yatarAn. vA iyamupAvarthsyati̍ ta idaM BaviṣyantIti̍ tAmupAmantrayanta̍ sA&bravId̍ varaM̍ ~MvRuṇai sarvAn mayA kAmAn vyaśnavatha̍ pUrvAM tu mA&gnErAhutiraśnavatA̍ iti tasmAduttaravEdiM̍ pUrvAmagnE-̍ rvyAGArayanti̍ vArEvRutaṅq̍ hyasyai̍ śamyayA̍ pari# mimItE- [ ] 34

verses.padam: - Padam mAtrA̱|Eva|asyai|sA|athO iti|yuktEna̍|Eva|yuktam|avEti̍|rundhE|vittAyanIti̍# vitta - ayanI|mE|asi|iti̍|Aha|vittA|hi|EnAn|Ava̍t|tiktAyanIti̍# tikta - ayanI|mE|asi|iti̍|Aha|tiktAn|hi|EnAn|Ava̍t|ava̍tAt|mA|nAthitam|iti̍|Aha|nAthitAn|hi|EnAn|Ava̍t|ava̍tAt|mA|vyathitam|iti̍|Aha|vyathitAn|hi|EnAn|Ava̍t|vidEḥ|agniḥ|naBa̍ḥ|nAma̍|35̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mAtraivAsyai sAthO# yuktEnaiva yuktamava# rundhE vittAyanI̍ mE&sItyAha̍ vittA hyEnAnAva̍t̍ tiktAyanI̍ mE&sItyAha̍ tiktAn. hyEnAnAvadava̍tAnmA̍ nAthitamityAha̍ nAthitAn. hyEnAnAvadava̍tAnmA̍ vyathitamityAha̍ vyathitAn. hyEnAnAva̍d-vidEragnirnaBO̍ nAmA- [ ] 35

verses.padam: - Padam agnE̱|a~ggiraḥ|iti|triḥ|harati|yE|Eva|Eṣu|lOkEṣu̍|agnaya̍ḥ|tAn|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|tUṣṇIm|caturtham|harati|ani̍ruktamityani̍ḥ̍ - uktam|Eva|avEti|rundhE|siṃqhIḥ|asi|mahiṣIḥ|asi|iti̍|Aha|siṃqhIḥ|hi|EṣA|rUpam|kRutvA|uBayAn̍|antarA|apakramyEtya̍pa̍ - kramya|ati̍ṣṭhat|uru|prathasva|uru|tE|yajñapa̍tiriti̍# yajña - patiḥ|prathatAm|iti|Aha|yaja̍mAnam|Eva|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|prathayati|dhruvA|36 (50)
verses.samhita: gnE# a~ggira iti triṛharati̍ ya Evaiṣu lOkEṣvagnaya-stAnEvAva# rundhE tUṣṇIM caturtthaṃ̍ haratyani̍-ruktamEvAva̍# rundhE siṃqhIrasi̍ mahiṣIrasItyAha̍ siṃqhIrhyEṣA̍ rUpaM kRutvOBayA-nantarA̍ &pakramyAtiṣṭhaduru̍ prathasvOru̍ tE# yajñapatiḥ̍ prathatAmityAha̍ yajamAnamEva̍ prajayA# paśuBiḥ̍ prathayati dhruvA- [ ] 36

verses.padam: - Padam asi|iti|samiti̍|hanti|dhRutyai̱|dEvEBya̍ḥ|śundhasva|dEvEBya̍ḥ|śumBasva|iti̍|avEti̍|ca|ukṣati̍|prEti̍|ca|kirati|śuddhyai̱|indraGOṣa̍ itI̱ndra - GOṣaḥ|tvA|vasuBiriti̍ vasu# - Biḥ|purastA̱t|pAtu|iti|Aha|digBya̍ iti# dik - Byaḥ|Eva|EnAm|prEti|ukṣati|dEvAn|ca|it|uttaravEdirityu̍ttara̍ - vEdiḥ|upAvavartItyu̍pa̍ - Avavarti|iha|Eva|vIti̍|jayAmahai|iti̍|asu̍rAḥ|vajra̱m|udyatyEtyu̍t̍ - yatya|dEvAn|aBIti̍|Ayanta|tAn|indraGOṣa̍ itI̱ndra - GOṣaḥ|vasuBiriti̍ vasu# - Biḥ|purastA̱t|apEti|37̍ (50)
verses.samhita: &sIti saṃ hanti̍ dhRutyai# dEvEByaḥ̍ śundhasva dEvEByaḥ̍ śuMBasvEtyava# cOkṣati pra ca# kirati śuddhyA# indraGOṣastvA vasuBiḥ̍ purastA̱t pAtvityAha̍ digBya EvainAM prOkṣati̍ dEvAṅścEdu-ttaravEdirupAva̍vartIhaiva̍ vi jayAmahA̍ ityasurA̍ vajramudyatya̍# dEvAnaByAyanta̍ tAnindraGOṣO̍ vasuBiḥ̍ purastAdapA-̍ [ ] 37

verses.padam: - Padam anudata|manOjavA̍ iti manaḥ̍ - javAḥ|pitRuBiriti# pitRu - Biḥ|dakṣiṇataḥ|pracEtA̍ iti pra - cEtAḥ|rudraiḥ|paścAt|viśvakarmEti# viśva - karmA|Adityaiḥ|uttarata ityut̍ - tarataḥ|yat|Evam|uttaravEdimityuttara̍ - vEdim|prOkṣatIti# pra - ukṣati|digBya̍ iti# dik - Byaḥ|Eva|tat|yajamAnaḥ|BrAtRu̍vyAn|prEti̍|nudatE|indra̍ḥ|yatIn̍|sAlAvRukEBya̍ḥ|prEti̍|ayacCat|tAn|dakṣiṇataḥ|uttaravEdyA̍ ityuttara̍ - vEdyAḥ|Adann|yat|prOkṣaṇInAmiti̍# pra - ukṣaṇInAm|ucCiṣyEtEtyu̍t̍ - śiṣyEta|tat|dakṣiṇataḥ|uttaravEdyA̍ ityuttara̍ - vEdyai|nIti|nayEt|yat|Eva|tatra̍|krUram|tat|tEna̍|śamayati|yam|dviṣyAt|tam|dhyAyEt|śucA̍ ( )|Eva|Enam|arpayati||38 (53) (mimItE - nAma# - dhruvA - &pa# - śucA - trIṇi# ca) ( A7)
verses.samhita: -nudata manOjavAḥ̍ pitRuBi# rdakṣiṇataḥ pracEtA̍ rudraiḥ paścAd-viśvakarmA&&dityairu̍ttaratO̍ yadEvamuttaravEdiM̍ prOkṣati# digBya Eva tad-yajamAnO̍ BrAtRuvyAn̍ pra ṇudata̍ indrO yatI̱nth sAlAvRukEByaḥ prAyacCat̍ tAn dakṣiṇata̍ uttaravEdyA̍ Adanq̍ yat prOkṣaṇInA-mucCiṣyE̍ta̍ tad dakṣiṇata̍ uttaravEdyai̍ ni nayEd-yadEva̍ tatra# krUraM tat tEna# śamayati yaM dviṣyAt taM dhyAyEcCucai̍ ( ) vainamarpayati||38̍ (mimItE - nAma# - dhruvA - &pa# - śucA - trIṇi# ca)

verses.padam: - Padam sA|uttaravEdirityuttara-vEdiḥ|abravIt|sarvAn̍|mayA̱|kAmAn̍|vIti̍|aśnavatha|iti̍|tE|dEvAḥ|akAmayanta|asu̍rAn|BrAtRu̍vyAn|aBIti̍|BavEma|iti̍|tE|ajuhavuḥ|siṃqhIḥ|asi|sapatnasAhIti̍# sapatna - sAhI|svAhA̱|iti|tE|asu̍rAn|BrAtRu̍vyAn|aBIti̍|aBavann|tE|asu̍rAn|BrAtRu̍vyAn|aBiBUyEtya̍Bi̍ - BUya|akAmayanta|prajAmiti̍# pra-jAm|vindEmahi|iti|tE|ajuhavuḥ|siṃqhIḥ|asi|suprajAvaniriti̍# suprajA - vaniḥ|svAhA̱|iti̍|tE|prajAmiti̍# pra-jAm|avindanta|tE|prajAmiti# pra - jAm|vittvA|39 (50)
verses.samhita: sOttaravEdira̍bravIth̍ sarvAn mayA kAmAn vyaśnavathEti̍ tE dEvA akAmayantAsu̍rAn̍ BrAtRuvyAnaBi̍ BavEmEti̍ tE&juhavuḥ̍ siṃqhIrasi̍ sapatnasAhI svAhEti tE&surAn̍ BrAtRuvyA-naBya̍Bavan̍ tE&surAn̍ BrAtRuvyA-naBiBUyA̍kAmayanta̍ prajAM ~MvindEmahIti̍ tE&juhavuḥ̍ siṃqhIrasi̍ suprajAvaniḥ svAhEti tE prajAmavindanta̍ tE prajAM ~MvittvA- [ ] 39

verses.padam: - Padam akAmayanta|paśUn|vindEmahi|iti|tE|ajuhavuḥ|siṃqhIḥ|asi|rAyaspOṣavaniriti̍# rAyaspOṣa - vaniḥ|svAhA̱|iti̍|tE|paśUn|avindanta|tE|paśUn|vittvA|akAmayanta|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati - sthAm|vindEmahi|iti|tE|ajuhavuḥ|siṃqhIḥ|asi|AdityavanirityA̍ditya̍ - vaniḥ|svAhA̱|iti̍|tE|imAm|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati - sthAm|avindanta|tE|imAm|pratiṣṭhAmiti# prati - sthAm|vittvA|akAmayanta|dEvatA̱ḥ|Aśiṣa ityA̱ - śiṣaḥ|upEti̍|iyAma|iti̍|tE|ajuhavuḥ|siṃqhIḥ|asi|Eti̍|vaha|dEvAn|dEvayata̍ iti# dEva - yatE|40 (50)
verses.samhita: &kAmayanta̍ paśUn. vindEmahIti̍ tE&juhavuḥ̍ siṃqhIrasi̍ rAyaspOṣavaniḥ svAhEti tE paśUnavindanta̍ tE paśUn. vittvA&kAmayanta̍ pratiṣṭhAM ~MvindEmahIti̍ tE&juhavuḥ̍ siṃqhI-rasyAdityavaniḥ̍ svAhEti ta imAM pratiṣṭhAma̍vindanta̍ ta imAM pratiṣṭhAM̍ ~MvittvA&kAmayanta̍ dEvatA# Aśiṣa upEyAmEti̍ tE&juhavuḥ̍ siṃqhIrasyA vaha̍ dEvAn dEvayatE-̍ [ ] 40

verses.padam: - Padam yajamAnAya|svAhA̱|iti̍|tE|dEvatA̱ḥ|Aśiṣa̍ ityA̱ - śiṣaḥ|upEti̍|Ayann|pa~jca̍|kRutva̍ḥ|vyAGA̍rayatIti̍# vi - AGArayati|pa~jcA̱kṣarEti̍ pa~jca-akṣarA|pa~gktiḥ|pA~gkta̍ḥ|yajñaḥ|yajñam|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|akṣṇayA|vyAGA̍rayatIti̍# vi-AGArayati|tasmA̱t|akṣṇayA|paśava̍ḥ|a~ggA̍ni|prEti̍|haranti|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|BUtEByaḥ|tvA|iti̍|sruca̱m|uditi̍|gRuhṇAti|yE|Eva|dEvAḥ|BUtAḥ|tEṣA̱m|tat|BAgadhEyamiti̍# BAga-dhEya̱m|tAn|Eva|tEna|prIṇAti|pautu̍dravAn|paridhIniti̍# pari - dhIn|parIti|dadhAti|EṣAm|41̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yajamAnAya̍ svAhEti tE dEvatA# Aśiṣa upAyan̍ pa~jca kRutvO vyAGArayati̍ pa~jcA̱kṣarA pa~gktiḥ pA~gktO# yajñO yajñamEvAva# rundhE &kṣṇayA vyAGArayati̍ tasmAdakṣṇayA̍ paśavO&~ggAni̍ praharanti̍ pratiṣṭhityai̍ BUtEByastvEti srucamudgRuhṇAti̍ ya Eva dEvA BUtAstEṣAM tad-BAgadhEyaM̍ tAnEva tEna# prIṇAti pautudravAn̍ paridhIn pari# dadhAtyEṣAM- [ ] 41

verses.padam: - Padam lOkAnA̱m|vidhRutyA̍ iti vi-dhRutyai|agnEḥ|trayaḥ|jyAyAṃ̍saḥ|BrAta̍raḥ|Asann|tE|dEvEBya̍ḥ|havyam|vaha̍ntaḥ|prEti̍|amIyanta|saḥ|agniḥ|abiBEt|ittham|vAva|syaḥ|Arti̱m|Eti̍|ariṣyati|iti̍|saḥ|nilA̍yata|saḥ|yAm|vanaspati̍ṣu|ava̍sat|tAm|pUtu̍drau|yAm|Oṣa̍dhIṣu|tAm|sugandhitEja̍na̍ iti# sugandhi - tEjanE|yAm|paśuṣu̍|tAm|pEtva̍sya|antarA|śRu~ggE̍ iti|tam|dEvatA̱ḥ|praiṣamiti̍# pra -Eṣa̱m|aicCann|tam|anviti|avindann|tam|abruvann|42̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ~MlOkAnAM ~MvidhRutyA̍ agnEstrayO jyAyAṃsO̍ BrAtara̍ Asan tE dEvEByO# havyaM ~Mvahantaḥ̍ prAmIyanta̍ sO̱&gnirabiBEditthaM̍ ~MvAva sya ArtimA&riṣyatIti̍ sa nilAyata̍ sa yAM ~MvanaspatiṣvavasattAM̍ pUtudrau̍ yAmOṣadhIṣu̍ tAṃ sugandhitEja̍nE̍ yAM paśuṣu tAM pEtvasyAntarA̍ śRu~ggE taM dEvatAḥ praiṣamaicCan̍ tamanvavindan̍ tamabruva-̍ [ ] 42

verses.padam: - Padam upEti|naḥ|Eti̍|vartasva|havyam|naḥ|vaha|iti̍|saḥ|abravIt|vara̱m|vRuṇai|yat|Eva|gRuhItasya̍|ahu̍tasya|bahiḥparidhIti̍# bahiḥ - paridhi|skandA̱t|tat|mE|BrAtRuṇAm|BAgadhEyamiti̍# BAga - dhEya̱m|asat|iti|tasmA̱t|yat|gRuhItasya̍|ahu̍tasya|bahiḥparidhIti̍# bahiḥ - paridhi|skandati|tEṣA̱m|tat|BAgadhEyamiti̍# BAga - dhEya̱m|tAn|Eva|tEna|prIṇAti|saḥ|amanyata|asthanvanta̍ ityasthann̍ - vantaḥ|mE|pUrvE̱|BrAta̍raḥ|prEti̍|amEṣata|asthAni̍|śAtayai|iti̍|saḥ|yAni̍|43̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -nnupa# na A vartasva̍ havyaM nO# vahEti sO̱&bravId varaM̍ ~MvRuṇai yadEva gRuhItasyAhu̍tasya̍ bahiḥparidhi skandAt tanmE BrAtRuṇAM̍ BAgadhEyamasaditi̍ tasmAd-yad-gRuhItasyAhu̍tasya̍ bahiḥparidhi skandati̍ tEṣAM tad BAgadhEyaM̍ tAnEva tEna# prIṇAti sO&manyatAsthanvantO̍# mE pUrvE BrAtaraḥ̍ prAmEṣatAsthAni̍# śAtayA iti sa yAnya- [ ] 43

verses.padam: - Padam asthAni|aśA̍tayata|tat|pUtu̍dru|aBavat|yat|mAṃqsam|upa̍mRutamityupa̍# - mRutam|tat|gulgulu|yat|EtAn|saBAMqrAniti̍# saM - BArAn|samBaratIti# saM-Barati|agnim|Eva|tat|samiti̍|Barati|agnEḥ|purI̍ṣam|asi|iti̍|Aha|agnEḥ|hi|Etat|purI̍ṣam|yat|saBAMqrA̍ iti# saM - BArAḥ|athO iti|Kalu̍|Ahuḥ|EtE|vAva|Enam|tE|BrAta̍raḥ|parIti̍|śErE|yat|pautu̍dravAḥ|paridhaya̍ iti# pari-dhayaḥ|iti̍||44̍ (44) (vittvA - dEvayata̍ - EṣA - mabruvan̍ - yAni - catuścatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A8)
verses.samhita: -sthAnyaśAtayata̍ tat pUtudrva-Bavad-yanmAṃq̍ samupamRutaM̍ tad-gulgulu̍ yadEtAnth saBAMqrAnth̍ saM BaratyagnimEva̍ tath saMBaratyagnEḥ̍ purIṣa-masItyA̍hAgnErhyE̍tat̍ purIṣaM̍ ~Myath saBAMqrA̍ athO KalvAhurEtE̍ vAvainaM tE BrAtaraḥ̍ pari# śErE yat pautudravAḥ̍ paridhaya iti||44̍ (vittvA - dEvayata̍ - EṣA - mabruvan̍ - yAni - catuścatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam baddham|avEti|syati|varuṇapAśAditi̍# varuṇa - pAśAt|Eva|EnE iti|mu~jcati|prEti̍|nEnEkti|mEddhyE̍ iti|Eva|EnE̍ iti|karOti|sAvitriyA|RucA|hutvA|havid^^rdhAnE̍ iti# haviḥ-dhAnE̱|prEti|vartayati|savitRupra̍sUta̍ iti# savitRu - prasUtaḥ|Eva|EnE iti|prEti̍|vartayati|varu̍ṇaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|durvAgiti̍# duḥ - vAk|uBayataḥ|baddhaḥ|yat|akṣa̍ḥ|saḥ|yat|uthsarjEdityu̍t̍ - sarjE̱t|yajamAnasya|gRuhAn|aByuthsa̍rjEditya̍Bi̍ - uthsarjEt|suvAgiti̍# su - vAk|dEva|duryAn|Eti̍|vada|iti̍|Aha|gRuhAḥ|vai|duryA̱ḥ|śAntyai̱|patnI̱|45̍ (50)
verses.samhita: baddhamava# syati varuṇapAśAdEvainE# mu~jcati praṇEnEkti̍ mEddhyE# EvainE# karOti sAvitriyarcA hutvA havirddhAnE̍ pra vartayati̍ savitRuprasUta̍ EvainE pra vartayati̍ varuṇO̍ vA Eṣa durvAguBayatO̍# baddhO yadakṣaḥ sa yaduth sarjEd-yajamAnasya̍ gRuhA-naByuthsarjEth̍ suvAgdEva̍ duryAṃq A vadEtyAha̍ gRuhA vai duryAḥ śAntyai patnyu- [ ] 45

verses.padam: - Padam upEti|anakti|patnI̱|hi|sarva̍sya|mitram|mitratvAyEti̍# mitra - tvAya|yat|vai|patnI̱|yajñasya̍|karOti̍|mithunam|tat|athO̍ iti|patni̍yAḥ|Eva|Eṣaḥ|yajñasya̍|anvAraBaM̍ ityanu̍ - AraBaMḥ|anavacCittyA̍ ityanava̍ - Cittyai|vartmanA|vai|anvityEtya̍nu̍ - itya|yajñam|rakṣAṃ̍si|jiGAṃqsanti|vaiṣṇavIByA̱m|RugByAmityRu̍k-ByAm|vartma̍nOḥ|juhOti|yajñaḥ|vai|viṣṇu̍ḥ|yajñAt|Eva|rakṣAṃ̍si|apEti̍|hanti|yat|addhvaryuḥ|anagnau|Ahu̍timityA̍ - hutim|juhuyAt|andhaḥ|addhvaryuḥ|syAt|rakṣAṃsi|yajñam|hanyuḥ|46̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pAnakti̍ patnI hi sarvasya̍ mitraM mitratvAya̍ yadvai patnI# yajñasya# karOti# mithunaM tadathO patniyA̍ Evaiṣa yajñasyA̱-nvAraBOM&navacCittyai̍ vartmanA̍ vA anvitya# yajñaṃ rakṣAṃsi̍ jiGAṃsanti vaiṣṇavIByAmRugByAM̍ ~MvartmanO̍ rjuhOti yajñO vai viṣṇuryajñAdEva̍ rakṣAṅqsyapa# hanti yadaddhvaryu-ra̍nagnA-vAhu̍tiM̍ juhuyA-dandhO̱&ddhvaryuḥ syAd-rakṣAṃsi̍ yajñaṃ hanyur-̍ [ ] 46

verses.padam: - Padam hiraṇyam|upAsyEtyu̍pa̍ - asya|juhOti|agnivatItya̍gni-vati̍|Eva|juhOti|na|andhaḥ|addhvaryuḥ|Bava̍ti|na|yajñam|rakṣAṃ̍si|Gnanti|prAcI̍ iti|prEti̍|itam|addhvaram|kalpa̍yantI̍ iti|iti̍|Aha|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|Eva|EnE iti|lOkam|gamayati|atra̍|ramEthAm|varṣmann̍|pRuthivyAḥ|iti̍|Aha|varṣma̍|hi|Etat|pRuthivyAḥ|yat|dEvayaja̍namiti̍# dEva - yajanam|śira̍ḥ|vai|Etat|yajñasya̍|yat|havid^^rdhAnamiti̍# haviḥ-dhAna̱m|divaḥ|vA|viṣṇO|uta|vA|pRuthivyAḥ|47 (50)
verses.samhita: -hiraṇyamupAsya̍# juhOtyagnivatyEva juhOti̍ nAndhO̱&ddhvaryurBavati̍ na yajñaṃ rakṣAṃsi̍ Gnanti prAcI prEtamaddhvaraM̍ kalpayantI̍ ityAha̍ suvargamEvainE# lOkaM gamayatyatra̍# ramEthAM ~Mvarṣman̍ pRuthivyA ityAha̍ varṣma hyEtat̍ pRuthivyA̍ yad dEvayaja̍naṃq̍ śirO vA Etad-yajñasya yaddhavirddhAna̍M̍ divO vA# viṣṇavuta vA# pRuthivyA- [ ] 47

verses.padam: - Padam iti|AśIrpa̍dayEtyAśIḥ̍ - padayA|RucA|dakṣiṇasya|havid^^rdhAnasyEti̍# haviḥ - dhAnasya|mEthIm|nIti̍|hanti|śIrq.ṣataḥ|Eva|yajñasya̍|yaja̍mAnaḥ|Aśiṣa̍ ityA̱ - śiṣaḥ|avEti̍|rundhE|daṇḍaḥ|vai|auparaḥ|tRutIya̍sya|havid^^rdhAnasyEti̍# haviḥ - dhAnasya|vaṣaṭkArEṇEti̍# vaṣaṭ - kArEṇa|akṣa̱m|acCinat|yat|tRutIya̱m|Cadiḥ|havid^^rdhAnayOriti̍# haviḥ-dhAnayOḥ|udAhriyata̍ ityut̍ - AhriyatE̱|tRutIyasya|havid^^rdhAnasyEti̍# haviḥ - dhAnasya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|śiraḥ|vai|Etat|yajñasya̍|yat|havid^^rdhAnamiti̍# haviḥ-dhAna̱m|viṣṇO̱ḥ|rarAṭa̱m|asi|viṣṇO̱ḥ|pRuṣṭham|asi|iti|Aha|tasmA̱t|EtAvaddhEtyE̍tAvat̍ - dhA|śiraḥ|viṣyU̍tamiti̍ vi - syUtam|viṣṇO̱ḥ ( )|syUḥ|asi|viṣṇO̱ḥ|dhruvam|asi|iti|Aha|vaiṣṇavam|hi|dEvata̍yA|havid^^rdhAnamiti̍# haviḥ - dhAna̱m|yam|prathamam|granthim|grathnIyAt|yat|tam|na|visraṃqsayEditi# vi - sraṃqsayE̱t|amEhEna|addhvaryuḥ|prEti̍|mIyEta|tasmA̱t|saḥ|visrasya̍ iti# vi-srasyaḥ||48̍ (76) (patnI# -hanyu-rvA pRuthivyA-viṣyUtaM̍ ~MviṣṇOḥ-ṣaḍviṃśatiśca)̍ (A9)
verses.samhita: ityAśIrpadayarcA̍ dakṣiṇasya̍ havirddhAnasya̍ mEthIM ni hanti̍ śIṛṣata Eva yajñasya yajamAna̍ AśiṣO&va# rundhE daṇḍO vA auparastRutIya̍sya̍ havirddhAnasya̍ vaṣaṭkArE-ṇAkṣa-macCinad-yat-tRutIya̍M̍ Cadiṛ havirddhAna̍yO-rudAhriyatE̍# tRutIyasya̍ havirddhAnasyAvaruddhyai̍ śirO vA Etad-yajñasya yaddhavirddhAnaM̍ ~MviṣṇO# rarAṭamasi̍ viṣṇO̱ḥ pRuṣṭhamasItyAha̍ tasmAdEtAvaddhA̍ śirO viṣyUtaM̍ ~MviṣṇOḥ ( ) syUrasi̍ viṣṇO̱rddhruvamasItyAha̍ vaiṣṇavaṃ hi dEvatayA̍ havirddhAnaM ~MyaM prathamaM̍ granthiM grathnIyAdyat̍ taM na visraṃq̍ sayEdamEhEnAddhvaryuḥ̍ pramIyEta̍ tasmAth sa visrasyaḥ||48̍ (patnI# -hanyu-rvA pRuthivyA-viṣyUtaM̍ ~MviṣṇOḥ-ṣaḍviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam dEvasya|tvA|savituḥ|prasava̍ iti# pra -savE|iti|aBri̱m|Eti̍|dattE|prasU̱tyA̍ iti pra - sUtyai|aśvinO̱ḥ|bAhuByAmiti# bAhu-ByAm|iti|Aha|aśvinau̱|hi|dEvAnA̱m|addhvaryU̍ iti|AstA̱m|pUṣṇaḥ|hastA̱ByAm|iti̍|Aha|yatyai̱|vajra̍ḥ|iva|vai|EṣA|yat|aBri̍ḥ|aBri̍ḥ|asi|nAri̍ḥ|asi|iti̍|Aha|śAntyai̱|kAṇḍE̍kAṇḍa̍ iti kAṇḍE̱ - kAṇḍE|vai|kriyamAṇE|yajñam|rakṣAṃ̍si|jiGAṃqsanti|pari̍liKitamiti̍ pari# - liKitam|rakṣaḥ|pari̍liKitA̍ iti pari# - liKitAḥ|arAtayaḥ|iti̍|Aha|rakṣa̍sAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa# - hatyai|49 (50)
verses.samhita: dEvasya# tvA savituḥ prasava̍ ityaBrimA dattE̍ prasU̱tyA aśvinO̱ rbAhuByAmityAhAśvinau̍ hi dEvAnAmaddhvaryU̍ AstA̱M pUṣṇO hastA̱ByAmityAha̍ yatyai vajra# iva vA EṣA yadaBriraBrirasi̍ nArirasItyA̍ha̍ śAntyai kAṇḍE# kAṇḍE vai kriyamAṇE̍ yajñaṃ rakṣAṃsi̍ jiGAṃsanti pariliKitaṃq̍ rakṣaḥ pariliKitA̍ arAtaya̍ ityAha̍ rakṣasAmapa̍hatyA-̍ [ ] 49

verses.padam: - Padam idam|aham|rakṣasaḥ|grIvAḥ|apIti̍|kRuntAmi|yaḥ|asmAn|dvEṣṭi̍|yam|ca|vayam|dviṣmaḥ|iti̍|Aha|dvau|vAva|puru̍ṣau|yam|ca|Eva|dvEṣṭi̍|yaḥ|ca|Enam|dvEṣṭi̍|tayO̱ḥ|Eva|ana̍ntarAyamityana̍ntaḥ̍ - Ayam|grIvAḥ|kRuntati|divE|tvA|antarikṣAya|tvA|pRuthivyai|tvA|iti̍|Aha|EByaḥ|Eva|EnAm|lOkEBya̍ḥ|prEti̍|ukṣati|parastA̱t|arvAcI̱m|prEti̍|ukṣati|tasmA̱t|50̍ (50)
verses.samhita: idamahaṃ rakṣasO̍ grIvA api# kRuntAmi yO̱&smAn dvEṣṭi yaM ca# vayaM dviṣma ityAha̍ dvau vAva puruṣau̍ yaM caiva dvEṣṭi yaścainaM̍ dvEṣṭi tayOrEvAna̍ntarAyaM̍ grIvAḥ kRuntati̍ divE tvA&ntarikṣAya̍ tvA pRuthivyai tvEtyAhaiBya̍ EvainA̱M ~MlOkEByaḥ prOkṣati̍ parastAdarvAcIM̍ prOkṣati̍ tasmA̱t- [ ] 50

verses.padam: - Padam parastA̱t|arvAcI̱m|manuṣyA̱ḥ|Urja̱m|upEti|jIvanti|krUram|iva|vai|Etat|karOti|yat|Kana̍ti|apaḥ|avEti̍|nayati|śAntyai̱|yava̍matIriti̍ yava# - matIḥ|avEti|nayati|Urk|vai|yava̍ḥ|Urk|udumbara̍ḥ|UrjA|Eva|Urja̱m|samiti̍|ad^^rdhayati|yaja̍mAnEna|sammitEti̍ saM - mitA|audubaMrI|Bavati|yAvAn̍|Eva|yaja̍mAnaḥ|tAva̍tIm|Eva|asminn|Urja̱m|dadhAti|pitRuṇAm|sada̍nam|asi|iti̍|barqḥiḥ|avEti̍|stRuṇAti|pitRudEvatya̍miti̍# pitRu - dEvatya̱m|51 (50)
verses.samhita: parastAdarvAcI̱M̍ manuṣyA# Urjamupa# jIvanti krUramiva̍ vA Etat karOti̍ yat KanatyapO&va̍# nayati śAntyai yavamatIrava̍# nayatyUrgvai# yava UrgudubaMra̍# UrjaivOrjaṃq samarddhayati̍ yajamAnEna̍ sammitaudubaMrI̍ Bavati yAvAnEva̍ yajamAnastAva̍tI-mEvAsmi-nnUrja̍M̍ dadhAti pitRuṇAṃ sadanamasIti̍# barqḥirava# stRuṇAti pitRudEvatyA̱(1q)ṅq- [ ] 51

verses.padam: - Padam hi|Etat|yat|niKAtamiti̍ ni - KAtam|yat|barqḥiḥ|anavastIryEtyana̍va-stIrya|minuyAt|pitRudEvatyEti̍# pitRu - dEvatyA̱|niKAtEti ni - KAtA|syAt|baraḥiḥ|avastIryEtyava-̍ stIrya|minOti|asyAm|Eva|EnAm|minOti|athO̍ iti|svAruhamiti̍# sva-ruha̱m|Eva|EnAm|karOti|uditi|diva̱m|staBAna|Eti̍|antari̍kṣam|pRuṇa|iti̍|Aha|EṣAm|lOkAnA̱m|vidhRu̍tyA̍ iti vi - dhRutyai|dyutAnaḥ|tvA|mArutaḥ|minOtu|iti|Aha|dyutAnaḥ|ha|sma|vai|mArutaḥ|dEvAnA̱m|audu̍baMrIm|minOti|tEna̍|Eva|52̍ (50)
verses.samhita: hyEtad-yanniKA̍taM̍ ~Myad-barqḥiranavastIrya̍ minuyAt pitRudEvatyA̍# niKAtA̍ syAd-barqḥiravastIrya̍# minOtyasyAmEvainA̱M minOtyathO̱ svAruhamEvainA̱M̍ karOtyud-divaṅ# staBAnA&&ntarikṣaM̍ pRuṇEtyAhaiṣAM̍ ~MlOkAnAM ~MvidhRutyai̍ dyutAnastvA# mArutO minOtvityA̍ha̍ dyutAnO ha# sma vai mArutO̍ dEvAnAmaudubaMrIM̍ minOti tEnaivai- [ ] 52

verses.padam: - Padam EnAm|minOti|brahmavanimiti# brahma - vani̱m|tvA|kṣatravanimiti# kṣatra - vani̱m|iti|Aha|yathAyajuriti̍# yathA - yajuḥ|Eva|Etat|GRutEna|dyAvApRuthivI̍ iti# dyAvA-pRuthivI|Eti|pRuṇEthAm|iti̍|audu̍baMryAm|juhOti|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|Eva|rasEna|anakti|AntamityA̱̍ - antam|anvavasrAvayatIya̍nu̍ -avasrAvayati|AntamityA̱-antam|Eva|yaja̍mAnam|tEja̍sA|anakti|aindram|asi|iti̍|Cadiḥ|adhi̍|nIti̍|dadhAti|aindram|hi|dEvata̍yA|sada̍ḥ|viśvajanasyEti̍# viśva - janasya|CAyA|iti̍|Aha|viśvajanasyEti̍# viśva - janasya|hi|EṣA|CAyA|yat|sada̍ḥ|nava̍CadIti̍ nava# - Cadi|53 (50)
verses.samhita: -nA̱M minOti brahmavaniM̍ tvA kṣatravanimityAha̍ yathAyajurEvaitad GRutEna# dyAvApRuthivI A pRuṇEthAmityaudu̍baMryAM̍ juhOti dyAvApRuthivI̍ Eva rasEnAnaktyA-ntamanva-va̍srAvayatyAntamEva̍ yajamAnaM̍ tEjasA-naktyaindramasIti̍# Cadiradhi ni dadhAtyaindraṃ̍ hi dEvatayA̍ sadO# viśvajanasya# CAyEtyAha̍ viśvajanasya hyEṣA̍ CAyA yath sadO navaCadi-̍ [ ] 53

verses.padam: - Padam tEjaskAmasyEti̍ tEjaḥ̍ - kAmasya|minuyAt|trivRutEti# tri-vRutA̱|stOmEna|sammi̍tamiti̍ saM - mitam|tEjaḥ|trivRuditi̍# tri -vRut|tEjasvI|Eva|Bavati|EkAdaśaCadItyEkA̍daśa̍ - Cadi|indriyakAmasyEtI̱ndriya̍ - kAmasya|EkAdaśAkṣarEtyEkA̍daśa-akṣarA|triṣṭuk|indriyam|triṣṭuk|indriyAvI|Eva|Bavati|pa~jca̍daśaCadIti̍ pa~jcadaśa-Cadi|BrAtRu̍vyavata̍ iti BrAtRuvya̍ - vataḥ|pa~jcadaśa iti# pa~jca - daśaḥ|vajraḥ|BrAtRu̍vyABiBUtyA̍ iti BrAtRuvya̍ - aBiBUtyai|saptadaśaCadIti̍# saptadaśa̍ - Cadi|prajAkAmasyEti̍# prajA - kAmasya|saptadaśa iti# sapta - daśaḥ|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajApatEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|Aptyai̱|EkaviṃśatiCadItyEka̍viṃśati̍ - Cadi|pratiṣṭhAkAmasyEti̍# pratiṣṭhA - kAmasya|Ekaviṃqśa ityEka-viṃqśaḥ|stOmA̍nAM|pratiṣṭhEti̍# prati - sthA|pratiṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|udara̱m|vai|sadaḥ|Urk|udubaMra̍ḥ|maddhyataḥ|audu̍baMrIm|minOti|maddhyataḥ|Eva|prajAnAmiti̍# pra - jAnA̱m|Urja̱m|dadhAti|tasmA̱t|54 (50)
verses.samhita: tEjaskAmasya̍ minuyAt trivRutA stOmEna̍ sammitaM̍ tEjastrivRut̍ tEjasvyE̍va̍ Bava-tyEkA̍daśa-CadIndriyakA̍ma-syaikA̍daśAkṣarA̍ triṣṭugindriyaM̍ triṣṭugindriyAvyE̍va̍ Bavati̍ pa~jcadaśaCadi̍ BrAtRuvyavataḥ̍ pa~jcadaśO vajrO BrAtRuvyABiBUtyai̍ saptadaśaCadi̍ prajAkAmasya̍ saptadaśaḥ prajApatiḥ̍ prajApatErAptyA̍ EkaviṃśatiCadi̍ pratiṣṭhAkAma-syaikaviṃqśaḥ̍ stOmAnAM̍ pratiṣṭhA pratiṣṭhityA̍ udaraM ~Mvai sada UrgudubaMrO̍# maddhyata audubaMrIM̍ minOti maddhyata Eva prajAnAmUrjaM̍ dadhAti tasmA̱n- [ ] 54

verses.padam: - Padam maddhyataḥ|UrjA|Bu~jjatE|yajamAnalOka iti# yajamAna - lOkE|vai|dakṣiṇAni|CadIṃṣi̍|BrAtRuvyalOka̍ iti# BrAtRuvya - lOkE|uttarAṇItyut̍ - tarAṇi|dakṣiṇAni|utta̍rAṇItyut̍ - tarAṇi|karOti|yajamAnam|Eva|aya̍jamAnAt|utta̍ramityut̍ - taram|karOti|tasmA̱t|yajamAnaḥ|aya̍jamAnAt|utta̍ra̍ ityut - taraḥ|antarvartAnityantaḥ̍ - vartAn|karOti|vyAvRuttyA̍ iti# vi-AvRuttyai|tasmA̱t|ara̍ṇyam|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|upEti|jIvanti|parIti̍|tvA|girvaṇaḥ|gira̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|yathAyajuriti̍# yathA - yajuḥ|Eva|Etat|indrasya|syUḥ|asi|indra̍sya|dhruvam|asi|iti̍|Aha|aindram|hi|dEvata̍yA|sada̍ḥ̍ ( )|yam|prathamam|granthim|grathnIyAt|yat|tam|na|visraṃqsayEditi# vi - sraṃqsayE̱t|amEhEn|addhvaryuḥ|prEti̍|mIyEta|tasmA̱t|saḥ|visrasya̍ iti# vi - srasyaḥ||55̍ (65)
verses.samhita: maddhyata UrjA Bu~jjatE̍ yajamAnalOkE vai dakṣiṇAni̍ CadIṃṣi# BrAtRuvyalOka uttarAṇi̍ dakṣiṇAnyutta̍rAṇi̍ karOti yajamAna-mEvA-ya̍jamAnAdutta̍raM̍ karOti tasmAd yajamAnO&ya̍jamAnAdutta̍rO̍ &ntarvartAn karOti̍ vyAvRuttyai̍ tasmAdaraṇyaM̍ prajA upa# jIvanti pari# tvA girvaṇO gira ityAha̍ yathAyajurEvaitadindrasya̍ syUrasIndrasya̍ dhruvamasItyAhaindraṃ̍ hi dEvatayA̍ sadO ( ) yaM prathamaM̍ granthiM grathnIyAdyat̍ taM na visraṃq̍ sayEdamEhEnAddhvaryuḥ̍ pramIyEta̍ tasmAth sa visrasyaḥ||55̍

verses.padam: - Padam śiraḥ|vai|Etat|yajñasya̍|yat|havid^^rdhAnamiti̍# haviḥ-dhAna̱m|prAṇA iti# pra - anAḥ|uparavA ityupa̍ - ravAḥ|havid^^rdhAna iti# haviḥ-dhAnE̱|KAyantE|tasmA̱t|śIrq.ṣann|prAṇA iti# pra-anAḥ|adhastA̱t|KAyantE|tasmA̱t|adhastA̱t|śIrṣṇaḥ|prAṇA iti# pra-anAḥ|rakṣOhaṇa iti# rakṣaḥ-hanaḥ|valagahana̍ iti# valaga-hanaḥ|vaiṣṇavAn|KanAmi|iti̍|Aha|vaiṣṇavAḥ|hi|dEvata̍yA|uparavA̍ ityupa̍ - ravAḥ|asurAḥ|vai|niryanta̍ iti# niḥ - yantaḥ|dEvAnA̱m|prAṇEṣviti̍# pra - anEṣu|valagAniti̍# vala-gAn|nIti|aKanann|tAn|bAhumAtra̍ iti# bAhu-mAtrE|anviti|avindann|tasmA̱t|bAhumAtrA̍ iti# bAhu - mAtrAḥ|KAyantE|idam|aham|tam|valagamiti# vala - gam|uditi|vapAmi|56̍ (50)
verses.samhita: śirO vA Etad-yajñasya yaddhavirddhAna̍M̍ prAṇA uparavA̍ havirddhAnE̍# KAyantE tasmA̱cCIrq.ṣan prAṇA adhastA̱t KAyantE tasmAdadhastA̱cCIrṣṇaḥ̍ prAṇA rakṣOhaṇO̍# valagahanO# vaiṣṇavAn KanAmItyA̍ha̍ vaiṣṇavA hi dEvatayOparavA̍ asurA̍ vai niryantO# dEvAnA̱M prAṇEṣu# valagAn nyaKanan̍ tAn bAhumAtrE&nva̍vindan̍ tasmA̱d bAhumAtrAḥ KAyanta̍ idamahaM taM ~Mvalagamudva̍pAmi-̍ [ ] 56

verses.padam: - Padam yam|naḥ|samAnaḥ|yam|asamAnaḥ|nicaKAniti̍# ni-caKAna|iti̍|Aha|dvau|vAva|puru̍ṣau|yaḥ|ca|Eva|samAnaḥ|yaḥ|ca|asa̍mAnaḥ|yam|Eva|asmai|tau|valagamiti̍# vala - gam|niKanata̍ iti# ni - Kanataḥ|tam|Eva|uditi̍|vapati|samiti̍|tRuṇatti|tasmA̱t|saMtRu̍ṇṇA̍ iti saM - tRuṇṇAḥ|antarataḥ|prAṇA iti# pra - anAḥ|na|samiti|Binatti|tasmA̱t|asa̍BiMnnA̍ ityasa̱M - BinnAḥ|prAṇA iti# pra - anAḥ|apaḥ|avEti|nayati|tasmA̱t|ArdrAḥ|antarataḥ|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|yavamatIriti̍ yava# - matIḥ|avEti|nayati|57̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yaM naḥ̍ samAnO yamasamAnO̍ nicaKAnEtyAha̍ dvau vAva puruṣau̍ yaścaiva samAnO̍ yaścAsamAnO̍ yamEvAsmai tau valagaM̍ niKanatastamEvOdva̍pati̍ saMtRuṇatti̍ tasmAth saMtRuṇṇA̍ antarataḥ prAṇA na saM Binatti̍ tasmAdasaBiMnnAḥ̍ prAṇA apO&va# nayati tasmAdArdrA̍ antarataḥ̍ prAṇA yavamatIrava̍# naya- [ ] 57

verses.padam: - Padam Urk|vai|yavaḥ|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|uparavA ityupa-ravAḥ|prAṇEṣviti̍# pra - anEṣu|Eva|Urja̱m|dadhAti|barqḥiḥ|avEti̍|stRuṇAti|tasmA̱t|lOmaśAḥ|antarataḥ|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|AjyEna|vyAGA̍rayatIti̍# vi - AGArayati|tEja̍ḥ|vai|Ajya̱m|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|uparavA ityupa̍ - ravAḥ|prAṇEṣviti# pra - anEṣu|Eva|tEja̍ḥ|dadhAti|hanU̍ iti|vai|EtE̍ iti|yajñasya̍|yat|adhiṣava̍ṇE̍ ityadhi-sava̍nE|na|samiti̍|tRuṇatti|asa̍tRuMṇṇE̍ ityasa̱M - tRuṇṇE|hi|hanU iti|athO̍ iti|Kalu̍|dIrGasOma̍ iti# dIrGa - sOmE|satRuMdyE iti# saM-tRudyE̱|dhRutyai̱|śiraḥ|vai|Etat|yajñasya̍|yat|havid^^rdhAnamiti̍# haviḥ - dhAna̱m|58 (50)
verses.samhita: -tyUrgvai yavaḥ̍ prAṇA uparavAḥ̍ prAṇEṣvEvOrjaM̍ dadhAti barqḥirava# stRuṇAti tasmA̱llOmaśA antarataḥ̍ prAṇA AjyEna̍ vyAGArayati̍ tEjO vA AjyaM̍ prAṇA uparavAḥ̍ prAṇEṣvEva tEjO# dadhAti hanU vA EtE yajñasya yadadhiṣava̍ṇE̍ na saM tRuṇattya̍ satRuMṇṇE̍ hi hanU athO Kalu# dIrGasOmE satRuMdyE dhRutyai śirO vA Etad-yajñasya yaddhavirddhAna̍M-̍ [ ] 58

verses.padam: - Padam prAṇA iti# pra - anAḥ|uparavA ityupa̍ - ravAḥ|hanU iti|adhiṣava̍ṇE̍ ityadhi̍ - savanE|jihvA|carma̍|grAvA̍ṇaḥ|dantA̱ḥ|muKa̱m|AhavanIya̍ ityA̱ - havanIyaḥ|nAsi̍kA|uttaravEdirityu̍ttara̍ - vEdiḥ|udara̱m|sadaḥ|yadA|Kalu̍|vai|jihvayA̱|dathsviti̍# dat -su|adhIti|KAda̍ti|atha̍|muKa̱m|gacCati|yadA|muKa̱m|gacCa̍ti|atha̍|udara̱m|gacCati|tasmA̱t|havid^^rdhAna̍ iti# haviḥ - dhAnE̱|carmann|adhIti̍|grAva̍Biriti̍ grAva# - Biḥ|aBiṣutyEtyaBi̍ - sutya|AhavanIya̍ ityA̱ - havanIyE̱|hutvA|pratya~jcaḥ|parEtyEti̍# parA - itya|sada̍si|Bakṣayanti|yaḥ|vai|virAja̍ iti# vi - rAjaḥ|yajñamuKa̍ iti# yajña - muKE|dOha̱m|vEda|duhE|Eva̍ ( )|EnAm|iyam|vai|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|tasyai̱|tvak|carma|Udha̍ḥ|adhiṣava̍ṇE̍ ityadhi-sava̍nE|stanA̱ḥ|uparavA̍ ityupa̍ - ravAḥ|grAvAṇaḥ|vathsAḥ|Rutvija̍ḥ|duhanti|sOma̍ḥ|paya̍ḥ|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|duhE|Eva|EnAm||59̍ (73) (vapAmi-yavamatIrava̍# nayati-havirddhAna-mEva-trayO̍viṃśatiśca)̍ (A11) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 11 Anuvaakams :- (yaduBau - dEvAsurAḥ̍ mitha - stEṣAṃ# - suvargaM - ~MyadvA anIśAnaḥ̍ - purOhaviṣi̍ - tEByaḥ - sOttaravEdi̍ - rbaddhan - dEvasyA&BriM ~Mvajraḥ - śirO vA - EkAdaśa̍ ) Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (yaduBA - vityAha̍ dEvAnA̱M - ~MyajñO dEvEByO - na rathAya̍ - yajamAnAya̍ - parastAdarvAcI̍ - nnava# pa~jcAśat) First and Last Padam of śecond Prasnam of 6th Kandam (yaduBau - duha EvainA̱M)||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE ṣaṣṭhakAṇḍE dvitIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||==================================
verses.samhita: prAṇA uparavA̍ hanU# adhiṣavaṇE̍ jihvA carma grAvAṇO̍ dantA muKamAhavanIyO̍ nAsikO-ttaravEdi-rudaraṃq̍ sadO# yadA Kalu vai jihvayA# dathsvadhi KAdatyatha muKaM̍ gacCati yadA muKaM gacCatyathOdaraM̍ gacCati tasmA̱ddhavirddhAnE carmannadhi grAvaBiraBiṣutyA̍&&*havanIyE̍# hutvA pratya~jcaḥ̍ parEtya sadasi̍ Bakṣayanti yO vai virAjO# yajñamuKE dOhaM ~MvEda# duha Evai ( ) nAmiyaM̍ ~Mvai virAṭ tasyai tvak carmOdhO&dhiṣava̍ṇE̍ stanA# uparavA grAvAṇO̍ vathsA RutvijO# duhanti sOmaḥ payO ya EvaM ~MvEda# duha EvainA̱M||59 (vapAmi-yavamatIrava̍# nayati-havirddhAna-mEva-trayO̍viṃśatiśca)̍ (A11) praśna kOrvai with starting padams of 1 to 11 anuvAkams :- (yaduBau - dEvAsurAḥ̍ mitha - stEṣAṃ# - suvargaM - ~MyadvA anIśAnaḥ̍ - purOhaviṣi̍ - tEByaḥ - sOttaravEdi̍ - rbaddhan - dEvasyA&BriM ~Mvajraḥ - śirO vA - EkAdaśa̍ ) kOrvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (yaduBA - vityAha̍ dEvAnA̱M - ~MyajñO dEvEByO - na rathAya̍ - yajamAnAya̍ - parastAdarvAcI̍ - nnava# pa~jcAśat) first and last padam of second praśnam Of 6th KAṇḍam (yaduBau - duha EvainA̱M)||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM ṣaṣṭhakAṇḍE dvitIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ hariḥ OM 6.3 ṣaṣṭhakAṇḍE tRutIyaḥ praśnaḥ - sOmamantrabrAhmaṇanirUpaṇaM

verses.padam: - Padam cAtvAlAt|dhiṣṇi̍yAn|upEti̍|vapati|yOni̍ḥ|vai|yajñasya̍|cAtvA̍lam|yajñasya̍|sayOnitvAyEti̍# sayOni - tvAya|dEvAḥ|vai|yajñam|parEti̍|ajayanta|tam|AgnI̱̱ddhrAdityAgni̍# - iddhrAt|punaḥ|apEti̍|ajayann|Etat|vai|yajñasya̍|apa̍rAjitamityapa̍rA̍ - jitam|yat|AgnI̱ddhramityAgni# - iddhram|yat|AgnI̱ddhrAdityAgni# - iddhrAt|dhiṣṇiyAn|viharatIti̍# vi-harati|yat|Eva|yajñasya̍|apa̍rAjitamityapa̍rA̍ - jitam|tataḥ|Eva|Enam|puna̍ḥ|tanutE|parAjityEti̍# parA-jitya|iva|Kalu̍|vai|EtE|yanti|yE|bahiṣpavamAnamiti̍# bahiḥ - pavamAnam|sarpanti|bahiṣpavamAna̍ iti# bahiḥ - pavamAnE|stutE|1 (50)
verses.samhita: cAtvAlAd-dhiṣṇi̍yAnupa̍# vapati yOnirvai yajñasya cAtvAlaM̍ ~Myajñasya# sayOnitvAya# dEvA vai yajñaM parA&jayanta̍ tamAgnI̱ddhrAt punarapAjayannEtadvai̍ yajñasyA-parAjitaM̍ ~MyadAgnI̱ddhraM ~MyadAgnI̱ddhrAddhiṣṇiyAn.̍ viharati̍ yadEva yajñasyA-parAjitaM̍ tata# EvainaM punastanutE̍ parAjityEva̍ Kalu vA EtE yanti̍ yE bahiṣpavamAnaṃ̍ sarpanti̍ bahiṣpavamAnE stuta- [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam Aha|agnIdityagni# - it|agnIn|vIti|hara|baraḥiḥ|stRuṇAhi|purOḍAśAn̍|ala̱m|kuru|iti̍|yajñam|Eva|apajityEtya̍pa-jitya̍|puna̍ḥ|tanvAnAḥ|yanti|a~ggA̍raiḥ|dvE̍ iti|sava̍nE̍ iti|vIti̍|harati|śalAkA̍Biḥ|tRutIya̱m|saśukratvAyEti̍# saśukra - tvAya|athO̍ iti|samiti̍|Barati|Eva|Enat|dhiṣṇi̍yAḥ|vai|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|sOma̱m|arakṣann|tEBya̍ḥ|adhIti̍|sOma̱m|Eti̍|aharann|tam|anvavAyannitya̍nu-avAyann̍|tam|parIti̍|aviśann|ya|Evam|vEda̍|vindatE̱|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: AhAgnIdagnIn.̍ vi hara̍ barqḥiḥ stRuṇAhi̍ purOḍAśAṃq alaM̍ kurviti# yajñamEvApajitya punastanvAnA̍ yantya~ggArairdvE̍ savanE̍ vi harati̍ śalAkABi-stRutIyaṃ̍# saśukratvAyAthO saM BaratyEvainaddhiṣṇi̍yA̍ vA amuṣmin̍ ~MlOkE sOmamarakṣan̍ tEByO&dhi sOmamA&haran̍ ta manvavAyantaM̍ paryaviśanq.̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda# vindatE-̍ [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam parivEṣṭAramiti# pari - vEṣṭAra̱m|tE|sOmapIthEnEti# sOma - pIthEna|vIti̍|Ad^^rdhyanta|tE|dEvEṣu̍|sOmapIthamiti̍# sOma - pItham|aicCanta|tAn|dEvAḥ|abruvann|dvE dvE iti dvE-dvE|nAmanI̍ iti|kuruddhvam|atha̍|prEti̍|vA|APsyatha̍|na|vA|iti̍|agnaya̍ḥ|vai|atha̍|dhiṣṇi̍yAḥ|tasmA̱t|dvinAmEti̍# dvi - nAmA̱|brAhmaṇaḥ|ad^^rdhukaḥ|tEṣA̱m|yE|nEdi̍ṣṭham|paryavi̍śaniti̍# pari - aviśann|tE|sOmapIthamiti̍# sOma - pItham|prEti|Apnuvann|AhavanIya̍ ityA̱ - havanIyaḥ|AgnIddhrIya̍ ityA̱gni - idhrIyaḥ|hOtrIya̍ḥ|mArjAlIya̍ḥ|tasmA̱t|tEṣu̍|juhvati|atihAyEtya̍ti-hAya̍|vaṣa̍ṭ|karOti|vIti̍|hi|3̍ (50)
verses.samhita: parivEṣṭAraM tE sOmapIthEna̍ vyA̱rddhyanta tE dEvEṣu# sOmapIthamai̱cCanta tAn dEvA abruvan̍ dvEdvE nAmanI̍ kuruddhvamatha pra vA&&Psyatha na vEtyagnayO vA atha dhiṣṇiyAstasmA̱d̍ dvinAmA̱ brAhmaṇO&rddhukastEṣAM̍ ~MyE nEdiṣṭhaM̍ paryaviśan̍ tE sOmapIthaM̍ prA&*pnuvannAhavanIya̍# AgnIddhrIyO# hOtrIyO# mArjAlIyastasmAt tEṣu# juhvatyatihAya vaṣaṭ̍ karOti vi hyE-̍ [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam EtE|sOmapIthEnEti# sOma - pIthEna|Ad^^rdhya̍nta|dEvAḥ|vai|yAḥ|prAcI̱ḥ|Ahu̍tIrityA̍ - hutIḥ|ajuhavuḥ|yE|purastA̱t|asu̍rAḥ|Asann̍|tAn|tABi̍ḥ|prEti̍|anudanta|yAḥ|pratIcI̱ḥ|yE|paścAt|asu̍rAḥ|Asann̍|tAn|tABi̍ḥ|apEti̍|anudanta|prAcI̱ḥ|anyAḥ|Ahu̍taya̍ ityA - hutayaḥ|hUyantE̱|pratya~g|AsInaḥ|dhiṣṇi̍yAn|vyAGA̍rayatIti̍# vi - AGArayati|paścAt|ca|Eva|purastA̱t|ca|yaja̍mAnaḥ|BrAtRu̍vyAn|prEti̍|nudatE|tasmA̱t|parA̍cIḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra-jAḥ|prEti|vIyantE|pratIcI̱ḥ|4̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -tE sOmapIthEnA&&*rddhya̍nta̍ dEvA vai yAḥ prAcI-rAhutI-raju̍havuryE̍ purastAdasurA̍ Asan tAṅ stABiḥ prAṇudanta̍ yAḥ pratIcIryE paścAdasurA̍ Asan tAṅstABi-rapAnudanta̍ prAcIranyA̍ AhutayO̍ hUyantE̱ pratya~g~gAsInO̍ dhiṣṇiyAn.̍ vyAGArayati̍ paścAccaiva purastA̱cca yajamAnO̍ BrAtRuvyAn̍ pra ṇudatE̍ tasmAt parAcIḥ̍ prajAḥ pra vIyantE̍ pratIcI̱- [ ] 4

verses.padam: - Padam jAyantE|prAṇA iti# pra-anAḥ|vai|EtE|yat|dhiṣṇiyAḥ|yat|addhvaryuḥ|pratya~g|dhiṣṇi̍yAn|atisarpEditya̍ti̍ - sarpE̱t|prAṇAniti# pra - anAn|samiti|karq.ṣEt|pramAyu̍ka̍ iti# pra - mAyukaḥ|syAt|nABi̍ḥ|vai|EṣA|yajñasya̍|yat|hOtA̱|Ud^^rdhvaḥ|Kalu̍|vai|nAByai̱|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|avA~g|apAna̍ ityapa̍ - anaḥ|yat|addhvaryuḥ|pratya~g|hOtAram|atisarpEditya̍ti̍ - sarpE̱t|apAna ityapa̍ - anE|prAṇamiti# pra - anam|daddhyAt|pramAyuka̍ iti# pra - mAyukaḥ|syAt|na|addhvaryuḥ|upEti̍|gAyEt|vAgvI̱rya̍ iti vAk - vIryaḥ|vai|addhvaryuḥ|yat|addhvaryuḥ|upagAyEdityupa̍ - gAyE̱t|udgAtra ityut̍ - gAtrE|5 (50)
verses.samhita: rjAyantE prAṇA vA EtE yaddhiṣṇiyA̍ yadaddhvaryuḥ̍ pratya~g dhiṣṇiyA-natisarpE̱t̍ prAṇAnth saMkaṛṣEt̍ pramAyukaḥ̍ syAnnABirvA EṣA yajñasya yaddhOtOrddhvaḥ Kalu vai nAByai̱ prAṇO&vA~gapAnO̍ yadadhvaryuḥ̍ pratya~g hOtAramatisarpE̍dapAnE̍ prAṇaM dadhyAt̍ pramAyukaḥ̍ syAnnAddhvaryurupa# gAyEd vAgvI̱ryO vA addhvaryu-ryada̍ddhvaryuru̍pa-gAyE̍dud-gAtrE-̍ [ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam vAca̱m|sam|prEti|yacCEt|upadAsukEtyu̍pa-dAsu̍kA|asya|vAk|syAt|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|na|asaṅ̍sthita̍ ityasa̱M - sthitE|sOmE̱|addhvaryuḥ|pratya~g|sadaḥ|atIti̍|iyAt|atha̍|kathA|dAkṣiṇAni̍|hOtu̱m|Eti|yAma̍ḥ|hi|saḥ|tEṣA̱m|kasmai̱|aha̍|dEvAḥ|yAma̱m|vA|ayA̍mam|vA|anviti̍|jñAsyanti|iti̍|utta̍rEṇEtyut-̍ tarEṇa|AgnI̱ddhramityAgni# - iddhram|parItyEti# pari - itya|juhOti|dAkṣiṇAni̍|na|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|samiti|karq.ṣati|nIti̍|anyE|dhiṣṇi̍yAḥ|upyantE̱̍ ( )|na|anyE|yAn|nivapatIti# ni - vapati|tEna̍|tAn|prIṇAti|yAn|na|nivapatIti̍# ni - vapati|yat|anudiśatItya̍nu̍ - diśati|tEna̍|tAn||6̍ (64)
verses.samhita: vAcaṃq saM pra yacCE-dupadAsu̍kA&sya̍ vAK syA̱dbrahmavAdinO# vadanti nAsaṅsthitE̍ sOmE̱&ddhvaryuḥ pratya~gK sadO&tIyAdatha̍# kathA dA̱kṣiṇAni hOtumEti̍ yAmO hi sa tEṣAM kasmA aha# dEvA yAmaM ~MvA&yAmaM̍ ~MvA&nu# jñAsyantItyu-ttarEṇA&&*gnI̱ddhraM̍ parItya# juhOti dAkṣiṇAni na prAṇAnthsaM kaṛṣati̍ nyanyE̍ dhiṣṇiyA̍ upyantE ( ) nAnyE yAn nivapati̍ tEna tAn prIṇAti̍ yAn nanivapati̍ yadanudiśati̍ tEna tAn||6

verses.padam: - Padam suvargAyEti# suvaḥ - gAya|vai|EtAni̍|lOkAya̍|hUyantE|yat|vaisarjanAni̍|dvAByA̱m|gAṛha̍patya̍ iti gAṛha# - patyE|juhOti|dvipAditi# dvi - pAt|yajamAnaḥ|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|AgnI̱ddhra ityAgni-iddhrE|juhOti|antari̍kṣE|Eva|Eti̍|kramatE|AhavanIya̍ ityA̱ - havanIyE̱|juhOti|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|Eva|Enam|lOkam|gamayati|dEvAn|vai|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|yataḥ|rakṣAṃsi|ajiGAṃqsann|tE|sOmE̍na|rAjñA̱|rakṣAṃ̍si|apahatyEtya̍pa̍ - hatya|aptum|AtmAna̱m|kRutvA|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Ayann|rakṣasAm|anu̍palABAyEtyanu̍pa̍ - lABAya|Attaḥ|sOma̍ḥ|Bavati|atha̍|7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: suvargAya vA EtAni# lOkAya# hUyantE yad vaisarjanAni̍ dvAByAM gAṛhapatyE̍ juhOti dvipAd yajamAnaḥ̍ pratiṣṭhityA̍ AgnI̱ddhrE juhOtyantarikṣa̍ EvA&&*kramata̍ AhavanIyE# juhOti suvargamEvainaM̍ ~MlOkaM gamayati̍ dEvAn. vai suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM ~MyatO rakṣAṅsya̍ jiGAṃsantE sOmEna̍ rAjñA rakṣAṅ-syapahatyAptu-mAtmAna̍M̍ kRutvA suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyan̍ rakṣasA-manu̍palABAyA̍ &&*ttaḥ sOmO# Bavatyatha-̍ [ ] 7

verses.padam: - Padam vaisarjanAni|juhOti|rakṣa̍sAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa# - hatyai|tvam|sOma|tanUkRudBya iti# tanUkRut - Byaḥ|iti|Aha|tanUkRuditi̍# tanU - kRut|hi|Eṣaḥ|dvEṣO̱Bya iti dvEṣaḥ̍ - Byaḥ|anyakRutEBya̍ ityanya - kRutEByaḥ|iti|Aha|anyakRu̍tAnItyanya̍ - kRutAni|hi|rakṣAṃsi|uru|yantA|asi|varU̍tham|iti̍|Aha|uru|naḥ|kRudhi|iti̍|vAva|Etat|Aha|juṣAṇaḥ|aptuḥ|Ajya̍sya|vEtu|iti̍|Aha|aptum|Eva|yaja̍mAnam|kRutvA|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|gamayati|rakṣasAm|anu̍palABAyEtyanu̍pa̍ - lABAya|Eti|sOma̱m|dadatE|8̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vaisarjanAni# juhOti rakṣasAmapa̍hatyai̍ tvaṃ sOma̍ tanUkRudBya ityAha̍ tanUkRuddhyaṣa̍ dvEṣO̱ByO&nyakRutEBya̍ ityAhAnyakRu̍tAni̍ hi rakṣAṅsyuru̍ yantA&si varUthamityA̍hOru̍ ṇaskRudhIti̍ vAvaitadAha̍ juṣAṇO apturAjyasya̍ vEtvityAhAptumEva̍ yajamAnaM̍ kRutvA suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM gamayati̍ rakṣasA-manu̍palABAyA&&*̍ sOmaM̍ dadata- [ ] 8

verses.padam: - Padam Eti|grAv^^ṇṇa̍ḥ|Eti̍|vAyavyA̍ni|Eti̍|drOṇakalaśamiti̍# drOṇa - kalaśam|uditi|patnI̱m|Eti̍|nayanti|anviti̍|anAṃ̍si|prEti̍|vartayanti|yAva̍t|Eva|asya|asti̍|tEna̍|saha|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Eti|nayavatyEti̍ naya# - vatyA|RucA|AgnI̱ddhra ityAgni# - iddhrE|juhOti|suvargasyEti# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|aBinI̱tyA̍ ityaBi-nItyai|grAv^^ṇṇaḥ|vAyavyA̍ni|drOṇakalaśamiti̍# drOṇa-kalaśam|AgnI̱ddhra ityAgni# - iddhrE|upEti|vAsayati|vIti̍|hi|Enam|taiḥ|gRuhṇatE̱|yat|saha|upavAsayEdityu̍pa̍ - vAsayE̱t|apuvAyEta|saumya|RucA|prEti̍|pAdayati|svayA̱|9̍ (50)
verses.samhita: A grAvṇṇa A vAyavyA̱nyA̍ drOṇakalaśamut̍ patnImA nayantyanvanAṃ̍si̍ pra vartayanti̍ yAvadEvAsyAsti̍ tEna# saha suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamEti̍ nayavatyarcA&&gnI̱ddhrE̍ juhOti suvargasya# lOkasyABinI̱tyai grAvṇṇO# vAyavyAni̍ drOṇakalaśamAgnI̱ddhra upa# vAsayati vi hyEnaM̍ tairgRuhṇatE yath sahOpavAsayE̍-dapuvAyEta̍# saumyarcA pra pAdayati̍ svayai- [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|Enam|dEvatayA|prEti̍|pAdayati|adi̍tyAḥ|sada̍ḥ|asi|adi̍tyAḥ|sada̍ḥ|Eti̍|sIda|iti̍|Aha|yathAyajuriti̍# yathA-yajuḥ|Eva|Etat|yajamAnaḥ|vai|Etasya̍|purA|gOptA|Bavati|Eṣaḥ|vaḥ|dEva|savitaḥ|sOma̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|savitRupra̍sUta̍ iti# savitRu-prasUtaḥ|Eva|Enam|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|sam|prEti|yacCati|Etat|tvam|sOma|dEvaḥ|dEvAn|upEti̍|agAḥ|iti̍|Aha|dEvaḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|sann|10̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -vainaM̍ dEvatayA̍ pra pAdayatyadi̍tyAḥ̍ sadO&syadityAḥ̍ sada A sIdEtyAha̍ yathAyajurEvaitad-yajamAnO̍ vA Etasya# purA gOptA BavatyEṣa̍ vO# dEva savitaḥ sOma ityAha̍ savitRuprasUta̍ EvainaM̍ dEvatA̱Byaḥ saM prayacCatyEtat̍ tvaṃ sOma̍ dEvO dEvAnupAgA̍ ityAha̍ dEvO hyEṣa̍ san- [ ] 10

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAn|upaitItyupa̍ - Eti|idam|aham|manuṣya̍ḥ|manuṣyAn̍|iti̍|Aha|manuṣya̍ḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|sann|manuṣyAn̍|upaitItyu̍pa̍ - Eti|yat|Etat|yaju̍ḥ|na|brUyAt|apra̍jA̍ ityapra# - jAḥ|apaśuḥ|yajamAnaḥ|syAt|saha|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|saha|rAyaḥ|pOṣEṇa|iti̍|Aha|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|Eva|paśuBiriti# paśu-Biḥ|saha|imam|lOkam|upAvartata̍ ityupa̍ - AvartatE|nama̍ḥ|dEvEBya̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|namaskAra̍ iti# namaḥ - kAraḥ|hi|dEvAnA̱m|svadhEti# sva - dhA|pitRuBya iti# pitRu - Byaḥ|iti|Aha|svadhAkAra̍ iti# svadhA - kAraḥ|hi|11 (50)
verses.samhita: dEvAnupaitIdamahaM manuṣyO̍# manuṣyAnityA̍ha̍ manuṣyO̱(1q) hyEṣa̍ san manuṣyA̍nupaiti̍ yadEtad yajurna brUyAdaprajA̍ apaśuryajamAnaḥ̍ syAth saha prajayA# saha rAyaspOṣEṇEtyAha̍ prajayaiva paśuBiḥ̍ sahEmaM ~MlOkamupAvartatE̍ namO# dEvEBya ityAha̍ namaskArO hi dEvAnAṅ# svadhA pitRuBya ityAha̍ svadhAkArO hi- [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam pitRuṇAm|idam|aham|niriti|varu̍ṇasya|pAśA̱t|iti̍|Aha|varuṇapAśAditi̍# varuṇa - pAśAt|Eva|niriti|mucyatE|agnE̱|vratapata̍ iti# vrata - patE|Atmanaḥ|pUrvA̱|tanUḥ|AdEyEtyA̱̍ - dEyA̱|iti|Ahuḥ|kaḥ|hi|tat|vEda̍|yat|vasI̍yAn|svE|vaśE̱|BUtE|puna̍ḥ|vA|dadA̍ti|na|vA|iti̍|grAvA̍ṇaḥ|vai|sOma̍sya|rAjña̍ḥ|malimlusEnEti̍# malimlu - sEnA|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|grAv^^ṇṇaḥ|AgnI̱ddhra̍ ityAgni# - iddhrE|upavAsayatItyupa̍ - vAsayati|na|Enam|malimlusEnEti̍# malimlu - sEnA|vindati ( )||12 (50)
verses.samhita: pitRuṇAmidamahaM̍ nirvaruṇasya̍ pAśAdityAha̍ varuṇapAśAdEva nirmucyatE̍ &gnE̱ vratapata Atmanaḥ pUrvA# tanUrAdEyEtyAhuḥ̍ kO hi tadvEda yad vasIyAnth̍ svE vaśE# BUtE punarvA̍ dadAti̍ na vEti grAvAṇO̍ vai sOmasya̍ rAjñO# malimlusEnA ya EvaM ~MvidvAn grAvṇṇaq AgnI̱ddhra upavAsayati̍ nainaM̍ malimlusEnA vindati̍ ( )||12

verses.padam: - Padam vaiṣṇavyA|RucA|hutvA|yUpa̱m|acCa|Eti|vaiṣṇavaḥ|vai|dEvata̍yA|yUpa̍ḥ|svayA̱|Eva|Enam|dEvata̍yA|acCa̍|Eti|atIti̍|anyAn|agA̱m|na|anyAn|upEti̍|agAm|iti̍|Aha|atIti̍|hi|anyAn|Eti̍|na|anyAn|upaitItyu̍pa-Eti̍|arvAk|tvA|parai̱ḥ|avidam|paraḥ|ava̍raiḥ|iti̍|Aha|arvAk|hi|Enam|parai̱ḥ|vindati̍|paraḥ|ava̍raiḥ|tam|tvA|juṣE|13̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vaiṣṇavyarcA hutvA yUpamacCaiti̍ vaiṣṇavO vai dEvatayA̍ yUpaḥ svayaivainaM̍ dEvatayA &cCaityatyanyAnagAM nAnyA-nupAgAmityAhAti̍ hyanyAnEti̍ nAnyA-nupaityarvAktvA parairavidaM̍ parO&varairityA̍hArvAgGyE̍naM̍ parai̱rvindati# parO&varaistaM̍ tvA# juṣE- [ ] 13

verses.padam: - Padam vaiṣṇavam|dEvayajyAyA iti# dEva - yajyAyai̱|iti|Aha|dEvayajyAyA̍ iti# dEva-yajyAyai̱|hi|Enam|juṣatE̱|dEvaḥ|tvA|savitA|maddhvA̱|anaktu|iti|Aha|tEja̍sA|Eva|Enam|anakti|Oṣa̍dhE|trAya̍sva|Enam|svadhi̍ta̍ iti sva-dhitE|mA|Enam|hiṃqsIḥ|iti|Aha|vajra̍ḥ|vai|svadhi̍tiriti̍ sva - dhitiḥ|śAntyai̱|svadhitEriti̍ sva - dhitEḥ|vRukṣasya|biBya̍taḥ|prathamEna̍|śaka̍lEna|saha|tEja̍ḥ|parEti̍|patati|yaḥ|prathamaḥ|śaka̍laḥ|parApatEditi̍# parA - patE̱t|tam|api|Eti̍|harEt|satE̍jasamiti̍ sa - tEjasam|14 (50)
verses.samhita: vaiṣṇavaM dEvayajyAyA̍ ityAha̍ dEvayajyAyai hyEnaM̍ juṣatE# dEvastvA# savitA maddhvAnattivatyA̍ha̍ tEjasaivaina̍-manaktyOṣa̍dhE̍ trAyasvainaṅq̍ svadhitE̍ mainaṃ# hiṃsIrityAha̍ vajrO vai svadhitiḥ̍ śAntyai svadhitErvRukṣasya̍ biByataḥ̍ prathamEna śakalEna̍ saha tEjaḥ parA# patati yaḥ prathamaḥ̍ śakalaḥ̍ parApatEt tamapyA harEth̍ satEjasa-̍ [ ] 14

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|Enam|Eti|harati|imE|vai|lOkAḥ|yUpA̱t|prayata̍ iti# pra - yataḥ|biByati|diva̱m|agrEṇa|mA|lEKIḥ|antari̍kṣam|maddhyE̍na|mA|hiṃqsIḥ|iti̍|Aha|EByaḥ|Eva|Enam|lOkEBya̍ḥ|śamayati|vana̍spatE|śatava̍ḷśa̍ iti# śata - vala.śaḥ|vIti|rOha|iti̍|Avraśca̍na̍ ityA̱ - vraścanE|juhOti|tasmA̱t|Avraśca̍nAdityA̱̍ - vraścanAt|vRukṣAṇA̱m|BUyAṃ̍saḥ|uditi̍|tiṣṭhanti|sahasra̍vaḷśA̍ iti# sahasra# - vala.śAḥ|vIti|vayam|ruhEma|iti̍|Aha|AśiṣamityA̱-śiṣa̱m|Eva|EtAm|Eti̍|śAstE|ana̍kṣasa~ggamityana̍kṣa̍ - sa~ggam|15 (50)
verses.samhita: -mEvainamA haratImE̍ vai lOkA yUpA̱t prayatO biByati̍ divamagrEṇa̍ mA lEKIrantari̍kṣaM̍ maddhyEna̍ mA hiṃsIrityA̍haiBya̍ EvainaM̍ ~MlOkEByaḥ̍ śamayati vanaspatE̍ śatavaḷśO̍ vi rOhEtyAvraścanE̍ juhOti tasmA-̍ dAvraścanAd-vRukṣAṇAM̍ BUyAṃsa̍ uttiṣṭhanti̍ sahasravaḷśA̍ vi vayaṃ ruhEmEtyA̍hA-̍ &&*śiṣamEvaitAmA̍ śAstE &nakṣasa~ggaM-̍ [ ] 15

verses.padam: - Padam vRuścEt|yat|akṣasa~ggamityakṣa̍ - sa~ggam|vRuścEt|adhaIṣamityadhaḥ̍ - Iṣam|yajamAnasya|pramAyu̍kamiti̍# pra-mAyukam|syAt|yam|kAmayE̍ta|apra̍tiṣṭhita̍ ityaprati̍ - sthitaḥ|syAt|iti|ArOhamityA̱̍ - rOham|tasmai̱|vRuścEt|Eṣaḥ|vai|vanaspatInAm|apra̍tiṣṭhita̍ ityaprati̍ - sthitaḥ|apratiṣṭhita̍ ityaprati̍ - sthitaḥ|Eva|Bavati|yam|kAmayEta|apaśuḥ|syAt|iti̍|aparṇam|tasmai̱|śuṣkA̱gramiti̍ śuṣka# - agram|vRuścEt|Eṣaḥ|vai|vanaspatInAm|apaśavyaḥ|apaśuḥ|Eva|Bavati|yam|kAmayE̍ta|paśumAniti̍# paśu - mAn|syAt|iti|bahuparṇamiti̍# bahu - parṇam|tasmai̱|bahuśAKamiti# bahu - śAKam|vRuścEt|Eṣaḥ|vai|16 (50)
verses.samhita: ~MvRuścEd-yadakṣasa~ggaM̍ ~MvRuścEdadhaIṣaM̍ ~MyajamAnasya̍ pramAyukaṅ̍ syAdyaM kAmayEtApratiṣṭhitaḥ̍ syAdityArOhaM̍ tasma# vRuścEdEṣa vai vanaspatInA-mapra̍tiṣṭhitO&pra̍tiṣṭhita̍ Eva Bavati̍ yaM kAmayEtApaśuḥ̍ syAdityaparṇaM̍ tasmai śuṣkA̱graM ~MvRuścEdEṣa vai vanaspatInA-mapaśavyO̍&paśurEva̍ Bavati̍ yaM kAmayEta̍ paśumAnth syAditi# bahuparṇaM tasmai# bahuśAKaM ~MvRuścEdEṣa̍ vai- [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam vanaspatInAm|paśavya̍ḥ|paśumAniti̍# paśu - mAn|Eva|Bavati|pratiṣṭhitamiti̍ prati# - sthitam|vRuścEt|pratiṣṭhAkAmasyEti̍# pratiṣṭhA- kAmasya|Eṣaḥ|vai|vanaspatInAm|prati̍ṣṭhita̍ iti prati# - sthitaḥ|yaḥ|samE|BUmyai̱|svAt|yOnE̱ḥ|rUḍhaḥ|pratIti|Eva|tiṣṭhati|yaḥ|pratya~g|upa̍nata̍ ityupa-nataḥ|tam|vRuścEt|saḥ|hi|mEdha̱m|aBIti̍|upa̍nata̍ ityupa# - nataḥ|pa~jcAratnimiti̍ pa~jca-̍ aratnim|tasmai̱|vRuścEt|yam|kAmayEta|upEti̍|Enam|utta̍ra̍ ityut - taraḥ|yajñaḥ|namEt|iti|pa~jcA̱kṣarEti̍ pa~jca-AkṣarA|pa~gktiḥ|pA~gkta̍ḥ|yajñaḥ|upEti̍|Enam|utta̍ra̍ ityut - taraḥ|yajñaḥ|17 (50)
verses.samhita: vanaspatInAM̍ paśavyaḥ̍ paśumAnEva Bavati̍ pratiṣṭhitaM̍ ~MvRuścEt pratiṣṭhAkAmasyaiṣa̍ vai vanaspatInAM̍ pratiṣṭhitO̍ yaḥ samE BUmyai svAdyOnE# rUḍhaḥ pratyEva tiṣṭhati̍ yaḥ pratya~g~gupanatastaM̍ ~MvRuścEth̍ sa hi mEdhamaByupa̍nataḥ̍ pa~jcAratniM̍ tasmai# vRuścEdyaM kAmayEtOpainamutta̍rO̍ yajñO namEditi̍ pa~jcA̱kṣarA pa~gktiḥ pA~gktO# yajña upainamutta̍rO̍ yajñO- [ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam namati|ṣaḍaratnimiti̍ ṣaṭ - aratnim|pratiṣṭhAkAmasyEti̍# pratiṣṭhA- kAmasya|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutavaḥ|Rutuṣu̍|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|saptAra̍tnimiti̍# sapta - aratnim|paśukAmasyEti̍# paśu - kAmasya|saptapadEti# sapta-padA|śakvarI|paśava̍ḥ|śakva̍rI|paśUn|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|navA̍ratnimiti̍ nava# - aratnim|tEjaskAmasyEti̍ tEjaḥ̍ - kAmasya|trivRutEti# tri - vRutA̱|stOmEna|sammi̍tamiti̍ saM - mitam|tEjaḥ|trivRuditi̍# tri - vRut|tEjasvI|Eva|Bavati|EkAdaśAratnimityEkA̍daśa-aratnim|indriyakA̍masyEtI̱ndriya-kAmasya|EkA̍daśAkṣarEtyEkA̍daśa̍ - akṣarA|triṣṭuk|indriyam|triṣṭuk|indriyAvI|Eva|Bavati|pa~jcadaśAratnimiti̍ pa~jcadaśa̍ - aratnim|BrAtRuvyavata̍ iti BrAtRuvya̍ - vataḥ|pa~jcadaśa iti# pa~jca - daśaḥ|vajraḥ|BrAtRu̍vyABiBUtyA̍ iti BrAtRuvya̍ - aBiBUtyai|saptadaśAratnimiti̍# saptadaśa̍ - aratnim|prajAkAmasyEti̍# prajA - kAmasya|saptadaśa iti# sapta - daśaḥ|prajApatiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|prajApatEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|Aptyai̱ ( )|EkaviṃśatyaratnimityEka̍viṃśati̍ - aratnim|pratiṣṭhAkAmasyEti̍# pratiṣṭhA - kAmasya|Ekaviṃqśa ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|stOmAnAm|pratiṣṭhEti̍# prati - sthA|pratiṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|aṣṭAśrirityaṣṭA - aśriḥ|Bavati|aṣṭAkṣarEtyaṣṭA - akṣarA|gAyatrI|tEjaḥ|gAyatrI|gAyatrI|yajñamuKamiti̍# yajña - muKam|tEjasA|Eva|gAyatriyA|yajñamuKEnEti̍# yajña - muKEna|saMmi̍ta̍ iti saM - mitaḥ||18 (69) (juṣE - satEjasa̍ - manakṣasa~ggaM̍ - bahuśAKaM ~MvRuścEdEṣa̍ vai - yajña upainamutta̍rO̍ yajña - AptyA - EkAnnaviṃśatiśca̍)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: namati̍ ṣaḍaratniM̍ pratiṣṭhAkAmasya̍ ṣaḍvA Rutava# RutuṣvEva prati# tiṣṭhati saptAratniM̍ paśukAmasya̍ saptapadA̍ śakvarI̍ paśavaḥ śakvarI̍ paśUnEvAva# rundhE navAratniM̍ tEjaskAmasya̍ trivRutA stOmEna̍ sammitaM̍ tEjastrivRut̍ tEjasvyE̍va̍ Bava-tyEkA̍daśAratni-mindriyakA̍ma-syaikA̍daśAkṣarA̍ triṣṭugindriyaM̍ triṣṭugindriyAvyE̍va̍ Bavati̍ pa~jcadaśAratniM̍ BrAtRuvyavataḥ̍ pa~jcadaśO vajrO BrAtRuvyABiBUtyai̍ saptadaśAratniM̍ prajAkAmasya̍ saptadaśaḥ prajApatiḥ̍ prajApatErAptyA̍ ( ) EkaviṃśatyaratniM̍ pratiṣṭhAkAma-syaikaviṃqśaḥ̍ stOmAnAM̍ pratiṣṭhA pratiṣṭhityA̍ aṣṭAśrirBava-tyaṣṭAkṣa̍rA̍ gAyatrI tEjO# gAyatrI gAyatrI̍ yajñamuKaM̍ tEjasaiva̍ gAyatriyA̍ yajñamuKEna̍ saMmitaḥ||18̍ (juṣE - satEjasa̍ - manakṣasa~ggaM̍ - bahuśAKaM ~MvRuścEdEṣa̍ vai - yajña upainamutta̍rO̍ yajña - AptyA - EkAnnaviṃśatiśca̍)̍

verses.padam: - Padam pRuthivyai|tvA|antarikṣAya|tvA|divE|tvA|iti̍|Aha|EByaḥ|Eva|Enam|lOkEBya̍ḥ|prEti̍|ukṣati|parA̱~jcam|prEti̍|ukṣati|parA~g̍|iva|hi|suvarga̍ iti# suvaḥ-gaḥ|lOkaḥ|krUram|iva|vai|Etat|karOti|yat|Kanati|apaḥ|avEti̍|nayati|śAntyai̱|yava̍matIriti̍ yava-matIḥ|avEti̍|nayati|Urk|vai|yava̍ḥ|yaja̍mAnEna|yUpa̍ḥ|saMmi̍ta̍ iti saM - mitaḥ|yAvAn|Eva|yaja̍mAnaḥ|tAva̍tIm|Eva|asminn|Urja̱m|dadhAti|19̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pRuthivyai tvA&ntarikṣAya̍ tvA divE tvEtyAhaiBya̍ EvainaM̍ ~MlOkEByaḥ prOkṣati̍ parA̱~jcaM prOkṣati̍ parA~giva̍ hi suvargO̍ lOkaḥ krUramiva̍ vA Etat karOti̍ yat KanatyapO&va̍# nayati śAntyai yavamatIrava̍# nayatyUrgvai yavO yajamAnEna̍ yUpaḥ saMmitO̍ yAvAnEva̍ yajamAna-stAva̍tI-mEvAsmi-nnUrja̍M̍ dadhAti- [ ] 19

verses.padam: - Padam pitRuṇAm|sadanam|asi|iti̍|barqḥiḥ|avEti̍|stRuṇAti|pitRudEvatya̍miti̍# pitRu - dEvatya̱m|hi|Etat|yat|niKAtamiti̍ ni - KAtam|yat|baraḥiḥ|anavastIryEtyana̍va̍ - stIrya|minuyAt|pitRudEvatya# iti# pitRu-dEvatyaḥ|niKA̍ta̍ iti ni-KAtaḥ|syAt|baraḥiḥ|avastIryEtyava̍ - stIrya|minOti|asyAm|Eva|Enam|minOti|yUpaśakalamiti̍# yUpa - śakalam|avEti|asyati|satE̍jasamiti̍ sa - tEjasam|Eva|Enam|minOti|dEvaḥ|tvA|savitA|maddhvA̱|anaktu|iti|Aha|tEja̍sA|Eva|Enam|anakti|supippalABya̍ iti# su-pippalAByaḥ|tvA|Oṣa̍dhIBya̍ ityOṣadhi̍ - Byaḥ|iti|caṣAla̱m|pratIti̍|20̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pitRuṇAṃ sadanamasIti̍# barqḥirava# stRuṇAti pitRudEvatyA̱(1q)ṅq hyEtad-yanniKA̍taM̍ ~Myad-barqḥiranavastIrya̍ minuyAt pitRudEvatyO̍# niKAtaḥ̍ syAd barqḥiravastIrya̍# minOtyasyAmEvainaM̍ minOti yUpaśakalamavA̱syati satEjasamEvaina̍M̍ minOti dEvastvA# savitA maddhvA&naktvityA̍ha̍ tEjasaivaina̍manakti̍ supippalABya-stvauṣadhIBya̍ iti# caṣAlaM prati-̍ [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam mu~jcati|tasmA̱t|śIrq.ṣataḥ|Oṣadhayaḥ|Pala̱m|gRuhṇanti|anakti̍|tEja̍ḥ|vai|Ajya̱m|yaja̍mAnEna|agniṣṭhEtya̍gni-sthA|aśri̍ḥ|saMmitEti̍ saM - mitA|yat|agniṣṭhAmityagni-̍ sthAm|aśri̱m|anakti|yajamAnam|Eva|tEja̍sA|anakti|AntamityA̱̍ - antam|anakti|AntamityA̱ - antam|Eva|yajamAnam|tEja̍sA|anakti|sarvata̍ḥ|parIti̍|mRuśati|apa̍rivargamityapa̍ri̍ - vargam|Eva|asminn|tEjaḥ|dadhAti|uditi̍|diva̱m|staBAna|Eti̍|antari̍kṣam|pRuṇa|iti̍|Aha|EṣAm|lOkAnA̱m|vidhRu̍tyA̍ iti vi - dhRutyai|vaiṣṇavyA|RucA|21 (50)
verses.samhita: mu~jcati tasmA̱cCIṛṣata Oṣadhayaḥ̍ PalaM̍ gRuhṇantyanakti tEjO vA AjyaM ~MyajamAnEnAgniṣṭhA&śriḥ̍ saMmitA̍ yadagniṣṭhA-maśri̍manakti̍ yajamAnamEva̍ tEjasA̍ &naktyAnta-manaktyAntamEva̍ yajamAnaM̍ tEjasAnakti̍ sarvataḥ pari# mRuśatyaparivarga-mEvAsmin̍ tEjO# dadhAtyud divaṅ# staBAnA&ntarikṣaM̍ pRuṇEtyAhaiṣAM̍ ~MlOkAnAM ~MvidhRutyai̍ vaiṣṇavyarcA- [ ] 21
