verses.samhita: -ṣkrAmata-stasmAt̍ prA~jcau yantau na paśyanti̍ pratya~jcAvAvRutya̍# juhutastasmA̱t pratya~jcau yantau# paśyanti cakṣuṣI̍ vA EtE yajñasya yacCukrAmanthinau nAsikOttaravEdiraBita̍ḥ̍ parikramya# juhutastasmAdaBitO̍ nAsikAM̍ cakṣuṣI̍ tasmAnnAsikayA̍ cakṣuṣI̍ vidhRutE̍ sarvataḥ pari# krAmatO rakṣasAmapa̍hatyai̍ dEvA vai yAḥ prAcIrAhutIraju̍havuryE̍ purastAdasurA̍ Asan tAṅstABiḥ prA- [ ] 44

verses.padam: - Padam anudanta|yAḥ|pratIcI̱ḥ|yE|paścAt|asurAḥ|Asann̍|tAn|tABi̍ḥ|apEti̍|anudanta|prAcI̱ḥ|anyAḥ|Ahu̍taya̍ ityA-hutayaḥ|hUyantE̱|pratya~jcau̱|śukrAmanthinAviti# śukrA - manthinau̱|paścAt|ca|Eva|purastA̱t|ca|yajamAnaḥ|BrAtRu̍vyAn|prEti̍|nudatE|tasmA̱t|parA̍cIḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|prEti|vIyantE|pratIcI̱ḥ|jAyantE|śukrAmanthinAviti̍# śukrA - manthinau̱|vai|anviti|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|prEti|jAyantE|attrIḥ|ca|AdyA̱ḥ|ca|suvIrA̍ iti# su - vIrA̱ḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|prajanayanniti# pra - janayann|parIti̍|ihi|śukraḥ|śukraśO̍ciṣEti̍# śukra - śOciṣA|45 (50)
verses.samhita: -ṇudanta̍ yAḥ pratIcIryE paścAdasurA̍ Asan tAṅstABirapAnudanta̍ prAcIranyA̍ AhutayO̍ hUyantE̱ pratya~jcau# śukrAmanthinau# paścAccaiva purastA̱cca yajamAnO̍ BrAtRuvyAn̍ pra ṇudatE̍ tasmAt parAcIḥ̍ prajAḥ pra vIyantE̍ pratIcI̱rjAyantE śukrAmanthinau vA anu# prajAḥ pra jAyantE&ttrIścAdyA̱śca̍ suvIrA̱ḥ prajAḥ prajanayan̍ parIhi̍ śukraḥ śukraśOciṣA-̍ [ ] 45

verses.padam: - Padam suprajA iti# su - prajAḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|prajanayanniti# pra - janayann|parIti̍|ihi|manthI|manthiśO̍ciṣEti̍# manthi - śOciṣA|iti|Aha|EtAḥ|vai|suvIrA̍ iti# su - vIrA̱ḥ|yA|attrIḥ|EtAḥ|suprajA iti# su - prajAḥ|yAḥ|AdyA̱ḥ|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|attrI|asya|prajEti̍# pra - jA|jAyatE|na|AdyA̱|prajApatEriti̍# prajA-patEḥ|akṣi|aśvayat|tat|parEti̍|apatat|tat|vika̍~gkatamiti̍ vi-ka~gkatam|prEti|aviśat|tat|vika̍~gkata̍ iti# vi - ka~gkatE|na|aramata|tat|yava̱m|prEti|aviśat|tat|yavE̱|aramata|tat|yava̍sya|46̍ (50)
verses.samhita: suprajAḥ prajAḥ prajanayan̍ parIhi̍ manthI manthiśOciṣEtyA̍haitA̍ vai suvIrA yA attrIrEtAḥ suprajA̍ yA AdyA# ya EvaM ~MvEdAtryasya̍ prajA jAyatE̍ nA&&dyA̱ prajApatErakṣya̍śvayat̍ tat parA&&*patat̍ tad vika~gkataM̍ prAviśat̍ tad vika~gkatE̍ nAramata̍ tad yavaM prAviśat̍ tad yavE&ramata̍ tad yavasya-̍ [ ] 46

verses.padam: - Padam yavatvamiti# yava - tvam|yat|vaika~gkatam|manthipAtramiti̍# manthi - pAtram|Bavati|saktu̍Biriti̍ saktu# - Biḥ|śrIṇAti|prajApa̍tEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|Eva|tat|cakṣuḥ|samiti̍|Barati|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|kasmA̱t|satyAt|manthipAtramiti̍# manthi - pAtram|sadaḥ|na|aśnutE|iti̍|ArtapAtramityA̱rta̍ - pAtram|hi|iti|brUyAt|yat|aśnuvIta|andhaḥ|addhvaryuḥ|syAt|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCEt|tasmA̱t|na|aśnutE||47̍ (37) (AtmanA parA - ni - ṣpra - śukraśOciṣA̍ - yavasya̍ - saptatriṃśacca)̍ (A10)
verses.samhita: yavatvaM ~Myad vaika~gkataM̍ manthipAtraM Bavati̍ saktuBiḥ̍ śrIṇAti# prajApatErEva̍ taccakṣuḥ saM Barati̍ brahmavAdinO# vadanti kasmA̱th satyAnmanthipAtraṃ̍ sadO nAśnuta̍ ityA̱rtapAtraṃ hIti# brUyAd-yadaśnuvItAndhO̱&ddhvaryuḥ̍ syAdArtimArcCEt tasmAnnAśnutE||47̍ (AtmanA parA - ni - ṣpra - śukraśOciṣA̍ - yavasya̍ - saptatriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAḥ|vai|yat|yajñE|akurvata|tat|asu̍rAḥ|akurvata|tE|dEvAḥ|AgrayaṇAgrAnityA̱grayaṇa̍ - agrAn|grahAn|apaśyann|tAn|agRuhṇata|tata̍ḥ|vai|tE|agra̱m|parIti̍|Ayann|yasya̍|Evam|viduṣa̍ḥ|AgrayaṇAgrA̍ ityA̱grayaṇa-agrAḥ|grahA̱ḥ|gRuhyanta̱|agra̱m|Eva|samAnAnA̱m|parIti|Eti|rugṇavatyEti̍# rugṇa - vatyA|RucA|BrAtRuvyavata̍ iti BrAtRuvya-vataḥ|gRuhṇIyAt|BrAtRu̍vyasya|Eva|ruktvA|agra̱m|samAnAnA̱m|parIti̍|Eti|yE|dEvAḥ|divi|EkA̍daśa|stha|iti̍|Aha|48̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvA vai yad yajñE&kurvata̍ tadasurA̍ akurvata tE dEvA A̱grayaṇAgrAn grahAnapaśyan̍ tAnagRuhṇata̍ tatO vai tE&graM paryAyana.̍ yasyaivaM ~Mviduṣa# AgrayaṇAgrA grahA# gRuhyantE&gramEva̍ samAnAnAM̍ paryEti̍ rugṇavatyarcA̍ BrAtRuvyavatO̍ gRuhṇIyAd-BrAtRuvyasyaiva̍ ruktvAgraṃ# samAnAnAM paryEti̍ yE dEvA̍ divyEkAdaśa̍ sthEtyAhai-̍ [ ] 48

verses.padam: - Padam EtAvatIḥ|vai|dEvatA̱ḥ|tABya̍ḥ|Eva|Enam|sarvA̱Byaḥ|gRuhṇAti|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|viśvE̱Byaḥ|tvA|dEvEBya̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|vaiśvadEva̍ iti# vaiśva - dEvaḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|dEvatayA|vAk|vai|dEvEBya̍ḥ|apEti̍|akrAmat|yajñAya̍|ati̍ṣṭhamAnA|tE|dEvAḥ|vAci|apa̍krAntAyAmityapa̍-krAntAyAm|tUṣṇIm|grahAn̍|agRuhṇata|sA|amanyata|vAk|antaḥ|yanti|vai|mA|iti̍|sA|Agrayaṇam|prati̍|Eti̍|agacCat|tat|Agrayaṇasya̍|AgrayaṇatvamityA̱grayaṇa̍ - tvam|49 (50)
verses.samhita: -tAvatIrvai̍ dEvatAstABya# Evainaṃq sarvA̱ByO gRuhṇAtyEṣa tE yOni rviśvE̱ByastvA dEvEBya ityAha̍ vaiśvadEvO hyEṣa̍ dEvatayA̍ vAgvai dEvEByO-&pA̱krAmad-yajñAyAtiṣṭhamAnA̍ tE dEvA vAcyapakrAntAyAM̍ tUṣṇIM grahAnagRuhṇata̍ sAmanyata̍ vAgantaryanti̍ vai mEti sA&&grayaṇaM̍ pratyAgacCat̍ tadA̱grayaṇasyA̱&&grayaṇatvaM- [ ] 49

verses.padam: - Padam tasmA̱t|AgrayaṇE|vAk|vIti|sRujyatE|yat|tUṣṇIm|pUrvE̱|grahA̱ḥ|gRuhyantE̱|yathA̱|thsArI|iya̍ti|mE|AKa̍ḥ|iya̍ti|na|apEti̍|rAthsyAmi|iti̍|upAvasRujatItyu̍pa̍ - avasRujati|Evam|Eva|tat|addhvaryuḥ|Agrayaṇam|gRuhItvA|yajñam|AraByEtyA̱-raBya̍|vAca̱m|vIti̍|sRujatE|triḥ|him|karOti|udgAtRUnityu̍t̍ - gAtRUn|Eva|tat|vRuṇItE|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|Agrayaṇaḥ|yat|Agrayaṇam|gRuhItvA|hikaMqrOtIti# him - karOti|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|Eva|50 (50)
verses.samhita: tasmAdAgrayaṇE̍ vAgvi sRujyatE̍ yat tUṣṇIM pUrvE grahA# gRuhyantE yathA̱thsArIyati̍ ma AKa iyati̍ nApa# rAthsyA-mItyupAvasRujatyEvamEva̍ tadaddhvaryurA̱grayaṇaM̍ gRuhItvA̍ yajñamAraBya vAcaM ~Mvi sRujatE̍ triṛhiM karOtyudgAtRU-nEva̍ tad vRuṇItE̍ prajApatirvA̍ Eṣa yadA̱grayaṇO yadA̱grayaṇaM gRuhItvA̍ hiM̍ karOti# prajApatirEva-̍ [ ] 50

verses.padam: - Padam tat|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|aBIti|jiGrati|tasmA̱t|vathsam|jAtam|gauḥ|aBIti̍|jiGrati|AtmA|vai|Eṣaḥ|yajñasya̍|yat|Agrayaṇaḥ|sava̍nEsavana̍ iti savanE̍ - savanE|aBIti|gRuhṇAti|Atmann|Eva|yajñam|samiti̍|tanOti|upari̍ṣṭAt|Eti̍|nayati|rEta̍ḥ|Eva|tat|dadhAti|adhastA̱t|upEti̍|gRuhṇAti|prEti̍|janayati|Eva|tat|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|kasmA̱t|satyAt|gAyatrI|kani̍ṣṭhA|Canda̍sAm|satI|sarvA̍ṇi|sava̍nAni|vahati|iti̍# ( )|Eṣaḥ|vai|gAyatriyai|vathsaḥ|yat|Agrayaṇaḥ|tam|Eva|tat|aBinivartamityaBi̍ - nivarta̱m|sarvAṇi|sava̍nAni|vahati|tasmA̱t|vathsam|apAkRu̍tamitya̍pa̍ - AkRutam|gauḥ|aBa|nIti̍|vartatE||51̍ (70) (AhA&& - grayaṇatvaM - prajApatirEvE̍ - ti# - viṃśatiśca)̍ (A11) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 11 Anuvaakams :- (yajñEna tA upayaḍBi̍# - rdEvA vai yajñamAgnI̱dhrE - brahmavAdinaḥ sa tvai - dEvasya grAvAṇaM̍ - prAṇO vA upAṅqśva̍grA̍ - dEvA vA upAṃqśau̍ - vAgvai - mitraM - ~Myajñasya - bRuhaspati# - rdEvA vA A̱grayaṇAgrA - nEkAdaśa)̍ Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (yajñEna# - lOkE paśumAnth̍ syAth - savanaM̍ mAdhyandinaM̍ - ~MvAgvA - ariktAni̍ - tat prajA - Ekapa~jcAśat)̍ First and Last Padam of Fourth Prasnam of 6th Kandam (yajñEna - ni vartatE)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE ṣaṣṭhakAṇḍE caturthaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||==================================
verses.samhita: tat prajA aBi jiGrati̍ tasmA̱d vathsaM jAtaM gauraBi jiGratyAtmA̍ vA Eṣa yajñasya yadA̱grayaṇaḥ savanEsavanE&Bi̍ gRuhṇAtyAtmannEva̍ yajñaṃ saM tanOtyupari̍ṣṭAdA̍ nayati̍ rEta# Eva tad dadhAtyadhastAdupa̍# gRuhṇAti pra janayatyEva̍ tadbrahmavAdinO̍# vadanti kasmA̱th satyAd-gAyatrI̍ kaniṣṭhA̍ CandasAṃ̍ satI sarvAṇi̍ savanAni̍ vahatItyE ( )-ṣa vai gAyatriyai̍ vathsO yadA̱grayaṇastamEva tadaBinivartaṃq̍ sarvAṇi̍ savanAni̍ vahati tasmA̱d vathsamapAkRutaM̍ gauraBi ni vartatE||51̍ (AhA&& - grayaṇatvaM - prajApatirEvE̍ - ti# - viṃśatiśca)̍ (A11) praśna kOrvai with starting padams of 1 to 11 anuvAkams :- (yajñEna tA upayaḍBi̍# - rdEvA vai yajñamAgnI̱dhrE - brahmavAdinaḥ sa tvai - dEvasya grAvAṇaM̍ - prAṇO vA upAṅqśva̍grA̍ - dEvA vA upAṃqśau̍ - vAgvai - mitraM - ~Myajñasya - bRuhaspati# - rdEvA vA A̱grayaṇAgrA - nEkAdaśa)̍ kOrvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (yajñEna# - lOkE paśumAnth̍ syAth - savanaM̍ mAdhyandinaM̍ - ~MvAgvA - ariktAni̍ - tat prajA - Ekapa~jcAśat)̍ first and last padam of fourth praśnam of 6th KAṇḍam (yajñEna - ni vartatE)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM ṣaṣṭhakAṇḍE caturthaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||----------------------------------------------------------------------- OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ hariḥ OM 6.5 ṣaṣṭhakAṇḍE pa~jcamaḥ praśnaḥ - sOmamantrabrAhmaṇanirUpaṇaM

verses.padam: - Padam indraḥ|vRutrAya̍|vajra̱m|uditi̍|ayacCat|saḥ|vRutraḥ|vajrA̱t|udya̍tAdityut-yatAt|abiBEt|saḥ|abravIt|mA|mE|prEti̍|hAḥ|asti̍|vai|idam|mayi̍|vIrya̱m|tat|tE|prEti̍|dAsyAmi|iti̍|tasmai̱|ukthya̱m|prEti̍|ayacCat|tasmai̱|dvitIya̱m|uditi̍|ayacCat|saḥ|abravIt|mA|mE|prEti̍|hAḥ|asti̍|vai|idam|mayi̍|vIrya̱m|tat|tE|prEti̍|dAsyAmi|iti̍|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: indrO# vRutrAya vajramudayacCath̍ sa vRutrO vajrAdudyatAdabiBEth̍ sO̱&bravInmA mE pra hArasti vA idaM mayi# vIryaM# tat tE pra dA̱syAmIti tasmA# ukthyaM̍ prAyacCat̍ tasmai̱ dvitIyamudayacCath̍ sO̱&bravInmA ma pra hArasti vA idaM mayi# vIryaM̍ tat tE pra dA̱syAmIti- [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam tasmai̱|ukthya̱m|Eva|prEti|ayacCat|tasmai̱|tRutIya̱m|uditi̍|ayacCat|tam|viṣṇu̍ḥ|anviti̍|atiṣṭhata|jahi|iti̍|saḥ|abravIt|mA|mE|prEti̍|hAḥ|asti̍|vai|idam|mayi̍|vIrya̱m|tat|tE|prEti̍|dAsyAmi|iti̍|tasmai̱|ukthya̱m|Eva|prEti̍|ayacCat|tam|nirmA̍yamiti̍ niḥ-mAyam|BUtam|ahann|yajñaḥ|hi|tasya|mAyA|AsI̱t|yat|ukthya̍ḥ|gRuhyatE̱|indriyam|Eva|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tasmA# ukthyamEva̍ prAyacCat̍ tasmai# tRutIyamudayacCat̍ taM ~Mviṣṇuranvatiṣṭhata̍ jahIti sO̱&bravInmA mE pra hArasti vA idaM mayi# vIryaM̍ tat tE pra dA̱syAmIti tasmA# ukthyamEva̍ prAyacCat̍ taM nirmAyaM̍ BUtamahan.̍ yajñO hi tasya# mAyA&&sId-yadukthyO# gRuhyata# indriyamEva- [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam tat|vIrya̱m|yajamAnaḥ|BrAtRu̍vyasya|vRu~gktE|indrA̍ya|tvA|bRuhadva̍ta̍ iti# bRuhat - vatE|vayasvatE|iti̍|Aha|indrA̍ya|hi|saḥ|tam|prEti̍|aya̍cCat|tasmai̱|tvA|viṣṇa̍vE|tvA|iti̍|Aha|yat|Eva|viṣṇu̍ḥ|anvati̍ṣṭhatEtya̍nu̍ - atiṣṭhata|jahi|iti̍|tasmA̱t|viṣṇu̱m|anvABa̍jatItya̍nu̍ - ABajati|triḥ|niriti̍|gRuhṇAti|triḥ|hi|saḥ|tam|tasmai̱|prEti̍|aya̍cCat|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|puna̍ṛhaviriti̍ punaḥ̍ - haviḥ|asi|iti|Aha|puna̍ḥpunariti̍ punaḥ̍ - punaḥ|3 (50)
verses.samhita: tad vIryaM̍ ~MyajamAnO̍ BrAtRuvyasya̍ vRu~gkta indrAya̍ tvA bRuhad-vatE̍ vayasvata̍ ityAhEndrAya̍ hi sa taM prAyacCat̍ tasmai̱ tvA viṣṇavE̍ tvEtyAha̍ yadEva viṣṇuranvati̍ṣṭhata̍ jahIti tasmAd-viṣṇumanvABa̍jati̍ trirnirgRuhṇAti̍ triṛhi sa taM tasmai prAyacCadEṣa̍ tE yOniḥ punaṛhavirasItyA̍ha̍ punaḥpuna-̍ [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam hi|asmAt|nirgRuhṇAtIti# niḥ - gRuhṇAti|cakṣu̍ḥ|vai|Etat|yajñasya̍|yat|ukthya̍ḥ|tasmA̱t|ukthya̱m|hutam|sOmA̱ḥ|anvAyantItya̍nu̍ - Ayanti|tasmA̱t|AtmA|cakṣu̍ḥ|anviti̍|Eti|tasmA̱t|Eka̱m|yanta̱m|bahava̍ḥ|anviti̍|yanti|tasmA̱t|Eka̍ḥ|bahUnAm|Badraḥ|Bavati|tasmA̱t|Eka̍ḥ|bahvIḥ|jAyAḥ|vindatE|yadi̍|kAmayE̍ta|addhvaryuḥ|AtmAna̱m|yajñayaśasEnEti̍# yajña - yaśasEna|arpayEyam|iti̍|antarA|AhavanIyamityA̱̍ - havanIya̱m|ca|havid^^rdhAnamiti# haviḥ - dhAna̱m|ca|tiṣṭhann|avEti̍|nayEt|4̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -rhyasmA-nnirgRuhṇAti̍ cakṣurvA Etad-yajñasya yadukthya-stasmA̍dukthyaṃ̍# hutaṃ sOmA# anvAyanti̍ tasmAdAtmA̍ cakṣuranvEti̍ tasmAdEkaM ~MyantaM̍ bahavO&nu# yanti tasmAdEkO# bahUnAM BadrO Bavati̍ tasmAdEkO# bahvIrjAyA vindatE̍ yadi# kAmayEtA-ddhvaryu-rAtmAna̍M̍ ~Myajña yaśasEnA̱-rpayEya-mityantarA&&ha̍vanIya̍M̍ ca havirddhAnaM̍ ca tiṣṭhannava# nayE- [ ] 4

verses.padam: - Padam AtmAna̱m|Eva|yajñayaśasEnEti# yajña-yaśasEna|arpayati|yadi̍|kAmayE̍ta|yaja̍mAnam|yajñayaśasEnEti̍# yajña - yaśasEna|arpayEyam|iti̍|antarA|sadOhavid^^rdhAnE̍ iti# sadaḥ - havid^^rdhAnE|tiṣṭhann|avEti̍|nayEt|yaja̍mAnam|Eva|yajñayaśasEnEti̍# yajña - yaśasEna|arpayati|yadi̍|kAmayE̍ta|sadasyAn̍|yajñayaśasEnEti̍# yajña - yaśasEna|arpayEyam|iti̍|sada̍ḥ|AlaByEtyA̱̍ - laBya|avEti̍|nayEt|sadasyAn̍|Eva|yajñayaśasEnEti̍# yajña - yaśasEna|arpayati||5̍ (33) (itI̱ - ndriyamEva - punaḥ̍ puna - rnayEt - trayastriṃśacca)̍ (A1)
verses.samhita: dAtmAnamEva̍ yajñayaśasEnA̱rpayati̍ yadi# kAmayEta̍ yajamAnaM̍ ~Myajña yaśasEnA̱rpayEya-mityantarA̍ sadOhavirddhAnE̍ tiṣṭhannava# nayEd-yajamAnamEva̍ yajñayaśasEnA̱-rpayati̍ yadi# kAmayEta̍ sadasyAn# yajña yaśasEnA̱-rpayEyamiti sada# AlaByAva# nayEth sadasyAnEva̍ yajñayaśasEnA̱rpayati||5̍ (itI̱ - ndriyamEva - punaḥ̍ puna - rnayEt - trayastriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam Ayuḥ|vai|Etat|yajñasya̍|yat|dhruvaḥ|uttama̍ ityut̍ - tamaḥ|grahAṇAm|gRuhyatE|tasmA̱t|Ayu̍ḥ|prAṇAnAmiti̍# pra - anAnA̱m|uttamamityut-tamam|mUd^^rdhAna̱m|divaḥ|aratim|pRuthivyAḥ|iti̍|Aha|mUd^^rdhAna̱m|Eva|Enam|samAnAnA̱m|karOti|vaiśvAnaram|RutAya̍|jAtam|agnim|iti̍|Aha|vaiśvAnaram|hi|dEvata̍yA|Ayu̍ḥ|uBayatO̍vaiśvAnara̍ ityuBayata̍ḥ̍ - vaiśvAnaraḥ|gRuhyatE|tasmA̱t|uBayataḥ|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|adhastA̱t|ca|upariṣṭAt|ca|arddhina̍ḥ|anyE|grahA̱ḥ|gRuhyantE̱|ad^^rdhI|dhruvaḥ|tasmA̱t|6̍ (50)
verses.samhita: AyurvA Etad-yajñasya yad dhruva uttamO̍ grahAṇAM̍ gRuhyatE tasmAdAyuḥ̍ prAṇAnAmuttamaM̍ mUrddhAnaM̍ divO aratiM̍ pRuthivyA̍ ityAha̍ mUrddhAnamEvainaṃ̍# samAnAnA̱M karOti vaiśvAnaramRutAya# jAtamagnimityAha̍ vaiśvAnaraṃ hi dEvatayA&&yuruBayatO̍# vaiśvAnarO gRuhyatE tasmAduBayata̍ḥ̍ prAṇA adhastA̱-ccOpariṣṭA-ccArddhinO&nyE̍ grahA# gRuhyantE&rddhI dhruvastasmA-̍ [ ] 6

verses.padam: - Padam arddhi|avA~g|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|anyEṣA̱m|prAṇAnAmiti# pra - anAnA̱m|upO̱pta ityupa# - uptE|anyE|grahA̱ḥ|sAdyantE̱|anupOpta̍ ityanupa̍ - uptE|dhruvaḥ|tasmA̱t|asthnA|anyAḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|pratitiṣṭhantIti# prati - tiṣṭhanti|mAṃqsEna̍|anyAḥ|asu̍rAḥ|vai|uttarata̍ ityut̍ - tarataḥ|pRuthivIm|paryAcikIṛṣanniti̍# pari - AcikIṛṣann|tAm|dEvAḥ|dhruvEṇa̍|adRuhann|tat|dhruvasya̍|dhruvatvamiti̍# dhruva - tvam|yat|dhruvaḥ|uttarata ityut̍ - tarataḥ|sAdyatE̱|dhRutyai̱|Ayuḥ|vai|Etat|yajñasya̍|yat|dhruvaḥ|AtmA|hOtA̱|yat|hOtRucamasa̍ iti# hOtRu - camasE|dhruvam|avanayatItyava̍ - nayati|Atmann|Eva|yajñasya̍|7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -darddhyavA̱~g prAṇO̱&nyEṣA̱M prAṇAnAmupO̱ptE&nyE grahA̱ḥ sAdyantE&nupOptE̍ dhruvastasmA-dasthnAnyAḥ̍ prajAḥ pratitiṣṭha̍nti̍ mAṃqsEnAnyA asurA̍ vA uttarataḥ̍ pRuthivIM̍ paryAcikIṛṣan̍ tAM dEvA dhruvEṇAdRuṃhan̍ tad dhruvasya# dhruvatvaM ~Myad dhruva uttarataḥ̍ sAdyatE dhRutyA AyurvA Etad-yajñasya yad dhruva AtmA hOtA yaddhOtRucamasE̍ dhruva-mavanaya̍tyAtmannEva̍ yajñasyA- [ ] 7

verses.padam: - Padam Ayuḥ|dadhAti|purastA̱t|ukthasya̍|avanIya̍ ityava̍ - nIyaḥ|iti̍|Ahuḥ|purastA̱t|hi|Ayu̍ṣaḥ|Bu~gktE|maddhyataḥ|avanIya̍ ityava̍ - nIyaḥ|iti̍|Ahuḥ|maddhyamEna̍|hi|Ayu̍ṣaḥ|Bu~gktE|uttarAd^^rdha̍ ityuttara̍ - ad^^rdhE|avanIya ityava̍ - nIyaḥ|iti̍|Ahuḥ|uttamEnEtyu̍t̍ - tamEna|hi|Ayu̍ṣaḥ|Bu~gktE|vaiśvadEvyAmiti̍# vaiśva - dEvyAm|Ruci|śasyamAnAyAm|avEti̍|nayati|vaiśvadEvya̍# iti# vaiśva - dEvyaḥ|vai|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|prajAsviti# pra - jAsu|Eva|Ayu̍ḥ|dadhAti||8̍ (39) (dhruvastasmA# - dEva yajñasyai - kAnnacatvAriṃqśacca̍)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: -yurdadhAti̍ purastAdukthasyA̍vanIya̍ ityAhuḥ̍ purastAddhyAyuṣO̍ Bu~gktE maddhyatO̍&vanIya̍ ityAhurmaddhyamEna̍ hyAyuṣO̍ Bu~gkta uttarArddhE̍&vanIya̍ ityAhuruttamEna̍ hyAyuṣO̍ Bu~gktE vai̱śvadEvyAmRuci śasyamAnAyAmava̍# nayati vaiśvadEvyO# vai prajAḥ prajAsvEvA&&*yurdadhAti||8̍ (dhruvastasmA# - dEva yajñasyai - kAnnacatvAriṃqśacca̍)̍

verses.padam: - Padam yajñEna|vai|dEvAḥ|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Ayann|tE|amanyanta|manuṣyA̱ḥ|naḥ|anvABaviṣyantItya̍nu-ABa̍viṣyanti|iti̍|tE|saM~MvathsarEṇEti̍# saM - vathsarEṇa|yOpayitvA|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Ayann|tam|Ruṣayaḥ|RutugrahairityRu̍tu̍ - grahaiḥ|Eva|anu|prEti̍|ajAnann|yat|RutugrahA̍ ityRutu̍ - grahAḥ|gRuhyantE̱|suvargasEti# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|prajñA̱tyA̍ iti pra - jñAtyai|dvAdaśa|gRuhyantE|dvAda̍śa|mAsA̱ḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|saM~MvathsarasyEti# saM - vathsarasya|prajñA̱tyA̍ iti pra - jñAtyai|saha|prathamau|gRuhyEtE iti|saha|uttamAvitu̍t̍ - tamau|tasmA̱t|dvaudvAviti dvau - dvau|RutU iti|uBayatO̍muKamityu̍Bayata̍ḥ̍ - muKam|RutupAtramityRutu̍ - pAtram|Bavati|kaḥ|9 (50)
verses.samhita: yajñEna vai dEvAḥ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyan̍ tE&manyanta̍ manuṣyA# nO&nvABaviṣyantIti̍ tE saM~MvathsarEṇa̍# yOpayitvA suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyan̍ tamRuṣaya̍ RutugrahairEvAnu prAjAnana.̍ yadRutugrahA̍ gRuhyantE# suvargasya# lOkasya prajñA̱tyai dvAdaśa̍ gRuhyantE dvAdaśa̍ mAsA̱ḥ saM~Mvathsaraḥ saM~Mvathsarasya̍ prajñA̱tyai saha prathamau̍ gRuhyEtE̍ sahOttamau tasmAd dvaudvAvRutU̍ uBayatO̍muKa-mRutupAtraM̍ Bavati̍ kO- [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam hi|tat|vEda|yata̍ḥ|RutUnAm|muKa̱m|RutunA̱|prEti̍|iṣya|iti̍|ṣaṭ|kRutva̍ḥ|Aha|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutava̍ḥ|RutUn|Eva|prIṇAti|RutuBirityRutu̍ - Biḥ|iti|catuḥ|catu̍ṣpada̍ iti catuḥ̍ - padaḥ|Eva|paśUn|prIṇAti|dviḥ|punaḥ|RutunA̱|Aha|dvipada̍ iti# dvi - padaḥ|Eva|prIṇAti|RutunA̱|prEti̍|iṣya|iti̍|ṣaṭ|kRutva̍ḥ|Aha|RutuBirityRutu̍ - Biḥ|iti|catuḥ|tasmA̱t|catu̍ṣpAda̍ iti catuḥ̍ - pAdaḥ|paśavaḥ|RutUn|upEti̍|jIvanti|dviḥ|10̍ (50)
verses.samhita: hi tad-vEda yata# RutUnAM muKamRutunA̍ prEṣyEti ṣaṭ kRutva# Aha ṣaḍvA Rutava# RutUnEva prIṇAtyRutuBiriti̍# catuścatuṣpada̍ Eva paśUn prIṇAti̍ dviḥ punaṛRutunA̍&&ha̍ dvipada# Eva prIṇAtyRutunA̍ prEṣyEti ṣaṭ kRutva# AhartuBiriti# catustasmA-ccatuṣpAdaḥ̍ paśava# RutUnupa# jIvanti dviḥ- [ ] 10

verses.padam: - Padam punaḥ|RutunA̱|Aha|tasmA̱t|dvipAda̍ iti# dvi - pAdaḥ|catu̍ṣpada̍ iti catuḥ̍ - padaḥ|paśUn|upEti|jIvanti|RutunA̱|prEti̍|iṣya|iti̍|ṣaṭ|kRutva̍ḥ|Aha|RutuBirityRutu̍ - Biḥ|iti|catuḥ|dviḥ|puna̍ḥ|RutunA̱|Aha|Akrama̍ṇamityA̱̍ - kramaṇam|Eva|tat|sEtu̱m|yaja̍mAnaḥ|kurutE|suvargasEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|sama̍ṣṭyA̍ iti saM - aṣṭyai|na|anyaḥ|anyam|anu|prEti̍|padyEta|yat|anyaḥ|anyam|anuprapadyEtEtya̍nu̍ - prapadyEta|Rutuḥ|Rutum|anu̍|prEti̍|padyEta|Rutava̍ḥ|mOhu̍kAḥ|syuḥ|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: punaṛRutunA̍&&ha̍ tasmA̱d-dvipAdaścatuṣpadaḥ̍ paśUnupa# jIvantyRutunA prEṣyEti ṣaṭ kRutva# AhartuBiriti# caturdviḥ punar̍ RutunA&&hA̍ &&kramaṇamEva̍ tath sEtuM ~MyajamAnaḥ̍ kurutE suvargasya# lOkasya samaṣṭyai̍ nAnyO̱&nyamanu prapadyEta̍ yadanyO̱&nyamanu̍ prapadyEtartuṛ̍ Rutumanu prapadyEtartavO̍ mOhukAḥ̍ syuḥ- [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam prasiddhamiti̍ pra - siddham|Eva|addhvaryuḥ|dakṣiṇEna|prEti̍|padyatE|prasi̍ddhamiti̍ pra - siddham|pratiprasthAtEti# prati-prasthAtA|uttarEṇEtyut-tarEṇa|tasmA̱t|Adityaḥ|ṣaṭ|mAsaḥ|dakṣi̍ṇEna|Eti|ṣaṭ|utta̍rEṇEtyut-tarEṇa|upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma-gRuhItaḥ|asi|saṃqsarpa̍ iti# saM - sarpaḥ|asi|aṃqhaspatyAyEtyaṃ̍haḥ̍ - patyAya|tvA|iti̍|Aha|asti̍|trayOdaśa̍ iti# trayaḥ - daśaḥ|mAsaḥ|iti̍|Ahuḥ|tam|Eva|tat|prIṇAti||12̍ (34) (kO - jIvanti̍ dviḥ - syu - ścatustriṃśacca)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: prasiddhamEvA-ddhvaryurdakṣi̍ṇEna̍ prapadyatE̍ prasiddhaM̍ pratiprasthAtOttarEṇa̍ tasmAdAdityaḥ̍ ṣaṇmAsO dakṣiṇEnaiti̍ ṣaḍuttarEṇO-payAmagRu̍hItO&si̍ saṃq sarpO̱&syaṃhaspatyAya tvEtyAhAsti# trayOdaśO mAsa ityAhustamEva̍ tat prIṇAti||12̍ (kO - jIvanti̍ dviḥ - syu - ścatustriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam suvargAyEti# suvaḥ - gAya|vai|EtE|lOkAya̍|gRuhyantE|yat|RutugrahA̍ ityRutu̍ - grahAḥ|jyOtiḥ|indrAgnI̍ itI̱ndra - agnI|yat|aindrAgnamityai̱ndra - agnam|RutupAtrEṇEtyRutu̍ - pAtrEṇa|gRuhṇAti̍|jyOti̍ḥ|Eva|asmai|upari̍ṣṭAt|dadhAti|suvargasEti̍# suvaḥ-gasya|lOkasya̍|anu̍KyAtyA̍ ityanu# - KyAtyai|OjOBRutAvityOjaḥ̍ - BRutau̱|vai|Etau|dEvAnA̱m|yat|indrAgnI itI̱ndra - agnI|yat|aindrAgna ityai̱ndra-agnaḥ|gRuhyatE̱|Ojaḥ|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|vaiśvadEvamiti̍# vaiśva - dEvam|śukrapAtrEṇEti# śukra - pAtrEṇa|gRuhṇAti|vaiśvadEvya̍# iti# vaiśva - dEvyaḥ|vai|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|asau|Adityaḥ|śukraḥ|yat|vaiśvadEvamiti# vaiśva - dEvam|śukrapAtrEṇEti# śukra - pAtrEṇa|gRuhṇAti̍|tasmA̱t|asau|Adityaḥ|13̍ (50)
verses.samhita: suvargAya vA EtE lOkAya# gRuhyantE yadRutugrahA̍ jyOtirindrAgnI̍ yadai̱ndrAgnamRutupAtrEṇa̍# gRuhṇAti jyOtirEvAsmA̍# upariṣṭAd-dadhAti̍ suvargasya# lOkasyAnuKyAtyA̍ OjOBRutau vA Etau dEvAnAM ~MyadindrAgnI̍ yadai̱ndrAgnO gRuhyata Oja# EvAva# rundhE vaiśvadEvaṃ śukrapAtrEṇa̍# gRuhṇAti vaiśvadEvyO# vai prajA asAvAdityaḥ̍ śukrO yad-vai̱śvadEvaṃśukrapAtrEṇa̍# gRuhṇAti tasmAdasAvA̍dityaḥ-̍ [ ] 13

verses.padam: - Padam sarvA̱ḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|pratya~g|uditi|Eti|tasmA̱t|sarva̍ḥ|Eva|manyatE|mAm|prati̍|uditi̍|agAt|iti̍|vaiśvadEvamiti̍# vaiśva - dEvam|śukrapAtrEṇEti# śukra-pAtrEṇa|gRuhṇAti|vaiśvadEvya̍# iti# vaiśva - dEvyaḥ|vai|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|tEjaḥ|śukraḥ|yat|vaiśvadEvamiti̍# vaiśva - dEvam|śukrapAtrEṇEti# śukra - pAtrEṇa|gRuhṇAti̍|prajAsviti̍# pra - jAsu|Eva|tEja̍ḥ|dadhAti||14̍ (30) (tasmAdasAvA̍ditya̍ - striṃqśacca)̍ (A4)
verses.samhita: sarvA̱ḥ prajAḥ pratya~g~gudEti̍ tasmAth sarva# Eva manyatE̍ mAM pratyudagAditi̍# vaiśvadEvaṃ śukrapAtrEṇa̍# gRuhṇAti vaiśvadEvyO# vai prajAstEjaḥ̍ śukrO yad-vai̱śvadEvaṃ śukrapAtrEṇa̍# gRuhṇAti# prajAsvEva tEjO# dadhAti||14 (tasmAdasAvA̍ditya̍ - striṃqśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam indraḥ|marudBiriti̍# marut - Biḥ|sAM~MvidyEnEti̍ sAM - vidyEna|mAddhyandinE|sava̍nE|vRutram|ahann|yat|mAddhya̍ndinE|sava̍nE|marutvatIyA̱ḥ|gRuhyantE̱|vArtra̍GnA̍ iti vArtra# - GnAḥ|Eva|tE|yajamAnasya|gRuhyantE|tasya̍|vRutram|jaGnuṣa̍ḥ|Rutava̍ḥ|amuhyann|saḥ|RutupAtrEṇEtyRu̍tu̍ - pAtrEṇa|marutvatIyAn̍|agRuhṇAt|tata̍ḥ|vai|saḥ|RutUn|prEti̍|ajAnAt|yat|RutupAtrEṇEtyRu̍tu-pAtrEṇa̍|marutvatIyA̱ḥ|gRuhyantE̱|RutUnAm|prajñA̱tyA̍ iti pra-jñAtyai|vajra̱m|vai|Etam|yajamAnaḥ|BrAtRu̍vyAya|prEti̍|harati|yat|marutvatIyA̱ḥ|uditi̍|Eva|prathamEna̍|15̍ (50)
verses.samhita: indrO# marudBiḥ sAM~MvidyEna̍ mAddhyandinE̍ savanE̍ vRutramahanq.̍ yanmAddhyandinE̍ savanE̍ marutvatIyA# gRuhyantE vArtraGnA̍ Eva tE yajamAnasya̍ gRuhyantE tasya# vRutraM jaGnuṣa# RutavO&muhyanthsa̍ RutupAtrEṇa̍# marutvatIyAnagRuhṇAt̍ tatO vai sa RutUn prAjAnAd-yadRu̍tupAtrEṇa̍# marutvatIyA# gRuhyanta# RutUnAM prajñA̱tyai vajraM ~MvA EtaM ~MyajamAnO̍ BrAtRuvyAya̍ pra harati̍ yanmarutvatIyA̍ udEva prathamEna̍-̍ [ ] 15

verses.padam: - Padam yacCati|prEti|harati|dvitIyE̍na|stRuṇutE|tRutIyE̍na|Ayu̍dham|vai|Etat|yaja̍mAnaḥ|samiti̍|kurutE|yat|marutvatIyA̱ḥ|dhanu̍ḥ|Eva|prathamaḥ|jyA|dvitIya̍ḥ|iṣu̍ḥ|tRutIya̍ḥ|pratIti̍|Eva|prathamEna̍|dhattE|vIti̍|sRujati|dvitIyE̍na|viddhya̍ti|tRutIyE̍na|indra̍ḥ|vRutram|hatvA|parA̱m|parAvatamiti̍# parA - vata̱m|agacCat|apEti|arAdham|iti̍|manya̍mAnaḥ|saḥ|hari̍taḥ|aBavat|saḥ|EtAn|marutvatIyAn̍|Atmaspara̍ṇAnityA̱tma̍ - sparaṇAn|apaśyat|tAn|agRuhṇIta|16̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yacCati pra harati̍ dvitIyEna̍ stRuṇutE tRutIyEnA&&*yudhaM̍ ~MvA Etad-yajamAnaḥ̍ saṅ skurutE̍ yanmarutvatIyA̍ dhanurEva̍ prathamO̍ jyA dvitIya iṣustRutIyaḥ̍ pratyEva prathamEna̍# dhattE visRujati̍ dvitIyEna̍ viddhyati̍ tRutIyEnEndrO# vRutraṃ hatvA parA̱M parAvata-magacCa-dapA̍rAdhamiti̍ manyamAnaḥ̍ sa haritO&Bavath̍ sa EtAn marutvatIyA̍-nAtmaspara̍ṇA-napaśyat̍ tAnagRuhṇIta-̍ [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam prAṇamiti# pra - anam|Eva|prathamEna|aspRuṇuta|apAnamitya̍pa̍ - anam|dvitIyEna|AtmAna̱m|tRutIyE̍na|Atmaspara̍ṇA̍ ityA̱tma - sparaṇAḥ|vai|EtE|yaja̍mAnasya|gRuhyantE|yat|marutvatIyA̱ḥ|prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|Eva|prathamEna|spRuṇutE|apAnamitya̍pa-anam|dvitIyE̍na|AtmAna̱m|tRutIyE̍na|indra̍ḥ|vRutram|ahann|tam|dEvAḥ|abruvann|mahAn|vai|ayam|aBUt|yaḥ|vRutram|ava̍dhIt|iti̍|tat|mahEndrasyEti̍# mahA - indrasya|mahEndratvamiti̍# mahEndra - tvam|saḥ|Etam|mAhEndramiti# mAhA - indram|uddhAramityut̍ - hAram|uditi|aharata|vRutram|hatvA|anyAsu̍|dEvatA̍su̍ ( )|adhIti|yat|mAhEndra̍ iti# mAhA - indraḥ|gRuhyatE̱|uddhAramityut̍ - hAram|Eva|tam|yajamAnaḥ|uditi̍|haratE|anyAsu̍|prajAsviti̍# pra-jAsu|adhIti̍|śukrapAtrEṇEti̍# śukra - pAtrEṇa|gRuhṇAti|yajamAnadEvatya̍# iti# yajamAna - dEvatyaḥ|vai|mAhEndra̍ iti# mAhA - indraḥ|tEjaḥ|śukraḥ|yat|mAhEndramiti̍# mAhA - indram|śukrapAtrEṇEti# śukra - pAtrEṇa|gRuhṇAti̍|yaja̍mAnE|Eva|tEja̍ḥ|dadhAti||17̍ (78) (prathamEnA# - gRuhṇIta - dEvatA̱sva - ṣṭAviṃśatiśca)̍ (A5)
verses.samhita: prAṇamEva prathamEnA̱-spRuṇutApAnaM̍ dvitIyEnA&&tmAna̍M̍ tRutIyEnA&&tmaspara̍ṇA̍ vA EtE yajamAnasya̍ gRuhyantE yanmarutvatIyA̱ḥ̍ prAṇamEva prathamEna̍# spRuṇutE&pAnaM dvitIyEnA&&*tmAna̍M̍ tRutIyEnEndrO# vRutramahan̍ taM dEvA abruvan̍ mahAn. vA ayamaBUdyO̍ vRutramavadhIditi̍ tanmahEndrasya̍# mahEndratvaṃ sa EtaM mAhEndra-mu̍ddhAra-muda̍harata̍ vRutraṃ hatvA&nyAsu# dEvatAsva ( ) dhi yanmAhEndrO̍ gRuhyata# uddhAramEva taM ~MyajamAna̍ uddharatE&nyAsu̍# prajAsvadhi# śukrapAtrEṇa# gRuhṇAti yajamAnadEvatyO# vai mAhEndrastEja̍ḥ̍ śukrO yanmAhEndraṃ̍ śukrapAtrEṇa̍# gRuhṇAti yajamAna̍ Eva tEjO# dadhAti||17 (prathamEnA# - gRuhṇIta - dEvatA̱sva - ṣṭAviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam aditiḥ|putrakAmEti̍# putra - kAmA|sAddhyEByaḥ|dEvEBya̍ḥ|brahmaudanamiti̍# brahma - Odanam|apacat|tasyai̱|ucCEṣaṇamityu̍t-śEṣa̍ṇam|adaduḥ|tat|prEti̍|aśnAt|sA|rEta̍ḥ|adhatta|tasyai̱|catvAra̍ḥ|AdityAḥ|ajAyanta|sA|dvitIya̱m|apacat|sA|amanyata|ucCEṣa̍ṇAdityu̍t̍ - śEṣaṇAt|mE|imE|ajñata|yat|agrE̱|prAśiṣyAmIti̍# pra - aśiṣyAmi|itaḥ|mE|vasI̍yAṃsaḥ|janiṣyantE|iti̍|sA|agrE̱|prEti̍|aśnAt|sA|rEta̍ḥ|adhatta|tasyai̱|vyRu̍ddhamiti̍ vi - Ruddham|Aṇḍam|ajAyata|sA|AdityEByaḥ|Eva|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: aditiḥ̍ putrakAmA̍ sAddhyEByO# dEvEByO̱ brahmaudanamapacat̍ tasyA# ucCEṣaṇamadadustat̍ prAśnAth sA rEtO&dhatta̍ tasyai# catvAra# AdityA ajAyanta̍ sA dvitIyamapacath̍ sA&manyatOcCEṣa̍ṇAnma̍ imE̱&jñata yadagrE̱ prAśiṣyAmItO mE vasIyAṃsO̍ janiṣyanta iti sA&grE prAśnAth sA rEtO&dhatta̍ tasyai vyRuddhamAṇḍama̍jAyata̍ sA&&dityEBya# Eva- [ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam tRutIya̱m|apacat|BOgAya|mE|idam|śrAntam|astu|iti̍|tE|abruvann|vara̱m|vRuṇAmahai|yaḥ|ata̍ḥ|jAyA̍tai|asmAka̱m|saḥ|Eka̍ḥ|asat|yaḥ|asya|prajAyAmiti̍# pra - jAyA̱m|RuddhyAtai|asmAka̱m|BOgA̍ya|BavAt|iti̍|tata̍ḥ|viva̍svAn|Adityaḥ|ajAyata|tasya̍|vai|iyam|prajEti̍# pra - jA|yat|manuṣyA̱ḥ|tAsu|Eka̍ḥ|Eva|Ruddhaḥ|yaḥ|yaja̍tE|saḥ|dEvAnA̱m|BOgA̍ya|Bavati|dEvAḥ|vai|yajñAt|19̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tRutIyamapacad-BOgA̍ya̍ ma idaṅ śrAntamastviti tE̱&bruvan varaM̍ ~MvRuṇAmahai yO&tO jAyAtA̍ asmAkaṃq sa EkO&sadyO̱&sya̍ prajAyAmRuddhyAtA̍ asmAkaM BOgAya̍ BavAditi tatO vivasvAnAdityO̍# &jAyata tasya vA iyaM prajA yanmanuṣyA̱stAsvEka̍# EvarddhO yO yajatE̍ sa dEvAnAM BOgAya̍ Bavati dEvA vai yajñA- [ ] 19

verses.padam: - Padam rudram|antaḥ|Ayann|saḥ|AdityAn|anvAkramatEtya̍nu̍ - Akramata|tE|dvidEvatyA̍niti̍# dvi - dEvatyAn|prEti̍|apadyanta|tAn|na|prati̍|prEti̍|ayacCann|tasmA̱t|apIti̍|vaddhya̱m|prapa̍nnamiti̍ pra - pannam|na|prati|prEti̍|yacCanti|tasmA̱t|dvidEvatyE̱Bya̍ iti# dvi - dEvatyE̱Byaḥ|Adityaḥ|niriti|gRuhyatE|yat|ucCEṣa̍ṇAdityu̍t̍ - śEṣaṇAt|ajA̍yanta|tasmA̱t|ucCEṣa̍ṇAdityu̍t̍ - śEṣaṇAt|gRuhyatE|tisRuBiriti̍# tisRu - Biḥ|RugBirityRuk̍ - Biḥ|gRuhṇAti|mAtA|pitA|putraḥ|tat|Eva|tat|mithunam|ulba̱m|garBaḥ|jarAyu̍|tat|Eva|tat|20̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -drudra-mantarAyanth̍ sa AdityAnanvAkra̍mata̍ tE dvidEvatyA̱n̍ prApadyanta̍ tAn na prati prAyacCan̍ tasmAdapi vaddhyaM prapannaM̍ na prati prayacCanti̍ tasmA̱d dvidEvatyE̱Bya AdityO nirgRuhyatE̍ yaducCEṣaṇA-dajA̍yanta̍ tasmAducCEṣa̍ṇAd-gRuhyatE̍ tisRuBiṛ̍ RugBirgRuhṇAti̍ mAtA pitA putrastadEva tanmithunamulbaM̍ garBO# jarAyu tadEva tan- [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam mithunam|paśavaḥ|vai|EtE|yat|Adityaḥ|Urk|dadhi̍|daddhnA|maddhyataḥ|śrIṇAti|Urja̱m|Eva|paśUnAm|maddhyataḥ|dadhAti|śRutAta~gkyE̍nEti̍# śRuta - Ata~gkyEna|mEddhyatvAyEti̍# mEddhya - tvAya|tasmA̱t|AmA|pakvam|duhE|paśava̍ḥ|vai|EtE|yat|Adityaḥ|pariśrityEti̍# pari - śritya|gRuhṇAti|pratiruddhyEti̍# prati - ruddhya|Eva|asmai|paśUn|gRuhṇAti|paśava̍ḥ|vai|EtE|yat|Adityaḥ|Eṣaḥ|rudraḥ|yat|agniḥ|pariśrityEti̍# pari - śritya|gRuhṇAti|rudrAt|Eva|paśUn|antaḥ|dadhAti|21̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -mithunaM̍ paśavO vA EtE yadAditya̍ Urgdadhi# daddhnA maddhyataḥ̍ śrIṇAtyUrja̍mEva̍ paśUnAM̍ maddhyatO̍ dadhAti̍ śRutAta~gkyEna̍ mEddhyatvAya tasmAdAmA̍ pakvaM duhE̍ paśavO vA EtE yadAdityaḥ̍ pariśritya̍# gRuhṇAti pratiruddhyaivAsmai# paśUn gRuhṇAti̍ paśavO vA EtE yadAditya̍ Eṣa rudrO yadagniḥ pariśritya̍# gRuhṇAti rudrAdEva paśUnantardadhA-̍ [ ] 21

verses.padam: - Padam Eṣaḥ|vai|vivasvAn|Adityaḥ|yat|upAṃqśusava̍na̍ ityupAṃśu̍ - savanaḥ|saḥ|Etam|Eva|sOmapIthamiti̍# sOma - pItham|parIti|śayE|Eti̍|tRutIyasavanAditi̍# tRutIya-savanAt|vivasvaḥ|Aditya|Eṣaḥ|tE|sOmapItha̍ iti# sOma - pIthaḥ|iti|Aha|viva̍svantam|Eva|Adityam|sOmapIthEnEti̍# sOma - pIthEna|samiti̍|ad^^rdhayati|yA|divyA|vRuṣṭi̍ḥ|tayA̱|tvA|śrIṇAmi|iti̍|vRuṣṭi̍kAmasyEti̍ vRuṣṭi# - kAmasya|śrIṇIyAt|vRuṣṭi̱m|Eva|avEti|rundhE|yadi̍|tAjak|praskandEditi̍# pra - skandE̱t|vaṛṣukaḥ|parjanya̍ḥ|syAt|yadi̍|ciram|ava̍ṛṣukaḥ|na̍ ( )|sAdayati|asannAt|hi|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|prajAyanta̍ iti# pra - jAyantE|na|anviti̍|vaṣa̍ṭ|karOti|yat|anuvaṣaṭkuryAditya̍nu̍ - vaṣaṭkuryAt|rudram|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|anvavasRujEditya̍nu̍ - avasRujEt|na|hutvA|anviti̍|IkṣEta|yat|anvIkṣEtEtya̍nu̍ - IkṣEta|cakṣu̍ḥ|asya|pramAyu̍kamiti̍# pra - mAyukam|syAt|tasmA̱t|na|anvIkṣya̍ ityanu̍ - Ikṣyaḥ||22̍ (77) (Eva - yajñA - jjarAyu tadEva tada - ntardadhAti̍ - na - saptaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A6)
verses.samhita: -tyEṣa vai vivasvAnAdityO̍ yadupAṃ̍ śusavanaḥ̍ sa EtamEva sOmapIthaM̍ pari# śaya A tRutIyasavanAd-viva̍sva̍ Adityaiṣa tE# sOmapItha ityAha̍ vivasvantamEvA&&*dityaṃ̍ sOmapIthEna̍ samarddhayati̍ yA divyA vRuṣṭistayA̱ tvA śrIṇAmIti vRuṣṭikAmasya̍ śrIṇIyAd-vRuṣṭimEvAva̍# rundhE yadi# tAjak praskandEd-vaṛṣukaḥ̍ parjanyaḥ̍ syAdyadi# ciramavaṛṣukO̍ na ( ) sAdayatyasa̍nnAddhi̍ prajAḥ prajAyantE̍ nAnu vaṣaṭ̍ karOti yadanuvaṣaṭkuryAd̍ -rudraM prajA anvavasRujEnna̍ hutvAnvI̱kṣEta yadanvIkṣEta̍ cakṣurasya̍ pramAyukaṅ̍ syAt tasmAnnAnvIkṣyaḥ||22̍ (Eva - yajñA - jjarAyu tadEva tada - ntardadhAti̍ - na - saptaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam antaryAmapAtrEṇEtyantaryAma̍ - pAtrEṇa|sAvitram|AgrayaṇAt|gRuhṇAti|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|Agrayaṇaḥ|prajAnAmiti# pra - jAnA̱m|prajananAyEti̍# pra - jananAya|na|sAdayati|asa̍nnAt|hi|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|prajAyanta̍ iti# pra - jAyantE|na|anviti̍|vaṣa̍ṭ|karOti|yat|anuvaṣaṭkuryAditya̍nu̍ - vaṣaṭkuryAt|rudram|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|anvavasRujEditya̍nu̍ - avasRujEt|Eṣaḥ|vai|gAyatraḥ|dEvAnA̱m|yat|savitA|Eṣaḥ|gAyatriyai|lOkE|gRuhyatE|yat|Agrayaṇaḥ|yat|antaryAmapAtrEṇEtya̍ntaryAma̍ - pAtrEṇa|sAvitram|AgrayaṇAt|gRuhṇAti̍|svAt|Eva|Enam|yOnE̱ḥ|niriti̍|gRuhṇAti|viśvE̱|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: antaryAmapAtrEṇa# sAvitramA̱grayaṇAd-gRuhṇAti̍ prajApatirvA̍ Eṣa yadA̱grayaṇaḥ prajAnA̱M prajananAya̍ na sAdayatyasa̍nnAddhi̍ prajAḥ prajAyantE̍ nAnu vaṣaṭ̍ karOti yadanuvaṣaṭkuryAd-rudraM̍ prajA anvavasRujEdEṣa̍ vai gAyatrO̍ dEvAnAM ~Myath savitaiṣa̍ gAyatriyai̍ lOkE gRuhyatE̍ yadA̱grayaṇO yadantaryAmapAtrEṇa̍# sAvitramA̱grayaṇAd-gRuhṇAti svAdEvainaM ~MyOnErnirgRuhṇAti̍ viśvE-̍ [ ] 23

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAḥ|tRutIya̱m|savanam|na|uditi̍|ayacCan|tE|savitAra̱m|prAtassavanaBA̍gamiti̍# prAtassavana - BAgam|santa̱m|tRutIyasavanamiti# tRutIya-savanam|aBi|parIti|anayann|tata̍ḥ|vai|tE|tRutIya̱m|sava̍nam|uditi̍|ayacCann|yat|tRutIyasavana̍ iti# tRutIya - savanE|sAvitraḥ|gRuhyatE̱|tRutIyasya|sava̍nasya|udya̍tyA̍ ityut - yatyai|savitRupAtrEṇEti# savitRu-pAtrEṇa|vaiśvadEvamiti̍# vaiśva - dEvam|kalaśA̱t|gRuhṇAti|vaiśvadEvya# iti# vaiśva - dEvyaḥ|vai|prajA̍ iti# pra-jAḥ|vaiśvadEva iti# vaiśva-dEvaḥ|kalaśaḥ|savitA|prasavAnAmiti̍# pra - savAnA̱m|IśE|yat|savitRupAtrEṇEti# savitRu - pAtrEṇa|vaiśvadEvamiti̍# vaiśva - dEvam|kalaśA̱t|gRuhṇAti|savitRupra̍sUta̍ iti# savitRu - prasUtaḥ|Eva|asmai|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|prEti|24̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvAstRutIyaṃq savanaM̍ nOdayacCan̍ tE savitAra̍M̍ prAtassavanaBAgaṃq̍ santaM̍ tRutIyasavanamaBi paryaṇayan̍ tatO vai tE tRutIyaṃq savanamuda̍yacCanq.̍ yat tRutIyasavanE̍ sAvitrO̍ gRuhyatE# tRutIyasya̍ savanasyOdya̍tyai̍ savitRupAtrEṇa# vaiśvadEvaM kalaśA̱d-gRuhṇAti vaiśvadEvyO# vai prajA vai̱śvadEvaḥ kalaśaḥ̍ savitA prasavAnA̍mIśE̍ yath savitRupAtrEṇa̍# vaiśvadEvaM kalaśA̱d-gRuhṇAti# savitRuprasUta̍ EvAsmai̱ prajAḥ pra- [ ] 24

verses.padam: - Padam janayati|sOmE̱|sOma̱m|aBIti|gRuhṇAti|rEta̍ḥ|Eva|tat|dadhAti|suśarmEti̍# su - śarmA̱|asi|supratiṣṭhAna iti# su - pratiṣṭhAnaḥ|iti|Aha|sOmE̱|hi|sOma̱m|aBigRuhṇAtItya̍Bi̍ - gRuhṇAti|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|Etasminn|vai|apIti̍|grahE̱|manuṣyE̱Byaḥ|dEvEBya̍ḥ|pitRuBya̍ iti# pitRu - Byaḥ|kriyatE|suśarmEti# su - śarmA̱|asi|supratiṣṭhAna iti# su - pratiṣṭhAnaḥ|iti|Aha|manuṣyE̱Byaḥ|Eva|EtEna̍|karOti|bRuhat|iti̍|Aha|dEvEBya̍ḥ|Eva|EtEna̍|karOti|nama̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|pitRuBya̍ iti# pitRu - Byaḥ|Eva|EtEna|karOti̍ ( )|EtAvatIḥ|vai|dEvatA̱ḥ|tABya̍ḥ|Eva|Enam|sarvA̱Byaḥ|gRuhṇAti|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|viśvE̱Byaḥ|tvA|dEvEBya̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|vaiśvadEva̍ iti# vaiśva - dEvaḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ||25 (69) (viśvE - pra - pitRuBya# EvaitEna# karOtyE - kAnnaviṃśatiśca̍)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: janayati̍ sOmE sOmamaBi̍ gRuhṇAti̍ rEta# Eva tad-dadhAti̍ suśarmA&si̍ supratiṣṭhAna ityAha̍ sOmE hi sOmamaBigRuhṇAti̍ pratiṣṭhityA̍ Etasmin vA api grahE# manuṣyE̱ByO dEvEByaḥ̍ pitRuByaḥ̍ kriyatE suśarmA&si̍ supratiṣṭhAna ityAha̍ manuṣyE̱Bya EvaitEna# karOti bRuhadityAha̍ dEvEBya# EvaitEna# karOti nama ityAha̍ pitRuBya# EvaitEna# karOtyE ( ) tAvatI̍ rvai dEvatAstABya# Evainaṃq sarvA̱ByO gRuhṇAtyEṣa tE yOnirviśvE̱ByastvA dEvEBya ityAha̍ vaiśvadEvO hyEṣaḥ||25̍ (viśvE - pra - pitRuBya# EvaitEna# karOtyE - kAnnaviṃśatiśca̍)̍

verses.padam: - Padam prAṇa iti# pra - anaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|upAṃqśurityupa-aṃqśuḥ|yat|upAṃqśupAtrEṇEtyu̍pAṃśu̍ - pAtrEṇa|prathamaḥ|ca|uttama̍ ityut̍ - tamaḥ|ca|grahau̱|gRuhyEtE iti|prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|Eva|anviti|prayantIti̍# pra - yanti|prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|anu|uditi̍|yanti|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|Agrayaṇaḥ|prAṇa iti# pra - anaḥ|upAṃqśurityupa-aṃqśuḥ|patnI̱ḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|prEti|janayanti|yat|upAṃqśupAtrEṇEtyu̍pAṃśu̍ - pAtrEṇa|pAtnIvatamiti̍# pAtnI - vatam|AgrayaṇAt|gRuhṇAti|prajAnAmiti̍# pra - jAnA̱m|prajananAyEti̍# pra - jananAya|tasmA̱t|prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|prajA iti# pra-jAḥ|anu|prEti̍|jAyantE|dEvAḥ|vai|ita̍ ita̍ itItaḥ - itaḥ|patnI̱ḥ|suvargamiti# suvaḥ-gam|26 (50)
verses.samhita: prAṇO vA Eṣa yadupAṃqśu-ryadu̍pAṃśupAtrEṇa̍# prathamaścO̱ttamaśca grahau# gRuhyEtE̱ prAṇamEvAnu# prayanti# prAṇamanUdyanti̍ prajApatirvA̍ Eṣa yadA̱grayaṇaḥ prAṇa upAṃqśuḥ̍ patnI̱ḥ prajAḥ pra janayanti̍ yadupAṃśupAtrEṇa̍# pAtnIvatamA̱grayaṇAd-gRuhṇAti# prajAnA̱M prajananAya̍ tasmA̱t prAṇaM prajA anu pra jAyantE̍ dEvA vA ita itaḥ̍ patnI̱ḥ suvargaM- [ ] 26

verses.padam: - Padam lOkam|ajigAṃqsann|tE|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|na|prEti|ajAnann|tE|Etam|pAtnIvatamiti̍# pAtnI - vatam|apaśyann|tam|agRuhṇata|tataḥ|vai|tE|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|prEti|ajAnann|yat|pAtnIvata̍ iti# pAtnI - vataḥ|gRuhyatE̱|suvargasEti# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|prajñA̱tyA̍ iti pra - jñAtyai|saḥ|sOmaḥ|na|atiṣṭhata|strIByaḥ|gRuhyamA̍ṇaḥ|tam|GRutam|vajra̱m|kRutvA|aGnann|tam|niri̍ndriyamiti̍ niḥ - indriyam|BUtam|agRuhṇann|tasmA̱t|striyaḥ|niri̍ndriyA̍ iti niḥ-indriyAḥ|adAyAdIrityadA̍ya-adIḥ|apIti̍|pApAt|puṃqsaḥ|upa̍stitaramityupa̍sti̍ - taram|27 (50)
verses.samhita: ~MlOkamajigAṃsan̍ tE suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM na prAjAnan̍ ta EtaM pA̱tnIvatamapaśyan̍ tamagRuhṇata̍ tatO vai tE suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM prAjAnanq.̍ yat pA̱tnIvatO gRuhyatE# suvargasya# lOkasya prajñA̱tyai sa sOmO nAtiṣṭhata̍ strIByO gRuhyamAṇastaM̍ GRutaM ~MvajraM̍ kRutvA&Gnan taM nirindriyaM̍ BUtamagRuhṇan̍ tasmAth striyO nirindriyA̍ adAyAdIrapi̍# pApAt puṃqsa upastitaraM-̍ [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam vadanti|yat|GRutEna|pAtnIvatamiti̍# pAtnI - vatam|śrIṇAti|vajrE̍ṇa|Eva|Enam|vaśE̱|kRutvA|gRuhṇAti|upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|iti|Aha|iyam|vai|upayAma̍ ityupa̍ - yAmaḥ|tasmA̱t|imAm|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|anu|prEti̍|jAyantE|bRuhaspati̍sutasyEti̍ bRuhaspati-sutasya|tE|iti̍|Aha|brahma̍|vai|dEvAnA̱m|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|brahma̍ṇA|Eva|asmai|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|prEti|janayati|indO̍ iti|iti̍|Aha|rEta̍ḥ|vai|indu̍ḥ|rEta̍ḥ|Eva|tat|dadhAti|indriyAva̍ itI̱ndriya - vaḥ|iti|28̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ~Mvadanti yad-GRutEna# pAtnIvataṅ śrIṇAti vajrEṇaivainaM̍ ~MvaśE# kRutvA gRuhṇA-tyupayAmagRu̍hItO&sItyA̍hEyaM̍ ~MvA upayAmastasmA̍dimAM̍ prajA anu pra jAyantE̍ bRuhaspatisutasya̍ ta ityAha̍ brahma vai dEvAnAM bRuhaspatirbrahmaṇaivAsmai̱̍ prajAḥ pra janayatIndO̍ ityAha̍ rEtO vA indU rEta# Eva tad-dadhAtIndriyAva̍ i- [ ] 28

verses.padam: - Padam Aha|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|vai|indriyam|prajA iti# pra-jAḥ|Eva|asmai|prEti|janayati|agnA(3)̍ i|iti|Aha|agniḥ|vai|rEtOdhA̍ iti# rEtaḥ - dhAḥ|patnIva̍ iti patnI̱ - vaḥ|iti|Aha|mithunatvAyEti̍# mithuna-tvAya|sajUriti̍# sa - jUḥ|dEvEna|tvaṣṭrA̱|sOma̱m|piba|iti̍|Aha|tvaṣṭA̱|vai|paśUnAm|mithunAnA̱m|rUpakRuditi̍# rUpa - kRut|rUpam|Eva|paśuṣu|dadhAti|dEvAḥ|vai|tvaṣṭA̍ram|ajiGAṃqsann|saḥ|patnI̱ḥ|prEti̍|apadyata|tam|na|prati̍|prEti̍|ayacCann|tasmA̱t|apIti̍|29̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -tyAha̍ prajA vA indriyaM̍ prajA EvAsmai pra janayatyagnA(3)̍ ityAhAgnirvai̍ rEtOdhAḥ̍ patnIva̍ ityAha̍ mithunatvAya# sajUrdEvEna tvaṣṭrA sOmaM̍ pibEtyAha̍ tvaṣṭA vai paśUnAM̍ mithunAnAṃ̍# rUpakRud-rUpamEva paśuṣu# dadhAti dEvA vai tvaṣṭAramajiGAṃsanth̍ sa patnIḥ prApadyata̍ taM na prati prAyacCan̍ tasmAdapi- [ ] 29

verses.padam: - Padam vaddhya̱m|prapannamiti̍ pra - pannam|na|prati|prEti̍|yacCanti|tasmA̱t|pAtnIvata̍ iti# pAtnI - vatE|tvaṣṭrE̱|apIti|gRuhyatE|na|sAdayati|asa̍nnAt|hi|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|prajAyanta̍ iti# pra - jAyantE|na|anviti̍|vaṣa̍ṭ|karOti|yat|anuvaṣaṭkuryAditya̍nu̍ - vaṣaṭkuryAt|rudram|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|anvavasRujEditya̍nu̍ - avasRujEt|yat|na|anuvaṣaṭkuryAditya̍nu-vaṣaṭkuryAt|aśA̱ntam|agnIditya̍gni-it|sOma̱m|BakṣayEt|upAṅqśvityu̍pa̍ - aṃqśu|anviti|vaṣa̍ṭ|karOti|na|rudram|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|anvavasRujatItyanu̍ - avasRujati|śAntam|agnIditya̍gni̍ - it|sOma̱m|Bakṣayati|agnIdityagni# - it|nEṣṭuḥ|upasthamityupa̍ - stham|Eti|sIda|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vaddhyaM prapannaM̍ na prati prayacCanti̍ tasmA̱t pAtnIvatE tvaṣṭrE&pi# gRuhyatE na sAdayatyasa̍nnAddhi̍ prajAḥ prajAyantE̍ nAnu vaṣaṭ̍ karOti yadanuvaṣaṭ̍ kuryAd-rudraM prajA anvavasRujEd-yannAnu̍vaṣaṭkuryA-daśA̱nta-magnIth̍ sOmaM̍ BakṣayEdupAṅqśvanu vaṣaṭ̍ karOti na rudraM prajA anvavasRujati̍# śAntamagnIth sOmaM̍ BakṣayatyagnI-nnEṣṭurupasthamA̍ sIda-̍ [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam nEṣṭaḥ|patnI̱m|udAnayEtyu̍t̍ - Anaya|iti̍|Aha|agnIditya̍gni-it|Eva|nEṣṭa̍ri|rEta̍ḥ|dadhA̍ti|nEṣṭA̱|patni̍yAm|udgAtrEtyu̍t-gAtrA|samiti̍|KyApayati|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|udgAtEtyut̍ - gAtA|prajAnAmiti# pra - jAnA̱m|prajananAyEti̍# pra - jananAya|apaḥ|upa̍|prEti̍|vartayati|rEta̍ḥ|Eva|tat|si~jcati|UruṇA̱|upa̍|prEti̍|vartayati|UruṇA̱|hi|rEta̍ḥ|sicyatE̱|nagna~gkRutyEti̍# nagnam - kRutya|Urum|upa̍|prEti̍|vartayati|yadA|hi|nagnaḥ|Uruḥ|Bava̍ti|atha̍|mithunI̍ ( )|Bavataḥ|atha|rEta̍ḥ|sicyatE|atha̍|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|prEti|jAyantE||31̍ (58)
verses.samhita: nEṣṭaḥ patnI-mudAnayEtyA̍hA-gnIdEva̍ nEṣṭari̍ rEtO dadhAti̍ nEṣṭA patniyAmud-gAtrA̍ saM KyApayati̍ prajApatirvA̍ Eṣa yadudgAtA̍ prajAnA̱M prajananAyApa̍ upa pra vartayati̍ rEta# Eva tath si~jcatyUruṇOpa̍ pra vartayatyUruṇA̍ hi rEtaḥ̍ sicyatE# nagnaM kRutyO-rumupa pra vartayati̍ yadA hi nagna UrurBavatyatha# mithunI ( ) BavatO&tha̍ rEtaḥ̍ sicyatE&tha# prajAḥ pra jAyantE||31̍

verses.padam: - Padam indraḥ|vRutram|ahann|tasya̍|śIrq.ṣakapAlamiti̍# śIṛṣa-kapAlam|uditi|aubjat|saḥ|drOṇakalaśa̍ iti# drOṇa-kalaśaḥ|aBavat|tasmA̱t|sOmaḥ|samiti̍|asravat|saḥ|hAriyOjana̍ iti# hAri - yOjanaḥ|aBavat|tam|vIti|acikithsat|juhavAnI(3)|mA|hauṣA(3)m|iti̍|saḥ|amanyata|yat|hOṣyAmi̍|Amam|hOṣyAmi|yat|na|hOṣyAmi̍|yajñavEśasamiti̍# yajña - vEśasam|kariṣyAmi|iti|tam|addhriyata|hOtu̱m|saḥ|agniḥ|abravIt|na|mayi̍|Amam|hOṣyasi|iti̍|tam|dhAnABi̍ḥ|aśrIṇAt|32̍ (50)
verses.samhita: indrO# vRutramahan̍ tasya# śIṛṣakapAla-mudau̱bjath sa drOṇakalaśO̍&Bavat̍ tasmAth sOmaḥ samasravath̍ sa hAriyOjanO̍&Bavat̍ taM ~Mvyacikithsa-jjuhavAnI(3)̍ mA hauṣA(3)miti sO&manyata̍ yaddhOṣyAmyAmaṃ hO̱ṣyAmi yanna hOṣyAmi# yajñavEśasaM kariṣyAmIti̍ tamaddhriyata̍ hOtuṃq sO̱&gnirabravInna̍ mayyAmaṃ hO̱ṣyasIti taM dhAnABiraśrIṇAt-̍ [ ] 32

verses.padam: - Padam tam|śRutam|BUtam|ajuhOt|yat|dhAnABiḥ|hAriyOjanamiti̍# hAri - yOjanam|śrIṇAti|śRutatvAyEti̍# śRuta - tvAya|śRutam|Eva|Enam|BUtam|juhOti|bahvIBi̍ḥ|śrIṇAti|EtAva̍tIḥ|Eva|asya|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|kAmaduGA̍ iti# kAma - duGA̱ḥ|Bavanti|athO iti|Kalu̍|Ahuḥ|EtAḥ|vai|indra̍sya|pRuśna̍yaḥ|kAmaduGA̍ iti# kAma - duGA̱ḥ|yat|hAriyOjanIriti# hAri - yOjanIḥ|iti|tasmA̱t|bahvIBi̍ḥ|śrIṇIyAt|RuKsAmE̍ ityRuk̍ - sAmE|vai|indrasya|harI̍ iti|sOmapAnAviti̍# sOma - pAnau̱|tayO̱ḥ|paridhaya iti# pari - dhayaḥ|AdhAnamityA̱̍ - dhAna̱m|yat|aprahRutyEtyapra̍# - hRutya|paridhIniti# pari - dhIn|juhuyAt|antarAdhAnAByAmityantaḥ-AdhAnAByAm|33̍ (50)
verses.samhita: taṃ śRutaM BUtamajuhOd-yaddhAnABi̍ṛ̍ hAriyOjanaṅ śrIṇAti# śRutatvAya# śRutamEvainaM̍ BUtaM juhOti̍ bahvIBiḥ̍ śrIṇAtyEtAvatI-rEvAsyA-muṣmi̍n̍ ~MlOkE kAmaduGA̍# BavantyathO KalvAhurEtA̍ vA indrasya̍ pRuśnayaḥ̍ kAmaduGA yaddhAriyOjanIriti̍ tasmA̱d-bahvIBiḥ̍ śrIṇIyAdRuKsAmE vA indrasya̍ harI# sOmapAnau tayO̱ḥ paridhaya# AdhAnaM ~MyadaprahRutya̍ paridhI-~jjuhuyA-dantarA̍dhAnAByAM-̍ [ ] 33

verses.padam: - Padam GAsam|prEti|yacCEt|prahRutyEti̍# pra - hRutya|paridhIniti̍# pari - dhIn|juhOti|nirAdhAnAByAmiti̍ niḥ - AdhAnAByAm|Eva|GAsam|prEti|yacCati|unnEtEtyu̍t̍ - nEtA|juhOti|yAtayAmEti# yAta - yAmA|iva|hi|Etaṛhi|addhvaryuḥ|svagAkRu̍ta̍ iti# svagA-kRutaḥ|yat|addhvaryuḥ|juhuyAt|yathA̱|vimuktamitq̍ vi - muktam|punaḥ|yunakti̍|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|śIrq.ṣann|adhinidhAyEtya̍dhi̍ - nidhAya|juhOti|śIrq.ṣataḥ|hi|saḥ|samaBa̍vaditi̍# saM - aBavat|vikramyEti̍# vi-kramya|juhOti|vikramyEti̍# vi - kramya|hi|indra̍ḥ|vRutram|ahann̍|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti sam-Ruddhyai|paśavaḥ|vai|hAriyOjanIriti̍# hAri-yOjanIḥ|yat|saBiMqndyAditi# saM - BindyAt|alpA̱ḥ|34 (50)
verses.samhita: GAsaM pra yacCEt̍ prahRutya# paridhI~jjuhOti̍ nirAdhAnAByAmEva̍ GAsaM pra yacCatyunnEtA̍ juhOti̍ yAtayAmEva̍ hyEtarhya̍ddhvaryuḥ̍ svagAkRutO̍ yadaddhvaryurju̍huyAd-yathA̍ vimuktaM̍ punaryunakti̍# tAdRugEva tacCIrq.ṣa-nnadhinidhAya̍# juhOti śIṛṣatO hi sa samaBavad-vikramya̍# juhOti vikramya hIndrO# vRutramahanth samRuddhyai̍ paśavO vai hAriyOjanIryath̍ saBiMqndyAdalpA̍-̍ [ ] 34

verses.padam: - Padam Enam|paśavaḥ|Bu~jjanta̍ḥ|upEti̍|tiṣṭhErann|yat|na|saBiMqndyAditi̍# saM - BindyAt|bahavaḥ|Enam|paśava̍ḥ|aBu̍~jjantaḥ|upEti̍|tiṣṭhErann|mana̍sA|samiti̍|bAdhatE|uBaya̱m|karOti|bahava̍ḥ|Eva|Enam|paśava̍ḥ|Bu~jjanta̍ḥ|upEti̍|tiṣṭhantE|unnEtarItyu̍t̍ - nEtari|upahavamityu̍pa̍ - havam|icCantE|yaḥ|Eva|tatra|sOmapItha̍ iti# sOma - pIthaḥ|tam|Eva|avEti|rundhatE|uttaravEdyAmityu̍ttara̍ - vEdyAm|nIti|vapati|paśava̍ḥ|vai|uttaravEdirityu̍ttara̍ - vEdiḥ|paśavaḥ|hAriyOjanIriti̍# hAri - yOjanIḥ|paśuṣu|Eva|paśUn|pratIti̍|sthApayanti̍ ( )||35 (50)
verses.samhita: EnaM paśavO# Bu~jjanta upatiṣṭhEranq.̍ yanna saBiMqndyAd-bahava̍# EnaM paśavO&Bu~jjanta̍ upa# tiṣṭhEran manasA̍ saM bAdhata̍ uBayaM̍ karOti bahava# EvainaM̍ paśavO# Bu~jjanta upa# tiṣṭhanta unnEtaryupahavami̍cCantE̍ ya Eva tatra# sOmapIthastamEvAva# rundhata uttaravEdyAM nivapati̍ paśavO vA uttaravEdiḥ̍ paśavO# hAriyOjanIḥ paśuṣvEva paśUn prati# ṣṭhApayanti ( )||35

verses.padam: - Padam grahAn|vai|anviti̍|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|paśavaḥ|prEti̍|jAyantE|upAṅqśvantaryAmAvityu̍pAṃśu̍ - antaryAmau|ajAvaya ityajA̍ - avayaḥ|śukrAmanthinAviti̍# śukrA - manthinau̱|puruṣAḥ|RutugrahAnityRu̍tu̍ - grahAn|EkaśaPA̍ ityEka# - śaPAḥ|AdityagrahamityAditya̍ - graham|gAvaḥ|Adityagraha̍ ityAditya̍ - grahaḥ|BUyiṣṭhABiḥ|RugBirityRu̍k-Biḥ|gRuhyatE|tasmA̱t|gAva̍ḥ|paśUnAm|BUyi̍ṣṭhAḥ|yat|triḥ|upAṃqśumityu̍pa̍ - aśum|hastEna|vigRuhṇAtIti̍# vi - gRuhṇAti|tasmA̱t|dvau|trIn|ajA|janaya̍ti|atha̍|ava̍yaḥ|BUya̍sIḥ|pitA|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|Agrayaṇaḥ|putraḥ|kalaśa̍ḥ|yat|Agrayaṇaḥ|upadasyEdityu̍pa̍ - dasyE̱t|kalaśA̱t|gRuhṇIyAt|yathA̱|pitA|36 (50)
verses.samhita: grahAnq. vA anu# prajAḥ paśavaḥ pra jAyanta̍ upAṅśvantaryA-mAvajAvaya̍ḥ̍ śukrAmanthinau puruṣA̍ RutugrahA-nEkaśaPA̍ AdityagrahaM gAva# AdityagrahO BUyiṣṭhABiṛ̍ RugBirgRuhyatE̍ tasmAd-gAvaḥ̍ paśUnAM BUyiṣṭhA̍ yat trirupAṃq̍ śuṃ hastEna̍ vigRuhṇAti tasmAd dvau trInajA janayatyathAvayO̍ BUyasIḥ̍ pitA vA Eṣa yadA̱grayaṇaḥ putraḥ kalaśO yadA̱grayaṇa upadasyE̱t̍ kalaśA̱d-gRuhṇIyAd-yathA# pitA- [ ] 36

verses.padam: - Padam putram|kṣitaḥ|upadhAvatItyupa-dhAva̍ti|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|yat|kalaśa̍ḥ|upadasyEdityu̍pa-dasyE̱t|AgrayaṇAt|gRuhṇIyAt|yathA̱|putraḥ|pitara̱m|kṣitaḥ|upadhAvatItyu̍pa̍ - dhAvati|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|AtmA|vai|Eṣaḥ|yajñasya̍|yat|Agrayaṇaḥ|yat|graha̍ḥ|vA|kalaśa̍ḥ|vA|upadasyEdityu̍pa̍ - dasyE̱t|AgrayaṇAt|gRuhṇIyAt|Atmanaḥ|Eva|adhIti̍|yajñam|niriti̍|karOti|avi̍jñAta̍ ityavi# - jñAtaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|gRuhyatE|yat|Agrayaṇaḥ|sthAlyA|gRuhṇAti|vAyavyE̍na|juhOti|tasmA̱t|37̍ (50)
verses.samhita: putraM kṣita upadhAva̍ti̍ tAdRugEva tadyat kalaśa# upadasyE-dAgrayaṇAd-gRu̍hṇIyAd-yathA̍# putraḥ pitaraM̍ kṣita upadhAva̍ti̍ tAdRugEva tadAtmA vA Eṣa yajñasya yadA̱grayaṇO yadgrahO# vA kalaśO# vOpadasyE-dAgrayaṇAd-gRu̍hṇIyAdAtmana̍# EvAdhi# yajñaM niṣkarOtyavi̍jñAtO̍ vA Eṣa gRuhyatE̍ yadA̱grayaṇaḥ sthAlyA gRuhṇAti# vAyavyEna̍ juhOti tasmAd- [ ] 37

verses.padam: - Padam gaBErṇa|avi̍jñAtEnEtyavi̍# - jñAtEna|brahmahEti# brahma - hA|avaBRuthamityava# - BRutham|avEti|yanti|parEti̍|sthAlIḥ|asya̍nti|uditi̍|vAyavyA̍ni|haranti|tasmA̱t|striya̱m|jAtAm|parEti̍|asyanti|uditi̍|pumAṃ̍sam|haranti|yat|purOrucamiti̍# puraḥ - ruca̱m|Aha|yathA̱|vasya̍sE|AharatItyA̱-hara̍ti|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|yat|graha̱m|gRuhṇAti̍|yathA̱|vasya̍sE|AhRutyEtyA̱̍ - hRutya|prEti̍|Aha̍|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|yat|sAdaya̍ti|yathA̱|vasya̍sE|upanidhAyEtyu̍pa̍ - nidhAya|apakrAmatItya̍pa̍ - krAmati|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|yat̍ ( )|vai|yajñasya|sAmnA̱|yaju̍ṣA|kriyatE̱|śithilam|tat|yat|RucA|tat|dRuḍham|purastA̍dupayAmA̍ iti# purastA̱t - upayAmAḥ|yajuṣA|gRuhyantE|upari̍ṣṭAdupayAmA̍ ityupariṣṭAt̍ - upayAmAḥ|RucA|yajñasya|dhRutyai̱||38̍ (68)
verses.samhita: garBEṇA vijñAtEna̍ brahmahA &vaBRuthamava̍# yanti parA̱ sthAlIrasyantyud-vAyavyA̍ni̍ haranti tasmAth striyaM̍ jAtAM parA̱&syantyut pumAṃ# saṃ haranti yat purOrucamAha̍ yathA vasyasa̍ Aharati̍ tAdRugEva tad-yad-grahaM̍ gRuhṇAti yathA vasyasa̍ AhRutya prA&&*ha# tAdRugEva tad-yath sAdayati̍ yathA vasyasa̍ upanidhAyA-pakrAma̍ti̍ tAdRugEva tad ya ( ) dvai yajñasya sAmnA yajuṣA̍ kriyatE# śithilaM tad-yadRucA tad dRuḍhaM purastAdupayAmA̍ yajuṣA̍ gRuhyanta upariṣṭA-dupayAmA̍ RucA yajñasya dhRutyai̱||38

verses.padam: - Padam prEti|anyAni̍|pAtrA̍ṇi|yujyantE̱|na|anyAni̍|yAni̍|parAcInA̍ni|prayujyanta̍ iti# pra - yujyantE̱|amum|Eva|taiḥ|lOkam|aBIti|jayati|parA~g̍|iva|hi|asau|lOkaḥ|yAni̍|puna̍ḥ|prayujyanta̍ iti# pra - yujyantE̱|imam|Eva|taiḥ|lOkam|aBIti|jayati|puna̍ḥpunariti̍ punaḥ̍ - punaḥ|iva|hi|ayam|lOkaḥ|prEti|anyAni̍|pAtrA̍ṇi|yujyantE̱|na|anyAni̍|yAni̍|parAcInA̍ni|prayujyanta̍ iti# pra - yujyantE̱|tAni|anviti̍|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|parEti̍|Bavanti|yAni̍|puna̍ḥ|39̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prAnyAni pAtrAṇi̍ yujyantE nAnyAni yAni# parAcInAni̍ prayujyantE&mumEva tairlOkamaBi jayati̍ parA~giva̍ hyasau̍ lOkO yAni punaḥprayujyanta̍# imamEva tairlOkamaBi jayati̍ punaḥ̍ punariva hyayaM̍ ~MlOkaḥ prAnyAni pAtrAṇi̍ yujyantE nAnyAni yAni# parAcInAni̍ prayujyantE tAnyanvOṣadhayaḥ̍ parA# Bavanti yAni punaḥ-̍ [ ] 39

verses.padam: - Padam prayujyanta iti# pra - yujyantE̱|tAni|anviti̍|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|puna̍ḥ|Eti̍|Bavanti|prEti̍|anyAni̍|pAtrA̍ṇi|yujyantE̱|na|anyAni̍|yAni̍|parAcInA̍ni|prayujyanta̍ iti# pra-yujyantE̱|tAni|anviti̍|AraṇyAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|ara̍ṇyam|apEti̍|yanti|yAni̍|puna̍ḥ|prayujyanta̍ iti# pra - yujyantE̱|tAni|anviti̍|grAmyAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|grAma̱m|upAva̍yantItyu̍pa-ava̍yanti|yaḥ|vai|grahA̍ṇAm|nidAnamiti̍# ni - dAna̱m|vEda|nidAna̍vAniti̍# nidAna# - vAn|Bavati|Ajya̱m|iti|uktham|tat|vai|grahA̍ṇAm|nidAnamiti̍# ni - dAna̱m|yat|upAṅqśvityupa̍ - aṃqśu|śaṃsati|tat|40̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prayujyantE tAnyanvOṣadhayaḥ̍ punarA Bavanti̍ prAnyAni pAtrAṇi̍ yujyantE nAnyAni yAni# parAcInAni̍ prayujyantE tAnyanvAraṇyAḥ̍ paśavO&raṇyamapa̍# yanti yAni punaḥ̍ prayujyantE tAnyanu# grAmyAḥ paśavO grAmamupAva̍yanti̍ yO vai grahAṇAM̍ nidAnaM ~MvEda# nidAnavAn̍ BavatyAjyamityukthaM tadvai grahAṇAM̍ nidAnaM ~MyadupAṃqśu̍ śaṃsati̍ ta- [ ] 40

verses.padam: - Padam upAṅqśvantaryAmayOrityupAṃśu̍ - antaryAmayO̱ḥ|yat|uccaiḥ|tat|itarEṣAm|grahA̍ṇAm|Etat|vai|grahA̍ṇAm|nidAnamiti̍# ni - dAna̱m|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|nidAna̍vAniti̍# nidAna# - vAn|Bavati|yaḥ|vai|grahAṇAm|mithunam|vEda̍|prEti̍|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|mithunaiḥ|jAyatE|sthAlIBiḥ|anyE|grahA̱ḥ|gRuhyantE̱|vAyavyai̱ḥ|anyE|Etat|vai|grahA̍ṇAm|mithunam|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|prEti̍|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|mithunaiḥ|jAyatE|indraḥ|tvaṣṭu̍ḥ|sOma̱m|aBIṣahEtya̍Bi̍ - sahA̱|apibat|saḥ|viṣva~g|41̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -dupAṅśvantaryAmayO-ryaduccai-stadita̍rEṣAM̍ grahAṇAmEtadvai̍ grahAṇAM̍ nidAnaM ~Mya EvaM ~MvEda# nidAnavAn̍ Bavati yO vai grahAṇAM̍ mithunaM ~MvEda pra prajayA# paśuBirmithunairjA̍yatE̍ sthAlIBiranyE̍ grahA# gRuhyantE# vAyavyairanya̍ Etadvai grahAṇAM̍ mithunaM ~Mya EvaM ~MvEda pra prajayA# paśuBirmithunairjA̍yata̍ indrastvaṣṭuḥ sOmamaBIṣahA̍&pibath̍ sa viṣva~g- [ ] 41

verses.padam: - Padam vIti|ArcCat|saḥ|Atmann|Arama̍ṇamityA̱̍ - ramaṇam|na|avindat|saḥ|EtAn|anusavanamitya̍nu-savanam|purOḍAśAn̍|apaśyat|tAn|niriti̍|avapat|taiḥ|vai|saḥ|Atmann|Arama̍ṇamityA̱̍ - ramaṇam|akuruta|tasmA̱t|anusavanamitya̍nu̍ - savanam|purOḍAśA̱ḥ|niriti|upyantE|tasmA̱t|anusavanamitya̍nu̍ - savanam|purOḍAśAnAm|prEti̍|aśnIyAt|Atmann|Eva|Arama̍ṇamityA̱̍ - ramaṇam|kurutE|na|Enam|sOma̍ḥ|atIti̍|pavatE|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|na|RucA|na|yaju̍ṣA|pa~gktiḥ|ApyatE|atha̍|kim̍ ( )|yajñasya|pA~gktatvamiti̍# pA~gkta - tvam|iti|dhAnAḥ|karamBaḥ|parivApa̍ iti# pari - vApaḥ|purOḍAśaḥ|payasyA̱|tEna̍|pa~gktiḥ|ApyatE|tat|yajñasya̍|pA~gktatvamiti̍# pA~gkta - tvam||42 (64) (Bavanti yAni punaḥ - śaṃsati̍ ta - dviṣva~g - kiM - caturdaśa̍ ca) (A11) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 11 Anuvaakams :- (indrO# vRutrAya- &&yurvE - yajñEna# - suvargA - yEndrO# marudBi - raditi̍ - rantaryAmapAtrEṇa# - prAṇa upAṃśu̍ pAtrE - ṇEndrO# vRutramahan̍ tasya - grahAn - prAnyA - nyEkAdaśa)̍ Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (indrO# vRutrAya - punaṛ̍ RutunA&&ha̍ - mithunaM paśavO - nEṣṭaḥ patnI# - mupAṅśvantaryAmayO - dvicatvAriṃśat)̍ First and Last Padam of Fifth Prasnam of 6th Kandam (indrO# vRutrAya# - pA~gktatvaM)||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE ṣaṣṭhakAṇḍE pa~jcamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||=========================================
verses.samhita: vyA̱rcCath sa AtmannAramaṇaM̍ nAvindath̍ sa EtAnanusavanaM̍ purOḍAśA̍napaśyat̍ tAn niravapat̍ tairvai sa AtmannAramaṇa-makuruta̍ tasmAdanusavanaM̍ purOḍAśA̍ nirupyantE̍ tasmAdanusavanaM̍ purOḍAśA̍nAM̍ prAśnIyAdAtma-nnEvA&&*rama̍ṇaM̍ kurutE nainaṃq sOmO&ti# pavatE brahmavAdinO# vadanti narcA na yajuṣA̍ pa~gktirA̱pyatE&tha kiM ( ) ~Myajñasya# pA~gktatvamiti# dhAnAḥ karaBaMḥ̍ parivApaḥ̍ purOḍAśa̍ḥ̍ payasyA# tEna# pa~gktirApyatE̍ tad-yajñasya# pA~gktatvaM||42 (Bavanti yAni punaḥ - śaṃsati̍ ta - dviṣva~g - kiM - caturdaśa̍ ca) (A11) praśna kOrvai with starting padams of 1 to 11 anuvAkams :- (indrO# vRutrAya- &&yurvE - yajñEna# - suvargA - yEndrO# marudBi - raditi̍ - rantaryAmapAtrEṇa# - prAṇa upAṃśu̍ pAtrE - ṇEndrO# vRutramahaqn̍ tasya - grahAn - prAnyA - nyEkAdaśa)̍ kOrvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (indrO# vRutrAya - punaṛ̍ RutunA&&ha̍ - mithunaM paśavO - nEṣṭaḥ patnI# - mupAṅśvantaryAmayO - dvicatvAriṃśat)̍ first and last padam of fifth praśnam of 6th KAṇḍam (indrO# vRutrAya# - pA~gktatvaM)||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM ṣaṣṭhakAṇḍE pa~jcamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||------------------------------------------------------------- OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ hariḥ OM 6.6 ṣaṣṭhakAṇḍE ṣaṣṭhaḥ praśnaḥ - sOmamantrabrAhmaṇanirUpaṇaM

verses.padam: - Padam suvargAyEti# suvaḥ - gAya|vai|EtAni̍|lOkAya̍|hUyantE|yat|dAkṣiṇAni̍|dvAByA̱m|gAṛha̍patya̍ iti gAṛha# - patyE|juhOti|dvipAditi# dvi - pAt|yajamAnaḥ|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|AgnI̱ddhra ityAgni# - iddhrE|juhOti|antarikṣE|Eva|Eti̍|kramatE|sada̍ḥ|aBi|Eti̍|Eti|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|Eva|Enam|lOkam|gamayati|saurIByA̱m|RugByAmityRuk̍ - ByAm|gAṛhapatya̍ iti gAṛha-patyE|juhOti|amum|Eva|Enam|lOkam|samArO̍hayatIti̍# saM - ArOhayati|naya̍vatyEti̍ naya# - vatyA|RucA|AgnI̱ddhra ityAgni# - iddhrE|juhOti|suvargasyEti# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|aBinI̱tya̍ ityaBi -nItyai|diva̱m|gacCa|suvaḥ|pata|iti̍|hira̍ṇyam|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: suvargAya vA EtAni# lOkAya# hUyantE yad-dA̱kṣiṇAni dvAByAM gAṛhapatyE̍ juhOti dvipAd-yajamAnaḥ̍ pratiṣṭhityA̍ AgnI̱ddhrE juhOtyantarikṣa̍ EvA&&*kramatE̍ sadO&Byaiti# suvargamEvainaM̍ ~MlOkaM gamayati̍ saurIByAmRugByAM̍ gAṛhapatyE̍ juhOtyamumEvainaM ~MlOkaṃ samArOhayati̍ nayavatyarcA&&*gnI̱ddhrE̍ juhOti suvargasya# lOkasyABinI̱tyai divaM̍ gacCa suvaḥ̍ patEti hiraṇyaṃ-̍ [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam hutvA|uditi|gRuhṇAti|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|Eva|Enam|lOkam|gamayati|rUpEṇa|vaḥ|rUpam|aBi|Eti̍|Emi|iti̍|Aha|rUpEṇa̍|hi|AsAm|rUpam|aBi|Eti̍|Eti̍|yat|hira̍ṇyEna|tuthaḥ|vaḥ|viśvavE̍dA̍ iti# viśva - vEdAḥ|vIti|Bajatu|iti̍|Aha|tuthaḥ|ha|sma|vai|viśvavE̍dA̍ iti# viśva - vEdAḥ|dEvAnA̱m|dakṣiṇAḥ|vIti̍|Bajati|tEna̍|Eva|EnAḥ|vIti̍|Bajati|Etat|tE|agnE|rAdha̍ḥ|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: hutvOd-gRuhṇAti̍ suvargamEvainaM̍ ~MlOkaM gamayati̍ rUpEṇa# vO rUpamaByaimItyAha̍ rUpEṇa hyAsAṃ̍ rUpamaByaiti yaddhiraṇyEna̍ tuthO vO# viśvavEdA̍ vi BajatvityA̍ha̍ tuthO ha# sma vai viśvavEdA̍ dEvAnAM dakṣiṇA̍ vi Bajati̍ tEnaivainA vi BajatyE̍ tat tE# agnE rAdha- [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam Eti|Eti|sOma̍cyutamiti̍ sOma# - cyutam|iti|Aha|sOma̍cyutamiti̍ sOma# - cyutam|hi|asya|rAdhaḥ|Eti̍|Eti̍|tat|mitrasya̍|pathA|naya|iti̍|Aha|śAntyai̱|Rutasya̍|pathA|prEti̍|ita|candrada̍kṣiṇA̍ iti# candra - dakṣiṇAḥ|iti|Aha|satyam|vai|Rutam|satyEna̍|Eva|EnAḥ|RutEna̍|vIti̍|Bajati|yajñasya̍|pathA|suvitA|naya̍ntIḥ|iti̍|Aha|yajñasya̍|hi|EtAḥ|pathA|yanti̍|yat|dakṣi̍ṇAḥ|brAhmaṇam|adya|rAddhyAsam|3̍ (50)
verses.samhita: aiti sOmacyutamityA̍ha̍ sOmacyutaṅq̍ hyasya̍ rAdha aiti tanmitrasya# pathA nayEtyAha̍ śAntyA# Rutasya# pathA prEta# candra dakṣiṇA̍ ityAha̍ satyaM ~MvA Rutaṃ satyEnaivainA# RutEna vi Bajati̍ yajñasya# pathA suvitA̍ nayantIrityA̍ha̍ yajñasya hyEtAḥ̍ pathA yanti yad-dakṣiṇA̍ brAhmaṇamadya rA̱ddhyAsa- [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam Ruṣi̱m|Arq.ṣEyam|iti|Aha|Eṣaḥ|vai|brAhmaṇaḥ|Ruṣi̍ḥ|Arq.ṣEyaḥ|yaḥ|śuśruvAn|tasmA̱t|Evam|Aha|vIti̍|suva̍ḥ|paśya̍|vIti̍|antari̍kṣam|iti̍|Aha|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ-gam|Eva|Enam|lOkam|gamayati|yatasva|sadasyai̱ḥ|iti̍|Aha|mitratvAyEti̍# mitra - tvAya|asmaddA̱trA̍ ityasmat - dAtrAḥ|dEvatrEti# dEva - trA|gacCata|madhumatIriti̍ madhu# - matIḥ|pradAtAramiti# pra - dAtAra̱m|Eti|viśata|iti̍|Aha|vayam|iha|pradAtAra̍ iti# pra - dAtAraḥ|smaḥ|asmAn|amutra̍|madhu̍matIriti̍ madhu# - matIḥ|Eti|viśata|iti̍|4̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mRuṣimAṛṣEyamityA̍haiṣa̍ vai brA̱hmaṇa RuṣirAṛṣEyO̍ yaḥ śuśruvAn̍ tasmAdEvamA̍ha̍ vi suvaḥ paśya vyantari̍kṣamityA̍ha̍ suvargamEvainaM̍ ~MlOkaM gamayati̍ yatasva̍ sadasyairityA̍ha̍ mitratvAyAsmaddA̱trA dEvatrA gacCata̍ madhumatIḥ̍ pradAtAramA viśatEtyA̍ha̍ vayamiha pradAtAraḥ̍ smO̱&smAnamutra madhumatIrA̍ viśatEti-̍ [ ] 4

verses.padam: - Padam vAva|Etat|Aha|hiraṇyam|dadAti|jyOti̍ḥ|vai|hira̍ṇyam|jyOti̍ḥ|Eva|purastA̱t|dhattE|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|anu̍KyAtyA̍ ityanu# - KyAtyai|agnIdha ityagni̍ - idhE̱|dadAti|agnimuKAnityagni̍ - muKAn|Eva|RutUn|prIṇAti|brahmaṇE̱|dadAti|prasU̱tyA iti pra-sUtyai|hOtrE̱|dadAti|AtmA|vai|Eṣaḥ|yajñasya|yat|hOtA̱|AtmAna̱m|Eva|yajñasya̍|dakṣi̍ṇABiḥ|samiti̍|ad^^rdhayati||5̍ (38) (hiraṇyaṃq̍ - rAdhO# - rAdhyAsa - mamutra madhumatIrA̍ viśatEtya̍ - ṣṭAtriṃśacca)̍ (A1)
verses.samhita: vAvaitadAha̍ hiraṇyaM̍ dadAti jyOtirvai hiraṇyaM̍ jyOtirEva̍ purastA̱ddhattE suvargasya# lOkasyAnuKyAtyA̍ agnIdhE# dadAtyagnimuKAnEvartUn̍ prIṇAti̍ brahmaṇE# dadAti prasU̱tyai hOtrE# dadAtyAtmA vA Eṣa yajñasya yaddhOtA&&tmAnamEva̍ yajñasya dakṣiṇABiḥ̍ samarddhayati||5̍ (hiraṇyaṃq̍ - rAdhO# - rAdhyAsa - mamutra madhumatIrA̍ viśatEtya̍ - ṣṭAtriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam samiṣṭayajUṃṣIti# samiṣṭa - yajUṃṣi|juhOti|yajñasya̍|sami̍ṣṭyA̍ iti saM - iṣṭyai|yat|vai|yajñasya|krUram|yat|vili̍ṣṭamiti̍ vi - liṣṭam|yat|atyEtItyati̍ - Eti|yat|na|atyEtItya̍ti̍ - Eti|yat|atikarOtItya̍ti̍ - karOti|yat|na|apIti̍|karOti̍|tat|Eva|taiḥ|prIṇAti|nava̍|juhOti|nava̍|vai|puru̍ṣE|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|puruṣEṇa|yajñaḥ|sammi̍ta̍ iti saM - mitaḥ|yAvAn|Eva|yajñaḥ|tam|prIṇAti|ṣaṭ|Rugmi̍yAṇi|juhOti|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutava̍ḥ|RutUn|Eva|prIṇAti|trIṇi̍|yajUṃ̍ṣi|6̍ (50)
verses.samhita: samiṣṭa yajUṃṣi# juhOti yajñasya samiṣṭyai̍ yadvai yajñasya# krUraM ~Myad-viliṣṭaM̍ ~MyadatyEti yannAtyEti yadatikarOti̍ yannApi# karOti tadEva taiḥ prIṇAti̍ nava# juhOti nava vai puruṣE̍ prAṇAḥ puruṣEṇa̍ yajñaḥ saMmitO̍ yAvAnEva̍ yajñastaM prIṇAti̍ ṣaḍ RugmiyAṇi̍ juhOti ṣaḍvA Rutava# RutUnEva prIṇAti̍ trIṇi yajUṃṣi-̍ [ ] 6

verses.padam: - Padam trayaḥ|imE|lOkAḥ|imAn|Eva|lOkAn|prIṇAti|yajña̍|yajñam|gacCa|yajñapa̍timiti̍# yajña - patim|gacCa|iti|Aha|yajñapa̍timiti̍# yajña - patim|Eva|Enam|gamayati|svAm|yOni̱m|gacCa|iti|Aha|svAm|Eva|Enam|yOni̱m|gamayati|Eṣaḥ|tE|yajñaḥ|yajñapata̍ iti# yajña - patE|sahasU̱ktavAka iti# sahasU̱kta - vAkaḥ|suvIra iti# su - vIraḥ|iti̍|Aha|yaja̍mAnE|Eva|vIrya̱m|dadhAti|vAsiṣṭhaḥ|ha|sAtyahavya̍ iti# sAtya - havyaḥ|dEvaBAgamiti# dEva - BAgam|papracCa|yat|sRu~jjayAn|bahuyAjina̍ iti# bahu - yAjinaḥ|ayI̍yajaḥ|yajñE|7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: traya# imE lOkA imAnEva lOkAn prIṇAti̍ yajña# yajñaM gacCa̍ yajñapatiM̍ gacCEtyAha̍ yajñapatimEvaina̍M̍ gamayati svAM ~MyOniM̍ gacCEtyAha̍ svAmEvainaM ~MyOniM̍ gamayatyEṣa tE# yajñO yajñapatE̍ sahasU̱ktavAkaḥ suvIra ityAha̍ yajamAna̍ Eva vIryaM̍ dadhAti vAsiṣṭhO ha# sAtyahavyO dEvaBAgaM̍ papracCa̍ yath sRu~jjayAn̍ bahuyAjinO&yIyajO̍ yajñE- [ ] 7

verses.padam: - Padam yajñam|pratIti|atiṣṭhipA(3)ḥ|yajñapatA(3)viti̍# yajña-patA(3)u|iti|saḥ|ha|uvAca|yajñapa̍tAviti̍# yajña-patau|iti|satyAt|vai|sRu~jja̍yAḥ|parEti̍|baBUvuḥ|iti̍|ha|uvAca|yajñE|vAva|yajñaḥ|pratiṣṭhApya̍ iti# prati - sthApyaḥ|AsIt|yaja̍mAnasya|apa̍rABAvAyEtyapa̍rA̍ - BAvAya|iti|dEvA̱ḥ|gAtuvida̍ iti# gAtu - vidaḥ|gAtum|vittvA|gAtum|ita|iti|Aha|yajñE|Eva|yajñam|pratIti̍|sthApayati|yaja̍mAnasya|apa̍rABAvAyEtyapa̍rA-̍ BAvAya||8 (41) (yajUṃṣi̍ - yajña - EkacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: yajñaM pratyatiṣṭhipA(3)̍ yajñapatA(3)viti sa hOvAca̍ yajñapatAviti̍# satyAdvai sRu~jjayAḥ̍ parA# baBUvuriti# hOvAca yajñE vAva yajñaḥ pratiṣṭhApya̍# AsId-yajamAnasyA-pa̍rABAvAyEti̍ dEvA# gAtuvidO gAtuM ~MvittvA gAtu -mitEtyAha̍ yajña Eva yajñaM prati# ṣṭhApayati yajamAnasyA-pa̍rABAvAya||8̍ (yajUṃṣi̍ - yajña - EkacatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam avaBRuthayajUṃṣItyavaBRutha̍ - yajUṃṣi|juhOti|yat|Eva|arvAcIna̱m|Eka̍hAyanAdityEka̍# - hAyanAt|Enaḥ|karOti̍|tat|Eva|taiḥ|avEti̍|yajatE|apaḥ|avaBRuthamitya̍va̍ - BRutham|avEti|Eti|aPsvitya̍p̍ - su|vai|varuṇaḥ|sAkṣAditi̍# sa - akṣAt|Eva|varuṇam|avEti̍|yajatE|vartma̍nA|vai|anvityEtya̍nu̍ - itya|yajñam|rakṣAṃ̍si|jiGAṃqsanta|sAmnA̱|prastOtEti̍# pra - stOtA|anvavaitItyanu̍ - avaiti|sAma̍|vai|rakṣOhEti̍# rakṣaḥ - hA|rakṣasAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa# - hatyai|triḥ|nidhanamiti# ni - dhana̱m|upEti|Eti|traya̍ḥ|imE|lOkAḥ|EByaḥ|Eva|lOkEBya̍ḥ|rakṣAṃ̍si|9̍ (50)
verses.samhita: avaBRutha-yajUṃṣi# juhOti yadEvArvAcIna-mEkahAyanAdEna̍ḥ̍ karOti tadEva tairava# yajatE &pO&vaBRutha-mavai̱tyaPsu̍ vai varuṇaḥ̍ sAkṣAdEva varuṇamava̍# yajatE vartmanA̍ vA anvitya# yajñaṃ rakṣAṃsi̍ jiGAṃsanti sAmnA̱ prastOtA&nvavaiti̍ sAma vai rakṣOhA̍ rakṣasAmapa̍hatyai̍ trirnidhanamupaiti̍ traya# imE lOkA EBya Eva lOkEByO rakṣAṅq- [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam apEti|hanti|puru̍ṣaḥpuruṣa̍ iti puruṣaḥ̍ - puruṣaḥ|nidhanamiti# ni - dhana̱m|upEti|Eti|puru̍ṣaḥpuruṣa̍ iti puruṣaḥ̍ - puruṣaḥ|hi|rakṣasvI|rakṣasAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa# - hatyai|urum|hi|rAjA̱|varuṇaḥ|cakAra̍|iti̍|Aha|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati-sthityai|śatam|tE|rAjann|Biṣaja̍ḥ|sahasra̱m|iti̍|Aha|BEṣajam|Eva|asmai|karOti|aBiṣṭhi̍ta̍ ityaBi - sthitaḥ|varuṇasya|pAśa̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|varuṇapAśamiti̍# varuṇa - pAśam|Eva|aBIti|tiṣṭhati|baraḥiḥ|aBIti̍|juhOti|Ahu̍tInAmityA̍ - hutInAm|pratiṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|athO iti|agnivatItya̍gni̍ - vati|Eva|juhOti|apa̍baṛhiṣa̍ ityapa# - baraḥiṣaḥ|prayAjAniti# pra - yAjAn|10 (50)
verses.samhita: -syapa# hanti puruṣaḥpuruṣO̍ nidhanamupaiti̍ puruṣaḥpuruṣO̍ hi rakṣasvI̍ rakṣasAmapa̍hatyA̍ uruṃ hi rAjA varuṇaścakArEtyA̍ha̍ pratiṣṭhityai̍ śataM tE# rAjan Biṣajaḥ̍ sahasramityAha̍ BEṣajamEvAsmai# karOtyaBiṣṭhitO̍ varuṇasya̍ pAśa ityAha̍ varuṇapAśamEvABi tiṣṭhati̍ barqḥiraBi juhOtyAhu̍tInAM̍ pratiṣṭhityA̍ athO# agnivatyEva juhOtyapa̍# baṛhiṣaḥ prayAjAn- [ ] 10

verses.padam: - Padam yajati|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|vai|barqḥiḥ|prajA iti# pra-jAḥ|Eva|varuṇapAśAditi# varuṇa - pAśAt|mu~jcati|AjyaBAgAvityAjya̍# - BAgau|yajati|yajñasya|Eva|cakṣu̍ṣI̍ iti|na|antaḥ|Eti|varu̍ṇam|yajati|varuṇapAśAditi̍# varuṇa - pAśAt|Eva|Enam|mu~jcati|agnIvaruṇAvityagnI̍ - varuṇau|yajati|sAkṣAditi̍# sa - akṣAt|Eva|Enam|varuṇapAśAditi# varuṇa - pAśAt|mu~jcati|apabaṛhiṣAvityapa̍# - baraḥiṣau|anUyAjAvityanu̍ - yAjau|yajati|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|vai|baraḥiḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|Eva|varuṇapAśAditi# varuṇa - pAśAt|mu~jcati|caturaḥ|prayAjAniti̍# pra - yAjAn|yajati|dvau|anUyAjAvityanu̍ - yAjau|ṣaṭ|samiti|padyantE|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutava̍ḥ|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yajati̍ prajA vai barqḥiḥ prajA Eva varuṇapAśAn-mu̍~jcatyAjya̍BAgau̍ yajati yajñasyaiva cakṣuṣI̍ nAntarEti̍ varuṇaM̍ ~Myajati varuṇapAśAdEvainaM̍ mu~jcatyagnIvaruṇau̍ yajati sAkṣAdEvainaM̍ ~MvaruṇapAśAn mu~jcatya-pa̍baṛhiṣAvanUyajau̍ yajati̍ prajA vai barqḥiḥ prajA Eva varuṇapAśAn-mu̍~jcati̍ caturaḥ̍ prayAjAn. yajati̍ dvAvanUyAjau̍ ṣaṭth saMpadyantE̍ ṣaḍvA Rutava-̍ [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam Rutuṣu|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|ava̍BRuthEtyava̍# - BRutha|nica~gkuṇEti# ni - ca~gkuṇa|iti|Aha|yathOditamiti̍# yathA - uditam|Eva|varuṇam|avEti̍|yajatE|samudrE|tE|hRuda̍yam|aPsvitya̍p-su|antaḥ|iti̍|Aha|samudrE|hi|antaḥ|varu̍ṇaḥ|samiti̍|tvA|viśantu|Oṣa̍dhIḥ|uta|Apa̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|adBiritya̍t-Biḥ|Eva|Enam|Oṣa̍dhIBirityOṣa̍dhi̍ - Biḥ|samya~jca̱m|dadhAti|dEvI̱ḥ|Apaḥ|Eṣaḥ|vaḥ|garBaḥ|iti̍|Aha|yathAyajuriti̍# yathA - yajuḥ|Eva|Etat|paśavaḥ|vai|12̍ (50)
verses.samhita: RutuṣvEva prati# tiṣṭha-tyavaBRutha-nica~gkuṇEtyA̍ha̍ yathOditamEva varuṇamava̍# yajatE samudrE tE hRudaya-maPsva̍ntarityA̍ha̍ samudrE hyantarvaru̍ṇaḥ̍ saM tvA# viśa-ntvOṣadhI-rutA&&*pa̍ ityAhAdBi-rEvainamOṣa̍dhIBiḥ̍ samya~jcaM̍ dadhAti dEvIrApa̍ Eṣa vO garBa ityAha̍ yathAyajurEvaitat paśavO vai- [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam sOmaḥ|yat|BindUnAm|BakṣayE̱t|paśumAniti̍# paśu - mAn|syAt|varuṇaḥ|tu|Enam|gRuhṇIyAt|yat|na|BakṣayE̱t|apaśuḥ|syAt|na|Enam|varu̍ṇaḥ|gRuhṇIyAt|upaspRuśyamityu̍pa̍ - spRuśya̱m|Eva|paśumAniti# paśu - mAn|Bavati|na|Enam|varuṇaḥ|gRuhṇAti|prati̍yuta̍ iti prati# - yutaḥ|varuṇasya|pAśa̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|varuṇapAśAditi̍# varuṇa - pAśAt|Eva|niriti|mucyatE|apra̍tIkṣamityapra̍ti̍ - Ikṣam|Eti|yanti|varu̍ṇasya|antaṛhi̍tyA̍ ityantaḥ - hityai|Edhaḥ|asi|EdhiṣImahi̍|iti̍|Aha|samidhEti̍# sam - idhA̱|Eva|agnim|namasyantaḥ̍ ( )|upAyantItyupa̍ - Ayanti|tEja̍ḥ|asi|tEja̍ḥ|mayi̍|dhEhi|iti̍|Aha|tEja̍ḥ|Eva|Atmann|dhattE||13̍ (62) (rakṣAṃsi̍ - prayAjA - nRutavO - vai - namasyantO̍ - dvAdaśa̍ ca) (A3)
verses.samhita: sOmO yad-BindUnAM̍ BakṣayE̱t paśumAnth-syAd-varuṇa-stvE̍naM̍ gRuhṇIyAdyanna BakṣayEdapaśuḥ̍ syAnnainaM ~MvaruṇO̍ gRuhṇIyA-dupaspRuśyamEva̍ paśumAn̍ Bavati̍ nainaM ~MvaruṇO̍ gRuhṇAti pratiyutO̍ varuṇasya̍ pAśa ityAha̍ varuṇapAśAdEva nirmucyatE̍ &pratIkṣamA̍ yanti̍ varuṇasyAntaṛhi̍tyA̍ EdhO̱&syEdhiṣImahI-tyAha̍ samidhaivAgniM namasyanta̍# ( ) upAyanti̍ tEjO&si̍ tEjO mayi# dhEhItyAha̍ tEja# EvA&&tman dhattE||13̍

verses.padam: - Padam sPyEna|vEdi̱m|uditi̍|hanti|rathAkṣEṇEti̍# ratha-akṣEṇa|vIti̍|mimItE|yUpa̱m|minOti|trivRutamiti̍# tri - vRuta̱m|Eva|vajra̱m|saBRuMtyEti# saM - BRutya|BrAtRu̍vyAya|prEti̍|harati|stRutyai̱|yat|antarvEdItya̍ntaḥ̍ - vEdi|minuyAt|dEvalOkamiti# dEva - lOkam|aBIti|jayEt|yat|bahirvEdIti̍# bahiḥ - vEdi|manuṣyalOkamiti# manuṣya - lOkam|vEdyantasyEti# vEdi - antasya|sandhAviti̍# saM - dhau|minOti|uBayO̱ḥ|lOkayO̱ḥ|aBijityA̍ ityaBi - jityai|uparasammitAmityupa̍ra̍ - samiMqtAm|minuyAt|pitRulOkakAmasyEti̍# pitRulOka - kAmasya|raśanasammitAmiti̍# raśana - samiMqtAm|manuṣyalOkakAmasyEti̍# manuṣyalOka - kAmasya|caṣAlasaMmitAmiti̍# caṣAla# - samiMqtAm|indriyakAmasyEtI̱ndriya̍ - kAmasya|sarvAn|samAn|pratiṣṭhAkA̍masyEti̍# pratiṣṭhA - kAmasya|yE|trayaḥ|maddhyamAḥ|tAn|samAn|paśukA̍masyEti̍# paśu - kAmasya|EtAn|vai|14 (50)
verses.samhita: sPyEna vEdimuddhanti̍ rathAkṣEṇa vi mimItE̍ yUpaM̍ minOti trivRutamEva̍ vajraṃ# saBRuMtya BrAtRuvyAya̍ pra harati̍ stRutyai yadantarvEdi̍ minuyAd-dE̍valOkamaBi̍ jayEd-yad-ba̍hirvEdi̍ manuṣya̍ lOkaM ~MvE̱dyantasya# sandhau minOtyuBayO̱-rlOkayO̍-raBiji̍tyA̍ uparasaMmitAM̍ minuyAt pitRulOkakAmasya̍ raśanasamiMtAM̍ manuṣyalOkakAmasya̍ caṣAla-saMmitAmindriya̍ kAmasya̍ sarvA̱nth samAn pratiṣṭhAkA̍masya̍ yE trayO# maddhyamAstAnth samAn paśukAmasyaitAn.̍ vA- [ ] 14

verses.padam: - Padam anviti|paśava̍ḥ|upEti̍|tiṣṭhantE|paśumAniti̍# paśu - mAn|Eva|Bavati|vyatiṣajEditi̍# vi - atiṣajEt|ita̍rAn|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|Eva|Enam|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|vyatiṣajatIti̍# vi - atiṣajati|yam|kAmayE̍ta|pramAyu̍ka̍ iti# pra - mAyukaḥ|syAt|iti̍|gartamitamiti̍# garta - mita̱m|tasya|minuyAt|uttarAd^^rdhya̍mityu̍ttara̍ - ad^^rdhya̱m|vaṛṣiṣṭham|atha̍|hrasI̍yAṃsam|EṣA|vai|gartamiditi̍# garta - mit|yasya|Evam|minOti̍|tAjak|prEti̍|mIyatE|dakṣiṇAd^^rdhya̍miti̍# dakṣiṇa - ad^^rdhya̱m|vaṛṣiṣṭham|minuyAt|suvargakA̍masyEti̍# suvarga - kAmasya|atha|hrasI̍yAṃsam|Akrama̍ṇamityA̱̍ - kramaṇam|Eva|tat|sEtu̱m|yaja̍mAnaḥ|kurutE|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|sama̍ṣṭya̍ iti saM - aṣṭyai|15 (50)
verses.samhita: anu# paśava upa# tiṣṭhantE paśumAnEva Bavati̍ vyatiṣajEdita̍rAn̍ prajayaivainaM̍ paśuBirvyatiṣajati̍ yaM kAmayEta̍ pramAyukaḥ̍ syAditi# gartamitaM tasya# minuyAduttarArddhyaM̍ ~Mvaṛṣiṣṭhamatha̍ hrasIyAṃsamEṣA̍ vai gartamidyasyaivaM̍ minOti# tAjak pra mIyatE̍ dakṣiṇArddhyaM̍ ~MvaṛṣiṣṭhaM̍ minuyAth suvargakAmasyAtha̍ hrasIyAṃsa-mAkrama̍ṇamEva̍ tath sEtuM ~MyajamAnaḥ̍ kurutE suvargasya# lOkasya samaṣṭyai-̍ [ ] 15

verses.padam: - Padam yat|Ekasminn|yUpE̱|dvE̍ iti|raśanE̍ iti|parivyayatIti̍# pari - vyayati|tasmA̱t|Eka̍ḥ|dvE̍ iti|jAyE̍ iti|vindatE|yat|na|EkA̱m|raśanAm|dvayO̱ḥ|yUpa̍yOḥ|parivyayatIti̍# pari - vyayati|tasmA̱t|na|EkA̱|dvau|patI̍ iti|vindatE|yam|kAmayE̍ta|strI|asya|jAyEta|iti̍|upAnta̍ ityupa̍ - antE|tasya|vyati̍ṣajEditi̍# vi - atiṣajEt|strI|Eva|asya|jAyatE|yam|kAmayE̍ta|pumAn̍|asya|jAyEta|iti̍|AntamityA̱̍ - antam|tasya|prEti̍|vEṣṭayEt|pumAn̍|Eva|asya|16̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yadEkasmina.̍ yUpE dvE raśanE̍ parivyaya̍ti̍ tasmAdEkO dvE jAyE vindatE̍ yannaikAṃ# raśanAM dvayOryUpayOḥ̍ parivyayati̍ tasmAnnaikA dvau patI# vindatE yaM kAmayEta̍ stryasya̍ jAyEtEtyupAntE̍ tasya vyatiṣajEth̍ stryEvAsya̍# jAyatE yaM kAmayEta̍ pumAnasya̍ jAyEtEtyAntaM tasya pra vE̱ṣṭayEt pumAnEvAsya̍-̍ [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam jAyatE|asurAḥ|vai|dEvAn|dakṣiṇataḥ|upEti̍|anayann|tAn|dEvAḥ|upaśayEnEtyu̍pa̍ - śayEna|Eva|apEti̍|anudanta|tat|upaśayasyEtyu̍pa̍ - śayasya|upaśayatvamityu̍paśaya̍ - tvam|yat|dakṣiṇataḥ|upaśaya ityupa̍ - śayaḥ|upaśaya ityupa̍ - śayE̱|BrAtRuvyApanuttyA̍ iti BrAtRuvya-apanuttyai|sarvE̱|vai|anyE|yUpA̱ḥ|paśumanta̍ iti# paśu - mantaḥ|atha̍|upaśaya̍ ityupa̍ - śayaḥ|Eva|apaśuḥ|tasya|yaja̍mAnaḥ|paśuḥ|yat|na|nirdiśEditi̍# niḥ - diśEt|Arti̱m|Eti|RucCEt|yaja̍mAnaḥ|asau|tE|paśuḥ|iti̍|niriti̍|diśEt|yam|dviṣyAt|yam|Eva|17̍ (50)
verses.samhita: jAyatE &surA̍ vai dEvAn dakṣiṇata̍ upAnayan̍ tAn dEvA upaśayEnaivApA̍-nudanta̍ ta-dupaśayasyO̍-paśayatvaM̍ ~Myad-dakṣiṇata̍ upaśaya̍ upaśayE̍ BrAtRuvyApanuttyai̍ sarvE vA anyE yUpA̱ḥ paśumantO&thOpaśaya̍ EvApaśustasya yajamAnaḥ̍ paśuryanna nirdiśEdArti-mArcCEd-̍ yajamAnO&sau̍ tE# paśuriti nirdiśEdyaM̍ dviṣyAd-yamEva- [ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam dvEṣṭi|tam|asmai|paśum|niriti̍|diśati|yadi̍|na|dviṣyAt|AKuḥ|tE|paśuḥ|iti̍|brUyAt|na|grAmyAn|paśUn|hinasti̍|na|AraṇyAn|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|asRujata|saḥ|annAdyEnEtyanna̍ - adyEna|vIti̍|ad^^rdhyata|saḥ|EtAm|EkAdaśinI̱m|apaśyat|tayA̱|vai|saḥ|annAdyamitya̍nna̍ - adya̱m|avEti|arundha|yat|daśa̍|yUpA̱ḥ|Bava̍nti|daśA̱kṣarEti̍ daśa# - akṣarA|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|anna̱m|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjEti# vi - rAjA̱|Eva|annAdyamityanna̍ - adya̱m|avEti|rundhE|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dvEṣṭi tamasmai̍ paśuM nirdiśati̍ yadi na dviṣyAdAKustE# paśuriti# brUyAnna grAmyAn paśUn. hinasti nA&&*raṇyAn prajApatiḥ̍ prajA asRujata̍ sO̱&nnAdyEna̍ vyA̱rddhyata sa EtAmEkAdaśinI̍-mapaśyat̍ tayA vai sO̱&nnAdyamavArundha̍ yaddaśa yUpA Bavanti̍ daśA̱kṣarA virAḍannaM̍ ~MvirAḍ virAjaivA-nnAdyamava# rundhE- [ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam yaḥ|EkAdaśaḥ|stanaḥ|Eva|asyai|saḥ|duhE|Eva|EnAm|tEna̍|vajra̍ḥ|vai|EṣA|samiti̍|mIyatE|yat|EkAdaśinI̱|sA|IśvarA|purastA̱t|pratya~jca̱m|yajñam|saMma̍rditOriti̍ saM - marditOḥ|yat|pAtnIvatamiti# pAtnI - vatam|minOti|yajñasya̍|pratIti̍|utta̍bdhyA̍ ityut - stabdhyai|sayatvAyEti# saya - tvAya||19̍ (30) (vai - samaṣṭyai̍ - pumAnEvAsya̍ - yamEva - rundhE̍ - triṃqśacca)̍ (A4)
verses.samhita: ya EkAdaśaḥ̍ stana# EvAsyai sa duha EvainAM tEna vajrO vA EṣA saM mIyatE̍ yadEkAdaśinI̍ sEśvarA purastA̱t pratya~jcaM̍ ~Myajñaṃ saMmarditOryat̍ pA̱tnIvataM minOti# yajñasya pratyuttabdhyai̍ sayatvAya||19̍ (vai - samaṣṭyai̍ - pumAnEvAsya̍ - yamEva - rundhE̍ - triṃqśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajA iti# pra-jAḥ|asRujata|saḥ|riricAnaḥ|amanyata|saḥ|EtAm|EkAdaśinI̱m|apaśyat|tayA̱|vai|saḥ|Ayuḥ|indriyam|vIrya̱m|Atmann|adhatta|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|iva|Kalu|vai|Eṣaḥ|sRujatE|yaḥ|yaja̍tE|saḥ|Etaṛhi̍|riricAnaḥ|iva|yat|EṣA|EkAdaśinI̱|Bava̍ti|Ayu̍ḥ|Eva|tayA̱|indriyam|vIrya̱m|yaja̍mAnaḥ|Atmann|dhattE|prEti̍|Eva|AgnEyEna̍|vApayati|mithunam|sArasvatyA|karOti|rEta̍ḥ|20̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prajApatiḥ̍ prajA asRujata̍ sa riricAnO̍&manyata̍ sa EtAmEkAdaśinI̍-mapaśyat̍ tayA vai sa AyurindriyaM̍ ~MvIryamAtmanna̍dhatta̍ prajA iva̍ Kalu vA Eṣa sRujatE̍ yO yajatE̍ sa Etaṛhi# riricAna iva̍ yadEṣaikAdaśinI̍ BavatyAyurEva̍ tayE̱ndriyaM ~MvIryaM̍ ~MyajamAna̍ Atman dhattE̍ praivA&&*gnEyEna# vApayati mithunaṃ sArasvatyA̍ karOti̍ rEtaḥ-̍ [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam saumyEna|dadhAti|prEti̍|janayati|pauṣṇEna̍|bArqḥaspatyaḥ|Bavati|brahma̍|vai|dEvAnA̱m|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|brahma̍ṇA|Eva|asmai|prajA̍ iti# pra-jAḥ|prEti|janayati|vaiśvadEva̍ iti# vaiśva - dEvaḥ|Bavati|vaiśvadEvya# iti# vaiśva - dEvyaḥ|vai|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|Eva|asmai|prEti|janayati|indriyam|Eva|aindrEṇa̍|avEti̍|rundhE|viśa̱m|mArutEna̍|Oja̍ḥ|bala̱m|aindrAgnEnEtyai̱ndra̍ - agnEna|prasavAyEti̍# pra - savAya|sAvitraḥ|nirvaruṇatvAyEti̍# nirvaruṇa - tvAya|vAruṇaḥ|maddhyataḥ|aindram|Eti̍|laBatE|maddhyataḥ|Eva|indriyam|yaja̍mAnE|dadhAti|21̍ (50)
verses.samhita: saumyEna# dadhAti pra janayati̍ pauṣṇEna# bAṛhaspatyO Bavati̍ brahma vai dEvAnAM bRuhaspatirbrahmaṇaivAsmai̱̍ prajAḥ prajanayati̍ vaiśvadEvO Bavati̍ vaiśvadEvyO# vai prajAḥ prajA EvAsmai prajanayatI-ndriyamEvaindrEṇAva̍# rundhE viśaM̍ mArutEnaujO balamaindrAgnEna̍# prasavAya# sAvitrO nirvaruṇatvAya̍# vAruṇO maddhyata̍ aindramA laBatE̍ maddhyata EvEndriyaM ~MyajamAnE̍ dadhAti- [ ] 21

verses.padam: - Padam purastA̱t|aindrasya|vaiśvadEvamiti̍# vaiśva - dEvam|Eti|laBatE|vaiśvadEvamiti̍# vaiśva - dEvam|vai|anna̱m|anna̱m|Eva|purastA̱t|dhattE|tasmA̱t|purastA̱t|anna̱m|adyatE|aindram|AlaByEtyA̱-laBya|mArutam|Eti̍|laBatE|viṭ|vai|maruta̍ḥ|viśa̱m|Eva|asmai|anviti̍|baddhnAti|yadi̍|kAmayE̍ta|yaḥ|ava̍gata̍ ityava# - gataḥ|saḥ|apEti|ruddhyatAm|yaḥ|apa̍ruddha̍ utyapa-̍ ruddhaḥ|saḥ|avEti|gacCatu|iti̍|aindrasya̍|lOkE|vAruṇam|Eti̍|laBEta|vAruṇasya̍|lOkE|aindram|22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: purastAdaindrasya̍# vaiśvadEvamA laBatE̍ vaiśvadEvaM ~MvA annamannamEva̍ purastA̱ddhattE tasmA̱t purastAdannamadyata̍ aindramAlaBya# mArutamA laBatE̍ viḍ vai marutO viśamEvAsmA̍ anu# baddhnAti yadi# kAmayEta̍ yO&vagataḥ̍ sO&pa# ruddhyatAM ~MyO&paruddhaḥ̍ sO&va# gacCatvityaindrasya# lOkE vAruṇamA̍ laBEta̍ vAruṇasya# lOka aindraM- [ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam yaḥ|Eva|avagata̍ ityava# - gataḥ|saḥ|apEti|ruddhyatE|yaḥ|apa̍ruddha̍ utyapa-ruddhaḥ|saḥ|avEti̍|gacCati|yadi̍|kAmayE̍ta|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|muhyEyuḥ|iti|paśUn|vyati̍ṣajEditi̍# vi - atiṣajEt|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|Eva|mOhayati|yat|aBivAhata ityaBi̍ - vAhataḥ|apAm|vAruṇam|AlaBEtEtyA̱ - laBEta|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|varuṇaḥ|gRuhṇIyAt|dakṣiṇataḥ|uda̍~jcam|Eti̍|laBatE|apavAhata̍ ityapa̍ - vAhataḥ|apAm|prajAnAmiti# pra - jAnA̱m|avaruṇagrAhAyEtyava̍ruṇa̍ - grAhAya||23 (37) (rEtO - yajamAnE̍ dadhAti - lOka aindraṃ - saptatriṃśacca)̍ (A5)
verses.samhita: ~Mya EvAvagataḥ̍ sO&pa# ruddhyatE yO&paruddhaḥ̍ sO&va# gacCati yadi# kAmayEta̍ prajA muhyEyuriti̍# paśUn vyatiṣajEt̍ prajA Eva mOhayati̍ yadaBivAhatO̍&pAM̍ ~MvAruṇamAlaBE̍ta̍ prajA varuṇO̍ gRuhṇIyAd-dakṣiṇata uda~jcamA̍ laBatE&pavAhatO̍&pAM̍ prajAnA-mavaruṇa̍ grAhAya||23 (rEtO - yajamAnE̍ dadhAti - lOka aindraṃ - saptatriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam indraḥ|patni̍yA|manu̱m|ayAjayat|tAm|parya̍gnikRutAmiti̍ paryagni̍ - kRutAm|uditi|asRujat|tayA̱|manu̍ḥ|Ad^^rdhnOt|yat|parya̍gnikRutamiti̍ paryagni-kRutam|pAtnIvatamiti̍# pAtnI-vatam|uthsRujatItyut̍ - sRujati|yAm|Eva|manu̍ḥ|Ruddhi̱m|Ad^^rdhnO̱t|tAm|Eva|yaja̍mAnaḥ|RuddhnOti|yajñasya̍|vai|apra̍tiṣṭhitAdityapra̍ti̍ - sthitAt|yajñaḥ|parEti|Bavati|yajñam|parABava̍ntamiti̍# parA - Bavantam|yaja̍mAnaḥ|anu̍|parEti̍|Bavati|yat|AjyE̍na|pAtnIvatamiti̍# pAtnI - vatam|saṅqsthApayatIti# saM - sthApayati|yajñasya̍|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati-sthityai|yajñam|pratitiṣṭha̍ntamiti̍# prati - tiṣṭhantam|yaja̍mAnaḥ|anu̍|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|iṣṭam|vapayA̱|24̍ (50)
verses.samhita: indraḥ patniyA̍ manumayAjayat̍ tAM paryagnikRutA-muda̍sRujat̍ tayA manurArddhnOdyat̍ paryagnikRutaM̍ pAtnIvatamuth̍ sRujati yAmEva manura. RuddhimArddhnOt tAmEva yajamAna̍ RudhnOti yajñasya vA apratiṣṭhitAd-yajñaḥ̍ parA# Bavati yajñaM parABava̍ntaM̍ ~MyajamAnO&nu̍ parA# Bavati yadAjyEna̍ pAtnIvataṃ saṅsthApaya̍ti̍ yajñasya pratiṣṭhityai̍ yajñaM pratitiṣṭha̍ntaM̍ ~MyajamAnO&nu̍ prati# tiṣṭhatIṣṭaM ~MvapayA- [ ] 24

verses.padam: - Padam Bavati|ani̍ṣṭam|vaśayA̱|atha̍|pAtnIvatEnEti̍# pAtnI - vatEna|prEti̍|carati|tIrttha|Eva|prEti̍|carati|athO̍ iti|Etaṛhi̍|Eva|asya|yAma̍ḥ|tvAṣṭraḥ|Bavati|tvaṣṭA̱|vai|rEta̍saḥ|siktasya̍|rUpAṇi̍|vIti̍|karOti|tam|Eva|vRuṣA̍ṇam|patnI̍ṣu|apIti̍|sRujati|saḥ|asmai|rUpAṇi̍|vIti̍|karOti||25̍ (36) (vapayA - ṣaṭtriṃśacca)̍ (A6)
verses.samhita: BavatyaniṣṭaM̍ ~MvaśayA&tha# pAtnIvatEna pra carati̍ tIrttha Eva pra caratyathO̍# EtarhyEvAsya yAmastvAṣṭrO̍ Bavati̍ tvaṣṭA vai rEtasaḥ̍ siktasya# rUpAṇi vi karOti̍ tamEva vRuṣAṇaM̍ patnIṣvapi# sRujati sO̱&smai rUpAṇi vi karOti||25̍ (vapayA - ṣaṭtriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam Gnanti|vA|Etat|sOma̱m|yat|aBiṣuṇvantItya̍Bi-sunvanti̍|yat|saumyaḥ|Bava̍ti|yathA̱|mRutAya̍|anustara̍ṇImitya̍nu̍ - staraṇIm|Gnanti̍|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|yat|uttarAd^^rdha̍ ityuttara̍ - ad^^rdhE|vA|maddhyE̱|vA|juhuyAt|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|samadamiti# sa - mada̱m|daddhyAt|dakṣiṇAd^^rdha iti# dakṣiṇa - ad^^rdhE|juhOti|EṣA|vai|pitRuṇAm|dik|svAyA̱m|Eva|diśi|pitRUn|niravadayata̍ iti# niḥ - avadayatE|udgAtRuBya̍ ityudgAtRu̍ - Byaḥ|haranti|sAmadEvatya# iti# sAma - dEvatyaḥ|vai|saumyaḥ|yat|Eva|sAmna̍ḥ|CabaMqṭkurvantIti̍# CaMbaṭ - kurvanti|tasya̍|Eva|saḥ|śAnti̍ḥ|avEti̍|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Gnanti vA Etath sOmaM ~MyadaBiṣuṇvanti̍ yath saumyO Bavati̍ yathA# mRutAyAnustara̍ṇIM̍ Gnanti# tAdRugEva tad yaduttarArddhE̍ vA maddhyE# vA juhuyAd-dEvatA̱Byaḥ samadaM̍ daddhyAd-dakṣiṇArddhE juhOtyEṣA̍ vai pitRuṇAM̍ diK svAyAmEva̍ diśi pitRUn niravadayata̍ udgAtRuByO# haranti sAmadEvatyO# vai saumyO yadEva sAmnaḥ̍ CaMbaṭkurvanti tasyaiva sa śAntiravE̱- [ ] 26

verses.padam: - Padam IkṣantE|pavitra̱m|vai|saumyaḥ|AtmAna̱m|Eva|pavayantE|yaḥ|AtmAna̱m|na|paripaśyEditi# pari-paśyE̱t|itAsuritIta-asuḥ|syAt|aBidadimityaBi̍ - dadim|kRutvA|avEti|IkṣEta|tasminn̍|hi|AtmAna̱m|paripaśyatIti̍# pari - paśyati|athO̍ iti|AtmAna̱m|Eva|pavayatE|yaḥ|gatama̍nA̍ iti# gata - manAḥ|syAt|saḥ|avEti|IkṣEta|yat|mE|mana̍ḥ|parA̍gatamiti̍ parA̱-gatam|yat|vA|mE|aparAgatamityapa̍rA-gatam||rAjñA̱|sOmE̍na|tat|vayam|asmAsu̍|dhArayAmasi|iti̍|mana̍ḥ|Eva|Atmann|dAdhAra|27̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -kṣantE pavitraM ~Mvai saumya AtmAnamEva̍ pavayantE̍ ya AtmAnaM na paripaśyE̍ditAsu̍ḥ̍ syAdaBidadiM kRutvA&vE̱kṣEta tasmina. hyA̱tmAnaM̍ paripaśyatyathO# AtmAnamEva̍ pavayatE̍ yO gatamanAḥ̍ syAth sO&vE̱kṣEta yanmE manaḥ parAgataM̍ ~MyadvA# mE aparAgataM|rAjñA̍ sOmEna̍ tadvayamasmAsu# dhArayAmasIti mana# EvAtman dAdhAra-̍ [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam na|gatamanA̍ iti# gata - manAḥ|Bavati|apEti|vai|tRutIyasavana̍ iti# tRutIya - savanE|yajñaḥ|krAmati|IjAnAt|anIjAnam|aBIti̍|AgnAvaiṣṇavyEtyA̱gnA̍ - vaiṣṇavyA|RucA|GRutasya|yajati|agniḥ|sarvA̱ḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|viṣṇu̍ḥ|yajñaḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|ca|Eva|yajñam|ca|dAdhAra|upAṅqśvityu̍pa̍ - aṃqśu|yajati|mithunatvAyEti# mithuna - tvAya|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|mitraḥ|yajñasya̍|svi̍ṣṭamiti̍ su-iṣṭam|yuvatE|varuṇaḥ|duri̍ṣṭamiti̍ duḥ - iṣṭam|kva|taṛhi̍|yajñaḥ|kva̍|yaja̍mAnaḥ|Bavati|iti̍|yat|maitrAvaruṇImiti̍# maitrA - varuṇIm|vaśAm|AlaBata̍ ityA̱ - laBatE|mitrEṇa̍|Eva|28̍ (50)
verses.samhita: na gatamanA̍ Bavatyapa vai tRutIyasavanE̍ yajñaḥ krAmatIjAnA-danI̍jAnamaByA̱-gnAvaiṣṇavyarcA̍ GRutasya# yajatyagniḥ sarvA# dEvatA viṣṇuryajñO̍ dEvatA̱ścaiva yajñaM ca# dAdhArOpAṃqśu yajati̍ mithunatvAya# brahmavAdinO# vadanti mitrO yajñasya sviṣṭaM̍ ~MyuvatE varuṇO̍ duriṣṭaM̍ kva# taṛhi# yajñaḥ kva# yajamAnO̍ BavatIti yanmai̱trAvaruṇIM ~MvaśAmAlaBatE̍ mitrEṇaiva- [ ] 28

verses.padam: - Padam yajñasya|svi̍ṣṭamiti̍ su - iṣṭam|śamayati|varuṇEna|duri̍ṣṭamiti̍ duḥ - iṣṭam|na|Arti̱m|Eti|RucCati|yaja̍mAnaḥ|yathA̱|vai|lA~gga̍lEna|urvarA̱m|praBindantIti̍# pra - Bindanti|Evam|RuKsAmE̍ ityRuk̍ - sAmE|yajñam|prEti|Bintaḥ|yat|maitrAvaruṇImiti̍# maitrA - varuṇIm|vaśAm|AlaBata̍ ityA̱-laBatE|yajñAya̍|Eva|praBi̍nnAyEti̍ pra - BinnAya|matya̱m|anvavA̱syatItyanu-avA̱syati|śAntyai̱|yAtayA̍mAnIti̍# yAta-yAmAni|vai|Etasya|CandAṃ̍si|yaḥ|IjAnaḥ|Canda̍sAm|Eṣaḥ|rasa̍ḥ|yat|vaśA|yat|maitrAvaruṇImiti̍# maitrA - varuṇIm|vaśAm|AlaBata̍ ityA̱ - laBatE|CandAṃ̍si|Eva|puna̍ḥ|Eti̍|prIṇAti̍ ( )|ayAtayAmatvAyEtyayA̍tayAma̍ - tvAya|athO iti|Candassviti̍ Candaḥ̍ - su|Eva|rasa̱m|dadhAti||29 (56)
verses.samhita: yajñasya sviṣṭaṃ̍ śamayati varuṇEna̍ duriṣṭaM̍ nA&&*rtimArcCati̍ yajamAnO̍ yathA vai lA~ggalEnOrvarA̱M̍ praBindan-tyEvamRuKsAmE̍ yajñaM pra BintO̍ yanmai̱trAvaruṇIM ~MvaśAmAlaBatE̍ yajñAyaiva praBinnAya̍ matyamanvavA̱syati̍ śAntyai# yAtayAmAni̍ vA Etasya CandAṃsi̍ ya IjAnaḥ̍ CandasAmEṣa̍ rasO yad-vaśA yanmai̱trAvaruṇIM ~MvaśAmAlaBatE̍ CandAṅsyEva̍ punarA prIṇAtya̍ ( ) yAtayAmatvAyAthO̍ CandassvEva̍ rasaM̍ dadhAti||29

verses.padam: - Padam dEvA|vai|indriyam|vIryA̱m|vIti|aBajanta|tata̍ḥ|yat|atyaśi̍ṣyatEtya̍ti̍ - aśiṣyata|tat|atigrAhyA̍# ityati-grAhyA̱ḥ|aBavann|tat|atigrAhyA̍ṇAmitya̍ti̍ - grAhyAṇAm|atigrAhyatvamitya̍tigrAhya̍ - tvam|yat|atigrAhyA# ityati-grAhyA̱ḥ|gRuhyantE̱|indriyam|Eva|tat|vIrya̱m|yaja̍mAnaḥ|Atmann|dhattE|tEja̍ḥ|AgnEyEna̍|indriyam|aindrEṇa̍|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|sauryEṇa|upastaMBa̍namityu̍pa̍ - staMBanam|vai|Etat|yajñasya̍|yat|atigrAhyA̍# ityati̍ - grAhyA̱ḥ|cakrE iti|pRuṣṭhAni̍|yat|pRuṣṭhyE̱|na|gRuhṇIyAt|prA~jca̱m|yajñam|pRuṣṭhAni̍|samiti̍|śRuṇIyuḥ|yat|ukthyE̱|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvA vA indriyaM̍ ~MvIryAM̱(1q) ~MvyaBajanta̍ tatO yadatyaśiṣyata̍ tadatigrAhyA̍# aBavan tadatigrAhyA̍ṇA-matigrAhyatvaM̍ ~MyadatigrAhyA̍# gRuhyanta# indriyamEva tad-vIryaM̍ ~MyajamAna̍ Atman dhattE̍ tEja# AgnEyEnE̱ndriya-maindrEṇa# brahmavarcasaṃ sauryEṇOpastaMBa̍naM̍ ~MvA Etad-yajñasya yadatigrAhyA̱ścakrE̍ pRuṣṭhAni yat pRuṣṭhyE na gRuhṇIyAt̍ prA~jcaM̍ ~MyajñaM pRuṣṭhAni saṃ śRuṇIyuryadukthyE̍-̍ [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam gRuhṇIyAt|pratya~jca̱m|yajñam|atigrAhyA# ityati̍ - grAhyA̱ḥ|samiti|śRuṇIyuḥ|viśvajitIti̍# viśva - jiti|sarva̍pRuṣṭha̍ iti sarva# - pRuṣṭhE|grahItavyA̱ḥ|yajñasya|savIryatvAyEti̍# savIrya-tvAya|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|dEvEByaḥ|yajñAn|vyAdi̍śaditi̍# vi - Adiśat|saḥ|priyAḥ|tanUḥ|apa̍|nIti̍|adhatta|tat|atigrAhyA̍# ityati-grAhyA̱ḥ|aBavann|vita̍nuriti̍ vi-tanuḥ|tasya|yajñaḥ|iti̍|Ahuḥ|yasya̍|atigrAhyA̍# ityati̍ - grAhyA̱ḥ|na|gRuhyantE̱|iti|apIti̍|agniṣṭOma̍ ityagni̍ - stOmE|grahItavyA̱ḥ|yajñasya|satanutvAyEti̍# satanu - tvAya|dEvatA̱ḥ|vai|sarvA̱ḥ|sadRuśI̱ḥ|Asann|tAḥ|na|vyAvRutamiti̍# vi-AvRuta̱m|agacCann|tE|dEvAḥ|31 (50)
verses.samhita: gRuhṇIyAt pratya~jcaM̍ ~MyajñamatigrAhyA̱ḥ̍ saṃ śRuṇIyurviśvajiti̍ sarvapRuṣṭhE̍ grahItavyA# yajñasya# savIryatvAya# prajApatirdEvEByO̍# yajñAn vyAdiśath̍ sa priyAstanUrapa nyadhatta̍ tadatigrAhyA̍# aBavan vitanustasya̍# yajña ityAhurya-syA̍tigrAhyA̍# na gRuhyanta ityapyagniṣṭOmE̍ grahItavyA̍# yajñasya# satanutvAya# dEvatA vai sarvA̱ḥ sadRuśIrAsan̍ tA na vyAvRuta-magacCan̍ tE dEvA- [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam EtE|EtAn|grahAn|apaśyann|tAn|agRuhṇata|AgnEyam|agniḥ|aindram|indra̍ḥ|sauryam|sUrya̍ḥ|tata̍ḥ|vai|tE|anyABi̍ḥ|dEvatA̍Biḥ|vyAvRutamiti̍# vi - AvRuta̱m|agacCann|yasya|Evam|viduṣa̍ḥ|EtE|grahA̱ḥ|gRuhyantE̱|vyAvRutamiti̍# vi-AvRuta̱m|Eva|pApmanA̱|BrAtRuvyEṇa|gacCati|imE|lOkAḥ|jyOti̍ṣmantaḥ|samAva̍dvIryA̍ iti# samAvat̍ - vIryAḥ|kAryA̱ḥ|iti|Ahuḥ|AgnEyEna̍|asminn|lOkE|jyOti̍ḥ|dhattE|aindrEṇa̍|antari̍kṣE|indravAyU̍ itI̱ndra - vAyU|hi|sayujAviti# sa-yujau̱|sauryEṇa|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|32̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Eta EtAn grahAnapaśyan̍ tAnagRuhṇatA&&*gnE̍ yamagniraindramindraḥ̍ sauryaṃ sUryastatO vai tE̱&nyABi-rdEvatA̍Bi-rvyAvRuta̍magacCanq.̍ yasyaivaM ~Mviduṣa# EtE grahA# gRuhyantE̱ vyAvRutamEva̍ pApmanA BrAtRuvyEṇa̍ gacCatImE lOkA jyOtiṣmantaḥ̍ samAvad-vIryAḥ̍ kAryA# ityAhurAgnEyEnAsmin̍ ~MlOkE jyOtirddhatta̍ aindrEṇAntarikṣa̍ indravAyU hi sayujau# sauryEṇAmuṣmin̍ ~MlOkE- [ ] 32
