verses.padam: - Padam śatAya|svAhA̱|sahasrA̍ya|svAhA̱|ayutA̍ya|svAhA̱|niyutAyEti̍# ni - yutAya|svAhA̱|prayutAyEti̍# pra - yutAya|svAhA̱|arbu̍dAya|svAhA̱|nya̍rbudAyEti̍ ni - arbudAya|svAhA̱|samudrAya|svAhA̱|maddhyA̍ya|svAhA̱|antA̍ya|svAhA̱|parAd^^rdhAyEti̍# para-ad^^rdhAya|svAhA̱|uṣasE̱|svAhA̱|vyu̍ṣṭyA̍ iti vi - uṣṭyai|svAhA̱|udEṣyata ityut̍ - EṣyatE|svAhA̱|udyata ityut̍ - yatE|svAhA̱|uditAyEtyut̍ - itAya|svAhA̱|suvargAyEti# suvaḥ-gAya|svAhA̱|lOkAya̍|svAhA̱|sarva̍smai|svAhA̱||50̍ (38) (śatAyA-&ṣṭAtriṃśat)̍ (A20) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 20 Anuvaakams :- (sAdhyAḥ ṣaḍ̍ rAtraM - kusurubinda̍ḥ̍ saptarAtraM - bRuhaspatiraṣṭarAtraM̍ - prajApatistAḥ̍ kṣudhannavarAtraM̍ - prajApatirakAmayata̍ daśahOtArAtra̍ - mRutava# - aindravAyavAgrA̱n - gAyatrO vai - prajApatiḥ̍ sa dvAdaśarAtraM̍ - na vA -EkasmA̍ - Ekasmai̍ - dvAByA̱M - triByaḥ - caturByaḥ̍ - pa~jcaByO# - daśaByO# - viṃśatyai - pa~jcAśatE̍# - śatAya# - viṃśatiḥ ) Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (sAdhyA - asmA̍ imE lOkA - gAyatraM̍ - ~Mvai tRutIya - mEkasmai̍ - pa~jcAśat ) First and Last Padam of śecOnd Prasnam of 7th Kandam (sAdhyAḥ - sarvasmai̍ svAhA̱ )||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE saptamakAṇḍE dvitIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||===============================================
verses.samhita: śatAya svAhA# sahasrAya̍ svAhA &yutAya̍ svAhA# niyutAya̍ svAhA̱ prayutAya̍ svAhA &rbudAya̍ svAhA nyarbudAya̍ svAhA# samudrAya svAhA maddhyAya̍ svAhA &ntAya̍ svAhA# parArddhAya svAhOṣasE svAhA vyuṣṭyai̍ svAhOdEṣyatE̍ svAhO̱dyatE svAhOditAya̍ svAhA# suvargAya svAhA# lOkAya svAhA sarvasmai̍ svAhA̱||50 (śatAyA-&ṣṭAtriṃśat)̍ (A20) praśna kOrvai with starting padams of 1 to 20 anuvAkams :- (sAdhyAḥ ṣaḍ̍ rAtraM - kusurubinda̍ḥ̍ saptarAtraM - bRuhaspatiraṣṭarAtraM̍ - prajApatistAḥ̍ kṣudhannavarAtraM̍ - prajApatirakAmayata̍ daśahOtArAtra̍ - mRutava# - aindravAyavAgrA̱n - gAyatrO vai - prajApatiḥ̍ sa dvAdaśarAtraM̍ - na vA -EkasmA̍ - Ekasmai̍ - dvAByA̱M - triByaḥ - caturByaḥ̍ - pa~jcaByO# - daśaByO# - viṃśatyai - pa~jcAśatE̍# - śatAya# - viṃśatiḥ ) kOrvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (sAdhyA - asmA̍ imE lOkA - gAyatraM̍ - ~Mvai tRutIya - mEkasmai̍ - pa~jcAśat ) first and last padam of second praśnam of 7th kAṇḍam (sAdhyAḥ - sarvasmai̍ svAhA̱ )||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM saptamakAṇḍE dvitIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||================================== OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ hariḥ OM 7.3 saptamakAṇḍE tRutIyaḥ praśnaḥ - satrajAtanirUpaṇaM

verses.padam: - Padam prajavamiti# pra - java̱m|vai|EtEna|yanti|yat|daśamam|aha̍ḥ|pApAvahIyamiti̍# pApa - avahIya̱m|vai|EtEna|Bavanti|yat|daśamam|aha̍ḥ|yaḥ|vai|prajavamiti̍# pra - java̱m|yatAm|apathEna|pratipadya̍ta̍ iti# prati - padyatE|yaḥ|sthAṇum|hanti̍|yaḥ|BrEṣa̱m|nyEtIti̍# ni - Eti|saḥ|hIyatE|saḥ|yaḥ|vai|daśamE|ahann̍|avivAkya̍ ityavi̍ - vAkyE|upahanyata ityupa-hanyatE̱|saḥ|hIyatE|tasmai̱|yaḥ|upa̍hatAyEtyupa̍-hatAya|vyAhEti̍# vi - Aha|tam|Eva|anvAraByEtya̍nu̍ - AraBya|samiti̍|aśnutE|atha̍|yaḥ|vyAhEti̍# vi - Aha|saḥ|1̍ ( 50)
verses.samhita: prajavaM ~MvA EtEna# yanti yad-daśamamaha̍ḥ̍ pApAvahIyaM ~MvA EtEna# Bavanti yad-daśamamaharyO̍ vai prajavaM̍ ~MyatAmapathEna̍ pratipadyatE̍ yaḥ sthAṇuṃ hanti yO BrEṣaM nyEti sa hIyatE̍ sa yO vai daśamE&ha̍nnavivAkya̍ upahanyatE̍ sa hIyatE̍ tasmai ya upahatAya̍ vyAha tamEvAnvAraBya samaśnutE&tha̍ yO vyAha sa - [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam hIyatE|tasmA̱t|daśamE|ahann|avivAkya̍ ityavi̍ - vAkyE|upahatAyEtyupa̍# - hatAya|na|vyucyamiti# vi-ucya̱m|athO iti|Kalu̍|Ahuḥ|yajñasya̍|vai|samRu̍ddhEnEti̍ saM - RuddhEna|dEvAḥ|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Ayann|yajñasya|vyRu̍ddhEnEti̍ vi - RuddhEna|asurAn|parEti̍|aBAvayann|iti̍|yat|Kalu̍|vai|yajñasya̍|samRu̍ddhamiti̍ saM - Ruddham|tat|yajamAnasya|yat|vyRu̍ddhamiti̍ vi-Ruddham|tat|BrAtRuvyasya|saḥ|yaḥ|vai|daśamE|ahann̍|avivAkya̍ ityavi̍ - vAkyE|upahanyata ityupa̍ - hanyatE̱|saḥ|Eva|atIti|rEcayati|tE|yE|bAhyA̱ḥ|dRuśIkava̍ḥ|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: hIyatE̍ tasmA̱d-daśamE &hannavivAkya̍ upahatAya̍ na vyucyamathO KalvAhuryajñasya̍ vai samRuddhEna̍ dEvAḥ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyan̍ yajñasya vyRuddhEnAsu̍rAn̍ parA&BAvayanniti̍ yat Kalu vai yajñasya samRuddhaM̍ tad-yajamAnasya̍ yadvyRuddhaM̍ tadBrAtRuvyasya̍ sa yO vai daśamE&ha̍nnavivAkya̍ upahanyatE̍ sa EvAti# rEcayati tE yE bAhyA# dRuśIkavaḥ - [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam syuḥ|tE|vIti|brUyuḥ|yadi̍|tatra̍|na|vindEyu̍ḥ|antassadasAditya̍ntaḥ̍ - sadasAt|vyucyamiti# vi - ucya̱m|yadi|tatra̍|na|vindEyu̍ḥ|gRuhapa̍tinEti̍# gRuha - patinA|vyucyamiti# vi- ucya̱m|tat|vyucyamiti# vi - ucya̱m|Eva|atha|vai|Etat|sarparAjñiyA̍ iti# sarpa - rAjñiyA̱ḥ|RugBirityRuk̍ - Biḥ|stuvanti|iyam|vai|sarpataḥ|rAjñI̱|yat|vai|asyAm|kim|ca|arca̍nti|yat|AnRucuḥ|tEna̍|iyam|sarparAjñIti̍# sarpa-rAjñI|tE|yat|Eva|kim|ca|vAcA|AnRucuḥ|yat|atOdhi|arcitAra̍ḥ|3̍ (50)
verses.samhita: syustE vi brUyuryadi̍ tatra na vindEyurantassadasAd-vyucyaM̍ ~Myadi tatra na vindEyurgRuhapa̍tinA̍ vyucyaM tadvyucyamEvAtha̍ vA Etath sarparAjñiyA̍# RugBiḥ stuvantayaM̍ ~Mvai sarpatO̍ rAjñI yadvA asyAM kiM cArcanti̍ yadAnRucustEnEyaṃ̍ sarparAjñI̍ tE yadEva kiM ca# vAcA &&nRucuryadatO&ddhyarcitAra̍ - [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam tat|uBaya̱m|AptvA|avaruddhyEtyava̍ - ruddhya|uditi̍|tiṣṭhAma|iti̍|tABi̍ḥ|mana̍sA|stuvatE|na|vai|imAm|aśvaratha̍ ityaśva̍ - rathaḥ|na|aśvatarIratha ityaśvatarI̍ - rathaḥ|sadyaḥ|paryA̱ptumiti pari-Aptum|aṛqhati|mana̍ḥ|vai|imAm|sadyaḥ|paryA̱ptumiti̍ pari# - Aptum|aṛqhati|manaḥ|pari̍Bavitumiti̍ pari-Bavitum|atha̍|brahma̍|vadanti|pari̍mitA̍ iti pari-mitAḥ|vai|Ruca̍ḥ|pari̍mitAnIti̍ pari# - mitAni|sAmAni|pari̍mitAnIti̍ pari# - mitAni|yajUṃṣi|atha̍|Etasya̍|Eva|anta̍ḥ|na|asti|yat|brahma̍|tat|pratigRuṇata̍ iti# prati - gRuṇatE|Eti|cakṣIta|saḥ̍ ( )|pratigara iti# prati - garaḥ||4 (51)
verses.samhita: -staduBayamAptvA̍ &varuddhyOt tiṣṭhAmEti̍ tABirmanasA̍ stuvatE na vA imAmaśvarathO̍ nA&śvatarIrathaḥ̍ sadyaḥ paryA̱ptumaṛhati manO vA imAṃ sadyaḥ paryA̱ptumaṛhati manaḥ pariBavitumatha̍ brahma# vadanti parimitA̍ vA Rucaḥ parimitAni̍ sAmAni̍ parimitAni̍ yajUṅqṣyathaitasyaivAntO nAsti yad-brahma tat pratigRuṇata̍ A cakṣIta̍ sa ( ) pratigaraḥ||4̍

verses.padam: - Padam brahmavAdina iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|kim|dvAdaśAhasyEti̍# dvAdaśa - ahasya|prathamEna̍|ahnA̱|RutvijA̱m|yaja̍mAnaḥ|vRu~gktE|iti̍|tEja̍ḥ|indriyam|iti̍|kim|dvitIyE̍na|iti̍|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|annAdyamityanna̍ - adya̱m|iti|kim|tRutIyE̍na|iti̍|trIn|imAn|lOkAn|iti̍|kim|caturtthEna̍|iti̍|catu̍ṣpada̍ iti catuḥ-padaḥ|paśUn|iti̍|kim|pa~jcamEna̍|iti̍|pa~jcA̱kṣarAmiti̍ pa~jca# - akṣarAm|pa~gktim|iti|kim|ṣaṣṭhEna̍|iti̍|ṣaṭ|RutUn|iti̍|kim|saptamEna̍|iti̍|saptapa̍dAmiti̍# sapta - padAm|śakvarIm|iti̍|5̍ (50)
verses.samhita: brahmavAdinO# vadanti kiM dvAdaśAhasya̍# prathamEnAhnartvijAM ~MyajamAnO̍ vRu~gkta iti tEja# indriyamiti kiM dvitIyEnEti# prAṇAnannAdyamiti kiM tRutIyEnEti trInimAn ~MlOkAniti kiM caturtthEnEti̍ catuṣpadaḥ̍ paśUniti kiM pa~jcamEnEti̍ pa~jcA̱kṣarAM pa~gktimiti kiṃ ṣaṣṭhEnEti ṣaḍ RutUniti kiṃ saptamEnEti̍# saptapadAṃq̍ śakvarImiti̍ - [ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam kim|aṣṭamEna|iti̍|aṣṭAkṣa̍rAmityaṣṭA̍ - akṣarAm|gAyatrIm|iti|kim|navamEna̍|iti̍|trivRutamiti̍# tri - vRuta̱m|stOma̱m|iti|kim|daśamEna̍|iti̍|daśA̱kṣarAmiti̍ daśa# - akṣarAm|virAjamiti# vi - rAja̱m|iti|kim|EkAdaśEna̍|iti̍|EkA̍daśAkṣarAmityEkA̍daśa̍ - akṣarAm|triṣṭuBa̱m|iti|kim|dvAdaśEna̍|iti̍|dvAda̍śAkṣarAmiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - akṣarAm|jagatIm|iti̍|EtAva̍t|vai|asti|yAva̍t|Etat|yAva̍t|Eva|asti̍|tat|EṣAm|vRu~gktE||6̍ (41) (śakvarImityE̍ - kacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: kimaṣṭamEnEtyaṣṭAkṣa̍rAM̍ gAyatrImiti kiM navamEnEti̍# trivRutaṅq stOmamiti kiM daśamEnEti̍ daśA̱kṣarAM ~MvirAjamiti kimEkAdaśEnEtyEkA̍daśAkṣarAM̍ triṣṭuBamiti kiM dvAdaśEnEti̍ dvAdaśAkṣarAM̍ jagatImityEtAvadvA̍ asti̍ yAvadEtad-yAva̍dEvAsti̍ tadEṣAM̍ ~MvRu~gktE||6 (śakvarImityE̍ - kacatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam Eṣaḥ|vai|Aptaḥ|dvAdaśAha iti# dvAdaśa - ahaḥ|yat|trayOdaśarAtra iti# trayOdaśa - rAtraḥ|samAnam|hi|Etat|ahaḥ|yat|prAyaṇIya̍ iti# pra - ayanIyaḥ|ca|udayanIya̍ ityut̍ - ayanIyaḥ|ca|trya̍tirAtra̍ iti tri - atirAtraḥ|Bavati|trayaḥ|imE|lOkAḥ|EṣAm|lOkAnA̱m|Aptyai̱|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|vai|prathamaḥ|atirAtra ityati̍ - rAtraḥ|vyAna iti# vi - anaḥ|dvitIyaḥ|apAna̍ ityapa-anaḥ|tRutIya̍ḥ|prAṇApAnOdAnEṣviti̍# prAṇApAna - udAnEṣu|Eva|annAdya̍ ityanna̍ - adyE̱|pratIti|tiṣṭhanti|sarva̱m|Ayu̍ḥ|yanti|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsa̍ḥ|trayOdaśarAtramiti̍# trayOdaśa - rAtram|AsatE|tat|Ahuḥ|vAk|vai|EṣA|vitatEti̍ vi - tatA|7 (50)
verses.samhita: Eṣa vA AptO dvAdaśAhO̍ yat trayOdaśarAtraḥ̍ samAnaṅ̍ hyEtadaharyat̍ prAyaṇIya̍ścOdayanIya̍śca̍ tryatirAtrO̍ Bavati traya# imE lOkA EṣAM ~MlOkAnAmAptyai̱ prAṇO vai prathamO̍&tirAtrO̍ vyAnO dvitIyO# &pAnastRutIyaḥ̍ prAṇApAnO-dAnEṣvEvAnnAdyE prati# tiṣṭhanti sarvamAyuryanti̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsa-strayOdaśarAtra-mAsa̍tE̍ tadAhurvAgvA̍ EṣA vitatA̍ - [ ] 7

verses.padam: - Padam yat|dvAdaśAha iti# dvAdaśa - ahaḥ|tAm|vIti|Cindyuḥ|yat|maddhyE̱|atirAtramitya̍ti-rAtram|kuryuḥ|upadAsukEtyu̍pa-dAsu̍kA|gRuhapa̍tEriti̍# gRuha - patEḥ|vAk|syAt|upariṣṭAt|CandOmAnAmiti̍# Candaḥ - mAnA̱m|mahAvratamiti# mahA - vratam|kurvanti|saMtatAmiti̍ saM-tatAm|Eva|vAca̱m|avEti|rundhatE|anu̍padAsukEtyanu̍pa̍ - dAsukA|gRuhapatEriti̍# gRuha - patEḥ|vAk|Bavati|paśavaḥ|vai|CandOmA̍ iti# Candaḥ - mAḥ|anna̱m|mahAvratamiti# mahA - vratam|yat|upariṣṭAt|CandOmAnAmiti̍# Candaḥ - mAnA̱m|mahAvratamiti# mahA - vratam|kurvanti|paśuṣu̍|ca|Eva|annAdya̍ ityanna̍ - adyE̱|ca|pratIti|tiṣṭhanti||8̍ (43) (vitatA̍ - tricatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: yad dvAdaśAhastAM̍ ~MvicCindyuryanmaddhyE̍# &tirAtraM kuryurupadAsu̍kA̍ gRuhapatErvAK̍ syA-dupari̍ṣṭAcCandOmAnA̱M̍ mahAvrataM kurvanti̍ saMtatAmEva̍ vAcamava# rundhatE&nupadAsukA̍ gRuhapatErvAg-Ba̍vati̍ paśavO vai CandOmA̍ annaM̍ mahAvrataM ~MyadupariṣṭAcCandOmAnA̱M̍ mahAvrataM kurvanti# paśuṣu# caivAnnAdyE# ca prati# tiṣṭhanti||8 (vitatA̍ - tricatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam AdityAḥ|akAmayanta|uBayO̱ḥ|lOkayO̱ḥ|RuddhnuyAma|iti|tE|Etam|caturdaśarAtramiti̍# caturdaśa - rAtram|apaśyann|tam|Eti|aharann|tEna̍|ayajanta|tata̍ḥ|vai|tE|uBayO̱ḥ|lOkayO̱ḥ|Ad^^rdhnuvann|asminn|ca|amuṣminn̍|ca|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsa̍ḥ|caturdaśarAtramiti̍# caturdaśa - rAtram|AsatE|uBayO̱ḥ|Eva|lOkayO̱ḥ|Ruddhnuvanti|asminn|ca|amuṣminn̍|ca|caturdaśarAtra̍ iti# caturdaśa - rAtraḥ|Bavati|sapta|grAmyAḥ|Oṣadhayaḥ|sapta|AraṇyAḥ|uBayI̍ṣAm|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava-ruddhyai|yat|parAcInA̍ni|pRuṣṭhAni̍|9̍ (50)
verses.samhita: AdityA akAmayantO-BayO̱rlOkayOr̍# RuddhnuyAmEti ta EtaM caturdaśarAtra-̍ mapaśyan̍ tamA&haran̍ tEnAyajanta̍ tatO vai ta uBayO̱-rlOkayO-rArddhnuvannasmiṅścA-muṣmiṅ̍śca̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsa-̍ ścaturdaśarAtramAsata̍ uBayOrEva̍ lOkayOr.̍ RuddhnuvantyasmiṅścA-muṣmiṅśca̍ caturdaśarAtrO Bavati̍ sapta grAmyA Oṣadhayaḥ̍ saptA&&*raṇyA uBayIṣAmava̍ruddhyai̍ yat parAcInA̍ni̍ pRuṣṭhAni - [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam Bavanti|amum|Eva|taiḥ|lOkam|aBIti̍|jayanti|yat|pratIcInA̍ni|pRuṣṭhAni̍|Bava̍nti|imam|Eva|taiḥ|lOkam|aBIti̍|jayanti|trayastriṃqśAviti̍# trayaḥ - triṃqśau|maddhyataḥ|stOmau̱|Bavataḥ|sAmrA̱jyamiti sAM - rAjyam|Eva|gacCanti|adhirAjAvityadhi̍ - rAjau|Bavataḥ|adhirAjA ityadhi̍ - rAjAḥ|Eva|samAnAnA̱m|Bavanti|atirAtrAvityati̍ - rAtrau|aBitaḥ|Bavataḥ|pari̍gRuhItyA̍ iti pari# - gRuhItyai||10 (34) (pRuṣṭhAni - catustriṃśacca)̍ (A4)
verses.samhita: BavantyamumEva̍ tairlOkamaBi jayanti̍ yat pratIcInA̍ni̍ pRuṣṭhAni BavantImamEva̍ tairlOkamaBi jayanti̍ trayastriṃqśau maddhyataḥ̍ stOmau# Bavataḥ sAmrA̱jyamEva gacCantyadhirAjau̍ BavatO&dhirAjA̍ Eva samAnAnA̱M̍ BavantyatirAtrAvaBitO# Bavataḥ parigRuhItyai||10̍ (pRuṣṭhAni - catustriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|ait|tam|dEvAḥ|anviti|Ayann|tAn|AdityAḥ|ca|paśava̍ḥ|ca|anviti̍|Ayann|tE|dEvAḥ|abruvan.|yAn|paśUn|upAjI̍viṣmEtyu̍pa̍ - ajIviṣma|tE|imE|anvAgmannitya̍nu-Agmann̍|iti̍|tEBya̍ḥ|Etam|caturdaśarAtramiti̍# caturdaśa-rAtram|pratIti|auhann|tE|AdityAḥ|pRuṣṭhaiḥ|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Eti|arOhann|tryahAByAmiti̍# tri - ahAByA̱m|asminn|lOkE|paśUn|pratIti|auhann|pRuṣṭhaiḥ|AdityAḥ|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|Ad^^rdhnu̍vann|tryahAByAmiti̍# tri - ahAByA̱m|asminn|11 (50)
verses.samhita: prajApatiḥ̍ suvargaM ~MlOkamait taM dEvA anvAyan̍ tAnAdityAśca̍# paśavaścAnvAyan̍ tE dEvA abruvana.̍ yAn paśUnupAjIviṣma̍ ta imE̱ &nvAgmanniti tEBya# EtaM caturdaśarAtraM̍ pratyauhan̍ ta AdityAḥ̍ pRuṣṭhaiḥ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamA&rOhan̍ tryahAByAmasmin̍ ~MlOkE paśUn pratyauhan̍ pRuṣṭhairAdityA̍ amuṣmin̍ ~MlOka Arddhnuvan̍ tryahAByAmasmin̍ - [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam lOkE|paśavaḥ|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsa̍ḥ|caturdaśarAtramiti̍# caturdaśa - rAtram|AsatE|uBayO̱ḥ|Eva|lOkayO̱ḥ|Ruddhnuvanti|asminn|ca|amuṣminn̍|ca|pRuṣṭhaiḥ|Eva|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|Ruddhnuvanti̍|tryahAByAmiti̍# tri - ahAByA̱m|asminn|lOkE|jyOtiḥ|gauḥ|Ayu̍ḥ|iti̍|tryaha̍ iti# tri-ahaḥ|Bavati|iyam|vAva|jyOtiḥ|antari̍kṣam|gauḥ|asau|Ayu̍ḥ|imAn|Eva|lOkAn|aByArO̍hantItya̍Bi̍ - ArOhanti|yat|anyata̍ḥ|pRuṣṭhAni̍|syuḥ|vivi̍vadhamiti̍ vi-vivadham|syAt|maddhyE̱|pRuṣṭhAni|Bavanti|savivadhatvAyEti̍# savivadha - tvAya|12̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ~MlOkE paśavO ya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsa-ścaturdaśarAtramAsa̍ta̍ uBayOrEva̍ lOkayOr# RuddhnuvantyasmiṅścAmuṣmiṅśca̍ pRuṣṭhairEvA&muṣmin̍ ~MlOka Ruddhnuvanti̍# tryahAByAmasmin̍ ~MlOkE jyOtirgaurAyuriti# tryahO BavatIyaM̍ ~MvAva jyOtirantari̍kṣaM̍ gaurasAvAyurimAnEva̍ lOkAnaByArOhanti̍ yadanyataḥ̍ pRuṣṭhAni syurvivivadhaṅ̍ syAnmaddhyE# pRuṣṭhAni# Bavanti savivadhatvAyau - [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam Ojaḥ|vai|vIrya̱m|pRuṣṭhAni̍|Oja̍ḥ|Eva|vIrya̱m|maddhyataḥ|dadhatE|bRuhadrathantarAByAmiti̍# bRuhat - rathantarAByA̱m|yanti|iyam|vAva|rathantaramiti# rathaM - taram|asau|bRuhat|AByAm|Eva|yanti|athO iti|anayO̱ḥ|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|EtE̍ iti|vai|yajñasya̍|a~jjasAya̍nI̍ itya~jjasA̍ - ayanI|srutI̍ iti|tAByA̱m|Eva|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|yanti|parA̱~jcaḥ|vai|EtE|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|aByArOhantItya̍Bi̍ - ArOhanti|yE|parAcInA̍ni|pRuṣṭhAni̍|upayantItyu̍pa̍ - yanti|pratya~g|tryaha̍ iti# tri - ahaḥ|Bavati|pratyavarUḍhyA̍ iti# prati - avarUḍhyai|athO̍ iti|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati-sthityai̍ ( )|uBayO̱ḥ|lOkayO̱ḥ|RuddhvA|uditi|tiṣṭhanti|catu̍rdaśEti̍ catuḥ̍ - daśa|EtAḥ|tAsA̱m|yAḥ|daśa|daśA̱kṣarEti̍ daśa# - akṣarA|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|anna̱m|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjEti# vi - rAjA̱|Eva|annAdyamityanna̍ - adya̱m|avEti|rundhatE|yAḥ|cata̍sraḥ|cata̍sraḥ|diśa̍ḥ|dikṣu|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|atirAtrAvitya̍ti̍ - rAtrau|aBitaḥ|Bavataḥ|pari̍gRuhItyA̍ iti pari# - gRuhItyai||13 (81) (Ardhnuvan̍ tryahAByAmasminth̍ - savivadhatvAya̍ - pratiṣṭhatyA̍ - Ekatriṃśacca)̍ (A5)
verses.samhita: -jO vai vIryaM̍ pRuṣṭhAnyOja# Eva vIryaM̍ maddhyatO dadhatE̍ bRuhad-rathantarAByA̱M ~MyantIyaM ~MvAva rathantaramasau̍ bRuhadAByAmEva yantyathO# anayOrEva̍ prati# tiṣṭhantyEtE vai yajñasyA̱~jjasAyanI̍ srutI tAByAmEva̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM ~Myanti̍ parA̱~jcO vA EtE suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamaByArOhanti̍ yE parAcInA̍ni̍ pRuṣṭhAnyupayanti̍# pratya~g tryahO Bavati̍ pratyavarUḍhyA̍ athO pratiṣṭhityA̍ ( ) uBayO̱rlOkayOr# RuddhvOt tiṣṭhanti̍ caturdaśaitAstAsAM̍ ~MyA daśa daśA̱kṣarA virAḍannaM̍ ~MvirAḍ virAjaivAnnAdyamava# rundhatE yAścatasraścata̍srO̍ diśO# dikṣvEva̍ prati# tiṣṭhantyatirAtrAvaBitO# Bavataḥ parigRuhItyai||13̍ (Ardhnuvan̍ tryahAByAmasminth̍ - savivadhatvAya̍ - pratiṣṭhatyA̍ - Ekatriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam indraḥ|vai|sadRu~g~giti̍# sa - dRu~g|dEvatABiḥ|AsIt|saḥ|na|vyAvRutamiti̍# vi - AvRuta̱m|agacCat|saḥ|prajApatimiti̍# prajA - patim|upEti|adhAvat|tasmai̱|Etam|pa~jcadaśarAtramiti̍# pa~jcadaśa-rAtram|prEti|ayacCat|tam|Eti̍|aharat|tEna̍|ayajata|tata̍ḥ|vai|saḥ|anyABi̍ḥ|dEvatA̍Biḥ|vyAvRutamiti̍# vi - AvRuta̱m|agacCat|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsaḥ|pa~jcadaśarAtramiti̍# pa~jcadaśa - rAtram|AsatE|vyAvRutamiti̍# vi - AvRuta̱m|Eva|pApmanA̱|BrAtRuvyEṇa|gacCanti|jyOti̍ḥ|gauḥ|Ayu̍ḥ|iti̍|tryaha̍ iti# tri - ahaḥ|Bavati|iyam|vAva|jyOtiḥ|antari̍kṣam|14̍ (50)
verses.samhita: indrO vai sadRu~g dEvatABirAsIth̍ sa na vyAvRutamagacCath̍ sa prajApatimupA̍dhAvat̍ tasmA# EtaM pa~jcadaśarAtraM̍ prAyacCat̍ tamA&harat̍ tEnAyajata̍ tatO vai sO̱&nyABi-rdEvatA̍Bi-rvyAvRuta̍magacCadya̍ EvaM ~MvidvAṃsaḥ̍ pa~jcadaśarAtramAsatE̍ vyAvRutamEva̍ pApmanA BrAtRuvyEṇa̍ gacCanti jyOtirgaurAyuriti# tryahO BavatIyaM̍ ~MvAva jyOtirantari̍kṣaM̍ - [ ] 14

verses.padam: - Padam gauḥ|asau|Ayuḥ|Eṣu|Eva|lOkEṣu̍|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|asa̍tram|vai|Etat|yat|aCandOmamitya̍Candaḥ̍ - mam|yat|CandOmA iti# Candaḥ - mAḥ|Bavanti|tEna̍|satram|dEvatA̱ḥ|Eva|pRuṣṭhaiḥ|avEti̍|rundhatE|paśUn|CandOmairiti̍# Candaḥ-maiḥ|Ojaḥ|vai|vIrya̱m|pRuṣṭhAni̍|paśava̍ḥ|CandOmA̍ iti# Candaḥ - mAḥ|Ojasi|Eva|vIryE̱|paśuṣu̍|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|pa~jcadaśarAtra̍ iti# pa~jcadaśa - rAtraḥ|Bavati|pa~jcadaśa iti# pa~jca - daśaḥ|vajraḥ|vajra̱m|Eva|BrAtRu̍vyEByaḥ|prEti̍|haranti|atirAtrAvitya̍ti̍ - rAtrau|aBitaḥ|Bavataḥ|indriyasya̍# ( )|parigRuhItyA̍ iti pari# - gRuhItyai||15 (51)
verses.samhita: gaurasAvAyurEṣvE̍va̍ lOkEṣu prati# tiṣṭhantyasatraM̍ ~MvA Etad-yadaCandOmaM̍ ~MyacCandOmA̍ Bavanti̍ tEna# satraM dEvatA# Eva pRuṣṭhairava# rundhatE paśU~jCandOmairOjO̍ vai vIryaM̍ pRuṣṭhAni# paśavaḥ̍ CandOmA OjasyEva̍ vIryE# paśuṣu prati# tiṣṭhanti pa~jcadaśarAtrO Bavati̍ pa~jcadaśO vajrO vajramEva̍ BrAtRuvyEByaḥ̍ pra harantyatirAtrAvaBitO̍# Bavata indriyasya ( ) parigRuhItyai||15̍

verses.padam: - Padam indraḥ|vai|śithilaḥ|iva|apra̍tiṣṭhita̍ ityaprati̍ - sthitaḥ|AsIt|saḥ|asurEByaḥ|abiBEt|saḥ|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA - patim|upEti|adhAvat|tasmai̱|Etam|pa~jcadaśarAtramiti̍# pa~jcadaśa - rAtram|vajra̱m|prEti|ayacCat|tEna̍|asu̍rAn|parABAvyEti̍# parA - BAvya|vijityEti̍# vi-jitya|śriya̱m|agacCat|agniṣṭutEtya̍gni̍ - stutA̱|pApmAna̱m|niriti|adahata|pa~jcadaśarAtrEṇEti̍# pa~jcadaśa - rAtrEṇa|Oja̍ḥ|bala̱m|indriyam|vIrya̱m|Atmann|adhatta|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsa̍ḥ|pa~jcadaśarAtramiti̍# pa~jcadaśa - rAtram|AsatE|BrAtRu̍vyAn|Eva|parABAvyEti̍# parA - BAvya|vijityEti̍# vi - jitya|śriya̱m|gacCanti|agniṣṭutEtya̍gni̍ - stutA̱|pApmAna̱m|niriti|16̍ (50)
verses.samhita: indrO vai śithila̍ ivA&pratiṣṭhita̍ AsIth sO&surEByO&biBEth̍ sa prajApatimupA̍&dhAvat̍ tasmA# EtaM pa~jcadaśarAtraM̍ ~MvajraM prAyacCat̍ tEnAsurAn̍ parABAvya# vijitya śriyamagacCadagniṣṭutA̍# pApmAnaM niradahata̍ pa~jcadaśarAtrEṇaujO balamindriyaM̍ ~MvIryamAtmanna̍dhatta̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsaḥ̍ pa~jcadaśarAtramAsatE̍ BrAtRuvyAnEva̍ parABAvya̍# vijitya śriyaM̍ gacCantyagniṣṭutA# pApmAnaM ni - [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam dahantE|pa~jcadaśarAtrEṇEti# pa~jcadaśa - rAtrEṇa|Oja̍ḥ|bala̱m|indriyam|vIrya̱m|Atmann|dadhatE|EtAḥ|Eva|paśavyA̱ḥ|pa~jca̍daśEti̍ pa~jca# - daśa|vai|ad^^rdhamAsasyEtyaqd^^rdha̍ - mAsasya|rAtra̍yaḥ|ad^^rdhamAsaśa̍ ityad^^rdhamAsa̍ - śaḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM-vathsaraḥ|ApyatE|saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM-vathsaram|paśavaḥ|anu̍|prEti̍|jAyantE|tasmA̱t|paśavyA̱ḥ|EtAḥ|Eva|suvargyA̍# iti# suvaḥ - gyA̱ḥ|pa~jcadaśEti̍ pa~jca# - daśa|vai|ad^^rdhamAsasyEtyad^^rdha̍ -mAsasya|rAtra̍yaḥ|ad^^rdhamAsaśa̍ ityad^^rdhamAsa̍ - śaḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|ApyatE|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|suvarga iti# suvaḥ - gaḥ|lOkaḥ|tasmA̱t|suvargyA# iti# suvaḥ - gyA̱ḥ|jyOtiḥ|gauḥ|Ayu̍ḥ|iti̍|tryaha̍ iti# tri - ahaḥ|Bavati|iyam|vAva|jyOtiḥ|antari̍kṣam|17̍ (50)
verses.samhita: rdahantE̍ pa~jcadaśarAtrEṇaujO balamindriyaM̍ ~MvIryamAtman̍ dadhata̍ EtA Eva paśavyA̱ḥ̍ pa~jcadaśa̍ vA arddhamAsasya̍ rAtrayO&rddhamAsaśaḥ̍ saM~Mvathsara̍ A̱pyatE saM~MvathsaraM paśavO&nu pra jAyantE̍ tasmA̱t paśavyA# EtA Eva suvargyA̱ḥ̍ pa~jcadaśa̍ vA arddhamAsasya̍ rAtrayO&rddhamAsaśaḥ̍ saM~Mvathsara̍ A̱pyatE saM~Mvathsaraḥ suvargO̍ lOkastasmA̱th suvargyA̱ jyOtirgaurAyuriti# tryahO BavatIyaM̍ ~MvAva jyOtirantari̍kṣaM̍ - [ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam gauḥ|asau|Ayuḥ|imAn|Eva|lOkAn|aByArO̍hantItya̍Bi̍ - ArOhanti|yat|anyata̍ḥ|pRuṣṭhAni̍|syuḥ|vivi̍vadhamiti̍ vi - vivadham|syAt|maddhyE̱|pRuṣṭhAni|Bavanti|savivadhatvAyEti̍# savivadha - tvAya|Oja̍ḥ|vai|vIrya̱m|pRuṣṭhAni̍|Oja̍ḥ|Eva|vIrya̱m|maddhyataḥ|dadhatE|bRuhadrathantarAByAmiti̍# bRuhat-rathantarAByA̱m|yanti|iyam|vAva|rathantaramiti# rathaM - taram|asau|bRuhat|AByAm|Eva|yanti|athO iti|anayO̱ḥ|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|EtE̍ iti|vai|yajñasya̍|a~jjasAya̍nI̍ itya~jjasA-aya̍nI|srutI̍ iti|tAByA̱m|Eva|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|18 (50)
verses.samhita: gaurasAvAyurimAnEva̍ lOkAnaByArOhanti̍ yadanyataḥ̍ pRuṣṭhAni syurvivivadhaṅ̍ syAnmaddhyE# pRuṣṭhAni# Bavanti savivadhatvAyaujO vai vIryaM̍ pRuṣṭhAnyOja# Eva vIryaM̍ maddhyatO dadhatE̍ bRuhad-rathantarAByA̱M ~MyantIyaM ~MvAva rathantaramasau̍ bRuhadAByAmEva yantyathO# anayOrEva̍ prati# tiṣṭhantyEtE vai yajñasyA̱~jjasAyanI̍ srutI tAByAmEva̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM - [ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam yanti|parA̱~jcaḥ|vai|EtE|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|aByArOhantItya̍Bi̍ - ArOhanti|yE|parAcInA̍ni|pRuṣṭhAni̍|upayantItyu̍pa̍ - yanti|pratya~g|tryaha̍ iti# tri - ahaḥ|Bavati|pratyavarUḍhyA̍ iti# prati - avarUḍhyai|athO̍ iti|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|uBayO̱ḥ|lOkayO̱ḥ|RuddhvA|uditi|tiṣṭhanti|pa~jca̍daśEti̍ pa~jca# - daśa|EtAḥ|tAsA̱m|yAḥ|daśa|daśA̱kṣarEti̍ daśa# - akṣarA|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|anna̱m|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjEti# vi - rAjA̱|Eva|annAdyamityanna̍ - adya̱m|avEti|rundhatE|yAḥ|pa~jca̍|pa~jca̍|diśa̍ḥ|dikṣu|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|atirAtrAvitya̍ti̍ - rAtrau|aBitaḥ|Bavataḥ|indriyasya̍|vIrya̍sya|prajAyA̍ iti# pra - jAyai̱ ( )|paśUnAm|parigRuhItyA̍ iti pari# - gRuhItyai||19 (52)
verses.samhita: ~Myanti̍ parA̱~jcO vA EtE suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamaByArOhanti̍ yE parAcInA̍ni̍ pRuṣṭhAnyupayanti̍# pratya~g tryahO Bavati̍ pratyavarUḍhyA̍ athO pratiṣṭhityA̍ uBayO̱rlOkayOr# RuddhvOt tiṣṭhanti̍ pa~jcadaśaitAstAsAM̍ ~MyA daśa daśA̱kṣarA virAḍannaM̍ ~MvirAḍ virAjaivAnnAdyamava# rundhatE yAḥ pa~jca pa~jca diśO# dikṣvEva̍ prati# tiṣṭhantyatirAtrAvaBitO# Bavata indriyasya# vIryasya̍ prajAyai# ( ) paśUnAM parigRuhItyai||19̍

verses.padam: - Padam prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|akAmayata|annAda ityanna̍ - adaḥ|syAm|iti|saḥ|Etam|saptadaśarAtramiti̍# saptadaśa - rAtram|apaśyat|tam|Eti|aharat|tEna̍|ayajata|tata̍ḥ|vai|saḥ|annAda̍ ityanna̍ - adaḥ|aBavat|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsaḥ|saptadaśarAtramiti̍# saptadaśa-rAtram|AsatE|annAdA̍ ityanna-adAḥ|Eva|Bavanti|pa~jcAha̍ iti# pa~jca - ahaḥ|Bavati|pa~jca|vai|Rutava̍ḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|Rutuṣu|Eva|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsarE|pratIti|tiṣṭhanti|athA̍ iti|pa~jcA̱kṣarEti̍ pa~jca# - akṣarA|pa~gktiḥ|pA~gktaḥ|yajñaḥ|yajñam|Eva|avEti̍|rundhatE|asa̍tram|vai|Etat|20̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prajApati-rakAmayatAnnAdaḥ̍ syAmiti sa Etaṃ saptadaśarAtra-ma̍paśyat̍ tamA&harat̍ tEnAyajata̍ tatO vai sO̱&nnAdO&Bavadya̍ EvaM ~MvidvAṃsaḥ̍ saptadaśa-rAtramAsatE̍ &nnAdA Eva Bavanti̍ pa~jcAhO Bavati̍ pa~jca vA Rutavaḥ̍ saM~Mvathsara RutuṣvEva saM~MvathsarE̍ prati# tiṣṭhantyathO pa~jcA̱kṣarA pa~gktiḥ pA~gktO# yajñO yajñamEvA&va# rundhatE &satraM̍ ~MvA Eta- [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam yat|aCandOmamityaCandaḥ-mam|yat|CandOmA̍ iti# Candaḥ - mAḥ|Bavanti|tEna̍|satram|dEvatA̱ḥ|Eva|pRuṣṭhaiḥ|avEti̍|rundhatE|paśUn|CandOmairiti̍# Candaḥ - maiḥ|Ojaḥ|vai|vIrya̱m|pRuṣṭhAni̍|paśava̍ḥ|CandOmA̍ iti# Candaḥ - mAḥ|Ojasi|Eva|vIryE̱|paśuṣu̍|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|saptadaśarAtra̍ iti# saptadaśa - rAtraḥ|Bavati|saptadaśa iti# sapta - daśaḥ|prajApatiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|prajApatEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|Aptyai̱|atirAtrAvityati̍ - rAtrau|aBitaḥ|Bavataḥ|annAdyasyEtya̍nna̍ - adyasya|pari̍gRuhItyA̍ iti pari# - gRuhItyai||21 (37) (Etath - saptatriṃśacca)̍ (A8)
verses.samhita: -dyadaCandOmaM̍ ~MyacCandOmA̍ Bavanti̍ tEna# satraM dEvatA# Eva pRuṣṭhairava# rundhatE paśU~jCandOmairOjO̍ vai vIryaM̍ pRuṣṭhAni# paśavaḥ̍ CandOmA OjasyEva̍ vIryE# paśuṣu prati# tiṣṭhanti saptadaśarAtrO Bavati̍ saptadaśaḥ prajApatiḥ̍ prajApatErAptyA̍# atirAtrAvaBitO# BavatO&nnAdyasya̍ parigRuhItyai||21̍ (Etath - saptatriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam sA|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|vikramyEti# vi - kramya|atiṣṭhat|brahma̍ṇA|dEvEṣu̍|annE̍na|asu̍rEṣu|tE|dEvAḥ|akAmayanta|uBaya̱m|samiti̍|vRu~jjImahi|brahma̍|ca|anna̱m|ca|iti̍|tE|EtAḥ|viṃqśatim|rAtrI̱ḥ|apaśyann|tata̍ḥ|vai|tE|uBaya̱m|samiti̍|avRu~jjata|brahma̍|ca|anna̱m|ca|brahmavarcasina̍ iti# brahma - varcasinaḥ|annAdA̍ ityanna̍ - adAḥ|aBavann|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsaḥ|EtAḥ|Asa̍tE|uBaya̱m|Eva|samiti̍|vRu~jjatE|brahma̍|ca|anna̱m|ca|22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sA virAḍ vikramyAtiṣṭhad-brahma̍ṇA̍ dEvEṣvannEnA-surEṣu̍ tE dEvA akAmayantOBayaṃq̍ saM ~MvRu~jjImahi̍ brahma cAnnaM cEti ta EtA viṃśatiṃ̍ rAtrIrapaśyan̍ tatO vai ta uBayaṃq samavRu~jjata̍ brahma cAnnaM̍ ca brahmavarcasinO̱&nnAdA aBavanq.̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsa# EtA Asata̍ uBayamEva̍ saM~M vRu~jjatE̍ brahma cAnnaM̍ ca - [ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam brahmavarcasina iti# brahma - varcasinaḥ|annAdA̍ ityanna̍ - adAḥ|Bavanti|dvE iti|vai|EtE̍ iti|virAjAviti̍# vi-rAjau̱|tayO̱ḥ|Eva|nAnA̱|pratIti|tiṣṭhanti|viṃqśaḥ|vai|puru̍ṣaḥ|daśa̍|hastyA̱ḥ|a~ggula̍yaḥ|daśa̍|padyA̱ḥ|yAvAn̍|Eva|puru̍ṣaḥ|tam|AptvA|uditi̍|tiṣṭhanti|jyOti̍ḥ|gauḥ|Ayu̍ḥ|iti̍|tryahA̍ iti# tri - ahAḥ|Bavanti|iyam|vAva|jyOtiḥ|antari̍kṣam|gauḥ|asau|Ayu̍ḥ|imAn|Eva|lOkAn|aByArO̍hantItya̍Bi̍ - ArOhanti|aBipUrvamitya̍Bi̍ - pUrvam|tryahA iti# tri - ahAḥ|Bavanti|aBipUrvamityaBi̍ - pUrvam|Eva|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|23 (50)
verses.samhita: brahmavarcasinO̱&nnAdA Bavanti̍ dvE vA EtE virAjau tayOrEva̍ nAnA prati# tiṣṭhanti viṃqśO vai puruṣO̍ daśa hastyA# a~ggulayO̍ daśa padyA yAvAnEva̍ puruṣastamAptvOt̍ tiṣṭhanti̍ jyOtirgaurAyuriti# tryahA BavantIyaM̍ ~MvAva jyOtirantari̍kṣaM̍ gaurasAvAyurimAnEva̍ lOkA-naByArOhantyaBipUrvaM̍ tryahA BavantyaBipUrvamEva̍ suvargaM̍ - [ ] 23

verses.padam: - Padam lOkam|aByArOhantItya̍Bi-ArO̍hanti|yat|anyata̍ḥ|pRuṣṭhAni̍|syuḥ|vivi̍vadhamiti̍ vi - vivadham|syAt|maddhyE̱|pRuṣṭhAni|Bavanti|savivadhatvAyEti̍# savivadha - tvAya|Oja̍ḥ|vai|vIrya̱m|pRuṣṭhAni̍|Oja̍ḥ|Eva|vIrya̱m|maddhyataḥ|dadhatE|bRuhadrathantarAByAmiti̍# bRuhat - rathantarAByA̱m|yanti|iyam|vAva|rathantaramiti# rathaM - taram|asau|bRuhat|AByAm|Eva|yanti|athO iti|anayO̱ḥ|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|EtE̍ iti|vai|yajñasya̍|a~jjasAya̍nI̍ itya~jjasA̍ - ayanI|srutI̍ iti|tAByA̱m|Eva|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|yanti|parA̱~jcaḥ|vai|EtE|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam ( )|lOkam|aByArOhantItya̍Bi̍ - ArOhanti|yE|parAcInA̍ni|pRuṣṭhAni̍|upayantItyu̍pa̍ - yanti|pratya~g|tryaha̍ iti# tri - ahaḥ|Bavati|pratyavarUḍhyA̍ iti# prati - avarUḍhyai|athO̍ iti|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|uBayO̱ḥ|lOkayO̱ḥ|RuddhvA|uditi|tiṣṭhanti|atirAtrAvitya̍ti̍ - rAtrau|aBitaḥ|Bavataḥ|brahmavarcasasyEti̍# brahma - varcasasya|annAdyasyEtya̍nna̍ - adyasya|pari̍gRuhItyA̍ iti pari# - gRuhItyai||24 (73) (vRu~jjatE brahma cAM naM̍ ca - suvarga - mEtE suvargaM̍ - trayOviṃśatiśca)̍ (A9)
verses.samhita: ~MlOkamaByArOhanti̍ yadanyataḥ̍ pRuṣṭhAni syurvivivadhaṅ̍ syAnmaddhyE# pRuṣṭhAni# Bavanti savivadhatvAyaujO vai vIryaM̍ pRuṣṭhAnyOja# Eva vIryaM̍ maddhyatO dadhatE̍ bRuhad-rathantarAByA̱M ~MyantIyaM ~MvAva rathantaramasau̍ bRuhadAByAmEva yantyathO# anayOrEva̍ prati# tiṣṭhantyEtE vai yajñasyA̱~jjasAyanI̍ srutI tAByAmEva̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM ~Myanti̍ parA̱~jcO vA EtE suvargaM̍ ( ) ~MlOkamaByArOhanti̍ yE parAcInA̍ni̍ pRuṣṭhAnyupayanti̍# pratya~g tryahO Bavati̍ pratyavarUḍhyA̍ athO pratiṣṭhityA̍ uBayO̱rlOkayOr.̍ RuddhvOt tiṣṭhantyatirAtrAvaBitO̍# BavatO brahmavarcasa-syAnnAdyasya̍ parigRuhItyai||24̍ (vRu~jjatE brahma cAM naM̍ ca - suvarga - mEtE suvargaM̍ - trayOviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam asau|Adityaḥ|asminn|lOkE|AsIt|tam|dEvAḥ|pRuṣṭhaiḥ|parigRuhyEti# pari - gRuhya|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|agamayann|parai̱ḥ|avastA̱t|parIti|agRuhṇann|divAkIrtyE̍nEti̍# divA - kIrtyEna|suvarga̍ iti# suvaḥ - gE|lOkE|pratIti|asthApayann|parai̱ḥ|parastA̱t|parIti̍|agRuhṇann|pRuṣṭhaiḥ|upAvA̍rOhannityu̍pa̍ - avArOhann|saḥ|vai|asau|Adityaḥ|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|parai̱ḥ|uBayata̍ḥ|pari̍gRuhIta̍ iti pari-gRuhItaḥ|yat|pRuṣṭhAni̍|Bava̍nti|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|Eva|taiḥ|lOkam|yajamAnAḥ|yanti|parai̱ḥ|avastA̱t|parIti̍|gRuhṇanti|divAkIrtyE̍nEti̍# divA - kIrtyEna|25̍ (50)
verses.samhita: asAvAdityO̱&smin̍ ~MlOka AsIt̍ taM dEvAḥ pRuṣṭhaiḥ parigRuhya̍# suvargaM ~MlOkamagamayan̍ parairavastAt̍ paryagRuhṇan̍ divAkIrtyEna̍ suvargE lOkE pratyasthApayan̍ parai̱ḥ parastAt paryagRuhṇan̍ pRuṣṭhairupAvArOhanthsa̍ vA asAvAdityO̍&muṣmi̍n̍ ~MlOkE parairuBayataḥ̍ parigRuhItO̍ yat pRuṣṭhAni Bavanti̍ suvargamEva tairlOkaM ~MyajamAnA̍ yanti parairavastAt̍ pari# gRuhṇanti divAkIrtyEna̍ - [ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam suvarga iti# suvaḥ-gE|lOkE|pratIti|tiṣṭhanti|parai̱ḥ|parastA̱t|parIti̍|gRuhṇanti|pRuṣṭhaiḥ|upAva̍rOhantItyu̍pa̍ - avarOhanti|yat|parE̱|parastA̱t|na|syuḥ|parA̱~jcaḥ|suvargAditi̍# suvaḥ - gAt|lOkAt|niriti|padyErann|yat|avastA̱t|na|syuḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|niriti|dahEyuḥ|aBita̍ḥ|divAkIrtya̍miti̍# divA - kIrtya̱m|parassAmAna̍ iti paraḥ̍ - sAmAnaḥ|Bavanti|suvarga iti# suvaḥ - gE|Eva|EnAnn|lOkE|uBayataḥ|parIti̍|gRuhṇanti|yaja̍mAnAḥ|vai|divAkI̱rtyamiti̍# divA - kIrtya̱m|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|parassAmAna̍ iti paraḥ̍ - sAmAnaḥ|aBitaḥ|divAkIrtya̍miti̍# divA - kIrtya̱m|parassAmAna̍ iti paraḥ̍ - sAmAnaḥ|Bavanti|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsarE|Eva|uBayataḥ|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: suvargE lOkE prati# tiṣṭhanti parai̱ḥ parastAt pari# gRuhṇanti pRuṣṭhairupAvarOhanti̍ yat parE# parastAnna syuḥ parA̱~jcaḥ suvargA-llOkAnniṣpadyEranq.̍ yadavastAnna syuḥ prajA nirdahEyuraBitO̍# divAkIrtyaM̍ parassAmAnO̍ Bavanti suvarga EvainA̱M ~MlOka uBayataḥ̍ pari# gRuhṇanti yajamAnA̍ vai divAkIrtyaṃ̍# saM~Mvathsaraḥ parassAmAnO&BitO̍# divAkIrtyaM̍ parassAmAnO̍ Bavanti saM~Mvathsara EvOBayataḥ - [ ] 26

verses.padam: - Padam pratIti|tiṣṭhanti|pRuṣṭham|vai|divAkIrtya̍miti̍# divA - kIrtya̱m|pArśvE iti|para̍ssAmAna̍ iti paraḥ̍ - sAmAnaḥ|aBitaḥ|divAkIrtya̍miti̍# divA - kIrtya̱m|parassAmAna̍ iti paraḥ-sAmAnaḥ|Bavanti|tasmA̱t|aBita̍ḥ|pRuṣṭham|pArśvE̍ iti|BUyi̍ṣṭhAḥ|grahA̱ḥ|gRuhyantE|BUyi̍ṣṭham|śasyatE|yajñasya̍|Eva|tat|maddhyataḥ|granthim|grathnanti|avi̍sraṃsAyEtyavi̍# - sraṃqsAya|sapta|gRuhyantE|sapta|vai|śIṛqṣaṇyA̱ḥ|prAṇA iti# pra - anAḥ|prAṇAniti# pra - anAn|Eva|yajamAnEṣu|dadhati|yat|parAcInA̍ni|pRuṣṭhAni̍|Bava̍nti|amum|Eva|taiḥ|lOkam|aByArO̍hantItya̍Bi-ArO̍hanti|yat|imam|lOkam|na|27̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prati# tiṣṭhanti pRuṣṭhaM ~Mvai divAkIrtya̍M̍ pArśvE parassAmAnO̍ &BitO# divAkIrtyaM̍ parassAmAnO̍ Bavanti tasmAdaBita̍ḥ̍ pRuṣṭhaM pArśvE BUyiṣṭhA̍ grahA# gRuhyantE BUyiṣṭhaṃ̍ śasyatE yajñasyaiva tanmaddhyatO̍ granthiM grathnantyavi̍sraṃsAya̍ sapta gRuhyantE̍ sapta vai śIṛṣaṇyA̱ḥ̍ prAṇAḥ prAṇAnEva yajamAnEṣu̍ dadhati yat parAcInA̍ni̍ pRuṣṭhAni BavantyamumEva̍ tai-rlOkamaByArOhanti̍ yadimaM ~MlOkaM na - [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam pratyavarOhEyuriti̍# prati - avarOhEyuḥ|uditi̍|vA|mAdyE̍yuḥ|yaja̍mAnAḥ|prEti̍|vA|mIyErann|yat|pratIcInA̍ni|pRuṣṭhAni̍|Bava̍nti|imam|Eva|taiḥ|lOkam|pratyava̍rOhantIti̍# prati - avarOhanti|athO̍ iti|asminn|Eva|lOkE|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|anu̍nmAdAyEtyanu̍t̍ - mAdAya|indraḥ|vai|apra̍tiṣṭhita̍ ityaprati̍ - sthitaḥ|AsIt|saḥ|prajApatimiti̍# prajA-patim|upEti|adhAvat|tasmai̱|Etam|EkaviṃqśatirAtramityE̍kaviṃśati̍ - rAtram|prEti|ayacCat|tam|Eti̍|aharat|tEna̍|ayajata|tata̍ḥ|vai|saḥ|pratIti̍|atiṣṭhat|yE|bahuyAjina̍ iti# bahu - yAjinaḥ|apra̍tiṣṭhitA̍ ityaprati̍ - sthitAḥ|28 (50)
verses.samhita: pratyava-rOhE̍yurudvA̍ mAdyEyuryaja̍mAnAḥ̍ pra vA# mIyEranq. yat pratIcInA̍ni̍ pRuṣṭhAni BavantImamEva̍ tairlOkaM pratyavarOhantyathO̍# asminnEva lOkE prati# tiṣṭhantyanunmAdAyEndrO̍ vA apratiṣṭhita̍ AsIth sa prajApati-mupA̍dhAvat̍ tasmA# EtamEkaviṃśatirAtraM̍ prAyacCat̍ tamA&harat̍ tEnAyajata̍ tatO vai sa pratyatiṣṭhadyE̍ bahuyAjinO̍ &pratiṣṭhitAḥ̍ - [ ] 28

verses.padam: - Padam syuḥ|tE|EkaviṃqśatirAtramityEkaviṃśati̍ - rAtram|AsIrann|dvAdaśa|mAsA̱ḥ|pa~jca̍|Rutava̍ḥ|traya̍ḥ|imE|lOkAḥ|asau|Adityaḥ|Ekaviṃqśa̍ ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|EtAvantaḥ|vai|dEvalOkA̍ iti# dEva - lOkAḥ|tEṣu|Eva|yathApUrvamiti̍# yathA - pUrvam|pratIti|tiṣṭhanti|asau|Adityaḥ|na|vIti̍|arOcata|saḥ|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA - patim|upEti|adhAvat|tasmai̱|Etam|EkaviṃqśatirAtramityE̍kaviṃśati̍ - rAtram|prEti|ayacCat|tam|Eti̍|aharat|tEna̍|ayajata|tata̍ḥ|vai|saḥ|arOcata|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsa̍ḥ|EkaviṃqśatirAtramityE̍kaviṃśati̍ - rAtram|AsatE̍ ( )|rOcantE|Eva|EkaviṃqśatirAtra̍ ityEkaviṃśati̍ - rAtraḥ|Bavati|ruk|vai|Ekaviṃqśa ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|ruca̱m|Eva|gacCanti|athO iti|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati - sthAm|Eva|pratiṣṭhEti# prati - sthA|hi|Ekaviṃqśa ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|atirAtrAvityati̍ - rAtrau|aBitaḥ|Bavataḥ|brahmavarcasasyEti̍# brahma - varcasasya|pari̍gRuhItyA̍ iti pari# - gRuhItyai||29 (71) (gRuhṇanti divAkIrtyEnai̍ - vOBayatO - nA - pratiṣṭhitA̍ - Asata̍ - Ekaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A10)
verses.samhita: syusta Ekaviṃśati-rAtramA̍sIran̍ dvAdaśa̍ mAsAḥ pa~jcartavastraya# imE lOkA asAvAditya̍ Ekaviṃqśa̍ EtAvantO̍ vai dEvalOkAstEṣvEva̍ yathA̍ pUrvaM prati# tiṣṭhantyasAvAdityO̍ na vyarOcata̍ sa prajApatimupA̍dhAvat̍ tasmA# EtamEkaviṃśatirAtraM̍ prAyacCat̍ tamA&harat̍ tEnAyajata̍ tatO vai sO# &rOcata ya EvaM vidvAṃsa# EkaviṃśatirAtramAsatE̍ ( ) rOcanta̍ EvaikaviṃśatirAtrO̍ Bavati̍ rugvA EkaviṃqśO̍ rucamEva̍ gacCantyathO̱̍ pratiṣṭhAmEva pratiṣṭhA̍ hyEkaviṃqśO̍# &tirAtrAvaBitO# BavatO brahmavarcasasya parigRuhItyai||29̍ (gRuhṇanti divAkIrtyEnai̍ - vOBayatO - nA - pratiṣṭhitA̍ - Asata̍ - Ekaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam arvA~g|yajñaḥ|samiti|krAmatu|amuṣmA̱t|adhIti̍|mAm|aBi||RuṣI̍ṇAm|yaḥ|purOhi̍ta̍ iti# puraḥ - hitaḥ||nirdEvamiti̍ niḥ - dEvam|nirvIramiti̍ niḥ - vIram|kRutvA|viṣkandhamiti̍ vi - skandham|tasminn|hIyatAm|yaḥ|asmAn|dvEṣṭi̍||śarI̍ram|yajñaśamalamiti̍# yajña - śamalam|kusIdam|tasminn̍|sIdatu|yaḥ|asmAn|dvEṣṭi̍||yajña̍|yajñasya̍|yat|tEja̍ḥ|tEna̍|samiti̍|krAma|mAm|aBi||brAhmaṇAn|Rutvija̍ḥ|dEvAn|yajñasya̍|tapa̍sA|tE|sava|aham|Eti̍|huvE||iṣṭEna̍|pakvam|upEti̍|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: arvA~g yajñaḥ saM krAmatvamuṣmAdadhi̍ mAmaBi|RuṣIṇAM̍ ~Myaḥ purOhitaḥ||nirdE̍vaM̍ nirvIraM̍ kRutvA viṣkandhaM̍ tasmin̍ hIyatAM ~MyO̱&smAn dvEṣṭi|śarI̍raM̍ ~MyajñaśamalaM kusIdaM̍ tasmiṉthsIdatu yO̱&smAn dvEṣṭi||yajña̍# yajñasya yat tEjastEna saMkrAma̍ mAmaBi|brAhmaṇAnRutvijO# dEvAn yajñasya tapasA̍ tE savAhamA huvE||iṣṭEna̍# pakvamupa# - [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam tE|huvE|sava|aham||samiti|tE|vRu~jjE|sukRutamiti̍# su - kRutam|samiti|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|paśUn||praiṣAniti# pra - EṣAn|sAmidhEnIriti# sAM - idhEnIḥ|AGArAvityA̱ - GArau|AjyaBAgAvityAjya̍# - BAgau|AśrutamityA̍ - śrutam|pratyAśrutamiti̍# prati - Aśrutam|Eti̍|śRuṇAmi|tE||prayAjAnUyAjAniti̍# prayAja - anUyAjAn|sviṣṭakRutamiti# sviṣṭa - kRuta̱m|iḍA̱m|Aśiṣa ityA̱ - śiṣaḥ|Eti̍|vRu~jjE|suva̍ḥ||agninA̱|indrE̍ṇa|sOmE̍na|sara̍svatyA|viṣṇu̍nA|dEvatA̍Biḥ||yAjyAnuvAkyA̱ByAmiti̍# yAjyA - anuvAkyA̱ByAm|upEti|tE|huvE|sava|aham|yajñam|Eti̍|dadE|tE|vaṣa̍ṭkRutamiti̍ vaṣaṭ̍ - kRutam||stutam|śastram|pratigaramiti# prati - garam|graha̱m|iḍA̱m|Aśiṣa ityA̱ - śiṣaḥ|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tE huvE savAhaM|saM tE# vRu~jjE sukRutaṃ saM prajAM paśUn||praiṣAnth-sAmidhEnI-rA̍GArAvAjya̍BAgAvA-śru̍taM̍ pratyAśrutamA̍ śRuṇAmi̍ tE|prayAjAnUyAjAnth-sviṣṭakRuta-miḍA̍mAśiṣa̍ A vRu~jjE̍ suvaḥ||agninEndrE̍ṇa̍ sOmEna̍ sarasvatyA̍ viṣṇunA̍ dEvatABiḥ|yAjyAnuvAkyA̱ByAmupa̍# tE huvE savAhaM ~MyajñamA dadE̍ tE vaṣaṭkRutaM||stutaṃ̍ śastraM pratigaraM̍ grahamiḍAmAśiṣa̍ - [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam Eti|vRu~jjE|suva̍ḥ||patnIsaM~MyAjAniti̍# patnI-saM~MyAjAn|upEti|tE|huvE|sava|aham|samiṣṭayajuriti̍# samiṣṭa - yajuḥ|Eti|dadE|tava̍||paśUn|sutam|purOḍAśAn̍|sava̍nAni|Eti̍|uta|yajñam||dEvAn|sEndrAniti̍ sa-indrAn|upEti|tE|huvE|sava|aham|agnimu̍KAnityagni̍ - muKAn|sOmavata̍ iti sOma-vataḥ|yE|ca|viśvE̱||32̍ (32) (upa - grahamiḍAmAśiṣO̍ - dvAtriṃśacca)̍ (A11)
verses.samhita: A vRu~jjE̍ suvaḥ|patnIsaM~MyAjAnupa̍# tE huvE savAhaṃ samiṣṭayajurA̍ dadE̍ tava||paśUnth-sutaM̍ purOḍAśAnth-sava̍nAnyOta̍ yajñaM|dEvAnth-sEndrAnupa# tE huvE savAha-magnimuKAnth-sOma̍vatO̍ yE ca viśvE̱||32 (upa - grahamiḍAmAśiṣO̍ - dvAtriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam BUtam|Bavya̱m|Baviṣyat|vaṣaṭ|svAhA̱|nama̍ḥ|Ruk|sAma̍|yaju̍ḥ|vaṣa̍ṭ|svAhA̱|nama̍ḥ|gAyatrI|triṣṭup|jaga̍tI|vaṣa̍ṭ|svAhA̱|nama̍ḥ|pRuthivI|antari̍kṣam|dyauḥ|vaṣa̍ṭ|svAhA̱|nama̍ḥ|agniḥ|vAyuḥ|sUrya̍ḥ|vaṣa̍ṭ|svAhA̱|nama̍ḥ|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|vyAna iti# vi - anaḥ|apAna ityapa-anaḥ|vaṣa̍ṭ|svAhA̱|nama̍ḥ|anna̱m|kRuṣiḥ|vRuṣṭi̍ḥ|vaṣa̍ṭ|svAhA̱|nama̍ḥ|pitA|putraḥ|pautra̍ḥ|vaṣa̍ṭ|svAhA̱|nama̍ḥ|BUḥ|Buva̍ḥ̍ ( )|suvaḥ|vaṣa̍ṭ|svAhA̱|nama̍ḥ||33̍ (54)

verses.padam: - Padam vanaspatiBya̍ iti vanaspati# - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|mUlE̱Byaḥ|svAhA̱|tUlE̱Byaḥ|svAhA̱|skandhO̱Bya iti skandhaḥ̍ - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|śAKA̱Byaḥ|svAhA̱|parṇEByaḥ|svAhA̱|puṣpE̱Byaḥ|svAhA̱|PalE̱Byaḥ|svAhA̱|gRuhItEBya̍ḥ|svAhA̱|agRu̍hItEByaḥ|svAhA̱|ava̍pannEBya̍ ityava# - pannEByaḥ|svAhA̱|śayAnEByaḥ|svAhA̱|śiṣṭAya̍|svAhA̱|ati̍śiṣṭAyEtyati̍# - śiṣṭAya|svAhA̱|pariśiṣṭAyEti̍ pari-śiṣṭAya|svAhA̱|saṃśi̍ṣṭAyEti̍ saM - śiṣṭAya|svAhA̱|ucCiṣṭAyEtyut̍ - śiṣṭAya|svAhA̱|riktAya|svAhA̱|ari̍ktAya|svAhA̱|prari̍ktAyEti̍ pra - riktAya|svAhA̱|saṃriktAyEti̍ saM - riktAya|svAhA̱|udriktAyEtyut̍ - riktAya|svAhA̱|sarvasmai|svAhA̱||42̍ (46) (vanaspatiByaḥ̍ - ṣaṭ catvAriṃśat)̍ (A20) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 20 Anuvaakams :- (prajavaM̍ - brahmavAdinaḥ ki - mEṣa vA Apta - AdityA̍ uBayO̱ḥ - prajApatiranvA̍ya̍ -nnindrO vai sadRu~g - ~gindrO vai śithilaḥ̍ - prajApatirakAmayatA̍ &nnAdaḥ - sA virAḍa - sAvAdityO̱̍ - &rvA~g - BUta - mA mE - &gninA -svAhA&&dhin - dadByO̱& - ~jjyEtAya# - kRuṣṇA - yauṣadhIByO̍ - vanaspatiByO̍ - viṃśatiḥ) Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (prajavaM̍ - prajApati̍ - ryadaCandOmaM̍ - tE# huvE savA&ha - mOṣadhIByO̍ - dvicatvAriṃśat)̍ First and Last Padam of ṭhird Prasnam of 7th Kandam (prajavaṃq - sarvasmai̍ svAhA̱)||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE saptamakAṇḍE tRutIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||==========================================
verses.samhita: vanaspatiByaḥ̍ svAhA mUlE̱Byaḥ svAhA tUlE̱Byaḥ svAhA skandhO̱Byaḥ svAhA śAKA̱Byaḥ svAhA# parṇEByaḥ svAhA puṣpE̱Byaḥ svAhA PalE̱Byaḥ svAhA# gRuhItEByaḥ svAhA &gRuhItEByaḥ̍ svAhA &vapannEByaḥ̍ svAhA śayAnEByaḥ̍ svAhA# śiṣṭAya svAhA &tiśiṣṭAya̍ svAhA pariśiṣṭAya̍ svAhA saṃśiṣṭAya̍ svAhO-cCiṣṭAya̍ svAhA# riktAya svAhA &riktAya̍ svAhA prariktAya̍ svAhA saṃriktAya̍ svAhO -driktAya̍ svAhA sarvasmai̍ svAhA̱||42 (vanaspatiByaḥ̍ - ṣaṭ catvAriṃśat)̍ (A20) praśna kOrvai with starting padams of 1 to 20 anuvAkams :- (prajavaM̍ - brahmavAdinaḥ ki - mEṣa vA Apta - AdityA̍ uBayO̱ḥ - prajApatiranvA̍ya̍ -nnindrO vai sadRu~g - ~gindrO vai śithilaḥ̍ - prajApatirakAmayatA̍ &nnAdaḥ - sA virAḍa - sAvAdityO̱̍ - &rvA~g - BUta - mA mE - &gninA -svAhA&&dhin - dadByO̱& - ~jjyEtAya# - kRuṣṇA - yauṣadhIByO̍ - vanaspatiByO̍ - viṃśatiḥ) kOrvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (prajavaM̍ - prajApati̍ - ryadaCandOmaM̍ - tE# huvE savA&ha - mOṣadhIByO̍ - dvicatvAriṃśat)̍ first and last padam of third praśnam of 7th kAṇḍam (prajavaṃq - sarvasmai̍ svAhA̱)||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM saptamakAṇḍE tRutIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||================================= OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ hariḥ OM 7.4 saptamakAṇḍE caturthaḥ praśnaḥ - satrakarmanirUpaṇaM

verses.padam: - Padam bRuhaspatiḥ|akAmayata|śrat|mE|dEvAḥ|dadhI̍rann|gacCE̍yam|purOdhAmiti̍# puraḥ - dhAm|iti|saḥ|Etam|caturviṃqśatirAtramiti̍# caturviṃśati - rAtram|apaśyat|tam|Eti|aharat|tEna̍|ayajata|tata̍ḥ|vai|tasmai̱|śrat|dEvAḥ|ada̍dhata|aga̍cCat|purOdhAmiti̍# puraḥ - dhAm|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsaḥ|caturviṃqśatirAtramiti̍# caturviṃśati - rAtram|AsatE|śrat|EByaḥ|manuṣyA̱ḥ|dadhatE|gacCa̍nti|purOdhAmiti̍# puraḥ-dhAm|jyOtiḥ|gauḥ|Ayu̍ḥ|iti̍|tryahA̍ iti# tri - ahAḥ|Bavanti|iyam|vAva|jyOtiḥ|antari̍kṣam|gauḥ|asau|Ayu̍ḥ|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: bRuhaspatirakAmayata̍ śranmE# dEvA dadhIran̍ gacCEyaM̍ purOdhAmiti sa EtaM caturviṃśatirAtra-ma̍paśyat̍ tamA&harat̍ tEnAyajata̍ tatO vai tasmai śraddEvA adadhatAga̍cCat̍ purOdhAM ~Mya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsa-ścaturviṃśatirAtramAsa̍tE̍ śradE̱ByO manuṣyA# dadhatE gacCanti̍ purOdhAM jyOtirgaurAyuriti# tryahA BavantIyaM̍ ~MvAva jyOtirantari̍kṣaM̍ gaurasAvAyu# - [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam imAn|Eva|lOkAn|aByArOhantItya̍Bi̍ - ArOhanti|aBipUrvamitya̍Bi̍ - pUrvam|tryahA iti# tri - ahAḥ|Bavanti|aBipUrvamityaBi̍ - pUrvam|Eva|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|aByArOhantItya̍Bi̍ - ArOhanti|asa̍tram|vai|Etat|yat|aCandOmamitya̍Candaḥ-mam|yat|CandOmA̍ iti# Candaḥ - mAḥ|Bavanti|tEna̍|satram|dEvatA̱ḥ|Eva|pRuṣṭhaiḥ|avEti̍|rundhatE|paśUn|CandOmairiti̍# Candaḥ-maiḥ|Ojaḥ|vai|vIrya̱m|pRuṣṭhAni̍|paśava̍ḥ|CandOmA̍ iti# Candaḥ - mAḥ|Ojasi|Eva|vIryE̱|paśuṣu̍|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|bRuhadrathantarAByAmiti̍# bRuhat - rathantarAByA̱m|yanti|iyam|vAva|rathantaramiti# rathaM - taram|asau|bRuhat|AByAm|Eva|2 (50)
verses.samhita: -rimAnEva lOkAnaByArOhantyaBi̍ pUrvaM tryahA BavantyaBipUrvamEva̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamaByArOhantyasa̍traM̍ ~MvA Etad-yadaCandOmaM̍ ~MyacCandOmA̍ Bavanti̍ tEna# satraM dEvatA# Eva pRuṣṭhairava# rundhatE paśU~jCandOmairOjO̍ vai vIryaM̍ pRuṣṭhAni# paśavaḥ̍ CandOmA OjasyEva̍ vIryE# paśuṣu prati# tiṣṭhanti bRuhad-rathantarAByA̱M ~MyantIyaM ~MvAva rathantaramasau̍ bRuhadAByAmEva - [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam yanti|athO iti|anayO̱ḥ|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|EtE̍ iti|vai|yajñasya̍|a~jjasAya̍nI̍ itya~jjasA̍ - ayanI|srutI̍ iti|tAByA̱m|Eva|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|yanti|caturviṃqśatirAtra iti# caturviṃśati - rAtraḥ|Bavati|caturviṃśatiriti̍ catuḥ̍ - viṃqśatiḥ|ad^^rdhamAsA ityad^^rdha̍ - mAsAḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|suvarga iti# suvaḥ - gaḥ|lOkaḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsarE|Eva|suvarga iti# suvaḥ - gE|lOkE|pratIti|tiṣṭhanti|athO̍ iti|catu̍rviṃśatyakṣarEti̍ caturviṃśati̍ - akṣarA|gAyatrI|gAyatrI|brahmavarcasamiti# brahma - varcasam|gAyatriyA|Eva|brahmavarcasamiti# brahma - varcasam|avEti|rundhatE|atirAtrAvitya̍ti̍ - rAtrau|aBitaḥ|Bavataḥ|brahmavarcasasyEti̍# brahma - varcasasya|pari̍gRuhItyA̍ iti pari# - gRuhItyai||3 (45) (asAvAyu# - rAByAmEva - pa~jcacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A1)
verses.samhita: yantyathO# anayOrEva̍ prati# tiṣṭhantyEtE vai yajñasyA̱~jjasAyanI̍ srutI tAByAmEva̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM ~Myanti̍ caturviṃśatirAtrO Bavati̍ caturviṃśatirarddhamAsAḥ̍ saM~Mvathsaraḥ̍ saM~Mvathsaraḥ̍ suvargO̍ lOkaḥ saM~Mvathsara̍ Eva suvargE̍ lOkE prati# tiṣṭhantyathO caturviṃśatyakṣarA̍ gAyatrI gAyatrI̍ brahmavarcasaM̍ gAyatriyaiva̍ brahmavarcasamava̍# rundhatE &tirAtrAvaBitO# BavatO brahmavarcasasya parigRuhItyai||3̍ (asAvAyu# - rAByAmEva - pa~jcacatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam yathA̱|vai|manuṣyA̱ḥ|Evam|dEvAḥ|agrE̱|Asann|tE|akAmayanta|avartim|pApmAna̱m|mRutyum|apahatyEtya̍pa-hatya̍|daivI̱m|saṃqsadamiti̍# saM - sada̱m|gacCEma|iti|tE|Etam|caturviṃqśatirAtramiti̍# caturviṃśati - rAtram|apaśyann|tam|Eti|aharann|tEna̍|ayajanta|tata̍ḥ|vai|tE|ava̍rtim|pApmAna̱m|mRutyum|apahatyEtya̍pa-̍ hatya|daivI̱m|saṃqsadamiti̍# saM - sada̱m|agacCann|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsaḥ|caturviṃqśatirAtramiti̍# caturviṃśati - rAtram|AsatE|ava̍rtim|Eva|pApmAna̱m|apahatyEtya̍pa-̍ hatya|śriya̱m|gacCanti|śrIḥ|hi|manuṣya̍sya|4̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yathA vai manuṣyA̍# EvaM dEvA agra# Asan tE&kAmayantAva̍rtiM̍ pApmAnaM̍ mRutyumapahatya̍ daivIṃ# saṃqsadaM̍ gacCEmEti ta EtaM caturviṃśatirAtra-ma̍paśyan̍ tamA&haran̍ tEnAyajanta̍ tatO vai tE&vartiM̍ pApmAnaM̍ mRutyumapahatya̍ daivIṃ# saṃqsadamagacCana.̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsa-ścaturviṃśatirAtra-mAsatE&va̍rtimEva̍ pApmAna-mapahatya̍ śriyaM̍ gacCanti śrIṛhi manuṣya̍sya̍ - [ ] 4

verses.padam: - Padam daivI̱|saṃqsaditi# saM - sat|jyOtiḥ|atirAtra̍ ityati̍ - rAtraḥ|Bavati|suvargasyEti# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|anu̍KyAtyA̍ ityanu# -KyAtyai|pRuṣṭhyaḥ|ṣaḍaha̍ iti# ṣaṭ - ahaḥ|Bavati|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutavaḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|tam|mAsA̱ḥ|ad^^rdhamAsA ityad^^rdha̍ - mAsAḥ|Rutavaḥ|praviśyEti̍# pra - viśya|daivI̱m|saṃqsadamiti̍# saM - sada̱m|agacCann|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsaḥ|caturviṃqśatirAtramiti̍# caturviṃśati - rAtram|AsatE|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM - vathsaram|Eva|praviśyEti# pra - viśya|vasya̍sIm|saṃqsadamiti̍# saM - sada̱m|gacCanti|trayaḥ|trayastriṃqśA̍ iti# trayaḥ - triṃqśAḥ|avastA̱t|Bavanti|trayaḥ|trayastriṃqśA̍ iti# traya - triṃqśAḥ|parastA̱t|trayastriṃqśairiti# trayaḥ - triṃqśaiḥ|Eva|uBayataḥ|ava̍rtim|pApmAna̱m|apahatyEtya̍pa̍ - hatya|daivI̱m|saṃqsadamiti̍# saM - sada̱m|maddhyataḥ|5 (50)
verses.samhita: daivI# saṃqsajjyOtiratirAtrO̍ Bavati̍ suvargasya# lOkasyAnuKyAtyai̍ pRuṣṭhyaḥ̍ ṣaḍahO Bavati̍ ṣaḍ vA Rutavaḥ̍ saM~MvathsarastaM mAsA# arddhamAsA Rutavaḥ̍ praviśya daivIṃ# saṃqsadamagacCana.̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsa-ścaturviṃśatirAtramAsa̍tE̍ saM~MvathsaramEva praviśya vasyasIṃ̍ saṃqsadaM̍ gacCanti trayastrayastriṃqśA̍ avastA̱d-Bavanti trayastrayastriṃqśAḥ̍ parastA̱t trayastriṃqśairEvOBayatO &vartiM̍ pApmAnamapahatya̍ daivIṃ# saṃqsadaM̍ maddhyatO - [ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam gacCanti|pRuṣṭhAni|hi|daivI̱|saṃqsaditi̍# saM - sat|jAmi|vai|Etat|kurvanti|yat|trayaḥ|trayastriṃqśA̍ iti# trayaḥ-striṃqśAḥ|anva~jcaḥ|maddhyE̱|ani̍rukta̍ ityaniḥ̍ - uktaḥ|Bavati|tEna|ajA̍mi|Ud^^rdhvAni̍|pRuṣṭhAni̍|Bavanti|Ud^^rdhvAḥ|CandOmA̍ iti# Candaḥ - mAḥ|uBAByA̱m|rUpAByA̱m|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|yanti|asatram|vai|Etat|yat|aCandOmamitya̍Candaḥ-mam|yat|CandOmA̍ iti# Candaḥ- mAḥ|Bavanti|tEna̍|satram|dEvatA̱ḥ|Eva|pRuṣṭhaiḥ|avEti̍|rundhatE|paśUn|CandOmairiti̍# Candaḥ - maiḥ|Ojaḥ|vai|vIrya̱m|pRuṣṭhAni̍|paśava̍ḥ|6̍ (50)
verses.samhita: gacCanti̍ pRuṣṭhAni hi daivI# saṃqsajjAmi vA Etat kurvanti̍ yat trayastrayastriṃqśA̍ anva~jcO maddhyE&niruktO̍ Bavati tEnAjA̱myUrddhvAni# pRuṣṭhAni# BavantyUrddhvAḥ CandOmA̍ uBAByAṃ# rUpAByAṃ# suvargaM ~MlOkaM ~MyantyasatraM̍ ~MvA Etad-yadaCandOmaM̍ ~MyacCandOmA̍ Bavanti̍ tEna# satraM dEvatA# Eva pRuṣṭhairava# rundhatE paśU~jCandOmairOjO̍ vai vIryaM̍ pRuṣṭhAni# paśavaḥ-̍ [ ] 6

verses.padam: - Padam CandOmA iti# Candaḥ - mAḥ|Ojasi|Eva|vIryE̱|paśuṣu̍|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|traya̍ḥ|trayastriṃqśA̍ iti# trayaḥ - triṃqśAḥ|avastA̱t|Bavanti|trayaḥ|trayastriṃqśA̍ iti# trayaḥ - triṃqśAḥ|parastA̱t|maddhyE̱|pRuṣṭhAni|ura̍ḥ|vai|trayastriṃqśA̍ iti# trayaḥ - triṃqśAḥ|AtmA|pRuṣṭhAni|AtmanE̱|Eva|tat|yaja̍mAnAḥ|śarma̍|nahyantE|anA̱rtyai|bRuhadrathantarAByAmiti̍# bRuhat - rathantarAByA̱m|yantI|iyam|vAva|rathantaramiti# rathaM - taram|asau|bRuhat|AByAm|Eva|yanti|athO iti|anayO̱ḥ|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|EtE̍ iti|vai|yajñasya̍|a~jjasAya̍nI̍ itya~jjasA̍ - ayanI|srutI̍ iti|tAByA̱m|Eva|7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: CandOmA OjasyEva̍ vIryE# paśuṣu prati# tiṣṭhanti trayastrayastriṃqśA̍ avastA̱d-Bavanti trayastrayastriṃqśAḥ̍ parastAnmaddhyE# pRuṣṭhAnyurO vai trayastriṃqśA̍ AtmA pRuṣṭhAnyAtmana# Eva tad-yajamAnAḥ̍ śarma# nahyantE&nA̱rtyai bRuhad-rathantarAByA̱M ~MyantIyaM ~MvAva rathantaramasau̍ bRuhadAByAmEva yantyathO# anayOrEva̍ prati# tiṣṭhantyEtE vai yajñasyA̱~jjasAyanI̍ srutI tAByAmEva̍ - [ ] 7

verses.padam: - Padam suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|yanti|parA̱~jcaḥ|vai|EtE|suvargamiti# suvaḥ-gam|lOkam|aByArOhantItya̍Bi̍ - ArOhanti|yE|parAcInA̍ni|pRuṣṭhAni̍|upayantItyu̍pa̍ - yanti|pratya~g|ṣaḍaha̍ iti# ṣaṭ - ahaḥ|Bavati|pratyavarUḍhyA̍ iti# prati - avarUḍhyai|athO̍ iti|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|uBayO̱ḥ|lOkayO̱ḥ|RuddhvA|uditi|tiṣṭhanti|trivRuta̍ iti# tri - vRutaḥ|adhIti̍|trivRutamiti̍# tri - vRuta̱m|upEti|yanti|stOmA̍nAm|saMpa̍ttyA̍ iti saM - pattyai|praBavAyEti# pra - BavAya|jyOti̍ḥ|agniṣṭOma̍ ityagni-stOmaḥ|Bavati|ayam|vAva|saḥ|kṣaya̍ḥ|asmAt|Eva|tEna̍|kṣayA̱t|na|yanti|caturviṃqśatirAtra̍ iti# caturviṃśati-rAtraḥ|Bavati|caturviṃśatiriti̍ catuḥ-viṃqśatiḥ|ad^^rdhamAsA̍ ityad^^rdha̍ - mAsAḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ ( )|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|suvarga iti# suvaḥ - gaḥ|lOkaḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM-vathsarE|Eva|suvarga iti# suvaḥ - gE|lOkE|pratIti|tiṣṭhanti|athO̍ iti|catu̍rviṃśatyakṣarEti̍ catarviṃśati-̍ akṣarA|gAyatrI|gAyatrI|brahmavarcasamiti# brahma - varcasam|gAyatriyA|Eva|brahmavarcasamiti# brahma - varcasam|avEti|rundhatE|atirAtrAvitya̍ti̍ - rAtrau|aBitaḥ|Bavataḥ|brahmavarcasyEti̍# brahma - varcasasya|pari̍gRuhItyA̍ iti pari# - gRuhItyai||8 (74) (manuṣyasya̍ - madhyataḥ - paśava - stAByAmEva̍ - saM~Mvathsara̍ - ścaturviṃśatiśca)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM ~Myanti̍ parA̱~jcO vA EtE suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamaByArOhanti̍ yE parAcInA̍ni̍ pRuṣṭhAnyupayanti̍# pratya~g ṣaḍahO̍ Bavati̍ pratyavarUḍhyA̍ athO pratiṣṭhityA̍ uBayO̱rlOkayOra# RuddhvOt tiṣṭhanti̍ trivRutO&dhi# trivRutamupa# yanti stOmAnAṃq̍ saMpattyai̍ praBavAya jyOtiragniṣṭOmO̍ BavatyayaM̍ ~MvAva sa kṣayO&smAdEva tEna kṣayAnna yanti̍ caturviṃśatirAtrO Bavati̍ caturviṃśatirarddhamAsAḥ̍ saM~Mvathsaraḥ̍ ( ) saM~Mvathsaraḥ̍ suvargO̍ lOkaḥ saM~Mvathsara̍ Eva suvargE̍ lOkE prati# tiṣṭhantyathO caturviṃśatyakṣarA̍ gAyatrI gAyatrI̍ brahmavarcasaM̍ gAyatriyaiva̍ brahmavarcasamava̍# rundhatE &tirAtrAvaBitO# BavatO brahmavarcasasya parigRuhItyai||8̍ (manuṣyasya̍ - madhyataḥ - paśava - stAByAmEva̍ - saM~Mvathsara̍ - ścaturviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam RukṣA|vA|iyam|alOmakA̱|AsIt|sA|akAmayata|OṣadhIBirityOṣa̍dhi-Biḥ|vanaspati̍Biriti̍ vanaspati-Biḥ|prEti̍|jAyEya|iti̍|sA|EtAḥ|triṃqśata̱m|rAtrI̱ḥ|apaśyat|tata̍ḥ|vai|iyam|Oṣa̍dhIBirityOṣa̍dhi̍ - Biḥ|vanaspatiBiriti̍ vanaspati# -Biḥ|prEti|ajAyata|yE|prajAkA̍mA̍ iti# prajA - kAmAḥ|paśukAmA̍ iti# paśu - kAmAḥ|syuḥ|tE|EtAḥ|AsIrann|prEti|Eva|jAyantE|prajayEti̍# pra-jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu-Biḥ|iyam|vai|akṣuddhyat|sA|EtAm|virAjamiti# vi - rAja̱m|apaśyat|tAm|Atmann|dhitvA|annAdyamityanna̍ - adya̱m|avEti|arundha|Oṣa̍dhIḥ|9̍ (50)
verses.samhita: RukṣA vA iyamalOmakA̍&&sIth̍ sA&kAmayatauṣa̍dhIBi-rvanaspati̍Biḥ̍ pra jAyEyEti̍ saitAstriṃqśataṃq rAtrIrapaśyat̍ tatO vA iyamOṣadhIBi-rvanaspati̍Biḥ̍ prAjAyata̍ yE prajAkAmAḥ̍ paśukAmAḥ̍ syusta EtA AsIran̍ praiva jAyantE̍ prajayA# paśuBiriyaM̍ ~MvA akṣuddhyath̍ saitAM ~MvirAjamapaśyat̍ tAmAtman dhitvA&nnAdyamavA# rundhauṣadhI̍ - [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam vanaspatIn|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|paśUn|tEna|avad^^rdhata|sA|jEmAna̱m|mahimAna̱m|agacCat|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsa̍ḥ|EtAḥ|Asa̍tE|virAjamiti̍# vi-rAja̱m|Eva|Atmann|dhitvA|annAdyamityanna̍ - adya̱m|avEti|rundhatE|vad^^rdha̍ntE|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|jEmAna̱m|mahimAna̱m|gacCanti|jyOtiḥ|atirAtra̍ ityati̍ - rAtraḥ|Bavati|suvargasyEti# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|anu̍KyAtyA̍ ityanu# - KyAtyai|pRuṣṭhyaḥ|ṣaḍaha̍ iti# ṣaṭ - ahaḥ|Bavati|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutavaḥ|ṣaṭ|pRuṣṭhAni̍|pRuṣṭhaiḥ|Eva|RutUn|anvArO̍hantItya̍nu̍ - ArOhanti|RutuBirityRutu̍ - Biḥ|saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM - vathsaram|tE|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsarE|Eva|10 (50)
verses.samhita: -rvanaspatI̱n prajAM paśUn tEnAvarddhata̍ sA jEmAnaM̍ mahimAna-magacCadya̍ EvaM ~MvidvAṃsa# EtA AsatE̍ virAjamEvA&&*tman̍ dhitvA&nnAdyamava# rundhatE varddhantE̍ prajayA# paśuBirjEmAna̍M̍ mahimAnaM̍ gacCanti jyOtiratirAtrO̍ Bavati̍ suvargasya# lOkasyAnuKyAtyai̍ pRuṣṭhyaḥ̍ ṣaḍahO Bavati̍ ṣaḍ vA Rutavaḥ ṣaṭ pRuṣṭhAni# pRuṣṭhairEvartUnanvA-rOhantyRutuBi̍ḥ̍ saM~MvathsaraM tE saM~Mvathsara̍ Eva - [ ] 10

verses.padam: - Padam pratIti|tiṣṭhanti|trayastriṃqśAditi̍# trayaḥ - triṃqśAt|trayastriṃqśamiti# trayaḥ - triṃqśam|upEti|yanti|yajñasya̍|saMta̍tyA̍ iti saM - tatyai|athO iti|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|vai|trayastriṃqśa iti# trayaḥ-triṃqśaḥ|prajApatimiti̍# prajA-patim|Eva|Eti|raBantE|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|triṇava iti# tri - navaḥ|Bavati|vijityA̍ iti vi - jityai|Ekaviṃqśa ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|Bavati|pratiṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|athO iti|ruca̱m|Eva|Atmann|dadhatE|trivRuditi̍# tri - vRut|agniṣṭudityagni̍ - stut|Bavati|pApmAna̱m|Eva|tEna|niriti̍|dahantE|athO̍ iti|tEja̍ḥ|vai|trivRuditi̍# tri-vRut|tEjaḥ|Eva|Atmann|dadhatE|pa~jcadaśa̍ iti# pa~jca - daśaḥ|indrastOma itI̱ndra - stOmaḥ|Bavati|indriyam|Eva|avEti|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prati# tiṣṭhanti trayastriṃqśAt trayastriṃqśamupa̍# yanti yajñasya saMtatyA̍ athO̱ prajApatirvai̍ trayastriṃqśaḥ̍ prajApatimEvA&&*ra̍BantE̍ pratiṣṭhityai̍ triṇavO Bavati̍ vijityA̍ EkaviṃqśO Bavati̍ pratiṣṭhityA̍ athO rucamEvA&&*tman̍ dadhatE̍ trivRudagniṣṭud-Ba̍vati̍ pApmAnamEva̍ tEna nirdahantE&thO̍ tEjO vai trivRut tEja# EvA&&tman dadhatE̍ pa~jcadaśa indrastOmO̍ BavatIndriyamEvAva̍# - [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam rundhatE|saptadaśa iti# sapta - daśaḥ|Bavati|annAdyasyEtyanna-̍ adyasya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava-ruddhyai|athO̍ iti|prEti̍|Eva|tEna̍|jAyantE|Ekaviṃqśa̍ ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|Bavati|pratiṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|athO iti|ruca̱m|Eva|Atmann|dadhatE|caturviṃqśa̍ iti# catuḥ - viṃqśaḥ|Bavati|caturviṃśatiriti̍ catuḥ̍ - viṃqśatiḥ|ad^^rdhamAsA ityad^^rdha̍ - mAsAḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|suvarga iti# suvaḥ - gaḥ|lOkaḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsarE|Eva|suvarga iti# suvaḥ - gE|lOkE|pratIti|tiṣṭhanti|athO̍ iti|Eṣaḥ|vai|viṣUvAniti̍# viṣu - vAn|viṣUvanta iti# viṣu - vantaḥ|Bavanti|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsa̍ḥ|EtAḥ|Asa̍tE|caturviṃqśAditi̍# catuḥ - viṃqśAt|pRuṣṭhAni|upEti̍|yanti|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsarE|Eva|pratiṣṭhAyEti# prati-sthAya|12̍ (50)
verses.samhita: rundhatE saptadaśO BavatyannAdyasyA̍ varuddhyA̍ athO praiva tEna# jAyanta EkaviṃqśO Bavati̍ pratiṣṭhityA̍ athO rucamEvA&&*tman̍ dadhatE̍ caturviṃqśO Bavati̍ aturviṃśatirarddhamAsAḥ̍ saM~Mvathsaraḥ̍ saM~Mvathsaraḥ̍ suvargO̍ lOkaḥ saM~Mvathsara̍ Eva suvargE̍ lOkE prati# tiṣṭhantyathO# Eṣa vai viṣUvAn̍ viṣUvantO̍# Bavanti ya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsa# EtA AsatE̍ caturviṃqśAt pRuṣṭhAnyupa# yanti saM~Mvathsara Eva pratiṣṭhAya̍# - [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam dEvatA̱ḥ|aByArOhantItya̍Bi̍ - ArOhanti|trayastriṃqśAditi̍# trayaḥ - triṃqśAt|trayastriṃqśamiti# traya - triṃqśam|upEti|yanti|traya̍striṃśaditi̍ trayaḥ̍ - triṃqśat|vai|dEvatA̱ḥ|dEvatAsu|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|triṇava̍ iti# tri - navaḥ|Bavati|imE|vai|lOkAḥ|triṇava iti# tri - navaḥ|Eṣu|Eva|lOkEṣu|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|dvau|EkaviṃqśAvityE̍ka̍ - viṃqśau|Bavataḥ|pratiṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|athO iti|ruca̱m|Eva|Atmann|dadhatE|bahava̍ḥ|ṣOḍaśina̍ḥ|Bavanti|tasmA̱t|bahava̍ḥ|prajAsviti̍# pra - jAsu|vRuṣA̍ṇaḥ|yat|EtE|stOmA̱ḥ|vyati̍ṣaktA̍ iti# vi - atiṣaktAḥ|Bava̍nti|tasmA̱t|iyam|Oṣa̍dhIBirityOṣa̍dhi̍ - Biḥ|vanaspatiBiriti̍ vanaspati# - Biḥ|vyatiṣaktEti̍# vi - atiṣaktA|13̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvatA# aByArOhanti̍ trayastriṃqśAt trayastriṃqśamupa̍# yanti trayastriṃśadvai̍ dEvatA# dEvatA̱svEva prati# tiṣṭhanti triṇavO BavatImE̍ vai lOkAstriṇava̍ EṣvEva̍ lOkEṣu prati# tiṣṭhanti dvAvEkaviṃqśau̍ Bavataḥ̍ pratiṣṭhityA̍ athO rucamEvA&&*tman̍ dadhatE̍ bahavaḥ̍ ṣOḍaśinO# Bavanti tasmA̱d-bahavaḥ̍ prajAsu vRuṣAṇO̍ yadEtE stOmA vyatiṣaktA̍ Bavanti̍ tasmAdiya̍ -mOṣadhIBi-rvanaspati̍Bi-rvyati̍ṣaktA̍ - [ ] 13

verses.padam: - Padam vyatiṣajyanta̍ iti# vi - atiṣajyantE|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsaḥ|EtAḥ|Asa̍tE|aklRu̍ptAḥ|vai|EtE|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|yanti|uccAvacAn|hi|stOmAn|upayantItyu̍pa̍ - yanti|yat|EtE|Ud^^rdhvAḥ|klRuptAḥ|stOmA̱ḥ|Bava̍nti|klRuptAḥ|Eva|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|yanti|uBayO̱ḥ|EByaḥ|lOkayO̱ḥ|kalpatE|triṃqśat|EtAḥ|triṃqśadakṣarEti̍# triṃqśat - akṣarA|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|anna̱m|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjEti# vi - rAjA̱|Eva|annAdyamityanna-adya̱m|avEti̍|rundhatE|atirAtrAvitya̍ti̍ - rAtrau|aBitaḥ|Bavataḥ|annAdyasyEtya̍nna̍ - adyasya|pari̍gRuhItyA̍ iti pari# - gRuhItyai||14 (49)
verses.samhita: vyatiṣajyantE̍ prajayA# paśuBirya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsa# EtA AsatE &klRuptA̍ vA EtE suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM ~MyantyuccAvacAn̍ hi stOmAnupayanti̍ yadEta UrddhvAḥ klRuptAḥ stOmA Bavanti̍ klRuptA Eva suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM ~MyantyuBayO̍rEByO̍ lOkayO̱ḥ kalpatE triṃqśadEtAstriṃqśadakṣarA̍ virAḍannaM̍ virAḍ virAjaivAnnAdyamava# rundhatE &tirAtrAvaBitO# BavatO &nnAdyasya̍ parigRuhItyai||14̍

verses.padam: - Padam prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|ait|tam|dEvAḥ|yEnayEnEti̍ yEna# - yEna|CandasA|anu̍|prEti̍|ayu̍~jjata|tEna̍|na|Apnuvann|tE|EtAḥ|dvAtriṃ̍śatam|rAtrI̱ḥ|apaśyann|dvAtriṃ̍śadakṣarEti̍ dvAtriṃśat̍ - akṣarA|anuṣṭugityanu̍ - stuk|AnuṣṭuBa̍ ityAnu# - stuBaḥ|prajApatiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|svEna|Eva|Canda̍sA|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA - patim|AptvA|aByAruhyEtyaBi̍ - Aruhya|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Ayann|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsaḥ|EtAḥ|Asa̍tE|dvAtriṃ̍śat|EtAḥ|dvAtriṃ̍śadakṣarEti̍ dvAtriṃśat̍ - akṣarA|anuṣṭugityanu̍ - stuk|AnuṣṭuBa̍ ityAnu# - stuBaḥ|prajApatiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|svEna|Eva|Canda̍sA|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA -patim|AptvA|śriya̱m|gacCanti|15 (50)
verses.samhita: prajApatiḥ̍ suvargaM ~MlOkamait taM dEvA yEnayEna̍ CandasA&nu prAyu~jjata̍ tEna nA&&*pnuvan̍ ta EtA dvAtriṃśataṃq̍ rAtrIrapaśyan̍ dvAtriṃśadakṣarA̍ &nuṣṭugA-nuṣṭuBaḥ̍ prajApatiḥ̍ svEnaiva CandasA̍ prajApati-mAptvA̍ &ByAruhya# suvargaM ~MlOkamAyana.̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsa# EtA AsatE̍ dvAtriṃśadEtA̍ dvAtriṃśadakṣarA̍ &nuṣṭugA-nuṣṭuBaḥ̍ prajApatiḥ̍ svEnaiva CandasA̍ prajApatimAptvA̍ śriyaM̍ gacCanti - [ ] 15

verses.padam: - Padam śrIḥ|hi|manuṣyasya|suvarga̍ iti# suvaḥ-gaḥ|lOkaḥ|dvAtriṃśat|EtAḥ|dvAtriṃ̍śadakṣarEti̍ dvAtriṃśat̍ - akṣarA|anuṣṭugityanu̍ - stuk|vAk|anuṣṭubityanu̍ - stup|sarvA̱m|Eva|vAca̱m|Apnuvanti|sarvE̱|vAcaḥ|vaditAraḥ|Bavanti|sarvE̱|hi|śriya̱m|gacCa̍nti|jyOti̍ḥ|gauḥ|Ayu̍ḥ|iti̍|tryahA̍ iti# tri - ahAḥ|Bavanti|iyam|vAva|jyOtiḥ|antari̍kṣam|gauḥ|asau|Ayu̍ḥ|imAn|Eva|lOkAn|aByArO̍hantItya̍Bi̍ - ArOhanti|aBipUrvamitya̍Bi̍ - pUrvam|tryahA iti# tri-ahAḥ|Bavanti|aBipUrvamityaBi̍ - pUrvam|Eva|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|aByArOhantItya̍Bi-ArO̍hanti|bRuhadrathantarAByAmiti̍# bRuhat - rathantarAByA̱m|yanti|16 (50)
verses.samhita: śrIṛhi manuṣya̍sya̍ suvargO lOkO dvAtriṃśadEtA̍ dvAtriṃśadakṣarA-&nuṣṭug-vAga̍nuṣṭuP̍ sarvAmEva̍ vAcamApnuvanti̍ sarvE# vAcO vaditArO̍# Bavanti sarvE hi śriyaM gacCanti̍ jyOtirgaurAyuriti# tryahA BavantIyaM̍ ~MvAva jyOtirantari̍kṣaM̍ gaurasAvAyurimAnEva̍ lOkAnaByArOhantyaBipUrvaM̍ tryahA BavantyaBipUrvamEva̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamaByArOhanti̍ bRuhad-rathantarAByA̱M ~MyantI - [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam iyam|vAva|rathantaramiti# rathaM - taram|asau|bRuhat|AByAm|Eva|yanti|athO iti|anayO̱ḥ|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|EtE̍ iti|vai|yajñasya̍|a~jjasAya̍nI̍ itya~jjasA̍ - ayanI|srutI̍ iti|tAByA̱m|Eva|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|yanti|parA̱~jcaḥ|vai|EtE|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|aByArOhantItya̍Bi̍ - ArOhanti|yE|parA̍caḥ|tryahAniti̍# tri - ahAn|upayantItyupa̍ - yanti|pratya~g|tryahA̍ iti# tri - ahaḥ|Bavati|pratyavarUḍhyA̍ iti# prati - avarUḍhyai|athO̍ iti|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|uBayO̱ḥ|lOkayO̱ḥ|RuddhvA|uditi|tiṣṭhanti|dvAtriṃ̍śat|EtAḥ|tAsA̱m|yAḥ|triṃqśat|triṃqśada̍kṣarEti̍# triṃqśat - akṣarA ( )|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|anna̱m|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjEti# vi - rAjA̱|Eva|annAdyamityanna̍ - adya̱m|avEti|rundhatE|yE̍ iti|dvE̍ iti|ahOrAtrE̍ ityahaḥ̍ - rAtrE|Eva|tE iti|uBAByA̱m|rUpAByA̱m|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|yanti|atirAtrAvityati̍ - rAtrau|aBitaḥ|Bavataḥ|pari̍gRuhItyA̍ iti pari# - gRuhItyai||17 (72) (gacCanti - yanti - triṃqśadakṣarA̍ - dvAviṃśatiśca)̍ (A4)
verses.samhita: -yaM ~MvAva rathantaramasau̍ bRuhadAByAmEva yantyathO# anayOrEva̍ prati# tiṣṭhantyEtE vai yajñasyA̱~jjasAyanI̍ srutI tAByAmEva̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM ~Myanti̍ parA̱~jcO vA EtE suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamaByArOhanti̍ yE parAcastryahAnu̍payanti̍# pratya~g tryahO Bavati̍ pratyavarUḍhyA̍ athO pratiṣṭhityA̍ uBayO̱rlOkayOr.̍ RuddhvOt tiṣṭhanti̍ dvAtriṃśadEtAstAsAM̍ ~MyA striṃqśat triṃqśadakṣarA̍ ( ) virAḍannaM̍ ~MvirAḍ virAjaivA&nnAdyamava# rundhatE yE dvE ahOrAtrE̍ Eva tE uBAByAṃ# rUpAByAṃ# suvargaM ~MlOkaM ~MyantyatirAtrAvaBitO̍# Bavataḥ parigRuhItyai||17̍ (gacCanti - yanti - triṃqśadakṣarA̍ - dvAviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam dvE iti|vAva|dEvasatrE̍ iti# dEva - satrE|dvAdaśAha iti# dvAdaśa-ahaḥ|ca|Eva|trayastriṃqśadaha iti# trayastriṃśat-ahaḥ|ca|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsaḥ|trayastriṃqśadahamiti̍# trayastriṃśat-aham|AsatE|sAkṣAditi̍# sa - AkṣAt|Eva|dEvatA̱ḥ|aByArOhantItya̍Bi̍ - ArOhanti|yathA̱|Kalu̍|vai|śrEyAn̍|aByArU̍ḍha̍ ityaBi̍ - ArUḍhaḥ|kAmaya̍tE|tathA̱|karOti|yadi̍|avaviddhyatItya̍va̍ - viddhyati|pApI̍yAn|Bavati|yadi̍|na|avaviddhyatItya̍va̍ - viddhyati|sadRu~g~giti̍# sa - dRu~g|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsaḥ|trayastriṃqśadahamiti̍# trayastriṃśat - aham|AsatE|vIti̍|pApmanA̱|BrAtRu̍vyEṇa|Eti̍|vartantE|aharBAja̍ ityahaḥ̍ - BAjaḥ|vai|EtAḥ|dEvAḥ|agrE̱|Eti̍|aharann|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dvE vAva dEvasatrE̍ dvAdaśAhaścaiva̍ trayastriṃśadahaśca̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsastrayastriṃśadahamAsa̍tE̍ sAkṣAdEva dEvatA# aByArOhanti̍ yathA Kalu vai śrEyAnaByArU̍ḍhaḥ̍ kAmayatE̍ tathA# karOti yadyavaviddhya̍ti̍ pApIyAn̍ Bavati yadi nAvaviddhyati̍ sadRu~g ya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsastrayastriṃ-̍ śadahamAsatE̍ vi pApmanA BrAtRuvyEṇA&&*̍ vartantE̍ &harBAjO vA EtA dEvA agra A&hara̍ - [ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam ahaḥ|Eka̍ḥ|aBa̍jata|aha̍ḥ|Eka̍ḥ|tABi̍ḥ|vai|tE|prabAhugiti̍# pra - bAhuk|Ad^^rdhnuvann|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsa̍ḥ|trayastriṃqśadahamiti̍# trayastriṃśat - aham|AsatE|sarvE̱|Eva|prabAhugiti̍# pra - bAhuk|Ruddhnuvanti|sarvE̱|grAma̍ṇIyamiti̍ grAma# - nIyam|prEti|Apnuvanti|pa~jcAhA̍ iti# pa~jca-ahAḥ|Bavanti|pa~jca|vai|Rutava̍ḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|Rutuṣu|Eva|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM-vathsarE|pratIti|tiṣṭhanti|athO̍ iti|pa~jcA̱kṣarEti̍ pa~jca-akṣarA|pa~gktiḥ|pA~gkta̍ḥ|yajñaḥ|yajñam|Eva|avEti̍|rundhatE|trIṇi̍|AśvinAni̍|Bavanti|traya̍ḥ|imE|lOkAḥ|Eṣu|19̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -nnaharEkO &BajatA-harEkastABirvaitE̍ prabAhugArddhnuvana.̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsastrayastriṃśadahamAsa̍tE̍ sarva# Eva prabAhugRuddhnuvanti̍ sarvE grAmaṇIyaM̍ prApnuvanti̍ pa~jcAhA Bavanti̍ pa~jca vA Rutavaḥ̍ saM~Mvathsara RutuṣvEva saM~MvathsarE̍ prati# tiṣṭhantyathO pa~jcA̱kṣarA pa~gktiḥ pA~gktO# yajñO yajñamEvAva# rundhatE trIṇyA̱śvinAni# Bavanti traya# imE lOkA E- [ ] 19

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|lOkEṣu|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|athO̍ iti|trIṇi̍|vai|yajñasya̍|indriyAṇi̍|tAni̍|Eva|avEti̍|rundhatE|viśvajiditi̍# viśva - jit|Bavati|annAdyasyEtyanna̍ - adyasya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|sarvapRuṣṭha̍ iti sarva# - pRuṣṭhaḥ|Bavati|sarvasya|aBiji̍tyA̍ ityaBi - jityai|vAk|vai|dvAdaśAha iti# dvAdaśa - ahaḥ|yat|purastA̱t|dvAdaśAhamiti dvAdaśa - aham|upEyurityupa-iyuḥ|anA̱ptAm|vAca̱m|upEti̍|iyuḥ|upadAsukEtyu̍pa̍ - dAsukA|EṣAm|vAk|syAt|upari̍ṣṭAt|dvAdaśAhamiti̍# dvAdaśa - aham|upEti|yanti|AptAm|Eva|vAca̱m|upEti̍|yanti|tasmA̱t|upari̍ṣṭAt|vAcA|vadAmaḥ|avAntaramitya̍va̍ - antaram|20 (50)
verses.samhita: -ṣvEva̍ lOkEṣu prati# tiṣṭhantyathO trIṇi vai yajñasyE̱ndriyAṇi tAnyEvAva# rundhatE viśvajid-BavatyannAdyasyA̍ varuddhyai̍ sarvapRuṣṭhO̍ Bavati sarvasyABiji̍tyai̍ vAgvai dvAdaśAhO̍ yat purastA̱d dvAdaśAha-mupEyuranA̱ptAM̍ ~MvAca-mupEyu-rupadAsu̍kaiṣAM̍ ~MvAK syA-dupari̍ṣṭAd̍ dvAdaśAhamupa# yantyAptAmEva vAcamupa# yanti tasmA-dupari̍ṣṭAd-vAcA̍ vadAmO̍ &vAntaraM - [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam vai|daśarAtrEṇEti# daśa - rAtrEṇa|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|asRujata|yat|daśarAtra iti# daśa - rAtraḥ|Bavati|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|Eva|tat|yajamAnAḥ|sRujantE|EtAm|ha|vai|uda~gkaḥ|śaulbAyanaḥ|satrasya̍|Ruddhi̱m|uvAca|yat|daśarAtra̍ iti# daśa - rAtraḥ|yat|daśarAtra iti# daśa - rAtraḥ|Bavati|satrasya̍|Ruddhyai̱|athO̍ iti|yat|Eva|pUrvE̍ṣu|ahassvityaha̍ḥ̍ - su|vilOmEti vi - lOma|kriyatE̱|tasya|Eva|EṣA|śAnti̍ḥ|dvyanIkA̍ iti# dvi - anIkAḥ|vai|EtAḥ|rAtrayaḥ|yaja̍mAnAḥ|viśvajiditi̍# viśva - jit|saha|atirAtrEṇEtyati̍ - rAtrEṇa|pUrvA̱ḥ|ṣOḍa̍śa|saha̍ ( )|atirAtrEṇEtyati̍ - rAtrEṇa|utta̍rA̍ ityut - tarAḥ|ṣOḍaśa|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsa̍ḥ|trayastriṃqśadahamiti̍# trayastriṃśat - aham|AsatE|Eti̍|EṣAm|dvyanIkEti̍# dvi - anIkA|prajEti# pra - jA|jAyatE|atirAtrAvityati̍ - rAtrau|aBitaḥ|Bavataḥ|pari̍gRuhItyA̍ iti pari# - gRuhItyai||21 (67) (ahara- nnEṣva# - vAntaraṃ - ṣOḍaśa̍ saha - saptadaśa̍ ca) (A5)
verses.samhita: ~Mvai daśarAtrEṇa̍# prajApatiḥ̍ prajA asRujata̍ yad-daśarAtrO̍ Bavati̍ prajA Eva tad yajamAnAḥ̍ sRujanta EtAṃ ha vA uda~gkaḥ̍ śau̱lbAyanaḥ satrasyarddhimuvAca̍ yad daśarAtrO̍ yad daśarAtrO̍ Bavati̍ satrasyarddhyA athO yadEva pUrvEṣvahassu̍ vilOma̍ kriyatE tasyaivaiṣA śAntidrvyanIkA̍ vA EtA rAtrayO̍ yajamAnA̍ viśvajith sahAtirAtrEṇa̍ pUrvAḥ ṣOḍaśa̍ sahA ( ) tirAtrEṇOtta̍rAḥ̍ ṣOḍaśa̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsastrayastriṃśadahamAsa̍ta̍ aiṣA̱M dvyanIkA prajA jAyatE̍ &tirAtrAvaBitO# Bavataḥ parigRuhItyai||21̍

verses.padam: - Padam AdityAḥ|akAmayanta|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|iyAma|iti|tE|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|na|prEti|ajAnann|na|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ-gam|lOkam|Ayann|tE|Etam|ṣaṭtriṃqśadrAtramiti# ṣaṭtriṃśat - rAtram|apaśyann|tam|Eti|aharann|tEna̍|ayajanta|tata̍ḥ|vai|tE|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|prEti|ajAnann|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ-gam|lOkam|Ayann|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsaḥ|ṣaṭtriṃqśadrAtramiti̍# ṣaṭtriṃśat - rAtram|AsatE|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|Eva|lOkam|prEti|jAnanti|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|yanti|jyOtiḥ|atirAtra̍ ityati̍ - rAtraḥ|22 (50)
verses.samhita: AdityA akAmayanta̍ suvargaM ~MlOkamiyAmEti̍ tE suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM na prAjAnanna̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyan̍ ta Etaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśadrAtra-ma̍paśyan̍ tamA&haran̍ tEnAyajanta̍ tatO vai tE suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM prAjAnanth̍ suvargaM ~MlOkamAyanq.̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsaḥ̍ ṣaṭtriṃśad rAtramAsatE̍ suvargamEva lOkaM pra jAnanti̍ suvargaM ~MlOkaM ~Myanti̍ jyOtiratirAtrO̍ - [ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam Bavati|jyOtiḥ|Eva|purastA̱t|dadhatE|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|anu̍KyAtyA̍ ityanu# - KyAtyai|ṣaḍahA iti# ṣaṭ - ahAḥ|Bavanti|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutavaḥ|Rutuṣu̍|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|catvAra̍ḥ|Bavanti|cata̍sraḥ|diśa̍ḥ|dikṣu|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|asa̍tram|vai|Etat|yat|aCandOmamitya̍Candaḥ̍ - mam|yat|CandOmA iti# Candaḥ - mAḥ|Bavanti|tEna̍|satram|dEvatA̱ḥ|Eva|pRuṣṭhaiḥ|avEti̍|rundhatE|paśUn|CandOmairiti̍# Candaḥ - maiḥ|Ojaḥ|vai|vIrya̱m|pRuṣṭhAni̍|paśava̍ḥ|CandOmA̍ iti# Candaḥ - mAḥ|Ojasi|Eva|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Bavati̍ jyOtirEva̍ purastA̱d dadhatE suvargasya# lOkasyAnuKyAtyai̍ ṣaḍahA Bavanti̍ ṣaḍ vA Rutava# RutuṣvEva prati# tiṣṭhanti catvArO# Bavanti catasrO̍ diśO# dikṣvEva̍ prati# tiṣṭhantyasatraM̍ ~MvA Etad-yadaCandOmaM̍ ~MyacCandOmA̍ Bavanti̍ tEna# satraM dEvatA# Eva pRuṣṭhairava# rundhatE paśU~jCandOmairOjO̍ vai vIryaM̍ pRuṣṭhAni# paśavaḥ̍ CandOmA OjasyEva̍ - [ ] 23

verses.padam: - Padam vIryE̱|paśuṣu|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|ṣaṭtriṃqśadrAtra̍ iti# ṣaṭtriṃśat-rAtraḥ|Bavati|ṣaṭtriṃśadakṣarEti̍ ṣaṭtriṃśat-akṣarA|bRuhatI|bAṛha̍tAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|bRuhatyA|Eva|paśUn|avEti̍|rundhatE|bRuhatI|Canda̍sAm|svArA̱jyamiti̍ sva - rAjyam|Aśnuta|aśnuvatE̱|svArA̱jyamiti sva - rAjyam|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsaḥ|ṣaṭtriṃqśadrAtramiti̍# ṣaṭtriṃśat - rAtram|AsatE|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|Eva|lOkam|yanti|atirAtrAvityati̍ - rAtrau|aBitaḥ|Bavataḥ|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|pari̍gRuhItyA̍ iti pari# - gRuhItyai||24 (36) (atirAtra - OjasyEva̍ - ṣaṭtriṃśacca)̍ (A6)
verses.samhita: vIryE# paśuṣu prati# tiṣṭhanti ṣaṭ-triṃśad rAtrO Bavati̍ ṣaṭtriṃśadakṣarA̍ bRuhatI bAṛhatAḥ̍ paśavO# bRuhatyaiva paśUnava# rundhatE bRuhatI CandasAṅq̍ svArA̱jyamAśnutA-śnuvatE svArA̱jyaM ~Mya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsaḥ̍ ṣaṭtriṃśad rAtramAsatE̍ suvargamEva lOkaM ~MyantyatirAtrAvaBitO̍# Bavataḥ suvargasya# lOkasya parigRuhItyai||24̍ (atirAtra - OjasyEva̍ - ṣaṭtriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam vasiṣṭhaḥ|hatapu̍tra̍ iti# hata - putraḥ|akAmayata|vindEya|prajAmiti̍# pra-jAm|aBIti|saudAsAn|BavEyam|iti̍|saḥ|Etam|EkasmAn^^napa~jcAśamityE̍kasmAt̍ - napa~jcAśam|apaśyat|tam|Eti|aharat|tEna̍|ayajata|tata̍ḥ|vai|saḥ|avi̍ndata|prajAmiti̍# pra-jAm|aBIti|saudAsAn|aBavat|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsa̍ḥ|EkasmAnnapa~jcAśamityE̍kasmAt-napa~jcAśam|Asa̍tE|vindantE̱|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|aBIti|BrAtRu̍vyAn|Bavanti|traya̍ḥ|trivRuta̍ iti# tri - vRutaḥ|agniṣṭOmA̍ ityagni̍ - stOmAḥ|Bavanti|vajrasya|Eva|muKa̱m|samiti̍|śyanti|daśa̍|pa~jcadaśA̍ iti# pa~jca - daśAḥ|Bavanti|pa~jcadaśa iti# pa~jca - daśaḥ|vajraḥ|25̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vasiṣṭhO̍ hataputrO&kAmayata̍ vindEya# prajAmaBi sAdAsAn̍ BavEyamiti̍ sa EtamEkasmA-nnapa~jcAśa-ma̍paśyat̍ tamA&harat̍ tEnAyajata̍ tatO vai sO&vindata̍ prajAmaBi saudAsAna̍Bavadya̍ EvaM ~MvidvAṃsa# EkasmA-nnapa~jcAśamAsatE̍ vindantE̱ prajAmaBi BrAtRuvyAn̍ Bavanti trayastrivRutO̱&gniṣṭOmA̍ Bavanti̍ vajrasyaiva̍ muKaṃq saṅ śyanti̍ daśa# pa~jcadaśA Bavanti̍ pa~jcadaśO vajrO - [ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam vajra̱m|Eva|BrAtRuvyEByaḥ|prEti̍|haranti|ṣOḍaśimaditi̍# ṣOḍaśi - mat|daśamam|ahaḥ|Bavati|vajrE̱|Eva|vIrya̱m|dadhati|dvAda̍śa|saptadaśA̍ iti# sapta - daśAḥ|Bavanti|annAdyasyEtyanna-̍ adyasya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava-ruddhyai|athO̍ iti|prEti̍|Eva|taiḥ|jAyantE|pRuṣṭhya̍ḥ|ṣaḍaha̍ iti# ṣaṭ - ahaḥ|Bavati|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutavaḥ|ṣaṭ|pRuṣṭhAni̍|pRuṣṭhaiḥ|Eva|RutUn|anvArO̍hantItya̍nu-ArO̍hanti|RutuBirityRutu̍ - Biḥ|saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM - vathsaram|tE|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsarE|Eva|pratIti|tiṣṭhanti|dvAda̍śa|EkaviṃqśA̍ ityEka̍ - viṃqśAḥ|Bavanti|pratiṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|athO iti|ruca̱m|Eva|Atmann|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vajramEva̍ BrAtRuvyEByaḥ̍ pra haranti̍ ṣOḍaśimad-daśamamaha̍-rBavati̍ vajra# Eva vIryaM̍ dadhati dvAdaśa̍ saptadaśA BavantyannAdyasyA̍ varuddhyA̍ athO praiva tairjAyantE̍ pRuṣṭhyaḥ̍ ṣaḍahO Bavati̍ ṣaḍvA Rutavaḥ ṣaṭ pRuṣṭhAni# pRuṣṭhairEvartUnanvArOhantyRutRuBi̍ḥ̍ saM~MvathsaraM tE saM~Mvathsara̍ Eva prati# tiṣṭhanti dvAdaśaikaviṃqśA̍ Bavanti̍ pratiṣṭhityA̍ athO rucamEvA&&*tman-̍ [ ] 26

verses.padam: - Padam dadhatE|bahavaḥ|ṣOḍaśina̍ḥ|Bavanti|viji̍tyA̍ iti vi - jityai|ṣaṭ|AśvinAni|Bavanti|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutava̍ḥ|Rutuṣu̍|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|UnAtiriktA̍ ityUna̍ - atiriktAḥ|vai|EtAḥ|rAtrayaḥ|UnAḥ|tat|yat|Eka̍syai|na|pa~jcAśat|ati̍riktA̍ ityati# - riktAḥ|tat|yat|BUyasIḥ|aṣṭAca̍tvAriṃśata̍ ityaṣṭA-catvAriṃqśataḥ|UnAt|ca|Kalu|vai|ati̍riktAdityati̍-riktAt|ca|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prEti|ajAyata|yE|prajAkA̍mA̍ iti# prajA - kAmAḥ|paśukAmA̍ iti# paśu - kAmAḥ|syuḥ|tE|EtAḥ|AsIrann|prEti|Eva|jAyantE|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱ ( )|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|vairAjaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yajñaḥ|yat|EkasmAnnapa~jcAśa ityEkasmAt̍ - napa~jcAśaḥ|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsaḥ|EkasmAnnapa~jcAśamityE̍kasmAt̍ - napa~jcAśam|AsatE|virAjamiti̍# vi - rAja̱m|Eva|gacCanti|annAdA ityanna-adAḥ|Bavanti|atirAtrAvitya̍ti̍ - rAtrau|aBitaḥ|Bavataḥ|annAdyasyEtya̍nna-adya̍sya|pari̍gRuhItyA̍ iti pari-gRuhItyai||27̍ (72) (vajra# - Atman - prajayA - dvAviṃśatiśca)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: dadhatE̍ bahavaḥ̍ ṣOḍaśinO# Bavanti vijityai̍ ṣaḍA̱śvinAni# Bavanti ṣaḍvA Rutava# RutuṣvEva prati# tiṣṭhantyUnAtiriktA vA EtA rAtraya̍ UnAstad-yadEkasyai̍ na pa~jcAśada-ti̍riktAstad-yad-BUya̍sI-raṣṭAca̍tvAriṃśata̍ UnAcca Kalu vA atiriktAcca̍ prajApatiḥ̍ prAjAyata̍ yE prajAkAmAḥ̍ paśukAmAḥ̍ syusta EtA AsIran̍ praiva jAyantE̍ prajayA# ( ) paśuBirvairAjO̍ vA Eṣa yajñO yadEkasmA-nnapa~jcAśO̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsa# EkasmA-nnapa~jcAśamAsatE̍ virAjamEva̍ gacCantyannAdA̍ Bavantyati-rAtrAvaBitO̍# BavatO&nnAdyasya̍ parigRuhItyai||27̍ (vajra# - Atman - prajayA - dvAviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam saM~MvathsarAyEti# saM - vathsarAya|dIkṣiṣyamA̍ṇAḥ|EkAṣṭakAyAmityE̍ka̍ - aṣṭakAyA̱m|dIkṣErann|EṣA|vai|saM~MvathsarasyEti# saM - vathsarasya|patnI̱|yat|EkAṣṭakEtyE̍ka-aṣṭakA|EtasyA̱m|vai|Eṣaḥ|EtAm|rAtri̱m|vasati|sAkṣAditi̍# sa - akṣAt|Eva|saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM - vathsaram|AraByEtyA̱ - raBya|dIkṣantE|Arta̱m|vai|EtE|saM~MvathsarasyEti̍# saM - vathsarasya|aBIti̍|dIkṣantE|yE|EkAṣṭakAyAmityE̍ka̍ - aṣṭakAyA̱m|dIkṣantE|anta̍nAmAnAvityanta̍-̍ nAmAnau|RutU iti|Bavataḥ|vya̍stamiti̍ vi-astam|vai|EtE|saM~MvathsarasyEti# saM - vathsarasya|aBIti̍|dIkṣantE|yE|EkAṣṭakAyAmityE̍ka̍ - aṣṭakAyA̱m|dIkṣantE|anta̍nAmAnAvityanta̍-̍ nAmAnau|RutU iti|Bavataḥ|PalgunIpUrṇamAsa̍ iti# PalgunI- pUrṇamAsE|dIkṣErann|muKa̱m|vai|Etat|28 (50)
verses.samhita: saM~MvathsarAya# dIkṣiṣyamAṇA̍ EkAṣṭakAyA̱M dIkṣErannEṣA vai saM~Mvathsarasya̍ patnI yadEkAṣṭakaitasyAM̍ ~MvA Eṣa EtAṃ rAtriM̍ ~Mvasati sAkṣAdEva saM~MvathsaramAraBya̍# dIkṣanta ArtaM ~MvA EtE saM~MvathsarasyABi̍ dI̱kṣantE ya EkAṣṭakAyAM̍ dIkṣantE &ntanAmAnAvRutU̍ BavatO̍ vyastaM̍ ~MvA EtE saM~MvathsarasyA&Bi̍ dI̱kṣantE ya EkAṣṭakAyAM̍ dIkṣantE&ntanAmAnAvRutU̍ Bavataḥ̍ PalgunI pUrṇamAsE dI̱kṣEran muKaM ~MvA Etath - [ ] 28

verses.padam: - Padam saM~MvathsarasyEti# saM - vathsarasya|yat|PalgunIpUrṇamAsa̍ iti# PalgunI-pUrṇamAsaḥ|muKataḥ|Eva|saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM-vathsaram|AraByEtyA̱ - raBya|dIkṣantE|tasya̍|EkA̱|Eva|niryEti̍# niḥ - yA|yath|sAMmE̱Gya iti sAM - mEGyE|viṣUvAniti# viṣu - vAn|sapaMdyata̍ iti# saM - padyatE|citrApUrṇamAsa̍ iti# citrA - pUrṇamAsE|dIkṣErann|muKa̱m|vai|Etat|saM~MvathsarasyEti# saM - vathsarasya|yat|citrApUrṇamAsa̍ iti# citrA - pUrṇamAsaḥ|muKataḥ|Eva|saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM - vathsaram|AraByEtyA̱ - raBya|dIkṣantE|tasya̍|na|kA|cana|niryEti̍# niḥ - yA|Bavati|caturaha iti# catuḥ-ahE|purastA̱t|paurṇamAsyA iti# paurṇa-mAsyai|dIkṣErann|tEṣA̱m|EkAṣṭakAyAmityEka̍ - aṣṭakAyA̱m|krayaḥ|samiti|padyatE|tEna̍|EkAṣṭakAmityE̍ka-aṣṭakAm|na|Cambaṭ|kurvanti|tEṣA̱m|29̍ (50)
verses.samhita: saM~Mvathsarasya̍ yat PalgunI̍ pUrṇamAsO muKata̍ Eva saM~MvathsaramAraBya̍# dIkṣantE tasyaikaiva niryA yath sAmmE̱GyE viṣUvAnth sapaMdyatE̍ citrApUrṇamAsE dI̱kṣEran muKaM ~MvA Etath saM~Mvathsarasya̍ yaccitrApUrṇamAsO̍ muKata̍ Eva saM~MvathsaramAraBya̍# dIkṣantE tasya na kA cana niryA Bavati̍ caturahE purastA̱t paurṇamAsyai dI̱kṣEran tEṣAmEkAṣṭakAyA̱M̍ krayaḥ saM padyatE̍ tEnaikAṣṭakAM̍ na Cambaṭ kurvanti̍ tEṣA̱M - [ ] 29

verses.padam: - Padam pUrvapakṣa iti# pUrva - pakṣE|sutyA|samiti|padyatE|pUrvapakṣamiti̍# pUrva - pakṣam|mAsA̱ḥ|aBi|samiti|padyantE|tE|pUrvapakṣa̍ iti# pUrva-pakṣE|uditi|tiṣṭhanti|tAn|uttiṣṭha̍ta̍ ityut-tiṣṭha̍taḥ|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|vanaspata̍yaḥ|anu̍|uditi̍|tiṣṭhanti|tAn|kalyAṇI|kIrtiḥ|anu̍|uditi̍|tiṣṭhati|arA̱thsuḥ|imE|yaja̍mAnAḥ|iti̍|tat|anviti̍|sarvE̱|rAddhnuvanti||30̍ (34) (Eta - cCabaMṭkurvanti̍ tEṣAM - catustriṃśacca)̍ (A8)
verses.samhita: pUrvapakṣE sutyA saM padyatE̍ pUrvapakṣaM mAsA# aBi saM padyantE̍ tE pU̱rvapakṣa ut tiṣṭhanti̍ tAnuttiṣṭhata̍ OṣadhayO̍ vanaspatayO&nUt tiṣṭhanti̍ tAn kalyAṇI̍ kIrtiranUt tiṣṭhatyarA̱th̍ surimE yajamAnA̍ iti tadanu sarvE# rAddhnuvanti||30 (Eta - cCabaMṭkurvanti̍ tEṣAM - catustriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|vai|EtE|lOkam|yanti|yE|satram|upayantItyupa̍ - yanti|aBIti̍|indhatE|Eva|dIkṣABi̍ḥ|AtmAna̱m|śrapayantE|upasadBirityu̍pasat̍ - Biḥ|dvAByA̱m|lOma|avEti̍|dyanti|dvAByA̱m|tvaca̱m|dvAByA̱m|asRu̍t|dvAByA̱m|mAṃqsam|dvAByA̱m|asthi̍|dvAByA̱m|majjAna̱m|Atmada̍kṣiṇamityAtma̍ - dakṣiṇam|vai|satram|AtmAna̱m|Eva|dakṣiṇAm|nItvA|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|yanti|śiKA̱m|anu|prEti̍|vapantE|Ruddhyai̱|athO̍ iti|raGI̍yAṃsaḥ|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|ayAma|iti# ( )||31 (50)
verses.samhita: suvargaM ~MvA EtE lOkaM ~Myanti̍ yE satramupayantyaBIndha̍ta̍ Eva dIkṣABirAtmAnaṅ̍# śrapayanta upasadBi-rdvAByAM ~MlOmAva# dyanti dvAByAM tvacaM dvAByAmasRud dvAByA̱M mAṃqsaM dvAByAmasthi dvAByA̱M majjAnamAtmada̍kṣiṇaM̍ ~Mvai satramAtmAnamEva̍ dakṣiṇAM̍ nItvA suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM ~Myanti̍ śiKAmanu pra vapanta̍ RuddhyA athO raGIyAṃsaḥ̍ suvargaM ~MlOkamayAmEti̍# ( )||31

verses.padam: - Padam brahmavAdina iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|atirAtra̍ ityati-rAtraḥ|paramaḥ|yajñakratUnAmiti̍# yajña-kratUnAm|kasmA̱t|tam|prathamam|upEti|yanti|iti̍|Etat|vai|agniṣṭOmamitya̍gni̍ - stOmam|prathamam|upEti|yanti|atha̍|ukthya̱m|atha̍|ṣOḍaśina̱m|atha̍|atirAtramitya̍ti̍ - rAtram|anupUrvamityanu̍ - pUrvam|Eva|Etat|yajñakratUniti# yajña - kratUn|upEtyEtyupa̍ - itya|tAn|AlaByEtyA̱̍ - laBya|parigRuhyEti̍# pari - gRuhya|sOma̱m|Eva|Etat|piba̍ntaḥ|AsatE|jyOti̍ṣṭOmamiti̍ jyOtiḥ̍ - stOmam|prathamam|upEti|yanti|jyOti̍ṣṭOma̍ iti jyOtiḥ̍ - stOmaḥ|vai|stOmAnAm|muKa̱m|muKataḥ|Eva|stOmAn̍|prEti̍|yu~jjatE|tE|32̍ (50)
verses.samhita: brahmavAdinO# vadantyatirAtraḥ paramO̍ yajñakratUnAM̍ kasmAt taM prathamamupa̍# yantItyEtadvA agniṣṭOmaM̍ prathamamupa̍# yantyathOkthyamatha̍# ṣOḍaśina-mathAtirAtra-ma̍nupUrvamEvaitad-ya̍jñakratUnupEtya̍ tAnAlaBya# parigRuhya sOmamEvaitat̍ pibanta̍ AsatE jyOtiṣṭOmaM̍ prathamamupa# yanti jyOtiṣṭOmO̍ vai stOmAnAM̍ muKaM̍ muKata Eva stOmAn pra yu~jjatE̍ tE - [ ] 32

verses.padam: - Padam saṅstutA̍ iti saM - stutAḥ|virAjamiti# vi - rAja̱m|aBi|samiti|padyantE|dvE̍ iti|ca|Rucau̱|atIti̍|ricyEtE̍ iti|Eka̍yA|gauḥ|ati̍rikta̍ ityati# - riktaḥ|EkayA|Ayu̍ḥ|Unaḥ|suvarga̍ iti# suvaḥ - gaḥ|vai|lOkaḥ|jyOtiḥ|Urk|virAḍiti̍# vi - rAṭ|suvargamiti# suvaḥ-gam|Eva|tEna|lOkam|yanti|rathantaramiti̍# rathaM - taram|divA̱|Bavati|rathantaramiti̍# rathaM-taram|nakta̱m|iti|Ahuḥ|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma-vAdinaḥ|kEna̍|tat|ajA̍mi|iti̍|sauBaram|tRutIyasavana̍ iti# tRutIya - savanE|brahmasAmamiti# brahma - sAmam|bRuhat|tan|maddhyataḥ|dadhati|vidhRutyA̍ iti vi - dhRutyai|tEna|ajA̍mi||33̍ (49)
verses.samhita: saṅstutA̍ virAjamaBi̍ saM padyantE̍ dvE carcAvati# ricyEtE EkayA̍ gauratirikta̍ EkayA&&yurUnaḥ̍ suvargO̍ vai lOkO jyOtirUrg-virAṭ-thsuvargamEva̍ tEna# lOkaM ~Myanti̍ rathantaraM divA Bavati̍ rathantaraM naktamityAhu-rbrahmavAdinaḥ̍ kEna tadajAmIti# sauBaraM tRutIyasavanE̍ brahmasAmaM̍ bRuhat tanmaddhyatO̍ dadhati̍ vidhRutyai̍ tEnAjAmi||33̍

verses.padam: - Padam jyOtiṣṭOmamiti̍ jyOtiḥ̍ - stOmam|prathamam|upEti|yanti|asminn|Eva|tEna̍|lOkE|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|gOṣṭO̍mamiti̍ gO - stOmam|dvitIya̱m|upEti|yanti|antari̍kṣE|Eva|tEna̍|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|Ayu̍ṣṭOmamityAyu̍ḥ̍ - stAmam|tRutIya̱m|upEti|yanti|amuṣminn̍|Eva|tEna̍|lOkE|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|iyam|vAva|jyOti̍ḥ|antari̍kṣam|gauḥ|asau|Ayu̍ḥ|yat|EtAn|stOmAn̍|upayantItyu̍pa̍ - yanti|Eṣu|Eva|tat|lOkEṣu̍|satriṇa̍ḥ|pratitiṣṭha̍nta̍ iti# prati - tiṣṭhantaḥ|yanti|tE|saṅstu̍tA̍ iti saM - stutAḥ|virAjamiti# vi - rAja̱m|34 (50)
verses.samhita: jyOtiṣṭOmaM̍ prathamamupa# yantyasminnEva tEna# lOkE prati# tiṣṭhanti gOṣṭOmaM̍ dvitIyamupa# yantyantarikṣa̍ Eva tEna prati# tiṣṭhantyAyuṣṭOmaM̍ tRutIyamupa# yantyamuṣminnEva̍ tEna# lOkE prati# tiṣṭhantIyaM ~MvAva jyOtirantari̍kṣaM̍ gaurasAvAyu-ryadEtAnth-stOmA-nupayantyEṣvE̍va̍ tallOkEṣu# satriṇaḥ̍ prati tiṣṭhantO̍ yanti tE saṅstutA̍ virAja# - [ ] 34

verses.padam: - Padam aBi|samiti|padyantE|dvE̍ iti|ca|Rucau̱|atIti̍|ricyEtE̍ iti|Eka̍yA|gauḥ|ati̍rikta̍ ityati# - riktaḥ|EkayA|Ayu̍ḥ|Unaḥ|suvarga̍ iti# suvaḥ - gaḥ|vai|lOkaḥ|jyOtiḥ|Urk|virAḍiti̍# vi - rAṭ|Urja̱m|Eva|avEti|rundhatE|tE|na|kṣudhA|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCanti|akṣO̍dhukAḥ|Bavanti|kṣuthsa̍mbAdhA̍ iti kṣut - sambAdhAḥ|iva|hi|satriṇaḥ|agniṣṭOmAvitya̍gni̍ - stOmau|aBitaḥ|pradhI̍ iti# pra -dhI|tau|ukthyA̱ḥ|maddhyE̱|naBya̱m|tat|tat|Etat|pariyaditi# pari - yat|dEvacakramiti# dEva - cakram|yat|EtEna|35̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -maBi saMpadyantE̍ dvE carcAvati# ricyEtE EkayA̍ gauratirikta̍ EkayA&&yurUnaḥ̍ suvargO̍ vai lOkO jyOtirUrg-virAḍUrja-mEvAva̍# rundhatE tE na kṣudhA &&rtimArcCantyakṣOdhukA̍ Bavanti kṣuth sabAMdhA̍ iva hi satriṇO̱ &gniṣṭOmAvaBitaḥ̍ pradhI tAvukthyA# maddhyE naByaM tat tadEtat pariyad-dE̍vacakraM̍ ~MyadEtEna# - [ ] 35

verses.padam: - Padam ṣaḍahEnEti# ṣaṭ - ahEna|yanti̍|dEvacakramiti̍# dEva-cakram|Eva|samArOhantIti̍# saM - ArOhanti|ari̍ṣṭyai|tE|svasti|samiti̍|aśnuvatE|ṣaḍahEnEti̍# ṣaṭ - ahEna|yanti|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutava̍ḥ|Rutuṣu̍|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|uBayatA̱jyOtiṣEtyu̍Bayata̍ḥ-jyOtiṣA|yanti|uBayata̍ḥ|Eva|suvarga̍ iti# suvaḥ - gE|lOkE|pratitiṣṭhanta̍ iti# prati-tiṣṭhantaḥ|yanti|dvau|ṣaḍahAviti̍# ṣaṭ-ahau|Bavataḥ|tAni|dvAda̍śa|ahA̍ni|samiti̍|padyantE|dvAdaśaḥ|vai|puru̍ṣaḥ|dvE̍ iti|sakthyau̱|dvau|bAhU̍ iti|AtmA|ca|śira̍ḥ|ca|catvAri̍|a~ggA̍ni|stanau̱|dvAdaśau|36̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ṣaḍahEna yanti# dEvacakramEva samArOhantyari̍ṣṭyai̍ tE svasti samaśnuvatE̍ ṣaḍahEna# yanti ṣaḍvA Rutava# RutuṣvEva prati# tiṣṭhantyuBayatO̱ jyOtiṣA yantyuBayata# Eva suvargE̍ lOkE pratitiṣṭha̍ntO̍ yanti dvau ṣaḍahau̍ BavatastAni̍ dvAdaśAhAni̍ saM padyantE̍ dvAdaśO vai puruṣO̍ dvE sakthyau̱ dvau bAhU AtmA ca śiraśca̍ catvArya~ggAni̍ stanau̱ dvAdaśau - [ ] 36

verses.padam: - Padam tat|puruṣam|anviti̍|paryAva̍rtanta̍ iti# pari - AvartantE|traya̍ḥ|ṣaḍahA̍ iti# ṣaṭ - ahAḥ|Bavanti|tAni|aṣṭAdaśEtyaṣṭA̍ - daśa|ahAni|samiti̍|padyantE|nava̍|anyAni̍|nava̍|anyAni̍|nava̍|vai|puru̍ṣE|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|tat|prAṇAniti# pra-anAn|anviti|paryAva̍rtanta̍ iti# pari - AvartantE|catvAra̍ḥ|ṣaḍahA̍ iti# ṣaṭ- ahAḥ|Bavanti|tAni|catu̍rviṃśatiriti̍ catuḥ-viṃqśatiḥ|ahA̍ni|samiti̍|padyantE|catu̍rviṃśatiriti̍ catuḥ̍ - viṃqśatiḥ|ad^^rdhamAsA ityad^^rdha - mAsAḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|tat|saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM - vathsaram|anviti|paryAva̍rtanta̍ iti# pari - AvartantE|apra̍tiṣṭhita̍ ityaprati̍ - sthitaḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|iti|Kalu̍|vai|Ahuḥ|vaṛṣI̍yAn|pratiṣṭhAyA̍ iti# prati - sthAyA̱ḥ|iti|EtAva̍t|vai̍ ( )|saM~MvathsarasyEti# saM - vathsarasya|brAhma̍ṇam|yAva̍t|mAsaḥ|mAsimAsIti̍# mAsi - mAsi|Eva|pratitiṣṭhanta̍ iti# prati - tiṣṭhantaḥ|yanti||37̍ (58)
verses.samhita: tat puruṣamanu̍# paryAvartantE̍ trayaḥ̍ ṣaḍahA Bavanti̍ tAnyaṣṭAdaśAhAni̍ saM padyantE̍ navAnyAni navAnyAni nava vai puruṣE̍ prAṇAstat prAṇAnanu# paryAvartantE̍ catvAraḥ̍ ṣaḍahA Bavanti̍ tAni caturviṃśatirahA̍ni̍ saM padyantE̍ caturviṃśatirarddhamAsAḥ̍ saM~Mvathsarastath̍ saM~Mvathsaramanu̍# paryAvartantE̍ &pratiṣṭhitaḥ̍ saM~Mvathsara iti Kalu vA AhurvaṛṣI̍yAn̍ pratiṣṭhAyA ityEtAvadvai ( ) saM~Mvathsarasya̍ brAhmaṇaM̍ ~MyAvanmAsO̍ mAsimA̱syEva pratitiṣṭha̍ntO̍ yanti||37

verses.padam: - Padam mEṣaḥ|tvA|pacataiḥ|avatu|lOhitagrIva̍ iti lOhita̍ - grIvaḥ|CAgai̱ḥ|śalmaliḥ|vRuddhyA̱|parṇaḥ|brahmaṇA|plakṣaḥ|mEdhE̍na|nyagrOdha̍ḥ|camasaiḥ|udumbara̍ḥ|UrjA|gAyatrI|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|trivRuditi# tri - vRut|stOmai̱ḥ|avantIḥ|stha|ava̍ntIḥ|tvA|avantu|priyam|tvA|priyAṇA̱m|vaṛṣi̍ṣṭham|ApyA̍nAm|nidhInAmiti̍# ni - dhInAm|tvA|nidhipatimiti# nidhi - pati̱m|havAmahE|vasO iti|mama||38̍ (36) (mEṣaḥ - ṣaṭ triṃśat)̍ (A12)
verses.samhita: mEṣastvA# pacatairavatu̍ lOhitagrIvaḥ̍ CAgai̱ḥ śalmalirvRuddhyA# parṇO brahmaṇA̍ plakṣO mEdhEna̍ nyagrOdhaścamasairu̍dubaMra̍# UrjA gAyatrI̍ CandOBistrivRuth̍ stOmairavantIḥ̍ sthAvantIstvA&vantu̍ priyaM tvA̱ priyAṇAM ~MvaṛṣiṣṭhamApyA̍nAM̍ nidhInAM tvA# nidhipatiṃ# havAmahE vasO mama||38 (mEṣaḥ - ṣaṭ triṃśat)̍
