verses.padam: - Padam kUpyA̱Byaḥ|svAhA̱|kUlyA̱Byaḥ|svAhA̱|vikaryA̱Bya iti# vi - karyA̱Byaḥ|svAhA̱|avaṭyA̱Byaḥ|svAhA̱|KanyA̱Byaḥ|svAhA̱|hradyA̱Byaḥ|svAhA̱|sUdyA̱Byaḥ|svAhA̱|sarasyA̱Byaḥ|svAhA̱|vaiśantIByaḥ|svAhA̱|palvalyA̱Byaḥ|svAhA̱|varṣyA̱Byaḥ|svAhA̱|avarṣyABya̍ḥ|svAhA̱|hrAdunI̱Bya̍ iti# hrAduni# - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|pRuṣvA̱Byaḥ|svAhA̱|syandamAnAByaḥ|svAhA̱|sthAvarABya̍ḥ|svAhA̱|nAdEyIBya̍ḥ|svAhA̱|saindhavIBya̍ḥ|svAhA̱|samudriyA̱Byaḥ|svAhA̱|sarvA̱Byaḥ|svAhA̱||39̍ (40) (kUpyA̱Bya - ścatvAriṃqśat) (A13)
verses.samhita: kUpyA̱Byaḥ svAhA kUlyA̱Byaḥ svAhA# vikaryA̱Byaḥ svAhA# &vaṭyA̱Byaḥ svAhA KanyA̱Byaḥ svAhA hradyA̱Byaḥ svAhA sUdyA̱Byaḥ svAhA# sarasyA̱Byaḥ svAhA# vaiśantIByaḥ svAhA# palvalyA̱Byaḥ svAhA varṣyA̱Byaḥ svAhA# &varṣyAByaḥ svAhA̱ hrAdunI̱Byaḥ svAhA pRuṣvA̱Byaḥ svAhA syandamAnAByaḥ̍ svAhA̱ sthAvarAByaḥ svAhA# nAdEyIByaḥ svAhA# saindhavIByaḥ svAhA# samudriyA̱Byaḥ svAhA sarvA̱Byaḥ svAhA̱||39

verses.padam: - Padam adBya ityat̍ - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|vahantIByaḥ|svAhA̱|parivaha̍ntIBya̍ iti# pari - vahantIByaḥ|svAhA̱|samantamiti̍# saM-antam|vahantIByaḥ|svAhA̱|śIGra̱m|vaha̍ntIByaḥ|svAhA̱|śIBa̱m|vaha̍ntIByaḥ|svAhA̱|ugram|vaha̍ntIByaḥ|svAhA̱|BImam|vaha̍ntIByaḥ|svAhA̱|amBO̱Bya̍ ityamBaḥ-Byaḥ|svAhA̱|naBO̱Bya̍ iti naBaḥ̍ - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|mahO̱Bya iti mahaḥ̍ - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|sarvasmai|svAhA̱||40̍ (29) (adBya - EkAnnatriṃqśat) (A14)
verses.samhita: adByaḥ svAhA vahantIByaḥ̍ svAhA# parivahantIByaḥ̍ svAhA# samantaM ~MvahantIByaḥ̍ svAhA śIGraM ~MvahantIByaḥ̍ svAhA śIBaM ~MvahantIByaḥ̍ svAhOgraM ~MvahantIByaḥ̍ svAhA# BImaM ~MvahantIByaḥ̍ svAhA&mBO̱Byaḥ svAhA naBO̱Byaḥ svAhA mahO̱Byaḥ svAhA sarvasmai̍ svAhA̱||40

verses.padam: - Padam yaḥ|arvantam|jiGAṃ̍sati|tam|aBIti̍|amIti|varu̍ṇaḥ||paraḥ|marta̍ḥ|paraḥ|śvA||aham|ca|tvam|ca|vRutrahanniti̍# vRutra - hann|samiti|baBUva|saniBya̍ iti# sani - Byaḥ|A||arAtIvA|cit|adriva ityadri̍ - vaḥ|anviti|nau|śUra|maṃqsatai|BadrAḥ|indra̍sya|rAtaya̍ḥ||aBIti̍|kratvA̱|indra|BUḥ|adha̍|jmann|na|tE|vivyak|mahimAna̱m|rajAṃ̍si||svEna̍|hi|vRutram|śava̍sA|jaGantha̍|na|śatru̍ḥ|anta̱m|vividat̍ ( )|yudhA|tE||41 (52)
verses.samhita: yO arvantaM̍ jiGAṃsati̍ tamaByamIti̍ varuṇaḥ||parO̍ martaḥ̍ paraḥ śvA||ahaM ca tvaM ca# vRutrahanthsaM baBUva̍ saniBya A|arAtIvA cidadrivO&nu̍# nau śUra maṃsatai BadrA indrasya̍ rAtayaḥ||aBi̍ kratvE̱ndra BUradha jmanna tE# vivya~gmahimAnaṃq rajAṃsi|svEnA̍ hi vRutraṃ śavasA̍ jaGantha na śatrurantaM̍ ~Mvividad ( ) yudhA tE̱||41

verses.padam: - Padam namaḥ|rAjñE̱|nama̍ḥ|varu̍ṇAya|nama̍ḥ|aśvA̍ya|nama̍ḥ|prajApa̍taya̍ iti# prajA - patayE|namaḥ|adhi̍pataya̍ ityadhi# - patayE|adhipatirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|asi|adhipatimityadhi̍# - patim|mA|kuru|adhipatirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|aham|prajAnAmiti# pra - jAnA̱m|BUyAsam|mAm|dhEhi|mayi|dhEhi|upAkRu̍tAyEtyu̍pa̍ - AkRutAya|svAhA̱|Ala̍bdhAyEtyA̍ - labdhAya|svAhA̱|hutAya|svAhA̱||42̍ (29) (nama - EkAnna triṃqśat) (A16)
verses.samhita: namO rAjñE namO varuṇAya̍ namO&śvAya̍ namaḥ̍ prajApatayE̍ namO&dhipatayE̍ &dhipatirasyadhi̍patiM̍ mA kurvadhipatirahaM̍ prajAnA̱M BUyAsaM mAM dhEhi̍ mayi# dhEhyupAkRutAya̍ svAhA &&labdhAya̍ svAhA# hutAya svAhA̱||42

verses.padam: - Padam mayOBUriti# mayaḥ - BUḥ|vAtaḥ|aBIti̍|vAtu|usrAḥ|Urja̍svatIḥ|Oṣa̍dhIḥ|Eti̍|riśantAm||pIva̍svatIḥ|jIvadha̍nyA̍ iti# jIva - dhanyAḥ|pibantu|avasAya|padvata̍ iti# pat - vatE̱|rudra|mRuḍa||yAḥ|sarUpA̍ iti sa - rUpAḥ|virUpA̍ iti vi - rUpAḥ|EkarUpA̍ ityEka-rUpAḥ|yAsA̱m|agniḥ|iṣṭyA̱|nAmA̍ni|vEda̍||yAḥ|a~ggi̍rasaḥ|tapa̍sA|iha|cakruḥ|tABya̍ḥ|parjanya|mahi̍|śarma̍|yacCa||yAḥ|dEvEṣu̍|tanuva̱m|aira̍yanta|yAsA̱m|sOma̍ḥ|viśvA̱|rUpAṇi̍|vEda̍||tAḥ|asmaByamityasma̍ - Byam|payasA|pinva̍mAnAḥ|prajAva̍tIriti̍# prajA - vatIḥ|indra|43 (50)
verses.samhita: mayOBUrvAtO# aBi vAtUsrA̍ UrjasvatIrOṣa̍dhIrA̍ riśantAM|pIva̍svatIrjIvadha̍nyAḥ̍ pibantvavasAya# padvatE# rudra mRuḍa||yAḥ sarUpA̍ virUpA̍ EkarUpA̍ yAsAmagniriṣṭyA̍ nAmAni̍ vEda|yA̍ a~ggirasastapa̍sEha̍ cakrustAByaḥ̍ parjanya mahi śarma# yacCa||yA dEvEṣu# tanuvamairayanta̍ yAsAṃq sOmO viśvA# rUpAṇi vEda|tA̍ asmaByaM payasA̍ pinvamAnAḥ̍ prajAvatIrindra̍ - [ ] 43

verses.padam: - Padam gOṣṭha iti# gO - sthE|rirIhi||prajApatiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|mahya̱m|EtAḥ|rarAṇaḥ|viśvai̱ḥ|dEvaiḥ|pitRuBiriti̍# pitRu - Biḥ|saM~MvidAna iti# saM - vidAnaḥ||śivAḥ|satIḥ|upEti|naḥ|gOṣṭhamiti̍# gO - stham|Eti|akaḥ|tAsA̱m|vayam|prajayEti̍# pra-jayA̱|samiti|sadEma||iha|dhRuti̍ḥ|svAhA̱|iha|vidhRu̍tiriti̍ vi - dhRutiḥ|svAhA̱|iha|rantiḥ|svAhA̱|iha|rama̍tiḥ|svAhA̱|mahIm|u|sviti̍|sutrAmA̍ṇamiti̍# su - trAmAṇam||44̍ (38) (indrA - ṣṭAtriṃśacca)̍ (A17)
verses.samhita: - mahImUṣu>1 sutrAmAṇaM>̍ 2 mahImUṣu mAtaraṃ# suvratAnAmRutasya̍ patnImavasE̍ huvEma|tuvikṣatrAmajarantImurUcIṃ̍ suśarmAṇamadi̍tiṃ̍ supraṇItiM||sutrAmA̍ṇaM̍ pRuthivIM dyAmanEhasaṃ̍# suśarmAṇa̍ maditiṃ̍ supraṇItiM|daivIM̍ nAvaṅ# svaritrAmanAgasamasra̍vantImA̍ ruhEmA̍ svastayE̱||(AppEaring in ṭ.ś.1.5.11.5) ============================== OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ hariḥ OM 7.5 saptamakAṇḍE pa~jcamaḥ praśnaḥ - satraviśEṣABidhAnaM

verses.padam: - Padam kim|svit|AsIt|pUrvacittiriti̍# pUrva - cittiḥ|kim|svit|AsIt|bRuhat|vayaḥ||kim|svit|AsIt|piśa~ggilA|kim|svit|AsIt|pilippilA||dyauḥ|AsIt|pUrvaci̍ttiriti̍# pUrva - cittiḥ|aśvaḥ|AsIt|bRuhat|vaya̍ḥ||rAtri̍ḥ|AsIt|piśa~ggilA|avi̍ḥ|AsIt|pilippilA||kaḥ|svit|EkAkI|carati|kaḥ|u|svit|jAyatE|puna̍ḥ||kim|svit|himasya̍|BEṣajam|kim|svit|Avapa̍namityA̱̍ - vapanam|mahat||sUrya̍ḥ|EkAkI|carati|45̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kiṅ svidAsIt̍ pUrvacittiḥ̍ kiṅ svidAsId-bRuhadvaya̍ḥ|kiṅ̍ svidAsIt̍ piśaMgilA kiṅ svidAsIt̍ pilippilA||dyaurAsIt̍ pUrvacittiraśva̍# AsId bRuhadvayaḥ|rAtri̍rAsIt̍ piśa~ggilA &virAsIt̍ pilippilA||kaḥ svidEkAkI̍ carati̍ ka u# svijjAyatE punaḥ|kiṅ̍ sviddhimasya̍# BEṣajaM kiṅ svidAvapa̍naM̍ mahat||sUrya# EkAkI carati̍ - [ ] 45

verses.padam: - Padam candramA̱ḥ|jAyatE|punaḥ||agniḥ|himasya̍|BEṣajam|BUmi̍ḥ|Avapa̍namityA̱̍ - vapanam|mahat||pRucCAmi̍|tvA|para̱m|anta̱m|pRuthivyAḥ|pRucCAmi̍|tvA|Buva̍nasya|nABi̱m||pRucCAmi̍|tvA|vRuṣṇa̍ḥ|aśva̍sya|rEta̍ḥ|pRucCAmi̍|vAcaḥ|paramam|vyO̍mEti̍ vi - Oma||vEdi̱m|Ahuḥ|para̱m|anta̱m|pRuthivyAḥ|yajñam|Ahuḥ|Buvanasya|nABi̱m||sOma̱m|Ahuḥ|vRuṣṇa̍ḥ|aśva̍sya|rEta̍ḥ|brahma̍|Eva|vAcaḥ|paramam|vyO̍mEti̍ vi - Oma||46 (46) (sUrya# EkAkI carati̍ - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A18)
verses.samhita: candramA# jAyatE punaḥ|agniṛ̍ himasya# BEṣajaM BUmirAvapa̍naM̍ mahat||pRucCAmi# tvA paramantaM̍ pRuthivyAḥ pRucCAmi# tvA Buvanasya̍ nABi̱M|pRucCAmi# tvA vRuṣṇO aśvasya̍ rEtaḥ̍ pRucCAmi# vAcaḥ paramaM̍ ~MvyOma||vEdi̍mAhuḥ̍ paramantaM̍ pRuthivyA yajñamAhu̍ rBuvanasya̍ nABi̱M|sOmamAhurvRuṣṇO̍ aśvasya̍ rEtO brahmaiva vAcaḥ paramaM̍ ~MvyOma||46̍ (sUrya# EkAkI carati̍ - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam abEM̱|ambAli|ambi̍kE|na|mA|nayati|kaḥ|cana||sasasti̍|aśvakaḥ||suBa̍ga̍ iti su - BagE|kAmpIlavAsinIti̍ kAmpIla̍ - vAsini|suvarga iti# suvaḥ-gE|lOkE|sam|prEti|UrṇvAthAm||Eti̍|aham|ajAni|garBadhamiti̍# garBa - dham|Eti|tvam|ajAsi|garBadhamiti̍# garBa - dham||tau|saha|caturaḥ|padaḥ|sam|prEti̍|sArayAvahai||vRuṣA̱|vAm|rEtOdhA̍ iti# rEtaḥ - dhAḥ|rEtaḥ|dadhAtu|uditi̍|sakthyO̱ḥ|gRudam|dhEhi|a~jjim|uda̍~jjimityut-a~jjim|anviti̍|aja||yaḥ|strIṇAm|jIvaBOja̍na̍ iti# jIva - BOjanaḥ|yaḥ|AsAm|47̍ (50)
verses.samhita: abEMq abAMqlyaMbikE̍ na mA# nayati kaścana|sasastyaśvakaḥ||suBa̍gE̍ kAMpIlavAsini̍ suvargE lOkE saM prOrṇvAthAM|A&hama̍jAni̍ garBadhamA tvamajAsi̍ garBadhaM||tau saha caturaḥ̍ padaḥ saM pra sArayAvahai||vRuṣA̍# vAṃ rEtOdhA rEtO# dadhAtUth sakthyO̱rgRudaM dhE̱hya~jjimuda~jjimanva̍ja|yaḥ̍ strIṇAM jIvaBOja̍nO̍ ya AsAM̍ - [ ] 47

verses.padam: - Padam biladhAvana̍ iti# bila - dhAvanaḥ||priyaḥ|strIṇAm|apIcya̍ḥ||yaḥ|AsAm|kRuṣṇE|lakṣma̍ṇi|sardi̍gRudim|parAva̍dhIditi̍# parA - avadhIt||ambE̱|ambA̍li|ambi̍kE|na|mA|yaBati|kaḥ|cana||sasasti̍|aśvakaḥ||Ud^^rdhvAm|EnAm|uditi̍|śrayatAt|vEṇuBAramiti̍# vEṇu-BAram|girau|iva||atha|asyAḥ|maddhya̱m|EdhatAm|śItE|vAtE̱|punann|iva||ambE̱|ambA̍li|ambi̍kE|na|mA|yaBati|kaḥ|cana||sasasti̍|aśvakaḥ||yat|hariṇI|yava̱m|atti̍|na|48̍ (50)
verses.samhita: biladhAvanaḥ|priyaḥ̍ strIṇAmapIcya̍ḥ||ya̍ AsAM̍ kRuṣṇE lakṣmaṇi̍ sardigRudiM̍ parAvadhIt||abEMq̍ abAMqlyaMbikE̍ na mA# yaBati kaścana|sasastyaśvakaḥ||UrddhvA-mE̍nAmucCra̍yatAd-vEṇuBAraM̍ girAviva|athA̱syA̍ maddhyamEdhatAṃ̍ śItE vAtE# punanniva||abEMq̍ abAMqlyaMbikE̍ na mA# yaBati kaścana|sasastyaśvakaḥ||yaddha̍riṇI̍ yavamatti na - [ ] 48

verses.padam: - Padam puṣṭam|paśu|manyatE||śUdrA|yat|aryajArEtyarya̍# - jArA|na|pOṣAya|dhanAyati||ambE̱|ambA̍li|ambi̍kE|na|mA|yaBati|kaḥ|cana||sasasti̍|aśvakaḥ||iyam|yakA|śakuntikA|AhalamityA̱-hala̱m|iti̍|sarpa̍ti||Aha̍tamityA-hatam|gaBE|pasa̍ḥ|nIti̍|jalgulIti|dhAṇi̍kA||ambE̱|ambA̍li|ambi̍kE|na|mA|yaBati|kaḥ|cana||sasasti̍|aśvakaḥ||mAtA|ca|tE|pitA|ca|tE|agra̱m|vRukṣasya̍|rOhataḥ̍ ( )||49 (50)
verses.samhita: puṣṭaM paśu manyatE|śUdrA̍ yadaryajArA̍ na pOṣAya̍ dhanAyati||abEMq abAMqlyaMbikE̍ na mA# yaBati kaścana|sasastyaśvakaḥ||iyaM̍ ~MyakA śakuntikA̍ &&halamiti sarpati|Aha̍taM̍ gaBE pasO ni jalgulIti̍ dhAṇikA||abEMq̍ abAMqlyaMbikE̍ na mA# yaBati kaścana|sasastyaśvakaḥ||mAtA̍ ca# tE pitA ca tE&graM̍ ~MvRukṣasya# rOhataḥ ( )|49

verses.padam: - Padam prEti|sulAmi|iti̍|tE|pitA|gaBE|muṣṭim|ataṃqsayat||dadhikrAv.ṇṇa̍ iti# dadhi-krAv.ṇṇaḥ|akAriṣam|jiṣṇOḥ|aśva̍sya|vAjina̍ḥ||suraBi|naḥ|muKA̱|karat|prEti̍|naḥ|AyUṃ̍ṣi|tAriṣat||Apa̍ḥ|hi|stha|mayOBuva̍ iti# mayaḥ - Buvaḥ|tAḥ|naḥ|UrjE|dadhAtana||mahE|raṇA̍ya|cakṣa̍sE||yaḥ|vaḥ|śivata̍ma̍ iti# śiva - tamaḥ|rasaḥ|tasya̍|BAjayata|iha|naḥ||uśatIḥ|iva|mAtara̍ḥ||tasmai̱|ara̱m|gamAma|vaḥ|yasya̍|kṣayA̍ya|jinva̍tha̍ ( )||Apaḥ|janaya̍tha|ca|naḥ||50̍ (54)
verses.samhita: pra sulAmIti̍# tE pitA gaBE muṣṭimataṃsayat||dadhikrAv.ṇṇO̍# akAriṣaM jiṣṇOraśvasya̍ vAjinaḥ|suraBi̍ nO muKA# karat praṇa AyUṃṣi̍ tAriṣat||ApO hi ṣṭhA mayOBuvastA̍ na# UrjE dadhAtana|mahEraṇA̍ya̍ cakṣasE||yO̍ vaḥ̍ śivatamO̍ rasastasya# BAjayatEha naḥ|uśatIri̍va̍ mAtaraḥ||tasmA̍ araM̍ gamAma vO yasya kṣayAya̍ jinvatha̍ ( )|ApO# janayathA̍ ca naḥ||50

verses.padam: - Padam BUḥ|Buvaḥ|suva̍ḥ|vasa̍vaḥ|tvA|a~jjantu|gAyatrEṇa̍|Canda̍sA|rudrAḥ|tvA|a~jjantu|traiṣṭu̍BEna|Canda̍sA|AdityAḥ|tvA|a~jjantu|jAga̍tEna|Canda̍sA|yat|vAta̍ḥ|apaḥ|aga̍mat|indra̍sya|tanuva̱m|priyAm||Etam|stOtaḥ|EtEna̍|pathA|puna̍ḥ|aśva̱m|Eti̍|vartayAsi|naḥ||lAjI(3)n|śAcI(3)n|yaśa̍ḥ|mamA(4)~Mm||yavyAyai̱|gavyAyai̱|Etat|dEvAḥ|anna̱m|atta|Etat|anna̱m|addhi|prajApata̍ iti# prajA - patE||yu~jjanti|braddhnam̍ ( )|aruṣam|carantam|parIti̍|tasthuṣa̍ḥ||rOca̍ntE|rOcanA|divi||yu~jjanti̍|asya|kAmyA̱|harI̍ iti|vipa̍kṣasEti̍ vi - pakṣasA|rathE̱||śOṇA̱|dhRuṣṇU iti|nRuvAhasEti̍# nRu-vAhasA||kEtum|kRuṇvann|akEtavE̱|pEśa̍ḥ|maryAḥ|apEśasE̱||samiti̍|uṣadBirityuṣat̍ - Biḥ|ajAyathAḥ||51 (75) (braddhnaM - pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A20)
verses.samhita: BUrBuvaḥ suvarvasavastvA̍ &~jjantu gAyatrEṇa CandasA̍ rudrAstvA̱ &~jjantu traiṣṭuBEna̍ CandasA,̍ &&dityAstvA̱&~jjantu jAgatEna̍ CandasA̍ yad-vAtO# apO agamadindra̍sya̍ tanuvaM̍ priyAM|Etaṅ stOtarEtEna̍# pathA punaraśvamA vartayAsi̍ naḥ||lAjI(3)~jCAcI(3)n yaśO# mamA~M(4)|yavyAyai# gavyAyA# Etad-dEvA̍ annamattaitadanna̍maddhi̍ prajApatE||yu~jjanti# braddhna ( )-maruṣaM̍ carantaM̍ pari# tasthuṣaḥ|rOca̍ntE̍ rOcanA divi||yu~jjantyasya̍ kAmyA harI vipakṣasA̍ rathE̱|śOṇA# dhRuṣṇU nRuvAhasA||kEtuM̍ kRuṇvannakEtavE̍ pEśO# maryA apEśasE̱|samuṣadBirajAyathAḥ||51̍ (braddhnaM - pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam prAṇAyEti# pra - anAya|svAhA̱|vyAnAyEti̍# vi - anAya|svAhA̱|apAnAyEtya̍pa̍ - anAya|svAhA̱|snAva̍Bya̍ iti snAva# - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|santAnEBya iti# saM - tAnEByaḥ|svAhA̱|pari̍santAnEBya̍ iti pari# - santAnEByaḥ|svAhA̱|parvaBya̍ iti parva-Byaḥ|svAhA̱|sadhAMnE̱Bya̍ iti# saM - dhAnE̱Byaḥ|svAhA̱|śarIrEByaḥ|svAhA̱|yajñAya̍|svAhA̱|dakṣi̍ṇAByaḥ|svAhA̱|suvargAyEti̍# suvaḥ - gAya|svAhA̱|lOkAya̍|svAhA̱|sarva̍smai|svAhA̱||52̍ (28) (prAṇAyA - ṣṭAviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A21)
verses.samhita: prAṇAya svAhA̱ vyAnAya svAhA# &pAnAya svAhA snAvaByaḥ̍ svAhA# saMtAnEByaḥ svAhA parisaMtAnEByaḥ̍ svAhA parvaByaḥ̍ svAhA# sadhAMnE̱Byaḥ svAhA śarIrEByaḥ̍ svAhA# yajñAya svAhA dakṣiṇAByaḥ̍ svAhA# suvargAya svAhA# lOkAya svAhA sarvasmai̍ svAhA̱||52 (prAṇAyA - ṣṭAviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: - Padam sitAya|svAhA̱|asi̍tAya|svAhA̱|aBihi̍tAyEtyaBi̍ - hitAya|svAhA̱|anaBihitAyEtyana̍Bi̍ - hitAya|svAhA̱|yuktAya|svAhA̱|ayu̍ktAya|svAhA̱|suyu̍ktAyEti̍ su - yuktAya|svAhA̱|udyuktAyEtyut̍ - yuktAya|svAhA̱|vimuktAyEti̍ vi - muktAya|svAhA̱|pramuktAyEti̍ pra - muktAya|svAhA̱|va~jcatE|svAhA̱|pariva~jca̍ta̍ iti# pari - va~jcatE|svAhA̱|saM~Mva~jca̍ta̍ iti# saM - va~jcatE|svAhA̱|anuva~jca̍ta̍ ityanu̍ - va~jcatE|svAhA̱|udva~jca̍ta̍ ityut-va~jca̍tE|svAhA̱|yatE|svAhA̱|dhAva̍tE|svAhA̱|tiṣṭha̍tE|svAhA̱|sarva̍smai|svAhA̱||53̍ (38) (sitAyA - ṣṭAtriṃśat)̍ (A22) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 22 Anuvaakams :- (bRuhaspatiḥ śrad - yathA vA - RukṣA vai - prajApatiryEna̍yEna̍ - dvE vAva dEvasatrE̍ - AdityA̍ akAmayanta̍ suvargaM - ~Mvasiṣṭhaḥ̍ - saM~MvathsarAya# -survargaM ~MyE satraM - brahmavAdinO̍&tirAtrO̍ - jyOtiṣṭOmaM̍ - mEṣaḥ - kUpyA̱ByO - &dByO - yO - namO# - mayOBUḥ - kiṅ svida - mbE - BUḥ - prAṇAya# - sitAya - dvAviṃśatiḥ)̍ Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (bRuhaspatiḥ - prati# tiṣṭhanti - vai daśarAtrEṇa̍# - suvargaM - ~MyO arvantaM̍ - BU - stripa~jcAśat)̍ First and Last Padam of Fourth Prasnam of 7th Kandam (bRuhaspatiḥ - sarvasmai̍ svAhA̱)||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE saptamakAṇḍE caturtthaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||=====================================
verses.samhita: sitAya svAhA &sitAya̍ svAhA &BihitAya̍ svAhA &naBihitAya̍ svAhA# yuktAya svAhA &yuktAya̍ svAhA suyuktAya̍ svAhO -dyuktAya̍ svAhA vimuktAya̍ svAhA pramuktAya̍ svAhA va~jcatE̍ svAhA# pariva~jcatE̍ svAhA# saM~Mva~jcatE̍ svAhA# &nuva~jcatE̍ svAhOd -va~jcatE̍ svAhA# yatE svAhA dhAvatE̍ svAhA tiṣṭhatE̍ svAhA sarvasmai̍ svAhA̱||53 (sitAyA - ṣṭAtriṃśat)̍ (A22) praśna kOrvai with starting padams of 1 to 22 anuvAkams :- (bRuhaspatiḥ śrad - yathA vA - RukṣA vai - prajApatiryEna̍yEna̍ - dvE vAva dEvasatrE̍ - AdityA̍ akAmayanta̍ suvargaM - ~Mvasiṣṭhaḥ̍ - saM~MvathsarAya# -survargaM ~MyE satraM - brahmavAdinO̍&tirAtrO̍ - jyOtiṣṭOmaM̍ - mEṣaḥ - kUpyA̱ByO - &dByO - yO - namO# - mayOBUḥ - kiṅ svida - mbE - BUḥ - prAṇAya# - sitAya - dvAviṃśatiḥ)̍ kOrvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (bRuhaspatiḥ - prati# tiṣṭhanti - vai daśarAtrEṇa̍# - suvargaM - ~MyO arvantaM̍ - BU - stripa~jcAśat)̍ first and last padam of fourth praśnam of 7th kAṇḍam (bRuhaspatiḥ - sarvasmai̍ svAhA̱)||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM saptamakAṇḍE caturtthaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||7.4.1 AppEndix

verses.padam: - Padam gAvaḥ|vai|Etat|satram|Asata|aśRu~ggAḥ|satIḥ|śRu~ggA̍ṇi|naḥ|jAyantai|iti̍|kAmE̍na|tAsA̱m|daśa̍|mAsA̱ḥ|niṣa̍ṇṇA̍ iti ni - sannAḥ|Asann|atha̍|śRu~ggA̍ṇi|ajAyanta|tAḥ|uditi̍|atiṣṭhann|arA̱thsma|iti̍|atha̍|yAsA̱m|na|ajA̍yanta|tAḥ|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM - vathsaram|AptvA|uditi|atiṣṭhann|arA̱thsma|iti̍|yAsA̱m|ca|ajA̍yanta|yAsA̱m|ca|na|tAḥ|uBayI̱ḥ|uditi̍|atiṣṭhann|arA̱thsma|iti̍|gOsatramiti̍# gO - satram|vai|1 (50)
verses.samhita: gAvO vA Etath satra-mAsatAśRu~ggAḥ̍ satIḥ śRu~ggAṇi̍ nO jAyantA iti kAmEna̍ tAsAM daśamAsA niṣaṇṇA̍ Asannatha śRu~ggA̱ṇyajAyanta tA udatiṣṭhannarAthsmEtyatha̍ yAsAM nAjAyanta̍ tAḥ saM~Mvathsara-mAptvOda̍tiṣṭha̍ -nnarAthsmEti yAsAM cAjAyanta̍ yAsA̱M ca na tA uBayIru-datiṣṭha-nnarAthsmEti̍# gOsatraM ~Mvai - [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsaḥ|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM - vathsaram|upayantItyupa̍ - yanti|Ruddhnuvanti̍|Eva|tasmA̱t|tUparA|vAṛṣi̍kau|mAsau̱|partvA̱|carati|satrABi̍jitamiti̍# satra - aBijitam|hi|asyai|tasmA̱t|saM~Mvathsarasada iti# saM~Mvathsara - sadaḥ|yat|kim|ca|gRuhE|kriyatE̱|tat|Aptam|ava̍ruddhamityava̍-ruddham|aBiji̍tamityaBi̍ - jitam|kriyatE|samudram|vai|EtE|prEti|plavantE|yE|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM - vathsaram|upayantItyupa-yanti̍|yaḥ|vai|samudrasya̍|pAram|na|paśya̍ti|na|vai|saḥ|tata̍ḥ|uditi̍|Eti|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|2 (50)
verses.samhita: saM~MvathsarO̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsaḥ̍ saM~Mvathsara-mupayantyRu̍ddhnuvantyEva̍ tasmA̱t tUparA vAṛṣikau̍ mAsau partvA# carati satrABijitaṅqhya̍syai̍ tasmA̱th saM~MvathsarasadO yat kiM ca# gRuhE kriyatE tadApta-mavaruddha-maBiji̍taM̍ kriyatE samudraM ~MvA EtE pra plavantE̍ yE saM~Mvathsaramu̍payanti̍ yO vai samudrasya̍# pAraM na paśyati̍ na vai sa tata udEti̍ saM~MvathsarO - [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam vai|samudraḥ|tasya|Etat|pAram|yat|atirAtrAvitya̍ti-rAtrau|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsa̍ḥ|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM - vathsaram|upayantItyupa̍ - yanti|anA̱rtAḥ|Eva|udRucamityu̍t̍ - Ruca̱m|gacCanti|iyam|vai|pUrvaḥ|atirAtra̍ ityati̍ - rAtraḥ|asau|uttara̍ ityut - taraḥ|manaḥ|pUrva̍ḥ|vAk|utta̍ra̍ ityut - taraḥ|prAṇa iti# pra -anaḥ|pUrvaḥ|apAna̍ ityapa̍ - anaḥ|uttara̍ ityut -taraḥ|prarOdhanamiti̍# pra - rOdhanam|pUrva̍ḥ|udaya̍namityu̍t-aya̍nam|utta̍ra̍ ityut - taraḥ|jyOtiṣṭOma̍ iti jyOtiḥ-stOmaḥ|vaiśvAnaraḥ|atirAtra̍ ityati̍ - rAtraḥ|Bavati|jyOtiḥ|Eva|purastA̱t|dadhatE|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|anu̍KyAtyA̍ ityanu# - KyAtyai|caturviṃqśa iti# catuḥ - viṃqśaḥ|prAyaṇIya iti# pra - ayanIyaḥ|Bavati|catu̍rviṃśatiriti̍ catuḥ̍ - viṃqśatiḥ|ad^^rdhamAsA ityad^^rdha̍ - mAsAḥ|3 (50)
verses.samhita: vai samudrastasyaitat̍ pAraM ~MyadatirAtrau̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAsaḥ̍ saM~Mvathsara-mupayantyanA̱rtA̍ EvOdRucaM̍ gacCantIyaM ~Mvai pUrvO&tirAtrO̍# &sAvuttarO̍ manaḥ pUrvO vAguttaraḥ̍ prAṇaḥ pUrvO&pAna̍ uttaraḥ̍ prarOdhanaM̍ pUrva# udayanamutta̍rO̍ jyOtiṣṭOmO̍ vaiśvAnarO# &tirAtrO Bavati̍ jyOtirEva̍ purastA̱ddadhatE suvargasya# lOkasyA-nuKyAtyai̍ caturviṃqśaḥ prAyaṇIyO̍# Bavati caturviṃśati-̍ rarddhamAsAḥ - [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|prayanta iti# pra - yantaḥ|Eva|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsarE|pratIti|tiṣṭhanti|tasya̍|trIṇi̍|ca|śatAni̍|ṣaṣṭiḥ|ca|stOtrIyA̱ḥ|tAva̍tIḥ|saM~MvathsarasyEti̍# saM - vathsarasya|rAtra̍yaḥ|uBE̍ iti|Eva|saM~MvathsarasyEti̍# saM - vathsarasya|rUpE̍ iti|Apnuvanti|tE|saṅsthi̍tyA̍ iti saM-sthityai|ariṣṭyai|utta̍rairityut̍ - taraiḥ|ahOBirityaha̍ḥ-Biḥ|caranti|ṣaḍahA̍ iti# ṣaṭ - ahAḥ|Bavanti|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutavaḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|Rutuṣu|Eva|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM-vathsarE|pratIti|tiṣṭhanti|gauḥ|ca|Ayu̍ḥ|ca|maddhyataḥ|stOmau̱|Bavataḥ|saM~MvathsarasyEti̍# saM - vathsarasya|Eva|tat|mithunam|maddhyataḥ|4̍ (50)
verses.samhita: saM~Mvathsaraḥ̍ prayanta# Eva saM~MvathsarE̍ prati# tiṣṭhanti tasya trIṇi# ca śatAni# ṣaṣṭiśca# stOtrIyAstAvatIḥ̍ saM~Mvathsarasya rAtraya̍ uBE Eva saM~Mvathsarasya̍# rUpE A̱pnuvanti tE saṅsthityA̍ ariṣṭyA̍ uttarairahO̍Biścaranti̍ ṣaḍahA Bavanti̍ ṣaḍ vA Rutavaḥ̍ saM~Mvathsara RutuṣvEva saM~MvathsarE̍ prati# tiṣṭhanti gauścA&&*yuśca̍ maddhyataḥ stOmau# Bavataḥ saM~Mvathsarasyaiva tanmithunaM̍ maddhyatO̍ -[ ] 4

verses.padam: - Padam dadhati|prajananAyEti̍# pra - jananAya|jyOti̍ḥ|aBita̍ḥ|Bavati|vimOca̍namiti̍# vi - mOcanam|Eva|tat|CandAṃ̍si|Eva|tat|vimOkamiti̍# vi - mOka̱m|yanti|athO iti|uBayatO̱jyOtiṣEtyu̍Bayata̍ḥ-jyOtiṣA|Eva|ṣaḍahEnEti̍# ṣaṭ-ahEna|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|yanti|brahmavAdina iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|Asa̍tE|kEna̍|yanti|iti̍|dEvayAnEnEti̍# dEva - yAnEna|pathA|iti̍|brUyAt|CandAṃ̍si|vai|dEvayAna̍ iti# dEva - yAnaḥ|panthA̱ḥ|gAyatrI|triṣṭup|jaga̍tI|jyOti̍ḥ|vai|gAyatrI|gauḥ|triṣṭuk|Ayu̍ḥ|jaga̍tI|yat|EtE|stOmA̱ḥ|Bava̍nti|davayAnEnEti̍# dEva-yAnEna|Eva|5̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dadhati̍ prajananAya̍ jyOtiraBitO̍# Bavati vimOcanamEva̍ tacCandAṅsyEva̍ tad-vimOkaM̍ ~MyantyathO# uBayatO̱jyOtiṣaiva ṣaḍahEna̍# suvargaM ~MlOkaM ~Myanti̍ brahmavAdinO# vadantyAsatE̍ kEna# yantIti# dEvayAnEna̍ pathEti# brUyAcCandAṃsi̍ vai dEvayAnaḥ̍ panthA# gAyatrI triṣṭub-jagatIjyOtirvai̍ gAyatrI̍ gaustriṣṭugAyurjagatI̍ yadEtE stOmA Bavanti̍ dEvayAnEnaiva̍ - [ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam tat|pathA|yanti|samAnam|sAma|Bavati|dEvalOka̍ iti# dEva - lOkaḥ|vai|sAma|dEvalOkAditi̍# dEva - lOkAt|Eva|na|yanti|anyA^^anyA̍ ityanyAḥ - anyAḥ|Rucaḥ|Bavanti|manuṣyalOka̍ iti# manuṣya - lOkaḥ|vai|Rucaḥ|manuṣyalOkAditi̍# manuṣya - lOkAt|Eva|anyamanyamityanyam̍ - anyam|dEvalOkamiti# dEva - lOkam|aByArOhanta̍ ityaBi-ArOha̍ntaḥ|yanti|aBivarta̍ ityaBi̍ - vartaḥ|brahmasAmamiti# brahma - sAmam|Bavati|suvargasyEti# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|aBivRu̍tyA̍ ityaBi - vRutyai|aBijidityaBi̍ - jit|Bavati|suvargasyEti# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|aBiji̍tyA̍ ityaBi - jityai|viśvajiditi# viśva - jit|Bavati|viśvasya|jityai̱|mAsimAsIti̍# mAsi - mAsi|pRuṣṭhAni|upEti̍|yanti|mAsimAsIti̍# mAsi - mAsi|atigrAhyA# ityati̍ - grAhyA̱ḥ|gRuhyantE|mAsimAsIti# mAsi - mAsi|Eva|vIrya̱m ( )|dadhati|mAsAm|pratiṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|upariṣṭAt|mAsAm|pRuṣṭhAni̍|upEti̍|yanti|tasmA̱t|upari̍ṣṭAt|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|Pala̱m|gRuhṇanti||6̍ (63)
verses.samhita: tat pathA yanti̍ samAnaṃ sAma# Bavati dEvalOkO vai sAma# dEvalOkAdEva nayantyanyAa̍nyA̍ RucO# Bavanti manuṣyalOkO vA RucO# manuṣyalOkAdEvAnyamanyaM̍ dEvalOkamaByArOha̍ntO̍ yantyaBivartO brahmasAmaM̍ Bavati̍ suvargasya# lOkasyABivRutyA̍ aBijid-Bavati̍ suvargasya# lOkasyABijityai̍ viśvajid-Bavati̍ viśvasya̍ jityai# mAsimAsi̍ pRuṣṭhAnyupa# yanti mAsimA̱syatigrAhyA# gRuhyantE mAsimA̱syEva vIryaM̍ ( ) dadhati mAsAM pratiṣṭhityA̍ upariṣṭAnmAsAM̍ pRuṣṭhAnyupa# yanti tasmAdupari̍ṣṭAdOṣa̍dhayaḥ̍ PalaM̍ gRuhṇanti||6

verses.padam: - Padam gAvaḥ|vai|Etat|satram|Asata|aśRu~ggAḥ|satIḥ|śRu~ggA̍ṇi|siṣA̍santIḥ|tAsA̱m|daśa̍|mAsA̱ḥ|niṣa̍ṇṇA̍ iti ni - sannAḥ|Asann|atha̍|śRu~ggA̍ṇi|ajAyanta|tAḥ|abruvann|arA̱thsma|uditi̍|tiṣṭhAma|avEti̍|tam|kAma̱m|aruthsmahi|yEna̍|kAmE̍na|nyaṣa̍dAmEti̍# ni - asadAma|iti̍|tAsA̱m|u|tu|vai|abruvann|ad^^rdhAḥ|vA|yAva̍tIḥ|vA|AsA̍mahai|Eva|imau|dvAdaśau|mAsau̱|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM - vathsaram|sapAMdyEti# saM - pAdya|uditi̍|tiṣṭhAma|iti̍|tAsA̱m|7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: gAvO vA Etath satramAsatAśRu~ggAḥ̍ satIḥ śRu~ggAṇi̍ siṣAsantIstAsAM̍ daśa mAsA niṣaṇṇA̍ Asannatha śRu~ggA̱ṇyajAyanta tA abruvannarAthsmOt̍ tiṣṭhAmAva̍ taM kAmamaruthsmahi̍ yEna kAmEna̍ nyaṣadAmEti̍ tAsAmu̍ tvA abruvannarddhAvA̍ yAvatIrvA&&sA̍mahA̍ EvEmaudvAdaśau̍ mAsau# saM~Mvathsaraṃ sapAMdyOt tiṣṭhAmEti̍ tAsA̱M - [ ] 7

verses.padam: - Padam dvAdaśE|mAsi|śRu~ggAṇi|prEti̍|avartanta|śraddhayEti̍# śrat-dhayA̱|vA|aśraddhayEtyaśra̍t̍ - dhayA|vA|tAḥ|imAḥ|yAḥ|tUparAḥ|uBayyaḥ|vAva|tAḥ|Ad^^rdhnuvann|yAḥ|ca|śRu~ggA̍ṇi|asa̍nvann|yAḥ|ca|Urja̱m|avAru̍ndhatEtya̍va̍ - arundhata|RuddhnOti̍|daśasviti̍# daśa - su|mAsu|uttiṣṭhannityut-tiṣṭhann̍|RuddhnOti̍|dvAdaśasviti̍# dvAdaśa - su|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|padEna̍|Kalu̍|vai|EtE|yanti|vindati̍|Kalu̍|vai|padEna̍|yann|tat|vai|Etat|Ruddham|aya̍nam|tasmA̱t̍ ( )|Etat|gOsanIti# gO - sani||8̍ (52)
verses.samhita: dvAdaśE mAsi śRu~ggAṇi̍ prAvartanta̍ śraddhayA vA&śraddhayA̍ vA tA imA yAstUparA̍ uBayyO vAva tA A̱rddhnuvanq. yAśca śRu~ggAṇyasanvanq.̍ yAścOrjamavAru̍ndhatarddhnOti̍# daśasu# mAsU̱ttiṣṭhannRuddhnOti̍# dvAdaśasu ya EvaM ~MvEda# padEna Kalu vA EtE yanti̍ vindati Kalu vai padEna yan tadvA EtadRuddhamayanaM̍ tasmA# ( ) dEtad-gOsani||8̍

verses.padam: - Padam prathamE|mAsi|pRuṣṭhAni|upEti̍|yanti|maddhyamE|upEti̍|yanti|uttama̍ ityut̍ - tamE|upEti|yanti|tat|Ahuḥ|yAm|vai|triḥ|Eka̍sya|ahna̍ḥ|upasIdantItyu̍pa̍ - sIdanti|dahram|vai|sA|apa̍rAByAm|dOhA̱ByAm|duhE|atha̍|kuta̍ḥ|sA|dhOkṣyatE|yAm|dvAda̍śa|kRutva̍ḥ|upasIdantItyu̍pa̍ - sIdanti|iti̍|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM - vathsaram|sapAMdyEti# saM - pAdya|uttama̍ ityut̍ - tamE|mAsi|sakRut|pRuṣṭhAni|upEti̍|iyuḥ|tat|yaja̍mAnAḥ|yajñam|paśUn|avEti̍|rundhatE|samudram|vai|9̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prathamE mAsi pRuṣṭhAnyupa# yanti maddhyama upa# yantyuttama upa# yanti tadAhuryAM̍ ~Mvai trirEkasyAhna# upasIdanti̍ dahraM ~Mvai sA&parAByAM̍ dOhA̱ByAM duhE&tha kutaḥ sA dhO̱kṣyatE yAM dvAdaśa̍ kRutva# upasIdantIti# saM~Mvathsaraṃ sapAMdyO̱ttamE mAsi sakRut pRuṣṭhAnyupEyustad-yaja̍mAnA̍ yajñaM paśUnava# rundhatE samudraM ~MvA - [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam EtE|anavAram|apAram|prEti|plavantE|yE|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM - vathsaram|upayantItyupa̍ - yanti|yat|bRuhadrathantarE̍ iti# bRuhat - rathantarE|anvarjEyuritya̍nu̍ - arjEyuḥ|yathA̱|maddhyE̱|samudrasya̍|plavam|anvarjE̍yuritya̍nu̍ - arjEyuḥ|tAdRuk|tat|anu̍thsargamityanu̍t̍ - sargam|bRuhadrathantarAByAmiti# bRuhat - rathantarAByA̱m|itvA|pratiṣṭhAmiti# prati - sthAm|gacCanti|sarvE̱Byaḥ|vai|kAmE̱Byaḥ|sandhiriti# saM - dhiḥ|duhE|tat|yajamAnAḥ|sarvAn̍|kAmAn̍|avEti̍|rundhatE||10̍ (34) (samudraM ~Mvai - catustriṃśacca)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: EtEnavArama̍pAraM̍ pra plavantE̍ yE saM~Mvathsaramu̍payanti̍ yad bRuhad-rathantarE̍ anvarjEyuryathA̍ maddhyE# samudrasya# plavamanvarjEyustAdRuk̍ tadanuthsargaM̍ bRuhad-rathantarAByAmitvA̍ pratiṣṭhAM̍ gacCanti̍ sarvE̱ByO vai kAmE̱Byaḥ sandhirduhE̍ tad-yajamAnAḥ̍ sarvAn kAmAnava# rundhatE||10 (samudraM ~Mvai - catustriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam samAnyaḥ|Ruca̍ḥ|Bavanti|manuṣyalOka̍ iti# manuṣya - lOkaḥ|vai|Rucaḥ|manuṣyalOkAditi̍# manuṣya - lOkAt|Eva|na|yanti|anyadanyadityanyat̍ - anyat|sAma|Bavati|dEvalOka̍ iti# dEva - lOkaḥ|vai|sAma|dEvalOkAditi̍# dEva - lOkAt|Eva|anyamanyamityanyaM̍ - anyam|manuṣyalOkamiti# manuṣya - lOkam|pratyavarOhanta̍ iti# prati - avarOhantaḥ|yanti|jaga̍tIm|agrE̱|upEti̍|yanti|jaga̍tIm|vai|CandAṃ̍si|pratyava̍rOhantIti̍# prati - avarOhanti|Agrayaṇam|grahA̱ḥ|bRuhat|pRuṣṭhAni̍|trayastriṃqśamiti̍# trayaḥ - triṃqśam|stOmA̱ḥ|tasmA̱t|jyAyAṃsam|kanI̍yAn|pratyava̍rOhatIti̍# prati - avarOhati|vaiśvakarmaṇa̍ iti# vaiśva - karmaṇaḥ|gRuhyatE|viśvAni|Eva|tEna̍|karmA̍ṇi|yaja̍mAnAḥ|avEti̍|rundhatE|Adityaḥ|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: samAnya# RucO# Bavanti manuṣyalOkO vA RucO# manuṣyalOkAdEva na yantyanyada̍nyath̍ sAma# Bavati dEvalOkO vai sAma# dEvalOkAdEvAnyamanyaM̍ manuṣyalOkaM pratyavarOha̍ntO̍ yanti jagatImagra̍ upa# yanti jagatIM̍ ~Mvai CandAṃsi̍ pratyavarOhantyA-grayaṇaM̍ grahA# bRuhat pRuṣṭhAni# trayastriṃqśaṅstOmA-stasmA-jjyAyAṃsaM̍ kanIyAn̍ pratyavarOhati̍ vaiśvakarmaṇO gRuhyatEviśvA̱nyEva̍ tEna karmAṇi̍ yajamAnA̍ ava# rundhata AdityO-[ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam gRuhyatE|iyam|vai|aditiḥ|asyAm|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|anyO̱nya̍ ityanyaḥ - anyaḥ|gRuhyEtE iti|mithunatvAyEti̍# mithuna - tvAya|prajA̱tyA̍ iti pra - jAtyai|avAntaramityava̍ - antaram|vai|daśarAtrEṇEti# daśa - rAtrEṇa|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|asRujata|yat|daśarAtra iti# daśa - rAtraḥ|Bavati|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|Eva|tat|yajamAnAḥ|sRujantE|EtAm|ha|vai|uda~gkaḥ|śaulbAyanaḥ|satrasya̍|Ruddhi̱m|uvAca|yat|daśarAtra̍ iti# daśa - rAtraḥ|yat|daśarAtra iti# daśa - rAtraḥ|Bavati|satrasya̍|Ruddhyai̱|athO̍ iti|yat|Eva|pUrvE̍ṣu|ahassvityaha̍ḥ̍ - su|vilOmEti vi - lOma|kriyatE̱|tasya|Eva̍ ( )|EṣA|śAntiḥ||12̍ (52)
verses.samhita: gRuhyata̍ iyaM ~MvA aditirasyAmEva̍ prati# tiṣṭhantyanyO̱&nyO gRuhyEtE mithunatvAya prajA̱tyA avAntaraM ~Mvai daśarAtrEṇa̍# prajApatiḥ̍ prajA asRujata̍ yad-daśarAtrO̍ Bavati̍ prajA Eva tad-yajamAnAḥ̍ sRujanta EtAṃ ha vA uda~gkaḥ̍ śau̱lbAyanaḥ satrasyarddhimuvAca̍ yad-daśarAtrOyad-da̍śarAtrO̍ Bavati̍ satrasyarddhyA athO yadEva pUrvEṣvahassu̍ vilOma̍ kriyatE tasyaivai ( )-ṣA śAntiḥ||12̍

verses.padam: - Padam yadi|sOmau̱|saṃsu̍tAviti̍ saM - sutau|syAtA̱m|mahati|rAtriyai|prAtaranuvAkamiti̍# prAtaḥ - anuvAkam|upAkuryAdityu̍pa̍ - AkuryAt|pUrva̍ḥ|vAca̱m|pUrva̍ḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|pUrva̍ḥ|CandAṃ̍si|vRu~gktE|vRuṣa̍ṇvatImiti̍ vRuṣaṇ# - vatIm|pratipadamiti# prati - pada̱m|kuryAt|prAtassavanAditi# prAtaḥ-savanAt|Eva|EṣAm|indra̱m|vRu~gktE|athO iti|Kalu̍|Ahuḥ|savanamuKEsa̍vanamuKa̍ iti# savanamuKE - savanamuKE|kAryA̱|iti|savanamuKAthsa̍vanamuKAditi̍# savanamuKAt - savanamuKAt|Eva|EṣAm|indra̱m|vRu~gktE|saM~MvEśAyEti# saM - vEśAya|upavEśAyEtyu̍pa̍ - vEśAya|gAyatriyAḥ|triṣṭuBa̍ḥ|jaga̍tyAḥ|anuṣṭuBa̍ ityanu̍ - stuBaḥ|pa~gktyAḥ|aBiBU̱tyA̍ ityaBi - BUtyai|svAhA̱|CandAṃsi|vai|saM~MvEśa̍ iti# saM - vEśaḥ|upavEśa ityupa̍ - vEśaḥ|CandOBiriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|Eva|EṣAm|13 (50)
verses.samhita: yadi sOmau saṃsutau̍ syAtA̱M mahati rAtriyai̍ prAtaranuvAka-mupAkuryAt̍ pUrvO vAcaM pUrvO# dEvatAḥ pUrvaḥ CandAṃsi̍ vRu~gktE vRuṣaṇvatIM̍ pratipadaM̍ kuryAt prAtassavanAdEvaiṣAmindraM̍ ~MvRu~gktE &thO KalvAhuḥsavanamuKE-sa̍vanamuKE̍ kAryEti# savanamuKAth savanamuKA-dEvaiṣAmindra̍M̍ ~MvRu~gktE saM~MvEśAyOpavEśAya̍# gAyatriyAstriṣṭuBO jagatyA̍ anuṣṭuBaḥ̍ pa~gktyA aBiBU̱tyai svAhA CandAṃsi̍ vai saM~MvEśa̍ upavEśaḥ̍ CandOBirEvaiṣAM-̍ [ ] 13

verses.padam: - Padam CandAṃsi|vRu~gktE|sajanIyamiti̍# sa - janIya̱m|śasya̱m|vihavyamiti̍# vi - havya̱m|śasya̱m|agastyasya|kayAśuBIyamiti̍# kayA-śuBIya̱m|śasya̱m|EtAvat|vai|asti|yAva̍t|Etat|yAva̍t|Eva|asti̍|tat|EṣAm|vRu~gktE|yadi̍|prAtassavana̍ iti# prAtaḥ - savanE|kalaśaḥ|dIryE̍ta|vaiṣṇavIṣu̍|śipiviṣṭava̍tIṣviti̍# śipiviṣṭa - vatIṣu|stuvIrann|yat|vai|yajñasya|atiricya̍ta̍ ityati̍ - ricyatE|viṣṇu̱m|tat|śipiviṣṭamiti̍# śipi - viṣṭam|aBi|atIti|ricyatE|tat|viṣṇu̍ḥ|śipiviṣṭa̍ iti# śipi - viṣṭaḥ|atirikta̍ ityati-̍ riktE|Eva|atiriktamityati̍# - riktam|dadhAti|athO iti|ati̍riktEnEtyati̍# - riktEna|Eva|atiriktamityati̍# - riktam|AptvA|avEti# ( )|rundhatE|yadi|maddhyandi̍nE|dIryE̍ta|vaṣaṭkArani̍dhanamiti̍# vaṣaṭkAra - nidhanam|sAma|kuryuḥ|vaṣaṭkAra̍ iti# vaṣaṭ - kAraḥ|vai|yajñasya|pratiṣṭhEti̍# prati - sthA|pratiṣṭhAmiti# prati - sthAm|Eva|Enat|gamayanti|yadi|tRutIyasavana̍ iti# tRutIya - savanE|Etat|Eva||14 (69) (CandOBirEvaiṣA̍ - mavai - kAnnaviṃśatiśca̍)̍ (A5)
verses.samhita: CandAṃsi̍ vRu~gktE sajanIyaṃq śasyaM̍ ~Mvihavyaṃ# śasyamagastya̍sya̍ kayAśuBIyaṃq śasyamEtAvadvA̍ asti̍ yAvadEtad-yAva̍dEvAsti̍ tadEṣAM̍ ~MvRu~gktE yadi# prAtassavanE kalaśO dIryEta̍ vaiṣṇavIṣu# śipiviṣṭavatIṣu̍ stuvIranq.yadvai yajñasyA-tiricya̍tE̍ viṣṇuM tacCipiviṣṭamaByati̍# ricyatE tadviṣṇuḥ̍ śipiviṣṭO&tirikta̍ EvAtiriktaM̍ dadhAtyathO atiriktEnaivA-ti̍riktamAptvA&va̍# ( ) rundhatE yadi# maddhyandinE̍ dIryEta̍ vaṣaṭkAranidhanaṃq̍ sAma# kuryurvaṣaṭkArO vai yajñasya# pratiṣṭhA pratiṣṭhAmEvaina̍d-gamayanti̍ yadi# tRutIyasavana EtadEva||14 (CandOBirEvaiṣA̍ - mavai - kAnnaviṃśatiśca̍)̍

verses.padam: - Padam ṣaḍahairiti# ṣaṭ - ahaiḥ|mAsAn|sapAMdyEti̍# saM - pAdya|aha̍ḥ|uditi̍|sRujanti|ṣaḍahairiti̍# ṣaṭ - ahaiḥ|hi|mAsAn|sapaMśyantIti̍# saM - paśyanti|ad^^rdhamAsairitya̍d^^rdha̍ - mAsaiḥ|mAsAn|sapAMdyEti̍# saM - pAdya|aha̍ḥ|uditi̍|sRujanti|ad^^rdhamAsairitya̍d^^rdha̍ - mAsaiḥ|hi|mAsAn|sapaMśyantIti̍# saM - paśyanti|amAvAsya̍yEtya̍mA̍ - vAsyayA|mAsAn̍|sapAMdyEti̍# saM - pAdya|aha̍ḥ|uditi̍|sRujanti|amAvAsya̍yEtya̍mA̍ - vAsyayA|hi|mAsAn̍|sapaMśyantIti̍# saM-paśyanti|paurṇamAsyEti̍# paurṇa-mAsyA|mAsAn|sapAMdyEti̍# saM - pAdya|aha̍ḥ|uditi̍|sRujanti|paurṇamAsyEti̍# paurṇa - mAsyA|hi|mAsAn|sapaMśyantIti̍# saM - paśyanti|yaḥ|vai|pUrṇE|Asi~jcatItyA̱̍ - si~jcati|parEti̍|saḥ|si~jcati|yaḥ|pUrṇAt|udacatItyu̍t̍ - acati|15̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ṣaḍahairmAsA̱nth sapAMdyAharuth sRujanti̍ ṣaḍahaiṛhi mAsA̱nth sapaMśyantya-rddhamAsairmAsA̱nth̍ sapAMdyAharuth sRujantya-rddhamAsaiṛhi̍ mAsA̱nth sapaMśyantyamAvAsya̍yA̍ mAsA̱nth sapAMdyAharuth sRujantyamAvAsya̍yA̍ hi mAsA̱nth sapaMśyanti̍ paurṇamAsyA mAsA̱nth sapAMdyA&haruth sRujanti̍ paurṇamAsyA hi mAsA̱nth sapaMśyanti̍ yO vai pUrṇa Asi~jcati̍ parA sa si~jcati̍ yaḥ pUrṇAdudacati̍ - [ ] 15

verses.padam: - Padam prAṇamiti# pra - anam|asminn|saḥ|dadhAti|yat|paurṇamAsyEti# paurṇa - mAsyA|mAsAn|sapAMdyEti̍# saM - pAdya|aha̍ḥ|uthsRujantItyu̍t̍ - sRujanti|saM~MvathsarAyEti̍# saM-vathsarAya|Eva|tat|prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|dadhati|tat|anviti|satriṇa̍ḥ|prEti̍|ananti|yat|aha̍ḥ|na|uthsRujEyurityu̍t-sRujEyu̍ḥ|yathA̱|dRuti̍ḥ|upa̍naddha̍ ityupa# - naddhaḥ|vipatatIti# vi - patati|Evam|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|vIti|patEt|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCEyuḥ|yat|paurṇamAsyEti̍# paurṇa - mAsyA|mAsAn|sapAMdyEti̍# saM - pAdya|aha̍ḥ|uthsRujantItyu̍t̍ - sRujanti|saM~MvathsarAyEti̍# saM - vathsarAya|Eva|tat|udAnamityu̍t̍ - anam|dadhati|tat|anviti|satriṇa̍ḥ|uditi̍|16̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prAṇamasminthsa̍ dadhAti̍ yat pau̱rṇamAsyA mAsA̱nth sapAMdyAharuth̍ sRujanti# saM~MvathsarAyaiva tat prAṇaM dadhati̍ tadanu# satriṇaḥ prAṇanti̍ yadaharnOth-sRujEyuryathA dRutirupanaddhO̍ vipatatyEvaṃ̍ saM~MvathsarO̍ vi patEdArti-mArcCE̍yuryat̍ pau̱rṇamAsyA mAsA̱nth-sapAMdyAharuth̍ sRujanti# saM~MvathsarAyaiva tadudAnaM̍ dadhati̍ tadanu# satriṇa u - [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam ananti|na|Arti̱m|Eti|RucCanti|pUrṇamA̍sa̍ iti# pUrṇa - mAsE|vai|dEvAnA̱m|sutaḥ|yat|paurṇamAsyEti# paurṇa - mAsyA|mAsAn|sapAMdyEti̍# saM - pAdya|aha̍ḥ|uthsRujantItya̍t̍ - sRujanti|dEvAnA̱m|Eva|tat|yajñEna̍|yajñam|pratyava̍rOhantIti̍# prati - avarOhanti|vIti̍|vai|Etat|yajñam|Cindanti|yat|ṣaḍahasa̍ntatamiti̍# ṣaḍaha - santatam|santa̱m|atha|aha̍ḥ|uthsRujantItyu̍t̍ - sRujanti|prAjApatyamiti̍# prAjA-patyam|paśum|Eti|laBantE|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|sarvA̱ḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|dEvatABiḥ|Eva|yajñam|samiti̍|tanvanti|yanti̍|vai|EtE|sava̍nAt|yE|aha̍ḥ|17̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dananti̍ nA&&*rtimArcCanti̍ pUrṇamAsE̍ vai dEvAnAṃ# sutO yat pau̱rṇamAsyA mAsA̱nth-sapAMdyAharuth̍ sRujanti# dEvAnAmEva̍ tad-yajñEna# yajñaM pratyavarOhanti̍ vi vA Etad-yajñaM Cindanti̍ yath ṣaḍahasa̍taMtaṃq̍ saMtamathAharuth̍ sRujanti# prAjApatyaM paśumA laBantE̍ prajApatiḥ̍ sarvA# dEvatA# dEvatABirEva̍ yajñaṃ saM tanvanti̍ yanti vA EtE savanAdyE&ha̍# -[ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam uthsRujantItyut̍ - sRujanti|turIya̱m|Kalu̍|vai|Etat|sava̍nam|yat|sAnnAyyamiti̍# sAM-nAyyam|yat|sAnnAyyamiti# sAM-nAyyam|Bavati|tEna̍|Eva|sava̍nAt|na|yanti|samupahUyEti̍# saM - upahUya|Bakṣayanti|EtathsO̍mapIthA̍ ityEtat - sOmapIthAḥ|hi|Etaṛhi|yathAyatanamiti̍# yathA - ayatanam|vai|EtEṣA̱m|savanaBAja iti# savana - BAjaḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|gacCanti|yE|aha̍ḥ|uthsRujantItyu̍t̍ - sRujanti|anusavanamitya̍nu̍ - savanam|purOḍAśAn|niriti̍|vapanti|yathAyatanAditi̍# yathA - AyatanAt|Eva|savanaBAja iti# savana - BAjaḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|avEti̍|rundhatE|aṣṭAka̍pAlAnityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlAn|prAtassavana iti# prAtaḥ - savanE|EkAdaśakapAlAnityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlAnn|mAddhyandinE|sava̍nE|dvAda̍śakapAlAniti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlAnn|tRutIyasavana iti# tRutIya - savanE|CandAṃsi|Eva|AptvA̍ ( )|avEti|rundhatE|vaiśvadEvamiti̍# vaiśva-dEvam|carum|tRutIyasavana iti# tRutIya-savanE|niriti|vapanti|vaiśvadEvamiti̍# vaiśva - dEvam|vai|tRutIyasavanamiti# tRutIya - savanam|tEna|Eva|tRutIyasavanAditi̍# tRutIya - savanAt|na|yanti||18 (65)
verses.samhita: -ruth sRujanti# turIyaM Kalu vA Etath savanaM̍ ~Myath sA̱nAMqyyaM ~Myath sA̱nAMqyyaM Bavati̍ tEnaiva savanAnna̍ yanti̍ samupahUya# BakṣayantyEtath- sOmapIthA̍ hyEtaṛhi̍# yathAyatanaM ~MvA EtEṣAṃ# savanaBAjO# dEvatA# gacCanti yE&haruth̍ sRujantyanusavanaM̍ purOḍAśAn̍ nirvapanti̍ yathAyatanAdEva savanaBAjO̍# dEvatA ava# rundhatE &ṣṭAkapAlAn̍ prAtassavana EkAdaśakapAlAn̍ mAddhyandinE̍ savanE̍ dvAdaśakapAlAṅ-stRutIyasavanE̍ CandAṅsyEvA&&*ptvA̍ ( ) -&va# rundhatE vaiśvadEvaM caruM tRutIyasavanE̍ nirvapanti̍ vaiśvadEvaM ~Mvai tRutIyasavanaM̍ tEnaiva tRutIyasavanAnna̍ yanti||18̍

verses.padam: - Padam uthsRujyA(3)mityut̍ - sRujyA(3)m|na|uthsRujyA(3)mityut-̍ sRujyA(3)m|iti|mImAṃqsantE|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|tat|u|Ahuḥ|uthsRujyamityu̍t̍ - sRujya̱m|Eva|iti|amAvAsyA̍yAmitya̍mA̍ - vAsyAyAm|ca|paurṇamAsyAmiti̍# paurṇa - mAsyAm|ca|uthsRujyamityut̍ - sRujya̱m|iti|Ahuḥ|EtE̍ iti|hi|yajñam|vaha̍taḥ|iti̍|tE̍ iti|tu|vAva|na|uthsRujyE̍ ityut̍ - sRujyE̱|iti|Ahuḥ|yE̍ iti|avAntaramitya̍va̍ - antaram|yajñam|BEjAtE iti|iti̍|yA|prathamA|vya̍ṣṭakEti̍ vi - aṣṭakA|tasyA̱m|uthsRujyamityut̍ - sRujya̱m|iti|Ahuḥ|Eṣaḥ|vai|mAsaḥ|viśara̍ iti# vi - śaraḥ|iti|na|Adi̍ṣṭamityA̍ - diṣṭam|19 (50)
verses.samhita: uthsRujyAM(3)nOthsRujyA(3)miti# mImAṃsantE brahmavAdina-stadvAhuruth̍ sRujyamEvEtya̍-mAvAsyA̍yAM̍ ca paurṇamAsyAM cOth-sRujyamityAhurEtE̍ hi yajñaM ~Mvahata̍ iti tE tvAva nOthsRujyE ityAhuryE̍ avAntaraM̍ ~MyajñaM BEjAtE iti yA prathamA̍ vyaṣṭakA̍ tasyAmuth-sRujyamityA̍hurEṣa̍ vai mAsO viśara̍ iti nA&&*diṣṭa̍ - [ ] 19

verses.padam: - Padam uditi|sRujEyuḥ|yat|Adi̍ṣṭamityA̍ - diṣṭam|uthsRujEyurityut̍ - sRujEyuḥ|yAdRuśE̱|puna̍ḥ|paryAplAva̍ iti# pari - AplAvE|maddhyE̱|ṣaḍahasyEti# ṣaṭ - ahasya|sapaMdyEtEti̍# saM - padyEta|ṣaḍahairiti̍# ṣaṭ - ahaiḥ|mAsAn|sapAMdyEti̍# saM - pAdya|yat|saptamam|aha̍ḥ|tasminn̍|uditi̍|sRujEyuḥ|tat|agnayE̱|vasu̍mata̍ iti vasu# - matE|purOḍAśa̱m|aṣṭAkapAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|niritiḥ|vapEyuḥ|aindram|dadhi̍|indrA̍ya|marutva̍tE|purOḍAśa̱m|EkA̍daśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|vaiśvadEvamiti# vaiśva-dEvam|dvAdaśakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|agnEḥ|vai|vasumata̍ iti vasu# - mataḥ|prAtassavanamiti# prAtaḥ - savanam|yat|agnayE̱|vasumata̍ iti vasu-matE|purOḍAśa̱m|aṣṭAka̍pAlamityaṣṭA̍ - kapAlam|nirvapantIti# niḥ - vapanti|dEvatA̱m|Eva|tat|BAginI̱m|kurvanti̍|20̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -muthsRujEyu-ryadAdi̍ṣṭa-muthsRujEyu̍ryAdRuśE̍ punaḥ̍ paryAplAvE maddhyE# ṣaḍahasya# sapaMdyEta̍ ṣaḍahairmAsA̱nth sapAMdya yath saptama-̍ mahastasminnuth sRujEyu-stadagnayE̍ vasumatE̍ purOḍAśamaṣṭAka̍pAlaM̍ nirvapEyuraindraM̍ dadhIndrAya̍ marutvatE̍ purOḍAśamEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ ~MvaiśvadEvaM dvAdaśakapAlamagnErvai̍ vasumataḥ̍ prAtassavanaM ~MyadagnayE vasumatE̍ purOḍAśamaṣṭAka̍pAlaM̍ nirvapanti̍ dEvatAmEva̍ tad-BAginI̱M kurvanti - [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam savanam|aṣṭABiḥ|upEti̍|yanti|yat|aindram|dadhi̍|Bava̍ti|indra̱m|Eva|tat|BAgadhEyAditi̍# BAga-dhEyA̱t|na|cyAvayanti|indrasya|vai|marutva̍taḥ|mAddhya̍ndinam|sava̍nam|yat|indrA̍ya|marutva̍tE|purOḍAśa̱m|EkA̍daśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAlam|nirvapantIti# niḥ-vapanti|dEvatA̱m|Eva|tat|BAginI̱m|kurvanti̍|sava̍nam|EkAdaśaBirityE̍kAdaśa̍ - Biḥ|upEti|yanti|viśvE̍ṣAm|vai|dEvAnA̱m|RuBumatAmityRu̍Bu̍ - matA̱m|tRutIyasavanamiti# tRutIya-savanam|yat|vaiśvadEvamiti# vaiśva-dEvam|dvAdaśakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|nirvapantIti# niḥ - vapanti|dEvatA̱ḥ|Eva|tat|BAginI̱ḥ|kurvanti̍|sava̍nam|dvAdaśaBiriti̍# dvAdaśa - Biḥ|21 (50)
verses.samhita: savanamaṣṭABirupa̍# yanti yadaindraM dadhi BavatIndramEva̍ tad-BAgadhEyAnna̍ cyAvayantIndra̍sya̍ vai marutvatO̍ mAddhyandinaṃq̍ savanaM̍ ~MyadindrAya̍ marutvatE̍ purOḍAśamEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapanti̍ dEvatAmEva̍ tad-BAginI̱M kurvanti savanamEkAdaśaBirupa̍# yanti viśvEṣAM̍ ~Mvai dEvAnAmRuBumatA̱M̍ tRutIyasavanaM~Myad-vai̱śvadEvaM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapanti̍ dEvatA# Eva tad-BAginI̱ḥ kurvanti savanaM̍ dvAdaśaBi - [ ] 21

verses.padam: - Padam upEti|yanti|prAjApatyamiti̍# prAjA - patyam|paśum|Eti|laBantE|yajñaḥ|vai|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|yajñasya|ana̍nusargAyEtyana̍nu̍ - sargAya|aBivarta ityaBi̍ - vartaḥ|itaḥ|ṣaṭ|mAsaḥ|brahmasAmamiti# brahma - sAmam|Bavati|brahma|vai|aBivarta̍ ityaBi̍ - vartaḥ|brahmaṇA|Eva|tat|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|aBivartayanta̍ ityaBi̍ - vartayantaḥ|yanti|pratikUlamiti̍# prati - kUlam|iva|hi|itaḥ|suvarga iti# suvaḥ - gaḥ|lOkaḥ|indra|kratu̱m|naḥ|Eti̍|Bara|pitA|putrEBya̍ḥ|yathA̱||śikṣa̍|naḥ|asminn|puruhUtEti̍# puru - hUta|yAmani|jIvAḥ|jyOti̍ḥ|aśImahi|iti̍# ( )|amutaḥ|AyatAmityA̱̍ - yatAm|ṣaṭ|mAsaḥ|brahmasAmamiti# brahma-sAmam|Bavati|ayam|vai|lOkaḥ|jyOtiḥ|prajEti̍# pra-jA|jyOtiḥ|imam|Eva|tat|lOkam|paśya̍ntaḥ|aBivada̍ntaitya̍Bi̍ - vadantaḥ|Eti̍|yanti||22̍ (70) (nA&&diṣṭaM̍ - kurvanti# - dvAdaśaBi - riti-̍ viṃśatiśca)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: -rupa# yanti prAjApatyaM paśumA laBantE̍ yajñO vai prajApati-ryajñasyA-na̍nusargAyABivarta̍ itaḥ ṣaṇmAsO brahmasAmaM̍ Bavati̍ brahma vA aBivartO̍ brahmaṇaiva̍ tath suvargaM̍ ~MlOka-maBivartaya̍ntO̍ yanti pratikUlamiva̍ hItaḥ suvargO̍ lOka indra kratuM̍ na A Bara̍ pitA putrEByO yathA̱|śikṣA# nO asmin puruhUta̍ yAmani̍ jIvA jyOtiraśImahItya̍ ( )-muta# AyatAṃ ṣaṇmAsO brahmasAmaM̍ BavatyayaM̍ ~Mvai lOkO jyOtiḥ̍ prajA jyOtirimamEva̍ tallOkaM paśyantO&Bivada̍nta̍ A yanti||22̍ (nA&&diṣṭaM̍ - kurvanti# - dvAdaśaBi - riti-̍ viṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAnA̱m|vai|anta̱m|jagmuṣA̱m|indriyam|vIrya̱m|apEti|akrAmat|tat|krOśEna̍|avEti̍|arundhata|tat|krOśasya̍|krOśatvamiti̍# krOśa - tvam|yat|krOśEna|cAtvA̍lasya|antE̱|stuvanti̍|yajñasya̍|Eva|anta̱m|gatvA|indriyam|vIrya̱m|avEti̍|rundhatE|satrasyad^^rdhyA̱|AhavanIyasyEtyA̱̍ - havanIyasya|antE̱|stuvanti|agnim|Eva|upadraṣṭAramityU̍pa̍ - draṣṭAra̱m|kRutvA|Ruddhi̱m|upEti|yanti|pajApa̍tarqḥRuda̍yEna|havid^^rdhAna̍ iti# haviḥ - dhAnE̱|antaḥ|stuvanti|prEmAṇa̱m|Eva|asya|gacCanti|ślOkEna|purastA̱t|sada̍saḥ|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvAnAM ~MvA antaM̍ jagmuṣAmindriyaM̍ ~MvIrya-mapA̱krAmat̍ tat krOśEnAvArundhata̍ tat krOśasya# krOśatvaM ~Myat krOśEna cAtvAlasyAntE̱̍ stuvanti# yajñasyaivAntaM̍ gatvEndriyaM ~MvIryamava̍# rundhatE satrasyarddhyA# &&havanIyasyAntE̱ stuvantyagni-mEvOpad-raṣṭAra̍M̍ kRutvarddhimupa# yanti prajApatErqḥRuda̍yEna̍ havirddhAnE&ntaḥ stuvanti̍ prEmAṇamEvAsya̍# gacCanti ślOkEna# purastAth sadasaḥ̍ - [ ] 23

verses.padam: - Padam stuvanti|anuślOkEnEtyanu̍# - ślOkEna|paścAt|yajñasya|Eva|anta̱m|gatvA|ślOkaBAja̍ iti# ślOka - BAjaḥ|Bavanti|navaBiriti̍# nava - Biḥ|addhvaryuḥ|uditi|gAyati|nava̍|vai|puru̍ṣE|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|prAṇAniti# pra - anAn|Eva|yajamAnEṣu|dadhAti|sarvA̱ḥ|aindriya̍ḥ|Bavanti|prAṇEṣviti̍# pra - anEṣu|Eva|indriyam|dadhati|apra̍tihRutABirityapra̍ti̍ - hRutABiḥ|uditi|gAyati|tasmA̱t|puru̍ṣaḥ|sarvA̍ṇi|anyAni̍|śIrṣṇaḥ|a~ggA̍ni|pratIti̍|acati|śira̍ḥ|Eva|na|pa~jcadaśamiti̍# pa~jca - daśam|rathantaramiti# rathaM-taram|Bavati|indriyam|Eva|avEti|rundhatE|saptadaśamiti̍# sapta - daśam|24 (50)
verses.samhita: stuvantyanuślOkEna̍ paścAd-yajñasyaivAntaM̍ gatvA ślOkaBAjO̍# Bavanti navaBi-raddhvaryurud-gA̍yati̍ nava vai puruṣE̍ prAṇAḥ prAṇAnEva yajamAnEṣu̍ dadhAti sarvA# aindriyO# Bavanti prAṇEṣvEvEndriyaM dadha-tyapra̍tihRutABirud-gA̍yati̍ tasmAt puruṣaḥ̍ sarvA̱ṇyanyAni# śIṛṣṇO&~ggAni̍ pratyacati̍ śira# Eva na pa~jcadaśaṃra̍thantaraM̍ BavatIndriyamEvAva̍# rundhatE saptadaśaM-[ ] 24

verses.padam: - Padam bRuhat|annAdyasyEtyanna̍ - adyasya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|athO iti|prEti̍|Eva|tEna̍|jAyantE|EkaviṃqśamityE̍ka̍ - viṃqśam|Badram|dvipadAsviti# dvi - padAsu|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|patnayaḥ|upEti̍|gAyanti|mithunatvAyEti̍# mithuna - tvAya|prajA̱tyA̍ iti pra - jAtyai|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajA iti# pra-jAḥ|asRujata|saḥ|akAmayata|AsAm|aham|rAjyam|parIti|iyAm|iti̍|tAsA̱m|rAjanEna̍|Eva|rAjyam|parIti̍|ait|tat|rAjanasya̍|rAjanatvamiti̍# rAjana - tvam|yat|rAjanam|Bavati|prajAnAmiti̍# pra - jAnA̱m|Eva|tat|yajamAnAḥ|rAjyam|parIti̍|yanti|pa~jcaviṃqśamiti̍# pa~jca - viṃqśam|Bavati|prajApatEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|25 (50)
verses.samhita: bRuha-dannAdyasyAvaruddhyA athO praiva tEna# jAyanta EkaviṃqśaM BadraM dvipadAsu̍ pratiṣṭhityai̍ patnaya̍ upa# gAyanti mithunatvAya prajA̱tyai prajApatiḥ̍ prajA asRujata̍ sO&kAmayatA&&*sAmahaṃ̍ rAjyaM parIyAmiti̍ tAsAṃ# rAjanEnaiva rAjyaM paryait tad-rAjanasya̍# rAjanatvaM ~Myad-rAjanaM̍ Bavati̍ prajAnAmEva̍ tad-yajamAnA̍ rAjyaM pari# yanti pa~jcaviṃqśaM Bavati̍ prajApatE̍ - [ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam Aptyai̱|pa~jcaBiriti# pa~jca - Biḥ|tiṣṭhantaḥ|stuvanti|dEvalOkamiti̍# dEva - lOkam|Eva|aBIti|jayanti|pa~jcaBiriti̍# pa~jca - Biḥ|AsInAḥ|manuṣyalOkamiti̍# manuṣya - lOkam|Eva|aBIti|jayanti|daśa̍|samiti̍|padyantE|daśA̱kṣarEti̍ daśa# - akṣarA|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|anna̱m|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjEti# vi - rAjA̱|Eva|annAdyamityanna̍ -adya̱m|avEti|rundhatE|pa~jcadhEti̍# pa~jca - dhA|viniṣadyEti# vi - niṣadya|stuvanti|pa~jca̍|diśa̍ḥ|dikṣu|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|Ekai̍kayEtyEka̍yA̍ - EkayA|astutayA|samAyantIti̍# saM - Ayanti|digBya̍ iti# dik - Byaḥ|Eva|annAdyamityanna̍ - adya̱m|samiti|Baranti|tABi̍ḥ|udgAtEtyu̍t̍ - gAtA|uditi|gAyati|digBya̍ iti# dik - Byaḥ|Eva|annAdyamityanna̍ - adya̱m|26 (50)
verses.samhita: -rAptyai# pa~jcaBi-stiṣṭhantaḥ̍ stuvanti dEvalOkamEvABi jayanti̍ pa~jcaBirAsInA̍ manuṣyalOkamEvABi jayanti̍ daśa saMpadyantE̍ daśA̱kṣarA virAḍannaM̍ ~MvirAḍ virAjaivA-nnAdyamava# rundhatE pa~jcadhA viniṣadya̍# stuvanti pa~jca diśO# dikṣavEva̍ pratitiṣṭhantyEkai̍kayA&stu̍tayA̍ samAyanti̍ digBya EvAnnAdyaṃq saM Baranti̍ tABi-rudgAtOd-gA̍yati̍ digBya EvAnnAdyaṃ-[̍ ] 26

verses.padam: - Padam saBRuMtyEti# saM - BRutya|tEja̍ḥ|Atmann|dadhatE|tasmA̱t|Eka̍ḥ|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|sarvAṇi|a~ggA̍ni|avati|athO̍ iti|yathA̱|suparṇa̍ iti# su - parṇaḥ|utpatiṣyannityut̍ - patiṣyann|śiraḥ|uttamamityu̍t̍ - tamam|kurutE|Evam|Eva|tat|yajamAnAḥ|prajAnAmiti̍# pra - jAnA̱m|uttamA ityut̍ - tamAḥ|Bavanti|AsandImityA̱ - sandIm|udgAtEtyut̍ - gAtA|Eti|rOhati|sAmrA̱jyamiti̍ sAM - rAjyam|Eva|gacCanti|plE~gKam|hOtA̱|nAkasya|Eva|pRuṣṭham|rOhanti|kUrcau|addhvaryuḥ|braddhnasya̍|Eva|viṣṭapa̱m|gacCanti|EtAva̍ntaḥ|vai|dEvalOkA̍ iti# dEva - lOkAḥ|tEṣu|Eva|yathApUrvamiti̍# yathA - pUrvam|pratIti# ( )|tiṣṭhanti|athO iti|Akrama̍ṇamityA̱̍ - kramaṇam|Eva|tat|sEtu̱m|yaja̍mAnAḥ|kurvatE|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ-gasya|lOkasya̍|sama̍ṣṭyA̍ iti saM - aṣṭyai||27 (61)
verses.samhita: saMqBRutya tEja# Atman dadhatE̍ tasmAdEkaḥ̍ prAṇaḥ sarvAṇya~ggA̱nyavatyathO yathA# suparṇa utpatiṣya~jCira̍# uttamaM kuruta̍ EvamEva tad-yajamAnAḥ̍ prajAnAmuttamA̍ BavantyAsandI-mu̍dgAtA̍ &&rOhati̍ sAmrA̱jyamEva gacCanti̍ plE~gKaṃ hOtA nAkasyaiva̍ pRuṣṭhaṃ rOhanti̍ kUrcAvaddhvaryu-rbraddhnasyaiva̍ viṣṭapaM̍ gacCantyEtAvantO̍ vai dEvalOkAstEṣvEva̍ yathApUrvaM̍ prati# ( ) tiṣṭhantyathO# AkramaṇamEva̍ tath sEtuM ~MyajamAnAḥ̍ kurvatE suvargasya# lOkasya samaṣṭyai||27̍

verses.padam: - Padam arkyEṇa|vai|sahasraśa̍ iti# sahasra - śaḥ|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|asRujata|tAByaḥ|ilA̱ndEna|irA̱m|lUtA̱m|avEti̍|arundha|yat|arkya̱m|Bava̍ti|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|Eva|tat|yajamAnAḥ|sRujantE|ilA̱ndam|Bavati|prajABya̍ iti# pra - jAByaḥ|Eva|sRuṣṭABya̍ḥ|irA̱m|lUtA̱m|avEti̍|rundhatE|tasmA̱t|yAm|samA̱m|satram|samRu̍ddhamiti̍ saM - Ruddham|kṣOdhukAḥ|tAm|samA̱m|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|iṣa̱m|hi|AsAm|Urja̱m|Adadata̍ ityA̱ - dadatE|yAm|samA̱m|vyRu̍ddhamiti̍ vi - Ruddham|akṣOdhukAḥ|tAm|samA̱m|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|28 (50)
verses.samhita: arkyEṇa̍ vai sahasraśaḥ̍ prajApatiḥ̍ prajA asRujata̍ tABya ilA̱dEMqnErAM ~MlUtAmavArundha̍ yadarkyaM̍ Bavati̍ prajA Eva tad-yajamAnAḥ̍ sRujanta ilA̱daM Bavati prajABya# Eva sRuṣṭABya irAM ~MlUtAmava# rundhatE tasmAdyAṃ samAṃ# satraṃ samRuddhaM̍ kṣOdhukAstAṃ̍ samA̱M prajA iṣaṅq hyAsAmUrja̍mAdada̍tE̍ yAṃ samAM ~MvyRuddha-makṣO̍dhukAstAṃ̍ samA̱M prajA - [ ] 28

verses.padam: - Padam na|hi|AsAm|iṣa̱m|Urja̱m|Adadata̍ ityA̱ - dadatE|utkrOdamityu̍t̍ - krOdam|kurvatE|yathA̱|bandhAt|mumucAnAḥ|utkrOdamityut̍ - krOdam|kurvatE̱|Evam|Eva|tat|yajamAnAḥ|dEvabandhAditi̍# dEva-bandhAt|mumucAnAḥ|utkrOdamityut̍ - krOdam|kurvatE|iṣa̱m|Urja̱m|Atmann|dadhAnAḥ|vAṇaḥ|śatata̍nturiti̍# śata - tantuḥ|Bavati|śatAyuriti# śata - Ayuḥ|puruṣaḥ|śatEndri̍ya̍ iti# śata - indriyaḥ|Ayuṣi|Eva|indriyE|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|Ajim|dhAvanti|ana̍BijitasyEtyana̍Bi̍ - jitasya|aBijityA̍ ityaBi - jityai|dunduBIn|samAGnantIti# saM - AGnanti|paramA|vai|EṣA|vAk|yA|dunduBau|paramAm|Eva|29̍ (50)
verses.samhita: na hyAsAmiṣamUrja̍mAdada̍ta̍ utkrOdaM kurvatE̍ yathA# bandhAn-mumucAnA̍ utkrOdaM̍ kurvata# EvamEva tad-yajamAnA̍ dEvabandhAn-mumucAnA̍ utkrOdaM̍ kurvata̍ iṣamUrjamAtman̍ dadhAnA̍ vAṇaḥ śatatanturBavati̍ śatAyuḥ puruṣaḥ̍ śatEndriya̍ AyuṣyEvEndriyE̍ prati# tiṣṭhantyAjiM dhAvantyana̍BijitasyA-Biji̍tyai̍ dunduBInth samAGnanti̍ paramA vA EṣA vAgyA dunduBau̍ paramAmEva̍ - [ ] 29

verses.padam: - Padam vAca̱m|avEti|rundhatE|BUmidunduBimiti̍# BUmi - dunduBim|Eti|Gnanti|yA|Eva|imAm|vAk|praviṣṭEti̍ pra - viṣṭA|tAm|Eva|avEti|rundhatE|athO̍ iti|imAm|Eva|jayanti|sarvA̱ḥ|vAca̍ḥ|vadanti|sarvA̍sAm|vAcAm|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|ArdrE|carmann|vyAya̍cCEtE̍ iti# vi-AyacCEtE|indriyasya̍|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|Eti|anyaḥ|krOśa̍ti|prEti̍|anyaḥ|śaṃqsati|yaḥ|AkrOśatItyA̱-krOśa̍ti|punAti̍|Eva|EnAn|saḥ|yaḥ|praśaṃsatIti̍# pra - śaṃsati|pUtEṣu̍|Eva|annAdyamitya̍nna̍ - adya̱m|dadhAti|RuṣikRutamityRuṣi̍-kRutam|ca|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vAcamava# rundhatE BUmidunduBimA Gnanti̍ yaivEmAM ~MvAk praviṣṭA̍ tAmEvAva# rundhatE &thO# imAmEva jayanti̍ sarvA vAcO# vadanti sarvAsAM̍ ~MvAcAmavaruddhyA̍ ArdrEcarman vyAyacCEtE̍ indriyasyA varuddhyA̍ A&nyaḥ krOśati̍ prAnyaḥ śaṃsati̍ ya AkrOśati̍ punAtyEvainAnthsa yaḥ praśaṃsati̍ pUtEṣvEvAnnAdyaM̍ dadhAtyRuṣikRutaM̍ ca - [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam vai|EtE|dEvakRutamiti̍# dEva-kRutam|ca|pUrvai̱ḥ|mAsai̱ḥ|avEti|rundhatE|yat|BUtEcCadAmiti̍# BUtE - CadA̱m|sAmAni|Bava̍nti|uBaya̍sya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|yanti|vai|EtE|mithunAt|yE|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM-vathsaram|upayantItyupa-yanti̍|antarvEdItya̍ntaḥ̍ - vEdi|mithunau|samiti|Bavataḥ|tEna̍|Eva|mithunAt|na|yanti||31̍ (30) (vyRuddhamakṣO̍dhukAstAṃ̍ samA̱M prajAḥ - paramAmEva̍ - ca# - triṃqśacca)̍ (A9)
verses.samhita: vA EtE dEvakRutaM̍ ca pUrvairmAsairava# rundhatE yad-BUtEcCadAṃq̍ sAmAni̍ BavantyuBayasyAva̍ruddhyai̍ yanti vA EtE mithunAdyE̍ saM~Mvathsara-mu̍payantya̍ntarvEdi̍ mithunau̍ saM BavatastEnaiva̍ mithunAnna̍ yanti||31̍ (vyRuddhamakṣO̍dhukAstAṃ̍ samA̱M prajAḥ - paramAmEva̍ - ca# - triṃqśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam carma|avEti̍|Bindanti|pApmAna̱m|Eva|EṣAm|avEti̍|Bindanti|mA|apEti̍|rAthsIḥ|mA|atIti̍|vyAthsIḥ|iti̍|Aha|sapraMqtIti̍# saM - prati|Eva|EṣAm|pApmAna̱m|avEti|Bindanti|udakumBAnityu̍da-kumBAn|adhinidhAyEtya̍dhi̍ - nidhAya|dAsya̍ḥ|mArjAlIya̱m|parIti̍|nRutyanti|padaḥ|niGnatIriti̍# ni - GnatIḥ|idaMmadhumitIdaM̍ - madhum|gAyantyaḥ|madhu̍|vai|dEvAnA̱m|paramam|annAdyamitya̍nna̍ - adya̱m|paramam|Eva|annAdyamityanna̍ - adya̱m|avEti|rundhatE|padaḥ|nIti̍|Gnanti|mahIyAm|Eva|Eṣu|dadhati||32̍ (49)
verses.samhita: carmAva# Bindanti pApmAnamEvaiṣAmava̍# Bindanti mA&pa# rAthsIrmA&ti# vyAthsIrityAha̍ saMpratyEvaiṣA̱M̍ pApmAnamava# BindantyudakumBAnadhinidhAya̍# dAsyO# mArjAlIyaM pari# nRutyanti padO niGnatIridaMma̍dhuM̍ gAyantyO̍ madhu vai dEvAnA̱M parama-mannAdyaM̍ paramamEvA-nnAdyamava# rundhatE padO ni Gnanti̍ mahIyAmEvaiṣu# dadhati||32

verses.padam: - Padam pRuthivyai|svAhA̱|antarikṣAya|svAhA̱|divE|svAhA̱|saplOMqṣyata̍ iti# saM - plOṣyatE|svAhA̱|saplaMvamAnAyEti̍# saM - plavamAnAya|svAhA̱|saMplu̍tAyEti̍ saM-plutAya|svAhA̱|mEGAyiṣyatE|svAhA̱|mEGAyata iti# mEGa - yatE|svAhA̱|mEGitAya|svAhA̱|mEGAya̍|svAhA̱|nIhArAya̍|svAhA̱|nihAkA̍yA̍ iti# ni-hAkAyai|svAhA̱|prAsacAya̍|svAhA̱|pracalAkA̍yA̍ iti# pra - calAkAyai|svAhA̱|vidyOtiṣyata̍ iti# vi - dyOtiṣyatE|svAhA̱|vidyOtamAnAyEti̍# vi - dyOtamAnAya|svAhA̱|saM~MvidyOta̍mAnAyEti̍# saM-vidyOtamAnAya|svAhA̱|stanayiṣyatE|svAhA̱|stanaya̍tE|svAhA̱|ugram|stanaya̍tE|svAhA̱|vaṛqṣiṣyatE|svAhA̱|vaṛṣa̍tE|svAhA̱|aBivaṛṣa̍ta̍ ityaBi̍ - vaṛṣatE|svAhA̱|parivaṛṣa̍ta̍ iti# pari - vaṛṣatE|svAhA̱|saM~Mvaṛṣa̍ta̍ iti# saM - vaṛṣatE|33̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pRuthivyai svAhA &ntarikṣAya̍ svAhA# divE svAhA# saMplOṣyatE svAhA# saplaMvamAnAya̍ svAhA saMplutAya̍ svAhA# mEGAyiṣyatE svAhA# mEGAyatE svAhA# mEGitAya svAhA# mEGAya svAhA# nIhArAya svAhA# nihAkAyai̍ svAhA̱ prAsacAya svAhA̱ pracalAkAyai̍ svAhA# vidyOtiṣyatE svAhA# vidyOtamAnAya̍ svAhA# saM~MvidyOtamAnAya̍ svAhA̱ stanayiṣyatE svAhA̱ stanayatE̍ svAhO -graṅ stanayatE̍ svAhA# vaṛṣiṣyatE svAhA vaṛṣatE̍ svAhA# &BivaṛṣatE̍ svAhA# parivaṛṣatE̍ svAhA# saM~MvaṛṣatE̍ - [ ] 33

verses.padam: - Padam svAhA̱|anuvaṛṣata̍ ityanu̍ - vaṛṣatE|svAhA̱|śIkAyiṣyatE|svAhA̱|śIkAyata̍ iti# śIka - yatE|svAhA̱|śIkitAya|svAhA̱|prOṣiṣyatE|svAhA̱|pruṣṇatE|svAhA̱|paripruṣṇata̍ iti# pari - pruṣṇatE|svAhA̱|udgrahIṣyata ityut̍ - grahIṣyatE|svAhA̱|udgRuhṇata ityut̍ - gRuhṇatE|svAhA̱|udgRuhItAyEtyut̍ - gRuhItAya|svAhA̱|viplOṣyata iti# vi - plOṣyatE|svAhA̱|viplavamAnAyEti̍# vi - plavamAnAya|svAhA̱|viplu̍tAyEti̍ vi - plutAya|svAhA̱|AtaPsyata ityA̱ - taPsyatE|svAhA̱|Atapata̍ ityA̱ - tapatE|svAhA̱|ugram|Atapa̍ta̍ ityA̱ - tapatE|svAhA̱|RugBya̍ ityRuk̍ - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|yajurBya̍ iti yajuḥ̍ - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|sAmaBya̍ iti sAma# - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|a~ggirOBya̍ itya~ggiraḥ̍ -Byaḥ|svAhA̱|vEdE̱Byaḥ|svAhA̱|gAthA̱Byaḥ|svAhA̱|nArAśaṃqsIByaḥ|svAhA̱|raiBI̱Byaḥ|svAhA̍# ( )|sarvasmai|svAhA̱||34̍ (52)
verses.samhita: svAhA# &nuvaṛṣatE̍ svAhA# śIkAyiṣyatE svAhA# śIkAyatE svAhA# śIkitAya svAhA̱prOṣiṣyatE svAhA̱ pruṣṇatE svAhA# paripruṣṇatE svAhO̱-dgrahIṣyatE svAhO̱ dgRuhṇatE svAhO-dgRuhItAya̍ svAhA# viplOṣyatE svAhA# viplavamAnAya̍ svAhA viplutAya̍ svAhA# &&taPsyatE svAhA &&tapatE̍ qsvAhO-gramAtapatE̍ svAha -rgByaḥ svAhA yajurByaḥ̍ svAhA sAmaByaḥ̍ svAhA &~ggirOByaḥ̍ svAhA vEdE̱Byaḥ svAhA gAthA̱Byaḥ svAhA# nArAśaṃqsIByaḥ svAhA raiBI̱Byaḥ svAhA ( ) sarvasmai̍ svAhA̱||34

verses.padam: - Padam datvatE̱|svAhA̱|adantakAya|svAhA̱|prAṇinE̱|svAhA̱|aprAṇAya̍|svAhA̱|muKa̍vata̍ iti muKa-vatE|svAhA̱|amuKAya̍|svAhA̱|nAsi̍kavata̍ iti nAsika̍ - vatE|svAhA̱|anAsikAya|svAhA̱|akṣaṇvata̍ ityakṣaṇ-vatE̱|svAhA̱|anakṣikA̍ya|svAhA̱|karṇinE̱|svAhA̱|akarṇakA̍ya|svAhA̱|śIṛqṣaṇvata̍ iti# śIṛṣaṇ - vatE̱|svAhA̱|aśIrq.ṣakAya|svAhA̱|padvata̍ iti# pat - vatE̱|svAhA̱|apAdakAya|svAhA̱|prAṇata̍ iti# pra-anatE|svAhA̱|aprAṇata̍ ityapra# - anatE|svAhA̱|vadatE|svAhA̱|ava̍datE|svAhA̱|paśya̍tE|svAhA̱|apa̍śyatE|svAhA̱|śRuṇvatE|svAhA̱|aśRu̍ṇvatE|svAhA̱|manasvinE̱|svAhA̱|35̍ (50)
verses.samhita: datvatE svAhA# &dantakAya̍ svAhA̱ prAṇinE svAhA̱ &prAṇAya svAhA muKavatE̍ svAhA&muKAya̍ svAhA nAsikavatE̍ svAhA# &nAsikAya svAhA̱ &kṣaṇvatE svAhA&nakṣikA̍ya̍ svAhA# karṇinE svAhA# &karṇakAya̍ svAhA# śIṛṣaṇvatE svAhA&śIrq.ṣakA̍ya̍ svAhA# padvatE svAhA# &pAdakAya̍ svAhA̱ prAṇatE svAhA &prAṇatE̍ svAhA vadatE̍ svAhA &vadatE̍ svAhA paśyatE̍ svAhA &paśyatE̍ svAhA# śRuṇvatE svAhA &śRuṇvatE̍ svAhA# manasvinE svAhA# - [ ] 35

verses.padam: - Padam amanasE̱|svAhA̱|rEtasvinE̱|svAhA̱|arEtaskAyEtyarEtaḥ̍ - kAya|svAhA̱|prajABya iti# pra - jAByaḥ|svAhA̱|prajana̍nAyEti̍# pra - jananAya|svAhA̱|lOma̍vata̍ iti lOma# - vatE|svAhA̱|alOmakAya|svAhA̱|tvacE|svAhA̱|atvakkA̍ya|svAhA̱|carma̍ṇvata̍ iti carmaṇ# - vatE|svAhA̱|acarmakAya|svAhA̱|lOhi̍tavata̍ iti lOhita̍ - vatE|svAhA̱|alOhitAya|svAhA̱|mAṃqsanvata̍ iti# mAṃsann-vatE̱|svAhA̱|amAṃqsakAya|svAhA̱|snAva̍Bya̍ iti snAva# - Byaḥ|svAhA̱|asnAvakAya|svAhA̱|asthanvata̍ ityasthann̍ - vatE̱|svAhA̱|anasthikAya|svAhA̱|majjanvata̍ iti# majjann - vatE̱|svAhA̱|amajjakAya|svAhA̱|a~gginE̱|svAhA̱|ana~ggAya̍|svAhA̱|AtmanE̱|svAhA̱|anA̱tmanE|svAhA̱̍ ( )|sarvasmai|svAhA̱||36̍ (52)
verses.samhita: &manasE svAhA# rEtasvinE svAhA# &rEtaskAya̍ svAhA̱ prajAByaḥ svAhA̱ prajananAya̍ svAhA lOmavatE̍ svAhA# &lOmakAya̍ svAhA̱ tvacE svAhA &tvakkAya̍ svAhA carmaṇvatE̍ svAhA# &carmakAya̍ svAhA lOhitavatE̍ svAhA&lOhitAya̍ svAhA# mAṃsanvatE svAhA# &mAṃqsakAya̍ svAhA snAvaByaḥ̍ svAhA̱ &snAvakAya̍ svAhA̱ sthanvatE svAhA&nasthikA̍ya̍ svAhA# majjanvatE svAhA# &majjakAya̍ svAhA &~gginE svAhA&na~ggAya̍ svAhA &&tmanE svAhA &nA̱tmanE svAhA ( ) sarvasmai̍ svAhA̱||36

verses.padam: - Padam kaḥ|tvA|yunakti|saḥ|tvA|yunaktu|viṣṇuḥ|tvA|yunaktu|asya|yajñasya̍|Ruddhyai̱|mahya̱m|sanna̍tyA̍ iti saM - natyai|amuṣmai̱|kAmAya|Ayu̍ṣE|tvA|prAṇAyEti̍# pra - anAya|tvA|apAnAyEtya̍pa̍ - anAya|tvA|vyAnAyEti̍# vi - anAya|tvA|vyu̍ṣṭyA̍ iti vi - uṣṭyai|tvA|rayyai|tvA|rAdhasE|tvA|GOṣA̍ya|tvA|pOṣA̍ya|tvA|ArAdGOṣAyEtyA̍rAt̍ - GOṣAya|tvA|pracyu̍tyA̍ iti pra - cyutyai|tvA||37 (38) (kastvA - &ṣṭAtriṃśat)̍ (A13)
verses.samhita: kastvA# yunakti sa tvA# yunaktu viṣṇustvA̍ yunaktvasya yajñasyarddhyai mahyaṃq sannatyA̍ amuṣmai kAmAyA&&*yuṣE̍ tvA prAṇAya# tvA &pAnAya# tvA vyAnAya# tvA vyuṣṭyai̍ tvA rayyai tvA rAdhasE̍ tvA GOṣAya̍ tvA pOṣAya̍ tvA &&rAdGOṣAya# tvA pracyutyai̍ tvA||37 (kastvA - &ṣṭAtriṃśat)̍

verses.padam: - Padam agnayE̱|gAyatrAya|trivRuta̍ iti# tri-vRutE̱|rAthantarAyEti̍ rAtha̱M-tarAya|vAsantAya|aṣṭAka̍pAla̍ ityaṣṭA - kapAlaḥ|indrAya|traiṣṭu̍BAya|pa~jcadaśAyEti̍# pa~jca - daśAya|bAṛha̍tAya|graiṣmA̍ya|EkA̍daśakapAla̍ ityEkAdaśa̍ - kapAlaḥ|viśvE̱Byaḥ|dEvEByaḥ|jAga̍tEByaḥ|saptadaśEBya̍ iti# sapta - daśEByaḥ|vairUpEBya̍ḥ|vAṛṣi̍kEByaḥ|dvAda̍śakapAla̍ iti dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlaḥ|mitrAvaruṇAByAmiti̍# mitrA - varuṇAByAm|Anu̍ṣṭuBAByAmityAnu̍-̍ stuBAByAm|EkaviṃqśAByAmityEka-viṃqśAByA̱m|vairAjAByA̱m|śAradAByA̱m|payasyA̱|bRuhaspata̍yE|pA~gktA̍ya|triṇavAyEti̍# tri - navAya|śAkvarAya̍|haima̍ntikAya|caruḥ|savitrE|AticCandasAyEtyA̍ti̍ - CandasAya|trayastriṃqśAyEti̍# trayaḥ - triṃqśAya|raivatAya̍|śaiśirAya̍|dvAda̍śakapAla̍ iti dvAdaśa̍ -kapAlaḥ|adityai|viṣṇu̍patnyA̍ iti viṣṇu# - patnyai|caruḥ|agnayE̱|vaiśvAnarAya|dvAda̍śakapAla̍ iti dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlaḥ|anumatyA̍ ityanu# - matyai|caruḥ|kAyaḥ|EkakapAla̍ ityEka-kapAlaḥ||38̍ (47) (agnayE&dityA̍ anumatyai̍ - saptacatvAriṃśat)̍ (A14)
verses.samhita: agnayE# gAyatrAya# trivRutE rAthantarAya̍ vAsantAyA-ṣṭAkapAla̍ indrAya̍ traiṣṭuBAya̍ pa~jcadaśAya bAṛhatAya̍ graiṣmAyaikAdaśakapAlO̍ viśvE̱ByO dEvEByO jAgatEByaḥ̍ saptadaśEByO# vairUpEByO vAṛṣikEByO̍ dvAdaśakapAlO̍ mitrAvaruṇAByA-mAnu̍ṣṭuBAByA-mEkaviṃqśAByA̱M̍ ~MvairAjAByAṃ# śAradAByA̱M payasyA# bRuhaspatayE̍ pA~gktAya̍ triṇavAya# śAkvarAya haimantikAya̍ caruḥ savitra̍ AticCandasAya̍# trayastriṃqśAya# raivatAya# śaiśirAya dvAdaśakapAlO̍ &dityai̍ viṣṇupatnyai̍ caruragnayE# vaiśvAnarAya dvAdaśakapAlO̍ &numatyai̍ caruḥ kAya EkakapAlaḥ||38̍ (agnayE&dityA̍ anumatyai̍ - saptacatvAriṃśat)̍

verses.padam: - Padam yaḥ|vai|agnau|agniḥ|prahriyata iti# pra - hriyatE̱|yaḥ|ca|sOmaḥ|rAjA̱|tayO̱ḥ|Eṣaḥ|Atithyam|yat|agnIṣOmIya̍ ityagnI̍ - sOmIyaḥ|atha̍|Eṣaḥ|rudraḥ|yaḥ|cIyatE̱|yat|sa~jci̍ta̍ iti saM - citE|agnau|EtAni|havIṃṣi̍|na|nirvapEditi̍# niḥ - vapE̱t|Eṣaḥ|Eva|rudraḥ|aśA̱ntaḥ|upOtthAyEtyupa̍ - utthAya|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|paśUn|yajamAnasya|aBIti̍|manyEta|yat|sa~jci̍ta̍ iti saM-citE|agnau|EtAni|havIṃṣi̍|nirvapatIti̍# niḥ - vapati|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|Eva|Enam|śamayati|na|asya|rudraḥ|aśA̱ntaḥ|39̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yO vA agnAvagniḥ prahriyatE̍ yaśca sOmO rAjA tayOrEṣa̍ AtithyaM̍ ~MyadagnIṣOmIyO&thaiṣa̍ rudrO yaścIyatE yath saMcitE&gnAvEtAni̍# havIṃṣi na nirvapEdEṣa̍ Eva rudrO&śA̱nta upOtthAya# prajAM paśUn yajamAnasyABi̍ manyEta̍ yath saMcitE&gnAvEtAni̍# havIṃṣi# nirvapati̍ BAgadhEyEnaivainaṃ̍# śamayati nAsya# rudrO&śA̱nta - [ ] 39

verses.padam: - Padam upOtthAyEtyupa̍ - utthAya|prajAmiti̍# pra-jAm|paśUn|aBIti|manyatE|daśa̍|havIṃṣi̍|Bavanti|nava̍|vai|puru̍ṣE|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|nABiḥ|daśamI|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|Eva|yajamAnE|dadhAti|athO̍ iti|daśA̱kṣarEti̍ daśa# - akṣarA|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|anna̱m|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjIti# vi - rAji|Eva|annAdya̍ ityanna̍ - adyE̱|pratIti|tiṣṭhati|RutuBirityRutu̍ - Biḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|CandOBiriti̍ Candaḥ-̍ Biḥ|stOmai̱ḥ|pRuṣṭhaiḥ|cEtavyaḥ|iti̍|Ahuḥ|yat|EtAni̍|havIṃṣi̍|nirvapatIti̍# niḥ - vapati|RutuBirityRutu̍ - Biḥ|Eva|Enam|CandOBiriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|stOmai̱ḥ|pRuṣṭhaiḥ|cinutE|diśaḥ|suṣuvAṇEna̍|40̍ (50)
verses.samhita: upOtthAya# prajAM paśUnaBi manyatE̍ daśa# havIṃṣi# Bavanti nava vai puruṣE̍ prAṇA nABirdaśamI̍ prAṇAnEva yajamAnE̍ dadhAtyathO daśA̱kṣarA virAḍannaM̍ ~MvirAḍ virAjyEvAnnAdyE prati# tiṣṭhatyRutuBirvA Eṣa CandOBiḥ̍ stOmai̱ḥ pRuṣṭhaiścEtavya̍# ityAhuryadEtAni̍# havIṃṣi# nirvapatyRutuBi̍rEvainaM̍ CandOBiḥ̍ stOmai̱ḥ pRuṣṭhaiścinutE̍ diśaḥ̍ suṣuvAṇEnA# - [ ] 40

verses.padam: - Padam aBijityA ityaBi̍ - jityA̱ḥ|iti|Ahuḥ|yat|EtAni̍|havIṃṣi̍|nirvapatIti̍# niḥ - vapati|diśAm|aBiji̍tyA̍ ityaBi - jityai|EtayA̱|vai|indra̱m|dEvAḥ|ayAjayann|tasmA̱t|indrasava itI̱ndra - savaḥ|EtayA̱|manu̱m|manuṣyA̱ḥ|tasmA̱t|manusava iti# manu - savaḥ|yathA̱|indraḥ|dEvAnA̱m|yathA̱|manu̍ḥ|manuṣyA̍ṇAm|Evam|Bavati|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|EtayA̱|iṣṭyA̱|yaja̍tE|digva̍tIriti̍ dik-vatIḥ|purO&nuvAkyA# iti# puraḥ-anuvAkyA̱ḥ|Bavanti|sarvAsAm|diśAm|aBiji̍tyA̍ ityaBi - jityai||41 (40) (aśA̱ntaḥ - suṣuvAṇEnai - kacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A15)
verses.samhita: -BijityA ityAhuryadEtAni̍# havIṃṣi# nirvapati̍ diśAmaBijityA̍ EtayA vA indraM̍ dEvA ayAjayan̍ tasmAdindrasava̍ EtayA manuM̍ manuṣyA̱stasmA̱n-manusavO yathEndrO# dEvAnAM ~MyathA manurmanuṣyA̍ṇAmEvaM̍ Bavati̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAnEtayEṣṭyA yajatE̍ digvatIḥ̍ purO&nuvAkyA# Bavanti sarvAsAM̍ diśAmaBijityai||41̍ (aśA̱ntaḥ - suṣuvAṇEnai - kacatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam yaḥ|prAṇata iti# pra - anataḥ|nimiṣata iti# ni - miṣataḥ|mahitvEti# mahi - tvA|Ekaḥ|it|rAjA̱|jaga̍taḥ|baBUva̍||yaḥ|IśE̱|asya|dvipada̍ iti# dvi - padaḥ|catu̍ṣpada̍ iti catuḥ̍ - padaḥ|kasmai̱|dEvAya|haviṣA̱|vidhEma||upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma-gRuhItaḥ|asi|prajApa̍taya̍ iti# prajA - patayE|tvA|juṣṭa̱m|gRuhṇAmi|tasya|tE|dyauḥ|mahimA|nakṣa̍trAṇi|rUpam|Adityaḥ|tE|tEja̍ḥ|tasmai̱|tvA|mahimnE|prajApa̍taya̍ iti# prajA - patayE|svAhA̱||42 (38) (yaḥ prAṇatO̍ dyaurAdityO̱̍ - &ṣṭAtriṃśat̍ ) (A16)
verses.samhita: yaḥ prAṇatO̍ nimiṣatO̍ mahitvaika̍ idrAjA jagatO̍ baBUva|ya̍ IśE# asya dvipadaścatuṣpadaḥ̍ kasmai# dEvAya# haviṣA# vidhEma||upayAmagRuhItO&si̍ prajApatayE̍ tvA juṣṭaM̍ gRuhṇAmi tasya# tE dyaurmahimA̍ nakṣatrAṇi̍ rUpamAdityastE̍ tEjastasmai̱ tvA mahimnE prajApatayE̍ svAhA̱||42

verses.padam: - Padam yaḥ|AtmadA ityA̱tma - dAḥ|baladA iti# bala - dAḥ|yasya|viśvE̱|upAsa̍ta̍ ityupa̍ - AsatE|praśiṣamiti̍# pra-śiṣa̱m|yasya|dEvAḥ||yasya̍|CAyA|amRuta̱m|yasya̍|mRutyuḥ|kasmai̱|dEvAya̍|haviṣA̱|vidhEma||upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma̍ - gRuhItaḥ|asi|prajApataya̍ iti# prajA - patayE|tvA|juṣṭa̱m|gRuhṇAmi|tasya|tE|pRuthivI|mahimA|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|vanaspata̍yaḥ|rUpam|agniḥ|tE|tEja̍ḥ|tasmai̱|tvA|mahimnE|prajApa̍taya̍ iti# prajA - patayE|svAhA̱||43 (39) (ya A̱tmadAḥ pRuthivya̍gni-rEkAnnaca̍tvAriṃqśat)̍ (A17)
verses.samhita: ya A̱tmadA baladA̍ yasya viśva# upAsatE̍ praśiṣaM ~Myasya# dEvAḥ|yasya# CAyA&mRutaM ~Myasya# mRutyuḥ kasmai# dEvAya# haviṣA# vidhEma||upayAmagRuhItO&si̍ prajApatayE̍ tvA juṣṭaM̍ gRuhṇAmi tasya# tE pRuthivI mahimauṣa̍dhayO̍ vanaspatayO̍ rUpamagnistE tEjastasmai̱ tvA mahimnE prajApatayE̍ svAhA̱||43 (ya A̱tmadAḥ pRuthivya̍gni-rEkAnnaca̍tvAriṃqśat)̍

verses.padam: - Padam Eti|brahmann̍|brAhmaṇaḥ|brahmavarcasIti̍# brahma-varcasI|jAyatAm|Eti|asminn|rAṣṭrE|rAjanya̍ḥ|iṣavya̍ḥ|śUra̍ḥ|mahAratha̍ iti# mahA - rathaḥ|jAyatAm|dOgdhrI̱|dhEnuḥ|vOḍhA̱|anaḍvAn|Aśuḥ|saptiḥ|pura̍ndhiḥ|yOṣA̱|jiṣṇUḥ|rathEṣṭhA̍ iti# rathE - sthAḥ|saBEyaḥ|yuvA̱|Eti̍|asya|yaja̍mAnasya|vIraḥ|jAyatAm|nikAmEni̍kAma̍ iti# nikAmE - nikAmE|naḥ|parjanyaḥ|vaṛqṣatu|Palinya̍ḥ|naḥ|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|pacyantAm|yOgakṣEma̍ iti# yOga - kṣEmaḥ|naḥ|kalpatAm||44 (41) (A brahma - nnEkacatvAriṃśat̍ )(A18)
verses.samhita: A brahman̍ brAhmaṇO brahmavarcasI̍ jAyatAmA̍ &smin rAṣṭrE rAjanya̍# iṣavyaḥ̍ śUrO# mahArathO jAyatAM̍ dOgdhrIdhEnurvOḍhA̍# &naḍvAnAśuḥ saptiḥ purandhiryOṣA̍# jiṣṇU rathEṣṭhAḥ̍ saBEyO yuvA &&sya yajamAnasya̍ vIrO jAyatAM̍ nikAmEnikAmE̍ naḥ parjanyO# vaṛṣatu PalinyO# na Oṣadhayaḥ̍ pacyantAM ~MyOgakṣEmOnaḥ̍ kalpatAM||44

verses.padam: - Padam Eti|akrAn|vAjI|pRuthivIm|agnim|yuja̱m|akRuta|vAjI|arvA̱|Eti̍|akrAn|vAjI|antari̍kṣam|vAyum|yuja̱m|akRuta|vAjI|arvA̱|dyAm|vAjI|Eti̍|akraṅqsta|sUrya̱m|yuja̱m|akRuta|vAjI|arvA̱|agniḥ|tE|vAjinn|yu~g|anviti̍|tvA|Eti̍|raBE|svasti|mA|samiti̍|pAraya|vAyuḥ|tE|vAjinn|yu~g|anviti̍|tvA|Eti̍|raBE|svasti|mA|samiti̍|45̍ (50)
verses.samhita: A&krAn# vAjI pRuthivImagniM̍ ~MyujamakRuta̍ vAjyarvA &&krAn# vAjyantari̍kṣaM̍ ~MvAyuM ~MyujamakRuta̍ vAjyarvA dyAM ~MvAjyA&kraṅsta̍ sUryaM ~MyujamakRuta̍ vAjyarvA &gnistE# vAjinq yu~g~ganu tvA && raBE̍ svasti mA saM pAraya̍ vAyustE# vAjinq yu~g~ganu tvA && raBE̍ svasti mA saM - [ ] 45

verses.padam: - Padam pAraya|Adityaḥ|tE|vAjinn|yu~g|anviti|tvA|Eti̍|raBE|svasti|mA|samiti̍|pAraya|prAṇadhRugiti̍# prAṇa - dhRuk|asi|prAṇamiti# pra - anam|mE|dRuṃqha|vyAnadhRugiti# vyAna - dhRuk|asi|vyAnamiti# vi - anam|mE|dRuṃqha|apAnadhRugityapAna̍ - dhRuk|asi|apAnamityapa̍ - anam|mE|dRuṃqha|cakṣuḥ|asi|cakṣu̍ḥ|mayi̍|dhEhi|śrOtra̱m|asi|śrOtra̱m|mayi̍|dhEhi|Ayu̍ḥ|asi|Ayu̍ḥ|mayi̍|dhEhi||46̍ (43) (vAyustE# vAjinq yu~g~ganu tvA && raBE̍ svasti mA saM - tricatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A19)
verses.samhita: pArayA̍ &&dityastE# vAjinq yu~g~ganu tvA && raBE̍ svasti mA saM pAraya̍ prAṇadhRugasi̍ prAṇaM mE# dRuṃha vyAnadhRugasi̍ vyAnaM mE# dRuṃhA &pAnadhRugasyapAnaM̍ ma# dRuṃha cakṣurasi̍ cakṣurmayi# dhEhi śrOtramasi̍ śrOtraM mayi# dhEhyAyurasyAyurmayi̍# dhEhi||46 (vAyustE# vAjinq yu~g~ganu tvA && raBE̍ svasti mA saM - tricatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam jajñi|bIja̱m|varṣṭA̱|parjanya̍ḥ|paktA̱|sasyam|supippalA̍ iti# su - pippalAḥ|Oṣadhayaḥ|svadhicaraṇEti̍# su - adhicaraṇA|iyam|sUpasadana iti# su - upasadanaḥ|agniḥ|svaddhyakṣamiti# su - addhyakṣam|antarikṣam|supAva̍ iti# su-pAvaḥ|pavamAnaḥ|sUpasthAnEti̍# su - upasthAnA|dyauḥ|śivam|asau|tapann|yathApUrvamiti̍# yathA - pUrvam|ahOrAtrE ityahaḥ̍ - rAtrE|pa~jcadaśina iti# pa~jca - daśinaḥ|ad^^rdhamAsA̍ ityad^^rdha̍ - mAsAḥ|triṃqśinaḥ|mAsA̱ḥ|klRuptAḥ|Rutava̍ḥ|śAntaḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ||47 (31) (jajñi bIja - mEkatriṃśat)̍ (A20)
verses.samhita: jajñi bIjaM ~MvarṣṭA# parjanyaḥ paktA# sasyaṃ supippalA̍ Oṣadhayaḥ̍ svadhicaraṇEyaṃ sUpasadanO̱&gniḥ̍ svaddhyakṣamantari̍kṣaṃsupAvaḥ̍ pavamAnaḥ̍ sUpasthAnA dyauḥ śivamasau tapan̍ yathApUrvamahOrAtrE̍ pa~jcadaśinO̱̍ &rddhamAsA-striṃqśinO mAsA̱ḥ klRuptA Rutavaḥ̍ śAntaḥ saM~Mvathsaraḥ||47̍ (jajñi bIja - mEkatriṃśat)̍

verses.padam: - Padam AgnEyaḥ|aṣṭAkapAla̍ ityaṣṭA - kapAlaḥ|saumyaḥ|caruḥ|sAvitraḥ|aṣṭAkapAla̍ ityaṣṭA - kapAlaḥ|pauṣṇaḥ|caruḥ|raudraḥ|caruḥ|agnayE̱|vaiśvAnarAya|dvAda̍śakapAla̍ iti dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlaḥ|mRugAKara iti# mRuga - AKarE|yadi|na|AgacCEdityA̱-gacCE̱t|agnayE̱|aṃqhOmuca̍ ityaṃhaḥ-mucE̱|aṣṭAka̍pAla̍ ityaṣṭA-kapAlaḥ|sauryam|payaḥ|vAyavya̍ḥ|Ajya̍BAga̍ ityAjya# - BAgaḥ||48 (24) (AgnEya - ścaturviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A21)
verses.samhita: AgnEyO̱&ṣṭAkapAlaḥ̍ saumyaścaruḥ sAvitrO̱&ṣṭAka̍pAlaḥ̍ pauṣṇaścarU raudraścaruragnayE# vaiśvAnarAya dvAdaśakapAlO̍ mRugAKarE yadi nA&&*gacCE-dagnayE-&ṃ̍hOmucE-&ṣṭAka̍pAlaḥ̍ sauryaM payO# vAyavya# AjyaBAgaḥ||48̍ (AgnEya - ścaturviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: - Padam agnayE̱|aṃqhOmuca ityaṃhaḥ-mucE̱|aṣṭAka̍pAla̍ ityaṣṭA-kapAlaḥ|indrAya|aṃqhOmuca̍ ityaṃhaḥ̍ - mucE̱|EkAdaśakapAla̍ ityEkAdaśa̍ - kapAlaḥ|mitrAvaruṇAByAmiti̍# mitrA - varuṇAByAm|AgOmugByAmityA̍gOmuk̍ - ByAm|payasyA̱|vAyOsAvitra iti# vAyO - sAvitraḥ|AgOmugByAmityAgOmuk̍ - ByAm|caruḥ|aśviByAmityaśvi - ByAm|agOmugByAmityAgOmuk̍ - ByAm|dhAnAḥ|marudBya iti# marut - Byaḥ|EnOmugBya ityEnOmuk-Byaḥ|saptaka̍pAla̍ iti# sapta - kapAlaḥ|viśvE̱Byaḥ|dEvEByaḥ|EnOmugBya̍ ityEnOmuk̍ - Byaḥ|dvAdaśakapAla̍ iti dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlaḥ|anumatyA̍ ityanu# - matyai|caruḥ|agnayE̱|vaiśvAnarAya|dvAda̍śakapAla̍ iti dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlaḥ|dyAvApRuthivIByAmiti̍ dyAvA̱ - pRuthivIByA̱m|aṃqhOmugByAmityaṃhOmuk̍ - ByAm|dvikapAla iti# dvi - kapAlaḥ||49 (30) (agnayE&ṃhOmucE̱̍ - triṃqśat) (A22)
verses.samhita: agnayE-&ṃhOmucE-&ṣṭAka̍pAla̍ indrAyA&ṃhOmuca̍ EkAdaśakapAlO̍ mitrAvaruṇAByA-mAgOmugByA̱M̍ payasyA# vAyOsAvitra AgOmugByA̱M̍ caruraśviByA-mAgOmugByA̱M̍ dhAnA marudBya# EnOmugByaḥ̍ saptakapAlO̍ viśvE̱ByO dEvEBya# EnOmugByO dvAdaśakapAlO̍ &numatyai̍ caruragnayE# vaiśvAnarAya dvAdaśakapAlO̍ dyAvApRuthivIByA̍-maṃhOmugByA̱M̍ dvikapAlaḥ||49

verses.padam: - Padam agnayE̱|samiti|anamat|pRuthivyai|samiti̍|anamat|yathA̱|agniḥ|pRuthivyA|samana̍maditi̍# saM - anamat|Evam|mahya̱m|BadrAḥ|saMna̍taya̍ iti saM - natayaḥ|samiti|namantu|vAyavE̱|samiti̍|anamat|antari̍kṣAya|samiti̍|anamat|yathA̱|vAyuḥ|antari̍kṣEṇa|sUryA̍ya|samiti̍|anamat|divE|samiti̍|anamat|yathA̱|sUrya̍ḥ|divA|candrama̍sE|samiti̍|anamat|nakṣa̍trEByaḥ|samiti̍|anamat|yathA̱|candramA̱ḥ|nakṣa̍traiḥ|varu̍ṇAya|samiti̍|anamat|adBya̍ ityat̍ - Byaḥ|samiti|anamatq|yathA̱|50̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agnayE samanamat̍ pRuthivyai samanamadyathA&gniḥ̍ pRuthivyA̍ samanamadEvaM̍ mahyaM̍ BadrAḥ saMnatayaḥ̍ saM namantu̍ vAyavE samanamadantari̍kṣAya̍ samanamadyathA̍# vAyurantarikṣEṇa̍ sUryAya̍ samanamaddivE̍ samanamadyathA̍ sUryO# divA candramasE̍ samanamannakṣa̍trEByaḥ̍ samanamadyathA̍# candramA nakṣatrairvaru̍ṇAya̍ samanamadadByaḥ̍ samanamadyathA̍ - [ ] 50

verses.padam: - Padam varuṇaḥ|adBiritya̍t̍ - Biḥ|sAmnE̱|samiti|anamat|RucE|samiti̍|anamat|yathA̱|sAma̍|RucA|brahma̍ṇE|samiti̍|anamat|kṣatrAya̍|samiti̍|anamat|yathA̱|brahma̍|kṣatrEṇa̍|rAjñE̱|samiti̍|anamat|viśE|samiti̍|anamat|yathA̱|rAjA̱|viśA|rathA̍ya|samiti̍|anamat|aśvE̱Byaḥ|samiti̍|anamat|yathA̱|ratha̍ḥ|aśvai̱ḥ|prajApa̍taya̍ iti# prajA - patayE|samiti|anamat|BUtEBya̍ḥ|samiti̍|anamat|yathA̱|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|BUtaiḥ|samanamaditi̍# saM-anamat|Evam|mahya̱m̍ ( )|BadrAḥ|saMnataya̍ iti saM - natayaḥ|samiti|namantu||51̍ (54)
verses.samhita: varuṇO&dBiḥ̍ sAmnE samanamadRucE̍ samanamadyathA̍ sAmarcA brahmaṇE̍ samanamat̍ kṣatrAya samanamadyathA̍ brahma# kṣatrEṇa rAjñE samanamad-viśE̍ samanamadyathA̍ rAjA# viśA rathAyaḥ̍ samanamadaśvE̱Byaḥ̍ samanamadyathA̍ rathO&śvai̱ḥ prajApatayE̍ samanamad-BUtEByaḥ̍ samanamadyathA̱̍ prajApatirBUtaiḥ̍ samanamadEvaM̍ mahyaM̍ ( ) BadrAḥ saMnatayaḥ̍ saM namantu||51̍

verses.padam: - Padam yE|ta|panthAnaḥ|savitaḥ|pUrvyAsa̍ḥ|arEṇava̍ḥ|vita̍tA̍ iti vi - tatAḥ|antarikṣE||tEBi̍ḥ|naḥ|adya|pathiBiriti̍# pathi - Biḥ|sugEBiriti# su - gEBiḥ|rakṣa̍|ca|naḥ|adhIti̍|ca|dEva|brUhi||nama̍ḥ|agnayE̱|pRuthivikṣita̍ iti# pRuthivi-kṣitE̱|lOkaspRuta iti# lOka - spRutE̱|lOkam|asmai|yajamAnAya|dEhi|nama̍ḥ|vAyavE̱|antarikṣakṣita̍ ityantarikṣa̍ - kṣitE̱|lOkaspRuta iti# lOka - spRutE̱|lOkam|asmai|yajamAnAya|dEhi|nama̍ḥ|sUryA̍ya|divikṣita̍ iti# divi - kṣitE̱|lOkaspRuta iti# lOka - spRutE̱|lOkam|asmai|yajamAnAya|dEhi||52̍ (44) (yE tE - catuścatvAriṃśat)̍ (A24)
verses.samhita: yE tE panthAnaḥ̍ savitaḥ pUrvyAsO&rEṇavO̍ vitatA̍ antarikṣE|tEBi̍rnO̍ adya pathiBiḥ̍ sugEBI rakṣA# ca nO adhi# ca dEva brUhi||namO&gnayE# pRuthivikṣitE# lOkaspRutE# lOkamasmai yajamAnAya̍ dEhi namO# vAyavE̱&ntarikṣakṣitE# lOkaspRutE# lOkamasmai yajamAnAya̍ dEhi namaḥ sUryAya̍ divikṣitE# lOkaspRutE# lOkamasmai yajamAnAya̍ dEhi||52 (yE tE - catuścatvAriṃśat)̍

verses.padam: - Padam yaḥ|vai|aśvasya|mEddhya̍sya|śira̍ḥ|vEda̍|śIṛqṣaṇvAniti̍# śIṛṣaṇ-vAn|mEddhyaḥ|Bavati|uṣAḥ|vai|aśva̍sya|mEddhya̍sya|śira̍ḥ|sUrya̍ḥ|cakṣu̍ḥ|vAta̍ḥ|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|candramA̱ḥ|śrOtra̱m|diśaḥ|pAdA̱ḥ|avAntaradiśA̍ ityavAntara̍ - diśAḥ|paṛśavaḥ|ahOrAtrE̍ ityahaḥ̍ - rAtrE|nimEṣa iti# ni - mEṣaḥ|ad^^rdhamAsA ityad^^rdha̍ - mAsAḥ|parvAṇi|mAsA̱ḥ|sadhAMnAnIti̍# saM - dhAnAni|Rutava̍ḥ|a~ggA̍ni|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|AtmA|raśmayaḥ|kEśA̱ḥ|nakṣa̍trAṇi|rUpam|tAra̍kAḥ|asthAni̍|naBa̍ḥ|mAṃqsAni̍|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|lOmA̍ni|vanaspata̍yaḥ|vAlA̱ḥ|agniḥ|muKa̱m|vaiśvAnaraḥ|vyAttamiti̍# vi - Atta̱m|53 (50)
verses.samhita: yO vA aśvasya̍ mEddhyasya̍ śirO vEda# śIṛṣaṇvAn mEddhyO# BavatyuṣA vA aśvasya̍ mEddhyasya̍ śiraḥ sUryaścakṣurvAtaḥ̍ prAṇaścandramAḥ śrOtraM diśaḥ pAdA# avAntaradiśAḥ paṛśavO&hOrAtrE̍ nimEṣO̱&rddhamAsAḥ̍ parvAṇi̍ mAsA̱ḥ sadhAMnA̱nyRutavO&~ggAni̍ saM~Mvathsara AtmA raśmayaḥ kEśA nakṣatrAṇi̍ rUpaM tArakA̍ asthAni naBO# mAṃqsAnyOṣadhayO̍ lOmAni̍ vanaspatayO̍ vAlA# agnirmuKaM̍ ~MvaiśvAnarO vyAttaṃ# - [ ] 53

verses.padam: - Padam samudraḥ|udara̱m|antarikṣam|pAyuḥ|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|Aṇḍau|grAvA̱|śEpaḥ|sOma̍ḥ|rEta̍ḥ|yat|ja~jjaByatE̱|tat|vIti̍|dyOtatE|yat|vidhUnuta̍ iti# vi-dhUnutE|tat|stanayati|yat|mEhati|tat|vaṛqṣati|vAk|Eva|asya|vAk|aha̍ḥ|vai|aśva̍sya|jAya̍mAnasya|mahimA|purastA̱t|jAyatE|rAtri̍ḥ|Enam|mahimA|paścAt|anviti̍|jAyatE|Etau|vai|mahimAnau̱|aśva̱m|aBita̍ḥ|samiti̍|baBUvatuḥ|haya̍ḥ|dEvAn|avahat̍ ( )|arvA̱|asurAn|vAjI|gandharvAn|aśva̍ḥ|manuṣyAn̍|samudraḥ|vai|aśva̍sya|yOni̍ḥ|samudraḥ|bandhu̍ḥ||54̍ (62) Prasna KOrvai with starting Padams Of 1 tO 25Anuvaakams :- (gAvO - gAvaḥ siṣAsantIḥ-̍ prathamE mAsi - samAnyO̍# - yadi sOmau-̍ ṣaḍahai - ruth sRujyA(3)n - dEvAnA# - markyEṇa̍ - carmA&va# - pRuthivyai - datvatE - kastvA - &gnayE - yO vai - yaḥ prAṇatO̍ - ya A̱tmadA - A brahma - nnA&krAn - jajñi bIja# - mAgnEyO̱&ṣṭAkapAlO̍ - &gnayE &ṃhOmucE̍ &ṣṭAkapAlO̍ - &gnayEsamanamad̍ - yE tE panthAnO̍ - yO vA aśvasyamEddhya̍sya̍ śiraḥ - pa~jcaviṃśatiḥ)̍ Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (gAvaḥ̍ - samAnyaḥ̍ - savanamaṣṭABi̍ - rvA EtE dEvakRuta~jcA̍ - &BijityA ityAhu̍ -rvaruṇO&dBiḥ̍ sAmnE - catuṣ̍ pa~jcAsat) First and Last Padam Of fifth Prasnam of 7th Kandam :- (gAvaḥ̍ - samudrO bandhuḥ̍ ) Kaanda Korvai with starting Padams of all 5 Prasanams of Kandam 7 prajananaṃ̍ - sAdyAḥ - prajavaM - bRuhaspati - rgAvaḥ - pa~jca# śamhita Korvai with starting Padams of all śeven Kandams iṣE - vAyavya̍M̍ - prajApati-̍ ryu~jjAnAḥ - sAvitrAṇi̍# - prAcInavaṃśO̍ - prajananaṃ̍ - sapta||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhEsaptamakAṇḍE pa~jcamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||||iti saptamaM kAṇḍaM||||iti taittirIyasaMhitA samAptA||========================================
verses.samhita: samudra udaramantari̍kṣaM̍ pAyu-rdyAvApRuthivI̍ Aṇḍau grAvA śEpaḥ sOmO rEtO yajja~jjaByatE̍ tadvi dyOtatE̍ yadvidhUnutE̍ tath stanayati̍ yanmEhati̍ tadvaṛṣati̍ vAgEvAsya vAgaharvA aśvasya̍ jAyamAnasya̍ mahimA purastA̱jjAyatE rAtrirEnaM̍ mahimA paścAdanu# jAyata Etau vai mahimAnA-̍ vaśvamaBitaḥ̍ saM baBUvaturqḥayO̍# dEvAnavaha̍ () darvA&surAn̍ vAjI gandharvAnaśvO̍manuṣyA̱nth̍ samudrO vA aśvasya̍ yOniḥ̍ samudrO bandhuḥ||54̍ Praśna kOrvai with starting padams of 1 to 25anuvAkams :- (gAvO - gAvaḥ siṣAsantIḥ-̍ prathamE mAsi - samAnyO̍# - yadi sOmau-̍ ṣaḍahai - ruth sRujyA(3)n - dEvAnA# - markyEṇa̍ - carmA&va# - pRuthivyai - datvatE - kastvA - &gnayE - yO vai - yaḥ prAṇatO̍ - ya A̱tmadA - A brahma - nnA&krAn - jajñi bIja# - mAgnEyO̱&ṣṭAkapAlO̍ - &gnayE&ṃhOmucE&ṣṭAka̍pAlO̍ - &gnayEsamanamad̍ - yE tE panthAnO̍ - yO vA aśvasyamEddhya̍sya̍ śiraḥ - pa~jcaviṃśatiḥ)̍ kOrvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (gAvaḥ̍ - samAnyaḥ̍ - savanamaṣṭABi̍ - rvA EtE dEvakRuta~jcA̍ - &BijityA ityAhu̍ -rvaruṇO&dBiḥ̍ sAmnE - catuṣ̍ pa~jcAsat) first and last padam of fifth Praśnam of 7th kAṇḍam :- (gAvaḥ̍ - samudrO bandhuḥ̍ ) kAṇḍa kOrvai with starting padams of all 5 Prasanams of kAṇḍam 7 (prajananaṃ̍ - sAdyAḥ - prajavaM - bRuhaspati - rgAvaḥ - pa~jca)̍ śamhita kOrvai with starting padams of all śeven kAṇḍams (iṣE - vAyavya̍M̍ - prajApati-̍ ryu~jjAnAḥ - sAvitrAṇi̍# - prAcInavaṃśO̍ - prajananaṃ̍ - sapta )||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM saptamakAṇḍE pa~jcamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||||iti saptamaM kAṇḍaM||||iti taittirIyasaMhitA samAptA||==================================

sections.text: brahmaq saMdha#ttaqM tanmE# jinvatam | kShaqtra(gm) sandha#ttaqM tanmE# jinvatam | iShaq(gm)q saMdha#ttaqM tAM mE# jinvatam | Urjaq(gm)q saMdha#ttaqM tAM mE# jinvatam | raqyi(gm) saMdha#ttaqM tAM mE# jinvatam | puShTiq(gm)q saMdha#ttaqM tAM mE# jinvatam | praqjA(gm) saMdha#ttaqM tAM mE# jinvatam | paqSUn thsaMdha#ttaqM tAnmE# jinvatam || stuqtO#&siq jana#dhAH | dEqvAstvA# SukraqpAH praNa#yantu || 1 (10)

suqvIrA$H praqjAH pra#jaqnayaqn parI#hi | SuqkraH SuqkraSO#ciShA || stuqtO#&siq jana#dhAH | dEqvAstvA# manthiqpAH praNa#yantu || suqpraqjAH praqjAH pra#jaqnayaqn parI#hi | maqnthI maqnthiSO#ciShA || saqjaMqgmAqnau diqva A pRu#thiqvyA&&yu#H | saMdha#ttaqM tanmE# jinvatam | prAqNa(gm) saMdha#ttaqM taM mE# jinvatam | aqpAqna(gm) saMdha#ttaqM taM mE# jinvatam | 2 (10)

vyAqna(gm) saMdha#ttaqM taM mE# jinvatam | cakShuqH saMdha#ttaqM tanmE# jinvatam | SrOtraq(gm)q saMdha#ttaqM tanmE# jinvatam | manaqH saMdha#ttaqM tanmE# jinvatam | vAcaq(gm)q saMdha#ttaqM tAM mE# jinvatam || Ayu#H sthaq Ayu#rmE dhattam | Ayu#r yaqj~jAya# dhattam | Ayu#r yaqj~japa#tayE dhattam | prAqNaH stha#H prAqNaM mE# dhattam | prAqNaM ~Myaqj~jAya# dhattam | 3 (10)

prAqNaM ~Myaqj~japa#tayE dhattam | cakShu#H sthaqScakShu#rmE dhattam | cakShu#r yaqj~jAya# dhattam | cakShu#r yaqj~japa#tayE dhattam | SrOtra(gg)# sthaqH SrOtra#M mE dhattam | SrOtra#M ~Myaqj~jAya# dhattam | SrOtra#M ~Myaqj~japa#tayE dhattam | tau dE#vau SukrAmanthinau | kaqlpaya#taqM daivIqrviSa#H | kaqlpaya#taqM mAnu#ShIH | 4 (10)

iShaq-mUrja#maqsmAsu# dhattam | prAqNAn paqSuShu# | praqjAM mayi# caq yaja#mAnE ca || nira#staqH SaNDa#H | nira#stOq marka#H || apa#nuttauq SaNDAqmarkau# saqhAmunA$ || Suqkrasya# saqmida#si | maqnthina#H saqmida#si || sa pra#thaqmaH saMkRu#tir viqSvaka#rmA | sa pra#thaqmO miqtrO varu#NO aqgniH ( ) | sa pra#thaqmO bRuhaqspati#ScikiqtvAn | tasmAq indrA#ya suqtamAju#hOmi || 5 (12) (naqyaq - ntvaqpAqna(gm) saMdha#ttaMq taM mE# jinvataM - prAqNaM ~Myaqj~jAya# dhattaMq - mAnu#ShIr - aqgnir dvE ca#) (A1) (SpEcial kOrvai fOr Anuvakam 1 ) brahma# kShaqtraM tat | iShaqmUrja(gm)# raqyiM puShTi#M praqjAM tAm | paqSun tAn | sandha#ttaqM tat | prAqNama#pAqnaM ~MvyAqnaM tam | cakShuqH SrOtraqM manaqstat | vAcaqM tAm | iqShAdiqpa~jca#kEq vAcaqM tAM mE$ | paqSUn thsaMdha#ttaqM tAnmE$ | prAqNAdiqtrita#yEq taM mE$ | aqnyatraq tanmE$ | ) 1.1.2 anuvAkaM 2 - athAgnyAdhAnaprakaraNaM, tatra kAlaviSEShavidhiH

kRutti#kA-svaqgni-mAda#dhIta | EqtadvA aqgnEr nakSha#tram | yat kRutti#kAH | svAyA#mEqvaina#M dEqvatA#yAmAqdhAya# | braqhmaqvaqrcaqsI Ba#vati || muKaqM ~MvA EqtannakSha#trANAm | yat kRutti#kAH | yaH kRutti#kA-svaqgni-mA#dhaqttE | muKya# Eqva Ba#vati || athOq Kalu# | 6 (10)

aqgniq-naqkShaqtramitya-pa#cAyanti | gRuqhAn.haq dAhu#kO Bavati || praqjApa#tI rOhiqNyA-maqgni-ma#sRujata | taM dEqvA rO#hiqNyA-mAda#dhata | tatOq vai tE sarvAqn rOhA#narOhann | tad-rO#hiqNyai rO#hiNiqtvam | yO rO#hiqNyA-maqgnimA#dhaqttE | RuqdhnOtyEqva | sarvAqn rOhA$n-rOhati || dEqvA vai BaqdrAH santOq&gni-mAdhi#thsanta | 7 (10)

tEShAqmanA#hitOq &gnirAsI$t | athai$ByO vAqmaM ~MvasvapA$krAmat | tE puna#rvasvOqrAda#dhata | tatOq vai tAn vAqmaM ~MvasUqpAva#rtata | yaH puqrA BaqdraH saMpApI#yAqn thsyAt | sa puna#rvasvO-raqgni-mAda#dhIta | puna#rEqvaina#M ~MvAqmaM ~MvasUqpAva#rtatE | BaqdrO Ba#vati || yaH kAqmayE#taq dAna#kAmA mE praqjAH syuqriti# | sa pUrva#yOqH Palgu#nyO-raqgni-mAda#dhIta | 8 (10)

aqryaqmNO vA EqtannakSha#tram | yatpUrvEq Palgu#nI | aqryaqmEtiq tamA#huqryO dadA#ti | dAna#kAmA asmai praqjA Ba#vanti || yaH kAqmayE#ta BaqgI syAqmiti# | sa utta#rayOqH Palgu#nyO-raqgnimAda#dhIta | Baga#syaq vA EqtannakSha#tram | yadutta#rEq Palgu#nI | BaqgyE#va Ba#vati || kAqlaqkaq~jjA vai nAmAsu#rA Asann | 9 (10)

tE su#vaqrgAya# lOqkAyAqgni-ma#cinvata | puru#Shaq iShTa#kAq-mupA#dadhAqt-puru#Shaq iShTa#kAm | sa indrO$ brAhmaqNO bruvA#Naq iShTa#kAqmupA#dhatta | EqShA mE# ciqtrA nAmEti# | tE su#vaqrgaM ~MlOqkamAprArO#hann | sa indraq iShTa#kAqmAvRu#hat | tE&vA#kIryanta | yE#&vAkI$ryanta | ta UrNAqvaBa#yO&Bavann | dvAvuda#patatAm | 10 (10)

tau diqvyau SvAnA#vaBavatAm | yO BrAtRu#vyavAqn thsyAt | sa ciqtrAyA#-maqgni-mAda#dhIta | aqvaqkIryaiqva BrAtRu#vyAn | OjOq bala#mindriqyaM ~MvIqrya#mAqtman-dha#ttE || vaqsantA$ brAhmaqNO$ &gnimAda#dhIta | vaqsaqntO vai brA$hmaqNasyaqrtuH | sva Eqvaina#-mRuqtAvAqdhAya# | braqhmaqvaqrcaqsI Ba#vati | muKaqM ~MvA EqtadRu#tUqnAm | 11 (10)

yad-va#saqntaH | yO vaqsantAq&gnimA#dhaqttE | muKya# Eqva Ba#vati | athOq yOni#mantamEqvainaqM prajA#taqmAdha#ttE | grIqShmE rA#jaqnya# Ada#dhIta | grIqShmO vai rA#jaqnya#syaqrtuH | sva Eqvaina#mRuqtAvAqdhAya# | iqndriqyAqvI Ba#vati | Saqradiq vaiSyaq Ada#dhIta | Saqradvai vaiSya#syaqrtuH | 12 (10)

sva Eqvaina#mRuqtAvAqdhAya# | paqSuqmAn Ba#vati || na pUrva#yOqH Palgu#nyO-raqgnimAda#dhIta | EqShA vai ja#GaqnyA# rAtri#H saM~Mvathsaqrasya# | yatpUrvEq Palgu#nI | pRuqShTiqta Eqva sa#M~MvathsaqrasyAq-gnimAqdhAya# | pApI#yAn-Bavati | utta#rayOqrAda#dhIta | EqShA vai pra#thaqmA rAtri#H saM~Mvathsaqrasya# | yadutta#rEq Palgu#nI ( ) | muqKaqta Eqva sa#M~MvathsaqrasyAq-gnimAqdhAya# | vasI#yAn Bavati || athOq Kalu# | yaqdaivaina#M ~Myaqj~ja u#paqnamE$t | athAda#dhIta | saivAsyarddhi#H || 13 (16) 1.1.3 anuvAkaM 3 - dEvayajanArthAH saMBArAH
