ahaq-nnahiqmanvaqpasta#tarda | pra vaqkShaNA# aBinaqt parva#tAnAm || ahaqnnahiqM parva#tE SiSriyAqNam | tvaShTA$&smaiq vajra(gg)# svaqrya#M tatakSha | vAqSrA i#va dhEqnavaqH syanda#mAnAH | a~jja#H samuqdra-mava#jagmuqrApa#H || vRuqShAqyamA#NO&vRuNItaq sOma$m | trika#drukEShva-pibath suqtasya# | A sAya#kaM maqGavA# dattaq vajra$m | aha#nnEnaM prathamaqjA mahI#nAm || 13 (10)

yadindrAha#n-prathamaqjA mahI#nAm | AnmAqyinAqmami#nAqH prOta mAqyAH | Ath sUrya#M jaqnayaqn dyAmuqShAsa$m | tAqdIknAq SatrUqnna kilA#vivithsE || aha#n vRuqtraM ~MvRu#traqtaraqM ~Mvya(gm)sa$m | indrOq vajrE#Na mahaqtA vaqdhEna# | skandhA(gm)#sIvaq kuli#SEnAq vivRu#kNA | ahi#H Sayata upaqpRuk-pRu#thiqvyAm || aqyOqddhyEva duqrmadaq A hi juqhvE | maqhAqvIqraM tu# vibAqdha-mRu#jIqSham | 14 (10)

nAtA#rIrasyaq samRu#tiM ~MvaqdhAnA$m | sa(gm) ruqjAnA$H pipiShaq indra#SatruH || viSvOq vihA#yA araqtiH | vasu#rdadhEq hastEq dakShi#NE | taqraNiqrna Si#Srathat | Sraqvaqsya#yAq na Si#Srathat | viSva#smAq idi#ShuddhyaqsE | dEqvaqtrA haqvyamUhi#ShE | viSva#smAq ithsuqkRutEq vAra#mRuNvati | aqgnir dvArAq vyRu#Nvati || 15 (10)

uduqjjihA#nO aqBi kAma#mIqrayann# | praqpRuq~jcan viSvAq Buva#nAni pUqrvathA$ | A kEqtunAq suSha#middhOq yaji#ShThaH | kAma#M nO agnE aqBiha#rya diqgByaH || juqShAqNO haqvyamaqmRutE#Shu dUqDhya#H | A nO# raqyiM ba#huqlA~g gOma#tIqmiSha$m | nidhE#hiq yakSha#daqmRutE#Shuq BUShann# || aSvi#nA yaqj~jamAga#tam | dAqSuShaqH puru#da(gm)sasA | pUqShA ra#kShatu nO raqyim || 16 (10)

iqmaM ~Myaqj~jamaqSvinA# vaqrddhaya#ntA | iqmau raqyiM ~Myaja#mAnAya dhattam | iqmau paqSUn ra#kShatAM ~MviqSvatO# naH | pUqShA na#H pAtuq sadaqma-pra#yucCann || pra tE# maqhE sa#rasvati | suBa#gEq vAji#nIvati | saqtyaqvAcE# BarE maqtim || iqdaM tE# haqvyaM GRuqtava#th-sarasvati | saqtyaqvAcEq praBa#rEmA haqvI(gm)Shi# | iqmAni# tE duriqtA sauBa#gAni ( ) | tEBi#rvaqya(gm) suqBagA#saH syAma || 17 (11) (vaqj - yrahI#nA - mRujIqShaM - ~MvyRu#Nvati - rakShatu nO raqyi(gm) - sauBa#gAqnyEka#M ca) (A4) 2.5.5 upahOmAH

yaqj~jO rAqyO yaqj~ja I#SEq vasU#nAm | yaqj~jaH saqsyAnA#muqta su#kShitIqnAm | yaqj~ja iqShTaH pUqrvaci#ttiM dadhAtu | yaqj~jO bra#hmaqNvA(gm) apyE#tu dEqvAn || aqyaM ~Myaqj~jO va#rddhatAqM gOBiqraSvai$H | iqyaM ~MvEdi#H svapaqtyA suqvIrA$ | iqdaM baqrq.hirati# baqraq.hI(gg)ShyaqnyA | iqmaM ~Myaqj~jaM ~MviSvE# avantu dEqvAH || Baga# Eqva Baga#vA(gm) astu dEvAH | tEna# vaqyaM Baga#vantaH syAma | 18 (10)

taM tvA# Bagaq sarvaq ijjO#havImi | sa nO# Baga pura EqtA Ba#vEqha || Bagaq praNE#taqr Bagaq satya#rAdhaH | BagEqmAM dhiyaqmuda#vaq dada#nnaH | Bagaq praNO# janayaq gOBiqraSvai$H | Bagaq pra nRuBi#r nRuqvanta#H syAma || SaSva#tIqH samAq upa#yanti lOqkAH | SaSva#tIqH samAq upa#yaqntyApa#H | iqShTaM pUqrta(gm) SaSva#tInAq(gm)q samA#nA(gm) SASvaqtEna# | haqviShEqShTvA &naqntaM ~MlOqkaM paraqmAru#rOha || 19 (10)

iqyamEqva sA yA pra#thaqmA vyaucCa#t | sA rUqpANi# kurutEq pa~jca# dEqvI || dvE svasA#rau vayataqstantra#mEqtat | saqnAqtanaqM ~Mvita#taq(gm)q ShaNma#yUKam | avAqnyA(gg) stantU$n kiqratO# dhaqttO aqnyAn | nAva#pRuqjyAtEq na ga#mAtEq anta$m || A vO# yantUdavAqhAsO# aqdya | vRuShTiqM ~MyE viSvE# maqrutO# juqnanti# | aqyaM ~MyO aqgnir ma#rutaqH sami#ddhaH | EqtaM ju#ShaddhvaM kavayO yuvAnaH || 20 (10)

dhAqrAqvaqrA maqrutO# dhRuqShNuvO#jasaH | mRuqgA na BIqmAsta#viqShEBi#-rUqrmiBi#H | aqgnayOq na Su#SucAqnA Ru#jIqShiNa#H | BrumiqM dhama#ntaq upaq gA a#vRuNvata || "vica#kramEq{1}", "trirdEqvaH{2}"|| AvEqdhasaqM nIla#pRuShThaM bRuqhanta$m | bRuhaqspatiq(gm)q sada#nE sAdayaddhvam | sAqdadyO#niqM damaq AdI#diqvA(gm)sa$m | hira#NyavarNamaruqSha(gm) sa#pEma || sa hi Suci#H Saqtapa#traqH sa SuqndhyUH | 21 (10)

hira#NyavASIriShiqraH su#vaqraq.ShAH | bRuhaqspatiqH sa svA#vEqSa RuqShvAH | pUqrU saKi#Bya A suqtiM ka#riShThaH || pUShaq(gg)qstava# vraqtE vaqyam | na ri#ShyEma kaqdA caqna | stOqtAra#sta iqha sma#si || yAstE# pUShaqnnAvO# aqntaH sa#muqdrE | hiqraqNyayI#raqntari#kShEq cara#nti | yABi#ryAsi dUqtyA(gm) sUrya#sya | kAmE#na kRuqtaH Srava# iqcCamA#naH || 22 (10)

ara#NyAqnyara#NyAnyaqsau | yA prEvaq naSya#si | kaqthA grAmaqM na pRu#cCasi | na tvAq BIri#va vindatI(3) || vRuqShAqraqvAyaq vada#tE | yaduqpAva#ti cicciqkaH | AqGAqTIBi#riva dhAqvayann# | aqraqNyAqnir-ma#hIyatE || uqta gAva# ivAdann | uqtO vESmE#va dRuSyatE | 23 (10)

uqtO a#raNyAqniH sAqyam | SaqkaqTIri#va sarjati || gAmaq~ggaiShaq Ahva#yati | dArvaq~ggaiShaq upA#vadhIt | vasa#nnaraNyAqnyA(gm) sAqyam | akru#kShaqditi# manyatE || na vA a#raNyAqnir.ha#nti | aqnyaScEnnABiqgacCa#ti | svAqdOH Pala#sya jaqgdhvA | yatraq kAmaqM nipa#dyatE ( ) || A~jja#nagandhI(gm) suraqBIm | baqhvaqnnAmakRu#ShIvalAm | prAhaM mRuqgANA$M mAqtara$m | aqraqNyAqnIma#Sa(gm)-siSham || 24 (14) 2.5.6 upahOmAH

vArtra#hatyAyaq Sava#sE | pRuqtaqnAq-sAhyA#ya ca | indraqtvA-&&va#rtayAmasi || suqbrahmA#NaM ~MvIqrava#ntaM bRuqhanta$m | uqruM ga#BIqraM pRuqthubu#ddhnamindra | Sruqtar.Shi#-muqgrama#Bi-mAtiqShAha$m | aqsmaBya#M ciqtraM ~MvRuSha#Na(gm) raqyiM dA$H || kShEqtriqyai tvAq nir.Ru#tyai tvA | druqhO mu#~jcAmiq varu#Nasyaq pASA$t | aqnAqgasaqM brahma#NE tvA karOmi | 25 (10)

SiqvE tEq dyAvA#pRuthiqvI uqBE iqmE || SaM tE# aqgniH saqhAdBira#stu | SaM dyAvA#pRuthiqvI saqhauSha#dhIBiH | Samaqntari#kSha(gm) saqha vAtE#na tE | SaM tEq cata#sraH praqdiSO# Bavantu || yA daivIqScata#sraH praqdiSa#H | vAta#patnIraqBi sUryO# vicaqShTE | tAsA$M tvA jaqrasaq Ada#dhAmi | pra yakShma# Etuq nir.Ru#tiM parAqcaiH || amO#ciq yakShmA$d-duriqtA-dava#rtyai | 26 (10)

druqhaH pASAqnnir.Ru#tyaiq cOda#mOci | ahAq ava#rtiqmavi#dath syOqnam | apya#BUd-BaqdrE su#kRuqtasya# lOqkE || sUrya#mRuqtaM tama#sOq grAhyAq yat | dEqvA amu#~jcaq-nnasRu#jaqnvyE#nasaH | EqvamaqhamiqmaM kShE$triqyAjjA#miSaq(gm)qsAt | druqhO mu#~jcAmiq varu#Nasyaq pASA$t || bRuha#spatE yuqvamindra#Scaq vasva#H | diqvyasyE#SAthE uqta pArthi#vasya | dhaqtta(gm) raqyi(gg) stu#vaqtE kIqrayE# cit | 27 (10)

yUqyaM pA#ta svaqstiBiqH sadA# naH || dEqvAqyudhaqmindraqmAjOhu#vAnAH | viqSvAqvRudha#maqBi yE rakSha#mANAH | yEna# haqtA dIqrGamaddhvA#naqmAyann# | aqnaqntamarthaqmani#varth-syamAnAH || yattE# sujAtE hiqmava#thsu BEShaqjam | maqyOqBUH SaMta#mAq yaddhRuqdO&si# | tatO# nO dEhi sIbalE || aqdO giqriByOq adhiq yat praqdhAva#si | saq(gm)qSOBa#mAnA kaqnyE#va SuBrE | 28 (10)

tAM tvAq mudga#lA haqviShA# varddhayanti | sA na#H sIbalE raqyimABA#jayEqha || pUrva#M dEvAq apa#rENA-nuqpaSyaq~jjanma#BiH | janmAqnyava#raiqH parA#Ni | vEdA#ni dEvA aqyamaqsmItiq mAm | aqha(gm) hiqtvA SarI#raM jaqrasa#H paqrastA$t || prAqNAqpAqnau cakShuqH SrOtra$m | vAcaqM mana#siq saMBRu#tAm | hiqtvA SarI#raM jaqrasa#H paqrastA$t | A BUtiqM BUti#M ~Mvaqyama#SnavAmahai ( ) || iqmA Eqva tA uqShasOq yAH pra#thaqmA vyaucCann# | tA dEqvya#H kurvatEq pa~jca# rUqpA | SaSva#tIqrnAva#pRujyanti | na ga#maqntyanta$m || 29 (14) 2.5.7 upahOmAH

vasU#nAqM tvA&&dhI#tEna | ruqdrANA#mUqrmyA | AqdiqtyAnAqM tEja#sA | viSvE#ShAM dEqvAnAqM kratu#nA | maqrutAqmEmnA# juhOmiq svAhA$ || aqBiBU#ti-raqhamAga#mam | indra#saKA svAqyudha#H | AsvASA#su duqShShaha#H || iqdaM ~MvarcO# aqgninA# daqttamAgA$t | yaSOq BargaqH sahaq OjOq bala#M ca | 30 (10)

dIqrGAqyuqtvAya# SaqtaSA#radAya | prati#gRuBNAmi mahaqtE vIqryA#ya || Ayu#rasi viqSvAyu#rasi | saqrvAyu#rasiq sarvaqmAyu#rasi | sarva#M maq Ayu#rBUyAt | sarvaqmAyu#rgESham || BUrBuvaqH suva#H || aqgnir-dharmE#NAnnAqdaH | mRuqtyur-dharmEqNAnna#patiH | brahma# kShaqtra(gg) svAhA$ || 31 (10)

praqjApa#tiH praNEqtA | bRuhaqspati#H pura EqtA | yaqmaH panthA$H | caqndramA$H punaraqsuH svAhA$ || aqgnira#nnAqdO&nna#patiH | aqnnAdya#maqsmin. yaqj~jE yaja#mAnAya dadAtuq svAhA$ || sOmOq rAjAq rAja#patiH | rAqjyamaqsmin. yaqj~jE yaja#mAnAya dadAtuq svAhA$ || varu#NaH saqmrAT thsaqmrATpa#tiH | sAmrA$jyamaqsmin. yaqj~jE yaja#mAnAya dadAtuq svAhA$ || 32 (10)

miqtraH kShaqtraM kShaqtrapa#tiH | kShaqtramaqsmin. yaqj~jE yaja#mAnAya dadAtuq svAhA$ || indrOq balaqM bala#patiH | bala#maqsmin. yaqj~jE yaja#mAnAya dadAtuq svAhA$ || bRuhaqspatiqr brahmaq brahma#patiH | brahmAqsmin. yaqj~jE yaja#mAnAya dadAtuq svAhA$ || saqviqtA rAqShTra(gm) rAqShTrapa#tiH | rAqShTramaqsmin. yaqj~jE yaja#mAnAya dadAtuq svAhA$ || pUqShA viqSAM ~MviTpa#tiH | viSa#maqsmin. yaqj~jE yaja#mAnAya dadAtuq svAhA$ ( ) || sara#svatIq puShTiqH puShTi#patnI | puShTi#maqsmin. yaqj~jE yaja#mAnAya dadAtuq svAhA$ || tvaShTA# paSUqnAM mi#thuqnAnA(gm)# rUpaqkRud-rUqpapa#tiH | rUqpENAqsmin. yaqj~jE yaja#mAnAya paqSUn da#dAtuq svAhA$ || 33 (14) special kOrvai (aqgniH sOmOq varu#NO miqtra indrOq bRuhaqspati#H saviqtA pUqShA sarasvatIq tvaShTAq daSa#) 2.5.8 upahOmAH

sa I$M pAhiq ya Ru#jIqShI taru#traH | yaH Sipra#vAn vRuShaqBO yO ma#tIqnAm | yO gO$traqBid-va#jraqBRudyO ha#riqShThAH | sa i#ndra ciqtrA(gm) aqBitRu#ndhiq vAjAn# || A tEq SuShmO# vRuShaqBa E#tu paqScAt | OttaqrAda#dhaqrAgA puqrastA$t | A viqSvatO# aqBi samE$tvaqrvA~g | indra# dyuqmna(gm) suva#rvaddhEhyaqsmE || prOShva#smai purOraqtham | indrA#ya SUqShama#rcata | 34 (10)

aqBIkE# cidu lOkaqkRut | saq~ggE saqmathsu# vRutraqhA | aqsmAka#M bOdhi cOdiqtA | naBa#ntA-manyaqkEShA$m | jyAqkA adhiq dhanva#su || indra#M ~Mvaqya(gm) Su#nAqsIra$m | aqsmin. yaqj~jE ha#vAmahE | AvAjaiqrupa# nO gamat || indrA#yaq SunAqsIrA#ya | sruqcA ju#huta nO haqviH | 35 (10)

juqShatAqM pratiq mEdhi#raH || pra haqvyAni# GRuqtava#ntyasmai | harya#SvAya BaratA saqjOShA$H | indraqrtuBiqr brahma#NA vAvRudhAqnaH | SuqnAqsIqrI haqviriqdaM ju#Shasva || vaya#H supaqrNA upa#sEduqrindra$m | priqyamE#dhAq RuSha#yOq nAdha#mAnAH | apa# dhvAqntamU$rNuqhi pUqrddhi cakShu#H | muqmuqgdhya#smAn niqdhayE#va baqddhAn || bRuqhadindrA#ya gAyata | 36 (10)

maru#tO vRutraqhanta#mam | yEnaq jyOtiq-raja#nayannRutAqvRudha#H | dEqvaM dEqvAyaq jAgRu#vi || kA miqhaikAqH ka iqmE pa#taq~ggAH | mAqnthAqlAH kuliq pari# mA patanti | anA#vRutainAqn-pradha#mantu dEqvAH | saupa#rNaqM cakShu#staqnuvA# vidEya || EqvA va#ndasvaq varu#NaM bRuqhanta$m | naqmaqsyA dhIra#maqmRuta#sya gOqpAm | sa naqH Sarma# triqvarU#thaqM ~Mviya(gm)#sat | 37 (10)

yUqyaM pA#ta svaqstiBiqH sadA# naH || nAkE# supaqrNamupaq yat-pata#ntam | hRuqdA vEna#ntO aqByaca#kShata tvA | hira#NyapakShaqM ~Mvaru#Nasya dUqtam | yaqmasyaq yOnau# SakuqnaM Bu#raqNyum || SaM nO# dEqvIraqBiShTa#yE | ApO# Bavantu pIqtayE$ | SaM ~MyOraqBisra#vantu naH || ISA#nAq vAryA#NAm | kShaya#ntI-Scar.ShaNIqnAm | 38 (10)

aqpO yA#cAmi BEShaqjam || aqPsu mEq sOmO# abravIt | aqntar viSvA#ni BEShaqjA | aqgniM ca# viqSvaSa#mBuvam | Apa#Sca viqSvaBE#ShajIH || yadaqPsu tE# sarasvati | gOShvaSvE#Shuq yanmadhu# | tEna# mE vAjinIvati | muKa#ma~ggdhi sarasvati || yA sara#svatI vaiSamBaqlyA | 39 (10)

tasyA$M mE rAsva | tasyA$stE BakShIya | tasyA$stE BUyiShThaqBAjO# BUyAsma || aqhaM tvada#smiq mada#siq tvamEqtat | mamA#siq yOniqstavaq yOni#rasmi | mamEqva sanvaha# haqvyAnya#gnE | puqtraH piqtrE lO#kaqkRujjA#tavEdaH || iqhaiva santatraq santa#M tvA &gnE | prAqNEna# vAqcA mana#sA biBarmi | tiqrO mAq santaqmAyuqrmA prahA#sIt | 40 (10)

jyOti#ShA tvA vaiSvAnaqrENOpa#tiShThE || aqyaM tEq yOni#r.Ruqtviya#H | yatO# jAqtO arO#cathAH | taM jAqnanna#gnaq ArO#ha | athA# nO varddhayA raqyim || yA tE# agnE yaqj~jiyA# taqnUstayE- hyArO#hAqtmA&&tmAna$m | acCAq vasU#ni kRuqNvannaqsmE naryA# puqrUNi# | yaqj~jO BUqtvA yaqj~jamAsI#daq svAM ~MyOni$m | jAta#vEdOq Buvaq AjAya#mAnaqH sakSha#yaq Ehi# || uqpAva#rOha jAtavEdaqH punaqstvam | 41 (10)

dEqvEByO# haqvyaM ~Mva#ha naH prajAqnann | Ayu#H praqjA(gm) raqyimaqsmAsu# dhEhi | aja#srO dIdihi nO durOqNE || tamindra#M jOhavImi maqGavA#namuqgram | saqtrAdadhA#naq-mapra#tiShkutaq(gm)q SavA(gm)#si | ma(gm)hi#ShThO gIqrBirA ca# yaqj~jiyO# &vaqvarta#t | rAqyE nOq viSvA# suqpathA# kRuNOtu vaqjrI || trika#drukEShu mahiqShO yavA#SiraM tuviqSuShma#stRuqpat | sOma#mapibaqd-viShNu#nA suqtaM ~MyathAva#Sat | sa I$M mamAdaq mahiq karmaq karta#vE maqhAmuqrum | 42 (10)

athaiqtaM ~MviShNa#vE caqruM nirva#pati | yaqj~jO vai viShNu#H | yaqj~ja EqvAntaqtaH prati# tiShThati | sO&tra# juhOti | viShNa#vEq svAhA# yaqj~jAyaq svAhA$ | praqtiqShThAyaiq svAhEti# || 63 (6) Special KOrvai [saqviqtA&&SUqnAM ~MvrI#hIqNAmindrO# maqhAvrI#hINAqmindra#H kRuqShNAnO$M ~MvrIhIqNAma#hOrAqtrE dvaqyAnA$M ~MvrIhIqNAm | piqtaraqH ShaTka#pAla(gm) saviqtA dvAda#SakapAlamindrAqgnI EkA#daSakapAlaqmindraq EkA#daSakapAlaqmindrOq daSa#kapAlaqM ~MviShNu#strikapAqlamahiqr BUmi#kapAlamaqSvinau$ dvikapAqlaM caqndramAqH pa~jca#daSakapAla-maqgniratvaShTAq vasa#vOq&ShTAka#pAlamaqnyatra# caqrum | ruqdrO$&ryaqmA pUqShA pa#SuqmAnth syAq(gm)q sOmO# ruqdrO bRuhaqspatiqH paya#si vAqyuH payaqH sOmO# vAqyuri#ndrAqgnI miqtra indraq ApOq brahma# yaqmO#&Biji#tyaiq tvaShTA$ praqjApa#tiH praqjAyai# paurNamAqsyA a#mAvAqsyA#yAq Aga#tyaiq viSvEq jityA# aqSvinauq Srutyai$ | brahmaq tadEqtaM ~MviShNuqH sa EqtaM ~MvAqyuH sa EqtadApaqstAH | piqtarOq viSvEq vasa#vO&kAmayantaqmEtiq ta EqtaM nira#vapann | ApO#&kAmayantaq mEtiq tA EqtaM nira#vapann | iqndrAqgnI aqSvinA#vakAmayEtAqM ~MvEtiq tAvEqtaM nira#vapadAm | aqhOqrAqtrE vA a#kAmayEtAqmitiq tE EqtaM nira#vapatAm | aqnyatrA#kAmayataqmitiq sa EqtaM nira#vapat | iqndrAqgnI SraiShThyaqmindrOq jyaiShThyaqmindrO# dRuqDhaH | AhiqH sUryO&di#tyaiq viShNa#vE pratiqShThAyai$ | sOmO# yaqmaH sa#mAqnAnA$m | aqgnirnO# rIriShadaqnyatra# rIriShaH] [viqduShO# haqviShAq ya u# cainadEqvaM ~MvEda# | iShTi#Biqrya u# cainA EqvaM ~MvEda# | aqnyatra# brAhmaqNE ya u# cainamEqvaM ~MvEda# ] Prapaataka KOrvai with starting Padams of 1 to 6 Anuvaakams :- (aqgnirna#-RuqddhyAsmaq-navO#navOq-&gnir-miqtra - (Both {15] and {16] appearing in T.B.2.4.1.4) ============= OM namaH paramAtmanE, SrI mahAgaNapatayE namaH SrI guruByO namaH, haqriqH OM 3.2 dvitIyaH prapAThakaH - daSapUrNamAsEShTibrAhmaNam 3.2.1 anuvAkaM 1 - vathsApAkaraNam

tRuqtIya#syAmiqtO diqvi sOma# AsIt | taM gA#yaqtryAha#rat | tasya# paqrNama#cCidyata | tat paqrNO#&Bavat | tat paqrNasya# parNaqtvam | brahmaq vai paqrNaH | yat pa#rNaSAqKayA# vaqthsAna#pAkaqrOti# | brahma#NaiqvainA#naqpAka#rOti || gAqyaqtrO vai paqrNaH | gAqyaqtrAH paqSava#H | 1 (10)

tasmAqt trINi#trINi paqrNasya# palAqSAni# | triqpadA# gAyaqtrI | yat pa#rNaSaqKayAq gAH prAqrpaya#ti | svayaiqvainA# dEqvata#yAq prArpa#yati | yaM kAqmayE#tA paqSuH syAqditi# | aqpaqrNAM tasmaiq SuShkA$grAqmAha#rEt | aqpaqSurEqva Ba#vati | yaM kAqmayE#ta paSuqmAnth syAqditi# | baqhuqpaqrNAM tasmai# bahuSAqKAmAha#rEt | paqSuqmanta#-mEqvaina#M karOti || 2 (10)

yat prAcI#mAqharE$t | dEqvaqlOqka-maqBija#yEt | yadudI#cIM manuShyalOqkam | prAcIqmudI#cIqmAha#rati | uqBayO$r lOqkayO#-raqBiji#tyai || iqShE tvOqrjE tvEtyA#ha | iSha#mEqvOrjaqM ~Myaja#mAnE dadhAti || vAqyavaqH sthEtyA#ha | vAqyurvA aqntari#kShaq-syAddhya#kShAH | aqntaqriqkShaqdEqvaqtyA$H Kaluq vai paqSava#H | 3 (10)

vAqyava# EqvainAqn pari# dadAti | pra vA E#nAnEqtadA-ka#rOti | yadAha# | vAqyavaqH sthEtyu#pAqyavaqH sthEtyA#ha | yaja#mAnAyaiqva paqSUnupa#hvayatE || dEqvO va#H saviqtA prArpa#yaqtvityA#haq prasU$tyai || SrEShTha#tamAyaq karma#Naq ityA#ha | yaqj~jO hi SrEShTha#tamaqM karma# | tasmA#dEqvamA#ha || ApyA#yaddhvamaGniyA dEvaBAqgamityA#ha | 4 (10)

vaqthsEBya#Scaq vA EqtAH puqrA ma#nuqShyE$Byaq-ScApyA#yanta | dEqvEBya# EqvainAq indrAqyApyA#yati || Urja#svatIqH paya#svatIqrityA#ha | Urjaq(gm) qhi paya#H saqmBara#nti || praqjAva#tI-ranamIqvA a#yaqkShmA ityA#haq prajA$tyai | mAva#H stEqna I#Sataq mA&GaSa(gm)#saq ityA#haq guptyai$ || ruqdrasya# hEqtiH pari# vO vRuNaqktvityA#ha | ruqdrA dEqvainA$-strAyatE || dhruqvA aqsmin gOpa#tau syAta baqhvIrityA#ha | dhruqvA EqvAsmi#n baqhvIH ka#rOti ( ) || 5 (10)

yaja#mAnasya paqSUn pAqhItyA#ha | paqSuqnAM gO#pIqthAya# | tasmA$thsAqyaM paqSavaq upa# saqmAva#rtantE || ana#dhaH sAdayati | garBA#NAqM dhRutyAq apra#pAdAya | tasmAqdgarBA$H praqjAnAqmapra#pAdukAH | uqparI#vaq nida#dhAti | uqparI#vaq hi su#vaqrgO lOqkaH | suqvaqrgasya# lOqkasyaq sama#ShTyai || 6 (9) 3.2.2 anuvAkaM 2 - barhirAharaNam

dEqvasya# tvA saviqtuH pra#saqva itya#Svapaqrq.SumAda#ttEq prasU$tyai | aqSvinO$r-bAqhuByAqmityA#ha | aqSvinauq hi dEqvAnA#maddhvaqryU AstA$m | pUqShNO hastA$ByAqmityA#haq yatyai$ || yO vA OSha#dhIH parvaqSO vEda# | nainAqH sa hi#nasti | praqjApa#tiqrvA OSha#dhIH parvaqSO vE#da | sa E#nAq na hi#nasti | aqSvaqpaqrSvA baqrq.hiracCai#ti | prAqjAqpaqtyO vA aSva#H sayOniqtvAya# | 7 (10)

OSha#dhInAqmahi(gm)#sAyai || yaqj~jasya# GOqShadaqsItyA#ha | yaja#mAna Eqva raqyiM da#dhAti | pratyu#ShTaq(gm)q rakShaqH pratyu#ShTAq arA#tayaq ityA#ha | rakSha#sAq-mapa#hatyai || prEyama#gAddhiqShaNA# baqrq.hiracCEtyA#ha | viqdyA vai dhiqShaNA$ | viqdyayaiqvainaqdacCai#ti || manu#nA kRuqtA svaqdhayAq vitaqShTEtyA#ha | mAqnaqvI hi par.Su#H svaqdhAkRu#tA | 8 (10)

ta Ava#hanti kaqvaya#H puqrastAqdityA#ha | SuqSruqvA(gm)sOq vai kaqvaya#H | yaqj~jaH puqrastA$t | muqKaqta Eqva yaqj~jamAra#BatE | athOq yadEqtaduqktvA yataqH kuta#ScAqhara#ti | tat prAcyA# Eqva diqSO Ba#vati || dEqvEByOq juShTa#miqha baqrq.hirAqsadaq ityA#ha | baqrq.hiShaqH samRu#ddhyai | karmaqNO&na#parAdhAya || dEqvAnA$M pariShUqtamaqsItyA#ha | 9 (10)

yadvA iqdaM kiM ca# | tad-dEqvAnA$M pariShUqtam | athOq yathAq vasya#sE pratiq prOcyAhEqdaM ka#riShyAqmIti# | EqvamEqva tada#ddhvaqryur-dEqvEBya#H pratiq prOcya# baqrq.hirdA#ti | AqtmanO&hi(gm)#sAyai || yAva#taH staqmbAn pa#ri diqSEt | yattEShA#-mucCiq(gg)qShyAt | atiq tad-yaqj~jasya# rEcayEt | Eka(gg)# staqmbaM pari#diSEt | ta(gm) sarva#M dAyAt | 10 (10)

uda#stAMPsIth saviqtA miqtrO a#ryaqmA | sarvA#-naqmitrA#-navadhIdyuqgEna# | bRuqhantaqM mAma#kara-dvIqrava#ntaM | raqthaqntaqrE Sra#yasvaq svAhA# pRuthiqvyAM | vAqmaqdEqvyE Sra#yasvaq svAhAq-&ntari#kShE | bRuqhaqti Sra#yasvaq svAhA# diqvi | bRuqhaqtA tvOpa#staBnOmi || A tvA# dadEq yaSa#sE vIqryA#ya ca | aqsmAsva#-GniyA yUqyaM da#dhAthEndriqyaM paya#H || yastE$ draqPsO yasta# udaqrq.ShaH | 105 (10)

daivya#H kEqtu rviSvaqM Buva#na-mAviqvESa# | sa na#H pAqhyari#ShTyaiq svAhA$ || anu# mAq sarvO# yaqj~jO#-&yamE#tu | viSvE# dEqvA maqrutaqH sAmAqrkaH | Aqpriyaq #007A;CandA(gm)#si niqvidOq yajU(gm)#Shi | aqsyai pRu#thiqvyai yadyaqj~jiya$M || praqjApa#tE rvartaqnimanu# vartasva | anu# vIqrairanu# rAddhyAmaq gOBi#H | anvaSvaiqranuq sarvai#ru puqShTaiH | anu# praqjayA-&nvi#ndriqyENa# | 106 (10)

dEqvA nO# yaqj~ja-mRu#juqdhA na#yantu || prati# kShaqtrE prati# tiShThAmi rAqShTrE | pratyaSvE#Shuq prati#tiShThAmiq gOShu# | prati# praqjAyAqM prati# tiShThAmiq BavyE$ | viSva#maqnyA&Bi# vAvRuqdhE | tadaqnyasyAq-madhi#SriqtaM | diqvE ca# viqSvaka#rmaNE | pRuqthiqvyai cA#karaqM nama#H || askAqndyauH pRu#thiqvIM | askA#nRuShaqBO yuvAq gAH | 107 (10)

skaqnnEmA viSvAq Buva#nA | skaqnnO yaqj~jaH praja#nayatu | askAqnaja#niq prAja#ni | A skaqnnAjjA#yatEq vRuShA$ | skaqnnAt praja#niShImahi || yE dEqvA yEShA#miqdaM BA#gaqdhEya#M baqBUva# | yEShA$M prayAqjA uqtAnU#yAqjAH | indra#jyEShThEByOq varu#NarAjaByaH | aqgnihO#tRuByO dEqvEByaqH svAhA$ || uqta tyA nOq divA# maqtiH | 108 (10)

brahma# pratiqShThA mana#sOq brahma# vAqcaH | brahma# yaqj~jAnA(gm)# haqviShAq-mAjya#sya | ati#riktaqM karma#NOq yacca# hIqnaM | yaqj~jaH parvA#Ni pratiqrannE#ti kaqlpayann# | svAhA#kRuqtA-&&hu#tirEtu dEqvAn || ASrA#vitamaqtyASrA#vitaM | vaSha#TkRuta-maqtyanU$ktaM ca yaqj~jE | ati#riktaqM karma#NOq yacca# hIqnaM | yaqj~jaH parvA#Ni pratiqrannE#ti kaqlpayann# | svAhA#kRuqtA-&&hu#tirEtu dEqvAn || 111 (10)

yadvO# dEvA atipAqdayA#ni | vAqcA ciqtpraya#taM dEvaq hEDa#naM | aqrAqyO aqsmA(gm) aqBi-du#cCunAqyatE$| aqnyatrAqsman-ma#rutaqsta-nnidhE#tana || taqtaM maq Apaqstadu# tAyataq puna#H | svAdi#ShThA dhIqtiruqcathA#ya SasyatE | aqya(gm) sa#muqdra uqta viqSvaBE#ShajaH | svAhA#-kRutasyaq samu#tRupNuta rBuvaH || “udvaqyaM tama#saqspari#{6}” | “uduq tyaM{7}” “ciqtraM{8}” | 112 (10)

“iqmaM mE# varuNaq{9}” “tattvA# yAmi{10}” | “tvaM nO# agnEq{11}” “sa tvaM nO# agnE{12}” | “tvama#gnE aqyA&siq{13}” “prajA#patE{14}” || iqmaM jIqvEBya#H pariqdhiM da#dhAmi | maiShAM nu# gAqdapa#rOq arddha#mEqtaM | SaqtaM jI#vantu Saqrada#H purUqcIH | tiqrO mRuqtyuM da#dhatAqM parva#tEna || iqShTEByaqH svAhAq vaShaqDani#ShTEByaqH svAhA$ | BEqShaqjaM duri#ShTyaiq svAhAq niShkRu#tyaiq svAhA$ | daurA$rddhyaiq svAhAq daivI$Bya-staqnUByaqH svAhA$ | 113 (10)

yaddE#vA dEvaqhEDa#naM | dEvA#saScakRuqmA vaqyaM | Adi#tyAq-stasmA$nmA mu~jcata | RuqtasyaqrtEnaq mAmuqta || dEvA# jIvanakAqmyA yat | vAqcA&nRu#tamUdiqma | aqgnirmAq tasmAqdEna#saH | gAr.ha#patyaqH pramu#~jcatu | duqriqtA yAni# cakRuqma | kaqrOtuq mAma#nEq nasa$M || 116 (10)

RuqtEna# dyAvApRuthivI | RuqtEnaq tva(gm) sa#rasvati | RuqtAnmA# mu~jcaqtA(gm)ha#saH | yadaqnya kRu#tamAriqma || saqjAqtaqSaq(gm)qsAduqta vA# jAmiSaq(gm)qsAt | jyAya#saqH Sa(gm)sA#duqta vAq kanI#yasaH | anA$j~jAtaM dEqvakRu#taqM ~MyadEna#H | tasmAqttvamaqsmA-~jjA#tavEdO mumugdhi || yadvAqcA yanmana#sA | bAqhuByA#-mUqruByA#-maShThIqvadByA$M | 117 (10)

SiqS~jai ryadanRu#taM cakRuqmA vaqyaM | aqgnirmAq tasmAqdEna#saH || yaddhastA$ByAM caqkaraq kilbi#ShANi | aqkShANA$M ~Mvaqgnumu#paq jiGna#mAnaH | dUqrEqpaqSyA ca# rAShTraqBRucca# | tAnya#PsaqrasAq-vanu#dattA-mRuqNAni# || adI$vyannRuqNaM ~MyadaqhaM caqkAra# | yadvA&dA$syanth saMjaqgArAq janE$ByaH | aqgnirmAq tasmAqdEna#saH || yanmayi# mAqtA garBE# saqti | 118 (10)

Ena#ScaqkAraq yatpiqtA | aqgnirmAq tasmAqdEna#saH || yadA# piqpESha# mAqtara#M piqtara$M | puqtraH pramu#ditOq dhayann# | ahi(gm)#sitau piqtarauq mayAq tat | tada#gnE anRuqNO Ba#vAmi || yadaqntari#kShaM pRuthiqvImuqta dyAM | yanmAqtara#M piqtara#M ~MvA jihi(gm)siqma | aqgnirmAq tasmAqdEna#saH || yadAqSasA# niqSasAq yatpa#rAqSasA$ | 119 (10)

yadEna#Sca kRuqmA nUta#naqM ~Myatpu#rAqNaM | aqgnirmAq tasmAqdEna#saH || ati#krAmAmi duriqtaM ~MyadEna#H | jahA#mi riqpraM pa#raqmE saqdhasthE$ | yatraq yanti# suqkRutOq nApi# duqShkRuta#H | tamArO#hAmi suqkRutAqM nu lOqkaM || triqtE dEqvA a#mRujataiq-tadEna#H | triqta Eqtanma#nuqShyE#Shu mAmRujE | tatO# mAq yadiq kiMci#dAnaqSE | aqgnirmAq tasmAqdEna#saH | 120 (10)

gAr.ha#patyaqH pramu#~jcatu | duqriqtA yAni# cakRuqma | kaqrOtuq mAma#nEqnasa$M || diqvi jAqtA aqPsu jAqtAH | yA jAqtA OSha#dhIByaH | athOq yA a#gniqjA Apa#H | tA na#H Sundhantuq Sundha#nIH || yadApOq nakta#M duriqtaM carA#ma | yadvAq divAq nUta#naqM ~Myatpu#rAqNaM | hira#Nya-varNAqstataq utpu#nIta naH ( ) || “iqmaM mE# varuNaq{15}” “tattvA# yAmi{16}” | “tvaM nO# agnEq{17}” “sa tvaM nO# agnE{18}” | “tvama#gnE aqyA&si#{19}” || 121 (13) (aqnEqnasa# - maShThIqvadByA(gm)# - saqti - pa#rAqSasA#&&naqSE$ - &gnirmAq tasmAqdEna#saH - punIta naqstrINi# ca) (A12) special kOrvai (yad dE#vAq gAr.ha#patyOq yaddhastA$ByAqM ~Myanmayi# mAqtA yadA#piqpEShaq ~Myadaqntari#kShaqM ~MyadAqSasA&ti#krAmAmi triqtE dEqvA diqvi jAqtA aqPsu jAqtA yadApa# iqmaM mE# varuNAq tattvA# yAmiq tvaM nO# agnEq sa tvaM nO# agnEq tvama#gnE aqyA&si#) 3.7.13 anuvAkaM 13 -avaBRuthE karmaNi RujIShaprOkShaNamantrAH

yattEq grAv.NNA# cicCiqduH sO#ma rAjann | priqyANya~ggA#niq svadhi#tAq parU(gm)#Shi | tathsaMdhaqth svAjyE#nOqta va#rddhayasva | aqnAqgasOq adhaqmithsaqkShaMyE#ma || yattEq grAvA# bAqhucyu#tOq acu#cyavuH | narOq yattE# duduqhu rdakShi#NEna | tattaq ApyA#yatAqM tattE$ | niShTyA#yatAM dEva sOma || yattEq tvaca#M biBiqduryaccaq yOni$M | yadAqsthAnAqt pracyu#tOq vEna#siq tmanA$ | 122 (10)

upa#kSharanti juqhvO# GRuqtEna# | priqyANya~ggA#niq tava# vaqrddhaya#ntIH | tasmai# tE sOmaq namaq idvaSha#Tca | upa# mA rAjanth sukRuqtE hva#yasva || saM prA#NApAqnAByAq(gm)q samuq cakShu#ShAq tvaM | sa(gg) SrOtrE#Na gacCasva sOma rAjann | yattaq Asthi#taq(gm)q Samuq tattE# astu | jAqnIqtAnna#H saqgaMma#nE pathIqnAM || EqtaM jA#nItAtparaqmE vyO#mann | vRukA$H sadhasthA viqda rUqpama#sya | 124 (10)

yadAqgacCA$t paqthiBi# rdEvaqyAnai$H | iqShTAqpUqrtE kRu#NutA-dAqvira#smai || ari#ShTO rAjannagaqdaH parE#hi | nama#stE astuq cakSha#sE raGUyaqtE | nAkaqmArO#ha saqha yaja#mAnEna | sUrya#M gacCatAtparaqmE vyO#mann || aBU$ddEqvaH sa#viqtA vandyOq nu na#H | iqdAnIqmahna# upaqvAcyOq nRuBi#H | vi yO ratnAq Baja#ti mAnaqvEBya#H | SrEShTha#M nOq atraq dravi#NaqM ~MyathAq dadha#t ( ) || upa# nO mitrAvaruNA-viqhAva#taM | aqnvAdI$ddhyA-thAmiqha na#H saKAyA | AqdiqtyAnAqM prasi#tir. hEqtiH | uqgrA SaqtApA$ShThA GaqviShAq pari#NO vRuNaktu || “ApyA#yasvaq{20}” “saM tE${21}” || 125 (15) 3.7.14 anuvAkaM 14 -avaBRuthE karmaNi sEcanAdimantrAH

yaddi#dIqkShE mana#sAq yacca# vAqcA | yadvA$ prAqNaiScakShu#ShAq yaccaq SrOtrE#Na | yadrEta#sA mithuqnEnA-pyAqtmanA$ | aqdByO lOqkA da#dhiqrE tEja# indriqyaM | SuqkrA dIqkShAyaiq tapa#sO viqmOca#nIH | ApO# vimOqktrI rmayiq tEja# indriqyaM || yadRuqcA sAmnAq yaju#ShA | paqSUqnAM carma#n. haqviShA# didIqkShE | yacCandO#Biq-rOSha#dhIBiq-rvanaqspatau$ | aqdByO lOqkA da#dhiqrE (da#dhirEq) tEja# indriqyaM | 126 (10)

SuqkrA dIqkShAyaiq tapa#sO viqmOca#nIH | ApO# vimOqktrI rmayiq tEja# indriqyaM || yEnaq brahmaq yEna# kShaqtraM | yEnE$ndrAqgnI praqjApa#tiqH sOmOq varu#NOq yEnaq rAjA$ | viSvE# dEqvA RuSha#yOq yEna# prAqNAH | aqdByO lOqkA da#dhirEq tEja# indriqyaM | SuqkrA dIqkShAyaiq tapa#sO viqmOca#nIH | ApO# vimOqktrI rmayiq tEja# indriqyaM || aqpAM puShpa#maqsyO-Sha#dhInAq(gm)q rasa#H | sOma#sya priqyaM dhAma# | 127 (10)

yaH piqtura#nuqjAyA$H puqtraH | sa puqrastA$nnayati | yO mAqtura#nuqjAyA$H puqtraH | sa paqScAnna#yati | viShva#~jcamEqvAsmA$t-pAqpmAnaqM ~MvivRu#hataH || yO arva#ntaqM jiGA(gm)#satiq tamaqBya#mItiq varu#Naq itiq SvAna#M caturaqkShaM prasau#ti | paqrO marta#H paqraH SvEtiq Suna#Scatu-raqkShasyaq praha#nti | SvEvaq vai pAqpmA BrAtRu#vyaH | pAqpmAna#-mEqvAsyaq BrAtRu#vya(gm) hanti || saiqddhraqkaM musa#laM Bavati | 13 (10)

daqkShiqNaqta udaq~gtiShThaqn prOkSha#ti | aqnEnASvE#naq mEddhyE#nEqShTvA | aqya(gm) rAjA$-&pratidhRuqShyO$-&stviti# | balaqM ~Mvai braqhmA | bala#marAqjOgraH | bala#naiq-vAsmiqn bala#M dadhAti || SaqtEna# sUtagrAmaqNiBi#H saqha hOtA$ | paqScAt-prA~gtiShThaqn prOkSha#ti | aqnEnASvE#naq mEddhyE#nEqShTvA | aqya(gm) rAjAq&syai viqSaH | 17 (10)

jyOqtiShA$ &pratiqKyEna# saH || viqSvaqrUqpANi# vAsAq(gm)qsi | AqdiqtyAnA$M niqbOdha#ta | sam~MvathsarINa#M karmaqPalaM | var.ShABir da#datAq(gm)q saha || aduHKO# duHKa ca#kShuriqva | tadmA# pIta ivaq dRuSya#tE | SItEnA$ vyatha#yanniqva | ruqruda#kSha ivaq dRuSya#tE || hlAdayatE$ jvala#taScaiqva ( ) | SAqmyata#ScAsyaq cakShu#ShI | yAvai prajA Bra(gg)#SyaqntE | sam~MvathsarAttA Bra(gg)#SyaqntE || yAqH prati#tiShThaqnti | saM~MvathsarE tAH prati#tiShThaqnti | vaqqrq.ShABya# ityaqrthaH || 11 (16)
anuvAkaM-4

akShi#duqHKOtthi#tasyaiqva | viqprasa#nnE kaqnIni#kE | A~gktE cAdga#NaM nAqsti | RuqBUNA$M tanniqbOdha#ta || kaqnaqkAqBAni# vAsAq(gm)qsi | aqhatA#ni niqbOdha#ta | annamaSrnIta# mRujmIqta | aqhaM ~MvO# jIvaqnapra#daH || EqtA vAqcaH pra#yujyaqntE | Saqradya#trOpaq dRuSya#tE | 12 (10)

aBidhUnvantO-&BiGna#nta iqva | vAqtava#ntO maqrudga#NAH || amutO jEtumiShumu#Kamiqva | sannaddhAH saha da#dRuSEq ha | apaddhvastair-vastiva#rNairiqva | viqSiqKAsa#H kapaqrdinaH || akruddhasya yOthsya#mAnaqsya | kRuqddhasyE#vaq lOhi#nI | hEmataScakShu#ShI viqdyAt | aqkShNayO$H kShipaqNOri#va || 13 (10)

durBikShaM dEva#lOkEqShu | maqnUnA#mudaqkaM gRu#hE | EqtA vAqcaH pra#vadaqntIH | vaiqdyutO# yAntiq SaiSi#rIH || tA aqgniH pava#mAnAq anvai$kShata | iqha jI#viqkAma-pa#ripaSyann | tasyaiqShA Bava#ti || iqhEha va#H svataqpasaH | maru#taqH sUrya#tvacaH | Sarma# saqprathAq AvRu#NE ( ) || 14 (10)
anuvAkaM-5

ati# tAqmrANi# vAsAq(gm)qsi | aqShTiva#jri SaqtaGni# ca | viSvE dEvA vipra#haraqnti | aqgniji#hva aqsaSca#ta || naiva dEvO# na maqrtyaH | na rAjA va#ruNOq viBuH | nAgnir nEndrO na pa#vamAqnaH | mAqtRukka#cca naq vidya#tE || diqvyasyaikAq dhanu#rArtniH | pRuqthiqvyAmapa#rA SriqtA | 15 (10)

tasyEndrO vamri#rUpEqNa | dhaqnurjyA#-maCiqnathsva#yaM || tadi#ndraqdhanu#rityaqjyaM | aqBrava#rNEShuq cakSha#tE | EtadEva Sam~MyOr-bAr.ha#spatyaqsya | Eqtad ru#drasyaq dhanuH || ruqdrasya# tvEvaq dhanu#rArtniH | Siraq utpi#pESha | sa pra#vaqrgyO#&Bavat | tasmAqd yaH sapra#vaqrgyENa# yaqj~jEnaq yaja#tE ( ) | ruqdrasyaq sa SiraqH prati#dadhAti | naina(gm)# ruqdra Aru#kO Bavati | ya EqvaM ~MvEda# || 16 (13)
anuvAkaM-6

aqtyUqrddhvAqkShO&ti#raScAt | SiSi#raH praqdRuSya#tE | naiva rUpaM na# vAsAq(gm)qsi | na cakShu#H pratiqdRuSya#tE || aqnyOnyaqM tu na# hi(gg)srAqtaH | saqta sta#d dEvaqlakSha#NaM | lOhitO&kShNi SA#raSIqrShNiH | sUqryasyO#dayaqnaM pra#ti || tvaM karOShi# nya~jjaqlikAM | tvaqM karO#Shi niqjAnu#kAM | 17 (10)

nijAnukAmE$ nya~jjaqlikA | amI vAca-mupAsa#tAmiqti || tasmai sarva RutavO# namaqntE | maryAdA karatvAt pra#purOqdhAM | brAhmaNa# ApnOqti | ya E#vaM ~MvEqda | sa Kalu sam~Mvathsara EtaiH sEnAnI#BiH saqha | indrAya sarvAn-kAmAna#Bivaqhati | sa draqqPsaH | tasyaiqShA Bava#ti || 18 (10)

ava# draqPsO a(gm)#SaqmatI#matiShThat | iqyAqnaH kRuqShNO daqSaBi#H saqhasrai$H | Avaqrta-mindraqH SacyAq dhama#ntaM | upasnuhi taM nRumaNA-matha#drAmiqti || Etayai vEndraH salA vRu#kyA saqha | asurAn pa#rivRuqScati | pRuthi#vyaq(gm)q Suma#tI | tAmaqnva-va#sthitaH sam~MvathsaqrO diqva~jca# | naivaM ~MviduShA-&&cAryA$n tEvAqsinau | anyOnyasmai$ druhyAqtAM ( ) | yO druqhyati | BraSyatE sva#rgAl lOqkAt | ityatu ma#NDalAqni | sUrya maNDalA$ nyAKyAqyikAH | ata Urddhva(gm)sa#nirvaqcanAH || 19 (15)
anuvAkaM-7

ArOgO BrAjaH paTara#H pataq~ggaH | svarNarO jyOtiShImAn#. viBAqsaH | tE asmai sarvE divamA#tapaqnti | UrjaM duhAnA anapasPura#nta iqti || kaSya#pO&ShTaqmaH | sa mahAmEruM na# jahAqti | tasyaiqShA Bava#ti || yattEq Silpa#M kaSyapa rOcaqnAva#t | iqndriqyAva#t puShkaqlaM ciqtraBA#nu | yasmiqn thsUryAq arpi#tAH saqpta sAqkaM | 20 (10)

tasmin rAjAna-madhiviSrayE#mamiqti || tE asmai sarvE kaSyapA-jjyOti#r -laBaqntE | tAnthsOmaH kaSyapAdadhi# nirddhaqmati | BrastA karma kRu#divaiqvaM || prANO jIvAnIndriya# jIvAqni | sapta SIr.Sha#NyAH prAqNAH | sUryA i#tyAcAqryAH || apaSyamaha mEtAnth sapta sU$ryAniqti | pa~jcakarNO# vAthsyAqyanaH | saptakarNa#Sca plAqkShiH | 21 (10)

AnuSravika Eva nau kaSya#pa iqti | uBau# vEdaqyitE | na hi SEkumiva mahAmE#ruM gaqntuM || apaSyamahamEtath sUryamaNDalaM pariva#rtamAqnaM | gAqrgyaH prA#NatrAqtaH | gacCanta ma#hAmEqruM | Eka#~jcAjaqhataM || BrAjapaTara pata#~ggA niqhanE | tiShThannA#tapaqnti | tasmA#diqha taptri# tapAH | 22 (10)

aqmutrEqtarE | tasmA#diqhA taptri# tapAH || tEShA#mEShAq Bava#ti || saqpta sUryAq divaq-manuq pravi#ShTAH | tAnaqnvEti# paqthiBi#r dakShiqNAvAn# | tE asmai sarvE GRutamA#tapaqnti | UrjaM duhAnA anapasPura#nta iqti || saptartvijaH sUryA i#tyAcAqryAH || tEShA#mEShAq Bava#ti || saqpta diSOq nAnA# sUryAH | 23 (10)

saqpta hOtA#ra Ruqtvija#H | dEvA AdityA# yE saqpta | tEBiH sOmABI rakSha#Na iqti || tada#pyAmnAqyaH | digBrAja RutU$n karOqti || Eta#yaivAqvRutA &&sahasrasUryatAyA iti vai#SampAqyanaH || tasyaiqShA Bava#ti || yaddyAva# indra tE Saqta(gm) SaqtaM BUmI$H | uqta syuH | na tvA# vajrinth saqhasraq(gm)q sUryA$H ( ) | 24 (10)

anu na jAtamaShTa rOda#sI iqti || nAnA li~ggatvA-dRutUnAM nAnA# sUryaqtvaM || aShTau tu vyavasi#tA iqti || sUryamaNDalA-nyaShTA#ta UqrddhvaM || tEShA#mEShAq Bava#ti || ciqtraM dEqvAnAq-muda#gAqdanI#kaM | cakShu#r miqtrasyaq varu#NasyAqgnEH | A&prAq dyAvA# pRuthiqvI aqntari#kShaM | sUrya AtmA jagatastasthu#ShaScEqti || 25 (9)
anuvAkaM-8

kvEdamaBra#M niviqSatE | kvAya(gm)# sam~MvathsaqrO mi#thaH | kvAhaH kvEyan dE#va rAqtrI | kva mAsA Ru#tavaqH SritAH || arddhamAsA# muhUqrtAH | nimEShAstu#TiBiqH (nimEShAstra#TiBiqH) saha | kvEmA ApO ni#viSaqntE | yaqdItO# yAntiq saMpra#ti || kAlA aPsu ni#viSaqntE | AqpaH sUryE# saqmAhi#tAH | 26 (10)

aBrA$NyaqpaH pra#padyaqntE | viqdyuthsUryE# saqmAhi#tA || anavarNE i#mE BUqmI | iqya~jcA#sau caq rOda#sI || ki(gg) svidatrAnta#rA BUqtaM | yEqnEmE vi#dhRutEq uBE | viqShNunA# vidhRu#tE BUqmI | iqti va#thsasyaq vEda#nA || irA#vatI dhEnuqmatIq hi BUqtaM | sUqyaqvaqsinIq manu#ShE daSaqsyE$ | 27 (10)

vya#ShTaBnAq-drOda#sIq viShNa#vEqtE | dAqdhartha# pRuthiqvI-maqBitO# maqyUKai$H || kinta-dviShNO rbala#mAqhuH | kAq dIpti#H kiM paqrAya#NaM | EkO# yaqddhA-ra#ya ddEqvaH | rEqjatI# rOdaqsI u#BE || vAtAdviShNOr ba#la mAqhuH | aqkSharA$d dIptiq rucya#tE | triqpadAqddhAra#yad dEqvaH | yadviShNO#rEkaq-mutta#maM || 28 (10)

(pagE 40) aqgnayO# vAya#vaScaiqva | Eqtada#sya paqrAya#NaM || pRucCAmi tvA pa#raM mRuqtyuM | aqvama#M maddhyaqma~jca#tuM | lOqka~jcaq puNya#pApAqnAM | Eqtat pRu#cCAmiq saMpra#ti || aqmumA#huH pa#raM mRuqtyuM | paqvamA#naM tuq maddhya#maM | aqgnirEqvAva#mO mRuqtyuH | caqndramA$-Scatuqrucya#tE || 29 (10)

aqnAqBOqgAH pa#raM mRuqtyuM | pAqpAH sa#m~Myantiq sarva#dA | ABOgAstvEva# sam~Myaqnti | yaqtra pu#NyakRuqtO ja#nAH || tatO# maqddhyama#mAyaqnti | caqtuma#gni~jcaq saMpra#ti || pRucCAmi tvA# pApaqkRutaH | yaqtra yA#tayaqtE ya#maH | tvannastad -brahma#n prabrUqhi | yaqdi vE$tthA&saqtO gRu#hAn || 30 (10)

kaqSyapA# dudi#tAH sUqryAH | pAqpAnni#rGnantiq sarva#dA | rOdasyOranta#r dESEqShu | tatra nyasyantE# vAsaqvaiH || tE &SarIrAH pra#padyaqntE | yaqthA &pu#Nyasyaq karma#NaH | apA$NyaqpAda# kESAqsaH | taqtra tE#&yOniqjA ja#nAH || mRutvA punarmRutyu-mA#padyaqntE | aqdyamA#nAH svaqkarma#BiH | 31 (10)

ASAtikAH krima#ya iqva | tataH pUyantE# vAsaqvaiH || apai#taM mRuqtyuM ja#yati | ya EqvaM ~MvEda# | sa Kalvaiva#M ~MvidbrAqhmaNaH | dIqrGaSru#ttamOq Bava#ti | kaSya#paqsyAti#thiqH siddhaga#manaqH siddhAga#manaH || tasyaiqShA Bava#ti || Ayasmina$-thsaqpta vA#saqvAH | rOha#nti pUqrvyA# ruha#H | 32 (10)

RuShi#r.ha dIrGaqSrutta#maH | indrasya GarmO ati#thiriqti || kaSyapaH paSya#kO Baqvati | yathsarvaM paripaSyatI#ti sauqkShmyAt || athAgnE#raShTapu#ruShaqsya | tasyaiqShA Bava#ti || agnEq naya# suqpathA# rAqyE aqsmAn | viSvA#ni dEva vaqyunA#ni viqdvAn | yuqyOqddhya#sma-jju#hurAqNamEna#H | BUyiShThAntE nama uktiM ~Mvi#dhEmEqti ( ) || 33 (10) saqmAhi#tA - daSaqsyE# - utta#maq-mucya#tE-gRuhAn-thsvaqkarma#BiH-pUqrvyA# ruha#-iqti) (A8)

agniSca jAta#vEdAqSca | sahOjA a#jirAqpraBuH | vaiSvAnarO na#ryApAqSca | paq~gktirA#dhAScaq sapta#maH | visarpE vAShTa#mO&gnIqnAM | EtE&ShTau vasavaH kShi#tA iqti || yathartvE-vAgnE-rarcirvarNa# viSEqShAH | nIlArciSca pItakA$rciScEqti || atha vAyO-rEkAdaSa-puruShasyaikAdaSa#strIkaqsya || praBrAjamAnA vya#vadAqtAH | 34 (10)

yASca vAsu#ki vaiqdyutAH | rajatAH paru#ShAH SyAqmAH | kapilA a#tilOqhitAH | UrddhvA avapa#tantAqSca | vaidyuta i#tyEkAqdaSa || nainaM ~MvaidyutO# hinaqsti | ya E#vaM ~MvEqda || sa hOvAca vyAsaH pA#rASaqryaH | vidyudvadhamEvAhaM mRutyumai$cCamiqti || na tvakA#ma(gm) haqnti | 35 (10)

ya E#vaM ~MvEqda || atha ga#ndharvaqgaNAH | svAnaq BrAT | a~gGA#riqr baMBA#riH | hastaqH suha#staH | kRuSA#nur viqSvAva#suH | mUrddhanvAnth-sU$ryavaqrcAH | kRutirityEkAdaSa ga#ndharvaqgaNAH || dEvASca ma#hAdEqvAH | raSmayaSca dEvA# garaqgiraH || 36 (10)

nainaM garO# hinaqsti | ya E#vaM ~MvEqda || gauqrI mi#mAya saliqlAniq takSha#tI | Eka#padI dviqpadIq sA catu#ShpadI | aqShTApa#dIq nava#padI baBUqvuShI$ | sahasrAkSharA paramE vyO#manniqti || vAcO# viSEqShaNaM || atha nigada#vyAKyAqtAH | tAnanukra#miShyAqmaH || vaqrAhava#H-svataqpasaH | 37 (10)

viqdyun ma#hasOq dhUpa#yaH | SvApayO gRuhamEdhA$ScEtyEqtE | yEq cEmE&Si#miviqdviShaH || parjanyAH sapta pRuthivImaBiva#r.Shaqnti | vRuShTi#Biriqti | Etayaiva viBakti vi#parIqtAH | saqptaBiqrvAtai# rudIqritAH | amUM ~MlOkA-naBiva#r.Shaqnti | tEShA#mEShAq Bava#ti || saqmAqna-mEqtaduda#kaM | 38 (10)

uqccaitya#vaq cAha#BiH | BUmi#M paqrjanyAq jinva#nti | divaM jinvan-tyagna#ya iqti || yadakSha#raM BUqtakRu#taM | viSvE# dEvA uqpAsa#tE | maqhar.Shi#masya gOqptAra$M | jaqmada#gniq-maku#rvata || jaqmada#gniq-rApyA#yatE | CandO#Bi-ScaturuttaqraiH | rAj~jaqH sOma#sya tRuqptAsa#H | 39 (10)

brahma#NA vIqryA#vatA | SiqvA na#H praqdiSOq diSa#H || tacCaq~MyyOrA vRu#NImahE | gAqtuM ~Myaqj~jAya# | gAqtuM ~Myaqj~japa#tayE | daivI$ svaqstira#stu naH | svaqstir mAnu#ShEByaH | UqrddhvaM ji#gAtu BEShaqjaM | SannO# astu dviqpadE$ | Sa~jcatu#ShpadE ( ) || sOmapA(3) asOmapA(3) iti nigada#vyAKyAqtAH || 40 (11)
anuvAkaM-10

saqhaqsraqvRudi#yaM BUqmiH | paqraM ~MvyO#ma saqhasra#vRut | aqSvinA# BujyU# nAsaqtyA | viqSvasya# jagaqtaspa#tI || jAyA BUmiH pa#tirvyOqma | miqthuna#ntA aqturya#thuH | putrO bRuhaspa#tI ruqdraH | saqramA# iti# strIpuqmaM || SuqkraM ~MvA#maqnyadya#jaqtaM ~MvA#maqnyat | viShu#rUpEq aha#nIq dyauri#va sthaH | 41 (10)

viSvAq hi mAqyA ava#thaH svadhAvantau | BaqdrA vA$M pUShaNAviqha rAqtira#stu || vAsA$tyau ciqtrau jaga#tO niqdhAnau$ | dyAvA#BUmI caqratha#H saq(gm)q saKA#yau | tAvaqSvinA# rAqsaBA$SvAq hava#M mE | SuqBaqspaqtIq Aqgata(gm)# sUqryayA# saqha || tyugrO# ha Buqjyu-ma#SvinOda mEqGE | raqyinna kaSci#n mamRuqvA~M(2) avA#hAH | tamU#hathur-nauqBirA$tmaqn-vatI#BiH | aqntaqriqkShaq pruDBiqra-pO#dakABiH || 42 (10)

tiqsraH kShapaqstrirahA# &tiqvraja#dBiH | nAsa#tyA BuqjyumU#hathuH pataq~ggaiH | saqmuqdrasyaq dhanva#nnAqrdrasya# pAqrE | triqBI rathai$H Saqtapa#dBiqH ShaDa#SvaiH || saqviqtAraqM ~Mvita#nvantaM | anu#baddhnAti SAMbaqraH | ApapUr.ShaM-ba#raScaiqva | saqvitA# &rEpaqsO# &Bavat || tya(gm) sutRuptaM ~Mvi#ditvaiqva | baqhusO#ma giqraM ~Mva#SI | 43 (10)

anvEti tugrO va#kriyAqntaM | AyasUyAnth sOma#tRuPsuqShu || sa sa~ggrAma-stamO$dyO&tyOqtaH | vAcO gAH pi#pAtiq tat | sa tadgOBiH stavA$ &tyEtyaqnyE | raqkShasA# &nanviqtASca# yE || aqnvEtiq pari#vRuttyAq&staH | EqvamEqtau sthO# aSvinA | tE EqtE dyu#H pRuthiqvyOH | aha#rahaqr-garBa#ndadhAthE || 44 (10)

tayO# rEqtau vaqthsA va#hOrAqtrE | pRuqthiqvyA aha#H | diqvO rAtri#H | tA avi#sRuShTau | daMpa#tI Eqva Ba#vataH || tayO# rEqtau vaqthsau | aqgniScA#-diqtyaSca# | rAqtrErvaqthsaH | SvEqta A#diqtyaH | ahnOq&gniH | 45 (10)

tAqmrO a#ruqNaH | tA avi#sRuShTau | dampa#tI Eqva Ba#vataH || tayO# rEqtau vaqthsau | vRuqtraSca# vaidyuqtaSca# | aqgnErvRuqtraH | vaiqdyuta# Adiqtyasya# | tA avi#sRuShTau | dampa#tI Eqva Ba#vataH || tayO# rEqtau vaqthsau | 46 (10)

uqShmA ca# nIhAqraSca# | vRuqtrasyOqShmA | vaiqdyuqtasya# nIhAqraH | tau tAvEqva prati#padyEtE || sEya(gm) rAtrI# gaqrBiNI# puqtrENaq sam~Mva#sati | tasyAq vA EqtaduqlbaNa$M | yadrAtrau# raqSmaya#H | yathAq gOrgaqrBiNyA# uqlbaNa$M | EqvamEqtasyA# uqlbaNa$M || prajayiShNuH prajayA ca paSuBi#Sca Baqvati ( ) | ya E#vaM ~MvEqda | Etamudyanta-mapiya#nta~jcEqti | AdityaH puNya#sya vaqthsaH | atha pavi#trA~ggiqrasaH || 47 (14)
anuvAkaM-11

paqvitra#vantaqH pariqvAjaqmAsa#tE | piqtaiShA$M praqtnO aqBira#kShati vraqtaM | maqhassa#muqdraM ~Mvaru#Na stiqrOda#dhE | dhIrA# icCEkuqrddharu#NEShvAqraBa$M || paqvitra#M tEq vita#taqM brahma#NaqspatE$ | praBuqrgAtrA#Niq paryE#Shi viqSvata#H | ata#ptatanUqr na tadAqmO a#SnutE | SrRuqtAsaq idvaha#n-taqstath samA#Sata || “braqhmA dEqvAnA$M{1}” || asa#taH saqdyE tata#kShuH | 48 (10)

RuSha#yaH saqptAtri#Scaq yat | sarvE&trayO a#gastyaqSca | nakSha#traiqH Sa~gkRu#tO &vasann || atha# savituqH SyAvASvaqsyA &vartti#kAmasya || aqmI ya RukShAq nihi#tA sa uqccA | naktaqM dadRu#SrEq kuha#ciqddivE#yuH | ada#bdhAniq varu#Nasya vraqtAni# | viqcAqkaSa#-ccaqndramAq nakSha#tramEti || tath sa#viqtur varE$NyaM | BargO# dEqvasya# dhImahi | 49 (10)

dhiyOq yO na#H pracOqdayA$t || tathsa#viqtur vRu#NImahE | vaqyaM dEqvasyaq BOja#naM | SrEShTha(gm)# sarvaqdhAta#maM | turaqM Baga#sya dhImahi || apA#gUhata savitAq tRuBIn# | sarvA$n diqvO andha#saH | nakta#006C;qtAnya#Bavan dRuqSE | asthyaqsthnA saMBa#viShyAmaH || nAmaq nAmaiqva nAqma mE$ | 50 (10)

braqhmaqvidA$pnOtiq para$M || tadEqShA&Byu#ktA | saqtyaM j~jAqna-ma#naqntaM brahma# | yO vEdaq nihi#taqM guhA#yAM paraqmE vyO#mann | sO$&SnutEq sarvAqn kAmA$nth saqha | brahma#NA vipaqScitEti# || tasmAqdvA EqtasmA#dAqtmana# AkAqSaH saMBU#taH | AqkAqSAd vAqyuH | vAqyOraqgniH | aqgnErApa#H | aqdByaH pRu#thiqvI | pRuqthiqvyA OSha#dhayaH | OSha#dhIqByO&nna$M | annAqt puru#ShaH || sa vA ESha puruShO&nna#rasaqmayaH || tasyEda#mEvaq SiraH | ayaM dakShi#NaH paqkShaH | ayamutta#raH paqkShaH | ayamAtmA$ | idaM pucCa#M pratiqShThA || tadapyESha SlO#kO Baqvati || 26 (21)

annAqdvai praqjAH praqjAya#ntE | yAH kASca# pRuthiqvI(gg) SriqtAH | athOq annE#naiqva jI#vanti | athai#naqdapi#yantyantaqtaH | annaq(gm)q hi BUqtAnAqM jyEShTha$M | tasmA$th sarvauShaqdha mu#cyatE | sarvaqM ~Mvai tE&nna#mApnuvanti | yE&nnaqM brahmOqpAsa#tE | annaq(gm)q hi BUqtAnAqM jyEShTha$M | tasmA$th sarvauShaqdha mu#cyatE | annA$d BUqtAniq jAya#ntE | jAtAqnyannE#na varddhantE | adyatE&tti ca# BUtAqni | tasmAdannaM taducya#ta iqti || tasmAdvA EtasmA-danna#rasaqmayAt | anyO&ntara AtmA$ prANaq mayaH | tEnai#Sha pUqrNaH || sa vA ESha puruShavi#dha Eqva | tasya puru#Sha viqdhatAM | anvaya#M puruShaq vidhaH | tasya prANa# Evaq SiraH || vyAnO dakShi#NaH paqkShaH | apAna utta#raH paqkShaH | AkA#Sa AqtmA | pRuthivI pucCa#M pratiqShThA || tadapyESha SlO#kO Baqvati || 27 (26)

prAqNaM dEqvA anuqprANa#nti | maqnuqShyA$H paqSava#Scaq yE | prAqNO hi BUqtAnAqmAyu#H | tasmA$th sarvAyuqSha mu#cyatE | sarva#mEqva taq Ayu#ryanti | yE prAqNaM brahmOqpAsa#tE | prANO hi BUtA#nAmAqyuH | tasmAth sarvAyuSha-mucya#ta iqti || tasyaiSha Eva SArI#ra AqtmA | ya#H pUrvaqsya || tasmAdvA EtasmA$t prANaqmayAt | anyO&ntara AtmA# manOqmayaH | tEnai#Sha pUqrNaH || sa vA ESha puruShavi#dha Eqva | tasya puru#ShaviqdhatAM | anvaya#M puruShaqvidhaH | tasya yaju#rEvaq SiraH | Rug dakShi#NaH paqkShaH | sAmOtta#raH paqkShaH | AdE#Sa AqtmA | atharvA~ggirasaH pucCa#M pratiqShThA || tadapyESha SlO#kO Baqvati || 28 (22)

yatOq vAcOq niva#rtantE | aprA$pyaq mana#sA saqha | AnandaM brahma#NO viqdvAn | na biBEti kadA#canEqti || tasyaiSha Eva SArI#ra AqtmA | ya#H pUrvaqsya || tasmAdvA EtasmA$n manOqmayAt | anyO&ntara AtmA vi#j~jAnaqmayaH | tEnai#Sha pUqrNaH || sa vA ESha puruShavi#dha Eqva | tasya puru#Sha viqdhatAM | anvaya#M puruShaq vidhaH | tasya Sra#ddhaivaq SiraH | RutaM dakShi#NaH paqkShaH | satyamutta#raH paqkShaH | yO#ga AqtmA | mahaH pucCa#M pratiqShThA || tadapyESha SlO#kO Baqvati || 29 (18)

viqj~jAna#M ~Myaqj~jaM ta#nutE | karmA#Ni tanuqtE&pi# ca | viqj~jAna#M dEqvAH sarvE$ | brahmaq jyEShThaq-mupA#satE | viqj~jAnaqM brahmaq cEd vEda# | tasmAqccEnna praqmAdya#ti | SaqrIrE# pApma#nO hiqtvA | sarvAn-kAmAnth-samaSnu#ta iqti || tasyaiSha Eva SArI#ra AqtmA | ya#H pUrvaqsya || tasmAdvA EtasmAd-vi#j~jAnaqmayAt | anyO&ntara AtmA#&&nandaqmayaH | tEnai#Sha pUqrNaH || sa vA ESha puruShavi#dha Eqva | tasya puru#ShaviqdhatAM | anvaya#M puruShaqvidhaH | tasya priya#-mEvaq SiraH | mOdO dakShi#NaH paqkShaH | pramOda utta#raH paqkShaH | Ana#nda AqtmA | brahma pucCa#M pratiqShThA || tadapyESha SlO#kO Baqvati || 30 (22)

asa#nnEqva sa# Bavati | asaqd brahmEtiq vEdaq cEt | asti brahmEti# cEd vEqda | santamEnaM tatO vi#duriqti || tasyaiSha Eva SArI#ra AqtmA | ya#H pUrvaqsya || athAtO#&nu praqSnAH || uqtA viqdvA naqmuM ~MlOqkaM prEtya# | kaScaqna ga#cCaqtI(3) | AhO# viqdvAnaqmuM ~MlOqkaM prEtya# | kaSciqt sama#SnuqtA(3) uq || sO#&kAmayata | baqhusyAqM prajA#yEqyEti# | sa tapO#&tapyata | sa tapa#staqptvA | iqda(gm) sarva#-masRujata || yadiqdaM ki~jca# | tathsRuqShTvA | tadEqvAnuq prAvi#Sat || tada#nupraqviSya# | saccaq tyaccA#Bavat | niqruktaqM cA ni#ruktaM ca | niqlaya#naqM cA ni#layanaM ca | viqj~jAnaqM cA vi#j~jAnaM ca | satyaM cAnRutaM ca sa#tya-maqBavat || yadi#daM kiq~jca | tathsatya-mi#tyA caqkShatE || tadapyESha SlO#kO Baqvati || 31 (28)

asaqdvA iqdamagra# AsIt | tatOq vai sada#jAyata | tadAtmAna(gg) svaya#-makuqruta | tasmAt tath sukRutamucya#ta iqti || yadvai# tath suqkRutaM | ra#sO vaiq saH | rasa(gg) hyEvAyaM ~MlabdhvA&&na#ndI Baqvati || kO hyEvAnyA$t kaH prAqNyAt | yadESha AkASa Ana#ndO naq syAt | ESha hyEvAna#ndayAqti || yaqdA hyE#vaiShaq Etasmin-nadRuSyE &nAtmyE &niruktE &nilayanE &BayaM prati#ShThAM ~MviqndatE | atha sO&BayaM ga#tO Baqvati || yaqdA hyE#vaiShaq Etasmin-nudara-manta#raM kuqrutE | atha tasya Ba#yaM Baqvati || tattvEva BayaM ~MviduShO-&ma#nvAnaqsya || tadapyESha SlO#kO Baqvati || 32 (16)

BIqShA&smAq-dvAta#H pavatE | BIqShOdE#tiq sUrya#H | BIShA&smA-dagni#-ScEndraqSca | mRutyur dhAvati pa~jca#ma iqti || saiShA&&nandasya mImA(gm)#sA Baqvati || yuvA syAth sAdhu yu#vA&ddhyAqyakaH | ASiShThO dRuDhiShThO# baliqShThaH | tasyEyaM pRuthivI sarvA vittasya# pUrNAq syAt | sa EkO mAnuSha# AnaqndaH || tE yE SataM mAnuShA# AnaqndAH | 33.a (10) sa EkO manuShya-gandharvANA#-mAnaqndaH | SrOtriyasya cAkAma#hataqsya || tE yE SataM manuShya-gandharvANA#-mAnaqndAH | sa EkO dEva-gandharvANA#-mAnaqndaH | SrOtriyasya cAkAma#hataqsya || tE yE SataM dEva-gandharvANA#-mAnaqndAH | sa EkaH pitRuNAM ciralOka-lOkAnA#-mAnaqndaH | SrOtriyasya cAkAma#hataqsya || tE yE SataM pitRuNAM ciralOka-lOkAnA#-mAnaqndAH | sa Eka AjAnajAnAM dEvAnA#-mAnaqndaH | 33.b (10) SrOtriyasya cAkAma#hataqsya || tE yE Sata-mAjAna-jAnAM dEvAnA# mAnaqndAH | sa EkaH karma-dEvAnAM dEvAnA#-mAnaqndaH | yE karmaNA dEvAna#pi yaqnti | SrOtriyasya cAkAma#hataqsya || tE yE SataM karmadEvAnAM dEvAnA#-mAnaqndAH | sa EkO dEvAnA#-mAnaqndaH | SrOtriyasya cAkAma#hataqsya || tE yE SataM dEvAnA#-mAnaqndAH | sa Eka indra#syAnaqndaH | 33.c (10) SrOtriyasya cAkAma#hataqsya || tE yE Satamindra#-syA&&naqndAH | sa EkO bRuhaspatE#-rAnaqndaH | SrOtriyasya cAkAma#hataqsya || tE yE SataM bRuhaspatE# rAnaqndAH | sa EkaH prajApatE#-rAnaqndaH | SrOtriyasya cAkAma#hataqsya || tE yE SataM prajApatE#-rAnaqndAH | sa EkO brahmaNa# AnaqndaH | SrOtriyasya cAkAma#hataqsya || 33.d (10) sa yaScA#yaM puqruShE | yaScAsA#-vAdiqtyE | sa Eka#H || sa ya# EvaqM ~Mvit | asmAllO#kAt prEqtya | Etamannamaya-mAtmAna-mupa#sa~gkrAqmati | EtaM prANamaya-mAtmAna-mupa#sa~gkrAqmati | EtaM manOmaya-mAtmAna-mupa#sa~gkrAqmati | EtaM ~Mvij~jAnamaya-mAtmAna-mupa#sa~gkrAqmati | EtamAnandamaya-mAtmAna-mupa#sa~gkrAqmati || tadapyESha SlO#kO Baqvati || 33.E (11)

yatOq vAcOq niva#rtantE | aprA$pyaq mana#sA saqha | AnandaM brahma#NO viqdvAn | na biBEti kuta#ScanEqti || Eta(gm) ha vA va# na taqpati | kimaha(gm) sAdhu# nAkaqravaM | kimahaM pApa-makara#va-miqti || sa ya EvaM ~MvidvAnEtE AtmA#na(gg) spRuqNutE || uqBE hyE#vaiShaq EtE AtmA#na(gg) spRuqNutE | ya EqvaM ~MvEda# || ityu#paqniSha#t || 34 (11) saqha nA# vavatu | saqha nau# Bunaktu | saqha vIqrya#M karavAvahai | tEqjaqsvinAq vadhI#tamastuq mA vi#dviShAqvahai$ || OM SAntiqH SAntiqH SAnti#H || (braqhmaqvididamayamidamEka#vi(gm)SatiH | annAq danna#rasaqmayAt prANOq vyAnO&pAna AkA#SaqH pRuthivI pucCaq(gm)q ShaDvi(gm)#SatiH | prAqNam prA#NaqmayAn ma#nOq yajuqr.q RuK sAmAdEqSO&tharvA~ggirasaH pucCaqm dvAvi(gm)#SatiH | yata#H Sraqddharta(gm) satyam ~MyO#gOq mahO#&ShTAda#Sa | viqj~jAnaqm priyaqm mOdaH pramOda Ana#ndOq brahma pucCaqm dvAvi(gm)#SatiH | asa#nnEqvAthAShTAvi (gm)#SatiH | asaqth ShODa#Sa | BIqShA&smAqn mAnuShOq manuShyagandharvANAqm dEvagandharvANAqm pitRuNAmciralOkalOkAnAq mAjAnajAnAm karmadEvAnAm ~MyE karmaNA dEvAnAqmindra#syaq bRuhaspatEqH prajApatEqr brahmaNaqH sa yaSva# saMkrAqmatyEka#pa~jcAqSat | yataqH kuta#Scaq naitamEkA#daSaq nava#) (A14) iti brahmAnandavallI samAptA ==================== OM namaH paramAtmanE, SrI mahAgaNapatayE namaH SrI guruByO namaH, haqriqH OM BRugu vallI saqha nA# vavatu | saqha nau# Bunaktu | saqha vIqrya#M karavAvahai | tEqjaqsvinAq vadhI#tamastuq mA vi#dviShAqvahai$ || OM SAntiqH SAntiqH SAnti#H || anuvAkaM - 15

BRuguqrvai vA#ruqNiH | varu#NaqM pita#raq-mupa#sasAra | adhI#hi BagavOq brahmEti# || tasmA# Eqtat prO#vAca | anna#M prAqNaM cakShuqH SrOtraqM manOq vAcaqmiti# || ta(gm) hO#vAca | yatOq vA iqmAniq BUtA#niq jAya#ntE | yEnaq jAtA#niq jIva#nti | yat praya#ntyaqBi sam~Mvi#Santi | tad viji#j~jAsasva | tad brahmEti# || sa tapO#&tapyata | sa tapa#-staqptvA || 35 (13)

AqnaqndO braqhmEtiq vya#jAnAt | AqnandAq-ddhyE#va-KalviqmAniq BUtA#niq jAya#ntE | AqnaqndEnaq jAtA#niq jIva#nti | AqnaqndaM praya#ntyaqBi-sam~Mvi#SaqntIti# || saiShA BA$rgaqvI vA#ruqNI viqdyA | paqraqmE vyO#maqn prati#ShThitA || ya EqvaM ~MvEdaq prati#tiShThati | anna#vAnannAqdO Ba#vati | maqhAn Ba#vati praqjayA# paqSuBi#r brahmavarcaqsEna# | maqhAn kIqrtyA || 40 (10)
